▁Bahobaho ▁viwa lawile ▁mwiingalawa , ▁wanhu ▁wa mmanya ▁Yesu .
▁“ Kolond a ▁ni kutendele ▁choni ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁no londa ▁kuwona .”
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha mtendela ni ▁vihile , ▁sekemu mu lihe ▁yehile ▁kwa ▁yehile . ▁Mbali ▁mutende ▁yanogile ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁dugila , ▁wa ndusa ▁kubwela ▁ukaye ▁kumwawo , ▁ mbali ▁mbwanga ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁Yelusalemu , ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule .
▁Chi no ▁chochilawilile ▁icho ▁chiyalongile ▁Yo we li , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mu l ugu ,
▁Wa nahina ▁wake , ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana ▁viwa wone ▁ivo , ▁wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁ko londa ▁chiu tange ▁moto ▁u hulumuke ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁uwa lungu ze ▁wose ?”
▁Ni kulongela ▁u mu lekele ▁mwanangu ▁yahite ‚ ▁muladi ▁ya ni tambikile , ▁ mbali ▁kulema ▁ku mulekela ▁yahite , ▁ivo ▁niza mkoma ▁chaudele ▁wako ▁wa ▁chilume .’ ▁”
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitondo , ▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁kahita ▁hanhu ▁ha hu p i ke ▁heli bule ▁wanhu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ndusa ▁ku mulonda , ▁na ▁viwamuwone , ▁wa londa ▁kun goma ▁sekeya segele .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Na ▁niye ▁nizawa uza ▁mbuli ▁imwe , ▁mwa hani dika , ▁na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁niza walongela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi ▁no ya tenda ▁yano .
▁“ Chila ▁imitondo ▁Haluni ▁viyo sasala ▁vitasa , ▁keza soma ▁ubani ▁wili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ivo ▁vino ▁weye ▁kwo daha ▁kudanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu ? ▁ Nokulongela ▁kweli , ▁yang ' hali ▁nz ogolo ▁hana kwika , ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu .”
▁Mbali ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁iya kalile ▁ko i longa ▁Yesu ▁i kala ▁lukuli ▁lwake .
▁Wa tuma ▁usenga ▁uno , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zetu ▁wose ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁womu kala ▁Antiyokiya ▁na ▁Siliya ▁na ▁Chilikiya , ▁cheye ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁walala ▁ndugu ▁zenu , ▁cho mu la m sa ni .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁kokala ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁yeye ▁kokala ▁ko ilumba ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Di no ▁no di longa ▁kwa ▁chila ▁munhu , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁mbasakanyo ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁na ▁kowa temela ▁mate ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo n pula .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁no lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kuvimanya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁uwa fikila .
▁One ▁mgulu ▁waha longa , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁niye ▁si ▁mkono , ▁niye ▁si ▁wa ▁lukuli ,” ▁si ▁wa ▁lukuli ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ?
▁M i lomo ▁yawo ▁i mema ▁u duwilo ▁na ▁usungu ▁mkulu .
▁Y eye ▁kawa tenda ▁wamwenga ▁wawe ▁watumigwa , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁walotezi , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wa peta ji ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁wamwenga ▁wa dimi ▁na ▁wafundiza .
▁Musa ▁viya humuluk e ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁kawa hiti la ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kawa safya , ▁nawo ▁wa ya sunh a ▁mawalo ▁yawo .
▁Niye ▁nizawa tenda ▁Wamisili ▁wawe ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala ▁muladi ▁wawa sondelele ni ▁mgati ▁muibahali , ▁niza i patila ▁utunhizo ▁kwa ▁ku mu huma ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁na ▁m ituka ▁yake ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wake .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa tenda ▁ivo , ▁wawa lava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago . ▁Wa tenda ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ L agilizo ▁kulu ▁ijo ▁dino . ▁‘ Tegelezeni , ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁yaidumwe .
▁One ▁uha mbandama ▁muke , ▁u teganye ▁muladi ▁sekeu mbandame ▁mndele ▁wake , ▁hebu ▁wazukulu ▁zake . ▁Wawo ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁habehi , ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁ni ▁za ▁chilo zo .
▁“ Siku ▁ya ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kuhak igwa ▁mavuta , ▁ wolondeka ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku . ▁N usu ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁uwo ▁keza ilava ▁imisi ▁na ▁nusu ▁imwenga ▁keza ilava ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Mbali ▁viwa kalile ▁wo mfunga ▁muladi ▁wa mu la n he ▁mibalati , ▁Paulo ▁kamulongela ▁mkulu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁yo ye mile ▁habehi , ▁“ Vino ▁vinoga ▁kumwenu ▁ku mu lanha ▁mibalati ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Loma ▁yang ' hali ▁hana tagusigwa ?”
▁Ng ' holo ▁za ▁Kohasi ▁zi kala ▁Wa a mu la mi ▁na ▁Wa i s hali ▁na ▁Wa he bu lo ni ▁na ▁Wa u zi eli .
▁Kwiza lumbiliza ▁mapanzia ▁matano ▁yawe ▁chi hande ▁chimwe , ▁mapanzia ▁yamwenga ▁matano ▁yawe ▁chi hande ▁chekaidi .
▁yahawa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ yatowigwe ▁keza pata ▁muhavu ▁na ▁ku daha ▁ku gendela ▁mhome , ▁iyo ▁ya mulumize ▁kezalekelelwa . ▁Mbali ▁kezamuli ha ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lo yagize ▁viyakalile ▁m di ko mwa ▁na ▁kolondeka ▁ya mu ugu ze ▁m baka ▁ya ho ne .
▁Iviya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁chinyala ▁na ▁za ▁ubozi ▁hebu ▁u ke we zi , ▁yayo ▁yose ▁kumwenu ▁haya faya . ▁M olondeka ▁mu mwing ' he ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Haluni ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viyamulagilize . ▁Ka sola ▁ch etezo ▁chake ▁na ▁kakimbila ▁m baka ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wowa i duganye ▁hamwe . ▁Viya wone ▁ hulo ▁jandusa , ▁ka guma ▁ubani ▁muna ▁i c h etezo ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁wanhu ▁kuilumba .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa ibwanha ▁chingubingubi ▁na ▁wa lila , ▁“ W eye ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁u weng ' hile ▁ugima ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁vino ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yaha bananga ▁ko wehila ▁wanhu ▁wose ?”
▁Ivo ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁ yenela ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lukulu .
▁Ze nga ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁viya ▁vonda nikulaguse .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni ▁niye ! ▁ Sekemudumbe !”
▁Ka lagiliza ▁ivo ivo ▁kwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁dekaidi ▁na ▁d eketatu ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Mwiza mulongela ▁Esau ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁izo ▁vonda mwi iting ' hane ▁nayo .
▁M sang ' hani ▁ija ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁ma sanduku ▁matano ▁ya ▁hela , ▁kahita ▁ka zi sang ' hanila , ▁ka pata ▁faida ▁ma sanduku ▁matano ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁hela .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ya p u wa ▁yayo ▁na ▁wa hindukila ▁mbuli ▁ zilibule ▁fambulo .
▁Sekemu leke ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yose ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zose ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁fana ▁viyamulagilize ni .
▁L a mu ka ▁uya gangamize ▁yaja ▁ya sigale ▁yeli ▁habehi ▁kudanganika ▁kwaviya ▁ni wona ▁kuwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁hazi komeleze ke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wangu .
▁Kwa viya ▁lu muli ▁vi lu lawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁m baka ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu .
▁Maabaho ▁wa mtemela ▁mate ▁m chi ha nga ▁na ▁wamtowa ▁ma gwa ng ' wa li , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wamtowa ▁ma ng ' huwa .
▁I teganye ▁sekeu mulongele ze ▁munhu ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁sekeu mkome ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁ubananzi , ▁kwa ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁heza walekelela ▁wanhu ▁wa bananzi .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mu danganika , ▁na ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁u fi sigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Chila ▁chitumetume ▁chinogile ▁na ▁hachi hunguke ▁chochose ▁cho lawa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁vo lawa ▁kwa ▁Tata , ▁mu lumba ji ▁wa ▁mab ung ' hulo , ▁ha hinduka ▁wala ▁ka bule ▁chilaguso ▁chochose ▁chochi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ko galuka ▁ galuka .
▁ Nolonda ▁kulonga ▁nina ▁luholozi ▁lukulu ▁na ▁usungu ▁hau mala ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu .
▁Ka fika ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁ha ▁kugona ▁chilo ▁chimwe ▁kwaviya ▁zuwa ▁di kala ▁di s wa . ▁Ka sola ▁dibwe ▁dimwe ▁da ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ka dika ▁hasi ▁ya ▁iditwi ▁jake , ▁kagona .
▁Hata ▁vinhu ▁vili bule ▁ugima ▁vovi lava ▁dizi , ▁ ihawa ▁chilonge ▁ longe , ▁ ihawa ▁chili mba , ▁one ▁havi lavile ▁dizi ▁dili ▁na ▁mbasakanyo . ▁I za ta mbu ligwa ▁ni ▁wila ▁u lihi ▁wou towigwa ▁na ▁chilonge longe ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁chim b e ta .
▁“ Kwiza wa tengenezel a ▁wanage ▁Haluni ▁ma jo ho ▁na ▁mi kwiji ▁na ▁ko fi ya ▁muladi ▁wa woneke ▁wana ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁ukulu .
▁Viya fikile ▁Kaisaliya , ▁kahita ▁Yelusalemu ▁na ▁ku walamusa ▁wahuwila , ▁m aabaho ▁kahita ▁Antiyokiya .
▁Wa segela ▁K ib ilosi ▁Hata ava ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Ha se lo si .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁viyakalile ▁ko gendelela ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kuno ga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁kulinganya , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁nhaguso ▁dodi kwiza , ▁Felisi ▁kadumba ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Leka ▁ teng ' hu , ▁sambi ▁kodaha ▁kuhita , ▁niha ilegeha ▁nizaku tanga ▁kaidi .”
▁Mbali ▁mgunda ▁one ▁wa ho ta ▁mi wa ▁na ▁ng ' ho ng e ▁hau faya , ▁na ▁wizakuwa ▁habehi ▁ku duwiligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁uhelelo ▁wake ▁ni ▁ku somigwa ▁moto .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kavi nanga ▁vi umbe ▁vose ▁vi gima ▁mwiisi , ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala ▁na ▁ndege ▁woguluka . ▁Ka sigala ▁Nuhu ▁muhala ▁na ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁muna ▁isafina .
▁Chi londa ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu . ▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁ni geza ▁kubwela ▁kaidi ▁kumwenu ▁kufosa ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁ mbali ▁Lufyende ▁kachi kimilila .
▁“ Vi nhu ▁vino ▁iviya ▁ni ▁venu , ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁vitumetume ▁vawo , ▁nhambiko ▁zose ▁za ▁Waisilaili ▁za ▁kwi n u ligwa ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso , ▁ni kwing ' ha ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike , ▁vi zakuwa ▁venu ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako ▁yeli ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁kodaha ▁kuja ▁vinhu ▁ivo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Walongele ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁kumwenu ▁sekeya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁kum dalisa ▁munhu ▁yadanganike ▁muna ▁u lukolo ▁lwake ,
▁“ Sekemu tende ▁fana ▁vimu kalile ▁mu tenda ▁m baka ▁sambi , ▁ya ni ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kakala ▁kotenda ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁mwenyewo ,
▁Pet a ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 4 5 , 6 5 0 .
▁Mbali ▁ko wona ▁kuwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuhumula ▁hano ga , ▁Na ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁iviya ▁ni ▁ya ▁ku nogeza . ▁Ko na miza ▁m gong o ▁wake ▁kupapa ▁mbahasha , ▁Na ▁kowa ngilizigwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁fana ▁mtumwa .
▁Niye ▁mulala ▁mulangulizi , ▁no kwandikila ▁weye ▁Gayo ▁mulondwa ▁wangu ▁yoni ku londa ▁muna ▁ikweli .
▁Nowalondel a ni ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ No walongele ni ▁kweli , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ha togoligwa ▁bule ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yake .
▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁mwanduso , ▁no mulamba ni ▁ mulongeleni ▁Mulungu ▁vinhu ▁vomu vi londa ▁na ▁ tambike ni ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa tambikile ni ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁na ▁mu mwing ' he ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Sa gule ni ▁wanhu ▁wabala ▁na ▁wene ▁kuvimanya ▁na ▁wene ▁ku hishimika ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila , ▁niye ▁nizawa tenda ▁wawe ▁walangulizi ▁wenu .’
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni mulagusa ni ▁mauzauza ▁mengi ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Tata . ▁Vino ▁ uza uza ▁dilihi ▁dodi mtenda ni ▁muni towe ▁na ▁mabwe ?”
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁ hita ▁kwaviya ▁ni msagula ▁yawe ▁chi a ▁changu , ▁ya gong ' onde ▁zina ▁jangu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wafalume ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .
▁Maabaho ▁Maliya ▁ka hi du ka ▁kuchisogo , ▁kamuwona ▁Yesu ▁kema ▁ mbali ▁ha vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁Yesu .
▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viyalondile ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ka tenda ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁damu ▁yangu ! ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ▁niha pulile ▁ni duwiligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku ba guligwa ▁na ▁Chilisito

▁Mbali ▁wakala ▁na ▁m bu za ▁zimwenga ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁kumsondelela ▁Mulungu ▁yawo ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁za ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwe ▁Yesu , ▁yoya kalile ▁kadanganika , ▁ mbali ▁Paulo ▁ka gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁ngima .
▁One ▁yaha wika ▁mgunda ▁wake ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁bei ▁yake ▁yo londeka ▁iwe ▁fana ▁i pangigwe .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tenda ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁yelile , ▁utali ▁wake ▁sent imita ▁gana ▁na ▁longo ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁ukala ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁vino ▁muladi ▁cheye ▁chi kalile ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ku muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁chi mwing ' he ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wake .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kulonga ▁mweye ▁mu batiz igwa ▁fana ▁wanahina ▁wangu .
▁Mu hulika ▁vini walongele ni , ▁‘ No segela ▁na ▁niza mbwelela ni .’ ▁One ▁muni londa ▁niye , ▁mwiza denelela ▁kwaviya ▁nohita ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁niye .
▁kuwa ▁keza mulagusa ni ▁diyelo ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni ▁mweye ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo .
▁One ▁u he ma , ▁vinoga ! ▁Mbali ▁one ▁ha wi mile , ▁kwiza u kanha .’ ▁”
▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁kawa tenda ▁m uilumb e ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁Mulungu ▁kamtenda ▁Chilisito ▁kuwa ▁ubala ▁wetu . ▁Kufos ela ▁yeye ▁cho petigwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁cho kuwa ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁chi komboligwe .
▁Sauli ▁kenuka ▁na ▁viya gubul e ▁meso ▁yake ▁ha dahile ▁kulola ▁chinhu ▁chochose . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa mu languliza ▁kwa ▁ku mwamha ▁mkono ▁m baka ▁Damasiki .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁hawa londile ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁wo sagula ▁kuitowa , ▁wanhu ▁wenu ▁weza di zunguluka ▁bululu ▁jawo .
▁Sauli ▁kakala ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁ bila ▁kulola . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁lose ▁ha dile ▁chinhu ▁wala ▁kung ' wa ▁chochose ▁bule .
▁Keza segeza ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁na ▁kuya timbula ▁hana ▁ulupango .
▁Ka londa ▁kuja ▁mak ang ' ha ▁yo wakalile ▁woja ▁nguluwe , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya mwing ' hile ▁chinhu ▁ndiya .
▁Ivo ▁muna ▁im iyaka ▁ija ▁saba ▁ya ▁ shi b e , ▁migunda ▁muna ▁iisi ▁i lava ▁ndiya ▁mvunyo ,
▁Wa guta ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁kuno ▁wolonga , ▁“ Yesu , ▁Mndewa , ▁uchi wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁Mbali ▁wose ▁wowa mmanyile ▁Yesu ▁na ▁waja ▁wanaake ▁wowamsondelel e ▁kulawa ▁Galilaya , ▁wema ▁kwa ▁kutali ▁wo lola ▁vinhu ▁ivo .
▁Wa nhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wabule ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁waha tenda ▁chinhu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo ▁wo tenda ▁fana ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁viyolonda , ▁wa nayo ▁malagilizo ▁yawo ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁wabule ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁na ▁Isilaili ▁muna ▁yamalaguso ▁ichilo ▁na ▁kamtanga , ▁“ Ya ko b o , ▁Yakobo !” ▁Na yo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Y e mwe , ▁ a i no ▁hano .”
▁Maabaho ▁ka we zila ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mu ng ' hali ▁mu gona ▁na ▁kuhumula ? ▁Loleni , ▁lusita ▁lufika ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ku tu ligwa ▁m makono ▁ya ▁wa hasanyi .
▁Bulahimu ▁mwenyewo ▁kalonga ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁ lumbu ▁jake , ▁Sala ▁iviya ▁kalonga ▁ivo ▁ivo . ▁Ni tenda ▁voilondeka ▁na ▁si sang ' hane ▁wihi .”
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha iwona ▁kuwa ▁ka nayo ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumsondelela ▁Mulungu ▁ mbali ▁ha lu kimilila ▁lulimi ▁lwake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko u vwizi la ▁moyo ▁wake ▁na ▁nzila ▁yake ▁iyo ▁hai faya ▁chinhu ▁bule .
▁ Muiteganye ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁seke yagize ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Wala ▁m zi zi ▁wili ▁usungu ▁seke usu ke ▁mgati ▁mmwenu ▁na ▁kuwa galila ▁magayo ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁kwa ▁usede ▁wake .
▁Weza mtendela ni ▁yano ▁yose ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁kwaviya ▁hawammanyile ▁bule ▁ija ▁yanhumile .
▁‘ Sekemu sang ' hane ▁ivo , ▁bule ▁ivo ▁mwiza ng ' o la ▁di savu ▁ijo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁uhemba .
▁Na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahalonda ▁kulema ▁kutogola ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁ivo ▁yavimanye ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁cha bule ▁chihendo ▁chimwenga ▁chochose ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁fana ▁icho ▁wala ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Kolond a ▁uchi tende ▁choni , ▁weye ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti ? ▁Vino ▁kwiza ▁kuchi komeleza ? ▁No ku manya ▁weye ▁iyo ▁Yelile ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Muhe ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁imwenga ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁imwenga ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ kuhonya ▁utamu .
▁Ma ge zo ▁yon gezigwa ▁ni ▁ya ka wa i da ▁kwa ▁wanhu . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kokwaminika , ▁nayo ▁heza togola ▁mu gezigwe ▁kufosa ▁nguvu ▁zenu , ▁ mbali ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ku gezigwa , ▁keza weng ' heni ▁iviya ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kulawa ▁umo ▁vinogile .
▁Yakobo ▁kaha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁Mulungu ▁ho yalongile ▁nayo ▁Beseli .
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wowa petigwe ▁wakala ▁ 6 0 1 , 7 3 0 .
▁Wa nahina ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁wa mu la m sa ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁Mndewa ! ▁Cho danganika !” ▁Yesu ▁ka lamka , ▁kadi bwakila ▁beho ▁diya ▁na ▁mawimbi ▁ya ▁mazi , ▁navo ▁vi hu p ika ▁hupi i , ▁kuwa ▁zi nzi wa .
▁Musa ▁kai sola ▁m ivuha ▁ya ▁Yosefu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Yosefu ▁viyalagilize ▁lusita ▁yang ' hali ▁hana danganika . ▁Kawa la hiza ▁Waisilaili , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁vondaya mulave ni , ▁m olondeka ▁mui p a pe ▁m ivuha ▁yangu ▁mu segele ▁nayo .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Chilisito ▁hai londile ▁mwenyewo ▁bule , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ M a li go ▁yose ▁yowa ku li gile ▁weye , ▁ya ni pata ▁niye ▁Mulungu .”
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kulonga ▁yayo , ▁kawa la g u sila ▁makono ▁yake ▁na ▁lu ba vu ▁lwake . ▁Wa nahina ▁wa denelela ▁na ni ▁kwaviya ▁wa muwona ▁Mndewa .
▁“ Sekeu mba manye ▁nyambenyambe ▁hebu ▁kum gaza , ▁mana ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mukala ▁nyambenyambe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Kwa viya ▁chitumetume ▁chetu ▁cha ▁umanyi ▁ni ▁chidodo , ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁chetu ▁cha ▁ ulotezi ▁ni ▁chidogo ,
▁Labani ▁viya i wonile ▁ija ▁i mhete ▁na ▁di kung ' hu ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁mwa li ▁wake , ▁na ▁kuzi hulika ▁mbuli ▁Lebeka ▁ziya longiligwe ▁na ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁Labani ▁ka mfika ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kema ▁habehi ▁na ▁ngamiya ▁wake ▁hamgwazo ▁wa ▁inzasa .
▁Yesu ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁kuno ▁kau papa ▁msalaba ▁wake , ▁kahita ▁hanhu ▁ho ha tangigwe ▁“ B o mbwe ” ▁Kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya ▁“ Gol i go ta ” .
▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁kawasagula ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁kuwa temela ▁mate ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁baho ▁hawa kalile ▁wageni ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁na ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁mkulu ▁kawa lava ▁muna ▁isi ▁iyo
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mami ▁yako ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁wa ku n ze , ▁wo londa ▁ku kuwona .”
▁Wa landula ▁ya madizi , ▁“ Mu wambe ▁mumsalaba !”
▁ Nolonda ▁mu m manye ▁ lumbu ▁jetu ▁F ib i , ▁yeli ▁msang ' hani ▁muna ▁di m bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁da ▁Ke m ke li ya .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁ mwing ' heni ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁kufose la ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁Vi ku kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁ku kunguzuka , ▁Paulo ▁ka walamba ▁wose ▁wa je , ▁“ Kwa ▁siku ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁mukala ▁mo dumba , ▁na ▁hamu dile ▁chinhu ▁chochose .”
▁One ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ha lawile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁bule , ▁sigambe ▁ya dahe ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose .”
▁Musa ▁kamulongela , ▁“ L usita ▁vondani lawe ▁muna ▁dibululu , ▁niza k winula ▁makono ▁yangu ▁kuchanyha ▁na ▁ku mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁M i bumo ▁iza leka , ▁hebu ▁ha kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁kaidi , ▁muladi ▁ uvimanye ▁kuwa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁ni ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁chihongwe ▁kwiza mkombola ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁mwanang ' hondolo , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁hu daha ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁kwiza mkoma ▁kwa ▁kum bena ▁isi ngo ▁yake . ▁Iviya ▁kwiza mkombola ▁chila ▁mwanago ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Katenda ▁mibiki ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁hema
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁niwa ▁vino ▁vini li , ▁na ▁unovu ▁uya ning ' hile ▁uwa ▁si ▁bule , ▁ila ▁niiyo ha ▁ng ' hani ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁kufosa ▁watumigwa ▁wose , ▁inga wa ▁hai kalile ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu ▁mwenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wo sang ' hana ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye .
▁Yesu ▁vi yengile ▁Kapelinaumu , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma ▁ka mwizila ▁na ▁ka mulamba ▁yam taze ,
▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁i lawilila ▁miyanza ▁mitatu , ▁m aabaho ▁ go lole ▁diya ▁di bwelezigwa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁hebu ▁mulume ▁ya he ng iligwa ▁na ▁migongo ▁na ▁ku muwonela ▁migongo ▁muke ▁wake , ▁keza mwika ▁muke ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezatenda ▁fana ▁viili ▁ndagilizi ▁iyo .
▁“ Mwiza gwiligwa ▁na ▁ku tu ligwa ▁muladi ▁mu tagusigwe ▁na ▁mwiza komigwa . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza mwihila ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu .
▁Enosi ▁viya malile ▁kumwelek a ▁Kenani , ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane ▁na ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁na ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Paulo ▁kakala ▁na ▁ka lamula ▁kugendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁ bila ▁kufose la ▁Efeso , ▁muladi ▁sekeya kala me ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁himahima ▁da ▁kufika ▁Yelusalemu ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁P e n t e ko si t e , ▁one ▁ihadahika .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁um ting ' hano ▁ko hokela ▁lu gubul o ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁yolonga ▁kolondeka ▁ya nyama le .
▁M i tu fi ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ndege ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁ha he zakuwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁wa ▁kuwawinga .
▁One ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁uha mwamha ▁na ▁k wene la ▁lukuli ▁lwose , ▁kwandusi la ▁kuna ▁di do si ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁u lwa yo ▁fana ▁vondaya wone ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ,
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mbwiy a , ▁ tenda ▁hima ▁diya ▁di kugalile .” ▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁weza ▁na ▁wa mgwila ▁Yesu , ▁wam ta tali za .
▁Zu a ▁diza galusigwa ▁kuwa ▁ziza , ▁na ▁mwezi ▁wiza galusigwa ▁kuwa ▁m dung ' hu ▁fana ▁damu , ▁ing ' hali ▁hai na fika ▁Isi ku ▁ija ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁da ▁utunhizo ▁da ▁Mndewa .
▁Wa nhu ▁watano ▁vimwili ▁weza wawinga ▁wanhu ▁gana ▁dimwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁gana ▁dimwe ▁vimwili ▁weza wawinga ▁wanhu ▁1 0 ,000 . ▁W e hi ▁wenu ▁wezadanganika ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁panga .
▁“ Ni kutenda ▁u manyike ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wou ni ni le ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wako , ▁weye ▁kuni na ▁wawe ▁wangu , ▁na ▁wawo ▁wa yamha ▁mbuli ▁yako .
▁Kuna ▁ulonzi ▁mwingi ▁mbasakanyo ▁muna ▁isi , ▁na ▁ habule ▁ulonzi ▁hau manyika .
▁ mbali ▁siku ▁zino ▁za ▁uhelelo ▁kalonga ▁na ▁cheye ▁kufose la ▁Mwanage , ▁Mwanage ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ija ▁kufose la ▁yeye ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁isi ▁yose , ▁ija ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi we ▁vake ▁ya vi tawale .
▁Mbuli ▁zozi mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁zozi lawa ▁muna ▁zim beyu ▁zozi ha ndigwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowo londa ▁tindiwalo .
▁Mbali ▁inga wa ▁nilonga ▁yano ▁yose , ▁mung ' hali ▁hamu muhuwila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ,
▁Ka dika ▁hakwe ▁bululu ▁da ▁Beseli ▁muna ▁di tambala le ▁da ▁chuwala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁bululu ▁da ▁L a mo si ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Gileadi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi , ▁bululu ▁da ▁Go la ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Bashani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase .
▁Ugima ▁wenu ▁ wolondeka ▁u langulizigw e ▁na ▁ulondo , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viya chi nogele ▁cheye ▁na ▁ka lava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁fana ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁sadaka ▁na ▁za b i hu ▁ya ▁ku mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁munhu ▁ko zi hulika ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁na ▁ha za mha ▁bule , ▁niye ▁si mtagusa . ▁Kwa viya ▁si zile ▁ku tagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ mbali ▁kuwakombola .
▁Ka mulava ▁muna ▁uzidilwa ▁wake ▁wose . ▁Yosefu ▁viya lawilile ▁yang ' hali ▁kulawilila ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁nzewele ▁na ▁ubala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁nayo ▁kamtenda ▁yawe ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁kaye ▁yake ▁yose .
▁Maabaho ▁u vi ke ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁muna ▁ichi gelo ▁chimwe ▁na ▁u vi lave ▁hamwe ▁na ▁diya ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁m alume ▁maidi .
▁Ivo ▁mu yeli ze ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁muwe ▁welile ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Kwa viya ▁mbuli ▁zozi daha ▁ku manyika ▁kuson hela ▁Mulungu ▁zi manyike ▁kumwawo ▁funhufunhu . ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁ka zi tenda ▁zi we ▁funhufunhu .
▁Petili ▁hachi manyile ▁cha ▁kulonga ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁na ▁wayage ▁wakala ▁wo dumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁ng ' huli ▁weza u wona ▁ulopozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu !’ ▁”
▁ Siku ▁ijo ▁mwiza pula ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu . ▁Si mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁niza n p u lila ni ▁kwa ▁Tata .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁vinoga ▁cheye ▁kukala ▁baha no . ▁Leka ▁chi ze ng e ▁vi zewe ▁vitatu , ▁chimwe ▁chako ▁na ▁chimwenga ▁cha ▁Musa ▁na ▁chimwenga ▁cha ▁Eliya .”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁vondaya kale ▁hana ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chake , ▁mweye ▁womu ni sondelele ▁niye ▁iviya ▁mwiza kala ▁muna ▁ivi goda ▁longo ▁na ▁vidi , ▁kuya tagusa ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli .
▁Wa nahina ▁wakala ▁wa zimiza ▁kusola ▁yamagate , ▁wakala ▁na ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁muhala ▁mwiingalawa .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ W eye ▁kwiza kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁uhazi ▁wowose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yawo , ▁hebu ▁kwiza kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁kumwawo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁hanhu ▁ha ko ▁na ▁uhazi ▁wako ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Petili ▁viyakalile ▁ko gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁wingu ▁di lawilila , ▁diwa gubika ▁na ▁kung ugu ▁jake , ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani ▁viwa gubikigwe ▁na ▁wingu ▁ijo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kabwela ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya , ▁kakala ▁ka mema ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile . ▁Mbuli ▁zake ▁zen ela ▁Galilaya ▁na ▁muna ▁i zi isi ▁zose ▁za ▁ mmabehi .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa longelela ▁kwa ▁Musa , ▁walonga , ▁“ Habali ▁kuchi lava ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁uchi kome ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁cheye ▁na ▁wanetu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wetu ?”
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Mbwiy a ▁zangu , ▁no walamba ▁sekemu tende ▁wihi ▁uno .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ilola , ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule ▁ko mulonga ▁yelihi .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Hata ▁wose ▁waha kuleka , ▁niye ▁siza kuleka ▁ng ' o !”
▁Maabaho ▁kawa bwelela ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁watatu , ▁ mbali ▁ka wafika ▁wa gona . ▁Kamulongela ▁Petili , ▁“ I wa ze ▁hamu dahile ▁kukala ▁meso ▁na ▁niye ▁hata ▁kwa ▁saa ▁dimwe ?
▁Labani ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Yakobo ▁mwi h wa ge , ▁kahita ▁yo kimbila ▁ku mu ho we la , ▁viya m fikile ▁kamuhagatila ▁na ▁kamnonela ▁na ▁kam ka l ib i s ha ▁ukaye ▁yake . ▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi lawilile .
▁Mbali ▁Isaka ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M dodo ▁wako ▁kani zila ▁na ▁ku nivwizila . ▁Na ▁kasola ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁kwa ko .”
▁Na ▁vi goda ▁va ▁chifalume ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁vi ne ▁vichi zunguluka ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chiya ▁na ▁muna ▁ivi goda ▁viya ▁ni wawona ▁walala ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wane ▁wakala ▁ wavaz igwa ▁mawalo ▁mazelu ▁na ▁wakala ▁na ▁mak ombe lo ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁muna ▁ya matwi ▁yawo .
▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Leka ▁chi lole ▁fana ▁Eliya ▁kezakwiza ▁ku mkombola !”
▁mana ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wose ▁ni ▁wangu . ▁Vini wa komile ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ni ka ▁hakwe ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili . ▁Chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁wa ▁mnyama , ▁wawo ▁weza kuwa ▁wangu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁D eng ' heleleni ▁na ▁kuvi na ▁yayo ▁vondaya lawilile , ▁kwaviya ▁gweko ▁jenu ▁ni ▁kulu ▁kuulanga . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁vo watendele ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Basi ▁Musa ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁Sihoni ▁wa ▁Waamoli , ▁isi ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁Ogu ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mabululu ▁na ▁isi ▁i zunguluke ▁mabululu ▁yayo .
▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wa peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁uko ▁D eli b e ▁na ▁wa pata ▁wanahina ▁wengi . ▁Maabaho ▁wabwela ▁Lisitila ▁na ▁Ikoniya ▁na ▁Antiyokiya .
▁Sekemu m tambikile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁fana ▁wawo ▁viwo tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁kwaviya ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku tibusa ▁chiya ▁hachi londa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wa i tendela ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁m baka ▁wawa timbula ▁muna ▁umoto ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wachi lu me ▁na ▁wachi ke ▁muladi ▁kutambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo .
▁“ Kwizagaya ▁weye ▁Kola zi ni ▁kwiza gaya ! ▁W eye ▁Besisaida ▁kwiza gaya ! ▁Kwa viya ▁fana ▁mauzauza ▁yoya tendeke ▁hano ▁yaha tendeke ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni , ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁waha yawale ▁viwalo ▁va ▁ maguniya ▁na ▁ku ihaka ▁maivu ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁wa leka ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo !
▁Sekemu gese ▁kuwa ▁mwo daha ▁kui kimbila ▁nhaguso ▁kwa ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁Bulahimu ▁ni ▁wa saho ▁yenu . ▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kuya sola ▁mabwe ▁yano ▁na ▁kuyatenda ▁yawe ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu !
▁Si gesa ▁kuwa ▁kwiza tenda ▁ivo , ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wehile , ▁ku watendele la ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁na ▁wehile . ▁Vino ▁msemi ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁ha tenda ▁yanogile ?”
▁ Vonda ni wagale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile , ▁fana ▁vini walaganile ▁wa saho ▁zawo , ▁uko ▁weza kuwa ▁na ▁ndiya ▁zose ▁zi wo londa ▁na ▁weza kala ▁vinogile , ▁ mbali ▁weza hinduka ▁na ▁kutambikila ▁milungu ▁imwenga . ▁Weza ni lema ▁na ▁ku bena ▁lagano ▁jangu ,
▁Wa ja ▁wolonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁woi gangamiza ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁wo lotela ▁wo di gangamiza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁Oholibama ▁na ▁ E la ▁na ▁Pi no ni ,
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni u gozela ▁ukombola ▁wako .”
▁Ivo ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mibiki ▁mi nane ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁longo ▁na ▁sita ▁va ▁hela .
▁ Siyo ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Nowalongela , ▁one ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁hamu samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁wose ▁mwiza danganika ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁muna ▁ha la za ▁hebu ▁hana ▁ichihanga ▁hana ▁ baka ▁ dung ' hu ▁chidogo , ▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁wou lawile ▁kuna ▁di ha la za ▁jake ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ichihanga .
▁Ivo ▁Waisilaili ▁wa ilumba ▁na ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Baali ▁wa ▁Peoli . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa wonela ▁ludoko .
▁ Yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa , ▁“ Sekeu m z ib e ▁ng ' ombe ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁vonda ▁ya h wa ge ▁uhemba .” ▁Iyo ▁si ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁kowa gesa ▁ng ' ombe ▁muhala .
▁uwa gubul e ▁yameso ▁yawo ▁na ▁kuwa tende za ▁wa lawe ▁muna ▁diziza ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo , ▁wa lawe ▁muna ▁u u da hi ▁wa ▁Lufyende , ▁wa mu hindukile ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁wa lekele ligwe ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁kusola ▁nyafasi ▁yawo ▁muna ▁wanhu ▁iwa ja ▁wowasaguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .”
▁Isaka ▁ka himba ▁kaidi ▁ma sima ▁yaja ▁ya hi mbigwe ▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁ tati ▁yake ▁viyakalile ▁mgima . ▁Ma sima ▁yaja ▁ya sili zigwa ▁na ▁Wafilisiti ▁lusita ▁Bulahimu ▁viyadanganike . ▁Isaka ▁kaya golela ▁mazina ▁yaja ▁yaja ▁yoya ya ta ngile ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Mbali ▁ni kuleka ▁uwe ▁mgima ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁udahi ▁wangu . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁yelihi .
▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko igoda ▁na ▁ha manyile ▁mbuli ▁yoyose , ▁munhu ▁yo londa ▁ku ibishil a ▁na ▁ku gomba ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁muhala , ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁yo gala ▁ndwagi ▁na ▁migongo ▁na ▁maligo ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yehile ,
▁Maabaho ▁ka tosa ▁kaidi , ▁mvula ▁i to nya ▁na ▁isi ▁i lava ▁mazao ▁yake .
▁ku muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁ko kongeza ▁u nd ugu ▁na ▁u nd ugu ▁wo kongeza ▁ulondo .
▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁kuna umulima ▁wa ▁Mizaituni ▁fana ▁viya zowel e , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁nawo ▁wamsondelela .
▁Kaini ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ N ha g u so ▁yangu ▁iwa ▁ndala ▁na ▁i ba sa nya ▁si i daha ▁hata ▁kui papa .
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochi lemigwe ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kabananga .
▁Chi lagano ▁chino ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁umwe de ▁na ▁u kale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁mwiisi .
▁Ivo ▁sekemudumbe , ▁mweye ▁munoga ▁kufosa ▁ s ho l we ▁wengi !
▁basi ▁niza itowa ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kumtagusa ni ▁mweye ▁wose ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁kufosa ▁ichanduso ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Sa ng ' hane ni ▁sang ' hano ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha ▁na ▁sekemuwe ▁wa b wa . ▁Na ▁msang ' hanileni ▁Mndewa ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁unogile .
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁gila di , ▁iyo ▁ko muliga ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yawe ▁mkaya ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Kwa ▁kuya fose la ▁yayo , ▁ka ching ' hi li za ▁chilagano ▁chikulu ▁na ▁chochi faya ▁ng ' hani ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁izo ▁mu dahe ▁kui hanganya ▁ hali ▁ya ▁chimu lungu ▁na ▁ku ye pula ▁na ▁ubananzi ▁wou galigw a ▁na ▁tama a ▁zihile ▁za ▁chi isi .
▁U mwaka ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ali ▁wakala ▁Wa e mi , ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wakulu ▁na ▁wengi ▁na ▁wa tali ▁fana ▁Wa a na ki ,
▁Na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wa lawile ▁Yelusalemu ▁walonga , ▁“ Ka na ▁Mwene mba go ! ▁Na ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁vinyamkela ▁iyo ▁yo mtaza ▁kuwa lava ▁vinyamkela .”
▁Saimoni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wayage ▁wose ▁wazanywa ▁kwa ▁kupata ▁somba ▁wengi ▁viya .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hawa loka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁weza hokela ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .”
▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁ni ▁kana ▁ubazi ▁na ▁moyo ▁unogile . ▁Keza chi mwemwese la ▁ mwemwes o ▁da ▁ukombola ▁kulawa ▁kuchanyha
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose ▁kwa ▁masimwe ▁na ▁ha walongele ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁ bila ▁ya ▁masimwe .
▁Ivo ▁yili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubazi ▁u mu uhokele , ▁Wayahudi ▁iviya ▁hawa mtegeleze ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁nawo ▁iviya ▁wa hokele ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁na ▁chitambala ▁m olondeka ▁kuchi ja . ▁Fan a ▁vini mwing ' hileni ▁mibiki ▁i s u ka , ▁sambi ▁no mwing ' hani ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁“ Habali ▁kwo chi wona ▁chi banzi ▁chili ▁mui di zi so ▁da ▁miyago ▁ mbali ▁hu di wona ▁ ba le ▁dili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁jako ?
▁Maabaho ▁Lawi ▁ka mtendela ▁Yesu ▁dugila ▁kulu ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁kulu ▁da ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁baho .
▁Kulaw a ▁Tulowa ▁chi kwela ▁ngalawa ▁m baka ▁Sa me ti la ke , ▁siku ▁di wi nzile ▁chifika ▁N e a p o li .
▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa muhulike ▁Mwana ▁fana ▁viwo muhulika ▁Tata . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo lema ▁ku muhulika ▁Mwana , ▁ko mulema ▁Tata ▁yoya mtumile .
▁Wa tumigwa ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁kulawa ▁Yudeya ▁wa hulika ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁nawo ▁iviya ▁wa i hokela ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Niye ▁Paulo , ▁no kwandika ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁mwenyewo ▁niza liha . ▁Si londa ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁ugima ▁wako ▁ku nya zima ▁niye .
▁Wa falume ▁wawo ▁wa ya hanganya ▁ma je shi ▁yawo ▁yose ▁hana ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Si di mu , ▁vino ▁sambi ▁ni ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁ Munyu .
▁Vi i fosile ▁miyaka ▁midi , ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ka lota ▁nzozi , ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁ye mile ▁muna ▁ing ema ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ,
▁One ▁wa hani tenda ▁vino , ▁muhavu ▁uni kome ▁sambi . ▁One ▁uha n itogolela , ▁sekeu ni leke ▁muna ▁yamagayo ▁yangu .”
▁ Nyama ▁yoyose ▁na ▁gate ▁jojose ▁vonda vi sigale ▁vo londeka ▁vi so m igwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho vimanya ▁u nhu ▁wetu ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁uwa mbigwa ▁muna ▁umsalaba ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁muladi ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁uhasanyi ▁lu li ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lw e tu ▁lu ba na ngigwe , ▁muladi ▁sekechi we ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁uhasanyi ▁kaidi .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kani hila ▁na ▁ka ilaha ▁kuwa ▁siza loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁inogile ▁iyo mwing ' hani .
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yo ilaha ▁kwa ▁chilingo ▁ka ilaha ▁kwa ▁chilingo ▁icho , ▁na ▁chochose ▁chochi kigwe ▁m chanyha ▁yake .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁M ele ya , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁M e na , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma ta ta , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Na ta ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ,
▁Mbali ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa lu son geza ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wam pule ▁Pilato ▁ya mu lekelele ▁Balaba ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁Yesu .
▁Wa nd ugu ▁zangu , ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁mu mema ▁unovu ▁na ▁muna ▁umanyi , ▁na ▁modaha ▁kwii fundiza ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye .
▁Ni mtuma ni ▁kugobola ▁ndiya ▁hamu zi handile ▁bule . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa sang ' hana , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mo mweda ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo .”
▁Kulaw a ▁ A zi mo ni ▁m haka ▁iza fose la ▁kuna ▁ichi za nda ▁cha ▁Misili ▁na ▁iza helela ▁muna ▁I ba hali ▁ya ▁Meditelaniya .
▁Maabaho ▁wa duganye ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .”
▁Musa ▁viyafikile ▁mudi la go ▁na ▁kuwona ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo vi na , ▁ka wona ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani . ▁K ava sa ▁ivi bawo ▁viya ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake ▁na ▁kuvi bena ▁haja ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mulima .
▁ Siku ▁ino ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁lukumbuso ▁kumwenu , ▁mwiza itenda ▁iwe ▁dugila ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁hata ▁nyele si ▁zenu ▁zose ▁kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁kumwenu .”
▁Nolonga ▁vino , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁kolonga ▁mbasakanyo . ▁Imwe ▁kolonga , ▁“ No msondelela ▁Paulo ” , ▁imwenga ▁kolonga , ▁“ No msondelela ▁Apolo ” , ▁imwenga ▁kolonga , ▁“ No msondelela ▁Petili ” , ▁na ▁imwenga , ▁“ No msondelela ▁Chilisito .”
▁Na ▁mweye ▁mwiza daha ▁kulava ▁vinyamkela .”
▁Iviya ▁muni tambikile ▁niye , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kulonga ▁ b wi lili ▁na ▁kuwa ma nyi za ▁wanhu ▁sili ▁ya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁U wo ▁ukala ▁mwanza ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁ku petigwa , ▁Chi leni yo ▁viyakalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Siliya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁na ▁Musa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ‚
▁“ Vino ▁vi dege ▁vitan o ▁havi u zigwa ▁kwa ▁sente ▁mbili ? ▁Mbali ▁vi vili , ▁ habule ▁chochi zi mizigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Ch a u de le ▁kelek igwa ▁na ▁mbende ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lose ▁lu kala ▁fana ▁walo ▁dili ▁na ▁mazoya , ▁ivo ▁zina ▁jake ▁kamtanga ▁Esau .
▁Mbali ▁nina ▁mbuli ▁ndodo ▁na ▁weye , ▁kuna wo ▁wanhu ▁baho ▁woya sondelela ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁ B a la mu , ▁yoya m fundize ▁Balaki ▁ni ▁vilihi ▁va ▁kuwa longoza ▁Waisilaeli ▁kuu hasanyi ▁muladi ▁wa je ▁ndiya ▁za ▁kutosela ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁na ▁kutenda ▁ugoni .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wakala ▁wam zunguluka . ▁Na wo ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mami ▁yake ▁yako ▁na ▁wandugu ▁zako ▁wa ku n ze ▁wo ku zahila .”
▁Mana ▁Heshiboni ▁di kala ▁bululu ▁da ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Waamoli , ▁yoya i to wile ▁na ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁na ▁ku muhoka ▁isi ▁yake ▁yose , ▁m baka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Alinoni .
▁Wa nahina ▁viwa kalile ▁wahita ▁fana ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁saa ▁dimwe , ▁wa muwona ▁Yesu ▁ko genda ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mazi , ▁kokwiza ▁habehi ▁na ▁ingalawa . ▁Wa nahina ▁wadumba ▁na ni .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuwalongela ▁viwo mmanya ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kupeta ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wabwela ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Viwakalile ▁wang ' hali ▁wo bwela , ▁wa peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁muna ▁ivi bulul u ▁ya ▁Samaliya .
▁Cho ku lamba ▁uchi leke ▁chi fose le ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako . ▁ Hachi za bojoga ▁migunda ▁yenu , ▁hebu ▁migunda ▁ya ▁mizabibu ▁hebu ▁hachiza kung ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁vi sima ▁venu . ▁ Chiza i sondelela ▁nzila ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁na ▁kuhita ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁dimwe ▁ bila ▁ku hinduka ▁kulume ▁hebu ▁kumoso , ▁m baka ▁vondachi lawe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁yose ▁yo langulizigw a ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁na ▁ivo ▁wene ▁kuhuwila ▁weng ' higwe ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku muhuwila ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Ivo ▁chose ▁chi itogolela ▁kuwa sagula ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁kuwa tuma ▁kumwenu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mambwiya ▁zetu ▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Paulo .
▁Maabaho ▁Kaini ▁ka gala ▁mavuno ▁yake ▁yamwenga ▁na ▁kaya lava ▁kuwa ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa gale ▁Walawi ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁uwa duganye ▁Waisilaili ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁kowa liha ▁vo wolondeka ▁waja ▁wo mwihila , ▁hebu ▁heza leka ▁kuwatagusa ▁wo mwihila .
▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo ▁na ▁ha londeka ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁yelile ▁m baka ▁vonda yo ge .
▁Yakobo ▁mwenyewo ▁ka walongolela ▁kwa ▁kuhita ▁yo tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁m baka ▁viyafikile ▁habehi ▁na ▁se kulu ▁wake .
▁Yakobo ▁kahulika ▁kuwa ▁Dina ▁mwanage ▁ka tendigw a ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁Shekemu , ▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁wanage ▁wakala ▁wo dima ▁wanyama , ▁ka nyama la ▁m baka ▁wanage ▁viwa bwelile .
▁Yesu ▁ka komeleze la ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Vino ▁ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁yoyo i memez ela ▁vinhu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁havi ka ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa segela ▁D o fu ka ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁ A lu shi .
▁Wa we miza ▁watumigwa ▁waja ▁haulongozi ▁hawo ▁na ▁wawa uza , ▁“ Kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lu lihi ▁na ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁yelihi ▁mo tenda ▁mbuli ▁zino ?”
▁Katenda ▁vi a ▁va ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁va ▁kwika ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁meza , ▁vya no ▁na ▁nhungo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubani ▁na ▁ma bu yu ▁na ▁vi ha mha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku gidila ▁nhosa ▁za ▁ching ' waji .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁hawa huwila ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zinogile , ▁ mbali ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo wa togola ▁wanyondenyonde ▁kuwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁kwa ▁kuhuwila ▁uko ▁Mulungu ▁kowa togola ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁ B a nda li ▁ija ▁i kala ▁hai faya ▁kukala ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁chihuhwe , ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa lamula ▁chi segela ▁uko ▁na ▁chi hita ▁F oni ke ▁one ▁ihadahika , ▁na ▁chi kala ▁uko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁zose ▁ya ▁chihuhwe . ▁F o i ni ke ▁ni ▁ ba nda li ▁ya ▁Chilete ▁ ilola ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kuchanyha ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁na ▁uko ▁waha dahile ▁kukala ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁chihuhwe .
▁Wo se ▁waja ▁ndiya ▁ija ▁ija ▁ya ▁chimuhe .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁hawa mwi di ke ▁kwaviya ▁mui nzila ▁wakala ▁wo ibishil a ▁yelihi ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁mgati ▁yawo .
▁Iviya ▁wanhu ▁ni ▁vi dala ▁kwika ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁muna ▁imi ko ba ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁na ▁one ▁waha tenda ▁ivo , ▁imi ko ba ▁iza tulika , ▁na ▁i di v a i ▁iza kwitika . ▁Mbali ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁yo gumigw a ▁muna ▁imi ko ba ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁na ▁vose ▁viza kala ▁goya .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁Galilaya , ▁wanaake ▁wano ▁wa muwinza ▁na ▁kumsang ' hanila . ▁Wa naake ▁wamwenga ▁wengi ▁wo wezile ▁Yelusalemu ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁wakala ▁haja .
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁niye ▁nowalongela , ▁wa londeni ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁na ▁muwa tose le ▁waja ▁wowa ba manya ▁mweye .
▁Lelo ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁ni ▁simwe ▁kumwetu , ▁zo chi zuma ▁sekechi londe ▁vinhu ▁vihile , ▁fana ▁wawo ▁viwatendile .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Abeli ▁ka mulavila ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁inogile ▁kufosa ▁ija ▁ya ▁Kaini . ▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁ka togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁kai togola ▁nhosa ▁yake . ▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁inga wa ▁kadanganika , ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁zing ' hali ▁zo chi fundiza .
▁Esau ▁kasola ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Kanaani , ▁Ada ▁niiyo ▁mndele ▁wa ▁ E lo ni ▁Mu hiti , ▁Oholibama ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Ana ▁na ▁ni ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁S ib e wo ni ▁Mu hivi ,
▁ fi go ▁zose ▁mbili ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini .
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁munhu ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁kasola ▁muke ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jake ▁mwenyewo ,
▁na ▁nz o ko we ▁na ▁iviya ▁modeli ▁zose ▁za ▁mu lo wa ▁na ▁chi z ogolo ▁ s ha mba ▁na ▁ gomba lima .
▁Na yo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Vinoga , ▁ni togola ▁chiu pulile , ▁siza di nanga ▁bululu ▁diya .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ija ▁vidi si mi kigwe ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁wingu ▁di hulumuka ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁hema ▁ijo . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁ichigulogulo ▁m baka ▁imitondo ▁wingu ▁diwa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁di woneka ▁fana ▁moto .
▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kezaku ng ' wa ▁divai ▁ya ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁lolu gi di gwe ▁muna ▁i nhu ngo ▁ya ▁ng ' ha si liki ▁yake ▁ bila ▁ku ha nga ny igwa ▁na ▁mazi . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza gazigwa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁ ba lu ti ▁yoyo kwaka ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁welile ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁“ Ku lekeleligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wako .”
▁Hata ▁ivo ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁ha batiz e ▁wanhu ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁muhala .
▁na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁shaba ▁na ▁lwavu ▁lwake ▁lwa ▁shaba , ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁ziga ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁jake ,
▁No muhuwila ▁Mndewa ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁niza daha ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁vino ▁sambi .
▁K wing i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁kuno ga ▁one ▁uha mha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁w ha m hile ▁bule , ▁ku linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁ija ▁hana kwing i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁bule .
▁M weye ▁mung ' hali ▁hamu vimanyile ▁bule ! ▁Ch ochose ▁chim wingile ▁munhu ▁muna ▁umulomo , ▁cho hita ▁m mu nda , ▁ha mala ▁baho ▁cho kwa sigwa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lukuli .
▁Nowalongela ▁chiya ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁choya ni laguse , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwo tenda ▁chiya ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁cha yawalongele .”
▁“ ▁‘ Yano ▁ni ▁madugila ▁ya pangigwe ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yondamu gong ' onde ▁ku we ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁zozi lavigwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁mhule ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁ching ' waji , ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁yake ▁i pangigwe .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁no mulamba ni ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kubwela ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁cheye ▁vondachi i duganye ▁haulongozi ▁wake .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Seili ▁Mu ho li ▁wowa kalile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁wa tangigwa ▁L o ta ni ▁na ▁S ho bali ▁na ▁S ib e yo ni ▁na ▁Ana ,
▁M wanamke ▁ino ▁ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁nayo ▁ka fungigwa ▁na ▁Lufyende ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mi nane ▁ino . ▁Vino ▁hai londeke ▁ya fungu li ligwe ▁muna isiku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ”
▁Maabaho ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa lawa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chi gwe na ▁cha ▁Helode , ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁ku londa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu .
▁u mwing ' he ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁kuwa ▁mchan go ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza wananga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya wa na ngile ▁Sihoni ▁na ▁Ogu , ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁isi ▁yawo .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁ni li ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁ 6 0 0 ,000 ▁wowo genda ▁kwa ▁migulu , ▁weye ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Niza weng ' ha ▁nyama ▁wa je ▁mwezi ▁mgima .
▁Mkanaani , ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁ A la di ▁yoya kalile ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁kahulika ▁kuwa ▁Waisilaili ▁wokwiza .
▁Mwenevale ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁viya zi hulike ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁za ▁muke ▁wake , ▁kuwa ▁ivo ▁viya sang ' hane ▁msang ' hani ▁wake , ▁kawa ▁na ▁ludoko
▁“ Vino ▁mweye ▁mo gesa ▁choni ? ▁Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁kana ▁wana ▁waidi . ▁Ka muhitila ▁ija ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Mwanangu , ▁ hita ▁diyelo ▁uka sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁umgunda .’
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁niiyo ▁wanhu ▁woya wakombole ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁Misili ▁muna ▁di ta n uli ▁da ▁ch uma . ▁Ka mulava ni ▁uko ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimwili ▁diyelo .
▁Ivo ▁wa mtanga ▁Lebeka ▁na ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Kolond a ▁kuhita ▁na ▁munhu ▁ino ?” ▁Na yo ▁kedika , ▁“ Ona ▁niza hita .”
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kum zeha , ▁wa di vula ▁walo ▁diya ▁na ▁wa mu yawaza ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁mwenyewo . ▁Maabaho ▁wa ngala ▁yawa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba .
▁Ino ▁i kala ▁ peta ▁ya ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Wa g elishoni ▁wowa sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁waja ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawa peta ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola ! ▁Ch eye ▁chi leka ▁vinhu ▁vetu ▁vose ▁na ▁kuku wi nza ▁weye .”
▁Pilato ▁kawauza , ▁“ Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Chilisito ▁ni mtende ▁choni ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Mu wambe ▁mumsalaba !”
▁Nomulambani ▁kuwa ▁vondanize ▁kumwenu ▁sekemu ni wa ng ili ze ▁niwe ▁mkali , ▁kwaviya ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁nizawa ka li kila ▁waja ▁wolonga ▁kuwa ▁cho kala ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chi isi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamala ▁kuwatenda ▁Waisilaili ▁wa nogelw e ▁na ▁Wamisili , ▁Wamisili ▁wa weng ' ha ▁Waisilaili ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho wapulile . ▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁Waisilaili ▁viwa solile ▁vinhu ▁va ▁Wamisili .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo ▁hamwiza niwona , ▁ mbali ▁hamwande ▁chidogo ▁mwiza niwona .”
▁Ivo ▁sekeu wa ndike ▁wagane ▁wa li ▁wa li ▁kwaviya ▁one ▁madambwa ▁yawo ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁ya h ongeze ka ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁weza londa ▁kusoligwa ▁kaidi .
▁Abulamu ▁kamwidika ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Sodoma , ▁“ Noilaha ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁Yeli ▁Uchanyha , ▁ yalumbile ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁yose ,
▁Ivo ▁Filipo ▁ka isasala ▁goya ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kuhita ▁ G a za . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁ulo ▁kukala ▁na ▁mkulu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁ E si yo p i ya , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁yo lawa ▁Yelusalemu ▁kutosa .
▁Ke ka ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁zahabu ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁panzia ,
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwanangu , ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁uku honye za . ▁ Hita ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo , ▁na ▁utamu ▁wako ▁u hona .”
▁Na wo ▁weza lawa ▁muna ▁yama leme ▁yawo , ▁waja ▁wa tendile ▁yanogile ▁weza zilibuligwa ▁na ▁kukala ▁wagima , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁wa tendile ▁yehile ▁weza zilibuligwa ▁na ▁ku tagusigwa .
▁Chi p indi ▁icho , ▁Yosefu ▁niiyo ▁yoya kalile ▁ mulole si ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁yoya wa chuuzi le ▁ndiya ▁wanhu ▁wa lawile ▁zisi ▁zose . ▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yosefu ▁weza ▁na ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁ vihanga ▁vi dalisa ▁hasi .
▁“ Na ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁weza sola ▁maivu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁yoi so m igwe ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo , ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ku ulwanda ▁yeza ha nga ny igwa ▁na ▁maivu ▁muna ▁ichi a .
▁Maabaho ▁Lutu ▁kawa gendela ▁wako yi ▁zake ▁wowo londa ▁kuwa sola ▁wa ndele ▁zake ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Segeleni ▁hano ▁himahima , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko ha nanga ▁hanhu ▁hano .” ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa muwona ▁fana ▁viya ▁ ke hu ka .
▁Wo se ▁viwamuwone ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani . ▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ I ng ' heni ▁moyo ! ▁Ni ▁niye ! ▁Seke mdumbe .”
▁na ▁mu yawale ▁u nhu ▁wa ▁sambi . ▁U wo ▁wo gendelela ▁kutend igwa ▁goya ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁mu lumba ji ▁wetu ▁viya ▁vidi li ▁simwe ▁jake , ▁muladi ▁mu manye ▁chihanga ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁ha bali ▁mweye ▁ha muhuwila ▁kuwa ▁haidahik a ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa zilibula ▁wanhu ?
▁Mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁Lelo ▁no kwing ' ha ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁ku tawala ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .”
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁Paulo ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ▁kumulola ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁walala ▁wose ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wa kalile ▁baho .
▁Kuuhelelo , ▁ka mtuma ▁mwanage ▁kuno ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Mwanangu ▁weza mtegeleza .’
▁“ Hamwande ▁waja ▁wa li ▁i wabozi ▁weza , ▁wa ndusa ▁ku tanga , ▁‘ Mwenevale ! ▁Mwenevale ! ▁Chi vugulil e ▁ulwivi .’
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka zi lava ▁kunze ▁zi fi mbo ▁zi kalile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kawa la g u sila ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁nawo ▁wa wona ▁chiya ▁chi lawilile . ▁Chila ▁mulangulizi ▁kasola ▁fimbo ▁yake .
▁Si londa ▁ku woneka ▁kuwa ▁ nogeza ▁kuwatenda ni ▁mu d umbe ▁kwa ▁ senga ▁zangu .
▁Ni wa tuma ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁fana ▁weye ▁viu nhu mile ▁niye ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Iviya ▁Lutu ▁yoya ge ndi le ▁na ▁Abulamu , ▁kakala ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ma he ma .
▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁imwe ▁kwiza mulava ▁imitondo , ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁imwenga ▁kwiza mulava ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁walume . ▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁uwo , ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁da ▁M agate ▁Ha ya na gumigw a ▁L usu ▁do kwandusa . ▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁m olondeka ▁muje ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu .
▁wowa mkomile ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁walotezi , ▁na ▁wachi gaza ▁cheye . ▁Wawo ▁hawa mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁nawo ▁ni ▁wehi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁ Siyo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weng ' higwa ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ kuhonya ▁mitamu ▁hebu ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁hebu ▁ku fambula ▁ulonzi ▁lu mwenga .
▁Maabaho ▁ka mwikila ▁makono ▁kwa ▁kumtenda ▁yawe ▁mulangulizi , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza mwihila ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuni wi nza ▁niye .
▁Mbali ▁chip indi ▁chetu ▁cha ▁kukala ▁nawo ▁vichi komeleze ke , ▁chi segela ▁na ▁chi gendelele la ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wetu . ▁Wo se ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wake ▁zawo ▁na ▁wana , ▁wahita ▁na ▁cheye ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu , ▁na ▁baho ▁chi tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁chi tambika .
▁Weza chi wona ▁chihanga ▁chake , ▁na ▁zina ▁jake ▁diza kwa ndikigwa ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁vawo .
▁wa zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumgwila ▁Yesu ▁chinyele ny ele ▁muladi ▁wa mkome .
▁Wa sola ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁viwa ho kile ▁na ▁vi a ▁vose ▁viwa patile ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁muha sondelela ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁na ▁kuyatenda ,
▁Ivo , ▁weye ▁miyangu , ▁fana ▁ko watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁hu daha ▁kui gombela ▁hata ▁fana ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi . ▁Kwa viya ▁uha watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁kuno ▁weye ▁ko sang ' hana ▁viwa sang ' hana ▁wawo , ▁ko i tagusa ▁mwenyewo .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁wa mtendela ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁fana ▁viyawalagilize ,
▁Chi hongwe ▁viyamuwonile ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kema ▁muna ▁inzila ▁kuno ▁kam ha ▁zele ▁dodi so mo ligwe ▁muna ▁iya la , ▁ka ileka ▁inzila ▁na ▁kengila ▁kumgwazo . ▁Balaamu ▁ka mtowa ▁chihongwe ▁muladi ▁ya mbweleze ▁muna ▁inzila .
▁“ Mndewa ▁wetu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kolondeka ▁kuhokela ▁ukulu ▁na ▁hishima ▁na ▁ludabwa . ▁Kwa viya ▁weye ▁kuvi lumba ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁na ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁yako ▁vilumb igwa ▁na ▁va ba hano .”
▁muladi ▁Lufyende ▁sekeya chi vwizi le ▁kwaviya ▁chiya manya ▁m agesa ▁yake .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁siza kung ' wa ▁kaidi ▁divai ▁ya ▁nzabi bu ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ija ▁vondani i ng ' we ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁U ge nzi ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu , ▁ wolondeka ▁uwe ▁uno ga ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁haja ▁honda ▁wawa vwizi le ▁kuwa ▁mo sang ' hana ▁yehile , ▁wa dahe ▁kuvimanya ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁inogile ▁na ▁ivo ▁wa mwing ' he ▁ukulu ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁kwiza ▁kuwa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wanhu .
▁Sa viya ▁Tata ▁viyo wa z lili bu la ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁na ▁ku we na ▁ugima , ▁iviya ▁Mwana ▁ko we na ▁ugima ▁wanhu ▁wo yo walonda .
▁Ko mwa ▁jojose ▁do yo ka lila ▁hebu ▁do yo go ne la , ▁jambul a ▁mwiko . ▁Na ▁chochose ▁cho yakalile ▁chi zakuwa ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko .
▁wamuuza , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁Musa ▁kalonga ▁munhu ▁yahadanganika ▁ bila ▁ku leka ▁wana , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁ya msole ▁mgane ▁iyo ▁muladi ▁ya n patile ▁wana ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁yoya danganike .
▁N hu ng we ▁vi i malile , ▁kuichuwala ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chili ngile ▁fana ▁gate ▁ sisili .
▁Ivo ▁sekemu mu lamulil e ▁nhaguso ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ing ' hali ▁lusita ▁halunafika , ▁na ▁ gozele ni ▁m baka ▁Mndewa ▁vondayeze . ▁Y eye ▁keza gala ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁muna ▁diziza ▁zozi fisigwe ▁na ▁ku lagusa ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁ mizoyo ▁ya ▁wanhu . ▁Baho ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kezahokela ▁nhogolwa ▁im faya ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza , ▁koja ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁na ▁mweye ▁mu longa , ▁‘ Munhu ▁ino ▁m melo ▁na ▁mu le vi , ▁mbwiya ▁wa ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁uhasanyi !’
▁One ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha pekul a ▁kaidi ▁uhele ▁uja ▁na ▁yaha wona ▁ha ha gi di mile ▁na ▁upipi ▁siyo ▁m titu , ▁basi ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Chi tose leni . ▁Ch eye ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu ▁hai chilongela ▁ku hasanya ▁na ▁cho londa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yo petigwa ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁nusu ▁shekel i ▁ya ▁hela , ▁fana ▁vi i p i m igwe ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ino ▁niiyo ▁nhosa ▁yondaya ni lavile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁haweza gendelela ▁ng ' hani , ▁kwaviya ▁ubozi ▁wawo ▁wiza woneka ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi i wa lawilile ▁Ya ne ▁na ▁Ya mbule .
▁Mbali ▁Helode ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁ini m ka n hile ▁iditwi ▁kazilibuka ▁kulawa ▁mwii fa !”
▁Kwa viya ▁vini kalile ▁kumwenu , ▁ni londa ▁ku leka ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁ila ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁ha sa ▁ifa ▁yake ▁mumsalaba .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁mu kumbuke ▁yaja ▁yoya wa lawilile ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁wowamsondelel e ▁Musa . ▁Wakala ▁wo kalizigwa ▁na ▁wingu , ▁na ▁wose ▁wa loka ▁vinogile ▁I ba hali ▁N dung ' hu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ I mwe ▁ vu mwili ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁i ye ye ▁yo towe za ▁gate ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁mwii chi zi ga .
▁“ Sekemu we hile ▁Wa e do mu , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁Waisilaili . ▁Iviya ▁sekemuwe hile ▁Wamisili , ▁kwaviya ▁mukala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yawo ▁fana ▁nyambenyambe .
▁Petili ▁kawa lava ▁wose ▁kunze , ▁m aabaho ▁ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁ka tosa ▁kalu hindukila ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁yadanganike , ▁kalonga , ▁“ T a b i ta , ▁in u ke !” ▁Ma ye ▁ka b e n zu la ▁meso ▁yake ▁na ▁viyamuwonile ▁Petili , ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kukala ▁hasi ,
▁Maabaho ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yondaya sagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁muladi ▁zina ▁jake ▁di kale , ▁uko ▁ni uko ▁ko nda mu gale ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni mu lagilize ni . ▁Nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁zimwenga ▁na ▁zaka ▁zenu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vovi lavigwa ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁vi la ho ▁venu .
▁N hondo ▁iyo ▁i tangigwa ▁U sungu , ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁mazi ▁yawa ▁ma sungu , ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wang ' wile ▁mazi ▁yayo ▁wadanganika ▁kwaviya ▁ya galuka ▁ma sungu .
▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁vimu li ▁kodaha ▁kui gaiya ▁muladi ▁yon geze ▁utali ▁wa ▁ugima ▁wake ?
▁Ivo ▁Yakobo ▁kahita ▁Misili , ▁uko ▁yeye ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁wamwenga ▁wadanganika ,
▁W eng ' heni ▁hishima ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁kuwa londa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ usang ' hano ▁wawo ▁womu utenda . ▁Mu we ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁mgati ▁yenu .
▁muladi ▁yawa lamulil e ▁nhaguso ▁wose ▁na ▁ku walongele za ▁wanhu ▁wehile ▁hawa muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile ▁zi watendile ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁m du kula ▁zo wa mu longile ▁wa hasanyi ▁wano .”
▁Haluni ▁kolondeka ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁lusita ▁voyo kwa c ha ▁vitasa ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila . ▁N hosa ▁ino ▁ya ▁ubani ▁iza lavigwa ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁ku leka ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu ▁zikwiza .
▁Na ▁Mndewa ▁ko ching ' ha ▁uhuwilo ▁mkulu ▁kumwenu , ▁cho manya ▁kweli ▁kuwa ▁mo sang ' hana ▁na ▁mwiza gendelela ▁kusang ' hana ▁yaja ▁yochi mulongeleni .
▁Wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Vino ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁maleme ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁m baka ▁kuchi gala ▁chi da nga ni kile ▁kuno ▁kuchuwala ? ▁ Habali ▁kuchi tendela ▁yano ▁kwa ▁kuchi lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ?
▁Mbali ▁uwa sagule ▁Walawi ▁wawe ▁ndole zi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁da ▁ukalangama ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁umo , ▁weza di papa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose . ▁Weza sang ' hana ▁umo ▁na ▁kwika ▁malago ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁kudi zunguluka ▁hema ▁ijo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Ivo ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu .
▁Ivo ▁kezamtenda ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁fana ▁viya mtendile ▁ng ' ombe ▁ija ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁iyo ▁keza watenda ▁wanhu ▁kuilumba , ▁nawo ▁weza lekele lwa .
▁Mbali ▁lusita ▁lu za fika ▁ija ▁yo sola ▁vondaya se gezigwe ▁mwa ▁ iwawo , ▁baho ▁weza funga ▁kuja .”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kabwela ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kumulongela ‚ ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ha bali ▁kuwatendela ▁vihile ▁wanhu ▁wano ? ▁ Habali ▁ku nhu ma ?
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walala ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wakwela ▁ku umulima
▁Yano ▁ya kala ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Lawi , ▁Gelishoni ▁na ▁Kohasi ▁na ▁Melali .
▁“ Mfalume ▁Agilipa ! ▁No iwona ▁nina ▁ ndo ndo ke la ▁diyelo ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ko ▁muladi ▁ni i g ombe le ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁masita ka ▁yose ▁yo wo nivwizila ▁Wayahudi ,
▁Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁vichili ▁yo kala ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo , ▁hebu ▁yo danganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁mnyumba ▁na ▁kuwalongela , ▁“ Habali ▁mo tenda ▁tibwilitibwili ▁na ▁kulila ? ▁ Mndele ▁ha danganike ▁bule , ▁kagona ▁ tu !”
▁Kwa viya ▁weza lawilila ▁Ma chilisito ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁nawo ▁weza tenda ▁mauzauza ▁makulu ▁na ▁mawewedeko , ▁muladi ▁one ▁ihadahika ▁wa dahe ▁ku wavwizila ▁m baka ▁wanhu ▁wowasaguligwe .
▁One ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Walawi ▁hai kombole , ▁kaye ▁i chuuzigwe ▁yo londeka ▁i bwele zigwe ▁kwa ▁mwenyewo ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁kwaviya ▁kaye ▁zili ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Walawi ▁weng ' higwa ▁kuwa ▁zawo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Nuhu ▁kam zengela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁lupango , ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁wanyama ▁wamwenga ▁wo digwa ▁na ▁ndege ▁wo digwa , ▁kam ti mbuli la ▁Mulungu ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ulupango .
▁Tend eni ▁yano ▁yose ▁kwa ▁kutosa , ▁m pule ni ▁Mulungu ▁yam tazeni . ▁To seni ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁ka leni ▁meso ▁ bila ▁ku le gela ▁muha tosa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Alamu ▁kamwelek a ▁Aminadabu , ▁Aminadabu ▁kamwelek a ▁Nashoni , ▁Nashoni ▁kamwelek a ▁Salimon i ,
▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁m kalangama ▁wetu ▁na ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁hachi sang ' hanile ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kui ko mba ko mba ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wala ▁hachi londile ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁kwa ▁u fi so .
▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁na m dodo ▁mwa ▁watumigwa ▁wose , ▁si faya ▁hata ▁ku tangigwa ▁mtumigwa , ▁kwaviya ▁ni di gaza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ha walongele ▁kui t e ga nya ▁na ▁lusu ▁da ▁magate , ▁ mbali ▁wa i teganye ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁Masadukayo .
▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ W e ne v a le , ▁one ▁mu nogelw a ▁na ▁niye ▁sekemu i fose ▁kaye ▁yangu ▁ bila ▁kwima , ▁na hano ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kuwa sang ' hanila .
▁Mbali ▁Yohana ▁ka londa ▁ku mulema ▁Yesu , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁no londa ▁kubatizigwa ▁na ▁weye , ▁vilihi ▁weye ▁kokwiza ▁kumwangu ▁niku batiz e ?”
▁Mulungu ▁yo manya ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ka lagusa ▁kuwa ▁kawa togola ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kwa ▁kuweng ' ha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya chitendele ▁cheye .
▁Katenda ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge ▁na ▁ku ihaka ▁shaba
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vochi londa ▁weye ▁utende . ▁Ha no ▁hana ▁wanhu ▁wane ▁ wekile ▁chilagano .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mwihila ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁kokala ▁na ▁kugenda ▁muna ▁diziza , ▁na ▁haku manya ▁ku nhu ▁ku yo hita , ▁kwaviya ▁ziza ▁di mtenda ▁ya tu li ke ▁yameso .
▁Maabaho ▁ mihe ▁iyo ▁iwa ku nza nya ▁wafalume ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁ho ho tangigwa ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya ▁Ha ma ge do ni .
▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁u kamulongele ▁kuwa ▁kolondeka ▁ku walekelela ▁Waisilaili ▁wa segele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake .”
▁Mo londa ▁chinhu ▁ mbali ▁ mwabule ▁chinhu , ▁mo koma ▁na ▁kuwona ▁migongo , ▁ mbali ▁ham daha ▁kupata , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁mo tenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁kuitowa . ▁M wa bule ▁chinhu ▁kwaviya ▁hamu mpula ▁Mulungu .
▁No kumbuka ▁masozi ▁yako ▁na ▁no londa ▁ng ' hani ▁ku kuwona ▁muladi ▁ni de ng ' helele ▁ng ' hani .
▁Niza wananga ▁wawo , ▁ivo ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya wa kumbuke .
▁Maabaho ▁keza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ,
▁Labani ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Izo . ▁W eye ▁munhu ▁u temeligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Habali ▁ko kwima ▁hano ▁hanze ? ▁Ni sasala ▁chiheleto ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala ▁ngamiya ▁wako .”
▁Yuda , ▁iyo ▁yonda yambiduke ▁Yesu , ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Ni ▁niye ▁mfundiza ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ni ▁niye ? .”
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁china ▁ vihanga ▁havi g u b i kwe ▁bule , ▁cheye ▁chi linga ▁fana ▁ichilo le ▁cho lagusa ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁cho kwasakany wa ▁chiwe ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu ▁muladi ▁chiwe ▁fana ▁yeye ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani . ▁U wo ▁ni ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁iyo ▁Mndewa , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Muhe .
▁Ivo ▁vinyamkela ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu , ▁“ U ha chi lava , ▁uchilekele ▁chika wengile ▁nguluwe ▁waja .”
▁Dug ila ▁dino ▁dizakuwa ▁lukumbuso ▁fana ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁venu , ▁muladi ▁siku ▁zose ▁chiwa ku mbuse ▁kulonga ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulava ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁mkulu .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kam fungu lila ▁Balaba , ▁kalagiliza ▁Yesu ▁ya la n higwe ▁mibalati , ▁m aabaho ▁kamulava ▁yawa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba .
▁Ka wekila ▁makono , ▁m aabaho ▁kasegela ▁hanhu ▁baho .
▁Helode ▁kakala ▁ka londa ▁kumkoma ▁Yohana ▁ mbali ▁chim p o t wile ▁Helode ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kawa dumba ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁ku mwa o ▁wam to ma ▁kuwa ▁Yohana ▁ni ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mu i n ye nde n ye nde ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa , ▁nayo ▁kezam winula ni ▁lusita ▁lufaya .
▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ya hawa ▁mu n itogolela ▁niwa wa nde ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jangu , ▁no lamba ▁m pule ni ▁Efiloni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁So hali
▁“ Walongele ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁‘ Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ wolondeka ▁wazi hishimu ▁nhambiko ▁zelile ▁ziya ▁Waisilaili ▁zo wa zi kile ▁kuwa ▁za ▁chiidumwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu , ▁muladi ▁sekewa di lige ▁zina ▁jangu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Muhe , ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wowo mtosela ▁ wolondeka ▁ku mtosela ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁na ▁kweli .”
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁He zi lo ni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ka li mi .
▁M gozele ▁kunze ▁na ▁u muleke ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ya kugalile ▁walo ▁ijo .
▁Y eye ▁kolonga ▁yaja ▁ya a wone ▁na ▁ya a hulike , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya togole ▁mbuli ▁zi yalongile .
▁Wa nahina ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁wa ndusa ▁kwii hasanya ▁na ▁Muyahudi ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kuisafya .
▁Iviya ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁weli ▁hano ▁haweza danganika ▁m baka ▁wa u wone ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wokwiza ▁kwa ▁ludabwa .”
▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa tenda ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Maabaho ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁bululu ▁dili ▁habehi ▁na ▁hanhu ▁howa u fikile ▁um tu fi , ▁weza sola ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁hana sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Kwiza ya cho la ▁mazina ▁yayo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁yayo ▁fana ▁viya ▁ son a la ▁viyo cho la ▁mu huli . ▁Maabaho ▁uya ha m b e ▁na ▁ku yeng iza ▁muna ▁i vihindo ▁va ▁zahabu .
▁Laheli ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mulumake ▁Yakobo ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁Biliha ▁yawe ▁fana ▁muke ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁Yakobo ▁ka mbandama .
▁Sekemu je ▁damu , ▁muladi ▁mu temeligw e ▁mate ▁mweye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zenu , ▁kwaviya ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mo tenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁mwanamke ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁ bila ▁ya ▁mulume , ▁wala ▁mulume ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁ bila ▁ya ▁muke .
▁“ Mu ha komeleza ▁ku ko b o la ▁mhule ▁zenu ▁na ▁ku ka ma ▁zabibu ▁zenu , ▁ tende ni ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Vi ba nda ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Ch eye ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwaviya ▁chi dalisa ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁ha bali ▁sekechi mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wamwenga ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lu pangigwe ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁yo dahika ▁wageni ▁wowagonikigwe ▁kuna ▁didugila ▁da ▁ sola ▁kulila ▁lusita ▁im sola ▁yang ' hali ▁nawo ? ▁M b e ! ▁ Haidahika ▁bule , ▁siku ▁iza kwiza ▁im sola ▁keza segezigwa ▁kumwawo . ▁Baho ▁weza funga .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁mhongono ▁za ▁Yeliko ▁zozi zengigw e ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ zigwa ▁Waisilaeli ▁viwa zi zunguluke ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Chi na ▁vitumetume ▁mbasakanyo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubazi ▁uya ching ' hile ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ ulotezi ▁na ya chi sang ' hanile ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wake .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁vino ▁mtini ▁wodaha ▁kwima ▁zaituni ▁hebu ▁mzabibu ▁kwima ▁nhini ? ▁N za sa ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ya ▁munyu ▁hai daha ▁kulava ▁mazi ▁ya ▁mu lile ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁munyu .
▁Mbali ▁mwenevale ▁kawedika , ▁‘ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mweye ▁si mmanyile ni ▁bule .’ ▁”
▁Kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁lwa ▁chimu lungu , ▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zo chi zi londa ▁muladi ▁chi kale ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁kugenda ▁muna ▁zinzila ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ku mmanya ▁yeye ▁ya chi ta ngile ▁cheye ▁chiwe ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁unovu ▁wake ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁mbeyu ▁ ihandigwe ▁muna ▁u dongo ▁unogile . ▁Wo hulika ▁mbuli , ▁woi togola ▁na ▁wo lela , ▁wamwenga ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁wamwenga ▁m alongo ▁masita , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁gana ▁dimwe .”
▁M nyama ▁yoyose ▁ya lu mile ▁zi mbwe gele ▁hebu ▁ya ho ndigwe ▁hebu ▁ya tu ligwe ▁hebu ▁ya kanhigwe , ▁sekemu mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu tende ▁chinhu ▁chili ngile ▁ivo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu .
▁Na ▁niza gola ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Wamisili ▁muladi ▁hata ▁mnyama ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁sekeya fe .’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁mwaka ▁uwo ▁ni ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁sekemu hande ▁mbeyu ▁hebu ▁kugobola ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi ko ta ▁ch e n ye wo , ▁hebu ▁sekem wa he ▁zabibu ▁muna ▁imi z abibu ▁hai da huli ligwe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Ni wawona ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁wana ▁ mizoyo ▁midala .
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa longole ▁wa mbwakila ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁ya nyama le , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁ka iyoha ▁ku landula ▁dizi , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁ni wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁Paulo ▁kenuka ▁kenul a ▁mkono ▁wake ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga , ▁“ M weye ▁Waisilaeli ▁wayangu ▁na ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁womu mtosela ▁Mulungu ! ▁Ni tegelezeni !”
▁Maabaho ▁Fesito ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chitala , ▁kedika , ▁“ Kolond a ▁kuhita ▁kwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁haya ▁kwiza hita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma !”
▁Lola , ▁mweye ▁welesi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁mwi nuka ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁ tati ▁zenu ▁muladi ▁kum ongeze la ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ludoko ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Basi ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁ mahamha ▁na ▁vi a ▁mbasakanyo , ▁vimwenga ▁vi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁shaba ▁na ▁zahabu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁chiidumwe , ▁vimwenga ▁vi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁mibiki ▁na ▁ulongo ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁chila ▁zuwa .
▁Musa ▁kawatanga ▁hamwe ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁wenyewo ▁ muwona ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya mtendele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁na ▁isi ▁yake ▁yose .
▁Kawa temela ▁mate ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Y e lekeni ▁wana ▁wengi , ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁u kale ▁na ▁kui memez a ▁isi ▁yose ▁na ▁kui tawala . ▁Mu wa tawale ▁somba ▁weli ▁mwiibahali , ▁ndege ▁woguluka ▁na ▁chila ▁chi umbe ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁chochi genda ▁mwiisi .”
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ E ne ya , ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ko kuhonya . ▁ Inuka , ▁ sola ▁ lili ▁jako .” ▁Bahobaho ▁ E ne ya ▁kenuka .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni tenda ▁mauzauza , ▁mweye ▁wose ▁mukala ▁mwa zanywa .
▁P e lele ▁sekemuje , ▁iyo ▁ko se lu la ▁ mbali ▁mapaga ▁yake ▁ha yaigol ile ▁ banzi ▁mbili , ▁iyo ▁kumwenu ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wa tenda ▁vino ▁siyo ▁fana ▁vichi lole le ! ▁Teng ' hu ▁wa ilava ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa , ▁m aabaho ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wa ilava ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁kumwetu .
▁ mbali ▁walume ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁weza leka ▁kusang ' hanila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ma bu la ▁yeza segela ▁kumwako ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zako ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako , ▁yeza sigala ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁muhala .”
▁mibiki ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁ndimi ▁mbili ▁za ▁ku lumbiliz ila . ▁M ibiki ▁yose ▁kwiza itenda ▁iwe ▁na ▁ndimi ▁mbili .
▁Uko ▁wa mwing ' ha ▁Yesu ▁divai ▁ iti b wi li zigwe ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁usungu , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁viya la nzile ▁ka lema ▁kung ' wa .
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁Yesu ▁keng ' higwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁inogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁yeye ▁vi ye kigwe ▁kuwa ▁mu lumbiliz i ▁wa ▁di lagano ▁diya ▁dinogile ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁chandusilo ▁chake ▁chi kala ▁muna ▁ivi lagano ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁va ▁hela , ▁vi kalilo ▁vidi ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chila ▁mbiki .
▁kalonga , ▁“ One ▁u vimanyile ▁chinhu ▁chochi londeka ▁kuku galila ▁tindiwalo ! ▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁chi fi sigwa ▁mmeso ▁yako .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 3 5 , 4 00.
▁“ H e bu ▁kuna ▁Mfalume ▁yelihi ▁yahalonda ▁kuhita ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁Mfalume ▁imwenga , ▁hakala ▁hasi ▁ teng ' hu ▁na ▁ku gesa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁longo ▁keza daha ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁Mfalume ▁mwene ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁maidi ?
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Chi hite ▁mwii ▁vi bulul u ▁vimwenga ▁vili ▁ mmabehi ▁na ▁hano . ▁Uko ▁na ko ▁no londeka ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁kwaviya ▁icho ▁ni icho ▁chi ni zile .”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka gala ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁da ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁weka ▁makono ▁yawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁iyo .
▁“ Walongele ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁‘ Yano ▁yayo ▁yoya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁ iwawo ▁yoya tangigwe ▁K ile o p a si ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mgeni ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁m baka ▁hu zi manyile ▁mbuli ▁zozi lawilile ▁kuja ▁siku ▁zino ?”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁muna ▁ichi bumbila ▁cha ▁Masadukayo , ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁kuzilibuka , ▁wa mwitila ▁Yesu , ▁wamuuza ,
▁Maabaho ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongoza ▁Yesu ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁muladi ▁ya gezigwe ▁na ▁Mwihi .
▁Na ▁waja ▁wo sang ' hanila ▁vinhu ▁va ▁isi ▁ino , ▁wawe ▁fana ▁wabule ▁sang ' hano ▁nayo , ▁kwaviya ▁isi ▁ino , ▁fana ▁vichi imanya , ▁yo fosa .
▁Kwa ▁ peta ▁ya ▁siku ▁zim pelembe ▁isi , ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁chila ▁siku ▁yo petigwa ▁kuwa ▁mwaka . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁mwiza gaya ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ni hi lwa .
▁Yosefu ▁kanogel wa ▁kuwa wona ▁wana ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁Efulaimu ▁na ▁kuwa hokela ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanage ▁wana ▁wa ▁Makili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Manase .
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁Yesu ▁haja ▁vi yamtangile ▁Lazalo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dileme ▁na ▁kun zilibula , ▁wa gendelela ▁kulonga ▁yaja ▁yoya lawilile .
▁Viwakalile ▁mwiinzila , ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwe ▁Saimoni , ▁munhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Chilene , ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁ A le ki za nda ▁na ▁Lu f o . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁ko lawa ▁kumgunda ▁ko i ta ▁kudibululu . ▁Wa kalizi ▁wam shulutiz a ▁ya u sole ▁msalaba ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁Munhu ▁yo itowa ▁kui ng ' hondo ▁ko leka ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁ugima ▁za ▁chila ▁zuwa ▁ mbali ▁ko sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁ng ' hondo ▁muladi ▁yam no geze ▁mkulu ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁Maliya ▁Magidalena ▁kahita . ▁Viya wa fi k le ▁wanahina , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni muwona ▁Mndewa !” ▁Iviya ▁kawalongela ▁chila ▁chiya longiligwe ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁Maabaho ▁muna ▁zinzozi ▁zangu ▁ni wona ▁m imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁inogile ▁na ▁i mema ▁yo kung ' hu na ▁muna ▁dibu wa ▁dimwe .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezatenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili , ▁nawo ▁weza lekele lwa ▁kwaviya ▁uhasanyi ▁u tendigw a ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁nawo ▁wa gala ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁wa mala , ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁za ▁uhasanyi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubananzi ▁wawo .
▁Vi nhu ▁venu ▁vingi ▁viwo la ▁na ▁viwalo ▁venu ▁vi digwa ▁na ▁mu s wa .
▁Iyo ▁ni ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁ha danganika ▁na ▁ha woneka ▁na ▁yeli ▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe . ▁Ya hishi m igwe ▁na ▁yeng ' higwe ▁ukulu ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo .
▁Viya malile ▁yayo ▁ ga yo ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁di fosa , ▁m aabaho ▁yang ' hali ▁magayo ▁maidi ▁nayo ▁yokwiza ▁sambi .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wafika ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Galilaya ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Wa gela si .
▁m aabaho ▁viya malile ▁kumwelek a ▁Mahalaleli ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Bulahimu ▁vi yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda ,
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁wo mkaliza ▁Yesu , ▁wakala ▁wo n zeha ▁na ▁kumtowa .
▁Ke se di ▁na ▁Ha zo ▁na ▁Pi li da shi ▁na ▁Y i di la fu ▁na ▁Besueli .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁hakala ▁mgati ▁mmwangu , ▁ko kwa sigwa ▁kunze ▁fana ▁viya ▁matambi ▁viya kwa sigwa ▁na ▁ku nyala . ▁Wa nhu ▁woya dondola ▁matambi ▁yayo ▁na ▁wo ye ka ▁muumoto ▁ya lungu le .
▁Laheli ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kani gombela , ▁kau hulika ▁usungu ▁wangu ▁na ▁ku ning ' ha ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .” ▁Ivo ▁Laheli ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Dani .
▁Mu mgale ▁mdodo ▁wenu ▁kumwangu . ▁Maabaho ▁niza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁hamu li ▁wapelembaji , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁hawa longa ▁uvwizi . ▁Niza weng ' ha ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁kubwela ▁nayo , ▁na ▁mwiza daha ▁ku leke lwa ▁kutenda ▁u c hulu zi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino .’ ▁”
▁Kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁Mulungu ▁kachi zilibula ▁hamwe ▁nayo , ▁chika tawale ▁nayo ▁kuulanga .
▁Mbali ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁ndala ▁kwa ▁kuvimanya . ▁M baka ▁vino ▁diyelo ▁Waisilaeli ▁waha soma ▁chitabu ▁cha ▁lagano ▁da ▁umwaka . ▁Chi tambala ▁icho ▁chiza segezigwa ▁haja ▁munhu ▁yaha ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Pelegi ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁kamwelek a ▁L e w u .
▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini , ▁Abida ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ G i di oni ,
▁Fan a ▁Mulungu ▁ko ya yawaza ▁ivo ▁mayani ▁ya ▁kumbago , ▁yaja ▁diyelo ▁ya uko ▁na ▁igolo ▁yo kwa sigwa ▁muumoto , ▁vino ▁heza mtendela ni ▁mweye ▁mengi ▁ng ' hani ? ▁Vi lihi ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mdodo !
▁I kala ▁fana ▁sita ▁imisi , ▁ziza ▁di tanda ▁mwiisi ▁yose , ▁m baka ▁fana ▁kenda
▁Walamse ni ▁Pilisi ka ▁na ▁Akila ▁na ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁One si f o lo .
▁M weye ▁wabozi ▁na ▁vipofu ! ▁I lihi ▁yili ▁ng ' hulu , ▁zahabu ▁hebu ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoi itenda ▁zahabu ▁ye le .
▁Paulo ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁ndugu ▁yetu .
▁Oholibama ▁kamwelek a ▁Ye u shi ▁na ▁Ya la mu ▁na ▁Kola . ▁Wa no ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wana ▁wa ▁Esau , ▁woya weleke ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁Ni lola , ▁ni wona ▁kukala ▁na ▁wingu ▁ ze lu . ▁Na ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁wingu ▁ijo ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁kombelo ▁da ▁zahabu ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁jake , ▁na ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake ▁sengo ▁i kutwa .
▁Kufos ela ▁mwanage ▁Mulungu ▁kavi bweleza ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁muna ▁isi . ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁damu ▁ya ▁Mwanage ▁yoi ti ke ▁mumsalaba .
▁Lelo ▁chilonge ze ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wa saho ▁yetu ▁Bulahimu , ▁ kala wi ligwa ▁na ▁choni ?
▁Mbali ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kanogel wa ▁na ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁mwene ▁ngalawa ▁na ▁m we nde s ha ji ▁wa ▁ngalawa , ▁na ▁siyo ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁Paulo .
▁Pilato ▁viya longiligwe ▁na ▁ija ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kamala ▁kudanganika , ▁ka mulekela ▁Yosefu ▁ya lu sole ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu .
▁kwaviya ▁weza watenda ▁wanenu ▁wa muleke ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwatenda ▁wa i tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza muwonela ni ▁ludoko ▁na ▁kezam da nga ni za ni ▁bahobaho .
▁Ivo ▁siyo ▁waidi ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁lukuli ▁lumwe . ▁Ivo chi ya ▁choya chi lumbiliz e ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁sekeya chi gole .”
▁Mndewa ▁ya u tende ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁ wongezeke ▁na ▁uku le , ▁muladi ▁mui nogele ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁na ▁muwa nogele ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose , ▁fana ▁viya ▁cheye ▁vichi wa nogele ▁mweye .
▁Abulamu ▁vi yengile ▁Misili , ▁Wamisili ▁wa muwona ▁muke ▁wake ▁kakala ▁lumondo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Wapete ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili , ▁kwandusi la ▁wana ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁wa pete ▁kwa ▁mazina ▁yawo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁yoyose ▁yo galigw a ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba ▁muna ▁iha nhu ▁helile , ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁haiza digwa ▁ mbali ▁iza timbuligwa ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁“ Habule ▁mbiki ▁unogile ▁wou kwima ▁ma tu da ▁yehile ▁bule , ▁iviya ▁ habule ▁mbiki ▁wihile ▁wou kwima ▁matunda ▁yanogile ▁bule .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Mazi ▁ya bwela ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁m ituka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi , ▁wakalizi ▁wose ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wowa wa sondelele ▁Waisilaili ▁wadanganika ▁muibahali . ▁Ha sigale ▁Mmisili ▁hata ▁imwe .
▁Maabaho ▁kabwela ▁kaidi , ▁ka wafika ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa gona , ▁meso ▁yawo ▁ya kala ▁ vu we vu we . ▁Na wo ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule ▁da ▁kumulongela .
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁cheye ▁siyo ▁wana ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁mtumwa ▁ila ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁yailegehe .
▁U langa ▁na ▁isi ▁viza fosa , ▁ mbali ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁hazi za fosa ▁bule !
▁Ha ja ▁hakala ▁na ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁kolumwa ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁na ne .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wo kwe hu la ▁yose , ▁ko lolela ▁yose , ▁ko huwila ▁yose , ▁na ▁ko funya ▁umoyo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Wa ka ya ▁wayage ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁viwahulike ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁Mndewa ▁viya mtendele , ▁wa de ng ' helela ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁U tajili ▁uno ▁wose ▁Mulungu ▁woya u solile ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁ni ▁wetu ▁cheye ▁na ▁wanetu . ▁Tend a ▁vovose ▁viya kulongele ▁Mulungu .”
▁Mbali ▁vi bu ha ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁kusegela , ▁kufosa ▁ku hunguka ▁hata ▁chinhu ▁chidodo ▁muna ya ma l agilizo .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁imitondo , ▁Bulahimu ▁kahita ▁himahima ▁hoya kalile ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁mwenevale ▁wangu , ▁na ▁kamtenda ▁munhu ▁tajili ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ka mwing ' ha ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁zahabu , ▁wanaake ▁na ▁walume ▁na ▁watumwa ▁na ▁ngamiya ▁na ▁vihongwe .
▁Mwiza wananga ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁wonda ya weke ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu , ▁sekemuwa wonele ▁ubazi . ▁Sekemu i tambikile ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁m t e go ▁kumwenu .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁ulo ▁ nimulagilizani ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zomu londeka ▁kutenda .
▁Leka mana ▁no mulagilizani ▁mwi ke ▁hakwe ▁mabululu ▁matatu .
▁M beyu ▁zozi la galile ▁muu lo ngo ▁uli ▁mu ulu we ▁zo lagusa ▁wanhu ▁wowo hulika ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kui hokela ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho , ▁ mbali ▁wabule ▁mizizi ▁hai weng ila ▁ng ' hani ▁bule ▁mu imizoyo ▁yawo . ▁Wo i togola ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁luguhi ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁waha gezigwa ▁wo ileka .
▁Ku vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Asiya ▁wa ni leka , ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁wa umo ▁F i gelo ▁na ▁Helim o ge ne .
▁Wa no ▁ni ▁wawo ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ya ni ▁Edomu , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁kawa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jake . ▁Wawo ▁wose ▁wana ▁wa ▁Oholibama , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ana , ▁muke ▁wa ▁Esau .
▁No gesa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi tenda ▁cheye ▁watumigwa ▁chiwe ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kulu kome le zo ▁ng ' hani , ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa tagusigwe ▁kukomigwa . ▁Chi kigwa ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kusang a zigwa ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁hanhu ▁ho tangigwa ▁Ge si se ma ne , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Niye ▁voni hita ▁haja ▁kutosa , ▁mweye ▁ka leni ▁hano .”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁uyatendile .”
▁ Vondau wagale ▁Walawi ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁Waisilaili ▁weza wekila ▁makono ▁Walawi ,
▁L usita ▁lwa ▁ku fukiz a ▁ubani ▁vilufikile , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu kala ▁hanze ▁lw o tosa .
▁Mbali ▁Timoseyo ▁keza ▁sambi ▁kulawa ▁kumwenu ▁kachi galila ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁za ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wenu . ▁Na ▁kachilongela ▁kuwa ▁mo chi kumbuka ▁goya ▁lusita ▁lwose ▁ mulonda ▁kuchi wona ▁cheye ▁fana ▁cheye ▁vichi londa ▁kuwa wona ▁mweye .
▁Ke miza ▁vitasa ▁vake ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa fosa ▁muibahali ▁hana ▁iisi ▁inyalile , ▁mazi ▁ya igola ▁ banzi ▁mbili ▁fana ▁ng ' huta .
▁Wa mwenga ▁wenu ▁wa ndusa ▁kuigoda ▁wa gesa ▁siza ▁kaidi ▁ku mu la ula ni .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁wa kugalile ▁fimbo ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili , ▁chila ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁fimbo ▁imwe . ▁Y andika ▁zina ▁da ▁chila ▁mulangulizi ▁muna ▁i fi mbo ▁yake ,
▁Yesu ▁viya ule kile ▁lung ' husesa ▁na ▁kwingila ▁mui chi hele to , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Chilongele ▁fambulo ▁da ▁simwe ▁da ▁ma savu ▁muna ▁umgunda .”
▁M ibiki ▁iyo ▁ya ▁hasi ▁i i leke ▁ mbali ▁i lumbiliz igwe ▁kwa ▁kuchanyha ▁kuna ▁i mhete ▁imwe . ▁M ibiki ▁yose ▁ya ▁ving obweda ▁iza tendigw a ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁ itende ▁mbili .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Sodoma ▁wakala ▁we ha ▁na ▁wa muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
