▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili , ▁“ Zindilil eni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yoni m fu nza ni , ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁na ▁kuisola ▁isi ▁ija ▁iyo mwing ' heni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Ka vi bweleza ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi soligwe ▁na ▁wafalume ▁waja , ▁na ▁ka mbweleza ▁Lutu ▁mwi h wa ge , ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mgala ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁nyambenyambe , ▁mweye ▁na ▁mfalume ▁wenu , ▁uko ▁mweye ▁hebu ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁ham ku manyile . ▁Mwiza sang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁yoi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁mibiki ▁na ▁mabwe .
▁Ha zengigw a ▁ zewe ▁da ▁vi hele to ▁vidi , ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁mwanduso ▁chi tangigwa ▁Ha nhu ▁He lile ▁na ▁chiheleto ▁chekaidi ▁chi tangigwa ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani . ▁U mo ▁mukala ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chiya ▁cha ▁kwikil a ▁vitasa ▁na ▁lupango ▁na ▁magate ▁vovi kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁muladi ▁sekekuw e ▁na ▁ku igola ▁muna ▁ulukuli , ▁ila ▁vilung o ▁vose ▁vi i gese .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Siku ▁yako ▁ya ▁kudanganika ▁ya habehi . ▁M tange ▁Yoshua , ▁m wize ▁hamwe ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁ni mtende ▁yawe ▁mulangulizi .” ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kawalagiliza ▁wa ga nga ▁wake ▁wa mu ha ke ▁da wa ▁Isilaili ▁muladi ▁sekeya wo le , ▁nawo ▁wa tenda ▁ivo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niza kwiza ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁diza mile , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa hulike ▁vini longa ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁wezaku huwila ▁siku ▁zose . ▁“ Mu sa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi walongile ▁wanhu ▁wawo .”
▁Yesu ▁kawatum a ▁wawo ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁na ▁kawalagiliza ▁vino , ▁“ Sekemu hite ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁wala ▁sekemwi ngile ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Wa samaliya .
▁I mi si ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka walongolela ▁muna ▁yamawingu ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁kuwa lagusa ▁nzila , ▁ichilo ▁ka walongolela ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uli ngile ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁kuweng ' ha ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kugenda ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo .
▁Yakobo ▁kawauza ▁waja ▁iwa dimi , ▁“ Wa mbwiya ▁zangu , ▁mweye ▁ mulawa ▁kulihi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ch o lawa ▁Halani .”
▁Eliya ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁fana ▁cheye . ▁Ka tosa ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha ▁mvula ▁seke itonye , ▁nayo ▁ha itonyile ▁mwiisi ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁miyezi ▁sita .
▁Uko ▁Yelusalemu , ▁habehi ▁na ▁ulwivi ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kukala ▁na ▁ lamba ▁dodi tangigwa ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya ▁Be ti sa za , ▁najo ▁di kala ▁na ▁vi hele ngo ▁vitan o .
▁Mbali ▁cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo ching ' ha ▁uhumi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁“ ▁‘ H e bu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo , ▁kwiza sasala ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁chilo ▁mbili ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ziza lavigwa ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ,
▁I la ▁isi ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muhala ▁hai gulile ▁bule . ▁Kwa viya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wakala ▁wo kwing ' higwa ▁yombe ▁jawo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mfalume , ▁ivo ▁isi ▁yawo ▁hai guligwe ▁bule .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁Musa ▁wam fisa ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyezi ▁mitatu ▁viya malile ▁ku vumbuka . ▁Kwa viya ▁wa muwona ▁kuwa ▁mwana ▁yanogile , ▁wala ▁hawa di dumbile ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁mfalume .
▁Bulahimu ▁ka winula ▁mwele ▁wake ▁ku mchinja ▁mwanage .
▁Mbali ▁unovu ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁viu gubul igwe ,
▁Daudi ▁ka wona ▁chiya ▁Mulungu ▁chonda ya mtendele ▁hamwande , ▁ivo ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kuzilibuka ▁kwa ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁viyalongile , ▁‘ H e za lekigwa ▁kuzimu ▁bule , ▁wala ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁ha lu wola ▁bule .’
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁Mulungu ▁mwene ▁Udaho , ▁uwe ▁na ▁welesi ▁mwingi ▁na ▁m ongeze ke . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yose ▁weza lawa ▁kumwako , ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁wa saho ▁wa ▁wafalume .
▁Ma ha mbo ▁yayo ▁yezakuwa ▁ku mbu ku mbu ▁kumwenu . ▁Chila ▁muha vi wona , ▁mwiza kumbuka ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁yose ▁na ▁kuya zindilila , ▁muladi ▁sekemu tende ▁vi mulonda ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁meso ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu , ▁yoi mu longoza ni ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mu tende ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁ muleka ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁simwe , ▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁tajili ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁mgunda ▁wou mu lele ▁ng ' hani .
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁umwanza ▁wangu ▁weketatu ▁woni isasala . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Chila ▁mbuli ▁yo londeka ▁kuhak i ki shi gwa ▁kwa ▁wa sindila ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu .”
▁Ivo , ▁“ Mndewa ” ▁ni ▁Muhe , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁ha yeli ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁hana ▁ulegeho .
▁Ivo ▁ivo ▁Mulungu ▁ka gangamiza ▁chilagano ▁chake ▁kwa ▁ku ilaha , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kawa lagusa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁woya walaganile ▁kuwa ▁heza galula ▁lungilo ▁jake .
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatanga ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁weli ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁waha wi ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁nawo ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁uha wi ▁wawo .
▁Iviya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Y atunhizigwe ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Shemu . ▁Kanani ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁Shemu .
▁Chi nyamkela ▁chi n ze n ze ula ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁ya g u t e ▁nyangi , ▁kaidi ▁cho n guma ▁chi sang o ▁na ▁ho vu ▁do mulawa ▁mu umulomo , ▁na ▁hachi muleka ▁hima !
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M a tu kwa ▁wana ▁mi na ▁na ▁ndege ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wana ▁m vu lu , ▁ mbali ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ka bule ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku go ne za ▁ditwi ▁jake .”
▁Munhu ▁yo fundizigw a ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁wa i gole le ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vinogile ▁na ▁mfundiza ▁wake .
▁Kuna ▁siku ▁sita ▁za ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁siku ▁ya ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo , ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁homukala .
▁Wa hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁ wofugigwa ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁ndege ▁na ▁chila ▁chi umbe ▁chili ▁na ▁mabawa .
▁Ni u lagusa ▁ukulu ▁wako ▁muna ▁isi , ▁ni i komeleza ▁sang ' hano ▁you nhu mile ▁ni i sa nane .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lose ▁ wedika , ▁“ D a mu ▁yake ▁iwe ▁m chanyha ▁yetu ▁na ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁wanetu !”
▁Mu londeni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁zenu ▁zose .
▁I ja ▁im sang ' hani ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Fan a ▁imndele ▁heza togola ▁bule ▁kwii leka ▁kaye ▁na ▁kuni sondelela ▁kwiza ▁kuno ▁kwii si ▁ino , ▁lelo ▁ni mgale ▁mwanago ▁kuna ▁isi ▁you lawile ?”
▁Ivo ▁Waisilaili ▁weza leka ▁kutambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁zili ngile ▁fana ▁luti , ▁zi wo zi sondelela ▁na ▁ku muleka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁ugoni . ▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁di kale ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zose .’
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁chi pata ▁ku huma ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁yeye ▁yoya chi londile ▁cheye !
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ch oni tenda ▁sambi ▁weye ▁hu chimanya ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁kwiza chimanya ▁hamwande .”
▁ngamiya ▁wo kong ' heza ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁yawo , ▁ma ng ' ombe ▁mazi ke ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁m alume ▁longo , ▁m hu nda ▁mazi ke ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alume ▁longo ,
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu m zunguluka . ▁Yesu ▁ka kwela ▁mwiingalawa ▁na ▁kakala ▁umo . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wema ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁wa ▁dilamba .
▁Maabaho ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁na ▁Adi ma ▁na ▁Se b o i mu ▁na ▁Be la ▁iviya ▁yo tangigwa ▁Soali , ▁wa tenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wehi ▁wawo ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Si di mu
▁“ P u leni , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kwing ' wi gwa , ▁za hileni , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza pata , ▁ho di ze ni ▁na ▁mwiza vugulil igwa ▁ulwivi .
▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani ▁kawa golela ▁wanhu ▁uhazi . ▁Viya wagolele ▁wanhu , ▁chila ▁isi ▁kaweng ' ha ▁m haka ▁zake ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ peta ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili ,
▁Kwa viya ▁mung ' hali ▁mo kala ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁viwo kala . ▁Kwa viya ▁muna ▁migongo ▁na ▁ndwagi ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁wenyewo , ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mo langulizigw a ▁na ▁isi , ▁mukale ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chiunhu .
▁Ha nhu ▁ha lawilila ▁chila ▁ jo zi ▁ya ▁matambi ▁yaja ▁sita , ▁hasi ▁yake ▁hana ▁ tu mba ▁dimwe ▁dimwe .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁tatu , ▁i kala ▁siku ▁ya ▁ku fikiza ▁kwelekigwa ▁mfalume . ▁Mfalume ▁ka wekila ▁dugila ▁wakulu ▁wake ▁wose , ▁kamulava ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁ mwika goya ▁ving ' waji ▁na ▁m okaji ▁magate ▁mkulu ▁na ▁ka weka ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wakulu ▁wake .
▁Yesu ▁ka hinduka , ▁ka wona ▁wo muwinza , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mwo zahila ▁choni ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ L a b i , ▁vino ▁weye ▁kokala ▁kulihi ?” ▁L a b i ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁mfundiza .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Gileadi ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Y ezeli ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁He le ki
▁Viwa segele ▁uko ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁muna ▁dikolongo ▁da ▁Ze le di .
▁Ivo ▁mu handa ji ▁na ▁ng u mila ji ▁mazi ▁ habule ▁mbasakanyo , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kezamuli ha ▁chila ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁ku wi nza na ▁viya ▁viya sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁ muhokela ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁Muhe ▁ija ▁yaha kala ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁ha mulonda ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kuwafundiza , ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁wake ▁ko m fundiza ni ▁mbuli ▁zose . ▁Muhe ▁ija ▁kolonga ▁ukweli ▁wala ▁ha longa ▁uvwizi . ▁Basi ▁fana ▁viya ▁Muhe ▁viyo m fundiza ni , ▁ka leni ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa segela ▁na ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁kumulima , ▁wafika ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Eshikoli ▁na ▁wa di pelemba .
▁Maabaho ▁ni muwona ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁ko bandul a ▁uhul a ▁umwe ▁wa ▁ija ▁mihul a ▁saba . ▁Maabaho ▁nihulika ▁imwe ▁wa ▁vi umbe ▁waja ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁yolonga ▁fana ▁viya ▁dizi ▁da ▁ku bu ma , ▁“ Izo !”
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu we hile ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu , ▁ mbali ▁m olondeka ▁muwa zum e ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁muladi ▁sekemu tende ▁ubananzi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo .
▁Ko igodela ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁vino ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁kunze ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku leka ▁kwa mha ▁Malagilizo ?
▁I mitondo ▁ng ' hani ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁ko bwela ▁kudi bu lu ▁jake , ▁kakala ▁na ▁nzala .
▁Ya mhilila ▁ng ' hani ▁chiya ▁chi uli na cho ▁m baka ▁vondanize .
▁Viwafikile ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa ho ki ligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wohuwila ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁walala , ▁nawo ▁wawalongela ▁yose ▁Mulungu ▁yoyatendile ▁kufose la ▁wawo .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wetu , ▁Yesu ▁kachi gala ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁cho de ng ' helela ▁kwa ▁ku lolela ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁mu komboligwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi , ▁na ▁muwa ▁watumigwa ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Na ▁cho mu mweda ▁sambi ▁ni ▁ku safyigwa , ▁uko ▁ko gala ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo songola ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁ya ▁kuhonda ▁hebu ▁yoi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁makono ▁ya ▁fundi ▁na ▁yo mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yehilwe .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwi di kila , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁One ▁isi ▁yenu ▁iha chuuzi gwa , ▁haki ▁ya ▁mwene ▁kuikombola ▁iza manyika .
▁Viya danganike ▁Yo ba bu , ▁ka tawala ▁Hu s ha mu ▁kulawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Wa t ema ni .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁ya ▁nhaguso , ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza nilongela ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁Mndewa ! ▁Kwa ▁zina ▁jako ▁chi wapetela ▁wanhu ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jako ▁chiwa lava ▁wanhu ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁chi tenda ▁mauzauza ▁mengi !’
▁Wa mtogoza ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wano geligwa ▁nawo . ▁Chila ▁siku ▁Mndewa ▁kakala ▁ko w ongeze la ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo lopoligwa .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁keka ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ ulangulizi ▁wake .” ▁U kweli ▁uno ▁ni ▁kuwa , ▁Mulungu ▁heng ila ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁ijo ▁da ▁vinhu , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁iyo ▁yo vika ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁hasi ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁iyo heni ▁ng ' hani ▁ gele ni ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁ gele ni ▁umanyi ,
▁Mwiza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁saba ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁ O zi ni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Eli
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁muhawa ▁mung ' hali ▁mo lema ▁kuni hulika ▁na ▁mo ni lema , ▁niza kongeza ▁nhaguso ▁yenu ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁kwa ▁wingi ▁wa ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Isi ▁iza yi towa ▁na ▁isi ▁imwenga , ▁na ▁ufalume ▁wiza yi towa ▁na ▁ufalume ▁umwenga . ▁Chila ▁hanhu ▁heza kuwa ▁na ▁mi gudemek o ▁ya ▁isi , ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁nzala . ▁Yano ▁yose ▁yezakuwa ▁fana ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁usungu ▁wa ▁ku ibasula ▁mwana .
▁Kufos ela ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁watatu ▁wa ▁Nuhu , ▁wanhu ▁wene la ▁mui isi ▁yose .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ko mgala ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yondamu kale ▁na ▁keza wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo . ▁ Vondamwingile ▁keza ya wing a ▁makabila ▁saba ▁haulongozi ▁wenu , ▁makabila ▁yeli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁mweye , ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Wa gi liga shi ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi .
▁Kwa hawa ▁na ▁ku iswela ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha gile , ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wolonga ▁ni ▁chawo , ▁wanhu ▁wa tendile ▁ivo ▁weza galigw a ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁ija ▁Mulungu ▁yondaya lamule ▁kuwa ▁kabananga , ▁kezamuli ha ▁miyage ▁miyanza ▁midi .
▁Abulamu ▁kamsola ▁Salayi ▁muke ▁wake , ▁na ▁mwi h wa ge ▁Lutu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa wa patile ▁uko ▁Halani . ▁Wa segela ▁kuhita ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Viwafikile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanani ,
▁Mulungu ▁viya solile ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁niye .
▁ Sambi ▁no kwiza ▁kumwako , ▁nilonga ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁ hani ka li e ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁muladi ▁wa me me ▁ nde ne le lo ▁yangu ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yawo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁hanhu ▁haku kala ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁habehi ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁L a ma se si , ▁fana ▁viya ▁mfalume ▁viyalagilize .
▁M weye ▁mwiza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁lupango , ▁muladi ▁sekeni wa wonele ▁ludoko ▁kaidi ▁Waisilaili .
▁“ Muiteganye ▁sekemu m zimize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kwa ▁ku leka ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁zo ni mwing ' hani ▁diyelo .
▁Mulungu ▁mwene ▁Udaho ▁ya i temele ▁mate ▁ sola ▁yako ▁na ▁ya kwing ' he ▁wana ▁wengi , ▁ivo ▁kwiza kuwa ▁tata ▁wa ▁makabila ▁mengi .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁kuwa ▁sekewa je ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ya ▁luti ▁hebu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁wabule ▁mizizi ▁mgati ▁mmwawo , ▁wokala ▁chip indi ▁chidogo . ▁Wa ha pata ▁magayo ▁hebu ▁manhesa ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁mbuli , ▁bahobaho ▁wabwela ▁kuchisogo .
▁“ Izoni ▁kumwangu ▁mweye ▁wose ▁womu gaya ▁na ▁ku me me lwa ▁na ▁mbahasha ▁ziza mile ▁na ▁niye ▁nizawa hu mu za .
▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁mwa li ▁yo soligwa ▁wolonga , ▁“ Izo .” ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁kolondeka ▁ya longe , ▁“ Izo .” ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁mwene ▁ng ' hilu ▁na ye ze , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ugima ▁na ye ze ▁ya sole ▁ bila ▁maliho .
▁Chi mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁kachi hulika . ▁Kachi galila ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoya chi segeze ▁Misili . ▁ Sambi ▁cha hano ▁Kadeshi , ▁isi ▁yoi haka na ▁na ▁isi ▁yako .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁halondile ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yam sondelele , ▁ila ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Yakobo .
▁Keza we gula ▁nyele ▁zake ▁zose ▁zili ▁mditwi ▁na ▁ nde vu ▁na ▁ng ' hu mbi tu . ▁Keza we gula ▁nyele ▁zose ▁zili ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lwake . ▁Maabaho ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁keza ko ga , ▁nayo ▁keza kwela .
▁“ Walongele ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁‘ I zindilile ni ▁siku ▁yangu ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁mana ▁chino ▁ni ▁chilaguso ▁hagati ▁ya ▁niye ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zenu ▁zose , ▁ivo ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoni mtenda ni ▁mwele .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Munhu ▁wa ▁kumwenu ▁hebu ▁wa ▁nyele si ▁zenu , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya we ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ku dalisa ▁mtufi , ▁hebu ▁yahawa ▁kutali ▁muna ▁umwanza , ▁ko zindilila ▁Pasaka ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁M weye ▁wa delenya ! ▁M ulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Isaya ▁ka lotela ▁kweli ▁viyalongile ,
▁Mbali ▁one ▁kaye ▁ili ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁di zengigw e ▁ng ' huta ▁hai komboligwe ▁kwa ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁ija ▁ya i gulile ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zake ▁zose , ▁hebu ▁haiza bwelezigwa ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁keza lawilila ▁mu lukolo ▁lwa ▁Daudi ▁na ▁kwelekigwa ▁uko ▁Betelehemu , ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da yakalile ▁Daudi .”
▁Sekemu mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mnyama ▁yoyose ▁ya tu li ke ▁yameso ▁na ▁chilema ▁na ▁yoya bene ke ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁na ▁yo lawa ▁ufila ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhele ▁hebu ▁chi londa , ▁sekemuwa lave ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ha chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁“ Yandik a ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁da ▁Laodikiya , ▁“ U senga ▁uno ▁wolawa ▁kwa ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Ivo , ▁m sindila ▁mwaminika ▁yeli ▁wa ▁kweli ▁na ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi lumbigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁modaha ▁kuwona ▁na ▁kuhulika ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁yaja ▁yoyo tenda ▁Paulo . ▁Kawa kong ' hela ▁na ▁kuwa hi ndu la ▁wanhu ▁wa togole ▁kuwa ▁milungu ▁i tendigw a ▁na ▁wanhu ▁siyo ▁milungu ▁hata ▁chidogo , ▁siyo ▁Efeso ▁muhala ▁ mbali ▁mi ko wa ▁yose ▁ya ▁Asiya .
▁I ja ▁yo huma ▁keza ya zigwa ▁mawalo ▁mazelu ▁fana ▁yano , ▁na ▁niye ▁siza di lava ▁ng ' o ▁zina ▁jake ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ugima , ▁kaidi ▁niza mtogola ▁kuwa ▁wangu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Ka gesa ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wayage ▁waha vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtuma ▁yeye ▁kuwakombola , ▁ mbali ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule .
▁“ Mu he ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁ha chanyha ▁yangu . ▁Kwa viya ▁kani sagula ▁niye ▁kuwa galila ▁ngayengaye ▁mbuli ▁inogile . ▁Ka ni tuma ▁niwa gong ' o ndele ▁wowa fungigw e ▁kuwa ▁weza lekele lwa , ▁na ▁vipofu ▁weza wona , ▁na ▁kuwakombola ▁wa wone ligwe .
▁na ▁mapanzia ▁ya ▁luwa ▁lu zunguluke ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁na ▁lupango , ▁na ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁nzabi ▁zake ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁va ▁ usang ' hano ▁wawo . ▁Wawo ▁weza sang ' hanila ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi son hela ▁vinhu ▁vino .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kofundiza ▁kulawa ▁chip indi ▁di zewe ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁ding ' hali ▁ dima , ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kwingila ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁ha ▁kuulanga ▁ing ' hali ▁ku vu guligwa .
▁Wa linga ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁wahita ▁m baka ▁zuwa ▁di s wa . ▁Maabaho ▁wa ndusa ▁ku mzahila ▁kwa ▁wandugu ▁na ▁wa mbwiya ▁zawo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa di tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁nhulanyika ▁diya ▁muladi ▁wa di tambikile ▁kwaviya ▁di lava ▁udahi ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ding ' onyo ▁ijo , ▁iviya ▁wa di tambikila ▁diya ▁ding ' onyo ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁ding ' ho nyo ▁dino ? ▁Yeli hi ▁yo daha ▁kutenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁najo ?”
▁“ Walongele ▁wanhu ▁wa segele ▁hana ▁yamahema ▁ya ▁Kola ▁na ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu .”
▁Vi ifikile ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁Tamali ▁kwi ibasula , ▁kukala ▁na ▁ma mba sa ▁mwii nda ▁yake .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁we ▁saba ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁kuulanga . ▁Di zi ▁kulu ▁di hulikik a ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chiya , ▁di longa , ▁“ Ima la ▁ku tendeka !”
▁ mbali ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wa ▁habehi ▁fana ▁viya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mwanage ▁hebu ▁mndele ▁wake ▁hebu ▁se kulu ▁wake ,
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁viyo lagiliza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuson hela ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁Selofehadi , ▁‘ W o daha ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁i wo mulonda , ▁ mbali ▁wa soligwe ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁jawo .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁ye ta no ▁mwiza lava ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁kenda ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁longo ▁na ▁mane ▁yeli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁kwa ga ▁kugona ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁kugona ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁mu lu ma ko ,
▁Yo si ▁da ▁ubani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vi kwela ▁uchanyha ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija .
▁Ka kala ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁ko n dumba ▁Mulungu , ▁yeye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ukaye ▁yake ▁wakala ▁wa mtosela ▁Mulungu . ▁Iviya ▁ka wataza ▁ng ' hani ▁Wa nhu ▁weli ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁kutambika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Na ▁iyo ▁miyaka ▁alufu ▁imwe ▁vonda i ma le , ▁Lufyende ▁keza fungu li ligwa ▁ya lawe ▁kui chi fu ngo ▁chake .
▁Leka mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ino ‚ ▁kwiza nimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Lola ▁niza ya towa ▁mazi ▁yano ▁yeli ▁mu ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁kwa ▁mhome ▁ino ▁ini li ▁nayo ▁mu m ko no ▁wangu ‚ ▁nayo ▁yeza galuka ▁kuwa ▁damu .
▁Wa nhu ▁weza wing igwa ▁muna zi kaye ▁za ▁kutosela , ▁na ▁chip indi ▁cho kwiza ▁weza wakoma ▁na ▁ku gesa ▁wo msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa wagala ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁wawe miza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichitala , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kawauza ,
▁Yuda ▁katogola ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁ku zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku mu hinduka ▁Yesu ▁ bila ▁wanhu ▁kuvimanya .
▁Vi i londeka ▁weye ▁wii ke ▁hela ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁iwa ja ▁wo lava ▁ lima ng we , ▁na ▁niye ▁ni heza ▁ni sole ▁iya ng u ▁na ▁kuhokela ▁yo ile ligwe .
▁Ana si ▁na ▁Kayafa ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁L usita ▁ulwo ▁ulwo , ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i mwizila ▁Yohana , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Zakaliya ▁kuja ▁kudibwilingu .
▁M wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa komigwe ▁kukala ▁na ▁wafalume ▁watano , ▁nawo ▁ni ▁ E vi ▁na ▁ Leke mu ▁na ▁S uli ▁na ▁Hu li ▁na ▁L e ba . ▁Iviya ▁wa mkoma ▁kwa ▁panga ▁Balaamu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Beoli .
▁Wakala ▁wo geza ▁kumkoma ▁Paulo , ▁ mbali ▁zi nhu me ▁zim fikila ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Chi lu mi ▁kuwa ▁Yelusalemu ▁yose ▁i kala ▁i mema ▁ h engelehengele .
▁Wa naake ▁wawo ▁wa watenda ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Lebeka ▁wakale ▁kwa ▁usungu .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁hamu ni hulike ▁hebu ▁hamu zindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ,
▁Kwa viya ▁wano ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁na ▁uhazi ▁wako , ▁wanhu ▁wouwa lavile ▁kulawa ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁na ▁udahi ▁wako ▁mkulu .’
▁ Tegelezeni ! ▁Ni mwing ' hani ▁udahi ▁mweye , ▁ivo ▁mwiza bojoga ▁zoka ▁na ▁ing e , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁udahi ▁kwa ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wose . ▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁chonda ▁chiwa lu mize ni .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wa dile ▁wakala ▁wa fosa ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁mane . ▁Yesu ▁ka walaga ▁wanhu .
▁Mu la la ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁kolondeka ▁sekeyawe ▁m bananzi , ▁yawe ▁na ▁muke ▁imwe ▁muhala , ▁na ▁wanage ▁ wolondeka ▁wa muhuwile ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁wihile ▁na ▁hawa tegeleza .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁Waisilaili ▁wokala ▁habehi ▁na ▁mweye ▁wahawa ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁kui chuuza ▁kumwenu , ▁sekemu watende ▁wa msang ' hanileni ▁fana ▁watumwa .
▁Kwa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁yondaya ku taze ▁Kwa ▁Mulungu ▁mwene ▁Udaho ▁yondaya ku temele ▁mate ▁Ya ku temele ▁mate ▁kwa ▁mvula ▁kulawa ▁kuchanyha ▁Ku temiligw a ▁mate ▁mazi ▁yoyo lawa ▁hasi ▁mwiisi , ▁Ku temiligw a ▁mate ▁ kweleka ▁wana ▁na ▁ fu go ,
▁Vi u chi le ▁Wayahudi ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁waidumwe ▁na ▁ walaga na ▁sekewa je ▁wala ▁sekewa ng ' we ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁m baka ▁vondawa mkome ▁Paulo .
▁Leka ▁chi humuluk e ▁na ▁ku ti bu la ▁ulonzi ▁wawo ▁muladi ▁sekewa i tegeleze .”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yelile ▁hebu ▁heli ▁muna ▁umwanza , ▁nayo ▁haja m hile ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kezaba guligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁kwaviya ▁ha mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lu pangigwe . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kezatagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁Shekemu ▁kanogel wa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁Dina ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁ivo ▁ka ndusa ▁k umbe m b ele za .
▁Wa falume ▁wa ▁zisi ▁wo watendile ▁ugoni ▁nayo ▁na ▁kukala ▁nayo ▁muna ▁yama da m b wa , ▁weza lila ▁kwa ▁giyogiyo ▁ng ' wi fi ▁na ▁ku mulilila , ▁vonda di wone ▁yosi ▁da ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁di di danganizigwa .
▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁hoya wa mbigwe ▁Yesu ▁hakala ▁na ▁mgunda , ▁na ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁uwo ▁kukala ▁na ▁ tuka ▁da ▁sambi , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yawa ndigwe ▁muna ▁dituka ▁ijo .
▁Mndewa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Vino ▁yelihi ▁msang ' hani ▁mwaminika ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala , ▁ija ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁yonda ▁ya mwi ke ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wamwenga , ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁yombe ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwake ?
▁Mbali ▁hata ▁m vili ▁umwe ▁muna ▁ya matwi ▁yenu ▁hawiza kwa ga .
▁Zu wa ▁vonda di ho ng e ▁keza kuwa ▁kela . ▁Maabaho ▁keza daha ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁yelile ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁ndiya ▁yake .
▁Munhu ▁yokwiza ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁wose . ▁Munhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ni ▁wa ▁chi isi isi , ▁nayo ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁isi . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ya lawile ▁kuulanga ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁vose .
▁W eye ▁hu huwila ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁na ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Tata , ▁na ▁Tata ▁ka mgati ▁yangu ? ▁Mbuli ▁zi ni walongela ni ▁siyo ▁zangu ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁Tata ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yangu ▁niiyo ▁yo zi sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zake .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wahita ▁Misili ▁na ▁wawa duganya ▁hamwe ▁walala ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chonda ya dalise ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁chi zakuwa ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya chi dalise ▁chinhu ▁icho ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .”
▁Na ▁hachi daha ▁kulonga ▁‘ U lawa ▁kwa ▁munhu .’ ▁” ▁Wa wa dumba ▁wanhu ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Yohana ▁kakala ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Tegeleza ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni kulongela . ▁Sekeu ya ta mbule ▁mazina ▁ya ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁hata ▁chidogo , ▁mazina ▁yayo ▁sekeya hulikik e ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wako .
▁“ Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu mweda ▁kwaviya ▁meso ▁yenu ▁yo wona ▁na ▁magutwi ▁yenu ▁yo hulika .
▁“ Mfundiza , ▁L agilizo ▁dilihi ▁dili ▁kulu ▁kufosa ▁yose ?”
▁“ Maabaho ▁keza di chinja ▁diya ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁da ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose . ▁Keza gala ▁damu ▁ya ▁luti ▁iyo ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁kwa ▁damu ▁iyo ▁kezatenda ▁viya viya ▁fana ▁viya i tendile ▁damu ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe . ▁Keza i miza ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁kuulongozi ▁kwake .
▁Mo wona ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁ko togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁muhala .
▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁ muwonele ▁ubazi ▁mbwanga ▁wangu , ▁ko gaya ▁ng ' hani , ▁kana ▁chi sang o . ▁M iyanza ▁mingi ▁ko m b wa n ha ▁muna ▁umoto ▁hebu ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Viwakalile ▁wang ' hali ▁wo gendelela ▁muna ▁inzila , ▁wafika ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁mazi ▁na ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vino ▁hanhu ▁hano ▁hana ▁chochose ▁cha ▁kum goma ▁sekeni batizigwe ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁kaidi , ▁“ Mu kale ▁kwa ▁ Tindiwalo . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Tata ▁viya nhu mile ▁niye , ▁na ▁niye ▁no mtuma ni ▁mweye .”
▁M weye ▁wana , ▁wa hulike ni ▁ tati ▁zenu ▁na ▁mami ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁mo ilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁kwaviya ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁vinoga .
▁Ka ya nanga ▁mabululu ▁yayo ▁na ▁ bawe ▁jose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁uko ▁na ▁mimeya ▁yose ▁yoi kalile ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Habule ▁ulondo ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁munhu ▁kulava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbwiya ▁zake .
▁Petili ▁kahumuluka ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁“ Munhu ▁yomu nzahila ▁iyo ▁niye . ▁ Habali ▁mwiza ?”
▁“ M abululu ▁yondamu weng ' he ▁Walawi ▁yezakuwa ▁sita ▁ya ▁kukimbilila , ▁yondamu ye ke ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁munhu ▁yondaya mkome ▁miyage ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁muladi ▁ya kimbilile ▁uko . ▁Iviya ▁mwiza weng ' ha ▁mabululu ▁yamwenga ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁maidi .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁uhuwilo , ▁yawa memez eni ▁de ng ' ho ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu , ▁muladi ▁lolelo ▁jenu ▁u gendelele ▁kuku la ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoya lole sa ▁goya ▁malagilizo ▁ya gangamale ▁yoyo weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁ulegeho ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁kui tendela ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁yam afundizo ▁ya ▁Chilisito . ▁Na ▁siyo ▁kuhulika ▁muhala ▁na ▁ku zimiza ▁ mbali ▁ko i fikiza ▁ng ' hani . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza temiligw a ▁mate ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zake .
▁Viya kalile ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁Besaniya ▁na ▁Be si fa ge , ▁muna umulima ▁wou tangigwa ▁Mizaituni , ▁kawatum a ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁waidi ▁wa longole ,
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁yaha vi kwenhukila ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁Waisilaili ▁vo wa vi kile ▁kuwa ▁va ▁chiidumwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu ▁kuno ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁niza mulema ▁sekeyawe ▁haulongozi ▁wangu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁nyingi , ▁Wayahudi ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa panga ▁mi pango ▁ya ▁kumkoma ▁Sauli ,
▁Labani ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Ni ku lihe ▁choni ?” ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Si londa ▁yombe ▁jojose . ▁One ▁chiha itogolela , ▁niza gendelela ▁kwika ▁goya ▁wanyama ▁wako .
▁Leka mana ▁wamwenga wenu ▁wanyondenyonde ▁na ▁watamu , ▁na ▁wengi ▁wenu ▁wadanganika .
▁Mo imanya ▁nzila ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ho ni hita .”
▁One ▁chiha pata ▁manhesa , ▁cho pata ▁manhesa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁m ta zo ▁wenu ▁na ▁ukombola , ▁one ▁chiha ta zigwa , ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mo ta zigwa ▁na ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁ku funyila ▁umoyo ▁manhesa ▁yaja ▁yaja .
▁Maabaho ▁wa tenda ▁mbugi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁yelile , ▁chila ▁di ha fosa ▁ komamanga ▁dimwe ▁weka ▁mbugi ▁hana ▁im hindo ▁ya ▁di jo ho .
▁Iviya ▁u mulonde ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wako ▁wose ▁na ▁kwa ▁haki li ▁zako ▁zose ▁na ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁zako ▁zose , ▁na ▁ku mulonda ▁miyago ▁fana ▁vou wi londa ▁mwenyewo ▁vinoga ▁kufosa ▁ku mulavila ▁za b i hu ▁Mulungu .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka kwela ▁m chanyha ▁kuna ▁ulugongo , ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake .
▁Yeli hi ▁yo daha ▁kuya peta ▁m atimbwisi ▁ya ▁Yakobo , ▁hebu ▁kupeta ▁lobo ▁ya ▁Isilaili ? ▁ Vonda ni da na g ni ke ▁niwe ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wanogile , ▁fana ▁Waisilaili .”
▁na ▁viya komeleze ▁kuja , ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁lu mbwelela . ▁Sauli ▁kakala ▁siku ▁ndodo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁uko ▁Damasiki .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuiyoha ▁kwenu ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁u hulikik a ▁si ▁uko ▁Makedoniya ▁na ▁Akaya ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁wene la ▁chila ▁hanhu . ▁Ivo ▁hachi londeka ▁kulonga ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁bule .
▁No daha ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁na bule ▁ulondo ▁niye ▁ni linga ▁fana ▁dizi ▁da ▁mbugi ▁hebu ▁da ▁ pe gwa .
▁Mbali ▁nzewele ▁zake ▁vi zi mbwe lele , ▁ka ilongela ▁mwenyewo , ▁‘ Vino ▁ni ▁watumigwa ▁we ngahi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁woja ▁na ▁kusi gaza , ▁na ▁niye ▁hano ▁no fa ▁na ▁nzala ?
▁Uko ▁Yuda ▁ka iting ' hana ▁na ▁mndele ▁Mkanaani ▁ tati ▁yake ▁zina ▁jake ▁S huwa . ▁Yuda ▁kamsola ▁mndele ▁iyo ▁na ▁ka mbandama ,
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Mu ha wataza ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Chiebulaniya ▁kuna ▁uku ibasula ‚ ▁one ▁yaha vumbuka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁ mkome ni , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁yaha vumbuka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike ▁muleke ni .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁niye ▁no sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁kuiyoha ▁kusang ' hanila ▁ludabwa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁Chilisito ▁yoi sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁mgati ▁yangu .
▁“ M a kabila ▁yano ▁yeza goliligw a ▁isi ▁iwe ▁uhazi ▁wawo , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ peta ▁ya ▁mazina ▁yawo .
▁M wanamke ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Chi samaliya ▁keza ▁kude ha ▁mazi . ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ U ning ' he ▁mazi ▁ning ' we !”
▁m aabaho ▁weza walongela ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino . ▁Wa hulika ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ha gati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁mana ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko woneka ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga ▁na ▁wingu ▁jako ▁do kwima ▁uchanyha ▁yawo . ▁W eye ▁imisi ▁ko walongolela ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁dili ngile ▁fana ▁mhanda , ▁na ▁ichilo ▁ko walongolela ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uli ngile ▁fana ▁mhanda .
▁Abulamu ▁kakala ▁tajili ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁ fu go ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁zahabu .
▁Wa ja ▁Mulungu ▁woya wa manyile ▁kulawa ▁umwaka ▁na ▁ka lamula ▁kulawa ▁umwaka ▁wa li ngile ▁fana ▁mwanage , ▁muladi ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁yawe ▁chaudele ▁muna ▁iwa nd ugu ▁wengi .
▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁kalu kwenhukila ▁ulupango ▁na ▁kadi chinja ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁diya ▁diya lavile ▁diwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Ivo ▁muwe ▁na ▁kulinganya ▁na ▁mukale ▁meso ! ▁Mwihi ▁wenu , ▁Lufyende ▁ko zunguluka ▁fana ▁simba ▁yo to ngo lo ma , ▁ko zahila ▁munhu ▁yam me le .
▁Wa senga ▁viwa bwelile ▁kwa ▁Yakobo , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chi hita ▁kwa ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁Esau , ▁nayo ▁kam zila ▁kokwiza ▁kuku hokela . ▁Ko kwiza ▁na ▁walume ▁magan a ▁mane .”
▁“ Niza wa du mbi za ▁na ▁kuwa ti bu la ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁womu itowa ▁nawo , ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁nizawa tenda ▁wa hinduke ▁na ▁ku kimbila .
▁Ka tumbik a ▁dipanzia ▁muna ▁i zi m handa ▁nne ▁za ▁mkenge ▁zozi ha kigwe ▁zahabu , ▁zili ▁na ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vi ne ▁va ▁hela .
▁Di togole ni ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁kwaviya ▁muna jo , ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁wana ▁wa ▁bu ng ' hulo .” ▁Yesu ▁viyalongile ▁ivo , ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kwi ifisa .
▁Wa hokela ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi lavigwe ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa gendelela ▁ku mgalila ▁Musa ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁chila ▁imitondo ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁wenyewo .
▁Kwiza mmanya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kuwa ▁kela , ▁mana ▁yeye ▁iyo ▁yo lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁gate ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁wako . ▁Keza kuwa ▁kela ▁kumwako , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niiyo ▁yoni mtenda ni ▁mwele .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya sang ' hane ▁yaja ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoyo mulonda ▁ya ya sang ' hane , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁se kulu ▁wangu , ▁ lumbu ▁jangu ▁na ▁mami ▁yangu .”
▁Musa ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁ka ibwanha ▁chingubingubi .
▁Walonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁hachi londa ▁wa kalangama ▁kaidi ? ▁Ch eye ▁wenyewo ▁chi hulika ▁chiyalongile ▁kwa ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁mwenyewo !”
▁Adamu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kalumb igwa ▁na ▁timbwisi ▁kulawa ▁mwiisi , ▁na ▁Adamu ▁wekaidi ▁kalawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Lelo , ▁kuna ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vidi , ▁chilagano ▁na ▁chilaho , ▁vino ▁havi daha ▁ku galuka ▁na ▁wala ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁Mulungu ▁hadaha ▁kulonga ▁uvwizi . ▁Ivo ▁cheye ▁wochi kimbilile ▁u kalizi ▁wake , ▁cho kwing ' higwa ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁kwa mhilila ▁lolelo ▁dodi kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁wetu .
▁Mbali ▁wanahina ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule ▁fambulo ▁da ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁kwaviya ▁di fi sigwa ▁hawa dahile ▁kuvimanya ▁bule , ▁nawo ▁wadumba ▁kumuuza ▁Yesu .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe , ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁viwa lawile ▁Misili , ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁ziya lagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya walongele .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁muke ▁yo huwila ▁yahawa ▁na ▁ndugu ▁wagane , ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yawa lole ▁goya ▁na ▁kuwataza ▁muladi ▁sekeya di lekele ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁sang ' hano ▁iyo , ▁muladi ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁di wataze ▁waja ▁wagane ▁weli bule ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kuwataza .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁keza vabik a ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁muna ▁idamu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kuya haka ▁yam ahembe ▁ya ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko . ▁Da mu ▁isigale ▁keza itila ▁hasi ▁hana ▁ichi kalilo ▁cha ▁lupango ▁ulo .
▁Vino ▁hamu vimanyile ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁si kalile ▁nolonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁magate ? ▁ Muiteganye ▁na ▁lusu ▁da ▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁Masadukayo .”
▁Cho ja ndi kila ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁weli ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Kolimso , ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁mose ▁wowa safyigwe ▁na ▁wowa tangigwe ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁howo mtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Mndewa ▁wawo ▁na ▁wetu .
▁Yosefu , ▁Mu la wi ▁ya lawile ▁Chipulo , ▁watumigwa ▁wa mtanga ▁Balinaba , ▁fambulo ▁jake , ▁“ Munhu ▁yo gela ▁moyo ,”
▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁ku lagusa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁kwa ▁wanhu , ▁muladi ▁ya mtende ▁kanoga ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo muhuwila ▁Yesu .
▁Lebeka ▁iyo ▁baho , ▁u msole ▁uhite ▁nayo . ▁Ya ka we ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mwenevale ▁wako , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile .”
▁ Siku ▁sita ▁sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁utende ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁zose .
▁Kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁“ H ela ▁yangu ▁i bwelezigwa .” ▁ Aino ▁hano ▁hana di guniya ▁jangu ! ▁Viwa hulike ▁yayo ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁ igwa ▁na ▁wakala ▁wo g u de ma ▁kwa ▁ludumbo ▁na ▁kwi iuzagiza ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Chi nhu ▁cha ki ▁chino ▁Mulungu ▁choya chitendele ?”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kusang ' hana ▁chila ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ufundi ▁hebu ▁yoi tendigw a ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁umanyi ▁hebu ▁ma fu ndi ▁wa ▁kutali zi ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁ufundi ▁wowose ▁wa ▁m sa ni i .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza ▁na ▁kwika ▁lago ▁jawo ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu , ▁dili ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁Yoludani ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yeliko .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁kumwenu ▁izakuwa ▁siku ▁ya ▁kuhumula ▁na ▁mwiza funga . ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁yo kwandusa ▁ichigulogulo ▁cha ▁siku ▁ya ▁kenda ▁na ▁yo komelezeka ▁ichigulogulo ▁cha ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo .”
▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁kasegela ▁isi ▁ya ▁Galilaya ▁na ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁zi banzi ▁za ▁Yudeya , ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani .
▁“ Hata ▁moto ▁sekemu kwa c he ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .”
▁Na ▁kamulongela ▁mwanamke , ▁“ Niza k ongeze la ▁usungu ▁vondau we ▁na ▁wimo ▁na ▁usungu ▁vonda wi i ba s ule . ▁Kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁hamu ▁ya ▁kum tawala ▁mu lu ma ko , ▁nayo ▁kezaku tawala .”
▁ Siku ▁ija ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Isaka ▁wa mwizila ▁na ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ chisima ▁chowa chi hi mbi le . ▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Chi ya fika ▁mazi .”
▁W eye ▁ walongele ▁wanhu ▁ndagilizi ▁zino , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁sekewa woneke ▁wa bananga .
▁Ha ulongozi ▁ha ▁lwivi ▁lwake ▁ ulu kulu , ▁ ke kigwa ▁ ngaye - ngaye ▁imwe , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Lazalo ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁vi londa ▁vingi .
▁One ▁ ihawa ▁kukala ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁uja ▁u galile ▁nhaguso , ▁ivo ▁kweli ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wo togoligwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Bahobaho ▁wahuwila ▁wa mgala ▁Paulo ▁mhwani . ▁Mbali ▁Sila ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁wa sigala ▁uko ▁Beleya .
▁Modaha ▁kuja ▁nyama ▁zawo , ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimu daha ▁kuja ▁chi dali ▁chochi n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁na ▁chi ma ▁cha ▁kulume .
▁“ Vondamu we ▁muna ▁ya mala go ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁ng ' hondo , ▁mu yepule ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kumtenda ni ▁mwa mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yohana , ▁kasegela ▁uko ▁kwa ▁ngalawa ▁na ▁kahita ▁hanhu ▁ha ho lile ▁na ▁ hali bule ▁wanhu , ▁wanhu ▁viwahulike ▁wamsondelela ▁kuno ▁wo genda ▁kwa ▁magulu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yawo .
▁Yosefu ▁ka lema ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale ▁wangu ▁ka bule ▁lugano ▁jojose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁na ba ha , ▁na ▁kani tu lila ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyeli ▁nacho .
▁“ F ung a ▁mahambo ▁muna ▁zi mhembe ▁nne ▁za ▁walo ▁jako .
▁Za ha fika ▁siku ▁nhatu , ▁mfalume ▁kezaku lava ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁na ▁kuku bweleza ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁ukulu ▁wako . ▁Kwiza mwing ' ha ▁mfalume ▁nhungo ▁fana ▁viu kalile ▁kotenda ▁baho ▁hau m wanduso .
▁Kwa viya ▁kuna ▁Mulungu ▁imwe ▁muhala , ▁na ▁kuna ▁imwe ▁yowa bene la ▁vi biki ▁wanhu ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ni ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁muha tegeleza ▁lagilizo ▁diya ▁da ▁chifalume ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁ vu i londa ▁mwenyewo ,” ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mo tenda ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Mu kale ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁ichilo ▁na ▁imisi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁muha tenda ▁mbuli ▁ziya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁one ▁si ivo ▁mwiza danganika . ▁Vino ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya ni lagilize .”
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ving ' waji ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yaja ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁fana ▁viili ▁ peta ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi i lagilizigwe .
▁Ishumaili ▁viyadanganike ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁saba , ▁kahita ▁ku iting ' hana ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zake .
▁Mbali ▁kowa togola ▁wanhu ▁wowo mtosela ▁yeye ▁na ▁wowo sang ' hana ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁hake ▁ bila ▁kulola ▁lukolo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wengi , ▁diyelo ▁muwa ▁wengi ▁fana ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga .
▁na ▁ka mgwila ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁hanhu ▁hawa kalile ▁wa fungigwa ▁wa ▁mfalume . ▁Ivo ▁Yosefu ▁ka lekigwa ▁mwiichifungo .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁yahite ▁na ▁kum gomesa ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yuda ▁na ▁Sila ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁wakala ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁walonga ▁mengi ▁kuwa guma ▁moyo ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁nguvu ▁wahuwila .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁viya wone ▁kuwa ▁hadaha ▁ku ifisa ▁bule , ▁keza ▁ko gudemeka , ▁ka ibwanha ▁mu yamagulu ▁ya ▁Yesu . ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu ▁hai wa nhu ▁wose ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kum dalisa ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁viya ▁viya honyigwe ▁bahobaho .
▁Musa ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa muleka ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wo tenda ▁viwo londa . ▁Haluni ▁ka walekela ▁wa muleke ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁watende ▁viwo londa , ▁na ▁kui galila ▁chinyala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wehi ▁wawo .
▁ Habali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi gala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino ▁muladi ▁chi komigwe ▁kwa ▁panga ? ▁Wa ke ▁zetu ▁na ▁wanetu ▁weza kuwa ▁mate ka . ▁Vino ▁siyo ▁muhavu ▁chi bwele ▁Misili ?”
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Na sa na eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S u a li .
▁Kwa viya ▁vini kalile ▁no fosa ▁na ▁kulola ▁goya ▁hanhu ▁ho mu tosela , ▁ni wona ▁chilingo ▁cha ndikigwa , ▁‘ Kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ha manyika .’ ▁Lelo ▁niye ▁no wapetela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁iyo ▁imu mtosela ▁ bila ▁ku mmanya .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁na ▁mweye ▁kulawa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁moto ▁uwo . ▁Mu zi hulika ▁mbuli ▁zi yalongile , ▁ mbali ▁hamu muwonile ▁bule , ▁ muhulika ▁dizi ▁jake ▁muhala .
▁Hata ▁walangulizi ▁wengi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wa muhuwila ▁Yesu . ▁Mbali ▁Mafalisayo ▁hawa mtogole ▁muumwingi , ▁kwaviya ▁wadumba ▁ku wing igwa ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ,
▁Baho ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ba guligwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁zi yo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁do we kigwe ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁M tendeleni ▁fana ▁yeye ▁viya mtendele ni , ▁muli heni ▁miyanza ▁midi ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁yoya mtendela ni . ▁Muna ▁i nhu ngo ▁iya ha nganye ▁divai ▁yake . ▁Muha nga nyi leni ▁divai ▁i ka li ka ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁iya weng ' hile .
▁Nasanayeli ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ku nimanya ze ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni kuwona ▁viu kalile ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁Filipo ▁yang ' hali ▁hana ku tanga .”
▁Lu wa ▁ulo ▁lwiza kuwa ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁nne ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili , ▁chimo ▁mita ▁mbili ▁na ▁lobo . ▁M apanzia ▁yake ▁yezakuwa ▁ya ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁vi zakuwa ▁va ▁shaba .
▁Yano ▁yose ▁ya lawilila ▁muladi ▁yatimie ▁yaja ▁ya longigwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Isaya ▁viyalongile , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁munhu ▁ilihi ▁yoyo togola ▁usenga ▁wetu ? ▁Munhu ▁yelihi ▁Mndewa ▁yoya n gubul ile ▁nguvu ▁zake ?”
▁M sitali ▁wekane ▁ukala ▁wa ▁za ba la ja di ▁na ▁ s ho ha mu ▁na ▁yasipi , ▁yose ▁ya gumigw a ▁muna ▁i vihindo ▁va ▁zahabu
▁Kwa viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ No kwika ▁dibwe ▁uko ▁Sayuni , ▁dibwe ▁da ▁chandusilo ▁da ▁kuna ▁ ichingolobweda , ▁niye ▁ni di sagula ▁di mbwe ▁do faya ▁ng ' hani . ▁Munhu ▁yo muhuwila ▁heza kuwa ▁na ▁chinyala .”
▁Wanage ▁Haluni ▁wa mgalila ▁damu , ▁nayo ▁ka vabik a ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁muna ▁idamu ▁ija ▁na ▁kuya haka ▁m ahembe ▁ya ▁lupango . ▁Da mu ▁isigale ▁ka itila ▁hana ▁ichi kalilo ▁cha ▁lupango .
▁Mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁wa fosa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁bahali ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile , ▁mazi ▁ya kala ▁fana ▁ng ' huta ▁kulume ▁kwa wo ▁na ▁kumoso ▁kwa wo .
▁Sa a ▁sita ▁imisi ▁ni wona ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁do fosa ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁zuwa , ▁di ni mwemwes a ▁niye ▁na ▁wayangu ▁wochi kalile ▁wose ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁chila ▁ubanzi .
▁Kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁chiza loka ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kusola ▁uhazi ▁wetu ▁uko ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁Yoludani .”
▁Mbali ▁walimi ▁viwamuwone ▁iyo , ▁wa ilongela ▁wenyewo , ▁‘ Ino ▁iyo ▁muha zi . ▁Chi mkome ▁na ▁uhazi ▁wizakuwa ▁wetu !’
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁hawa ko ligwe ▁bule ▁fana ▁vimu longa . ▁ Sambi ▁saa ▁nhatu ▁imitondo !
▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁sili ▁ija ▁yoi fisigwe ▁lusita ▁lose ▁kwa ▁welesi ▁wose , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁i gubuligwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yakobo ▁kahita ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wake , ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waiting ' hana ▁nayo .
▁“ Habali ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁hawa mha ▁bule ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zetu ? ▁Wa ha ja ▁hawana wa ▁bule ▁makono ▁yawo ▁voilondeka !”
▁Yano ▁ni ▁madugila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yondamu we ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁mwiza ya gong ' onda ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwikigwe .
▁Wa nd ugu ▁zangu ▁woni walonda , ▁nikala ▁no londa ▁ng ' hani ▁ku mwandikilani ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ulopozi ▁uchi ha ngila ▁chose , ▁ mbali ▁ni wona ▁yo londeka ▁ nimwandikileni ▁muladi ▁niwa gele ni ▁moyo ▁mu gendelele ▁kuiyoha ▁kuu gombela ▁uhuwilo ▁uja ▁Mulungu ▁uya weng ' hile ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁lusita ▁lumwe ▁muhala ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Na ▁kutambika ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁kwiza muhonya ▁mtamu ▁ija , ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁kezam winula , ▁hata ▁yahawa ▁ka tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁wowose ▁uja , ▁Mulungu ▁keza mulekelela .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Hiteni ▁mu kamulongele ▁ija ▁ tu kwa , ▁‘ Diyelo ▁na ▁igolo ▁no lava ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁ kuhonya ▁watamu , ▁na ▁muna ▁siku ▁d eketatu ▁niza komeleza ▁ usang ' hano ▁wangu .’
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya mbandame ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wa ▁habehi . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁kwaviya ▁m delenya ▁na ▁wa ▁ku hinduka ▁ hinduka ▁muna ▁ugen zi ▁wake .
▁“ Si wa tosela ▁bule ▁wawo ▁muhala . ▁No wa tosela ▁iviya ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wondawa ni huwile ▁niye ▁kwa ▁usenga ▁wawo .
▁Niye ▁kwaviya ▁nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁hamu ni togola .
▁Hata ▁one ▁uha wa ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake ▁hebu ▁ lumbu ▁hebu ▁mwa li ▁wake , ▁muladi ▁sekeya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwaviya ▁ka ika ▁hakwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁chilaho .
▁No vimanya ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu . ▁Mbali ▁mwo londa ▁kunikoma ▁kwaviya ▁ha mtogola ▁mafundizo ▁yangu .
▁Ni longele ni , ▁mu hita ▁kulola ▁choni ? ▁M ulotezi ? ▁Ona , ▁nowalongela , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁kolonga , ▁“ Segeleni ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁na ▁mui gole ▁nawo . ▁Sekemu dalise ▁chinhu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁niye ▁nizawa hokela .
▁Viwafikile ▁kuna ▁dikolongo ▁da ▁Eshikoli , ▁wa kanha ▁tambi ▁dili ▁na ▁chip a mbo ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁zabibu . ▁Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁wa di papa ▁kwa ▁mbiki ▁hagati ▁ya ▁waidi ▁wawo , ▁iviya ▁wa gala ▁ma komamanga ▁na ▁nhini .
▁Wa waleka ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁haja , ▁wanahina ▁wengi la ▁mwiingalawa ▁i yengile ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kusegela . ▁Ku kala ▁ngalawa ▁zimwenga .
▁Vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁waja ▁wane ▁ wedika , ▁“ Ivo .” ▁Na ▁waja ▁walala ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁kutambika .
▁Ka u hulumus a ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu , ▁ka ufu mba ▁sanda ▁ya ▁chitani , ▁ka wika ▁hagati ▁ya ▁dileme ▁di songoligwe ▁mu lu we , ▁na ▁dili bule ▁mtufi ▁mgati .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi la g u sila ▁vilaguso ▁na ▁mauzauza ▁makulu ▁ya za mile ▁kwa ▁kui gaza ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁mfalume ▁wake ▁na ▁kaye ▁yake ▁yose .
▁Balinaba ▁ka tangigwa ▁Ze u , ▁na ▁Paulo ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁iyo ▁ya kalile ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kulonga ▁ka tangigwa ▁Helim e ,
▁Mbali ▁muke ▁wake ▁Lutu ▁ka lola ▁kuchisogo ▁na ▁ka galuka ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁munyu .
▁“ I zindilile ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁kwa ▁kui tenda ▁ye le , ▁mana ▁ni ▁siku ▁ya ▁chiidumwe .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha mwing ' ha ▁miyage ▁chinhu ▁hebu ▁hela ▁ya mwikile ▁goya , ▁m aabaho ▁i ba wi gwa ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁mbavi ▁yaha patik a ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁hela ▁iyo ▁miyanza ▁midi .
▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiwa peta ▁wakalizi ▁wose ▁wochi walongoza , ▁chi wona ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁ya hunguke .
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ni yo ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .”
▁M iyanza ▁mingi ▁kezamtenda ni ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁muladi ▁siku ▁zose ▁mu dahe ▁ku lagusa ▁moyo ▁wa ▁kulava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa mwing ' he ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁vitumetume ▁venu ▁vo wa vi hokele ▁kufose la ▁kumwetu .
▁Wa tendeleni ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi mulonda ▁wanhu ▁wa watendele ▁mwene .
▁Ivo ▁cha mhe ▁ng ' hani ▁uhuwilo ▁wochi u togole . ▁Kwa viya ▁chi nayo ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yo yengile ▁m baka ▁kuulanga ▁ku yeli ▁Mulungu , ▁Yesu ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Sala ▁kakala ▁ivo , ▁ka mtegeleza ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁kamtanga ▁mwenevale ▁wake . ▁M weye ▁ni ▁wanage ▁one ▁muha tenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁ku leka ▁kudumba ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁Yelusalemu ▁kuna ▁didugila ▁da ▁Wayahudi .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁habehi ▁na ▁Paulo ▁walonga , ▁“ W eye ▁ko muliga ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Maabaho ▁ni weng ' ha ▁nusu ▁ya ▁kabila ▁diya ▁da ▁Manase ▁hanhu ▁ha sigale ▁ha ▁Gileadi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Bashani ▁yose ▁yoi ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁Ogu , ▁ya ni ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Ali go bu .” ▁Isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Bashani ▁i manyika ▁fana ▁isi ▁ya ▁Walefai .
▁walonga , ▁“ Kwizagaya ! ▁ Kwizagaya ▁bululu ▁kulu ! ▁D o diya wa zigwa ▁viwalo ▁vovi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁chitani ▁inogile ▁na ▁viwalo ▁va ▁ langi ▁ya ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁kui ha mba ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vovi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁na ▁lu lu .
▁Leka mana ▁m baka ▁diyelo ▁mgunda ▁uwo ▁wo tangigwa , ▁“ M gunda ▁wa ▁damu .”
▁Maabaho ▁muna ▁ ichisege ▁cha ▁magate ▁chi kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka lava ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁hadi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁na ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁dili ▁na ▁mavuta ▁na ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁ sisili . ▁V ose ▁ka vika ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁na ▁chi ma ▁cha ▁kulume .
▁Wa naake ▁wose ▁wa dahile ▁ku bota , ▁wa gala ▁vinhu ▁vi botigwe ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁vinogile .
▁Mbali ▁viya wonile ▁beho , ▁kadumba ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kudi dimi la ▁na ▁kalila , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ni kombole .”
▁“ Ivo ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁lugano ▁kuwa ▁mwiza kuja ▁choni ▁hebu ▁mwiza kung ' wa ▁choni .
▁Se geze ni ▁kumwenu ▁usungu ▁na ▁ludoko ▁na ▁ng ' ha si liki ▁na ▁ g u bu ▁na ▁maligo ▁vi segele ▁kumwenu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chila ▁wihi .
▁Wem ba ▁wila ▁wa ▁sambi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁vi umbe ▁waja ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁na ▁waja ▁walala . ▁Na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁ku ifunza ▁wila ▁uja , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁ la ki ▁imwe ▁na ▁alufu ▁ a lu ba i ni ▁na ▁nne , ▁wowa komboligwe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Waisilaili ▁wawa sola ▁mate ka ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Midiani ▁na ▁wana ▁wawo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wawo ▁wose ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wawo ▁wose ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vose ▁wa vi sola .
▁M wanamke ▁yaha tosa ▁hebu ▁yaha gong ' onda ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁ bila ▁ku gubika ▁ditwi ▁jake , ▁ko m zeha ▁mulumake , ▁baho ▁ habule ▁mbasakanyo ▁ka ti ▁ya ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁ya wegule .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya , ▁ka wapetela ▁wanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁na ▁ku wing a ▁vinyamkela .
▁Ivo ▁siyo ▁mweye ▁yomu ni galile ▁hano , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka ni tenda ▁niwe ▁tata ▁kwa ▁mfalume . ▁Niye ▁ni ▁ mwimiliz i ▁wa ▁kaye ▁yose , ▁niye ▁ni ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁na ▁mbuli ▁ziya watendele ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Eliabu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni . ▁Kumbuk eni ▁viya ▁isi ▁vi i g u bu ke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁na ▁ku wamela , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zawo ▁na ▁ma he ma ▁yawo ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wawo ▁wose .
▁Lebeka ▁kamulongela ▁Isaka , ▁“ Niye ▁ndege zigwa ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wano ▁Wahiti ▁wa ▁Esau . ▁One ▁Yakobo ▁iviya ▁yaha sola ▁muke ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁wanaake ▁wano ▁Wahiti , ▁muhavu ▁ni danganike .”
▁Chilo ▁chiya ▁Paulo ▁ka wona ▁malaguso ▁ya ▁munhu ▁wa ▁Makedoniya ▁kema , ▁ka mulamba , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Izo ▁M e ko do ni ya ▁uchi taze !”
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁vino ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yelihi ? ▁Ni longele ▁muladi ▁na ▁niye ▁ni muhuwile !”
▁Wa nhu ▁wam se ka ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁mndele ▁ija ▁kadanganika ▁kamala .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wa hinduka ▁na ▁wa sondelela ▁nzila ▁yoi hita ▁Bashani . ▁Ogu ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁kasegela ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wose ▁kahita ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁uko ▁ E dile i .
▁Maabaho ▁mwiza kala ▁hano ▁hana ▁isi ▁yetu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁mwiza kala ▁hohose ▁ho mulonda ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ulegeho ▁wa ▁ku gula ▁na ▁ku c hulu za ▁vinhu ▁na ▁kupata ▁hanhu .”
▁Lelo ▁one ▁chi danganika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁cho huwila ▁chiza kala ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Weza sola ▁mapanzia ▁na ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ngubiko ▁yake ▁na ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁na ▁mapanzia ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁Balaamu ▁kamulongela ▁Mulungu , ▁“ B a la ki ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Sipol i , ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Moabu , ▁ka nigalila ▁usenga ▁uno ,
▁Na yo ▁yoyanitumile ▁ko londa ▁vino , ▁ nde ke ▁kum wagiza ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁waja ▁woya ni ni le , ▁ mbali ▁niwa zilibule ▁wose ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁uhelelo .
▁Chila ▁cho muli ▁nacho ▁sambi ▁chongezeke le ▁chi wataze ▁waja ▁wochi londa , ▁muladi ▁nawo ▁vondawa we ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chongezeke le , ▁wa wataze ▁m we n ye . ▁Ivo ▁kolondeka ▁ku we ▁na ▁ulinga nyo .
▁Lelo ▁weye ▁mwenevale ▁nokulamba , ▁niye ▁msang ' hani ▁wako , ▁ni sigale ▁niwe ▁mtumwa ▁wako ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁mbwanga ▁ino . ▁Mu leke ▁yeye ▁ya bwele ▁ukaye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁Fan a ▁viili , ▁vilung o ▁ni ▁vingi ▁ mbali ▁lukuli ▁ni ▁lumwe ▁muhala .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁Ananiya ▁kawalagiliza ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁habehi ▁na ▁Paulo ▁wam towe ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wake .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowa malile ▁kuya kimbila ▁yaja ▁yehile ▁ya ▁isi ▁yose , ▁kwa ▁ku mmanya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁one ▁wa namata ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ku potwa , ▁u nhu ▁wawo ▁wa ▁uhelelo ▁wizakuwa ▁ wi ha ▁kufosa ▁uja ▁wa ▁ichanduso .
▁N diya ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ngama ▁ya ▁isi ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ya ▁nzala ▁yondai we ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Kwa ▁nzila ▁ino ▁wanhu ▁haweza danganika ▁kwa ▁nzala ▁bule .”
▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Hita ▁na ▁u walongele ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁Mwiza tegeleza ▁na ▁kutegeleza , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza vimanya . ▁Mwiza lola ▁na ▁kulola , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza wona .
▁wamwenga ▁wa sigale , ▁wakwela ▁muna ▁zim bawo ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁uha chanyha ▁ya ▁vi a ▁va ▁ngalawa . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wafika ▁kuna ▁isi ▁inyalile .
▁Petili ▁ka hinduka , ▁kamuwona ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁ya lo ndigwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kowa wi nza . ▁M wa nahina ▁ino ▁iyo ▁ija ▁lusita ▁viwa kalile ▁woja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ichilo ▁kakala ▁habehi ▁na ni ▁na ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kumuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁yelihi ▁yondaya ku b i du ke ?”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁i lawilila ▁mwene ▁mnyama ▁ka baho , ▁ya zi me ▁heza liha ▁chochose . ▁One ▁kakala ▁ya zi m igwe ▁kwa ▁hela , ▁hela ▁izo ▁ziza faya ▁kwa ▁kwa ga ▁kwa ▁mnyama ▁iyo .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 7 4 , 6 00.
▁Walondwa ▁wangu , ▁one ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu ▁hachi longele za , ▁cheye ▁hachiza dumba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ,
▁Basi ▁ ihawa ▁ku ikwala ▁kwa wo ▁ku gala ▁u temela ▁mate ▁mwingi ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁iviya ▁fana ▁kunangigwa ▁kwa wo ▁ku gala ▁u temela ▁mate ▁mwingi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁ku bwelezigwa ▁kwa wo ▁kwiza gala ▁u temela ▁mate ▁mwingi ▁ng ' hani .
▁I m ndele ▁imdodo ▁iviya ▁kelek a ▁mwana ▁na ▁zina ▁jake ▁kamtanga ▁Be na mi . ▁Iyo ▁niiyo ▁wa saho ▁yawo ▁Waamoni ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Mbali ▁uha sola ▁ko kuwa ▁hu tendile ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁mhambe ▁yaha soligwa ▁ha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wondawa msole ▁weza p a ti gwa ▁na ▁uzidilwa ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁no londa ▁yayo ▁sekeya m pate ni ▁mweye .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁kwa bule ▁cha ▁ kwidika ▁kwa ▁u sa hi di ▁uno ▁ o wo u lava ▁kumwako ?”
▁U vimanye ▁kuwa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁uhelelo ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁magayo .
▁Kawa gong ' onde la ni ▁lagano ▁jake ▁na ▁ka mulagilizani ▁muzindilile ▁ndagilizi ▁longo ▁zo ya ndike ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kamuhitila ▁Paulo ▁na ▁kumgwila ▁na ▁ku lagiliza ▁ya ta tali zigwe ▁minyololo ▁midi . ▁Maabaho ▁ka uza , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁iyo ▁yelihi , ▁na ▁ka tenda ▁choni ?”
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Sol a ▁nongo ▁uka gume ▁lita ▁mbili ▁za ▁mana , ▁wii ke ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁i kalizi gwe ▁kwa ▁ukalangama ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zikwiza .”
▁nayo ▁keza ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Na ▁weye ▁kwiza mtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yesu , ▁kwaviya ▁kezawa lopola ▁wanhu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u u hasanyi .”
▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁china ▁tata , ▁kwaviya ▁mu mmanya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yeli ▁baha ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁zisi ▁zose . ▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁wabwanga , ▁kwaviya ▁mumuhum a ▁mwihi ▁ija .
▁Mbali ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁chiya ▁cha yalongile ▁Mulungu ▁cho gozela ▁kuwa ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ulanga ▁wa ▁sambi ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁hanhu ▁howa kala ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁ija ▁yoya ku goneke , ▁“ U ha tenda ▁ndiya ▁cha ▁imisi ▁hebu ▁cha ▁ichilo , ▁sekeu wa goneke ▁mbwiya ▁zako ▁hebu ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁hebu ▁wakaya ▁wayago ▁weli ▁matajili . ▁Kwa viya ▁uha tenda ▁ivo , ▁wawo ▁nawo ▁wezaku goneka ▁mwii zi kaye ▁zawo , ▁na ▁ivo ▁wezaku liha ▁yaja ▁you watendele .
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁wana ▁wa ▁Nuhu , ▁kusondelela ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁welesi ▁wawo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁zisi ▁zawo . ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wa pwililika ▁mwii zi si ▁zose ▁vidi malile ▁di gombo .
▁Isaya ▁kolonga ▁kaidi , ▁“ Muna ▁u lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ye se ▁keza lawilila ▁munhu , ▁nayo ▁keza tawala ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁nawo ▁weza mulole la ▁yeye .”
▁Na wo ▁wa mkaliza ▁kwaviya ▁hawavimanyile ▁wa mtende ▁choni .
▁Niye ▁ni ▁ndimi ▁ni nogile . ▁No wamanya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu , ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu ▁wo nimanya ▁niye .
▁Wa nhu ▁wo kuwa ▁wehi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁ya ▁chiunhu , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa tegeleza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁bule , ▁na ▁kweli ▁hawa daha ▁kuya tegeleza .
▁Chilisito ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ulegeho ▁ka londa ▁chi ilegehe . ▁Ivo ▁im eni ▁kwa ▁kui gangamiza ▁na ▁seke mtogole ▁kaidi ▁kuwa ▁watumwa .
▁Chila ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yo kigwe ▁hebu ▁ya mbi kigwe ▁hebu ▁i ka nzi ngigwe , ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yoyo ilava .
▁Ivo ▁Pilato ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu ▁kaidi , ▁“ H wi dika ▁chochose ? ▁ Tegeleza ▁masita ka ▁yose ▁yayo ▁yawa ku sita ka ▁weye !”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Na ▁mweye ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁mwiza gaya ! ▁Kwa viya ▁mwo wa t wika ▁wanhu ▁mbahasha ▁ziza mile ▁ng ' hani , ▁wala ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁hamu wataza ▁hata ▁kwa ▁chi dole ▁muhala .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁mwa li ▁wa ▁mami ▁yako , ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁mami ▁yako .
▁m aabaho ▁molonga ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ha l ondigwa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake .
▁Mbali ▁hata ▁umo ▁mui chi fu ngo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁nayo ▁na ▁ka gendelela ▁ku mulagusa ▁Yosefu ▁ulondo ▁wake , ▁m baka ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁kanogel wa ▁nayo .
▁Maliya ▁kalonga , ▁“ M o yo ▁wangu ▁wo mtunhiza ▁Mndewa ,
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Habule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁ sasale ni ▁nzewele ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano . ▁Ka leni ▁meso ▁na ▁kwika ▁lolelo ▁jenu ▁jose ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wonda ▁ mwing ' higwe ▁lusita ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁vondaya lawile .
▁Waisilaili ▁viwa wone ▁chinhu ▁icho ▁wa i uza , ▁“ Chi no ▁choni ?” ▁Mana ▁hawavimanyile ▁chi kala ▁choni . ▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Di no ▁ijo ▁gate ▁do ya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muje .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wowa sigale , ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali , ▁“ Soleni ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yoi sigale ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁zozi lavigwe ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Mu je ▁gate ▁hadi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁habehi ▁ya ▁ulupango ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁yelile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Balaki ▁ka muwonela ▁ludoko ▁Balaamu , ▁ka towa ▁ma ng ' huwa ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ni ku tanga ▁muladi ▁ uwaduwile ▁wehi ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁kuwa temela ▁mate ▁miyanza ▁mitatu .
▁L udoko ▁lwa ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁vonda lu hunguke ▁na ▁vondaya zimize ▁you mtendele , ▁niza mtuma ▁munhu ▁ya ku bweleze . ▁ Habali ▁ni da nga ni kiligwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁wose ▁waidi ▁siku ▁dimwe ?”
▁Ivo ▁ha kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁uhazi ▁wowose ▁wonda u ha m izigwe ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁dimwe ▁kuhita ▁kabila ▁dimwenga , ▁mana ▁chila ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isilaili ▁diza kwamha ▁uhazi ▁wake .’ ▁”
▁“ M weye ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁sekemu i c ha n je ▁ sa le ▁hebu ▁sekemu wegule ▁iditwi ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁ndilo .
▁Mbali ▁weza londeka ▁kumulongela ▁Mulungu ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi watendile , ▁ija ▁yowa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wagima ▁na ▁wadanganike .
▁Eleazali , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Haluni ‚ ▁kamsola ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁Pu ti eli , ▁iyo ▁kamwelek ela ▁F i ne ha si . ▁Wa no ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Lawi .
▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁keza nga lila ni ▁M tazi , ▁iyo ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁Tata ▁yondayam tume ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁keza wafundiza ▁yose ▁na ▁kuwa ku mbu sa ▁yose ▁yoni walongele .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Hiteni ▁mu kamulongele ▁Yohana ▁yaja ▁yomu ya wone ▁na ▁kuya hulika . ▁Vi pofu ▁wo wona ▁na ▁mbetembete ▁wo genda , ▁wene ▁dikulu ▁wo safyigwa , ▁wa s u wa ▁magutwi ▁wo hulika , ▁wadanganike ▁wo zilibuligwa ▁na ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yo petigwa ▁kwa ▁ngayengaye .
▁Maabaho ▁watumigwa ▁wabwela ▁Yelusalemu ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁U lugongo ▁lwa ▁Mizaituni , ▁utali ▁wa ▁chilo mi ta ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁dibululu .
▁Mwiza weng ' ha ▁mabululu ▁matatu ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁mwiza weng ' ha ▁mabululu ▁matatu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁na ▁vilumb e ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁vose ▁vili ▁na ▁weye , ▁ndege ▁na ▁wanyama ▁ wofugigwa ▁na ▁chila ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁yoya lawile ▁muna ▁isafina ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye .
▁Maabaho ▁niuwo na ▁ulanga ▁u gubuka , ▁kukala ▁na ▁falasi ▁mzelu . ▁M kwela ▁falasi ▁iyo ▁ko tangigwa ▁M waminika ▁na ▁Kweli , ▁viyo tagusa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁ng ' hondo ▁kotenda ▁ivo ▁fana ▁viilondeka .
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ko chilongela ▁kwiza ▁chi tawala ?” ▁Hebu ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ukulu ▁kumwetu ? ▁Ivo ▁wa iyoha ▁kugendelela ▁ku mwihila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nzozi ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zake .
▁Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yoni mulavile ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁niwe ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁M olondeka ▁muwe ▁welile , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ni ▁yelile .
▁na ▁mabwe ▁yo kwaka ▁ya ▁ sa li doniki ▁na ▁mabwe ▁yo kwaka ▁yamwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mahambo , ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁cha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁vondamu hulike ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ng ' hondo , ▁sekemudumbe . ▁Ya yo ▁yo londeka ▁kulawilila , ▁ mbali ▁uhelelo ▁u ng ' hali ▁kufika .
▁Wala ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yam gezile ▁kumuuza ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga ▁kaidi .
▁Mulungu ▁kawa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁imwana , ▁nayo ▁ka kula , ▁kakala ▁muna ▁dibwilingu ▁da ▁Palani , ▁iviya ▁kakala ▁galu ▁wa ▁kutowa ▁mi sa le .
▁Wa gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza ▁kulawa ▁P eli ge ▁kuhita ▁Antiyokiya ▁yili ▁uko ▁Pi si diya . ▁Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁wengi la ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁na ▁wakala ▁hasi .
▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁wolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁zisi ▁zino , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁wowa tegeleza ▁kwaviya ▁walo wa ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zose ,
▁Ko mwa ▁jojose ▁di yo go ne la ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁hebu ▁uka zi ▁u yo ka lila , ▁viza kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁fana ▁viyo kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁siku ▁zake .
▁Viwafikile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kugona ▁nyambenyambe , ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁ka fungula ▁lobo ta ▁jake ▁ya dahe ▁kum dima ▁chihongwe ▁wake , ▁kazanywa ▁kuwona ▁hela ▁yake ▁muna ▁di guniya ▁jake .
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Esau , ▁iviya ▁ko tangigwa ▁Edomu .
▁Mbali ▁ulanga ▁wa ▁sambi ▁na ▁isi ▁vi kigwa ▁ngama ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁iyo , ▁vi ha kalizigwa ▁m baka ▁zuwa ▁da ▁nhaguso ▁na ▁da ▁kunangigwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁hawa muhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya mtemele ni ▁mate ▁na ▁ku mkaliza ni ,
▁Maabaho ▁ni muwona ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ko hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake ▁kam ha ▁m ha la li ng we ▁ya ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁ kombo ▁ tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo ▁na ▁ nyolo lo ▁kulu .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁muli ▁ waminika ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mwa wa gima ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Na ▁bululu ▁diya ▁kulu ▁di igola ▁vi bumbila ▁vitatu , ▁na ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁zisi ▁zose ▁ya gwa , ▁na ▁Babeli ▁bululu ▁diya ▁kulu ▁hadi zi m izigwe ▁bule ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁kadi ng ' wiza ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁divai ▁ya ▁ludoko ▁lwake .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawa peta , ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Sambi ▁ni mwing ' hani ▁mu sagule ▁hagati ▁ya ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁na ▁ku duwiligwa . ▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁vonda zi mulawilile ni , ▁mwiza kala ▁muna ▁izisi ▁ziya ▁zo ya m pwililis eni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁mwiza kumbuka ▁u sa g u zi ▁woni mwing ' hileni .
▁Hebu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ila wa ▁kumwenu ? ▁Hebu ▁im fikila ni ▁mweye ▁muhala ?
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁siku ▁ija ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁vondaya gubul igwe .
▁I mitondo ▁ng ' hani ▁Abimeleki ▁kawatanga ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁wose ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi lawilile , ▁nawo ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Mwiza wona , ▁‘ W i hi ▁wa ▁ubananzi ,’ ▁wou longigwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Dani yeli . ▁D izakwima ▁hanhu ▁helile , ▁ija ▁yo soma ▁yavimanye .
▁Na ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁kakala ▁Abida ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ G i de oni .
▁Musa ▁viyadanganike ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi , ▁meso ▁yake ▁haya wile ▁na ▁u vu li vu li ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁ha lu malile ▁bule .
▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo muhuwila ▁Yesu ▁ko tendigw a ▁ya bagule ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vovi mtenda ▁ya leke ▁ku woneka ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Niye ▁ni chi wona ▁chinhu ▁icho , ▁na ▁niye ▁nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁ino ▁iyo ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Maabaho ▁wabwela ▁ukaye , ▁wa sasala ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁kun ung ' hila ▁na ▁ma liha mu . ▁Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁wa humula ▁fana ▁Malagilizo ▁viyolonda .
▁Mbali ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁kumwetu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Ni kombole ▁kwa ▁se kulu ▁wangu ▁Esau . ▁No dumba ▁kwaviya ▁kezakwiza ▁kuchi towa ▁na ▁kuchi nanga ▁cheye ▁chose ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana .
▁Nzi ge ▁ha weng ' higwe ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁weng ' higwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kuwa du n u nza ▁kwa ▁miyezi ▁mitano . ▁U sungu ▁wawo ▁ulinga ▁fana ▁viya ▁usungu ▁wa ▁kulu migwa ▁na ▁ing e .
▁Na wo ▁wabwela ▁na ▁wawalongela ▁wowamsondelel e ▁Yesu , ▁ mbali ▁nawo ▁iviya ▁hawa togole ▁bule .
▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁ziya ▁Yohana ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kobatiza , ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ija ▁Yesu ▁viya soligwe ▁kulawa ▁kumwetu ▁kuhita ▁kuulanga . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁m kalangama ▁miyetu ▁wa ▁kuzilibuka ▁kwa ▁Yesu .
▁Yesu ▁viya walongele , ▁“ Iyo ▁Niye ,” ▁wabwela ▁kuchisogo , ▁wa gwa ▁hasi .
▁Mbali ▁sekemuje ▁ndege ▁wano , ▁masumula ▁na ▁ fu lu k ombe ▁na ▁ma kung ule
▁Mu vimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ko mwing ' hani ▁isi ▁ino ▁inogile ▁mui sole ▁siyo ▁kwaviya ▁mo tenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁mana ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala .
▁Mbali ▁haiza kuwa ▁ivo ▁bule ▁kumwenu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁yawe ▁mkulu ▁kumwenu , ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁msang ' hani ▁wenu .
▁“ Wa bagule ▁Walawi ▁wose ▁kuwa ▁wangu ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Iviya ▁wa bagule ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁Walawi ▁wose ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Walawi ▁ni ▁wangu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁sita , ▁Yesu ▁kawasola ▁Petili ▁na ▁ndugu ▁waidi , ▁ndugu ▁wawo ▁ni ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana . ▁Kawa gala ▁m chanyha ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁waidumwe .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawauza ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Na ha i togoza ▁mwenyewo , ▁ukulu ▁wangu ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁bule . ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁iyo ▁yo mulonga ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁iyo ▁yoni tunhiza .
▁Ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁di leke li ligwa ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁magoda ▁na ▁ku muliga ▁Mulungu . ▁Iviya ▁di lekeleligwa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kutenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyezi ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁midi .
▁Chila ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka , ▁Pilato ▁kakala ▁na ▁ichi hendo ▁cha ▁ku mulekelela ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁mchifungo ▁wanhu ▁wowa mulondile .
▁Wa hulike ni ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁wa londeni ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁wahuwila , ▁m umdumbe ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ muhulike ni ▁mfalume .
▁Iviya ▁wa tazi ▁wamwenga ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁ wolondeka ▁wawe ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁na ▁sekewawe ▁wa delenya ▁na ▁sekewa ko l we ▁divai ▁wala ▁sekewa me lele ▁mate ▁hela ▁zozi patik a ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁zihile ,
▁Mbali ▁wahuwila ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Filipo ▁wou longa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁wabatizigwa ▁wanaake ▁na ▁walume .
▁Ali sitali ko ▁yeli ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁ko mu la m sa ni , ▁na ▁Maliki ▁iviya , ▁mwi h wa ▁wa ▁Balinaba . ▁Mu hokela ▁mu mala ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁kumuhokela ▁Maliki ▁yaheza ▁kumwenu .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulola ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁One ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁ma baka ▁yayo ▁ni ▁mazelu ▁chidogo , ▁uwo ▁ni ▁uhele ▁muhala ▁na ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela .
▁Wa lotezi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwandusi la ▁Sa mwe li ▁na ▁waja ▁wose ▁ wezile ▁hamwande , ▁iviya ▁walonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vi lawilila ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zino .
▁Fan a ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ I ng ' hali ▁chidogo , ▁ija ▁yokwiza ▁kezakwiza , ▁heza kala ma ▁bule .
▁Kaidi , ▁kwaviya ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁hai galigwe ▁mgati ▁muna ▁iha nhu ▁helile , ▁kweli ▁m olondeka ▁kum di la ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁fana ▁vini lagilize .”
▁U dongo ▁wenyewo ▁wo zi tenda ▁mbeyu ▁kuku la ▁goya ▁na ▁kwima ▁matunda , ▁ teng ' hu ▁diya ni ▁m aabaho ▁ma da , ▁na ▁kuuhelelo ▁uhemba ▁wo kung ' hu n ha .
▁Maabaho ▁keza kwasakany a ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁keza ya gala ▁maivu ▁yaja ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Chi nhu ▁chi ni togola ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁ni ▁chino , ▁niye ▁no mtosela ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁zi walongile ▁kuwa ▁za ▁uvwizi . ▁Iviya ▁no togola ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zo za ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ivi tabu ▁va ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁vi tabu ▁va ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Kwa viya ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁kezawa lagiliza ▁wa senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ku kalize .
▁ mbali ▁sekeu je ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁kuyamanya ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile , ▁mana ▁siku ▁do nda u je ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁uwo , ▁kweli ▁kwiza danganika .”
▁So la ▁iyo ▁yili ▁yako ▁na ▁uhite ▁ukaye . ▁ Nolonda ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ino ▁wa ▁kuuhelelo ▁fana ▁vini kwing ' hile ▁weye .
▁I ja ▁yoya humuluk e ▁mwiisi ▁niiyo ▁ija ▁yoya kweli le ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' h ' a ni ▁kuulanga , ▁muladi ▁ya memez e ▁isi ▁yose .
▁No vimanya ▁kuni tegeleza ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ mbali ▁nolonga ▁vino ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wo we mile ▁hano , ▁wa togole ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁ku nhu ma .”
▁Wa huwila ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wose ▁wa ilumba ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁walonga , ▁“ M kulu ▁na ▁mu lumba ▁wa ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁na ▁bahali ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo !
▁Lung ilo ▁jangu ▁siku ▁zose ▁ni i pete ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁wanhu ▁hawana muhulika ▁Chilisito , ▁muladi ▁ni leke ▁ku zenga ▁muna ▁i c ha ndusil o ▁cha ▁munhu ▁imwenga .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza i timbula ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ili ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁zi ngo di . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Ku ja ▁kuzimu , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kakala ▁ko gaya ▁ng ' hani , ▁kenul a ▁meso ▁yake , ▁kamuwona ▁Bulahimu ▁kwa ▁kutali ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Lazalo ▁mwii mha mba ga ▁yake .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ha vi nogile ▁bule ▁kusola ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁wana ▁na ▁kuwa sila ▁zimbwa .”
▁Yakobo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wafika ▁Lu zu , ▁iviya ▁yo tangigwa ▁Beseli , ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁Maabaho ▁wa tosa , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁weye ▁ko imanya ▁ mizoyo ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wose . ▁Lelo ▁uchi laguse ▁munhu ▁yelihi ▁you msagula ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wano ▁waidi
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁mwanamke ▁viya lumbigwe ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mulume , ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁na ▁mulume ▁kelek igwa ▁na ▁muke , ▁ mbali ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Vi i fosile ▁miyaka ▁mingi ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kadanganika ‚ ▁ mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁wang ' hali ▁muna ▁utumwa ▁na ▁wo li lila ▁kutazigwa . ▁Ku gutil ila ▁kwa wo ▁kum fikila ▁Mulungu .
▁Si ga m b e chi geze ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁kui linganyiz a ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁woi togoza ▁wenyewo . ▁Wawo ▁ni ▁wabozi . ▁Wo i p i ma ▁na ▁ningo ▁yawo ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁ ki linganyiz a ▁wawo ▁wenyewo .
▁M avuta ▁ya sigale ▁keza muhaka ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁mditwi . ▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kulaw a ▁haja ▁chi hita ▁na ▁chifika ▁muna ▁dibu lu ▁da ▁L e gi o mu . ▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁beho ▁dibu ma ▁kulawa ▁kusi , ▁na ▁zuwa ▁di sondelele ▁chifika ▁bululu ▁da ▁Pu t e o li .
▁One ▁isi gala ▁miyaka ▁mingi , ▁keza liha ▁nyingi ▁kwa ▁ukombola ▁wake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa longelela ▁kwa ▁Musa , ▁walonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁chiza kung ' wa ▁choni ?”
▁Ng ' huli ▁zose ▁si ▁zi mwe , ▁wanhu ▁wana ▁ng ' huli ▁modeli ▁umwenga , ▁ma ng ' onyo ▁ya na ▁ng ' huli ▁modeli ▁umwenga , ▁ndege ▁wana ▁ng ' huli ▁modeli ▁umwenga , ▁somba ▁wana ▁ng ' huli ▁modeli ▁umwenga .
▁Ni wagaza ▁wanhu ▁wowo sondelela ▁nzila ▁ino . ▁Ni wagwila ▁wose ▁wanaake ▁na ▁walume , ▁na ▁niwa sa ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁weye ▁kwa ▁u fu fu n he nde , ▁ huli ▁moto ▁wala ▁ huli ▁u zi zi mi , ▁na habehi ▁kuku de ka .
▁Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁nohita ▁na ▁weye ▁uko ▁Misili , ▁na ▁nizaku bweleza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino . ▁Yosefu ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁weye ▁baho ▁vondau danganike ▁na ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wiza m fu mba ▁meso ▁yako .”
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Habali ▁weye ▁na ▁mulume ▁wako ▁mu lamula ▁kumgeza ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mndewa ? ▁ Walume ▁wowa mu wa ndi le ▁mulume ▁wako ▁sambi ▁wa ba hano ▁hana ▁ulwivi , ▁nawo ▁wezaku sola ▁na ▁weye ▁iviya !”
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁kwa ▁lusita , ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kamwing ' ha ▁ukulu ▁Yosefu ▁yawa lole se .
▁hebu ▁kulonga , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yondaya humuluk e ▁m baka ▁kudi kombo ▁ tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo , ▁uko ▁ni ▁kum winula ▁Chilisito ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁kuchi kombola ?”
▁Daudi ▁ka l ondigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁Daudi ▁ka mpula ▁Mulungu ▁ya muleke ▁yam zengele ▁kaye ▁iyo ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Yakobo .
▁Yosefu ▁kamulongela ▁mfalume , ▁“ Tat i ▁yangu ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁weza ▁kulawa ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wawo ▁na ▁luti ▁wawo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wawo ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vose ▁viweli ▁navo . ▁ Sambi ▁wokala ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Gosheni .”
▁Ha no ▁na hana ▁inzasa . ▁One ▁mndele ▁yaheza ▁kude ha ▁mazi , ▁niza mpula ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ino ngo ▁yake .
▁ Siku ▁ziya ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁kumulima , ▁uko ▁kakala ▁meso ▁ichilo ▁chose ▁ko tosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mu lu ma ke ▁ya he ng iligwa ▁na ▁migongo ▁na ▁ku muwonela ▁migongo ▁muke ▁wake ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁hebu ▁one ▁yaha muwonela ▁migongo ▁muke ▁wake ▁hata ▁one ▁muke ▁iyo ▁hambule ▁mwiko ,
▁Mbali ▁nizawa segeza ▁chidogo ▁chidogo ▁m baka ▁vonda m ongeze ke ▁na ▁kui tawala ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁zi longigwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁ka zeha , ▁kamulongela ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela , ▁“ Sekeudumbe , ▁ togola ▁ tu .”
▁One ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁wo iting ' hana ▁hamwe , ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ko kwandusa ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁vino ▁one ▁wa heza ▁wanhu ▁hawavimanyile ▁na ▁weli bule ▁uhuwilo , ▁haweza longa ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁wose ▁muna ▁vichala ?
▁na ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁wabozi , ▁na ▁mfundiza ▁wa ▁wana ▁wadodo do . ▁Kwa viya ▁ko gesa ▁Yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa ▁kuna wo ▁umanyi ▁na ▁ukweli .
▁Ivo ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwa longiligwe . ▁Yosefu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁m ituka ▁fana ▁viyalagilize ▁mfalume ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁kuja ▁mwiinzila .
▁Mbali ▁ifa ▁i tawala ▁kulawa ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁Adamu ▁m baka ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁Musa , ▁ifa ▁i tawala ▁hata ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wanhu ▁ha watendile ▁uhasanyi ▁fana ▁uyatendile ▁Adamu . ▁Adamu ▁kakala ▁sisil a ▁da ▁Chilisito ▁yoyo kwiza ▁hamwande .
▁ A sa ▁kamwelek a ▁Ye ho s ha fa ti , ▁Ye ho s ha fa ti ▁kamwelek a ▁Yo la mu , ▁na ▁Yo la mu ▁kamwelek a ▁U zi a ,
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ baka ▁ijo , ▁inga wa ▁ ze lu ▁hadi ngile ▁ng ' hani ▁mgati ▁ya ▁mbende ▁hebu ▁upipi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁hau galuke ▁kuwa ▁mzelu , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Niza muleka ni ▁muhite ▁muka mulavile ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kuichuwala , ▁ mbali ▁sekemu hite ▁kutali ▁ng ' hani . ▁Iviya ▁ni pulile ni ▁na ▁niye .”
▁Laheli ▁kakala ▁ya solile ▁nyang ' hiti ▁izo ▁za ▁milungu ▁na ▁ka zi fisa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁ku ka lila ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ngamiya , ▁na ▁kakala ▁m chanyha ▁yake . ▁Mbali ▁Labani ▁ka zahila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁jose , ▁ mbali ▁hazi patile ▁bule .
▁Iviya ▁sang ' hano ▁zinogile ▁zo woneka ▁funhufunhu , ▁na ▁hata ▁ziya ▁hazi woneka ▁funhufunhu ▁hazi daha ▁kugendelela ▁ku fi si ka .
▁Maabaho ▁Nuhu ▁ka mtuma ▁nziwa ▁ya wone ▁one ▁mazi ▁ya hunguka ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vi lavigwe ▁sadaka ▁kwa ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁chi vimanya ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁chose ▁china ▁umanyi . ▁U ma nyi ▁wo gala ▁magoda , ▁ mbali ▁ulondo ▁wo zenga .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Gol o sa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁bahali , ▁muladi ▁mazi ▁ya bwele ▁na ▁kuwa gubika ▁Wamisili ▁na ▁m ituka ▁yawo ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wawo .”
▁Maabaho ▁Waamaleki ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁wowa kalile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁mulima , ▁wa hulumuka ▁na ▁kuwatowa . ▁Wa wawinga ▁m baka ▁wafika ▁Holi ma .
▁Ka li za ▁chinhu ▁chiya ▁chinogile ▁chi wing ' higwe ▁kwa ▁nhazo ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁yoyo kala ▁mgati ▁yetu .
▁Mbali ▁vino ▁ni ivo ▁Waisilaeli ▁wose ▁vondawa komboligwe . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ M kombola ▁kezakwiza ▁kulawa ▁Sayuni ▁na ▁keza segeza ▁wihi ▁wose ▁muna ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo .
▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo ▁saba , ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁lusu ▁jojose ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yawe ▁m fosa nzila ▁hebu ▁mkaya , ▁yaha ja ▁chinhu ▁chi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁keza wing igwa ▁na ▁Waisilaili .
▁Wa ta no ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wabozi , ▁na ▁watano ▁wakala ▁wabala .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa ▁luja ▁walonga ▁vino ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁walonga ▁vimwenga , ▁mkulu ▁iyo ▁ha dahile ▁bule ▁kuhulika ▁goya ▁kwaviya ▁ku ka kala ▁na ▁ g u bu , ▁ivo ▁kalagiliza ▁Paulo ▁ya galigwe ▁kuna ▁im ho ngo no .
▁Kawa tuma ▁kaidi ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wamwenga , ▁kawalongela ▁wa ka walongele , ▁‘ D u gila ▁jangu ▁di sa sa ligwa ▁di mala , ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁wanenehe ▁wa chinjigwa ▁wa mala , ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi kigwa ▁goya ▁chi mala . ▁ Izoni ▁kuna ▁didugila !’
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁mfalume ▁Am ila fe li ▁wa ▁S hi na li ▁na ▁Ali yo ki ▁wa ▁ E la sa li ▁na ▁Ke do lila o ma ▁wa ▁ E la mu ▁na ▁T i dali ▁wa ▁Go i mu ,
▁Zi kala ▁nyele si ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁kulawa ▁Bulahimu ▁m baka ▁viifikile ▁Daudi , ▁welesi ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁kulawa ▁Daudi ▁m baka ▁uha mi ▁wa ▁Babeli , ▁na ▁welesi ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁kulawa ▁uha mi ▁wa ▁Babeli ▁m baka ▁viifikile ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwa ▁Chilisito .
▁ Sambi ▁wa vimanya ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vou ni ni le ▁vo lawa ▁kumwako .
▁Ivo ▁wahuwila ▁wongezeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wongezeka ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Kwa viya ▁yahawa ▁chiya ▁chi kalile ▁cha ▁lusita ▁muhala , ▁chi kala ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wake , ▁ivo ▁chiya ▁chili ▁siku ▁zose ▁chi zakuwa ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 5 9 , 3 00.
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁wose ▁modaha ▁ku lotela , ▁imwe ▁imwe , ▁muladi ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya i funze ▁na ▁ku ga nga mizigwa .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli , ▁kakala ▁Se s uli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁M ika eli .
▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁Wayahudi ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wa mhilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zawo . ▁Wakala ▁hawa ja ▁chinhu ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana ▁na wa ▁makono ▁m baka ▁mui ching ' ho .
▁Ha kalile ▁Nazaleti , ▁ mbali ▁kahita ▁kukala ▁Kapelinaumu , ▁isi ▁yili ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁ lamba ▁da ▁Galilaya , ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Zabuloni ▁na ▁Nafutali .
▁M weye ▁mu danganike ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁kukomboligwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u languliza ▁wa ▁vinyamkela ▁wa languliza ▁wa ▁isi . ▁Lelo ▁ha bali ▁mweye ▁mo kala ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ? ▁Vino ▁ha bali ▁mo wa tegeleza ▁malagilizo ▁fana ▁yano ,
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hachi manya ▁chi mpula . ▁Vino ▁mwo daha ▁kung ' wila ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁manhesa ▁i ning ' wila ▁niye ▁hebu ▁kubatizigwa ▁ubatiz o ▁uni batiz igwa ▁niye ?”
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁hata ▁iha mala ▁nhaguso ▁ino ▁mung ' hali ▁mo lema ▁kuni hulika , ▁ mbali ▁mo itowa ▁na ▁niye ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo papa ▁mtufi , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo , ▁nayo ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake . ▁Wa nyama ▁wawo ▁kumwenu ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Sekemu togole ▁ku tagusigwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo itenda ▁yeye ▁munhu ▁goya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁malaguso , ▁yoyolonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁magoda ▁muhala ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁munhu ▁fana ▁iyo ▁ka n ze n ze u ka ▁kwa ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁wa ▁chiunhu ,
▁One ▁si zile ▁na ▁kulonga ▁nawo , ▁waha dahile ▁kulonga ▁wabule ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁hawa daha ▁kulonga ▁wabule ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mulungu ▁kawa lava ▁kulawa ▁Misili , ▁kawa gombela ▁na ▁wehi ▁wawo ▁fana ▁ng ' ombe ▁mbago . ▁Keza wananga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga ▁weli ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁keza ib e me nda ▁m ivuha ▁yawo ▁vihande ▁vihande , ▁kezawa homa ▁kwa ▁mi sa le ▁yawo .
▁“ Yandik a ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wa ▁P eli ga mo , ▁“ U no ▁niuwo ▁usenga ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁ija ▁yeli ▁na ▁zele ▁di kutwa ▁kuno ▁na ▁kuno .
