▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chochi daha ▁kwima ▁muumoto , ▁mwiza chi fose za ▁muna ▁umoto , ▁nacho ▁chi zakuwa ▁chela . ▁Ha mwe ▁na ▁yano ▁chiza safyigwa ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ku safya , ▁na ▁chila ▁hachi daha ▁kwima ▁muumoto ▁mwiza chi fose za ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁“ Mulongele ▁Haluni , ▁‘ U he ka ▁vitasa ▁saba , ▁viza mwemwes a ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁i chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa .’ ▁”
▁Iviya ▁sekemu lave ▁viu ngo ▁va ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁vi tende ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁mwii lave ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa zilibuke , ▁vi lave ni ▁viu ngo ▁va ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Chodaha .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mwiza i ng ' wila ▁nhungo ▁i ning ' wila ▁niye ▁na ▁kubatizigwa ▁ubatiz o ▁uni batizigwe ▁niye .
▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁ni ivo ▁viyalagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁‘ Igolo ▁ni ▁siku ▁ya ▁kuhumula , ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁yelile ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁ hite ni ▁muka mbi ke ▁hebu ▁muka ki mu se ▁ndiya ▁yo mulonda ▁diyelo , ▁ndiya ▁yondai sigale ▁i ke ni ▁m baka ▁igolo .’ ▁”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Na ▁niye ▁si walongela ni ▁kuwa ▁notenda ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi .”
▁Isilaili ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ One ▁na ha danganika ▁sambi ▁si ▁chinhu ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁ni chi wona ▁chihanga ▁chako ▁na ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mgima .”
▁Ma leme ▁ya gubuka ▁na ▁ng ' huli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁wowa gonile ▁zi zilibuka .
▁Maabaho ▁kulawilila ▁nzala ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁nzala ▁iyo ▁hai kalile ▁ija ▁yoi kalile ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁Bulahimu . ▁Isaka ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁Abimeleki ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Wafilisiti , ▁uko ▁Gelali .
▁Kalonga ▁kufose la ▁kwa ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wake ▁welile ▁kuson gela ▁umwaka
▁I wa ▁imitondo ▁iwa ▁ichigulogulo , ▁siku ▁yetatu .
▁Mbali ▁nyama ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁na ▁mbende ▁yake ▁na ▁ma vi ▁yake , ▁kavi lunguza ▁kwa ▁moto ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Kwa viya ▁vimu batizigwe , ▁mu wandigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁muna ▁ubatiz o ▁iviya ▁mu zilibuka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁kufose la ▁uhuwilo ▁yili ▁muna ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoya m zilibule ▁Yesu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wowadanganike .
▁Sauli ▁viyafikile ▁Yelusalemu , ▁ka geza ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁wanahina , ▁ mbali ▁wakala ▁wa mdumba ▁kwaviya ▁hawa to go lile ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mwanahina .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kodaha ▁ku gesa ▁siku ▁imwe ▁ino ga ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁dimwenga , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁kodaha ▁kuwona ▁siku ▁zose ▁yano ga . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ya wone ▁fana ▁chi yo tenda ▁chinoga .
▁Yosefu ▁kalagiliza ▁ maguniya ▁yawo ▁ya ▁k usu mila ▁ya memezigw e ▁ndiya ▁na ▁ku mbweleze la ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁hela ▁muna ▁di guniya ▁jake ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁m zila . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁i tendeke .
▁Kwa viya ▁Helode ▁mwenyewo ▁kakala ▁kalagiliza ▁Yohana ▁ya gwiligwe ▁na ▁ye kigwe ▁mwiichifungo . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁kamsola ▁Helodiya , ▁yoya kalile ▁mke ▁wa ▁Filipo , ▁se kulu ▁wa ▁Helode .
▁“ Siku ▁sita ▁kwiza sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁kwiza humula , ▁hata ▁ ihawa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ku lima ▁hebu ▁kugobola ▁kwiza humula .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu , ▁vilumb igwa ▁vose ▁kuulanga , ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁kowa danganike , ▁vi tumbal e ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wake ,
▁Niye ▁Paulo , ▁yoni saguligwe ▁kwa ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muli ▁uko ▁Efeso ▁ waminika ▁wowa ilumbile ▁ugima ▁wawo ▁na ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁L usita ▁lwake ▁lwa ▁ku vu mbula ▁vilufikile , ▁ka vu mbula ▁ma mba sa .
▁Chila ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁Loma ▁ko mulekelela ▁m fungwa ▁imwe ▁yoya lo ndigwe ▁na ▁lung ' husesa .
▁Si ivo , ▁ mbali ▁usenga ▁uno ▁wa habehi ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁mweye , ▁wa mu na ▁imi lomo ▁yenu ▁na ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kuu zindilila .
▁Leka mana ▁ni mulamba ni ▁niwa wone ▁na ▁kulonga ▁na ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁ni fungigwa ▁minyololo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chiya ▁cho wo chi lolela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .”
▁Mbali ▁mtumwa ▁yo ha vimanyile ▁viyolonda ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁ya vi tende , ▁nayo ▁ka tenda ▁vihile , ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁keza to igwa ▁chidogo . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁vinhu ▁vingi , ▁kumwake ▁viza londeka ▁vinhu ▁vingi , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁kumwake ▁viza londeka ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Wa ng ' onyo ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁mabawa ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko , ▁sekemuje .
▁Ivo ▁mwanangu ▁u gangamale ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wochi u pata ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁hamwiza sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowose .
▁Maabaho ▁wa lawa ▁ O b o si , ▁wa panga ▁I ye ▁Abalimu , ▁muna ▁ichuwala , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Moabu .
▁Na ▁we mba ▁wila ▁wa ▁sambi , ▁“ W eye ▁kolondeka ▁ku bandul a ▁mihul a ▁na ▁kuchi sola ▁chitabu . ▁Kwa viya ▁ku chinjigwa , ▁na ▁kwa ▁damu ▁yako ▁ku mu lo p o lela ▁Mulungu ▁wanhu , ▁wanhu ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁na ▁welesi ▁na ▁isi .
▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁ha ▁ziya ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁na ▁nusu , ▁m hu mu zi ▁ya ▁ugima ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁iwe ngila , ▁nawo ▁wema . ▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa wawonile ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa viya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁ngima ▁na ▁zina ▁ludabwa , ▁zo kutwa ▁kufosa ▁zele ▁di kanha ▁kuno ▁na ▁kuno . ▁ Z o ibebenyek a ▁m baka ▁mgati ▁kuna ▁umuh e ▁na ▁u nhu ▁fana ▁zele ▁di kutwa ▁vo di kanha ▁m baka ▁mgati ▁ya ▁vilung o ▁va ▁lukuli ▁na ▁u pe m b e . ▁Mbuli ▁izo ▁zo manya ▁ma lu ng ilo ▁na ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁m yoyo ▁ya ▁wanhu .
▁Musa ▁ka kwela ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁m aabaho ▁wingu ▁di gubika ▁mulima .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁ha we li ▁wenevale ▁sambi ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁wenevale , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wenevale ▁sambi ▁weza kuwa ▁ha we li ▁wenevale .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁dilago ▁da ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁mabumbila ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁1 8 6 , 4 00. ▁Wawo ▁ni iwawo ▁wondawa longole .
▁“ M weye ▁iviya ▁vimu kalile ▁uko ▁T a bela ▁na ▁Masa ▁na ▁K ib ilosi ▁Hata ava , ▁mu mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yehilwe .
▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i kala ▁i memezigw a ▁yosi ▁dodi galigwe ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mulungu , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁ma hulo ▁saba ▁yoya m hi li ligwe ▁na ▁waja ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁saba .
▁Na ▁baho ▁hakala ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁chinyamkela ▁cho c ha mtendile ▁yawe ▁mtamu ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mi nane . ▁Ka kala ▁ka v e du ka ▁na ▁ha dahile ▁bule ▁ku go loka .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wano ▁wose ▁wa itowa ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wafalume , ▁wa huma . ▁Wa tenda ▁voilondeka ▁na ▁wa pata ▁yaja ▁yowa longeligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa sita ▁mi lomo ▁ya ▁simba ,
▁iviya ▁na hawa uza , ▁hamwiza ▁ kwidika .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁mo kwa ga ▁kwaviya ▁hamu ya manyile ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁wala ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁Miliamu ▁kakala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa gendelele ▁na ▁umwanza ▁m baka ▁Miliamu ▁viya galigwe ▁mgati ▁kaidi .
▁Chila ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁keng ' higwa ▁ng ' hanzu ▁nzel u , ▁wa longiligwa ▁wa humule ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁luguhi ▁m baka ▁vonda i fike ▁ peta ▁ya ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wayawo ▁na ▁ndugu ▁waja ▁wonda ▁wa komigwe ▁fana ▁viya ▁wawo ▁viwa komigwe .
▁Kaidi ▁ka pata ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁kamtanga ▁Shela . ▁Shela ▁vi yelekwe , ▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁uko ▁Ke zi bu .
▁Mwiza hita ▁kwa ▁ku baba sa baba sa ▁imisi ▁fana ▁vipofu ▁hebu ▁hamwiza komeleza ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu . ▁Mwiza kuwa ▁mo baba ny igwa ▁na ▁ku ba wi ligwa ▁chila ▁lusita ▁na ▁ha kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ku mtaza ni .
▁Yesu ▁kamwamha ▁mkono ▁munhu ▁ija ▁chipofu , ▁kani gala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dibululu . ▁Maabaho ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁muna ▁yameso , ▁ka mwikila ▁makono ▁yake ▁na ▁kumuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁kodaha ▁kulola ▁chinhu ?”
▁na ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁kakala ▁ko woneka ▁na ▁waja ▁wo yengile ▁nawo ▁kulawa ▁Galilaya ▁kuhita ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Wawo ▁sambi ▁ni ▁wa kalangama ▁wake ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .
▁Kuna ▁sang ' hano ▁mbasakanyo , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁imwe ▁yowa da hiza ▁wose ▁kutenda ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo .
▁Weza kuja ▁nyama ▁izo ▁zi lavigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁kwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwa bagula , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁sekeya leke ligwe ▁kuja ▁nyama ▁izo ▁kwaviya ▁ ze la .
▁Ha mbwe ▁muna isiku ▁ya ▁uzilibuko ▁muke ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Kwa viya ▁wose ▁saba ▁wamsola .”
▁Mbali ▁watumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁wa wona ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zi walongile ▁wanaake ▁wawo ▁ni ▁za ▁ubozi , ▁ivo ▁hawa togole ▁bule .
▁Wa segela ▁M iti ka ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Ha shi mo na .
▁Di zi ▁da ▁mhalati ▁di gendelela ▁ku la ndu ka . ▁Musa ▁kalonga ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁nayo ▁kamwidika ▁muna ▁um bumo .
▁na ▁zina ▁da ▁Haluni ▁ ja ndikigwe ▁muna ▁i fi mbo ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi . ▁Kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁fimbo ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila .
▁Wa dimi ▁wa ▁ zinguluwe ▁vi wawonile ▁chiya ▁chochilawilile , ▁wa kimbila , ▁wa p wi li sa ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁na ▁muna ▁ivi bulul u .
▁Mazi na ▁sita ▁muna ▁idibwe ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁mazina ▁sita ▁muna ▁idibwe ▁dekaidi , ▁uya p ang e ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi welekigwe .
▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁uko , ▁kalu fika ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Lazalo ▁lu wandigwa ▁m di leme ▁lu mala ▁siku ▁nne ▁ zifosile .
▁Mu yepule ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ugoni . ▁U hasanyi ▁umwenga ▁wose ▁u yo tenda ▁munhu ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwake , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁ugoni ▁ko lu tendela ▁uhasanyi ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko t e za ▁mibiki ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁yoi nogeza ▁na ▁yoi kwima ▁matunda ▁yo faya ▁kwa ▁ndiya . ▁Ha na ▁ ulu do n ho ▁lwa ▁mgunda ▁uwo ▁kukala ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wou lava ▁ugima ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁kuwa tende za ▁wanhu ▁wa ya manye ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kukala ▁uko , ▁wanhu ▁wowa huwile ▁wa ▁ A n ti o ki ya ▁wa walaga , ▁wawa londe la ▁tindiwalo , ▁m aabaho ▁wabwela ▁Yelusalemu ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wa watumile .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁ wolondeka ▁watende ▁dugila ▁ijo .
▁Ni walongela ▁wose ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wasamhe ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa muhuwile ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu .
▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁ka soligwa ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁kakala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁ng ' ombe ▁wamwenga ▁saba ▁wa sisili ▁na ▁wasokile . ▁Muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁sina wawona ▁bule ▁wowa li ngile ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Yakobo ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M oni ho ka ▁wanangu , ▁Yosefu ▁ka kwa bule , ▁Simeoni ▁ka kwa bule , ▁na ▁lelo ▁mo londa ▁kumsola ▁Benjamini . ▁Ma n he sa ▁yose ▁ya mha ta ▁niye !”
▁Maabaho ▁mfundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁imwe ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁niza hita ▁na ▁weye ▁ko ko se ▁ko nda u hite .”
▁Baho ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁kulawa ▁damu ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁midi .
▁Mafalisayo ▁viwahulike ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kowa tenda ▁Masadukayo ▁wanyama le , ▁wa i duganya ▁hamwe .
▁Weza kuwa ▁na ▁mazi ▁mengi ▁muna ▁zino ngo ▁zawo , ▁mbeyu ▁zawo ▁ziza ha n digwa ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ku faya . ▁Mfalume ▁wawo ▁keza kuwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ A ga gi , ▁ufalume ▁wawo ▁wiza tunhizigwa .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hamu lu ngile ▁kumkoma ▁ila ▁Mulungu ▁ka leka ▁i lawilile ▁ivo , ▁basi ▁mkomaji ▁iyo ▁kodaha ▁kukimbilila ▁hanhu ▁honda ni wa sa gulile ni .
▁Zi so ▁jako ▁da ▁ukulu me ▁di ha kutenda ▁utende ▁uhasanyi , ▁ding ' o le ▁na ▁uja se ▁kutali ▁na ▁weye , ▁kwaviya ▁muhavu ▁kumwako ▁weye ▁kwa giza ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chili ▁mu lu ku li ▁lwako , ▁kufosa ▁lukuli ▁lose ▁kwa sigwa ▁muumoto ▁wa ▁jehanamu .
▁Wa tegelezeni ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁udahi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa , ▁fana ▁mfalume ▁mkulu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁ku languliza ,
▁Balaba ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁ye kigwe ▁mchifungo ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ fu jo ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tenda ▁ mhete ▁nne ▁za ▁zahabu ▁za ▁kudi p a p ila ▁muna ▁imigulu ▁yake ▁mine , ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁umwe ▁na ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wekaidi .
▁Maabaho ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Tat i ▁yako ▁ka kulihi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Ha mu ni manyile ▁niye ▁wala ▁Tat i ▁yangu . ▁One ▁mu hani manyile ▁niye , ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁muha mmanyile ▁iviya .”
▁Muna ▁usenga ▁umwenga ▁wo nimwandikileni ▁ni mulongelani ▁sekemu ihangany e ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wazinzi .
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kwa ▁m pango ▁wake , ▁mwanduso ▁Chilisito ▁m aabaho ▁waja ▁weli ▁wake ▁Chilisito ▁chip indi ▁chonda ye ze .
▁ Sambi ▁no bwela ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁ning ' hali ▁sina segela , ▁leka ▁ nikulongele ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁zo nda wa watendela ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁siku ▁zikwiza .”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wakale ▁hasi ▁hana ▁yama savu , ▁m aabaho ▁kaya sola ▁yaja ▁yamagate ▁matano , ▁na ▁somba ▁waidi ▁m aabaho ▁ka lola ▁kuulanga ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka ya mo gola ▁yamagate ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa weng ' ha ▁wanhu .
▁Na ▁kalonga , ▁‘ I nula ▁meso ▁yako ▁na ▁u lole ▁mabe belu ▁yose ▁yeli ▁na ▁m ili ya ▁na ▁ma wola ma wola . ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁iwa ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁ni wona ▁viya ku tendile ▁Labani .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wasegela ▁wahita ▁hanhu ▁howa dahile ▁kudi wona ▁bululu ▁da ▁Sodoma , ▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁kawa si ndik iza .
▁Maabaho ▁waja ▁iwa sang ' hani ▁na ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wafika ▁habehi ▁na ▁wa inama ▁kwa ▁hishima ,
▁Pet a ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 3 5 , 4 00.
▁si leka ▁bule ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁No wa kumbuka ▁muna ▁zi n hosa ▁zangu ,
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁kwiza simika ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁weza towa ▁mhalati ▁izo . ▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁dizakuwa ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zikwiza .
▁Vino ▁vi linga ▁fana ▁ma bawe ▁yo ki lima ▁mazi , ▁fana ▁chi zi ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁lwanda , ▁fana ▁ma ku nza m vili ▁yoya handile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁mi ele zi ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁mazi .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Y ava ni ▁wakala ▁Eli s ha ▁na ▁T a li shi shi ▁na ▁K iti mu ▁na ▁D o da ni mu .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁magogogo ▁na ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁viwahulike ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁wazanywa ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁chiwa lawilile ▁watumigwa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wa muhuwila ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁yake .
▁Nowalongela ni ▁keza we zila ni ▁hima ▁hima ! ▁Mbali ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁vondayeze , ▁vino ▁keza wona ▁uhuwilo ▁mwiisi ▁yose ?”
▁Wa nahina ▁wa lamula ▁kuwa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁fana ▁vi yodaha ▁ya gale ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muladi ▁kuwataza ▁wahuwila ▁wa ya we ▁wowo kala ▁Yudeya .
▁Nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁mwenevale ▁keza mwika ▁msang ' hani ▁iyo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose .
▁Kwa viya ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana kwiza ▁wanhu ▁wolawa ▁kwa ▁Yakobo , ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁koja ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Mbali ▁viwafikile ▁ka leka ▁kuja ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kwaviya ▁kawa dumba ▁wanhu ▁wowo londa ▁ku gumigw a ▁ulungwana .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁m agesa ▁yawo , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Habali ▁mwo gesa ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ?
▁Musa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ha vi nogile ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁mana ▁nhambiko ▁zo nda chi m tambikile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁ziza watenda ▁Wamisili ▁wehilw e . ▁Vino ▁Wamisili ▁waha chi wona ▁cho lava ▁nhambiko ▁zozi wehila ▁wawo , ▁haweza chi towa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁chi danganike ?
▁Mndewa ▁kachi tenda ▁chinhu ▁chino , ▁na ▁chiwa ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁mwazanyo ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwetu .’ ▁”
▁Yosefu ▁kadi tenda ▁dino ▁lagilizo ▁kwa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano ▁ni ▁ma li ▁ya ▁mfalume . ▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁di sigala ▁m baka ▁diyelo . ▁Mbali ▁zisi ▁za ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muhala ▁hazi wile ▁ma li ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁bule .
▁Chilisito ▁hai gole ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁bule . ▁Paulo ▁hawa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Ha m batizigwe ▁bule ▁fana ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Paulo .
▁Ko walongela , ▁“ Ino ▁yo fambula ▁vino , ▁chila ▁mfundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁yondaya we ▁mwanahina ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ko linga ▁fana ▁mwene ▁kaye ▁yoyo lava ▁vinhu ▁va ▁sambi ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁umwaka ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ ingama ▁yake .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yuda ▁wa ▁Galilaya ▁ka lawilila ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁kupeta ▁wanhu , ▁ka languliza ▁lung ' husesa , ▁ mbali ▁na ▁yeye ▁iviya ▁ka komigwa , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa m so m de lele ▁wa pwililika .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Hata ▁one ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kam bwajulil a ▁mate ▁muna ▁ichihanga , ▁sigambe ya wone ▁chinyala ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ? ▁Ko londeka ▁yafu ngigwe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁siku ▁saba , ▁m aabaho ▁keza bwelezigwa ▁mgati ▁kaidi .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa g ombe leni ▁mweye , ▁mweye ▁m olondeka ▁mu nyama le ▁hupi .”
▁Chi no ▁ni icho ▁choni londa ▁kulonga , ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁ka fikiza . ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yoya lawilile ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁i fosile , ▁muladi ▁hai daha ▁ku bena ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁ivo ▁ku segeza ▁chiya ▁cha yalongile ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo , ▁na ▁kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza . ▁Wa zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yo yamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wetu ▁digogogo ▁kochi wonela ▁ubazi ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁unyondenyonde ▁wetu , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ka gezigwa ▁fana ▁cheye ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila ▁ mbali ▁ha tendile ▁uhasanyi ▁bule .
▁“ Mu wa hulika ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁viwa longiligwe , ▁‘ Sekemu kome , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yondaya kome ▁kezakomigwa .’
▁M wanamke ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁mwana ▁mndele ▁yeli ▁na ▁chinyamkela ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu . ▁Ivo ▁bahobaho ▁kamuhitila ▁na ▁ka ibwanha ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁yake .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom duwila ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Kwel eni ▁kumwangu , ▁weye ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walala ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁muni tumbalil e ▁mavindi ▁kwa ▁kutali .
▁Mbali ▁hata ▁one ▁muha gazigwa ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁fana ▁viilondeka , ▁mu mweda ! ▁Sekemu mdumbe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁na ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁lugano .
▁Kwa viya ▁si longa ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wangu ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁Tata ▁yanhumile ▁kani lagiliza ▁choni londeka ▁kulonga .”
▁Vi i kalile ▁zuwa ▁da ▁sita ▁imisi , ▁isi ▁yose ▁i kala ▁i gubikigwe ▁na ▁ziza ▁m baka ▁viifikile ▁zuwa ▁da ▁kenda ▁imisi .
▁na ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu , ▁ma andazi ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁ya bu lu g igwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁na ▁magate ▁ma sisili ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu , ▁ mbali ▁yoi gumigw e ▁mavuta . ▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁vi teng e ne n zigwe ▁kwa ▁usage ▁lu n hi li ▁wa ▁ngano .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha mulonda ▁Mndewa ▁na ya duwiligwe . ▁Mndewa ▁wetu , ▁izo !
▁Ino ▁i kala ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁hawa mtegeleze ▁Mulungu ▁viyakalile ▁ko gozela ▁kwa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁siku ▁ziya ▁Nuhu ▁viyakalile ▁ko zenga ▁safina . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa nane ▁muhala ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁isafina ▁ija , ▁wa lopoligwa ▁muna ▁yamazi ,
▁Kwa viya ▁kwii goda ▁kwetu ▁ni ▁kuno , ▁lungilo ▁jetu ▁do lava ▁ukalangama ▁kuwa ▁chi kala ▁muna ▁isi , ▁haswa ▁muna ▁u mbwiya ▁wetu ▁na ▁mweye , ▁muna ▁ kwela ▁na ▁ubala ▁wa ▁moyo , ▁vovi lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Chi tenda ▁ivo ▁si ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁chi isi ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁howo iting ' hana ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁na ▁niye ▁na ha gati ▁yawo .”
▁Wa gane ▁fana ▁wawo ▁wo ifunza ▁kuwa ▁wa b wa ▁na ▁ku ze b we gela ▁kaye ▁kwa ▁kaye . ▁Chi hile ▁ng ' hani , ▁iviya ▁wo kwandusa ▁kuwa de ta ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kui guma ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wolonga ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁hawa londeka ▁kuzi longa .
▁Vino ▁ha kalile ▁yochi gesa ▁cheye ▁viyalongile ▁ivo ? ▁Ona ! ▁ Yandikigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu . ▁Munhu ▁yo handa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo lima ▁ wolondeka ▁ku lolela ▁kupata ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁mavuno ▁yake .
▁Yesu ▁viyalongile ▁yano , ▁mkalizi ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁kema ▁habehi ▁ka mtowa ▁Yesu ▁ko fi , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Habali ▁kwo mwidika ▁vino ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ?”
▁Keza kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁honda ya sagule ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁hanhu ▁ho mnogela . ▁Sekemu mba manye .
▁Yesu ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Ni galile ni ▁niye ▁hano .”
▁Mbali ▁kamwidika ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁‘ Lola , ▁miyaka ▁ino ▁yose ▁niku sang ' hanila ▁fana ▁mtumwa , ▁na ▁si lemile ▁bule ▁kuku tegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁yako . ▁Ku ning ' ha ▁choni ▁niye ? ▁Hu ning ' hile ▁hata ▁luti ▁nitende ▁dugila ▁na ▁mambwiya ▁zangu !
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁Waisilaili ▁wa kugalile ▁mavuta ▁yanogile ▁ya ▁mzaituni ▁muladi ▁vitasa ▁vi gendelele ▁kwa ka .
▁Bahobaho ▁chipofu ▁ija ▁ka daha ▁kuwona , ▁kamsondelela ▁Yesu ▁kuno ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁vi wawonile ▁ivo , ▁ivi a ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Mndewa ▁kani tendela ▁yano . ▁ Sambi ▁kani lagusa ▁ubazi ▁wake . ▁Ka ni segeze la ▁chinyala ▁choni kalile ▁nacho ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu !”
▁M weye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁baho ▁umwaka ▁ mulema ▁kumtegeleza ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ muhokela ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁Wayahudi ▁wa lema ▁kumtegeleza ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁Muhe ▁niiyo ▁yoyolonga ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁niiyo ▁kweli .
▁Vino ▁mu muwona ▁mulangulizi ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁Mfalisayo ▁yoyose ▁yoyo muhuwila ?
▁“ Yodahika ▁vilihi ▁munhu ▁kwingila ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁ha mala ▁baho ▁kusola ▁vinhu ▁vake , ▁na ▁sekeya nduse ▁ku mfunga ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ?
▁ G a lu leni ▁m agesa ▁yenu ▁yanogile ! ▁Ka nduse ni ▁kukala ▁goya ▁na ▁ lekeni ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi . ▁Wa mwenga ▁wenu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁hata ▁chidogo . ▁Nomulongelani , ▁ni ▁chinyala ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwenu !
▁He za de ta ▁wala ▁heza guta ▁ng ' hondo ▁bule , ▁iviya ▁dizi ▁jake ▁hadi hulikik a ▁bule ▁muna ▁zinzila .
▁Na ▁va wamuwonile , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wo ku zahila ▁weye .”
▁Walawi ▁wa i safya ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁wa fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vawo . ▁Maabaho ▁Haluni ▁kawa lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁kuilumba ▁muladi ▁kuwa safya .
▁“ Mu sa ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁mulotezi ▁wake ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya ni tu mile ▁niye , ▁iyo ▁keza lawa ▁kumwenu ▁wenyewo . ▁M olondeka ▁kuhulika ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi yo mulongelani .
▁na ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kwikil a ▁vitasa ▁ivo ▁ni wona ▁chinhu ▁chili ngile ▁fana ▁mwana ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁kayawala ▁walo ▁ tali ▁do fika ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁imigulu ▁na ▁kai funga ▁mkwiji ▁wake ▁wa ▁zahabu ▁muna ▁im ha mba ga .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawa gomesa ▁kumulongela ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mbuli ▁ino . ▁Mbali ▁va ya gendelele ▁kuwa gomesa , ▁ni ivo ▁va wa gendelele ▁kui pwililisa ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Mbuli ▁zino , ▁“ M wa nza ▁umwenga ▁kaidi ” ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁vinhu ▁viu mbigwe ▁viza tingisigwa ▁na ▁kwa ga , ▁muladi ▁viya ▁vinhu ▁havi daha ▁ku tingisigwa ▁vi dahe ▁kukala ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Kawa sagula ▁ndugu ▁watano ▁na ▁kawa lagusa ▁kwa ▁mfalume .
▁Ka mu i nza ▁Paulo ▁na ▁cheye ▁kuno ▁ko guta ▁nyangi , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ! ▁Wo mulongelani ▁viya ▁vondamu komboligwe !”
▁Wa samaliya ▁wengi ▁wa ▁dibululu ▁diya ▁wa muhuwila ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ka nilongela ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁voni tendile .”
▁Paulo ▁kawa bunhul ila ▁yameso ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu ▁Waisilaeli ! ▁Ni msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁unogile ▁m baka ▁diyelo .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁ufila ▁yaham bwajulil a ▁mate ▁munhu ▁yelile , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya bwajulil igwe ▁mate ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁“ Wa nhu ▁hawa guma ▁chi ku p o ▁cha ▁walo ▁da ▁sambi ▁muna ▁imi ko ba ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁kwaviya ▁ichi ku p o ▁icho ▁chiza di de ga ▁diwalo ▁da ▁umwaka , ▁na ▁haja ▁ha dege ke ▁heza k ongeze ka .
▁Kwa ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ho ho ki ligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa kala ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga ▁ho ho ki ligwa ▁na ▁ija ▁yochi mulonga ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima .
▁M haka ▁iza lawa ▁S he fa mu ▁kuhita ▁L i bila , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁ A i ni , ▁m aabaho ▁iza gendelela ▁na ▁kufika ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ lamba ▁da ▁Galilaya .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Isaka ,
▁Mu we ▁na ▁usungu ▁na ▁ lile ni ▁na ▁kulila ▁kwa ▁ gi yo ▁ gi yo ▁na ▁se ko ▁zenu ▁zi galuke ▁zi we ▁ndilo , ▁na ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁yenu ▁i galuke ▁kuwa ▁luholozi !
▁Na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁weketatu ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁muna ▁ziny a nda ▁na ▁muna ▁zi nza sa , ▁vi galuka ▁damu .
▁Loleni ▁kuja ▁kuna ▁bululu ▁ dodo ▁nodaha ▁kudi kimbilila ▁kwaviya ▁da habehi . ▁Lelo ▁ni lekelele ▁ni kimbilile ▁uko . ▁Di ya ▁ni ▁bululu ▁ dodo ▁muhala ▁na ▁uko ▁niza honye ka .”
▁weka ▁magulu ▁yawo ▁ha ▁watumigwa , ▁nawo ▁wazi gola ▁kwa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁fana ▁vi i londeke .
▁“ Mu he ngila ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁jojose ▁hebu ▁ chibululu , ▁umo ▁m zahile ni ▁munhu ▁yo londa ▁kuwa hokela , ▁na ▁kukala ▁na ▁mweye ▁umo ▁m baka ▁vondamu segele ▁hanhu ▁baho .
▁“ Nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno ▁haweza fosa ▁bule ▁m baka ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vi lawilile .
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁wa bananzi ▁wa kalile ▁wawa mbigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁ka muliga ▁Yesu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁siyo ▁Chilisito ▁bule ? ▁I kombole ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁cheye .”
▁Wo se ▁waidi ▁wa potwa ▁kuliha ▁ma de ni ▁yawo , ▁ivo ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya wa kwa zi mi s he ▁ka walekela ▁wose . ▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁viweli ▁yondaya mulonde ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya wa kwa zi mi s he ?”
▁Nompul a ▁Mulungu ▁ya fungu le ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu , ▁muladi ▁mudi manye ▁lolelo ▁diya ▁do ya wa ta ngile ni ▁na ▁vitumetume ▁va ▁utunhizo ▁viya ▁viya walaganile ▁wanhu ▁welile ,
▁Kawa tuma ▁kaidi ▁watumigwa ▁wamwenga ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁waja ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁ mbali ▁walimi ▁wa watendela ▁viya viya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niza gala ▁ hulo ▁dimwenga ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Maabaho ▁kezamuleka ni ▁mu segele , ▁na ▁vondaya muleke ni ▁mu segele , ▁keza muwinga ni ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ One ▁muha tenda ▁wihi ▁na ▁ku muleka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kezamgalila ni ▁ duwilo ▁na ▁tibwilitibwili ▁na ▁manhesa ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zose , ▁m baka ▁wose ▁muna ngigwe ▁himahima .
▁Mbali ▁viwa wa p u wile , ▁wa wagwila ▁Y asoni ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wa wagala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁dibululu ▁na ▁wa landula ▁madizi , ▁“ Paulo ▁na ▁Sila ▁wa gala ▁magayo ▁chila ▁hanhu ! ▁ Sambi ▁weza ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁jetu .
▁iviya ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga ▁ukala ▁na ▁panzia ▁dili ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁sita ▁na ▁nusu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mhanda ▁nhatu ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁ka zowel a ▁ku kenha ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁na ▁mwene ▁ng ' ombe ▁ka longeligwa ▁ mbali ▁ham fu ngile , ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁yaha koma ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁kolondeka ▁ yatowigwe ▁na ▁mabwe , ▁na ▁mwene ▁ng ' ombe ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Wa panga ▁zuwa ▁da ▁ku iting ' hana ▁na ▁Paulo , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza ▁hanhu ▁hoya kalile ▁Paulo . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁imitondo ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo ▁kawa fambulila ▁usenga ▁wake ▁kuson hela ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁m aandiko ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka geza ▁kuwa kwe sa ▁wa mtogole ▁Yesu .
▁Mbali ▁chi gendelele ▁muna ▁inzila ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁ichi i sondelele ▁m baka ▁sambi .
▁Yakobo ▁ka lamka ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kweli ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ▁hanhu ▁hano , ▁niye ▁si vimanyile ▁bule !”
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁Balaki ▁kamsola ▁Balaamu ▁na ▁ka kwela ▁nayo ▁m baka ▁ B a mo si ▁Baali . ▁Kulaw a ▁uko ▁Balaamu ▁kawa wona ▁Waisilaili ▁wamwenga .
▁na ▁ka b wa ki ligwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake . ▁Chi hongwe ▁ha dahile ▁kalonga , ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁da ▁chiunhu ▁na ▁kam kimilila ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁sekeya tende ▁lukwale .
▁hebu ▁heza m golela ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁nyama ▁ya ▁wanage ▁wonda ya wa je . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁lwa ▁ku zunguluk igwa ▁na ▁kugazigwa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁hamwiza si galil wa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni , ▁Eliabu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁He lo ni ,
▁Maabaho ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zako ‚ ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo .” ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kai gubika ▁chihanga ▁chake ‚ ▁kwaviya ▁kadumba ▁kumulola ▁Mulungu .
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁kohita ▁kulihi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ H u daha ▁bule ▁kuni wi nza ▁hanhu ▁ho ni hita ▁sambi , ▁ mbali ▁hamwande ▁ku za ni wi nza .”
▁Mbali ▁notenda ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁cheye ▁diyelo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁welesi ▁wenu .
▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yekigw a ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wagoni ▁na ▁walume ▁woya ngala ▁na ▁walume ▁wayawo ▁na ▁wowo chuuza ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wa vwizi ▁na ▁wo ilaha ▁chiu vwizi ▁hebu ▁wowo tenda ▁chochose ▁chochi i lema ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁kweli .
▁Mbali ▁si ▁ivo ▁kumwenu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kuwa ▁mkulu ▁kumwenu , ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁msang ' hani ▁wenu ,
▁Wa gula ▁vinhu ▁Wa midiani ▁viwafikile ▁hanhu ▁baho , ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wa mulava ▁Yosefu ▁muna ▁disima ▁na ▁wam chuuza ▁kwa ▁Wa i s huma ili ▁kwa ▁vihande ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁va ▁hela , ▁na ▁Wa i s huma eli ▁wamsola ▁Yosefu ▁m baka ▁Misili .
▁Za ha bu ▁yenu ▁na ▁hela ▁yenu ▁vingi la ▁ng ' hu tu , ▁na ▁ng ' hu tu ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ukalangama ▁kumwenu , ▁nayo ▁iza kuja ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁fana ▁moto . ▁Mu i memez ela ▁ngama ▁siku ▁za ▁uhelelo .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela , ▁“ One ▁hu hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁sekeu chi segeze ▁hanhu ▁hano .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ha he ne le , ▁basi ▁ija ▁ni ▁ng ' ho vu ▁ya ▁i hu ▁muhala ▁yoi sigale , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁we mile ▁haja ▁wa muhulika ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Ko mtanga ▁Eliya .”
▁Wa lagilize ▁watende ▁yanogile , ▁na ▁watende ▁sang ' hano ▁nyingi ▁zinogile ▁na ▁sekewawe ▁wa gila ▁na ▁wawe ▁ ti ya li ▁kuwa golela ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁vinhu ▁vawo .
▁Na ▁mkulu ▁kumwenu ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁msang ' hani ▁wenu ,
▁M apanzia ▁yayo ▁ye zakwamh igwa ▁na ▁mibiki ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁ya ▁shaba ▁ili ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁va ▁shaba . ▁Mbali ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁mhanda ▁na ▁ vihindo ▁vake ▁vi zakuwa ▁va ▁hela .
▁Wala ▁hawa sa m hile ▁kukoma ▁na ▁uha wi ▁wawo ▁na ▁ugoni ▁wawo ▁hebu ▁u bavi ▁wawo .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁isi ▁vi i lumbigwe , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya hulike ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ka muhonya ▁munhu ▁yo yelekigwe ▁chipofu .
▁Nzi wa ▁kabwela ▁kwa ▁Nuhu ▁ichigulogulo ▁kuno ▁kana ▁tambi ▁ bisi ▁da ▁mzaituni ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁Nuhu ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁mazi ▁ya kala ▁ya hunguka ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Kaye ▁iyo ▁yo londeka ▁ ib o mo ligwe , ▁mabwe ▁yake ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁na ▁cho ka a ▁yake ▁vi galigwe ▁hanhu ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁chifika ▁Sidoni , ▁Y uli yo ▁ka mtendela ▁vinogile ▁Paulo ▁na ▁ka mtogole la ▁yahite ▁na ▁kuwa lola ▁mbwiya ▁zake , ▁wa mwing ' he ▁vinhu ▁viyolonda .
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁ndugu ▁saba . ▁Mkulu ▁wawo ▁kasola ▁muke ▁na ▁kadanganika ▁ha le kile ▁mwana .
▁M baka ▁sambi ▁cheye ▁china ▁nzala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu , ▁cha bule ▁viwalo ▁na ▁cho towigwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁cha bule ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala .
▁Vi g ingi ▁vose ▁va ▁hema ▁na ▁va ▁luwa ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁dihema ▁vi kala ▁va ▁shaba .
▁Na ▁ndagilizi ▁yake ▁iyo ▁ino , ▁chi muhuwile ▁mwanage ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁chi i londe ▁fana ▁viya chi lagilize .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yoya kulongele ▁weye ▁kwa ▁ ukengele ? ▁Vino ▁weye ▁kuja ▁ tunda ▁da ▁mbiki ▁u nikulongele ▁sekeu je ?”
▁Enosi ▁viya wile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁kenda , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁zina ▁jake ▁Kenani .
▁V a wakalile ▁woja , ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁imwe ▁ vu mwili , ▁yoja ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁kezam hinduka .”
▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Tata , ▁uwa wonele ▁ubazi ▁kwaviya ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule ▁chi wo tenda .” ▁Wa gola ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya .

▁Ivo ▁Abulamu ▁kaha miza ▁hema ▁jake , ▁kahita ▁kukala ▁habehi ▁na ▁mibiki ▁mi kulu ▁ya ▁Mamule ▁kuja ▁Hebuloni , ▁na ▁uko ▁kam zengela ▁lupango ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁ nitegeleze ▁niye ▁na ▁niza kulongela ▁vini gesa , ▁Mulungu ▁yawe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye . ▁W eye ▁kwiza hita ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ku mgalila ▁magayo ▁yawo .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁wa bwele ▁hachisogo ▁na ▁kwika ▁ma he ma ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Pi ha h ilosi , ▁hagati ▁ya ▁M i gi do li ▁na ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu , ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Baali ▁Se f oni .
▁Wayahudi ▁wo londa ▁vilaguso ▁va ▁mauzauza . ▁Wagiliki ▁wo zahila ▁ubala .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁kumtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁ni zi ligwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁kuchisogo ▁changu ▁fana ▁dizi ▁da ▁mhalati .
▁Mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lagilizo ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁yawe ▁mkaya ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁kumwenu .
▁Viya kalile ▁yo lawa ▁mwiingalawa , ▁ka iting ' hana ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁bululu ▁diya ▁yeli ▁na ▁vinyamkela . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ h ava lile ▁walo ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁mwingi , ▁wala ▁ha kalile ▁ukaye , ▁ mbali ▁kuna ▁yama leme .
▁Munhu ▁yahawa ▁na ▁magutwi ▁na yahulike .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kawa wona ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wa hasanya ▁viyalongile , ▁Mndewa ▁kolonga , ▁“ Siku ▁zo kwiza , ▁niza tenda ▁lagano ▁da ▁sambi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Yuda .
▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁chitasa ▁cha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁vilung o ▁kwa ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ,
▁Wem a , ▁wa mulava ▁Yesu ▁hanze ▁ya ▁ chibululu ▁chawo ▁na ▁kumgala ▁m chisuwili ▁cha ▁ichi lima ▁ho di zengigw e ▁bululu ▁jawo . ▁Wa londa ▁ku mwasa ▁hasi ,
▁ Sambi ▁chodaha ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho ▁di chi li ▁najo ▁haulongozi ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Ivo ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁Efiloni ▁uli ▁uko ▁Makipela ▁habehi ▁na ▁Mamule , ▁ tuka ▁dodi kalile ▁umo ▁muu n gunda ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yose ▁i kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁m we la ▁wose ▁diwa ▁jake
▁Wa nhu ▁wa o ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁mawimbi ▁makulu ▁ya ▁bahali , ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁za ▁chinyala ▁zo lawa ▁fana ▁ho vu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁nhondo ▁zozi we gela ▁zi kigwe ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ziza ▁totolo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ T engenez a ▁luwa ▁lwa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁U banzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁uluwa ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mapanzia ▁ya tengenez igwe ▁kwa ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁yondaya we ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁nne ▁kwa ▁ubanzi ▁umwe .
▁ Z o wandigwa ▁ng ' huli ▁za ▁chiunhu , ▁na ▁zo zilibuligwa ▁ng ' huli ▁za ▁chimuhe . ▁One ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁chiunhu ▁basi ▁iviya ▁kuna ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁chimuhe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mkono ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulume ▁u pata ▁udahi ▁mkulu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mkono ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulume ▁uwa ho nda ▁wehi .
▁M wi isiku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁dugila ▁da ▁M agate ▁hayana gumigw a ▁ha mila , ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁ku mchinja ▁mwana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁Pasaka , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Kolond a ▁chihite ▁kulihi ▁kuku sasalil a ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka ?”
▁Y eye ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁kasola ▁magate ▁yoilavigw e ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka ja ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wayage . ▁Malagilizo ▁yowa goma ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁kuja ▁magate ▁yayo , ▁ila ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muhala .”
▁L usita ▁Musa ▁viyakalile ▁uko ▁Midiani ‚ ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ‚ ▁“ Bwel a ▁Misili ‚ ▁mana ▁waja ▁wose ▁wowa londile ▁kuku koma ▁wadanganika .”
▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka bule ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁hima ▁hima ▁na ▁ka mema ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁ko lekelela ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mbali ▁heza leka ▁kuwatagusa ▁wana ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁nyele si ▁yetatu ▁na ▁yekane ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁zawo .’
▁Kwa viya ▁no mulongelani ▁kuwa , ▁muna i wa ja ▁wowagonikigwe , ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁yonda ▁ya la n ze ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁dugila ▁jangu !’ ▁”
▁Baho ▁Yakobo ▁kaya de ga ▁yama wa lo ▁yake ▁kwa ▁usungu , ▁kai yawaza ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁ maguniya ▁muna ▁i chigudi . ▁Ka mulilila ▁mwanage ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi .
▁Basi ▁yahawa ▁ni wandikila , ▁si ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ija ▁yoyatendile ▁uhasanyi ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ija ▁yoya hasanye . ▁Mbali ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁ku ta mbula ▁funhufunhu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vomu iyoha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo , ▁“ Vino ▁Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁yo togola ▁ku muhonya ▁munhu ▁muna isiku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁hebu ▁haya togola ▁bule ?”
▁kwaviya ▁vi umbe ▁ v e n ye wo ▁weza komboligwa ▁muna ▁utumwa ▁wa ▁ku wola ▁na ▁vi ngile ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁chip indi ▁chiza kwiza ▁munhu ▁yoyo sola ▁vondaya se gezigwe ▁kumwawo . ▁Baho ▁weza funga ▁kuja .
▁Petili ▁kakala ▁ya kalile ▁kunze ▁ku luhelengo . ▁M sang ' hani ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁muke ▁kamuhitila , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Na we ▁iviya ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Galilaya ?”
▁Ivo ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya petigwe ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yochi tenda ▁chi yepule ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi .
▁M ting ' hano ▁wose ▁vi wawonile ▁kuwa ▁Haluni ▁kadanganika , ▁kaye ▁zose ▁za ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mulilila ▁Haluni ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁matatu .
▁Maliya ▁viyafikile ▁hanhu ▁ha yakalile ▁Yesu , ▁kamuwona , ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi , ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁one ▁u wile ▁baha , ▁ lumbu ▁jangu ▁sigambe ya danganike ▁bule .”
▁Na ▁di la gi zo ▁da ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁ukulu ▁ijo ▁dino , ▁‘ Mulonde ▁miyago ▁fana ▁vo wi i londa ▁mwenyewo .’ ▁Habule ▁lagilizo ▁kulu ▁kufosa ▁yano ▁maidi .”
▁No mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁nolonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁kufosa ▁mweye ▁wose .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁hamwiza ni pula ▁chinhu ▁chochose . ▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli ‚ ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁keza mwi g ' hani ▁chochose ▁chonda mu m pule ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa mulilila ▁Musa , ▁nayo ▁Musa ▁ka mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁moto ▁uja ▁u fa .
▁Kweli , ▁mweye ▁ni ▁utunhizo ▁wetu ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁jetu .
▁Go mbo ▁di gendelela ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁na ▁yamazi ▁ya mema ▁m baka ▁safina ▁i yeng e lu ka ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mazi .
▁Kulaw a ▁uko ▁Waisilaili ▁wahita ▁m baka ▁Be eli , ▁icho ▁ni ▁ chisima ▁chiya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hoya mulongele ▁Musa , ▁“ Wa ting ' hani ze ▁wanhu ▁hamwe , ▁niza weng ' ha ▁mazi .”
▁Lameki ▁kakala ▁na ▁wake ▁waidi , ▁imwe ▁ka tangigwa ▁Ada ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ka tangigwa ▁Zi la .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kam kumbuka ▁Laheli ▁na ▁kahulika ▁chiya pulile , ▁ivo ▁kamtenda ▁ya dahe ▁kupata ▁wana .
▁Lelo ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁chi togoligwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁lelo ▁china ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁m gombela ji ▁wenu ▁siku ▁zose ▁makono ▁yake ▁ya ▁hasi ▁yenu , ▁muladi ▁yam tazeni . ▁Ka wawinga ▁wehi ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu , ▁na ▁ko walongela ni ▁muwa nange ▁wose .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁ka tenda ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁na ▁kalagiliza ▁damu ▁im izigwe ▁muna ▁zi nyivi , ▁muladi ▁M senga ▁wa ▁I fa ▁sekeya wakome ▁ welekwa ▁wa u de le ▁wa ▁Waisilaeli .
▁Mwiza de ng ' helela ▁dugila ▁ijo ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanenu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wenu ▁na ▁Walawi ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁wachiwa ▁na ▁wagane ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu .

▁Uchanyha ▁yake ▁mwiza kwandika ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁vonda mwing ile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁isi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ iyawalaganile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Ka vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Yakobo ▁kawa tegeleza ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁kahita ▁Padani ▁Alamu .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga , ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁weza ▁kulawa ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁Yailo , ▁ija ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mndele ▁wako ▁kadanganika . ▁ Habali ▁ko gendelela ▁kum gaza ▁mfundiza ?”

▁M wa nahina ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Andeleya , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu ,
▁Mulungu ▁ka londa ▁chi di manye ▁lungilo ▁jake ▁dodi fisike ▁do ya londile ▁kudi tenda . ▁Ka no gezigwa ▁na ▁ka lamula ▁kudi tenda ▁mwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁vi yezile ▁bululu ▁da ▁Antiyokiya , ▁ni i hasanya ▁nayo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁kabananga .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemudumbe . ▁ Hiteni ▁muka walongela ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wahite ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya , ▁uko ▁weza niwona .”
▁Esau ▁kakala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Seili , ▁zina ▁dimwenga ▁da ▁Esau ▁ni ▁Edomu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ H u mu lu ka ▁hasi ▁uka msole ▁Haluni ▁ wize ▁nayo . ▁Mbali ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁sekewa lo ke ▁ imhaka ▁na ▁kwiza ▁kumwangu , ▁bule ivo ▁niza watagusa .”
▁one ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁yaha wona ▁muke ▁yanogile ▁mwa ▁wa fungwa ▁waja , ▁yaha nogelw a ▁nayo ▁na ▁ku londa ▁kumsola ,
▁Niza wawinga ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁viwo wing igwa ▁na ▁ma dondola .
▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁Esau , ▁“ Haidahika ▁bule , ▁one ▁kutogola ▁kuni hokela , ▁nokulamba ▁uni hokele ▁vitumetume ▁vangu . ▁Kweli ▁nod eng ' helela ▁ku kuwona ▁weye ▁fana ▁viya ▁ni wona ▁chihanga ▁cha ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁viu ni hokele ▁kwa ▁unovu .
▁ J o ho ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁na ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kufose ze la ▁ditwi ▁hagati , ▁najo ▁di zungulusil igwa ▁lukingilo ▁lu botigwe ▁muladi ▁sekei dege ke .
▁No mtogoza ni , ▁kwaviya ▁mo ni kumbuka ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁chinhu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁mafundizo ▁yoni weng ' hile .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁ yate ndi ligwe ▁ uza uza ▁da ▁ku honyigwa ▁miyaka ▁yake ▁i kala ▁i fosa ▁m alongo ▁mane .
▁Kuna ▁nzila ▁imwe ▁muhala ▁ya ▁ku kutenda ▁u ilegehe ▁na ▁chilaho ▁chako , ▁one ▁uha hita ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁na ▁waha ku lema , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁ku ilegeha .’
▁Vi zi fikile ▁siku ▁na ne , ▁wanahina ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁kaidi ▁mnyumba . ▁Tomasi ▁kakala ▁nawo . ▁N yi vi ▁zi kala ▁zi hi ndigwe , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁keza , ▁kema ▁hagati ▁yawo , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M kale ▁kwa ▁ Tindiwalo !”
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁nowalongela ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁yondaya mulole ▁muke , ▁na ▁kuno ▁komulonda , ▁iyo ▁kagona ▁nayo ▁muumoyo ▁wake .
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wowa kalile ▁wokwiza ▁na ▁kusegela , ▁m baka ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁hawa patile ▁bule ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kuja ▁ndiya . ▁Ivo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ C hite ni ▁chiidumwe ▁hanhu ▁heli bule ▁wanhu ▁muladi ▁muka humule ▁chidogo .”
▁Maabaho ▁walume ▁wose ▁wa ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁weza mtowa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁yadanganike . ▁Ivo ▁mwiza segeza ▁wihi ▁kumwenu . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁keza hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁na ▁keza dumba .
▁Vino ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁haya itogolela ▁na ▁chiyalongile ▁Mulungu ? ▁Si ivo ▁hata ▁chidogo ! ▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁ya lavigwe ▁Malagilizo ▁yoyo daha ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁ugima , ▁basi ▁chaha dahile ▁kutend igwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Malagilizo .
▁“ U tunhizo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁woya nogeligw e ▁nawo .”
▁One ▁mu mwing iza ▁ulungwana ▁mwana ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁muladi ▁sekem bene ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ha bali ▁mo ni hila ▁kwaviya ▁ni muhonya ▁munhu ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ?
▁Kwa viya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Makedoniya ▁na ▁Akaya ▁wa lamula ▁kulava ▁sadaka ▁zi wataze ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁ngayengaye ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Cho londeka ▁chiza hile ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ubala ▁seke wongezeke , ▁one ▁si ivo , ▁iha lawilila ▁ng ' hondo ▁weza ilumba ▁na ▁wehi ▁wetu ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁cheye ▁na ▁kusegela ▁mwiisi .”
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁ni wawona ▁ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁wolawa ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁wa t e lele ▁na ▁wanenehe ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kuja ▁mgina .
▁Chila ▁panzia ▁dizakuwa ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁mita ▁mbili .
▁Mwiza de ng ' helela ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mweye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanenu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wenu ▁na ▁Walawi ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁wachiwa ▁na ▁wagane ▁wowo kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁Tend eni ▁yano ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ha ▁kumtambikila ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁wa muwonela ▁migongo , ▁ mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ka gendelela ▁kui gesa ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Wa mwing ' ha ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁somba ▁yo kigwe .
▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa . ▁Ivo ▁kawa peta ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai .
▁Ni kala ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁nyingi ▁za ▁kulola ▁goya ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S hu fa mu ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Hu fa mu .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁sekemu tende ▁sang ' hano ▁yoyose , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Ku ilumba , ▁vondamu segeze ligwe ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanani ▁kukala ▁na ▁nzala . ▁Ivo ▁Abulamu ▁kahita ▁Misili ▁kukala ▁uko ▁fana ▁mgeni , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yo gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁Yuda , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁kafika . ▁Keza ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁ mize le ▁na ▁vi lungu . ▁Wakala ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁walala .
▁Ndugu ▁yangu , ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁u ning ' ha ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu ▁na ▁kuni gela ▁moyo ▁ng ' hani ! ▁Ku sangalaz a ▁ mizoyo ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁kwaviya ▁nhaguso ▁yondamu wataguse ▁wamwenga , ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mwiza tagusigwa ▁ivo , ▁na ▁ningo ▁yomu wa li ngila ▁wamwenga , ▁Mulungu ▁kezamuli ngila ni ▁na ▁ningo ▁iyo ▁iyo .
▁One ▁munhu ▁hadaha ▁kui languliza ▁kaye ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁kodaha ze ▁kulola ▁goya ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Mulungu ?
▁Niza tenda ▁weye ▁wii hile ▁na ▁muke ▁ija , ▁ulel o ▁wake ▁wii hile ▁na ▁ulel o ▁wako . ▁Y eye ▁kezaku ho nda ▁ditwi ▁jako , ▁Na ▁weye ▁kwiza mu lu ma ▁chi si gi n ho ▁chake .”
▁Mbali ▁wang ' onyo ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁migulu ▁mine ▁na ▁mabawa ▁wo tibusa ▁kumwenu .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu kome ▁gila di .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ka tenda ▁chiya ▁Mulungu ▁chiya mulondile ▁yatende , ▁cheye ▁wose ▁chi safyigwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lo ya u lavile ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁One ▁yahawa ▁muke , ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁shekel i ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁ya ▁hela .
▁Mbali ▁ija ▁munhu ▁yo lema ▁u tawala , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko mulema ▁Mulungu ▁ya wi kile , ▁nawo ▁wo tenda ▁ivo ▁weza tagusigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza ▁Kaini , ▁“ Ka kulihi ▁mdodo ▁wako ▁Abeli ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁si vimanyile ▁bule . ▁Vino ▁niye ▁ndole zi ▁wa ▁mdodo ▁wangu ?”
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza i zungulusil a ▁lukingilo ▁lw ili ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁sent imita ▁na ne .
▁Vi l umbe ▁ivo ▁kumwenu ▁vi ha . ▁Sekemu je ▁nyama ▁yawo ▁hebu ▁sekemu dalise ▁ mitufi ▁yawo ▁kwaviya ▁vo tibusa ▁kumwenu .
▁One ▁muha i londa ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza vimanya ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wanahina ▁wangu .”
▁Mu ke ▁ya soligwe ▁ko kuwa ▁ka fungigwa ▁lusita ▁lose ▁na ▁mulumake ▁yahawa ▁ngima , ▁ mbali ▁mulumake ▁yahadanganika , ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ka ilegeha ▁na ▁yahalonda ▁kodaha ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁yoyose , ▁ mbali ▁yawe ▁ muhuwila .
▁Na yo ▁keza kwima ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali , ▁yeye ▁keza mulongela ▁voyo londeka ▁kwa ▁uhumi zo ▁wa ▁U li mu ▁na ▁S u mi mu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Eleazali ▁keza walongoza ▁Yoshua ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zawo ▁zose .”
▁Mwene ▁ubananzi ▁kodaha ▁ku la n higwe ▁mibalati ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁ mbali ▁sekei fose ▁baho . ▁One ▁muha iyoha ▁baho ▁mo kuwa ▁mu mguma ▁chinyala ▁mkaya ▁mi ye n u .
▁Petili ▁kalonga , ▁“ Aka , ▁Mndewa ! ▁Si na kuja ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁hebu ▁hachi na safyigwa .”
▁“ Fan a ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁vi yawala hile ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁yeye ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁mabululu ▁makulu ▁na ▁yanogile ▁yaja ▁mweye ▁hamu ya ze ngile ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁ko gendelela ▁kulonga ▁nawo , ▁lusita ▁ulo u lo ▁Yuda , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁keza ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wene ▁ mize le ▁na ▁ma lungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Ivo ▁chochose ▁cho mu tenda , ▁iwe ▁kuja ▁hebu ▁kung ' wa , ▁ tende ni ▁yano ▁yose ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁mose ▁ni ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁ni ▁chilung o ▁cha ▁lukuli ▁ulo .
▁Muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁yaja ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁vo safyigwa ▁na ▁damu , ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wo lekeleligwa ▁one ▁damu ▁i he ti ka .
▁Yam ha ▁vinogile ▁mafundizo ▁yaja ▁ya ▁kweli ▁yoni ku fundize , ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁Iviya ▁kwiza chi tengenezel a ▁ichi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁muna ▁zi mhembe ▁mbili ▁za ▁chi fuko ▁icho .
▁Niza mulagusa ni ▁wa ▁kumdumba . ▁M d umbe ni ▁Mulungu , ▁yaha mala ▁kumkoma ▁munhu ▁kodaha ▁ku mwasa ▁jehanamu . ▁Nomulongelani , ▁ mdumbe ni ▁yeye !
▁“ Mbali ▁muni kwenhukila ▁na ▁mu nilongela , ▁‘ Leka ▁chi tume ▁walume ▁wachi longole le ▁muladi ▁wa ka i pelembe ▁isi , ▁m aabaho ▁wa bwele ▁na ▁wachi longele ▁nzila ▁inogile ▁kusondelela ▁na ▁mabululu ▁yonda chi ya fike ▁uko .’
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lola ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁uhele ▁muna ▁imbende ▁hebu ▁havi ngile ▁mgati ▁ya ▁mbende , ▁basi ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake , ▁nayo ▁keza kwela .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁yose ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wa nde wa , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁na ▁wa ▁kudumbiza , ▁ha lola ▁chihanga ▁cha ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁ha hokela ▁lu s h wa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁hano , ▁na ▁haswa ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma .
▁ Nolonda ▁muni fu nyi le ▁umoyo ▁chidogo ▁hata ▁one ▁niye ▁na ▁mbozi , ▁mu tenda ▁ivo ▁mu mala .
▁kwaviya ▁ muleka ▁kuni tegeleza ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni . ▁Ha ja ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁ho walongele le ▁kuson hela ▁niye ▁kuja ▁Meliba . ▁Hamu nitendile ▁fana ▁yelile ▁haulongozi ▁wawo ▁viwa londile ▁weng ' higwe ▁mazi .” ▁Meliba ▁ni ▁nzasa ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ili ▁Kadeshi ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁sambi , ▁hwiza tangigwa ▁Abulamu ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁kwiza tangigwa ▁Bulahimu , ▁kwaviya ▁ni kutenda ▁uwe ▁tata ▁wa ▁makabila ▁mengi .
▁Yam hi sa ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁na ▁uwe ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku sagula ▁kutenda ▁yanogile . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁ha watendile ▁ivo ▁bule , ▁ivo ▁wa u bananga ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo .
▁Haluni ▁ka ika ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁haulongozi . ▁Ka msola ▁luti ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu , ▁ka mchinja ▁na ▁ku mulava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁fana ▁viyatendile ▁kwa ▁ija ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁Muna ▁di ta mbi ▁kuna ▁nhungo ▁nhatu ▁zili ngile ▁fana ▁ma tu mba ▁na ▁maluw a ▁yo tangigwa ▁ a li mo ndi , ▁muna ▁di ta mbi ▁di sondelela ▁kuna ▁ tu mba ▁jake ▁na ▁luwa ▁jake . ▁M atambi ▁yose ▁sita ▁yawe ▁fana ▁ivo .
▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁ngano ▁na ▁ s ha yi li ▁na ▁mizabibu ▁na ▁m iti ni ▁na ▁mi komamanga ▁na ▁mizaituni ▁na ▁u ki ,
▁Sekemu je ▁nyama ▁m bisi ▁hebu ▁i to go sigwe , ▁ mbali ▁yo londeka ▁yo kigwe ▁yose , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ditwi ▁na ▁migulu ▁na ▁nyama ▁zake ▁za ▁mgati .
▁“ Di longele ▁bululu ▁da ▁Sayuni , ▁‘ Lola ▁mfalume ▁wako ▁kokwiza , ▁muhole ▁na ▁ka kwela ▁chihongwe , ▁mwana ▁chihongwe .’ ▁”
▁Chilo chi lo , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁walala ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁bala za ▁jose , ▁wa itogolela ▁kumgala ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁Pilato . ▁Ivo ▁wa nda za ▁wa ngala ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁Pilato .
▁Ndams ileni ▁U li ba no , ▁msang ' hani ▁wetu ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Chilisito , ▁iviya ▁ndams ileni ▁mulondwa ▁wangu ▁Si ta ki si .
▁Chila ▁hanhu ▁ho mu iting ' hana ▁kutambika ▁no londa ▁walume ▁wowo tenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁wenu le ▁makono ▁yawo ▁yelile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁ludoko ▁hebu ▁ubishi .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁lusita ▁ulo , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Yosefu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kai temela ▁mate ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mmisili ▁iyo ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho yakalile ▁nacho ▁na ▁migunda ▁yake .
▁“ One ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁waha gomba , ▁waha hita ▁ku hu mizigwa ▁kuna ▁ichitala , ▁imwe ▁ko woneka ▁kuwa ▁ka bule ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ko tagusigwa .
▁Mana ▁ni vimanya ▁vimwili ▁wa a si ▁na ▁vimwili ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala . ▁One ▁mu muleka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁ning ' hali ▁mgima ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁izakuwa ze ▁niha danganika ?
▁“ Wapete ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Melali ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Wa wa p a p iza ▁mbahasha ▁zawo ▁vihongwe , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁wasegela .
▁Mwiza kuja ▁na ▁kwi guta , ▁mwiza mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁isi ▁inogile ▁iya mwing ' hileni .
▁Viya fosile ▁yayo , ▁kasegela ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁uli ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁Beseli , ▁ka simika ▁hema ▁jake ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Beseli ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zua ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁ A yi ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua . ▁Baho ▁iviya ▁kam zengela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁lupango ▁na ▁ka mtambikila .
▁Mulungu ▁heza muwonela ▁ubazi ▁bule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁hawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁wamwenga . ▁Mbali ▁ubazi ▁wo huma ▁nhaguso .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Wa mwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁ni ▁Eliya .” ▁Na ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁ni ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ya linga ne ▁na ▁wala gula ▁wa ▁umwaka .”
▁Ze nga ▁safina ▁kwa ▁ma banzi ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁midala . ▁Go la ▁vi hele to ▁na ▁uha ke ▁ tula si ▁kunze ▁na ▁mgati .
▁Wing u ▁diya ▁vidi kala me ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁nyingi , ▁Waisilaili ▁wa muhulika ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁hawa segele .
▁Sekemu m duwile ▁m s u wa ma gutwi ▁hebu ▁sekemu mwikile ▁ng ' wa lo ▁munhu ▁chipofu , ▁ mbali ▁m umdumbe ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁“ Mwaha tosa , ▁sekemuwe ▁fana ▁viya ▁wa delenya ! ▁Wawo ▁wo londa ▁kwima ▁na ▁kutosa ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁na ▁muna ▁zinzila ▁mhanda ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wawa lole . ▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁wawo ▁wa hokela ▁wa mala ▁gweko ▁jawo .
▁W eye ▁mwenyewo ▁kwiza kala ▁miyaka ▁mingi , ▁m aabaho ▁kwiza danganika ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁ku wandigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Habali ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁keza kuwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ?
▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mu komboligwa ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁uhuwilo . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁hai lawa ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu .
▁Sila ha ▁zo chi itowe la ▁muna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁si ▁za ▁chi isi . ▁Mbali ▁silaha ▁zetu ▁ni ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wou daha ▁ku bananga ▁mhongono ▁za ▁wehi . ▁Cho bananga ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁uvwizi ,
▁No kwandikila ▁weye ▁Tito , ▁mwanangu ▁kweli ▁muna ▁uhuwilo . ▁No ku londe la ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu .
▁Vino ▁ha mmanyile ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁muhavu ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁kumwenu ▁yadanganike ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁wa komboligwe ?”
▁Yosefu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Di no ▁ni i jo ▁fambulo ▁jake : ▁Vi gelo ▁vitatu ▁ni ▁siku ▁nhatu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hadaha ▁kuikombola , ▁iza sigala ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁ija ▁ya gulile ▁m baka ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza . ▁Muna ▁umwaka ▁uwo , ▁isi ▁iyo ▁yo londeka ▁ ile kigwe ▁na ▁ku bwelezigwa ▁kwa ▁ija ▁ya chuuzi le , ▁nayo ▁keza bwela ▁isi ▁yake .
▁Tend eni ▁vino ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁ubananzi ▁sekeya komigwe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yondaya mwing ' heni ▁kuwa ▁yenu , ▁muladi ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁kukoma .
▁“ M n he gele ze , ▁Ha kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyo handa ▁kahita ▁ku miza ▁mbeyu .
▁Maabaho ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ L usita ▁luno ▁niza mtogoza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .” ▁Ka mtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yuda , ▁m aabaho ▁Leya ▁ka leka ▁ kweleka .
▁Muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ndilo ▁ng ' hulu , ▁ndilo ▁yake ▁ha inalawilila ▁hebu ▁haiza lawilila ▁kaidi .
▁Kwa viya ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yenu ▁vo londa ▁yaja ▁yo lemigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko londa ▁yaja ▁yo lemigwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁wano ▁waidi ▁hawa ilumba , ▁ivo ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yaha languliza ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁hamwiza tenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cho mulonda ▁muhala .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ka mu hulumukila ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁fana ▁lwa ▁nziwa . ▁Di zi ▁di huli kigwa ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁mwanangu , ▁nyachende ▁wangu . ▁Ni nogeligw e ▁na ▁weye .”
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁Musa ▁wiidumwe ▁u kwenhuke ▁habehi ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wayago ▁sekewa kwenhuke ▁habehi . ▁Wa nhu ▁seke we ze ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye .”
▁M weye ▁wazinzi ! ▁Vino ▁hamu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁mbwiya ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁ni ▁mwihi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ? ▁Wa nhu ▁wowo londa ▁kuwa ▁mbwiya ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁va ▁isi ▁ni ▁mwihi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁kakala ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁ko son a ▁ma he ma ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Kwa ▁lagilizo ▁ijo , ▁uhasanyi ▁u la m sa ▁chila ▁ku me lela ▁mate ▁kwi hile ▁kwi li ▁mgati ▁mmwangu . ▁One ▁ habule ▁malagilizo , ▁uhasanyi ▁u fa .
▁Iviya ▁Mulungu ▁ka tagusa ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁kwa ▁kuya ta ka miza ▁ ti ki ti ki ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁na ▁yayo ▁kaya tenda ▁masimwe ▁ya ▁chondachi wa lawilile ▁wanhu ▁wo mwihila ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁ku chilongela ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako , ▁‘ One ▁ha mwi zile ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁imdodo ▁siza muhokela ni ▁bule .’
▁“ Hamwande , ▁Lazalo ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka soligwa ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁m baka ▁mwii mha mba ga ▁ya ▁Bulahimu . ▁T ajili ▁ija ▁nayo ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka wandigwa .
▁No tenda ▁yayo ▁yose ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁muladi ▁ni pate ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁bala ka ▁zake .
▁Nomulambani , ▁sekemu fe ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁manhesa ▁yoni ya pata ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁yayo ▁ya ni pata ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁yayo ▁ni ▁utunhizo ▁wenu .
▁Mu walongele za ▁nhaguso ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁ iwawo ▁hawa watendele ▁udugi .
▁Lelo ▁nolonga ▁vino , ▁muleke ni ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ya langulize ▁ugima ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁hamwiza sondelela ▁kaidi ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yenu .
▁Yano ▁yayo ▁malagilizo ▁kwa ▁mulume ▁yo lawa ▁ufila ▁na ▁yo lawa ▁shahawa ▁na ▁kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wa dumba ▁ngalawa ▁sekeya nga me ▁muna ▁yamabwe , ▁ivo ▁wa humulus a ▁na nga ▁nne ▁kuna ▁i chisogo ▁cha ▁ingalawa , ▁na ▁wa tosa ▁u c he ▁hima ▁hima .
▁Keza weka ▁ng ' hondolo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁luti ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kumoso .
▁“ B a si ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁chiwa hume ▁Ogu ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁chi wakoma ▁wose , ▁ha sigale ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yawe ▁mgima .
▁Wa tenda ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chi lemba ▁chelile ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁na ▁ku cho la ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁fana ▁viwa cho lile ▁mu huli , ▁“ Yeli le ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa nda za ▁nzabi , ▁m aabaho ▁wamsola ▁na ▁wa ngala ▁kwa ▁Pilato ▁ya kalile ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁Loma .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamtenda ▁Yesu ▁ya zilibuke ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike , ▁ka mkombola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁usungu ▁wa ▁ifa ▁kwaviya ▁haidahik e ▁bule ▁ifa ▁ku mfunga .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁weli ▁wana ▁wa ▁Lawi ▁wa kwenhuke ▁kuulongozi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kawasagula ▁wa msang ' hanile ▁na ▁ku temela ▁mate ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku lamula ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁Agilipa ▁kamulongela ▁Paulo , ▁“ Sambi ▁kodaha ▁kui gombela ▁mwenyewo .” ▁Baho ▁Paulo ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁kai gombela , ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga ,
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁ mwabule ▁haki li ? ▁Hamu vimanyile ▁bule ? ▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁chochi mwing ila ▁munhu ▁kulawa ▁kunze ▁chochi mtenda ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁One ▁ko togola ▁chihite ▁nayo ▁mdodo ▁wetu , ▁chiza hita ▁kuku gulila ▁ndiya .
▁“ Leka mana ▁nowalongela , ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ha nga i ko , ▁viya ▁vondamu kale ▁kuno ▁molonga , ▁mo ja ▁choni ▁na ▁mo ng ' wa ▁choni ▁na ▁iviya ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁mu yawale ▁choni , ▁vino ▁ugima ▁ni ▁kuja ▁muhala ? ▁Na ▁lukuli ▁ni ▁ku yawala ▁muhala ? ▁Vino ▁viwalo ▁vinoga ▁kufosa ▁lukuli ▁na ▁lukuli ▁kufosa ▁viwalo ?
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁siza ihangany a ▁muna ▁u wi hi ▁wawo , ▁ Siza ihangany a ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wawo , ▁Kwa viya ▁muna ▁u l udoko ▁lwa wo ▁wa mkoma ▁munhu , ▁Chi u tu ndu ▁wawo ▁wa kanha ▁u mu ge ▁wa ▁ng ' ombe .
▁Ya tawale ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁na ▁kuvi gola ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁na ▁ziza . ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁vinoga .
▁“ Munhu ▁yaha komigwa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁one ▁hamu mmanyile ▁yelihi ▁ya mkomile ,
▁uko ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yaholole ▁umkono . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁haja ▁wowa londile ▁kumgeza ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁ya banange , ▁ivo ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁vinoga ▁ku muhonya ▁munhu ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .”
▁“ ▁‘ Niza mwing ' hani ▁tindiwalo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kugona ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁chochose . ▁Niza wawinga ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁na ▁isi ▁yenu ▁haiza kuwa ▁na ▁ng ' hondo .
▁Vi nhu ▁vose ▁viyeli navo ▁Tata ▁ni ▁vangu . ▁Leka mana ▁ni mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁Muhe ▁keza mulongelani ▁yaja ▁yoya patile ▁kumwangu .”
▁M olondeka ▁kudi segeza ▁lusu ▁da ▁umwaka ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁ b o ng e ▁da ▁sambi ▁dili ▁hadi na gumigw a ▁lusu ▁fana ▁vimu londeka ▁kuwa , ▁kwaviya ▁Chilisito ▁ka lavigwa ▁fana ▁mwana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁Pasaka .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁Yosefu . ▁Vino ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima ?” ▁Mbali ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wadumba ▁m baka ▁hawa dahile ▁ kwidika ▁bule .
▁na ▁chi g wi sa ▁chila ▁ching ' hwaso ▁cha ▁magoda ▁chi kigwe ▁kwa ▁kui lema ▁umanyi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Cho sola ▁m agesa ▁yose ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kuyatenda ▁ya mtegeleze ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa ja ▁iwanhu ▁viwa m fikile ▁Yesu , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kachi tuma ▁chi ku uze , ▁‘ Vino ▁weye ▁niiyo ▁ija ▁yoyalongile ▁Yohana ▁kezakwiza , ▁hebu ▁chi n gozele ▁munhu ▁imwenga ?’ ▁”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁ko fosa , ▁kamuwona ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁chipofu ▁kuson gela ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwake .
▁ B umbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁weli ▁uko ▁Babeli , ▁dodi saguligwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁womulamsani , ▁Maliki ▁mwanangu ▁kweli ▁muna ▁uhuwilo .
▁Kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁mauzauza ▁na ▁mawewedek a ▁na ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile . ▁Kwa ▁kugenda ▁kwangu ▁kulawa ▁Yelusalemu ▁m baka ▁I lu li ko , ▁ni mala ▁kui gong ' onda ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa viya ▁novimanya ▁lungilo ▁jenu ▁dino ga ▁da ▁ku taza , ▁na ▁niye ▁no igoda ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Makedoniya , ▁nilonga , ▁“ Wa huwila ▁wa ▁Akaya ▁wa isasala ▁ku taza ▁kuson gela ▁mwaka ▁u fosile .” ▁Vino ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha ▁kwenu ▁muwa kong ' hela ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁ku taza ▁iviya .
▁Yakobo ▁kasegela ▁Belisheba ▁na ▁kuhita ▁Halani .
▁Chi vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yano ga ▁one ▁yaha sang ' haniligwa ▁fana ▁viilondeka .
▁W eye ▁ko iwona ▁fana ▁weye ▁ni ▁mulangulizi ▁vipofu ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁diziza ,
▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize .
▁na ▁ku mulongele za ▁mbuli ▁za ▁chinyala ▁na ▁ka mulonga ▁vihile , ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ni msola ▁muke ▁ino ▁na ▁vini mbandame , ▁si wonile ▁um ha m b e ▁wake ,’
▁M wa nahina ▁imwenga ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ teng ' hu ▁ni leke ▁ni hite ▁ni ka mu wa nde ▁ tati ▁yangu .”
▁“ Na ▁mweye ▁mu yi lole . ▁Mwiza gwiligwa ▁na ▁kugal igwa ▁kwii chi ta la . ▁Mwiza towigwa ▁mwii ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela . ▁Mwiza galigw a ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁watawala ▁na ▁wafalume ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu , ▁muladi ▁mu walongele ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Na ▁kanilongela , ▁“ I tendeka . ▁Niye ▁ A lu fa ▁na ▁ O me ga , ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁wa ▁uhelelo . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁mwene ▁ng ' hilu ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa ▁bule ▁fana ▁chitumetume ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁inzasa ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ugima .
▁Mo yo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ukala ▁u ng ' hali ▁mdala , ▁halondile ▁kuwa tegeleza , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile .
▁Ivo ▁weza mtambikila ni ▁kwa ▁ulondo ▁mwingi , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁unovu ▁mkulu ▁uya mwing ' hileni ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kasegela ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁ka mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chondachi dalise ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁chi zakuwa ▁chela . ▁Wa lo ▁jojose ▁di ha la galil igwa ▁na ▁damu ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁do londeka ▁di fu wi gwa ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni sondelele , ▁wa leke ▁wowadanganike ▁wawa wa nde ▁wowadanganike ▁wawo .”
▁Wa galigw a ▁na ▁wahuwila , ▁na ▁viwa kalile ▁wohita ▁kufose la ▁F o i ni ke ▁na ▁Samaliya , ▁wawalongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kukomboligwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁iwa de ng ' hele za ▁ng ' hani ▁wahuwila ▁wose .
▁Na ▁chino ▁ni icho ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo ▁choya chi la gane , ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁U tali ▁wa ▁chi fuko ▁icho ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁vi kala ▁voi linga , ▁utali ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili , ▁ugala mu ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili , ▁nacho ▁chi ku n ji gwa .
▁Mbali ▁u ng ' hali ▁kowa lagusa ▁udugi ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁na ▁hu walekela ▁wa segele .
▁Kwa viya ▁chowa kumbuka ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁viya ▁vimu sang ' hana ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁vomu i gaza ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ulondo ▁wenu , ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwenu ▁ko ku galigwe ▁na ▁lolelo ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁chandusilo ▁chimwenga ▁chochi daha ▁ku ze ng wa , ▁Mulungu ▁ko mwika ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁fana ▁chandusilo .
▁I mi to o to ndo ▁na ni ▁Yesu ▁ka soligwa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Kayafa ▁na ▁kugal igwa ▁mwii m ho ngo no ▁ya ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁Loma . ▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Chiyahudi ▁ha wengile ▁mwii m ho ngo no , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa londile ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka .
▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁waha komeleza ▁ku ha gubika ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose , ▁wahawa ▁wa isasala ▁kwa ndusa ▁mwanza , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Kohasi ▁weza kwiza ▁na ▁kuvi papa . ▁Wawo ▁hawa londeka ▁kwa mha ▁vi a ▁ivo ▁velile , ▁bule ivo ▁wezadanganika . ▁Iyo ▁niiyo ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Kohasi ▁chila ▁lusita ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁vidi ha mizigwa .
▁Iviya ▁wo sagula ▁vi goda ▁va ▁kuulongozi ▁mwii ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela , ▁na ▁kukala ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁kuna ▁yamadugila .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemu m go me . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mauzauza ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu ▁na ▁kuno ▁ko ni longa ▁vihile .
▁No lolela ▁ku kuwona ▁sambi ▁na ▁niza longa ▁na ▁weye ▁mulomo ▁kwa ▁mulomo .
▁Ivo ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha tangigwa ▁T a bela , ▁kwaviya ▁moto ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ka ▁hagati ▁yawo .
▁Baho ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Yudeya ▁wa kimbilile ▁kui mili ma , ▁na ▁weli ▁mgati ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁wa lawe ▁kunze , ▁na ▁wose ▁weli ▁m mi gunda ▁seke wengile ▁muna di bulul u .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁vini zile ▁kumwenu ▁si m pete leni ▁usenga ▁ukweli ▁wou fisike ▁kuson hela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zozi londeka ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Di lawilile ▁bu ng ' hulo ” ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁di lawilila .
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yoya ya manyile ▁yanogile ▁yoyo londeka ▁kutenda ▁ mbali ▁haya tenda , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka sang ' hana ▁uhasanyi .
▁One ▁uha mwa zima ▁nyambenyambe ▁kodaha ▁ku mulonda ▁ya ku lihe ▁nyingi ▁kufosa ▁chiu mwing ' hile , ▁ mbali ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁sekeu mulonde ▁ya ku lihe ▁nyingi ▁kufosa ▁chiu mwing ' hile . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁kezaku temela ▁mate ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zako ▁zose ▁zo nda usang ' hane ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yonda u hite ▁ku ihazi .
▁“ Wa nhu ▁wonda weke ▁malago ▁yawo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁weza kuwa ▁hana ▁ ib e nde la ▁ya ▁Yuda . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wawo ▁kakala ▁Nashoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Aminadabu ,
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza vabik a ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁muna ▁idamu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kuya haka ▁yam ahembe ▁ya ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko . ▁Da mu ▁isigale ▁keza itila ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chi kalilo ▁cha ▁ulupango .
▁Vino ▁ mba la ▁ka kulihi ? ▁Hebu ▁mfundiza ▁ka kulihi ? ▁Na yo ▁galu ▁wa ▁ubishi ▁wa ▁lusita ▁luno ▁ka kulihi ? ▁Mulungu ▁ka utenda ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁kuwa ▁ubozi !
▁Wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Long a ▁na ▁cheye ▁weye ▁mwenyewo , ▁chiza ku tegeleza . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁sekeya longe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁bule ivo ▁chiza danganika .”
▁Lawi ▁kenuka , ▁ka leka ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁kamsondelela .
▁Ivo ▁muha mala ▁kuisafya ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁kuu tegeleza ▁ukweli ▁m baka ▁kuu vi kila ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁uli bule ▁udelenya , ▁iyo heni ▁kui londa ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁umwe .
▁mwanage ▁chaudele ▁ka tangigwa ▁U si ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁ B u si ▁na ▁Ke mu eli ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Alamu ,
▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁L a me se si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁S uko si .
▁Musa ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ni kala ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo , ▁fana ▁vi nitendile ▁mwanduso . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani tegeleza ▁na ▁katogola ▁kuwa ▁heza m nanga ni ▁bule .
▁Iviya ▁wa ndusa ▁ku ibishil a ▁yelihi ▁keza kuwa ▁mkulu ▁mwa ▁ iwawo ▁wose .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kani gala ▁kudibwilingu ▁chimuhe . ▁Uko ▁ni wona ▁mwanamke ▁yoya kalile ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ dung ' hu , ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁ ja ndikigwa ▁mazina ▁ya ▁ku muliga ▁Mulungu ▁chila ▁hanhu , ▁na ▁di kala ▁na ▁matwi ▁saba ▁na ▁ mhembe ▁longo .
▁Kwiza zi vu nga nyi za ▁fana ▁walo , ▁navo ▁viza ha mbu ligwa ▁fana ▁viwalo ▁Mbali ▁weye ▁siku ▁zose ▁hu ha mbu ligwa ▁bule , ▁Ugima ▁wako ▁wo kuwa ▁wabule ▁uhelelo .”
▁Mbali ▁mbwiya ▁zangu , ▁hata ▁one ▁cholonga ▁vino , ▁cho vimanya ▁kweli ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁mwa mu na ▁zinzila ▁zi ngile ▁ng ' hani ▁zozi wa languliza ▁kuna ▁ulopozi .
▁“ ▁‘ M kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mgala ▁im wanamke ▁habehi ▁na ▁ku mwi miza ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Zi gale ▁fimbo ▁izo ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuzi ka ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁hanhu ▁ho ni iting ' hana ▁na ▁weye .
▁nawo ▁weza kuwa ▁lukuli ▁lumwe .’ ▁Ivo ▁wawo ▁si ▁waidi ▁kaidi , ▁ila ▁lukuli ▁lumwe .
▁Keza mchinja ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁damu ▁na ▁ku muhaka ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yo safyigwa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ gutwi ▁jake ▁da ▁kulume ▁na ▁muna ▁di dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁ dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mgulu ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume .
▁Iviya ▁halondile ▁bule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya mulongele ▁mbuli ▁za ▁munhu , ▁kwaviya ▁kavimanya ▁yaja ▁yeli ▁mwiimizoyo .
▁Yosefu ▁kai longoza ▁na ▁Nikodemo , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya hitile ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁ichilo ▁baho ▁umwaka . ▁Nikodemo ▁kakala ▁ya galile ▁mavuta ▁vi baba ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁ya ti b wi li zigwe ▁na ▁mane ma ne ▁na ▁ubani .
▁Mu lole si ▁kawasola ▁m baka ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Yosefu . ▁Ka weng ' ha ▁mazi ▁wana we ▁nhende , ▁na ▁kawa dima ▁vihongwe ▁wawo .
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁nawo ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa fika ▁mudibululu ▁da ▁Besisaida , ▁wanhu ▁we mwenga ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁munhu ▁chipofu ▁na ▁wamulamba ▁ya n dalise .
▁Nompul a ▁Mndewa ▁ya i langulize ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁wo mwing ' higwe ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁mo i bu nza ▁na ▁kui tendela ▁yehile , ▁na ▁mo watendela ▁yano ▁ndugu ▁zenu .
▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁kwiza mwing ' ha ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo , ▁nawo ▁weza vi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁kuni lavila ▁nhambiko ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako ▁weye ▁cha mu na ▁uzidilwa ▁wa ▁ifa ▁lusita ▁lose . ▁Chi wa ▁fana ▁viya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wowo galigw a ▁kuchi igwa .”
▁Yesu ▁kafika ▁kwa ▁Saimoni ▁Petili . ▁Saimoni ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁weye ▁kwiza ni n ava ▁magulu ▁yangu ?”
▁Wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waidi ▁wafika ▁Sodoma ▁ichigulogulo , ▁Lutu ▁kakala ▁ya kalile ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dibululu . ▁Viya wa wone , ▁kahita ▁kuwa ho hela ▁na ▁kuwa tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi .
▁Maabaho ▁ni di wona ▁ng ' onyo ▁dimwenga , ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi , ▁najo ▁di kala ▁na ▁ mhembe ▁mbili ▁fana ▁ mhembe ▁za ▁mwanang ' hondolo , ▁di longa ▁fana ▁nhulanyika .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mwele zi ▁na ▁tambi ▁da ▁hisopo ▁na ▁ s ufu ▁ndu ng ' hu , ▁kezavi guma ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uwo .
▁Cho kumbuka ▁somba ▁wochi dile ▁Misili ▁ bila ▁kuliha , ▁na ▁yaja ▁ma tanga ▁na ▁ma ti ki ti ▁na ▁vi tu ng u u ▁va ▁mayani ▁na ▁vi tu ng u u ▁na ▁vi tu ng u u ▁ sa u mu .
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁mazi ▁ya kala ▁yang ' hali ▁ya i gubika ▁isi ▁yose , ▁nziwa ▁ha patile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwima ▁bule . ▁Ka bwela ▁kwa ▁Nuhu ▁kuna ▁isafina , ▁Nuhu ▁kau golosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁kamsola ▁na ▁ku mbweleza ▁muna ▁isafina .
▁Sekemu lawe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁m baka ▁siku ▁zenu ▁za ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁zi fose . ▁ Siku ▁za ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁zizakuwa ▁saba .
▁Waisilaili ▁vi wawonile ▁udahi ▁mkulu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uya laguse ▁kwa ▁Wamisili , ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mdumba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa muhuwila ▁yeye ▁na ▁Musa ▁msang ' hani ▁wake .
▁Niye ▁no i lavila ▁ukalangama ▁mwenyewo , ▁na ▁Tata ▁yoyanitumile ▁iviya ▁ko ni lavila ▁ukalangama .”
▁Kwiza mchinja ▁na ▁kusola ▁damu ▁chidogo ▁na ▁ku muhaka ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁hasi ▁ha ▁magutwi ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume ▁na ▁muna ▁yama dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mi ko no ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume ▁na ▁ma dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁migulu ▁yawo ▁ya ▁ukulu me . ▁Da mu ▁yondai sigale ▁kwiza lu mizil a ▁ulupango ▁ banzi ▁zake ▁zose ▁nne .
▁Haluni ▁keza kwingila ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁yaha gala ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁ko ni tanga ▁niye ▁yanogile ? ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yanogile ▁ila ▁Mulungu ▁muhala .
▁Ugima ▁iyo ▁viya lawilile ▁cheye ▁chi muwona ▁na ▁cho mulavila ▁ukalangama ▁na ▁kuwa gong ' onde la ni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ugima ▁iyo ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁yoya kalile ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁na ▁yoya lagusigwe ▁kumwetu .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁zina ▁jako ▁Yakobo , ▁ mbali ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁kwiza tangigwa ▁Isilaili .” ▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁Isilaili .
▁Mfalume ▁ka vula ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁na ▁luzabi ▁chili ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁chake ▁muna ▁ichi dole ▁chake , ▁na ▁kachi guma ▁muna ▁ichi dole ▁cha ▁Yosefu . ▁Ka mu ya wa li za ▁walo ▁da ▁m go lole ▁na ▁ku mvaz a ▁m ku fu ▁wa ▁zahabu ▁mwii isi ngo ▁yake .
▁One ▁mo muhuwila ▁Musa , ▁mu hani huwile ▁na ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ka z andika ▁mbuli ▁zangu .
▁Ivo ▁ni lamula , ▁sekeni ze ▁kumwenu ▁kaidi ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁usungu .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza zenga ▁luwa ▁na ▁ku tumbik a ▁panzia ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwake .
▁One ▁Mwana ▁yaha mtenda ni ▁mwi ilegehe , ▁mwiza ilegeha ▁kweli ▁kweli .
▁“ Ni hulika ▁kulongelela ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Walongele , ▁‘ N g uku ▁zikwingila ▁wezakuja ▁nyama ▁na ▁imitondo ▁wezakuja ▁magate . ▁Baho ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .’ ▁”
▁Yosefu ▁viya la mu ke ▁muna ▁zi n ho ngo , ▁kamsola ▁Maliya ▁fana ▁viya ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁viyamulongele ▁yatende .
▁wose ▁waidi ▁mwiza wa lava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu ▁na ▁muwa towe ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁wadanganike . ▁Mu ke ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe ▁kwaviya ▁ha gutil e ▁ng ' hondo ▁ku pula ▁ya ta zigwe , ▁inga wa ▁kakala ▁muna ▁dibululu . ▁Na ▁mulume ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe ▁kwaviya ▁ka mguma ▁chinyala ▁muke ▁wa ▁miyage . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁mwiza segeza ▁wihi ▁uno ▁vimwili .
▁“ One ▁hamu mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁hebu ▁one ▁hamu zindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yose ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁zose ▁zo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo , ▁mwiza p a ti gwa ▁na ▁ma duwilo ▁yano ▁yose ,
▁Mulungu ▁hachi sagule ▁muladi ▁chi ga ye ▁na ▁ludoko ▁lwake , ▁ mbali ▁chiu pate ▁ukombola ▁kufose la ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Yesu ▁viya wonile ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo , ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yahololile , ▁“ Mwanangu , ▁ku segezigwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wako .”
▁“ Mwenevale ▁ka mtogoza ▁mulangulizi ▁ija ▁m vwizi ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁vinhu ▁kwa ▁ubala . ▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁yose ▁wana ▁ubala ▁muna ▁uku tenda ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁kufosa ▁wana ▁weli ▁mudi bu ng ' hulo .”
▁Vini gesile ▁ivo , ▁si kalile ▁na ▁m pango ▁ivo ▁nikala ▁fana ▁viya ▁munhu ▁ya li bule ▁ gesa . ▁Vini panga ▁si tenda ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁ wi mi lo ▁fana ▁munhu ▁kolonga ▁“ o na , ▁ o na ” ▁na ▁“ a ka , ▁ a ka ” ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lumwe .
▁na ▁chitambala ▁chiya zi ng ili zi ligwe ▁Yesu ▁ ndi t wi . ▁Chi tambala ▁icho ▁hachi kalile ▁na ▁sanda ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁chi kala ▁chi ku igwa ▁hamgwazo ▁chiidumwe .
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁Waisilaili ▁kufose la ▁Musa ▁muna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁uli ▁ma lola ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko .
▁So mba ▁weli ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁wezaku fa ‚ ▁lwanda ▁lose ▁lwiza n ung ' ha ▁ vu ndo ▁na ▁Wamisili ▁wezakwi hi lwa ▁kung ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁ulo .’ ”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Habali ▁ko ni uza ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ? ▁Ya nogile ▁ni ▁imwe ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁waha londa ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ya mhilila ▁malagilizo .”
▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁ni ▁ya ▁kuhumula ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁sekeu tende ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowose , ▁weye ▁hebu ▁wanago ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike ▁hebu ▁watumwa ▁wako ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike ▁hebu ▁ng ' ombe ▁wako ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁wako ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁wako ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako . ▁Wa tumwa ▁wako ▁ wolondeka ▁wa humule ▁fana ▁weye .
▁Musa ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ U ko ▁Gileadi ▁ni weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Makili ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase .
▁Di v a i ▁ya ▁sambi ▁yo gumigw a ▁muna ▁mi fuko ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁sambi !
▁Wayahudi ▁wa ndusa ▁kulongelela ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁iyo ▁ndiya ▁yoi humuluk e ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .”
▁Ivo ▁wawo ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vose ▁wa gidimila ▁kuzimu . ▁Isi ▁iwa gubika , ▁wose ▁wadanganika .
▁Mu kumbuke ▁chi ni walongele , ▁‘ M tumwa ▁siyo ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁mwenevale ▁wake .’ ▁One ▁wanhu ▁woni gaza ▁niye , ▁iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁weza nga za ni . ▁One ▁wo yamha ▁Malagilizo ▁yangu ▁iviya ▁weza yamha ▁malagilizo ▁yenu .
▁Zi mhembe ▁ziya ▁mbili ▁za ▁m ikufu ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁wazi guma ▁muna ▁i vihindo ▁viya ▁vidi ▁na ▁wazi lumbiliza ▁na ▁ivi hande ▁viya ▁vidi ▁va ▁muna ▁ya mayega ▁ya ▁chizibawo , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kuulongozi .
▁Kwa viya ▁vino ▁vi tendeka ▁diyelo ▁kuna ▁ng ' hondo ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁weza chilongela ▁chi gala ▁ndwagi , ▁cha bule ▁chimu ▁chochose ▁cha ▁ndwagi ▁ino ▁na ▁hachi daha ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁yili ▁na ▁fambulo ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁vino . ▁Viyakomeleze ▁kulonga ▁vino , ▁kadi longela ▁ bumbila ▁di hite .
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁chiya ze ngile ▁chiha lungu la , ▁m aabaho ▁kezakw a giza ▁gweko ▁jake , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kezakomboligwa , ▁fana ▁ka ho ng ela ▁kufose la ▁ku umo to .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Kohasi ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo , ▁Amilamu ▁na ▁I s hali ▁na ▁Hebuloni ▁na ▁U zi eli .
▁Ivo ▁Yoshua ▁ka wahuma ▁Waamaleki ▁kwa ▁u panga .
▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kachilongela ▁sekechi je ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁uli ▁ha lu do n ho ▁hebu ▁kuu dalisa . ▁One ▁chaha tenda ▁ivo ▁chiza danganika .”
▁ Long eni ▁na ▁sang ' hane ni ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wondawa tagusigwe ▁kwa ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo chi tenda ▁chi ilegehe .
▁ Habali ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁ino ▁mwa li ▁wako ▁na ▁niye ▁ni msola ▁kuwa ▁muke ▁wangu ? ▁Lelo ▁ a yo ▁muke ▁wako , ▁m sole ▁na ▁m segele ▁hano .”
▁Mulungu ▁ka bule ▁ubagulo , ▁yeye ▁heza zimiza ▁ usang ' hano ▁wenu ▁womu sang ' hane ▁hebu ▁ulondo ▁womu laguse ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁na ▁mung ' hali ▁mo wataza .
▁Yano ▁yayo ▁malagilizo ▁yaja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili .
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Kolond a ▁choni ?” ▁I ma ma ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni kile ▁chilagano ▁kuwa ▁wano ▁wanangu ▁waidi ▁weza kala ▁ubanzi ▁wako ▁wa ▁kumoso ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wako ▁kulume ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wako .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u temele ▁mate ▁ludabwa ▁lwa wo ▁lose , ▁u zi togole ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zowo sang ' hana , ▁u bene ▁nguvu ▁za ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁nguvu ▁za ▁waja ▁wo wehila , ▁seke wenu ke ▁kaidi .’
▁Ni lekele ▁ni fose ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wako ▁wose ▁diyelo ▁ni gole ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁chila ▁mnyama ▁yeli ▁na ▁uzegenha ▁na ▁uzolizoli , ▁chila ▁mnyama ▁m titu ▁na ▁luti ▁weli ▁na ▁uzegenha ▁na ▁uzolizoli . ▁I jo ▁ni i jo ▁yombe ▁do ni londa .
▁ H engelehengele ▁diya ▁da ▁Efeso ▁vidi malile , ▁Paulo ▁kawatanga ▁hamwe ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowamsondelel e ▁kawa gangamiza ▁ imizoyo ▁na ▁ka walaga . ▁Ha mala ▁baho ▁kawaleka ▁na ▁kahita ▁Makedoniya .
▁na ▁ubishi ▁uli bule ▁uhelelo , ▁wou lawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁zi du ndik a ▁na ▁wabule ▁kaidi ▁ukweli . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wo gesa ▁kuwa ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku patila ▁vinhu ▁vingi .
▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁Malagilizo ▁kufose la ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁unovu ▁na ▁kweli ▁viza ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Na ▁ni muuza ▁mwenevale ▁wangu , ▁‘ One ▁yaha lema ▁kwiza ▁na ▁niye ?’
▁kwaviya ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi lagusigwe ▁cho woneka ▁ b wi lili . ▁Leka mana ▁i longigwa , ▁“ L a mu ka ▁weye ▁uku kila , ▁ zilibuka ▁kulawa ▁kowa danganike , ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁kezaku bu ng ' huli la .”
▁Pet a ▁ya ▁ bumbila ▁jake ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 5 7 , 4 00.
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁Yosefu ▁wakala ▁kwa ▁kui panga ▁haulongozi ▁wake ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ li ka ▁jawo . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁m baka ▁wa ▁uhelelo , ▁wakala ▁wo ilola ▁kwa ▁mwazanyo .
