▁M zum e ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁wanhu ▁wa i gole , ▁mu lamule ▁mo si ▁m aabaho ▁mu lamule ▁ p ili , ▁m aabaho ▁muleke .
▁Ni ▁Lu ka ▁muhala ▁yeli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye . ▁M sole ▁Maliki ▁ye ze ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁kwaviya ▁kodaha ▁kuni taza ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wangu .
▁Ka mpula ▁Mulungu , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁Bulahimu , ▁diyelo ▁no londa ▁u fa ni ki we ▁na ▁u laguse ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .
▁Kwa viya ▁Malagilizo ▁yose ▁ya ▁Musa ▁yo fi ki zigwa ▁muna ▁di l agilizo ▁dino ▁dimwe , ▁“ Mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁ vu i londa ▁mwenyewo .”
▁“ B a ho ▁m tazi ▁vondayeze ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁tata ▁niiyo ▁muhe ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁iyo ▁keza longa ▁mbuli ▁zangu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya kwenhuke ▁habehi ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kezadanganika . ▁Vino ▁chiza danganika ▁chose ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Kwiza kuwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siku ▁zose ▁fana ▁viya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Melikizedeki .”
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo ilaha ▁kwa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ko ilaha ▁kwa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yake .
▁kuna ▁wehi ▁wengi , ▁ mbali ▁hachi lekigwa ▁chiidumwe ▁bule , ▁na ▁cho g wi sigwa , ▁ mbali ▁hachi banangigwa ▁bule .
▁Mulungu ▁kai fi ki zila ▁kumwetu ▁cheye , ▁iwa na ▁wawo ▁chilagano ▁icho ▁kwa ▁kum zilibula ▁Yesu , ▁fana ▁viya ndik i kwe ▁muna ▁I za bu li ▁yekaidi , ▁‘ W eye ▁iyo ▁mwanangu , ▁diyelo ▁niwa ▁ tati ▁yako .’
▁Kwa viya ▁usenga ▁umwaka ▁chi kala ▁wabozi ▁na ▁chi kala ▁hachi tegeleza ▁na ▁chi vwiziligwa ▁na ▁kuno ▁chi sang ' hanila ▁ku londa ▁yehile ▁na ▁madambwa ▁mbasakanyo . ▁Chi kala ▁muna ▁u wi hi ▁na ▁migongo ▁na ▁chi wehila ▁wanhu ▁nawo ▁wachi hila ▁cheye .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mulotezi ▁yoyose ▁yaha longa ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁hebu ▁yondaya geze ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁si mulongele ▁ya longe , ▁mulotezi ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .’
▁Iviya ▁uwa zum e ▁wabwanga ▁wawe ▁wa ▁kulinganya ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Maabaho ▁Wayahudi ▁walonga , ▁“ Loleni ▁viya mulondile !”
▁kwaviya ▁ha muhokele ▁Muhe ▁yo watenda ▁muwe ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁kudumba ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁ muhokela ▁Muhe ▁yo watenda ▁muwe ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁chi mulilila ▁Mulungu , ▁“ A ba ” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁Tata
▁ Tegelezeni , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁Lufyende ▁wowo itanga ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁ni ▁Wayahudi ▁ h umbe ▁wa vwizi , ▁nizawa tenda ▁weze ▁na ▁ku tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wako . ▁Weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no ku londa .
▁Basi ▁sekeu zimize ▁yaja ▁you ya hokele ▁na ▁viya ▁viu hulike , ▁uya sondelele ▁yayo ▁na ▁ku samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wako . ▁One ▁hu la m ke ▁bule ▁niza kwiza ▁fana ▁mbavi , ▁na ▁hwiza vimanya ▁ng ' o ▁lusita ▁vo onda ni ze ▁kumwako ▁kuku tagusa .
▁Leka mana ▁no kwandika ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁ni hawa ▁kutali ▁na ▁mweye , ▁muladi ▁vondanize ▁kumwenu ▁sekeni we ▁mkali ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁woya ning ' hile ▁Mndewa . ▁Kwa viya ▁udahi ▁uja ▁ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwa zenga ni , ▁si ▁kwa ▁kuwa bomola ni .
▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁i lawilila ▁miyanza ▁mitatu , ▁kuuhelelo ▁di go lole ▁di bwelezigwa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kuzilibuka , ▁vino ▁hamu somile ▁bule ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ,
▁wa mulava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dibu lu ▁na ▁wamtowa ▁na ▁mabwe . ▁Wa kalangama ▁weka ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁muladi ▁vi kalizi gwe ▁na ▁mbwanga ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwa ▁Sauli .
▁Na ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁ijo ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁mgane ▁yoya kalile ▁ko muhitila ▁msemi ▁iyo ▁ bila ▁ku fa mo yo ▁na ▁ku mulamba , ▁‘ Ni taze ▁ni pate ▁yoni londeka ▁kupata ▁kwa ▁mwihi ▁wangu .’
▁Vi lele ▁weza ▁na ▁wema ▁muna ▁i mitufi , ▁ mbali ▁Abulamu ▁ka wawinga .
▁Wamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁‘ Ch itendele ▁milungu ▁yonda ▁ichi longoze ▁muna ▁inzila , ▁kwaviya ▁hachi manyile ▁bule ▁chochi mulawilile ▁Musa , ▁yoya chi lavile ▁Misili .’
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai , ▁kachi lawilila ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Seili , ▁ka mwemwes a ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Palani . ▁Ka lawa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁maelufu ▁longo , ▁na ▁moto ▁wou kwaka ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume .
▁Musa ▁viyahulike ▁ivo ▁kakimbila , ▁kahita ▁kukala ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁M i diya ni , ▁uko ▁ka pata ▁wana ▁waidi .
▁“ I sila ili ▁ni ▁isi ▁ili bule ▁nzewele , ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wabule ▁ubala ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo .
▁Ivo ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i gendelela ▁ku pwililika . ▁Wa nahina ▁wongezeka ▁ng ' hani ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu , ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wengi ▁wa togola ▁uhuwilo .
▁ Mami ▁yake ▁kamulongela , ▁“ D u wi lo ▁jako ▁di mha t e ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁mwanangu ▁ tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁vini ku lagiliza , ▁na ▁ hita ▁uka ni galile ▁ wanaluti .”
▁Maabaho ▁kawa hu mu lila , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ H o ke leni ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Petili ▁na ▁waja ▁watumigwa ▁wamwenga ▁ wedika , ▁“ Ch olondeka ▁chi muhulike ▁Mulungu , ▁siyo ▁wanhu .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁sambi ▁sekeu ng ' we ▁mazi ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁u ng ' we ▁divai ▁chidogo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mu nda ▁wako , ▁kwaviya ▁matamu ▁yo ku pata ▁usenga ▁kwa ▁usenga .
▁kwa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwake ▁siku ▁zose !”
▁Vi i fose ▁mi e zi ▁mitatu , ▁cha ndusa ▁mwanza ▁kwa ▁ngalawa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁ A le ki sa nda li ya , ▁na ▁ya la ma ▁yake ▁ni , ▁“ Ndugu ▁M ba sa .” ▁I ngala wa ▁iyo ▁i kala ▁i gela ▁na nga ▁muna ▁ichisiwa ▁lusita ▁lwose ▁lwa ▁chihuhwe .
▁Vino ▁Muyahudi ▁kana ▁choni ▁chongezeke le ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ? ▁Vino ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ▁kuna ▁choni ▁cha ▁kuigodela ?
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamwamha ▁mkono ▁imwana ▁ija , ▁ka mtaza ▁kwi nuka , ▁nayo ▁kenuka .
▁Wa hita ▁kui sang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ija ▁hawa i manyile , ▁hebu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ha weng ' hile .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁one ▁hamu dile ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁na ▁kui ng ' wa ▁damu ▁yake , ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ugima ▁mgati ▁mmwenu .
▁Na ▁m kila ▁wake ▁ukulu la ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku za sa ▁mwiisi . ▁N hu la nyi ka ▁ dung ' hu ▁diya ▁ dima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mwanamke ▁ya i ba s ule ▁mwana , ▁muladi ▁yaha ibasula ▁yam me le ▁mwanage .
▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁chondachi la galil igwe ▁na ▁mtufi , ▁chiza kwa mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Ihaw a ▁tanuli ▁hebu ▁ ji ko , ▁cho londeka ▁chi benigw e , ▁vi zakuwa ▁va mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁viza gendelela ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kumwenu ,
▁D eng ' heleleni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wene ▁kude ng ' helela , ▁iviya ▁ lile ni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wene ▁kulila .
▁chimvuguya ▁muna ▁diwalo ▁na ▁muna ▁ikaye ,
▁Wo u ba sakany a ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁uvwizi , ▁wo tambika ▁na ▁kusang ' hanila ▁vinhu ▁viya umbile ▁Mulungu ▁ mbali ▁hawa mtambikila ▁Mu umba ji ▁mwenyewo , ▁yo londeka ▁yeng ' higwe ▁nhogolwa ▁siku ▁zose ! ▁Ivo .
▁Chi handa ▁mbeyu ▁ya ▁chimuhe ▁mgati ▁yenu . ▁Si ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁chiha gobola ▁vinhu ▁vovi londeka ▁kwa ▁chila ▁zuwa ▁kulawa ▁kumwenu .
▁“ Diyelo ▁m wima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mweye ▁wose ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁makabila ▁na ▁walala ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wenu ▁na ▁walume ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wo chuuza ▁nziwa , ▁“ S e geze ni ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁hano ! ▁ Habali ▁mo itenda ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁kuwa ▁ g uli lo ?”
▁Chila ▁siku ▁wa gendelela ▁kufundiza ▁na ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wanhu .
▁“ ▁‘ Ino ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁kwa ▁Mnazili , ▁fana ▁vichili ▁chilaho ▁chake . ▁Mbali ▁yaha daha ▁kulava ▁vinhu ▁vimwenga , ▁kolondeka ▁ku zindilila ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁Mnazili .’ ▁”
▁“ Mwaha tosa , ▁muleke ▁kulonga ▁chakachaka ▁fana ▁viwo tenda ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu , ▁wowo gesa ▁kuwa ▁milungu ▁yawo ▁yowa hulika ▁kwaviya ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁nhali .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha wona ▁uhele ▁hau galuke ▁na ▁upipi ▁m titu ▁wo ta ▁hanhu ▁baho , ▁basi ▁uhele ▁uwo ▁u hona . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kela . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁viyo mtuma ▁Mwanage ▁chaudele ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁kalonga , ▁Wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wose ▁ wolondeka ▁kumtambikila ▁mwanage .
▁Ndugu ▁viwa manyile ▁ imbuli ▁iyo ▁wamsola ▁Sauli ▁m baka ▁Kaisaliya ▁na ▁wa ngala ▁T a so .
▁Haluni ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Sekeu ni wonele ▁ludoko ▁niye ▁msang ' hani ▁wako . ▁Ku wamanya ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁viwa isasale ▁kutenda ▁yehile .
▁L o wandigwa ▁mwii hali ▁ya ▁chinyala ▁na ▁lo zilibuligwa ▁mwii hali ▁ya ▁utunhizo , ▁lo wandigwa ▁mwi hali ▁ya ▁unyondenyonde ▁na ▁lo zilibuligwa ▁na ▁ludabwa .
▁ J uma p ili ▁imitootondo ▁ng ' hani , ▁wanaake ▁wa sola ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁kun ung ' hila ▁yowa ya sasale , ▁wahita ▁kudileme .
▁Maabaho ▁wa mtemela ▁mate , ▁wa sola ▁diya ▁di balati ▁na ▁wamtowa ▁najo ▁muna ▁iditwi .
▁“ Tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁Waisilaili ! ▁ Diyelo ▁mo kwenhukila ▁ku loka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kusola ▁isi ▁ng ' hulu ▁ili ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁mweye . ▁M abululu ▁yake ▁ni ▁makulu ▁ya zengigw a ▁mhongono ▁m baka ▁kuulanga .
▁Yano ▁yayo ▁mazina ▁ya ▁walume ▁wondawa ku taze , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁Eli s uli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S he du eli ,
▁Yesu ▁viyamuwonile , ▁kamtanga , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mama , ▁ku honyigwa ▁utamu ▁wako !”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha mulola ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁kuwona ▁upipi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hau galuke ▁kuwa ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ha ha gi di mile ▁ mbali ▁ha fi la , ▁basi ▁keza mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Ka tanga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁‘ Tata ▁Bulahimu , ▁ni wonele ▁ubazi ! ▁M tume ▁Lazalo ▁ya vabik e ▁n ho nga ▁ya ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁muna ya ma zi , ▁ya lu ho ze ▁lulimi ▁lwangu , ▁kwaviya ▁no gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁muna umo to ▁uno !’
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vondamu mwin ule ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁mumsalaba , ▁baho ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Niye ▁Niiyo . ▁Iviya ▁mwiza manya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁si tenda ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁nolonga ▁chiya ni fundize ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁L e w u ▁viya mweleke ▁Se lu gi ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁saba , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Na ▁muke ▁wa ▁Potifa ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁chila ▁siku , ▁ mbali ▁Yosefu ▁ka lema ▁ku mbandama ▁na ▁hata ▁kuwa ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Mbali ▁si wona ▁ugima ▁wangu ▁kuwa ▁chinhu ▁bule , ▁ila ▁no londa ▁ku komeleza ▁sang ' hano ▁iya ning ' hile ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁ni itende , ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ku petela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁kowa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wa mtosele ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁kusondelela ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa !”
▁“ Muiteganye ! ▁M izo yo ▁yenu ▁sekei soligwe ▁na ▁ndiya ▁na ▁u melo , ▁ku patik a ▁na ▁ku gaiya ▁ugima ▁uno , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁ija ▁iza kwiza ▁kwa ▁ku we du ki za .
▁Kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu , ▁wa bota ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁kuval a ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁hanhu ▁helile . ▁Wa mson ela ▁Haluni ▁mawalo ▁yelile ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁“ L a ga no ▁jangu ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako ▁da bule ▁uhelelo . ▁Ivo ▁niza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wako .
▁P anzia ▁da ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁wa ▁ulwivi ▁dizakuwa ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁sita ▁na ▁nusu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mhanda ▁nhatu ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁vitatu .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁mami ▁yako ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁wa uko ▁kunze ▁wema ▁na ▁wo londa ▁kulonga ▁na ▁weye .
▁Za ndike ni ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁ya mhilile ▁zi nyivi ▁za ▁kaye ▁zenu ▁na ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ nyivi ▁zing ' hulu ,
▁Muhe ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁usenga ▁wa ▁ubala , ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ko kwing ' higwa ▁usenga ▁wa ▁umanyi ▁na ▁Muhe ▁iyo i yo .
▁Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁Nuhu ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Y e lekeni ▁na ▁m ongeze ke ▁na ▁mui memez e ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kamwidika ‚ ▁“ Mndewa , ▁no lamba ▁um tume ▁munhu ▁imwenga .”
▁Wa pulile ni ▁wafalume ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁ ulangulizi , ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁u hu p i ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kumdumba ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁unogile .
▁Mu ng ' hali ▁mo kwamha ▁siku ▁na ▁miyezi ▁na ▁m isi mu ▁na ▁miyaka !
▁M sang ' hani ▁ija ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁mfalume , ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁no lamba ▁uni fu nyi le ▁umoyo ▁na ▁niye ▁nizaku liha ▁chila ▁chinhu !’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yosefu , ▁nayo ▁ka tenda ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu . ▁Yosefu ▁kakala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁Mmisili .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁vimu ya wona ▁yano ▁yose ▁viyo tendeka , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁za habehi ▁ng ' hani .
▁Nolonga ▁kaidi ▁funhu ▁funhu , ▁chila ▁yo togola ▁ku gumigw a ▁ulungwana ▁kolondeka ▁kutegeleza ▁Malagilizo ▁yose ▁ya ▁Musa .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wawo . ▁Viya kalile ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁ija , ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁kawatum a ▁mbwiya ▁zake ▁wa kamulongele ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁seke wi gaze ▁kwiza ▁kuno , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁si faya ▁weye ▁ wingile ▁mwiikaye ▁yangu .
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁kuwa sasala ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁u tumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁muladi ▁kulu zenga ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Maabaho ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁chiza woneka ▁kuulanga , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yose ▁muna ▁isi ▁weza lila ▁vondawa muwone ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kokwiza ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁yamawingu ▁ya ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu .
▁Leka mana ▁ni wandikila ▁mweye ▁usenga ▁uwo , ▁kuwa ▁na heza ▁sekeni gum we ▁luholozi ▁na ▁iwa ja ▁ wolondeka ▁kuni sa m hu sa . ▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁na ha de ng ' helela ▁na ▁mweye ▁mose ▁iviya ▁mo de ng ' helela .
▁ Siku ▁na ne ▁kulawa ▁viyalongile ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁Yesu ▁kawasola ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁kahita ▁nawo ▁ku umulima ▁kutosa .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁ya ▁nhaguso , ▁nyang ' o ng we ▁kulawa ▁S he ba ▁keza kwima ▁na ▁kuwatagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁uno , ▁kwaviya ▁kalawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁kutali ▁na ▁keza ▁kutegeleza ▁mafundizo ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁Solomoni . ▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁hano ▁kuna ▁mkulu ▁kumfosa ▁Solomoni !
▁Si longa ▁ivo ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁no londa ▁chinhu , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ifunza ▁kude ng ' helela ▁vinhu ▁vini li ▁navo .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemu sole ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna u mwa nza ▁wenu . ▁Sekemu sole ▁mhome , ▁wala ▁ndiya , ▁wala ▁hela , ▁wala ▁viwalo ▁vidi .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁ka kwe sa ▁ng ' ho mbali , ▁kasegela ▁kwa ▁luholozi ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi .
▁Ka kala ▁kuna ▁dibwilingu ▁da ▁Palani , ▁mami ▁yake ▁ka msole la ▁muke ▁kulawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Iviya ▁ni iwona ▁si faya ▁leka mana ▁si zile ▁kumwako . ▁Mbali ▁ longa ▁mbuli ▁muhala , ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁keza hona .
▁Ma tunda ▁yose ▁ye vi le ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁va ▁mwanduso ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yawo ▁weza nigalila ▁niye , ▁yezakuwa ▁yako . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁muna ▁u lukolo ▁lwako ▁yeli ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁kodaha ▁kuja .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kumtendela ▁kuilumba ▁ija ▁yo safyigwa , ▁muladi ▁kum segeze la ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwake . ▁Maabaho ▁keza mchinja ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .
▁“ Munhu ▁yaha mwing ' ha ▁miyage ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁ya mulole ▁goya ▁na ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁yaha fa ▁hebu ▁yaha lu mila ▁hebu ▁yaha soligwa ▁ bila ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁kumuwona ,
▁Meso ▁ya ▁Yakobo ▁ya kala ▁haya lola ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁u la la . ▁Ivo ▁Yosefu ▁kawa kwenhus a ▁wanage ▁habehi ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁kawa ha gati la ▁na ▁kawa nonela .
▁Ka wawinga ▁kunze ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁makulu ▁yeli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁mweye , ▁muladi ▁ya mwing ' heni ▁zisi ▁zawo ▁zi we ▁uhazi ▁wenu ▁fana ▁viili ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Wa segela ▁M ose lo si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Be ne ▁Ya a ka ni .
▁Maabaho ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁i nhambiko ▁iyo ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁keza mulavila ▁mab ambala ▁yake ▁na ▁m kila ▁wose ▁uli ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁ya kanhigwe ▁habehi ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁um gong o sang o ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ,
▁Ni na ▁mbuli ▁nyingi ▁za ▁ku wandikila ni , ▁si londa ▁ku wandikila ni ▁ ta la ta si ▁na ▁ kala mu ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁no lolela ▁niza kwiza ▁kulonga ▁na ▁mweye ▁mulomo ▁kwa ▁mulomo , ▁muladi ▁chi memezigw e ▁de ng ' ho .
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁walondwa , ▁m gangamale , ▁sekemu ting isi ke , ▁mu iyohe ▁ng ' hani ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kwaviya ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁si ▁bule .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Lola ! ▁ Habali ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁wo tenda ▁chinhu ▁hachi londeka ▁kutend igwa ▁mwii ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ?”
▁kuwa ▁kezachi kombola ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wehi ▁wetu , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ ulu da b wa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo chi hila .
▁I l umbe ▁nawo , ▁i sa f ye ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁na ▁uwa li hile ▁muladi ▁wawe guligwe ▁m vili ▁zawo . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁zo wa longiligwe ▁kuku son hela ▁weye ▁za bule ▁fambulo ▁jojose , ▁na ▁kuwa ▁mwenyewo ▁u ng ' hali ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Nokulongela ▁Petili , ▁diyelo ▁nz ogolo ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwika ▁bule , ▁weye ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu ▁kuwa ▁hu ni manyile ▁bule .”
▁Kwa viya ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kumwenu , ▁sekemuje ▁nyama ▁yawo ▁hebu ▁sekemu dalise ▁ mitufi ▁yawo .
▁Wawo ▁woni tosela ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁wo fundiza ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁wolonga ▁ni ▁Malagilizo ▁yangu !’ ▁”
▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁zenu ▁za ▁kude ng ' helela ▁na ▁muna ▁yamadugila ▁yenu ▁ya pangigwe , ▁na ▁kwima ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mwezi , ▁mwiza towa ▁mhalati ▁izo ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁tindiwalo , ▁na zo ▁kumwenu ▁zizakuwa ▁lukumbuso ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .”
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁vondaya mu hu mu ze ni ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uku itowa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wowo m zunguluka ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iya mwing ' hileni ▁iwe ▁yenu ▁na ▁mukale ▁umo , ▁m olondeka ▁muwa nange ▁Waamaleki ▁wose ▁muladi ▁sekewa kumbukigw e ▁kaidi . ▁Sekemu zimize ▁kutenda ▁ivo .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Gelishoni ▁wakala ▁L ib i ni ▁na ▁S hi me i , ▁nawo ▁wakala ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa wo .
▁Yuda ▁viya segele ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Sambi ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza tunhizigwa , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁keza tunhizigwa ▁kufose la ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu .
▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁i manyika ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Yopa , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa muhuwila ▁Mndewa .
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno ▁ wolondeka ▁ku tagusigwa ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wose ▁kuson gela ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose ,
▁Vino ▁ku pekul a ▁vinhu ▁vangu ▁vose , ▁chinhu ▁chako ▁chi lihi ▁cho u chi patile ▁kumwangu ? ▁Chi ke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wa dahe ▁kulola ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁ku lamula ▁fana ▁imwe ▁wetu ▁kagolosa .
▁keza lagiliza ▁walo ▁ijo ▁di fu wigwe ▁na ▁di kigwe ▁hakwe ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁zimwenga .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni hulika ▁kuna ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁nyingi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola , ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁u ba sa nya .
▁Chila ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁Pilato ▁ko mulekelela ▁m fungwa ▁imwe .
▁M weye ▁vondamu we ▁muna ▁izisi ▁za ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁isi ▁iza de ng ' helela ▁siku ▁zake ▁za ▁kuhumula , ▁vondaiwe ▁mahame . ▁Isi ▁iza humula ▁na ▁kude ng ' helela .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyawalagilize . ▁Haluni ▁kenul a ▁uchanyha ▁mhome ▁yake ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake , ▁kaya towa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁Naili , ▁nayo ▁yose ▁ya galuka ▁kuwa ▁damu .
▁One ▁yaha potwa ▁kumtendela ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vitatu , ▁muke ▁ko segela ▁kwa ▁ku ilegeha ▁ bila ▁kuliha ▁chochose .
▁“ Kwiza tengenez a ▁ziga ▁dodi u mbigwe ▁kwa ▁shaba ▁da ▁kuna wila ▁dili ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁da ▁shaba , ▁u di ke ▁hagati ▁ya ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ulupango , ▁na ▁kudi guma ▁mazi ▁mgati ▁yake .
▁Fan a ▁Tata ▁viyo nimanya ▁na ▁niye ▁no mmanya ▁Tata , ▁na ▁no u lava ▁ugima ▁wangu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁Wa ndusa ▁ku mshitak a , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chi muwona ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ko wagiza ▁wanhu ▁wetu . ▁Kawa goma ▁kuliha ▁kodi ▁kwa ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁na ▁kulonga ▁yeye ▁ni ▁iyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mndewa .”
▁Lameki ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁midi , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁chilaho ▁ni ▁mnyama ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwanyama ▁wo yo laviligw a ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁chochose ▁chi lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chela .
▁Katenda ▁panzia ▁da ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe . ▁P anzia ▁ijo ▁di ha mbigwa ▁vinogile ▁kwa ▁vilumb e ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa songoligwe ▁na ▁fundi .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ha fu wile ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁ko ga , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihiliz igwe ▁kwa ▁wihi ▁wake .”
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa pwililisa ▁mwiisi ▁ija ▁yose , ▁wa ndusa ▁kuwa sola ▁watamu ▁muna ▁yama ko mwa ▁na ▁kuwa gala ▁hohose ▁ho wahulike ▁Yesu ▁ka baho .
▁Kanani ▁kakala ▁tata ▁wa ▁Sidoni , ▁mwanage ▁chaudele , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ka tangigwa ▁ H iti ,
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁kweli ▁no wona ▁ifa ▁chila ▁zuwa ! ▁Vino ▁voni igoda ▁kumwenu , ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁Nuhu ▁ka tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choya lagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M o ya wona ▁yano ▁yose ? ▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁ habule ▁hata ▁dibwe ▁dimwe ▁dondadi sigale ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁dimwenga , ▁chila ▁dibwe ▁diza la gazigwa ▁hasi .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uzidilwa ▁uchi li ▁nawo , ▁no gesa ▁vinoga ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁kukala ▁fana ▁viyeli .
▁Kwa viya ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁ni ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁kweli ▁na ▁damu ▁yangu ▁ni ▁ching ' waji ▁cha ▁kweli .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁hadi sili ze ▁ kombo ▁hebu ▁yaha himba ▁ kombo ▁na ▁sekeya di gubike , ▁m aabaho ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁ko du mbu kila ▁umo ,
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁chi mwidika , ▁‘ Ch eye ▁siyo ▁wapelembaji , ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁hachi longa ▁uvwizi .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wawa peta ▁Walawi ▁wose ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka bela ▁kaidi . ▁Hamwande ▁chidogo ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁haja ▁wamulongela ▁Petili ▁kaidi , ▁“ W eye ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wawo ▁kweli , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁weye ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁M galila ya .”
▁Chilisito ▁hanhu mile ▁kubatiza ▁bule . ▁Ka nhu ma ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁chiunhu , ▁muladi ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁ifa ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁muna ▁umsalaba ▁seke ku woneke ▁siyo ▁chinhu .
▁Mbali ▁muvimanye ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁Mwene kaye ▁one ▁ya vimanyile ▁lusita ▁lu yo kwiza ▁mbavi , ▁yaha kalile ▁meso , ▁sigambe ▁ya i leke ▁kaye ▁yake ▁i benigw e .
▁‘ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁kwa ndusa ▁kuni lagusa ▁niye ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ▁ukulu ▁wako ▁na ▁udahi ▁wako . ▁Kwa viya ▁kuna ▁m ulungu ▁yelihi ▁uko ▁kuulanga ▁hebu ▁hano ▁hana ▁iisi ▁yo daha ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁za ▁mwazanyo ▁fana ▁zo utendile ▁weye ?
▁“ Mwizagaya ▁mweye ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ! ▁Kwa viya ▁mu ifisa ▁m vugulil o ▁ya ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kuvi ma nyi la . ▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁ha mwing ila , ▁na ▁muwa lema ▁hata ▁waja ▁wowo londa ▁kwingila !”
▁ tati ▁yake ▁yaha hulika ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁chilagano ▁chiya ▁na ▁ha longa ▁chochose , ▁mndele ▁ija ▁keza fungigwa ▁na ▁chilaho ▁na ▁chilagano ▁choya chitendile .
▁na ▁ko nogelw a ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vidi . ▁Iviya ▁ya uko ▁mbasakanyo ▁hagati ▁ya ▁muke ▁hana soligwa ▁hebu ▁mhambe . ▁M wanamke ▁hana soligwa ▁ko sang ' hanila ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁ kwela ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁na ▁muhe ▁wake . ▁Mbali ▁muke ▁ya soligwe ▁ko sang ' hanila ▁mbuli ▁za ▁isi ▁ino , ▁kwaviya ▁ko londa ▁ku mnogeza ▁mulumake .
▁Ka sigala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁ku mtuma , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁mwanage ▁nyachende . ▁Kalonga , ▁‘ Ino ▁wa ▁uhelelo ▁weza mtegeleza , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁mwanangu .’
▁N igwa ▁hasi ▁na ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁do nilongela , ▁‘ S a uli , ▁Sauli ! ▁ Habali ▁ko ni gaza ?’
▁Sa gula ▁mulangulizi ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁muladi ▁wa ku taze ▁ku igola ▁isi .
▁Niza kutenda ▁uwe ▁kabila ▁kulu ▁na ▁nizakutemel a ▁mate ▁na ▁niza di tenda ▁zina ▁jako ▁di manyike ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁kwiza wa temela ▁mate ▁wamwenga .
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Wa longa ▁ukweli .
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondamu gezigwe , ▁no ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁mfalume , ▁hano ▁hamwiza ha lawa ▁m baka ▁mdodo ▁wenu ▁vondayeze ▁hano .
▁Mwenevale ▁wake ▁yaha mwing ' ha ▁muke ▁na ▁imuke ▁yaha mweleke la ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike , ▁basi ▁imuke ▁na ▁iwa na ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwenevale , ▁msang ' hani ▁iyo ▁keza segela ▁yaidumwe .
▁Vi wezile ▁hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁si kala me ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁isondelele ▁nikala ▁muna ▁ichitala ▁na ▁ku lagiliza ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ya galigwe ▁mgati .
▁“ U ha mwa zima ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁seke wingile ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁kusola ▁walo ▁kuwa ▁ le hani .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁mu ja ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁viwahulike ▁yayo , ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani .
▁Seke ya m kwenhukile ▁munhu ▁yadanganike ▁muladi ▁sekeya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁hata ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁yadanganike ▁ni ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake .
▁Walongele la ▁kwa ▁Musa , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chi ng ' he ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa .” ▁Musa ▁kawedika , ▁“ Habali ▁mo longelela ▁kumwangu ? ▁ Habali ▁mo m geza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ Niye ▁no londa ▁ubazi , ▁si londa ▁nhosa ▁bule .’ ▁One ▁mu vimanyile ▁fambulo ▁da ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁sigambe ▁mu wataguse ▁wanhu ▁weli bule ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Ka tumbik a ▁panzia ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mwenevale ▁keza mwika ▁msang ' hani ▁iyo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose .
▁Yesu ▁viya lu wonile ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁kawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wa le gele ▁na ▁kwii mwa ga , ▁fana ▁viya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁weli bule ▁m dimi .
▁na ▁L e seni ▁ili ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Ni na wi ▁na ▁Ka la , ▁bululu ▁dikulu .
▁ Habali ▁kochi wona ▁chi banzi ▁chili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁da ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁kuno ▁hu di wona ▁bule ▁ ba le ▁dili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁jako ?
▁ Siku ▁yetatu ▁na ▁yesaba , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza i safya ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁yaja ▁ya ▁kuisafya , ▁nayo ▁ko sa f yi ka . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁yaha leka ▁kuisafya ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁yetatu ▁na ▁yesaba , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁yang ' hali ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁ Mama ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁kulawa ▁damu ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁midi , ▁kamsondelela ▁Yesu ▁hachisogo , ▁kahita ▁na ▁ka dalisa ▁m hindo ▁ya ▁walo ▁jake .
▁“ Kwa ▁siku ▁sita ▁kwiza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zako , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁u humule , ▁muladi ▁ng ' ombe ▁wako ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁wako ▁iviya ▁wa humule , ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wo welekigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wa humule .
▁Wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza ▁wenyewo ▁yelihi ▁viweli ▁kezatenda ▁chinhu ▁icho .
▁Viwakalile ▁woja , ▁Yesu ▁kasola ▁gate , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁m aabaho ▁ka mo gola ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ H i ne ni ▁muje ▁wose , ▁luno ▁ulo ▁lukuli ▁lwangu .”
▁“ Chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁yonda wa ni lavile ▁Waisilaili , ▁yawe ▁wa ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁mnyama , ▁keza kuwa ▁wako . ▁Mbali ▁kolondeka ▁u wakombole ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wose ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁mnyama ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kolondeka ▁ya komboligwe .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Ka lava ▁vingi , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ngayengaye . ▁Uno vu ▁wake ▁wokala ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Hamwande ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁vonda zi mulawilile ni ▁na ▁muha pata ▁manhesa , ▁mwiza mu hindukila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁ku muhulika .
▁Wo londa ▁ku la m sigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁yama g uli lo , ▁na ▁wo londa ▁ku tangigwa ▁‘ Mfundiza ’ .
▁Hu chi galile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile , ▁hebu ▁hu ching ' hile ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁migunda , ▁na ▁migunda ▁ya ▁mizabibu , ▁vino ▁ko londa ▁kuwa tula ▁yameso ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁na ▁ku wavwizila ? ▁Ch eye ▁hachiza kwiza !”
▁Musa ▁kamtanga ▁Bezaleli ▁na ▁Oholi a bu ▁na ▁ma fu ndi ▁wamwenga ▁waja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya weng ' hile ▁udahi , ▁wowo londa ▁ku taza . ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁wa nduse ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulagusa ni ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁muladi ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁yaidumwe ▁na ▁ habule ▁imwenga .
▁Maabaho ▁kakala ▁mgane ▁m baka ▁ ichipi ndi ▁chiya ▁kakala ▁mulala ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁mine . ▁Na ▁chip indi ▁icho ▁chose ▁kakala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ko tambika ▁ichilo ▁na ▁imisi ▁kwa ▁ku funga ▁kuja ▁na ▁kutosa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wa londa ▁wa wakome ▁watumigwa .
▁Mu wataze ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vinhu ▁viwo londa ▁na ▁muwa hokele ▁wageni ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu .
▁Fan a ▁mi ye ▁no sang ' hanila ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mwene mba go ▁kulava ▁vinyamkela , ▁lelo ▁wanhu ▁wenu ▁wo lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Wa nhu ▁wenu ▁wawo ▁wondawa mtaguse ni .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza ▁wanhu ▁waja , ▁“ Chi lihi ▁chinogile ▁kutend igwa ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁hebu ▁kutenda ▁yehile ? ▁Ku u kombola ▁ugima ▁wa ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁kuu koma ?” ▁Mbali ▁hawa longile ▁chinhu .
▁Vi i kalile ▁ chigulogulo ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁juma , ▁wanahina ▁wakala ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁mwiikaye . ▁Zi nyivi ▁zi kala ▁zi hi ndigwe ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wowa dumba ▁vi langulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi . ▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁keza , ▁kema ▁hagati ▁yawo , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mu kale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo !”
▁Mbali ▁Isaka ▁ka mulonda ▁Esau , ▁kwaviya ▁kanogel wa ▁kuja ▁wanyama ▁woya wa komile ▁Esau , ▁ mbali ▁Lebeka ▁ka mulonda ▁Yakobo .
▁Lelo ▁loleni ▁ubazi ▁na ▁uka li ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Y eye ▁mkali ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wowa gwile , ▁ mbali ▁kanoga ▁kumwenu ▁one ▁muha gendelela ▁kukala ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wake , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁si ivo ▁bule , ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwiza kanhigwa .
▁Uko ▁mwiza kuja ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu , ▁mwiza de ng ' helela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho mu pata ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kamtemela ni ▁mate .
▁Chila ▁mbiki ▁wo manyika ▁kwa ▁matunda ▁yake . ▁Wa nhu ▁hawa ha ▁ma c hu ng wa ▁muna ▁imi wa , ▁wala ▁hawa ha ▁nhini ▁muna ▁imi wa ▁ya ▁m mba go .
▁Wa nyama ▁wose ▁wowo gendela ▁ma fu mba ▁inga wa ▁wana ▁magulu ▁mane , ▁kumwenu ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Y oyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁ mitufi ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁fana ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Lu gubul o ▁lwa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁niuwo ▁Yesu ▁woya goliligw e ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa la g u sila ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁yaja ▁yo londeka ▁kulawilila ▁himahima . ▁Chilisito ▁ka utenda ▁u manyike ▁kwa ▁ku mtuma ▁m senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Yohana ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ,
▁Labani ▁kamulava ▁Biliha ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike , ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁Laheli .
▁“ G e seni ▁ng ' hani ▁mbuli ▁zi lawilile ▁umwaka , ▁mbuli ▁zi lawilile ▁mweye ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna kwe lekigwa , ▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁ija ▁Mulungu ▁viya mu l umbile ▁munhu ▁muna ▁isi . ▁U ze ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁kulawa ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁m baka ▁umwenga , ▁fana ▁mbuli ▁za ▁mwazanyo ▁zili ngile ▁ivo ▁zi lawilila ▁hebu ▁ku hulikik a ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Maabaho ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁i mwizila ▁kaidi : ▁“ Ino ▁mtumwa ▁wako ▁Eliya za li ▁heza kuwa ▁muha zi ▁wako , ▁ mbali ▁mwanago ▁yonda u mweleke ▁mwenyewo ▁niiyo ▁yondaya we ▁muha zi ▁wako .”
▁Mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza fosa ▁kuwakoma ▁Wamisili , ▁one ▁yaha wona ▁damu ▁yoi ha kigwe ▁muna ▁im ibiki ▁ya mhilile ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁kaye ▁zenu , ▁keza fosa . ▁Wala ▁heza muleka ▁m da nga nyi ▁ yengile ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁na ▁kumkoma ni .
▁Hawa manyile ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ko walongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Tat i ▁yake .
▁Iviya ▁isi ▁iyo ▁yo manyika ▁fana ▁isi ▁ya ▁Walefai . ▁U mwaka ▁Walefai ▁wakala ▁uko , ▁ mbali ▁Waamoni ▁wa watanga ▁wawo ▁Wa za mu zum i .
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake , ▁kamwamha , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁mwene ▁uhuwilo ▁ndodo , ▁ha bali ▁muna ▁ma s haka ?”
▁Yakobo ▁ka gendelela ▁kukala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁hanhu ▁hoya kalile ▁ tati ▁yake ▁fana ▁mgeni .
▁Pilato ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Ha mbwe ▁weye ▁iyo ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Ona , ▁fana ▁weye ▁vou longile .”
▁Ku mtenda ▁yawe ▁mdodo ▁chidogo ▁kufosa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku mvaz a ▁kombelo ▁da ▁ukulu ▁na ▁hishima ,
▁Iviya ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Walawi ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁L ib i ni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Hebuloni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ma hi li ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Mu shi ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Kola . ▁Kohasi ▁kamwelek a ▁Amilamu .
▁Mbali ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁wowa lawile ▁Chipulo ▁na ▁Chilene ▁wahita ▁Antiyokiya , ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kulonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu .
▁“ ▁‘ Mwiza peta ▁ma j uma ▁saba ▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁i sondelela ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁siku ▁ija ▁yomu galile ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ch eye ▁ni ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu . ▁ Hachi na wahi ▁kuwa ▁watumwa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁yoyose . ▁Vi lihi ▁kwo chilongela ▁chiza ilegeha ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wo londa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kumgwila ▁Yesu . ▁Ivo ▁wa mulola ▁fana ▁keza muhonya ▁mwii ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁kam bela ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁ku ilaha , ▁“ Si mmanyile ▁bule ▁munhu ▁iyo !”
▁Wa ka li kile ▁hau mwing i ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wadumb e .
▁Maabaho ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁k andika ▁usenga ▁fana ▁vino .
▁Niye ▁no kulongela , ▁Petili , ▁weye ▁kwa lu we , ▁na ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁luwe ▁luno ▁niza zenga ▁kani sa ▁jangu ▁na ▁hata ▁nguvu ▁za ▁kuzimu ▁hazi za daha ▁kudi huma ▁bule .
▁Mbali ▁hai weng ila ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo ▁na ▁hai kala ▁bule , ▁ivo ▁manhesa ▁yaheza ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁usenga ▁uwo ▁wo hinduka ▁na ▁ku ileka ▁baho .
▁one ▁chiha u zigwa ▁diyelo ▁chinhu ▁chinogile ▁chi yate ndi ligwe ▁mbetembete ▁na ▁viya ▁viya honyigwe ,
▁M vula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁makulu ▁ng ' hani ▁ya za mile ▁chilo ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁chila ▁dimwe , ▁iwa to ny ela ▁wanhu . ▁Na wo ▁wa muliga ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ hulo ▁da ▁mvula ▁iyo ▁ya ▁mabwe , ▁kwaviya ▁ hulo ▁jake ▁di kala ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁viwa kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yelusalemu , ▁wafika ▁Be si fa ge ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Mizaituni . ▁Uko ▁Yesu ▁kawatum a ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁waidi ▁wa mu longole le .
▁I chigulogulo ▁cha ▁siku ▁ija , ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Chi kanhe ▁lwanda ▁chihite ▁umwambu .”
▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁ivo ▁viyalagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁‘ Soleni ▁lita ▁mbili ▁za ▁mana ▁na ▁mwii ke ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nyele si ▁zikwiza , ▁muladi ▁wa wone ▁ndiya ▁yoni muli si leni ▁kuichuwala ▁chip indi ▁chi ni mulavile ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .’ ▁”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa hulika ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁ivo ▁muna ▁u u lo nzi ▁wawo ▁wa u tanga ▁mgunda ▁uwo ▁ A ke li da na , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ M gunda ▁wa ▁damu .”
▁Lola ▁isi ▁ino ▁yose ▁haulongozi ▁wako , ▁chi i gole . ▁U ha hita ▁uku mo so ▁niye ▁niza hita ▁ukulu me , ▁hebu ▁uha hita ▁ukulu me ▁niye ▁niza hita ▁uku mo so .”
▁Kufos a ▁yayo ▁yose , ▁m olondeka ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁ku fambula ▁kwa ▁nzewele ▁zake ▁mwenyewo ▁usenga ▁wa ▁ ulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wili ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ka komeleza ▁chila ▁chiyalongile ▁umwaka ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wose , ▁kuwa ▁i londeka ▁Chilisito ▁wake ▁ya du n u n zigwe .
▁Zakaliya ▁ka pula ▁chi bawo ▁cha ▁ kwandikila , ▁m aabaho ▁k andika ▁vino , ▁“ Zin a ▁jake ▁Yohana .” ▁Wo se ▁wazanywa !
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁Wayahudi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁usenga ▁uno ▁ni ▁Chilisito , ▁yeli ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ubala ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa fosa ▁chi tu wo ▁cha ▁mwanduso ▁cha ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁ch e ▁kaidi , ▁m aabaho ▁wafika ▁muna ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁zuma ▁lwa ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dibululu . ▁L wi vi ▁luwa fungu kila ▁lwenyewo , ▁nawo ▁wa lawa ▁kunze . ▁Viwakalile ▁wang ' hali ▁wohita ▁muna ▁inzila ▁imwe , ▁baha ja ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁iyo ▁ka muleka ▁Petili .
▁Wa kalizi ▁wa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁viwa bwelile , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wawa uza , ▁“ Habali ▁hamu mgalile ?”
▁Iyo heni ▁m wize ▁lusita ▁chihuhwe ▁ching ' hali ▁hachi na fika . ▁ E u bu lo ▁na ▁Pu de ▁na ▁L i no ▁na ▁K ila u di a ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁w okulamsa .
▁Wa sindila ▁wawo ▁waidi ▁ni ▁mibiki ▁midi ▁ya ▁mizaituni ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vidi ▁va ▁kwikil a ▁vitasa ▁vi mile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁isi .
▁Mbali ▁viifikile ▁ichigulogulo , ▁Labani ▁kamulava ▁Leya ▁mwanage ▁imkulu ▁na ▁kumgala ▁kwa ▁Yakobo , ▁nayo ▁Yakobo ▁kagona ▁nayo .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁yoni longa ▁na ▁weye ▁niiyo .”
▁Chilo ▁chimwe ▁niye ▁na ▁yeye ▁chilo ta ▁nzozi , ▁na ▁chila ▁nzozi ▁i kala ▁na ▁fambulo ▁jake .
▁M senga ▁ija ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Bwel a ▁kwa ▁you msang ' hanila ▁uka mtegeleza .”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mama , ▁sekeu nilongele ▁cha ▁kutenda . ▁L usita ▁lwangu ▁lung ' hali ▁halunafika ▁bule .”
▁One ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁waha danganika ▁fana ▁viwo danganika ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ bila ▁kugazigwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁baho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ hani tu mile .
▁Kulaw a ▁ A tali ya , ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁ingalawa , ▁wabwela ▁Antiyokiya . ▁Ha nhu ▁howa p uli ligwe ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ija ▁yowa i komeleze ▁sambi .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁Bulahimu ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Fan a ▁hawa wahulike ▁Musa ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁haweza muhulika ▁hata ▁munhu ▁yaha zilibuka .’ ▁”
▁“ Vichi fikile ▁kuna ▁ichifungo , ▁chifika ▁ulwivi ▁lu hindigwa ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wose ▁wo kaliza ▁ulwivi . ▁Mbali ▁vichi fungu le ▁ulwivi , ▁ha chifikile ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mgati !”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kamsagula ▁Sila ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁viwa komeleze ▁ku mwika ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁kasegela .
▁I la m seni ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wo walamusa ni .
▁“ Habali ▁mo tenda ▁ivo ? ▁Ch eye ▁iviya ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁mweye . ▁Cho nga lila ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁muladi ▁muleke ▁mbuli ▁zili ▁si ▁chinhu ▁na ▁mu mu hindukile ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ugima , ▁ yalumbile ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁na ▁bahali ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo .
▁Yosefu ▁ka gula ▁sanda , ▁kalu hulumus a ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu , ▁kalu zingiliza ▁sanda ▁na ▁ka l wika ▁mwii di leme ▁di kalile ▁dodi songoligwe ▁mu ulu we . ▁Amalabaho ▁ka bimbilis a ▁dibwe ▁kulu ▁hamu lomo ▁ha ▁dileme .
▁Muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁muna ▁vi hele to ▁vingi , ▁one ▁si ivo , ▁na ha walongele ni . ▁No hita ▁kuwa sasalil a ▁hanhu ▁henu .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mu la hiza ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁“ One ▁hu gonile ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kui tenda ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁kuno ▁kuna ▁mu lu ma ko , ▁hwiza p a ti gwa ▁na ▁ duwilo ▁dodi galigw a ▁na ▁mazi ▁yano ▁yeli ▁usungu .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kawatanga ▁wakalizi ▁waidi , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa sasale ni ▁wakalizi ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁wowo kwela ▁falasi ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁weli ▁na ▁mi go ha ▁magan a ▁maidi , ▁na ▁mu isasale ▁kuhita ▁Kaisaliya ▁ing ' hali ▁kufika ▁saa ▁tatu ▁ichilo .
▁Wa fika ▁hanhu ▁ha tangigwe ▁Go li go ta , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ B o mbwe ▁da ▁Di t wi ” .
▁na ▁kamulongela ▁Efiloni ▁kuno ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo hulika , ▁“ U ni hulike ▁nokulamba , ▁niza gula ▁mgunda ▁wako , ▁nokulamba ▁ uhokele ▁maliho ▁yano , ▁ni dahe ▁kuwa wa nda ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jangu .”
▁“ Ivo ▁himahima ▁mu bwele ▁kwa ▁tata ▁na ▁mu mulongele ▁kuwa ▁vino ▁ivo ▁viyolonga ▁Yosefu ▁mwanago ; ▁‘ Mulungu ▁kani tenda ▁niwe ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁izo ▁kumwangu ▁ bila ▁kukala ma .
▁Ivo ▁chiya ▁cha ya lumbiliz e ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁sekeya chi gole .”
▁Niye ▁Paulo , ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁yochi mulole la .
▁Ka mha ▁lung o ▁lwa ▁ku b e t ela . ▁Keza duganya ▁ngano ▁na ▁kuika ▁mudi dung u , ▁ mbali ▁keza i lunguza ▁im hu mba ▁muna ▁umoto ▁hau zi mi ka ▁bule .”
▁Ni kala ▁na ▁nzala , ▁mu ning ' ha ▁ndiya , ▁nikala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu , ▁mu ning ' ha ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa , ▁nikala ▁mgeni , ▁muni hokela ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yenu ,
▁“ M weye ▁mo leka ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁mo wi nza ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁wanhu .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁ija ▁im wa nahina , ▁“ Lola , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁mami ▁yako .” ▁ Kuson gela ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁mwanahina ▁ija ▁kamsola ▁Maliya , ▁kakala ▁nayo ▁ukaye ▁yake .
▁mtufi ▁wake ▁sekeu le kigwe ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁ichilo ▁chose . ▁M olondeka ▁muu wa nde ▁siku ▁iyo ▁iyo , ▁kwaviya ▁munhu ▁ya tumbik igwe ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁ka duwiligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu itende ▁isi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁mu ihazi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba ▁mwiza lava ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁saba ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁longo ▁na ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ vu mwili ▁sekeya zahile ▁malond o ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁malond o ▁ya ▁wayage .
▁“ N yambenyambe ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁weza kuwa ▁uchanyha , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwiza kuwa ▁hasi .
▁Kweli ▁kavimanya ▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yose ▁yoya mu laganile .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo kwamha ▁mafundizo ▁yangu , ▁heza danganika ▁ng ' o !”
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ M weye ▁mwiza ni lavila ▁nhosa ▁zozi londeka ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lolu londeka , ▁ndiya ▁za ▁kutimbuligwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁zili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁kuni nogeza .’
▁Loleni ▁makono ▁na ▁magulu ▁yangu ▁m manye ▁iyo ▁niye . ▁N ya m heni ▁ muwone , ▁kwaviya ▁m zi mu ▁wabule ▁lukuli ▁wala ▁ma vu ha ▁fana ▁vomu niwona .”
▁ Mbwanga ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁midi , ▁wose ▁wahita ▁kuna didugila ▁ijo ▁viwa londeke ▁na ▁chihendo .
▁Meso ▁yawo ▁ya gumigw e ▁ziza ▁muladi ▁sekewa lole , ▁wawo ▁wo gaya ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Maabaho ▁niza u longela ▁moyo ▁wangu , ▁Lelo ▁ku navo ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁vingi ▁vo wi i kile ▁ngama ▁ya ▁kusang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁mingi . ▁Ivo ▁ humula ▁u je ▁na ▁u ng ' we ▁na ▁u de ng ' helele !’
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hamu wa lekele ▁wanhu ▁wihi ▁wawo , ▁iviya ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁heza mu lekelele ni ▁uhasanyi ▁womu tendile .
▁One ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ yekile ▁mgunda ▁wake ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁yahalonda ▁kuu kombola , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁na ▁yon geze le ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano ▁ha ▁bei ▁ya ▁mgunda ▁uwo , ▁m aabaho ▁wizakuwa ▁wake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wolawa ▁kumwetu ▁ mbali ▁hawa wile ▁wa ▁kumwetu , ▁kwaviya ▁one ▁wa wile ▁wa ▁kumwetu , ▁waha kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁ mbali ▁viwa chi le kile ▁i lagusa ▁kuwa ▁hawa wile ▁wa ▁kumwetu .
▁Maabaho ▁ka wafundiza , ▁“ Muna ▁yam aandiko ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Ka ye ▁yangu ▁iza ta ng wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁nhambiko , ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zi isi ▁zose .’ ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mui tenda ▁kuwa ▁mi na ▁ya ▁wa bavi ! .”
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁niza wehila ▁na ▁nizawa leka , ▁niza chi fisa ▁chihanga ▁changu , ▁weza na ng igwa . ▁Weza pata ▁yehile ▁mengi ▁na ▁manhesa ▁m baka ▁wa vimanye ▁kuwa ▁yayo ▁yose ▁yawa pata ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ hali ▁nawo .

▁Wa tagusa ▁wake ▁wema , ▁ mbali ▁hawa lavile ▁ma longele zo ▁yehile ▁fana ▁vini gesile .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁Labani , ▁“ L usita ▁lwangu ▁lufika , ▁ning ' he ▁muke ▁wangu .”
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁niha tosa ▁no ku kumbuka ▁weye ▁Fil imoni ▁na ▁no mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁wangu ,
▁“ B e n ja mi ni ▁ni ▁mbwizi ▁mkali . ▁I mitondo ▁koja ▁ma i ngo ▁yake ▁na ▁ichigulogulo ▁ko gola ▁viya ho kile .”
▁Yakobo ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁niye ▁no lamula ▁vino , ▁chi leke ▁kuwa gaza ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wowa mu hindukile ▁Mulungu .
▁M beyu ▁zozi la galile ▁muna i mi wa ▁zo lagusa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo hulika ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁viwo gendelela , ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yo mi ny igwa - mi ny igwa ▁na ▁ tabu ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁isi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁hawa lela ▁matunda ▁yoyose .
▁Fan a ▁mweye ▁muli ▁wehi ▁mo vimanya ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanenu ▁vinhu ▁vinogile , ▁vino ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁heza mwing ' hani ▁bule ▁vinhu ▁vimu mpula ▁wala ▁vinogile !
▁One ▁ha la za ▁ijo ▁di ha lawa ▁kuna ▁ichihanga , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kana ▁ha la za ▁muhala , ▁na ▁kela .
▁Mbali ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁honda vi kigwe ▁hasi ▁ya ▁u tawala ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁nayo ▁mwenyewo , ▁Mwana , ▁keza ika ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁hasi ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁yo yekile ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁hasi ▁yake , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁keza tawala ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁ng ' hani .
▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁kulawa ▁bululu ▁da ▁L a ma se si ▁wahita ▁S uko si . ▁Wakala ▁walume ▁ la ki ▁sita , ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana ▁hawa petigwe ▁bule .
▁Maabaho ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza ! ▁Cho londa ▁utende ▁mauzauza .”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ya ilumbile ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁ko kuwa ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁chimuhe .
▁Wa tumigwa ▁na ▁walala ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁muladi ▁walo nganye ▁m bu za ▁iyo .
▁Maabaho ▁kawedika , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁vimwili ▁ ihawa ▁mwanage ▁hebu ▁ng ' ombe ▁wake ▁ka du mbu kila ▁mwii chisima ▁muna isiku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁hadaha ▁ku mulava ?”
▁Lubeni ▁na ▁Simeoni ▁na ▁Lawi ▁na ▁Yuda ‚
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yaha di guma ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu , ▁mu wakome ▁kwa ▁zele ▁walume ▁wose .
▁Mana ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa igoda ▁kuwa ▁na ▁umanyi ▁uwo ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁na ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁wa giza ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo . ▁No wapulile ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Mami ▁yangu ▁ya lihi ? ▁Na ▁wandugu ▁zangu ▁wa lihi ?”
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁yo petigwa ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁kazilibuka , ▁vilihi ▁wamwenga ▁wenu ▁wolonga ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁haweza zilibuka ▁bule ?
▁“ U ha mwa zima ▁hela ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁hebu ▁ndiya ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chimwenga ▁chochose , ▁sekeu londe ▁ya ku lihe ▁nyingi ▁kufosa ▁chiya ▁chiu mwing ' hile .
▁Na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁Wa me la li ▁m ituka ▁mine ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁wa nane , ▁kwa ▁viili ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kupapa ▁vi a ▁va ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Isamali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni .
▁Vi bu ha ▁ngamiya ▁kwingila ▁muna i chi zonzo ▁cha ▁ sa nzi ya ▁kufosa ▁tajili ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa falume ▁wawo ▁wane ▁wa hu mile ▁wa sola ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁na ▁ndiya ▁zawo ▁zose , ▁m aabaho ▁wasegela .
▁Na wo ▁weza ilumba ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁weza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zose ▁za ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁yondaya ku kwenhukile .
▁Wa longiligwa ▁sekemu da nga nyi ze ▁mayani ▁ya ▁isi ▁wala ▁m me a ▁wowose ▁wala ▁mbiki ▁wowose , ▁ mbali ▁wawa gaze ▁wanhu ▁weli bule ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁mu huli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁vawo .
▁Filipo ▁kamwidika ▁Yesu , ▁“ M agate ▁ya ▁hela ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁hazi faya ▁bule ▁hata ▁ ihawa ▁chila ▁imwe ▁yaha pata ▁chi hande ▁chidodo ▁muhala !”
▁Musa ▁kawatum a ▁wanhu ▁kudi pelemba ▁bululu ▁da ▁Ya ze li . ▁Wa di sola ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi bulul u ▁vake ▁na ▁wa wawinga ▁Waamoli ▁wowa kalile ▁umo .
▁kwa ▁ kwela ▁na ▁ku woneka ▁munoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake , ▁siku ▁zose ▁ya ▁ugima ▁wetu .
▁Yesu ▁kaha segela ▁hanhu ▁haja , ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁vipofu ▁wamsondelela ▁na ▁kuno ▁wo landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ▁uchi wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁na ▁yawe ▁munhu ▁yo manyika ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁ yawale lile ▁wanage ▁vinogile ▁na ▁kuhokela ▁wageni ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁na ▁yawa sunh ile ▁magulu ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yawe ▁ko wataza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yawe ▁ko wataza ▁weli ▁na ▁uzidilwa ▁na ▁ya iyohe ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁Lelo ▁ hita ▁na ▁uka i zunguluke ▁isi ▁ija , ▁kwaviya ▁nizakwing ' ha .”
▁Mbali ▁chinyamkela ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Yesu ▁ni mmanya ▁na ▁Paulo ▁ni mmanya , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁wawo ▁welihi ?”
▁F i ne ha si ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Eleazali , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁viya wonile ▁ivo , ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kasegela ▁hana ▁um ting ' hano . ▁Ka sola ▁m go ha
▁Mbali ▁mweye , ▁hata ▁m vili ▁zili ▁muna ▁ya matwi ▁yenu ▁zi petigwa ▁zose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁wa hulika ▁yayo ▁na ▁ku gudemeka , ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁Fil isi ti ▁wengi lwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kudumbiza ▁chi wagalile ▁usungu .
▁Viwa hulike ▁yayo , ▁wose ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁walonga , ▁“ Ndugu ▁yetu ▁Paulo , ▁kodaha ▁kuwona ▁viya ▁Wayahudi ▁wengi ▁viwa wile ▁wahuwila , ▁na ▁viya ▁wose ▁viwo kwamha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa kalile ▁ o fosa ▁mwiinzila ▁wa ting i sa ▁matwi ▁yawo ▁na ▁ku muliga ▁Yesu , ▁walonga , ▁“ M we e ! ▁W eye ▁mwene ▁kui bena ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kui zenga ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu !
▁M ulume ▁yoyose ▁yaha mbandama ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwanage , ▁kweli ▁wose ▁waidi ▁ wolondeka ▁wa komigwe , ▁wa tenda ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁chilo zo , ▁woi tendela ▁wenyewo ▁wawe ▁na ▁ubananzi .
▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁kadi mo gola , ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ L u no ▁ulo ▁lukuli ▁lwangu , ▁lolu lavigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Tend eni ▁vino ▁kwa ▁kuni kumbuka ▁niye .”
▁Lola ▁diyelo ▁kuni wing a ▁muna ▁iisi ▁inogile ▁na ▁kuni segeza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ko . ▁Niza kuwa ▁na bule ▁uka zi ▁na ▁no we gela ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya ni wone ▁keza ni koma .”
▁L usita ▁luja ▁viwa mulongele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁Musa ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁Haluni ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁mitatu .
▁Cho mwandikilani ▁yano ▁muladi ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁yetu ▁i dahe ▁ku fi ki zigwa .
▁Hamwande ▁chidogo , ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe ▁di tangigwa ▁Na i ni . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁luwa sondelela .
▁Wa leka ▁kumtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁yo kala ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ mbali ▁wo tunhiza ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zili ngile ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wowo danganika ▁na ▁u dege ▁na ▁wanyama ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala .
▁Ivo ▁Shekemu ▁kamulongela ▁Hamoli ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁“ U ning ' he ▁mndele ▁ino ▁yawe ▁muke ▁wangu .”
▁Uko ▁kukala ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Za ka yo , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁tajili .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁yochi tende za ▁chinhu ▁icho ▁chi sa f y wigwe .
▁Na ▁kwa ▁ A fi ya ▁ lumbu ▁jetu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁Ali ki p o ▁mkalizi ▁miyetu ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wo iting ' hana ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka hinduka , ▁kawalola ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁na ▁ku mbwakila ▁Petili , ▁“ Segel a ▁kuchisogo ▁changu , ▁Lufyende ! ▁Kwa viya ▁m agesa ▁yako ▁siyo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ila ▁ya ▁chiunhu !”
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Lubeni , ▁“ Vino ▁mo londa ▁kukala ▁hano ▁lusita ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁Waisilaili ▁wohita ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ?
▁Ihaw a ▁chi ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁ku gumigw a ▁ulungwana ▁hebu ▁ku leka ▁ku gumigw a ▁ulungwana , ▁kwa bule ▁mana , ▁cha mana ▁ni ▁uhuwilo ▁yoi sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁ulondo .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Zakaliya ▁kakala ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kotenda ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁ya ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁fana ▁viya tenda ga ▁mwii ▁za mu ▁yake .
▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mtendile ▁Isaka ▁ya mdumbe , ▁one ▁sigambe ya we ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁wa hani wingile ▁mi ko no ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kaya wona ▁manhesa ▁yangu ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁yoni i tendile , ▁na ▁ichilo ▁chi fosile ▁ka ku bwakila .”
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁mulangulizi ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochi lemigwe ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kabananga .
▁Iviya ▁modaha ▁kuwa gula ▁watumwa ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁wokala ▁zisi ▁zili ▁habehi ▁yenu .
▁ Habali ▁cho ika ▁muna ▁ing ' hondo ▁cheye ▁wenyewo ▁chila ▁lusita ?
▁Ivo ▁kawalagiliza ▁wa batizigwe ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁Maabaho ▁wamulamba ▁ya kale ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁ndodo .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wasegela ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁Musa ▁ka mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yam segeze le ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁mabula ▁yayo ▁yoya mgalile .
▁na ▁Wa p a ti lusi ▁na ▁Wa ka s hu hi ▁na ▁Wa ka fi to li , ▁Wafilisiti ▁niiyo ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁Wa ka s hu hi .
▁m olondeka ▁mu gendelele ▁kukala ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁i gangamale , ▁fana ▁mwi kigwa ▁muna ▁i c ha ndusil o ▁na ▁muwa ▁wa gangamavu , ▁one ▁hamu hi ndu sigwe ▁na ▁ku leka ▁kui huwila ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yomu i hulike , ▁yoi petigwe ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose . ▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁iyo ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁usenga ▁uno .
▁Chi no ▁chi zakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kumwenu , ▁mwiza muwona ▁mwana ▁ching ' hele , ▁kaya wa zigwa ▁vi b we nde ▁ka ta mbali sigwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudi la ▁iwanyama .”
▁Sekemu kwele ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁heli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁Mwiza hu migwa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu .
▁Ka bwela ▁ukaye ▁yake . ▁Ka fundiza ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa muhulike ▁wazanywa , ▁wa i uza , ▁“ Vino ▁kau pata ▁kulihi ▁ubala ▁uno ▁na ▁mauzauza ▁yano ?”
▁Ka weng ' ha ▁sam uli ▁na ▁matombo ▁ya ▁wanyama , ▁ma fu ta ▁ya ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume , ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁na ▁luti . ▁Ka weng ' ha ▁uhemba ▁unogile ▁kufosa ▁umwenga ▁wose ▁na ▁divai ▁inogile ▁kufosa ▁zose ▁wang ' wa .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁chetu ▁wahita ▁kudileme , ▁nawo ▁wafika ▁fana ▁wanaake ▁waja ▁viwalo ngile . ▁Mbali ▁ha wamuwonile ▁Yesu ▁bule .”
▁Sekemu wa d umbe , ▁ mbali ▁mu kumbuke ▁chiya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chiya mtendile ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁Wamisili ▁wose .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Be la ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ali di ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Na a ma ni .
▁No mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁vo n geze ke ▁muna ▁uku mmanya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Yesu ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁M abululu ▁yayo ▁yose ▁ya kala ▁na ▁mhongono ▁nhali ▁zi kalile ▁na ▁ nyivi ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁m ha la li ng we . ▁Iviya ▁kukala ▁na ▁vi bulul u ▁vingi ▁vi kalile ▁va bule ▁mhongono .

▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ye nane ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana .
▁“ Mu ke ▁sekeya yawale ▁viwalo ▁va ▁chilume ▁na ▁mulume ▁sekeya yawale ▁viwalo ▁va ▁chike . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ko mwihila ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁zino .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ No ku tunhiza ▁Tata , ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁isi ▁na ▁ulanga ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁kuwa fisa ▁weli ▁na ▁nzewele ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁kuwa fu n u lila ▁wana ▁wadodo .
▁Ku i go lola ▁ go lola ▁lukuli ▁ko faya ▁chidogo , ▁ mbali ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁ko faya ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁kweli ▁yochi la ga ni la ▁ugima ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁sambi ▁na ▁ugima ▁u kwiza .

▁L usita ▁lose ▁cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Tata ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁vichi wa tosela ni ▁mweye ,
▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁woni tunhiza ▁kwa ▁mi lomo ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁ya ku tali ▁na ▁niye .
▁Yosefu ▁kamwidika ▁mfalume , ▁“ Si daha ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kezam fambulila ▁mfalume ▁vinogile .”

▁Yosefu ▁ka galil igwa ▁ndiya ▁yake ▁yaidumwe ▁mwii me za , ▁na ▁wandugu ▁zake ▁waidumwe . ▁Wamisili ▁wa dile ▁hamwe ▁iviya ▁wa igola ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁mwiko ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Waebulaniya .

▁Vino ▁mweye ▁modaha ze ▁kuwa ▁wabozi ▁ fa ni le ▁ivo ? ▁M weye ▁mwa ndusa ▁yose ▁kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁lelo ▁mo londa ▁ku komeleza ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁ l wenu ▁wenyewo ?
▁Labani ▁kawasola ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁kamsondelela ▁Yakobo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba . ▁Ka mfika ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Gileadi .
▁Mbali ▁u pinde ▁wake ▁u ng ' hali ▁u gangamala ▁Ma ko no ▁yake ▁ya na ▁udahi , ▁Kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁M dimi ▁na ▁luwe ▁lwa ▁Isilaili .
▁Yakobo ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Lelo ▁ nilongele ▁zina ▁jako .” ▁Mbali ▁yeye ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Habali ▁ko londa ▁ku manya ▁zina ▁jangu ?” ▁Maabaho ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁Yakobo .
▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wawalongela , ▁“ M uhavu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yaha chi komile ▁vichi kalile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kochi kalile ▁chi ja ▁nyama ▁na ▁magate ▁m baka ▁chi guta . ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu chi gala ▁kuno ▁kuichuwala ▁muladi ▁mu chi kome ▁chose ▁na ▁nzala .”
▁Mwiza igola ▁isi ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁mhiya ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁kaye ▁zenu , ▁kabila ▁kulu ▁wa pate ▁hanhu ▁ha kulu ▁na ▁kabila ▁ dodo ▁wa pate ▁hanhu ▁ha dodo .
▁Kwa ▁kuwa zeha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yawe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁one ▁niha muleke leni ▁muhite ▁na ▁wanenu . ▁Kweli ▁muna ▁lungilo ▁dihile ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu .
▁Zi si ku ▁izo ▁ing ' hali ▁ha inalawilila ▁ gombo , ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁woja ▁na ▁kung wa , ▁wo sola ▁na ▁kusoligwa ▁m baka ▁Nuhu ▁vi yengile ▁mwiisafina .

▁Kwa viya ▁Adamu ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kulumbigwa , ▁m aabaho ▁Hawa .

▁Na ▁one ▁mwo wa kwa zima ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁muhala ▁womuhuwila ▁weza wa lihe ni , ▁vino ▁mwiza hokela ▁unovu ▁u lihi ? ▁Hata ▁‘ we li ▁na ▁uhasanyi ’ ▁wowa kwa zima ▁wayawo ▁waha lolela ▁ku bwele zi ligwa ▁viya viya .
▁Ivo ▁siku ▁zose ▁no iyoha ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Maabaho ▁tama a ▁ihile ▁yaha kangala ▁yo lela ▁uhasanyi , ▁uhasanyi ▁uha kangala ▁wo lela ▁ifa .
▁Nikodemo ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zo dahika ze ?”
▁Wa no ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁Waholi , ▁L o ta ni ▁na ▁S ho bali ▁na ▁S ib e yo ni ▁na ▁Ana ,
▁M ting ' hano ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁Kadeshi ▁na ▁wafika ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi .
▁Yam heni ▁yaja ▁yomu i fu nzile ▁na ▁kuya hokela ▁kulawa ▁kumwangu , ▁mbuli ▁zi ni longile ▁na ▁kuzi tenda . ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁yo weng ' ha ▁tindiwalo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁keza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Yesu ▁ka vumbuka ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Betelehemu ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya , ▁chip indi ▁Helode ▁viyakalile ▁mfalume . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁nyam ilo to ▁wa ▁nhondo ▁wafika ▁Yelusalemu ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ,
▁Mbali ▁lung ' hali ▁kwiza ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁uhuwilo , ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ya chi tenda ▁chiwe ▁wa fungwa , ▁cho gozela ▁m baka ▁uhuwilo ▁ino ▁vonda i gubul igwe .
▁Ma kabila ▁ya ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Lubeni ▁wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiza tenda ▁fana ▁weye ▁mwenevale ▁wetu ▁vou chi lagiliza .
▁ Noilaha ▁kwa ▁uja ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁uli ▁mgati ▁yangu , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁chondachi dahe ▁kuni kimilila ▁kwi igodela ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁hohose ▁umo ▁isi ▁ya ▁Akaya .
▁Yesu ▁vi yengile ▁mwi kaye ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁vipofu ▁wamsondelela , ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mo huwila ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁nodaha ▁ku wahonya ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ona , ▁Mwenevale !”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoya ni ho nyi le ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Sol a ▁ lili ▁jako ▁uhite .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁ni ivo ▁i lawilila ▁kumwawo ▁sawa sa wa ▁na ▁simwe ▁diya ▁da ▁kweli ▁dodi longa , ▁“ I m b wa ▁kaya bwelela ▁ma de si ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ,” ▁na ▁dimwenga ▁dolonga ▁“ N gulu we ▁yo gezigwe ▁kabwela ▁kui bimbilis a ▁mwii n ho pe .”
▁Sekemu wa lihi zile ▁hebu ▁ku wehila ▁wayenu , ▁ mbali ▁muwa londe ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁fana ▁vomu i londa ▁wenyewo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezavi timbula ▁ivo ▁vose ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁fana ▁ndiya ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Munhu ▁ya i sa f yi le ▁keza ya zo la ▁maivu ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁na ▁kuya gala ▁hanhu ▁ha safyigwe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago , ▁yeza kwikigwa ▁goya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁kuwa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ku segeza ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko , ▁muladi ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi .
▁Musa ▁kelek igwa ▁siku ▁izo , ▁mwana ▁yanogile ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ke le ki ligwa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁kwa ▁miyezi ▁mitatu ,

▁Maabaho ▁keza msola ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku mulava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁na ▁kum timbula ▁kwa ▁moto ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya mtendile ▁ng ' ombe ▁ija ▁wa ▁mwanduso . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁ mbali ▁wa p u wa ▁cha ▁kutenda ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wo londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kumtegeleza .
▁Kwiza walongela ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁weza komboligwa , ▁kwa ▁ku se ge zi ligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .
▁“ Vichi kalile ▁kumulima ▁wa ▁Holebu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kachilongela , ▁‘ Mu kala ▁va ▁ku faya ▁hana ▁umulima ▁uno .
▁“ D u gila ▁vidi kalile ▁do gendelela , ▁ija ▁mbwanga ▁mkulu ▁kakala ▁kumgunda . ▁Viya kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁ikaye , ▁kahulika , ▁nyila ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo vi na .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Na ▁sekemu mwing ' he ▁nzila ▁Mwihi .
▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Yano ▁yose ▁nizakwing ' ha , ▁one ▁muhala ▁u hani tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁kuni tosela .”
▁kwaviya ▁ha wahulike ▁chiya ▁chochi longigwe , ▁“ One ▁hata ▁ ihawa ▁m ng ' onyo ▁yaha dalisa ▁ lugongo , ▁yo londeka ▁ yatowigwe ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁yadanganike .”
▁Maabaho ▁wose ▁waidi ▁wakwela ▁mwiingalawa ▁na ▁beho ▁ dima ▁hupi .
▁Iyo ▁niiyo ▁yokwiza ▁hachisogo ▁changu . ▁Niye ▁si faya ▁hata ▁kwi inama ▁na ▁ku fungula ▁nzabi ▁za ▁vilatu ▁vake .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁iisi ▁yonda ni weng ' he ▁welesi ▁wako .” ▁Maabaho ▁Abulamu ▁kam zengela ▁lupango ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoya mulawilile .
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁mwiza mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁ Siku ▁ye nane ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁M ting ' hano ▁uwo ▁we la , ▁siku ▁iyo ▁sekemu sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁vino ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁“ Ni kutenda ▁uwe ▁mfalume ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ino , ▁muladi ▁ni laguse ▁ludabwa ▁lwangu ▁muladi ▁zina ▁jangu ▁di manyike ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁ hinduke ni ▁na ▁mu bwele ▁kuchuwala ▁kuhita ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu .’
▁Bahobaho , ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁ kala wila , ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁di mwemwes a ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁chiya . ▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁iyo ▁ka mtowa ▁Petili ▁mu lu ba vu ▁na ▁kamul a m sa . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ H i ma ! ▁ Inuka !” ▁Na ▁baho ▁minyololo ▁iwa m zi ng ili ze ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ila gala .
▁Maabaho ▁ni sola ▁chinhu ▁chenu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi , ▁ni ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁diya ▁di mu di tendile , ▁ni di timbula ▁muna ▁umoto , ▁ni di ho nda ▁na ▁kudi dunda ▁m baka ▁diwa ▁timbwisi ▁lu n hi ni , ▁m aabaho ▁ni ya sa ▁m atimbwisi ▁yaja ▁hana ▁ichi za nda ▁chochi ki lima ▁mazi ▁kulawa ▁kumulima .
▁Ivo ▁Yosefu ▁viya bwelile ▁ukaye , ▁wa sola ▁vitumetume ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁na ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi .
▁Yohana ▁ka batiz a ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁siku ▁ndodo ▁hamwande ▁mwiza batiz igwa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .”
▁hebu ▁chochose ▁chiya ilahile ▁kwa ▁uvwizi . ▁Keza liha ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁na ▁ kongeza ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano ▁ha ▁ gala ma ▁yake . ▁Vondaya vimanye ▁chiya banange , ▁keza mbweleze la ▁mwenyewo ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁yondaya umanye ▁ubananzi ▁wake .

▁Vino ▁mo gesa ▁kuwa ▁niza ▁kun galila ni ▁tindiwalo ▁muna i isi ? ▁Hata ▁chidogo ! ▁Si zile ▁ku gala ▁tindiwalo ▁ mbali ▁kuwa bagula ▁wanhu .
▁ Siku ▁ija ▁Yesu ▁viyatendile ▁n ho pe ▁na ▁ku muhonya ▁munhu ▁chipofu ▁di kala ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁Maabaho ▁cheye ▁wonda chi we ▁wagima ▁lusita ▁ulo , ▁chiza du ga ny igwa ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁muna ▁yamawingu ▁kwa ▁kwi iting ' hana ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁kuulanga . ▁Na ▁ivo ▁chiza kala ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wa longelela ▁na ▁ku walongele za ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo tenda ▁yehile ▁fana ▁viwo londa . ▁Wa igoda ▁na ▁kuwa togoza ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁faida ▁yawo ▁wenyewo .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mkoma ▁mnyama ▁kolondeka ▁ya lave ▁mnyama ▁imwenga ▁muladi ▁kulihi la ▁ija ▁yakomigwe , ▁ugima ▁kwa ▁ugima .
▁Mbali ▁muwe ▁na ▁moyo ▁unogile ▁na ▁ubazi , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ya mu lekelele ▁miyage ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viya mu lekelele ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Na yo ▁viya i togole le ▁nawo ▁kuwa liha ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe , ▁kawa gala ▁kusang ' hana ▁kuna ▁umgunda ▁wake .
▁“ Mbali ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yahawa ▁ngayengaye , ▁hadaha ▁kulava ▁vinhu ▁ivo , ▁basi ▁keza gala ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁yonda ye n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁nhambiko , ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kuilumba . ▁Iviya ▁keza gala ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁na ▁mavuta ▁se lusi ▁imwe ▁ya ▁lita .
▁viwa kalile ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁habehi ▁na ▁Be si ▁Peoli , ▁muna ▁iisi ▁i kalile ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁Sihoni ▁wa ▁Waamoli , ▁yoya tawale ▁kulawa ▁bululu ▁da ▁Heshiboni , ▁ija ▁Musa ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mu huma ▁viwa lawile ▁Misili .
▁Yuda ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Kolond a ▁ni kwing ' he ▁choni ▁fana ▁wingi li zi ?” ▁Tamali ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni ng ' he ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁na ▁luzabi ▁chili ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁chako ▁na ▁mhome .” ▁Yuda ▁kamwing ' ha ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁na ▁ka mbandama , ▁nayo ▁ka pata ▁wimo .
▁Maabaho ▁Balaamu ▁kamulongela ▁Balaki , ▁“ Ima ▁hano ▁habehi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁yako , ▁niye ▁ni segele . ▁Hu we nda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza iting ' hana ▁na ▁niye . ▁Ch ochose ▁chonda ya ni la g u si le ▁niza kwiza ▁ku kulongela .” ▁Ivo ▁kahita ▁yaidumwe ▁kuna ▁ inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima .
▁Balaki ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Izo ▁niku gale ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga . ▁Hu we nda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza nogelw a ▁uni du wi lile ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁kulawa ▁uko .”
▁Ni de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁ndugu ▁wamwenga ▁viwafikile ▁hano , ▁wa nilongela ▁kuson hela ▁ukweli ▁u wi li nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁ko gendelela ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ikweli .

▁Pet a ▁ya ▁walume ▁wose ▁kwandusi la ▁wana ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wakala ▁ 8 , 6 00. ▁Wa no ▁wakala ▁wo kaliza ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Walonga , ▁“ Haidahika ▁bule ▁ lumbu ▁jetu ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁heng izigwe ▁ulungwana , ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁ni ▁chinyala ▁kumwetu .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁saba ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁saba , ▁safina ▁i fika ▁muna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁ A la la ti ▁na ▁i kala ▁baho .
▁Baho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Bwel e za ▁zele ▁jako ▁hanhu ▁hou di patile , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo kwamha ▁zele ▁wezadanganika ▁kwa ▁zele .
▁Wana alume ▁muhala ▁wakala ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁matano . ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Walongele ni ▁wanhu ▁wakale ▁muna ▁ivi bumbila ▁va ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matano - ma ta no .”
▁na ▁kusang ' hanila ▁chila ▁mbasakanyo ▁wa ▁wihi ▁wa ▁ku v wiza ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁kwa ga . ▁Wawo ▁weza kwa ga ▁kwaviya ▁hawa uhokele ▁na ▁kuu londa ▁ukweli , ▁muladi ▁wa komboligwe .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁muna ▁lung ' husesa ▁luja ▁wamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁wa zum e ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁wanyama le !”
▁Chila ▁mnyama ▁yeli ▁na ▁mapaga ▁yo yaigol ile ▁ banzi ▁mbili ▁na ▁yose lu la , ▁iyo ▁modaha ▁kuja .
▁yoya hitile ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kukala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ko tawala ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁udahi ▁na ▁ludabwa .
▁Chi walaga ▁na ▁chi segela . ▁Chi kwela ▁ngalawa ▁chi hita ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁dimwe ▁m baka ▁Ko si , ▁siku ▁isondelele ▁chifika ▁L o de , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁uko ▁chi hita ▁Pa ta la .
▁Kwa viya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁viu galuke , ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁nayo ▁yo londeka ▁ya galuke .
▁Wa ka ya ▁wa ▁haja ▁wakala ▁mbwiya ▁zetu , ▁wako ng ' ha ▁moto ▁na ▁wachi hokela , ▁kwaviya ▁mvula ▁i kala ▁yo to nya ▁na ▁kukala ▁na ▁mbeho .
▁Sekemu ila he ▁uvwizi ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁na ▁ivo ▁kudi liga ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Hamwande ▁ni hita ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Siliya ▁na ▁Chilikiya .
▁Abimeleki ▁keza ▁kulawa ▁Gelali ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ A hu za ti , ▁mbwiya ke ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁F i ko li ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wake , ▁kumulola ▁Isaka .
▁“ One ▁wasemi ▁waha potwa ▁ku humiza ▁mbuli ▁ndala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kukoma ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ▁hebu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ku ibishil a ▁hebu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ku mu lumiza ▁imwenga , ▁m aabaho ▁mwiza segela ▁na ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa lunguzigw a ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁vuke ▁jake ▁ka li , ▁nawo ▁wa di liga ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁muna ▁yama hulo ▁yayo , ▁iviya ▁wawo ▁hawa sa m hile ▁hebu ▁ku mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁viyamuwone ▁Nasanayeli ▁ko mwizila , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁ni ▁Mu isi la eli ▁kweli , ▁mgati ▁mmwake ▁ mwabule ▁uvwizi .”
▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Leka mana ▁ni walongela ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kwiza ▁kumwangu ▁m baka ▁Tata ▁ya mtende ▁ya dahe ▁kwiza .”
▁Maabaho ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁kuulanga , ▁dolonga , ▁“ Sambi , ▁ulopozi ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁wiza ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ija ▁yoya saguligwe ▁kuwa ▁Mulopozi . ▁Kwa viya ▁ija ▁yo walongele za ▁ndugu ▁zetu ▁m isi ▁na ▁chilo ▁ka sigwa ▁hasi .
▁Hata ▁muke ▁yeli ▁muhole ▁yoya le ligwe ▁vinogile ▁na ▁yanogile ▁na ▁hana bojoga ▁ulongo ▁kwa ▁chi si gi n ho ▁chake ▁heza daha ▁kutenda ▁vimwenga . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁lwa ▁ku zunguluk igwa ▁heza kuwa ▁na ▁nzala ,
▁One ▁miyaka ▁ ihawa ▁mingi ▁kwiza kongeza ▁bei , ▁na ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁mi dodo ▁kwiza hunguza ▁bei , ▁kwaviya ▁bei ▁yake ▁iza li ng igwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁mavuno ▁yake ▁yoyo ku chuuzi ya .
▁Maabaho ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁ku bandul a ▁uhul a ▁wa ▁tano . ▁Ni wawona ▁haja ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chilingo ▁cha ▁ku lavila ▁nhosa , ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁waja ▁wa chinjigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku gong ' onda ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁usindila ▁wowa u lavile .
▁Sa sa la ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁divai ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁imwenga .
▁M wa ka ▁wa ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁mwiza utenda ▁kuwa ▁wa ▁chiidumwe ▁kwa ▁ku gong ' onda ▁ku ilegeha ▁kwa ▁watumwa ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁M wa ka ▁uwo ▁wizakuwa ▁wa ▁kubweleza . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kumwenu ▁yoya guligwe ▁fana ▁mtumwa , ▁kolondeka ▁ya bwele ▁isi ▁yake ▁na ▁iwanhu ▁wake .
▁Nuhu ▁viya wile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁sita , ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁saba ▁mwezi ▁wekaidi , ▁siku ▁iyo ▁nzasa ▁zose ▁hasi ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁isi ▁zi lava ▁mazi ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ma zonzo ▁ya ▁kuulanga ▁ya vu g u ka .
▁Kwa viya ▁chilagano ▁chiya ▁chila ga ni ligwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁na ▁wanenu ▁na ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁kutali , ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo tangigwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁weza ikwala ▁na ▁kuu lema ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo , ▁na ▁weza i n u ni la , ▁na ▁weza i biduka ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁wenyewo .
▁Kwa viya ▁wakala ▁wabule ▁uhuwilo , ▁ha tendile ▁mauzauza ▁mengi .
▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize . ▁Wa kwela ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose .
▁Ivo ▁cho m peta ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁chowa zuma ▁na ▁kuwafundiza ▁wose ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kumgala ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ka gangamala ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁muha wona ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vo lawilila , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁habehi .
▁Ivo ▁Labani ▁ka sasala ▁dugila ▁na ▁kawa goneka ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁haja .
▁Wa senga ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁viwa segele , ▁Yesu ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁ku mson hela ▁Yohana . ▁“ Vi mu hitile ▁kumulola ▁Yohana ▁kudibwilingu , ▁vino ▁mu gesa ▁keza kuwa ▁fana ▁munhu ▁wa ki ? ▁Vino ▁mu gesa ▁yeye ▁ka linga ▁ sa n ze ▁vidi he m belu sigwa ▁na ▁mbeho ?
▁Vino ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Chilisito ? ▁Nolonga ▁fana ▁chi c ha la , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁ni ▁msang ' hani ▁yanogile ▁kufosa ▁wawo ! ▁No sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁wawo , ▁nikala ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁kufosa ▁wawo , ▁ni la n higwa ▁mibalati ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁wawo , ▁na ▁nikala ▁habehi ▁kudanganika ▁miyanza ▁mingi .
▁Mbali ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wakala ▁wo kweleka ▁na ▁kongezeka ▁ng ' hani ‚ ▁wakala ▁wengi ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wa gendelela ▁kongezeka ▁ludabwa , ▁ivo ▁isi ▁ija ▁ya ▁Misili ▁i kala ▁wene la ▁wawo .
▁Munhu ▁wowose ▁ija ▁yondaya mu lige ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu , ▁keza lekeleligwa , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya mu lige ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁iyo ▁heza lekeleligwa ▁bule , ▁sambi ▁hebu ▁hamwande .
▁Niye ▁no mulongelani , ▁hata ▁mfalume ▁Solomoni ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁wose , ▁ha dahile ▁kuya wa zigwa ▁vinogile ▁fana ▁dimwe ▁muna ▁yama lu wa ▁yano .
▁Wawo ▁weza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zo nda u weng ' he ▁kuson hela ▁hema , ▁ mbali ▁hawa londeka ▁kuvi kwenhukila ▁vi a ▁va ▁hema ▁hebu ▁kulu kwenhukila ▁ulupango , ▁bule ivo ▁wezadanganika ▁wawo ▁na ▁weye ▁iviya .
▁ A zo li ▁kamwelek a ▁Sa do ki , ▁Sa do ki ▁kamwelek a ▁ A ki mu , ▁ A ki mu ▁kamwelek a ▁Eli u di .
▁Ino ▁i kala ▁ peta ▁ya ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Wa ko ha si ▁wowa sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawa peta ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁imwe ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁“ Kwizagaya ▁weye ▁Kola zi ni ! ▁ Kwizagaya ▁weye ▁Besisaida ! ▁Ma uza uza ▁yoya tendeke ▁kumwenu , ▁one ▁ya tendeke ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni , ▁wanhu ▁waha le kile ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁kuson gela ▁umwaka ▁kwa ▁ku yawala ▁ maguniya ▁na ▁kui bu ga ▁maivu , ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁wa leka ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .
▁“ Mbali ▁loleni ! ▁Munhu ▁ija ▁yonda ▁ya ni hinduke ▁ka ba hano ▁koja ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye !
▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ni tenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yangu ▁mwenyewo ▁muladi ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁voni londa ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁wayangu .
▁Chila ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yoya saguligwe ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁ko kwing ' higwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁kusang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ▁kwa ▁kulava ▁sadaka ▁na ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Aka . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya mkome ▁Kaini , ▁keza lihiliz igwa ▁miyanza ▁saba .” ▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwika ▁n ha le ▁kum zuma ▁yoyose ▁yondaya iting ' hane ▁nayo , ▁sekeya mkome .
▁“ Loleni , ▁diyelo ▁no kwika ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ▁mu sagule ▁hagati ▁ya ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁na ▁ku duwiligwa .
▁na ▁kawa guma ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi , ▁hanhu ▁hoya fungigw e ▁Yosefu .
▁Vino ▁munhu ▁keza mweda ▁choni ▁yaha pata ▁isi ▁yose ▁ mbali ▁ka giza ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁keza lava ▁choni ▁ kwasakany a ▁na ▁ugima ▁wake ?
▁Yesu ▁viyalongile ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁kadanganika .
▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i gendelela ▁na ▁k wene la .
▁Na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cho mu tenda ▁hebu ▁kulonga , ▁ tende ni ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁yake .
▁Ka dika ▁dizi ga ▁hagati ▁ya ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁lupango ▁na ▁ku guma ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kuna wa .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezavi nula ▁uchanyha ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwi n u ligwa ▁uchanyha ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁ v ela ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chi dali ▁chochi n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁na ▁chi ma ▁chochi lavigwe ▁nhambiko . ▁Yaha komelezeka ▁yayo ▁yose , ▁Mnazili ▁kodaha ▁kung ' wa ▁divai .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha londeka ▁ku uza ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁kanoga ▁hebu ▁ ke ha ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁heza kwasakany igwa ▁na ▁imwenga , ▁ mbali ▁waha ya sakany a ▁wanyama , ▁wose ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁we la , ▁haweza komboligwa .’ ▁”
▁Melikizedeki ▁ha wile ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Walawi , ▁ mbali ▁ka hokela ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Bulahimu , ▁iviya ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁yeye ▁yoya hokele ▁chiya ▁chiya la ga ni ligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Nomulongelani , ▁ichilo ▁cha ▁siku ▁iyo , ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁weza gona ▁muna ▁dikomwa ▁dimwe , ▁imwe ▁keza ga ndu ligwa ▁na ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .
▁“ One ▁mu nimanya ▁niye , ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁iviya ▁muha mmanyile , ▁kuson gela ▁sambi ▁mu mmanya ▁na ▁mu muwona .”
▁Tata ▁unogile , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁hawa ku manya , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁no ku manya , ▁na ▁wawo ▁wo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kuni tuma .
▁Ch a ndusil o ▁cha ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁chi kala ▁chiha mbigwa ▁kwa ▁mabwe ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi , ▁dibwe ▁da ▁chandusilo ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁di tangigwa ▁yasipi ▁na ▁dekaidi ▁ sa fi lo ▁na ▁d eketatu ▁ka li ke do ni ▁na ▁de ▁ka ne ▁zuma li di
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Iviya ▁no mwandikilani ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁ukweli ▁wake ▁wo woneka ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁iviya ▁wo woneka ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁kwaviya ▁ziza ▁do fosa ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁kweli ▁dibu ng ' hu la ▁di mala .
▁Niza bena ▁chibu li ▁chenu , ▁mvula ▁izakuwa ▁kwa bule , ▁na ▁isi ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁ndala ▁fana ▁zuma ▁na ▁ha izakwima ▁ndiya .
▁Bahobaho ▁nz ogolo ▁keka ▁kwa ▁umwanza ▁we ▁kaidi . ▁Petili ▁ka kumbuka ▁viya ▁Yesu ▁va ya mulongele , ▁“ I chi lo ▁cha ▁diyelo , ▁yang ' hali ▁nz ogolo ▁hana kwika ▁miyanza ▁midi , ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu .” ▁Ka ndusa ▁kulila .
▁Vino ! ▁W eye ▁kukala ▁mtumwa ▁lusita ▁viu ta ng i ng we ? ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁kukala ▁mtumwa . ▁ Vinoga , ▁sekeu gese , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁uha wa ▁na ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ulegeho , ▁ usang ' hanile ▁uwo ,
▁Chi lagano ▁icho ▁ni icho ▁chiya ▁chochi lole ligwa ▁na ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁isi ▁yetu , ▁wo mtosela ▁Mulungu ▁vinogile ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo , ▁mwenevale ▁mfalume , ▁Wayahudi ▁woni sita ka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁uwo .
▁mulume ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁m baka ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁shekel i ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁ya ▁hela ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁vi yengile ▁m chi hele to ▁mwa ▁imkulu ▁iyo . ▁Kawa wona ▁wo towa ▁vi longe longe ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wo du nhu la ▁ndilo ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁kuna i chibululu ▁chimwenga .
▁Wa segela ▁Ha se lo si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁L i sima .
▁Maabaho ▁Ya ili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Manase , ▁kahita ▁na ▁kuvi sola ▁vi bulul u ▁vimwenga ▁va ▁Gileadi , ▁kavi ng ' ha ▁zina , ▁Ha wo si ▁Ya ili .
▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Wa g elishoni ▁kakala ▁Eli asafu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁L a eli .
▁I ka ▁ngubiko ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wala la ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁weza kwika ▁makono ▁yawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ijo , ▁m aabaho ▁diza chinjigwa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Mbwanga ▁ija ▁imkulu ▁ ke hi ligwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁ka lema ▁kwingila ▁mnyumba . ▁Tat i ▁yake ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁ka mulamba ▁ yengile ▁mnyumba .
▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁wo lolela ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Mulopozi , ▁ivo ▁wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yawo , ▁“ M a n ye ▁Yohana ▁iyo ▁Chilisito ?”
▁M weye ▁mu muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwandusi la ▁vini mmanyile ni .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁wezalonga , ▁‘ Habali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kai tendela ▁vino ▁isi ▁ino ? ▁L udoko ▁luno ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?’
▁Mbali ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni ▁na ▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune ▁hawa danganike ▁bule ▁mwa ▁waja ▁wowa hitile ▁kui pelemba ▁isi .
▁Henoko ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁mitano , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁zina ▁jake ▁Mesusela .
▁Kwa viya ▁kumkoma ▁mdodo ▁wako ▁na ▁damu ▁yake ▁ iti ka ▁muna ▁isi , ▁weye ▁ko duwiligwa ▁kulawa ▁iisi ▁you kala .
▁“ No wa o ne la ▁ubazi ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁ ichimu ▁wakala ▁na ▁niye ▁siku ▁nhatu , ▁na ▁sambi ▁wabule ▁ndiya .
▁Bul ulu ▁da ▁Babeli ▁di tagusigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁kuwakoma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa chinjigwe ▁muna ▁zi isi ▁zose .
▁Laheli ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kani segeze la ▁chinyala ▁changu .”
▁Maliya ▁kamuuza ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija , ▁“ Niye ▁na mha m b e . ▁Lelo ▁yano ▁yeza dahika ze ?”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ni ▁wa ▁Mwihi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mwihi ▁ka tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi , ▁ mbali ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁keza ▁mwiisi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuzi bananga ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁Mwihi ▁ija .
▁Zi mwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁hanhu ▁hana ▁imi wa . ▁I mi wa ▁i kula ▁na ▁kui bananga ▁mi no ga ▁hata ▁i potwa ▁ku lela .
▁Na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁na ▁ndege ▁wose ▁woguluka ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁wose ▁wotambala ▁mwiisi ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima , ▁ndiya ▁yawo ▁izakuwa ▁mayani ▁ya ▁mimeya .” ▁I lawilila ▁ivo .
▁Yuda ▁mwanangu , ▁ku linga ▁fana ▁simba , ▁yoya patile ▁ma i ngo ▁yake ▁na ▁kabwela ▁ukaye , ▁Fan a ▁simba ▁ko i go lola ▁na ▁kugona ▁hasi , ▁simba ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁yelihi ▁yoyo daha ▁ku mu la mu sa ?
▁M weye ▁na ▁wanenu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wenu ▁na ▁Walawi ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁mwiza kuja ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kutambikila ▁ho ha ya sagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Uko ▁mwiza de ng ' helela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho mu pata ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁vino ▁vinoga ▁munhu ▁kulonga ▁kana ▁uhuwilo , ▁ mbali ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁hazi lagusa ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁bule ? ▁Vino ▁uhuwilo ▁uwo ▁wodaha ze ▁ku mu lopola ni ?
▁Yoshua ▁viyahulike ▁madizi ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wo guta , ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ No hulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁ng ' hondo ▁muna ▁dilago .”
▁Yuda ▁ka za sa ▁zi hela ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁m aabaho ▁kasegela , ▁kahita ▁kui koma ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁luzabi .
▁One ▁muha mha ▁Malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁mwiza kala ▁muna ▁di londo ▁jangu , ▁fana ▁niye ▁vini ya m hile ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Tata ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁di londo ▁jake .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ U teganye , ▁sekeu mbweleze ▁mwana g u ▁uko !
