▁Mulungu ▁kamulava ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁damu ▁yake ▁muladi ▁yawe ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kuwa segeze la ▁wanhu ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁kwika ▁uhuwilo ▁kumwake ▁yeye . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁ya dahe ▁ku lagusa ▁yeye ▁m nyendanyenda . ▁Baho ▁hau mwaka ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁yo funya ▁umoyo , ▁ bila ▁ku gesa ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁Wa nhu ▁weza si ndu ka ▁kwa ▁kudumba , ▁na ▁ku lolela ▁mbuli ▁yondai lawilile ▁muna i isi ▁yose , ▁kwaviya ▁ludabwa ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wiza ting isi ka .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni , ▁“ Soleni ▁magan za ▁ya ▁maivu ▁ya ▁tanuli , ▁m aabaho ▁Musa ▁ya ya p i gi se ▁uchanyha ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .
▁kwaviya ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kuzi huma ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁za ▁zisi ▁zose . ▁Na ▁cho zi huma ▁zisi ▁zose ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁wetu .
▁Na ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁iza petigwa ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁fana ▁ukalangama ▁kwa ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁uhelelo ▁wiza kwiza .
▁Mu kala ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa gile , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁mu mbwelela ▁M dimi ▁na ▁M wi mili zi ▁wa ▁ugima ▁wenu .
▁M beyu ▁zimwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁hana ▁uluwe , ▁ho ha kalile ▁na ▁ulongo ▁chidogo . ▁Zi m beyu ▁zo ta ▁himahima , ▁kwaviya ▁ulongo ▁hau gendelele ▁hasi ▁bule .
▁Lelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kumbukeni ▁vimu kalile ▁chip indi ▁vimu tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁W eng i ▁wenu ▁mukala ▁ mwabule ▁ubala ▁kwa ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁wengi ▁wenu ▁mukala ▁ mwabule ▁nguvu , ▁wala ▁weli ▁na ▁ ulangulizi .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kaidi ▁na ▁luholozi ▁na ▁kugazigwa ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake , ▁kahita ▁m baka ▁kudileme . ▁L e me ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁ tuka ▁di gubikigwe ▁na ▁dibwe .
▁ Nokulongela ▁kweli , ▁cholonga ▁vinhu ▁vochi vimanyile , ▁iviya ▁cholonga ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vochi vi wone , ▁ mbali ▁mung ' hali ▁mwo lema ▁ukalangama ▁wetu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁mu mweda ▁kuvimanya ▁sili ▁za ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁wawo ▁hawa mwe dile ▁bule .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Gol o sa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁uja mhe ▁um kila .” ▁Ivo ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁ka ja mha , ▁na ▁di galuka ▁mhome ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake .
▁Iviya ▁one ▁lukuli ▁lose ▁lu ha wile ▁ziso , ▁kuhulika ▁kwa ▁kulihi ? ▁Na ▁one ▁yaha kalile ▁magutwi ▁muhala , ▁lwa ha dahile ▁vilihi ▁kun u sa ?
▁Mbali ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁no londa ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁tano ▁zozi daha ▁ku manyika , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kuwafundiza ▁wamwenga , ▁kufosa ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁ elufu ▁longo ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya .
▁Mbali ▁no mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ! ▁Kwa viya ▁umwaka ▁mukala ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁mu tegeleza ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wenu ▁wose ▁yaja ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁yo muhokele .
▁ Sambi ▁mkono ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wiza kwamha , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza kuwa ▁ nhu nhu ▁na ▁hwiza wona ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁zuwa ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo .” ▁Bahobaho ▁kung ugu ▁na ▁ziza ▁vi mwizila , ▁na ▁kahita ▁uko ▁na ▁uko ▁ko londa ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ku mwamha ▁mkono ▁ya mu langulize .
▁One ▁nyambenyambe ▁yaha kala ▁kumwenu , ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁hagati ▁yenu ▁yahalonda ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁imu tenda ▁mweye , ▁nayo ▁kezatenda ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁hamuna soma ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga ? ▁‘ Dib we ▁do wa lemile ▁wa ze nzi ▁kuzengela , ▁diwa ▁dibwe ▁dinogile ▁kufosa ▁mabwe ▁yose ▁ya ▁kuzengela . ▁Mndewa ▁kachi tenda ▁chinhu ▁chino , ▁na ▁chiwa ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁mwa z nyo ▁n ' hani ▁kumwetu .’
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁mbahasha ▁ya ▁utumwa , ▁ wolondeka ▁wa wategeleze ▁wenevale ▁wawo , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁sekewa di lige ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku zeha ▁mafundizo ▁yetu .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁sili ▁ya ▁nhondo ▁ziya ▁saba ▁zi u zi wonile ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁sili ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kwikil a ▁vitasa ▁viya ▁saba ▁va ▁zahabu ▁ni ▁zino , ▁ziya ▁nhondo ▁saba ▁ni ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁viya ▁vitasa ▁saba ▁va ▁zahabu ▁ni ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁saba .
▁“ Sekeu li me ▁mgunda ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁chihongwe ▁hamwe .
▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁ya ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁weza lawilila ▁na ▁kuwa duganya ▁wanhu ▁wehile ▁hagati ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wanogile .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁imwe ▁ka tenda ▁dugila ▁da ▁ zengele ▁na ▁kawa goneka ▁wanhu ▁wengi .
▁W eye ▁kolonga ▁wanhu ▁wa leke ▁uzinzi , ▁vino ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁hu zi ni ▁bule ? ▁Ko k wi hila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu , ▁vino ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁hu bawa ▁bule ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁milungu ? .
▁“ Maabaho ▁ija ▁ya hokele ▁sanduku ▁dimwe ▁da ▁hela ▁imwe ▁keza ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁ndala . ▁Ko gobola ▁hanhu ▁hu ha handile , ▁na ▁ko duganya ▁hanhu ▁hu ha mizil e ▁mbeyu .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁mbuli ▁nyingi ▁kwa ▁masimwe . ▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁muha ndi ▁yoya hitile ▁ku handa ▁mbeyu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wenyewo ▁wa tali ▁na ▁wana ▁nguvu , ▁ni ▁Wa a na ki ▁waja ▁fana ▁vimu vimanyile ▁na ▁fana ▁vi muhulika ▁wanhu ▁viwo longa ▁kuson hela ▁wawo , ▁‘ Yeli hi ▁yo daha ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wana ▁wa ▁Ana ki ?’
▁Kwa viya ▁waja ▁wose ▁wolanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁wawo ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kolonga ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wafika . ▁Wem a ▁kunze , ▁wa pula ▁kulonga ▁nayo .
▁Kwa viya ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo ▁kwiza kuwa ▁magayo ▁makulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁yayo ▁yang ' hali ▁kulawilila ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso ▁Mulungu ▁vi yalumbile ▁isi ▁yose ▁m baka ▁sambi , ▁na ▁ha ye za lawilila ▁kaidi !
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁no wona ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Lu mwe mwe ▁na ▁mi bumo ▁na ▁ng ' huwa ▁vi kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁icho ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁ma muli ▁saba ▁ya ▁moto ▁ya kala ▁yo kwaka ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁icho . ▁Ma muli ▁yaja ▁ni ▁ mihe ▁saba ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁“ One ▁hamu tendile ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino , ▁hebu ▁kudi hishimu ▁zina ▁da ▁kudumbiza ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ,
▁Musa ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁nawo , ▁kachi gubika ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁na ▁chitambala .
▁Shel u mi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S uli s ha da i ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni .
▁“ Mbuli ▁yo wolonga ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁Selofehadi ▁ni ▁kweli , ▁weng ' he ▁uhazi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yawo , ▁wa sole ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁nhaguso ▁lufika , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁wawo ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ku tagusigwa . ▁One ▁iha ndusa ▁na ▁cheye , ▁vino ▁izakuwa ze ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁hawa tegeleza ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu ?
▁“ Vi di s wile , ▁ija ▁mwene ▁mgunda ▁kamulongela ▁i mwimiliz i ▁wake , ▁‘ Wa tange ▁walimi ▁uwa lihe ▁ma y ombe ▁yawo , ▁waha son gela ▁waja ▁wa ▁uhelelo ▁m baka ▁wa ▁mwanduso .’
▁Ka gubula ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lufaya ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kupeta , ▁Mulungu ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁kani lagiliza ▁kui gong ' onda .
▁Yakobo ▁katogola , ▁viifikile ▁juma ▁da ▁dugila , ▁Labani ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Laheli ▁mwanage ▁yawe ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Ch eye ▁cha wabozi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwa wa ba la ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ! ▁Ch eye ▁cha wa nyonde nyonde ▁na ▁mweye ▁muna ▁nguvu , ▁iviya ▁mweye ▁mo hishimika ▁ mbali ▁cheye ▁cho kwe hu ligwa .
▁Maabaho ▁imwe ▁wawo , ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Kayafa , ▁yoya kalile ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko ▁Di go go go ▁umwaka ▁uja , ▁kalonga , ▁“ M weye ▁mwa wabozi !
▁ Hamwiza kuja ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁hebu ▁siku ▁mbili ▁hebu ▁siku ▁tano ▁hebu ▁siku ▁longo ▁hebu ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁maidi ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha mtowa ▁miyage ▁na ▁dibwe , ▁yahadanganika , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mkomaji ▁na ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niza tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁viu nilongele , ▁kwaviya ▁ni nogeligw a ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁niku manya ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jako .”
▁Baho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Habali ▁Sala ▁ka se ka ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Kweli ▁iza dahika ▁nyele ke ▁mwana ▁na ▁niye ▁mulala ?’
▁Niye ▁ni dika , ▁‘ Aka , ▁Mndewa ! ▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁hachi togole ka ▁hebu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁chochi ngile ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wangu .’
▁Bahobaho ▁kulawilila ▁beho ▁kulu ▁mudilamba , ▁ wi mbi ▁di gubika ▁ingalawa . ▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ya gonile .
▁Vino ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁icho ▁choni ? ▁Wawo ▁ni ▁ mihe ▁yoi msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yo tumigwa ▁kuwataza ▁waja ▁wondawa hokele ▁ulopozi .
▁“ Maabaho ▁msang ' hani ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi ▁keza , ▁kamulongela ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁ku ning ' ha ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi , ▁ lola ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi ▁ya ▁hela ▁yamwenga ▁faida ▁yoni patile .’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni , ▁kalonga ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁mwiisi . ▁Na ▁kukala ▁na ▁maihu ▁makulu ▁yo b we mwe nda ▁ng ' hani , ▁yawa pata ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁na ▁waja ▁woi tambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁yake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Asen e ▁na ▁wageni ▁wowo kala ▁umo ▁wa sang ' hanila ▁lusita ▁lwa wo ▁lwose ▁kulonga ▁na ▁hu hulika ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁sambi .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kasola ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁na ▁kam golela ▁Abimeleki , ▁nawo ▁waidi ▁weka ▁lagano .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno ▁uli bule ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁uli ▁na ▁uhasanyi ! ▁Vino ▁niza kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁m baka ▁ li ni ?” ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁“ M gale ▁imwana ▁wako ▁hano .”
▁Mbali ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ni ▁ija ▁ija ▁imwe ▁yoyo tenda ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vose , ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁chila ▁munhu ▁chitumetume ▁mbasakanyo ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁ Siyo ▁kwa ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Tito ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁moyo ▁womu mwing ' hile ▁mweye . ▁Y eye ▁kachilongela ▁viya ▁vi mulonda ▁ng ' hani ▁ku niwona , ▁viya ▁vimu li ▁na ▁usungu , ▁vomu londa ▁kuni gombela . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁yoni tenda ▁ni de ng ' helele ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mbali ▁ teng ' hu ▁u zahile ni ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁mwiza kwing ' higwa .
▁Mbali ▁Walawi ▁hawa petigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yaja ▁ya makabila ▁yamwenga ,
▁Yesu ▁viya humuluk e ▁ku lugongo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁wake , ▁kema ▁hanhu ▁ho ha kalile ▁ha goloke ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁kulu ▁da ▁wanahina ▁wake . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu kala ▁haja ▁kulawa ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁Yelusalemu , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁mhwani ▁ya ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni .
▁Kamulongela , ▁“ One ▁weye ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ ib wa n he ▁hasi , ▁kwaviya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁kezawa lagiliza ▁wa senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁nawo ▁wezaku sola ▁na ▁makono ▁yawo ▁muladi ▁sekeu ikwale ▁muna ▁idibwe .’ ▁”
▁Chi nhu ▁chi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁si wo ▁chiya ▁chi mwing ila ▁m mu lomo , ▁ mbali ▁chiya ▁chila wa ▁m mu lomo ▁wake , ▁ni icho ▁chi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .”
▁Ko yamanya ▁Malagilizo , ▁‘ Sekeu kome , ▁sekeu we ▁m go ni , ▁sekeu bawe , ▁sekeu longe ▁uvwizi , ▁wa hulike ▁ tati ▁yako ▁na ▁mami ▁yako .’ ▁”
▁Wa m gubika ▁yameso ▁na ▁kumuuza , ▁“ L o t ela ! ▁Yeli hi ▁ya ku to wile ?”
▁Na yo ▁keza kuwa ▁mkulu , ▁keza tangigwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁yeli ▁Uchanyha ▁Ng ' hani . ▁Na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ▁yawe ▁Mfalume , ▁fana ▁Daudi ▁wa saho ▁yake ▁viyakalile .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoja ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya tagusigwe ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁wake , ▁kwaviya ▁kachi tenda ▁chinhu ▁chelile ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kana ▁ugima ▁uwo , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ka bule ▁ugima ▁uwo .
▁Musa ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Ona , ▁yaja ▁ya watendile ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁ya kala ▁uhasanyi ▁mkulu ! ▁Wakala ▁wa i tendela ▁milungu ▁ya ▁zahabu .
▁Wa segela ▁Ke hela sa ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁S he fe li .
▁Mwanage ▁Dani ▁kakala ▁Hu shi mu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁vi we g u t e , ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Soleni ▁ masigavu ▁muladi ▁seke c ha ge ▁chinhu ▁chochose .”
▁Kwa ▁lusita ▁luno ▁mweye ▁m olondeka ▁kuwa ▁wafundiza , ▁ mbali ▁mung ' hali ▁m olondeka ▁muwe ▁na ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kum fundiza ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁mwanduso ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁m olondeka ▁ko ng ' he zigwa ▁matombo , ▁siyo ▁ndiya ▁ndala .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalu tanga ▁kaidi ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kalu longela , ▁“ N he gele ze ni ▁mose ▁na ▁muvimanye .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyo kala ▁na ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁kokwiza ▁kudi bu ng ' hulo , ▁muladi ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁zi woneke ▁kuwa ▁zi sang ' hani gwa ▁kwa ▁ku muhulika ▁Mulungu .
▁Sa gula ▁be belu ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁mwa ▁luti . ▁Di we ▁da ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁na ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁chochose .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁niye ▁hebu ▁wawo , ▁chino ▁ni icho ▁chochi peta , ▁na ▁chino ▁ni icho ▁chi muhuwile .
▁Ya dahe ▁kui languliza ▁vinogile ▁kaye ▁yake ▁na ▁kuwafundiza ▁wanage ▁wa mtegeleze ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ka chilongela ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁wo mwing ' higwe ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamulongela ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁yoya kalile ▁mulala , ▁iviya ▁ndole zi ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose , ▁“ Nokulamba ▁ wi ke ▁mkono ▁wako ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ma wa mbo ▁yangu , ▁ni kula hi ze .
▁Kwa viya ▁mwaha walonda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo mulonda ni ▁muhala ▁mweye , ▁mwiza hokela ▁chinhu ▁chi lihi ▁chinogile ? ▁Hata ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁wo tenda ▁ivo !
▁Iviya ▁na ▁cheye , ▁cho zunguluk igwa ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁kulu ▁da ▁wa kalangama ▁haulongozi ▁wetu ▁fana ▁vino , ▁chi leke ▁chila ▁mbahasha ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wou chi na na hila , ▁chi iyohe ▁kwa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁mwa ▁yaja ▁ya ▁kwii huma ▁yo ye kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁ he tu .
▁Maabaho ▁wamulongela ▁mfalume , ▁“ Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiza ▁kukala ▁fana ▁nyambenyambe ▁mu no ▁mwiisi ▁kwaviya ▁uko ▁Kanaani ▁kuna ▁nzala ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁kaidi ▁cha bule ▁mgina ▁wa ▁wanyama ▁wetu ▁wa ▁ku fu g igwa . ▁Ivo ▁mwenevale , ▁cho ku pula ▁cheye , ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako , ▁uchilekele ▁kukala ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Gosheni .”
▁Musa ▁kamuuza ▁Haluni , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wa kutenda ▁choni ▁m baka ▁kuwatenda ▁watende ▁uhasanyi ▁mkulu ▁ivo ?”
▁M weye ▁hamu ni sagule ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁ni msagula ni ▁mweye ▁muhite ▁muke leke ▁matunda , ▁matunda ▁yoyo kala . ▁Tata ▁nayo ▁keza mwi g ' hani ▁chochose ▁chonda mu pule ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu .
▁Lelo , ▁igolo ▁lusita ▁fana ▁luno , ▁niza gala ▁mvula ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁mabwe , ▁iyo ▁ha inalawilila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwandusi la ▁mwanduso ▁wake ▁m baka ▁sambi .
▁one ▁ni hano la ▁zele ▁jangu ▁di melemeta ▁na ▁ku golosa ▁mkono ▁kulava ▁nhaguso , ▁nizawa lihiliza ▁wehi ▁wangu , ▁niza watagusa ▁wanhu ▁woni hila .
▁I chigulogulo ▁vi chifikile , ▁wanhu ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁watamu ▁wawo ▁na ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela .
▁kolonga ▁mwenyewo , ▁‘ Niza bwela ▁ukaye ▁yangu ▁kuni lawile .’ ▁Ivo ▁keza hita ▁na ▁keza fika ▁kaye ▁ya bule ▁chinhu , ▁i f ya gi ligwa ▁na ▁iha mbigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Gol o sa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁kuulanga , ▁muladi ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁ itonye ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁I wa to ny ele ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁na ▁vose ▁vi ha ndigwe ▁muna ▁imigunda .”
▁Niye ▁ni tendigw a ▁kuwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁kwa ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁unovu ▁uya ning ' hile ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁mkulu .
▁Niye ▁Paulo , ▁yoni tangigwe ▁kuwa ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁kwa ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁So si t e ne .
▁Munhu ▁yo kwingila ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁muu l wi vi ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁ndimi ▁wa ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁M tumigwa ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko , ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya kanhigwe ▁di gutwi ▁na ▁Petili ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁siku wonile ▁nayo ▁bule ▁kuna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁Mizaituni ?”
▁Vi di malile ▁ gombo , ▁Nuhu ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁matatu ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano
▁Yano ▁yose ▁yo londeka ▁ya lawilile ▁muladi ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yatimie .” ▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wose ▁wa muleka , ▁wa kimbila .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wa dondola ▁yaja ▁ya masigavu ▁ya ▁magate ▁na ▁somba ▁na ▁ku memez a ▁vi gelo ▁longo ▁na ▁vidi .
▁hanhu ▁hoya kalile ▁ya ze ngile ▁lupango . ▁Baho ▁Abulamu ▁ka mtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Saimoni ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁Chi iyoha ▁ku vula ▁somba ▁ichilo ▁chi gima ▁ mbali ▁hachi patile ▁chinhu . ▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁weye ▁kulonga , ▁niza kwa sa ▁nyavu !”
▁Mulungu ▁viya mulavile ▁Sauli , ▁kamtenda ▁Daudi ▁yawe ▁mfalume ▁wawo . ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Daudi , ▁‘ Ni muwona ▁Daudi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ye se , ▁munhu ▁ya u nogele ▁umoyo ▁wangu . ▁Y eye ▁kezatenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni mulonda ▁ya chi tende .’
▁Mbali ▁one ▁iha manyika ▁kuwa ▁mnyama ▁ka ba wi gwa ▁kumwake , ▁imu nhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya mu lihe ▁mwene ▁mnyama .
▁I sasale ▁igolo ▁imi to to ndo ▁u kwele ▁kwii chi s u ili ▁cha ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁u iting ' hane ▁na ▁niye .
▁Muha iting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁niye ▁no iting ' hana ▁na ▁mweye ▁muna ▁yama gesa ▁yangu , ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ,
▁U pango ▁lwenyewo ▁luwe ▁lwa ▁mu la ba ▁utali ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano ▁na ▁chimo ▁chake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁kenda . ▁M ahembe ▁yake ▁ya ▁chila ▁ching obweda ▁yawe ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁lupango ▁lwenyewo .
▁M wanduso ▁wa ▁ufalume ▁wake ▁ukala ▁Babeli ▁na ▁ E le ki ▁na ▁ Aka di ▁na ▁Ka li ne hi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁S hi na li .
▁Filipo ▁na ▁ B a tu lo ma yo , ▁Tomasi ▁na ▁Masa yo , ▁ija ▁m sola ▁kodi , ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A lu fa yo , ▁na ▁T a de i ,
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Yesu ▁ka mu hindukila ▁Petili , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Segel a ▁kumwangu , ▁weye ▁Lufyende ! ▁W eye ▁kwa ▁ching ' wa so ▁kumwangu , ▁kwaviya ▁hu ya gesa ▁yeli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁yeli ▁ya ▁chiunhu .”
▁Mbali ▁Abulamu ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niza vimanya ze ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁ija ▁izakuwa ▁yangu ?”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁“ Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke , ▁yahawa ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ichi de vu ,
▁Loleni , ▁muleke ligwa ▁kaye ▁yenu ▁ya ▁Mulungu ! ▁Na ▁niye ▁nowalongela , ▁hamwiza niwona ▁kaidi ▁ng ' o ▁m baka ▁vondamu longe , ▁‘ Ka temiligw a ▁mate ▁yokwiza ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa .’ ▁”
▁N yambenyambe ▁yo fosa ▁nzila ▁hebu ▁msang ' hani ▁yo lihigwa , ▁ha londeka ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁iyo .
▁ Sambi ▁mtawala ▁Helode ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi sang ' a ni gwe , ▁ivo ▁kakala ▁na ▁mwazanyo ▁kwa ▁viya ▁wakala ▁wolonga , ▁“ Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kazilibuka .”
▁Lelo ▁ tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ! ▁L ileni ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ gi yo ▁ gi yo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁magayo ▁yondaya mwi zile ni !
▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Mulungu ▁mwene ▁Udaho ▁kani lawilila ▁uko ▁Lu zu ▁kuna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁kani temela ▁mate .
▁Mbali ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁viya wonile ▁mvula ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁na ▁mi bumo ▁vi leka , ▁ka tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁kaidi . ▁Kawa ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁yeye ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake .
▁Bahobaho ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁ka holo la ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁wawo , ▁ka itwik a ▁dikomwa ▁do yakalile ▁ka go ne la , ▁kahita ▁ukaye ▁yake ▁yaha mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .
▁M ting ' hano ▁uwo ▁viu malile , ▁Wayahudi ▁wengi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wowa kalile ▁wo so nde l ke la ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumsondelela ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁Chiyahudi ▁wawa sondelela ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba . ▁Wa tumigwa ▁wawo ▁walonga ▁nawo , ▁wawa guma ▁moyo ▁wa gendelele ▁kukala ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁kamuuza ▁imwenga , ▁‘ Na ▁weye ▁kolondeka ▁u lihe ▁choni ?’ ▁Na yo ▁kedika , ▁‘ M a guniya ▁magan a ▁longo ▁ya ▁uhemba .’ ▁Mu lole zi ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Sol a ▁ch e ti ▁chako ▁na ▁ya ndik a , ▁ maguniya ▁m alongo ▁manane .’
▁Y ombe ▁da ▁uhasanyi ▁ni ▁ifa , ▁ mbali ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁haku kalile ▁na ▁ma savu ▁bule ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁mimeya ▁hai s u kile ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ha itonye le ▁mvula ▁iisi ▁na ▁iviya ▁kwa bule ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ku lima .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁uka walongele ▁wa i sa f ye ▁diyelo ▁na ▁igolo . ▁Wo londeka ▁wa ya sunh e ▁mawalo ▁yawo
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka nyama la ▁hupi , ▁ha longile ▁mbuli ▁yoyose . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kamuuza ▁kaidi , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁iyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo temiligw a ▁mate ?”
▁Yesu ▁viya wahulike , ▁kawedika , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wagima ▁hawa mulonda ▁mganga ▁ mbali ▁watamu ▁wo mulonda . ▁Si zile ▁kuwa tanga ▁wanhu ▁wanogile , ▁ mbali ▁weli ▁na ▁uhasanyi .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁na ▁kulawa ▁ B a mo si ▁wahita ▁kudi bawe ▁da ▁Moabu , ▁ku inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Pisiga , ▁yoi son hela ▁hasi ▁kuchuwala .
▁Na ▁m aabaho ▁ni di wona ▁ng ' onyo ▁ka li ▁dodi lawa ▁muna ▁ibahali , ▁dili ▁na ▁matwi ▁saba ▁na ▁ mhembe ▁longo , ▁chila ▁ mhembe ▁i kala ▁na ▁kombelo ▁na ▁chila ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁ ja ndikigwa ▁ li go ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa ivo ▁niza mu lanha ▁mibalati ▁na ▁niza mulekela .”
▁Wa hita ▁kufose la ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁na ▁wafika ▁bululu ▁da ▁Hebuloni , ▁uko ▁wa wafika ▁Wa a hi ma ni ▁na ▁Wa a s he s ha i ▁na ▁Wa tali ma i , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Ana ki . ▁Bul ulu ▁da ▁Hebuloni ▁di zengigw e ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ing ' hali ▁ku zengigw a ▁bululu ▁da ▁So a ni ▁dili ▁Misili .
▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ni heza ▁kumwenu , ▁niza kwiza ▁na ▁bala ka ▁ka mili ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁nyingi , ▁Paulo ▁kamulongela ▁Balinaba , ▁“ Ha ya ▁chi bwele ▁kuchisogo ▁chika wa la ule ▁wanhu ▁wohuwila ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yose ▁yochi pe tile ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁kulola ▁viwo gendelela .”
▁Niza de ng ' helela ▁kusang ' hanila ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi ni li ▁nacho ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu . ▁Vino ! ▁Mwiza ni londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁no walonda ▁mweye ▁chidogo .
▁Mana ▁cheye ▁hachi zile ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁hano ▁hana ▁isi , ▁na ▁hachiza segela ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁kuson gela ▁siku ▁ija ▁vichi hulike ▁hachi le kile ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁muladi ▁mu memezigw e ▁umanyi ▁wa ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ubala ▁wose ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁woya ching ' hile .
▁Ichil o ▁chiya , ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁wa lamka . ▁Ku kala ▁na ▁ndilo ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁mana ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁kaye ▁hata ▁imwe ▁munhu ▁ha danganike .
▁Maabaho ▁kasola ▁nhungo , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ H i ne ni ▁mung ' we ▁wose ▁kwa ▁nhungo ▁ino .”
▁Ch eye ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mmanya ▁Mulungu ▁kochi tegeleza , ▁munhu ▁heli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁hachi tegeleza . ▁Ivo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ino ▁chodaha ▁ku manya ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁kweli ▁na ▁muhe ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha mtegeleza ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁“ Munhu ▁yahawa ▁na ▁mwana ▁yeli ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁na ▁ko tu ndu ka ▁na ▁ha muhulika ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake ▁viwo mtagusa ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁mulima , ▁kolondeka ▁ yatowigwe ▁na ▁mabwe ▁hebu ▁m sa le , ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁mnyama , ▁kezadanganika . ▁Mbali ▁mhalati ▁vonda i lile , ▁wanhu ▁weza kwela ▁kumulima .”
▁Wa saho ▁zenu ▁viwa hitile ▁Misili , ▁wakala ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wengi ▁fana ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Mulongele ▁Haluni ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁seke yengile ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁kuchisogo ▁ya ▁panzia ▁lusita ▁ha lu londeka , ▁kwaviya ▁baho ▁honda ni lawile ▁kuna ▁diwingu ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba . ▁One ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo ▁kezadanganika .
▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondamu ni lavile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁zaka ▁zondamu hokele ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Za ka ▁iyo ▁yondamu ni lavile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mwiza mwing ' ha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni .
▁Henoko ▁viya mweleke ▁Mesusela ▁kakala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁matatu ▁na ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Gosheni ▁muhala , ▁ko wakalile ▁Waisilaili , ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe .
▁Munhu ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano , ▁ha lihigwa ▁fana ▁gweko ▁ mbali ▁ko lihigwa ▁fana ▁yombe .
▁Yesu ▁ka pata ▁usungu ▁muumoyo , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mbo na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel wa ▁uno ▁wo londa ▁vilaguso ? ▁Nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁ habule ▁chilaguso ▁chonda ▁weng ' higwe .”
▁muladi ▁ya to le ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁umanyi , ▁ya ho nde ▁zahabu ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁shaba ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Uko ▁Lisitila ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁mbetembete ▁kwandusi la ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwake ▁na ▁ha dahile ▁kugenda .
▁Kwa ▁lusita ▁luno ▁vini li ▁kutali ▁na ▁mweye , ▁no bwelela ▁kuwalongela ▁funhufunhu ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zi ni kalile ▁nowalongela ▁haulongozi ▁kuna ▁umwanza ▁wangu ▁wekaidi ▁wo nitendile ▁kumwenu . ▁Nowalongela ▁kuwa ▁vondanize ▁kaidi , ▁siza leka ▁kuwatagusa ▁waja ▁wo watendile ▁uhasanyi ▁umwaka ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wose ,
▁ Tindiwalo ▁da ▁Chilisito ▁di langulize ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu . ▁Mulungu ▁kawatanga ▁ya weng ' he ▁ijo ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁kumwenu ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lumwe , ▁iviya ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kulava ▁hewela .
▁Ivo ▁waja ▁watumigwa ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁wa watanga ▁ bumbila ▁jose ▁da ▁wanahina ▁na ▁wawalongela , ▁“ Ha vi nogile ▁bule ▁cheye ▁ku leka ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁chitende ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ku gola ▁ndiya .
▁Walawi ▁wa lamula ▁kuwa leka ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo , ▁wawa zimiza ▁ndugu ▁zawo , ▁hawa wa manyile ▁hata ▁wana ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁wa zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yako ▁na ▁kwa mha ▁lagano ▁jako .
▁Yesu ▁kawalola ▁waja ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁ludoko , ▁na ▁ka wona ▁usungu ▁muumoyo ▁wake ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁u dala ▁wa ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo . ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁yahololile , ▁“ Gol o sa ▁umkono ▁wako .” ▁Na yo ▁kau golosa , ▁bahobaho ▁umkono ▁wake ▁u hona .
▁Paulo ▁kedika , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁si vimanyile ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁do go go go , ▁kwaviya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ U leke ▁kulonga ▁vihile ▁kwa ▁im tawala ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wako .’ ▁”
▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁m kweli ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ni ▁m vwizi . ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Chila ▁uha longa ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ko wona ▁kolonga ▁viilondeka ▁na ▁muna ▁in ha g u so ▁weye ▁ko huma .”
▁Keza ika ▁hakwe ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Siku ▁za ▁mwanduso ▁hazi za petigwa ▁kwaviya ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake ▁za ▁kuika ▁hakwe . ▁Keza lava ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi .
▁Muna ▁ imbuli ▁ya ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁kutegeleza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁k andika ▁vino , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tegeleza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁keza kuwa ▁ngima ▁kwa ▁Malagilizo ▁yayo .”
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahawa ▁nyondenyonde , ▁na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁m nyonde nyonde . ▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁na ▁niye ▁ni me migwa ▁na ▁usungu .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kalonga ▁na ▁niye ▁muna ▁zinzozi ▁na ▁kani tanga , ▁‘ Ya ko b o ,’ ▁ni mwidika , ▁‘ Aino .’
▁Mbali ▁yoyose ▁yondaya mu lige ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁heza segeze ligwa ▁ng ' o , ▁kwaviya ▁ka tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wezakuja ▁nyama ▁ya ▁be belu ▁ijo ▁na ▁gate ▁dili ▁muna ▁ichi gelo ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Mu sa ▁kawalagiliza ▁vilihi ?”
▁Maabaho ▁hamwande ▁chidogo , ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁chidogo ▁ka mkanha miza ▁kulonga , ▁“ U kweli ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁nayo ▁ni ▁N galila ya !”
▁Viwa wone ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁kadanganika , ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yosefu ▁walonga , ▁“ Yodahika ▁Yosefu ▁kezachi hila ▁na ▁kezachi liha ▁yehile ▁yose ▁yochi mtendele ?”
▁Ka danganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁waja ▁weli ▁wagima ▁sekewawe ▁wagima ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ija ▁yadanganike ▁na ▁kuzilibuka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo .
▁Ka watanga ▁hamwe ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁Chilisito ▁Mkombola ▁kezakwelek igwa ▁kulihi ?”
▁Mu longa , ▁‘ H umbe ! ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kachi lagusa ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁vichi muhulike ▁kolonga ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoto ! ▁ Diyelo ▁chi wona ▁kuwa ▁yo dahika ▁munhu ▁kugendelela ▁kuwa ▁mgima , ▁inga wa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁nayo .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya si gaze ▁ndiya ▁iyo ▁m baka ▁imitondo .”
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁ gendelela ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yo londeka ▁you fundizigw e ▁na ▁kuhuwila ▁kwa ▁ugangamalo . ▁Ku wamanya ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wafundiza ▁wako ,
▁sekemu m zimize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mulavile ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁ko mu kalile ▁watumwa .
▁Mulungu ▁yoyo ching ' ha ▁tindiwalo ▁kamzilibula ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁yeli ▁m dimi ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kwaviya ▁ ke ti la ▁damu ▁yake ▁yoi lagusa ▁lagano ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁ni ▁kweli .
▁Na yo ▁vondayeze , ▁kezawa lagusa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ukweli ▁kuson hela ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁yaja ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kuson hela ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Wayahudi ▁wa mgwila ▁munhu ▁ino ▁na ▁wa londa ▁kumkoma . ▁Ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁ivo ▁ni hita ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wangu ▁na ▁ni mkombola .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁No uza , ▁vino ▁Mulungu ▁kowa lema ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁ni ▁Mu isi la eli , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini .
▁Yesu ▁kawa lavila ▁simwe ▁dimwenga ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ulinga ▁vino . ▁U linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁ya handile ▁mbeyu ▁zinogile ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wake .
▁“ Tat i ▁yangu ▁ko ni londa ▁kwaviya ▁no u lava ▁ugima ▁wangu ▁muladi ▁ni uhokele ▁kaidi .
▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wa hokela ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁fana ▁vichi hokele ▁cheye . ▁Vino ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kodaha ▁kuwa lemesa ▁sekewa batizigwe ▁na ▁mazi ?”
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalagiliza ▁ wemiliz i ▁wa ▁Chi mi sili ▁na ▁wa nya p a la ▁wa ▁Chi isi la ili , ▁kalonga ,
▁Mbali ▁L isi ya , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁walangulizi ▁keza ▁na ▁kamsola ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yetu .
▁M we zi ▁umwe ▁hamwande , ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁ya ▁mwezi , ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila , ▁weza i zindilila . ▁Weza kuja ▁hamwe ▁na ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁na ▁ mbo ga ▁zili ▁usungu .
▁Na ▁keza ya segeza ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ,
▁Hamwande ▁ha ▁yayo ▁ni ki ligwa ▁kombelo ▁da ▁uhumi ▁da ▁ku petigwa ▁ninoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁K ombe lo ▁diya ▁Mndewa ▁mwenyewo ▁yeli ▁msemi ▁yanogile , ▁keza ning ' ha ▁zuwa ▁ijo , ▁wala ▁si ▁niye ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo gozela ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁kulawilila ▁kwake .
▁mulume ▁iyo ▁keza mwing ' ha ▁tata ▁wa ▁mhambe ▁iyo ▁vihande ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁va ▁hela , ▁kwaviya ▁ka mguma ▁chinyala ▁muke ▁iyo , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁muke ▁wake . ▁Ha londeka ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wake .
▁Chila ▁na ha ya tanda ▁ma wing u ▁muna ▁u u langa ▁na ▁ pinde ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁diza lawilila ▁muna ▁yamawingu ,
▁Viwakalile ▁wang ' hali ▁wo bunhul a ▁yameso ▁yawo ▁kuulanga ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁ko soligwa , ▁bahobaho ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wa kalile ▁wa yawale ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁chwee ▁wema ▁habehi ▁yawo ,
▁“ M gale ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁m aabaho ▁uwa na v e .
▁“ Munyu ▁uno ga , ▁ mbali ▁munyu ▁waha giza ▁u munyu ▁wake , ▁u gumigw e ▁choni ▁m baka ▁uwe ▁na ▁u munyu ▁kaidi ?
▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁kwiza togoligwa ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa bule ▁ihile , ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁kwiza tagusigwa .”
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁wa ba hano ▁wanhu ▁haweza ▁ danganika ▁m baka ▁wa u wone ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoni wona ▁niye , ▁iviya ▁ko muwona ▁ija ▁yanhumile .
▁“ Kwa viya ▁kawa londa ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁kamsagula ni ▁na ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁yake ▁ng ' hulu , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kamulava ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Mwiza gendelela ▁kutenda ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁M agate ▁Ha ya gumigw e ▁L usu ▁fana ▁vini mu lagilize ni , ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁lusita ▁lwikigwe ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁ A b i bu , ▁kwaviya ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁uwo ▁ mulawa ▁Misili . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeye ze ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁makono ▁muhala .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁“ Mwiza ▁kun yamha ▁kwa ▁ma ze le ▁na ▁ma lungu ▁fana ▁viya ▁niye ▁na mba vi ? ▁ Siku ▁zose ▁nikala ▁hasi ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁hamu ni gwilile ▁bule .
▁Teng ' hu , ▁no mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁wangu ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁kwaviya ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁i longigwa ▁muna ▁izisi .
▁Kwa ▁kuu leka ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁woi lumiza ▁ni ▁fana ▁ku muwamb a ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi ▁na ▁ku mguma ▁chinyala ▁muumwingi .
▁Ndugu ▁wekaidi ▁i kala ▁ivo ▁ivo , ▁na ▁wekatatu , ▁m baka ▁wose ▁saba .
▁Ivo ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa ilongela , ▁“ Loleni , ▁hachi daha ▁kutenda ▁chochose . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wo muwinza !”
▁Mu lole si ▁kawedika , ▁“ Mu we ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁seke mdumbe . ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yenu , ▁niiyo ▁ yekile ▁hela ▁zenu ▁muna ▁ya maguniya . ▁Ni hokela ▁maliho ▁yenu .” ▁Maabaho ▁ka wagalila ▁Simeoni .
▁Wa segela ▁L i sima ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁L imoni ▁P ele zi ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁chilagano ▁na ▁Abulamu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ No la ga na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁ino ▁welesi ▁wako ▁wose ▁kuson gela ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Misili ▁m baka ▁lwanda ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁Efulati ,
▁L usita ▁Waisilaili ▁vi wamuwonile ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁wowa sondelela ▁wawo , ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya wataze .
▁Vi ku chi le ▁wa senga ▁waja ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wamulongela ▁Lutu , ▁“ L o p o la ▁na ▁u msole ▁muke ▁wako ▁na ▁wano ▁wa ndele ▁zako ▁waidi ▁muladi ▁sekemwi ze ▁kunangigwa ▁lusita ▁bululu ▁dino ▁vonda di tagusigwe .”
▁M avuta ▁ya sigale ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁keza muhaka ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁muna ▁iditwi , ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ▁kuilumba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁Yesu ▁iviya ▁ka gaya ▁na ▁kadanganika ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu , ▁muladi ▁yawa sa f ye ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁damu ▁yake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Muna ▁ivi nhu ▁venu ▁m olondeka ▁muwe ▁na ▁ ge m b e , ▁vondamu hite ▁uko , ▁mwiza di sang ' hanila ▁ku hi m bila ▁ kombo ▁na ▁ku sili za ▁ma vi ▁yenu .
▁Niye ▁no wabatiza ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁keza wabatiza ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .”
▁Kwiza tenda ▁m ahembe ▁mane , ▁chila ▁ching obweda ▁ he m b e ▁dimwe . ▁M ahembe ▁yayo ▁yezakuwa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁ulupango , ▁kwiza lu haka ▁shaba ▁ulupango ▁lose .
▁Kwa viya ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁waha tenda ▁vino ▁kwa ▁mbiki ▁m bisi , ▁izakuwa ze ▁kwa ▁mbiki ▁u nya lile ?”
▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowa lo t ele ▁kuson hela ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁uja ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁wa u pelemba ▁na ▁kuu lole sa ▁kuson hela ▁ulopozi ▁uno .
▁“ One ▁mkono ▁wako ▁hebu ▁mgulu ▁wako ▁waha kutenda ▁ wagize ▁uhuwilo ▁wako , ▁u kanhe ▁uka wa se ▁kutali ▁na ▁weye . ▁M uhavu ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁kuno ▁ku hungukilw a ▁na ▁mkono ▁hebu ▁mgulu , ▁se mbuse ▁kuwa ▁na ▁makono ▁maidi ▁hebu ▁migulu ▁midi ▁na ▁kwa sigwa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ Mu isi la ili ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁kumwenu ▁yoyo sa ka ▁mnyama ▁hebu ▁ndege ▁yo digwa , ▁kolondeka ▁ye tile ▁damu ▁hasi ▁na ▁ya isi li ze ▁na ▁msang a ,
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza kwika ▁mavuta ▁yayo ▁chidogo ▁muna ▁di ga nza ▁jake ▁da ▁kumoso ,
▁Ye ke ni ▁yamagate ▁muna ▁imisi tali ▁midi ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁meza ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁inogile , ▁chila ▁m sitali ▁uwe ▁na ▁magate ▁sita .
▁Na ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁Mulungu ▁wangu ▁keza fikiza ▁malond o ▁yenu ▁yose , ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁wingi ▁wa ▁utunhizo ▁wake .
▁No pula ▁udahi ▁wako ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uwe ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁viu chi laganile ▁viulongile ,
▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko lava ▁ugima , ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁munhu ▁ha lu daha ▁chinhu ▁bule . ▁Mbuli ▁zo ni walongele ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo wagalila ▁ugima .
▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wowa huwile , ▁chi wagalila ▁usenga ▁na ▁chi walongela ▁mbuli ▁zi chi sagule , ▁kuwa ▁sekewa je ▁chochose ▁chochi tose ligwe ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁sekewa je ▁damu ▁na ▁sekewa je ▁nyama ▁ya ▁ng ' onyo ▁d ib o b o to ligwe ▁na ▁wa yepule ▁na ▁u ashelati .”
▁He ma ▁vonda di se gezigwe , ▁Walawi ▁weza di segeza , ▁vonda di si mi kigwe , ▁Walawi ▁weza di simika . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁Mu la wi ▁yaha di kwenhukila ▁kezakomigwa .
▁“ Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ulinga ▁vino . ▁Ku kala ▁na ▁mfalume ▁ya weng ' hile ▁mwanage ▁dugila ▁da ▁ zengele .
▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose ▁kwa ▁wanhu , ▁kahita ▁Kapelinaumu .
▁“ ▁‘ Mwiza peta ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁miyanza ▁saba , ▁yose ▁izakuwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁kenda .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁mu komboligwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u u ge nzi ▁wenu ▁hau faya , ▁uwo ▁muu hokela ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wa saho ▁zenu . ▁Mbali ▁hamu komboligwe ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁viwo la , ▁fana ▁viya ▁hela ▁hebu ▁zahabu .
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi , ▁munhu , ▁ yu u mwidika ▁ivo ▁Mulungu ? ▁No ngo ▁hai daha ▁kumuuza ▁ija ▁ya i umbile , ▁“ Habali ▁kuni umba ▁fana ▁vino ?”
▁Ng ' hondolo ▁wangu ▁wo di hulika ▁dizi ▁jangu , ▁no wamanya ▁nawo ▁woni wi nza .
▁Niye ▁Yohana , ▁ni wona ▁na ▁kuhulika ▁mbuli ▁zino . ▁Na ▁vini komeleze ▁kuwona ▁na ▁kuhulika , ▁ni tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁hana ▁ yamagulu ▁ya ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁iyo ▁ya ni laguse ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose , ▁na ▁ni londa ▁kumtambikila .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁ditwi ▁siyo ▁m kila , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁uchanyha ▁siyo ▁hasi , ▁one ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo ▁na ▁kui t e ga nya ▁kuyatenda ,
▁na ▁no mpula ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Tata ▁wa ▁utunhizo , ▁ya mwing ' heni ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁yondaya mtende ni ▁muwe ▁wabala ▁na ▁kuwa gubulila ni ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁mu m manye ▁ng ' hani .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ulondo ▁ha p u wa ▁hishima ▁na ▁ha zahila ▁faida ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁ha ka wa ▁kupata ▁ludoko ▁na ▁ha peta ▁yehile .
▁“ Wapete ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Kohasi , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Walawi , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Iviya ▁lulimi ▁lu linga ▁fana ▁moto , ▁lulimi ▁ni ▁chi ungo ▁chochi mema ▁wihi ▁wa ▁chila ▁mbasakanyo ▁muna ▁ivi lu ngo ▁vetu , ▁lulimi ▁wo fi li za ▁lukuli ▁lose . ▁L o lunguza ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁wose ▁kwa ▁moto ▁na ▁lulimi ▁wenyewo ▁wo lunguza ▁na ▁moto ▁wou lawa ▁jehanamu .
▁“ M gale ▁Haluni ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁na ▁wanage , ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali . ▁Wa gale ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Paulo , ▁sekeudumbe ! ▁Ko londeka ▁ wime ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma . ▁Na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako ▁Mulungu ▁keza kombola ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁muna ▁ingalawa .’
▁Na ▁kaye ▁yoyose ▁yonda mwing ile ▁na ▁ku hokel igwa , ▁ka leni ▁umo ▁m baka ▁vondamu lawe ▁mudibululu ▁ijo .
▁Ch eye ▁iviya ▁cho vimanya ▁na ▁kuhuwila ▁ulondo ▁uya li nawo ▁Mulungu ▁kumwetu . ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁ulondo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ulondo , ▁waja ▁wokala ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kokala ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁nawo .
▁Habule ▁yonda ▁yam fundize ▁miyage , ▁hebu ▁yonda ▁ya mulongele ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁‘ M manye ▁Mndewa .’ ▁Kwa viya ▁wose ▁weza nimanya ▁niye , ▁kwandusi la ▁mbugi la mbu gila ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa manyike .
▁Eleazali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Walawi , ▁ndole zi ▁wa ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wose ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Zin a ▁jako ▁na ni ?” ▁Na yo ▁kedika , ▁“ Zin a ▁jangu ▁Lung ' husesa , ▁kwaviya ▁cha weng i !”
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁lagano ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁zo yamulagilize ▁Musa ▁yatende ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Moabu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lagano ▁do yatendile ▁nawo ▁uko ▁Holebu .
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁kuyamanya ▁mafundizo ▁yangu ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁wangu , ▁na ▁lungilo ▁jangu ▁muna ▁ugima ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wangu ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwangu ▁na ▁ku londa ▁kwangu ▁na ▁ku gozela ▁kwangu ,
▁ mbali ▁ha woneke ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu , ▁ila ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa kalangama ▁wowasaguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁cheye ▁chi dile ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁hamwande ▁ha ▁kuzilibuka ▁kwake .
▁nikala ▁no iyoha ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁ni di gaza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kwa mha ▁ng ' hani ▁malagilizo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kutogoligwa ▁kuno ga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁niye ▁nikala wa ▁si banange ▁bule .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mtowa ni ▁kwa ▁utamu ▁wa ▁ko lo lo ▁dikulu ▁na ▁ homa ▁na ▁maihu ▁na ▁vuke ▁na ▁ng ' hangu ▁na ▁ vula vu mbi ▁na ▁chimvuguya , ▁mwiza p a ti gwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁m baka ▁muna ngigwe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ▁yawe ▁simwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁makabila ▁yose ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ma duwilo ▁yose ▁ya ▁lagano ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁hamwande ▁Yosefu ▁kadanganika , ▁iviya ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁welesi ▁wose ▁wadanganika ‚
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁ndugu ▁saba ▁wa ▁tata ▁imwe , ▁Muyahudi ▁ya tangigwe ▁Si ke wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁wa tenda ▁ivo .
▁Isaka ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola ▁niye ▁na mu la la , ▁na ▁siku ▁yangu ▁ya ▁kudanganika ▁si i manyile ▁bule .
▁L usita ▁lwa ▁Elizabeti ▁ku ibasula ▁vilufikile , ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁viyahulike ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa hulika ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ko pata ▁wanahina ▁wengi ▁na ▁kubatiza ▁kumfosa ▁Yohana .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁ya komile ▁kolondeka ▁ya kale ▁mgati ▁ya ▁dibululu ▁da ▁kukimbilila ▁m baka ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁vondaya danganike , ▁iha mala ▁ifa ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo , ▁kodaha ▁kubwela ▁ukaye .
▁One ▁mulume ▁yaha mbandama ▁mnyama , ▁kweli ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁na ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁ wolondeka ▁wa komigwe .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁ni iwawo ▁wowa mulongele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ya walekelele ▁Waisilaili ▁wa lawe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁niza tenda ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁mo londa ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁kolonga ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁yangu . ▁Kweli ▁kumwenu ▁Chilisito ▁si ▁nyondenyonde , ▁ mbali ▁ko lagusa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁hagati ▁yenu .
▁Kwa ▁saa ▁dimwe ▁muhala ▁vinhu ▁vako ▁vingi ▁vi segela .” ▁“ Maabaho ▁walangulizi ▁wose ▁wa ▁m eli ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁muna ▁zim eli ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁muna ▁im eli ▁na ▁wa chuuzi ▁wo chuuza ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁bahali ▁wema ▁kutali .”
▁Na yo ▁kakala ▁na ▁udahi ▁wose ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso . ▁Na ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁udahi ▁wose ▁wa ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁hanhu ▁hake , ▁kai wa ng ili za ▁isi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁umo ▁wa di tumbalil e ▁mavindi ▁ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁dodi kalile ▁na ▁chi londa ▁chikulu ▁ng ' hani ▁chochi gala ▁ifa ▁chochi ho ni le .
▁Uko ▁Yelusalemu ▁kukala ▁na ▁Wayahudi ▁wo mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁wowa lawile ▁chila ▁isi ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ulanga .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁wihi ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁yehile ▁chila ▁siku ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁si ▁watumigwa ▁hebu ▁walotezi ▁hebu ▁wafundiza . ▁Si ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza .
▁siza sola ▁ lusi ng i ja ▁hebu ▁luzabi ▁lwa ▁chila tu , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chako ▁chochose , ▁muladi ▁sekeu longe ▁kuwa ▁kuni tende za ▁niwe ▁tajili .
▁Isaka ▁kamuuza , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ?” ▁Na yo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁niiyo ▁Esau ▁mwanago ▁chaudele .”
▁Kwa viya ▁chiha gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁gila di ▁chaha mala ▁kuvimanya ▁kweli , ▁ habule ▁nhosa ▁yoi daha ▁ku lavigwa ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi .
▁Paulo ▁ka tangigwa ▁mgati , ▁T eli tu lo ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga ▁hana ▁ichitala ▁ha ▁Felisi . ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁chi de ng ' helela ▁tindiwalo ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁ ulangulizi ▁wako , ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁vovi l ondigwa ▁vi tendigw a ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁isi ▁yetu .
▁Ka mtuma ▁mtumwa ▁imwenga , ▁iyo ▁wa mkoma . ▁Kawa tuma ▁watumwa ▁wamwenga ▁wengi , ▁wamwenga ▁wawa towa , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wa wakoma .
▁na ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁ yelekigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako ▁hebu ▁ya guligwe ▁kwa ▁hela ▁kolondeka ▁yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana . ▁Chi no ▁chi zakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁lagano ▁do ni kile ▁na ▁weye ▁ni ▁da ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Mulungu ▁ka sasala ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁muladi ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wetu ▁sekeya hu ng u kiligwe ▁na ▁chinhu .
▁Katenda ▁mibiki ▁midi ▁ya ▁mkenge ▁na ▁ka ihaka ▁zahabu .
▁Sekeu londe ▁ya k ongeze ▁hela ▁imwenga ▁muna ▁i hela ▁iya kwa zi me , ▁ mbali ▁ umdumbe ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁muladi ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁ya dahe ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁simwe ▁dino , ▁“ Munhu ▁imwe ▁ka lima ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁mizabibu . ▁Ke ka ▁walimi , ▁m aabaho ▁kahita ▁kuna i isi ▁imwenga ▁kakala ▁siku ▁mengi .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Bulahimu ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wake .”
▁Ch eye ▁cho londeka ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wa li ngile ▁vino , ▁muladi ▁chi sang ' hane ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ukweli .
▁One ▁chiha wa ▁na ▁ndiya ▁na ▁viwalo , ▁cho londeka ▁k wene z wa ▁navo .
▁Wamisili ▁viwa nduse ▁kuwa ▁na ▁nzala , ▁wa mulilila ▁mfalume ▁ya weng ' he ▁ndiya . ▁Mbali ▁mfalume ▁kawalongela ▁Wamisili ▁wose , ▁“ Mu hite ▁kwa ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁mutende ▁chonda yawalongele .”
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ni longele , ▁zino ▁izo ▁hela ▁zose ▁zim patile ▁weye ▁na ▁mulume ▁wako ▁kwa ▁ku chuuza ▁mgunda ?” ▁Na yo ▁kedika , ▁“ Ona , ▁ivo .”
▁Nowalongela ni ▁kweli ! ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya muhokele ▁munhu ▁yoyanitumile , ▁ko ni hokela ▁niye . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya ni hokele ▁niye , ▁ko muhokela ▁ija ▁yoyanhumile .”
▁m baka ▁keka ▁chilagano ▁kuwa , ▁“ Noilaha ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chochose ▁chonda ya n pule !”
▁Chi zakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁hagati ▁ya ▁niye ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁siku ▁zose , ▁mana ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni lumba ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁sita , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁ni leka ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁ni humula .’ ▁”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kalagiliza ▁wa ka tangigwe ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Eliabu , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁walonga , ▁“ Ch eye ▁hachiza kwiza .
▁Niye ▁no londa ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁fana ▁Wayahudi ▁wa wone ▁migongo , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kuwakombola ▁wamwenga ▁wawo .
▁Basi ▁Yakobo , ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wawo ▁wowa woneke ▁kuwa ▁walangulizi ▁wakulu , ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁sang ' hano ▁ino , ▁wa c ha m hi sa ▁makono ▁niye ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁na ▁wawo ▁cha wa mwe . ▁Ivo ▁chi itogolela ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁chiza hita ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wawo ▁weza hita ▁kuwapetela ▁Wayahudi .
▁wachi lamba ▁ng ' hani ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kui lumbiliza ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁ino ▁ya ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁Yudeya .
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa muhulike , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Lelo ▁yelihi ▁yondaya dahe ▁kukomboligwa ?”
▁M olondeka ▁mutende ▁mbuli ▁zo yalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁zino ga ▁na ▁zi go loka ▁muladi ▁mu gendelele ▁vinogile ▁na ▁mui sole ▁isi ▁inogile ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya ilahile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Kwa viya ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vilumb igwa ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁vose ▁va uko ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁na ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁Mulungu . ▁Mulungu ▁ yatunhizigwe ▁siku ▁zose ! ▁Ivo .
▁Muna ▁disanduku ▁ijo , ▁kwiza kwika ▁vi bawo ▁va ▁mabwe ▁va ▁ukalangama ▁vondani kwing ' he .
▁Mwiza lava ▁wanyama ▁wawo , ▁iviya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku , ▁yoilavigw a ▁chila ▁imitondo .
▁Wa mtemela ▁mate ▁Lebeka ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁“ W eye ▁mwa li ▁wetu ▁uwe ▁mama ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁ng ' hani ! ▁W elesi ▁wako ▁wa sole ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁wehi ▁wawo !”
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Isilaili ▁wowa hitile ▁Misili ▁hamwe ▁nayo ,
▁Kwa bule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wetu , ▁kwaviya ▁moyo ▁wako ▁hau nogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Segeleni ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁muladi ▁niwa danganize ▁sambi !” ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa ibwanha ▁chingubingubi .
▁M olondeka ▁ku sagula . ▁Ni ze ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁ balati ▁hebu ▁ni ze ▁na ▁muhe ▁wa ▁ulondo ▁na ▁uhole ? ▁No gesa ▁mo londa ▁ni ze ▁na ▁ulondo ▁na ▁uhole .
▁No daha ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ku lotela ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁nodaha ▁kuwa ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wose ▁na ▁kuvimanya ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi fisigwe , ▁nodaha ▁kuwa ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wa ▁ku daha ▁ku ha miza ▁migongo , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁na bule ▁ulondo , ▁niye ▁si ▁chinhu .
▁Ch a ha vwiziligwa ▁cho kwidika ▁vinogile . ▁M baka ▁sambi ▁cheye ▁cho woneka ▁fana ▁u nyolo do ▁wa ▁isi ▁na ▁u nyolo do ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu mtende ▁mwanago ▁wa ▁chike ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁kumtenda ▁malaya , ▁muladi ▁isi ▁yose ▁sekei me me ▁u mala ya ▁na ▁wihi .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ija ▁wa i bagula , ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁watumigwa .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Gadi ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Se f oni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ha gi ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S hu ni
▁Maabaho ▁keza mulava ▁ndege ▁wekaidi ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁fana ▁vi i lagilizigwe . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁Viwa segele ▁L e fi di mu ▁na ▁kufika ▁kuichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai , ▁Waisilaili ▁wa zenga ▁lago ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁nhatu , ▁kukala ▁na ▁dugila ▁da ▁ sola ▁mudibululu ▁da ▁Ka na , ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya . ▁ Mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁uko .
▁Ichil o ▁icho ▁wam ng ' wiza ▁upele ▁ tati ▁yawo , ▁na ▁imndele ▁imkulu ▁kahita ▁ka ibandama ▁nayo . ▁Mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁lusita ▁imndele ▁wake ▁viya i bandame ▁nayo , ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁yako ligwe .
▁Iviya ▁nowalongela ni , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mwene ▁uhasanyi ▁yoyo samha ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda ▁wanogile ▁wo hawa londa ▁ku samha .”
▁Ivo ▁hamu hu ng u kiligwe ▁bule ▁kuhokela ▁vitumetume ▁vovose ▁vovi lavigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁fana ▁vimu gozela ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ya gubul igwe .
▁Isi ▁yose ▁iza lunguzigw a ▁na ▁ch ib ili ti ▁na ▁munyu ▁na ▁kutimbuligwa , ▁haiza ha n digwa ▁mbeyu ▁hebu ▁haiza ko ta ▁chochose . ▁I za linga ▁fana ▁lusita ▁luja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya i na ngile ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola , ▁Adi ma ▁na ▁Se b o i mu ▁kwa ▁ludoko ▁lwake .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁ni bananga ▁kwa ▁kum biduka ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁uhasanyi ▁yakomigwe .” ▁Wawo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Ya yo ▁cheye ▁haya chi son hela ▁ manye ▁mwenyewo .”
▁Ivo ▁wasegela ▁waidumwe ▁kwa ▁ngalawa , ▁wahita ▁hanhu ▁heli bule ▁wanhu .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁wanhu ▁wadodo ▁wawo ▁wondawa komboligwe ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika ,
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁niwa ▁mkaya ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁hela ▁nyingi .” ▁Paulo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Loma ▁kwa ▁k welekwa .”
▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ichi wapetela ▁i fi si ka , ▁i fi si ka ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wo kwa ga ▁iviya .
▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁yowa s ha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁kuchi fisa ▁hebu ▁kuchi gubika ▁kwa ▁nongo . ▁Mbali ▁chitasa ▁cho kwikigwa ▁ha ichingolobweda ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wo kwingila ▁wa wone ▁bu ng ' hulo .
▁Ivo ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Isaya ▁ iti miya ▁kumwawo , ▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁weza tegeleza ▁na ▁kutegeleza , ▁ mbali ▁haweza vimanya , ▁Weza lola ▁na ▁kulola ▁ mbali ▁haweza wona ,
▁Wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Isaka ▁wa himba ▁ chisima ▁muna ▁diza nda ▁na ▁wafika ▁ sima ▁da ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ugima .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yaha mkoma ▁miyage ▁gila di , ▁hata ▁fana ▁ka kimbilila ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁lwa ▁kui gombela , ▁m segeze ni ▁na ▁mu mkome .
▁Wawo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ M sang ' hani ▁wako ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima ▁na ▁ka c he lwa .” ▁Maabaho ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi .
▁Sala , ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu , ▁viyakalile ▁mulala ▁kamwelek ela ▁mwana ▁mwenevale ▁wangu , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose .
▁one ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁wekaidi ▁yaha mwing ' ha ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁na ▁ku muwinga ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁hebu ▁one ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁yahadanganika ,
▁Vini fikile ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Tulowa ▁kui peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Chilisito , ▁Mndewa ▁kani vugulil a ▁ulwivi .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ulondo ▁ha de ng ' helela ▁yehile , ▁ mbali ▁ko de ng ' helela ▁yanogile .
▁ mbali ▁vondachi ze ▁chiya ▁chika mili ke , ▁vose ▁vili ▁havi ka mili ke ▁viza ha lawa .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ L u mbu ▁jako ▁keza zilibuka .”
▁Viya kalile ▁ko gesa ▁ivo , ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Maliya , ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yohana , ▁zina ▁jake ▁dimwenga ▁Maliki . ▁Uko ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁kutosa .
▁Viya muwonile ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁kutali , ▁kam kimbilila ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi .
▁Vi chifikile ▁Yelusalemu , ▁wahuwila ▁wachi hokela ▁kwa ▁ nde ng ' helelo .
▁One ▁niha zenga ▁kaidi ▁chiya ▁ch ib o mo ligwe , ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁m bomola ji ▁wa ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Niye ▁na mgati ▁mwa ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwa mgati ▁mmwangu , ▁na ▁Niye ▁na mgati ▁mmwenu .
▁Keza ko ga ▁umo ▁mgati ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile ▁na ▁ku yawala ▁viwalo ▁vake . ▁Keza lawa ▁na ▁kui lavila ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁kalonga , ▁“ Siza kuleka ▁u wone ▁chihanga ▁changu , ▁mana ▁munhu ▁yaha niwona ▁niye ▁hawa ▁mgima .”
▁“ L usita ▁lwa ▁ku zunguluk igwa ▁na ▁kugazigwa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁nzala ▁iza mtenda ni ▁muwa je ▁wanenu ▁woya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Yano ▁mauzauza , ▁ha bali ▁chi ba go ▁cho kwaka ▁moto ▁na ▁hachi ta ka mila ? ▁Niza chi kwenhukila ▁ni ka chi lole .”
▁M beyu ▁yo ihandigwe ▁na ▁muha ndi ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁maihu ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁Wamisili , ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁vi londa ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁na ▁kuwa wa , ▁ivo ▁hamu daha ▁ku hona .
▁Mu wagala ▁walume ▁wano ▁hano ▁inga wa ▁hawa ba wile ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kaye ▁ya ▁m ulungu ▁hebu ▁ka muliga ▁m ulungu ▁wetu ▁wa ▁chike .
▁D e b o la ▁ya ya ▁wa ▁Lebeka ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka wandigwa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁muwa lo ni ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁Beseli . ▁Ivo ▁Yakobo ▁kaha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ A lo ni ▁ B a ku si , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ mu wa lo ni ▁wa ▁ndilo .”
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁walonga , ▁“ Ka longa ▁kuwa ▁hachi daha ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁ho yo hita . ▁Vino ▁ko londa ▁ya i kome ▁mwenyewo ?”
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁hata ▁yano ▁ya lawilile ▁haya gesile ▁bule .
▁Bulahimu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Noilaha .”
▁Ivo ▁kezatenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁za mbule ▁mwiko ▁zi watendile ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁wose . ▁Iviya ▁kezatenda ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁dili ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu di sang ' hanile ▁chakachaka ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mtagusa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo di sang ' hanila ▁chakachaka ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Wa fundiza ▁Ma la gi l zo ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁Mafalisayo ▁vi wamuwonile ▁koja ▁na ▁“ we li ▁na ▁uhasanyi ” ▁na ▁wa sola ▁kodi , ▁wawa uza ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Habali ▁koja ▁na ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wano ?”
▁Leka mana ▁cho londeka ▁kuya tegeleza ▁ng ' hani ▁yose ▁kwa ▁ugangamalo ▁na ▁ukweli ▁yaja ▁yochi yahulike ▁muladi ▁sekechi ya p u we .
▁Na ▁waja ▁Mulungu ▁woyawasagule ▁kulawa ▁umwaka , ▁kawatanga ▁viya ▁viya , ▁nawo ▁kawatanga , ▁na ▁kuwa peta ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁nawo ▁kawa peta ▁wanoga , ▁kawa tunhiza ▁viya ▁viya .
▁Maabaho ▁damu ▁imwenga ▁keza ika ▁muna ▁yam ahembe ▁ya ▁lupango ▁lw ili ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Da mu ▁isi galile ▁keza itila ▁hasi ▁hana ▁ichi kalilo ▁cha ▁ulupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁habehi ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Basi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbasakanyo ▁ino ▁Yesu ▁kawa ▁ mwimiliz i ▁wa ▁lagano ▁dinogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁ka sunh a ▁utumbo ▁na ▁migulu ▁na ▁kui timbula ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁muna ▁ulupango .
▁Ivo ▁kabwela ▁na ▁ka mfika ▁Balaki ▁yang ' hali ▁kema ▁habehi ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁yeye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Moabu .
▁Saimoni ▁kachilongela ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viya watendele ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁baho ▁mwanduso , ▁kawasagula ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁wawe ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁T ajili ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁‘ B ule ▁tata ▁Bulahimu . ▁Fan a ▁munhu ▁yoya zilibuke ▁yahawa hiti la , ▁weza leka ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .’
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kaye ka ▁hakwe ▁mabululu ▁matatu ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .
▁Ivo ▁one ▁waha mulavila ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁nhambiko ▁hana ▁ichilingo ▁cha ▁kutambikila ▁na ▁kuno ▁ku kumbuka ▁kuwa ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁kana ▁mbuli ▁na ▁weye .

▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁muna ▁U lugongo ▁lwa ▁Mizaituni , ▁u mwa mbo ▁wa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana ▁na ▁Andeleya ▁wamuuza ▁viwa kalile ▁waidumwe .
▁Niza di kumbuka ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima . ▁Mazi ▁ha ye za galuka ▁kaidi ▁kuwa ▁ gombo ▁kuvi nanga ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima .
▁Mbali ▁vilung o ▁vetu ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁havi londeka . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁ka l wika ▁lukuli ▁muna ▁um pango , ▁kavi ng ' ha ▁unovu ▁ng ' hani ▁viu ngo ▁viya ▁vi hungukilw e ▁unovu ,
▁Lelo ▁Musa ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁kuulanga , ▁kukala ▁na ▁ziza ▁totolo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu .
▁Cho ni londa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁lolelo ▁jangu ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁choni tenda ▁chondachi ni gume ▁chinyala , ▁niza kuwa ▁galu ▁muladi ▁sambi ▁na ▁lusita ▁lose , ▁niha danganika ▁hebu ▁ni hawa ▁mgima , ▁Chilisito ▁ko tunhizigwa ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lwangu .

▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Bulahimu ▁kamulava ▁mwanage ▁Isaka ▁yawe ▁nhosa ▁lusita ▁Mulungu ▁viya m gezile . ▁Bulahimu ▁iyo ▁ya kalile ▁ka hokela ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁kakala ▁kamala ▁ku mulava ▁mwanage ▁nyachende ▁yawe ▁nhosa .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁keza mulongolelani ▁na ▁kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁heza muleka ni ▁hebu ▁heza mwasa ni . ▁Ivo ▁sekemudumbe ▁hebu ▁sekemu fe ▁moyo .”
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Bulahimu ▁ka hokela ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuwa ▁tata , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kulonga ▁kakala ▁mulala ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁Sala ▁mke ▁wake ▁kakala ▁m gum ba . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁i lawilila ▁kwaviya ▁Bulahimu ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁yoya kalile ▁kamwing ' ha ▁chilagano ▁kuwa ▁mwaminika .
▁Viya fosile ▁yayo ▁Mulungu ▁kam geza ▁Bulahimu . ▁Kamulongela , ▁“ Bulahimu !” ▁Na yo ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Na ba ha !”
▁“ Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Walongele ▁wawo ▁sekewa hite ▁kuitowa , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁sili ▁hamwe ▁nawo , ▁ivo ▁wehi ▁wawo ▁weza wa towa .’

▁Ka zumha , ▁kema ▁kwa ▁magulu ▁yake ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kugenda ▁ genda . ▁Maabaho ▁kengila ▁nawo ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ko genda ▁na ▁ko zumha ▁ zumha ▁na ▁ko mtogoza ▁Mulungu .

▁“ P e t eni ▁ma j uma ▁saba ▁kwandusi la ▁vimu gobola ▁mhule .
▁Maabaho ▁kawatum a ▁wahite ▁ku petela ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ kuhonya ▁watamu .
▁Lelo ▁Mulungu ▁ka galula ▁kawaleka ▁muladi ▁wa tose le ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁walotezi , ▁‘ M weye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁Si ▁niye ▁bule ▁muni lavile ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁kuja ▁kudibwilingu ?
▁“ Kuson hela ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani ▁kalonga , ▁‘ D a ni ▁ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁simba , ▁yo zumha ▁kulawa ▁Bashani .’
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁kenda ▁Abida ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ G i di oni , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁“ Si vimanyile ▁chondachi ni lawilile ▁Yelusalemu , ▁ mbali ▁no muhulika ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁nohita ▁uko .
▁Kwa viya ▁sambi ▁mweye ▁mwa wa na , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtuma ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁mwanage ▁muna ▁im yoyo ▁yetu , ▁Muhe ▁yo lila ▁“ A ba ,” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Tata .”
▁“ Ko londeka ▁ya kale ▁kuulanga ▁m baka ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kutend igwa ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁kaidi ▁lu fike , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁kufose la ▁walotezi ▁wake ▁welile ▁wowa kalile ▁umwaka .
▁Na yo ▁Yohana ▁viyakalile ▁ko komeleza ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake , ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu , ▁‘ M weye ▁mwo gesa ▁niye ▁na ye lihi ? ▁Si ▁niye ▁bule ▁imu m go za . ▁Mbali ▁imwe ▁kokwiza ▁kuchisogo ▁changu , ▁iyo ▁niye ▁si faya ▁bule ▁hata ▁kwi inama ▁na ▁ku fungula ▁nzabi ▁za ▁vilatu ▁vake .’
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondau weke ▁hakwe ▁Walawi ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Walawi ▁weza kuwa ▁wangu .
▁Y eye ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁mkulu , ▁niye ▁no londeka ▁kuwa ▁mdodo .”
▁‘ Noilaha ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁hata ▁mulume ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁walume ▁waja ▁wa lawile ▁Misili , ▁kwandusi la ▁yeli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁yondaya i wone ▁isi ▁iyo ▁yoni wa la hile ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa nitegeleze .
▁Efiloni ▁kamwidika ▁Bulahimu ,
▁Lelo ▁chilonge ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁chitende ▁uhasanyi ▁kwaviya ▁hachi langulizigw a ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁cho langulizigw a ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule !
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vo wekile ▁vinhu ▁vose . ▁Maabaho ▁chila ▁siku ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁chiya ▁cha ▁mwanduso ▁cha ▁di zewe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁za ▁nhambiko .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁viwa kalile ▁mwiinzila , ▁kengila ▁mwii chibululu . ▁M wanamke ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwe ▁Masa ▁ka muhokela ▁mwiikaye ▁yake .
▁Iviya ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa , ▁kwika ▁chandusilo ▁cha ▁isi , ▁na ▁ka lumba ▁ulanga ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yako .

▁Yesu ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kulava ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁ kuhonya ▁mitamu ▁yoyose ▁na ▁unyondenyonde ▁wose .
▁Wa ka ya ▁wayage ▁wa fi kigwa ▁na ▁lugano , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zen ela ▁muna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁Sala ▁ka se ka ▁chimo yo mo yo ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Sambi ▁niye ▁na mu la la . ▁Lelo ▁nodaha ze ▁kude ng ' helela ▁kupata ▁wimo ▁kwa ▁mu lu ma ng u ▁yeli ▁mulala ?”
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁yaja ▁ya wakalile ▁wo gesa ▁mwi ▁im yoyo ▁yawo . ▁Ivo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Habali ▁mwo gesa ▁ivo ▁mwi ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ?
▁Ni mwandikilani ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wo geza ▁kum wagiza ni .
▁Wanage ▁Yakobo ▁wamwidika ▁kwa ▁ku mvwizila ▁Shekemu ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Hamoli , ▁kwaviya ▁Shekemu ▁kamtenda ▁ lumbu ▁jawo ▁Dina ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁“ Sekemu sole ▁chi gelo ▁cha ▁mwanza ▁wa ▁ku p u lila , ▁iviya ▁sekemu sole ▁ma ko ti ▁maidi , ▁vilatu ▁hebu ▁ng ho me . ▁M sang ' hani ▁kolondeka ▁yeng ' higwe ▁kulawa ▁umo .
▁Viwakalile ▁wolawa ▁muna ▁yamazi , ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁kamsola ▁Filipo , ▁na ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁ha muwone ▁kaidi ▁ mbali ▁ka gendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wake ▁kuno ▁ko de ng ' helela .
▁ Kuson gela ▁siku ▁ijo , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wengi ▁wabwela ▁kuchisogo ▁na ▁hawa m sondelele ▁bule .
▁Sekemu wa zimize ▁Walawi ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁kwaviya ▁wabule ▁uhazi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Na ▁niye ▁nizawa uza ▁mbuli ▁imwe , ▁ nilongele ni ,
▁“ ▁‘ Ha i togoligwa ▁ku mwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁wanyama , ▁kwaviya ▁kawa ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamala , ▁yawe ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo , ▁ni ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Lola ▁lelo ! ▁Ka ba hano , ▁kolonga ▁muumwingi ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo mulongela ▁chinhu ▁chochose . ▁Vino ▁walangulizi ▁wo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁iyo ▁ni ▁Chilisito ?

▁Uno ▁ulo ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Isaka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu . ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwelek a ▁Isaka
▁Wa nhu ▁viwahulike ▁yano , ▁wa somigwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁wamuuza ▁Petili ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁wamwenga , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zetu , ▁chitende ▁choni ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Kaisaliya ▁Filipi . ▁Mwii nzila ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Ni longele ni , ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁niye ▁iyo ▁yelihi ?”
▁niza kumbuka ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁do nitendile ▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁kaidi ▁niza kumbuka ▁isi ▁ija .
▁ Kolineliyo ▁ka mulola ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁chino ▁choni ?” ▁M senga ▁iyo ▁kedika , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kanogel igwa ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yako ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁kwa ▁ngayengaye , ▁nayo ▁keza kwidika .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho vimanya ▁magayo ▁yochi gaya ▁sambi ▁si ▁chinhu ▁na ▁haya linganyiz wa ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wonda u lawilile ▁kumwetu .
▁Chi muwona ▁munhu ▁ino ▁m so vu ▁na ▁chandusilo ▁cha ▁ h engelehengele ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Wayahudi ▁wose ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁m aabaho ▁ni ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁di tangigwa ▁Wana za la yo .
▁Mulungu ▁ka ng ula ni ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu , ▁ivo ▁sekemuwe ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁Zi la ▁nayo ▁kamwelek a ▁T u bali ka i ni , ▁yoya kalile ▁mu hu nzi ▁wa ▁vi a ▁vose ▁va ▁shaba ▁na ▁ma zuma . ▁Lu mbu ▁wa ▁T u bali ka i ni ▁ka tangigwa ▁Na ma .
▁Vino gile ▁kutenda ▁ni ▁ku leka ▁kuja ▁nyama ▁hebu ▁kung ' wa ▁divai ▁hebu ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chondachi mtende ▁miyago ▁ya gwe ▁muna ▁uhasanyi .
▁ G a li yo ▁viyakalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁Akaya , ▁Wayahudi ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe , ▁wa mgwila ▁Paulo ▁na ▁wa mgala ▁kuna ▁ichitala .
▁Wa danganize ni ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi , ▁fana ▁viyalagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zi yalongile ▁Saimoni ▁ku mson hela ▁imwana .
▁Na ye ▁kawedika , ▁‘ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁ija ▁yeli ▁na ▁chinhu ▁keza kong e zi ligwa , ▁na ▁ija ▁yeli bule ▁chinhu , ▁keza ho kigwa ▁hata ▁chiya ▁chidodo ▁chiyeli na cho .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ N I Y E ▁I Y O ▁N I Y E .” ▁Na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Walongele ▁vino ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ‚ ▁‘ I ja ▁i wo mtanga ▁I Y O ▁N I Y E ▁ka nhu ma ▁kumwenu .’ ▁”
▁“ W e hi ▁wenu ▁waha mtowa ni , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwa hume . ▁Weza kwiza ▁kumtowa ni ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁imwe ▁ mbali ▁weza kimbila ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁saba .
▁Di v a i ▁vi i malile , ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Wa bule ▁divai .”
▁M weye ▁hamu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁niha dahile ▁ku mtanga ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁yaha mgalile ▁mvunyo ▁wa ▁ma je shi ▁kufosa ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wamuhitila , ▁walonga , ▁“ Yohana ▁ha tendile ▁mauzauza ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁chila ▁mbuli ▁iya mulongele ▁munhu ▁ino ▁i kala ▁kweli .”
▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁kabila ▁da ▁Efulaimu , ▁Eli s ha ma ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Amihudi , ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase , ▁Gamali eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P e da s uli ,
▁L usita ▁lw ingi ▁wa geza ▁kum zingiliza , ▁ mbali ▁kai du mu la ▁minyololo ▁viwa m zingiliza ga ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake ▁na ▁kuvi bena ga - bena ga ▁vi zuma ▁viwa m zingiliza ga ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁yake . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoya dahile ▁kumgwila .
▁Isi ▁ izakwima ▁matunda ▁yake ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi mulonda ▁kuja , ▁na ▁mwiza kala ▁ bila ▁kudumba .
▁Viwafikile ▁wawa tosela ▁wahuwila ▁wowa muhokele ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Tend eni ▁vinhu ▁vovi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁ muleka ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu . ▁ Leke ni ▁ku ilongela , ▁‘ Bulahimu ▁wa saho ▁yenu !’ ▁Nowalongela , ▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kuya sola ▁mabwe ▁yano ▁na ▁kuyatenda ▁yawe ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu !
▁Filipo ▁kamuwona ▁Nasanayeli , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi muwona ▁ija ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁za ndikigwe ▁na ▁Musa ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁Malagilizo , ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁iviya ▁wa ndik a ▁mbuli ▁zake . ▁Niiyo ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu .”
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁sili ▁ino ▁i fisike ▁sekemwi ze ▁kui wona ▁mweye ▁mwa wa ba la ▁ng ' hani . ▁U dala ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁ukala ▁wa ▁lusita ▁muhala ▁m baka ▁m he ta ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁vondawa mbwe lele ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka wedika , ▁iyo ▁yehile ▁niiyo ▁ya sang ' hane ▁mbuli ▁iyo . ▁Na ▁watumigwa ▁wamulongela ▁ko nda chi hite ▁chika ya ng ' o le ?
▁Kuna zo ▁siku ▁sita ▁za ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁zose ,
▁Wakala ▁wo mzahila ▁Yesu , ▁ivo ▁viwa iting ' hane ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁wa iuzagiza , ▁“ M wo wona ze ? ▁Vino ▁heza kwiza ▁bule ▁muna ▁Didugila ?”
▁“ One ▁mulume ▁yaha sola ▁muke ▁na ▁hamwande ▁ha mulonda ▁kaidi ▁kwaviya ▁ka wona ▁ha faya , ▁mulume ▁yaha mwing ' ha ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁na ▁ku muwinga ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁muke ▁iyo ▁yaha segela ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wowamsondelel e ▁Yesu ▁wowa lawile ▁Kaisaliya ▁wahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ▁wachi gala ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁M n asoni . ▁M n asoni ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁wa ▁Chipulo , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁ muhuwila ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁“ G a di ▁keza towigwa ▁na ▁mabe du wi , ▁Mbali ▁yeye ▁kezawa sondelela ▁kuchisogo ▁na ▁kuwatowa .”
▁Chila ▁mwaka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁wakala ▁na ▁chihendo ▁cha ▁kuhita ▁Yelusalemu ▁muu lusita ▁lwa ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga ▁yayo , ▁keza ▁munhu ▁kulawa ▁kui kaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela . ▁Kamulongela ▁Yailo , ▁“ Mndele ▁wako ▁kamala ▁kudanganika . ▁Sekeu nga ze ▁ Mfundiza .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka lola ▁kuulanga , ▁ka bweleza ▁umuh e ▁na ▁ku mulongele la ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁“ E fa ta !” ▁F a mbulo ▁jake , ▁“ V ugu ka !”
▁na ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Wa tenda ▁ mhete ▁zimwenga ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁kuulongozi ▁hana ▁zi mhembe ▁za ▁hasi ▁za ▁vihande ▁va ▁chizibawo , ▁hanhu ▁ho chi ilumba ▁na ▁mkwiji ▁uja ▁u botigwe ▁vinogile .
▁Yesu ▁kalawa ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela , ▁kahita ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Saimoni . ▁ Mama ▁m ko yi ▁wa ▁Saimoni ▁kakala ▁mtamu , ▁kolumwa ▁ homa ▁ka li , ▁ivo ▁wa n pula ▁Yesu ▁ya mu honye .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yo lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yoyose , ▁keza sola ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁yoya lavigwe .
▁Munhu ▁yonda ▁ya hume ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁kutegeleza ▁mbuli ▁zo ni ku fundize ▁m baka ▁kulu komeleze lo , ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuwa tawala ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose .
▁Kwa viya ▁chip indi ▁icho ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ha kalile ▁yowa humuluk ila ▁yoyose ▁viweli , ▁wakala ▁wa batizigwe ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁muhala .
▁Yuda ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁vi wezile ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Yosefu , ▁Yosefu ▁kakala ▁yang ' hali ▁umo . ▁Ivo ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁kwa ▁hishima .
▁Filipo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Wa ha huwila ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wako ▁wose ▁kodaha ▁kubatizigwa .” ▁Na yo ▁kalonga , ▁“ No huwila ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁W eye ▁kwa m delenya ! ▁Teng ' hu ▁ lava ▁ ba le ▁dili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁jako , ▁m aabaho ▁kwiza daha ▁kulava ▁chi banzi ▁chili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁da ▁ndugu ▁yako .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ko m gomesa ▁lusita ▁voyo hulika ▁voyo kwika ▁chilagano ▁icho , ▁heza fungigwa ▁na ▁chilaho . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mulekelela ▁kwaviya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kam gomesa .
▁Ivo ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu ▁mbuli ▁nyingi , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁ h edike ▁chochose ▁bule .
▁na ▁keza ya miza ▁kwa ▁chi dole ▁cha ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Loleni ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁sekeya mu lihiliz ile ▁imwenga ▁yehile ▁kwa ▁yehile , ▁ila ▁mu ilungile ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁kui tendela ▁yanogile ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁yanogile ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁wawa peta ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Kohasi , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Tegelezeni ▁nzozi ▁yoni lo tile .
▁Maabaho ▁ B umbila ▁da ▁Labani ▁di kala ▁kutali ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁Yakobo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu . ▁Yakobo ▁kadi lole sa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Labani ▁dodi sigale .
▁Wa sola ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁na ▁muna ▁imigunda .
▁Kwa ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁Inogile ▁mo komboligwa , ▁one ▁muha mha ▁mbuli ▁zo ni m pete leni . ▁One ▁si ▁ivo ▁ muhuwila ▁bule .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Ni ▁vi dala ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kukomboligwa , ▁vino ▁izakuwa ze ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁hawa mtegeleza ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa hasanyi ?”
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wonda weke ▁lago ▁habehi ▁nayo ▁ni ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni ▁kakala ▁Shel u mi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S uli s ha da i ,
▁Petili ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁mu luhelengo , ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza .
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁wanhu ▁vondawa zi li bu ligwe . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁mbeyu , ▁lukuli ▁lo wandigwa ▁muna ▁umsanga , ▁lo wola . ▁Lu ha zilibuka , ▁ha lu wola .
▁“ One ▁uha wa ▁na ▁magutwi ▁na ▁u hulike ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁Muhe ▁zi yo ya longela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁“ L usita ▁luja ▁ni mulamba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁nilonga ,
▁No vimanya ▁ muhulika ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁ka ning ' ha ▁sang ' hano ▁ino ▁ni msang ' hanileni ▁mweye .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Wa mweda ▁waja ▁woi bene la ▁vi biki , ▁kwaviya ▁weza tangigwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu !
▁Mu vimanye ▁kuwa ▁ku gezigwa ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁ko gala ▁ufunya umo yo .
▁Meso ▁muna yo ▁ mbali ▁ha muwona ? ▁Ma gutwi ▁muna yo ▁ mbali ▁ha muhulika ? ▁Wala ▁hamu kumbuka ?
▁N hu ngo ▁yochi sang ' hanila ▁muna ▁I ndi ya ▁ya ▁ku kumbuka ▁ifa ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁kwa ▁iyo ▁cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu . ▁Ch a ha ng ' wila ▁nhungo ▁ino , ▁cho ilumba ▁muna ▁idamu ▁ya ▁Chilisito . ▁Na ▁gate ▁do chi mo gola , ▁chaha di ja , ▁cho ilumba ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Chi na ▁tata ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁wana ▁wawo , ▁na ▁wana ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁ tati ▁zawo . ▁Chi na ▁mama ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁zawo ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo . ▁Wa koi ▁wa ▁chike ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁wako i ▁zawo , ▁na ▁wako i ▁wezaihasanya ▁na ▁wako i ▁wa ▁chike .”
▁Kwa viya ▁ivo ▁ni ivo ▁viwa i ha mbi le ▁we he ▁wowa m tambikile ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ikweli ▁umwaka ▁wo wekile ▁lolelo ▁jawo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁walume ▁zawo .
▁“ M weye ▁mu linga ▁fana ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁isi ▁yose . ▁Bul ulu ▁di ha zengigw a ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁hadi daha ▁bule ▁ku ifisa .
▁Mbali ▁ka togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁uhuwilo ▁yo longigwa ▁vino , ▁“ Sekeu longe ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wako , ▁yelihi ▁yondaya kwele ▁m baka ▁kuulanga , ▁uko ▁ni ▁ku muhulumu sa ▁hasi ▁Chilisito ▁kuchi kombola ?”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ivo , ▁fana ▁vou longa . ▁Mbali ▁nowalongela , ▁kuson gela ▁sambi ▁mwiza muwona ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kakala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁Udaho , ▁kokwiza ▁m chanyha ▁m ma wing u .”
▁Kwa viya ▁ ulungu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁mgati ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁muna ▁u nhu ▁lwake ,
▁Chi nayo ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yoyo languliza ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka uza , ▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁mgunda ▁kezatenda ze ?” ▁“ K e za kwiza ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁walimi ▁waja , ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁mgunda ▁uja ▁wa ▁mizabibu .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁iviya ▁wakala ▁wagoni kigwa ▁kuna ▁didugila ▁ijo .
▁Maabaho ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo wezile ▁nayo ▁waja ▁wang ' wa ▁na ▁wakala ▁na ▁kugona ▁ichilo ▁chose . ▁Viwa la mu ke ▁imitondo , ▁msang ' hani ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni lekeni ▁ni bwele ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁No sang ' hana ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁weye ▁u dahe ▁ku umanya ▁ukweli ▁wose ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁viu fundizigw e .
▁Maabaho ▁keza timbula ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya ti mbule ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo . ▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁mulangulizi ▁iyo ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁na ▁Yohana ▁kalonga ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choya wonile ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁icho , ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁usindila ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁nzasa ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁jetu , ▁heza kala ma ▁ku mu ho nda ▁Lufyende ▁hasi ▁ya ▁migulu ▁yenu . ▁Uno vu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁uwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁kela .
▁Baho ▁Isilaili ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Fan a ▁viya ▁viu wona ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁na habehi ▁kudanganika , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwa sola ▁kuwa bweleza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Ch eye ▁hachi geza ▁kaidi ▁kuigoda ▁wenyewo ▁haulongozi ▁wenu . ▁Mbali ▁cho mwing ' hani ▁mweye ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuigoda ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁ku wedika ▁waja ▁wowo igodela ▁ng ' hani ▁yaja ▁yo woneka ▁kufosa ▁yaja ▁yeli ▁muna ▁umoyo .
▁Vini kalile ▁no bwela ▁kulawa ▁Padani , ▁Laheli ▁kadanganika ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁siyo ▁ugen zi ▁m tali ▁kufika ▁ E fu la ta . ▁Ni muwanda ▁baho ▁hamgwazo ▁wa ▁dikulu g u mbi ▁di hita ▁ E fu la ta , ▁sambi ▁yo tangigwa ▁Betelehemu .”
▁Wa nahina ▁waja ▁wamuhitila ▁Yohana , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁ko m kumbuka ▁ija ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁weye ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani , ▁ija ▁you chi longele ▁mbuli ▁zake ? ▁Lelo ▁kobatiza ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo muhitila !”
▁Musa ▁k andika ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Igolo ▁yake ▁kai da wa ▁na ▁ka zenga ▁ulupango ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mulima ▁na ▁ka simika ▁mhanda ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁fana ▁viili ▁ peta ▁ya ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁mwanahina ▁yoyalongile ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁na ▁ku z andika , ▁na ▁cheye ▁cho vimanya ▁zino ▁zi a longile ▁ni ▁za ▁kweli .
▁Keza guma ▁ubani ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uwo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yosi ▁da ▁ubani ▁uwo ▁diza i gubika ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba , ▁ivo ▁heza danganika .
▁One ▁iha towigwa ▁mhalati ▁imwe ▁muhala , ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Isilaili ▁weza iting ' hana ▁haulongozi ▁wako .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza yawala ▁walo ▁jake ▁da ▁chitani ▁na ▁ka p u tula ▁yake ▁ya ▁chitani , ▁keza sola ▁maivu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ulupango ▁na ▁ku ye ka ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁ulupango .
▁Sekemu je ▁gate , ▁hebu ▁lu ku so , ▁hebu ▁u hishi , ▁m baka ▁siku ▁iyo , ▁vondamu komeleze ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁N dagilizi ▁zino ▁zi zindililigw e ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁homukala .
▁Kwa viya ▁gate ▁ni ▁dimwe , ▁cheye ▁chili ▁wengi ▁ni ▁lukuli ▁lumwe , ▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁chose ▁cho hokela ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁gate ▁dimwe .
▁ Z abibu ▁zi b o jo gwa ▁ b o jo gwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku ka mila ▁zabibu ▁heli ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu ▁na ▁damu ▁ila wa ▁muna ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁ku ka mila ▁zabibu ▁na ▁i ki lima ▁na ▁i mema ▁m e ta ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu , ▁utali ▁wa ▁chilo me ta ▁magan a ▁matatu .
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁one ▁yaha n pata ▁iyo , ▁ko de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani , ▁kufosa ▁waja ▁ng ' hondolo ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda ▁hawa gile .
▁“ One ▁ndugu ▁waidi ▁wa ▁chilume ▁waha kala ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁imwe ▁viweli ▁yahadanganika ▁ bila ▁ku leka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwenekwaga ▁sekeya soligwe ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lu mwenga . ▁Ndugu ▁wa ▁mwenekwaga ▁kolondeka ▁ya mwing i lile ▁muke ▁iyo .
▁na ▁ka mtuma ▁ho we ▁kunze , ▁na ▁ka gulu ka ▁kuno ▁na ▁kuja , ▁m baka ▁mazi ▁viya nya lile ▁mwiisi .
▁Mbali ▁si ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁bule ▁yoni tenda ▁yano , ▁ mbali ▁no gesa ▁ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wou kala ▁mgati ▁yangu .
▁Cho vimanya ▁Mulungu ▁hawa tegeleza ▁bule ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁ko mtegeleza ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo muhuwila ▁na ▁yoyo tenda ▁chiya ▁chi yo mulondile ▁yatende .
▁Balaki ▁viyahulike ▁kuwa ▁Balaamu ▁kokwiza , ▁kahita ▁kumuhokela ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Ali , ▁bululu ▁di kalile ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Alinoni , ▁muna ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁Moabu .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁Muisilaili ▁yahawa ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁hadaha ▁kui tu nza ▁mwenyewo ▁yahawa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁kolondeka ▁um tu n ze ▁muladi ▁ya gendelele ▁kukala ▁na ▁weye . ▁M tende le ▁fana ▁nyambenyambe ▁hebu ▁m fosa nzila ▁yo kala ▁kumwako .
▁Tend a ▁vilumb e ▁vidi ▁va ▁zahabu ▁vovi li ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ tenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁kuhonda ▁muna ▁imi helelo ▁ya ▁ing u b i ko ▁iyo .
▁Nzi ge ▁wawo ▁weza mema ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zako ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁Wamisili ▁wose . ▁Weza kuwa ▁wengi ▁ng ' hani ▁hata ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁hawana wawona ▁kwandusi la ▁vi welekigwe ▁m baka ▁diyelo .’ ▁” ▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka hinduka ▁na ▁kasegela ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .
▁Na yo ▁kawasagula ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁dimwe ▁na ▁waidi , ▁kawa langa ▁watumigwa . ▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Ni wa sagula ▁mweye ▁mukale ▁na ▁niye . ▁Maabaho ▁nizawa tuma ▁m ka wapetele ▁wanhu .
▁Yosefu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndiya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁mwiikaye ▁yake ▁kusondelela ▁i dadi ▁ya ▁wa nawo ▁wadodo do .
▁One ▁uha geza ▁ku lima ▁ndiya , ▁ulongo ▁hawiza ku patila ▁chinhu ▁chochose . ▁Kwiza we gela ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁uka zi ▁muna ▁iisi .”
▁“ Sekemu gese ▁kuwa ▁niza ▁kuya segeza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁hebu ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Si zile ▁kuya segeza ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁niza ▁kuya ti miza .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kohita ▁hanhu ▁ hali bule ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kutosa .
▁Nolonga ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁ni m gume ni ▁chinyala . ▁Mo watanga ▁wawo ▁wasemi , ▁hata ▁hawa hishimigwa ▁na ▁wahuwila . ▁Ku m wenu ▁kwa ▁bule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala ▁yo daha ▁ku lamula ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wahuwila .
