▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa falume ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wowa tawala ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁ludabwa , ▁na ▁waja ▁wene ▁udahi ▁kumwawo ▁wo tangigwa ▁‘ Mbwiy a ▁wa ▁wanhu .’
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' o ndo lo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ peta ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁voilagilizigw e .
▁Weza i g wila ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo kimbila ▁ng ' hondo . ▁Weza kimbila ▁na ▁ku gwa ▁hata ▁one ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo wawinga . ▁ Hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁kuwatowa ▁wehi ▁wenu .
▁Mbali ▁chip indi ▁cho kwiza , ▁na ▁sambi ▁chifika ▁wanhu ▁wowo tosa ▁muna ▁ikweli ▁weza mtosela ▁Tata ▁muna ▁U mu he ▁na ▁kweli , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁niiyo ▁wawo ▁Tata ▁yo o wa zahila .
▁Kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu , ▁novimanya ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwandusi la ▁umwaka , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yaha gesa ▁chinhu ▁ fu la ni ▁cha ▁mwiko ▁ivo ▁kumwake ▁yeye ▁cho kuwa ▁mwiko .
▁W eye ▁kwiza longa ▁nayo ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁yose ▁yondaya longe , ▁niye ▁nizawa tazeni ▁na ▁kuwa fu nza ▁mbuli ▁zondamu tende .
▁Katenda ▁m ahembe ▁mane , ▁chila ▁ubanzi ▁ he m b e ▁dimwe . ▁M ahembe ▁yayo ▁yawa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁ulupango , ▁ka haka ▁shaba ▁lupango ▁lose .
▁Kwa ▁zaka ▁zose ▁zondamu hokele , ▁mwiza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁kufosa ▁zose .’
▁Maabaho ▁Paulo ▁kasegela ▁Asen e ▁kahita ▁Kolimso .
▁basi ▁mulume ▁ija ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ha londeka ▁kaidi ▁ku mbwelela ▁muke ▁iyo , ▁kwaviya ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kamala . ▁Ku tenda ▁ivo ▁ni ▁kum tibusa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Ivo ▁sekeu watende ▁wanhu ▁wa hasanye ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁i wo kwing ' higwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁u ihazi .
▁Maabaho ▁Abimeleki ▁kamulongela ▁Sala , ▁“ No mwing ' ha ▁ lumbu ▁jako ▁vihande ▁magan a ▁longo ▁va ▁hela , ▁kuwa lagusa ▁wose ▁weli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye ▁kuwa ▁kuno ga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yavimanye ▁kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁wihi .”
▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁chi komboligwa , ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁u segezigwa . ▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁wili ▁mkulu ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu mulumize ▁imwana , ▁hebu ▁sekeu mtendele ▁chinhu ▁chochose ,” ▁Lelo ▁ni vimanya ▁weye ▁ko mtegeleza ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁hu ni mile ▁bule ▁mwanago ▁nyachende .
▁Wawo ▁wose ▁wa mgwila ▁So si t e ne , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁wamtowa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichitala . ▁Mbali ▁ G a li yo ▁ha gesile ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁hata ▁chidogo .
▁Modaha ▁kuwa wa ng ili za ▁nyambenyambe ▁wa muli heni , ▁ mbali ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁Waisilaili ▁mu walekelele .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁“ Walongele ▁Walawi ▁ndagilizi ▁zino , ▁‘ Vondamu hokele ▁zaka ▁yo mwing ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁iwe ▁uhazi ▁wenu , ▁mwiza ni lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁zaka ▁iyo .
▁Ma kabila ▁yose ▁wezaku sang ' hanila , ▁na ▁wezaku tumbalil a ▁mavindi , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁wandugu ▁zako ▁wose ▁na ▁welesi ▁wa ▁mami ▁yako ▁wa ku tumbalil e ▁mavindi , ▁wanhu ▁wo ku duwila ▁weye ▁wa duwiligwe ▁na ▁wo ku temela ▁mate ▁weza temeligw a ▁mate .”
▁Viya lawile ▁kunze , ▁ha dahile ▁kulonga ▁nawo , ▁ivo ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ka wona ▁malaguso ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Kwa viya ▁ha dahile ▁kulonga , ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁vilaguso ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yake ▁kulonga ▁nawo .
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁Sauli ▁ka iyoha ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwatenda ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wadumb e ▁kwa ▁kuwakoma . ▁Ka hita ▁kwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko .
▁U ning ' he ▁wake ▁zangu ▁na ▁wanangu ▁woni wa patile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ usang ' hano ▁woni ku sang ' hanile , ▁ni segele ▁nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁kuvimanya ▁niku sang ' hanila ▁vinogile .”
▁Munhu ▁yaha iwona ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁chinhu , ▁ h umbe ▁si ▁chinhu ▁bule , ▁iyo ▁ko i vwizi la ▁mwenyewo .
▁Wala ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Wayahudi ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁kezadanganika ▁muladi ▁ya weke ▁hamwe ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowa p wi lili ke .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yo petigwa ▁kwandusi la ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁keza ni lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁iyo .
▁Hajili ▁kawa ki li s ha ▁ lugongo ▁lwa ▁Sinai ▁uli ▁ A la b i ya ▁na ▁simwe ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁ili sa mbi ▁mui isi ▁dili ▁mtumwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanage .
▁divai ▁ ilinga ▁fana ▁i tendigw a ▁na ▁sumu ▁za ▁mazoka .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁ bila ▁ya ▁ku longiligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁kuwa ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wakala ▁wo longelela . ▁Ivo ▁kawauza , ▁“ M afundizo ▁yano ▁yo watenda ▁muwe ▁na ▁m ka nga gile ?
▁wala ▁kwa ▁isi , ▁kwaviya ▁baho ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁ha ▁kwikil a ▁magulu ▁yake , ▁wala ▁kwa ▁Yelusalemu , ▁kwaviya ▁ijo ▁ni ▁bululu ▁da ▁Mfalume ▁Mkulu .
▁To seni ▁ng ' hani ▁yayo ▁sekeya lawilile ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁chihuhwe !
▁Mbali ▁one ▁waha soligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁Isilaili , ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁wiza lawa ▁kumwetu ▁na ▁kuhita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁di wo soligwa , ▁ivo ▁uhazi ▁wetu ▁wiza hunguka .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawa gala ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁haulongozi ▁na ▁kuwa n ava ▁kwa ▁mazi .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁keza we gula ▁nyele ▁zose ▁na ▁keza ko ga , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁kela . ▁Maabaho ▁keza bwela ▁kuna ▁dilago , ▁ mbali ▁keza kala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁hema ▁jake ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Maabaho ▁kahita ▁hata li ▁chidogo , ▁ka gwa ▁ching u b i ▁ng u b i ▁ka tosa , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Tat i ▁yangu , ▁one ▁ihadahika , ▁u n yepule ▁na ▁nhungo ▁ino ▁ya ▁manhesa ▁muladi ▁sekei ni fike . ▁Mbali ▁siyo ▁fana ▁vini londa ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁fana ▁viu londa ▁weye .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ F o sa ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁na ▁uwa sole ▁walala ▁wawo ▁wamwenga . ▁Iviya ▁u sole ▁mhome ▁ija ▁you itowe le ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁na ▁uhite .
▁Labani ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Habali ▁kutenda ▁vino , ▁ha bali ▁ku nivwizila ▁na ▁kuwa sola ▁wa ndele ▁wangu ▁fana ▁mate ka ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ?
▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁ya ▁chilo ▁mbili ▁za ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁zondamu ni lavile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁M n ung ' ho ▁wake ▁wiza ni nogeza , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁divai .
▁W eye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁mwiza le gela , ▁kwaviya ▁sang ' hano ▁ino ▁ndala . ▁Hu daha ▁kui sang ' hana ▁wiidumwe .
▁hebu ▁mwa li ▁wake ▁wa ▁habehi ▁yeli ▁yang ' a li ▁hana soligwa ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake , ▁kwa ▁muke ▁iyo ▁keza itenda ▁mwenyewo ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁na ▁munhu ▁yoya wa go ni ke ni ▁wose ▁kokwiza ▁kumwako ▁na ▁ku kulongela , ▁‘ I ne ge ▁ya kale ▁ino .’ ▁Baho ▁kwiza wona ▁chinyala ▁na ▁kuhita ▁kukala ▁kuna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁kuchisogo .
▁Hata ▁vi ku kalile ▁kwa bule ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kumtenda ▁Bulahimu ▁kuhuwila , ▁Bulahimu ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku lolela ▁chilagano , ▁ivo ▁kawa ▁tata ▁wa ▁makabila ▁mengi ▁fana ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ W elesi ▁wako ▁wizakuwa ▁mwingi ▁fana ▁nhondo !”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁mfundiza ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli ▁na ▁hu zi manyile ▁bule ▁mbuli ▁zino ?
▁“ H o ho se ▁heli ▁na ▁mtufi , ▁vi lele ▁wo iting ' hana .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mbwiyangu , ▁vino ▁yelihi ▁yoya ni kile ▁niye ▁kuwa ▁msemi ▁hebu ▁m gola ji ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁venu ?”
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁ lekeni ▁ku gesa ▁fana ▁wana , ▁muwe ▁wana ▁ving ' hele ▁muna ▁u wi hi , ▁ mbali ▁mu ku le ▁muna ▁uku gesa .
▁Yuda ▁kamwelek a ▁Pelesi ▁na ▁Ze la , ▁mami ▁yawo ▁yo tangigwa ▁Tamali , ▁Pelesi ▁kamwelek a ▁ E si lo mu , ▁ E si lo mu ▁kamwelek a ▁Alamu ,
▁“ One ▁mtumwa ▁yaha kimbilila ▁kumwenu , ▁sekemu mbweleze ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁muvimanye ▁vino , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁muna ▁iisi .” ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁yaholole , ▁“ Inuka , ▁ sola ▁ko mwa ▁jako ▁uhite ▁ukaye !”
▁“ Munhu ▁kezam biduka ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁muladi ▁yakomigwe , ▁tata ▁kezam biduka ▁mwanage , ▁na ▁wana ▁weza m biduka ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁na ▁mami ▁yawo , ▁na ▁kuwakoma .
▁Sa sa leni ▁falasi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Paulo ▁na ▁mu ngale ▁vinogile ▁kwa ▁Felisi , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁mkowa .”
▁Wa wagala ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁Yosefu , ▁nayo ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁ kwasakany a ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁m hu nda . ▁Na yo ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndiya ▁ kwasakany a ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁wose ▁mwaka ▁uwo .
▁“ Sekeu hande ▁mizabibu ▁yako ▁hamwe ▁na ▁matunda ▁yamwenga , ▁waha tenda ▁ivo , ▁matunda ▁yose ▁yezakuwa ▁ya mbula ▁mwiko , ▁siyo ▁yaja ▁you handile ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁na ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mizabibu ▁iviya .
▁Munhu ▁yondayam some ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo , ▁iviya ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁na ▁ko ga ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁“ Vondamu hite ▁kuitowa ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wo muwonela ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yenu , ▁baho ▁mwiza towa ▁mhalati ▁ulo ▁kwa ▁ulo . ▁Mwiza kumbukigw a ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁mwiza komboligwa ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wehi ▁wenu .
▁“ Yandik a ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wa ▁Si ya ti la , ▁“ Zin o ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁meso ▁yake ▁ya linga ▁fana ▁m ila mbi ▁ya ▁moto ▁na ▁magulu ▁yake ▁ya linga ▁fana ▁shaba ▁i sunh igwe ▁goya .
▁Ka hita ▁kufose la ▁zisi ▁ziya ▁na ▁kawa gangamiza ▁wanhu ▁ mizoyo ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁nyingi . ▁Maabaho ▁kafika ▁Akaya ,
▁ Izo ▁zi kala ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku l wika ▁ulupango ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile , ▁siku ▁ija ▁vi lu b o b o di gwe ▁mavuta , ▁vya no ▁va ▁hela ▁longo ▁na ▁vidi , ▁ma bu yu ▁ya ▁hela ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁na ▁mazi ga ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi .
▁Chi dika , ▁‘ Chi nayo ▁tata ▁mulala ▁na ▁ndugu ▁mdodo , ▁kamwelek a ▁muna ▁u la la ▁wake . ▁Se kulu ▁wake ▁kadanganika , ▁na ▁yeye ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁mwana ▁ya sigale ▁kwa ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake ▁komulonda ▁ng ' hani .’
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza sang ' hanila ▁vi a ▁ivo ▁ku tengenezel a ▁ubani ▁fana ▁viu tengenez igwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁vinhu ▁vo nhu ng ' hila ▁goya , ▁ubani ▁uli ▁na ▁munyu ▁na ▁mzelu ▁na ▁we la .
▁Lelo ▁chilonge ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁chi gendelele ▁kukala ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁muladi ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ wongezeke ?
▁One ▁muha pula ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu ▁niza mtendela ni .
▁“ ▁‘ Ku m wenu ▁wanhu ▁wondawa sigale ▁niza wagalila ▁ludumbo ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo ▁muna ▁izisi ▁za ▁wehi ▁wawo . ▁Ya ni ▁di he m belu ka ▁diza watenda ▁wa kimbile , ▁weza kimbila ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo kimbila ▁ng ' hondo . ▁Weza kimbila ▁na ▁ku gwa ▁kuno ▁kwa bule ▁munhu ▁yo wawinga .
▁Ivo ▁Yuda ▁kasola ▁ ki bumbila ▁cha ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Mafalisayo , ▁keza ▁nawo ▁baho ▁na ▁vitasa ▁na ▁mi muli ▁na ▁silaha .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁kakala ▁Ha ni eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ E f o di .
▁Iviya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wakala ▁wengi ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁hawa kala ▁siku ▁zose ▁wo danganika ▁na ▁hawa dahile ▁kugendelela ▁na ▁ usang ' hano ▁wawo .
▁walonga , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁cho kumbuka ▁kuwa ▁viyakalile ▁ngima ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Z a ha fosa ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁niza zilibuka .’
▁Ivo ▁hachi bwela ▁kuchisogo ▁bule , ▁hata ▁fana ▁ng ' huli ▁zetu ▁zo la la ▁ mbali ▁ mihe ▁yetu ▁yo tendigw a ▁ya ▁sambi ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Vini kalile ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁ni itenda ▁fana ▁Muyahudi ▁muladi ▁niwa ga lu se ▁Wayahudi , ▁inga wa ▁si langulizigw a ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa , ▁nikala ▁no langulizigw a ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁kumwawo ▁muladi ▁niwa ga lu se ▁waja ▁wowa la ngilizigwa ▁na ▁malagilizo .
▁Mulungu ▁kaha tanga ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile ▁“ I si ” ▁na ▁hanhu ▁haya i duganye ▁yamazi ▁hamwe ▁kaha tanga ▁“ Bahali .” ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁vinoga .
▁No peta ▁usenga ▁wa ▁ubala ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wowa ka ngale ▁chimuhe . ▁Mbali ▁si ▁ubala ▁wa ▁lusita ▁luno , ▁hebu ▁wa ▁watawala ▁weli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁wa ▁lusita ▁luno , ▁wowo kwa giza ▁nguvu ▁zawo .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Sekeu hite ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁na ▁seke uwaduwile ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁wa temeligw a ▁mate .”
▁“ Maabaho ▁Haluni ▁keza kwingila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁keza ha mbula ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁chitani ▁yoya yawale ▁vi yengile ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kuya leka ▁umo .
▁Hamwande ▁mwana ▁viya ku lile ▁ka mgala ▁kwa ▁mndele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁nayo ▁kamtenda ▁kuwa ▁mwanage . ▁ Mndele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni mulava ▁muna ▁yamazi .” ▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Musa .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi fa mbuli le ▁ulonzi ▁uwo .”
▁Leka mana ▁hata ▁lagano ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁hadi kigwe ▁ bila ▁damu .
▁Chila ▁siku ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kofundiza ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁wakala ▁wo zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumkoma ,
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁yondaya we ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁keza v a la ▁mawalo ▁yayo ▁siku ▁saba ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁ya sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Wa no ▁longo ▁na ▁sita ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Zilipa , ▁mtumwa ▁niiyo ▁Labani ▁ya mwing ' hile ▁Leya ▁mndele ▁wake .
▁Hata ▁ivo ▁chip indi ▁chiya ▁hamu n ye hu le ▁bule , ▁wala ▁hamu ni lemile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁utamu ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁muni hokela ▁fana ▁niye ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁muni hokela ▁fana ▁vomu muhokela ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo .
▁Yakobo ▁viyamulongele ▁kuwa ▁mwanage ▁Yosefu ▁keza ▁kumulola , ▁Isilaili ▁kai gangamiza ▁na ▁ka du ndu mala ▁muna ▁dikomwa .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa ndusa ▁kwi iuzagiza ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Vino ▁kuna ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁yoya mgalile ▁ndiya ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁wasegela ▁imisi ▁iyo ▁yose ▁na ▁ichilo ▁chose ▁na ▁igolo ▁yake ▁yose , ▁wa duganya ▁ng ' h wa le . ▁Ya patile ▁wadodo ▁ng ' hani ▁ka pata ▁chilo ▁1 ,000 . ▁Maabaho ▁wawa ni ka ▁wose ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁lago ▁ku zunguluka ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁“ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁siku ▁ya ▁saba ▁ni ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁dugila . ▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo ▁mbili ▁hamu londeka ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowose , ▁ila ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁ku sasala ▁ndiya .
▁Muna ▁ichi gelo ▁cha ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁chili ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwiza sola ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁na ▁ andazi ▁dimwe ▁dodi gumigw e ▁mavuta ▁na ▁gate ▁ sisili ▁dimwe .
▁“ Vi nhu ▁vose ▁Waisilaili ▁vo wo ni galile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁no kwing ' ha ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike . ▁Di no ▁ni ▁lagano ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁hadiza benigw a ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁dili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako .”
▁Ka leni ▁mwiikaye ▁iyo ▁iyo , ▁di ye ni ▁na ▁ing ' we ni ▁chochose ▁chonda wa mwing ' heni , ▁kwaviya ▁msang ' hani ▁kolondeka ▁ya pate ▁yombe ▁jake . ▁Sekemu ha me ▁ha me ▁kulawa ▁kaye ▁imwe ▁kuhita ▁kaye ▁imwenga .
▁Mu nilongele ▁yombe ▁jojose ▁da ▁ zengele ▁na ▁chitumetume , ▁hata ▁yahawa ▁ng ' hulu ▁vilihi , ▁niye ▁niza lava ▁muladi ▁ni msole ▁yawe ▁muke ▁wangu .”
▁Hawa mu i nza ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁weza mulema ▁kwaviya ▁hawa di manyile ▁dizi ▁da ▁munhu ▁imwenga .”
▁Viwakalile ▁lusita ▁mwingi me ng i ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kuja , ▁Paulo ▁kema ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Walume , ▁m olondeka ▁mu nitegeleze ▁niye ▁na ▁muleke ▁kulawa ▁Chilete , ▁one ▁mu tendile ▁ivo ▁chiha yepule ▁na ▁manhesa ▁yano ▁na ▁ha sa la ▁zose .
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁ulondo , ▁siyo ▁cheye ▁chi mulonda ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁kachi londa ▁cheye , ▁ka mtuma ▁Mwanage ▁yawe ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Na ▁mbeyu ▁ ihandigwe ▁hana ▁uluwe , ▁ni ▁simwe ▁da ▁munhu ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁na ▁ko i hokela ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho .
▁One ▁uha muhasanya ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁chiu ja , ▁yo lagusa ▁ugen zi ▁wako ▁hau genda ▁na ▁ulondo . ▁Sekeu togole ▁hata ▁chidogo ▁ndiya ▁yako ▁iwe ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kwa ga ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwenga , ▁ija ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake .
▁Mbali ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamtanga ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁“ Bulahimu , ▁Bulahimu !” ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Na ba ha .”
▁Ivo ▁vinyamkela ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu , ▁“ U chi gale ▁ku zinguluwe , ▁na ▁uchilekele le ▁chi wengile ▁wawo .”
▁Musa ▁kagolosa ▁mhome ▁yake ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁beho ▁kulu ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua , ▁dibu ma ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁m isi ▁yose ▁na ▁chilo ▁chose . ▁Vi ku chi le , ▁beho ▁diya ▁da ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁di gala ▁nzige .
▁Maabaho ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁wa ilongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ko muliga ▁Mulungu !”
▁Kwa ▁miyaka ▁sita ▁mwiza handa ▁migunda ▁yenu ▁na ▁mwiza da huli la ▁mizabibu ▁yenu ▁na ▁kwa ha ▁matunda ▁yake ,
▁Pa lo ▁da ▁hagati ▁dodi fikile ▁nusu ▁ya ▁zen go ▁da ▁hema ▁diza ibebenyek a ▁hagati ▁kulawa ▁kuuhelelo ▁umwe ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁umwenga ▁wa ▁hema .
▁Ivo ▁Pilato ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Vino ▁hu hulika ▁bule ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁zowo ku longa ?”
▁M wa nahina ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁Tomasi ▁yoya tangigwe ▁M ba sa ▁ha wile ▁baho ▁bule ▁Yesu ▁vi yezile .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Muna yo ▁magate ▁m e ngahi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Chi nayo ▁saba .”
▁Isaka ▁kawa sasalil a ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁dugila , ▁nawo ▁waja ▁na ▁wang ' wa .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaham chuuza ▁mwanage ▁wa ▁chike ▁kuwa ▁mtumwa , ▁iyo ▁heza tendigw a ▁yailegehe ▁fana ▁viili ▁kwa ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Lelo ▁ha bali ▁Musa ▁ka ching ' ha ▁L agilizo ▁da ▁ku muleka ▁muke ▁kwa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ?”
▁Balaki ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Vino ▁si tu mile ▁wanhu ▁kumwako ▁muladi ▁wa ku tange ? ▁ Mbo na ▁ h wi zile ? ▁Vino ▁niye ▁sidaha ▁kuku liha ▁goya ?”
▁Kuuhelelo ▁mama ▁ija ▁nayo ▁kadanganika .
▁Ka msimu lila ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁“ Iyo ▁msang ' hani ▁Muebulaniya ▁yo yu mgalile ▁hano ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁kuni guma ▁chinyala .
▁ Hita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Padani ▁Alamu , ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁yako ▁Besueli , ▁na ▁uka sole ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁ mtumba ▁wako ▁Labani .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁yang ' hali ▁ka da zigwa ▁nzabi , ▁Ana si ▁ka mgala ▁kwa ▁Kayafa , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo .
▁Ni we ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁uja ▁uja ▁wou ni ni le , ▁muladi ▁wawe ▁wa mwe ▁fana ▁cheye ▁vichili ▁wa mwe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ko daha ▁kuja ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wowose ▁muna ▁umgunda ,
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁weza ni o na ▁niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁na heza ▁m ma wing u ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁mkulu ▁na ▁utunhizo .
▁Mbali ▁hachi londa ▁kuwa de sa ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁bule . ▁Ivo ▁ hita ▁kuna ▁dilamba ▁uka lo we ▁somba ▁kwa ▁ nd wa no . ▁So mba ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁yonda u n pate , ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wake ▁kwiza wona ▁sente ▁yoi faya ▁kulihi la ▁kodi ▁yangu ▁na ▁yako . ▁So la ▁uka lihe ▁kodi ▁yetu .”
▁Maabaho ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁imwe zila ▁Abulamu ▁kwa ▁malaguso , ▁i longa , ▁“ Sekeudumbe . ▁Niye ▁ni ▁ng a wo ▁yako ▁na ▁nizaku gwe ka .”
▁ Nimulongelani ▁chiya ▁chiya nilongele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁ha muhulike ▁bule . ▁Mu lema ▁kusondelela ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁mwingi la ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁ili ▁kumulima ▁kwa ▁magoda .
▁Wa ya tenda ▁yose ▁ya ili ng e , ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁longo ▁na ▁tatu ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁mita ▁mbili .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁keza yawala ▁viwalo ▁vi dege ke , ▁nyele ▁zake ▁heza zi bu n ha , ▁na ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁keza u gubika , ▁keza longa ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁‘ Niye ▁ nya mbula ▁mwiko , ▁niye ▁ nya mbula ▁mwiko !’
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁waha mala ▁ku longiligwa ▁kuwa ▁wa huma ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ! ▁Hata ▁ivo ▁hawa hokele ▁yaja ▁yoya walaganile ▁Mulungu .
▁M he t e ▁izo ▁zizakuwa ▁habehi ▁na ▁lukingilo ▁luja ▁lwa ▁ku zunguluka ▁meza ▁na ▁zizakuwa ▁za ▁kwa mhilila ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila ▁imeza ▁iyo .
▁kwaviya ▁ha fundize ▁fana ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁viwo fundiza ▁ila ▁ka fundiza ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi .
▁One ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁ku hawa ▁kutali ▁hebu ▁one ▁hu mmanyile , ▁basi ▁ hita ▁nayo ▁ukaye ▁yako , ▁uka kale ▁nayo ▁m baka ▁mwenyewo ▁vondayeze , ▁um bwelezele .
▁“ One ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yaha ta ga mu la ▁m haka ▁za ▁isi ▁yenu , ▁fana ▁vi yawala hile ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁nayo ▁kamwing ' hani ▁isi ▁yose ▁iya laganile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu ,
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁siyo ▁wanhu ▁wo si n ha ▁si n ha ▁na ▁kunangigwa . ▁I la ▁china ▁uhuwilo ▁wa ▁kuchi kombola ▁ mihe ▁yetu .
▁Saimoni ▁kawa temela ▁mate , ▁kamulongela ▁Maliya , ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu , ▁“ I mwa na ▁ino ▁ka sa guligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kuwa zilibula ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁muna ▁Isilaeli . ▁Maabaho ▁keza kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza mulema .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁Inogile , ▁niye ▁ni kigwa ▁niwe ▁mtumigwa ▁na ▁m petela ji ▁na ▁mfundiza ji .
▁Na yo ▁keza di gala ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo ▁na ▁ku dika ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Keza kwika ▁mkono ▁wake ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁kudi chinja ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka hulika ▁dizi ▁do mulongela , ▁“ P e ti li , ▁ Inuka , ▁u chinje ▁wano ▁na ▁uwa je !”
▁One ▁uha mulonda ▁miyago ▁w hiza mtendela ▁yehile ▁bule , ▁ulondo ▁ni ▁ku fikiza ▁Malagilizo ▁yose ▁ya ▁Musa .
▁Seti ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁tano , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁zina ▁jake ▁Enosi .
▁M weye ▁wanaake ▁wa tegelezeni ▁walume ▁zenu ▁fana ▁vimu mtegeleza ▁Mndewa .
▁Nowalongela , ▁one ▁mke ▁wako ▁ha tendile ▁ugoni ▁bule , ▁hu londeka ▁ku mwasa ▁na ▁kusola ▁imwenga . ▁One ▁uha tenda ▁ivo , ▁kotenda ▁ugoni .”
▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁mwene ▁chinyamkela ▁kodaha ze ▁kulonga ▁vino ? ▁Vino ▁chinyamkela ▁kodaha ▁ku muhonya ▁munhu ▁chipofu ?”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Simeoni ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁N e mu eli ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Yam i ni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ya ki ni
▁Tela ▁kamsola ▁Abulamu ▁mwanage , ▁na ▁Lutu ▁m zukulu ▁wake ▁yo yelekigwe ▁mwanage ▁Halani , ▁na ▁Salayi ▁muke ▁wake ▁Abulamu , ▁na ▁wasegela ▁wose ▁hamwe ▁kulawa ▁U lu , ▁bululu ▁da ▁Wa ka li da yo , ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Viwafikile ▁Halani ▁wakala ▁uko .
▁Mana ▁ muhulika ▁umwaka ▁vini kalile ▁no kwa mhilila ▁di ni ▁ya ▁Chiyahudi , ▁ni wagaza ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁wowa muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁ni londa ▁kuwa nanga .
▁Lelo ▁cho mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁sekemu tende ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chihile , ▁ mbali ▁mu dahe ▁kutenda ▁yanogile , ▁hata ▁one ▁cheye ▁cho woneka ▁kuwa ▁chi potigwa .
▁Yakobo ▁kamwelek a ▁Yosefu , ▁m ha le ▁wa ▁Maliya , ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Chilisito ▁Mkombola .
▁Na ▁one ▁niha tenda ▁yaja ▁si ya londa ▁kuyatenda , ▁iyo ▁yo lagusa ▁no togola ▁kuwa ▁Malagilizo ▁yano ga .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁Pa gi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ O kila ni , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kana ▁ubazi ▁mwingi , ▁no walamba ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wose , ▁ mulavile ni ▁Mulungu ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁fana ▁viya ▁nhambiko ▁yili ▁na ▁ugima , ▁yelile ▁na ▁yili ▁na ▁kude ng ' hele za . ▁Ino ▁niiyo ▁nzila ▁yenu ▁haswa ▁ya ▁kumtambikila .
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ya vimanyile ▁Tata ▁kamwing ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁na ▁iviya ▁kakala ▁ya lawile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁keza bwela ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁dino ▁ni i jo ▁lolelo ▁jetu , ▁cheye ▁cholonga ▁kwa ▁u gangamavu ▁mkulu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni , ▁“ Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁ni ▁yayo ▁yano , ▁nyambenyambe ▁yoyose ▁heza kuja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁mo igoda . ▁Mbali ▁m olondeka ▁muwe ▁na ▁usungu , ▁na ▁munhu ▁ya tendile ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ya se gezigwe ▁kumwenu .
▁Ivo ▁na ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁mo londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁chi tume ▁ tume ▁cha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁ londeni ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwa ▁mu iyohe ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwa ▁na zo ▁muladi ▁kudi gangamiza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁keza ning ' ha ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .” ▁Wawo ▁waidi ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza .
▁M iyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁yose ▁nikala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye . ▁Ni ku sang ' hanila ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mine ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wa ndele ▁zako ▁waidi ▁na ▁miyaka ▁sita ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanyama ▁wako , ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁ kwasakany a ▁yombe ▁jangu ▁miyanza ▁longo .
▁mu wategeleze ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wano , ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁kusang ' hanila ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wawo .
▁Yosefu ▁kamulongela ▁mfalume , ▁“ N zo zi ▁zako ▁mbili ▁zina ▁fambulo ▁dimwe , ▁Mulungu ▁ka kulongela ▁chiya ▁chonda ya tende .
▁One ▁nhosa ▁you ilava ▁ni ▁ya ▁magate ▁ya mbi kigwe ▁muna ▁ino ngo , ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁u gumigw e ▁mavuta .
▁“ Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁weza mwidika , ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁zuwaki ▁chi kuwona ▁kwa ▁nzala ▁chi kwing ' ha ▁ndiya ? ▁Hebu ▁zuwaki ▁chi kuwona ▁kuna ▁ng ' hilu ▁chi kwing ' ha ▁mazi ?
▁ Zindilil eni ▁malagilizo ▁yose ▁yo yamulagilizileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁muladi ▁mbuli ▁zenu ▁zi gendelele ▁vinogile ▁na ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yonda mwing ' higwe ▁iwe ▁yenu .
▁One ▁nhosa ▁yako ▁ ihawa ▁ya ▁gate ▁di ka nzi ngigwe , ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁hau gumigw e ▁lusu ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁zaituni .
▁“ Na ▁mweye ▁iyo ▁womu kalile ▁na ▁niye ▁muna uku gezigwa ▁kwangu .
▁Kwa viya ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁ugima ▁yoni kombola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ imbuli ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁ifa .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁vondawa zilibuke , ▁haweza sola ▁wala ▁kusoligwa , ▁ mbali ▁weza kuwa ▁fana ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Muna ▁umwanza ▁wekaidi ▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁na ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ka wamanya ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁k andika ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vi bawo ▁ivo ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁za ▁mwanduso , ▁ndagilizi ▁longo ▁zo yamulagilize ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uko ▁kumulima ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁siku ▁ya ▁m ting ' hano , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁vi bawo ▁ivo .
▁Na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wangu ▁iviya , ▁wose ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁wa ▁chilume ▁niza we ti lila ▁Muhe ▁wangu ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo , ▁nawo ▁weza gong ' onda ▁usenga ▁wangu .
▁Sekemu sa la le ▁migunda ▁yenu ▁ya ▁mizabibu ▁hebu ▁sekemu do ndo le ▁zabibu ▁zi la gale , ▁muwa lekele ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁ngayengaye . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu ▁ya segele ▁mwiisi ▁yawo .
▁Baho ▁Mulungu ▁viya na ngile ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁dibawe ▁Lutu ▁hoya kalile ▁kokala , ▁kam kumbuka ▁Bulahimu ▁kwa ▁ku mulava ▁Lutu ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yano , ▁muladi ▁Lutu ▁sekeya na ngigwe .
▁M baka ▁cheye ▁chose ▁chi ifikile ▁u hamwe ▁wa ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ku mmanya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁chiwe ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁u gangamale ▁fana ▁viyeli ▁Chilisito ▁haswa .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka komeleza ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Habule ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁Yohana ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁yose . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yeli ▁mdodo ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁Yohana .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁one ▁niha tosa ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁muhe ▁wangu ▁wo tosa , ▁ mbali ▁nzewele ▁zangu ▁hazi sang ' hana ▁chinhu .
▁Maabaho ▁kasola ▁vi bawo ▁viya ▁vidi ▁na ▁ku vika ▁hana ▁disanduku ▁diya ▁da ▁ukalangama . ▁Ka i fose za ▁im ibiki ▁ija ▁hana ▁zi mhete ▁za ▁sanduku ▁na ▁keka ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba ▁uchanyha ▁yake .
▁Ke ka ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi , ▁vi ilola ▁na ▁imeza .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁iwa ja ▁we mile ▁haja ▁ka lava ▁mwele ▁wake , ▁ka mtowa ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁ku mkanha ▁ gutwi ▁jake .
▁M wolondeka ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁chitasa ▁chili ▁mgati ▁mmwenu ▁sekechi we ▁lwiza .
▁Iviya ▁kumwetu ▁kuna ▁mgina ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku c hu ngila ▁na ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁kugona .”
▁Haluni ▁keza kwika ▁makono ▁yake ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁iyo ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁na ▁kulonga ▁kwa ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁uhasanyi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁ubananzi ▁wawo ▁wose ▁na ▁wihi ▁wawo ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁ku ye ka ▁yayo ▁yose ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁da ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti . ▁Maabaho ▁kezamuleka ▁luti ▁iyo ▁yahite ▁kuchuwala , ▁kezagal igwa ▁uko ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya i lave ▁mwenyewo .
▁Wa ng ' wa ▁ching ' waji ▁chiya chi ya ▁cha ▁chimuhe . ▁Wa ng ' wa ▁mazi ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uluwe ▁lwa ▁chimuhe ▁wowa hitile ▁nawo , ▁na ▁luwe ▁uwo ▁ukala ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo .
▁na ▁m olondeka ▁mukale ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁sambi , ▁fana ▁kuval a ▁walo ▁da ▁sambi . ▁Ugima ▁uno ▁ ulu mbigwa ▁kwa ▁simwe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁woi lagusa ▁wenyewo ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁wa ▁unovu ▁na ▁ kwela .
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁yaja ▁yoya longigwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Isaya ▁yatimie , ▁“ Y eye ▁mwenyewo ▁kasola ▁mitamu ▁yetu , ▁na ▁kachi tenda ▁chiwe ▁wagima .”
▁‘ Mulungu ▁kolonga , ▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁uhelelo , ▁niza we ti lila ▁Muhe ▁wangu ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁Wana ▁wenu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁weza gong ' onda ▁usenga ▁wangu . ▁Wa bwanga ▁zenu ▁weza wona ▁malaguso ▁na ▁walala ▁weza lota ▁nzozi .
▁Ka ha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁Beseli . ▁U mwaka ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁di tangigwa ▁Lu zu .
▁wawo ▁wose ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wamwenga , ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano , ▁walangulizi ▁wakulu ▁wowasaguligwe ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁weli ▁na ▁nhogolwa , ▁wenu ka ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku mulema .
▁kawauza , ▁“ Mwiza ning ' ha ▁choni ▁one ▁niha ngala ▁Yesu ▁kumwenu ?” ▁Wa m petela ▁hela ▁m alongo ▁matatu .
▁Wanage ▁Gadi ▁wakala ▁Ze f oni ▁na ▁Ha gi ▁na ▁S hu ni ▁na ▁ E s b oni ▁na ▁Eli ▁na ▁ A lo di ▁na ▁ A le li .
▁Ivo ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zen ela ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁isi ▁ija .
▁Kwa ▁ifa ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁Chilisito ▁mumsalaba , ▁ka gala ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁kawa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wawe ▁fana ▁lukuli ▁lumwe , ▁na ▁kuwa bweleza ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁chila ▁munhu ▁keza papa ▁mbahasha ▁yake ▁mwenyewo .
▁I kala ▁saa ▁kenda ▁imisi ▁viya wonile ▁malaguso ▁funhu ▁funhu , ▁kamuwona ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko mwizila ▁na ▁kamtanga , ▁“ Kolineliyo !”
▁Ivo ▁ lekeni ▁uvwizi , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁kumulongela ▁ muhuwila ▁miyage ▁ukweli , ▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁wose ▁ni ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito .
▁M ulotezi ▁Miliamu , ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁Haluni , ▁kasola ▁chi goma ▁mu m ko no , ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wose ▁wamsondelela , ▁wa towa ▁chi goma ▁na ▁wa vi na .
▁Zakaliya ▁kamuuza ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija , ▁“ Vino ▁niza vimanya ze ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁kweli ? ▁Niye ▁na ▁mulala ▁na ▁mke ▁wangu ▁iviya ▁mulala .”
▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁viya lawile ▁navo ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo . ▁F a mbulo ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁da ▁zina ▁Melikizedeki ▁ni , ▁“ Mfalume ▁wa ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zozi mnogeza ▁Mulungu ” , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁bululu ▁da ▁Sa le mu , ▁zina ▁jake ▁iviya ▁di na ▁fambulo ▁da ▁“ Mfalume ▁wa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Mbali ▁china ▁moyo ▁u gangamale ▁na ▁chaha londile ▁hata ▁ku ha ma ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁ng ' huli ▁zetu , ▁chiha ha mile ▁ukaye ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa .
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela ‚ ▁‘ Loleni ‚ ▁lelo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ni ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁Wamisili . ▁Mo londa ▁kuwa leke za ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo !’ ▁”
▁Wanage ▁Laheli ▁wakala ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁Benjamini .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza gala ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁kutali ▁wam vu n hileni ▁fana ▁masumula , ▁isi ▁iyo ▁hamu imanya ▁ulonzi ▁wake .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho hulika ▁kuwa ▁kumwenu ▁wa uko ▁wanhu ▁wa b wa , ▁wabule ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁wo sang ' hanila ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wamwenga .
▁“ U chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁zahabu ▁weza gubika ▁chitambala ▁cha ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁kwa ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali . ▁Weza guma ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁ya ▁kupapila .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wowa huwile ▁weza , ▁wa samha ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu .
▁Weza watanga ▁wanhu ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁yawo , ▁uko ▁weza lava ▁nhambiko ▁zozi londeka . ▁Mana ▁weza pata ▁utajili ▁wawo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁na ▁ngama ▁zawo ▁muna ▁umsanga ▁wa ▁mhwani .’
▁Ha nhu ▁ha ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yoya kalile ▁yo soma ▁hakala ▁hano , ▁“ Fan a ▁ng ' hondolo ▁yo galigw a ▁ku chinjigwa , ▁fana ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁viyo nyama la ▁viyo kanhigwa ▁mazoya , ▁nayo ▁ha longile ▁mbuli ▁bule .
▁Ni tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁wo mulonga , ▁“ Diyelo ▁hebu ▁igolo ▁chiza hita ▁kudibululu ▁dimwenga ▁mwaka ▁mgima ▁chiza chuuza ▁vinhu ▁kupata ▁faida .”
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁ku ilongela ▁wenyewo ▁chinhu ▁cha ki ▁cho wo daha ▁kumtendela ▁Yesu .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ Y atunhizigwe ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁Bulahimu ▁niiyo ▁yang ' hali ▁hana zimiza ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁kwaminika ▁kwake ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani languliza ▁m baka ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁Ni sang ' hanileni ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁niye ▁niza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁ndiya ▁na ▁mazi ▁na ▁ku segeza ▁mitamu ▁kumwenu .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁kasegela ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁Galilaya .
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁cha ▁hamwe ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Chilisito ▁ ihawa ▁cho kwamha ▁kwa ▁ugangamalo ▁m baka ▁ku helelo ▁chiya ▁chochi huwila ▁chi chi li ▁nacho ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamulongela ▁kaidi , ▁“ Nolamba ▁uni lekelele ▁ni longe ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁niye ▁ni li ▁m atimbwisi ▁na ▁maivu . ▁Niye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁muhala ▁na ▁si faya ▁kulonga ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁Mbali ▁hata ▁mwanza ▁uno ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kakala ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁na ▁hawalek ile ▁wanhu ▁wa segele .
▁Ivo ▁cholonga , ▁si ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zo chi fundizigw e ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zo chi fundizigw e ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁cho fambula ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kweli ▁va ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁Muhe ▁ino .
▁Ha tendile ▁lagano ▁ijo ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁ mbali ▁ka tenda ▁na ▁cheye ▁wose ▁chili ▁wagima ▁diyelo .
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wengi ▁na ▁wafalume ▁wengi ▁wa londa ▁kuwona ▁chino ▁cho muwona ▁mweye , ▁ mbali ▁hawa dahile ▁bule , ▁na ▁wa londa ▁kuhulika ▁chino ▁cho muhulika ▁mweye , ▁ mbali ▁hawa daha ▁bule .”
▁ mbali ▁ mulave ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁hanhu ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁i di mwe ▁ya ▁makabila ▁yenu . ▁Baho ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁honda mulavile ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁baho ▁mwiza tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho nimulagilizani .
▁No mmanya ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ija ▁ya ilumbile ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁kenul igwa ▁m baka ▁kuulanga ▁ng ' hani ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mine ▁i fosile . ▁Si vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁uko ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁baho ▁viya lawilile , ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁kovimanya .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kasegela ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁msang ' hani ▁wake , ▁na ▁Musa ▁ka kwela ▁kumulima ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Wapete ni ▁Waisilaili , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo , ▁ pete ni ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁mazina ▁ya ▁walume , ▁imwe ▁imwe ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza ▁mwanamke , ▁“ W eye ▁kutenda ▁choni ?” ▁M wanamke ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Z o ka ▁di nivwizila , ▁na ▁niye ▁ni ja ▁di tunda .”
▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁mambwiya , ▁wa leke ▁wakale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁ku gula ▁na ▁ku c hulu za ▁vinhu . ▁Isi ▁yo faya ▁kukala ▁cheye ▁na ▁wawo . ▁Wawo ▁wa sole ▁wa ndele ▁wetu ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiwa sole ▁wa ndele ▁wawo .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo kwingila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁lusita ▁i hindigwa , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Nokulamba , ▁ni laguse ▁utunhizo ▁wako .”
▁Na ▁sambi ▁waja ▁wehi ▁wangu , ▁waja ▁hawa ni londa ▁niwe ▁mfalume , ▁wa gale ni ▁hano ▁mu wakome ▁haulongozi ▁wangu !’ ▁”
▁Wo se ▁wa memezigw a ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁wa son ga ▁kulonga ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁umwenga ▁fana ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁viya wa da hi ze ▁kulonga .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁Sala ▁fana ▁viyamulongele .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu i c ha n je ▁ sa le ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁zing ' huli ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wadanganike , ▁hebu ▁sekem wa ndike ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁zing ' huli ▁zenu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ M weye ▁walume ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁Chi tazeni ! ▁Ino ▁niiyo ▁munhu ▁yo fundiza ▁wanhu ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁wa leke ▁kuwa sondelela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁Kaye ▁ino ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Na ▁sambi ▁kaweng iza ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kaha tenda ▁hanhu ▁hano ▁helile ▁hambule ▁mwiko .”
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mulema ▁Mwana ▁iviya ▁ko mulema ▁Tata , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mtogola ▁Mwana ▁iviya ▁ko mtogola ▁Tata .
▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kutosa , ▁yeye ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁chiza nda ▁cha ▁Chi di lo ni . ▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁hakala ▁na ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁Mizaituni , ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wengi la ▁umo .
▁na ▁wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa gala ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kufosa ▁viya ▁vovi londeka ▁kwa ▁ usang ' hano ▁uja ▁uya chi lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi usang ' hane .”
▁Zi ti mbule ni ▁kwa ▁moto ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zawo ▁za ▁ku songola ▁za ▁milungu ▁yawo . ▁Sekemu londe ▁hela ▁hebu ▁zahabu ▁ili ▁uchanyha ▁yake , ▁hebu ▁sekemu vi sole ▁na ▁kuvi tenda ▁venu . ▁Ku tenda ▁ivo ▁ni ▁m t e go ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yehilwe .
▁M vula ▁i to nya ▁na ▁lwanda ▁zose ▁zi mema ▁mazi , ▁beho ▁dibu ma ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁kaye ▁ija , ▁nayo ▁ igwa ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁kwaviya ▁i zengigw a ▁muna ▁umsanga .”
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kutambika , ▁hanhu ▁hawa iting ' hane ▁ha ting isi ka . ▁Wo se ▁wa memezigw a ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁ku gong ' onda ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁kudumba .
▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁tajili ▁yoya kalile ▁ko yawala ▁viwalo ▁va ▁chitani ▁inogile ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁chila ▁siku ▁kakala ▁kotenda ▁dugila ▁koja ▁ndiya ▁zinogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho , ▁ni go migwa ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu .
▁Zi sigala ▁siku ▁mbili ▁kufika ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁na ▁dugila ▁da ▁magate ▁hayana gumigw a ▁ha mila . ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wakala ▁wo zahila ▁kumgwila ▁Yesu ▁chi hu p i hu p i ▁na ▁kumkoma .
▁Ka hita ▁yo kimbila ▁m baka ▁kwa ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁na ▁kwa ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁imwenga ▁yoya lo ndigwe ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa u sola ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁kuna ▁dileme , ▁na ▁hachi vimanyile ▁wa wika ▁kulihi !”
▁na ▁keka ▁chilaguso ▁uchanyha ▁yetu ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁na ▁kwika ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁mgati ▁yetu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁viyo chi kila .
▁Mulungu ▁kani gala ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu ▁muladi ▁ni watende ▁mweye ▁mu sigale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁kuwakombola ▁kwa ▁ukombola ▁mkulu .
▁Yano ▁yose ▁ya lawilila ▁uko ▁Besaniya , ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani , ▁Yohana ▁hoya kalile ▁kobatiza .
▁ka tuma ▁wa senga ▁kwa ▁Balaamu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Beoli , ▁uko ▁P e so li ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Efulati ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Wa a ma wi . ▁Wamulongela ▁Balaki , ▁“ Nolonda ▁ uvimanye ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁wene la ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁na ▁wokala ▁habehi ▁na ▁niye .
▁Kwa viya ▁chila ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁ko sa guligwa ▁muladi ▁ya lave ▁chitumetume ▁na ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁wetu ▁iviya ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁Mulungu .
▁Ni msagula ▁yeye ▁muladi ▁yawa fundize ▁wanage ▁na ▁waja ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wangu . ▁Na ▁niye ▁niza mtendela ▁Bulahimu ▁chiya ▁choni mu laganile .”
▁Wa segela ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁K ib ilosi ▁Hata ava .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kongezeka ▁kwa ▁yehile , ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wiza ho la .
▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁viza komelezeka ▁lusita ▁va ha sang ' haniligwa , ▁yano ▁ni ▁mafundizo ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁chiunhu .
▁Na yo ▁Mulungu ▁yo wona ▁m yoyo ▁yetu , ▁kovimanya ▁chi yo gesa ▁Muhe , ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁kowa tambikila ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyolonda .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitondo , ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁waiting ' hana , ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁magogogo ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Mulungu . ▁Yesu ▁ka galigw a ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁chitala .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁mwa mbu ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Yolodani , ▁hanhu ▁Yohana ▁ha yakalile ▁kobatiza , ▁na ▁kakala ▁uko .
▁“ Mwiza handa ▁mbeyu ▁nyingi , ▁ mbali ▁mwiza gobola ▁chidogo , ▁kwaviya ▁nzige ▁wezakuja .
▁Ivo ▁wa a na ke ▁waja ▁wasegela ▁kudileme , ▁wa kimbila ▁kuno ▁wo gudemeka ▁na ▁ kwazanywa . ▁Hawa mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁kwaviya ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ M a bu ng ' hulo ▁ya lawilile ▁kuulanga , ▁ya gole ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo , ▁ya laguse ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁dugila ▁na ▁siku ▁na ▁miyaka ,
▁ Mwaha kweleka ▁matunda ▁mengi ▁na ▁kui lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mwa wa nahina ▁wangu , ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁ko tunhizigwa .
▁Keza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi se ge ▁cha ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁ching ' waji .
▁Ichil o ▁chiya ▁Helode ▁yang ' hali ▁hana mulava ▁Petili ▁kunze ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁kagona ▁hagati ▁ha ▁wakalizi ▁waidi , ▁ka zi ngilizigwa ▁minyololo ▁midi ▁na ▁wakala ▁wo kaliza ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁ichifungo .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁Masadukayo ▁wamwenga , ▁wanhu ▁wowo longa ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁hawa daha ▁kuzilibuka , ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu ,
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁Mfalisayo ▁iyo , ▁“ Saimoni , ▁no londa ▁ nikulongele ▁chinhu .” ▁Saimoni ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ona ▁ Mfundiza , ▁ nilongele .”
▁One ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁yaha mbandama ▁muke ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁ka mguma ▁chinyala ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Kweli ▁wose ▁waidi ▁ wolondeka ▁wa komigwe . ▁Wo i tendela ▁wenyewo ▁wawe ▁na ▁ubananzi .
▁Walawi ▁weza wa gong ' onde la ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ,
▁M umanye ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁mu ashelati ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁ hi mu ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo tambikila ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁munhu ▁fana ▁iyo ▁heza kwingila ▁bule ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Seke wa za ny we ▁kwaviya ▁no kulongela ▁kuwa ▁wose ▁m wolondeka ▁m welekigwe ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi .
▁Wa naake ▁wamwenga ▁wa b we li zi ligwa ▁ndugu ▁zawo ▁wadanganike ▁kuno ▁wa zilibuligwa . ▁Wa mwenga ▁wawo ▁wa lema ▁ku fungu ligwa , ▁wa gazigwa ▁m baka ▁kudanganika ▁muladi ▁wa pate ▁ku zilibuligwa ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ugima ▁unogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Vino ▁kuna ▁m ulungu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁ya gezile ▁kuwa sola ▁wanhu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kuwatenda ▁wawe ▁wake , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁viya mtendele ni ▁uko ▁Misili ? ▁Ka sang ' hanila ▁udahi ▁wake ▁ng ' hulu ▁ku gala ▁ma hulo ▁na ▁ng ' hondo , ▁ka tenda ▁vilaguso ▁na ▁mauzauza ▁na ▁ka tenda ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kudumbiza ▁zi lawilile .
▁Ivo ▁mwiza wa sang ' hanila ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁waja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wonda ya wa tume ▁kumwenu , ▁kwa ▁nzala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁na ▁kukala ▁mwa zi ▁na ▁ku hungukilw a ▁chila ▁chinhu . ▁Keza mfunga ni ▁ni la ▁ya ▁zuma ▁m baka ▁yam danganize ni .
▁Sala ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁saba .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Musa ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁siku ▁ija ▁iya walagilize ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mgalile ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁kuja ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai .
▁I wa ▁imitondo ▁iwa ▁ichigulogulo , ▁siku ▁ye ta no .
▁“ Haluni ▁viyo kwingila ▁hanhu ▁helile , ▁keza v a la ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁cha ▁ku humiza ▁chi cho ligwe ▁mazina ▁ya ▁makabila ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁siza wa zimiza ▁ng ' o .
▁Ch eye ▁cha ▁watumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁chaha dahile ▁kum gaza ni ▁mweye , ▁ mbali ▁cheye ▁chi lagusa ▁uhole ▁fana ▁viya ▁mama ▁viyo mulole sa ▁mwanage .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kamsola ▁Yesu ▁ya la n higwe ▁mibalati .
▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ka la ga na ▁na ▁mweye ▁kuwa ▁kezakwiza ! ▁Lelo ▁ka kulihi ? ▁Wa saho ▁zetu ▁wa mala ▁kudanganika , ▁ mbali ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho kala ▁iviya ▁iviya ▁kuson gela ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose !”
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁hasi , ▁kawa langa ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁na ▁kuwalongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo londa ▁kuwa ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁wa ▁kuuhelelo , ▁na ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁wose .”
▁Ivo ▁wa zengele ni ▁mabululu ▁wanenu ▁na ▁mab umba ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wenu , ▁ mbali ▁ tende ni ▁fana ▁vi mwikile ▁chilagano !”
▁Mu de ng ' helele ▁siku ▁zose .
▁muladi ▁sekeya igode ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁ku dika ▁hakwe ▁lagilizo ▁dino ▁kwa ▁vovose . ▁Maabaho ▁yeye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁weza tawala ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Vi tume tume ▁va ▁Yakobo ▁vi kala ▁vimu longole la , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁chilo ▁icho ▁kakala ▁mudi la go .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁hamu langulizigw a ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁kufose la ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito , ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁ija ▁yoya zilibuke ▁muladi ▁chi mtendile ▁yanogile ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa za ga nyi ka ▁ng ' hani , ▁walonga , ▁“ Vino ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁wochi wa hulika ▁wolonga ▁vino ▁si ▁Wa galila ya ?
▁Na ▁lagilizo ▁dekaidi ▁ijo ▁dino , ▁‘ Mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁viu i londa ▁mwenyewo .’
▁Uchanyha ▁yake ▁weza kwika ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali , ▁weza kwika ▁chitambala ▁cha ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu . ▁Maabaho ▁weza kwing iza ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano .
▁ Hachi londa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya ikwale ▁kwa ▁ usang ' hano ▁wetu , ▁ivo ▁cho iyoha ▁sekechi ke ▁ching ' hwaso ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yoyose .
▁U ba la ▁uli ngile ▁ivo ▁hau lawa ▁kuulanga ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁wolawa ▁muna ▁isi , ▁siyo ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ mbali ▁wa ▁chinyamkela .
▁Kwa viya ▁Daudi ▁viya komeleze ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka wandigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zake , ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lu wola .
▁Maabaho ▁iviya ▁U ba la ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁u longa , ▁‘ Niza wa tuma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁watumigwa , ▁mwiza wakoma ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁wamwenga .’
▁Na ▁Yesu ▁ka kula ▁muna ▁ubala ▁na ▁ichi mo , ▁na ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwa nogeza ▁wanhu ▁iviya .
▁Maabaho ▁Abimeleki ▁ka mbweleza ▁Sala ▁kwa ▁Bulahimu , ▁iviya ▁kamwing ' ha ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁chike .
▁L usita ▁luja ▁viu chi wonele ▁ludoko ▁cheye ▁wakulu ▁wako , ▁niye ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁m okaji ▁magate ▁na ▁kuchi funga ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi .
▁Munhu ▁yaha langulizigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁viza woneka ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁ulondo ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁ubazi ▁na ▁u nhu ▁goya ▁na ▁unovu ▁na ▁kwaminika ,
▁Na ▁one ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ka bule ▁se kulu ▁hebu ▁mdodo , ▁uhazi ▁wake ▁keza kwing ' higwa ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wa ▁habehi , ▁nayo ▁keza hazi ▁fana ▁uhazi ▁wake . ▁Di no ▁dizakuwa ▁lagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .”
▁Maabaho , ▁kabwela ▁nawo ▁m baka ▁Nazaleti , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁kowa tegeleza . ▁ Mami ▁yake ▁ka gendelela ▁ku kumbuka ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁muha muwona ▁munhu ▁kabananga , ▁mweye ▁womu langulizigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁m zum eni ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁uhole , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁m uiteganye ▁muladi ▁sekemu gezigwe .
▁Ichil o ▁chikulu ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila ▁wakala ▁wo tosa ▁na ▁ kwimba ▁nyila ▁za ▁ku mtogoza ▁Mulungu ▁kuno ▁wa fungigw e ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wo tegeleza .
▁Na wo ▁wa tenda ▁ivo , ▁Haluni ▁kagolosa ▁ balati ▁jake ▁na ▁kaya towa ▁yam atimbwisi , ▁nayo ▁ya galuka ▁u sa wa sa wa ▁u w ava mba ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama . ▁M atimbwisi ▁yose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁ya galuka ▁kuwa ▁u sa wa sa wa .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuni uza , ▁Wa lu mi ▁wa londa ▁kuni lekelela ▁kwaviya ▁hawa ni fikile ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁chochose ▁chochi londa ▁ni komigwe .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wo m gaiya ni , ▁ mbali ▁si ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁inogile . ▁I la ▁wose ▁wo londa ▁kuwa gola ▁na ▁niye , ▁muladi ▁mweye ▁muwa gaiye ▁wawo ▁fana ▁viwo m gaiya ni ▁mweye .
▁Na yo ▁kakala ▁ko wafundiza ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zawo ▁za ▁kutosela , ▁na ▁kakala ▁ko tunhizigwa ▁na ▁wose .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Tegelezeni ▁viyalongile ▁ija ▁msemi ▁yehile .
▁M weye ▁ walongele ni , ▁‘ Chi kala ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi lava ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁uli ▁na ▁udahi .
▁Chila ▁vini wa kumbuka ▁no mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁wangu .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁viwo danganika ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Adamu , ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza zilibuka ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁baho ▁waja ▁na ▁we guta . ▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wa dondola ▁yaja ▁ya masigavu ▁na ▁wa memez a ▁vi gelo ▁longo ▁na ▁vidi .
▁Viya kalile ▁yo gesa ▁yayo , ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁ka mulawilila ▁muna ▁zinzozi , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁Yosefu , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁sekeudumbe ▁kumsola ▁Maliya ▁yawe ▁muke ▁wako , ▁kwaviya ▁kana ▁wimo ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ,
▁“ ▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wose ▁ welekigwe ▁Isilaili ▁ wolondeka ▁watende ▁yayo ▁yose ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁simwe ▁ijo , ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁ukulu ▁wake , ▁m ahembe ▁yake ▁ni ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁mbago ▁lume . ▁Keza ya sang ' hanila ▁kuwa kenha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁kezawa kenha ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁isi . ▁Efulaimu ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ng ' hondo ▁maelufu ▁mengi ▁na ▁Manase ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ng ' hondo ▁maelufu .’
▁Mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ka lema , ▁kalonga , ▁“ No vimanya ▁mwanangu , ▁novimanya . ▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Manase ▁iviya ▁weza kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wakulu . ▁Mbali ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁keza kuwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁yeye , ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁weza kuwa ▁makabila ▁makulu .”
▁Mbali ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁wa mala ▁kum sepa ▁Paulo , ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁wa kimbila . ▁M baka ▁ija ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kadumba , ▁viya vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁Paulo ▁ni ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Loma ▁na ▁kawa ▁kamala ▁ku mfunga ▁minyololo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niza m segeza ▁munhu ▁yoni mu l umbile ▁muna ▁isi , ▁na ▁iviya ▁nizawa segeza ▁wang ' onyo , ▁waja ▁wotambala ▁na ▁ndege ▁wa ▁kuulanga . ▁No j u ta ▁kwaviya ▁niwa lumba .”
▁Maabaho ▁Isaka ▁kamsola ▁Lebeka ▁m baka ▁muna ▁i he ma ▁da ▁Sala ▁mami ▁yake , ▁na ▁kawa ▁muke ▁wake . ▁Isaka ▁ka mulonda ▁Lebeka ▁yoya m sangalaz e ▁viyadanganike ▁mami ▁yake .
▁ Mwing ' he ▁chila ▁munhu ▁cho yo ku pula , ▁na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ku ho ka ▁chinhu ▁chako , ▁sekeu mulongele ▁ya ku bwelezele .
▁Ha mala ▁baho ▁wa chinja ▁mwana ▁luti ▁na ▁wa cho fe ka ▁ng ' hanzu ▁ya ▁Yosefu ▁muna ▁idamu .
▁Wayahudi ▁wamwenga ▁wa mgala ▁ A le ki za nda ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo . ▁Na yo ▁kawa fu nyi za ▁wanhu ▁wanyama le , ▁muladi ▁ya i g ombe le ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu .
▁Na ▁wakala ▁uko ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁mwingi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina .
▁Loleni ▁ma ho we , ▁hawa handa ▁na ▁hawa gobola ▁na ▁wabule ▁ dung u , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kowa li sa . ▁M weye ▁munoga ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁ndege !
▁Mbali ▁wa geza ▁ku kwela ▁ku inhembeti ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁mulima , ▁inga wa ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hadi lawile ▁muna ▁dilago ▁hebu ▁Musa ▁ha lawile .
▁Nolonga , ▁lungilo ▁ mbali ▁siyo ▁jako ▁ila ▁da ▁ija ▁imwenga . ▁ Siza sang ' hanila ▁ulegeho ▁wangu ▁one ▁uha tenda ▁lungilo ▁da ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁di ni taguse .
▁Yesu ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁masimwe . ▁“ Munhu ▁imwe ▁ka handa ▁mizabibu ▁mumgunda . ▁Amalabaho ▁ka zungulusil a ▁wako , ▁ka himba ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku b o jo gela ▁nzabi bu , ▁na ▁ka zenga ▁lingo . ▁Ke ka ▁mkalizi , ▁m aabaho ▁kahita ▁isi ▁ya ▁kutali .
▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁yoya ni ni le ▁wawo , ▁ka ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁wose . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kuwa lava ▁m makono ▁ya ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁Viya kalile ▁yolonga ▁yayo , ▁wingu ▁ ze lu ▁diwa gubika , ▁dizi ▁di lawa ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁ijo ▁di longa , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁ Mwanangu , ▁nyachende ▁wangu ▁yoni mulonda . ▁Mu mtegeleze ▁yeye !”
▁Abulamu ▁kakala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁ mbali ▁Lutu ▁kakala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yaja ▁ya ▁dibawe ▁na ▁kaha mila ▁Sodoma .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo ha u papa ▁msalaba ▁wake ▁na ▁kuni sondelela , ▁hadaha ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁mwanahina ▁wangu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yoyo laviligw a ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁yondaya i je . ▁I za digwa ▁muna ▁uluwa ▁lwa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zi watenda ▁Wayahudi ▁wa i bagule ▁kaidi .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁iwe ▁yenu . ▁Habule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yondaya we ▁ngayengaye ,
▁kwaviya ▁kani kumbuka , ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁m nyendanyenda ! ▁ Kuson gela ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza ni tanga ▁ni li ▁na ▁heli
▁Na ▁vi na la ▁va ▁chitasa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁viya ▁vake ▁vose , ▁vitasa ▁vake ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yake ,
▁Ma aabaho ▁ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁wamwenga ▁weza , ▁wowa kalile ▁wa sisili ▁na ▁wa so ka . ▁Weza ▁na ▁wema ▁habehi ▁na ▁waja ▁ng ' ombe ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁luja ▁lwa ▁Naili ,
▁“ Vonda wi ke ▁chilaho ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁sekeu kala me ▁kuchi fikiza , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁kezachi da i ▁kumwako , ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁ku hasanya .
▁Na ▁vino ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁umanyi ▁wako , ▁ndugu ▁ija ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁nyondenyonde ▁Chilisito ▁yoya danganike ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake , ▁kezakw a ga .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kolonga ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁kuwa ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁uhelelo , ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁weza u bela ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁kui tegeleza ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁vinyamkela .
▁Iviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁matamu ▁ya ▁chila ▁modeli ▁na ▁manhesa ▁yamwenga ▁yaja ▁haya ta mbu ligwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino ▁cha ▁malagilizo ▁m baka ▁mu danganizigwe .
▁Mbali ▁viwa mulongele ▁Yakobo ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose ▁zi wa lagilizigwe ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁viya wone ▁m ituka ▁yoya galil igwe ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁kumsola , ▁moyo ▁wake ▁u mema ▁de ng ' ho ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Mndewa ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Z i ha mala ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁niza bwela ▁na ▁niza zenga ▁kaidi ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Daudi . ▁Niza zenga ▁kaidi ▁mahame ▁yake ▁na ▁niza u gangamiza ▁kaidi .
▁Labani ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Leka ▁na ▁niye ▁ni longe . ▁Ni ifunza ▁kwa ▁u sa wi ▁wangu ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani temela ▁mate ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako .
▁“ Mwiza temeligw a ▁mate ▁vimu kwingila ▁na ▁vi mulawa .
▁“ M o daha ▁kuja ▁ndege ▁yoyose ▁hambule ▁mwiko .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁“ Mami ▁yangu ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁ni ▁waja ▁woi hulika ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kui togola .”
▁Wa kalizi ▁viwa muwamb ile ▁Yesu , ▁wa sola ▁viwalo ▁vake , ▁wa vi gola ▁vi lu ndi ▁vi ne , ▁chila ▁mkalizi ▁lu ndi ▁jake . ▁Iviya ▁wa sola ▁ng ' hanzu ▁yake , ▁ng ' hanzu ▁iyo ▁i kala ▁i lu kigwe ▁kwa ▁chi hande ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁walo ▁muhala ▁chili bule ▁mu lu ko .
▁“ M kulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kalonga ▁na ▁cheye ▁kwa ▁uka li ▁na ▁kuchi longa ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wapelembaji ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake .
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁ufila ▁vou mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁lusita ▁lwose ▁vondaya la wigwe ▁na ▁ufila ▁hebu ▁ufila ▁hou ki mili ligwa ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Ha ulongozi ▁ha ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁kukala ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chili ngile ▁fana ▁bahali ▁ya ▁chi lole , ▁fana ▁dibwe ▁di melemeta ▁ng ' hani . ▁Chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chiya ▁haja ▁hagati ▁chi kala ▁chi zunguluk igwa ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁wagima ▁wane , ▁vi umbe ▁waja ▁wakala ▁wene la ▁meso ▁kuulongozi ▁na ▁kuchisogo .
▁Sa ng ' hano ▁ya ▁Wa g elishoni ▁i kala ▁ku kaliza ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ngubiko ▁yake ▁na ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁wa uza , ▁“ Ka kulihi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁ yelekwe ▁yondaya we ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ? ▁Kwa viya ▁chi iwona ▁nhondo ▁yake ▁im a ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiza ▁ku mtosela .”
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁ka kanha ▁lu fa a , ▁ka lamba ▁ya kalizi gwe ▁na ▁ya muleke ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma ▁ya lamule ▁mbuli ▁iyo . ▁Ivo ▁ni lagiliza ▁ya kalizi gwe ▁m baka ▁vondani ngale ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma .”
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁no walamba ▁muwe ▁fana ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ni linga ▁fana ▁mweye . ▁Hamu nitendele ▁jojose ▁dihile .
▁Petili ▁yang ' hali ▁ka za ga nyi ka ▁na ▁malaguso ▁yano ▁ya na ▁fambulo ▁ ja ki , ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa tumigwe ▁kwa ▁ Kolineliyo ▁wafika ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Saimoni ▁ko yakalile , ▁nawo ▁wema ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ulwivi ,
▁Tata ▁wa ▁mndele ▁iyo ▁yaha lema ▁ng ' hani ▁kum ze n geza ▁mwanage , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza liha ▁hela ▁ya ▁ zengele ▁yoi londeka ▁kwa ▁mndele ▁yeli ▁mhambe .
▁Leya ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁ka leka ▁ku lela , ▁kamsola ▁Zilipa ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Yakobo ▁yawe ▁fana ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Yesu ▁viya lu wone ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wam zunguluka , ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁walo ke ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa tenda ▁mauzauza ▁yano ▁yose ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka utenda ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁mdala . ▁Hawa le kile ▁Waisilaili ▁wa segele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa kwe ga ▁ingalawa ▁ndodo , ▁wa i zingiliza ▁ingalawa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ miza b i . ▁Wa dumba ▁kuwa ▁waha dahile ▁ku namata ▁muna ▁ing ema ▁ya ▁mhwani ▁ya ▁L ib i ya , ▁wa hulumus a ▁ma tanga ▁na ▁wa ileka ▁ingalawa ▁i soligwe ▁na ▁mbeho .
▁Ivo ▁Mwenevale , ▁kwaviya ▁na ▁niye ▁ ny hunguza ▁vinogile ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso , ▁ni lola ▁vinogile ▁na ▁niye ▁ni k wandikile ▁goya ▁viya ▁vi lawilile .
▁M wa ▁ iwawo ▁wa umo ▁ H i me nayo ▁na ▁ A le ki za nda , ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁ni watagusa ▁kwa ▁kuwa leka ▁waiting ' hane ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Lufyende , ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁iza wafundiza ▁wa leke ▁ku muliga ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁na ha tagusa , ▁no tagusa ▁viilondeka , ▁kwaviya ▁si tagusa ▁niidumwe . ▁Tata ▁yanhumile ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁niye .
▁Y eye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ija ▁yam gulile , ▁keza peta ▁miyaka ▁kwandusi la ▁viya i chuuze ▁m baka ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza . ▁Be i ▁ya ▁ku lekigwa ▁yailegehe ▁iza linganyiz igwa ▁na ▁maliho ▁ya ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake .
▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vino ▁hawa honyigwe ▁bule ▁wanhu ▁longo ? ▁Lelo ▁waja ▁kenda ▁wa kulihi ?
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulagiliza ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁u weng ' he ▁Waisilaili ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁wa ▁isi ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya , ▁iviya ▁ kala gi li zigwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya weng ' he ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁Selofehadi ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Maabaho ▁keza ▁mwanamke ▁mgane ▁na ▁ngayengaye , ▁ka lava ▁sente ▁mbili .
▁Nomulambani ▁mu winze ▁simwe ▁jangu .
▁na ▁Ha do la mu ▁na ▁U za li ▁na ▁Di kila ,
▁Maabaho ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁wowa kalile ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁maelufu ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁magan a ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁Musa
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 5 3 , 4 00.
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁ka tenda ▁lagano ▁na ▁cheye ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Holebu .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu . ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁siku ▁saba ▁izo , ▁mwiza segeza ▁lusu ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ja ▁chinhu ▁chi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁saba ▁izo , ▁kolondeka ▁ya wi ngigwe ▁na ▁Waisilaili .’ ▁”
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁sekeye ke ▁lusu ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake , ▁nyama ▁ija ▁i chinjigwe ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁sekei sigale ▁m baka ▁imitondo .
▁Fan a ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Diyelo ▁muha hulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ peta ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁voilagilizigw e .
▁hebu ▁kwa ▁kumtowa ▁ng ' ho nde ▁na ▁kudanganika , ▁baho ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya mkomile ▁miyage ▁ni ▁mkomaji ▁na ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe . ▁Ndugu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyakomigwe ▁kolondeka ▁ku lihiliza ▁vondaya iting ' hane ▁nayo .
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁na ▁yoni huwila ▁niye ▁heza danganika ▁ng ' o ! . ▁Vino ▁ko ya huwila ▁yayo ?”
▁M i sa le ▁yangu ▁niza itenda ▁i ko l we ▁na ▁damu , ▁na ▁zele ▁jangu ▁diza wakoma ▁wose ▁woni lema ▁niye . ▁Weza ta p a gala ▁damu ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa komigwe ▁na ▁watumwa ▁na ▁wehi ▁weli ▁na ▁nyele ▁nhali .’
▁Nompul a ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Tata ▁ya ching ' hile ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ubazi ▁na ▁tindiwalo , ▁vi we ▁na ▁cheye ▁muna ▁ikweli ▁na ▁ulondo .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kuvimanya ▁fana ▁munhu ▁kolongo zigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁keza ▁chiunhu ▁kolongo zigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁Waisilaeli , ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga , ▁“ M isi ▁yose ▁niwa golose la ▁makono ▁yangu ▁wanhu ▁hawa tegeleza ▁na ▁hawa togola .”
▁Mo longa ▁cheye ▁one ▁chi kalile ▁uko ▁miyaka ▁iyo ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁sigambe ▁chitende ▁chiya ▁chi watendile ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Baho ▁wa muwamb a ▁Yesu ▁mumsalaba . ▁Iviya ▁wawa wa mba ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁waidi , ▁imwe ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kumoso , ▁na ▁Yesu ▁hagati ▁yawo .
▁Mbali ▁Wa ko ha si ▁ha weng ' hile ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo ▁i kala ▁kupapa ▁vinhu ▁va ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ya mayega ▁yawo .
▁Mulungu , ▁Tata ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu , ▁yeng ' higwe ▁nhogolwa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kovimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁si ▁m vwizi .
▁ Siku ▁ye nane ▁kezamgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ huwa ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁ma ki nda ▁ya ▁nziwa ▁maidi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Yakobo ▁ka mvwizila ▁Labani ▁M wa la mu , ▁ha mulongele ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁ko segela .
▁Mbali ▁Sauli ▁ka ndusa ▁kudi bananga ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁kahita ▁chila ▁kaye , ▁kawa lava ▁kunze ▁wahuwila , ▁wanaake ▁na ▁walume ▁na ▁kuwa guma ▁mui chi fu ngo .
▁N hosa ▁yenu ▁ino ▁iza togole ka ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁mhule ▁zenu ▁za ▁mwanduso ▁hebu ▁fana ▁zabibu ▁zi yo ni lavila ▁muli mi .
▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁kachilongela , ▁‘ M o vimanya ▁kuwa ▁muke ▁wangu ▁Laheli ▁ka n ye leke la ▁wana ▁waidi ▁muhala ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Pa lu ▁kakala ▁Eliabu .
▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ingalawa , ▁ka loka ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁na ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁jake .
▁Haluni ▁ka mchinja ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Wanage ▁wa mgalila ▁damu , ▁nayo ▁kai mizil a ▁muna ▁zi banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁lupango .
▁Wa zi tagusa ▁hamwe ▁hela ▁izo ▁na ▁wazi sang ' hanila ▁ku gulila ▁M gunda ▁wa ▁Chilo ngo , ▁uwe ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuwandila ▁wageni .
▁Ka lila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁m baka ▁Wamisili ▁wa muhulika , ▁m baka ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁nawo ▁wa hulika .
▁Muha hulika ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁mi go mo , ▁sekemudumbe , ▁kwaviya ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁viza lawilila ▁ teng ' hu , ▁ mbali ▁uhelelo ▁ha wi li ▁habehi ▁bule .”
▁Balaamu ▁kenul a ▁meso ▁yake ▁ka wona ▁Waisilaili ▁weka ▁malago ▁yawo , ▁chila ▁kabila ▁hanhu ▁hake , ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwizila ,
▁N hosa ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yoilavigw a ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁iza timbuligwa ▁yose , ▁haiza digwa ▁ng ' o .”
▁Na ▁fana ▁vi i wile ▁muna z isiku ▁za ▁Nuhu , ▁viya ▁viya ▁izakuwa ▁ivo ▁muna z isiku ▁za ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁walonga , ▁“ Ino ▁kana ▁chinyamkela ▁na ▁iviya ▁kana ▁chip e yu . ▁Vino ▁ha bali ▁mwo mtegeleza ?”
▁Lelo ▁nowalongela ▁mu yepule ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁hebu ▁ usang ' hano ▁uno ▁wahawa ▁u lawa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁wiza bene ka ,
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamwamha ▁mkono , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwanangu , ▁ lamka !”
▁Ho ke leni ▁ukombola ▁fana ▁ p a ma ▁yenu ▁ya ▁zuma , ▁na ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁u panga ▁u mwing ' higwe ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Iviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwihila ▁ng ' hani ▁Haluni ▁m baka ▁ka londa ▁kumkoma , ▁ mbali ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁ni m p u lila ▁Haluni ▁iviya .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa mulongele lela ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Musa , ▁walonga , ▁“ Habali ▁mu chi lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁chi danganike ▁muna ▁ichuwala ? ▁Mana ▁hano ▁ habule ▁ndiya ▁hebu ▁mazi . ▁Ch eye ▁chi ting ' h wa ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ino ▁ya ▁chakachaka .”
▁W e ▁kaidi ▁kamsola ▁mgane ▁iyo , ▁nayo ▁kadanganika ▁iviya ▁ha le kile ▁mwana . ▁I lawilila ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁we ▁ ke ta tu .
▁“ Wa fundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wakala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁Musa .
▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁baho , ▁kahita ▁kudibululu ▁jake ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamsondelela .
▁Bulahimu ▁kawa bagula ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁chike ▁saba ,
▁Mwiza galigw a ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁watawala ▁na ▁wafalume ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu , ▁kuwa ▁m kalangama ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁na ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁Si chimanya ▁bule ▁chiya ▁chi ni sang ' hana , ▁kwaviya ▁chiya ▁chi ni londa ▁si chi sang ' hana ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁chiya ▁chi ni chi hila ▁ni icho ▁choni chi sang ' hana .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁walume ▁wa londeni ▁wanaake ▁zenu , ▁muleke ▁kuwa ka li kila .
▁Wa naake ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁wa lavigwa ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁ku honyigwa ▁mitamu ▁yawo ▁na ▁Yesu ▁iviya ▁wawa sondelela . ▁Wawo ▁wakala ▁china ▁Maliya , ▁ya tangigwe ▁Magidalena , ▁ija ▁yoya lavigwe ▁vinyamkela ▁saba ,
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kema ▁na ▁ka inama ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Wahiti , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ija
▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yo sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yawe ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho yolonda ▁muna ▁uku msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ya isasale ▁kutenda ▁chila ▁sang ' hano ▁inogile .
▁Ivo ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁wasegela ▁na ▁wabwela ▁kwa ▁Balaki ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ B a la a mu ▁ka lema ▁kwiza ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye .”
▁Baho ▁wanahina ▁wa tenda ▁ivo , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wakala ▁hasi .
▁Mbali ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁Yosefu ▁kengila ▁mgati ▁mwiikaye ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wamwenga ▁hawa kalile ▁umo .
▁Seke chi longele le ▁fana ▁viwatendile ▁wamwenga ▁wawo , ▁nawo ▁wa komigwa ▁na ▁M senga ▁wa ▁ifa ▁wa ▁ka tumigwa ▁Mulungu .
▁M iyanza ▁imwenga ▁wingu ▁di kala ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁ichigulogulo ▁m baka ▁imitondo . ▁Wing u ▁diya ▁vi dinuligwe ▁imitondo , ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza , ▁hata ▁one ▁di kala ▁uchanyha ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo , ▁wingu ▁vi dinuligwe ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza .
▁V a leni ▁vilatu , ▁ mbali ▁seke msole ▁viwalo ▁vimwenga .
▁Chi hongwe ▁wako ▁ka niwona ▁na ▁kahita ▁kumgwazo ▁miyanza ▁mitatu . ▁One ▁ha tendile ▁ivo , ▁niha dahile ▁kuku koma ▁na ▁ku muleka ▁chihongwe ▁yawe ▁mgima .”
▁Maabaho ▁ka songola ▁vilumb e ▁vidi ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁kuhonda ▁zahabu ▁hana ▁imi helelo ▁ya ▁ngubiko ▁iyo ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kamuhitila ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ N okulamsa ! ▁Mndewa ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁nayo ▁ka ku temela ▁mate ▁ g ' hani !”
▁Walonga , ▁“ Chilongele , ▁weye ▁iyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mulopozi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Fan a ▁na ha mulongelani , ▁hamwiza ni togola ▁bule ,
▁I ja ▁yeli ▁kuna ▁i chisuwili , ▁sekeya humuluk e ▁kuvi sola ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake .
▁Viya kalile ▁kofundiza , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M wi i lole ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ! ▁Wo londa ▁ku yawala ▁viwalo ▁vi tali ▁na ▁kui ta ▁m ma so ko ▁muladi ▁wala m sigwe ▁kwa ▁ nhu nya .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁S ho bali ▁wa tangigwa ▁ A v a ni ▁na ▁Mana ha ti ▁na ▁ E bali ▁na ▁S he f o ▁na ▁Ona mu .
▁Uko ▁Kolimso ▁kam ting ' hana ▁Muyahudi ▁imwe ▁yo tangigwa ▁Akila , ▁yo yelekigwe ▁na ▁P o n to , ▁yo yezile ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁Pilisi ka ▁kulawa ▁I tali ya ▁siku ▁ziya , ▁kwaviya ▁mtawala ▁Chila u di yo ▁kawalagiliza ▁Wayahudi ▁wose ▁wa lawe ▁Loma . ▁Ivo ▁Paulo ▁kahita ▁kuwa lola ,
▁“ L u b eni , ▁chaudele ▁wangu , ▁nguvu ▁yangu ▁Na ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁u bwanga ▁wangu , ▁Mwene ▁udahi ▁na ▁nguvu .”
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁u walongele , ▁‘ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁isi ▁ino ▁izakuwa ▁uhazi ▁wenu , ▁m haka ▁za ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁zizakuwa ▁fana ▁vino .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wawo ▁waja ▁hawana ibandama ▁na ▁wanaake ▁ng ' o , ▁kwaviya ▁wa ika ▁goya . ▁Wa no ▁wawo ▁wo msondelela ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁chila ▁ho yo hita . ▁Wa no ▁wawo ▁wowa komboligwe ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁muladi ▁wawe ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ma li mbulo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chitumetume ▁chake ▁chili bule ▁ningo .
▁Kwa viya ▁ni gesa ▁kuwa la ula ▁vini kalile ▁m zila ▁kuhita ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Makedoniya ▁na ▁iviya ▁vondani bwele , ▁muladi ▁ni pate ▁nhazo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁umwanza ▁wangu ▁kuhita ▁Yudeya .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha lungu la ▁na ▁chi londa ▁chi bisi ▁chi galuka ▁kuwa ▁chi dung ' hu ▁chidogo ▁hebu ▁chi ze lu ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁m baka ▁Kapelinaumu , ▁bululu ▁da ▁Galilaya . ▁Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁kakala ▁kofundiza ▁wanhu .
▁Na ▁uha iwona , ▁weye ▁iviya ▁kwiza danganika ▁fana ▁viyadanganike ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁Haluni ,
▁Lelo ▁yo kuwa ze ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wetu ▁kowa hulika ▁wolonga ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ?
▁Ka mtenda ni ▁mweye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Walawi ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁muwe ▁habehi ▁nayo . ▁Lelo ▁mo londa ▁kusola ▁hata ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ?
▁Mu yi lole , ▁m kale ▁meso ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁ham vimanya ▁bule , ▁izakuwa ▁zuwaki .
▁Ka leni ▁meso ▁na ▁mu tose ▁muladi ▁sekemu gezigwe . ▁Mo yo ▁wo londa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile , ▁ mbali ▁lukuli ▁lwa bule ▁nguvu .”
▁“ Nimulongelani ▁yano ▁yose ▁muladi ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁yangu ▁i kale ▁mgati ▁mmwenu ▁na ▁ nde ng ' hele o ▁yenu ▁sekei ma le .
▁I nga wa ▁mweye ▁wengi ▁fana ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wadodo ▁kwaviya ▁hamu tegeleze ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Kulaw a ▁muna ▁di bugulu ▁da ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose , ▁ sola ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁ha ▁chila ▁m alongo ▁matano , ▁iwe ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti . ▁Ivo ▁kwiza weng ' ha ▁Walawi ▁wowo sang ' hana ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .”
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁hachi dahile ▁kuwona ▁zuwa ▁hebu ▁nhondo , ▁na ▁beho ▁kulu ▁di gendelela ▁ku bu ma . ▁Kuuhelelo ▁chi kala ▁cha bule ▁lolelo ▁da ▁ku lopoligwa .
▁Wa mweda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo sunh a ▁mawalo ▁yawo ▁muladi ▁wa lekele l we ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁ nyivi ▁zake ▁na ▁kuja ▁ tunda ▁da ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁ugima .
▁Waamaleki ▁weza ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁uko ▁L e fi di mu .
▁No walamba ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁ulondo ▁u yo ching ' ha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁m uilumb e ▁na ▁niye ▁kwa ▁kuni tosela ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko hulika ▁chiya ▁cho yo longa ▁Mulungu . ▁M weye ▁hamu muhulika ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁siyo ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Mbo na ▁mu lukolo ▁wenu ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁zina ▁ijo ?”
▁Wa muwona , ▁ mbali ▁hawammanyile ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁ka uza , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yoya ni dalise ?” ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa bela . ▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁wanhu ▁wa ku zunguluka ▁na ▁kuku sung ' ha - sung ' ha !”
▁Iviya ▁ka tenda ▁panzia ▁da ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema . ▁P anzia ▁di ha mbigwa ▁vinogile .
▁Bule ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wezalonga ▁kuwa ▁ku potigwa ▁kuwa gala ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁you wekile ▁chilagano . ▁Weza longa ▁kuwa ▁kuwa lava ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁muladi ▁uka wakome ▁kuchuwala , ▁kwaviya ▁ku wehila .
▁Wa segela ▁Eli mu ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁habehi ▁na ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu .
▁Iyo ▁izakuwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Walawi , ▁kwaviya ▁wabule ▁uhazi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁N yambenyambe ▁na ▁wachiwa ▁na ▁wagane ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁wezakuja ▁na ▁kwi guta . ▁Tend eni ▁vino ▁muladi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ya mtemele ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chonda mu sang ' hane .
▁Kwa viya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁keza ▁mfundiza ni ▁lusita ▁luja ▁luja ▁yomu l ondigwa ▁kuya longa .”
▁ Hiteni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile . ▁Mbali ▁siza hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala , ▁muladi ▁sekeni wa danganize ▁muna ▁inzila .”
▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wa sang ' hani , ▁kamuuza , ▁‘ Vino ▁kuna ▁choni ?’
▁hebu ▁yaha dalisa ▁chilumb e ▁chochose ▁chochi tambala ▁chochi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁hebu ▁yaham dalisa ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kumtenda ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁vovose ,
▁Baho ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wawo , ▁yoni wa lavile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁ni kale ▁hagati ▁yawo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wawo .
▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁Misili ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁saba , ▁m baka ▁viya wile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁saba .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Zebedayo ▁wa mwizila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁kuna ▁chinhu ▁cho londa ▁u chitendele .”
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁sekeu na v e ▁magulu ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁u na v e ▁makono ▁yangu ▁na ▁ditwi ▁jangu !”
▁Wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁kuwa hulika ▁wano ▁chi wolonga ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Wona , ▁nihulika . ▁Vino ▁hamu somile ▁bule ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Mu wafundiza ▁wana ▁wadoododo ▁na ▁ving ' hele ▁kulava ▁nhogolwa ▁inogile .’ ▁”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁koja , ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁ka mwizila ▁na ▁ ny hu p a ▁ya ▁ a la ba sita ▁inogile ▁ng ' hani ▁yili ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁ka n gidila ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake .
▁Wa tegelezeni ▁walangulizi ▁wenu ▁na ▁mutende ▁viwo lagiliza . ▁Kwa viya ▁wawo ▁wo lole sa ▁ mihe ▁yenu , ▁kwaviya ▁wo za londeka ▁kumwing ' ha ▁Mulungu ▁ peta ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo . ▁One ▁muhawa tegeleza ▁weza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁hamu wategeleze ▁weza sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁kwa ▁kulongelela , ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁haiza wataza .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ka mu languliza ▁Daudi , ▁nayo ▁kalonga . ▁‘ Mndewa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁wangu , ▁U kale ▁ubanzi ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kulume ▁m baka ▁ni weke ▁wehi ▁wako ▁hasi ▁ya ▁magulu ▁yako .’
▁Vino ▁dilihi ▁dibu hile ? ▁Ku longa , ▁‘ Ku lekeleligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wako ,’ ▁hebu ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Inuka ▁uhite ?’
▁Muna ▁iisi ▁yomu hita ▁kukala , ▁hana ng eni ▁hanhu ▁ho se ▁wanhu ▁howo tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁imi tali , ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁imi guhi ▁na ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chila ▁mbiki ▁uli ▁na ▁mbeho ▁ng ' hulu .
▁Wa naake ▁wose ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁yowa londa ▁kuwatendela , ▁wa bota ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁luti .
▁Isi ▁iza itowa ▁na ▁isi ▁imwenga , ▁ufalume ▁wiza itowa ▁na ▁ufalume ▁umwenga . ▁Kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁nzala ▁na ▁ gudemek o ▁da ▁isi ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁Pelegi ▁viya mweleke ▁L e w u ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁kenda , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Viya kalile ▁baho , ▁ka lola ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁na ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁dibawe , ▁ka lola ▁na ▁ka wona ▁yosi ▁do fu ka ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi , ▁yosi ▁fana ▁viya ▁da ▁tanuli ▁kulu .
▁Maabaho ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁kwazanya ▁chi woneka ▁kuulanga , ▁mwanamke ▁yawa ya zigwe ▁zuwa ▁na ▁mwezi ▁ukala ▁hasi ▁ya ▁migulu ▁yake ▁na ▁kombelo ▁da ▁nhondo ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka gala ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁da ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁weka ▁makono ▁yawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo .
▁Wa naake ▁wowa longile ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁kwa ▁watumigwa ▁wakala ▁Maliya ▁Magidalena ▁na ▁Yo a na ▁na ▁Maliya ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁nawo .
▁Maabaho ▁kawa lava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ichitala .
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁uko ▁Besaniya ▁mwii ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Saimoni , ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁dikulu ▁umwaka . ▁Na ▁viyakalile ▁koja , ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁ ny hu p a ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' hila ▁ya ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁keza . ▁Ka i fungula ▁na ▁ka n gidila ▁Yesu ▁mavuta ▁yayo ▁ ndi t wi .
▁na ▁Kola ▁na ▁ G a tamu ▁na ▁Am a le ki , ▁wano ▁wose ▁niuwo ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Elifazi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Edomu , ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁Ada ▁muke ▁wake ▁Esau .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁walonga ▁viya ▁vimu chi hokele ▁lusita ▁vichi mu la u leni ▁na ▁viya ▁vimu le kile ▁kutambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁na ▁ku mu hindukila ▁kum tambika ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ugima ▁na ▁kweli ,
▁“ One ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yose ▁yoni mu la gi li zile ni , ▁ku mulonda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁zake ▁zose ▁na ▁kuilumba ▁nayo ,
▁Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁nikala ▁si mmanyile ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁niza ▁kubatiza ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁wam manye .”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Siyo ▁wose ▁wowo daha ▁kuhokela ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁ni ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wowa ja li igwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁W eye ▁vino ▁ko itenda ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁Bulahimu ? ▁Y eye ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wadanganika . ▁Vino ▁weye ▁ko itenda ▁kwa ▁yelihi ?”
▁Vino ▁niye ▁si i ge he ? ▁Vino ▁niye ▁si ▁mtumigwa ? ▁Vino ▁niye ▁si mu o ne ▁Mndewa ? ▁M weye ▁siyo ▁matunda ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ?
▁Mbali ▁iha fika ▁ichigulogulo ▁keza ko ga , ▁zuwa ▁vonda di ho ng e ▁kodaha ▁kubwela ▁muna ▁dilago .
▁Ka watendela ▁vihile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yetu ▁na ▁kawa wonela ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁wawa wa ng ili za ▁wa weke ▁kunze ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wadoododo ▁wa komigwa .
▁Mfalume ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁chinyala ▁ng ' hani , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁ka ilaha ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wageni ▁wake ▁hana ▁didugila , ▁ha dahile ▁ku mu leme la ▁bule .
▁ Muiteganye ▁sekekuw e ▁na ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke , ▁hebu ▁lukolo ▁hebu ▁kabila ▁jojose ▁dodi kwima ▁hano ▁diyelo ▁dondadi muleke ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kuhita ▁kusang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁imwenga . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁izakuwa ▁fana ▁zi zi ▁dondadi no ge ▁na ▁kwima ▁matunda ▁ya ▁usungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁sumu .
▁Munhu ▁yeng ' higwe ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ▁wayage , ▁leka ▁yawa sang ' hanile , ▁one ▁kufundiza , ▁leka ▁ya fundize .
▁U wa sang ' hanile ▁yanogile ▁wanaake ▁wagane ▁weli bule ▁u tazi ▁wowose .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁hawavimanyile ▁fambulo ▁da ▁mbuli ▁yoya walongele .
▁So la ▁yo l ondigwa ▁i hishi m igwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁mulume ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁sekewa ya ngale ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁keza watagusa ▁wazinzi ▁na ▁wagoni .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wakala ▁wo zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu ▁chinyele , ▁ mbali ▁wakala ▁wowa dumba ▁wanhu .
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya itende ▁mwenyewo ▁mkulu , ▁keza hulumus igwa , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya itende ▁mwenyewo ▁ndodo ▁keza kwe zigwa .
▁Musa ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁bahali , ▁vi ku kung u zu ke ▁mazi ▁ya bwela ▁fana ▁viyakalile . ▁Wamisili ▁wa geza ▁kuya kimbila ▁yamazi , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa sung ' hila ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁Mbali ▁Balinaba ▁kamsola ▁Sauli ▁na ▁ka mgala ▁kwa ▁watumigwa . ▁Kawalongela ▁watumigwa ▁viya ▁Sauli ▁viyamuwonile ▁Mndewa ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁wake ▁na ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁kalonga ▁nayo , ▁na ▁viya pe tile ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁kuja ▁Damasiki .
▁m olondeka ▁kuwawinga ▁wakaya ▁wose ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo ▁kumwenu . ▁Mwiza zi nanga ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zawo ▁zose ▁za ▁mabwe ▁na ▁za ▁ch uma ▁cha ▁kuhonda ▁na ▁ku ha bomola ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁hawo ▁ha ▁kutambikila .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kofundiza ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Habali ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wolonga ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ?
▁Mbali ▁Pilato ▁kawauza , ▁“ Ka tenda ▁ilihi ▁ihile ?” ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa iyoha ▁ku landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ Mu wambe ▁mumsalaba !”
▁Yaha wa lava ▁kunze ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake , ▁ko walongolela , ▁nawo ▁wa mu i nza ▁kwaviya ▁wa di manya ▁dizi ▁jake .
▁yawa gele ni ▁moyo ▁na ▁kum gangamiza ni , ▁muladi ▁lusita ▁lose ▁mu dahe ▁kusang ' hana ▁na ▁kulonga ▁yanogile .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁sambi ▁Waisilaili ▁sekewa di kwenhukile ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁bule ivo ▁weza tagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁kui galila ▁ifa .
▁Kola ▁mwana ▁wa ▁I s hali , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Kohasi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Lawi , ▁kasola ▁wanhu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁watatu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁watatu ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu ▁wana ▁wa ▁Eliabu ▁na ▁ O ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Pelesi ,
▁na ▁Wa ava di ▁na ▁Wa ze ma li ▁na ▁Wa ha ma ti . ▁Hamwande ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Wakanaani ▁wa i mwa ga .
▁Bulahimu ▁kakala ▁mulala ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho yatendile .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezavi timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 3 2 , 2 00.
▁Pilato ▁ka londa ▁ku mulekelela ▁Yesu , ▁ivo ▁kalonga ▁nawo ▁mwanza ▁we ▁kaidi .
▁iya i sang ' hanile ▁viya m zilibule ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁kukala ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁udahi ▁kuulanga .
▁Wa segela ▁Ma ke lo si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁T a ha si .
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁mo igoda ▁na ▁kui togoza , ▁magoda ▁yose ▁ya li ngile ▁ivo ▁ye ha .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Midiani ▁kakala ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁saba , ▁nawo ▁weza ▁kude ha ▁mazi . ▁Wa memez a ▁ mba lu ti ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kuwa ng ' wiza ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Lung ilo ▁jetu ▁ni ▁kutenda ▁yanogile , ▁si ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁Mulungu ▁ka weka ▁hasi ▁ya ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁kwa ga ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kuhuwila ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi , ▁kuna ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁Edomu ,
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino , ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁nina ▁udahi ▁wo ning ' higwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁kuku lagiliza ▁mbuli ▁you londeka ▁kutenda ,
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wa mwe , ▁wa sang ' hani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁ni ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁M weye ▁iviya ▁ni ▁fana ▁zen go ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa ▁muhe ▁wake ▁welile , ▁yeye ▁ kala g u sigwa ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁mkulu ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuzilibuka , ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁Tend eni ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁ bila ▁kulongelela ▁wala ▁ku ihuma .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo gona ▁hebu ▁yoja ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁iyo , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Ka leni ▁meso ▁na ▁m tose ▁sekemwi ze ▁ku gezigwa . ▁Muhe ▁wo londa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile , ▁ mbali ▁lukuli ▁lwa bule ▁ludabwa .”
▁Vi i fosile ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mine , ▁ni hita ▁kaidi ▁Yelusalemu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Balinaba , ▁iviya ▁ni msola ▁Tito .
▁“ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kuwa ▁yenu ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo ,
