▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Sambi ▁kwo longa ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁ bila ▁masimwe .
▁Ku no ▁mo humula ▁ni i fu nganye ▁ndiya ▁chidogo ▁muladi ▁muje ▁m pate ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁kugendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁muni zila ▁niye ▁mtumwa ▁wenu .” ▁Na wo ▁wamwidika ▁“ Vinoga , ▁sang ' hana ▁fana ▁viulongile .”
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalagiliza ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa kwele ▁mwiingalawa ▁wahite ▁Besisaida . ▁Y eye ▁kakala ▁ko lu la ga ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wa segele .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁niza kumbuka ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁do ni kile ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zawo ▁voni wa ha mize ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁muladi ▁niwe ▁Mulungu ▁wawo , ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .’ ▁”
▁“ One ▁mulume ▁yaha gwiligwa ▁ugoni ▁na ▁muke ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwenga , ▁wose ▁waidi ▁ wolondeka ▁wa komigwe . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁mwiza segeza ▁wihi ▁uwo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Galilaya ▁wakala ▁wahita ▁mu didugila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu , ▁na ▁wa wona ▁yose ▁ya tendigwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁muna ▁didugila ▁ijo . ▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁Galilaya , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Galilaya ▁wa muhokela .
▁Hu d ib o b o de ▁ditwi ▁jangu ▁mavuta , ▁ mbali ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁kaya boboda ▁magulu ▁yangu ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' hila ▁goya ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka bela , ▁“ Si mmanyile ▁bule ▁wala ▁si chimanya ▁chiu longa .” ▁Maabaho ▁kalawa ▁m baka ▁ku luhelengo , ▁bahobaho ▁nz ogolo ▁keka .
▁“ Siku ▁izo ▁za ▁magayo ▁makulu ▁zihafosa , ▁zuwa ▁diza gumigw a ▁ziza , ▁na ▁umwe zi ▁hawiza lava ▁mu le ng e ▁wake .
▁“ Sekeu kome ▁gila di .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Chi no ▁icho ▁choya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mu chi tende ▁muladi ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u woneke ▁kumwenu .”
▁W e ne ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁waha londa ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu , ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁umo ▁weza kuwa ▁watumwa ▁wenu ▁na ▁kuwa sang ' hanileni .
▁Vino ▁hachi kulongele ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁vichi kalile ▁ching ' hali ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ? ▁Chi kulongela ▁uchilekele ▁chi gendelele ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ▁Wamisili . ▁Ihaw ile ▁muhavu ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ▁Wamisili ▁se mbuse ▁ku da nga ni kila ▁kuno ▁kuchuwala .”
▁Iviya ▁kamulongoza ▁yeye ▁na ▁Oholi a bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ahi sa ma ki , ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani ▁wawe ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuwa fu nza ▁wamwenga .
▁Mu li mi ▁ya tendile ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kupata ▁chiya ▁cho tile ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁ tose ni ▁vino , ▁‘ Tat i ▁yetu ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁zina ▁jako ▁di tu n hi zigwe ,
▁Wa wonele ni ▁ubazi ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁chi lu ga no .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁vomu iting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁kuja ▁N diya ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁mui gozele .
▁Viya malile ▁yayo , ▁Yesu ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁Kapelinaumu . ▁Wakala ▁uko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁ndodo .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁sita ▁vondawa sasale ▁ndiya ▁yowa duganye , ▁chiya si ▁icho ▁chi zakuwa ▁miyanza ▁midi ▁ya ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Balaamu ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kulonga ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Bwel a ▁kwa ▁Balaki ▁u kamulongele ▁mbuli ▁zino .”
▁M wa ka ▁uwo ▁wa ▁isi ▁kuhumula , ▁isi ▁iza m patila ni ▁ndiya , ▁mweye ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wenu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike , ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wenu ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wamwenga ▁wokala ▁kumwenu .
▁Ivo ▁mndele ▁ija ▁kahita ▁kumuuza ▁mamiyake ▁yake , ▁“ Ni pule ▁choni ?” ▁Ma miya ke ▁kamwidika , ▁“ P ula ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi .”
▁Mulungu ▁kahulika ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁Leya , ▁na ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁kamwelek ela ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁we ta no ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Viwa wonile ▁yosi ▁diya ▁da ▁moto ▁dodi di lungu ze ▁dibululu , ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Ha ku na lawilila ▁bululu ▁kulu ▁fana ▁dino !”
▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁kodaha ▁kwingiz a ▁chitasa ▁mnyumba ▁m aabaho ▁kudi gubika ▁na ▁m hishi ▁hebu ▁ku dika ▁muu vu ng u ▁wa ▁dikomwa ? ▁ Haidahika ▁hata ▁chidogo . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ko kwika ▁chitasa ▁hana ▁ ichingolobweda , ▁muladi ▁chi mwemwese ▁ko se .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kakala ▁koja ▁na ▁kung ' wa , ▁kusola ▁na ▁kusoligwa ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ija ▁Nuhu ▁vi yengile ▁mwiisafina . ▁Baho ▁ gombo ▁diza ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁ Walangulizi ▁weza gendelela ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu , ▁‘ Kuna ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yafile ▁moyo ▁na ▁yo dumba ? ▁Ya bwele ▁ukaye ▁muladi ▁sekeya watende ▁wayage ▁wa fe ▁moyo ▁fana ▁yeye .’
▁Nuhu ▁upele ▁viu kung u zu ke ▁kavimanya ▁vi yate ndi ligwe ▁na ▁mwanage ▁imdodo ,
▁Kenani ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁kenda ▁na ▁longo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Niza kwing ' ha ▁weye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako ▁isi ▁ino ▁i muli ▁nyambenyambe ▁sambi . ▁Isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁izakuwa ▁yenu ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wawo .”
▁Kwa viya ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁wa pata ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo .
▁Mndewa ▁kolonga , ▁‘ U langa ▁ni ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁changu , ▁na ▁isi ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwikil a ▁magulu ▁yangu . ▁Mwiza ni zengela ▁kaye ▁ili ngile ▁vilihi ?
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wa sang ' hani , ▁“ M e me ze ni ▁mazi ▁muna ▁imi zi ga .” ▁Na wo ▁wa i memez a ▁ ne e m hu .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu muuza , ▁“ Lelo ▁chitende ▁choni ?”
▁U mwaka ▁Mulungu ▁ha walongele ▁wanhu ▁sili ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁Mulungu ▁kawa gubulila ▁watumigwa ▁wake ▁welile ▁na ▁walotezi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁na ▁ka igola ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁yeli ▁ditwi ▁da ▁lukuli ▁ulo ▁wo ta zigwa ▁na ▁ku lumbiliz igwa ▁hamwe ▁viu ngo ▁na ▁mi ge ▁yake , ▁nawo ▁wo kula ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha lema ▁kumuhokela ni ▁hebu ▁kumtegeleza ni , ▁ segele ni ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁na ▁kung ' hu n heni ▁m atimbwisi ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁yenu .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁weye ▁kwa bule ▁do o ▁da ▁kude hela , ▁na ▁ chisima ▁chi ngila . ▁Lelo ▁kulihi ▁ko nda u pate ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Ugima ?
▁Pilato ▁kalonga ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wakala ▁wa mgalile ▁Yesu ▁kumwake ▁kwa ▁ku muwonela ▁migongo .
▁Kwa viya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ni ▁nyondenyonde ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vingi , ▁kodaha ▁ku msole la ▁fana ▁viyeli ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁ya ga , ▁wo lema ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezatenda ▁kuilumba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁munhu ▁ya tendile ▁uhasanyi , ▁vondaya tende ▁uhasanyi ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ▁kuilumba , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁Fan a ▁Mndewa ▁viyalongile ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁Ho se ya , ▁“ Wa ja ▁weli ▁‘ si ▁wanhu ▁wangu ,’ ▁niza watanga ▁‘ wa nhu ▁wangu ,’ ▁Niza lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wangu ▁kwa ▁zisi ▁ziya ▁ning ' hali ▁sina zi londa .”
▁Kufos a ▁yose , ▁i londeni ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wose , ▁kwaviya ▁ulondo ▁wo fisa ▁uhasanyi ▁mwingi .
▁Vi la g u so ▁va ▁mauzauza ▁vingi ▁na ▁mawewedeko ▁vi tendigw a ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu . ▁Wa huwila ▁wose ▁waiting ' hana ▁muna ▁U luhelengo ▁lwa ▁Solomoni .
▁One ▁nyama ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁magate ▁yeza sigala ▁m baka ▁imitondo , ▁basi ▁kwiza i timbula , ▁sekei di gwe ▁kwaviya ▁ye la .
▁Mbali ▁de ng ' heleleni ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁yamagayo ▁fana ▁Chilisito ▁viya gaiye , ▁muladi ▁mu de ng ' helele ▁ng ' hani ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁vondau gubul igwe .
▁Ko daha ▁kusola ▁ ki nda ▁da ▁ndege , ▁ mbali ▁u muleke ▁mami ▁yake ▁yahite . ▁U ha tenda ▁ivo ▁kwiza temeligw a ▁mate ▁na ▁kwiza kala ▁siku ▁nyingi .
▁Iviya ▁kumbukeni ▁viya mtendele ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuichuwala ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna fika ▁hanhu ▁hano ,
▁Ch eye ▁cha ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyatendile ▁mwa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Wa mkoma ▁kwa ▁ku muwamb a ▁mumsalaba .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahalaw igwa ▁na ▁ufila ▁yaham dalisa ▁munhu ▁ bila ▁kuna wa ▁makono ▁yake , ▁munhu ▁ya dali sigwe ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁“ Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁ija ▁viya segele , ▁kamuwona ▁msang ' hani ▁miyage ▁yoya kalile ▁yondai ▁hela ▁ndodo . ▁Ka ng wila , ▁kam ka bu la ▁di melo ▁jake ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ U ni lihe ▁chila ▁chi ni ku da i .’
▁Wa tenda ▁ivo ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai . ▁Waisilaili ▁wa tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Ivo ▁isi ▁na ▁ulanga ▁na ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo ▁vi komelezeka .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mwing ' heni ▁Kaisali ▁vili ▁va ▁Kaisali , ▁na ▁ mwing ' heni ▁Mulungu ▁vili ▁va ▁Mulungu .”
▁Kwa ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga , ▁ndiya ▁ndala ▁ni ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wakulu , ▁wowa i fundize ▁vinogile ▁wodaha ▁kuvimanya ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile .
▁Keza weka ▁wafalume ▁wawo ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu . ▁Mwiza wakoma , ▁nawo ▁weza zi mizigwa . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya dahe ▁kum gomesa ni ▁m baka ▁vondamu wa nange ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yoya petigwe ▁na ▁niye ▁na ▁Sila , ▁na ▁Timoseyo , ▁si ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁“ kwa ▁kutogola ▁na ▁kulema ” ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lumwe . ▁Mbali ▁lusita ▁lose ▁Yesu ▁ko togola .
▁Wa si do ni ▁wou tanga ▁mulima ▁uwo ▁Si li oni , ▁Waamoli ▁wou tanga ▁Se ni li .
▁Mana ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chi umbe ▁wa ▁muna ▁idamu , ▁ni mwing ' hani ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ni ▁kuilumba ▁hana ▁ulupango , ▁ni ▁damu ▁yoi tenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ugima ▁wenu .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kezam mizil a ▁ija ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁yetatu ▁na ▁yesaba . ▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁kezam safya , ▁nayo ▁keza fu wa ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁na ▁ko ga ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ichigulogulo ▁keza kuwa ▁kela ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁mwaminika , ▁iyo ▁yo yamtangile ni ▁m uilumb e ▁na ▁Mwanage ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁yoyo walonda ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁walo p o ligwe ▁na ▁wa dahe ▁ku imanya ▁kweli .
▁Kwa ▁waja ▁wo kwa ga , ▁mn ung ' ho ▁uwo ▁wou gala ▁ifa , ▁mwa ▁waja ▁wa komboligwe ▁cheye ▁ni ▁mn ung ' ho ▁ugala ▁ugima . ▁Lelo ▁yelihi ▁yo daha ▁mbuli ▁izo ?
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁keza gala ▁luti ▁zi ke ▁dili ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Maabaho ▁Abimeleki ▁kamtanga ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Ku chi tendela ▁choni ? ▁Ni ku bananga ▁choni ▁m baka ▁kuni tenda ▁niwe ▁habehi ▁na ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁niye ▁na ▁ufalume ▁wangu ? ▁Ku ni tendela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁m du kula ▁hazi faya ▁bule ▁kusang ' hani gwa .”
▁Kulaw a ▁haja , ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza ▁m baka ▁ G u di goda , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁ G u di goda ▁wahita ▁Yo ti ba sa , ▁iyo ▁ni ▁isi ▁ya ▁viza nda ▁va ▁mazi .
▁Mu zengigw a ▁muna ▁i c ha ndusil o ▁chi kigwe ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁walotezi , ▁nayo ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁iyo ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁m gomba .
▁Vi mu fikile ▁hanhu ▁hano , ▁mfalume ▁Sihoni ▁wa ▁Heshiboni ▁na ▁mfalume ▁Ogu ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁weza ▁kuchi towa , ▁ mbali ▁chi wahuma ,
▁Ivo ▁Yohana ▁ka lawilila ▁mui chuwala , ▁ko petela ▁na ▁kobatiza . ▁Kawalongela ▁wanhu , ▁“ Leke ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁na ▁mu batizigwe , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa segeze la ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .”
▁Maabaho ▁wa muwamb a ▁Yesu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa bavi ▁mu ▁mi salaba , ▁imwe ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁imwe ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kumoso .
▁Daudi ▁mwenyewo ▁ko mtanga ▁Chilisito , ▁‘ Mndewa .’ ▁Vi lihi ▁lelo ▁ya dahe ▁kuwa ▁mwanage ?”
▁kuwa ▁weye ▁hwiza chi lumiza ▁na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁hachiza ku lumiza ▁weye . ▁Chi ku tendela ▁yanogile ▁na ▁chi kuleka ▁u segele ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁sambi ▁weye ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Seke mtogole ▁ku vwiziligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ubozi , ▁kwaviya ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁fana ▁izo ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yo mwizila ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo lema ▁kumtegeleza .
▁na ▁wa watanga ▁hamwe ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wekaidi , ▁nawo ▁walume ▁wapetigwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁zing ' holo ▁za ▁wa saho ▁zawo , ▁kwa ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo , ▁fana ▁viili ▁ peta ▁ya ▁mazina , ▁kwandusi la ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁imwe ▁imwe ,
▁Chi ha kala ▁kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na chi u sondelele ▁ugen zi ▁wake .
▁Viwakalile ▁wo humuluka ▁kuna ▁ulugongo , ▁Yesu ▁kawalagiliza , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemu mulongele ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁yomu ya wonile ▁m baka ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁vondaya zilibuke .”
▁Cho segela ▁hano ▁na ▁cho hita ▁Beseli , ▁uko ▁niza m zengela ▁lupango ▁Mulungu ▁yoya ni ta zile ▁siku ▁ya ▁uzidilwa , ▁Mulungu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁niye ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁wangu .”
▁Tend a ▁vilumb e ▁ivo ▁vidi , ▁chimwe ▁uhelelo ▁umwe ▁na ▁chimwenga ▁uhelelo ▁wekaidi , ▁ tenda ▁vilumb e ▁ivo ▁vidi ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁ngubiko .
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka muwinga ▁Adamu ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁ E de ni ▁na ▁ka mtende za ▁ya li me ▁muna ▁ulongo ▁uya lawile .
▁na ▁waja ▁wo lila ▁na ▁wawe ▁fana ▁hawa lila , ▁waja ▁wo de ng ' helela ▁na ▁wawe ▁fana ▁hawa de ng ' helela , ▁wa gula ji ▁na ▁wawe ▁fana ▁wabule ▁chinhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁Tomasi , ▁“ I ka ▁chi dole ▁chako ▁hano , ▁na ▁u lole ▁makono ▁yangu . ▁Maabaho ▁ golosa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁u wi ke ▁mu lu ba vu ▁lwangu . ▁Sekeu leme ▁kutogola , ▁ togola !”
▁Mbali ▁nina ▁mbuli ▁imwe ▁muhala ▁na ▁weye , ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁ko mulekela ▁ija ▁mwanamke ▁Ye ze b eli , ▁yoi tanga ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁chike . ▁Kwa ▁mafundizo ▁yake ▁ko wagiza ▁watumigwa ▁wangu ▁kutenda ▁ugoni ▁na ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁zi tose ligwe ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu .
▁Na ▁m aabaho ▁kolonga , ▁“ Si uza gesa ▁kaidi ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁wala ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile .”
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wam sita ka ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁nyingi .
▁ Diyelo ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁ A b i bu , ▁mwiza segela ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁zake ▁za ▁usage , ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁mwiza lava ▁chilo ▁nhatu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁ng ' ombe ▁imwe ▁na ▁chilo ▁mbili ▁kwa ▁chila ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ,
▁na ▁mhanda ▁zi zunguluke ▁uluwa ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁na ▁vi g ingi ▁vake ▁na ▁nzabi ▁zake .
▁Na ▁niye ▁niza weng ' ha ▁ludabwa ▁wa sindila ▁wangu ▁waidi ▁wo w ava lile ▁ma g u ni a , ▁muladi ▁walo t ele ▁kwa ▁siku ▁alufu ▁imwe ▁na ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alongo ▁sita .”
▁Masa ▁viyahulike ▁Yesu ▁kokwiza , ▁kahita ▁kumuhokela , ▁ mbali ▁Maliya ▁ka sigala ▁ukaye .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁muna wo ▁ngayengaye , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁niye ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁weza kwiza ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁niye ▁niiyo ! ▁Na ▁weza wavwizila ▁wengi .
▁Ivo ▁ mulole si ▁viya wa fikile ▁kawalongela ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁izo .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁wa walongele la ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni . ▁Walonga , ▁“ Mu wakoma ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Niye ▁si faya ▁hata ▁chidogo ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁za ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁ubazi ▁wou ni laguse ▁msang ' hani ▁wako . ▁Vini lo kile ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁nikala ▁na bule ▁chinhu ▁ila ▁mhome ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁lelo ▁ni nayo ▁mabumbila ▁maidi .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Ishumaili ▁wakala ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Ha vi la ▁na ▁S huli , ▁habehi ▁na ▁Misili ▁mwiinzila ▁ya ▁kuhita ▁Ashulu . ▁Wakala ▁kwa ▁ku igola ▁na ▁welesi ▁umwenga ▁za ▁Bulahimu .
▁Mbali ▁Chilisito ▁kokwaminika ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Ch eye ▁wenyewo ▁ni ▁kaye ▁yake ▁one ▁chiha gendelela ▁kuwa ▁magalu ▁na ▁kuigodela ▁lolelo ▁jetu .
▁Nzi ge ▁wa lawilila ▁muna ▁di yo si ▁diya ▁na ▁k wene la ▁muna ▁isi , ▁weng ' higwa ▁ludabwa ▁fana ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ing e ▁weli ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Habule ▁watawala ▁wa ▁lusita ▁luno ▁wou manyile ▁ubala ▁uno . ▁One ▁wa u manyile , ▁sigambe ▁wa muwamb e ▁bule ▁mumsalaba ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁utunhizo .
▁Seke chi we ▁fana ▁viya ▁Kaini ▁viya wile ▁wa ▁Mwihi ▁ija ▁kwa ▁kumkoma ▁chi se de ▁Ha b ili ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁mwenyewo . ▁ Habali ▁Kaini ▁ka mkoma ▁chi se de ▁Ha b ili ? ▁Kwa viya ▁ka sang ' hana ▁yehile ▁ mbali ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁ka sang ' hana ▁yanogile .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ One ▁no londa ▁ya kale ▁mgima ▁m baka ▁vondani bwele , ▁vino ▁na ▁weye ▁yo ku funya ▁choni ? ▁W eye ▁ni winze ▁niye !”
▁na ▁wa isasale ▁kwa ▁chi si ndo , ▁mana ▁siku ▁iyo ▁yetatu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niza humuluka ▁kulawa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Maabaho ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yili ▁kuulanga ▁i vu guligwa , ▁na ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁jake ▁di woneka ▁umo . ▁Ku lawilila ▁ng ' huwa ▁na ▁mi mwe mwe ▁na ▁mi bumo ▁na ▁ gudemek o ▁da ▁isi ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁mu vimanya ▁vinogile ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁vondaya bwele ▁Mndewa ▁izakuwa ▁fana ▁mbavi ▁viyo kwiza ▁ichilo .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁ni ▁wawo ▁waidumwe ▁siku ▁zose ▁wa togole ligwa ▁kuja ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁nhambiko ▁zi yo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁yelile .’ ▁”
▁Isilaili ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Si gesile ▁bule ▁kuwona ▁chihanga ▁chako ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁ h umbe ▁Mulungu ▁kanogel a ▁m baka ▁kuwa wona ▁wanago .”
▁Yesu ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁kawatum a ▁waidi wa i di , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku wing a ▁vinyamkela .
▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Habule ▁chimu ▁cha ▁ku mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwaviya ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kamala .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yeli ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁keza sola ▁hisopo ▁na ▁keza di vabik a ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁yayo , ▁m aabaho ▁keza mizil a ▁hema ▁na ▁vi a ▁vose ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁mgati . ▁Iviya ▁kezam mizil a ▁munhu ▁yoya dalise ▁ vu ha ▁da ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyakomigwe ▁hebu ▁yoya danganike ▁ifa ▁i manyika , ▁hebu ▁yoya dalise ▁ leme .
▁Iviya ▁keza lava ▁ fi go ▁mbili ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hokela ▁lu s h wa ▁muladi ▁yakomigwe ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁ubananzi .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Yesu ▁kaya sola ▁yaja ▁magate ▁matano ▁na ▁somba ▁waidi , ▁ka lola ▁kuulanga , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁kaya mo gola ▁yamagate ▁na ▁somba , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa wagolele ▁wanhu .
▁Chi lekelele ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁fana ▁cheye ▁vochi walekelela ▁wowa chitendele ▁yehile . ▁Sekeu ching i ze ▁muna ▁yama ge zo .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁nowalongela , ▁‘ Sekemwi ila he ▁kwa ▁ulanga , ▁kwaviya ▁icho ▁ni ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ,’
▁Modaha ▁ku kanha ▁mibiki ▁imwenga ▁mui sang ' hanile ▁kudi zi nga ▁bululu ▁m baka ▁mudi sole .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁niye ▁vi sili ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁iviya ▁wawo ▁siyo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁bule .
▁Mulungu ▁kau sa ▁chila ▁modeli ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wo wofugigwa ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala . ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁vinoga .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁siku ▁nyingi , ▁Filipo ▁hu na nimanya ▁bule ? ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoya ni wone ▁niye ▁kamuwona ▁Tata . ▁ Habali ▁kolonga ▁‘ Chi laguse ▁Tata ’ ?
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Nashoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Aminadabu .
▁Mwenevale ▁wa ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁kezakwiza ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁do ha di gesile ▁na ▁muna ▁fana ▁yo ha i manyile ▁bule . ▁Na yo ▁keza mkanha ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁vihande ▁vihande , ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁hawa togole ▁kuhuwila .
▁kachi lopola ▁cheye , ▁siyo ▁kwaviya ▁chi tenda ▁yanogile ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wake , ▁kufose la ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ya chitendile ▁kuwa ▁wanage ▁kwa ▁kwelekigwa ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi ▁na ▁ku ching ' ha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁sambi ▁kwa ▁kuchi sunh a ▁na ▁mazi .
▁Sekeu m gume ▁chinyala ▁ tati ▁yako ▁kwa ▁ku mbandama ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Cho mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wetu ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁ya ching ' he ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kuwa o ne ni ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kwika ▁goya ▁chochose ▁chi hunguke ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu .
▁Tend eni ▁vino ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Ka msagula ni ▁mweye ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁waidumwe .
▁Munhu ▁yaha longa ▁kuwa , ▁“ Ni mmanya ▁Mulungu ,” ▁ mbali ▁ha tegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ni ▁m vwizi ▁na ▁ka bule ▁ukweli ▁mgati ▁yake .
▁I la mu seni ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁chelile ▁cha ▁ulondo . ▁Wa huwila ▁wose ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁womulamsani .
▁Ch eye ▁chi gangamale ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁cho londeka ▁chi wataze ▁wanyondenyonde ▁na ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kupapa ▁mi zi go ▁yawo . ▁Seke chi i no geze ▁cheye ▁wenyewo ▁muhala .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kavi sola ▁vi ga t e ▁viya , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁hasi . ▁Iviya ▁ka tenda ▁viya ▁viya ▁kwa ▁ivi so mba .
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Eli asafu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁D e u eli .
▁Ka mweda ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo soma ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ ulotezi ▁uno ▁na ▁wa mweda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo hulika ▁na ▁kutegeleza , ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kufika ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁lwa habehi .
▁Ka ya bananga ▁makabila ▁saba ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁isi ▁ija ▁iwe ▁yawo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Abulamu , ▁“ Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoni ku lavile ▁kulawa ▁U lu ▁bululu ▁da ▁Wa ka li da yo , ▁muladi ▁ni kwing ' he ▁isi ▁ino ▁iwe ▁yako .”
▁Niza kuwa ▁Tat i ▁yenu , ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wanangu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike . ▁Ko longa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi .”
▁Lelo ▁ko gozela ▁choni ? ▁ Inuka ▁na ▁u batizigwe ▁na ▁kwiza lekeleligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wako ▁kwa ▁ku mtosela ▁yeye .’ ▁”
▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁Nashoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Aminadabu ,
▁Mkulu ▁iyo ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu , ▁kawatum a ▁walala ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Chiyahudi ▁ku mulamba ▁Yesu ▁ye ze ▁ya muhonya ▁mtumwa ▁wake .
▁M weye ▁mudi sondelela ▁simwe ▁jetu ▁na ▁mu mu hi ga ▁Mndewa . ▁One ▁ ihawa ▁mu gazigwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁muu hokela ▁usenga ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho ▁dodi lawa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Viwakalile ▁woja , ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁keza ni biduka .”
▁Yosefu ▁ka lamka , ▁kamsola ▁imwana ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁wabwela ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli .
▁M kumbuke ni ▁muke ▁wa ▁Lutu .
▁Be ho ▁kulu ▁di lawilila ▁na ▁ku ti bu la ▁mazi , ▁mawimbi ▁ya ndusa ▁kwingila ▁mwiingalawa ▁na ▁m baka ▁i londa ▁ku mema ▁mazi .
▁Maabaho ▁Yuda ▁Isikaliyoti , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ,
▁Si ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁munoga ▁na ▁mo tenda ▁yanogile ▁leka mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka muleka ni ▁mui sole ▁isi ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ka wawinga ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ▁muladi ▁ya i gangamize ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁i yawala hile ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo .
▁Musa ▁kahita ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zose , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ wedika ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁dimwe , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chiza tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Maabaho ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kuwa sola ▁vinyamkela ▁wamwenga ▁saba ▁wehile ▁ng ' hani ▁kumfosa ▁yeye ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁wose ▁wokwiza ▁kumwing ila ▁munhu ▁ija ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo . ▁Ugima ▁wa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁wo k wi ha ▁kufosa ▁ichanduso . ▁Ni ivo ▁vonda i lawilile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wehile ▁wa ▁siku ▁zino .”
▁Ka son a ▁vitan zi ▁va ▁buluu ▁mui m hindo ▁ya ▁dipanzia ▁da ▁uhelelo ▁da ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mwanduso , ▁vitan zi ▁vimwenga ▁muna ▁dipanzia ▁da ▁uhelelo ▁da ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁uhelelo .
▁Zu wa ▁vidi s wile ▁na ▁ziza ▁di son ga , ▁tanuli ▁di fu ka ▁yosi ▁na ▁weng e ▁di woneka ▁na ▁di fosa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁ma u nde ▁ya ▁nyama .
▁Wa nahina ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wolonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁voi ha mbigwe ▁kwa ▁mabwe ▁yanogile , ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁wanhu ▁zozi lavigwe ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Yesu ▁kalonga ,
▁Ka weka ▁kuulongozi ▁iwa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁wa nawo , ▁m aabaho ▁Leya ▁na ▁wanage , ▁kuchisogo ▁Laheli ▁na ▁mwanage ▁Yosefu .
▁Lu ku li ▁lu na ▁viu ngo ▁vingi , ▁na ▁chila ▁chimwe ▁china ▁sang ' hano ▁yake .
▁Chilisito ▁ka ilava ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁fana ▁viyalondile ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁muladi ▁ya chi kombole ▁muna ▁isi ▁ihile ▁ya ▁sambi .
▁M wi n u ke , ▁chihite ! ▁Loleni ▁ija ▁yoni hinduka ▁ka mmabehi !”
▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka fosa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁lung ' husesa , ▁kahita ▁kumwake .
▁ivo ▁nizakutemel a ▁mate ▁na ▁niza w ongeze la ▁welesi ▁wako ▁fana ▁viya ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁fana ▁viya ▁msang a ▁uli ▁mumgwazo ▁ya ▁bahali . ▁W elesi ▁wako ▁weza ya sola ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁wehi ▁wawo .
▁“ Muiteganye ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo . ▁Wawo ▁wo londa ▁kugenda ▁wa yawala ▁viwalo ▁vi tali ▁na ▁ku la m sigwa ▁muna ▁yama g uli lo ▁kwa ▁ nhu nya . ▁Iviya ▁wo londa ▁kukala ▁vi goda ▁va ▁kuulongozi ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁na ▁muna ▁yamadugila .
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁kawa lawilila ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁waidi ▁muna ▁di lu mbo ▁dimwenga . ▁Wa nahina ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wohita ▁kuvi bulul u .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza mulongolelani , ▁keza itowa ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁fana ▁vimu muwone ▁viyatendile ▁kuja ▁Misili .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁ndodo , ▁mfalume ▁Agilipa ▁na ▁Be ni ke ▁weza ▁Kaisaliya ▁kumulamsa ▁Fesito .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulavila ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kumtendela ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁kuilumba . ▁Ivo ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁kela ▁kwa ▁damu ▁yake . ▁Zi no ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁kwa ▁mwanamke ▁yo ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Tend a ▁chila ▁chiu daha ▁weye ▁mwenyewo , ▁muladi ▁ukala ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .
▁Wa fika ▁Yelusalemu , ▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwawinga ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo chuuza ▁na ▁ku gula ▁vinhu ▁umo . ▁Ka vi hi ndu la ▁ivi li ngo ▁va ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo vu n ja ▁hela , ▁na ▁vi goda ▁va ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo chuuza ▁nziwa .
▁Kwa viya ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁uwa ▁mvunyo , ▁u i me me ke za ▁m baka ▁kuulanga , ▁Mulungu ▁ka kumbuka ▁ubananzi ▁wake .
▁M sang ' hani ▁ija ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁ha longile ▁mbuli ▁yoyose , ▁ mbali ▁kakala ▁yo mulola ▁ya wone ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kau temela ▁mate ▁mwanza ▁wake .
▁Si longa ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁ni huma ▁hebu ▁n yenela , ▁bule ! ▁Mbali ▁no gendelela ▁kuiyoha ▁muladi ▁ni pate ▁gweko ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁nyam higwa ▁na ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wowa lawile ▁Yelusalemu ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁wamuuza ,
▁Wa ibishil a ▁na ▁Musa , ▁walonga , ▁“ M uhavu ▁chiha danganike ▁chip indi ▁chiya ▁ndugu ▁zetu ▁viwa danganike ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yakobo ▁kagona ▁baho ▁chilo ▁chose , ▁m aabaho ▁ka bagula ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vimwenga ▁vi we ▁chitumetume ▁kwa ▁Esau ▁se kulu ▁wake ,
▁Ni kala ▁na ▁weye ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi , ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wako ▁hebu ▁luti ▁wako ▁hawa teng ule ▁wimo , ▁na ▁si dile ▁mabe belu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jako .
▁I nga wa ▁mu manya ▁mu mala ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁no londa ▁ku mkumbus a ni ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁viya wakombole ▁Wa i zila eli ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ mbali ▁m aabaho ▁ka wananga ▁waja ▁wa lemile ▁kuhuwila .
▁Di si galile ▁ni ▁ku gozela ▁kudumba ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁moto ▁mkali ▁wondawa wa nange ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo mulema ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁ku bu ma ▁kwa ▁beho ▁jako , ▁Wamisili ▁wa gubikigwa , ▁wadumb u kila ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁mengi ▁fana ▁dibwe .
▁I zakuwa ▁ivo ▁haswa ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wo sondelela ▁tama a ▁zihile ▁za ▁lukuli , ▁waja ▁wo sondelela ▁tama a ▁zawo ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁na ▁kuu lema ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa fundiza ▁wano ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁wana ▁magoda ▁na ▁hawa vi dumba ▁vi umbe ▁vili ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁va ▁kuulanga .
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁viya batizigwe , ▁kalawa ▁muna ▁yamazi . ▁Maabaho ▁ulanga ▁um g u bu kila , ▁kamuwona ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko hulumuka ▁fana ▁nziwa , ▁ko mwizila ▁m chanyha ▁yake .
▁“ I ngile ni ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁lwivi ▁lu sisili , ▁kwaviya ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁kwingilila ▁kuna ▁uku na ng igwa ▁ni ▁lu gala mu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wo kwingila ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁lwivi ▁ulo .
▁Maabaho ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁diza sondelela , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁kakala ▁Abida ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ G i de oni .
▁Na ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁ulo , ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wamulongela ▁Yesu ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Wa galila ya ▁wowa komigwe ▁na ▁Pilato ▁viwa kalile ▁wo mulavila ▁nhosa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kaidi ▁nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁izakuwa ▁vi bu ha ▁kwa ▁mnyama ▁yo tangigwa ▁ngamiya ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ichi zonzo ▁cha ▁ sa nzi ya ▁se mbuse ▁munhu ▁tajili ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Kwa viya ▁weza lawilila ▁Ma chilisito ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi . ▁Weza tenda ▁u n zo nza ▁na ▁vilaguso ▁muladi ▁wawa vwizi le ▁hata ▁waja ▁Mulungu ▁ o ya wa sagule , ▁one ▁ihadahika .
▁M weye ▁Wa ko li n so , ▁chi mulongelani ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁funhufunhu ▁na ▁chim fungu lila ni ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu .
▁Ivo ▁Yosefu ▁ka ila ga ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake . ▁Viwakalile ▁wose gela ▁Yosefu ▁kawa zuma ▁kulonga , ▁“ Sekemu g ombe ▁mwiinzila .”
▁Waisilaili ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viwa longeligwe , ▁wamwenga ▁wa duganya ▁nyingi ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁chidogo .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁yayo , ▁kamulongela ▁Yailo , ▁“ Sekeudumbe , ▁ huwila ▁muhala ▁na ▁mndele ▁wako ▁keza hona .”
▁Maabaho ▁mwanahina ▁ija ▁imwenga ▁yoya nduse ▁kufika ▁kuna ▁dileme ▁iviya ▁kengila ▁mgati , ▁ka wona ▁na ▁katogola .
▁One ▁uha sola ▁m go lole ▁wa ▁miyago ▁na ▁ku wika ▁ p oni , ▁kolondeka ▁um bwelezele ▁ding ' hali ▁zuwa ▁hadi na ho nga .
▁Mbali ▁ka lema , ▁kasegela ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁miyage ▁mchifungo , ▁m baka ▁vondaya lihe ▁di de ni ▁diya .
▁Ha no ▁ka habule , ▁kazilibuka ▁fana ▁viyalongile . ▁ Izoni ▁muha lole ▁hanhu ▁hoya go ni zigwe .
▁Wa kulu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Asiya , ▁wa kalile ▁mbwiya ▁zake ▁Paulo , ▁wam tu mila ▁usenga ▁wamulamba ▁sekeya hite ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁m iting ' hano .
▁M sitali ▁wekaidi ▁wizakuwa ▁wa ▁zuma li di ▁na ▁ jo hali ▁ya ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁ a lima si ▁ya ▁ langi ▁ya ▁mayani ▁ma bisi .
▁Nikodemo , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Mafalisayo , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya mu hitile ▁Yesu ▁baho ▁umwaka ▁ka uza ,
▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁ni ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ila ▁vino ▁sambi ▁na ▁mchifungo . ▁Ivo ▁ tambike ni ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kulonga ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kudumba .
▁ Mwing ' heni ▁chila ▁munhu ▁chiya ▁cho yo londeka , ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ usu lu , ▁ mwing ' heni ▁ usu lu ▁wake ▁na ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kodi ▁yeng ' higwe ▁kodi ▁yake , ▁yo londa ▁ku huli kigwa ▁na ▁ya huli kigwe .
▁Mu vimanya ▁wa kimbila ji ▁wengi ▁wo kimbila ▁ mbali ▁yo sola ▁gweko ▁ni ▁imwe ▁muhala . ▁Basi ▁mu kimbile ▁m baka ▁m pate ▁gweko .
▁Na wo ▁wakala ▁wo kwimba ▁wila ▁wa ▁Musa , ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wila ▁wa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo , ▁walonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wili ▁na ▁Udaho , ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁zina ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁za ▁kwazanya ! ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁na ▁nzila ▁zako ▁zi go loka ▁na ▁za ▁kweli .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zi linga ▁fana ▁mbuli ▁za ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga .
▁M vula ▁i to nya ▁mwiisi ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo .
▁nayo ▁kahita ▁kusang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kui tambikila , ▁iviya ▁ka tambikila ▁zuwa ▁hebu ▁mwezi ▁hebu ▁nhondo ▁hebu ▁vinhu ▁vimwenga ▁va ▁kuulanga ▁viya ▁voni vi go me se ,
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha lava ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁yake , ▁kolondeka ▁ya mulave ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁kaidi ▁Ka na ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Galilaya , ▁hanhu ▁hayag a lu se ▁mazi ▁kuwa ▁divai . ▁Baho ▁hakala ▁mkulu ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁na ▁mwana ▁mtamu ▁uko ▁Kapelinaumu .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁ko tosa . ▁Viyakomeleze , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁imwe ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁chi fundize ▁kutosa , ▁fana ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁viya wa fundize ▁wanahina ▁wake .”
▁“ Tat i ▁yetu ▁kadanganika ▁mui chuwala , ▁ha kalile ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁waja ▁wowa ilumbile ▁ku muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁Kola , ▁ mbali ▁kadanganika ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁ he leke ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁chilaguso ▁chino ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁cha ▁mwanduso ▁uko ▁Ka na , ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya . ▁Uko ▁ka lagusa ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa mtogola .
▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁kolumwa ▁kagona ▁muna ▁dikomwa ▁ukaye , ▁ka holo la ▁na ▁mtamu ▁ng ' hani .”
▁na ▁meza ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose , ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake , ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kusom ela ▁ubani
▁Chila ▁lusita ▁Musa ▁viyo hita ▁kuna ▁dihema , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wema ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁jake ▁na ▁kumulola ▁Musa ▁m baka ▁vi yengile ▁muna ▁dihema ▁ijo .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁mwenyewo ▁ ke ze humuluka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lu ke mo ▁na ▁dizi ▁da ▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁imkulu ▁na ▁mhalati ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁nawo ▁wadanganike ▁muna ▁I chilisito ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kuzilibuka .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Lelo ▁sambi ▁mwo ni togola ?
▁Agilipa ▁kamulongela ▁Fesito , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁yaha dahile ▁ku lekeleligwa ▁one ▁halondile ▁ku kanha ▁lu fa ni ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁Walawi ▁muhala ▁weza sang ' hanila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁nawo ▁weza u sola ▁wihi ▁wake , ▁dino ▁dizakuwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zose , ▁haweza kuwa ▁na ▁uhazi ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Waisilaili .
▁Wala ▁hawa daha ▁bule ▁ku lagusa ▁chochose ▁cha ▁ma longele zo ▁yawo .
▁One ▁ ihawa ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁kam gula ▁yawe ▁imwe ▁wa ▁watumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike ▁ mbali ▁ha nogelw e ▁nayo , ▁basi ▁mwenevale ▁kezamuleka ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁yam kombole . ▁Mwenevale ▁iyo ▁ka bule ▁haki ▁ya ▁kum chuuza ▁kuna ▁izisi ▁zimwenga , ▁kwa ▁viya ▁ka bena ▁lagano ▁na ▁mtumwa ▁ija .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Kohasi ▁wakala ▁Amilamu ▁na ▁I s hali ▁na ▁Hebuloni ▁na ▁U zi eli . ▁Ko ha ti ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁nhatu .
▁Ka mu lagiliza ▁ija ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kuwa ▁yam kalize ▁Paulo , ▁ mbali ▁yailegehe ▁chidogo ▁muladi ▁wa mbwiya ▁zake ▁wa msang ' hanile ▁chiya ▁cho yolonda .
▁Vi u chi le , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ngalawa ▁hawavimanyile ▁isi ▁ija ▁ila ▁wa di wona ▁ B wi li ng u , ▁wa itogolela ▁ku isi ga miza ▁ingalawa ▁uko ▁one ▁yaha dahika .
▁weza mgala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁walume ▁wa ▁bululu ▁jake ▁weza mtowa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁yadanganike . ▁Kwa viya ▁kai guma ▁chinyala ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁kwa ▁kugona ▁na ▁mulume ▁yang ' hali ▁hana soligwa , ▁kuno ▁yang ' hali ▁kokala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁mwiza segeza ▁wihi ▁kumwenu .
▁T engenez a ▁ma ko le o ▁yake ▁na ▁vya no ▁vake ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wabwela ▁na ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁ku mfika ▁Yesu ▁kolonga ▁na ▁mwanamke . ▁Mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya mu u zile ▁kuwa ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁ko londa ▁choni , ▁hebu ▁kumuuza ▁Yesu ▁ha bali ▁kolonga ▁na ▁mwanamke .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza walongela ▁wanhu ▁wa gale ▁ndege ▁waidi ▁wagima ▁weli ▁hawa mbule ▁mwiko , ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mwele zi , ▁ s ufu ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁tambi ▁da ▁hisopo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yondaya safyigwe .
▁Mbali ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁chondachi ngile ▁umo , ▁wala ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo sang ' hana ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ubananzi ▁hebu ▁uvwizi , ▁heza kwingila ▁ng ' o . ▁Ni ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wa ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ugima ▁cha ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁ni iwawo ▁wonda wengile .
▁Ivo ▁Balaki ▁kamsola ▁Balaamu ▁kahita ▁nayo ▁kuna ▁ inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Peoli , ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁munhu ▁ya he ma ▁ko wona ▁chuwala ▁hasi ▁yake .
▁M avuta ▁ya sigale ▁muna ▁di ga nza ▁jake ▁keza muhaka ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yo safyigwa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ gutwi ▁jake ▁da ▁kulume ▁na ▁ dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁ dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mgulu ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁haja ▁heli ▁na ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi .
▁Vini lo lile , ▁ni wona ▁kuwa ▁mu muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mui tendela ▁nyang ' hiti ▁ya ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁kuhonda . ▁ H i ma ▁hima ▁ muleka ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁i yamulagilizileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Zindilil eni ▁ Siku ▁zangu ▁za ▁Mhumulo ▁na ▁ku ha hishimu ▁hanhu ▁ hangu ▁helile , ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mwana ▁kawa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁fana ▁viya ▁zina ▁diya ▁Mulungu ▁diya mwing ' hile ▁yeye ▁vidi li ▁kulu ▁kufosa ▁yawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yohana ▁niiyo ▁iyo ▁yo longigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁niza mtuma ▁m senga ▁wangu ▁ya ku longole le , ▁iyo ▁keza isasala ▁nzila ▁yako .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hachi kala me ▁bule , ▁chaha hitile ▁uko ▁na ▁kubwela ▁hano ▁miyanza ▁midi .”
▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁niza ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁siyo ▁kutenda ▁vini londa ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁kutenda ▁viyolonda ▁ija ▁yoyanhumile .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hamu wa wingile ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁waja ▁wondawa sigale ▁weza kuwa ▁fana ▁mab a le ▁muna ▁yameso ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁mi wa ▁chila ▁ubanzi ▁na ▁weza m gaza ni .
▁Ka zi wona ▁ngalawa ▁mbili ▁mumgwazo ▁mwa ▁dilamba ▁zozi le kigwe ▁na ▁wa vula ji ▁wowa kalile ▁wo sunh a ▁nyavu ▁zawo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁weza hulika ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁hano , ▁lelo ▁chitende ze ?
▁Na ▁sambi ▁nod eng ' helela ▁ku so hela ▁manhesa ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁kwaviya ▁manhesa ▁yangu ▁hano ▁mwiisi ▁no memez a ▁ya sigale ▁mu ya manhesa ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁ni iwawo ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wetu ▁ wolondeka ▁wa i funze ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁lusita ▁lose ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁viwo londa ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wawo , ▁na ▁sekewa kale ▁bule .
▁N hosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁yondai lavigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁ni ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁divai . ▁Kwiza i gida ▁nhosa ▁ino ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile .
▁Viya lu bwele le ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁hake ,
▁Maabaho ▁ndege ▁ija ▁im gima ▁kezamuleka ▁ya gulu ke ▁yahite ▁kuna ▁imigunda ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondaya itendele ▁kuilumba ▁kaye ▁iyo , ▁nayo ▁izakuwa ▁haya mbule ▁mwiko .”
▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁Mu yu na ni , ▁ya le kigwe ▁mudibululu ▁da ▁Si lo f o i ni ke ▁uko ▁Siliya . ▁Ka mpula ▁Yesu ▁ya mulave ▁mndele ▁wake ▁chinyamkela .

▁L usita ▁Wamisili ▁vondawa ku wone , ▁wezalonga ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁muke ▁wangu , ▁ivo ▁weza ni koma ▁na ▁ku kuleka .
▁kezachi kombola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁wehi ▁wetu . ▁Na ▁kezachi tenda ▁chi dahe ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁ bila ▁ya ▁lugano ,
▁Muha wona ▁mayani ▁yake ▁yo kwandusa ▁k usu ka , ▁mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ vu li ▁da habehi .
▁Wala la ▁wawo ▁wamwidika ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁“ Wa naake ▁wa ▁Chiebulaniya ▁hawa li ngile ▁fana ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Chi mi sili ▁bule , ▁wo ibasula ▁himahima , ▁na ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wo kwe lekigwa ▁yang ' hali ▁mulala ▁hana fika .”
▁Mazi ▁ya kala ▁mengi ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁ya i gubika ▁milima ▁mita li ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa muhuwile ▁Mndewa ▁wakala ▁wo k ongeze ka ▁ng ' hani , ▁wake ▁kwa ▁walume .
▁I mitondo ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁lugano , ▁ka tuma ▁wa sa wi ▁wose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wabala ▁wose ▁wa ▁Misili . ▁Na ▁mfalume ▁kawalongela ▁nzozi ▁zake , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yam fa mbuli le .
▁Ivo ▁sekechi le gele ▁kusang ' hana ▁yanogile , ▁kwaviya ▁one ▁hachiza ku fa ▁moyo ▁lusita ▁lu ha fika ▁chiza gobola .
▁Vino ▁uha tenda ▁yanogile ▁hu togoligwa ▁bule ? ▁One ▁uha tenda ▁yehile , ▁uhasanyi ▁wo ku sepa sepa ▁muna ▁ulwivi ▁lwako , ▁wo ku londa ▁kuku tawala ▁ mbali ▁kolondeka ▁u u hume .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁ingalawa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁wa londa ▁kui ba nga ▁na ▁ku ileka ▁ingalawa ▁ija . ▁Ivo ▁viwa komeleze ▁ku t ele mu sa ▁ingalawa ▁ndodo ▁muna ▁yamazi , ▁wa i vwizi la ▁kuwa ▁wohita ▁ku t ele mu sa ▁na nga ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ ulongozi .
▁Mu i pelembe ▁isi ▁yo wo kala ▁fana ▁ino ga ▁hebu ▁iha , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yeli ▁na ▁mhongono ▁hebu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ya mala go .
▁“ Wapete ni ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁na ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁waja ▁wose ▁wowo daha ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo .”
▁Wa naake ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁wo dunda , ▁imwe ▁keza ga ndu ligwa ▁na ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .” ▁1 7 : 3 5 . ▁Wa naake ▁waidi , ▁keza lekigwa . ▁M aandiko ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁yo kongeza ▁m sitali ▁ 3 6 . ▁Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁kumgunda , ▁imwe ▁keza soligwa ▁na ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .
▁ mbali ▁wanaake ▁waja ▁weli ▁hawana ibandama ▁na ▁mulume , ▁wa sigale ▁wagima ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Maabaho ▁wa wagala ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁wowa longile , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ha leka ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁kwa ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Ku ja ▁kuna ▁yama bawe ▁ya ▁Moabu ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁kwandusi la ▁Be si ▁Ye shi mo si ▁m baka ▁Abeli ▁S hiti mu .
▁M ulume ▁na ▁muke ▁wose ▁waidi ▁wakala ▁ ukengele , ▁ mbali ▁ha wawonile ▁chinyala ▁bule .
▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁keza ▁kumwenu ▁ka mulagusa ni ▁nzila ▁inogile , ▁na ▁mweye ▁hamu mtogole ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁na ▁wagoni ▁wa mtogola . ▁Iviya ▁hata ▁vi muwonile ▁yayo , ▁hamu sa m hile ▁na ▁hamu mtogole ▁bule .”
▁Wa i s huma ili ▁viwa msolile ▁Yosefu ▁wa mgala ▁m baka ▁Misili ▁na ▁wam chuuza ▁kwa ▁Potifa , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁mfalume , ▁na ▁niiyo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁chake ▁cha ▁wakalizi .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza msola ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yaja ▁yam avuta ▁na ▁kezavi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁kuvi lavila ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalagiliza ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ‚ ▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁niwa lagiliza ni ▁mweye ▁kuwa lava ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .”
▁Kwa ▁kweli ▁uko ▁kui longele za ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁ko lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mu potigwa ▁ng ' hani ! ▁Ihaw ile ▁muhavu ▁ng ' hani ▁mweye ▁kubun zigwa . ▁Ihaw ile ▁muhavu ▁ng ' hani ▁mweye ▁ku ho kigwa !
▁I jo ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁chimvuguya ▁chochi lawa ▁muna ▁diwalo ▁da ▁ s ufu ▁hebu ▁chitani ▁na ▁di lu kigwe ▁hebu ▁dibotigwe ▁hebu ▁da ▁mbende . ▁Kwa ▁nzila ▁iyo ▁mwiza daha ▁kudi manya ▁walo ▁jambul e ▁mwiko ▁na ▁walo ▁haja mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Kwa viya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ulinga ▁vino . ▁U linga ▁fana ▁mfalume ▁imwe ▁yoya londile ▁kuwa peta ▁watumigwa ▁wake .
▁Iviya ▁wa gala ▁vilung o ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁mzaituni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ▁uli ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁di lawile ▁kuna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁Yosefu , ▁kakala ▁Gadi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S u si .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁“ Ivo ▁weza di ta mbula ▁zina ▁jangu ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili , ▁na ▁nizawa temela ▁mate .”
▁Ka gula ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁lago ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wa ▁Hamoli ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Shekemu ▁kwa ▁vihande ▁gana ▁va ▁hela .
▁Muisilaili ▁ija ▁yoyakomigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ija ▁mwanamke ▁M midiani ▁ka tangigwa ▁Zi mili , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Sa lu , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yahawa ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁luti , ▁keza mulava ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Iviya ▁ndams ileni ▁Maliya , ▁yoya sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Iviya ▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Vino ▁niwa linganyiz e ▁na ▁choni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel wa ▁uno ? ▁Ni ▁wanhu ▁wa li ngile ▁vilihi ?
▁Ng a ma ▁za ▁ubala ▁na ▁umanyi ▁vi fi sigwa ▁mgati ▁yake .
▁Ka bila ▁kulu ▁diza kwing ' higwa ▁hanhu ▁ha kulu ▁na ▁kabila ▁ dodo ▁diza kwing ' higwa ▁hanhu ▁ha dodo . ▁Chila ▁kabila ▁diza hokela ▁uhazi ▁wake ▁fana ▁viili ▁ peta ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁waja ▁wo londa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yawa sang ' hanile , ▁waja ▁wo lema ▁ukweli , ▁muladi ▁wa sondelele ▁yehile , ▁Mulungu ▁keza watagusa ▁kwa ▁ludoko ▁lwake .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Wa nhu ▁viwa nduse ▁kongezeka ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁chike ▁we lekigwa ▁kumwawo ,
▁Ka funyila ▁umoyo ▁manhesa ▁viya gezigwe , ▁ivo ▁ka daha ▁kuwataza ▁waja ▁wowa gezigwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁ko mtagusa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ bila ▁ku wonela .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Sekemu tende ▁ivo ▁kaidi !” ▁Ka mwamha ▁ gutwi ▁na ▁ku muhonya .
▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lola ▁uhele ▁uwo . ▁One ▁uhele ▁uwo ▁ha wene le ▁na ▁ habule ▁upipi ▁wa ▁ langi ▁ya ▁uko le , ▁hebu ▁ha ha gi di mile ,
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wo dumba ▁na ▁hawa huwila ▁na ▁wo so vula ▁wayawo ▁na ▁wa komaji ▁na ▁wagoni ▁na ▁wa sa wi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo tambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁na ▁wa vwizi ▁wose , ▁hanhu ▁hawo ▁heza kuwa ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁dodi memile ▁mabwe ▁yoyo kwaka ▁moto . ▁Ino ▁iyo ▁ifa ▁yekaidi .”
▁Muha ja ▁na ▁kwi guta , ▁muha zenga ▁kaye ▁inogile ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo ,
▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vi kulu ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁Lu da b wa ▁vo ya n he ndele . ▁Zi na ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁ je la .
▁Haluni ▁keza gala ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁dodi saguligwe ▁na ▁mhiya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Wahiti ▁wamwidika ▁Bulahimu ,
▁kezahokela ▁vingi ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zino ▁za ▁sambi ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁lu kwiza .”
▁One ▁uha tenda ▁ivo , ▁Wamisili ▁weza daha ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁kawa lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁kuwakoma ▁muna ▁mulima ▁na ▁kuwa nanga . ▁ G a lu la ▁m agesa ▁yako ▁ya ▁ludoko ▁na ▁sekeu watende ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁mbuli ▁zihile .
▁Ke ma ▁habehi ▁na ▁magulu ▁ya ▁Yesu , ▁kalila ▁na ▁masozi ▁yake ▁ya la galila ▁m ma gulu ▁ya ▁Yesu . ▁Maabaho ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁kaya hangu sa ▁magulu ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁m vili ▁zake , ▁m aabaho ▁kaya nonela ▁na ▁kuya boboda ▁mavuta ▁yaja .
▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yosefu , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu .
▁Ebeli ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁mine ▁kamwelek a ▁Pelegi .
▁na ▁Kanani ▁iviya ▁ni ▁tata ▁wa ▁Wayebusi ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wa gi liga shi ,
▁Maabaho ▁ni longiligwa , ▁“ Ko londeka ▁ku gong ' onda ▁kaidi ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kuson hela ▁nyele si ▁nyingi ▁na ▁makabila ▁mengi ▁na ▁lo nzi ▁nyingi ▁na ▁wafalume ▁wengi .”
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ wolondeka ▁sekewa sole ▁mwanamke ▁malaya ▁hebu ▁muke ▁ya sigwe . ▁Kwa viya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa tendigw a ▁kuwa ▁welile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁ ulamuzi ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁Musa ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁Waisilaili ▁viwa lawile ▁Misili ,
▁Mfalisayo ▁ija ▁kema ▁yaidumwe , ▁ka tosa ▁vino ▁muumoyo ▁wake , ▁‘ W eye ▁Mulungu , ▁no kwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁sili ngile ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁wa h okaji ▁na ▁wowo tenda ▁yehile ▁na ▁wazinzi , ▁na ▁wala ▁sili ngile ▁fana ▁m sola ▁kodi ▁ino .
▁“ Mwaha di zunguluka ▁bululu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁kumwawo , ▁sekemu kanhe ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁matunda ▁kwa ▁n he mo . ▁Vino ▁mibiki ▁iyo ▁ili ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁m baka ▁mui danganize ? ▁Modaha ▁kuja ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁sekemu i kanhe .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wa zimiza ▁gila di ▁kuwa ▁baho ▁umwaka ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁vilumb igwa . ▁Isi ▁yose ▁i lu mbigwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁na ▁kwa ▁mazi .
▁ Siku ▁ija ▁Helode ▁na ▁Pilato ▁wa ilumba ▁kwa ▁u mbwiya , ▁baho ▁umwaka ▁wakala ▁wa i hile .
▁“ ▁‘ Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁sekewa wegule ▁nyele ▁za ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁matwi ▁yawo ▁hebu ▁ nde vu ▁zawo ▁hebu ▁sekewa c ha n je ▁ sa le ▁muna ▁zing ' huli ▁zawo ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁wo lila .

▁M gunda ▁na ▁ tuka ▁dodi kalile ▁umo , ▁i togole ka ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Bulahimu ▁ha ▁kuwandila .

▁Cho mpula ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁kachi londa ▁na ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁kachi gela ▁moyo ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁kuchi gangamiza ▁muna ▁di lole lo ▁dinogile ,
▁M beyu ▁zimwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁muna ▁imi wa ▁na ▁mi wa ▁i kula ▁na ▁i i ba na .

▁m aabaho ▁keza wagalila ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁Keza sola ▁ ga nza ▁dimwe ▁da ▁usage ▁uwo ▁uli ▁na ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ubani ▁wose ▁muladi ▁ya u ti mbule ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁uwe ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁kum kumbuka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Paulo ▁kedika , ▁“ I we ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lutali ▁hebu ▁luguhi , ▁no tambika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wowo ni hulika ▁niye ▁diyelo ▁mu dahe ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁ bila ▁minyololo ▁ino !”
▁Walamse ni ▁ndugu ▁weli ▁Laodikiya , ▁na ▁mu la m seni ▁mwa li ▁Ni mi fa , ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wo iting ' hana ▁mwiikaye ▁yake .
▁Ivo ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁“ Ka kwela ▁kuchanyha ▁ng ' hani ” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ? ▁F a mbulo ▁jake ▁ni ▁kuwa , ▁ teng ' hu ▁kahumuluka ▁m baka ▁hasi ▁ng ' hani .

▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino , ▁munhu ▁kezamuleka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake , ▁keza ilumba ▁na ▁mke ▁wake , ▁nawo ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁lukuli ▁lumwe .’
▁Na ▁wamulamba ▁yawa togole le ▁watamu ▁wose ▁muhavu ▁wa dalise ▁m hindo ▁ya ▁walo ▁jake , ▁na ▁wose ▁wowa dalise ▁wa hona .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁imwenga ▁kalawa ▁kuna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ija ▁yili ▁kuulanga , ▁yeye ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁na ▁sengo ▁i kutwa .
