▁Wa nahina ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁weza ▁na ▁wa u sola ▁um tu fi ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁na ▁wahita ▁kuu wa nda . ▁Maabaho ▁wahita ▁kumulongela ▁Yesu ▁yayo ▁ya lawilile .
▁Ni ngo ▁ya ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁yoi londeka ▁ni ▁lita ▁mbili ▁za ▁divai ▁kwa ▁chila ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume , ▁lita ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo . ▁Ino ▁iyo ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁chila ▁mwezi ▁kwa ▁mwaka .
▁Ndugu ▁sekemu longele le ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁muladi ▁sekemwi ze ▁ku lamuliligw a ▁nhaguso ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Niiyo ▁M se mi ▁yeli ▁ha b eli ▁kwiza .
▁Chi tume tume ▁cha ▁ ulotezi ▁cho londeka ▁chi ta wa ligwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁mwenyewo .
▁Chi ha mbigwa ▁kwa ▁mi sitali ▁mine ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu . ▁M sitali ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ukala ▁wa ▁haki ki ▁na ▁ to p a zi ▁na ▁ a lima si ▁ndu ng ' hu .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁vi ye g u t e , ▁wa hunguza ▁mbahasha ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁im eli ▁na ▁kwa sa ▁uhemba ▁muna ▁ibahali .
▁Ka bila ▁da ▁Gadi ▁wa zenga ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁ Dib oni ▁na ▁ A ta lo si ▁na ▁ A lo eli
▁Petili ▁ka kumbuka ▁cha yalongile ▁Yesu , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁ lola ! ▁U ja ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁wou u duwile ▁u nyala !”
▁Mbali ▁ichilo ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁ka vugula ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁ichifungo , ▁kawa lava ▁watumigwa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kawalongela ,
▁walangulizi ▁na ▁wasemi ▁wenu ▁wahite ▁wa ka lole ▁utali ▁wa ▁kulawa ▁hanhu ▁ko ya ko mi ligwe ▁imu nhu ▁m baka ▁mabululu ▁yeli ▁habehi .
▁Malagilizo ▁yo gala ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁ habule ▁Malagilizo ▁sigambe ku we ▁na ▁ubananzi .
▁Iviya ▁nihulika ▁vi umbe ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁viya ▁vose ▁vili ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁hanhu ▁howo kala ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁na ▁muna ▁ibahali . ▁Ona ! ▁Vi nhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁vo mwimbila , ▁“ U kulu ▁na ▁hishima ▁na ▁nhogolwa , ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁vi we , ▁kumwake ▁yeye ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁kwa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondamu tende , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁yoya mwa zi me ▁miyage , ▁kolondeka ▁ya mu lekelele ▁de ni ▁ijo , ▁sekeya m da i ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁kalagiliza ▁de ni ▁ijo ▁di se gezigwe .
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vondamu tagusigwe , ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁diza ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa londa ▁ziza ▁kufosa ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁kwaviya ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zi ha .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁yoya hu ng u kiligwe ▁na ▁chinhu . ▁Wo se ▁wa kalile ▁na ▁migunda ▁hebu ▁kaye ▁wa vi chuuza , ▁na ▁wa gala ▁zi hela ▁kwa ▁watumigwa ,
▁sekemu zimize ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mbweleza ▁mu hasanyi ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁zinzila ▁zihile , ▁keza u lopola ▁muhe ▁wa ▁mu hasanyi ▁iyo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁i i fa , ▁na ▁kezatenda ▁Mulungu ▁ya mu lekelele ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁mvunyo .
▁Sekemu i londe ▁zisi ▁zose ▁hebu ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁muna ▁isi . ▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha i londa ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Tata ▁wa mwabule ▁mgati ▁yake .
▁Yosefu ▁ka wamanya ▁se kulu ▁zake , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁hawammanyile ▁bule .
▁Wa no ▁wose ▁wakala ▁na ▁lungilo ▁dimwe ▁nawo ▁wo di ng ' ha ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁ludabwa ▁lwa wo ▁na ▁udahi ▁wawo .
▁Maabaho ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁ko i longa ze ? ▁Lelo ▁chi longele ▁chika walongele ▁waja ▁wowa chi tu mile ▁kuku uza . ▁Vino ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁ko i longa ze ?”
▁Mbali ▁wose ▁weli bule ▁ nhu nya ▁zino ▁hawa daha ▁kuwona , ▁ukweli ▁wa tulika ▁yameso , ▁ivo ▁na ▁wa zimiza ▁viya ▁viwa safyigwe ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁umwaka .
▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁ha mtogola ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁siyo ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu .
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁mbuli , ▁yawa lave ▁wahuwila ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁viya komeleze ▁kudi sunh a ▁kwa ▁mazi ,
▁Niye ▁ning i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁siku ▁ye nane ▁vini vu mbu ke . ▁Niye ▁na ▁Mu isi la eli ▁wa ▁kwelekigwa ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini , ▁na ▁Mu ye bu la ni ya ▁wa ▁haswa , ▁muna ▁u kwa mhilila ▁yamalagilizo , ▁niye ▁nikala ▁Mfalisayo ,
▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁Eli s ha ma ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Amihudi , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Efulaimu ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁Maabaho ▁Helode ▁kawatanga ▁waja ▁nyam ilo to ▁wa ▁nhondo ▁chinyele ny ele ▁waiting ' hane , ▁ka londa ▁yavimanye ▁siku ▁nhondo ▁ija ▁vi i wa lawilile .
▁ Mwizagaya ▁kwaviya ▁mu linga ▁fana ▁maleme ▁yeli bule ▁vilaguso , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo fosa ▁m chanyha ▁yake ▁ bila ▁kuvimanya .”
▁na ▁chi kulongele ▁kuwa ▁mbwanga ▁iyo ▁hadaha ▁ku muleka ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁one ▁yaha muleka ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kezadanganika .
▁vino ▁uno ▁siyo ▁ubagulo ▁vimwili ? ▁Vino ▁ku tagusa ▁kwenu ▁haku galigw a ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yehile ?
▁Ko londeka ▁ya yepule ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁yatende ▁mbuli ▁zinogile , ▁kolondeka ▁ya zahile ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wake ▁wose .
▁Wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Chi fika ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁you chi tu mile , ▁isi ▁i na ▁ulongo ▁unogile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁yano ▁ni ▁matunda ▁yake .
▁Musa ▁kawa hulika ▁wanhu ▁wo lila ▁muna ▁zing ' holo ▁zawo ▁zose , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁jake , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani , ▁Musa ▁nayo ▁ka wona ▁vi ha .
▁Ivo ▁walume , ▁sang a la leni ! ▁Kwa viya ▁no muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁izakuwa ▁fana ▁vini mulongeleni .
▁Mwiza sola ▁mayani ▁ya ▁hisopo ▁na ▁kuya cho fa ▁muna ▁idamu ▁mgati ▁ya ▁dizi ga ▁na ▁ku ihaka ▁muna ▁im ibiki ▁ya mhilile ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁kaye ▁zenu . ▁Munhu ▁ye yo se ▁sekeya lawe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁kaye ▁ichilo ▁icho ▁m baka ▁imitondo .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Se lu gi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁L e yu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Pelegi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ebeli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Sala ,
▁He la ▁yoyose ▁yoi patik e ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁u mala ya ▁uwo , ▁sekei galigwe ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kuliha ▁chilaho , ▁kwaviya ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁yeli ▁malaya ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁milungu ▁imwenga , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko mwihila ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Ichil o ▁Abulamu ▁kawa gola ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁kuna ▁ya mabumbila ▁wa itowe ▁na ▁wafalume ▁waja , ▁nayo ▁kawa towa ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁m baka ▁Ho ba , ▁ili ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁Damasiki .
▁Mulungu ▁kawalola ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁kavimanya ▁viya ▁viwo gaya .
▁Ni dumba ▁kwaviya ▁ludoko ▁na ▁ng ' ha si liki ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vi ha mwa nga mize ni . ▁Mbali ▁chip indi ▁icho ▁iviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani tegeleza .
▁Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nilonga . ▁Kweli ▁niza watendela ▁vino ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wehile ▁wowa i duganye ▁kwa ▁kuni lema , ▁wezadanganika ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁chino .’ ▁”
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wo lema ▁ukweli ▁fana ▁viya ▁Ya ne ▁na ▁Ya mbule ▁viwa mu lemile ▁Musa , ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁zi banangika , ▁wa lemigwa ▁kwaviya ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁Musa ▁kawalagiliza ▁Waisilaili ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yosefu ▁walonga ▁ukweli .
▁Wa no ▁wawo ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo . ▁Lubeni ‚ ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁na ▁wana ▁wane ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁He no ki ▁na ▁Pa lu ▁na ▁He zi lo ni ▁na ▁Ka li mi . ▁Wawo ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Lubeni .
▁Ka pula ▁yeng ' higwe ▁ ba lu wa ▁za ▁u ta mbuli so ▁kuna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁uko ▁Damasiki ▁muladi ▁yaha fika ▁uko ▁yawa zahile ▁walume ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wowo sondelela ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁yawa gwile ▁na ▁ya wagale ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁uko ▁viwa mu u zile ▁mbuli ▁za ▁muke ▁wake , ▁Isaka ▁kawedika ▁kuwa ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ lumbu ▁jake . ▁Kwa viya ▁kadumba ▁kulonga ▁iyo ▁ni ▁muke ▁wake ▁mana ▁kadumba ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁uko ▁sekewa mkome ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Lebeka , ▁yoya kalile ▁lumondo .
▁“ Mwiza duwiligwa ▁vimu kwingila ▁na ▁vi mulawa .
▁Ivo ▁mfalume ▁yaha watanga ▁na ▁kuwa uza ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁choni ,
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitondo , ▁va wakalile ▁wo fosa ▁wa u wona ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁u nyala ▁kuson gela ▁muna ▁yamazi zi ▁m baka ▁k w inhembeti .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Ni ▁mbuli ▁za ki ▁zino ▁zi mulonga ▁vimu genda ?” ▁Wem a ▁chidogo ▁wa hu zu ni ka .
▁Tend a ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila ▁ya ▁mkenge ▁na ▁ku ihaka ▁zahabu , ▁mibiki ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁kui p a p ila ▁meza ▁iyo .
▁Kwa viya ▁hachi wandikila ▁mweye ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁hamu daha ▁kuzi soma ▁hebu ▁ku zimanya ▁bule . ▁Na ▁no lolela ▁kuwa ▁mwiza vimanya ▁ng ' hani ,
▁I chigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila ▁kwiza mulava ▁ija ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁imwenga ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁fana ▁vi utendile ▁imitondo , ▁kwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ku shi ▁kamwelek a ▁Ni mu lo di , ▁yoya kalile ▁galu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁mwiisi ▁yose .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani lagiliza ▁ni m fu nza ni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yose ▁yomu londeka ▁kuya zindilila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yonda mwing ' higwe .
▁Ma kabila ▁ya ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Lubeni ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiza tenda ▁fana ▁viyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁M olondeka ▁mu sang ' hanile ▁ningo ▁za ▁vi baba ▁na ▁m hishi ▁za ▁kweli . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoni mulavile ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁“ Haluni ▁yahadanganika , ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁yelile ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁welesi ▁wake , ▁nawo ▁weza v a la ▁siku ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kuhak igwa ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁no mwing ' hani ▁simwe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁wa ▁chila ▁zuwa , ▁one ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁waha itogolela ▁chinhu ▁na ▁kwika ▁chilagano , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁ku hunguza ▁hebu ▁k ongeze la .
▁L usita ▁lumwe ▁ku fi nyi li za ▁lwa ▁mhalati ▁ya ▁kuuhelelo , ▁kwaviya ▁mhalati ▁iza lila , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁weza zilibuligwa ▁na ▁haweza danganika ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁uku potigwa , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiza galusigwa .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁kachi lagiliza ▁vino , ▁Ni kutenda ▁uwe ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁wa dahe ▁kukomboligwa .”
▁W e ngila ▁muna ▁dileme , ▁ mbali ▁hawa wone ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu .
▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁yaidumwe , ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala , ▁ yatunhizigwe ▁siku ▁zose ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ! ▁Ivo .
▁Ivo ▁wa wagalila ▁Waisilaili ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁za ▁isi ▁ija ▁yowa i pelembe , ▁walonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁wo danganika . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wochi wawonile ▁umo ▁ni ▁wa tali ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁D ishoni ▁wa tangigwa ▁He mi da ni ▁na ▁ E shi ba ni ▁na ▁Sila ni ▁na ▁Ke la ni .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁m baka ▁ chibululu ▁chiya ▁chili ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu . ▁Baho ▁mwiza mfika ▁chihongwe ▁na ▁mwanage ▁wa fungigwa , ▁wa fungu leni ▁mu wagale ▁hano .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa . ▁U sa ge ▁wonda u sigale ▁wizakuwa ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁fana ▁viili ▁kwa ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule .’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁Yohana ▁niiyo ▁yo longigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁Niza mtuma ▁m senga ▁wangu ▁ya ku longole le ▁ya sasale ▁nzila ▁yako .’
▁Kwa viya ▁ni la ▁yangu ▁haiza mile , ▁na ▁mbahasha ▁yangu ▁i hu ha .”
▁Yohana ▁kawedika , ▁“ Niye ▁no batiz a ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁mgati ▁mmwenu ▁ka umo ▁imwe ▁hamu mmanyile ▁bule .
▁“ M ituka ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁kawa sa ▁muna ▁ibahali , ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁wanogile ▁kufosa ▁wose , ▁wadumb u kila ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁ya ▁Shamu .
▁One ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁waha hita ▁hamwe ▁kumbago ▁ku zahila ▁ngodi , ▁viyo kanha ▁n he mo ▁i so mo ka ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁umuh i ni ▁wake ▁na ▁i mkoma ▁ija ▁munhu ▁imwenga , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kodaha ▁kukimbilila ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe ▁mwa ▁mabululu ▁matatu ▁yayo ▁muladi ▁yawe ▁mgima .
▁Chila ▁panzia ▁dizakuwa ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁longo ▁na ▁nhatu ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁mita ▁mbili , ▁mapanzia ▁yose ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁yezakuwa ▁na ▁ningo ▁ziya ▁ziya .
▁Nolonga ▁fana ▁mbozi , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁iyo ▁muni wa ng ili ze ▁kutenda ▁viya . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chiya ▁ni londeka ▁ku to go zigwa ▁na ▁mweye . ▁Kwa viya ▁hata ▁fana ▁niye ▁si ▁chinhu , ▁waja ▁wowo itanga ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁“ Wa tumigwa ▁wakulu ” ▁hawa ni huma ▁chinhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Mulongele ▁Haluni ▁ya di golose ▁ balati ▁jake ▁na ▁kuya towa ▁m atimbwisi ‚ ▁nayo ▁yeza galuka ▁kuwa ▁u sa wa sa wa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .”
▁Viwakalile ▁wo walongela ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁kema ▁hamwe ▁nawo , ▁kawa la m sa , ▁“ Tindiwalo ▁na ▁diwe ▁kumwenu .”
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Yano ▁ni ▁madugila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yondamu ya gong ' onde ▁kuwa ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁yano ▁ni ▁madugila ▁yangu .
▁ Sambi ▁mwo vimanya ▁vinhu ▁vino , ▁one ▁muha vi tenda , ▁Mulungu ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁cho londa ▁mweye ▁muvimanye ▁unovu ▁uja ▁Mulungu ▁uya weng ' hile ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁uko ▁Makedoniya .
▁Kulaw a ▁muna ▁ichi hendo ▁cha ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁mhiya ▁i msagula ▁Zakaliya ▁kuhita ▁ku fukiz a ▁ubani ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Kuna ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya handile ▁mizabibu ▁ mbali ▁ hali mbule ▁matunda ▁yake ? ▁Ya bwele ▁ukaye ▁muladi ▁sekeya danganike ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ya sang ' hanile ▁kaye ▁yake .
▁Ni tenda ▁vino ▁muladi ▁muwa simulil e ▁wanenu ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁zenu , ▁viya ▁vini watendile ▁Wamisili ▁kuwa ▁wabozi ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza ▁kumwawo , ▁ivo ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga , ▁munhu ▁yo sagula ▁kusola ▁mhambe ▁kotenda ▁vinogile , ▁munhu ▁yo sagula ▁ku leka ▁kusola ▁kotenda ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Na ▁mudi zu wa ▁da ▁kenda ▁imisi , ▁Yesu ▁kalila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ E lo i , ▁ E lo i , ▁ la ma ▁saba ki ta ni ?” ▁F a mbulo ▁jake ▁ni , ▁“ Mulungu ▁wangu , ▁Mulungu ▁wangu , ▁ha bali ▁kuni leka ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁haya ndikigwe ▁bule ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁yenu ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ M weye ▁mwa ▁milungu ’ ?
▁Uko ▁wa gendelela ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁kwa ▁ tamu ▁ijo ▁wakala ▁ 2 4 ,000 .
▁Niza gendelela ▁kuigoda . ▁I nga wa ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chongezeke . ▁Niza gendelela ▁muna ▁yamalaguso ▁na ▁ma gubul o ▁ya ning ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa .
▁M avuta ▁yano ▁yaha da hi ke ▁ku guligwa ▁kwa ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁hela ▁izo ▁wa he ng ' higwe ▁ng a e nga e !” ▁Ivo ▁wa mbwakila ▁muke ▁iyo .
▁Kumbuk eni ▁kuwa ▁mukala ▁watumwa ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ka mkombola ni ▁kulawa ▁uko , ▁leka mana ▁no mulagilizani ▁mutende ▁vino .
▁Ka i tendela ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ ulu ki ngo ▁hana ▁zi banzi ▁mbili ▁zozi i hindukile . ▁M he t e ▁izo ▁za mhilila ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila .
▁Mana ▁lagano ▁di na ▁ludabwa ▁fana ▁mwenyewo ▁kadanganika , ▁lagano ▁da bule ▁ludabwa ▁fana ▁mwenyewo ▁mgima .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Sekeu i kome ▁mwenyewo ! ▁Wo se ▁cha ba hano !”
▁Muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁longo ▁na ▁nne , ▁mfalume ▁Ke do lila o ma ▁na ▁wafalume ▁wayage ▁weza ▁na ▁kuwahuma ▁Walefai ▁wa ▁uko ▁ A s hite lo shi ▁K ili a sa i mu ▁na ▁Wa zu zi ▁uko ▁Hamu ▁na ▁Wa e mi ▁uko ▁S ha we ▁K ili ya sa i mu .
▁Vi lu fikile ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kuja , ▁kawatum a ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁ya ka walongele ▁wageni , ▁‘ Izoni , ▁kwaviya ▁sambi ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi sa sa ligwa ▁chi mala !’
▁Walonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁mfalume ▁yokwiza ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ! ▁Mulungu ▁kachi patila ▁tindiwalo ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁ukulu ▁kuchanyha ▁ng ' hani ▁kuulanga !”
▁“ M kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni , ▁ni iwawo ▁wondawa wagolele ▁wanhu ▁isi ▁kuwa ▁yawo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka galula ▁m agesa ▁yake ▁ya ▁kuwatendela ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁zo yalongile .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyawalagilize .
▁Maabaho ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁yeli ▁na ▁ching ' hele ▁keza gendelela ▁kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁tatu . ▁Chi p indi ▁icho ▁sekeya dalise ▁chochose ▁chelile ▁hebu ▁kwingila ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁m baka ▁siku ▁za ▁ku safyigwa ▁kwake ▁vonda zima le .
▁Kuna ▁sili ▁i ifisa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yano , ▁niye ▁no wona ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wose .
▁Wana ▁wawo ▁wa kula . ▁Esau ▁kakala ▁m kala , ▁yoyo londa ▁kukala ▁muna ▁i v yu wa la , ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁ya ho lile ▁yo londa ▁kukala ▁ha kaye .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Mbali ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁dodi saguligwe ▁kwa ▁mhiya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ A za ze li ▁diza lavigwa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuno ▁mgima ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezamuleka ▁yahite ▁kuchuwala ▁kwa ▁ A za ze li .
▁Wa nahina ▁wasegela , ▁wahita ▁kudibululu , ▁na ▁wa wona ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁Yesu ▁va yawalongele . ▁Ivo ▁wa sasala ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka .
▁“ One ▁mulume ▁yahawa ▁na ▁ha la za , ▁iyo ▁kela ▁kwaviya ▁kana ▁ha la za ▁muhala .
▁Vino ▁lelo ▁niye ▁niwa ▁mwihi ▁wenu ▁kwaviya ▁ni mulongelani ▁ukweli ?
▁Viwa malile ▁ku kanha ▁dilamba , ▁wafika ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ge ne sa le ti , ▁baho ▁wa i miza ▁ngalawa ▁yawo .
▁Ze lu ba b eli ▁kamwelek a ▁Abihu di , ▁Abihu di ▁kamwelek a ▁Eliya ki mu , ▁Eliya ki mu ▁kamwelek a ▁ A zo li ,
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁imi to to ndo ▁ng ' hani ▁wa lamka ▁na ▁wakwela ▁kuna ▁ inhembeti ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁mulima . ▁Walonga , ▁“ Chi togola ▁chi tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ mbali ▁cha hano ▁cho hita ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hoya chi laganile .”
▁Nompul a ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁wa weng ' heni ▁bala ka ▁na ▁tindiwalo .
▁Yesu ▁kenuka , ▁kamuuza ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁“ Wa kulihi ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowa ku gwilile ? ▁Habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁yoya ku taguse ?”
▁Lung ' husesa ▁luja ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁viwa wone ▁ma bu bu ▁wolonga , ▁mbetembete ▁wo genda ▁na ▁vipofu ▁wo wona . ▁Ivo ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .
▁Yakobo ▁kagona ▁na ▁Laheli ▁iviya , ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁ka mulonda ▁kufosa ▁Leya . ▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁ka msang ' hanila ▁Labani ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁imwenga .
▁Uno vu ▁uwo ▁wochi fundiza ▁chi leke ▁wihi ▁na ▁malond o ▁yehile ▁na ▁chi kale ▁kwa ▁kulinganya ▁na ▁chi kale ▁vinogile ▁voilondeka ▁na ▁chi kale ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁luno ,
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁damu ▁chidogo ▁ili ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ulupango ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yaja ▁yelile ▁um mizil e ▁Haluni ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yake , ▁iviya ▁uwa mizil e ▁wanage ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yawo . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza kuwa ▁we la ▁kumwangu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yawo ▁yose .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁no i safya ▁kwa ▁weye ▁muladi ▁na ▁wawo ▁wa safyigwe ▁haswa ▁kwa ▁weye .
▁“ N diya ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁isi ▁yako ▁kwiza i gala ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako . ▁“ Sekeu m ki mu se ▁m wanaluti ▁muna ▁yama to mbo ▁ya ▁mami ▁yake .
▁Pilato ▁viyakalile ▁mwii chi goda ▁cha ▁nhaguso , ▁mke ▁wake ▁ka mgalila ▁usenga , ▁“ Sekeu we ▁na ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁na ▁iyo ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁unovu , ▁kwaviya ▁chilo ▁chi fosile ▁ni gazigwa ▁ng ' hani ▁mu zi n zo zi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi , ▁ya hulike !”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁vichala , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁vipofu ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lukwale .
▁Na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁saba ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁ma hulo ▁saba ▁wa lawa ▁umo ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa yawala ▁mawalo ▁mazelu ▁ya na ng ' hane ▁na ▁yo melemeta ▁na ▁wazi ngilizigwa ▁mi kwiji ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁muna ▁zim ha mba ga ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁lugano ▁kwa ▁ndiya ▁iyo ja , ▁Mulungu ▁ko mtagusa ▁one ▁yaha ja , ▁kwaviya ▁lungilo ▁da ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁da mwabule ▁muna ▁uhuwilo . ▁Na ▁chochose ▁chili bule ▁mwanduso ▁wake ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁ni ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁kamuuza ▁Sitefano , ▁“ Vino ▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁kweli ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁si msagule ni ▁mweye ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ? ▁Mbali ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁mwihi !”
▁na ▁viwa segela ▁wa ilongela ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ha tendile ▁chochose ▁chochi mulonda ▁ya tagusigwe ▁ifa ▁hebu ▁chifungo .”
▁Bahobaho ▁ka kwela ▁mwiingalawa ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kahita ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Da lima n u ta .
▁Ivo ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁uchanyha ▁kudi wing u ▁ka sa ▁sengo ▁yake ▁mwiisi ▁na ▁mavuno ▁ya go b o ligwa .
▁ Mbwiyangu , ▁sekeu hi ge ▁yehile , ▁ mbali ▁ hi ga ▁yanogile . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁yanogile ▁ko lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁yehile ▁hana mmanya ▁Mulungu ▁bule .
▁Mbali ▁yano ▁yo lawilila ▁muladi ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁ya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁yawo ▁yawe ▁kweli , ▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wa ni hila ▁bule .’
▁Adamu ▁ka mbandama ▁Hawa ▁muke ▁wake , ▁na ▁ka pata ▁wimo . ▁Ka mwe leka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁ya tangigwe ▁Kaini , ▁nayo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni pata ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .”
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁ha ili ▁ivo , ▁yeye ▁kokwaminika ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wangu ▁wose .
▁M baka ▁vino ▁diyelo , ▁viwo soma ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa , ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁zo gubikigwa ▁na ▁chitambala .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁ya patile ▁kuyamanya ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁Mndewa ? ▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yo daha ▁ku mu longoza ▁muna ▁ ulamuzi ▁wake ?
▁Wa muwamb a ▁mumsalaba ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁wa i golela ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁kwa ▁kuvi towe la ▁mhiya .
▁N diya ▁yenu ▁niza i hunguza ▁m baka ▁wanaake ▁longo ▁wa sang ' hanile ▁chi vu ▁chimwe ▁muhala ▁ko ka ▁magate . ▁Weza m golela ni ▁kwa ▁ningo . ▁Hata ▁muha komeleza ▁kuja ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mung ' hali ▁na ▁nzala .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁ku fambula ▁ka habule , ▁munhu ▁yolonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁na ya nyama le , ▁ya longe ▁yaidumwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wake .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wa ▁chiidumwe ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni , ▁one ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yeye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁zake .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁ija ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁zomu longa ▁yeye , ▁kakala ▁wa ▁kabila ▁dimwenga , ▁na ▁ habule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jake ▁yoya sang ' hanile ▁muna ▁ichilingo ▁cha ▁ku lavila ▁nhosa .
▁“ M weye ▁mu linga ▁fana ▁munyu ▁wa ▁isi , ▁munyu ▁waha giza ▁u munyu ▁wake , ▁kwiza guma ▁choni ▁m baka ▁uko lele ▁kaidi ? ▁Ha u faya ▁chochose ▁bule , ▁ivo ▁wo kwa sigwa ▁kunze ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wou bojoga .
▁M uladi ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁sekeu we ▁na ▁ubala ▁wa ▁chiunhu , ▁ mbali ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁mavuno ▁ni ▁mengi ▁ mbali ▁wa gobola ji ▁ni ▁wadodo .
▁Lelo ▁sambi ▁no kwima ▁hano ▁ni gezigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁lolelo ▁do ni li na jo ▁muna ▁ichi lagano ▁chiya ▁Mulungu ▁cho yekile ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu .
▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁“ Gol o sa ▁mkono ▁wako .” ▁Na yo ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake , ▁na ▁u hona ▁fana ▁viya ▁mkono ▁wake ▁we ▁kaidi .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁woi ne ga , ▁imwe ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁wo mtogole la ▁kuja ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁ mbali ▁imwenga ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁nyondenyonde , ▁koja ▁ mbo ga ▁za ▁mayani ▁muhala .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁viya ka li ▁kohita ▁na ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kukimbilila ▁hanhu ▁ha tangigwe ▁“ L u hele ngo ▁lwa ▁Solomoni .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁wanhu ▁wa ▁uko ▁viwa mmanyile ▁Yesu ▁ka uko . ▁Wa pwililisa ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁muna ▁zi isi ▁zose ▁zili ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁na ▁iviya ▁wa mgalila ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁watamu .
▁Viwakalile ▁mwiinzila , ▁wa y ilongela , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yonda ▁ya chi bimbilis ile ▁dibwe ▁diya ▁hamu lomo ▁ha ▁dileme ?”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wezakwi v a ▁ya u ya u ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yawo . ▁Yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya ▁kuhulika ▁na yahulike !
▁Mulungu ▁kam memez a ▁muhe ▁wake ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁udahi ▁na ▁nzewele ▁na ▁umanyi ▁na ▁ufundi
▁“ T uma ▁wanhu ▁muladi ▁wahite ▁wa ka i pelembe ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁yoni weng ' ha ▁Waisilaili . ▁Kwiza mtuma ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁da ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁yawe ▁mulangulizi ▁hagati ▁yawo .”
▁Weza ▁wanhu ▁wane , ▁wam papa ▁munhu ▁yahololile , ▁wa mgala ▁kwa ▁Yesu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo zahila ▁ugima ▁wake ▁keza wagiza , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo wagiza ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu ▁keza u wona .
▁Ka wavwizila ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁mwiisi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁mauzauza ▁viya da hi zigwe ▁ku lagusa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso . ▁Yo yawalongele ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁watende ▁nyang ' hiti ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁ya ▁diya ▁ding ' ho nyo ▁di lu m izigwe ▁kwa ▁zele , ▁ mbali ▁ka gendelela ▁kuwa ▁mgima .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wa nza nza ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁mwiinzila , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wa kanha ▁matambi ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁mu mi gunda ▁na ▁kuya nza nza ▁mwiinzila .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ M a li ya !” ▁Maliya ▁ka mu hindukila , ▁kamulongela ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya , ▁“ L a b oni !” ▁F a mbulo ▁jake , ▁“ Mfundiza .”
▁Mbali ▁yondaya funye ▁umoyo ▁m baka ▁ku helelo ▁keza kuwa ▁mgima .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kalawa , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁m baka ▁Yesu ▁ha dahile ▁kwingila ▁mudibululu ▁kwa ▁uwa zi . ▁Ivo , ▁kakala ▁kunze , ▁hanhu ▁ hali bule ▁wanhu . ▁Hata ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wamuhitila ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁kwandusi la ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁m baka ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matano , ▁wowo daha ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁Lola , ▁ulanga ▁m baka ▁ulanga ▁wa ▁ulanga ▁ni ▁va ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁isi ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo ▁ni ▁vake .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ Leke ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa habehi !”
▁“ Ni sa gulile ▁wana ▁chaudele ▁wose ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wawe ▁wangu , ▁mana ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁wa ▁wanyama ▁ni ▁wangu .”
▁Na ▁siyo ▁Adamu ▁ya vwizi ligwe , ▁ mbali ▁kakala ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁ya vwizi ligwe ▁na ▁kawa ▁mu hasanyi .
▁m olondeka ▁mu wakome ▁kwa ▁panga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁wose . ▁Di nange ni ▁ng ' hani ▁bululu ▁ijo .
▁Na wo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Chi lota ▁nzozi ▁na ▁ habule ▁yo daha ▁kuchi fambulila ▁nzozi ▁zetu .” ▁Yosefu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vino ▁siyo ▁Mulungu ▁muhala ▁yoyo daha ▁ku fambula ▁nzozi ?” ▁Ni longele ni ▁nzozi ▁zenu .
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁uluwa ▁wizakuwa ▁na ▁panzia ▁dili ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁mhanda ▁zake ▁longo ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁longo .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁keza lava ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁yoya ha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁na ▁magate ▁ma sisili ▁yoya ha kigwe ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ma andazi ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta .
▁Walongele ▁wa mtendele ▁mawalo ▁yelile , ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁na ▁ng ' hanzu ▁na ▁chi lemba ▁na ▁mkwiji ▁na ▁joho ▁dodi ha mbigwe . ▁Haluni ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza v a la ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ H u mu lu ka , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁wouwa lavile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁wa hasanya .
▁“ Di no ▁ijo ▁fambulo ▁da ▁simwe ▁dino , ▁M beyu ▁zo lagusa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Si mwe ▁dino ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?”
▁“ Y u da , ▁wana ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁wezaku togola . ▁W e hi ▁wako ▁kwiza wa nyo da ▁si ngo . ▁Wana ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁weza tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ko .
▁“ Chi togole le ▁chi fose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako . ▁ Hachi za fosa ▁mumgwazo ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁hebu ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ya ▁mizabibu , ▁hebu ▁hachiza kung ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁vi sima ▁venu , ▁chiza fosa ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁dimwe ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁m baka ▁vondachi segele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako .”
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁cho kala ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo ▁fana ▁yeye ▁viyeli ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo , ▁cho ilumba ▁cheye ▁kwa ▁cheye , ▁na ▁damu ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yeli ▁mwanage , ▁yochi safya ▁cheye ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁wose .
▁“ M kalangama ▁imwe ▁ha faya ▁ku mulavila ▁ukalangama ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wowose . ▁Mbuli ▁yo londeka ▁i laviligw e ▁ukalangama ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu .
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁hachi lola ▁vinogile ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vovi woneka , ▁ mbali ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁havi woneka . ▁Kwa viya ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vi woneka , ▁vo kala ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁havi woneka ▁bule ▁vo kala ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁uhasanyi ▁viu tawale ▁muna ▁ifa , ▁iviya ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wiza tawala ▁kufose la ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuchi gala ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁na ▁mauzauza ▁hebu ▁mawewedek a ▁ya lawilile ▁ku mu longoza ni ▁mweye ▁kutambikila ▁na ▁kusang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁ija ▁hamuna wahi ▁kui tambikila ▁baho ▁umwaka . ▁Hata ▁one ▁yaja ▁yo wekile ▁chilagano ▁yaha lawilila ,
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁no mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁unovu ▁uya weng ' hileni ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Lu pango ▁ulo ▁lw i ke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁panzia ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba , ▁honda ni iting ' hane ▁na ▁weye .
▁“ Ivo ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁na ▁kuzi tegeleza , ▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala ▁ya ze ngile ▁kaye ▁yake ▁uchanyha ▁muna ▁uluwe .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Fan a ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁viyalongile , ▁‘ M gati ▁yake ▁yeye ▁cho kala ▁na ▁cho genda ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ugima ▁wetu .’ ▁Fan a ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁im tu nga ▁wila ▁viyalongile , ▁‘ Ch eye ▁wose ▁ni ▁welesi ▁wake .’
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁uha go ni kigwa ▁utende ▁vino , ▁uha fika ▁kuna ▁didugila , ▁ hita ▁uka kale ▁kuna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁kuchisogo , ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya ku goneke ▁yaha k wi zila , ▁ya kulongele , ▁‘ Mbwiyangu , ▁inuka ▁ wize ▁uka kale ▁kuna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁kuulongozi .’ ▁Baho ▁kwiza tunhizigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye .
▁Na ▁watumigwa ▁waja ▁wowa tumigwe ▁wahita ▁na ▁wa wona ▁fana ▁Yesu ▁viya walongele .
▁Maabaho ▁weza lawilila ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁wengi ▁muladi ▁wa wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁wengi .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalu tanga ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanahina , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kuni sondelela , ▁ya i leme ▁mwenyewo , ▁ya itwik e ▁msalaba ▁wake ▁ya ni sondelele .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai , ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wekaidi ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁wekaidi ▁viwa malile ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Kalonga ,
▁Mulungu ▁kamzilibula ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁kezachi zilibula ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwake .
▁Mulungu ▁kawa gubulila ▁waja ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁lusita ▁viwa kalile ▁wolonga ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zo muhulika ▁sambi ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁wowa wa gong ' onde la ▁Mbuli ▁inogile ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁yoya tumigwe ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo ▁hai kalile ▁kwa ▁faida ▁ya o ▁we n ye we ▁ila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁ Izo ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁hata ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa londa ▁ku zimanya .
▁Ihaw ile ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ku faya ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwetu ▁kuwa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁fana ▁ino ▁yelile , ▁yeli bule ▁ubananzi ▁hebu ▁uhasanyi , ▁ka ba guligwa ▁kwa ▁wa hasanyi , ▁nayo ▁kenul igwa ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani ▁kuulanga .
▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁na ▁ka mtuma ▁iyo ▁ teng ' hu ▁kumwenu ▁muladi ▁ya mtemele ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁kumtenda ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya leke ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁zihile .”
▁ Vichi komeleze ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁M agate ▁hayana gumigw a ▁L usu , ▁chi kwela ▁ngalawa ▁kulawa ▁Filipi , ▁na ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁hamwande ▁chifika ▁Tulowa . ▁Uko ▁chi kala ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Tata ▁mwenyewo ▁komulonda ni , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁mu no nda ▁niye ▁na ▁mu togola ▁kuwa ▁ni lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁M weye ▁mo vimanya ▁usenga ▁uya tu mile ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁yeli ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wose .
▁One ▁chiha tenda ▁ivo ▁chiza mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁yawe ▁na ▁migongo . ▁Ch eye ▁cha bule ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁yeye .
▁Lelo ▁ka togoligwa ▁zuwaki ? ▁Viya kalile ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwingila ▁ulungwana ▁hebu ▁viya komeleze ▁kwingila ▁ulungwana ? ▁Ka togoligwa ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwingila ▁ulungwana ▁na ▁si ▁viya komeleze ▁kwingila ▁ulungwana ▁bule !
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yahadanganika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁ko komboligwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi .
▁“ Tegeleza ! ▁No kwiza ▁fana ▁mbavi . ▁Ka mweda ▁munhu ▁yo kala ▁meso ▁kuno ▁kayawala ▁mawalo ▁yake , ▁muladi ▁sekeya wone ▁chinyala ▁wanhu ▁vondawa muwone ▁ka mwa zi .”
▁Viya kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁kufika ▁Yelusalemu , ▁kuna ▁u muhulumu ko ▁wa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mizaituni , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁lwa ndusa ▁kutowa ▁lu ke n ze ▁na ▁ku mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁zose ▁za ▁udahi ▁zo wa zi wonile .
▁Kuuhelelo ▁mfalume ▁ha mmanyile ▁bule ▁Yosefu ▁ka ndusa ▁ku tawala ▁uko ▁Misili .
▁ka chuuza ▁mgunda ▁wake , ▁kasola ▁zi hela ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁watumigwa .
▁Viwa hulike ▁m bumo ▁uwo , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁waiting a na ▁hamwe . ▁Wo se ▁we du ka ▁kwaviya ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kawa hulika ▁walonga ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Vi i fosile ▁miyaka ▁mitatu , ▁ni hita ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁ku imanya ▁na ▁Petili , ▁nikala ▁kumwake ▁siku ▁longo ▁na ▁tano .
▁Mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Tat i ▁yako ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁wa k wi zila ▁weye ,
▁kwaviya ▁mbwiya ng u ▁yeli ▁muu mwa nza ▁keza ▁ukaye ▁yangu , ▁na ▁niye ▁na bule ▁ndiya ▁cha ▁kumwing ' ha !’
▁Muna ▁ ichipi ndi ▁chidodo ▁chi kwiza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁haweza niwona ▁kaidi ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwiza niwona , ▁kwaviya ▁na m gima , ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mwiza kala ▁wagima .
▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁chi yalumbile ▁Mulungu ▁chinoga , ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku lemigwa , ▁ mbali ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi hokel igwe ▁kwa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Kwiza tenda ▁panzia ▁da ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dibotigwe . ▁P anzia ▁ijo ▁kwiza di ha mba ▁vinogile ▁kwa ▁vilumb e ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa songoligwe ▁na ▁ma fu ndi .
▁Vini kalile ▁Damasiki , ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁ A le ta ▁kakala ▁ yekile ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁bululu ▁muladi ▁wa ni gwile .
▁Mbali ▁cho muwona ▁Yesu ▁yoya tendigwe ▁kuwa ▁mdodo ▁kufosa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo , ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yadanganike ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁magayo ▁yoya gaiye ▁m baka ▁kudanganika ▁kwake , ▁sambi ▁cho muwona ▁kaya wa zigwa ▁kombelo ▁da ▁ukulu ▁na ▁hishima .
▁Ndams a ▁ino ▁no y andika ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁Paulo ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wangu .
▁Ivo ▁mulala ▁mulangulizi ▁yo lola ▁goya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁kolondeka ▁sekeya longigwe ▁vihile ▁na ▁yawe ▁na ▁muke ▁imwe ▁muhala ▁na ▁yawe ▁na ▁kulinganya ▁na ▁yawe ▁munhu ▁yo togole ka ▁na ▁wanhu ▁na ▁sekeyawe ▁m gila ▁ya dahe ▁kufundiza ,
▁Vino ▁mweye ▁mu zimiza ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ku gela ▁moyo ▁ziya ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ▁na ▁mweye ▁fana ▁wanage ? ▁“ Mwanangu ▁sekeu ze he ▁lu zum o ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁hebu ▁sekeu bene ke ▁moyo ▁vondaya ku b wa kile .
▁Esau ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ha ya ▁chi gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wetu . ▁Niye ▁nizaku longole la .”
▁“ Ku mbu ke ni ▁siku ▁ zifosile , ▁ gese ni ▁miyaka ▁ya ▁nyele si ▁nyingi , ▁wa uze ni ▁ tati ▁zenu , ▁nawo ▁weza mwidika ni , ▁wa uze ni ▁walala ▁wenu , ▁nawo ▁weza mulongelani .
▁W eli ▁na ▁nzala ▁ka we g u ti za ▁yanogile , ▁na ▁kawa segeza ▁matajili ▁makono ▁muhala .
▁“ Vino ▁kuna ▁ bumbila ▁dimwenga ▁kulu ▁da ▁wanhu ▁dili ▁na ▁m ulungu ▁wawo ▁habehi ▁fana ▁viyeli ▁habehi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁yochi taza ▁vochi mpula ?
▁Kwa viya ▁Lutu ▁kakala ▁ko dumba ▁kukala ▁Soali , ▁yeye ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁zake ▁waidi ▁wasegela ▁kuna ▁na ▁wahita ▁kukala ▁kuna ▁dituka ▁kuna ▁imilima .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vondaya wa danganize ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁na ▁kumwing ' hani ▁isi ▁yawo , ▁muwa wing e ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yawo ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zawo ,
▁ Mami ▁yake ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake ▁vi wamuwonile ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani . ▁ Mami ▁yake ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mwana ▁weye ! ▁ Habali ▁kuchi tendela ▁vino ? ▁Niye ▁na ▁ tati ▁yako ▁chi kala ▁cho ku zahila ▁kwa ▁kugaya .”
▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁chochi mwing ila ▁munhu ▁kulawa ▁kunze ▁chi chi daha ▁kumtenda ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko . ▁Mbali ▁chiya ▁chochi lawa ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁munhu ▁ni icho ▁chi chi daha ▁kumtenda ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .”
▁Loleni ▁cho kwika ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku longoze la ▁muna ▁imi lomo ▁ya ▁falasi , ▁kuwatenda ▁wachi tegeleze , ▁na ▁chodaha ▁kuwa longoza ▁ko ko se ▁kochi londa .
▁na ▁Ishumaili ▁mwanage ▁vi yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁mitatu .
▁“ Lelo ▁no kwika ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wenu ,
▁Mbali ▁ gendelele ni ▁kukala ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku mmanya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁U tunhizo ▁uwe ▁wake ▁sambi ▁na ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo !
▁Yo manyika ▁china ga na ga ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁kelek igwa ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁diya ▁Musa ▁hadi ta mbule ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kuson hela ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Mbali ▁viya ▁vi lawa ▁m mu lomo , ▁vo lawa ▁muna ▁umoyo , ▁na ▁ivo ▁vovi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa mtogola ▁na ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁unovu ▁za yalongile . ▁Walonga , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁heli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁bule ?”
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa pwililisa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁nawo ▁wa leka ▁ku zenga ▁dibululu .
▁Si daha ▁kuwa papa ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁niidumwe , ▁kwaviya ▁mbahasha ▁iyo ▁iza ma ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwangu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Samaliya ▁hawa muhokele ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kohita ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Wa ni ke ! ▁M wa bule ▁somba ▁yoyose ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ona ! ▁Ch a bule .”
▁Niza fisa ▁chihanga ▁changu , ▁kwaviya ▁wa tenda ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁kutambikila ▁milungu ▁imwenga .
▁“ Zin o ▁ni izo ▁nhambiko ▁zomu londeka ▁kulava ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁chila ▁siku , ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁waidi ▁m alume ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe .
▁Chi no ▁chi zakuwa ▁fana ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wako ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁ichihanga ▁chako , ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁mkulu .’ ▁”
▁Yaha wa ▁kaye ▁i na ▁wanhu ▁wadodo ▁ng ' hani , ▁yo londeka ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁mkaya ▁miyage ▁kuja ▁i nyama ▁ya ▁kuwa faya ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁m aabaho ▁weza sagula ▁nyama ▁chila ▁munhu ▁iyo daha ▁kuja .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁migulu ▁wabwela ▁muna ▁im ho ngo no , ▁wa waleka ▁waja ▁wakalizi ▁wakwela ▁falasi , ▁wa gendelele la ▁na ▁umwanza ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Paulo .
▁Mbali ▁m tazi ▁wako ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni ▁keza kwima ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo . ▁Basi ▁m gume ▁moyo ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kezawa languliza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa ka i sole ▁isi ▁iyo .’
▁Sekemu i bu n ze , ▁ mbali ▁m umdumbe ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Lola , ▁ nya ndusa ▁kutenda ▁mumuhum e ▁Sihoni ▁na ▁isi ▁yake , ▁ya nduse ni ▁kuisola ▁muladi ▁iwe ▁yenu .’
▁“ Sekemu wataguse ▁wamwenga , ▁Mulungu ▁heza mtagusa ni ▁mweye ▁bule . ▁Sekemu wa longe ▁vihile ▁wamwenga , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁heza mulonga ni ▁mweye ▁vihile . ▁Wa lekelele ni ▁wamwenga , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁keza walekelele ni ▁mweye .
▁kawalongela , ▁“ Z i ke ni ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zo ni mulongeleni ▁diyelo , ▁muladi ▁mu walagilize ▁wanenu ▁wa sondelele ▁chigangamavu ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁lagilizo ▁dino .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Tend a ▁ nyo ka ▁wa ▁shaba ▁na ▁um tumbik e ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mbiki , ▁muladi ▁chila ▁yoya l umigwe ▁yaha mulola ▁i nyo ka ▁iyo , ▁keza hona .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁cha ▁mwingi zo , ▁Sipol a ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁mulume ▁wa ▁damu ▁yangu .” ▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kau leke la ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Musa .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha ika ▁kaye ▁yake ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lamula ▁bei ▁yake ▁kwa ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁unovu ▁wake ▁hebu ▁wihi ▁wake . ▁Vondaya lamule ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ni ivo ▁vondaiwe .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yoya le kile ▁kaye ▁hebu ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike ▁hebu ▁tata ▁hebu ▁mama ▁hebu ▁wana ▁hebu ▁migunda ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁kezahokela ▁miyanza ▁gana , ▁na ▁keza kwing ' higwa ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Muhe ▁kanilongela ▁ni hite ▁nawo ▁ bila ▁kudumba . ▁Wa huwila ▁wano ▁sita ▁kulawa ▁Yopa ▁wa ni sondelela ▁niye ▁m baka ▁Kaisaliya , ▁na ▁wose ▁chi ngila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ Kolineliyo .
▁Ka zenga ▁lupango ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁na ▁ku ha tanga ▁Eli ▁ E lo he ▁Isilaili , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Vi pofu ▁na ▁mbetembete ▁wamuhitila ▁umo ▁mwi ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁kawahonya .
▁M bavi ▁kokwiza ▁kwa ▁lungilo ▁da ▁ku bawa , ▁kukoma ▁na ▁ku bananga . ▁Niye ▁niza ▁kwa ▁lungilo ▁da ▁kuwatenda ▁muwe ▁na ▁ugima , ▁na ▁iviya ▁sekemu hu ng u kiligwe ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wenu .
▁Vi wengile ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁viwa kwenhukile ▁ulupango , ▁wana wa ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Ng a lawa ▁i fika ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁nzila ▁mbili ▁za ▁mazi ▁ya ▁bahali , ▁ngalawa ▁i kwa ma . ▁Ha nhu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁im eli ▁hakala ▁hadi di mile ▁muna ▁umsanga ▁hai dahile ▁bule ▁kusegela , ▁na ▁kuchisogo ▁kwa ndusa ▁ku bene ka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ma wing u .
▁Wawo ▁wose ▁wotambala ▁kumwenu ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁ mitufi ▁yawo , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁m aabaho ▁mweye ▁wose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ye mile ▁hano ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ▁ka hona ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁wa ▁Nazaleti , ▁yomu muwamb ile ▁mumsalaba ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kamzilibula .
▁Vi nhu ▁viwa ho kile ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁vi kala ▁ng ' hondolo ▁ 6 7 5 ,000
▁Waisilaili ▁wa ya sola ▁mabululu ▁yose ▁ya ▁Waamoli , ▁nawo ▁wakala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yose ▁ya ▁Waamoli , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Heshiboni ▁na ▁vi bulul u ▁vake .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁k alongo la ▁kaidi , ▁kema ▁hanhu ▁heli bule ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kufosa ▁ukulu me ▁hebu ▁uku mo so .
▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mwenevale ▁wangu ▁kovimanya ▁kuwa ▁wana ▁wano ▁ving ' hele , ▁iviya ▁no gesa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wo kong ' heza ▁na ▁niye ▁no londeka ▁kuwa lola ▁goya . ▁Fan a ▁cha hawa ge nde za ▁siku ▁ngima , ▁yo dahika ▁wezadanganika .
▁Maabaho ▁wamsola ▁na ▁ku mwasa ▁muna ▁disima ▁dili bule ▁mazi .
▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁imwe , ▁nayo ▁keza watende za ▁Wayahudi ▁wano ge ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁uhuwilo , ▁na ▁keza watenda ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁iviya ▁wano ge ▁haulongozi ▁hake ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁uhuwilo .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁muleke ▁ugen zi ▁wihile ▁na ▁wihi ▁mvunyo ▁wo wene le ▁kumwenu . ▁Mu hokele ▁kwa ▁u nyendanyenda ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁yo ihandigwe ▁mgati ▁yenu ▁na ▁yoi daha ▁kuwa lopola ▁mweye .
▁hebu ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁mi ko wa , ▁wowasaguligwe ▁nayo ▁kuwatagusa ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yehile ▁na ▁kuwa togoza ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yanogile .
▁Zi ng ' hali ▁siku ▁sita ▁kufika ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka , ▁Yesu ▁kafika ▁Besaniya , ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁Lazalo , ▁ija ▁yoya m zilibule .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya mkome ▁miyage , ▁iviya ▁nayo ▁kezakomigwa ▁na ▁munhu , ▁Mana ▁munhu ▁kalumb igwa ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo .
▁One ▁mulotezi ▁yaha longa ▁mbuli ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁one ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁hai lawilila ▁hebu ▁hai wa ▁kweli , ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁hai longile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁mulotezi ▁kai longa ▁kwa ▁kuigoda . ▁Sekemu mdumbe ▁mulotezi ▁iyo .
▁Wamulongela , ▁‘ Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya ching ' hile ▁sang ' hano .’ ▁Kawalongela , ▁‘ Vinoga , ▁lelo ▁na ▁mweye ▁ hite ni ▁kuna ▁umgunda .’
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawa lamula , ▁“ Sekemu mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mbuli ▁ino .”

▁ B a ha ja ▁vinhu ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁mab a le ▁vi la gala ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yameso ▁yake , ▁nayo ▁ka daha ▁kuwona ▁kaidi . ▁Ke nuka ▁na ▁ka batiz igwa ,
▁Pilato ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁hai faya ▁chochose ▁ila ▁tibwilitibwili ▁jandusa , ▁kasola ▁mazi ▁kana wa ▁makono ▁yake ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁lung ' husesa , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁na bule ▁kwi hi ligwa ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁munhu ▁ino ! ▁Ivo ▁ manye ▁wenyewo !”
▁“ Loleni , ▁sekem umbe ze ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wadodo ▁wano ! ▁Kwa viya ▁nowalongela ▁kuwa ▁wa senga ▁wawo ▁kuulanga ▁wa ku ulongozi ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga .

▁Wala ▁sekeu wone ▁u dala ▁vondau muleke ▁mtumwa ▁wako ▁yailegehe , ▁kwaviya ▁ka ku sang ' hanila ▁miyaka ▁sita ▁kwa ▁nusu ▁ya ▁maliho ▁ya ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁ku lihigwa . ▁Tend a ▁ivo ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁kezaku temela ▁mate ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho utenda .

▁Walawi ▁wamwenga ▁ni weng ' ha ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage , ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁muladi ▁wawa sang ' hanile ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁watende ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili , ▁muladi ▁sekekuw e ▁na ▁matamu ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili , ▁vondawa kwenhukile ▁hanhu ▁helile .”

▁Mbali ▁weye ▁ kala ▁hano ▁habehi ▁na ▁niye , ▁niza kulongela ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁yose ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zose . ▁Wa funze ni ▁wanhu ▁muladi ▁wa zindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yonda ni weng ' he ▁iwe ▁yawo .’

▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mbali ▁sambi ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁m fuko ▁na ya u sole , ▁na ▁um ko ba ▁iviya . ▁Na ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁zele , ▁na ya chuuze ▁ko ti ▁jake ▁ya ka gule ▁zele .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁na ▁kwi ta ▁Yudeya , ▁na ▁ku kanha ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu mwitila , ▁nayo ▁ka wafundiza ▁fana ▁va ya tenda ga .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁ulanga ▁wa ▁sambi ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁sambi . ▁U langa ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁vi fosa , ▁bahali ▁hai kalile ▁baho ▁kaidi .

▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁nod eng ' helela , ▁si ▁kwaviya ▁ni mtenda ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁usungu , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁usungu ▁wenu ▁u mtenda ni ▁muleke ▁uhasanyi . ▁ Mwing ila ▁usungu ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁hachi dahile ▁bule ▁kuwa za ga nya ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁vovose .

▁Ko londeka ▁uwa fundize ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwa lagusa ▁viya ▁vi wolondeka ▁kukala ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Iviya ▁wa wahuma ▁Waholi ▁uko ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Seili , ▁wa wawinga ▁kutali ▁m baka ▁Eli p a la ni ▁habehi ▁na ▁dibwilingu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁1 6 ,000 , ▁mwa ▁ iwawo , ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁waidi ▁wawa lava ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁yaja ▁yon inogela ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ti mi ye ▁mgati ▁yetu , ▁cheye ▁wochi kala ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁na ▁si ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁uli ▁na ▁uhasanyi .
▁Cho mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁yeli ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu , ▁ya chi da hi ze ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu .

▁Yakobo ▁ka imanya ▁ing ' hanzu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁yake ! ▁M ng ' onyo ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁ka mgwila ▁na ▁ka mu ja . ▁Yosefu ▁ka nyo m ho ligwa ▁vihande ▁vihande !”
▁Katenda ▁vinhu ▁vi kulu ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wake . ▁Kawa pwililisa ▁weli ▁na ▁magoda ▁muna imizoyo ▁yawo .
▁Chi tabu ▁icho ▁keza kuwa ▁nacho ▁na ▁kezachi soma ▁siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁muladi ▁ya i funze ▁kumdumba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wake . ▁Ya zindilile ▁na ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁lagilizo ▁dino ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zino ,
▁Ka wedika , ▁“ Izoni ▁mwiza wona .” ▁Ivo ▁wahita ▁na ▁wa wona ▁hanhu ▁ha yakalile ▁kokala ▁Yesu . ▁I kala ▁yo fika ▁saa ▁longo ▁ichigulogulo . ▁Na wo ▁wakala ▁na ▁Yesu ▁ chigulogulo ▁yose .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁mitamu ▁ihile ▁m baka ▁mose ▁mu danganike ▁muna ▁iisi ▁imu hita ▁kuisola .
▁“ I kala ▁viwa kalile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁lago ▁mwiinzila ▁kuhita ▁Misili , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka iting ' hana ▁nayo ▁na ▁ka geza ▁kumkoma .
▁Pilato ▁kamuuza , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Ona , ▁ivo ▁viu longa .”
▁Si londeka ▁kuigoda ▁kwaviya ▁no peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁sang ' hano ▁i ning ' higwe . ▁Na ▁niza gaya ▁one ▁si wapetele ▁wanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile !
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wowo mulonda ▁Mulungu ▁weza ▁na ▁wa muwanda ▁Sitefano , ▁na ▁wa mtendela ▁ nhu la ▁ fu vu ▁na ▁wa lila ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalagiliza , ▁‘ Segeleni , ▁m wanduse ▁mwanza ▁wenu , ▁mu lo ke ▁ bawe ▁da ▁Alinoni , ▁ni mtenda ni ▁mumuhum e ▁Sihoni ▁M wamo li , ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Heshiboni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁isi ▁yake . ▁M towe ni ▁na ▁m wanduse ▁kuisola ▁isi ▁yake .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tenda ▁ vihindo ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁va ▁shaba ▁muladi ▁ku lumbiliza ▁viya ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁va ▁mapanzia , ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁panzia ▁dimwe ▁da ▁hema .
▁Cho mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Bulahimu ▁ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi , ▁ka se ka ▁na ▁kalonga ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake , ▁“ Vino ▁mulume ▁yeli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁kodaha ▁kupata ▁mwana ? ▁Vino ▁Sala ▁kodaha ▁kupata ▁mwana ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁kenda ?”
▁Kaye miza ▁magulu du mu ▁ya ▁m ituka ▁yawo ▁ya ▁ng ' hondo , ▁ya kala ▁yo genda ▁ugaluga ▁ng ' hani . ▁Wamisili ▁walonga , ▁“ Leka ▁chiwa kimbile ▁Waisilaili ! ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kowa gombela ▁Waisilaili !”
▁Yakobo ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁Labani ▁ham gesile ▁fana ▁baho ▁hau mwaka .
▁Na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁ya kalile ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁msalaba ▁ka wona ▁Yesu ▁va ya danganike . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Kweli ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kakala ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁weza kwiza ▁kulawa ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ni ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi , ▁na ▁weza kala ▁na ▁kuja ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁nawo ▁ukala ▁na ▁matambi ▁matatu . ▁L usita ▁vi usu kile ▁mayani , ▁maluw a ▁yake ▁ya p u mbu lu ka ▁na ▁vi lo bota ▁vake ▁viwa ▁zabibu ▁zi vi le .
▁Sekemu wa tawale ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁Waisilaili ▁chiu se de , ▁ mbali ▁m umdumbe ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Ivo ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ng ' hondo ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Wa he bu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁S u fa ▁na ▁ma ko lo ngo ▁ya ▁Alinoni .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁hawa mtegeleze ▁Musa , ▁ivo ▁wa si gaza ▁ndiya ▁m baka ▁imitondo . ▁Mbali ▁imitondo ▁ndiya ▁iyo ▁i wola , ▁i lava ▁ma vu nyo ▁na ▁kun ung ' ha ▁ vu ndo . ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawa wonela ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ko londeka ▁yeng ' higwe ▁ndiya ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wamwenga , ▁inga wa ▁kana zo ▁hela ▁zo ya patile ▁kwa ▁ku chuuza ▁vinhu ▁va ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wili ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁ugima ▁wose , ▁u msagule ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kuwa longoza ▁wanhu ▁wano ,
▁Kwa viya ▁ino ▁mwanangu ▁kakala ▁kadanganika , ▁lelo ▁kazilibuka , ▁kakala ▁ka ga ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ka woneka .’ ▁Ivo ▁wa ndusa ▁kude ng ' helela .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuwa lanha ▁wawa guma ▁muna ▁ichifungo , ▁mkalizi ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁kalagiliza ▁wakalizi gwe ▁ng ' hani .
▁Masa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ No vimanya ▁keza zilibuka ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁uhelelo .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yoja ▁ndiya ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Lawi , ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁wengi ▁na ▁“ we li ▁na ▁uhasanyi ” ▁wakala ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wakala ▁wo msondelela .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Sekemwi i da nga nyi ze ▁isi ▁hebu ▁bahali ▁hebu ▁mibiki , ▁m baka ▁vondachi komeleze ▁kuwa si nga ▁mu huli ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu .”
▁Mbali ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁yaha sigala ▁mgima ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁hebu ▁mbili , ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁heza tagusigwa ▁kwaviya ▁ka giza ▁hela ▁yake ▁iya m gulile .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wowa go ne kigwe ▁hawa gesile , ▁wahita ▁imwe ▁kumgunda ▁wake ▁na ▁imwenga ▁kuna ▁ ib i a s ha la ▁yake ,
▁ Walangulizi ▁waidi ▁mwa ▁waja ▁walangulizi ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁wa sigala ▁muna ▁dilago , ▁imwe ▁ka tangigwa ▁Eli dadi ▁na ▁imwenga ▁M e dadi . ▁Muhe ▁ukala ▁uchanyha ▁yawo , ▁nawo ▁wakala ▁mwa ▁waja ▁wapetigwe . ▁Kwa viya ▁hawa lawile ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁dihema , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulonga ▁fana ▁walotezi ▁muna ▁dilago .
▁Zi mwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁hana ▁ulongo ▁uli ▁mu ulu we , ▁na ▁vi zo tile , ▁zi nyala ▁kwaviya ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁mazi ▁muu lo ngo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Chila ▁siku ▁mulangulizi ▁imwe ▁keza lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku l wika ▁ulupango ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile .”
▁Yakobo ▁viya wa wone ▁kalonga , ▁“ Di no ▁ni ▁lago ▁da ▁Mulungu .” ▁Ka ha tanga ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁Ma hana i mu .
▁One ▁chaha mulongela ▁Mulungu ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁yeye ▁kokwaminika ▁na ▁kanoga ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁kezachi lekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁na ▁kuchi safya ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vichi tenda ▁viya ▁havi mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁L usita ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁viya bandul e ▁uhul a ▁wa ▁saba , ▁kuulanga ▁kukala ▁zi nzi wa ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁nusu ▁saa .
▁Ma tu mba ▁yayo ▁na ▁matambi ▁yake ▁yezakuwa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe . ▁Chi na la ▁icho ▁chose ▁chiza h ondigwa ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile .
▁Ndams ileni ▁ A ndu lo ni ko ▁na ▁Y u ni ya , ▁Wayahudi ▁wayangu , ▁wowa fungigw e ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye . ▁Wawo ▁wo manyika ▁ng ' hani ▁mwa iwawo ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁wawo ▁wa ni longole la ▁ku muhuwila ▁Chilisito .
▁Walonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Chilisito , ▁ lotela ▁yelihi ▁ya ku to wile !”
▁“ Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁waha gomba , ▁m aabaho ▁imwenga ▁ka mtowa ▁miyage ▁na ▁dibwe ▁hebu ▁ng ' ho nde ▁ bila ▁kumkoma , ▁ mbali ▁ka mu lumiza ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁ya ugu le ▁na ▁ku tambala la ▁m di ko mwa ,
▁One ▁muha huwila , ▁mwiza hokela ▁chochose ▁chonda mu pule ▁muna ▁i nhambiko .”
▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁yo mwing ' ha ▁mu handa ji ▁mbeyu ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁kuja . ▁Ivo ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁mbeyu ▁yoyose ▁yomu i londa ▁na ▁yoi m faya ni , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁moyo ▁wenu ▁wa ▁kulava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi ▁u lele ▁ma da ka ▁mengi .
▁Iviya ▁ni nawo ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wamwenga , ▁wawo ▁siyo ▁wa ▁chi kwa ma ▁chino . ▁Wawo ▁nawo ▁no londeka ▁ni wagale ▁hano ▁iviya . ▁Weza di hulika ▁dizi ▁jangu , ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁ bumbila ▁dimwe ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁m dimi ▁imwe .
▁One ▁ziso ▁jako ▁da ha kutenda ▁ wagize ▁uhuwilo , ▁ding ' o le ▁na ▁uka ja se ▁kutali ▁na ▁weye . ▁M uhavu ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁kuno ▁kuna ▁ gele ▁se mbuse ▁kuwa ▁na ▁meso ▁maidi , ▁na ▁kwa sigwa ▁muna ▁jehanamu ▁ya ▁moto .
▁Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁kuwa ▁wa sole ▁be belu ▁dimwe ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi . ▁Iviya ▁wa sole ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁dimwe ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Wa nyama ▁wose ▁wawe ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁na ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Iyo ▁keza ni tunhiza ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁keza walongela ▁yose ▁yoya patile ▁kumwangu .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁ni ▁lusita ▁lu nogile ▁lu yo mwing ' hani ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁ulopozi , ▁fana ▁viya ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁Paulo ▁viya m wandikile ni ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wo yeng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa ▁m hu mu zi ▁yako , ▁mazi ▁ya i duganya ▁hamwe , ▁mawimbi ▁ye ma ▁ zu ga ga ▁fana ▁ng ' huta , ▁Mazi ▁mengi ▁ya ▁hagati ▁ya ▁bahali ▁ya na na hila .
▁Mbuli ▁zozi tendeka ▁kwa ▁sili ▁ni ▁chinyala ▁hata ▁kuzi ta mbula .
▁Vino ▁chiya ▁chinogile ▁chi galuka ▁ifa ▁kumwangu ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁I tendeka ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁uhasanyi ▁u tangigwe ▁uhasanyi , ▁u nigalila ▁ifa ▁kufose la ▁chiya ▁chinogile . ▁Ivo ▁uhasanyi ▁kufose la ▁malagilizo , ▁wo lagusa ▁wihi ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kachi tendela ▁ulupango ▁lwavu ▁lwa ▁shaba , ▁ka l wika ▁hasi ▁ya ▁lukingilo ▁lwa ▁ulupango ▁m baka ▁hagati ▁ya ▁ulupango .
▁na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁ku fukiz ila ▁ubani ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yake , ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ▁wili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁na ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ndams ileni ▁T ili fa i na ▁na ▁T ili fosa ▁wanaake ▁wowo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁u tumigwa ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁mulondwa ▁wangu ▁P eli si ▁yeye ▁ka sang ' hana ▁mengi ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa .
▁Fan a ▁Mulungu ▁ko ya yawaza ▁ivo ▁mayani ▁ya ▁kumbago , ▁diyelo ▁ya baho , ▁igolo ▁yo kwa s wa ▁muna ▁umoto . ▁Vino ▁Mulungu ▁hadaha ▁bule ▁ku mu yawaza ni ▁mweye ? ▁Wa nhu ▁muli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mdodo !
▁Ko gaya ▁weye ▁Moabu ! ▁Mu danganizigwa , ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Ke mo shi ! ▁Kawa lava ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kuwa ▁wa ki mbi zi , ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chike ▁wahite ▁kuu tumwa , ▁wahite ▁kwa ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Waamoli .
▁Mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mizaituni ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁zaituni , ▁kwaviya ▁zaituni ▁izo ▁ziza p a gati ka .
▁ Siku ▁imwe ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁kuja ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁Mafalisayo . ▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁wo m sepa sepa ▁Yesu .
▁Yakobo ▁ka lamka ▁na ▁ka isasala ▁kusegela ▁kwa ▁kuwa kwe za ▁wanage ▁na ▁wake ▁zake ▁muna ▁inga miya ,
▁Viwafikile ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa muwona ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁vinyamkela ▁kakala ▁hasi , ▁kayawala ▁viwalo ▁goya ▁na ▁haki li ▁zake ▁zi mbwelela . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wadumba .
▁Sekemu je ▁damu , ▁ mbali ▁i tile ni ▁hasi ▁fana ▁mazi .
▁Go mbo ▁vidi zile ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁Nuhu ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁sita .
▁kwaviya ▁mndele ▁wake ▁yo yelekigwe ▁yaidumwe ▁kakala ▁habehi ▁kudanganika . ▁ Mndele ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁midi . ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kohita , ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wo msung ' ha - sung ' ha ▁chila ▁ubanzi ▁mwiinzila .
▁one ▁muha mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁zo za ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino ▁cha ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ku mbwelela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose .
▁Mbali ▁hu we nda ▁wo patik a ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano . ▁Ivo ▁kwiza di nanga ▁bululu ▁jose ▁kwaviya ▁wa s we la ▁wanhu ▁watano ?” ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kedika , ▁“ Siza di nanga ▁bule ▁bululu ▁one ▁na ha wafika ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano .”
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁yonda wa mweleke ▁keza petigwa ▁kuwa ▁wa ▁mwenekwaga , ▁muladi ▁zina ▁jake ▁seke ja ge ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wakala ▁ 3 6 ,000 , ▁mwa ▁ iwawo , ▁ng ' ombe ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁waidi ▁wa lavigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Esau ▁viya wile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁kasola ▁wanaake ▁waidi ▁Wahiti , ▁Y u di si ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Be eli ▁na ▁ B a se ma ti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ E lo ni .
▁Yohana ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁chi muwona ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ko lava ▁chinyamkela ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jako . ▁Ch eye ▁ching ' o ma ▁kwaviya ▁siyo ▁miyetu ▁vichili .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya muhuwile , ▁heza gumigw a ▁chinyala ▁bule .”
▁Mu hulika ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kweli , ▁i wo ▁ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yoi wagalile ni ▁ukombola , ▁na ▁mu muhuwila ▁Chilisito . ▁Ivo ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwika ni ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁vino ▁kwa ▁kumwing ' hani ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ija ▁iya mu laganile ni .
▁Haluni ▁keza vika ▁vitasa ▁ivo ▁hana ▁i chinala ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁inogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁viza gendelela ▁kwa ka ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Wa soligwa ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁u sigala ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁da ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Vi ta sa ▁vingi ▁vi kala ▁vo kwaka ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁cha ▁uchanyha ▁kochi kalile ▁chi iting ' hana .
▁Mulungu ▁kai temela ▁mate ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁na ▁ka itenda ▁iwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake , ▁kwaviya ▁siku ▁iyo ▁Mulungu ▁ka komeleza ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁yose ▁ya ▁u lumba ji ▁na ▁ka humula .
▁M weye ▁iviya , ▁sambi ▁muna ▁usungu , ▁ mbali ▁niza muwona ni ▁kaidi ▁na ▁mwiza denelela , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kuwa segeze la ▁ nde ne le lo ▁yenu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya ku tende ▁uwe ▁ duwilo ▁chilaho ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wako , ▁sekeu lele ▁na ▁mu nda ▁wako ▁u me me .
▁Mu lu ma ke ▁kodaha ▁kutogola ▁hebu ▁ku segeza ▁chila ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁chilagano ▁chochi mfunga ▁muke ▁iyo .
▁Chila ▁siku ▁nikala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwi ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁hamu ni gwilile ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁ino ▁iyo ▁saa ▁yenu , ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ziza ▁lo tawala .”
▁Ivo ▁no kimbila ▁niha ilungila ▁ku huma , ▁ivo ▁vichi i gomba ▁na ni ye ▁fana ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kuitowa ▁voyo kwa sa ▁ng ' ho nde ▁kuchanyha .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa tendile ▁ivo ▁wakala ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁m alongo ▁mane .
▁Mbali ▁migunda ▁yose ▁ya ▁kudimila ▁Walawi ▁ili ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yawo , ▁sekei chuuzigwe , ▁kwaviya ▁uwo ▁ni ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁ni mulongela ▁Yoshua , ▁‘ W eye ▁kuwona ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yako ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ziya watendele ▁wafalume ▁wano ▁waidi , ▁Sihoni ▁na ▁Ogu . ▁Y eye ▁keza watendela ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁zondamu fose le .
▁Ni ya wona ▁yehile ▁yowa t e ndi ligwa ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁kuja ▁Misili . ▁Ni hulika ▁chili lo ▁chawo , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza ▁kuwatenda ▁wa ilegehe . ▁Ivo ▁izo ▁sambi , ▁nizaku tuma ▁Misili .’
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁kolonga ▁nawo ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi .
▁I ja ▁ ihandigwe ▁muna ▁u dongo ▁unogile , ▁simwe ▁jake ▁ni i ja ▁munhu ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁na ▁kuvimanya , ▁iyo ▁ko lela ▁matunda , ▁imwe ▁gana ▁na ▁imwenga ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁imwenga ▁m alongo ▁matatu .”
▁To seni ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁lose .

▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yaha komeleza ▁kuwa nanga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo , ▁sekemu ingi ze ▁muna ▁ulo da ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁milungu ▁yawo . ▁Sekemu geze ▁kuvimanya ▁viya ▁viwo tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kui tambikila ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Ni hulika ▁ peta ▁ya ▁wakalizi ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁i kala ▁m ili yo ni ▁magan a ▁maidi .
▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁ni ▁simwe ▁da ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁sambi . ▁Ma la vi lo ▁na ▁nhosa ▁vo lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ mbali ▁havi daha ▁kutenda ▁yoyo tambika ▁kuwa ▁na ▁moyo ▁u faya ,

▁Viya kalile ▁kowa temela ▁mate , ▁kawaleka ▁na ▁ka soligwa ▁kuhita ▁kuchanyha ▁kuulanga .
▁“ One ▁ng ' ombe ▁yaham kenha ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁na ▁kumkoma , ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁kezakomigwa ▁kwa ▁ku towigwa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁na ▁nyama ▁yake ▁haiza digwa . ▁Mwene ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁ka bule ▁mbuli .
▁“ Chi mulongelani ▁sekemu fundize ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁munhu ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁loleni ▁chiya ▁chi mtendile ! ▁Mu pwililisa ▁mafundizo ▁yenu ▁Yelusalemu ▁yose ▁na ▁mo londa ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁chi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yadanganike !”
▁Y eye ▁keza lema ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chiya ▁wanhu ▁cho wo chi tanga ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁m ulungu ▁hebu ▁cho wo chi tambikila ▁na ▁kuchi ka ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vose . ▁Y eye ▁keza hita ▁m baka ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo ▁na ▁ku itanga ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁wanangu ▁sekemu togole ▁ kwe hu ligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁iviya ▁ko no gi ligwa ▁na ye ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Na yo ▁kenuka , ▁ka papa ▁ lili ▁jake ▁na ▁kulawa ▁kunze ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo mulola . ▁Wo se ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu , ▁walonga , ▁“ Hachi na ▁chi wona ▁chinhu ▁chino !”
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁ka msung ' ha ▁kwa ▁kum si nhu sa ▁ bila ▁ku mwihila ▁hebu ▁ka mwa sila ▁chinhu ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ,

▁Yosefu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Di no ▁ni i jo ▁fambulo ▁jake , ▁matambi ▁matatu ▁ni ▁siku ▁nhatu .

▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo , ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ko wahonya ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wowa kalile ▁watamu ▁na ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁magayo ▁na ▁ka lava ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁vipofu ▁wengi ▁kawa da hiza ▁kuwona .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keka ▁lusita ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Igolo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezatenda ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁muna ▁iisi .”
▁no kwandikila ▁weye ▁Timoseyo ▁mwanangu ▁mulondwa . ▁No ku londe la ▁unovu ▁na ▁ubazi ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁Mndewa ▁wetu .
▁Na yo ▁ka ibasula ▁mwanage ▁chaudele , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁ka mu yawaza ▁vi b we nde . ▁Maabaho ▁kam ta mbali sa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudi la ▁ng ' ombe ▁muna ▁dizi zi ▁da ▁ng ' ombe , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa patile ▁bule ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁wageni .
▁Ya ng ' hali ▁hana komeleza ▁kulonga , ▁Lebeka ▁kafika ▁na ▁kuno ▁ka itwik a ▁nongo ▁ya ▁mazi ▁muna ▁di ye ga ▁jake . ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁Besueli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Milika , ▁muke ▁wa ▁Naholi , ▁Naholi ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Hamwande ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Abeli . ▁Abeli ▁kakala ▁m dimi ▁wa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁Kaini ▁kakala ▁muli mi ▁wa ▁isi .
▁Lola ▁kokwiza ▁muna ▁yamawingu , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁keza muwona ▁na ▁m baka ▁waja ▁wa mu ho mile ▁na ▁m go ha . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yose ▁muna ▁isi ▁weza mulilila . ▁Ni ivo ▁vondaiwe . ▁Ivo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁utamu ▁uwo ▁uhenela ▁muna ▁imbende , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko , ▁iyo ▁kana ▁utamu .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mo wafundiza ▁wanhu ▁ha mbwe ▁munhu ▁yahawa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cho yolonda ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake , ▁m aabaho ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Chi nhu ▁chino ▁ni mulavila ▁Mulungu ’ ,

▁Iviya ▁Yosefu ▁kai sondelela ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Yakobo . ▁Muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Gosheni ▁wa sigala ▁wana ▁wawo ▁muhala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wawo .
▁Lelo ▁mu ilumba ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁muna ▁kuiyoha . ▁Ku iyoha ▁kuno ▁ni ▁sawa ▁na ▁ku niwona ▁niye ▁m baka ▁diyelo ▁mo hulika ▁vini iyoha .

▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa wonela ▁ludoko ▁Waisilaili , ▁kawa tenda ▁wawe gele ▁m chuwala ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁m baka ▁nyele si ▁zose ▁zozi tendile ▁wihi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wadanganika .
▁Salayi ▁muke ▁wake ▁Abulamu ▁kakala ▁hana kweleka ▁mwana . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chike ▁Mmisili ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Hajili .
▁Wa pata ▁wimo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁ mango ▁izo , ▁ weleka ▁wanyama ▁weli ▁na ▁m indi li zi ▁hebu ▁uzolizoli ▁hebu ▁uzegenha .
▁He we la ▁Mulungu , ▁yoyo tenda ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁Ivo ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁muna ▁zi n zewe le ▁zangu ▁na ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁niye ▁na ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mbali ▁ mwika goya ▁ving ' waji , ▁ham kumbuke ▁bule ▁Yosefu ▁kam zimiza .
▁Ivo ▁cheye ▁cholonga ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁Chilisito , ▁hata ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁kufose la ▁cheye . ▁Cho mulamba ni ▁mweye ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁mu lumbiliz igwe ▁kaidi ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka hita ▁ku petigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mhambe ▁wake ▁Maliya , ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁wimo .
▁M baka ▁ni weke ▁wehi ▁wako ▁hasi ▁ya ▁magulu ▁yako .’
▁U hazi ▁wa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁wiza go ligwa ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya . ▁Chila ▁kabila ▁diza pata ▁kwa ▁viili ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁hebu ▁u dodo ▁wake .”
▁Nzi ge ▁wawo ▁wene la ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁na ▁wakala ▁ bumbila ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani ▁hawana lawilila ▁nzige ▁fana ▁wawo ▁hebu ▁haweza lawilila ▁kaidi .
▁Sekemu vwizi ligwe . ▁“ U mbwiya ▁wihile ▁wo bananga ▁lu zo we ▁lu nogile .”
▁M olondeka ▁m uza ndike ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁muna ▁im ibiki ▁ya mhilile ▁zi nyivi ▁za ▁kaye ▁zenu ▁na ▁ nyivi ▁za ▁mabululu ▁yenu .
▁M weye ▁m we la ▁mu mala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁ini mulongeleni .

▁Keza mgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁dili ▁na ▁ gala ma ▁inogile ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁uyatendile ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁Wa g elishoni ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Sala ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁kamwelek ela ▁Bulahimu ▁mwana ▁viyakalile ▁mulala . ▁I mwa na ▁kelek igwa ▁lusita ▁luja ▁Mulungu ▁lo yalongile ▁kezakwelek igwa .
▁M ulume ▁iyo ▁ka mgwila ▁mhambe ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁kuna ▁ichuwala , ▁inga wa ▁ka guta ▁ng ' hondo ▁ku pula ▁ya ta zigwe , ▁ mbali ▁ha patile ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ku mtaza .
▁Yeli ▁ku chisuwili ▁sekeya hulumuke ▁hasi , ▁hebu ▁kwingila ▁mnyumba ▁kusola ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁m baka ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁Yohana ▁wa lotela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mndewa .

▁ Siku ▁ye ta no ▁Shel u mi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S uli s ha da i , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa kugalile ▁mavuta ▁yanogile ▁ya ▁mzaituni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chitasa , ▁muladi ▁chitasa ▁chi dahe ▁kwa ka ▁lusita ▁lose .
▁Kulaw a ▁muna ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁Mulungu ▁ka wagalila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁Mulopozi ▁Yesu , ▁fana ▁viyalongile .
▁Mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwanangu ▁hai ta ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁bule , ▁se kulu ▁wake ▁kadanganika , ▁na ▁ka sigala ▁yaidumwe ▁muhala . ▁One ▁jojose ▁da ha mulawilila ▁mwiinzila , ▁niye ▁na mu la la ▁ni li ▁na ▁u he nga , ▁ivo ▁mwiza ni koma ▁kwa ▁lugano ▁do nda ni pate .”
▁ Kuson hela ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo , ▁chila ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁longo ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁yake ▁kela ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁No ba ▁kai sola ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ke na si ▁na ▁vi bulul u ▁vake , ▁ka itanga ▁No ba ▁dili ▁zina ▁jake ▁mwenyewo .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁yahawa ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁ku chuuza ▁isi ▁yake , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wa ▁habehi ▁keza i kombola .
▁No muwona , ▁ mbali ▁siyo ▁sambi , ▁No muwona , ▁ mbali ▁heli ▁habehi . ▁N hondo ▁iza lawilila ▁kwa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁keza lawilila ▁mfalume ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili . ▁Keza wa towa ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wamoabu ▁kwa ▁fimbo ▁yake , ▁keza wadanganiza ▁welesi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Seti .
▁Musa ▁vi yengile ▁muna ▁dihema , ▁wingu ▁dili ngile ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁di humuluka ▁hasi ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha kwing ili a ▁hana ▁dihema , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁diwingu .
▁“ ▁‘ M ulume ▁yaha mbandama ▁mwanamke ▁yeli ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chike ▁yoya u zigwe ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga , ▁ mbali ▁yang ' hali ▁hana komboligwa ▁hebu ▁hana tendigw a ▁yailegehe , ▁ wolondeka ▁wa tagusigwe , ▁ mbali ▁sekewa komigwe ▁kwaviya ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁yang ' hali ▁hana ilegeha .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁mnyama ▁yoyose ▁yo faya ▁ku digwa ▁yaha fa , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁mtufi ▁uwo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Chila ▁juma p ili , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁kolondeka ▁ya bagule ▁hela ▁zimwenga ▁kadi li ▁viyo pata , ▁muladi ▁seke ha we ▁na ▁sang izo ▁vondanize .
