▁Kamulongela , ▁“ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wa itogolela ▁wa ku pule ▁igolo ▁u ngale ▁Paulo ▁kuna ▁ichitala , ▁wo tenda ▁fana ▁wo londa ▁wa manye ▁vinogile ▁mbuli ▁zake .
▁Sekemu mba manye ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁ku mba wila . ▁Y ombe ▁da ▁munhu ▁ye kigwe ▁kusang ' hana ▁kwa ▁ku lihigwa , ▁seke di kale ▁kumwenu ▁m isi ▁na ▁chilo .
▁Chila ▁mwaka ▁mutende ▁dugila ▁dino ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁N dagilizi ▁ino ▁mui zi ndi le ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu . ▁Mwiza di tenda ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁saba .
▁ mbali ▁chochi londeka ▁ni ▁chimwe ▁muhala . ▁Maliya ▁ka sagula ▁chinhu ▁chinogile , ▁na ▁hachiza segezigwa ▁kumwake .”
▁Hamwande ▁mfundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁keza ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁yam geze , ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁vino ▁nitende ▁choni ▁ni u pate ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ?”
▁Mbali ▁isi ▁iza go ligwa ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya . ▁Chila ▁kabila ▁diza kwing ' higwa ▁isi ▁kwa ▁viili ▁mazina ▁ya ▁lukolo ▁lwa wo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁wowa hitile ▁nayo ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ bila ▁kuwa peta ▁wake ▁wa ▁wanage , ▁wakala ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Ivo ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho huwila ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁si ▁chiya ▁chi yolonda ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁chi yo sang ' hana , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muhala .
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Niye ▁mfalume , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁yonda ye n ule ▁mkono ▁hebu ▁mgulu ▁ bila ▁ya ▁ku longiligwa ▁na ▁weye .”
▁Haluni ▁viya komeleze ▁kulava ▁nhambiko ▁zose , ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo , ▁ka wenu lila ▁wanhu ▁makono ▁yake ▁na ▁kuwa temela ▁mate , ▁m aabaho ▁kahumuluka .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kehilwa ▁na ▁ka gomba ▁na ▁Labani , ▁kalonga ▁“ Ni hasanya ▁choni ▁m baka ▁uni sondelele ▁vino ?
▁I mitondo ▁mwiza wona ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁kahulika ▁kulongelela ▁kwenu ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Vino ▁cheye ▁china ▁na ni ▁m baka ▁mu dahe ▁kulongelela ▁kumwetu ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁iwa danganike ▁vondawa zilibuke , ▁haweza sola ▁wala ▁kusoligwa , ▁weza kuwa ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁I ng ' hali ▁hai na kwandusa ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ya ▁nzala , ▁Yosefu ▁kawa ▁ka pata ▁wana ▁waidi ▁kwa ▁imuke ▁Asen a ti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P o ti fe la ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁ O ni .
▁Wakala ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana vimanya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyalongile ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kolondeka ▁ya zilibuke .
▁Vi chifikile ▁bululu ▁da ▁Sila ku sa ▁chi kala ▁haja ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani ▁kakala ▁ B u ki ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yo gi li .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁saa ▁kenda ▁imisi , ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wakala ▁wohita ▁kuna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kutambika .
▁Wa nhu ▁viwa somile ▁usenga ▁uwo , ▁wa de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁usenga ▁uja ▁uwa guma ▁moyo .
▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁wana , ▁kwaviya ▁mu mmanya ▁Tata . ▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁china ▁tata , ▁kwaviya ▁mu mmanya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yeli ▁baha ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁zisi ▁zose . ▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁wabwanga , ▁kwaviya ▁muna ▁ludabwa , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁na ▁mumuhum a ▁mwihi ▁ija .
▁Wayahudi ▁wa mtanga ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁chipofu , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ W ila he ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁one ▁kwo longa ▁ukweli . ▁Ch eye ▁cho vimanya ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yoya ku ho nyi le ▁kana ▁uhasanyi .”
▁Maabaho , ▁nihulika ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wowa si ngigwe ▁mu huli ▁muna ▁chila ▁kabila ▁da ▁Waisilaeli , ▁wanhu ▁ la ki ▁imwe ▁na ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁nne ▁alufu .
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Gamali eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P e da s uli .
▁Ivo ▁kumbukeni ▁kuwa ▁umwaka ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kwa ▁kwelekigwa ▁womu tangigwa ▁“ Ha wa na gumigw a ▁ulungwana ” ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wowo itanga ▁“ W o gumigw e ▁ulungwana .” ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wakala ▁wa gum i g igwe ▁ulungwana ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁wa ▁chiunhu ▁kwa ▁makono ▁fana ▁chilaguso .
▁Hata ▁nyele ▁za ▁m matwi ▁yenu ▁zi petigwa ▁zose . ▁Ivo ▁seke mdumbe ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁munoga ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁ s ho le ▁wengi !
▁M weye ▁molonga ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mwene mba go , ▁wanenu ▁no wa lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Mu vimanye ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wawo ▁wondawa wataguse ▁mweye .
▁“ M tange ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁u sole ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ku haka ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁maidi ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁chi se ge ▁cha ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kasola ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ku haka ▁na ▁damu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ulupango , ▁kam mizil a ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yawo . ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁ka weka ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yawo .
▁Isi ▁ izakwima ▁mi wa ▁na ▁ mbi gi li , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza kuja ▁mimeya ▁ya ▁isi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya mtumile ni ▁kulawa ▁Kadeshi ▁Balinea ▁kalagiliza ▁muhite ▁muka i sole ▁isi ▁iya mwing ' hileni , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁ mulema , ▁hamu muhuwile ▁hebu ▁hamu mtegeleze .
▁Chi mulole ▁Yesu , ▁mwene ▁kwa ndusa ▁na ▁ku komeleza ▁uhuwilo ▁wetu . ▁Kwa viya ▁kavimanya ▁de ng ' ho ▁do nda ya pate ▁hamwande , ▁ka funyila ▁umoyo ▁kudanganika ▁mumsalaba ▁na ▁ha lo lile ▁chinyala ▁chake . ▁Lelo ▁kakala ▁na ▁udahi ▁kuna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁Mulungu .
▁Mana ▁wa i gubika ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁m baka ▁isi ▁iwa ▁na ▁ziza . ▁Wa ja ▁mimeya ▁yose ▁na ▁matunda ▁yose ▁ya sigale ▁chip indi ▁chiya ▁cha ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe . ▁Muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁ habule ▁hata ▁ya ni ▁dimwe ▁di sigale ▁hebu ▁mbiki ▁hebu ▁m me ya ▁kuna ▁imigunda .
▁Yesu ▁ka lola ▁ko se , ▁kawa wona ▁matajili ▁wo guma ▁sadaka ▁zawo ▁muna ▁ichi tanda ▁cha ▁nhosa .
▁“ L usita ▁luja ▁ni weng ' ha ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁kabila ▁da ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁da ▁Manase ▁na ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kamwing ' hani ▁isi ▁iyo ▁yose ▁iwe ▁yenu . ▁M weye ▁womu daha ▁kuitowa ▁ng ' hondo ▁muwa longole le ▁na ▁silaha ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁Waisilaili ▁ku loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .
▁Wa linga ▁fana ▁wana ▁wa kalile ▁kudi g uli lo . ▁ B umbila ▁dimwe ▁dodi gutil a ▁ bumbila ▁dimwenga , ▁‘ Chi wa towe leni ▁chilonge - longe , ▁ mbali ▁hamu vi ni le , ▁chi mba ▁wila ▁wa ▁ndilo , ▁ mbali ▁hamu li lile !’
▁Yesu ▁viya onile ▁kamwidika ▁kwa ▁ubala , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ H uli ▁kutali ▁na ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .” ▁Kulaw a ▁baho , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya mu u zile ▁Yesu ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁kaidi .
▁No mulavila ▁ukalangama ▁kuwa ▁ko sang ' hana ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mweye ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wawo ▁weli ▁Laodikiya ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wawo ▁weli ▁ H i ye la p o li .
▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kwingila ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁na ▁kusola ▁vinhu ▁vake , ▁m baka ▁ya nduse ▁ku mfunga ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya li ▁na ▁nguvu . ▁Maabaho ▁keza daha ▁kusola ▁vinhu ▁vake .
▁Mbali ▁wam se ka , ▁ivo ▁Yesu ▁kawa segeza ▁wose ▁kunze , ▁kamsola ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ija ▁imwana ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁watatu , ▁wengi la ▁mu m sa na ▁mu ya ta mbali sigwe ▁imndele .
▁Uko ▁mwiza sang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁na ▁mabwe ▁yoi songoligwe ▁kwa ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁nayo ▁hai daha ▁kuwona ▁hebu ▁hai hulika ▁hebu ▁hai ja ▁hebu ▁hai n u sa .
▁Leka mana ▁cheye ▁chi gumigw a ▁moyo ▁ng ' hani . ▁Mbali ▁Tito ▁kachi de ng ' hele za ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁de ng ' ho ▁diya kalile ▁najo ▁kwaviya ▁vimu m sangalaz e ▁umoyo .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁niye ▁na ta ya li ▁kugenda ▁na ▁weye ▁mwiichifungo , ▁na ▁hata ▁kudanganika ▁na ▁weye !”
▁Mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁Lebeka ▁mami ▁yake , ▁“ Ku vimanya ▁kuwa ▁se kulu ▁wangu ▁Esau ▁ni ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁upipi , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁na bule .
▁Na yo ▁kawauza ▁lusita ▁lu ya ho ni le ▁mwanage , ▁watumigwa ▁wamwidika , ▁“ U tamu ▁u mulawa ▁igolo ▁i fosile ▁saa ▁saba ▁imisi .”
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁madugila ▁yayo ▁ya pangigwe ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawa hindukila ▁kawa bwakila . ▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Ha mu vimanyile ▁bule ▁muhe ▁wa ki ▁u muli nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ he zile ▁bule ▁kuu bananga ▁ugima ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁kuwa lopola .”
▁Keza wawinga ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁ viyamulaganileni .
▁Ya yo ▁ni ▁kweli ! ▁Ya benigw a ▁kwaviya ▁haya huwile ▁bule , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwima ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wako . ▁Seke wi igode ▁ mbali ▁u d umbe .
▁Wayahudi ▁wa dondola ▁mabwe ▁kaidi ▁muladi ▁wam towe ▁Yesu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁mwa ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zi tibusa , ▁kolondeka ▁ya ba guligwe ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁M weye ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wahuwila , ▁sekemu vwizi ligwe .
▁Keza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁nhambiko ▁yoilavigw e ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Keza gala ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chi dali , ▁nawo ▁weza vi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko .
▁Mu kala ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁ng ' hani ! ▁Ku lawilila ▁choni ? ▁No lava ▁ukalangama ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁ziya ▁muha dahile ▁hata ▁kuya ng ' o la ▁meso ▁yenu ▁na ▁ku ning ' ha ▁niye .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Ha mu di manyile ▁simwe ▁dino ? ▁Lelo ▁m uza manya ze ▁simwe ▁dimwenga ▁jojose ?
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mfundiza ! ▁Niza mha ▁ndagilizi ▁zose ▁kwandusi la ▁u dodo ▁wangu .”
▁Musa ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁uchanyha ▁muibahali , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kai bweleza ▁bahali ▁kuchisogo ▁kwa ▁beho ▁kulu ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁beho ▁ijo ▁dibu ma ▁ichilo ▁chose , ▁di igola ▁bahali ▁ banzi ▁mbili , ▁hagati ▁ha lawilila ▁isi ▁inyalile . ▁Mazi ▁ya igola ,
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁wanhu ▁weza zahila ▁ifa , ▁ mbali ▁haweza i pata . ▁Weza londa ▁kudanganika , ▁ mbali ▁ifa ▁iza wa kimbila .
▁“ U banzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lago ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁mabumbila ▁yawo . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wawo ▁kakala ▁Eli s uli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S he du eli .
▁N usu ▁yo weng ' higwe ▁Waisilaili ▁ija ▁yoya i bagule ▁Musa ▁na ▁nusu ▁ija ▁yo weng ' higwe ▁wakalizi ▁wowa hitile ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ,
▁L usita ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁viya bandul e ▁uhul a ▁wekane , ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁chi umbe ▁yeli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wekane ▁dolonga , ▁“ Izo !”
▁Ni nawo ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuku lumiza , ▁ mbali ▁chilo ▁chi fosile ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁kani zuma ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Seke ▁u mtemele ▁mate ▁Yakobo ▁hebu ▁sekeu m duwile .’
▁“ Zindilil eni ▁malagilizo ▁yose ▁yoni mwing ' hileni ▁diyelo , ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁wagima ▁na ▁kongezeka , ▁mwiza kwingila ▁na ▁kuisola ▁isi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ iyawalaganile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁F u nhu fu nhu ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁haya daha ▁kumtenda ▁munhu ▁ya woneke ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁keza kala ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo .”
▁Wa pulile ni ▁u temela ▁mate ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁waja ▁wose ▁wo mba manya ni ▁mweye , ▁muwa lo ndele ▁u temela ▁mate ▁na ▁sekemuwa duwile .
▁Maabaho ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁makabila , ▁wowa wemiliz e ▁wanhu ▁wapetigwe ,
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁m koi ▁wake ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chiya mtendele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁ndala ▁zose ▁zi wa patile ▁m nzila ▁na ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya wakombole .
▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba , ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Wa gela si , ▁kawa ting ' hana ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁weli ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁wolawa ▁kuna ▁yama leme . ▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁wowa dumba ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁kufosa ▁nzila ▁iyo .
▁N ya ng i ▁ z ongeze ka ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁cha ▁Mafalisayo ▁wema ▁na ▁kulava ▁mifu ndo ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁ludabwa , ▁“ Hachi wona ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chihile ▁mwa ▁munhu ▁ino ! ▁ Yodahika ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁hebu ▁chi umbe ▁cha ▁kuulanga ▁chi longa ▁nayo .”
▁M beyu ▁iyo ▁ndodo ▁kufosa ▁mbeyu ▁zimwenga ▁zose ▁zili ▁umo ▁mumgunda , ▁ mbali ▁iha kula ▁yo kuwa ▁mbiki ▁mkulu , ▁na ▁ndege ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wokwiza ▁ku zenga ▁m vu lu ▁zawo ▁muna ▁yam atambi ▁yake .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Abida ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ G i di oni .
▁Hamwande ▁chidogo ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁kamuwona ▁Petili ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁imwe ▁wawo !” ▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁kedika , ▁“ A weye , ▁siyo ▁niye ▁bule !”
▁“ Wa nhu ▁viwahulike ▁mi bumo ▁na ▁dizi ▁da ▁mhalati ▁na ▁kuwona ▁ng ' huwa ▁na ▁yosi ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁wa gudemeka ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁na ▁wema ▁kutali .”
▁Weza de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁hata ▁fana ▁ye heza ▁ichilo ▁chikulu ▁hebu ▁imitootondo ▁keza wafika ▁wa isasala .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁panzia ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁mhanda ▁tano ▁za ▁mkenge ▁na ▁kuzi haka ▁zahabu . ▁M handa ▁izo ▁zizakuwa ▁na ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁zahabu , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁da ▁shaba .”
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mwo tenda ▁vinhu ▁ivi tendigwe ▁na ▁ tati ▁yenu .” ▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁chili nayo . ▁Ch eye ▁cha ▁wanage ▁kweli .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niza muwonela ▁ubazi ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoni mulonda ▁ku muwonela ▁ubazi , ▁niza mtendela ▁yanogile ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoni mulonda ▁kumtendela ▁yanogile .”
▁Kwa ▁mazao ▁yanogile ▁ya ▁milima ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁na ▁mazao ▁mengi ▁ya ▁milima ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose .
▁ Diyelo ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza mulongolelani ▁fana ▁moto ▁wo udanganiza . ▁Keza wadanganiza ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁kunze , ▁keza wananga ▁hima ▁hima ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni .
▁Wa naake ▁waja ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku idulika ▁hasi , ▁ mbali ▁iwanhu ▁waja ▁wawalongela , ▁“ Habali ▁mwo nzahila ▁munhu ▁ngima ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wadanganike ?
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lava ▁ huwa ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁nziwa ▁waidi ▁fana ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁vi yodaha ▁ku gala ,
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kolonga ▁ku mson hela ▁Yuda , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Saimoni ▁Isikaliyoti , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi . ▁Hamwande ▁Yuda ▁iyo ▁yo yambiduke ▁Yesu .
▁Wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wachi ke ▁wa mwizila ▁wa dahe ▁ku muli za , ▁ mbali ▁Yakobo ▁ka lema ▁ku li z wa ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ni lekeni ▁niza gendelela ▁kulila ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁mwanangu , ▁m baka ▁vondani hite ▁kuzimu ▁ku yeli .” ▁Ni ivo ▁ tati ▁yake ▁viya gendelele ▁ku mulilila ▁Yosefu .
▁“ ▁‘ Wa ng ' onyo ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁mabawa ▁na ▁wo genda ▁kwa ▁magulu ▁mane , ▁wawo ▁kumwenu ▁wo tibusa .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁kulawilila ▁ndwagi ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wa dima ji ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁wa dima ji ▁wa ▁Lutu . ▁Chi p indi ▁icho ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁wakala ▁wokala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁“ H e bu ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha kulongela , ▁‘ Lola , ▁ka ▁kuna ▁dibwilingu !’ ▁Sekemu hite , ▁hebu ▁‘ Ko ifisa ▁hano ,’ ▁sekemu togole .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁iyo mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yo lawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jake ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti , ▁basi ▁di saguligwe ▁lume ▁hebu ▁zi ke ▁dili bule ▁chilema .
▁Maabaho ▁kasola ▁gate , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁kadi mo gola ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ L u no ▁ulo ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁wou lavigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Tend eni ▁vino ▁kwa ▁kuni kumbuka ▁niye .”
▁Shemu ▁viya mweleke ▁Alifakisadi ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁matano , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Sekemu wa d umbe , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza itowa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .’
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁nhosa ▁ija ▁ya ▁usage ▁ya ▁migongo ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁na ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kui gala ▁hana ▁ulupango .
▁Maabaho ▁kasegela ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁na ▁ka himba ▁ chisima ▁chimwenga . ▁Baho ▁ha ha kalile ▁na ▁ndwagi , ▁ivo ▁kachi tanga ▁zina ▁“ L e ho b o si ” . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ulegeho ▁wa ▁kukala ▁muna ▁isi , ▁na ▁chiza kala ▁hano ▁na ▁kongezeka .”
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo , ▁kukala ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁wahuwila . ▁Wa huwila ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi . ▁Petili ▁kema ▁hagati ▁yawo , ▁kalonga ,
▁“ Sekemu mba manye ▁msang ' hani ▁yeli ▁ngayengaye , ▁yawe ▁mkaya ▁mi ye n u ▁Muisilaili ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu .
▁Ka bila ▁da ▁Isakali ▁weza kwika ▁lago ▁habehi ▁na ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁mulangulizi ▁wawo ▁kakala ▁Na sa na eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S u a li .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁vinhu ▁vovi lavigwe ▁kuwa ▁mchan go ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Ivo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁na msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya hu ng uze ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁ ulotezi ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino , ▁Mulungu ▁keza muhoka ▁ fungu ▁jake ▁da ▁matunda ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁uja ▁wa ▁ugima ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hake ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁viya ▁vovi longigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino .
▁Zi no ▁izo ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Efulaimu , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 3 2 ,500. ▁Zi no ▁ni ▁nyele si ▁za ▁Yosefu ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁ka londa ▁ku mkombola ▁Paulo , ▁kawa lemesa ▁sekewa tende ▁fana ▁viwa ilungile , ▁kawalagiliza ▁waja ▁wa dahile ▁ko gele la ▁wa zum he ▁mwanduso ▁mwiibahali , ▁wa fike ▁isi ▁inyalile ,
▁Wa senga ▁wose ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wema ▁kuchi zunguluka ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁walala ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁waja ▁wane , ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁wa mtambikila ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa mulilila ▁Musa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁ya walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁“ Mu wona ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁kuwa ▁nilonga ▁na ▁mweye ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Mbali ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁za ndikigwa ▁muladi ▁mu togole ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ku muhuwila ▁muwe ▁na ▁ugima ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Lelo ▁ka leni ▁hano ▁ichilo ▁chino ▁fana ▁viwatendile ▁wayenu , ▁muladi ▁ni vimanye ▁chonda ya nilongele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kaidi .”
▁Yesu ▁kahulika ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya mu ho nyi le ▁ka wing igwa ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Ku tosela . ▁Ivo ▁viyamuwonile ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ko muhuwila ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ?”
▁one ▁mwaha lema ▁ku zindilila ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁na ▁ku ye hila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁na ▁kulema ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁yose , ▁ mbali ▁mo di bena ▁lagano ▁jangu ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Igolo ▁wii da we ▁ng ' hani ▁uhite ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁lusita ▁viyo hita ▁ku ulwanda ▁na ▁u mulongele ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga , ▁‘ U wa leke ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite ▁wa ka ni tose le .’
▁Chi longa ▁hano ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁wose ▁niye ▁na ▁mweye ▁chi i gele ▁moyo ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wangu ▁na ▁niye ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu .
▁Laheli ▁viya mwe leka ▁Yosefu , ▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela ▁Labani , ▁“ U ni leke ▁ni bwele ▁ukaye ▁yangu .
▁“ Tend a ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuilumba , ▁utali ▁wake ▁wizakuwa ▁sent imita ▁gana ▁na ▁longo ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Ichil o ▁chiya ▁im kalizi ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁kawasola ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila ▁na ▁kawa sunh a ▁vi londa ▁vawo , ▁na ▁bahobaho ▁yeye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁yake ▁wabatizigwa .
▁Baho ▁mwanduso ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁ving ' hali ▁havi na lu mbigwa ▁kukala ▁na ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwe ▁Mbuli . ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁sekeu i banange ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ndiya . ▁Kwa viya ▁ndiya ▁zose ▁zo faya , ▁ mbali ▁hai faya ▁bule ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁yoi mtende za ▁munhu ▁ya gwe ▁muna ▁uhasanyi .
▁Ha yeli ▁kuulanga ▁m baka ▁mu longe , ▁‘ Yeli hi ▁yondaya kwele ▁m baka ▁kuulanga ▁ya chi galile ▁muladi ▁chi yahulike ▁na ▁kuya zindilila ?’
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Sala ▁kamuwona ▁Ishumaili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁yo yelekigwe ▁na ▁Hajili ▁Mmisili , ▁ko se ka .
▁Cho huwila ▁na ▁cho vimanya ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Yelile ▁u lawile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Y eye ▁kowa safya ▁wanhu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi , ▁na ▁waja ▁wowo safyigwa ▁nayo ▁wose ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁Tata ▁imwe . ▁Ni ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁Yesu ▁ha wona ▁chinyala ▁kuwa tanga ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatum a ▁wanhu ▁wa ka wa tange ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁kawalongela . ▁“ M wa nza ▁uno ▁ni tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanoga , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁chi bananga .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁mo tenda ▁chinhu ▁chochi leme zigwe ▁kutend igwa ▁mu isiku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ?”
▁ Nolonda ▁ni mwi ke ▁hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁vino ▁vini li ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kuni taza ▁hanhu ▁ha ko .
▁“ Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁sidaha ▁bule ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁ila ▁no tagusa ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viya nilongele , ▁ivo ▁nhaguso ▁yangu ▁ni ▁ya ▁haki . ▁Si tenda ▁viya ▁vini londa ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁notenda ▁viya ▁viyolonda ▁ija ▁yoyanhumile .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ,
▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Di ye ni ▁ndiya ▁ino ▁diyelo , ▁kwaviya ▁diyelo ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Diyelo ▁hamwiza fika ▁ndiya ▁yoyose ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago .
▁Maabaho ▁chila ▁munhu ▁keza hulika ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁na ▁keza dumba , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁yondaya geze ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kaidi .
▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁kawaleka ▁watende ▁yehile ▁muna ▁im yoyo ▁yawo ▁na ▁woi tendela ▁vinhu ▁va ▁ku guma ▁chinyala ▁ng ' huli ▁zawo .
▁Vino ▁Bulahimu ▁wa saho ▁yetu ▁ka togoligwa ▁vilihi ▁kuwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ? ▁Ka togoligwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zake , ▁chip indi ▁viya mulavile ▁mwanage ▁Isaka ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁chilingo .
▁Paulo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁no kwima ▁hano ▁hai chi ta la ▁cha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma , ▁no londeka ▁ nilongele zigwe ▁hano . ▁Si tendile ▁bule ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁fana ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁viu yamanya ▁yano ▁vinogile .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Sambi ▁kwa habehi ▁kudanganika , ▁m aabaho ▁wanhu ▁weza ni leka ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁isi ▁iyo ▁ko nda wa hite ▁kukala ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wowo tenda ▁ugoni . ▁Weza ni leka ▁na ▁ku bena ▁lagano ▁do nitendile ▁nawo .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kalonga ‚ ▁“ M weye ▁mwa ▁wa b wa , ▁mana ▁ha mulonda ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ‚ ▁leka mana ▁muni pula ▁ni walekelele ▁muhite ▁na ▁ku mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁yaha ku bananga ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁hebu ▁yaha kwa zima ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁niye ▁niza liha .
▁na ▁ku la nza ▁unovu ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku la nza ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁lusita ▁lu kwiza .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo m peta ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁faida ▁yawo ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁welile , ▁wo gesa ▁kuwa ▁weza ny ongeze la ▁manhesa ▁mengi ▁vini wa ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁Mbali ▁Chilisito ▁mu lo p o zi ▁ka ilava ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁yawe ▁nhosa ▁i faya ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Vino ▁damu ▁yake ▁hai daha ▁ku safya ▁ng ' hani ▁umanyi ▁wetu ▁wa ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁na ▁kuchi lopola ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zetu ▁hazi faya ▁na ▁kuchi tenda ▁chi msang ' hanile ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima ?
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁Wagiliki ▁wengi ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁ wezile ▁Yelusalemu ▁kutosa ▁muna ▁Didugila ▁da ▁Pasaka .
▁“ Mbali ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Heshiboni ▁hachi lekele ▁chi fose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kamtenda ▁yawe ▁m ta tali ▁na ▁mwene ▁moyo ▁mdala , ▁muladi ▁chimu hume ▁na ▁kusola ▁isi ▁yake ▁yochi ihazi ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Keza mulongelani ▁mbuli ▁zo nda zi m kombole ▁yeye ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwako ▁lwose .’
▁M ko no ▁wako ▁wa ▁ukulu me ▁waha kutenda ▁utende ▁uhasanyi , ▁u kanhe ▁na ▁uwa se ▁kutali , ▁kumwako ▁weye ▁vinoga ▁kwa giza ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁chili ▁mu lu ku li ▁lwako , ▁se mbuse ▁lukuli ▁lose , ▁lwa sigwe ▁muna ▁umoto ▁wa ▁jehanamu .
▁Kwiza sekelela ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kude ng ' helela , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza sekelela ▁kwa ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwake .
▁U sa ge ▁u sigale ▁wezakuja ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁ bila ▁ku guma ▁lusu . ▁Weza kuja ▁muna ▁uluwa ▁lwa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁ lagiliza ▁wanyama ▁wako ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁kumgunda ▁vi kigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye . ▁Kwa viya ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁iza m to ny ela ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ▁mnyama ▁yeli ▁kumgunda ▁na ▁mnyama ▁yeli ▁kunze ▁ya ▁kaye , ▁wose ▁wezaku fa .’ ▁”
▁Mulungu ▁kamul a ga ni la ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁yose ▁izakuwa ▁yawo . ▁Weza i hokela ▁isi ▁iyo ▁si ▁kwaviya ▁Bulahimu ▁ka tenda ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ▁kanoga ▁kumwake .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Musa ▁viya wile ▁mkulu , ▁ka lema ▁ku tangigwa ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mndele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .
▁Mbali ▁u yepule ▁na ▁ubishi ▁wa ▁chibozi ▁na ▁ndwagi ▁na ▁si mo ▁za ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁ma wa saho ▁na ▁ku gomba ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa . ▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁za bule ▁u tazi ▁wowose ▁na ▁hazi faya .
▁“ Munhu ▁yahawa dima ▁wanyama ▁wake ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁mizabibu ▁na ▁ku mulekelela ▁mnyama ▁wake ▁ya je ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwenga , ▁keza liha ▁u da nga nyi ▁uwo ▁kwa ▁ndiya ▁inogile ▁ya ▁umgunda ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ▁hebu ▁mgunda ▁wake ▁wa ▁mizabibu .
▁Maabaho ▁kam gidila ▁Haluni ▁mavuta ▁yayo ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁muladi ▁ku mwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza fu wa ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁na ▁ko ga ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁m aabaho ▁kodaha ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dilago ▁ mbali ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁one ▁hamu to goliligw e ▁kwika ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁mwiisi , ▁yelihi ▁yonda ▁yawa togole le ▁kwika ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kweli ?
▁Yakobo ▁viya manyile ▁kuwa ▁uko ▁Misili ▁kuna ▁ndiya , ▁kawalongela ▁wanage , ▁“ Habali ▁mweye ▁mo ilola ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁muhala ?
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kamulongela ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi , ▁“ Wa chi lanha ▁mibalati ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kuchi tagusa , ▁inga wa ▁cheye ▁ni ▁Wa lo ma . ▁Maabaho ▁wachi ka ▁muna ▁ichifungo . ▁Lelo ▁wo londa ▁wachi lave ▁chinyele ▁nyele . ▁ Aka ! ▁Leka ▁weze ▁wachi lave ▁wenyewo .”
▁Ni mulongeleni ▁yang ' hali ▁hayana lawilila , ▁muladi ▁vondaya lawilile ▁ muhuwile .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowo tenda ▁yehile ▁wo di hila ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁na ▁haweza ▁kwiza ▁mudi bu ng ' hulo , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa londa ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zi lagusigwe .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kasola ▁nhungo , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁m aabaho ▁kalonga , ▁“ Soleni ▁mui g ' we ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁viwafikile ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa muwona ▁kadanganika ▁kamala , ▁ivo ▁ha wambe ni le ▁bule ▁magulu ▁yake .
▁Mfalume ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Hita ▁uka mu wa nde ▁ tati ▁yako , ▁fana ▁viu ila gane ▁nayo .”
▁Kwa viya ▁nowalongela ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kawa sang ' hanila ▁Wayahudi , ▁ya pate ▁ku lagusa ▁uwa mi ni fu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁iviya ▁ivi lagano ▁viya ▁va ▁Mulungu ▁viya weng ' hile ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁vi dahe ▁kufika .
▁Musa ▁ka mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni watendele ▁choni ▁wanhu ▁wano ? ▁Ha behi ▁weza ni towa ▁na ▁mabwe .”
▁na ▁wala ▁niye ▁sina i hokela ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu , ▁wala ▁si fundizigw e ▁na ▁munhu . ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo ▁yoya ni gubul ile .
▁“ M weye ▁mo gesa ▁choni ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁Mkombola ? ▁Vino ▁m welekwa ▁wa ▁yelihi ?” ▁Wawo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ M welekwa ▁wa ▁Daudi .”
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni ▁kakala ▁Eli sa fa ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Pa li na ki .
▁na ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo togoligwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yo wakombola .
▁Kwa viya ▁chiya ▁chi woneka ▁ubozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁china ▁ubala ▁kufosa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁chiya ▁chi woneka ▁chi nyonde nyonde ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁chigangamavu ▁kufosa ▁u gangamavu ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁“ N diya ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁isi ▁yako ▁na ▁ndiya ▁inogile ▁kwiza i gala ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako . ▁“ Sekeu m ki mu se ▁m wanaluti ▁muna ▁yama to mbo ▁ya ▁mami ▁yake .”
▁Mulungu ▁ha mwing ' hile ▁Bulahimu ▁hata ▁hanhu ▁hamwe ▁muna ▁isi ▁ino ▁ha we ▁hake , ▁hata ▁ivo ▁kamwing ' ha ▁uha di ▁wa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁iisi ▁ino ▁iwe ▁yake ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁vi kalile ▁siku ▁izo ▁kakala ▁ka bule ▁mwana .
▁“ Tegelezeni ! ▁No mtuma ni ▁mweye ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hagati ▁ya ▁mbwizi . ▁Mu we ▁na ▁ubala ▁fana ▁zoka , ▁na ▁wa ho le ▁fana ▁nziwa .
▁Mwenevale ▁wake ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Vinoga ▁msang ' hani ▁unogile ▁na ▁wa ▁kwaminika ! ▁K waminika ▁kwa ▁ma dodo , ▁niza kwika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mengi . ▁I ngila ▁umo ▁mwa ▁kude ng ' helela ▁mwa ▁mwenevale ▁wako .’
▁na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁ziga ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁jake .
▁“ Maabaho ▁wa sole ▁wanage ▁na ▁u wavaz e ▁ng ' hanzu ,
▁Baho ▁Petili ▁ka ndusa ▁kui duwila ▁na ▁ku ilaha , ▁kalonga , ▁one ▁nolonga ▁uvwizi ▁Mulungu ▁ya ni taguse , ▁“ Si mmanyile ▁bule ▁munhu ▁iyo !” ▁Bahobaho ▁nz ogolo ▁keka .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kakala ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁yo tangigwa ▁Maliya , ▁yoya kalile ▁mu yamagulu ▁ya ▁Mndewa . ▁Na yo ▁kakala ▁ko tegeleza ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁Yesu .
▁Ko londeka ▁ya sole ▁mhambe .
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wahita ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Yudeya , ▁uko ▁kakala ▁nawo ▁na ▁ka batiz a .
▁Isilaili ▁viyakalile ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁mwanage ▁Lubeni ▁kagona ▁na ▁Biliha ▁imwe ▁wa ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa kalile ▁fana ▁wake ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Isilaili ▁na ▁Isilaili ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁izo . ▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁na ▁wana ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi .
▁Baho ▁keza towa ▁mhiya ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁mabwe ▁maidi ▁kwa ▁mabe belu ▁maidi ▁ya ▁luti , ▁dibwe ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁dimwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ A za ze li .
▁Kwa viya ▁ha ili ▁ngama ▁yako ▁baho ▁heli ▁moyo ▁wako .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Sekeu wa gaze ▁Wamoabu , ▁hebu ▁sekeu itowe ▁nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁siza kwing ' ha ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yawo . ▁Mbali ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ali ▁ni weng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Lutu ▁iwe ▁yawo .’ ▁”
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁“ I chigulogulo ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁ya mulavile ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Viwakalile ▁wo hulumuka ▁mu umulima , ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemu mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yomu ya wone ▁m baka ▁niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁vondani zilibuke ▁kulawa ▁kui i fa .”
▁Hata ▁waja ▁wa bananzi ▁wowa kalile ▁wawa mbigwa ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁wam ke we za ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Nafutali ▁fana ▁viya ▁m bu guma ▁ya ▁m ha la , ▁yoyo kweleka ▁wana ▁wanogile .
▁na ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile , ▁isi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ iyawalaganile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zawo .
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kai wonela ▁ludoko ▁isi ▁ino ▁na ▁kai galila ▁ma duwilo ▁yose ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino .
▁Kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁nyondenyonde ▁niwa ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁nyondenyonde ▁fana ▁wawo , ▁muladi ▁niwa pate . ▁Ivo ▁niwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁wawo ▁wa komboligwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila .
▁ Siku ▁yetatu ▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁niye ▁no mdumba ▁Mulungu , ▁ tende ni ▁vino ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kala .
▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁vondani zilibuke , ▁niza walongolela ▁kuhita ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya .”
▁Wa zimiza ▁mhwani ▁ngalawa ▁zawo , ▁wa leka ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁wa muwinza ▁Yesu .
▁S uku ▁da ▁ku tagusigwa ▁isi ▁ino ▁di fika , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁keza hi ndu ligwa .
▁Wa kong ' ha ▁moto ▁hagati ▁ya ▁ luhelengo , ▁wakala ▁hamwe . ▁Na yo ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁nawo .
▁ Vinoga ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ya kale ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyakalile ▁chip indi ▁viya tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁kasola ▁ya sigale ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁hebu ▁hana sola ▁ya sigale ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁imwe ▁na ▁ku mulava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁se lusi ▁imwe ▁ya ▁lita . ▁Maabaho ▁kezavi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Isilaili ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁kudanganika , ▁kamtanga ▁Yosefu ▁mwanage ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Lelo ▁fana ▁weye ▁ko nogelw a ▁na ▁niye , ▁i ka ▁mkono ▁wako ▁hasi ▁ya ▁diwa mbo ▁jangu ▁na ▁uni laganile ▁kuwa ▁kwiza ni tendela ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁na ▁voilondeka , ▁hwiza ni wa nda ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁bule .
▁Na ▁kwiza mgalila ▁ tati ▁yako ▁ya je ▁muladi ▁ya ku temele ▁mate ▁yang ' hali ▁hana danganika .”
▁Kawa languliza ▁waja ▁wanhu ▁wa lawe ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza ▁mengi , ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muna ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Siliya ▁na ▁muna ▁dibwilingu ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁kudibwilingu .
▁Ivo ▁nowalongela ▁ukweli , ▁hohose ▁honda ha petigwe ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁mwiisi ▁yose , ▁chino ▁chiyatendile ▁mwanamke ▁ino , ▁chiza longigwa ▁kwa ▁ku mbu ku mbu ▁ya ▁mwanamke ▁iyo .”
▁Yakobo ▁kaha segela ▁Belisheba . ▁Wanage ▁Isilaili ▁wa mguma ▁Yakobo ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁muna ▁im ituka ▁yoya i lavile ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁iwa na ▁iwa dodo do ▁na ▁wake ▁zawo .
▁L usita ▁lwa ▁ku hu na ▁ngano , ▁Lubeni ▁kahita ▁kuchuwala , ▁uko ▁ka pata ▁makalanga ▁na ▁ka mgalila ▁Leya ▁mami ▁yake . ▁Laheli ▁kamulongela ▁Leya , ▁“ No pula ▁u ning ' he ▁makalanga ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁mwanago .”
▁“ Mwenevale ▁chi tegeleze , ▁weye ▁ni ▁mulangulizi ▁mkulu ▁you saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kumwetu . ▁Mu wa nde ▁muke ▁wako ▁muna ▁dileme ▁jojose ▁do nda u di sagule . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya k wime ▁ leme ▁jake , ▁hebu ▁kuku gomesa ▁sekeu mu wa nde ▁muke ▁wako .”
▁Chilo ▁chimwe ▁Yosefu ▁ka lota ▁nzozi , ▁na ▁viya wa simulil e ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁wawo ▁wa iyoha ▁ku mwihila ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁simwe ▁dino , ▁“ Chi pofu ▁hadaha ▁ku mu longoza ▁chipofu ▁miyage . ▁One ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo , ▁wose ▁waidi ▁weza kwingila ▁mudi kombo .
▁Na ▁kwiza tenda ▁mibiki ▁midi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ving obweda ▁va ▁dihema ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuchisogo .
▁Se lu gi ▁viya mweleke ▁Naholi ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁maidi , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo l wi hila ▁lukuli ▁lwake , ▁ mbali ▁ko lu li sa ▁na ▁kulu yawaza , ▁ni ivo ▁Chilisito ▁nayo ▁viya watendele ▁wahuwila ▁wose ,
▁Yohana ▁kawedika , ▁“ Yeli ▁na ▁viwalo ▁vidi ▁ya mwing ' he ▁yeli bule ▁chiwalo , ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁ndiya ▁na ▁yatende ▁ivo ▁ivo .”
▁Chi na la ▁icho ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁chi kala ▁chi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁ufundi ▁mkulu ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yoi ho ndigwe ▁kulawa ▁hana ▁ichi kalilo ▁m baka ▁maluw a ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁ka mwika ▁Yosefu ▁yawe ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wa fungigwa ▁wose ▁na ▁chila ▁chochi tendeke ▁umo ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁chi tendeka ▁kwa ▁ ulangulizi ▁wake .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁N diya ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁ching ' waji ▁chochose ▁chi dalisa ▁mazi ▁yake , ▁chiza kwa mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Ka i nyendanyenda ▁na ▁kutegeleza ▁m baka ▁kudanganika ▁m baka ▁kadanganika ▁mumsalaba .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Lawi ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zawo ‚ ▁fana ▁viili ▁m aandiko ▁yawo , ▁Gelishoni ▁na ▁Kohasi ▁na ▁Melali . ▁Lawi ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁saba .
▁Hu ni hokele ▁kwa ▁kuni nonela , ▁ mbali ▁kuson gela ▁vini ngile , ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁ha le kile ▁kuya nonela ▁magulu ▁yangu .
▁na ▁mu lu ▁na ▁bu ndi ▁ma tu wa ▁na ▁chi lele
▁chandusilo ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁ni ▁lolelo ▁da ▁kupata ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Mulungu ▁ha longa ▁uvwizi ▁bule , ▁kachi kila ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁ugima ▁uwo ▁kwandusi la ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Petili ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁simwe ▁ijo ▁ku chilongela ▁cheye ▁muhala , ▁hebu ▁wanhu ▁wose ?”
▁Baho ▁ pinde ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁vonda di woneke ▁kuna ▁yamawingu , ▁niza di wona ▁na ▁kudi kumbuka ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁na ▁vilumb e ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁mwiisi .”
▁Yesu ▁ka mbwakila ▁chinyamkela ▁ija , ▁“ Nyama la ! ▁L a wa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁ino !”
▁Ng ' holo ▁za ▁Wa g elishoni ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Mulungu ▁kam ta ngile ni ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yochi wapetele ni , ▁kamtanga ni ▁ muhokele ▁hanhu ▁henu ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁“ Tegelezeni ! ▁Nomulongelani ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁lung ' hali ▁lusita ▁halunafika .
▁“ Si londa ▁bule ▁wanhu ▁wa ni tunhize ,
▁“ Y e lu sa le mu ! ▁Yelusalemu ! ▁Ku wakoma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwatowa ▁kwa ▁mabwe ▁waja ▁wa senga ▁woya watumile ▁Mulungu ▁kumwenu ! ▁M iyanza ▁mi ngahi ▁ni m kunzagiza ni ▁hamwe ▁kumwangu ▁fana ▁viya ▁ko lo ▁da ▁ng uku ▁vo di kunzagiza ▁va na ge ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mabawa ▁yake , ▁ mbali ▁ha mulondile ▁bule !
▁Lelo ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁kuzilibuka , ▁mama ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁muke ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Ndugu ▁wose ▁saba ▁wamsola .”
▁M imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁imisi sili ▁yoi nya zigwe ▁na ▁mbeho ▁ili ▁na ▁vuke ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁i lawilila .
▁Mfalume ▁Helode ▁kahulika ▁zi mbuli ▁izo , ▁chimu ▁nhogolwa ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zen ela ▁chila ▁hanhu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁wolonga , ▁“ Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kazilibuka ! ▁I cho ▁ ichimu ▁leka mana ▁kana ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁mauzauza .”
▁Wa ke ▁zetu ▁na ▁wanetu ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wetu ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wetu , ▁weza sigala ▁hano ▁hana ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Gileadi .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁weza nimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁vondani i patile ▁utunhizo ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁m ituka ▁yake ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wake .”
▁Labani ▁kedika , ▁“ Vinoga . ▁ Chiza tenda ▁fana ▁viulongile .”
▁Yesu ▁ka tuma ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁waidi , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁mudibululu , ▁umo ▁mwiza yi ting ' hana ▁na ▁mulume ▁ka y itwik a ▁nongo ▁ya ▁mazi . ▁M sondelele ni
▁“ ▁‘ Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wose ▁ wolondeka ▁wa zindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁muladi ▁sekewa tende ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kukomigwa ▁kwa ▁ku zeha ▁malagilizo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoni watenda ▁we le .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ha wi ye ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁nawo ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁ka wamanya ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁“ Siku ▁isondelele ▁kawa wona ▁Waisilaeli ▁waidi ▁wo itowa , ▁ka londa ▁kuwatenda ▁wakale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo , ▁kawalongela , ▁‘ M weye ▁ni ▁wandugu , ▁ha bali ▁mo londa ▁kui tenda ▁vihile ▁wenyewo ?’
▁W eye ▁muke ▁ muhuwila , ▁hu daha ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁hwiza mkombola ▁mulume ▁wako . ▁Na ▁weye ▁mulume ▁ muhuwila , ▁hu daha ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁hwiza mkombola ▁muke ▁wako .
▁Niye ▁ni lawa ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁na ▁niza ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁na ▁sambi ▁no ileka ▁isi ▁na ▁kubwela ▁kwa ▁Tata .”
▁Yakobo ▁kahita ▁Mamule ▁kwa ▁Isaka ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁habehi ▁na ▁K ili a si ▁Ali ba , ▁iviya ▁yo tangigwa ▁Hebuloni , ▁howa kalile ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka .
▁Wamuuza , ▁“ W eye ▁kotenda ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁ ga ni ? ▁Yeli hi ▁ya kwing ' hile ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kutenda ▁yayo ?”
▁M weye ▁mazoka , ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁mazoka ! ▁Modaha ze ▁kui kimbila ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁jehanamu ?
▁ Mbwanga ▁ija ▁mami ▁yake ▁ya tangigwe ▁Shel o mi si ▁mndele ▁wa ▁ Dib ili ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani , ▁kadi liga ▁na ▁kudi duwila ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa mgala ▁i mbwanga ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁Musa .
▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo ▁kau gula ▁na ▁kadanganika . ▁Wa sunh a ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁na ▁wa wika ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁cha ▁kuchanyha .
▁Mahalaleli ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁tano .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoni londa ▁niye ▁keza yamha ▁Malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁keza mulonda ‚ ▁niye ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁chiza kwiza ▁kumwake ▁na ▁kukala ▁nayo .
▁“ N ha mbi ko ▁ino ▁ya ▁kutimbuligwa ▁iza lavigwa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁welesi ▁m baka ▁welesi , ▁haulongozi ▁ hangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁honda ni iting ' hane ▁na ▁kulonga ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Lelo ▁cho walamba ▁ndugu ▁zetu ▁kuwa hulika ▁waja ▁wose ▁wo tenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁mweye , ▁waja ▁wowa languliza ▁na ▁kuwa fundize ni ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ugima ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha u longela ▁ lugongo ▁luno , ▁‘ Hita ▁uka ya se ▁muibahali ,’ ▁one ▁ha wile ▁na ▁be ge ta ▁mu mo yo ▁wake , ▁ila ▁ko huwila ▁kuwa ▁cha yalongile ▁chiza lawilila , ▁chiza tendeka ▁kumwake .
▁Maabaho ▁wabwela ▁kuchisogo ▁m baka ▁ E ni mi shi p a ti ▁iviya ▁yo tangigwa ▁Kadeshi , ▁wa ihuma ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Waamaleki ▁na ▁kuwahuma ▁Waamoli ▁wowa kalile ▁Ha sa so ni ▁Tamali .
▁usede ▁na ▁uko ligwa ▁na ▁u melo ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga ▁fana ▁izo . ▁Ni wa zum eni ▁fana ▁voni wa zum ileni ▁ichanduso , ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁haweza u hazi ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Iviya ▁kwiza tenda ▁vitasa ▁saba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ chinala ▁icho ▁na ▁ku vika ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁muladi ▁vi mwemwese ▁kuulongozi .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Makili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Manase ▁wahita ▁m baka ▁Gileadi , ▁wa itowa ▁isi ▁iyo ▁na ▁kui t e ka ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁Waamoli ▁wowa kalile ▁umo .
▁niza mtendela ni ▁yano . ▁Niza mtowa ni ▁kwa ▁ku mgalila ni ▁ludumbo ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁kusi nhu kila , ▁utamu ▁wa ▁lu nyala nyala , ▁utamu ▁wa ▁ku tula ▁yameso ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁mu ba nde . ▁Mwiza handa ▁mbeyu ▁zenu ▁ bila ▁kupata ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wawo ▁wondawa je .
▁Iviya ▁mo fundiza , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ilaha ▁kwa ▁chilingo ▁siyo ▁chinhu , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yondaya ila he ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁yili ▁muna ▁im a za ba hu , ▁u la ho ▁uwo ▁wo mwamha .’
▁Mbali ▁ubala ▁wou lawa ▁kuulanga ▁we la ▁na ▁u na ▁tindiwalo ▁lusita ▁lose ▁na ▁uhole ▁na ▁wowa tegeleza ▁na ▁u mema ▁ubazi ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁inogile ▁na ▁wabule ▁ubagulo ▁wala ▁udelenya .
▁walala ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wane ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁iyo ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁na ▁wa mtambikila ▁yeye ▁yo kala ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁siku ▁zose . ▁W e ka ▁mak ombe lo ▁yawo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁walonga ,
▁Ge ndele leni ▁kugenda ▁muna ▁inzila ▁igolo ke , ▁muladi ▁chiya ▁chilema le ▁sekechi si g u ke , ▁ mbali ▁chi honyigwe .
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁si wonile ▁kuwa ▁ka tenda ▁jojose ▁dihile ▁dodi mtenda ▁yakomigwe . ▁Paulo ▁mwenyewo ▁ka kanha ▁lu fa a ▁kwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁ni lamula ▁kumgala ▁Loma .
▁L a ga no ▁dino ▁hadiza kuwa ▁fana ▁diya ▁do nitendile ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zawo ▁zuwa ▁diya ▁vini wa solile ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁na ▁kuwa languliza ▁kulawa ▁Misili . ▁Kwa viya ▁ha wategeleze ▁chiya ▁chi ni walongele , ▁na ▁niye ▁si wa gesile .
▁Shela ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁kamwelek a ▁Ebeli .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lamula ▁bei ▁yake ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁unovu ▁wake ▁hebu ▁wihi ▁wake . ▁Vondaya lamule ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ni ivo ▁vondaiwe .
▁Iyo ▁kweli ▁ni ▁ lumbu ▁jangu . ▁Y eye ▁ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu , ▁ mbali ▁siyo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mami ▁yangu , ▁na ▁ni msola .
▁Maabaho ▁kau longela ▁mbiki ▁uja , ▁“ Kuson gela ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yonda ▁ya je ▁kaidi ▁matunda ▁yako ▁ng ' o !” ▁Na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa hulika ▁va yalongile ▁ivo .
▁Wa towa ▁ng ' hondo ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wamsondelela ▁wakala ▁wa yawala ▁mawalo ▁mazelu ▁ya ▁chitani ▁yelile ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wa ze lu .
▁“ Siku ▁izo ▁yoyose ▁yondaya walongele ▁mweye , ▁‘ Loleni ▁Chilisito ▁Mkombola ▁ka hano !’ ▁Hebu ▁‘ ka ha ja !’ ▁Seke mtogole .
▁Weza gubika ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁kwa ▁chitambala ▁chi dung ' hu , ▁na ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁weza gubika ▁kwa ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali ▁na ▁kui guma ▁ija ▁im ibiki ▁yake .
▁M afundizo ▁yawo ▁yeza kwe ne la ▁fana ▁ londa ▁ je ne la ▁himahima ▁na ▁kuja ▁nyama ▁za ▁lukuli . ▁Ha gati ▁yawo ▁wa umo ▁ H i me nayo ▁na ▁Fil e to .
▁na ▁muwa funze ▁wanenu , ▁mwiza wa simulil a ▁vomu wa ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁hebu ▁vomu wa ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁hebu ▁vomu gona ▁hebu ▁vomu lamka .
▁Ha gati ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kufose ze la ▁ditwi , ▁nyafasi ▁iyo ▁iza son igwa ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁muladi ▁sekei dege ke .
▁Wa huwila ▁wowa p wi lili ke , ▁wa peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁howa hitile .
▁Wa kalizi ▁viwa kalile ▁wo mgala ▁Paulo ▁muna ▁im ho ngo no , ▁kamuuza ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi , ▁“ No daha ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁kumwako ?” ▁I m kulu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁kodaha ▁kulonga ▁Chigiliki ?”
▁Ada ▁kamwelek ela ▁Esau ▁Elifazi ▁na ▁ B a se ma ti ▁kamwelek a ▁Leuweli .
▁Yaha dahika ▁niza kala ▁kumwenu ▁kwa ▁lusita , ▁hebu ▁ihadahika ▁niza kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁miyezi ▁yose ▁ya ▁chi hu he , ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁kun ha za ▁ni gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza ▁hohose ▁honda ni hite .
▁Zi funge ni ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu ▁na ▁ku yawala ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁venu ▁fana ▁lukumbuso .
▁Yesu ▁ka ti mala la ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Mulongele ni ▁ye ze .” ▁Ivo ▁wa mtanga ▁ija ▁chipofu , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ I gangamize ! ▁I ma , ▁ko ku tanga !”
▁Kwa viya ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁siyo ▁mbuli ▁muhala ▁ mbali ▁ugima ▁wenu . ▁ Zindilil eni ▁malagilizo ▁yayo ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁yomu hita ▁kuisola ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁Yoludani .”
▁Maabaho ▁Lebeka ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa isasala ▁na ▁wakwela ▁ngamiya ▁na ▁kumsondelela ▁iyo ▁im sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁nawo ▁wose ▁wasegela .
▁One ▁chaha longa ▁ha chitendile ▁uhasanyi , ▁cho mtenda ▁yeye ▁kuwa ▁m vwizi ▁na ▁wala ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁ya mwabule ▁mgati ▁yetu .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁ulo ▁wanahina ▁wa lola ▁kuno ▁na ▁kuno , ▁hawa muwone ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ila ▁Yesu ▁yaidumwe .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁lung ' husesa ▁lu mwenga ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu iting ' hana ▁kaidi . ▁Wa nhu ▁viwa kalile ▁wabule ▁ndiya , ▁Yesu ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁na ▁kuwalongela ,
▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ku gozela ▁na ▁kugazigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁ mbali ▁hu le gele ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁vi yengile ▁Yelusalemu , ▁bululu ▁jose ▁di ngila ▁ ti vi ti vi ▁da ▁wanhu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa uza , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁yelihi ?”
▁one ▁muha mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁ku zindilila ▁vinogile ▁malagilizo ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo .
▁Chi sola ▁isi ▁yawo , ▁chiya golela ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁Gadi ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁iwe ▁yawo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Vino ▁udahi ▁wangu ▁u hunguka ? ▁Lelo ▁kwiza wona ▁fana ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁iza lawilila ▁kumwako ▁hebu ▁haiza lawilila .”
▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo kanha ▁chi ku p o ▁cha ▁walo ▁da ▁sambi ▁na ▁kuchi ka ▁mwii ▁chiwalo ▁cha ▁umwaka . ▁Kwa viya ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo , ▁chi ku p o ▁cha ▁sambi ▁chiza chi bananga ▁chiwalo ▁cha ▁umwaka , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha dege ke ▁heza k ongeze ke la .
▁Cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose ▁no wa tose leni ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwa kumbuke ni ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Ivo ▁niwa sola ▁walangulizi ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁wo hishimika ▁womu wa sagule ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁yenu , ▁ni weka ▁wawe ▁walangulizi ▁wenu . ▁Wawo ▁ni weka ▁wawe ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁ elufu ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁gana ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁longo . ▁Ni sagula ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁ku dima ▁chila ▁kabila .
▁Ivo ▁kasegela , ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁“ Mbali ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kutali , ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kamuwona , ▁ka muwonela ▁ubazi , ▁kam kimbila , ▁kamuhagatila , ▁na ▁kamnonela .
▁Na yo ▁viya komeleze ▁ku walaga , ▁kahita ▁mchan ya ▁mu lugongo ▁yaidumwe ▁kutosa . ▁Vi ifikile ▁ichigulogulo , ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁baho ▁yaidumwe .
▁Wa me la li ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁we he ▁wa tegelezeni ▁wa mha le ▁zenu , ▁muladi ▁one ▁wa uko ▁wa mha le ▁wowose ▁hawa huwila ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wa pate ▁kuhuwila ▁kwa ▁kuwona ▁ugen zi ▁wenu , ▁haiza londeka ▁kumwenu ▁kulonga ▁mbuli
▁na ▁D ishoni ▁na ▁ E se li ▁na ▁Di s hani . ▁Wawo ▁niwa wo ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁Waholi ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Seili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Edomu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalagiliza ▁chitende ▁fana ▁vi chitendile ▁diyelo ▁muladi ▁chim tendeleni ▁kuilumba .
▁Wa nahina ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa ndusa ▁kwii uza , ▁“ Vino ▁yelihi ▁yonda ▁ya dahe ▁ku lopoligwa ?”
▁“ K wika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁va ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo . ▁Vino ▁ivo ▁chi dali ▁chi n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁na ▁chi ma ▁chi ba guligwe . ▁Chi dali ▁yeng ' higwe ▁Haluni , ▁chi ma ▁weng ' higwe ▁wanage .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁cho lolela ▁chinhu ▁chiya ▁ching ' hali ▁hachi na chi wona , ▁chochi go za ▁kwa ▁kufunya umo yo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁ha tegeleze ▁yano , ▁nayo ▁sekemu mtegeleze .
▁Cho wa londe leni ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wowa goma ▁wanhu ▁kwii sola ▁na ▁iviya ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁zimwenga ▁zimwenga . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁ndiya ▁izo ▁muladi ▁zi di gwe ▁kwa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa huwile ▁na ▁wowo umanya ▁ukweli .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoya duganye ▁vingi ▁ha wile ▁na ▁vingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁munhu ▁yoya duganye ▁vi dodo ▁ha wile ▁na ▁vi dodo ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Yuda ▁viya hokele ▁gate , ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁lusita ▁ulwo ▁ulwo . ▁I kala ▁ichilo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ M a zi ▁yeli ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ulanga ▁ya i duganye ▁hanhu ▁hamwe , ▁i dahe ▁kulawilila ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile .” ▁I lawilila ▁ivo .
▁Mbali ▁zuwa ▁vidi lawile , ▁di i soma ▁mi no ga , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁hai kalile ▁na ▁mizizi , ▁i nyala .
▁Wa p a ti gwa ▁na ▁lugano ▁na ▁ludumbo . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nguvu ▁zako , ▁wanyama la ▁hupi ▁fana ▁dibwe . ▁M baka ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wa fose , ▁m baka ▁vondawa fose ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁wou wakombole .
▁Ivo ▁ka mtuma ▁mtumwa ▁imwenga . ▁Iyo ▁nayo ▁wamtowa ▁iviya ▁na ▁wa mtendela ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁wa muwinga ▁makono ▁muhala .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁vino , ▁ning ' hali ▁no londa ▁ku mu la ula ni ▁ mbali ▁no go migwa ▁m baka ▁sambi . ▁ Nolonda ▁wanhu ▁wa muhuwile ▁Mulungu ▁ vu mwili ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁viwa muhuwile .
▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ▁yo kwika ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁yo tagusa . ▁Y eye ▁yaidumwe ▁yoyo daha ▁ku lopola ▁na ▁kuna nga . ▁Ivo ▁weye ▁iyo ▁yelihi ▁you wa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wakaya ▁wayago ?
▁Sekemu mtende ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya ikwale , ▁Wayahudi ▁hebu ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁kuna i chibululu ▁chili ▁haulongozi ▁wenu . ▁ Vondamwingile ▁muna i chibululu ▁icho , ▁mwiza mfika ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁ka fungigwa , ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwe ligwa ▁na ▁munhu . ▁M fungu leni ▁mu ngale ▁hano .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu , ▁keza vimanya ▁fana ▁mafundizo ▁yangu ▁ya lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁nolonga ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wangu ▁mwenyewo .
▁No mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁ini msang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁umoyo ▁wou nilongela ▁na bule ▁ubananzi , ▁fana ▁viya ▁wa saho ▁zangu ▁viwatendile . ▁No mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁chila ▁vini ku kumbuka ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁zangu ▁ichilo ▁na ▁imisi .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hamu daha ▁kuzi kimilila ▁tama a ▁zenu ▁za ▁lukuli , ▁ sole ni , ▁kwaviya ▁muhavu ▁kusola ▁kufosa ▁kwa ka ▁tama a ▁za ▁lukuli .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza di lola ▁walo ▁ijo ▁di ha mala ▁ku fu wi gwa . ▁One ▁hadi galuke ▁inga wa ▁chimvuguya ▁ha c he ne le ▁bule , ▁walo ▁ijo ▁jambul a ▁mwiko . ▁Wa lo ▁ijo ▁keza di lunguza , ▁ baka ▁da ▁chimvuguya ▁diwe ▁kuchisogo ▁hebu ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁walo ▁ijo .
▁Kwa viya ▁kwiza kuwa ▁m kalangama ▁wake ▁kumulongela ▁chila ▁munhu ▁chiya ▁chiu wone ▁na ▁chiu hulike .
▁Keza mgalila ni ▁matamu ▁yomu ya dumbile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁nayo ▁yeza m gaza ni ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Ivo ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁kaweng ' ha ▁mazina ▁wanyama ▁ wofugigwa ▁na ▁ndege ▁woguluka ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁yoyo faya ▁ku mtaza .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁wowo gendelela ▁kusang ' hana ▁yanogile ▁kuno ▁wo zahila ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁nhogolwa ▁na ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku leka ▁kudanganika . ▁Wa no ▁Mulungu ▁keza weng ' ha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Na yo ▁kwaviya ▁viyakalile ▁muna ▁uzidilwa , ▁ka iyoha ▁ng ' hani ▁kutosa . ▁F ugu ti ▁jake ▁diwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁ma do ndo ▁ya ▁damu ▁yoyo la gala ▁hasi .
▁Viya viya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wam ke we za ▁Yesu , ▁wa y ilongela , ▁“ Ka wahonya ▁wamwenga , ▁ mbali ▁hadaha ▁ku yi ho nya ▁mwenyewo !
▁Ivo ▁ni muuza ▁mndele ▁iyo , ▁‘ Vino ▁weye ▁ tati ▁yako ▁yelihi ?’ ▁Na yo ▁kani dika , ▁‘ Tat i ▁yangu ▁ni ▁Besueli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Milika ▁muke ▁wa ▁Naholi .’ ▁Maabaho ▁ni mwing ' ha ▁ mhete ▁ndodo ▁ya ▁kwika ▁muna ▁im hu la ▁na ▁ku mvaz a ▁kung ' hu ▁muna ▁yamakono .
▁One ▁iha londeka ▁ni igode , ▁niza igodela ▁vinhu ▁vovi lagusa ▁unyondenyonde ▁wangu .
▁Chi wakalile ▁wa chimanya ▁ni ▁chiya ▁muhala ▁chowa chi hulike , ▁“ Munhu ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁kochi gaza ▁umwaka , ▁lelo ▁ko peta ▁uhuwilo ▁ija ▁ija ▁iya kalile ▁ko geza ▁kui da nga ni za !”
▁M i gulu ▁yake ▁ ilinga ▁fana ▁viya ▁shaba ▁i sunh igwe ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁di ta n uli , ▁na ▁dizi ▁jake ▁fana ▁viya ▁dizi ▁da ▁mazi ▁mengi .
▁Niza tenda ▁mawewedek a ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁vilaguso ▁muna ▁isi , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁damu ▁na ▁moto ▁na ▁m vu ke ▁wa ▁mo si .
▁“ Walume , ▁no wona ▁mwanza ▁wetu ▁wizakuwa ▁muna ▁iha tali . ▁ Chiza kwa giza ▁vinhu , ▁siyo ▁mbahasha ▁muhala ▁ mbali ▁na ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁iviya .”
▁“ Ka kala ▁Yelile ▁na ▁kanoga , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mu mulema ▁na ▁mu mulamba ▁Pilato ▁ya mu lekelele ▁munhu ▁mkomaji .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁isi ▁ya ▁Tilo ▁na ▁kahita ▁mudilamba ▁da ▁Galilaya ▁kufose la ▁Sidoni ▁na ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁D e ka p o li .
▁Mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Ni lota ▁ni ma ▁muna ▁ing ema ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ,
▁Lelo ▁Mndewa , ▁ko wona ▁viwo chi tenda ▁chi d umbe , ▁uchi togole le ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chilonge ▁usenga ▁wako ▁ bila ▁kudumba .
▁Petili ▁ka hodiza ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁kunze , ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁yo tangigwa ▁L o da ▁keza ▁ku mwidika .
▁Iviya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ M wi hi ▁wako ▁yahawa ▁na ▁nzala , ▁ mwing ' he ▁ndiya , ▁na ▁yahawa ▁na ▁ng ' hilu , ▁ mwing ' he ▁mazi ▁yang we . ▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁kwiza mtende za ▁ya wone ▁chinyala ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁ma kala ▁ya ▁moto ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake .”
▁Kwa viya ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁walume ▁watano , ▁na ▁mulume ▁ yu uli ▁nayo ▁sambi ▁si ▁mu lu ma ko ▁bule . ▁Ku nilongela ▁kweli .”
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zi wa ▁simwe , ▁wa ma ma ▁wano ▁waidi ▁ni ▁simwe ▁da ▁ma lagano ▁maidi , ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁diya ▁dodi tendeke ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Sinai , ▁muwa ki li shi ▁wake ▁ni ▁Hajili ▁na ▁wanage ▁wo kwe lekigwa ▁kuu tumwa .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha longa ▁“ No mulonda ▁Mulungu ,” ▁kuno ▁ko mwihila ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁m vwizi . ▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁yaha mwihila ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁yoyo muwona , ▁hadaha ▁ku mulonda ▁Mulungu ▁ija ▁ha muwona .
▁W elesi ▁wako ▁wiza bwela ▁hano ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wekane , ▁kwaviya ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁Waamoli ▁hau na kuwa ▁mwingi ▁muladi ▁ni wataguse .”
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kawalongela ▁wanaake ▁waja , ▁“ Seke mwa ny we , ▁kwaviya ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁mo nzahila ▁Yesu ▁yoya wa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba .
▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁keza , ▁wala ▁ha dile ▁na ▁ha ng ' wile ▁divai , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mu longa , ▁‘ Ka na ▁chinyamkela !’
▁Chi ha longa ▁kuwa ▁chi ilumba ▁nayo ▁na ▁kuno ▁cho kala ▁muna ▁diziza , ▁cholonga ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁hachi kala ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ukweli .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kumwenu ▁wondawa sigale ▁muna ▁izisi ▁za ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁weza wola ▁na ▁ku komelezeka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wihi ▁wawo ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wihi ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zawo .
▁ Sekemwi i me , ▁ila ▁ teng ' hu ▁mui togole le ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁lusita ▁ludodo , ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁nyafasi ▁inogile ▁ya ▁kutosa . ▁Maabaho ▁i bwele leni ▁kaidi , ▁muladi ▁Lufyende ▁sekeya m geze ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku potwa ▁kui languliza ▁kwenu .
▁Abulamu ▁kamulongela ▁Salayi , ▁“ M tumwa ▁wako ▁kaha si ▁yako ▁weye , ▁ mtendele ▁cho u londa .” ▁Maabaho ▁Salayi ▁kam gaza ▁Hajili ▁m baka ▁kai ba nga .
▁Niza tenda ▁chochose ▁chi ni daha ▁kulonga ▁muladi ▁hamwande ▁vondani danganike ▁mu dahe ▁ku kumbuka ▁mbuli ▁izo .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu lekeni . ▁ Mbo na ▁mwo nde sa ? ▁Ka n he nde la ▁chinhu ▁chinogile .
▁Vi i fosile ▁ifa ▁ya ▁Bulahimu , ▁Mulungu ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁Isaka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁yoyo kalile ▁kakala ▁habehi ▁na ▁disima ▁da ▁Be eli ▁ la ha ▁ ilo i .
▁kugaya ▁kwangu ▁na ▁yangu . ▁Ku yamanya ▁yose ▁yoya ni lawilile ▁uko ▁Antiyokiya ▁na ▁Ikoniya ▁na ▁Lisitila , ▁ni funya ▁umoyo ▁magayo ▁makulu . ▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁kani lopola ▁muna ▁yayo ▁yose .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mama ▁ni togole , ▁lusita ▁lw o kwiza ▁wanhu ▁haweza mtosela ▁Tata ▁muna ▁ulugongo ▁luno ▁wala ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu .
▁“ Wa tendeleni ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁yaja ▁yo mulonda ▁wawo ▁wa mtendele ni ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁ivo ▁ni ivo ▁viyalongile ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁m alongo ▁matano , ▁siku ▁i sondelela ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁ya ▁saba , ▁mwiza ni lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁mhule ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁va ▁mwanduso ▁kugobola .
▁Sekemu je ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁magate ▁ya gumigw e ▁lusu . ▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁nayo ▁ni ▁magate ▁ya ▁magayo , ▁kwaviya ▁ mulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁himahima . ▁Ivo ▁lusita ▁lose ▁ londa mu kale ▁mwiza kumbuka ▁siku ▁ija ▁yomu lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Lelo ▁ segela ! ▁Ni kala ▁ni k wi kila ▁chilagano ▁ku kwing ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vingi , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁haku da hi ze ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁ivo , ▁ka kwima .”
▁Vino ▁kuna ▁ bumbila ▁kulu ▁dimwenga ▁dili ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya goloke ▁fana ▁viyeli ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yoni m fu nzile ni ▁diyelo ?
▁Yesu ▁viya malile ▁kulonga ▁yano , ▁ka walongolela ▁kuhita ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Bule ivo ▁weza m fu nza ni ▁kutenda ▁vi hendo ▁vawo ▁va ▁ku tibusa ▁vo wa vi tendile ▁kwa ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁na ▁kuwatenda ni ▁mu mu hasanye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁zahabu , ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ▁uli ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁na ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁Ivo ▁leka mana ▁ni walongela ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁mkaya ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁kolondeka ▁sekeya je ▁damu .’
▁Haluni ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁vi wamuwonile ▁Musa ▁wadumba ▁ku mkwenhukila ▁kwaviya ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi kala ▁cho kwaka .
▁Lelo ▁ha bali ▁sambi ▁mo m geza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuwa t wika ▁mbahasha ▁ziza mile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁womuhuwila ▁Yesu , ▁mbahasha ▁ziya ▁cheye ▁wala ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁hachi daha ▁kwinula ?
▁“ Kwiza sola ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁lume , ▁m kila ▁wake ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hano ni le ▁hasi ▁ha ▁ma i ni ▁na ▁ fi go ▁zake ▁mbili ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yake , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chi ma ▁cha ▁kulume . ▁Ng ' hondolo ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁yetatu ▁mwiza lava ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁longo ▁na ▁dimwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁waidi ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁longo ▁na ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁weli bule ▁chilema .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Segeleni ▁hano , ▁weye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wouwa lavile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁muhite ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yoni wa la hile ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁nilonga , ▁‘ I si ▁ino ▁niza weng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wenu .’
▁Mbali ▁tata ▁kawatanga ▁watumwa ▁wake , ▁kawalongela , ▁‘ H i ma hi ma ! ▁ G a leni ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁mu mu ya wa ze . ▁M v a ze ni ▁na ▁ mhete ▁m chi dole ▁na ▁vilatu ▁m ma gulu .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Abulamu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola ▁hu ning ' hile ▁mwana , ▁mtumwa ▁ya vu mbu ke ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yangu ▁keza kuwa ▁muha zi ▁wangu .”
▁na ▁ivo ▁ya walekelele ▁wa ilegehe ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁siku ▁zose ▁watumwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ludumbo ▁lwa wo ▁lwa ▁ifa .
▁Petili ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga ▁na ▁ Kolineliyo ▁viwa kalile ▁wo kwingila ▁muna ▁ikaye , ▁umo ▁ka wafika ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza hita ▁kumulola ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dilago . ▁One ▁utamu ▁wake ▁wa ▁mbende ▁u hona ,
▁Maabaho ▁viya malile ▁kumwelek a ▁Lameki , ▁Mesusela ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁saba ▁na ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁midi , ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁ichisiwa ▁viya wonile ▁yaja ▁ya lawilile , ▁ka huwila ▁kwaviya ▁kazanywa ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mndewa .
▁Viwakalile ▁wo kung ' hu na ▁ndiya ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya maguniya ▁yawo , ▁wazanywa ▁kuwona ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁ka bwele zi ligwa ▁chi fuko ▁chake ▁na ▁hela ▁mgati ▁ya ▁ guniya ▁jake . ▁Viwa wone ▁zi hela , ▁wawo ▁na ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁Yakobo ▁wadumba .
▁Chi p indi ▁chiya , ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁zina ▁jake ▁Saimoni . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁kanoga ▁na ▁ko mdumba ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁kakala ▁ko gozela ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁ukombola ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Pet a ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁yondamu weng ' he ▁Walawi ▁muna ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁iza sondelela ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁kabila , ▁kabila ▁kulu ▁diza lava ▁mabululu ▁mengi ▁na ▁kabila ▁ dodo ▁diza lava ▁mabululu ▁ma dodo .”
▁Si londeka ▁ nimwandikileni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁yoi galigw a ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁uko ▁Yudeya .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ku muwona ▁ku mala , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁you longa ▁nayo ▁sambi ▁ni ▁iyo !”
▁Yesu ▁kawaleka ▁kaidi ▁mwanza ▁weketatu , ▁kahita ▁kutosa ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁iyo .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza gendelela ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁zose ▁zi yeli ▁na ▁utamu ▁uwo . ▁Iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko , ▁nayo ▁keza kala ▁yaidumwe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dilago .
▁Mbali ▁mwiza chinjil a ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kumtambikila ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Baho ▁mwiza chinja ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁luja ▁luja ▁lu mu lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁wa ni lavile ▁nhosa . ▁Ni hokele le ▁nhosa ▁zangu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁ku ning ' ha .
▁kawa wona ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waidi , ▁wa yawala ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁chwee , ▁wakala ▁hanhu ▁hau kalile ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁Yesu , ▁imwe ▁hadi kalile ▁iditwi ▁na ▁imwe ▁ha yakalile ▁ yamagulu .
▁I lawilila ▁vino ▁muladi ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zi yalongile ▁ku lagusa ▁kezadanganika ▁vilihi ▁zi ti mi e .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Abulamu ▁ka mbandama ▁Hajili ▁nayo ▁ka pata ▁wimo . ▁Hajili ▁viya wonile ▁ka pata ▁wimo , ▁ka ndusa ▁ku mwe hu la ▁Salayi .
▁Wakala ▁wo di lola ▁goya ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁na ▁meza ▁na ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁ma lu pango ▁na ▁vi a ▁viwo sang ' hanila ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile ▁na ▁panzia , ▁na ▁vi a ▁vose ▁va ▁kusang ' hanila .
▁Ivo ▁vimu i bena ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁yomu i hokele za . ▁Iviya ▁mo tenda ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁vi fa ni le ▁na ▁ivo .”
▁Na ▁chinyamkela ▁viya lavigwe , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ka daha ▁kulonga . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁baho ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁walonga . ▁“ Hachi na wona ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chi fa ni le ▁vino ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli !”
▁Maabaho ▁wa i hasanya ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁wa igola . ▁Balinaba ▁kamsola ▁Maliki ▁wahita ▁Chipulo .
▁“ Ka i di ▁nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁vimwili ▁waha itogolela ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁kutosa ▁hano ▁hana ▁isi , ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁keza watendela ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁one ▁waha togola ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zawo ▁wou watendile ▁wa hinduke ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁niye ,
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yomu lumiza ▁miyage ▁kolondeka ▁ya lu m izigwe ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya mulumize ▁miyage .
▁Niye ▁ A lu fa ▁na ▁ O me ga , ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁wa ▁uhelelo , ▁yoni kwandusa ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁na ▁yoni vi komeleza ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁L a mu leni ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁mwiza togola ▁one ▁vinoga ▁mwanamke ▁ya gubike ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁yaha tosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Keza lola ▁chimvuguya ▁icho , ▁one ▁chiha woneka ▁muna ▁ing ' huta ▁na ▁chi tenda ▁ma baka ▁ya ▁ langi ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁hebu ▁ya ▁mayani ▁ma bisi ▁na ▁ku woneka ▁kuwa ▁chi ngila ▁mgati ▁ya ▁ng ' huta ,
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁kedika , ▁“ Ya yo ▁yose ▁ni ya tenda ▁kuson gela ▁u dodo ▁wangu .”
▁Wawo ▁niwa sola ▁wawe ▁wangu ▁ng ' hani , ▁niwa sola ▁wawo ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Na wo ▁viwahulike ▁Yuda ▁cha yawalongele , ▁wa de ng ' helela , ▁wamulongela ▁kuwa ▁weza mwing ' ha ▁hela . ▁Ivo ▁Yuda ▁ka ndusa ▁ku zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku mu hinduka .
▁Ng a lawa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ziza kwiza ▁kulawa ▁mhwani ▁ya ▁K iti mu , ▁weza zi t e ka ▁Ashulu ▁na ▁Ebeli , ▁na ▁wawo ▁iviya ▁weza danganizigwa .”
▁Ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁kulonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁wano ▁sekeu wapetele ▁uhasanyi ▁uno .” ▁Viyakomeleze ▁kulonga ▁ivo , ▁kadanganika .
▁ Nolonda ▁niwa ndigwe ▁howa wa ndigwe ▁ tati ▁zangu , ▁uni p a pe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁uni wa nde ▁kuna ▁yama leme ▁yowa wa ndigwe ▁wawo .” ▁Yosefu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niza tenda ▁fana ▁vou longa .”
▁Leya ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁nayo ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Lawi . ▁Leya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁mulume ▁wangu ▁keza ilumba ▁vinogile ▁na ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁ni mweleke la ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁watatu .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁wose ▁ichilo ▁chino ▁mwiza ni leka , ▁kwaviya ▁Yam a ndi ko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁keza mkoma ▁m dimi , ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁weza i mwa ga .’
▁“ Lelo ▁ha bali ▁mavuta ▁yano ▁sekeya chuuzigwe ▁kwa ▁di na li ▁magan a ▁matatu , ▁na ▁hela ▁zo nda zi patik e ▁we ni gwe ▁ngayengaye ?”
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Wa mi sili ▁weza hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁kuwa ▁kuwa gala ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wako ▁hagati ▁yawo ,
▁kawa gola ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ bumbila ▁jake . ▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Long o leni , ▁kuno ▁ muleka ▁nyafasi ▁hagati ▁ya ▁ bumbila ▁dimwe ▁na ▁dimwenga .”
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁wahita ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya ▁kuna ▁ulugongo , ▁uko ▁Yesu ▁ku yawalongele ▁wahite .
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Lazalo ▁wam tu mila ▁Yesu ▁usenga , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁mbwiya ko ▁you mulonda ▁kolumwa .”
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁saba ▁ gombo ▁diza .
▁“ Kuson hela ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali ▁kalonga , ▁‘ M weye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali ▁mu mema ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁isi ▁yenu ▁ni ▁kusi ▁kuna ▁dilamba .’
▁Niye ▁no funga ▁kuja ▁miyanza ▁midi ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁saba , ▁na ▁no lava ▁zaka ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁chinhu ▁choni chi pata .’
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kalila ▁na ▁kamuhagatila ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁kamnonela .
▁“ Nokulongela ▁kweli , ▁hwiza lawa ▁umo ▁bule ▁m baka ▁u lihe ▁sente ▁ya ▁uhelelo .
▁Iviya ▁ha muhuwila ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁ham muhuwile ▁bule ▁ija ▁yoya mtumile .
▁W i i leke ▁nhosa ▁yako ▁baho ▁hana ▁ichilingo ▁na ▁weye ▁ hita ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁yeli ▁na ▁mbuli ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁muka i lamule ▁mbuli ▁yenu , ▁m aabaho ▁u bwele ▁uka i lave ▁nhosa ▁yako .
▁ Mndele ▁ija ▁kakimbila ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁mbuli ▁zose .
▁Iviya ▁ walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom duwila ▁Mulungu ▁wake ▁kolondeka ▁ya tagusigwe ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁Bahobaho ▁ka gwa ▁hasi ▁hana ▁ yamagulu ▁ya ▁Petili ▁na ▁kadanganika . ▁Wa bwanga ▁waja ▁vi wengile , ▁wa muwona ▁kadanganika , ▁ivo ▁wa mulava ▁kunze ▁na ▁wa muwanda ▁habehi ▁na ▁mulume ▁wake .
▁Nolonga ▁kweli ▁wa lava ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁viwa dahile , ▁na ▁kufosa ▁udahi ▁uwe li ▁nawo . ▁Wa tenda ▁ivo ▁ bila ▁ku shulutiz wa ,
▁Mazi ▁viya malile ▁yose ▁muna ▁ino ngo , ▁ka muleka ▁imwana ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁m guhi .
▁“ One ▁muha mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁chigangamavu ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁zisi ▁zose .
▁Nuhu ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wake ▁zawo , ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁isafina ▁muladi ▁ku gombo ka ▁na ▁di gombo .
▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁wayage ▁wahita ▁na ▁wawa sola ▁watumigwa . ▁Hawa sang ' hanile ▁ludabwa , ▁kwaviya ▁wadumba ▁wanhu ▁sekewa wa towe ▁na ▁mabwe .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Habali ▁hamu zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ? ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁haiza dahika !
▁Maabaho ▁Balaki ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Ku ni tendela ▁choni ? ▁Ni ku gala ▁hano ▁muladi ▁ uwaduwile ▁wehi ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁kuwa temela ▁mate !”
▁Chila ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁velile ▁va ▁Waisilaili ▁vo wo mulavila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁vi zakuwa ▁va ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ,
▁Vini kalile ▁no sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁na ▁mweye , ▁ni lihigwa ▁na ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁yamwenga . ▁Ni ▁fana ▁viya ▁ni ya ho ka ▁vinhu ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁yaja ▁muladi ▁ni wataze ▁mweye .
▁I chigulogulo ▁mbeho ▁vi zi ho lile , ▁mulume ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁wa muhulika ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko genda ▁muna ▁umgunda , ▁ivo ▁wa ifisa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁muladi ▁sekeya wa wone .
▁Chi tabu ▁cha ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁N dagilizi ▁yangu ▁iyo ▁ino , ▁Mwii londe ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye , ▁fana ▁niye ▁vini mulondile ni ▁mweye .
▁Mbali ▁ino ▁ni ▁ndiya ▁yoi hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya i je ▁sekeya danganike .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁viwa kalile ▁wo mtegeleza , ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ,
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁wasemi ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁“ M weye ▁m olondeka ▁mu wakome ▁wanhu ▁wowa ilumbile ▁na ▁Baali ▁wa ▁Peoli .”
▁Baho ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yesu ▁wamuhitila , ▁ mbali ▁hawa dahile ▁ku mkwenhukila ▁habehi ▁kwaviya ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu kala ▁lukulu .
▁Wa mwenga ▁wou peta ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁kwaviya ▁wana ▁migongo ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wana ▁ndwagi , ▁ mbali ▁wamwenga ▁wo m peta ▁kwaviya ▁wo londa ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu .
▁Kwa viya ▁wawa hulika ▁wolonga ▁ulonzi ▁umwenga ▁na ▁wa mtogoza ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kalonga ,
▁Wa huwila ▁wa ▁uko ▁wa gezigwa ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁kugaya , ▁ mbali ▁u de ng ' helelo ▁wawo ▁ukala ▁mkulu ▁vino , ▁m baka ▁wakala ▁wa lava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi , ▁ mbali ▁wakala ▁ngayengaye ▁ng ' hani .
▁Munhu ▁imwenga ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ni gula ▁ng ' ombe ▁longo ▁dimwe , ▁sambi ▁nohita ▁kuwa geza . ▁ Nokulamba ▁uni lekelele .’
▁Yesu ▁kawa lamula , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M wi i lole ! ▁Mu yi teganye ▁na ▁lusu ▁da ▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁da ▁Helode !”
▁Lelo ▁weye ▁ha bali ▁ko mtagusa ▁miyago ? ▁Na ▁iviya ▁ha bali ▁ko n zeha ▁miyago ? ▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁chose ▁chiza kwima ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁nhaguso ▁cha ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbuli ▁izo ▁vi zi fikile ▁kwii m ho ngo no ▁ya ▁mfalume , ▁kuwa ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁weza , ▁zi mnogela ▁mfalume ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wake .
▁Wamoabu ▁wawa dumba ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wengi . ▁Wamoabu ▁wawa dumba ▁ng ' hani ▁Waisilaili .
▁Maabaho ▁kamwamha ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁kam winula . ▁Bahobaho ▁magulu ▁na ▁mavindi ▁yake ▁viwa ▁na ▁ludabwa .
▁Sekeu m gume ▁chinyala ▁ tati ▁yako ▁kwa ▁ku mbandama ▁mami ▁yako ▁ya kwe leke . ▁Sekeu m gume ▁chinyala ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mami ▁yako .
▁Kweli ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁kumbukeni ▁viya ▁vichi sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁na ▁magayo ! ▁Chi sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁muladi ▁sekechi m gaze ▁munhu ▁wowose , ▁lusita ▁lose ▁lwa ▁kuwapetela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu .

▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁chose ▁cho londeka ▁chi me ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁kuchi lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁ilihi . ▁M uladi ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya hokele ▁yombe ▁da ▁ usang ' hano ▁uya utendile ▁muna ▁ulukuli , ▁vinhu ▁vo chitendile ▁vinoga ▁hebu ▁vi ha .
▁Yakobo ▁ka msang ' hanila ▁Labani ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁muladi ▁yam pate ▁Laheli , ▁ mbali ▁kumwake ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ni ▁fana ▁viya ▁siku ▁ndodo , ▁kwaviya ▁ka mulonda ▁Laheli .
▁M izo yo ▁iza dumba ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chonda muwone . ▁I mitondo ▁mwiza longa , ▁‘ I ha wile ▁ichigulogulo ,’ ▁iha fika ▁ichigulogulo ▁mwiza longa , ▁‘ I ha wile ▁imitondo .’
▁Wamulongela ▁ tati ▁yawo , ▁“ Y ose fu ▁mgima !” ▁Niiyo ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ! ▁Baho ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁m ka nga gile , ▁kwaviya ▁ha dahile ▁bule ▁kuzi togola ▁mbuli ▁zawo .
▁Ivo ▁ha bali ▁chi danganike ▁hana ▁yameso ▁yako ▁cheye ▁na ▁migunda ▁yetu ? ▁U chi gule ▁cheye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁isi ▁yetu ▁chiwe ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁kwa ▁ kwasakany a ▁na ▁ndiya . ▁Ch eye ▁we n ye we ▁hamwe ▁na ▁isi ▁yetu ▁chiza msang ' hanila ▁mfalume . ▁Na ▁u ching ' he ▁mbeyu ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kuwa ▁wagima , ▁ivo ▁isi ▁yetu ▁isigale .”
▁Wana ▁wa ▁S ib e yo ni ▁wa tangigwa ▁ A ya ▁na ▁Ana . ▁Ana ▁niiyo ▁ya to lile ▁nzasa ▁za ▁mazi ▁ya ▁moto ▁kuchuwala ▁viyakalile ▁kowa dima ▁m hu nda ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁S ib e yo ni .

▁Leka mana ▁wema ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁wo msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁yake ▁ya ▁kuulanga . ▁Na ▁ija ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁keza kuwa ▁nawo ▁na ▁kuwa kaliza .
▁Muna ▁yamalaguso ▁yangu ▁ni wona ▁falasi ▁na ▁wakwela ji ▁wake , ▁w ava la ▁va lo ▁da ▁zuma ▁muna ▁zim ha mba ga , ▁ dung ' hu ▁fana ▁moto ▁na ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁buluu ▁fana ▁ulanga ▁na ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁uko le ▁fana ▁usage ▁wa ▁ ba lu ti . ▁Ma t wi ▁ya ▁falasi ▁wawo ▁ya kala ▁yo woneka ▁fana ▁matwi ▁ya ▁simba , ▁muna ▁imi lomo ▁yawo ▁ mulawa ▁moto ▁na ▁yosi ▁na ▁usage ▁wa ▁ ba lu ti .

▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁Kola ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jake , ▁“ Igolo ▁imitondo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza lagusa ▁welihi ▁weli ▁wake ▁na ▁welihi ▁welile , ▁na ▁yelihi ▁yondayam kwenhukile , ▁mana ▁yondaya msagule ▁niiyo ▁yondayam kwenhus e ▁kumwake .
▁Na ▁wa chuuzi ▁wowa patile ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁ijo , ▁weza kwima ▁kutali , ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁mawine ▁yake , ▁wo lila ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁giyogiyo ,

▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kam gulila ▁mfalume ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwaviya ▁Wamisili ▁wose ▁wa gula ▁migunda ▁yawo ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁iwa yo hela . ▁Ivo ▁isi ▁yose ▁i kala ▁ma li ▁yake ▁mfalume .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁yaha komelezeka ▁yayo ▁yose ▁na ▁mung ' hali ▁mo lema ▁kuni hulika , ▁ mbali ▁mo itowa ▁na ▁niye ,
▁“ H e bu ▁fana ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁sente ▁longo ▁na ▁ka giza ▁sente ▁imwe , ▁kezatenda ze ? ▁Keza wa s ha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁ku f ya gila ▁kaye ▁yake , ▁na ▁kui zahila ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁m baka ▁ya i wone .
▁Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁yehile ▁kolonga ▁mwenyewo ▁kuwa ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁kokala ma ▁kubwela ,
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitondo ▁viifikile , ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kawasagula ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jawo , ▁wawo ▁kawatanga ▁watumigwa .

▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka umanya ▁udelenya ▁wawo . ▁Kawauza , ▁“ Mbo na ▁mwo ni geza ? ▁N galile ni ▁hela ▁ni i lole .”
▁Kwiza gela ▁vitan zi ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁muna ▁dipanzia ▁dimwe , ▁vitan zi ▁vimwenga ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁va ▁panzia ▁dekaidi , ▁vitan zi ▁vose ▁vi i lole .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ h edike ▁mbuli ▁bule . ▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mu leke ▁yahite ▁kwaviya ▁kochi sondelela ▁na ▁kuno ▁ko guta ▁nyangi ▁kuchisogo ▁chetu !”
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁uzilibuko ▁na ▁ugima . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo nihuwila ▁niye , ▁hata ▁yahadanganika ▁keza kuwa ▁ngima .
▁Yesilo ▁m koi ▁wa ▁Musa , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁muke ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁wanage , ▁weza ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁kuichuwala ▁ko yekile ▁lago ▁habehi ▁na ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁nayo ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Viya muwone ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁mwana ▁yanogile ▁ng ' hani ‚ ▁kam fisa ▁kwa ▁miyezi ▁mitatu .
▁Katenda ▁vino ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wam zahile ▁na ▁wam sondelele ▁hata ▁kwa ▁kum dalisa ▁ya pete ▁ku dali sigwa . ▁Mulungu ▁heli ▁kutali ▁na ▁cheye ▁bule .
▁Maabaho ▁mke ▁wa ▁Zebedayo ▁na ▁wanage ▁waidi ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa mwizila ▁Yesu . ▁I ma ma ▁iyo ▁kum tumbalil a ▁Yesu ▁mavindi ▁na ▁ka londa ▁ yate ndi ligwe ▁cho yolonda .
▁“ Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vi petigwa ▁m baka ▁muna ▁ ichipi ndi ▁cha ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi . ▁ Kuson gela ▁chip indi ▁icho , ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo petigwa , ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ko iyoha ▁kwingila ▁kwa ▁ludabwa .
▁Ha ku na lawilila ▁mulotezi ▁imwenga ▁ya tendile ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁za ▁kudumbiza ▁fana ▁viyatendile ▁Musa ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wose .

▁Sekemu gale ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha ▁ku tibusa , ▁bule ivo ▁mwiza duwiligwa ▁fana ▁chinhu ▁icho . ▁M olondeka ▁mu chi hile ▁na ▁kuchi zeha ▁chinhu ▁icho , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chi duwiligwe .

▁“ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁sekemu i funze ▁vi hendo ▁vi ge ni ▁va ▁ku tibusa ▁vo wo tenda ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo .
▁Ma n he sa ▁na ▁usungu ▁yezakuwa ▁kwa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo sang ' hana ▁yehile , ▁ teng ' hu ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁Ka na ▁lung o ▁lwake ▁lwa ▁ku b e t ela ▁muna ▁yamakono . ▁Keza duganya ▁ngano ▁na ▁kuika ▁muna ▁mudi dung u , ▁ mbali ▁keza i lunguza ▁im hu mba ▁muna ▁umoto ▁hau zi mi ka ▁bule .”
▁ Muiteganye ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁weza mgala ni ▁kui chi ta la ▁na ▁ku mu lanha ni ▁mibalati ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zawo ▁za ▁kutosela .
▁Hamwande , ▁Yesu ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁kamuwona ▁m sola ▁kodi ▁imwe ▁yo tangigwa ▁Lawi ▁kakala ▁mwii ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kulihi la ▁kodi . ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ni sondelele .”
▁Ku ni lagusa ▁nzila ▁yoi longoza ▁kuna ▁ugima , ▁na ▁kwiza ni memez a ▁de ng ' ho ▁kwaviya ▁kwa hamwe ▁na ▁niye .’
▁Kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa solile ▁no weng ' ha ▁lagilizo ▁dino , ▁dino ▁si ▁jangu ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁da ▁Mndewa , ▁muke ▁sekeya muleke ▁mulumake ,
▁Mulungu ▁ya mwing ' he ▁wana ▁wengi ▁Yafesi , ▁ya kale ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Shemu ▁na ▁Kanani ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wake .”
▁Chi mulongela ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁cha ▁ndugu ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁wana ▁wa ▁tata ▁imwe . ▁Ndugu ▁yetu ▁imwe ▁ni ▁mwene ▁kwa ga , ▁mdodo ▁wetu ▁ka uko ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ tati ▁yetu .’
▁Kwa viya ▁nhaguso ▁zake ▁za ▁kweli ▁na ▁zi go loka , ▁kwaviya ▁ka mulongele za ▁nhaguso ▁ija ▁m go ni ▁mkulu ▁ya wagize ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁kwa ▁ugoni ▁wake . ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtagusa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwakoma ▁watumigwa ▁wake .”
▁Leya ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Lubeni ▁kwa ▁viya ▁kalonga , ▁ ' Mwana ▁ a i no ' . ▁Leya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁manhesa ▁yangu ▁na ▁lelo ▁mulume ▁wangu ▁keza ni londa .”
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁we ▁tano ▁ka itowa ▁mhalati ▁yake , ▁ni wona ▁nhondo ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁ila gala ▁muna ▁isi . ▁Na yo ▁keng ' higwa ▁lu vugul o ▁lwa ▁mwi na ▁wa ▁dikombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo .
▁W eye ▁ko huwila ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁imwe , ▁kotenda ▁goya . ▁Iviya ▁Vi nyamkela ▁wohuwila ▁na ▁wo gudemeka ▁kwa ▁kudumba .
▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Sauli ▁viwa komeleze ▁ usang ' hano ▁wawo , ▁wabwela ▁kulawa ▁Yelusalemu , ▁wamsola ▁Yohana ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Maliki .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yailo . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela ▁na ▁ku msung ' ha - sung ' ha .
▁Munhu ▁tajili ▁kalonga , ▁‘ B a si ▁nokulamba ▁tata ▁Bulahimu , ▁m tume ▁Lazalo ▁kui kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yangu .
▁Wa li ▁wose ▁longo ▁wa lamka ▁na ▁wa sola ▁ma weng e ▁yawo .
▁“ Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁na ▁ya hulike ▁yaja ▁Muhe ▁yoyo walongela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁“ Munhu ▁yondaya hume , ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁ndiya ▁yoi fisigwe ▁yoi tangigwa ▁mana . ▁Iviya ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁dibwe ▁ ze lu ▁do ja ndikigwe ▁zina ▁da ▁sambi ▁dili ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya di manyile ▁ila ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo di hokela .
▁Lelo ▁tata ▁u ning ' he ▁utunhizo ▁haulongozi ▁wako , ▁utunhizo ▁uja ▁wou kalile ▁nawo ▁weye ▁uja ▁woni kale ▁nawo ▁isi ▁ing ' hali ▁hai na ▁lu mbigwa ▁bule .
▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁viifikile ▁kumwenu ▁i gala ▁yo nogile ▁na ▁ku pwililika ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁fana ▁voi wa ▁kumwenu ▁kuson gela ▁zuwa ▁diya ▁vimu i hulike ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁na ▁mu umanya ▁ng ' hani ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ikweli .
▁Y eye ▁ha tendigwe ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁chiunhu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ugima ▁uli bule ▁uhelelo .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka yamanya ▁yo wakalile ▁woya gesa ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yawo , ▁ivo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ufalume ▁wowose ▁uha igola ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁wenyewo ▁hau daha ▁kugendelela . ▁Na ▁kaye ▁yaha igola ▁yenyewo ▁kwa ▁yenyewo ▁iza ku gwa .
▁M wanduso ▁ka mulawilila ▁Petili ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁kawa lawilila ▁waja ▁watumigwa ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi .
▁Wa nahina ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa iuzagiza , ▁“ Ino ▁munhu ▁wa ki ? ▁Hata ▁mbeho ▁na ▁mawimbi ▁vose ▁vi mtegeleza !”
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Habali ▁kuni tendela ▁vihile ▁niye ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ? ▁ Habali ▁hu nogelw e ▁na ▁niye ▁m baka ▁ku ning ' ha ▁mbahasha ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ?
▁Yesu ▁kawa hindukila , ▁na ▁kuwalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Yelusalemu , ▁sekemu ni li lile ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁ili lile ni ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁wanenu .
▁Yo woneka ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁si ▁munhu ▁yoyo vimanya ▁kulonga , ▁ mbali ▁nina ▁umanyi . ▁Ch eye ▁chiwa lagusa ni ▁yano ▁yose ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila .
▁Kwa viya ▁hachi daha ▁bule ▁ku leka ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zo chi zi wone ▁na ▁kuzi hulika .”
▁Fil i gi ya ▁na ▁Pa m fi li ya , ▁Misili , ▁na ▁ banzi ▁za ▁L ib i ya ▁habehi ▁na ▁Chilene , ▁wamwenga ▁wa lawilila ▁Loma ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka landula ▁dizi , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyo nihuwila ▁niye , ▁ha nihuwila ▁niye ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁ko muhuwila ▁ija ▁yanhumile .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Iyo ▁Niye .” ▁Yuda ▁yo yambiduke ▁kakala ▁kema ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hamwe ▁nawo .
▁Kuna ▁im hindo ▁ya ▁hasi ▁ya ▁di jo ho ▁wa bota ▁mahambo ▁ya ▁ma komamanga ▁ya ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁vinogile .
▁ ihawa ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu ▁yo chilongela ▁kuwa ▁chi bananga , ▁chi vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu , ▁na ▁ko manya ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁Timoseyo ▁yaheza , ▁ mulole ni ▁ya kale ▁kumwenu ▁ bila ▁kudumba , ▁kwaviya ▁ko sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁fana ▁niye .
▁Hamu ▁tata ▁wa ▁Kanani ▁kau wona ▁ ukengele ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁waidi .
