▁Kwa ▁kulonga ▁lagano ▁dino ▁da ▁sambi , ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁lagano ▁da ▁umwaka ▁di sa kale , ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi sa kala ▁na ▁kuwa ▁cha ▁umwaka ▁chiza segezigwa ▁sambi .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kuja ▁chochi lavigwe ▁mwaha wa ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ng ' holo ▁zenu , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁chitumetume ▁chenu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁Kale bu ▁kavi ng i , ▁kani sondelela ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wose , ▁niza mgala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iya hitile , ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁weza i sola ▁isi ▁iyo .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo lema ▁kuu hokela ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁mwana ▁mdodo , ▁hadaha ▁kwingila ▁mu ▁Ufalume ▁uwo ▁bule .”
▁Viwakalile , ▁kakala ▁umo ▁Maliya ▁Magidalena , ▁na ▁Maliya ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yosefu , ▁na ▁mke ▁wa ▁Zebedayo .
▁Ndugu ▁wose ▁wahuwila ▁weli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁womulamsani , ▁chibumbila ▁cha ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Galatiya .
▁Mbuli ▁izo ▁zen ela ▁muna ▁isi ▁ija ▁yose .
▁munhu ▁ino ▁ha londeka ▁kaidi ▁kumtegeleza ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake . ▁Ni ivo ▁ vu mu i ba sakany a ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁cha u mwaka ▁ya ▁vi hendo ▁venu .
▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁ni to lo sigwa ▁kulawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Waebulaniya ▁na ▁hano ▁si tendile ▁chochose ▁chi ni tende ze ▁ni gumigw e ▁muna ▁ichifungo .”
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁nyele si ▁zawo ▁zi banangigwa , ▁Nzi la ▁zose ▁kulawa ▁Heshiboni ▁m baka ▁ Dib oni , ▁kulawa ▁Na shi mu ▁m baka ▁No fa , ▁habehi ▁na ▁M e de ba .”
▁Chi ma ▁chiya ▁chi lavigwe ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁chi dali ▁icho ▁chochi n u ligwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁mavuta ▁zozi lavigwa ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Ivo ▁vi zakuwa ▁vako ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago , ▁ni ▁venu ▁siku ▁zose ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalagilize .”
▁Mfalume ▁kolondeka ▁sekeyawe ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁wengi , ▁hebu ▁sekeya wa bweleze ▁wanhu ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁vihongwe ▁wengi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa zuma ▁sekewa bwele ▁uko ▁ng ' o .
▁Kaidi ▁Balaamu ▁kalonga , ▁“ L o o ! ▁Yeli hi ▁yondaya ho ne , ▁Mulungu ▁vondaya tende ▁yano ?
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kokala ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁heza mwing ' ha ▁munhu ▁imwenga .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Habali ▁mo ni li lila ? ▁Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁wa ge ndele ▁na ▁mwanza .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawa shulutiz a ▁wanahina ▁wa kwele ▁mwiingalawa ▁wa longole ▁kuhita ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁yo walaga ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu .
▁Petili ▁viyamuwonile , ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vilihi ▁munhu ▁ino ?”
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako , ▁chose ▁cha ▁ndugu ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁wana ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Kanaani . ▁Ndugu ▁yetu ▁imwe ▁kadanganika , ▁na ▁mdodo ▁wetu ▁ka sigala ▁na ▁ tati ▁yetu .”
▁Se mi yo ni ▁kamsola ▁imwana ▁Yesu ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake , ▁m aabaho ▁kamwing ' ha ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu , ▁kalonga ,
▁ Sambi ▁no mwing ' hani ▁mu sagule ▁ugima ▁hebu ▁ifa , ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁ku duwiligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁no tanga ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁vi we ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁u sa g u zi ▁womu tenda . ▁Sa gule ni ▁ugima ▁muladi ▁mukale .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamsondelela .
▁Ivo ▁kuna ▁ng ' hondo ▁kuwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yetu ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁zina ▁dihile . ▁ Siyo ▁ivo ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁yo daha ▁kui tenda ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁ Alitemi ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu ▁kuwa ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁mana ▁na ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁wiza banangika . ▁ Alitemi ▁iyo ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu ▁ko tose ligwa ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya ▁na ▁muna ▁zisi ▁zose .”
▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁iyo ▁ yezile ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁na ▁damu . ▁He zile ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁keza ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁na ▁damu . ▁Na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kolonga ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁ni ▁kweli , ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ni ▁kweli .
▁Mu mkoma ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya ka li l le ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁ugima , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamzilibula ▁na ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Wa mweda ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁nzala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁keza we g u ti za .
▁Mulungu ▁ha wekile ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wawe ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁isi ▁i kwiza , ▁ija ▁yochi i longa .
▁Leka ▁wanhu ▁wa ni zengele ▁hanhu ▁helile , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁nawo .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa londa ▁kumgwila , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya gezile ▁kumgwila ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁lwake ▁lu kala ▁halunafika .
▁“ Lelo , ▁ya ndik a ▁wila ▁uno ▁na ▁uwa funze ▁Waisilaili , ▁muladi ▁uwe ▁ukalangama ▁wangu ▁kumwawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo bena ▁lagilizo ▁dimwe ▁muhala ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ mbali ▁kabananga ▁mbuli ▁imwe ▁muhala , ▁iyo ▁kabananga ▁yose .
▁Maabaho ▁keza ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yailo . ▁Viya muwonile ▁Yesu , ▁ka ibwanha ▁hasi ▁mu yamagulu ▁yake ,
▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁vinyamkela ▁yoi tenda ▁mauzauza . ▁M i he ▁ino ▁mitatu ▁yo hita ▁kwa ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁kuwa ku nza nya ▁kwa ▁ng ' hondo ▁ya ▁siku ▁ija ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁Udaho .
▁Kwa viya ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ▁hebu ▁ku leka ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ▁si ▁chinhu , ▁ mbali ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁mana ▁ni ▁kutegeleza ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Petili ▁ka kumbuka ▁mbuli ▁ziya longiligwe ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁“ Ya ng ' hali ▁nz ogolo ▁hana kwika , ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu ▁kuwa ▁hu ni manyile ▁bule .” ▁Ka lawa ▁kunze , ▁ka ndusa ▁kulila ▁kwa ▁usungu .
▁Wamuuza , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁yelihi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁ija ▁yoni walongele ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viya walongele , ▁wawa pula ▁Wamisili ▁vi a ▁va ▁zahabu ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁viwalo .
▁N hosa ▁zako ▁zose ▁za ▁mhule ▁kwiza zi guma ▁munyu . ▁Sekeu leke ▁ku guma ▁munyu ▁muna ▁in hosa ▁yako ▁ya ▁mhule , ▁kwaviya ▁munyu ▁ni ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁lagano ▁diya tendile ▁Mulungu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Kwa viya ▁vi c ha nduse ▁imwe ▁nayo ▁muna ▁ifa ▁yake , ▁iviya ▁chiza ilumba ▁nayo ▁muna ▁uku zilibuka ▁kwake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Mfundiza ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kolonga ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁vinhu ▁vinogile . ▁Cho vimanya ▁hu lola ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁ mbali ▁kofundiza ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viyolonda ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁kwa ▁ukweli .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo dalisa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chiya kalile ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya sole ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cho yakalile ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁M olondeka ▁mutende ▁vino , ▁kwaviya ▁mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁mweye ▁ku lamka ▁muna ▁zi n ho ngo ▁lufika . ▁Kwa viya ▁sambi ▁ukombola ▁wetu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁kufosa ▁lusita ▁luja ▁vo c ha nduse ▁kuhuwila .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁mwi ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁wo gula ▁na ▁ku chuuza ▁vinhu ▁umo ▁mwi ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁ka hi ndu la ▁meza ▁za ▁wa vu n ja ▁hela ▁na ▁ka hi ndu la ▁vi goda ▁va ▁wa chuuza ▁nziwa .
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁chi linga ▁fana ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ubani ▁wa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁mwa ▁waja ▁wo komboligwa ▁na ▁wo kwa ga .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hanhu ▁ha fi lile ▁heza sigala ▁iviya ▁ bila ▁k wene la , ▁ijo ▁ni ▁ lulumu ▁dodi lawile ▁kuna ▁ukulu ng ula . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela , ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ng ' ho vu ▁ya ▁ku lungu la .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁hawa daha ▁ku kwela ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁kwaviya ▁kuchi zuma ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁chike ▁m haka ▁ku zunguluka ▁mulima ▁na ▁ku utenda ▁we le .”
▁Ivo ▁ habule ▁kaidi ▁mbasakanyo ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁Wa nhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁hagati ▁ya ▁watumwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ilegehe , ▁hagati ▁ya ▁mulume ▁na ▁muke . ▁M weye ▁mose ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Muna ▁di ta mbi ▁kuna ▁nhungo ▁nhatu ▁zili ngile ▁fana ▁ma tu mba ▁na ▁maluw a ▁yo tangigwa ▁ a li mo ndi , ▁muna ▁di ta mbi ▁di sondelela ▁kuna ▁ tu mba ▁jake ▁na ▁luwa ▁jake . ▁M atambi ▁yose ▁sita ▁yawa ▁fana ▁viya ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa
▁Mesusela ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁kenda ▁na ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁kenda .
▁Ku duwiligwa , ▁one ▁hamu zindilile ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁ku ileka ▁nzila ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ija ▁hamu i manyile .
▁Muha wa ▁na ▁mi go m vi ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kawa i da , ▁hata ▁mo watanga ▁wasemi ▁waja ▁hawa hishimigwa ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila .
▁Mana ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁niha danganika ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wehi ▁na ▁ku leka ▁nzila ▁ini mulongeleni ▁mui sondelele . ▁ Siku ▁zikwiza ▁mwiza gaya ▁kwaviya ▁mwiza tenda ▁wihi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁yehilwe ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu .”
▁ B a se ma ti ▁muke ▁wa ▁Esau ▁kamwelek a ▁Leuweli . ▁Wana ▁wa ▁Leuweli ▁wa tangigwa ▁Na ha ti ▁na ▁Ze la ▁na ▁S ha ma ▁na ▁M iza .
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya mwing ' he ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ya ▁mbeho ▁imwe ▁wa ▁iwa dodo ▁wano ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁mwanahina ▁wangu , ▁heza s we la ▁kupata ▁gweko ▁jake .”
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndele ▁wangu , ▁ku nihuwila ▁niye ▁ku kuhonya . ▁ Hita ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁kufosa ▁ziya ▁zo chi daha ▁ku pula ▁hebu ▁ku gesa ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁yake ▁yoi sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁mgati ▁yetu .
▁ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁ikaye , ▁longeni , ▁‘ Ka leni ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .’
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha humiza ▁voilondeka ▁kwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁hebu ▁m chi wa ▁hebu ▁mgane .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁“ I fa , ▁uhumi ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulihi ? ▁Udaho ▁wako ▁wa ▁ku lumiza ▁wa kulihi ?”
▁Na ▁sambi ▁loleni ▁Kaye ▁yenu ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁izakuwa ▁ha me .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Hita ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁uka iting ' hane ▁na ▁Musa .” ▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁kahita ▁na ▁waiting ' hana ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kamnonela .
▁ Siku ▁yekane ▁Eli s uli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S he du eli , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko .
▁Mbali ▁viya p o t wile ▁kum fisa ▁kam patila ▁chi gelo ▁cha ▁mayani ▁na ▁kachi bu lu giza ▁ tula si ‚ ▁ka mwika ▁mgati ▁yake ▁na ▁kuchi ka ▁hana ▁yama ya ni ▁yo ko ta ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili .
▁Maabaho ▁ka mtuma ▁kaidi ▁mtumwa ▁imwenga . ▁Iyo ▁nayo ▁wamtowa ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁na ▁kumtendela ▁vihile .
▁Zi no ▁izo ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 6 0 ,500.
▁Ivo ▁wa kanha ▁na nga ▁na ▁kuzi leka ▁muibahali , ▁lusita ▁ulwo ▁ulwo ▁wazi fungula ▁nzabi ▁zozi kalile ▁zi wa mha ▁ usu ka ni , ▁m aabaho ▁waja mha ▁ tanga ▁dimwe ▁haulongozi ▁kwa mha ▁d ib e ho ▁wa gendelele la ▁kum h wa ni .
▁“ Tend a ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Ma j uma ▁kwa ▁ku hu na ▁ngano ▁yako ▁mwanduso , ▁na ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Ku duganya ▁Vi nhu ▁Vi mu gobole ▁kuuhelelo ▁wa ▁mwaka .
▁Wa naake ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁wo msondelela ▁Yesu ▁kulawa ▁Galilaya , ▁wahita ▁na ▁Yosefu , ▁waha wona ▁hanhu ▁ha wi kigwe ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu .
▁Vi a ▁vose ▁va ▁kusang ' hanila ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁vi g ingi ▁vose ▁na ▁hata ▁vi a ▁va ▁uluwa ▁vi zakuwa ▁va ▁shaba .
▁Na ▁viya chi solile ▁chitabu ▁icho , ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wane ▁na ▁walala ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wane , ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo . ▁Chila ▁imwe ▁kam ha ▁ p u ti kala nga ▁na ▁ mahamha ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁ya memile ▁ubani , ▁yano ▁niiyo ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mwiza kuja ▁nyama ▁iyo ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi i digwa ▁nyama ▁ya ▁m ha la ▁na ▁ mba la . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁kodaha ▁kuja , ▁yelile ▁hebu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Kweli ▁m ulamuzi ▁ha l ondigwa ▁one ▁mbuli ▁yenyewo ▁yo mson hela ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁ila ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁imwe .
▁Ko londeka ▁yam chinjil e ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁lupango ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza itila ▁idamu ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁lupango .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Y u da , ▁ko m biduka ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kwa ▁kum nonela ?”
▁Ivo ▁ samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wako . ▁One ▁hu sa m hile ▁bule , ▁no kwiza ▁kumwako ▁himahima , ▁na ▁niza itowa ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁zele ▁dodi lawa ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wangu .
▁Na yo ▁keza ▁hano ▁na ▁udahi ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yawa gwile ▁wose ▁wowo ku tosela .”
▁wowa longa ▁vihile ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wo mwihila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ je uli ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁magoda ▁na ▁wa sondelela ▁yehile ▁na ▁wo lema ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo .
▁“ Vondamu kale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo , ▁muha pata ▁wana ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁na ▁kuwa ▁walala , ▁one ▁muha ndusa ▁ kwe hu ka ▁na ▁kutenda ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁ku songola ▁kwa ▁simwe ▁da ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁mu tenda ▁yehile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁mu mtenda ▁yehilwe .
▁Mulungu ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁kasegela .
▁Mulungu ▁ha mtumile ▁Mwanage ▁mwiisi ▁ya wataguse ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁isi , ▁ mbali ▁ka mtuma ▁ya wakombole .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wasegela ▁Ha se lo si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Palani .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Yesu ▁viya walongela , ▁wa funga nya ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka .
▁Si wonile ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁ijo , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁Yeli ▁na ▁Udaho ▁na ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa umo ▁hanhu ▁hake .
▁Uko ▁kwii si ▁ya ▁Misili ▁Yosefu ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁waidi . ▁Ivo ▁ peta ▁yose ▁ya ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁wengi le ▁Misili ▁wakala ▁m alongo ▁saba .
▁U senga ▁kuson hela ▁Chilisito ▁ wima ▁chigangamavu ▁mgati ▁yenu .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁mhambe ▁na ▁wagane , ▁na bule ▁lagilizo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa , ▁ mbali ▁no lava ▁malaguso ▁yangu ▁niye ▁ni li ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁no londeka ▁ku hu wi ligwa .
▁One ▁waha kalile ▁woi gesa ▁isi ▁yawo ▁iwa lawile , ▁waha dahile ▁kubwela ▁uko .
▁nikala ▁na bule ▁chiwalo , ▁mu ning ' ha ▁chiwalo , ▁nikala ▁mtamu , ▁mwiza ▁kuni sang ' hanila , ▁nikala ▁mchifungo , ▁mwiza ▁kuni la ula .’
▁Viwafikile , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁mo vimanya ▁viya ▁vini kalile ▁na ▁mweye ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwandusi la ▁zuwa ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁vini fikile ▁Asiya .
▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁tindiwalo ▁mwenyewo ▁na ya mwing ' heni ▁tindiwalo ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁zose . ▁Mndewa ▁yawe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁mose .
▁Petili ▁viya wone ▁ivo , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁ha bali ▁mwo kwazanywa ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁chino ? ▁ Mbo na ▁mo chi bunhul ila ▁meso ▁fana ▁cheye ▁niiyo ▁chi mtendile ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ya dahe ▁kugenda ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lw e tu ▁wenyewo , ▁hebu ▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ?
▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁do mson hela ▁mwanamke ▁yeli ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake ▁na ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁mwanamke ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁chochose . ▁Iviya ▁do mson hela ▁mulume ▁yo mbandama ▁muke ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁mnyama ▁muladi ▁sekewa mbule ▁mwiko , ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁muke ▁yoyose ▁sekeya tende ▁ivo , ▁mana ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁ni ▁chilo zo .
▁Na ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁fana ▁dizi ▁da ▁mazi ▁mengi ▁yo kulu ma , ▁na ▁fana ▁dizi ▁da ▁ng ' huwa ▁ng ' hulu . ▁Na ▁dizi ▁ijo ▁do ni di hulike ▁di kala ▁fana ▁dizi ▁da ▁wa towa ▁ma p u ti kala nga ▁wowo towa ▁ma p u ti kala nga ▁yawo .
▁Ivo ▁Za ka yo ▁ka hulumuka ▁hasi ▁hima ▁hima ▁na ▁ka muhokela ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu .
▁One ▁uha wa ba manya ▁nawo ▁waha ny ulu lu ka , ▁ukweli ▁niza hulika ▁ndilo ▁yawo .
▁W eye ▁fana ▁viya ▁mazi ▁ya memile , ▁Mbali ▁hwiza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kaidi ▁bule , ▁Kwa viya ▁kugona ▁muna ▁dikomwa ▁jangu ▁na ▁ku mbandama ▁mtumwa ▁wangu , ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁muke ▁weng u ▁hu di hishimu ▁ko mwa ▁da ▁ tati ▁yako .
▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁umanyi ▁vo mwili ? ▁Basi ▁na ya laguse ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁ugen zi ▁wake ▁unogile ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁zinogile ▁zozi tendeka ▁kwa ▁ku nyendanyenda ▁na ▁ubala .
▁Na ▁iviya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ukalangama ▁wake . ▁Teng ' hu ▁kolonga ,
▁M sang ' hani ▁ija ▁mwanamke ▁kamuwona ▁kaidi ▁Petili ▁haja . ▁Ka ndusa ▁kaidi ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁haja , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wawo !”
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya ni taguse .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁iviya ▁siku tagusa ▁bule . ▁ Hita ▁na ▁sekeu ka tende ▁uhasanyi ▁kaidi .”
▁Wa mbwiya ▁zangu , ▁si mwandikilani ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁ mbali ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁yomu kalile ▁nayo ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso . ▁N dagilizi ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁ni ▁usenga ▁uja ▁wo muhulike .
▁na ▁umuh a mbule ▁Haluni ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁u mu ya wa ze ▁Eleazali ▁mwanage . ▁Haluni ▁kezadanganika ▁uko ▁kuna ▁mulima .”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wasegela ▁na ▁wahita ▁kuson hela ▁Sodoma ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka sigala ▁na ▁Bulahimu .
▁U sungu ▁wou galigw a ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wo mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya leke ▁uhasanyi . ▁Na ▁ku leka ▁uhasanyi , ▁ko mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya komboligwe . ▁Ku komboligwa ▁haku gala ▁lugano . ▁Mbali ▁usungu ▁wou galigw a ▁na ▁isi ▁wo gala ▁ifa .
▁Maabaho ▁kawa guma ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu .
▁kwaviya ▁sambi ▁chodaha ▁kukala ▁kweli ▁kwa ▁kuwona ▁mo kwima ▁chigangamavu ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ni ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁kweli ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zose .
▁Isaka ▁ka zenga ▁lupango ▁uko ▁na ▁ka mtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Uko ▁ka simika ▁hema ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁wa himba ▁ sima ▁uko .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wowo kwiza ▁kuja ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁muna ▁zi ndi a ▁zenu ▁za ▁ulondo ▁ bila ▁chinyala . ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁ni ▁fana ▁mi lu we ▁ya ▁kudumbiza ▁yoi daha ▁k udanganiza ▁m eli . ▁Wawo ▁ni ▁fana ▁wa dimi ▁wa ▁wowo ili sa ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁ni ▁fana ▁ma wing u ▁yeli bule ▁mvula ▁yoi he m belu sigwa ▁na ▁mbeho ▁na ▁ni ▁fana ▁mibiki ▁ili bule ▁matunda ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kwa ha ▁ing ' o ligwe ▁na ▁ku nyala ▁ng ' hani .
▁Lelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁vitumetume ▁va ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁mbuli ▁zino .
▁Mwiza lava ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁sambi ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁mhule ▁na ▁nhosa ▁zake ▁za ▁ching ' waji ▁fana ▁viya ▁voilagilizigw a . ▁M n ung ' ho ▁wake ▁unogile ▁wiza mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wa lava ▁usindila ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁ mbali ▁usindila ▁wawo ▁hau wi li nganye ▁bule .
▁“ Na ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁ya vimanyile ▁viyolonda ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁ mbali ▁ha isasale ▁wala ▁kutenda ▁viya londeke ▁na ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁keza towigwa ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Soleni ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁velile ▁vimu li ▁navo ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁vi la ho ▁venu , ▁muhite ▁navo ▁hanhu ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yosefu ▁ka duganya ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁keka ▁kuna ▁yamabululu . ▁Chila ▁bululu ▁keka ▁ndiya ▁kulawa ▁m mi gunda ▁yoi zunguluka .
▁“ Chila ▁siku ▁kwiza lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁dimwe ▁diwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kwiza lu safya ▁ulupango , ▁m aabaho ▁kwiza chi gidila ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁muladi ▁kulu bagula ▁ulupango .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ M tose le ▁Mndewa , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁na ▁u msang ' hanile ▁yeye ▁muhala !’ ▁”
▁Niye ▁ni ▁mwene ▁ugima ! ▁Ni kala ▁ni danganike , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁na m gima ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ni na ▁vi vugul o ▁va ▁ifa ▁na ▁va ▁kuzimu .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko kumbuka ▁chiya ▁chi watendile ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁ko gozela ▁lusita ▁lufaya ▁kuwatagusa .
▁Ka leni ▁meso , ▁im eni ▁chiu gangamavu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo , ▁muwe ▁magalu ▁na ▁wene ▁nguvu .
▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁hakala ▁na ▁ chisima ▁cha ▁Yakobo . ▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁hasi ▁habehi ▁na ▁ chisima ▁icho ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁ka le gela ▁kwa ▁umwanza . ▁L usita ▁uwo ▁i kala ▁saa ▁sita ▁imisi .
▁meza ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁na ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kusom ela ▁ubani ,
▁Viya kalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kohita ▁ukaye , ▁kakala ▁muna ▁ to lo li ▁dodi bulul igwa ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁ko soma ▁chitabu ▁cha ▁Isaya , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha ku languliza ▁u mgalile ▁m zi go ▁wake ▁kwa ▁utali ▁wa ▁ma ili ▁imwe , ▁n galile ▁utali ▁wa ▁ma ili ▁mbili .
▁Yuda ▁kam fu ng iza ▁ zengele ▁Eli ▁mwanage ▁chaudele , ▁kwa ▁muke ▁ya tangigwe ▁Tamali .
▁Maabaho ▁ka guma ▁yamazi ▁muna ▁ichi zi ga , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwa n ava ▁migulu ▁iwa nahina ▁wake ▁na ▁ku hangu sa ▁na ▁chiya ▁ichi ku mbi ▁choya i fu ngile ▁m chigudi .
▁Kwa viya ▁vi umbe ▁vose ▁vi kigwa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁u tawala ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁chakachaka , ▁ku tawala ▁vi woneke ▁si ▁chinhu ▁bule , ▁si ▁fana ▁vi vi londile ▁ mbali ▁fana ▁viyalondile ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁kukala ▁na ▁lolelo ,
▁ mwing ' heni ▁Lufyende ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁muladi ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lu ba na ngigwe , ▁na ▁muhe ▁wake ▁u dahe ▁kukomboligwa ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Wo se ▁weli ▁na ▁moyo ▁wa ▁u nyendanyenda , ▁walume ▁kwa ▁wanaake ▁wa gala ▁ hele ni ▁za ▁kuval a ▁muna ▁im hu la ▁na ▁ hele ni ▁za ▁kuval a ▁muna ▁yama gutwi ▁na ▁ mhete ▁za ▁mi huli ▁na ▁ ba ng ili ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁zahabu , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ka mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁zahabu .
▁Wa ka ya ▁wa ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁vi wawonile ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁ma tanga ▁ha lu bu ga ▁lwa ▁ A ta di , ▁walonga , ▁“ M a tanga ▁yano ▁ya ▁Wamisili ▁ni ▁makulu .” ▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha tangigwa ▁Abeli ▁Misili ▁ili ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .
▁Iviya ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁mwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ino ▁mwiza ilava ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ‚ ▁“ One ▁hawa ku huwile ▁hebu ▁kutogola ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁cha ▁mwanduso , ▁yo dahika ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁chino ▁chekaidi ▁weza chi togola .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wa hulika ▁lung ' husesa ▁wo nyo ng ' o nya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu . ▁Ivo ▁wawo ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wawatum a ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Ku tosela ▁wang wile ▁Yesu .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Nolonda ▁ng ' hani ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁iyo ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁ning ' hali ▁sina gazigwa !
▁Niza bagula ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ulupango , ▁iviya ▁nizawa bagula ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁L ili ▁jojose ▁da ▁ku ka lila ▁munhu ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁ufila ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁dizakuwa ▁jambul a ▁mwiko .
▁Di no ▁di kala ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁kweli , ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁dodi kalile ▁do kwiza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁na ▁kuwa mwemwese la ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Pilato ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁kadumba ▁na ni .
▁Mbali ▁waha wi ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wa tenda ▁vinhu ▁fana ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁uha wi ▁wawo , ▁iviya ▁mabula ▁yeza ▁ya i gubika ▁isi .
▁Wa honye ni ▁watamu , ▁wa zilibule ni ▁wowadanganike , ▁wa honye ni ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁dikulu ▁na ▁wa lave ni ▁vinyamkela . ▁ Mwing ' higwa ▁bule ▁ lave ni ▁bule .”
▁ Zindilil eni ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁zo ni mu la gi li zile ni , ▁muladi ▁mu temeligw e ▁mate ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanenu ▁siku ▁zose ▁vondamu tende ▁yanogile ▁na ▁ya goloke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁“ Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁kudi haka ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁kudi bagula ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose , ▁najo ▁dizakuwa ▁ je la .
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁ A lo di ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁ A le li .
▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁vidi malile , ▁Maliya ▁Magidalena , ▁na ▁Maliya ▁mamiyake ▁yake ▁Yakobo , ▁na ▁Sa lo me ▁wa gula ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁kun ung ' hila ▁muladi ▁wa ka lu b o b o de ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu .
▁Wa ndusa ▁kusegela ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁One ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yahawa ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁one ▁yahawa ▁mulume ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁shekel i ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁hela , ▁one ▁yahawa ▁muke ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁shekel i ▁longo ▁ya ▁hela .
▁Na ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zose ▁zizakuwa ▁za bule ▁faida , ▁kwaviya ▁isi ▁haiza pata ▁ndiya ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁mibiki ▁ha izakwima ▁matunda ▁yoyose .
▁Mwihi ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Niza wa wi nza ▁na ▁ku wagwila , ▁niza gola ▁utajili ▁wawo ▁na ▁kusola ▁vose ▁vini londa . ▁Niza so mo la ▁ng u gulila ▁yangu , ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁wiza wadanganiza .’
▁“ Mwizagaya ▁mweye ▁Mafalisayo ! ▁Kwa viya ▁mwo londa ▁kukala ▁kuna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁haulongozi ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela , ▁na ▁ku la m sigwa ▁muna ya ma g uli lo .
▁M olondeka ▁ku bagula ▁mbuli ▁za ▁chiidumwe ▁na ▁ziya ▁za ▁chila ▁siku , ▁ziya ▁zelile ▁na ▁za mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Mbali ▁ija ▁ha huwila ▁yahalonda ▁kusegela ▁na ya segele . ▁Baho ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁hebu ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ha fu ng ika . ▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁kamtanga ni ▁mweye ▁mukale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .
▁na ▁mabwe ▁yo kwaka ▁ya ▁ sa li doniki ▁na ▁mabwe ▁yo kwaka ▁yamwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mahambo , ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁cha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Ch eye ▁chi leka ▁vose ▁na ▁chi ku sondelela ▁weye !”
▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁zo ni mwing ' hani ▁diyelo ▁kwa ▁faida ▁yenu .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ko lava ▁chinyamkela ▁chochi mtendile ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yawe ▁bu bu . ▁Chi nyamkela ▁vichi mu lawile , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lwa zanywa ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mbali ▁wakala ▁wo londa ▁ng ' hani ▁isi ▁inogile ▁ng ' hani , ▁isi ▁ya ▁kuulanga . ▁Leka mana ▁Mulungu ▁ha wona ▁chinyala ▁waha mtanga ▁yeye ▁Mulungu ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kawa sasalil a ▁bululu ▁jawo .
▁Ka hita ▁kwa ▁Pilato ▁na ▁ku mpula ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu . ▁Baho ▁Pilato ▁kalagiliza ▁yeng ' higwe .
▁Na ▁mulume ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁keza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Leya ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Vino ▁ko gesa ▁mbuli ▁ndodo ▁kuni ho ka ▁mu lu ma ng u ? ▁Lelo ▁ko londa ▁kusola ▁makalanga ▁ya ▁mwanangu .” ▁Laheli ▁kalonga , ▁“ One ▁wa hani ng ' ha ▁makalanga ▁ya ▁mwanago , ▁Yakobo ▁keza gona ▁kumwako ▁chilo ▁cha ▁diyelo .”
▁na ▁ B a se ma ti ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Ishumaili , ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁N e ba yo ti .
▁Mbali ▁Laheli ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁kudanganika , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mwanage ▁zina ▁Be no ni , ▁ mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mwanage ▁zina ▁Benjamini .
▁Niza bananga ▁isi ▁yenu , ▁m baka ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wo ha mila ▁uko ▁weza kwazanywa .
▁Mwiza loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁ Vondamu i sole ▁isi ▁iyo ▁na ▁kukala ▁uko ,
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yenu ▁mui wona ▁sang ' hano ▁ng ' hulu ▁i yatendile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Vonda wa we ▁kunze ▁ya ▁isi ▁yawo , ▁isi ▁iza de ng ' helela ▁siku ▁yake ▁ya ▁ mhumulo ▁baho ▁vondaiwe ▁mahame . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁wawo ▁wa togola ▁ku lamuliligw a ▁nhaguso , ▁kwaviya ▁wa lema ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁na ▁wa ye hila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu .
▁Ka nilongela , ▁‘ Niza k ongeze la ▁wana ▁wengi , ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁wizakuwa ▁kabila ▁kulu , ▁niza weng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wako ▁isi ▁ino ▁kuwa ▁yawo ▁siku ▁zose .’ ▁”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda yeng e ▁mavuta ▁fana ▁yano ▁hebu ▁ku muhaka ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁ha londeka ▁kuhak igwa ▁mavuta ▁yano , ▁keza wing igwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake .’ ▁”
▁Ivo ▁kwaviya ▁chiya ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁kwingila ▁hanhu ▁hake ▁ha ▁kuhumula ▁ching ' hali ▁baho , ▁leka ▁chi i teganye ▁bule ▁ivo ▁imwenga ▁wenu ▁keza ha p u wa ▁hanhu ▁haja .
▁“ L usita ▁ulo ▁ni weng ' ha ▁wasemi ▁wenu ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁‘ Tegelezeni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wakaya ▁wayenu ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁mu taguse ▁voilondeka ▁hagati ▁ya ▁munhu ▁na ▁mkaya ▁ miya ke , ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Ivo ▁ sole ni ▁viya ▁vose ▁va ▁ng ' hondo ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁siku ▁za ▁wihi ▁vondayeze , ▁mu dahe ▁kwima ▁vinogile , ▁na ▁muha itowa ▁m baka ▁kuuhelelo , ▁mwiza gendelela ▁kuwa ▁wa gangamavu .
▁Mbali ▁Wayahudi ▁vi wawonile ▁m ting ' hano , ▁wa wona ▁migongo , ▁wa i lema ▁mbuli ▁i longigwe ▁na ▁Paulo ▁na ▁wa muliga ,
▁Musa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Sambi ▁voni segela , ▁niza mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁igolo ▁ya ya segeze ▁mabumbila ▁yano ▁ya ▁ng ' honzi ▁kumwako ▁na ▁kwa ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁na ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wako . ▁Mbali ▁weye ▁sekeu chi vwizi le ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁kulema ▁kuwa leka ▁wanhu ▁wahite ▁ku mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁na ▁yoni mulavile ni ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁muladi ▁niwe ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Ivo ▁isi ▁yo t e za ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mimeya ▁yoi kwima ▁mbeyu ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁yoi kwima ▁matunda ▁yeli ▁na ▁mbeyu . ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁vinoga .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo ibandama ▁na ▁mnyama ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁“ Mulongele ▁Eleazali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁ya ka segeze ▁vetezo ▁hana ▁umoto , ▁mana ▁vetezo ▁ivo ▁ v ela .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁kumulongela ‚ ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ‚ ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Wa lekelele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite ‚ ▁muladi ▁wa ka nitendele ▁dugila ▁kuichuwala .’ ▁”
▁Abimeleki ▁kamuuza ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Habali ▁kutenda ▁ivo ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁wolanguliz igwa ▁na ▁lukuli ▁hawa daha ▁bule ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Bahobaho ▁viya lawile ▁muna ▁yamazi , ▁ka wona ▁kuulanga ▁ku vu g u ka ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mu hulumukila ▁fana ▁nziwa .
▁na ▁m bu ni ▁na ▁lu ga wa ▁na ▁ ba ta ▁mazi ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁za ▁chi nya ng ' hu wi
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose . ▁Mbali ▁ hita ▁uka i laguse ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁na ▁uka lave ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku honyigwa ▁kwa ko , ▁Musa ▁viyalagilize , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa vimanye ▁kuwa ▁ku hona .”
▁U hasanyi ▁hawiza wa tawala ▁kaidi , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁hamu langulizigw a ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁mo langulizigw a ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya ▁kuhulika , ▁na yahulike !
▁Ka kala ▁galu ▁wa ▁ku sa ka ▁wanyama ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁leka mana ▁wanhu ▁wolonga , ▁“ U we ▁fana ▁Ni mu lo di ▁ya kalile ▁galu ▁wa ▁ku sa ka ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wesaba ▁mwiza itenda ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁ya ▁kuhumula . ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁ku kumbukigw a ▁yondai gong ' o ndigwe ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁da ▁mhalati ▁kutenda ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ch eye ▁cho tagusigwa ▁vi londeka , ▁ivo ▁cho hokela ▁maliho ▁yochi londeka ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁wetu . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ha tendile ▁bule ▁chochose ▁chihile .”
▁“ Mu iyohe ▁kwingila ▁muna u l wi vi ▁lu sisili , ▁kwaviya ▁no mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁weza geza ▁kwingila , ▁ mbali ▁weza potigwa .
▁M olondeka ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁ni ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁na ▁yo mwing ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁M weye ▁si ▁wenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁wa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Waisilaili ▁wa lawa ▁vi si wa ▁va ▁Be ne ▁Ya a ka ni ▁m baka ▁M ose lo si , ▁uko ▁Haluni ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka wandigwa ▁uko , ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁mwanage ▁kasola ▁nyafasi ▁yake ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁ Mwizagaya ▁mweye ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo , ▁Wa delenya ! ▁Kwa viya ▁mo ja ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wagane , ▁na ▁kwa ▁udelenya ▁mo tambika ▁nhambiko ▁nhali . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁nhaguso ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wo londa ▁kukala ▁kuna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁kuulongozi ▁kuna ▁yamadugila , ▁na ▁kukala ▁kuchisogo ▁kuna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka mwikila ▁makono ▁mwanamke ▁iyo , ▁na ▁bahobaho ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁ka go loka , ▁ka mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .
▁ Sambi ▁no mtuma ▁kumwako ▁kaidi , ▁fana ▁moyo ▁wangu ▁wohita ▁nayo .
▁“ Wa la wi ▁ni weng ' ha ▁zaka ▁zose ▁zowo nigalila ▁Waisilaili ▁kuwa ▁uhazi . ▁Yano ▁yezakuwa ▁maliho ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁i wo itenda ▁ya ▁ku kaliza ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Fan a ▁yahawa ▁ni lavigwa ▁sadaka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁na ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁nod eng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kuweng ' hani ▁mweye ▁mose ▁de ng ' ho ▁ijo ▁jose .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wakala ▁wo genda ▁kufose la ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ya ▁uhemba . ▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wa ndusa ▁ku hulu la ▁uhemba , ▁wa u fi gi sa ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yawo , ▁m aabaho ▁wa u ja .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁ya wonile ▁chiya ▁chi lawilile ▁kachilongela ▁ukalangama ▁muladi ▁chi togole . ▁Na ▁chiya ▁chiya chi longele ▁cha ▁kweli , ▁na ▁kovimanya ▁kolonga ▁kweli .
▁Ivo ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mkoma ▁Ogu ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wose , ▁hawa m si gaze ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe . ▁Maabaho ▁wa i sola ▁isi ▁yake .
▁Ivo ▁chi tume ▁ tume ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁cha ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁ni ▁chilaguso , ▁si ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁waja ▁weli bule ▁uhuwilo , ▁ mbali ▁chi tume ▁ tume ▁cha ▁ku lotela ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁waja ▁wohuwila ▁na ▁si ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁weli bule ▁uhuwilo .
▁Wayahudi ▁hawa ni vi kile ▁no iuzagiza ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowose , ▁hawa ni vi kile ▁no wa son geza ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁hebu ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga ▁hohose ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁jawo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwawinga ▁kunze ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁wo chuuza ▁vinhu .
▁Ivo ▁ichilo ▁icho ▁wam ng ' wiza ▁upele ▁ tati ▁yawo , ▁m aabaho ▁ija ▁imndele ▁imdodo , ▁kahita ▁ka ibandama ▁nayo . ▁Mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁lusita ▁mndele ▁wake ▁viya i bandame ▁nayo , ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁yako ligwe .
▁Yesu ▁viya malile ▁kuwa n ava ▁magulu ▁yawo , ▁kayawala ▁ng o lole ▁wake , ▁kabwela ▁ha ▁indiya , ▁kakala ▁hasi . ▁Kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mu yamanya ▁yoni watendele ?
▁Ihaw a ▁Kaini ▁ko lihigwa ▁miyanza ▁saba , ▁Lameki ▁keza lihigwa ▁miyanza ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁saba .”
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁m olondeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁hamu ▁ya ▁ku lotela , ▁ mbali ▁sekemu mu leme se ▁munhu ▁kulonga ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya .
▁“ Mwing ' he ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁‘ Zin o ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁kuson hela ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbula . ▁Nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁izakuwa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁ichilo ▁chose ▁m baka ▁imitondo ▁na ▁moto ▁wake ▁wo kong ' he ligwa ▁muladi ▁sekeu zi mi ke .
▁Mwana ▁ka kula ▁lukuli ▁na ▁muhe . ▁Ka kala ▁mudi b wi li ng u ▁m baka ▁siku ▁viya wa lawilile ▁wanhu ▁muumwingi ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .
▁na ▁niye ▁niza itowa ▁nawo ▁na ▁kuwa gala ▁kuna ▁izisi ▁za ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁midala ▁iha nyendanyenda , ▁nawo ▁wa togola ▁ku tagusigwa ▁kwa ▁wihi ▁wawo ,
▁Ku mwa ke ▁yeye ▁yo daha ▁ku mkaliza ni ▁muladi ▁sekemu gwe , ▁na ▁kumgala ni ▁ bila ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁n he ng ' helelo ▁ng ' hani , ▁m baka ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁utunhizo ▁wake ,
▁Munhu ▁yoya mgalile ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ A za ze li ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁ko ga ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dilago .
▁L wa vu ▁vi lu memile , ▁wa lu kwe ga ▁na ▁wakala ▁hasi . ▁Maabaho ▁wa sola ▁somba ▁wanogile ▁wa weka ▁muna ▁ivi p i p a ▁na ▁somba ▁wehile ▁wawa sa .
▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Melali ▁kakala ▁S uli eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A b i ha ili , ▁wano ▁wa londeka ▁kwika ▁lago ▁jawo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Uno vu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁uwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁mose .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁V ela ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wa vi gala ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vi sole ▁vetezo ▁va ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wowa komigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo , ▁vovi ho ndigwe ▁kuwa ▁vi sisili ▁muladi ▁vi we ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁lupango . ▁Di no ▁dizakuwa ▁lamulo ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁wose .”
▁ Siku ▁dekaidi ▁Yesu ▁na ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁watatu ▁wa hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁ku umulima , ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu iting ' hana ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁Yesu ▁ha dahile ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza ▁yoyose , ▁ila ▁ka wekila ▁makono ▁watamu ▁wadodo ▁na ▁kuwa honye za .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁wake ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ya lave ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁hebu ▁zi ke . ▁M nyama ▁iyo ▁sekeyawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Ni hulika ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁dizi ▁dodi lawile ▁ha lu do n ho ▁ha ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wane ▁dolonga , ▁“ Chi baba ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁uhemba ▁ni ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁da ▁sang ' hano , ▁vi baba ▁vitatu ▁va ▁u ho ni ▁ni ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁da ▁sang ' hano , ▁ mbali ▁sekeu da nganye ▁mavuta ▁hebu ▁divai .”
▁Helode ▁kakala ▁ko mdumba ▁Yohana ▁kwaviya ▁kavimanya ▁Yohana ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yelile , ▁ivo ▁kakala ▁ko mkaliza . ▁Ka kala ▁ko nogelw a ▁kumtegeleza , ▁inga wa ▁kakala ▁ko ny ulu lu ka ▁ng ' hani ▁chila ▁viya malile ▁kumtegeleza .
▁Mkulu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Chiyahudi ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza ▁unogile , ▁nitende ▁choni ▁ni dahe ▁kupata ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁ni ▁ubozi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁ko wagwila ▁wene ▁ubala ▁muna ▁uja n ja ▁wawo ” ,
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kakimbila ▁kuna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁zing ' ombe ▁ka sagula ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁dimwe ▁ng ' ombe ▁di ne ne he , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁msang ' hani , ▁yoya di sasale ▁hima ▁hima .
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁Timoseyo ▁zi leme ▁si mo ▁ziya ▁zili ▁siyo ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁ zilibule ▁fambulo . ▁I funze ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ja ▁damu ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .”
▁U ba la ▁woni u peta ▁ni ▁ubala ▁wa ▁sili ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ubala ▁uwo ▁wou fisike . ▁Wo ya u sagule ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁utunhizo ▁wetu ▁ing ' hali ▁isi ▁yose ▁hai na lu mbigwa ▁bule .
▁ ihawa ▁cho gozela ▁zuwa ▁diya ▁da ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu ▁do chi di lolela ▁lusita ▁vondau lawilile ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu ▁na ▁Mulopozi ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁V o m tosa , ▁mu lekelele ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yoya wa hasanye ▁chochose ▁chiya , ▁muladi ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁nayo ▁ya walekelele ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .”
▁Malagilizo ▁yaja ▁yoyo gala ▁ifa ▁yekigw a ▁kwa ▁kwa ndikigwa ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁vihande ▁va ▁mabwe , ▁inga wa ▁uhelelo ▁wake ▁ukala ▁ifa , ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁ukala ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁hawa dahile ▁kulola ▁chihanga ▁cha ▁Musa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁jake , ▁kaidi ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁da ▁lusita ▁muhala ,
▁Na ▁weye ▁ funya ▁umoyo ▁yaja ▁yehile ▁fana ▁mkalizi ▁yanogile ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Kumbuk eni ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁mukala ▁watumwa ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁leka mana ▁no mulagilizani ▁mutende ▁vino .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mtegeleza ni ▁mweye , ▁ko ni tegeleza ▁niye , ▁na ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mulema ni ▁mweye , ▁ko ni lema ▁niye . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo ni lema ▁niye , ▁ko mulema ▁ija ▁ya ni tu mile !”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mgala ▁ndege ▁iyo ▁kuna ▁ulupango , ▁keza b o b o to la ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ndege ▁iyo ▁na ▁kudi timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango . ▁Da mu ▁ya ▁ndege ▁iyo ▁iza ka migwa ▁na ▁ku mizil igwa ▁kulu ba vu ▁lwa ▁ulupango .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁chitabu ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁nacho ▁chi kala ▁cha ndikigwa ▁mgati ▁na ▁kunze ▁na ▁kusi ng igwa ▁mihul a ▁saba .
▁Wa mgwila ▁Lutu , ▁mwi h wa ▁wa ▁Abulamu , ▁yoya kalile ▁yo kala ▁Sodoma , ▁wa sola ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose , ▁m aabaho ▁wasegela .
▁Mwenevale ▁To fi li . ▁Muna ▁ichitabu ▁changu ▁cha ▁mwanduso , ▁ ny andika ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁Yesu ▁ziya tendile ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁kuson gela ▁viya nduse ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake ,
▁Isaka ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁siku ▁na ne , ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwing iza ▁ulungwana ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Mulongele ▁Haluni ▁ya sole ▁mhome ▁yake ▁na ▁kwii golosa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ nya nda ▁zose ▁na ▁ma ko lo ngo ▁yose ▁na ▁ma lamba ▁yose ▁na ▁mazi mbu ▁yose , ▁nayo ▁yezakuwa ▁damu . ▁Isi ▁yose ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁damu , ▁hata ▁muna ▁iviya ▁vose ▁va ▁m bawo ▁na ▁mabwe .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁“ Vino ▁mwa ▁iwanhu ▁waja ▁iwa ta tu , ▁yelihi ▁ya kalile ▁mkaya ▁miyage ▁ija ▁ yatowigwe ▁na ▁wa bavi ?”
▁Wa nahina ▁waja ▁wahita ▁na ▁kumuwona ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁ka fungigwa ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁wa ▁kaye . ▁V a wakalile ▁wo m fungula ,
▁Viwakalile ▁muu mwa nza , ▁Yesu ▁kagona ▁nhongo . ▁Bahobaho , ▁beho ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani ▁diza ▁mudilamba , ▁ngalawa ▁ya ndusa ▁ku mema ▁mazi , ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wo gaya ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wa lema ▁ku mmanya ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzewele ▁zawo , ▁Mulungu ▁kawaleka ▁wa sondelele ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁yehile , ▁watende ▁yaja ▁yowa go m igwe ▁kuya sang ' hana .
▁Na ▁yeli ▁kumgunda ▁sekeya bwele ▁ukaye ▁kusola ▁viwalo ▁vake .
▁Mbali ▁Zu wa ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁diza kwiza ▁fana ▁mbavi ▁viyo kwiza , ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁ijo ▁ulanga ▁wiza segela ▁kwa ▁m si ndo ▁mkulu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁kuulanga ▁viza na ng igwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁na ▁isi ▁na ▁vose ▁vili umo ▁viza na ng igwa .
▁Cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁zisi ▁zose ▁za ▁wihi ▁zo langulizigw a ▁na ▁Mwihi ▁ija .
▁Mbali ▁chitende ▁dugila ▁na ▁chi de ng ' helela , ▁kwaviya ▁mdodo ▁wako ▁kakala ▁kadanganika ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ngima , ▁kakala ▁ka ga ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ka woneka !’ ▁”
▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁walume ▁kwa ▁wanaake , ▁wowa londile ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wawo ▁ku gala ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁uja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u yamulagilize ▁Musa ▁ usang ' hani ke , ▁wa gala ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ku londa ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁no lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wangu ▁kwa ▁ma a lu fu ▁ya ▁welesi ▁wa ▁waja ▁woni londa ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu .
▁Vino ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁ndodo ▁weye ▁kuchi gala ▁kulawa ▁Misili , ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile ▁muladi ▁uchi kome le ▁kuichuwala ? ▁Iviya ▁ko i tunhiza ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁muladi ▁uwe ▁mkulu ▁wetu ?
▁Kwa viya ▁m baka ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yesu ▁hawa mtogole ▁bule .
▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁no londa ▁kuwalongela ni ▁funhufunhu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zozi m patile ▁wa saho ▁yetu ▁Daudi . ▁Y eye ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka wandigwa , ▁ leme ▁jake ▁da ba hano ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁wose ▁keza somigwa ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁mbende ▁yake ▁na ▁nyama ▁yake ▁na ▁damu ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ma vi ▁yake ▁vose ▁kezavi soma ▁moto .
▁“ L a v eni ▁zaka ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vimu gobola ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu ▁chila ▁mwaka .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka nyama la . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kamuuza ▁kaidi , ▁“ I la he ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁ngima , ▁chi longele ▁one ▁weye ▁iyo ▁Chilisito ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁weza kuwa ▁woi londa ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wene ▁ku londa ▁hela ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wene ▁kui togoza ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wene ▁kuigoda ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wene ▁ku liga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa wa hulika ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo , ▁weli bule ▁hewela ▁na ▁iviya ▁wanhu ▁wehi .
▁“ Habali ▁mwo ni tanga , ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁Mndewa ’ ▁ mbali ▁hamu tenda ▁bule ▁yoni mulongelani ▁mu ya tende ?
▁No mwandikilani ▁usenga ▁uno ▁m guhi ▁kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁Si lo wa no , ▁ndugu ▁yo k waminika ▁fana ▁vini wona . ▁ Nolonda ▁ku mguma ni ▁moyo ▁na ▁ku mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁uno ▁ni ▁kweli ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁I gangamize ni ▁muna ▁unovu ▁uno .
▁N dege ▁wano ▁wose ▁kumwenu ▁wo tibusa . ▁Ma s u mu la ▁na ▁ fu lu k ombe ▁na ▁ma kung ule ,
▁lusita ▁ka wona ▁ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁wa t e lele ▁na ▁wanenehe ▁wa lawa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kuja ▁mgina .
▁Henoko ▁ka pata ▁mwana ▁na ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁I la di ; ▁I la di ▁nayo ▁kamwelek a ▁M e hu ya eli ; ▁M e hu ya eli ▁kamwelek a ▁M e s u sa yeli , ▁M e s u sa yeli ▁kamwelek a ▁Lameki .
▁Musa ▁viya komeleze ▁ku simika ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁kadi boboda ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ku dika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose . ▁Iviya ▁ulupango ▁kalu boboda ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ku l wika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose .
▁Kwa viya ▁kuson gela ▁Chi i l sito ▁viya gazigwe ▁chi lu ku li , ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁m olondeka ▁mui gangamize ▁kupata ▁lungilo ▁fana ▁jake . ▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yo funyila ▁umoyo ▁manhesa ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁ha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁kaidi .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zen ela ▁ko se ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁muna ▁zi isi ▁za ▁ mmabehi .
▁No kumbuka ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁uhuwilo ▁u yakalile ▁nawo ▁wa u ▁yako ▁L o isi ▁na ▁mamiyake ▁yako ▁ E u ni ke . ▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁iviya ▁uhuwilo ▁uwo ▁kuna wo .
▁Muyahudi ▁kweli ▁ni i ja ▁yeli ▁Muyahudi ▁kwa ▁mgati , ▁ni i ja ▁yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana ▁muna ▁umoyo . ▁Na ▁uno ▁ni ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁si ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ya ndikigwe ▁bule . ▁Munhu ▁fana ▁iyo ▁ko hokela ▁nhogolwa ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁si ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu .
▁Kwa viya ▁mwaka ▁uwo ▁ni ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁wizakuwa ▁we la ▁kumwenu , ▁mwiza kuja ▁chinhu ▁chochi ko ta ▁ch e n ye wo ▁muna ▁imigunda .
▁Mbali ▁mwi h wa ▁wa ▁Paulo ▁kahulika ▁m pango ▁uwo , ▁Ivo ▁kahita ▁muna ▁im ho ngo no ▁na ▁kamulongela ▁Paulo .
▁Vi dala ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kufosa ▁ngamiya ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ichi zonzo ▁cha ▁ sa nzi a .”
▁Kwa viya ▁chi mmanya ▁ija ▁ya longile , ▁“ Niye ▁niza lihiliza ▁chi lihi zo , ▁niye ▁niza lihiliza ,” ▁na ▁iviya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁kezawa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wanhu ▁wake .”
▁“ Tat i ▁yangu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vose . ▁Na ▁ habule ▁ya mmanyile ▁Mwana ▁ila ▁Tata , ▁na ▁ habule ▁ya mmanyile ▁Tata ▁ mbali ▁Mwana ▁na ▁yoyose ▁Mwana ▁yoyo londa ▁kun gubulila .”
▁“ One ▁chimvuguya ▁icho ▁chiha lawilila ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yaha mala ▁ku segezigwa ▁yamabwe ▁na ▁ku kwa ng ula ▁cho ka a ▁na ▁kwika ▁cho ka a ▁imwenga ,
▁Ke ng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kutenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuwahuma . ▁Iviya ▁keng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chila ▁kabila ▁na ▁chila ▁isi ▁na ▁chila ▁ulonzi ▁na ▁chila ▁welesi .
▁Mulungu ▁kam winula ▁m baka ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁kuwa ▁M ulangulizi ▁na ▁Mulopozi , ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁wasamhe ▁muladi ▁Mulungu ▁ya walekelele ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁muladi ▁kuwatendela ▁kuilumba .
▁ Chilongele , ▁vino ▁vinoga ▁kuliha ▁kodi ▁kwa ▁Kaisali , ▁hebu ▁havi nogile ▁bule ?”
▁ Haidahika ▁bule ▁munhu ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁uhuwilo , ▁kwaviya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo muhitila ▁Mulungu ▁kolondeka ▁ya huwile ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka uko ▁na ▁kowa gwe ka ▁waja ▁wo iyoha ▁ku mzahila .
▁Mbali ▁niza kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁niha komeleza ▁kufose la ▁Makedoniya , ▁kwaviya ▁no londa ▁kufose la ▁Makedoniya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Izo ▁kumwangu ▁kuchanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁u kale ▁kuno , ▁nizakwing ' ha ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁vili ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zo nya ndike ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwa fu nza ▁Waisilaili .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁muna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁mizaituni , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁waidumwe ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Chilongele ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁ziza lawilila ▁zuwaki ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁cha ki ▁chondachi laguse ▁kwiza ▁kwa ko ▁na ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁“ I cho ▁ni icho ▁chimu m p u lila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kuja ▁Holebu , ▁siku ▁ija ▁vimu iting ' hane ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Seke chi di hulike ▁kaidi ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁hebu ▁sekechi u wone ▁kaidi ▁moto ▁uno ▁mkulu , ▁bule ivo ▁chiza danganika .’
▁Ka hita ▁kuulongozi ▁chidogo , ▁ka y ibwanha ▁hasi ▁na ▁ka tosa , ▁one ▁ihadahika ▁sekeya fose le ▁lusita ▁luja ▁lwa ▁manhesa .
▁“ Habali ▁hamu dile ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁hanhu ▁helile ? ▁Kwa viya ▁icho ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chelile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ mwing ' higwa ▁muladi ▁ku segeza ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁kuilumba ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ku huwila ▁kwaviya ▁ni kulongela ▁kuwa ▁ni kuwona ▁hasi ▁hana ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ? ▁Kwiza wona ▁vinhu ▁vi kulu ▁kufosa ▁vino !”
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁wa ▁ichanduso , ▁Adamu , ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁ugima ,” ▁ mbali ▁Adamu ▁wa ▁kuuhelelo ▁ni ▁Muhe ▁yoyo weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁ugima .
▁“ B ung ' hulo ▁da ▁lukuli ▁lwako ▁ni ▁ziso . ▁One ▁meso ▁yako ▁ya hano ga , ▁lukuli ▁lwako ▁lose ▁lu za kala ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo .
▁Kwa ▁mvunyo ▁yake ▁ya ▁ubazi , ▁cheye ▁chose ▁chi hokela ▁unovu ▁umwe ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁unovu .
▁Wanage ▁Nuhu ▁wowa lawile ▁muna ▁isafina ▁wakala ▁Shemu ▁na ▁Hamu ▁na ▁Yafesi . ▁Hamu ▁kakala ▁niiyo ▁tata ▁wa ▁Kanani .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁luwa bwakila , ▁wawalongela ▁wanyama le . ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa iyoha ▁ku landula ▁ya madizi , ▁“ Mndewa ! ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ! ▁U chi wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁Na ▁hawa hulikik e ▁hata ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁wolonga ▁uvwizi . ▁Kwa viya ▁wabule ▁ubananzi .
▁Ivo ▁wa i ngila ▁mwii di leme , ▁wa muwona ▁mbwanga ▁ya i ya wa lile ▁chiwalo ▁chi ze lu ▁chwee ▁kakala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume . ▁Wa zanywa .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ No mulongelani , ▁waha nyama la ▁wano , ▁mabwe ▁yeza kwandusa ▁ku guta .”
▁Isi ▁yawo ▁i memezigw e ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vinogile , ▁i temeligw e ▁mate ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoyalongile ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁chi ba go ▁chi kwaka ▁moto . ▁Ku temeligw a ▁mate ▁kuno ▁kuwa hulu mu kile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yosefu , ▁yoya kalile ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁Waisilaili ▁wa weng ' he ▁Walawi ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u u hazi ▁wawo . ▁Na ▁wa weng ' he ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudimila ▁wanyama ▁wawo , ▁habehi ▁na ▁yamabululu .
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁welesi ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Nuhu , ▁Shemu ▁na ▁Hamu ▁na ▁Yafesi . ▁Wa no ▁watatu ▁ weleka ▁wana ▁vidi malile ▁di gombo .
▁Y eye ▁kochi taza ▁muna ▁manhesa ▁yetu ▁yose , ▁na ▁muladi ▁na ▁cheye ▁chi dahe ▁kuwataza ▁goya ▁wamwenga ▁muna ▁manhesa ▁kwa ▁ku taza ▁goya ▁iyo ▁ichi hokele ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Balaamu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ka leni ▁hano ▁ichilo ▁chino , ▁niye ▁niza mulongelani ▁mbuli ▁zo nda ya nilongele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .” ▁Ivo ▁walangulizi ▁wawo ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁wakala ▁na ▁Balaamu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa lawilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁muna ▁im handa ▁ya ▁wingu ▁yoi mile ▁muna ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁hema .
▁Mwene ▁kuwa gangamiza ▁wamwenga , ▁na ya tende ▁ivo , ▁munhu ▁yo lava , ▁ya lave ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁welile . ▁Munhu ▁yo languliza , ▁ya langulize ▁kwa ▁kuiyoha , ▁nayo ▁yo lagusa ▁ubazi ▁ya laguse ▁kwa ▁kude ng ' helela .
▁Tata ▁kani sagula ▁na ▁kuni tuma ▁niye ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Lelo ▁m wolonga ▁ni muliga ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁nilonga ▁‘ Niye ▁na ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ’ ?
▁Yakobo ▁ka mkwenhukila ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁nayo ▁kam baba sa ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Di zi ▁jako ▁do hulikik a ▁fana ▁viya ▁dizi ▁da ▁Yakobo , ▁ mbali ▁makono ▁ya linga ▁fana ▁makono ▁ya ▁Esau .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wo lila ▁na ▁ kwimba ▁wila ▁wa ▁usungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mwana ▁yoya danganike . ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemu lile ▁kwaviya ▁mwana ▁ha danganike ▁bule , ▁kagona ▁nhongo ▁muhala .”
▁Mbali ▁waja ▁wowo l ondigwa ▁wawe ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weza kwa sigwa ▁kunze ▁kuna ▁u l wiza , ▁uko ▁weza lila ▁na ▁ku dunda ▁meno ▁yawo .” .
▁Na ▁walonga ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁va ▁ku muliga .
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁ni tendile ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ni weka ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wengi ▁muna ▁ichifungo , ▁nawo ▁viwa tagusigwe ▁kukomigwa , ▁niye ▁ni togola .
▁Wo se ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino , ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ?” ▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁molonga . ▁Iyo ▁niye .”
▁Ka ya lumbiliza ▁mapanzia ▁matano ▁kutenda ▁chi hande ▁chimwe ▁na ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁yaja ▁yamwenga ▁matano .
▁inga wa ▁chi kala ▁chi danganike ▁chimuhe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi , ▁kachi tenda ▁chiwe ▁wagima ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito . ▁Kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mweye ▁mu komboligwa .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁magate ▁hayana gumigw a ▁lusu ▁i fika . ▁Iviya ▁i kala ▁siku ▁yoi londeka ▁ku chinja ▁wana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka .
▁Ch eye ▁ni ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁cheye ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁yeli ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wo muhulika .”
▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁moyo ▁wake ▁wo mulonda ▁kumtendela ▁ye ze ▁na ▁ku mgalila ▁nhosa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁hema ▁ijo , ▁na ▁kwa ▁mawalo ▁yayo ▁yelile ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Ivo ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ukala ▁mdala , ▁hawalek ile ▁Waisilaili ▁wahite , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁kufose la ▁Musa .
▁mana ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Ka i sa gulila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁wawe ▁wake .
▁Helode ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁wa mtendela ▁Yesu ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁kunze ha , ▁wa mu yawaza ▁walo ▁da ▁chifalume , ▁m aabaho ▁wa mbweleza ▁kwa ▁Pilato .
▁Katenda ▁ mhete ▁nne ▁za ▁shaba ▁za ▁kupapila ▁ulupango , ▁ka zi guma ▁chila ▁ching obweda ▁ mhete ▁imwe .
▁Mbali ▁nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁M uhavu ▁ni segele . ▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁siza segela , ▁M tazi ▁heza kwiza ▁kumwenu . ▁Mbali ▁niha segela ▁niza mtuma ▁kumwenu .
▁muladi ▁nyele si ▁zenu ▁wa vimanye ▁kuwa ▁vini wa lavile ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ni watenda ▁wakale ▁muna ▁ivi ba nda . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .’ ▁”
▁Ch a ha longa ▁cha bule ▁uhasanyi , ▁cho i vwizi la ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁ukweli ▁wa mwabule ▁mgati ▁yetu .
▁Seke wa si gaze ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁m baka ▁imitondo , ▁hebu ▁sekewa bene ▁ vu ha ▁jojose ▁da ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁Pasaka . ▁Weza tenda ▁fana ▁vi zi li ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka .
▁Mndewa ▁ka hinduka ▁ka mulola ▁Petili . ▁Petili ▁ka kumbuka ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁iya longeligwe ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁“ Diyelo ▁nz ogolo ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwika ▁bule , ▁weye ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu ▁kuwa ▁hu ni manyile ▁bule !”
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Sol a ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁weli bule ▁chilema , ▁m aabaho ▁wa lave ▁nhambiko ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁kalonga ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ha togoligwa ▁bule ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kau gubula ▁mulomo ▁wa ▁chihongwe ▁iyo . ▁Chi hongwe ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Ni kutenda ▁choni ▁m baka ▁uni towe ▁miyanza ▁ino ▁mitatu ?”
▁Wa ho nda ▁zahabu ▁iyo ▁m baka ▁iwa ▁ sisili ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku kanha ▁nyuzi , ▁muladi ▁kuzi bota ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁vinogile .
▁“ ▁‘ Kwiza tenda ▁fana ▁vino ▁kwa ▁chila ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁hebu ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁mwana ▁luti .
▁“ Chi tende ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁kana ▁mtumwa ▁yoyo lima ▁kumgunda ▁hebu ▁yoyo dima ▁ng ' ombe . ▁Vino ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁viyo bwela ▁kulawa ▁kumgunda , ▁yelihi ▁keza mulongela , ▁‘ Izo ▁ teng ' hu , ▁ kala ▁hasi ▁u je ▁ndiya .’
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ko son gezigwa ▁na ▁tama a ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁ku kwe g igwa ▁na ▁ku namata .
▁Munhu ▁fana ▁iyo ▁sekeya gese ▁kuwa ▁kezahokela ▁chochose ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ,
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁si sang ' hanile ▁hata ▁imwe ▁ya ▁haki ▁zino , ▁na ▁wala ▁ sa ndik a ▁muladi ▁ni pate ▁haki ▁zino . ▁M uhavu ▁ni danganike ! ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁ku segeza ▁magoda ▁yangu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lola ▁chi londa ▁icho ▁ichi bisi ▁na ▁kum gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwaviya ▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yaha mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁ndege , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lave ▁ huwa ▁hebu ▁nziwa .
▁Yesu ▁viya vimanyile ▁chiya ▁chi wakalile ▁wo panga , ▁kasegela ▁hanhu ▁haja , ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela . ▁Ka wahonya ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁watamu ,
▁Na ▁keka ▁haulongozi ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule , ▁ka memez a ▁ ga nza ▁dimwe ▁na ▁kui timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁chila ▁imitondo .
▁Ye ke ▁muumoyo ▁yano ▁yoni longa , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁kezaku taza ▁uya manye ▁yano ▁yose .
▁M tegelezeni ▁na ▁kwa mha ▁cho yo longa ▁sekemu mwe hu le , ▁heza walekelela ni ▁ubananzi ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁na hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Musa ▁ka zenga ▁lupango ▁na ▁kachi tanga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani tenda ▁ni hume .”
▁Mu kala ▁muna ▁isi ▁kwa ▁kui de ng ' hele za ▁na ▁ma da b wa . ▁Mu i ne ne heza ▁mu mala ▁kwa ▁zuwa ▁da ▁ku chinjigwa .
▁Ivo ▁sekem uilumb e ▁na ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Ka mwamha ▁mkono ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ T a li ta , ▁ko u mu !” ▁F a mbulo ▁jake , ▁“ Mndele , ▁no kulongela ▁ lamka !”
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaham dalisa ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chochi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁ bila ▁kuvimanya , ▁basi ▁vondaya vimanye ▁keza kuwa ▁kabananga .
▁Ulon zi ▁uno ▁wa ▁ukweli , ▁“ One ▁chi danganika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁iviya ▁chiza kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yeye .
▁ Chodaha ▁kulonga ▁yayo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kweli ▁ng ' hani ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Yesu ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ No wa wonela ▁ubazi ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁vino ▁lelo ▁zi fika ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁wang ' hali ▁na ▁niye ▁na ▁wabule ▁ndiya . ▁Si londa ▁bule ▁ku walaga ▁wahite ▁mu zi mwa wo ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kuja , ▁seke we ze ▁wa si ndu ke ▁nzila ▁kwa ▁nzala .”
▁Mbali ▁hachi de ng ' helela ▁yayo ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁cho de ng ' helela ▁kugaya ▁kwetu , ▁kwaviya ▁cho vimanya ▁kugaya ▁ko gala ▁ufunya umo yo ,
▁Kwa viya ▁wa tazi ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wowo tenda ▁vinogile ▁ usang ' hano ▁wawo ▁wowa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa wategeleze ▁na ▁wodaha ▁kuwa ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Ka lila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ku gwa ! ▁Ku gwa ▁Babeli ▁bululu ▁kulu ! ▁Ku wa ▁hanhu ▁howo kala ▁chila ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁ tuka ▁da ▁chila ▁mbeho ▁zihile , ▁kuwa ▁chi sa nza ▁cha ▁chila ▁ndege ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁wa ▁kwi hiza .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁ye sita ▁mwiza lava ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁manane ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁waidi ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁longo ▁na ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Yesu ▁kawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kawa dalisa ▁meso ▁yawo . ▁Bahobaho ▁wa daha ▁kuwona , ▁nawo ▁wamsondelela .
▁Na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁we ▁tano ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya , ▁ufalume ▁wake ▁u gumigw a ▁lwiza , ▁wanhu ▁wa ge ge da ▁ndimi ▁zawo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mawine .
▁No kwiza ▁sambi ! ▁Yam ha ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi uli na cho , ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁sekeya ku ho ke ▁gweko ▁jako .
▁Ndugu ▁yake ▁kakala ▁Y u bali , ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁tata ▁wa ▁wose ▁wa vi na ▁wila ▁na ▁wo towa ▁vi m b e ta ▁na ▁vi ngo dongo do .
▁Maabaho ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wahita ▁kufose la ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Pi si diya , ▁wafika ▁Pa m fi li ya .
▁Mbali ▁Sitefano ▁kuno ▁ka mema ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁ka lola ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka wona ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kema ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁M weye ▁mo gesa ▁kuwa ▁lusita ▁luno ▁lose ▁cheye ▁cho i gombela ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ? ▁Cho longa ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kusondelela ▁na ▁viya ▁vichi ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito . ▁Wa nd ugu ▁wa londo ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zose ▁ni ▁kuwa ze nza ▁mweye ▁muna ▁uhuwilo .
▁Mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁ka ku lagusa ▁yano ▁yose , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubala ▁fana ▁weye .
▁“ Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondau watendele ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁kui sondelela ▁na ▁yaja ▁yose ▁yoni ku lagilize , ▁kwiza weka ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Mwihi ▁wa ▁uhelelo ▁yondaya ba na ngigwe ▁keza kuwa ▁ifa .
▁Sekemu chinje ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mwanage ▁siku ▁dimwe .
▁Keza kwika ▁mkono ▁wake ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁be belu ▁na ▁kudi chinja ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku chinjil a ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁wa senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa wawona ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁kuwa ▁lumondo , ▁na ▁wawa sola ▁kuwa ▁wake ▁zawo ▁fana ▁viwa londile .
▁Di zi ▁di longa ▁kaidi ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁‘ Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁choya chi sa f yi le ▁Mulungu ▁sekeu chi tange ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko ,’
▁Kwa viya ▁no londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwa wona ▁mweye ▁mose ▁na ▁ni dahe ▁kun golela ni ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁chimuhe ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁mu gangamale .
▁Nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁wawo ▁wa ilava ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁si ▁kwa ▁ku manya ▁vinogile ▁bule .
▁Ni ivo ▁yili ▁kuwa ▁kezawa gangamiza ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁ mwabule ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁m we lile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁yeli ▁Tata ▁lusita ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁vondayeze ▁hamwe ▁na ▁waja ▁wose ▁weli ▁wake .
▁No de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁nodaha ▁kuwa huwila ▁mweye ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalagiliza ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wose , ▁“ Chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁yonda yelekwe ▁kwa ▁Waebulaniya ▁ya sigwe ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili , ▁ mbali ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike ▁muleke ni .”
▁Chila ▁lusita ▁Musa ▁viya hitile ▁kulonga ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka segeza ▁ichi tambala ▁m baka ▁viya lawile ▁kunze . ▁Viya lawile ▁kunze ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁ziya lagilizigwe ,
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yo fosa ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Galilaya , ▁kawa o na ▁wa vula ▁waidi , ▁Saimoni ▁na ▁Andeleya ▁ndugu ▁yake . ▁Wakala ▁wo vula ▁somba ▁kwa ▁lwavu .
▁Hajili ▁kamwelek ela ▁Abulamu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Abulamu ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Ishumaili .
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waja ▁saba ▁wa kalile ▁na ▁ mahamha ▁saba ▁keza ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁kanilongela , ▁“ Izo , ▁nizaku lagusa ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁m go ni ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dikulu ▁di zengigw e ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁ya ▁ nya nda ▁nyingi .
▁“ ▁‘ D u gila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁do kwandusa ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila , ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁mo si .
▁Na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yahalonda ▁kuku gala ▁kuna ▁ichitala ▁muladi ▁ya sole ▁ s ha ti ▁jako , ▁iviya ▁mu lekele ▁ya sole ▁na ▁di ko ti ▁jako .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Habali ▁muni zahila ? ▁Hamu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁ni londeka ▁ni kale ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Tat i ▁yangu ?”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yahawa ▁ko lotela ▁usenga ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁yaheza ▁munhu ▁ha vimanyile ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁ha huwila , ▁yose ▁yondaya yahulike ▁yeza lagusa ▁wihi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo , ▁yose ▁yondaya yahulike ▁keza mu lamulil a ▁nhaguso ,
▁Tend eni ▁voilondeka ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kukala ▁na ▁ku ihazi ▁isi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha longa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁ kwazanywa , ▁wa longe ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu , ▁imwe ▁imwe , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ya fa mbule
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁niiyo ▁wanhu ▁woya chi ta ngile , ▁si ▁kulawa ▁mwa ▁Wayahudi ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁kulawa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁Maabaho ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁mwiza mzahila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mweye ▁mwiza m pata ▁one ▁muha mzahila ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose .
▁Hu lo ▁vidi komeleze ke , ▁Haluni ▁kabwela ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Iviya ▁wa fundize ▁walala ▁wa ▁chike ▁watende ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁Hawa londeka ▁wawe ▁wa delenya ▁na ▁sekewawe ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ku kolwa . ▁Mbali ▁ wolondeka ▁kufundiza ▁yanogile ,
▁Ni londa ▁kuvimanya ▁chimu ▁chiwa m ta g u si le , ▁ivo ▁ni hulumuka ▁muna ▁ichitala ▁chawo .
▁ Wapete ▁walume ▁kwandusi la ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁m baka ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁wowo daha ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu ▁chinyele , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁cheye ▁hachi dahile ▁bule ▁ku mulava ▁chinyamkela ?”
▁Mbali ▁ ihawa ▁cheye ▁wenyewo , ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁kutogoligwa ▁kuwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁chi woneka ▁kuwa ▁wene ▁uhasanyi , ▁vino ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁kochi taza ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ? ▁ Aka !
▁Ha ku na lawilila ▁mulotezi ▁imwenga ▁ya tendile ▁mauzauza ▁na ▁mawewedeko ▁fana ▁yaja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mtumile ▁Musa ▁kuyatenda ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁na ▁isi ▁yake ▁yose .
▁ Hiteni ! ▁No mtuma ni ▁mweye ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁mgati ▁ya ▁mbwizi .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Alamu ▁wakala ▁U si ▁na ▁Hu li ▁na ▁Ge t eli ▁na ▁Ma shi .
▁Ha manyile ▁chiya kalile ▁kolonga , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁uja , ▁ kala gula ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kezadanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Wayahudi .
▁L usita ▁lu kwiza , ▁kai ▁lufika ▁lu mala , ▁vondamu p wi lili ke ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ukaye ▁yake . ▁M weye ▁wose ▁mwiza ni leka ▁niidumwe . ▁Mbali ▁sili ▁ du mwe ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁na hamwe ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁Zi ya ▁chilo ▁longo ▁na ▁saba ▁na ▁gila mu ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁tano ▁zozi sigale , ▁zi sang ' haniligwa ▁ku tengenezel a ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁mhanda ▁na ▁ku haka ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁uchanyha ▁ha ▁mhanda ▁na ▁kui tendela ▁lukingilo .
▁Kwa viya ▁wose ▁wa lava ▁za wa si gaze , ▁ mbali ▁mgane ▁ino ▁ka lava ▁vose ▁va ya li navo .”
▁Maabaho ▁Andeleya ▁kamsola ▁Saimoni ▁ka mgala ▁kwa ▁Yesu . ▁Yesu ▁ka mulola ▁Saimoni , ▁m aabaho ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁Saimoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁ mbali ▁kwiza tangigwa ▁Ke fa .” ▁Ke fa ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁Petili , ▁Petili ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁luwe .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁Isaka ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu hite ▁Misili , ▁ mbali ▁ kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁m baka ▁vonda nikulongele .
▁Musa ▁kengila ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁na ▁ka kwela ▁kumulima . ▁Ka kala ▁kumulima ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo .
▁“ Mbali ▁nowalongela ▁mwene ▁womu ni tegeleza , ▁wa londeni ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁wa tendeleni ▁yanogile ▁waja ▁wowo mwihila ni ▁mweye .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Ho ba bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁L e u eli ▁M midiani , ▁m koi ▁wake , ▁“ Ch eye ▁cho kwandusa ▁mwanza ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ho yalongile , ▁‘ Niza mwing ' hani ▁hanhu ▁baho .’ ▁W i ze ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁chiza ku tendela ▁yanogile ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁yanogile ▁kuson hela ▁Waisilaili .”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁wa ▁sina go gi ▁dodi tangigwa ▁Ma hulu ▁na ▁da ▁Wa chi le ne ▁na ▁da ▁Wa isi ka nda li ya ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁wa ▁Chilikiya ▁na ▁Asiya , ▁wasegela ▁wa dahe ▁ku ibishil a ▁na ▁Sitefano .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wasegela ▁imwe - i mwe , ▁kwandusi la ▁walala . ▁Yesu ▁ka sigala , ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kakala ▁kema ▁haja ▁haja .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo b wi n ha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁kuchi gubika ▁na ▁de b e , ▁ mbali ▁wochi ka ▁hana ▁ ichingolobweda , ▁nacho ▁chowa mwemwes a ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁ichiheleto .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yahalonda ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁mnyama , ▁ya sagule ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti .
▁Niye ▁Yuda , ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁Yakobo , ▁no mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁womu tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁womu kala ▁muna ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁na ▁ku kalizigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Wawo ▁ni iwawo ▁Waisilaili ▁wapetigwe ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁muna ▁ya mala go ▁kwa ▁mabumbila ▁yawo , ▁wose ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 6 0 3 , 5 5 0 .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁wamulongela ▁Yohana ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose . ▁Na yo ▁kawatanga ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁waidi
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ M tunhize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoya wakombole ni ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁Wamisili ! ▁Y atunhizigwe ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoya wa gombo le ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁kulawa ▁kuu tumwa !
▁Mbali ▁izakuwa ze ▁one ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁wahawa ▁ha waminika ▁bule ? ▁Vino ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁yo lagusa ▁Mulungu ▁ha mi ni ka ▁bule ?
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ya seni ▁lwavu ▁ l wenu ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁ngalawa , ▁na ▁mwiza vu wa ▁somba .” ▁Ivo ▁wa sa ▁lwavu ▁mmazi , ▁na ▁hawa dahile ▁ku kwe ga ▁lwavu ▁kwaviya ▁wa pata ▁somba ▁wengi ▁na ni .
▁Mbali ▁vini wonile ▁kuwa ▁nzila ▁yawo ▁hai hita ▁vinogile ▁na ▁kweli ▁ya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁ni mulongela ▁Petili ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁Muyahudi , ▁ mbali ▁kokala ▁fana ▁viya ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi , ▁siyo ▁fana ▁Muyahudi . ▁Vino ▁lelo ▁kowa s ulu ti za ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kukala ▁fana ▁Wayahudi ?”
▁Wa nahina ▁waja ▁wahita , ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Yesu ▁viyawalagilize ▁kutenda .
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁walondwa , ▁nina ▁hamu ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁kuwa wona ▁kaidi , ▁mweye ▁iyo ▁de ng ' ho ▁jangu ▁na ▁kombelo ▁jangu , ▁ivo ▁walondwa ▁wangu ▁m olondeka ▁m wime ▁chigangamavu ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa .
▁Sekemu itendele ▁vinhu ▁va ▁hela ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁vi we ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁sekemu itendele ▁milungu ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁hebu ▁shaba .
▁Mu vimanya ▁viya ▁vichi gazigwe ▁na ▁vochi li g igwe ▁kuja ▁Filipi ▁ching ' hali ▁hachi na fika ▁kumwenu ▁Sesalonike . ▁One ▁ ihawa ▁kukala ▁na ▁kulema ▁ng ' hani ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kachi guma ▁moyo ▁chi mulongeleni ▁Mbuli ▁yake ▁Inogile ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kudumba .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁imwe ▁weza itowa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁imwenga , ▁na ▁ufalume ▁wiza itowa ▁na ▁ufalume .
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁chike ▁imwe , ▁kakala ▁mulala ▁ng ' hani , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Ana , ▁mwanage ▁Fan u eli , ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli . ▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁na ▁mulume ▁wake ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁kuson gela ▁kusoligwa ▁kwake .
▁Kwa ▁ku wi nza na ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁u ning ' higwe ▁fana ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁u ze nzi ▁mwene ▁ubala , ▁ni ka ▁chandusilo ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ko zenga . ▁Mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ya lole ▁viya ▁vondaya ze ng e ▁uchanyha ▁yake .
▁ Siku ▁ija ▁vondayeze ▁kezahokela ▁utunhizo ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁na ▁kezahokela ▁hishima ▁kwa ▁wahuwila ▁wose . ▁M weye ▁iviya ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mwa iwawo , ▁kwaviya ▁ muhuwila ▁usenga ▁uja ▁wochi mgalile ni .
▁Vino ▁cheye ▁chiza s ulu p u ka ze , ▁one ▁hachi u gesa ▁ulopozi ▁uno ▁mkulu ? ▁Teng ' hu ▁Mndewa ▁mwenyewo ▁kau gong ' onda ▁ukombola ▁uno , ▁na ▁wose ▁wowa muhulike ▁wa chilongela ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁kweli .
▁U tu mbo ▁na ▁mi gong ' ho ▁vi vi komeleze ke ▁ku sunh igwa , ▁Musa ▁kam timbula ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wose ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁mbwiya ▁wa ▁Se li gi yo ▁Paulo , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁ichisiwa , ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁luti . ▁Se li gi yo ▁Paulo ▁kawatanga ▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Sauli ▁wahite ▁kumwake ▁kwaviya ▁ka londa ▁ya hulike ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁simwe ▁dino , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁hawavimanyile ▁chiya ▁cha yalongile .
▁ bila ▁ku hinduka ▁kulume ▁hebu ▁kumoso ▁kusondelela ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kui sang ' hanila .
▁“ Mulungu ▁ yalumbile ▁isi ▁na ▁ulanga ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁mu no ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi , ▁hakala ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu ▁zozi zengigw e ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Wa mgala ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa nza nza ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁na ▁wam kwe za ▁Yesu ▁uchanyha ▁yake .
▁Vino ▁ino ▁yo fambula ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁uno ▁cho bena ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Mbali ▁cho yamha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Mulungu ▁ka sagula ▁vinhu ▁vi nyonde nyonde ▁va ▁isi ▁na ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vovi ze higwa , ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vovi woneka ▁si ▁chinhu , ▁muladi ▁ku bananga ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁isi ▁vovi vi wona ▁chinhu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose , ▁wenevale ▁na ▁ngayengaye ▁wakala ▁wo mtegeleza ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ni ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁yoi manyika ▁‘ lu da b wa ▁lukulu .’ ▁”
▁ Zindilil eni ▁na ▁kutenda ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zino , ▁kwaviya ▁muha tenda ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga ▁vondawa vimanye ▁malagilizo ▁yayo , ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wabala ▁na ▁muna ▁umanyi . ▁Weza longa , ▁‘ Kweli ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁wana ▁ubala ▁na ▁umanyi !’
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawasagula ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁muladi ▁wa di p a pe ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wa msang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁kuwa temela ▁mate ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jake ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Igolo ▁wii da we ▁ng ' hani ▁uhite ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁u mulongele ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Waebulaniya , ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Wa lekele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite ▁muladi ▁wa ka ni tose le .
▁Mbali ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Kola ▁hawa danganike .
▁Ivo ▁viyalondile ▁ku lagusa ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁hamwande ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁uli bule ▁ningo ▁kwa ▁ulondo ▁uya ching ' hile ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Mulungu ▁ka mulagusa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁ng ' hani ▁Sitefano ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ludabwa , ▁ka tenda ▁mauzauza ▁makulu ▁na ▁mawewedeko ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁wanhu .
▁N ha g u so ▁yawo ▁izakuwa ▁kunangigwa ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁ku ba guligwa ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁utunhizo ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁ufunya umo yo ▁u londeka ▁u komeleze ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁ku kangala ▁na ▁mu me me ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁ bila ▁ku hungukilw a ▁chochose .
▁Kwa viya ▁vomu ja , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kolongo lela ▁kusola ▁ndiya ▁yake . ▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁kana ▁nzala , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ka ko ligwa .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁wawa mbigwa ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁yehile ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yawo .
▁U langa ▁u dege ka ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁fana ▁viya ▁chitabu , ▁m aabaho ▁vi zi ngilizigwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁ lili ▁vidi zi ngilizigwa ▁na ▁migongo ▁yose ▁na ▁vi si wa ▁vi segezigwa ▁hanhu ▁hake .
▁“ Malagilizo ▁yoni mwing ' hani ▁diyelo ▁siyo ▁ma dala , ▁hebu ▁ha yeli ▁kutali ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Na ▁iviya ▁lolelo ▁do chi li na jo ▁kumwenu ▁ya gangamala , ▁kwaviya ▁cho vimanya ▁mwaha ihangany a ▁muna ▁ya manhesa ▁yetu , ▁iviya ▁mo ihangany a ▁muna ▁ku taza ▁kwetu .
▁Be la ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Be wo li ▁kakala ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Edomu . ▁Bul ulu ▁jake ▁di tangigwa ▁Di ni ha ba .
▁“ Chi lo ▁chikulu , ▁nyangi ▁zi g u ti gwa ▁kunze , ▁‘ Izoni ▁m sola ji ▁kafika ! ▁L a we ni ▁muhite ▁muka muhokele !’
▁Maabaho ▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁kulawa ▁Ku u langa ▁ka mulawilila ▁Zakaliya , ▁kema ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁chilingo ▁cha ▁ku fukiz ila ▁ubani .
▁Mulungu ▁kaha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁“ L a nga .” ▁I wa ▁imitondo ▁iwa ▁ichigulogulo , ▁siku ▁yekaidi .
▁“ Chilongele ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁ziza lawilila ▁zuwaki , ▁yayo ▁yose ▁yeza lawilila ▁zuwaki ? ▁Na ▁vilaguso ▁vilihi ▁vonda vi laguse ▁kuwa ▁yayo ▁yose ▁ya ▁ mmabehi ▁kulawilila ?”
▁Viwafikile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku hulu lila ▁na fa ka ▁wa ▁ A ta di , ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁luholozi ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lukulu , ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁ka mtendela ▁mwenekwaga ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ma tanga ▁ya ▁siku ▁saba .
▁N he mo ▁i kigwa ▁i mala ▁muna ▁yamazi zi ▁ku kanha ▁mibiki , ▁ivo ▁chila ▁mbiki ▁uja ▁ha wima ▁matunda ▁yanogile ▁wiza kanhigwa ▁na ▁kwa sigwa ▁muumoto .”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu , ▁“ Vi muwona ▁ma wing u ▁yokwiza ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁u s h we lo ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁baho ▁molonga , ▁‘ M vula ▁iza to nya ,’ ▁na ▁kweli ▁yo to nya .
▁Na wo ▁viwa gendelele ▁kumuuza , ▁kenuka , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁uhasanyi ▁vimwili ▁na ▁yawe ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kumtowa ▁dibwe .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga , ▁“ Niye ▁niiyo ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vose .” ▁Niiyo ▁yeli ▁uko ▁na ▁ya kalile ▁uko ▁na ▁yonda ye ze ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁wose .
▁Na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁muna ulu ng ' husesa ▁luja ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁ka landula ▁dizi ▁jake , ▁“ Mfundiza ! ▁ Nokulamba ▁u mulole ▁mwanangu , ▁ni ▁mwanangu ▁yaidumwe .
▁Yeli hi ▁yondaya dahe ▁kuchi bagula ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Chilisito ? ▁ Yodahika ▁uzidilwa ▁hebu ▁kugaya ▁hebu ▁manhesa ▁hebu ▁nzala ▁hebu ▁u ngaye ngaye ▁wa ▁ku p u wa ▁viwalo ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondo ▁hebu ▁ifa ?
▁“ Izoni ▁mu muwone ▁munhu ▁yoya nilongele ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi nitendile . ▁Vino ▁ino ▁kodaha ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ?”
▁Maabaho ▁ka zenga ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kusom ela ▁ubani ▁kwa ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mkenge . ▁U tali ▁wa ▁lupango ▁ulo ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁vi ilinga , ▁utali ▁ukala ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁ukala ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁tano ▁na ▁chimo ▁chake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁kenda . ▁M ahembe ▁ya ▁lupango ▁ulo ▁ya kala ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁lupango ▁lwenyewo .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁ habule ▁mtumwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁wala ▁ habule ▁mtumigwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ija ▁ya mtumile .
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Nuhu ▁yoya kalile ▁yo tenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁m ka mili fu ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wake . ▁Nuhu ▁kakala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ditwi ▁da ▁mulume ▁ni ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁ditwi ▁da ▁mwanamke ▁ni ▁mulume , ▁na ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁Mulungu .
▁Viya muwonile ▁Petili ▁ko ko t ela ▁moto , ▁kam bunhul ila ▁meso ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hata ▁weye ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁M na za le ti .”
▁Ya yo ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁Musa ▁woya watumile ▁wahite ▁kui pelemba ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Iyo ▁Ho s he a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni , ▁Musa ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yoshua .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ hani londa ▁niye ▁ha yamha ▁bule ▁Malagilizo ▁yangu . ▁Na ▁mafundizo ▁yo muhulike ▁siyo ▁yangu ▁bule , ▁yo lawa ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁yanhumile .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ndusa ▁kulongelela ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁manhesa ▁yawo . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyahulike , ▁kehilwa ▁na ▁ka wagalila ▁moto . ▁Mo to ▁uwo ▁wa ka ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁na ▁u timbula ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁wa ▁lago .
▁Mbali ▁Mafalisayo ▁walonga , ▁“ M wene mba go ▁iyo ▁ya mwing ' hile ▁Yesu ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku wing a ▁vinyamkela .”
▁Niza kwing ' ha ▁welesi ▁mwingi i ▁na ▁makabila ▁mengi ▁na ▁wafalume ▁weza lawa ▁kumwako .
▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wawo ▁hawa msang ' hanila ▁Chilisito ▁Mndewa ▁wetu , ▁ mbali ▁wo sang ' hanila ▁viwo londa ▁wawo ▁wenyewo . ▁Kwa ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁zinogile ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁ku he m b ele za ▁wo wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁mi yoyo ▁inogile .
▁muladi ▁hata ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁sekeya bwele ▁kuchisogo ▁na ▁manhesa ▁yano ▁yochi pata . ▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁mu vimanya ▁vinogile ▁kuwa ▁chi londeka ▁kupata ▁magayo ▁yayo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi , ▁kweli ▁kabananga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁viya ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁“ Chila ▁mwana ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁kela ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa .”
▁M ibiki ▁iyo ▁ya ▁kupapila ▁iza sigala ▁muna ▁zi mhete , ▁sekei se gezigwe .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁“ Kwa ▁ivo ▁vo wi di ke , ▁ hita ▁ukaye , ▁na ▁kwiza mfika ▁chinyamkela ▁ka mulawa ▁mndele ▁wako !”
▁Chi kale ▁vinogile ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanhu ▁wochi kala ▁ha bu ng ' hu ke ▁imisi , ▁si ▁kwa ▁u melo ▁na ▁u ng ' waji ▁na ▁u nyolo do ▁na ▁u w ashelati ▁na ▁ndwagi ▁hebu ▁migongo .
▁Ni wona , ▁na ▁ lola ▁falasi ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ija ▁ya kweli le ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁kakala ▁na ▁u pinde , ▁keng ' higwa ▁kombelo . ▁Na yo ▁kalawa ▁kuno ▁mu huma ji ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kugendelela ▁ku huma .
▁Vini kalile ▁na ▁mweye ▁si nga zile ▁munhu ▁ye yo se ▁ija ▁haja ▁vini londile ▁vinhu , ▁ndugu ▁wa lawile ▁Makedoniya ▁wa nigalila ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni londile . ▁Seke ni we ▁mbahasha ▁kwa ▁vovose ▁viya , ▁na ▁iviya ▁niza gendelela ▁kusang ' hana ▁ivo .
▁Wakala ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weli ▁na ▁nguvu ▁na ▁wa tali ▁fana ▁Wa a na ki . ▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wadanganiza ▁viwafikile ▁Waamoni ▁wowa i solile ▁isi ▁yawo ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo ▁ ba dala ▁yawo .
▁Petili ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kolonga , ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kawa hulumukila ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁wo tegeleza ▁usenga ▁wake .
▁Lameki ▁viya malile ▁kumwelek a ▁Nuhu , ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁matano ▁na ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁mitano ▁na ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza , ▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁wowo mzahila ▁wa mkome ▁siyo ▁ino ?
▁One ▁muhawa hasanya ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁fana ▁ivo ▁na ▁kwa giza ▁lungilo ▁jawo ▁nyondenyonde ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mu muhasanya ▁Chilisito .
▁Vi umbe ▁vose ▁vo gozela ▁ng ' hani ▁ku gubuligwa ▁kwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
