▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Abulamu , ▁“ Ni galile ▁ng ' ombe ▁muke ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁mwana ▁luti ▁muke ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁da ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁ huwa ▁na ▁ ki nda ▁da ▁nziwa .”
▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁ mshitak a ▁wako ▁ko ku gala ▁kwii chi ta la , ▁iyo he ▁ uilumb e ▁nayo ▁muhawa ▁mung ' hali ▁muna ▁inzila . ▁Fan a ▁si ▁ivo ▁msemi ▁kezaku gala ▁kwa ▁wakulu , ▁nawo ▁weza kwika ▁mchifungo .
▁“ Ku mbu ke ni ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁na ▁mu zi ke ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁na ▁muna ▁i mihe ▁yenu . ▁Zi funge ni ▁zi we ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu ▁na ▁mu zi v a le ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁venu ▁fana ▁lukumbuso .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuhita ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁imwe ▁imwe , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Abulamu , ▁“ Segel a ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako , ▁leka ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁na ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yako ▁na ▁uhite ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yonda ni kula g u si le .
▁Lu no ▁ni ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S hu ha mu , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 6 4 , 4 00.
▁Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁dimwenga , ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁kufundiza ▁wanhu ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela . ▁Mu ja ▁mgati ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁mukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁ka holo la ▁mkono ▁wa ▁kulume .
▁“ ▁‘ Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza kwandika ▁ma duwilo ▁yano ▁muna ▁ichi b e nde ▁na ▁kuya sunh a ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁yeli ▁usungu ,
▁Na ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁vino ▁vichili , ▁cho da mila ▁na ▁ku londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kupata ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁kuulanga
▁na ▁ku mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile . ▁Keza gala ▁zi ke ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁zi ke ▁da ▁luti ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jake ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁maliho ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁One ▁muke ▁ya soligwe ▁yaha ilaha ▁hebu ▁ya he ka ▁chilagano ▁yahawa ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁mulumake ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁chiya ▁chiyatendile ▁Yesu , ▁wa uza , ▁“ Ino ▁kodaha ▁kuwa ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ?”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁yo mtenda ▁vihile ▁miyage ▁ka msung ' ha ▁Musa , ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Vino ▁yelihi ▁ya k wi kile ▁weye ▁kuwa ▁mtawala ▁na ▁m ulamuzi ▁wetu ?’
▁Pilato ▁kalu w u uza ▁kaidi ▁lung ' husesa ▁ulo , ▁“ M o londa ▁ni mtende ▁choni ▁ino ▁imu mtanga , ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?”
▁Mbali ▁viyakalile ▁ko segela , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ One ▁Mulungu ▁yahalonda ▁niza kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁kaidi .” ▁Maabaho ▁ka kwela ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁kasegela ▁Efeso .
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁Isaya , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Munhu ▁ko tanga ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁dibwilingu , ▁‘ Mu i ta nde ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa . ▁Muha golose ▁hanhu ▁honda ya fose .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Habali ▁kolonga ▁uha daha ! ▁Niye ▁no kulongela , ▁yose ▁yo dahika ▁kumwake ▁yoyo huwila .”
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁Yohana ▁kamuwona ▁Yesu ▁ko mwizila , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Loleni ! ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoyose geza ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁isi !
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁waha mbula ▁mahambo ▁yawo ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holebu .
▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Naholi , ▁kezachi humiza ▁niye ▁na ▁weye . ▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁ka ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mtendile ▁Isaka ▁ya mdumbe .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mwiza da nga ni kila ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁chino .
▁“ ▁‘ Zindilil a ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁na ▁u itende ▁iwe ▁yelile , ▁fana ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁vini ku lagilize .
▁Ni dumba , ▁ivo ▁ni hita ▁ni di fisa ▁sanduku ▁da ▁hela ▁muna ▁umsanga . ▁Lola ▁hela ▁yako ▁ a i no .’
▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁S uko si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁uko ▁ E sa mu ▁mu imhaka ▁ya ▁ichuwala .
▁Mbali ▁walo ▁diya ▁di lawile ▁chimvuguya ▁di ha mala ▁ku fu wi gwa ▁do londeka ▁ku fu wi gwa ▁kaidi , ▁ivo ▁do kuwa ▁ je la .”
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁milungu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁kau guma ▁ziza ▁ubala ▁wawo , ▁sekewa dahe ▁kulola ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁yeye ▁yeli ▁sisil a ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Na yo ▁siyo ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wowadanganike ▁ mbali ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wagima , ▁kwaviya ▁wose ▁wokala ▁kumwake ▁wana ▁ugima .”
▁Wa nhu ▁we mile ▁haja ▁wo lola . ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁Chiyahudi ▁nawo ▁wakala ▁wo n zeha , ▁walonga , ▁“ Ka wakombola ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁leka ▁ya i kombole ▁mwenyewo ▁fana ▁yeye ▁Chilisito , ▁Mulopozi ▁yoya saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu !”
▁Chila ▁mbiki ▁ukala ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁nne ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Vino ▁hamu kumbuka ▁kuwa ▁vini kalile ▁na ▁mweye ▁ni mulongelani ▁yano ▁yose ?
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁mwiza gong ' onda ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu tende ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁chila ▁siku . ▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁do londeka ▁di zindililigw e ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu , ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁homukala .
▁ Siku ▁ye nane ▁Gamali eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P e da s uli , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁U mwaka ▁mukala ▁hamu mmanyile ▁Mulungu , ▁ivo ▁mukala ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁vi umbe ▁kwa ▁kweli ▁siyo ▁milungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mfalume ▁Agilipa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁mkowa ▁na ▁Be ni ke ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wenu ka ,
▁One ▁mulume ▁yaha mbandama ▁muke ▁yeli ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake , ▁wose ▁waidi ▁ wolondeka ▁wa ba guligwe ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wawo . ▁M ulume ▁iyo ▁ka mbandama ▁muke ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁yeli ▁na ▁damu , ▁na ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ka ba nda migwa ▁na ▁mulume ▁kuno ▁kana ▁damu .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kaha londa ▁kuwa nogeza ▁wanhu , ▁ivo ▁ka mulekela ▁Balaba ▁kulawa ▁mchifungo . ▁Maabaho ▁kalagiliza ▁Yesu ▁ yatowigwe ▁mibalati ▁na ▁yawa mbigwe ▁mu ▁msalaba .
▁Na ▁niye ▁ni tendigw a ▁kuwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wo mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁iya ning ' hile ▁kwa ▁yanogile ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zinogile , ▁sang ' hano ▁yenyewo ▁ni ▁kui tenda ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i manyike ▁goya .
▁Mbali ▁waja ▁iwa ba la ▁wa sola ▁mavuta ▁mwii zi ny hu p a ▁zawo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ma weng e ▁yawo .
▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁“ Niye ▁na habehi ▁kudanganika , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁keza we zila ▁na ▁kwika ▁goya ▁na ▁kezawa lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino ▁na ▁kuwa gala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yo yawala hile ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo .”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mwiza kala ▁mudi bu ng ' hulo ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo . ▁Ge nde ni ▁na ▁dibu ng ' hulo , ▁ding ' hali ▁ziza ▁hadi na mfika ni ▁na ▁kuwahuma . ▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yo genda ▁ ndi zi za ▁ha manya ▁ko yo hita .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Meliba , ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁Waisilaili ▁howa mulongele le ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁kai lagusa ▁mwenyewo ▁kuwa ▁kela ▁hagati ▁yawo .
▁N y elesi ▁zikwiza , ▁wanenu ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wolawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁kutali ▁weza wona ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya i galile ▁isi ▁ino ▁magayo ▁na ▁matamu .
▁“ Kwa ▁lungilo ▁ijo ▁ni hita ▁Damasiki ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ni g wila ▁vini kalile ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁wa geza ▁kunikoma .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa gala ▁nyuzi ▁zawo ▁za ▁buluu ▁hebu ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁hebu ▁chitani ▁chinogile ▁hebu ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁luti ▁hebu ▁mbende ▁za ▁ng ' hondolo ▁di ha kigwe ▁ langi ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁hebu ▁mbende ▁za ▁wanyama ▁wamwenga .
▁One ▁nyama ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁iha digwa ▁siku ▁yetatu , ▁munhu ▁ya i lavile ▁heza togoligwa , ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁haiza petigwa . ▁ Nyama ▁iyo ▁ya mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya i je ▁kezatagusigwa .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Waisilaeli ▁wa loka ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu ▁fana ▁muna ▁isi ▁inyalile , ▁ mbali ▁Wamisili ▁viwa londile ▁ku loka ▁yamazi ▁wang ' wa ▁ng ' ha bu ▁wadanganika .
▁Labani ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M uhavu ▁ni kwing ' he ▁weye ▁Laheli ▁se mbuse ▁kumwing ' ha ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose . ▁Ge ndele la ▁kukala ▁hano ▁na ▁niye .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Daudi ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu ▁vino , ▁‘ Ni muwona ▁Mndewa ▁haulongozi ▁ hangu ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁na ▁niye ▁siza dumba ▁bule .
▁Wawo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Lelo ▁cho vimanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁weye . ▁Ivo ▁chi itogolela ▁yo faya ▁chi ilahile ▁na ▁kutenda ▁lagano ▁na ▁weye ,
▁Mbali ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili ▁kwiza kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁ndilo ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁tindiwalo , ▁baho ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niiyo ▁yowa bagula ▁Wamisili ▁na ▁Waisilaili .’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁ku londa ▁ng ' hani ▁hela ▁ni ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁chila ▁wihi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa londa ▁ng ' hani ▁hela ▁wa leka ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁na ▁wa i lumiza ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani .
▁ Tegelezeni ▁no mulongelani ▁sili , ▁cheye ▁chose ▁hachiza danganika , ▁ mbali ▁chose ▁chiza galusigwa .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁ya hasanyi gwe ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ka bule ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁yoyo daha ▁kuhokela ▁chinhu ▁icho , ▁basi ▁maliho ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁yeza lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁Ma li ho ▁yayo ▁yeza lavigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁da ▁kuilumba ▁dondadi sang ' hani ligwe ▁ku tende ligwa ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kezadanganika ▁fana ▁M aandiko ▁va ya ndikigwe . ▁Mbali ▁keza gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yomu hinduka ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu . ▁Ihaw ile ▁muhavu ▁fana ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁sigambe ▁ yelekigwe !”
▁M sang ' hani ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁ma sanduku ▁matano , ▁ka gala ▁ma sanduku ▁yamwenga ▁matano , ▁kamulongela ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁ku ning ' ha ▁ma sanduku ▁matano , ▁na ▁hano ▁hana ▁ma sanduku ▁yamwenga ▁matano ▁ya ▁hela ▁faida ▁yoni patile .’
▁Wawo ▁ni ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁ ny ela , ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁ng e da , ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁d ulu du lu ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁se m vu le .
▁Si londa ▁bule ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁yoni londa ▁kutenda , ▁ mbali ▁notenda ▁yehile ▁yaja ▁si ya londa ▁kuyatenda .
▁“ Mfundiza , ▁Musa ▁ka c ha ndi kila ▁lagilizo ▁dino , ▁‘ Fan a ▁munhu ▁yahadanganika ▁na ▁ku leka ▁muke ▁mgane ▁yeli bule ▁mwana , ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yafile ▁kolondeka ▁ya msole ▁mgane ▁iyo , ▁muladi ▁ya mu lele le ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wana .’
▁Mbali ▁niza watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wondawa wa sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁watumwa ▁na ▁hamwande ▁weza sola ▁vinhu ▁vingi .
▁na ▁wanaake ▁hawa i bandame ▁na ▁walume ▁wakala ▁ 3 2 ,000 .
▁Mfalisayo ▁ija ▁yoya m goneke ▁Yesu ▁viya wone ▁yayo , ▁ka ilongela ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁one ▁ya wile ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁yaha vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁yoyo n dalisa ▁ni ▁mwene ▁uhasanyi !”
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁wanhu ▁wa ilungila ▁kwiza ▁wa mtende ▁mfalume ▁kwa ▁nguvu , ▁kawa ba nga , ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁yaidumwe .
▁Yaha wile ▁vinoga ▁kumwawo ▁one ▁hawa i manyile ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁kufosa ▁ku imanya ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁ku leka ▁lagilizo ▁jelile ▁do wa di hokele .
▁Maabaho ▁Isaka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwanangu , ▁ni kwenhukile ▁uni no ne le .”
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ M o yo ▁wangu ▁wo sa fa gila ▁ng ' hani ▁habehi ▁na ▁kudanganika . ▁Ka leni ▁hano , ▁mukale ▁meso ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye .”
▁ Habali ▁kwo ni uza ▁niye ? ▁Wa uze ▁wanhu ▁wowa ni hulike . ▁Wawo ▁wa vimanya ▁chi ni longile .”
▁Mbali ▁m uilumb e ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁ lekeni ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁na ▁tama a ▁zake .
▁Ivo , ▁sekemuwe ▁wa b wa , ▁ mbali ▁muwe ▁fana ▁waja ▁wohuwila ▁na ▁wene ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁weza hokela ▁yaja ▁ya chi laganile ▁Mulungu .
▁ Mwizagaya ! ▁M wo zenga ▁maleme ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowa komigwe ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Mbali ▁wang ' onyo ▁wamwenga ▁weli ▁na ▁mabawa ▁wowo gendela ▁migulu ▁mine ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁migulu ▁yoi wa da hiza ▁ku zumha , ▁modaha ▁kuja .
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ ▁‘ Mulonde ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wako ▁wose , ▁na ▁kwa ▁muhe ▁wako ▁wose , ▁na ▁kwa ▁nzewele ▁zako ▁zose .’
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Y oyose ▁yoyo londa ▁kuigoda ▁kolondeka ▁ya igode le ▁yaja ▁yoyatendile ▁Mndewa .”
▁“ Tend a ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁M agate ▁Ha ya gumigw e ▁L usu . ▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁kwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁fana ▁vini ku lagilize ▁lusita ▁lwikigwe ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁ A b i bu . ▁Mana ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁uwo ▁ku lavigwa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kulonga , ▁kamulongela ▁Saimoni , ▁“ I gale ▁ingalawa ▁m baka ▁hana ▁yamazi ▁mengi , ▁m aabaho ▁mwa se ▁nyavu ▁zenu ▁mmazi ▁mu vu le ▁somba .”
▁na ▁mulumake ▁yaha hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁na ▁ham go me se ▁hebu ▁kumulongela ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁baho ▁vi la ho ▁na ▁vi lagano ▁vake ▁vose ▁viza mfunga .
▁Vino ▁ha muwona ▁bule ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vose ▁vi zakuwa ▁vinhu ▁vetu ? ▁Lelo ▁chi i togole le ▁nawo ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye .”
▁N yambenyambe ▁iyo ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁m olondeka ▁mukale ▁nayo ▁vinogile ▁fana ▁mkaya ▁mi ye n u . ▁Mu mulonde ▁fana ▁vomu i londa ▁we n ye we , ▁mana ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mukala ▁nyambenyambe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Mbali ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Sitefano ▁ubala ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga , ▁hawa dahile ▁kui hasanya ▁nayo .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ peta ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁voilagilizigw e .
▁Kwiza tengenez a ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁hema ▁vino , ▁mibiki ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi
▁Ka m n ye nda ni n ye nda ni ▁na ▁ka muleka ni ▁ muwone ▁nzala ▁na ▁hamwande ▁kamwing ' hani ▁mana ▁muje , ▁ndiya ▁hamu i manyile ▁hebu ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁hawa i manyile . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁yam funze ni ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁hawa ▁mgima ▁kwa ▁gate ▁muhala , ▁ila ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mbuli ▁iyo longa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Chi mwidika , ▁‘ Hachi daha ▁kuhita , ▁ mbali ▁hachi hokel igwa ▁m baka ▁chihite ▁na ▁mdodo ▁wetu . ▁One ▁heza hita ▁na ▁cheye ▁bule ▁hachi daha ▁ku ho ki ligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁ija .’
▁Maliya ▁ino ▁iyo ▁ija ▁yoya b o b o de ▁magulu ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁kun ung ' hila ▁goya ▁na ▁kuya hangu sa ▁kwa ▁m vili ▁zake . ▁Lelo ▁Lazalo ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁iyo ▁ya kalile ▁mtamu .
▁Baho ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁vi lu kalile ▁lo msondelela ▁Yesu , ▁Yesu ▁kawa hindukila , ▁kawalongela ,
▁Ni hawa ▁ning ' hali ▁no mwing ' hani ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁si mtogoza ni ▁kwaviya ▁m iting ' hano ▁yenu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁yo gala ▁yehile ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁vinhu ▁vinogile .
▁Ha nhu ▁honda ha lawilile ▁chila ▁ jo zi ▁ya ▁matambi ▁yaja ▁sita , ▁hasi ▁yake ▁heza kuwa ▁na ▁ tu mba ▁dimwe ▁dimwe .
▁One ▁munhu ▁ko mwihila ▁miyage , ▁m aabaho ▁ko msung ' ha ▁hebu ▁ko mwa sila ▁chinhu ▁kwa ▁kum sepa ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Leka ▁isi ▁i lave ▁chila ▁modeli ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁vilumb e ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima , ▁wanyama ▁wo wofugigwa ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ,” ▁i lawilila ▁ivo .
▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁kweli ▁ni ▁moto ▁wo udanganiza .
▁Kaidi ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ni ▁kuilumba .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha wona ▁upipi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁siyo ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ha ha gi di mile ▁ mbali ▁ha fi la , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Keza mgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁nayo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁ ga nza ▁da ▁usage ▁unogile ▁na ▁kuu timbula ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁ku lavila ▁nhambiko ▁fana ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁lukumbuso , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Kawalongela ▁wakalizi ▁wa mkome ▁kwa ▁panga ▁Yakobo ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Yohana .
▁Mu vimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁niiyo ▁Mulungu ▁yo k waminika . ▁Keza kwika ▁lagano ▁jake ▁na ▁ku lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁za ▁waja ▁wo mulonda ▁yeye ▁na ▁wo zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁m baka ▁nyele si ▁alufu .
▁na ▁keka ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ ulangulizi ▁wake ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁hana ▁ ulangulizi ▁wa ▁munhu .” ▁Mulungu ▁ha le kile ▁chinhu ▁hata ▁chimwe , ▁ mbali ▁hata ▁vino ▁sambi ▁hachi na wona ▁munhu ▁keng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁ha chanyha ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁M ibiki ▁yose ▁kwiza ihaka ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi tendela ▁ mhete ▁za ▁zahabu ▁zo nda za mhilile ▁mapa lo ▁yayo , ▁izo ▁iviya ▁kwiza zi haka ▁zahabu .
▁Na ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁hawa muhokele ni ▁hebu ▁kuwa tegeleza , ▁ segele ni ▁hanhu ▁baho , ▁na ▁kung ' hu ne ni ▁m atimbwisi ▁yeli ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁yenu , ▁ku lagusa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁kuwa ka nya .”
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ go go ▁wazi sola ▁hela ▁izo ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁yetu ▁hachi londeka ▁bule ▁kuzi ka ▁mwi ingama ▁ya ▁nhambiko , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁hela ▁za ▁damu .”
▁“ M ulume ▁ya solile ▁sambi ▁kolondeka ▁sekeya hite ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁hebu ▁sekeye ng ' higwe ▁sang ' hano ▁yoyose , ▁kolondeka ▁yailegehe ▁kwa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁muladi ▁ya kale ▁ukaye ▁na ▁kude ng ' helela ▁na ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Maabaho ▁mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wandugu ▁zake ▁weza ▁Wem a ▁hanze , ▁wa mtuma ▁munhu ▁ya ka m tange ▁Yesu .
▁Niye ▁niza mulema ni , ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁weza mu huma ni , ▁mwiza ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo mwihila ni . ▁Mwiza dumba ▁na ▁ku kimbila ▁hata ▁one ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo muwinga ni .
▁na ▁weza pata ▁manhesa ▁mengi . ▁Mbali ▁wila ▁uno ▁wiza gendelela ▁kwi mbigwa ▁na ▁wizakuwa ▁fana ▁ukalangama ▁kumwawo . ▁Hata ▁sambi ▁ning ' hali ▁sina wagala ▁kuna ▁isi ▁ini i laganile ▁kuweng ' ha , ▁no manya ▁m agesa ▁yawo .”
▁“ Mu kwenhuka ▁na ▁kwima ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mulima ▁uja ▁u kalile ▁wo kwaka ▁moto ▁u fikile ▁m baka ▁kuulanga , ▁wou ta ndi le ▁ziza ▁na ▁wingu ▁diza mile .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁va wakalile ▁wolawa ▁Besaniya , ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁na ▁nzala .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha bananga ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁izo , ▁kolondeka ▁ya longe ▁kwa ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁ubananzi ▁wake ▁uyatendile ,
▁Na ▁sambi ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁no londa ▁ku mkumbus a ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ini wapetele ni , ▁yomu i hokele ▁iyo ▁chandusilo ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁ wima ▁chigangamavu .
▁Mbali ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Edomu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hamwiza fosa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yangu , ▁one ▁muha fosa ▁chiza mulawil a ni ▁na ▁kumtowa ni ▁na ▁panga .”
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mtowa ▁miyage ▁na ▁kumkoma , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Na ▁ nyivi ▁zake ▁hazi za hindigwa ▁bule ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kwaviya ▁umo ▁ mwabule ▁ichilo .
▁Habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁yondaya i wone , ▁ila ▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune , ▁M ke ni zi , ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni , ▁mana ▁wawo ▁wa mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .’
▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁One ▁yahalonda ▁kum ze n geza ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁kwa ▁mwanage ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁keza mtendela ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁fana ▁mndele ▁wake .
▁Iviya ▁kumbukeni , ▁umwaka ▁mukala ▁hamu mmanyile ▁Chilisito , ▁mukala ▁wageni ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli , ▁na ▁hamu kalile ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁muna ▁yama lagano ▁yaja ▁Mulungu ▁yoya chi laganile . ▁Mu kala ▁ mwabule ▁lolelo ▁na ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁bule .
▁wa geza ▁kum sepa sepa ▁muladi ▁wang wile ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁zo nda ya dahe ▁kulonga .
▁Mwiza danganika ▁na ▁ mitufi ▁yenu ▁iza kwa sigwa ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁chino . ▁Kwa viya ▁mu longelela ▁kumwangu , ▁ habule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya petigwe ▁yeli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁vimwili ▁yonda yengile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija .
▁Mbali ▁Isilaili ▁kaya fose sa za ▁yamakono ▁yake , ▁mkono ▁wa ▁kulume ▁ka wika ▁mditwi ▁da ▁Efulaimu , ▁inga wa ▁kakala ▁mdodo ▁na ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kumoso ▁ka wika ▁mditwi ▁da ▁Manase ▁yoya kale ▁chaudele .
▁Ivo ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo lo ngo zigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo daha ▁kulonga ▁“ Yesu ▁ya duwiligwe !” ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kutogola ▁kuwa ▁“ Yesu ▁ni ▁Mndewa ,” ▁I la ▁yawe ▁ko langulizigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁ chuuze ni ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁va ▁zaka ▁na ▁mu zi gale ▁zi hela ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hoya ha sagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Halani ▁kadanganika ▁U lu ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Wa ka li da yo ▁kuya vu mbu kile ▁chip indi ▁Tela ▁ tati ▁yake ▁yang ' hali ▁kokala ▁uko .
▁walonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁kazilibuka ▁kweli ! ▁Ka mulawilila ▁Saimoni !”
▁Seke lele ni ▁na ▁mu de ng ' helele ▁kwaviya ▁gweko ▁jenu ▁ni ▁kulu ▁kuulanga , ▁ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vo wa gazigwe ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁fana ▁mweye .
▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁ha lu li ▁baha ▁ mbali ▁muhe ▁wangu ▁wa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁nod eng ' helela ▁kuwona ▁vomu kala ▁vinogile ▁na ▁kwima ▁chigangamavu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wihile ▁weza kwa sigwa ▁muna ▁di ta n uli ▁da ▁moto , ▁na ▁uko ▁weza lila ▁na ▁ku du na ▁meno .”
▁V ose ▁umo ▁mu vi leke ▁vi ku le ▁hamwe ▁m baka ▁siku ▁za ▁kugobola , ▁vonda zi fike ▁siku ▁za ▁kugobola ▁niza ▁ walongela ▁wa gobola ji ▁wangu , ▁ya nduse ni ▁ku duganya ▁ma savu ▁na ▁mu ya funge ▁ng ' hi nza ▁ng ' hiza , ▁ha mala ▁baho ▁mu ya some ▁moto , ▁ mbali ▁uhemba ▁muu gwa gule ▁na ▁muka i ke ▁muna ▁di gulu ▁jangu .’ ▁”
▁Niye ▁Yohana ▁no m zuma ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ ulotezi ▁zili ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino . ▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya ho n geza ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁umo , ▁Mulungu ▁keza ▁m tenda ▁ya ga ye ▁kwa ▁ma hulo ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino .
▁Kwa viya ▁lagano ▁diya ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁one ▁dinogile , ▁sigambe ▁di londeke ▁lagano ▁dekaidi .
▁Yesu ▁kawalola , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁muka i laguse ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wenu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .” ▁Viwakalile ▁mwiinzila , ▁wa sa f yi ka .
▁Ivo ▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁cha wa na ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁hachi londeka ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁zahabu ▁hebu ▁hela ▁hebu ▁dibwe , ▁vinhu ▁vi tendigw a ▁goya ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza ha lola ▁hanhu ▁baho . ▁Na ▁one ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁upipi ▁wake ▁u galuka ▁kuwa ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ha gidimila , ▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁wou lawile ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha lungu le . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Vino ▁ha bwelile ▁hata ▁imwe ▁kumwing ' ha ▁utunhizo ▁Mulungu ▁ila ▁mgeni ▁ino ▁muhala ?”
▁M wo tagusa ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁viwo tagusa . ▁Niye ▁si mtagusa ▁munhu ▁yoyose .
▁Mbali ▁walimi ▁wa mgwila , ▁wamtowa ▁na ▁ku muwinga ▁ bila ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chinhu .
▁yelihi ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Yohana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kubatiza , ▁vino ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁wanhu ?”
▁Mbali ▁Lebeka ▁viya vimanyile ▁chiya ilungile ▁Esau , ▁kam tu mila ▁usenga ▁ku mtanga ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ W i i teganye , ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁Esau ▁ko i guma ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁kuku koma .
▁Mbali ▁m okaji ▁magate ▁mkulu ▁ka tumbik igwa ▁fana ▁viyalongile ▁Yosefu .
▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Chi no ▁ni icho ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁lagano ▁di ni kwika ▁hagati ▁ya ▁niye ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁chila ▁chilumb e ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁chi kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁welesi ▁wose ▁m baka ▁welesi ▁u kwiza ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁wenyewo ▁kaye ▁yetu ▁ya ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁cho gozela ▁ng ' hani ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu , ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁ye ze ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yosefu ▁mwenyewo ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁goya , ▁ mbali ▁halondile ▁bule ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chinyala ▁Maliya ▁muumwingi , ▁ivo ▁ka lamula ▁kuu bena ▁u fu di ki lwa ▁chinyele ny ele .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁weza ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa ndusa ▁ku ibishil a ▁na ▁Yesu . ▁Wakala ▁wo londa ▁kumgeza , ▁ivo ▁wa mulonda ▁yatende ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Cho mu handa ▁ni ▁mbeyu ▁muhala , ▁iwe ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁hebu ▁mbeyu ▁imwenga , ▁na ▁si ▁mbiki ▁ngima ▁wonda u lawilile ▁hamwande .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁kulava ▁hela ▁hebu ▁shaba , ▁kai gala ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁yake . ▁Iviya ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁m bawo ▁za ▁mkenge ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yoyose ▁ka zi gala .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza kwika ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁zahabu ▁cha ▁kusom ela ▁ubani ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁m aabaho ▁kwiza tumbik a ▁panzia ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ku golosa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulume , ▁na ▁isi ▁i wamela ▁wehi ▁wetu .
▁Viya m hile ▁walo ▁da ▁Yesu , ▁bahobaho ▁damu ▁ ileka ▁ku mulawa , ▁nayo ▁kai hulika ▁kuwa ▁ka hona .
▁Mbali ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁muhala ▁ko kwingila ▁muna ▁di zewe ▁na ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁mwaka . ▁Ko sola ▁damu ▁yoilavigw e ▁nhosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁u watendile ▁wanhu ▁ bila ▁kuvimanya .
▁Wa mwing ' ha ▁divai ▁ iti b wi li zigwe ▁na ▁chi wo pe ▁cha ▁mane ma ne , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka lema ▁kui ng ' wa .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wo kuwa ▁na ▁ yu ng wa yu ng wa ▁da ▁yano ▁yose , ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁kovimanya ▁kuwa ▁mo londa ▁yano ▁yose .
▁Mulungu ▁ha walekelele ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wo watendile ▁uhasanyi , ▁kawa sa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁haku tagusigwa , ▁wawo ▁we kigwa ▁mu ja ▁wa fungigwa ▁minyololo ▁muna ▁diziza ▁totolo ▁wo gozela ▁zuwa ▁da ▁nhaguso ▁zawo .
▁L usita ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁ka lema ▁kuchi leke la ▁chihite , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wakoma ▁chila ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁chilume ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama . ▁Leka mana ▁cho mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁mulume ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁cho wakombola ▁wanetu ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Yuda ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁“ Chiza pata ▁choni ▁chiha mkoma ▁ndugu ▁yetu , ▁na ▁ku fisa ▁u komaji ▁wake ?
▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁kamsondelela ▁Yesu ▁hachisogo , ▁m aabaho ▁ka dalisa ▁m hindo ▁ya ▁walo ▁da ▁Yesu . ▁Bahobaho ▁damu ▁ ileka ▁ku mulawa .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Henoko ▁ka soligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi ▁ bila ▁kudanganika . ▁Na yo ▁ha woneke ▁kaidi ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kamsola ▁kuulanga . ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁kuwa , ▁yang ' hali ▁Henoko ▁hana soligwa , ▁ka mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁ Nyama ▁yoi dalisa ▁chinhu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁hai londeka ▁ku digwa . ▁ Nyama ▁iyo ▁iza lunguzigw a ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yelile ▁kodaha ▁kuja ▁nyama .
▁Ni ng ' higwa ▁ a muli ▁ya ▁ku temela ▁mate , ▁yeye ▁kawa temela ▁mate , ▁niye ▁sidaha ▁ku galula .
▁“ Maabaho ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁na ▁ku cho la ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁fana ▁munhu ▁viyo cho la ▁mu huli , ▁‘ Yeli le ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .’
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mbo na ▁mweye ▁wabozi ▁vino ! ▁Na ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁midala ▁kuhuwila ▁yose ▁yoya longigwe ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu !
▁I teganye ni ! ▁“ Fan a ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁yaha ku bananga , ▁mu lamule , ▁yaha samha ▁mu lekelele .
▁Wawo ▁walonga , ▁“ Leka ▁chim tange ▁mndele ▁mwenyewo ▁chimu uze .”
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kasola ▁ulongo ▁wa ▁isi ▁na ▁ka mu u sa ▁mulume , ▁ka mu hu vi la ▁m hu mu zi ▁ya ▁ugima ▁mui m hu la , ▁na ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁kawa ▁mgima .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende , ▁kwa ▁uhele ,
▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M iyaka ▁yangu ▁fana ▁m fosa nzila ▁ni ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu . ▁M iyaka ▁iyo ▁iwa ▁mi dodo ▁na ▁i mema ▁magayo , ▁kaidi ▁hai na fika ▁miyaka ▁yo wakalile ▁ma wa saho ▁fana ▁wa fosa ▁nzila .”
▁Filipo ▁kakala ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Besisaida , ▁bululu ▁di wakalile ▁wokala ▁Andeleya ▁na ▁Petili .
▁Mndewa ▁kawedika , ▁“ Fan a ▁mu wile ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mdodo ▁fana ▁mbeyu ▁ya ▁ha la dali , ▁muha u longele ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁m ku yu , ▁‘ N g ' o ka , ▁uka i hande ▁mwiibahali .’ ▁Na wo ▁uha wahulike .
▁Kwa ▁yano ▁ni ya yo ▁yo o londa ▁Mulungu , ▁ kwela ▁kulawa ▁kuu leka ▁ugoni .
▁Yakobo ▁ka simika ▁mhanda ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ leme ▁da ▁Laheli , ▁m baka ▁diyelo ▁mhanda ▁iyo ▁ya uko .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya ni leme ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁nayo ▁keza mulema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁ka gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwa hiti la ▁wa ga nga ▁wengi ▁na ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose , ▁ha patile ▁muhavu ▁ mbali ▁ hali ▁yake ▁i gendelela ▁kwi ha .
▁Musa ▁kawa gala ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Haluni , ▁ka wavaz a ▁ng ' hanzu ▁na ▁kuwa funga ▁mi kwiji ▁muna ▁ivi g u di ▁vawo ▁na ▁ka wavaz a ▁chi lemba ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁mweye ▁muha hulika ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁mwiza lola ▁goya , ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁kweli ▁kuwa ▁chinhu ▁icho ▁cha ▁ku tibusa ▁chi tendigw a ▁Isilaili ,
▁Kaidi ▁wa nawo ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku hinda ▁ulanga ▁muladi ▁mvula ▁seke itonye ▁lusita ▁viwo lotela . ▁Wana ▁udahi ▁ku galusa ▁nzasa ▁zose ▁za ▁mazi ▁kuwa ▁damu ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuitowa ▁isi ▁kwa ▁ma hulo ▁mbasakanyo ▁lusita ▁viwo londa ▁wenyewo .
▁Maabaho ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁waidi ▁wawalongela ▁chiya ▁chochi wa lawilile ▁mwiinzila , ▁na ▁viya ▁Yesu ▁viya i laguse ▁viyakalile ▁ko mo gola ▁gate .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 5 4 , 4 00.
▁Vini mulongeleni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁vinhu ▁va ▁isi ▁hamu togole ▁bule , ▁vino ▁mwiza togola ze ▁niha walongela ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kuulanga ?”
▁Viwa hulike ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kazilibuka ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kamuwona , ▁hawa mtogole le ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hita ▁kam tange ▁mu lu ma ko ▁ wize ▁nayo ▁hano .”
▁Ivo ▁weza ▁na ▁wa sola ▁ mitufi ▁ya ▁ndugu ▁zawo ▁kwa ▁kwa mha ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁ mitufi ▁na ▁kui gala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Musa ▁viyawalagilize .
▁Mbali ▁niza tenda ▁lagano ▁na ▁weye . ▁Kwiza kwingila ▁muna ▁isafina ▁na ▁muke ▁wako , ▁wanago ▁na ▁wake ▁zawo .
▁Kwa ▁ivo , ▁chilagano ▁cho huwila ▁uhuwilo , ▁muladi ▁chilagano ▁chiya ▁chi woneke ▁kuwa ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zose ▁za ▁Bulahimu , ▁si ▁kwa ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wowo tenda ▁chi yolonda ▁Malagilizo , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wokala ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁fana ▁viyakalile ▁Bulahimu ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁wose .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁heza kala ma ▁bule ▁kui tagusa ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Maabaho ▁kasola ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁divai , ▁kamulongela ▁Mulungu , ▁“ H e we la .” ▁Ka weng ' ha , ▁na ▁wose ▁wang ' wa ▁mwii nhu ngo ▁iyo .
▁Mbali ▁chiza galigw a ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁ichisiwa ▁chimwenga .”
▁ Sambi ▁ gendelele ni ▁nayo ▁na ▁kui komeleza . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁vimu wile ▁na ▁moyo ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku taza ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁kulava , ▁basi ▁muwe ▁na ▁moyo ▁unogile ▁wa ▁kui komeleza ▁kusondelela ▁udahi ▁ wi mwili ▁nawo .
▁Wawo ▁ni ▁Saimoni , ▁iyo ▁Yesu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁zina ▁da ▁Petili ▁na ▁Andeleya ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana ▁na ▁Filipo ▁na ▁ B a tu lo ma yo .
▁Musa ▁kalagiliza ▁na ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁i gong ' ondigwa ▁muna ▁dilago , ▁“ Chila ▁munhu , ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁mwanamke , ▁sekeya gale ▁vitumetume ▁vingi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .” ▁Wa nhu ▁wa go me sigwa ▁ku gala ▁vinhu ,
▁Mbali ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁vino , ▁“ U senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa habehi ▁na ▁weye , ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wako ▁na ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wako ,” ▁uwo ▁ni ▁usenga ▁wa ▁uhuwilo ▁wochi u peta .
▁yayo ▁yose ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yo yamulagilize ni ▁kufose la ▁Musa , ▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁iya lavile ▁malagilizo ▁m baka ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu ,
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁didugila ▁kaya la nza ▁yamazi , ▁nayo ▁ya galuke ▁divai . ▁Ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁kui lawile ▁divai ▁ija , ▁ mbali ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wowa de hile ▁yamazi ▁wa vimanya . ▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁kamtanga ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo sola ▁hamgwazo ,
▁Mwenevale ▁wake ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁chila ▁chiyatendile ▁ka tenda ▁vinogile .
▁Da mu ▁iha nyala , ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁keza gozela ▁siku ▁saba ▁muladi ▁yawe ▁kela , ▁zihafosa ▁siku ▁izo ▁keza kuwa ▁kela .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Wa na go ▁weza galigw a ▁kuna ▁isi ▁yoi ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁uko ▁weza tendigw a ▁watumwa ▁na ▁weza tendigw a ▁vihile ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane .”
▁ Sambi ▁no kwiza ▁kumwako . ▁Si li ▁muna ▁iisi ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁wang ' hali ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Tata ▁Yelile , ▁wa lole se ▁goya ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁zina ▁jako , ▁zina ▁di u ni ni le , ▁muladi ▁wawe ▁wa mwe ▁fana ▁weye ▁na ▁niye ▁vichili ▁wa mwe .
▁“ N diya ▁yose ▁yo londeka ▁ku digwa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yoi sa sa ligwe , ▁sekemu lawe ▁nayo ▁kunze ▁hebu ▁sekemu bene ▁hata ▁ vu ha ▁dimwe ▁da ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁Pasaka .
▁Maabaho ▁tata ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁keza walongela ▁walala , ▁‘ M ulume ▁ino ▁ni mwing ' ha ▁mwanangu ▁ya msole , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ha mulonda ▁kaidi .
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chi isasala ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁kwa ▁ ulangulizi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Chiza loka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kuitowa , ▁fana ▁viulongile .”
▁Wa fika ▁Efeso , ▁uko ▁Paulo ▁kawaleka ▁Pilisi la ▁na ▁Akila . ▁Ke ngila ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁na ▁kalonga ▁na ▁Wayahudi .
▁Ka lekeleligwa ▁ku yawala ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁chitani ▁yon ang ' hana ▁yo melemeta . ▁Wa lo ▁ ze lu ▁di na ng ' hana ▁dodi melemeta ▁ni ▁sang ' hano ▁zi goloke ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Lelo ▁mwanangu ▁ tegeleza ▁choni kulongela ▁na ▁uchi tende . ▁ H i ma ▁ kimbilila ▁kwa ▁ lumbu ▁jangu ▁Labani ▁uko ▁Halani ,
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁heli ▁na ▁niye ▁bule , ▁kani lema . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo ha ya kunzagiza ▁na ▁niye , ▁ko pwililisa .
▁wawa uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁mwa nenu ? ▁Mu longa ▁kelek igwa ▁chipofu , ▁lelo ▁ka daha ze ▁kuwona ?”
▁Wayahudi ▁wam zunguluka , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁kwiza chi leka ▁muna ▁um ka nga gile ▁m baka ▁ li ni ? ▁ Chilongele ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁fana ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Chilisito .”
▁Tat i ▁zetu ▁wa c he leke ▁wachi zuma ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁viya ▁viwo wona ▁kuwa ▁vinoga . ▁Mulungu ▁kochi zuma ▁kwa ▁kuchi taza ▁muladi ▁chiwe ▁fana ▁yeye .
▁Mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kulu tawala ▁lulimi , ▁lulimi ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁lume ma ▁sumu ▁ yi gala ▁u da nga ni ko .
▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁Misili ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu .
▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁i wi nzile , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁diya ▁weza ▁kutegeleza ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Ebeli ▁viya mweleke ▁Pelegi ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁ Nolonda ▁kuku la hiza ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi , ▁kuwa ▁hwiza msole la ▁mwanangu ▁muke ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Wakanaani ▁woni kala ▁nawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁yeye ▁ko msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁yanogile . ▁Mbali ▁uha tenda ▁yehile , ▁ umdumbe ▁kwaviya ▁kodaha ▁kuku tagusa . ▁Y eye ▁ko msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu , ▁kowa lagusa ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁waja ▁wo tenda ▁yehile .
▁Ha no ▁ha kaye ▁ka bule ▁ma mu la ka ▁kufosa ▁niye , ▁ hani lemesa ▁kwa mha ▁chochose ▁ila ▁weye ▁muhala ▁kwaviya ▁weye ▁kwa ▁muke ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁nodaha ze ▁kutenda ▁wihi ▁fana ▁uwo ▁kwa ▁ku muhasanya ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Mbali ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁hamwande ▁ya ▁ifa ▁yake , ▁Mulungu ▁ka n zilibuka , ▁na ▁kamtenda ▁ya woneke ,
▁Nasanayeli ▁kedika ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ! ▁W eye ▁kwa ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Isilaeli !”
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kani wonela ▁ubazi ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁niye ▁ni li ▁mu hasanyi ▁kufosa ▁wose , ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁ya dahe ▁ku lagusa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwake . ▁Na ▁vino ▁niye ▁ni pate ▁kuwa ▁simwe ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wondawa huwile ▁hamwande ▁na ▁kupata ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Hata ▁one ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vi tangigwa ▁“ mi lungu ” ▁iwe ▁kuulanga ▁hebu ▁muna ▁isi , ▁na ▁hata ▁one ▁kuna ▁milungu ▁wengi ▁na ▁wa nde wa ▁wengi ,
▁Si ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁bule ▁yoni vi tendile ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vose ?’ ▁”
▁Ndugu ▁wose ▁no wa londe leni ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁ulondo ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Muha towa ▁ulo ▁kwa ▁ulo , ▁malago ▁yeli ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁yeza segela .
▁Munhu ▁yondaya wa ti mbule ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁ko ga , ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dilago .
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hita ▁uka wa lole ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁na ▁mifu go ▁one ▁wawo ▁wagima ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁u bwele ▁u nilongele .” ▁Ivo ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ka mtuma ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁za nda ▁da ▁Hebuloni . ▁Yosefu ▁kafika ▁Shekemu .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁ka lamula ▁kumtagusa ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁chi wo londa ▁chi tendeke .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁hano ▁mwiisi , ▁kwa ▁ndilo ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁masozi , ▁ka tosa ▁na ▁ku mulamba ▁Mulungu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku mu lopola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ifa . ▁Ka huli kigwa ▁kwaviya ▁kai nyendanyenda ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Sekeu itendele ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁ya ▁zuma .
▁Chila ▁vi umbe ▁waidi ▁waidi ▁walume ▁na ▁wake , ▁chila ▁chilumb e ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁chi ngila ▁muna ▁isafina ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Nuhu ,
▁M ulume ▁ha huwila ▁ko togoligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁mke ▁wake , ▁na ▁muke ▁ha huwila ▁ko togoligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁mulumake . ▁One ▁si ivo ▁wana ▁wawo ▁waha wile ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko , ▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino , ▁wo kwela .
▁Wa kwela ▁mwiingalawa ▁wa dahe ▁ku loka ▁dilamba ▁kuhita ▁Kapelinaumu . ▁L wiza ▁lu kala ▁lu tanda , ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁yang ' hali ▁kuwa fikila .
▁Mbali ▁yaha zi lema ▁na ▁kuzi segeza ▁yaha mala ▁kuhulika , ▁baho ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁keza sola ▁ubananzi ▁wa ▁muke ▁wake .”
▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza iting ' hana ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁kezawa gola ▁fana ▁viya ▁n dima ▁viyo wa gola ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti .
▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁mvunyo ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ,
▁M wima ▁hano ▁diyelo ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁lagano ▁diya ▁do ya ilahile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ,
▁Maabaho ▁wafika ▁Yeliko . ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁va wakalile ▁wose gela ▁mudibululu ▁ijo , ▁chipofu ▁imwe ▁yoya tangigwe ▁ B a tu lo me ▁mwana ▁wa ▁T i ma yo ▁kakala ▁ya kalile ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁inzila , ▁ko pula .
▁Kwa viya ▁watawala ▁hawa du mbigwa ▁bule ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yanogile , ▁ mbali ▁wo du mbigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yehile . ▁Na ▁weye ▁one ▁hu londa ▁kumdumba ▁mtawala , ▁utende ▁yanogile , ▁nayo ▁kezaku togola .
▁Sa ng ' hanileni ▁vinogile ▁ningo ▁zenu ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁na ha dahile ▁kuigodela ▁vinhu ▁vovi tendigw a ▁muna ▁ulukuli , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁yaha iwona ▁kana ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kuigodela ▁vinhu ▁vovi tendigw a ▁muna ▁ulukuli , ▁ hani fosa ▁niye ▁bule .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁wila ▁uno ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Waisilaili ▁wose .
▁Musa ▁kalagiliza , ▁‘ Wa tegeleze ▁ tati ▁yako ▁na ▁mamiyake ▁yako .’ ▁Iviya ▁kalagiliza , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya mu lige ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mamiyake ▁yake ▁yakomigwe .’
▁Ona , ▁kuna ▁chongezeke ▁chila ▁ubanzi . ▁Teng ' hu ▁Mulungu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁Wayahudi ▁usenga ▁wake .
▁“ Walongele ▁vino ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ M wanamke ▁yahawa ▁na ▁wimo , ▁yaha ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁fana ▁viya ▁voyo kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁siku ▁zake .
▁Wala ▁hachi igoda ▁kwa ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowo utenda ▁wamwenga ▁kufosa ▁ningo ▁yo ching ' higwe , ▁ila ▁cho lolela ▁kuwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁wo kula ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁na ▁ningo ▁yoya chi kile ▁Mulungu .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yonda ▁ya longe , ▁‘ Lola , ▁ a u no ,’ ▁hebu ▁‘ A u ja ,’ ▁kwaviya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁mgati ▁mmwenu .”
▁Ivo ▁cho lolela ▁kuhokela ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁havi daha ▁ku wola , ▁hebu ▁ku hunguka ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwikila ni ▁uko ▁kuulanga .
▁U wa fundize ▁watumwa ▁wa wategeleze ▁wenevale ▁wawo ▁na ▁wawa no geze ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose . ▁Wo londeka ▁sekewa ibishil e ▁nawo ,
▁Maabaho ▁mwiza tenda ▁fana ▁vondawa mulongeleni ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁m uiteganye ▁mutende ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁vondawa mu lagilize ni .
▁Besueli ▁kamwelek a ▁Lebeka , ▁Milika ▁kamwelek a ▁Naholi , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Bulahimu , ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wa nane .
▁Uko ▁kum salaba ▁Chilisito ▁kawa ho ka ▁ludabwa ▁wawo ▁vinyamkela ▁wa languliza ▁na ▁wakulu , ▁kawa tenda ▁kuwa ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁chinyala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁ifa ▁yake ▁mumsalaba ▁fana ▁mate ka ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁wa ▁uhumi ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁wawa son geza ▁lung ' husesa , ▁wa mulonde ▁Balaba ▁na ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu .
▁Mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kadi sagula ▁kabila ▁da ▁Walawi ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁yose , ▁di msang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kamuwona ▁ko we gela ▁mui chuwala ▁na ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Ko zahila ▁choni ?”
▁Labani ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Chi bugulu ▁cha ▁mabwe ▁yano ▁ya ▁luwe ▁na ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁uku mbu so ▁yoni i simike ▁hagati ▁ya ▁weye ▁na ▁niye ▁ni ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁dibwe .”
▁Paulo ▁na ▁Si lo wa no ▁na ▁Timoseyo , ▁cho ja ndi kila ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁weli ▁Sesalonike , ▁weli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁Nowalondel a ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo .
▁Kwa viya ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁ho longa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁zuwa ▁da ▁saba , ▁“ Mulungu ▁ka leka ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁zose , ▁zuwa ▁da ▁saba ▁ka humula .”
▁baho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulola ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁wene la ▁lukuli ▁lwose , ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela ▁kwaviya ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lwose ▁lu galuka ▁lu ze lu . ▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela .
▁ Sambi ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁u sola ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁uja ▁utunhizo ▁uno ▁uwo ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁u mala .
▁Wa vwizi ▁wengi ▁weza ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁waja ▁hawa togola ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁keza ▁na ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁munhu . ▁Munhu ▁fana ▁iyo ▁ni ▁m vwizi ▁na ▁m du gi ▁kwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani ▁ mbali ▁ludoko ▁lwako ▁lufika , ▁ulo ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kuwa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wadanganike . ▁L usita ▁lwa ▁kuwa gwe ka ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁walotezi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo di dumba ▁zina ▁jako , ▁wanhu ▁wo hishimika ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa hishimika , ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁k udanganiza ▁waja ▁wo wadanganiza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi .”
▁“ Zin o ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yaja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kani lagiliza ▁ni m funze ni , ▁muladi ▁mu ya zindilile ▁vonda mwing ile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yondamu i sole .
▁Maabaho ▁ka lawilila ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁imwenga ‚ ▁kui tawala ▁Misili ▁yo ha mmanyile ▁Yosefu .
▁Yesu ▁viya hitile ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Petili , ▁uko ▁kamuwona ▁m koi ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁Petili ▁kagona ▁muna ▁dikomwa , ▁kolumwa ▁ homa .
▁Niye ▁ni kwing ' ha ▁weye ▁siyo ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁hanhu ▁ho tangigwa ▁Shekemu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁voni solile ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Waamoli ▁kwa ▁u panga ▁wangu ▁na ▁u ta ▁wangu .”
▁Vi i kalile ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁saa ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe , ▁kalawa ▁kaidi , ▁ka wafika ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wema ▁ zu ga ga . ▁Kawauza , ▁‘ Vi lihi ▁vino ▁vi mwi mile ▁hano ▁ zu ga ga ▁imisi ▁yose ▁ bila ▁sang ' hano ?’
▁No kwika ▁weye ▁muna ▁u lole si ▁wa ▁isi ▁yangu , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wose ▁wezaku tegeleza . ▁U kulu ▁wako ▁wizakuwa ▁wekaidi ▁kulawa ▁niye .
▁ B a we ▁da ▁Si di mu ▁di kala ▁di memile ▁ma kombo ▁ya ▁ la mi , ▁na ▁baho ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁viwa gezile ▁ku kimbila ▁ng ' hondo , ▁wa tu mbu ki ya ▁umo ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wa i ba ngila ▁muna ▁ivi gong o .
▁Ulon zi ▁uno ▁wa ▁ku hu wi ligwa ▁na ▁kutogoligwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁keza ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁kuwa lopola ▁wa hasanyi . ▁Niye ▁ni ▁mu hasanyi ▁kufosa ▁wose .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Mu isi la ili ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yoyose ▁yo kala ▁kumwenu ▁yaha mulava ▁nhambiko ▁mwanage ▁yoyose ▁kwa ▁m ulungu ▁Moleki , ▁kolondeka ▁yako m wigwe . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza mtowa ▁na ▁mabwe .
▁Ivo ▁vondanize ▁niza zi pwililisa ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁ziya tendile , ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁ziya chi longile ▁na ▁kuchi vwizi la ! ▁Mbali ▁vino ▁havi m faya ▁bule . ▁Wa huwila ▁wayetu ▁vonda we ze ▁hawa hokela ▁bule ▁na ▁kowa lema ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo londa ▁kuwa hokela ▁na ▁ko geza ▁kuwawinga ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito !
▁Isi ▁ya ▁Edomu ▁izakuwa ▁yake , ▁isi ▁ya ▁Seili ▁izakuwa ▁yake , ▁Isilaili ▁iza huma .
▁Ke ngila ▁Ha nhu ▁He lile ▁Ng ' hani ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala , ▁yahawa ▁kasola ▁siyo ▁damu ▁ya ▁luti ▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe , ▁ mbali ▁kasola ▁damu ▁yake ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo , ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ukombola ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ T eng ' hu ▁ ilahile ▁kuwa ▁kwiza ni c hulu zila ▁haki ▁yako .” ▁Esau ▁ka ilaha ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Yakobo ▁haki ▁yake .
▁Vino ▁hamu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa sang ' hani ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wo pata ▁ndiya ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁waja ▁wo lava ▁za b i hu ▁muna ▁ichilingo ▁wo pata ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁za b i hu ▁iyo ?
▁Ka kala ▁ya saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁ing ' hali ▁isi ▁yose ▁kulumbigwa , ▁ mbali ▁ka gubuligwa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zino ▁za ▁uhelelo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁M v a ze ▁Haluni ▁chi lemba ▁chiya ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁na ▁kwika ▁chi hande ▁chiya ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁chi lemba ▁icho .
▁Mbali ▁inga wa ▁kuna ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wo igoda ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza tenda ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Ni walongela ni , ▁‘ Sambi ▁mu fika ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁milima ▁ya ▁Waamoli ▁iyo ching ' ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu .
▁“ Sekemwi ke ▁ngama ▁zenu ▁hano ▁hana ▁iisi , ▁bule ▁ivo ▁ so ndo ▁weza zi bananga , ▁na ▁wa bavi ▁wo bomola ▁na ▁ku bawa .
▁Saimoni ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁weng ' higwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kwa ▁kwikil igwa ▁makono ▁na ▁watumigwa , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁hela ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ,
▁Viwa hulike ▁ivo ▁wazanywa , ▁wa muleka ▁na ▁wasegela .
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁udahi ▁u mulawa . ▁Basi ▁kalu hindukila ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kulu uza , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yoya dalise ▁walo ▁jangu ?”
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁ulondo , ▁mukale ▁kwa ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zake . ▁Fan a ▁vi muhulike ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso , ▁ndagilizi ▁yake ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁mose ▁m olondeka ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ku lagusa ▁ulondo .
▁Ivo ▁sang ' hano ▁yose ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁i komelezeka . ▁Waisilaili ▁wa tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ U sungu ▁uli ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁wodaha ▁kunikoma . ▁Ka leni ▁hano ▁na ▁ka leni ▁meso .”
▁Na wo ▁iviya ▁kawalongela , ▁‘ Hiteni ▁na ▁mweye ▁kuna ▁umgunda ▁wangu . ▁Niza wa liha ▁viilondeka .’
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha mtogola ▁Chilisito , ▁ka bule ▁Muhe ▁yo lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kana ▁muhe ▁wa ▁m du gi ▁kwa ▁Chilisito . ▁Na ▁mweye ▁ muhulika ▁mu mala ▁kuwa ▁kokwiza , ▁na ▁sambi ▁keza ▁kamala ▁muna ▁zisi ▁zose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁yeye .” ▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Si ▁yeye ▁bule .” ▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁ija ▁mwenyewo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁niiyo ▁iyo .”
▁Wa tumigwa ▁viwa iting ' hane ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁lusita ▁luno ▁kwiza wa bweleze la ▁Waisilaeli ▁Ufalume ?”
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁walonga ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wowa dumba ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi . ▁ Walangulizi ▁wawo ▁walonga ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya longe ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito ▁keza wing igwa ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Ku tosela .
▁Bahobaho ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi , ▁kawasola ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁imkulu ▁na ▁kudi hiti la ▁diya ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁wanhu . ▁Viwa muwone ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi , ▁wakalizi ▁wa leka ▁kumtowa ▁Paulo .
▁“ ▁‘ Vi umbe ▁vino ▁vi tambala ▁kumwenu ▁va mbula ▁mwiko , ▁ fuko ▁na ▁ng o so ▁na ▁modeli ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁ng ' he ng e ,
▁Mbali ▁muha komeleza ▁kugaya ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁luguhi , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁unovu ▁wose , ▁yoyo mtanga ni ▁m wingile ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁keza watenda ▁wawe ▁wagima ▁kaidi ▁na ▁kuwa guma ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁kwima ▁chi ga nga mu ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁chandusilo ▁chi gangamale .
▁Wa kalizi ▁wazi sola ▁hela ▁ziya ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viwa fu n zigwe . ▁Na ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ yenela ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁m baka ▁diyelo .

▁Mbali ▁ubala ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁u la g u sigwa ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wose ▁wou togola .”
▁Wawo ▁wema ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁walangulizi ▁wose ▁wa ▁m ting ' hano , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Walonga ,
▁Ka pata ▁wimo ▁umwenga ▁kaidi ▁na ▁kelek a ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁na ▁zina ▁jake ▁kamtanga ▁Ona ni .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁“ Vino ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mwo londa ▁kusegela ?”
▁Na ▁mweye ▁iyo ▁wa kalangama ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁zino .
▁Kuna ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁yafu ngile ▁ zengele ▁na ▁ka habehi ▁kusola ? ▁Ya bwele ▁ukaye ▁muladi ▁sekeya danganike ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁ya msole ▁mhambe ▁wake .’
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka handa ▁mgunda ▁ha tangigwe ▁ E de ni , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁umo ▁ka mwika ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁yoya mu u si le .
▁Niye ▁ni ▁lwivi . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo kwingila ▁kufose la ▁niye ▁kezakomboligwa . ▁Keza kwingila ▁na ▁kulawa ▁ku zahila ▁ndiya .
▁Yohana ▁iviya ▁kakala ▁kobatiza ▁wanhu ▁uko ▁ Aino ni ▁habehi ▁na ▁Sa li mu , ▁kwaviya ▁uko ▁kukala ▁na ▁mazi ▁mengi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamuhitila , ▁nayo ▁ka wabatiza .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁“ Mogesa ze ? ▁Munhu ▁yahawa ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁gana , ▁na ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁ iwawo ▁ko kwa ga , ▁vino ▁hawa leka ▁waja ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda , ▁na ▁kuhita ▁ku lugongo ▁na ▁ku nzahila ▁ija ▁ng ' hondolo ▁ya gile ?

▁One ▁mweye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁muha mbwelela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose ▁malagilizo ▁yoni mu la gi li zile ni ▁diyelo ,
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁ivo ▁viyakalile ▁kofundiza ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁uko ▁Kapelinaumu .
▁Katenda ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile . ▁I tendigwe ▁kwa ▁kuhonda , ▁ kalilo ▁jake ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wake ▁na ▁nhungo ▁zake ▁na ▁ma tu mba ▁yake ▁na ▁maluw a ▁yake , ▁vose ▁vi tendigw a ▁kwa ▁chi hande ▁chimwe .
▁Ivo ▁si ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁one ▁watumigwa ▁wa ▁Lufyende ▁wo wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁U helelo ▁wawo ▁weza lihigwa ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁Wa gendelela ▁kumtowa ▁na ▁ balati ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake ▁na ▁ku mtemela ▁mate . ▁Maabaho ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁na ▁ku mwin a mila .
▁M kwiji ▁u b o ti gwa ▁goya ▁m chanyha ▁yake ▁muladi ▁kui funga , ▁ukala ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁icho . ▁U tendigw a ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁ivo , ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁buluu ▁na ▁ya ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Lelo ▁chilonge ▁choni ? ▁Ch eye ▁Wayahudi ▁chela ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁hata ▁chidogo . ▁Baho ▁mwanduso ▁ni walongela ni ▁kuwa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wana ▁uhasanyi .
▁Musa ▁kasola ▁nusu ▁ya ▁damu ▁ija ▁na ▁kai guma ▁muna ▁ya mahamha , ▁nusu ▁imwenga ▁ka itila ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ulupango .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁vonda y ongeze ▁m haka ▁ya ▁isi ▁yenu ▁fana ▁viya walaganile ni , ▁mu longa , ▁‘ Chiza kuja ▁nyama ,’ ▁kwaviya ▁mo londa ▁kuja ▁nyama , ▁modaha ▁kuja ▁nyama ▁vovose ▁viya ▁vi mulonda .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁chitala ▁chose ▁wa zahila ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁wa dahe ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu .
▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wehile ▁kumwenu , ▁wawa son geza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁jawo . ▁Walonga , ▁‘ Chi hite ▁chika tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga ,’ ▁ija ▁hamu i manyile ,
▁One ▁chiha zindilila ▁vinogile ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yose ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁fana ▁viya chi lagilize , ▁chi zakuwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁wake .’
▁Kwa viya ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁chiunhu ▁yo gala ▁ifa , ▁ mbali ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁yo gala ▁ugima ▁na ▁tindiwalo .
▁Mwiza tenda ▁dugila ▁dino ▁da ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁fana ▁lukumbuso ▁lwa ▁siku ▁voni mulavile ni ▁mweye ▁vi bumbila ▁va ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Dug ila ▁ijo ▁diza tendigw a ▁siku ▁ino ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zenu ▁zose ▁zikwiza ▁fana ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Seke wo kigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lusu . ▁Ni weng ' ha ▁wawo ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁zi n hosa ▁zi wo ni lavila ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁nhambiko ▁zelile ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁vi zi li ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁ubananzi .
▁Hata ▁one ▁mu pwililis igwa ▁muna ▁izisi ▁za ▁kuuhelelo ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ulanga , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kezam duganya ni ▁na ▁ku mbweleza ni ,
▁Wayahudi ▁wamwenga ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wo lava ▁vinyamkela ▁wahita ▁uko ▁na ▁uko ▁wo geza ▁kusang ' hanila ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu . ▁Wa walongela ▁waja ▁wa ku mbigwe ▁na ▁vinyamkela , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu , ▁ija ▁yo petigwa ▁na ▁Paulo .”
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁za ▁kuika ▁hakwe ▁kwake ▁keza kuwa ▁kela ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Vino ▁ku mweda ▁kuno ▁ku yo longa ▁Daudi ▁kowa longa ▁waja ▁wengi le ▁ulungwana ▁muhala ▁hebu ▁na ▁waja ▁hawana kwingila ▁ulungwana ▁bule ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Iviya ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawana kwing i zigwa ▁ulungwana . ▁Kwa viya ▁chi wona ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Bulahimu ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁wake , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Kwel a ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁uno ▁wa ▁Abalimu ▁na ▁u i lole ▁isi ▁yoni weng ' hile ▁Waisilaili .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁vilufikile ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁ku fikiza ▁lagano ▁diya mwing ' hile ▁Bulahimu , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁kuja ▁Misili ▁ longe ze ka ▁ng ' hani .
▁N za la ▁ yenela ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁Yosefu ▁kaya vugula ▁ma dung u ▁yose ▁na ▁kawa c hulu zila ▁ndiya ▁Wamisili , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Na ▁inga wa ▁kakala ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka ifunza ▁kutegeleza ▁kufose la ▁manhesa ▁yoya patile .
▁Bezaleli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁U li , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁Hu li , ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁wa tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁cho yamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Maabaho ▁Helode ▁ kongeza ▁wihi ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ku mguma ▁Yohana ▁mui chi fu ngo .
▁Kumbuk eni ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' hani ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁leka mana ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ye sita ▁ko mwing ' hani ▁magate ▁kwa ▁siku ▁mbili . ▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ya kale ▁hanhu ▁ha yeli . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya lawe ▁kunze ▁siku ▁yesaba .”
▁Kwa viya ▁mulume ▁ha lumbigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mwanamke , ▁ila ▁mwanamke ▁kalumb igwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mulume .
▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁kai yawala ▁walo ▁da ▁ langi ▁ya ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁kakala ▁kai ha mba ▁vinhu ▁vovi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁lu lu . ▁Muna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁kam ha ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁yoi memile ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁zozi lagusa ▁ugoni ▁wake .

▁Iviya ▁modaha ▁kuwa gula ▁watumwa ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁wowo kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁Wawo ▁wo welekigwe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁wodaha ▁kuwa ▁wenu .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁imitondo ▁Bulahimu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Hajili ▁ndiya ▁na ▁nongo ▁i memile ▁mazi . ▁Ka m t wika ▁mwanage ▁m di ye ga ▁na ▁ku muwinga ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mami ▁yake . ▁Wa segela ▁na ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁dibwilingu ▁da ▁Belisheba .
▁Sala ▁kadanganika ▁uko ▁K ili a si ▁Ali ba , ▁iviya ▁yo tangigwa ▁Hebuloni , ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁ka mtendela ▁ tanga ▁na ▁ka mulilila .
▁Ka ya lumbiliza ▁mapanzia ▁matano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mapanzia ▁sita ▁hamwe .
▁“ ▁‘ Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chochi lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁iwe ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chi patik e ▁kwa ▁uhazi , ▁hachiza chuuzi gwa ▁hebu ▁kukomboligwa . ▁Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chi lavigwe ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chela ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa nahina ▁wamwenga ▁weza ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁kwaviya ▁hawa kalile ▁kutali ▁bule ▁na ▁isi ▁inyalile , ▁ mbali ▁wakala ▁utali ▁wa ▁magulu ▁gana , ▁wa kwe ga ▁lwavu ▁lu memile ▁somba .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Fan a ▁yaheza ▁kwa ▁kuwa si nhu sa , ▁sekeya wa fike ▁mu gona ▁nhongo .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁hakala ▁muna ▁yam afundizo ▁yo son hela ▁Chilisito ▁ mbali ▁ko kongeza ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga ▁kuson hela ▁mafundizo ▁yayo , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ha ilumbile ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁yam afundizo ▁yayo , ▁ka ilumba ▁na ▁Tata ▁na ▁Mwana ▁iviya .
▁Hajili ▁kamwing ' ha ▁zina ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoyalongile ▁nayo , ▁“ W eye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yoni wona .” ▁Na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kweli ▁niye ▁ni muwona ▁yeye ▁yoni wona .”
▁Wakala ▁walume ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi .
▁“ Wapete ni ▁wanhu ▁kwandusi la ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .” ▁Wawo ▁wakala ▁Waisilaili ▁wowa lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Mbali ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yayo ▁yose , ▁vondawa we ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁niye ▁siza wa sa ▁hebu ▁siza wehila ▁m baka ▁ku wadanganiza ▁kwa ▁ku bena ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁hamwe ▁nawo , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wawo .
▁Na ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga ▁ zigwa ▁mwiisi ▁fana ▁viya ▁ng ' ho ga ▁za ▁mtini ▁vo zila gala ▁lusita ▁mbiki ▁wake ▁viu tingisigwa ▁na ▁beho ▁kulu .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Chila ▁mulume ▁ya i funge ▁panga ▁jake ▁muna ▁i chigudi , ▁ya zunguluke ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁dilago , ▁kulawa ▁lwivi ▁lumwe ▁m baka ▁umwenga , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya mkome ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁na ▁mbwiya ke ▁na ▁mkaya ▁miyage .’ ▁”
▁“ Sekemu segeze ▁chinhu ▁chochi lagusa ▁m haka ▁ya ▁wakaya ▁wayenu , ▁chochi kigwe ▁goya ▁umwaka ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁mu ihazi .
▁ Nolonda ▁mweye ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ludumbo . ▁Munhu ▁yeli bule ▁muke ▁ko msang ' hanila ▁Mndewa , ▁kwaviya ▁ko geza ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa .
▁Wamisili ▁wa ya duganya ▁mabula ▁yayo ▁vi bugulu ▁ bugulu , ▁isi ▁yose ▁in ung ' ha ▁ vu ndo .
▁One ▁ habule ▁kuzilibuka ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wadanganike , ▁basi ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁nayo ▁ha zilibuke ▁bule .
▁M nyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁keza chinjigwa ▁hanhu ▁howo chinjil igwa ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁damu ▁yake ▁iza k wi ti ligwa ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁lupango .
▁Na ▁fana ▁yaha ku bananga ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁imwe , ▁na ▁kubwela ▁kumwako ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁na ▁ku kulongela , ▁‘ Ni samha ,’ ▁mu lekelele .”
▁Wa nhu ▁weza sola ▁damu ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wawo ▁na ▁ku haka ▁mibiki ▁ya mhilile ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁ikaye ▁yonda wa je ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁Mbali ▁Wayahudi ▁weli ▁hawa huwila ▁wawa son geza ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wawa leme ▁wanhu ▁wohuwila .
▁Basi , ▁loleni ▁usungu ▁uja ▁wou galigw a ▁na ▁Mulungu ! ▁U mtenda ni ▁mu iyohe ▁ng ' hani , ▁wene ▁kui gombela , ▁kwi hi ligwa ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁chihile , ▁wene ▁kudumba , ▁wene ▁hamu ▁ng ' hulu , ▁wene ▁kui lava ▁na ▁wene ▁ku londa ▁ku tagusa ▁wihi . ▁Mu lagusa ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila ▁kuwa ▁ mwabule ▁wihi ▁muna ▁ imbuli ▁ino .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawil a ▁Bulahimu ▁heli ▁na ▁mibiki ▁mi kulu ▁ya ▁Mamule . ▁Bulahimu ▁kakala ▁ya kalile ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁di he na ▁jake ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁vuke ▁da ▁imisi .
▁Mbali ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela ‚ ▁“ M weye ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ‚ ▁ha bali ▁mo wa leke za ▁wanhu ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ? ▁M weye ▁watumwa ▁wose ▁ hite ni ▁kuna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zenu !
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁kawa lawilila ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁viwa kalile ▁woja . ▁Kawa bwakila ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wabule ▁uhuwilo , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wa dala ▁kuwa togola ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowa mu onile ▁viya malile ▁ya ▁kuzilibuka .
▁“ Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Uchanyha ▁Ng ' hani ▁hakala ▁bule ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zozi zengigw e ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁fana ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁viyolonga ,
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁Musa ▁viya ku lile ▁kahita ▁kuwa la ula ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Waebulaniya ▁na ▁kulola ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁ndala ▁zi wo tenda . ▁Ka wona ▁Mmisili ▁ko mtowa ▁Muebulaniya , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁Ni uza , ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁nitende ▁choni ?’ ▁Na ▁Mndewa ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Inuka ▁uhite ▁Damasiki , ▁uko ▁kwiza longiligwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁Mulungu ▁chi yo ku londa ▁utende .’
▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vi zakuwa ▁vako ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁velile ▁ng ' hani , ▁vili ▁havi timbuligwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁vino ▁vi zakuwa ▁venu , ▁nhosa ▁za ▁usage ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁ubananzi . ▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁chonda wa ni lavile ▁wanhu , ▁chi zakuwa ▁chako ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago .
▁Mu ke ▁wa ▁Esau ▁Oholibama , ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Ana ▁wa ▁S ib e wo ni ▁kamwelek ela ▁Esau ▁wana ▁watatu , ▁nawo ▁niiyo ▁Ye u shi ▁na ▁Ya la mu ▁na ▁Kola .
▁Na ▁wa chuuzi ▁wa ▁isi ▁weza lila ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁giyogiyo , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya gulile ▁vinhu ▁vawo .
▁One ▁waha londa ▁kuvimanya ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁ wolondeka ▁wawa uze ▁walume ▁zawo ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zawo . ▁Ni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁chinyala ▁ng ' hani ▁muke ▁kulonga ▁muna ▁im iting ' hano ▁ya ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wowomuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁Muha londa ▁ndiya ▁hebu ▁mazi ▁kumwawo ▁m olondeka ▁mu gule .’
▁Kachi lava ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ivo ▁kezachi ka ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino , ▁fana ▁viya walaganile ▁wa saho ▁zetu .
▁Mbali ▁mulume ▁ya solile ▁ko sang ' hanila ▁mbuli ▁za ▁isi ▁ino , ▁kwaviya ▁ko londa ▁yam no geze ▁muke ▁wake ,
▁ Sambi ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁wo kwazanywa ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁hamwiza ilumba ▁nawo ▁kaidi ▁kukala ▁vihile ▁ng ' hani , ▁ivo ▁wo muliga ni .
▁Pilato ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Kweli ▁icho ▁icho ni ?” ▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁kawalongela ▁Wayahudi ▁“ Si patile ▁ ba na ngo ▁da ▁munhu ▁ino .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁wanhu ▁ mwili bule ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁mwa gile ! ▁Niza kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁Niza wa funyila ▁umoyo ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁M gale ni ▁iyo ▁i mbwanga ▁hano ▁ha mwa ng u !”
▁“ No mulongelani ▁kweli , ▁chochose ▁chonda mu funge ▁muna ▁isi , ▁chiza fungigwa ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁chochose ▁chonda mu fungu le ▁muna ▁isi , ▁chiza fungu ligwa ▁kuulanga .
▁I ja ▁yo lava ▁usindila ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁kolonga , ▁“ Kweli , ▁no kwiza ▁sambi !” ▁Ivo ! ▁W i ze ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu !
▁Vino ▁kuna ▁wanhu ▁wo hulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁dolonga ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u umo to ▁fana ▁vi muhulike ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwa ▁wagima ?
▁Vino ▁niwa ba wila ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁waja ▁woni watumile ▁kumwenu ?
▁“ Sekeu mba manye ▁nyambenyambe , ▁mweye ▁mu umanya ▁u n yambenyambe , ▁mana ▁na ▁mweye ▁mukala ▁nyambenyambe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Wa b i mbi li ka ▁muna ▁yam atimbwisi ▁ku lagusa ▁usungu , ▁wa guta ▁nyangi ▁na ▁wa lila ▁na ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁giyogiyo , ▁“ Kwizagaya ! ▁ Kwizagaya ▁bululu ▁kulu ! ▁M gati ▁yake ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁m eli ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁wa pata ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vake , ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁saa ▁dimwe ▁muhala ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiya kalile ▁nacho ▁chi segela .”
▁Mndewa ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ V ula ▁vilatu ▁vako ▁kwaviya ▁hanhu ▁hano ▁ho wi mile ▁hela .
▁Na ▁viya nduse ▁kulonga , ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ka mu hulumukila ▁fana ▁viya chi humuluk ile ▁cheye ▁baho ▁mwanduso .
▁Na ▁ka tanga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁fana ▁m bumo ▁wa ▁simba . ▁Viya la ndu le ▁dizi , ▁mi bumo ▁saba ▁i di kila ▁kwa ▁m si ndo .
▁Wanage ▁Leya ▁wakala ▁Lubeni , ▁yeli ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁na ▁Simeoni ▁na ▁Lawi ▁na ▁Yuda ▁na ▁Isakali ▁na ▁Zabuloni .
▁Maabaho ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁dimwenga ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁dolonga , ▁“ L a we ni ▁kumwake ! ▁M weye ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁muladi ▁sekemuwe ▁m v ava ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁wake , ▁wala ▁sekemu hokele ▁ma hulo ▁yake .
▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mwiza wona ▁ulanga ▁wo gubuka ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wo kwela ▁na ▁ku hulumuka ▁m chanyha ▁mwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu .”
▁I zakuwa ▁fana ▁viu lawilile ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁Lutu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁woja ▁na ▁kung ' wa , ▁wakala ▁wo gula ▁na ▁ku chuuza , ▁wakala ▁wo handa ▁na ▁ku zenga .
▁Yesu ▁kalamuka , ▁kadi bwakila ▁beho ▁na ▁kaya longela ▁mawimbi , ▁“ Nyama la !” ▁Maabaho ▁beho ▁di kala ▁hupi ▁na ▁kukala ▁zi nzi wa .
▁Chi mwing ' he ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁Tata ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Tata ▁wa ▁ubazi ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yo taza .
▁Ka muuza , ▁“ Malagilizo ▁yelihi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Sekeu kome , ▁sekeu zi ni , ▁sekeu bawe ▁na ▁sekeu longe ▁uvwizi ,
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁“ Chi no ▁ni icho ▁choya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi tendigwe .”
▁Wa u nogeza ▁muhe ▁wangu ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwa gum ile ▁moyo ▁mweye ▁wenyewo , ▁yo londeka ▁kuwa hishimu ▁wanhu ▁wano .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachilongela ▁cheye ▁wose , ▁‘ M o dumba ▁kuwa ▁wanenu ▁weza soligwa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁wawo ▁weli ▁wadodo do ▁hawavimanyile ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile , ▁wawo ▁ni iwawo ▁wonda wengile ▁umo ▁na ▁niza weng ' ha ▁isi ▁iyo ▁iwe ▁yawo .
▁Mwiza kweleka ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike , ▁ mbali ▁haweza kuwa ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁weza soligwa ▁kuna ▁utumwa .
▁na ▁modeli ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁mdala si ni ▁chilo ▁sita , ▁ningo ▁izo ▁zose ▁zi we ▁za ▁kwii linga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁iviya ▁uya ha nganye ▁na ▁lita ▁nne ▁za ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁mzaituni .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mbandama ▁mwa li ▁wake , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mami ▁yake .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kawa ▁kabananga , ▁kolondeka ▁ya bweleze ▁chiya ba wile ▁hebu ▁chiya patile ▁kwa ▁u ba ma nyi , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chi yeng ' higwe , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁cha gile ▁kachi pata ,
▁Mbali ▁muvimanye ▁muna imizoyo ▁yenu , ▁sekemu gese - gese ▁vonda mwi di ke .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya hume ▁kezahokela ▁vinhu ▁vino , ▁niye ▁niza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁mwanangu .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁M midiani ▁yoyakomigwe ▁ka tangigwa ▁Ko z ib i , ▁mndele ▁wa ▁S uli , ▁yoya kalile ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁uko ▁Midiani .
▁Chi p indi ▁icho , ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Balaba . ▁Iyo ▁kakala ▁ka fungigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa mwe ga ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁u son ga ▁ma gida ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu ▁vi ku kalile ▁na ▁ma go do go do .
▁Sekemu tumbal e ▁mavindi ▁kui tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo ▁hebu ▁kui sang ' hanila ▁hebu ▁sekemu hi ge ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo . ▁Mwiza wadanganiza ▁na ▁kuvi bomola ▁vi ba nda ▁vawo .
▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Kohasi ▁kakala ▁Eli sa fa ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁U zi eli .
▁Lelo ▁izo ▁ uwaduwile ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁kwaviya ▁wana ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁niye . ▁Hu we nda ▁niza daha ▁kuwahuma ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁wa lawe ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Kwa viya ▁ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wose ▁wouwa temela ▁mate ▁wo temeligw a ▁mate ▁na ▁wouwa duwila ▁wo duwiligwa .”
▁Mulungu ▁iviya ▁kolonga ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wa kalangama ▁wetu , ▁vichi kalile ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁womuhuwila ▁kwa ▁ kwela ▁na ▁u nhu ▁goya ▁na ▁ bila ▁ya ▁ku longigwa ▁vihile .
▁Viwa wile ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Yosefu , ▁wamulongela ▁msang ' hani ,
▁Henoko ▁kakala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁m aabaho ▁kasegela , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kamsola .
▁Wamisili ▁wose ▁wa himba ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili ▁muladi ▁wa pate ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa ‚ ▁mana ▁wa potwa ▁kung ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili .
▁Mu huwile ▁haja ▁ hani walongele , ▁Niye ▁na mgati ▁mwa ▁Tata ▁na ▁Tata ▁ka mgati ▁yangu . ▁One ▁ha muhuwile ▁ivo , ▁ muhuwile ▁kwa ▁zi sa a no ▁zi nitendile .
▁Kulaw a ▁muna ▁in usu ▁iyo ▁yo weng ' higwe ▁Waisilaili , ▁Musa ▁kasola ▁imwe ▁chila ▁muna ▁yam alongo ▁matano ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama , ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁Walawi ▁wowa sang ' hane ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁wa hokela ▁zahabu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁wa i gala ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁iwe ▁lukumbuso ▁lwa ▁Waisilaili ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁ko mwa ▁da ▁mwanamke ▁iyo , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁ko ga ▁mazi , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁kakala ▁fana ▁mgeni ▁muna ▁isi ▁ija ▁iya mulongele ▁Mulungu . ▁Y eye ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁muna ▁yama zewe , ▁wa hokela ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viya mu laganile ▁Bulahimu .
▁I wa nd ugu ▁wa sola ▁vitumetume ▁na ▁hela ▁miyanza ▁midi ▁kufosa ▁ija ▁ya ▁ichanduso . ▁Wa hita ▁Misili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yawo ▁Benjamini . ▁Viwafikile ▁wahita ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Yosefu .
▁One ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha wona ▁ha fi lile ▁ habule ▁kwaviya ▁di fu wi gwa , ▁keza segeza ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ hali ngile ▁fana ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁M agate ▁Ha ya na gumigw a ▁L usu , ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁wamuhitila , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Ha lihi ▁hou londa ▁chi ku funga nyi le ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka ?”
▁Mbali ▁Ananiya ▁ka bagula ▁hela ▁zimwenga ▁ka fisa , ▁hela ▁zi sigale ▁ka zi gala ▁kwa ▁watumigwa . ▁M ke ▁wake ▁ka imanya ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ No mulongelani , ▁sang ' hanileni ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁kui patila ▁wa mbwiya , ▁muladi ▁vonda zima le , ▁wa muhokele ni ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose .
