▁Wala ▁sekemu tangigwe ▁‘ Walangulizi ’ ▁kwaviya ▁mulangulizi ▁wenu ▁ni ▁imwe ▁muhala , ▁nayo ▁ni ▁Chilisito .
▁Chila ▁siku ▁i ka ▁magate ▁yelile ▁hana ▁imeza ▁haulongozi ▁ hangu .
▁Yano ▁ya kala ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Gelishoni ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo , ▁L ib i ni ▁na ▁S hi me i .
▁kwaviya ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna kwingila ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuhumula ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yondaya mwing ' heni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁ Diyelo ▁mu togola ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Mwiza sondelela ▁nzila ▁zake ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁na ▁kumtegeleza .
▁Iviya , ▁na ▁mweye ▁one ▁lulimi ▁ l wenu ▁hau longa ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku manyika , ▁yelihi ▁yondaya dahe ▁kuyamanya ▁yo mulonga ? ▁Mbuli ▁zenu ▁ziza kwa ga ▁bule !
▁“ Ivo , ▁ka leni ▁meso , ▁kwaviya ▁hamu vimanyile ▁siku ▁yonda ye ze ▁Mndewa ▁wenu .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁kumgeza , ▁walonga , ▁“ Vino ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁yetu ▁munhu ▁kodaha ▁ku mwasa ▁mke ▁wake ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ?”
▁walonga , ▁“ M weye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Galilaya ! ▁ Habali ▁m wima ▁hano ▁mo bunhul a ▁meso ▁kuulanga ? ▁Yesu ▁ino ▁yoya soligwe ▁kumwenu ▁kuhita ▁kuulanga , ▁keza bwela ▁kaidi ▁fana ▁viya viya ▁vimu muwonile ▁kohita ▁kuulanga .”
▁M kalizi ▁wa ▁lwivi ▁ko m fungu lila ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wo hulika ▁dizi ▁jake . ▁Na yo ▁ko watanga ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake ▁kwa ▁mazina ▁yawo , ▁m aabaho ▁ko wagala ▁kunze .
▁Ihaw a ▁munhu ▁keng i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁va ya tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁sekeya londe ▁ku segeza ▁ng ' ho vu ▁ya ▁ulungwana . ▁Ihaw a ▁kakala ▁hana kwing i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁viya ta ng i we ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁ha londeka ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya muwonele ni ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kumwing ' hani ▁tindiwalo .’
▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu ▁wodaha ▁kulonga , ▁wamwenga ▁wa lamule ▁na ▁yaja ▁yo longigwa .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha gesa ▁ha mtendela ▁vinogile ▁mhambe ▁wake , ▁fana ▁ha msolile , ▁fana ▁tama a ▁zake ▁zi ha mwing ila ▁basi ▁na ya tende ▁viyolonda , ▁wa i sole . ▁Ha tenda ▁uhasanyi .
▁Keza lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁yeli bule ▁chilema ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁zi ke ▁da ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ,
▁ Habali ▁chihite ▁uko ▁kuno ▁chi fa ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁ludumbo ? ▁Wa chilongela ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁uko ▁ni ▁wakulu ▁na ▁wa tali ▁kufosa ▁cheye , ▁mabululu ▁yawo ▁ni ▁makulu ▁ya na ▁mhongono ▁zo fika ▁kuna ▁yamawingu . ▁Kaidi ▁walonga ▁kuwa ▁wa wona ▁mi zi nhu ▁mita li ▁ya ▁ welekwa ▁wa ▁Ana ki ▁uko .’
▁Nuhu ▁ka gozela ▁siku ▁zimwenga ▁saba , ▁m aabaho ▁ka mtuma ▁kaidi ▁nziwa .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo londa ▁ugima ▁wake ▁keza wagiza , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo wi hila ▁ugima ▁wake ▁mwi ▁isi ▁ino , ▁keza kwing ' higwa ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Kamulongela , ▁“ L a m ka , ▁u msole ▁imwana ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁mu bwele ▁kuna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli , ▁kwaviya ▁waja ▁wa gezile ▁kumkoma ▁imwana ▁wadanganika .”
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo , ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁m chisuwili ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁va ▁mnyumba , ▁sekeya hulumuke ▁kuhita ▁mwii i kaye ▁kuvi sola , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁kumgunda ▁iviya ▁sekeya bwele ▁kuchisogo ▁kusola ▁chochose .
▁Na ▁niye ▁nod eng ' helela ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Sitefano ▁na ▁F o tu na ta ▁na ▁ Aka i ko , ▁kwaviya ▁wano ▁wazi ba ▁heng o ▁di kalile ▁uko ▁kwa ▁ku leka ▁kuwa uko ▁u k wenu .
▁U iyohe ▁kui lagusa ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁msang ' hani ▁ha wonela ▁chinyala ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake ▁na ▁iviya ▁ija ▁yo fundiza ▁voilondeka ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kweli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁lwavu ▁lwa ▁shaba ▁lw ili ▁na ▁ mhete ▁nne ▁za ▁shaba ▁kuna ▁ivi ng obweda ▁vake ▁vi ne .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ‚ ▁“ Niza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye . ▁Na ▁chino ▁chi zakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁niku tu mile . ▁ Vondau wa lave ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwiza mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁mulima ▁uno .”
▁Niza tenda ▁nawo ▁lagano ▁dino ▁vondani segeze ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .”
▁“ U ha go ni kigwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁kuna i sola , ▁sekeu kale ▁vi goda ▁va ▁k ulongozi . ▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁mkulu ▁kuku fosa ▁weye ▁kodaha ▁kwiza ,
▁“ ▁‘ Vondamu gobole ▁vinhu ▁vimu handile ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu , ▁sekemu gobole ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁muna ▁zim haka ▁za ▁migunda , ▁hebu ▁sekemu sa la le .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Mulungu ▁wa ▁Waebulaniya ▁kachi lawilila ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo . ▁Lelo ▁chi lekele ▁chi ge nde ▁mwanza ▁wa ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁kuichuwala , ▁chika mulavile ▁nhambiko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu . ▁One ▁ha chitendile ▁ivo , ▁kezachi koma ▁kwa ▁matamu ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondo .”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam pekul a ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁yaha wona ▁ha gidimila ▁na ▁upipi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁u galuka ▁kuwa ▁mzelu , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko . ▁U wo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁wou lawile ▁kuna ▁di i hu .
▁Maabaho ▁niza tuma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kumwenu ▁wanhu ▁wabala ▁na ▁wafundiza , ▁ mbali ▁wamwenga ▁mwiza wakoma ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁mwiza wa wa mba ▁mumsalaba , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁mwiza wa lanha ▁mibalati ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutosela ▁na ▁kuwawinga ▁kulawa ▁bululu ▁m baka ▁bululu .
▁Wa weka ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁watumigwa , ▁nawo ▁wawa tambikila ▁na ▁wa wekila ▁makono ▁m chanyha ▁yawo .
▁Wanage , ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Ishumaili ▁wa muwanda ▁umo ▁muna ▁dituka ▁da ▁Makipela ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁Mamule ▁mumgunda ▁wou kale ▁wa ▁Efiloni , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁So hali ▁Mu hiti .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁na ha kala ma , ▁usenga ▁uno ▁wo kulongela ▁ugen zi ▁uchi londeka ▁chiwe ▁nawo ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ni i jo ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁dili ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁m gomba ▁na ▁chandusilo ▁cha ▁kweli .
▁“ Mbali ▁vondamu pate ▁yamabululu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁mu ihazi , ▁sekemu si gaze ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁chochose .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁watawala ▁wa ▁isi , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁u tawala ▁hau lawile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁bule , ▁na ▁uja ▁uli ▁sambi ▁ wi kigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁ziya ▁mfalume ▁Helode ▁ka wagwila ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁ka wagaza .
▁Vi ha ▁ng ' hani ▁ku muliga ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yoyo i zeha ▁damu ▁ya ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yoi chi sa f yi le , ▁na ▁yo muliga ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo tenda ▁fana ▁vino ▁kezatagusigwa ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela ,
▁Yo faya ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁nhaguso ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wengi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁iyo .
▁Na ▁kalonga , ▁“ H ajili ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Salayi , ▁kulawa ▁kulihi ▁na ▁kohita ▁kulihi ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ No m kimbila ▁Salayi ▁yoni msang ' hanila .”
▁Ivo ▁mu ya gele ▁ludabwa ▁makono ▁yenu ▁ya b o b ile ▁na ▁mavindi ▁yenu ▁ya b o b ile .
▁Sekemu lawe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁bule ivo ▁mwiza danganika , ▁kwaviya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ku haka ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁uchanyha ▁yenu .” ▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viyalongile .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁sambi ▁na ▁isi ▁iyo ▁i gubuka ▁na ▁ku wamela ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁nawo , ▁nayo ▁i wamela ▁wang ' hali ▁wagima ▁nawo ▁weza hita ▁kuzimu . ▁Baho ▁mwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wam zeha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Waholi ▁nawo ▁umwaka ▁wakala ▁Seili , ▁ mbali ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Esau ▁wa wawinga ▁kunze ▁na ▁wa wakoma ▁muladi ▁wakale ▁uko , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Waisilaili ▁viwatendile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁yo weng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yoya ha kigwe ▁mavuta ▁iyo ▁yo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wawe ▁na ▁ubananzi , ▁iyo ▁keza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁diwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wakale ▁hasi .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Sambi ▁kwiza wona ▁chonda ni mtendele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili . ▁Mana ▁kwa ▁shuluti ▁yangu ▁keza walekelela ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁kwa ▁shuluti ▁keza wawinga ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yake .”
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Yakobo . ▁Yosefu ▁viyakalile ▁mbwanga ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁longo ▁na ▁saba , ▁kakala ▁ko dima ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wana ▁wa ▁Biliha ▁na ▁Zilipa , ▁wake ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Yosefu ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁za ▁ndugu ▁zake .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁Musa ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁Waisilaili .
▁Maabaho ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁kachilongela ▁chi bwele ▁ku gula ▁ndiya ▁chidogo .
▁Nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wengi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa londa ▁kuya wona ▁yo muwona ▁mweye , ▁ mbali ▁hawa ya wonile ▁na ▁wa londa ▁kuya hulika ▁yaja ▁yo muhulika ▁mweye , ▁ mbali ▁hawa yahulike .
▁Kwiza kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Gosheni , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁habehi ▁na ▁niye , ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁zako ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wako ▁na ▁luti ▁wako ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wako ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi uli na cho .
▁Mbali ▁ teng ' hu ▁keza gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁keza lemigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno .
▁One ▁vose ▁vi wile ▁chilung o ▁chimwe ▁muhala , ▁sigambe ▁ku we ▁na ▁lukuli .
▁ lulumu ▁hebu ▁chi londa ▁hebu ▁ baka ,
▁Viya longile ▁ivo , ▁kawa lagusa ▁makono ▁na ▁magulu ▁yake .
▁Ha nhu ▁hohose ▁honda ▁mu hokel we , ▁mukale ▁umo ▁m baka ▁vondamu segele .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁imndele ▁imkulu ▁kamulongela ▁imdodo , ▁“ Ni ibandama ▁na ▁tata ▁ichilo , ▁Lelo ▁leka ▁chim ng ' wize ▁upele ▁kaidi ▁m aabaho ▁weye ▁wii bandame ▁nayo , ▁ivo ▁chose ▁chiza kweleka ▁nayo ▁wana .”
▁Na ▁ziya ▁ nyivi ▁ng ' hulu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁zi kala ▁lu lu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili , ▁chila ▁lwivi ▁lu kala ▁lu sang ' hani gwa ▁kwa ▁lu lu ▁imwe , ▁kulu g u mbi ▁da ▁bululu ▁di kala ▁di sang ' hani gwe ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁inogile ▁yoi ba mila ▁fana ▁chi lole .
▁uhasanyi ▁uwo ▁vondau manyike , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza lava ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁diwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi . ▁Weza di gala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Chila ▁munhu ▁keza hu ng igwa ▁kwa ▁umoto , ▁fana ▁nyama ▁vi i gumigw a ▁munyu .
▁Maliya ▁kakala ▁na ▁Elizabeti ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyezi ▁mitatu , ▁m aabaho ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁yake .
▁Na yo ▁kadumba ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ha nhu ▁hano ▁ho du mbi za ▁ng ' hani ! ▁Kweli ▁ni ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁kuulanga .”
▁Nuhu ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁sita ▁na ▁umwe , ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁mo si , ▁ka wona ▁mazi ▁ya kala ▁ya nyala ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Nuhu ▁ka gubula ▁chi g u b i ko ▁cha ▁safina , ▁ka lola ▁na ▁kuwona ▁isi ▁i kala ▁i nyala .
▁Ha behi ▁na ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hakala ▁na ▁migunda ▁ya ▁Pu bu li yo , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁chi si wa ▁chiya . ▁Kachi hokela ▁vinogile ▁chi kala ▁wageni ▁wake ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu ,
▁Kwa viya ▁cho vimanya ▁Chilisito ▁kazilibuka ▁kamala , ▁nayo ▁heza danganika ▁kaidi ▁bule ▁na ▁ifa ▁haiza m tawala ▁bule .
▁Lelo ▁yombe ▁jangu ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁cha ki ? ▁Y ombe ▁jangu ▁ni ▁ku wapetele ▁wanhu ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ bila ▁ku lihigwa . ▁ B ila ▁ku pula ▁choni londeka ▁kupata ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu ▁ya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Iviya ▁viya komeleze ▁kuja , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁i nhu ngo ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ N hu ngo ▁ino ▁ni ▁lagano ▁da ▁sambi ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁dodi gubikigwe ▁na ▁damu ▁yangu ▁yoi kwitika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Chi li si p o , ▁ya kalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mndewa , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kaye ▁yake ▁yose . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wengi ▁uko ▁Ko li n so ▁wa hulika ▁usenga , ▁wahuwila ▁na ▁wabatizigwa .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kahita ▁kuwalongela ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁nawo ▁wang ' hali ▁mwii n ha nga ▁na ▁kulila .
▁Chi no ▁chi zakuwa ▁chip indi ▁chenu ▁chinogile ▁cha ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Wa tengenez e ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁na ▁ngubiko ▁iyo ▁ya ▁kuilumba ▁ili ▁uchanyha ▁yake , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ,
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁nolonga ▁vino , ▁chiya ▁chochi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁na ▁damu , ▁havi daha ▁ku hazi ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁vinhu ▁ v e ne ▁ku wola ▁havi daha ▁ku hazi ▁vinhu ▁va ▁ku wola .
▁“ Izoni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mu tegeleze , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Yakobo . ▁Mu nitegeleze ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁Isilaili .”
▁One ▁mulume ▁yaha msola ▁muke ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mami ▁yake , ▁wose ▁watatu ▁weza somigwa ▁moto , ▁muladi ▁sekekuw e ▁na ▁chilo zo ▁hagati ▁yenu .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁M ulume ▁ha londeka ▁ku gubika ▁ditwi ▁jake , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ka linga ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yeye ▁ko ba mila ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁mwanamke ▁ko ba mila ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁mulume .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mwimbila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wila ▁uno , ▁walonga , ▁“ Niza mwimbila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani . ▁Kawa sa ▁muibahali ▁falasi ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi .
▁Vi chifikile ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma , ▁Paulo ▁ka lekeleligwa ▁kukala ▁yaidumwe ▁na ▁mkalizi ▁imwe ▁wa ▁ku mkaliza .
▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kuni tenda ▁ni de ng ' helele ▁kufosa ▁kuhulika ▁kuwa ▁wanangu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ikweli .
▁Abimeleki ▁ka tuma ▁usenga ▁kwa ▁Isaka ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ H umbe ▁iyo ▁ni ▁muke ▁wako ! ▁ Habali ▁kulonga ▁ni ▁ lumbu ▁jako ?” ▁Isaka ▁kedika , ▁“ Ni gesa ▁one ▁ni longile ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁muke ▁wangu , ▁niha komigwe .”
▁Tela ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁mitano , ▁kadanganika ▁uko ▁Halani .
▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wokala ▁kumwawo ▁weza lekele lwa , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa tenda ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ bila ▁kuilunga .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ku m wenu ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kutogola ▁m baka ▁ya wone ▁vilaguso ▁na ▁mauzauza .”
▁Yesu ▁viyalongile ▁ivo , ▁ka tanga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ L a za lo , ▁ lawa ▁kunze !”
▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁na i kale ▁ng ' hani ▁mgati ▁mmwenu ▁kwa ▁mvunyo . ▁I fundize ni ▁na ▁kui zuma ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wose , ▁im b eni ▁za bu li , ▁na ▁nyila , ▁na ▁nyila ▁za ▁kun tunhiza ▁Mulungu . ▁M wi mbi leni ▁Mulungu ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁kulava ▁hewela .
▁Muna ▁zinzozi ▁ichilo ▁Mulungu ▁ka mwizila ▁Labani ▁M wa la mu ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ U i teganye , ▁seke ▁u mtemele ▁mate ▁Yakobo ▁hebu ▁sekeu m duwile .”
▁Ivo ▁baha ja ▁niwa tuma ▁wanhu ▁kumwako , ▁na ▁weye ▁kutenda ▁vinogile ▁kwiza . ▁Lelo ▁cheye ▁wose ▁cha ba hano ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁cho gozela ▁kuhulika ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chiu lagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁uchi longele .”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁yang ' we ▁mazi ▁yoni mwing ' ha ▁niye , ▁heza wona ▁ng ' hilu ▁kaidi ▁bule . ▁Kwa viya ▁mazi ▁yoni mwing ' ha ▁niye ▁yezakuwa ▁nzasa ▁yoi lava ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Ugima ▁mgati ▁mmwake , ▁na ▁yeza mwing ' ha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Mbali ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu ▁wadanganika ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁viwa mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁moto ▁hau londeka ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai . ▁Wawo ▁hawa wile ▁na ▁wana , ▁ivo ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali ▁wa sang ' hana ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kahumuluka ▁na ▁kudi wona ▁bululu ▁na ▁lingo ▁dodi kalile ▁di zengigw a ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Musa ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁kumuhokela ▁Yesilo , ▁kam tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁kamnonela . ▁Wa iuzagiza ▁mbuli ▁za ▁u ho nya ji , ▁m aabaho ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁dilago ▁da ▁Musa .
▁Modaha ▁kuja ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁ h ava mbule ▁mwiko ▁vili ▁na ▁mabawa .
▁U mo ▁mukala ▁na ▁chilingo ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku fukiz ila ▁ubani , ▁na ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁dodi kalile ▁di ha kigwa ▁zahabu ▁ banzi ▁zose , ▁na ▁mgati ▁yake ▁mukala ▁na ▁ziga ▁dodi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁dodi kalile ▁na ▁ndiya ▁yoi tangigwa ▁mana ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁mhome ▁ya ▁Haluni ▁yoi kalile ▁i s u ka ▁mayani ▁na ▁mabwe ▁yaja ▁maidi ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁lagano .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kasola ▁chiya ▁ichi dali ▁na ▁kuchi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kwa ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ha nhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁d ib e belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁ku mwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁ni ▁ha ▁Musa ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Mwenevale ▁wake ▁kamwidika ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ W eye ▁mtumigwa ▁wihile ▁na ▁m b wa ! ▁Ko vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no gobola ▁hanhu ▁si ha handile ▁na ▁no duganya ▁hanhu ▁si ha mizil e ▁mbeyu .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁cheye ▁cho togoligwa ▁kuhokela ▁ufalume ▁hau daha ▁ku tingisigwa ▁bule , ▁chiwe ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu . ▁Chi laguse ▁hewela ▁fana ▁voilondeka ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Chi tabu ▁cha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁havi somigwa , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wa tuma ▁usenga , ▁“ Wa nd ugu , ▁one ▁muhawa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁ walongele ni .”
▁“ Sekeu mbandame ▁muke ▁yahawa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake .
▁Na yo ▁kawauza , ▁“ Na ▁mweye ▁molonga ▁niye ▁yelihi ?” ▁Petili ▁kedika , ▁“ W eye ▁Chilisito , ▁Mulopozi ▁u saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .”
▁ Siku ▁ye sita ▁Eli asafu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁D e u eli , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁Kuna ▁lukuli ▁lumwe ▁lwa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁imwe , ▁fana ▁viya ▁lolelo ▁di m ta ng i ligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁vidi li ▁dimwe .
▁Sekeu mwa zi me ▁hela ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁ya ku lihe ▁ lima ng we , ▁hebu ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ndiya ▁muladi ▁ya ku lihe ▁ lima ng we .
▁Na ha hita ▁na ▁kuwa sasalil a ▁hanhu , ▁niza kwiza ▁kuwa sola ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁haja ▁ho ni kala ▁niye .
▁Mu muhokele ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa , ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁viili ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁M tazeni ▁chochose ▁chi yolonda ▁kulawa ▁kumwenu , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ka wataza ▁wanhu ▁wengi , ▁iviya ▁na ▁niye ▁kani taza .
▁m kalangama ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yatende ligwe ▁fana ▁viyalondile ▁kumtendela ▁ija ▁iya mulongele ze . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondamu segeze ▁wihi ▁hagati ▁yenu .
▁Ka v wiza ▁na ▁kalonga ▁kuwa ▁viya msolile ▁ha kalile ▁mhambe ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁chino ▁ni ▁chilaguso ▁chochi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mwanangu ▁kakala ▁mhambe .’ ▁Maabaho ▁tata ▁na ▁mama ▁wa ▁muke ▁ija ▁wezaku n j ula ▁chitambala ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁walala ▁wa ▁bululu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lagiliza ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁umo ▁chi lavigwe ▁kunze ▁ya ▁kaye ▁yang ' hali ▁hana lola ▁chimvuguya ▁icho , ▁muladi ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁sekechi gong ' o ndigwe ▁kuwa ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza kwingila ▁ku ilola ▁kaye ▁iyo .
▁No daha ▁kulava ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni li na cho , ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁ngayengaye , ▁hata ▁kulava ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁lu lunguzigw e ▁na ▁moto , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁na bule ▁ulondo , ▁iyo ▁hai faya ▁chochose ▁kumwangu .
▁U senga ▁uja ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁u longigwe ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁umwaka ▁u lagusa ▁kuwa ▁kweli , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa lemile ▁kuu sondelela ▁wa hokela ▁nhaguso ▁yoi londeke .
▁Mbali ▁siyo ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ka umanya ▁ukweli ▁uno . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo tambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁m baka ▁sambi ▁waha ja ▁ndiya ▁wo gesa ▁kuwa ▁ndiya ▁ija ▁i lavigwe ▁sadaka ▁kwa ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁kwaviya ▁ma lu ng ilo ▁yawo ▁ma nyonde ▁ nyonde ▁hata ▁ku geligwa ▁mwiko .
▁T u pe ▁jake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁m ichipi lo ▁yake ▁kezavi segeza ▁na ▁ku v a sa ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁ulupango ▁ho yo kwikigwa ▁maivu .
▁Hata ▁munhu ▁muhole ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ya le ligwe ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kezam wima ▁ndiya ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁yoyo mulonda ▁na ▁mwanage ▁ya si galile ,
▁Labani ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ One ▁uha wagaza ▁wa ndele ▁zangu , ▁hebu ▁uha sola ▁wake ▁wamwenga , ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁si i manyile ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁ uvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁m kalangama ▁wetu .”
▁Yesu ▁kalila .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wawona ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wadanganike ▁wo hishimigwa ▁na ▁hawa hishimigwa , ▁wema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁vi goda ▁va ▁chifalume ▁na ▁vi tabu ▁vi gubuligwa . ▁Maabaho ▁chitabu ▁chimwenga ▁chi gubuligwa ▁na ▁wadanganike ▁wa tagusigwa ▁iviya ▁fana ▁viwatendile ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo , ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ivi tabu ▁ivo .
▁“ ▁‘ Muna ▁um ting ' hano ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lagilizo ▁dimwe ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁na ▁kwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu , ▁fana ▁mweye ▁vimu li ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁keza kuwa ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose , ▁na ▁hata ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁viwahulike ▁yayo , ▁wa togola ▁malagilizo ▁yelile ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wabatizigwa ▁na ▁Yohana .
▁Wo se ▁wowa hulike ▁yayo , ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zi walongile ▁wa dimi .
▁“ One ▁Mu la wi ▁yoyose ▁yo lawa ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe ▁mwa ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁ko yakalile , ▁yaheza ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo ▁hanhu ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Paulo ▁kafika ▁D eli b e ▁na ▁Lisitila , ▁uko ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yo muhuwila ▁Yesu . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ka tangigwa ▁Timoseyo . ▁ Mami ▁yake ▁kakala ▁Muyahudi ▁yoya muhuwile ▁Mndewa , ▁ mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kakala ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi .
▁Wala ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo guma ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁mwii ▁mi fuko ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁umwaka . ▁Kwa viya ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo , ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁iza i tula ▁mi fuko ▁iyo , ▁divai ▁iza kwitika ▁na ▁mi fuko ▁iza tulika .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mbwiya ▁zangu ▁walondwa , ▁i zengele ni ▁wenyewo ▁uhuwilo ▁welile ▁ng ' hani . ▁Pu leni ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yo s huwa , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Eli ezeli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yo li mu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma tati , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Lawi ,
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu nya mhe , ▁kwaviya ▁ning ' hali ▁sina hita ▁bule ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁kuulanga . ▁Mbali ▁ hita ▁uka walongela ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁niye ▁nohita ▁kwa ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yenu , ▁Mulungu ▁wangu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .”
▁“ Tata , ▁no londa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wou ning ' hile ▁wakale ▁na ▁niye ▁hanhu ▁ho ni kala . ▁Wa wone ▁utunhizo ▁wangu ▁wou ni ni le ▁kwaviya ▁kuni londa ▁ing ' hali ▁isi ▁kulumbigwa .
▁M beyu ▁ziya ▁zozi la galile ▁nzila ▁zo lagusa ▁wanhu ▁wowo hulika ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁Mwihi ▁kokwiza ▁na ▁kuisola ▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yawo ▁muladi ▁sekewa togole ▁na ▁kukomboligwa .
▁Yosefu ▁viya komeleze ▁ku muwanda ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁kabwela ▁Misili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁wa i sondelela ▁nayo ▁kuhita ▁ku muwanda ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Walamse ni ▁walangulizi ▁wenu ▁wose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ndugu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁I tali ya ▁womulamsani .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ M o yo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁mdala ▁ng ' hani , ▁ko lema ▁ku walekelela ▁wanhu ▁wahite .
▁Hamu wa li hile ▁bule ▁wanhu ▁wa hu ni le ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu . ▁ Tegelezeni ▁viwo longelela ! ▁U ya la zi ▁na ▁ndilo ▁za ▁wa hu na ji ▁vi hulikik a ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa .
▁“ Vondamu hite ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁muha wona ▁vihongwe ▁na ▁m ituka ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁mweye , ▁sekemudumbe , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoya mulavile ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ka habehi ▁na ▁mweye .
▁No wapulile ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁fana ▁viya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ he zile ▁kusang ' haniligwa ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁kusang ' hanila ▁na ▁kulava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku kombola ▁wanhu ▁wengi .”
▁Yesu ▁viya malile ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁ka lola ▁kuulanga , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Tata , ▁L usita ▁lufika . ▁M tunhize ▁Mwana go ▁muladi ▁Mwana go ▁nayo ▁ya ku tunhize ▁weye .
▁“ Sekemu wa si le ▁zimbwa ▁vinhu ▁velile , ▁bule ▁ivo ▁weza wa hindukila ▁na ▁kuwa lu ma . ▁Sekemu wa si le ▁nguluwe ▁lu lu ▁zenu , ▁bule ▁ivo ▁weza zi bojoga ▁na ▁magulu ▁yawo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁na ▁mazina ▁ya ▁malagilizo ▁ni ▁venu ▁mweye , ▁ lamule ni ▁mweye ▁wenyewo . ▁Niye ▁si zakuwa ▁m ulamuzi ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁zino !”
▁“ Munhu ▁yaha mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁one ▁hai sa f yi le , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza lemigwa ▁muna ▁um ting ' hano , ▁kwaviya ▁kadi tenda ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁jambul e ▁mwiko . ▁Kwa viya ▁ha mizil igwe ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kuisafya , ▁ivo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yaha mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yo kigwe , ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁zaituni ▁hebu ▁magate ▁ma sisili ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁yoi ha kigwe ▁mavuta .
▁Na ▁ka tenda ▁mibiki ▁midi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ving obweda ▁va ▁dihema ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuchisogo .
▁Si di manyile ▁da kutenda ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁ivo ▁ni muuza ▁Paulo ▁fana ▁ko londa ▁kuhita ▁kwi n ha g u so ▁kui chi ta la ▁kuja ▁Yelusalemu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ma longele zo ▁yayo .
▁Niza mtuma ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yawa longole le , ▁niza wawinga ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi .
▁Viwafikile ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁Yakobo ▁uko ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi lawilile .
▁Mwiza wawinga ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁kwa ▁panga .
▁ Vondamu lo ke ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁iwe ▁yenu , ▁keza watenda ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁sekewa m gaze ni ▁na ▁mwiza kala ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .
▁Ndugu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyakomigwe ▁keza lihiliza . ▁Yaha m ting ' hana ▁im komaji , ▁keza mkoma .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Wa mwenga ▁wolonga ▁weye ▁ni ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi , ▁wamwenga ▁wolonga ▁ni ▁Eliya ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wolonga ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wa muwonela ▁migongo ▁ng ' hani ▁Sitefano ▁na ▁wa ge ge da ▁meno ▁kwa ▁ludoko .
▁Ivo ▁no lolela ▁ku mtuma ▁Timoseyo ▁kumwenu , ▁baho ▁vondani vimanye ▁yondaya ni lawilile .
▁One ▁na ha bananga ▁na ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁chochi ni londa ▁ni komigwe , ▁si lema ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁kuna ▁ shi ta ka ▁da ▁uvwizi ▁ kwasakany a ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo . ▁ Nolamba ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma ▁ya nitegeleze .”
▁Walondwa ▁wangu , ▁sekemu muhuwile ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yoyolonga ▁kolongo zigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁m geze ni ▁muladi ▁ muwone ▁fana ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kolongo zigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁wengi ▁wa baho ▁mvunyo ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁simwe ▁dino , ▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁mtini ▁kumgunda ▁wake . ▁Munhu ▁ino ▁kahita ▁ku londa ▁nhini , ▁ mbali ▁ha patile ▁bule .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁Yesu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wakala ▁wo fosa ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ya ▁uhemba . ▁Viwakalile ▁wo fosa , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa ndusa ▁ku hulu la ▁uhemba .
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁cha bule ▁hamu ▁ya ▁kuja , ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁chimwenga ▁cha ▁kuja ▁ila ▁mana ▁muhala .”
▁Kwa viya ▁siyo ▁Daudi ▁bule ▁yoya soligwe ▁kuhita ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁wangu , ▁ kala ▁ubanzi ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kulume ,
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa huwile ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁Mafalisayo ▁wema ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁ wolondeka ▁wa mhe ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .”
▁“ Y e za temeligw a ▁mate ▁mabululu ▁yenu ▁na ▁migunda ▁yenu .
▁Ada ▁kamwelek a ▁Ya bali , ▁ya kalile ▁tata ▁wa ▁wa fu ga ji ▁wokala ▁muna ▁yamahema .
▁Ni londeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁Wagiliki ▁na ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wagiliki , ▁na ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁wabala ▁na ▁wabozi .
▁Mulungu ▁ka zimanya ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁za ▁mgati ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu , ▁kwaviya ▁ning ' hali ▁kuhita ▁Kolimso ▁ku kimilila ▁magayo .
▁Ma la ▁na ▁T ili za ▁na ▁Ho gila ▁na ▁Milika ▁na ▁Nuhu , ▁wa ndele ▁wa ▁Selofehadi , ▁wa soligwa ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁za ▁ tati ▁yawo .
▁Hamwande ▁Bulahimu ▁keng i zigwa ▁ulungwana , ▁na ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ▁uko ▁kukala ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ku lagusa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwingila ▁ulungwana . ▁Ivo ▁Bulahimu ▁kawa ▁tata ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁hata ▁one ▁ha wengile ▁ulungwana ▁muladi ▁Mulungu ▁yawa togole ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁Wawo ▁wa ilongela ▁migongo ▁na ▁mi lu we , ▁“ Chi p o lomo ke leni ▁na ▁mu chi fi se ▁muladi ▁sekechi woneke ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁meso ▁ya ▁ija ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁kutali ▁na ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo .
▁No zimanya ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁na ▁viya ▁novimanya ▁ vu iyoha ▁na ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁wako , ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁hu daha ▁bule ▁kui sondelela ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wehile . ▁No vimanya ▁iviya ▁kuwa geza ▁waja ▁wo itanga ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁iviya ▁wawo ▁si wo , ▁na ▁kuwa wona ▁kuwa ▁wa vwizi .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ha bali ▁sidaha ▁kuku wi nza ▁sambi ? ▁Niza danganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako !”
▁Esau ▁ka mwihila ▁Yakobo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁ko ya temeligw e ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Ka gesa , ▁“ Siku ▁za ▁ma tanga ▁ya ▁tata ▁za a behi , ▁zi ha mala ▁niza mkoma ▁mdodo ▁wangu ▁Yakobo .”
▁Chi kwela ▁m eli ▁i lawile ▁Adi la mi to ▁i kalile ▁muna ▁mwanza ▁na ▁kufose la ▁ ba nda li ▁zimwenga ▁za ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya , ▁cha ndusa ▁mwanza . ▁Ali sitali ko ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Makedoniya ▁kulawa ▁Sesalonike ▁yoya kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye .
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁sekewa mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁dodi lawilile .
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁i kalile ▁miyanza ▁ya ▁Waisilaili ▁kwa ▁makabila ▁yawo , ▁dimwe ▁dimwe , ▁viwa nduse ▁mwanza .
▁Mbali ▁ija ▁yondaya funye ▁umoyo ▁m baka ▁kuuhelelo , ▁kezakomboligwa .
▁Wawo ▁viwa malile ▁kuwa goma ▁kaidi , ▁wa walekela ▁na ▁wa waleka ▁wahite . ▁I kala ▁vi dala ▁kuwatagusa ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wo mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁ya lawilile .
▁“ Lelo ▁inuka ▁na ▁ wingile ▁muna ▁dibu lu , ▁uko ▁kwiza longiligwa ▁chiu londeka ▁kutenda .”
▁Ndugu , ▁kwii leka ▁na ▁mweye ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁muhala , ▁na ▁iviya ▁kwii leka ▁uko ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁chihanga ▁muhala ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁moyo . ▁L usita ▁ludodo ▁hamwande ▁cha m hi s wa ▁na ▁hamu ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁kuwa wona ▁kaidi ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu he ▁wangu ▁hawiza kala ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁ni ▁lukuli . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁haweza kala ▁miyaka ▁kufosa ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi .”
▁Viwafikile ▁isi ▁inyalile , ▁wa wona ▁moto ▁wa ▁ma kala , ▁somba ▁na ▁magate ▁vi kigwa ▁m chanyha ▁yake .
▁Mu we ▁na ▁mazi zi ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁mu ze ng e ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁muna ▁i c ha ndusil o ▁chake , ▁na ▁muwe ▁wa gangamavu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimu fundizigw e . ▁Na ▁muwe ▁na ▁hewela ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawa gomesa ▁kumulongela ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ya lihi .
▁ Vondamu lo ke ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ simike ni ▁mabwe ▁makulu ▁na ▁mu ya kulu ge .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ko mwing ' ha ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ku lotela ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuvimanya ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁kweli . ▁Na ▁imwenga ▁keng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku fambula ▁ulonzi ▁umwenga .
▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁chidogo , ▁d ib e ho ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani ▁di tangigwa ▁“ B e ho ▁da ▁kuchanyha ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ” ▁jandusa ▁kubun a ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ichisiwa .
▁isi ▁yondamu je ▁ndiya ▁nyingi ▁na ▁hebu ▁hamwiza hungukilw a ▁na ▁chinhu . ▁Isi ▁yake ▁ili ▁na ▁luwe ▁lwa ▁zuma ▁na ▁muna ▁umulima ▁wake ▁modaha ▁ku himba ▁shaba .
▁Mwiza kuja ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁mwii me za ▁yangu ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wangu , ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁chifalume ▁na ▁kuwatagusa ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli .
▁Isaka ▁kawa ▁tajili ▁na ▁utajili ▁wake ▁u gendelela ▁kongezeka ▁m baka ▁kawa ▁tajili ▁ng ' hani .
▁Viya tendile ▁ivo , ▁ hulo ▁ijo ▁di leka , ▁nayo ▁ka sigala ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁na ▁weli ▁wagima .
▁Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁wa bananzi ▁iviya ▁wa galigw a ▁muladi ▁wa komigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalagiliza ▁Waisilaili , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁isi ▁yondamu ihazi ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya , ▁isi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁iya lagilize ▁weng ' higwe ▁makabila ▁kenda ▁na ▁nusu .
▁Kawalongela ▁watumigwa ▁wake , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kazilibuka , ▁leka mana ▁kana ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁mauzauza .”
▁M olondeka ▁mui zindilile ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁kwaviya ▁ye la ▁kumwenu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoi tenda ▁siku ▁iyo ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁siku ▁iyo , ▁kolondeka ▁ya wi ngigwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁mkalizi ▁kasola ▁vinhu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yo mulonda ▁Mulungu ▁ka manyika ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Kola ▁wakala ▁ A sili ▁na ▁Eli ka na ▁na ▁ A b i asafu . ▁Wawo ▁wakala ▁wa saho ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Kola .
▁Petili ▁ka ndusa ▁ku yi du ila ▁na ▁ku y ilaha , ▁“ Niye ▁si mmanyile ▁munhu ▁ino ▁i mulonga ▁mbuli ▁zake !”
▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wou kulongela ▁kwa bule ▁u ba na zi ▁kolondeka ▁kwa mhilila ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁uhuwilo ▁u gubul igwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Teng ' hu ▁za hileni ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁mu ya tende , ▁m aabaho ▁Mulungu ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁yayo ▁yose .
▁kawatanga ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁kaye ▁yake ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Loleni ▁ino ! ▁Ino ▁Muebulaniya ▁mu lu ma ng u ▁yoyo mgalile ▁mwiikaye ▁kochi guma ▁chinyala . ▁Ke ngila ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁changu ▁muladi ▁ya nya ngale , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁ni guta ▁nyangi .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁sambi ▁yose ▁ya mala ▁ku ti mi a . ▁M uladi ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yatimie , ▁kalonga , ▁“ No wona ▁ng ' hilu .”
▁I sola ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁lusita ▁lu zo weleke ▁kwa ▁kwika ▁da wa . ▁Wamisili ▁wa mulilila ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁saba .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁vomu iting ' ha ▁na ▁hamwe ▁fana ▁chibumbila , ▁mo gesa ▁kuwa ▁mo ja ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku mbu ku mbu ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁ h umbe ▁siyo .
▁Sekeu i tumbalil e ▁mavindi ▁hebu ▁kui sang ' hanila , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁ni li ▁na ▁migongo . ▁No watagusa ▁wana ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁zawo , ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁yetatu ▁na ▁yekane ▁ya ▁waja ▁woni hila .
▁Mkulu ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁chihite ▁sambi ▁mwanangu ▁yang ' hali ▁hana danganika .”
▁Na ▁one ▁yahawa ▁ka bule ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike , ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁M weye ▁walume , ▁wa nogele ni ▁wake ▁zenu ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viya wa londile ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁na ▁ka lava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo .
▁Isaka ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁manane .
▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁ya manyile ▁siku ▁iyo ▁wala ▁saa , ▁hata ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wala ▁Mwana , ▁ila ▁Tata ▁muhala .
▁Ivo ▁chi de ng ' helele ▁na ▁chi mtunhize ▁Mulungu ▁viyeli ▁mkulu , ▁kwaviya ▁ sola ▁ya ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁iza , ▁mke ▁wake ▁ka isasala ▁kamala .”
▁Ka sola ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁do watendile ▁na ▁kadi soma ▁moto , ▁m aabaho ▁kadi dunda ▁m baka ▁diwa ▁usage , ▁ka ko lo ga ▁usage ▁uwo ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁na ▁kawa wa ng ili za ▁Waisilaili ▁wang ' we .
▁Ivo ▁sekemu ha nganye ▁mnyama ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁hambule ▁mwiko , ▁ndege ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁hambule ▁mwiko . ▁Seke mwa mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ku dalisa ▁mnyama ▁hebu ▁ndege ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi tambala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁chochi lemigwe ▁kuwa ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yawe ▁mkaya ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe , ▁yoja ▁chochose ▁chi fi le ▁ch e n ye wo ▁hebu ▁chi komigwe ▁na ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo . ▁Maabaho ▁keza kuwa ▁ka safyigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁kengila ▁mgati ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Tegelezeni ! ▁Wa nhu ▁womu wekile ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁wa mu na ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wo fundiza !”
▁Wa fosa ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Fil i gi ya ▁na ▁Galatiya ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kawa lemesa ▁sekewa pete ▁usenga ▁muna ▁zisi ▁za ▁Asiya .
▁Mbali ▁walimi ▁wa wagwila ▁watumigwa ▁waja , ▁imwe ▁wamtowa , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁wa mkoma , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁wa mkoma ▁kwa ▁mabwe .
▁U hasanyi ▁wingi la ▁muna ▁isi ▁kufose la ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁na ▁ifa ▁i ngila ▁kufose la ▁uhasanyi , ▁ivo ▁ifa ▁iwe zila ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁kwaviya ▁wose ▁wa tenda ▁uhasanyi .
▁Ni humuluk e ▁ni hite ▁uko ▁ni ka lole ▁mwenyewo ▁fana ▁yoni yahulike ▁ni ▁kweli .”
▁Kawa sola ▁Petili ▁na ▁wana ▁waidi ▁wa ▁Zebedayo , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁giyogiyo ▁na ▁ku sa fa gila .
▁Yosefu ▁ka tuma ▁wanhu ▁ku mtanga ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wose ▁kwiza ▁kumwake , ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁watano ▁weze .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahawa ▁na ▁i hu ▁muna ▁imbende ▁yake , ▁najo ▁di hona ,
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Maabaho ▁vi lawilila ▁vinhu ▁vovi woneka ▁fana ▁m ila mbi ▁ya ▁moto , ▁navo ▁vi pwililika ▁na ▁kukala ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁chila ▁munhu .
▁Zu wa ▁d eketatu ▁wa ndusa ▁kwa sa ▁vi a ▁va ▁ngalawa ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yawo ▁wenyewo ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁Ivo ▁no londa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁ulongo lele ▁na ▁niye ▁niza sondelela ▁hachisogo ▁ugaluga ▁fana ▁viya ▁kwa ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁iwanyama ▁na ▁iwa na , ▁m baka ▁vondani fike ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁uko ▁Seili .”
▁Na yo ▁keza lawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kwa ndusa ▁ku wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁wowa i mwa gile ▁muna ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁hanhu ▁ho tangigwa ▁Go g u ▁na ▁Ma go g u . ▁Lufyende ▁kezawa kunzagiza ▁hamwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ng ' hondo , ▁nawo ▁weza kuwa ▁wengi ▁fana ▁msang a ▁wa ▁mhwani .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Mu wategeleze ▁ tati ▁zenu ▁na ▁mami ▁zenu .” ▁Am uli ▁ino ▁niiyo ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁yili ▁na ▁chilagano .
▁Filipo ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁uchi la g u si le ▁Tata , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁ichi nzahila .”
▁Maabaho ▁keza mchinja ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza i sola ▁damu ▁na ▁kui mizil a ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁ulupango ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Kawauza , ▁“ Mbuli ▁za ki ?” ▁Na wo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Vi nhu ▁vovi mulawilile ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo daha ▁kutenda ▁na ▁ku languliza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu ▁nod eng ' helela ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁cho hokela ▁kulawa ▁kumwake ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chochi pula , ▁kwaviya ▁cho tegeleza ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁na ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yo mnogeza .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha hita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁na ▁mi zi mu ▁na ▁waha wi , ▁niza mulema ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku mbagula ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Wa nahina ▁walonga , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁ lola , ▁hano ▁hana ▁ma ze le ▁maidi !” ▁Kawalongela , ▁“ I faya .”
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁mami ▁yako ▁sang a zi , ▁ lumbu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako , ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako .
▁Maabaho ▁wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁chitende ▁choni ▁muladi ▁chitende ▁chiya ▁Mulungu ▁cho yo chi londa ▁chitende ?”
▁Vino ▁mu gesa ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ndodo ▁kumwenu ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mbagula ni ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁muladi ▁mu m kwenhukile ▁habehi ▁na ▁mu sang ' hane ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muladi ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ?
▁Yesu ▁kawalola , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kwa ▁munhu ▁haidahik a ▁bule , ▁ila ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ha ili ▁ivo , ▁yose ▁yo dahika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Ivo ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁ndiya ▁bule ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁na ▁isi ▁zi gaya ▁kwa ▁nzala .
▁Ha i londeka ▁kulava ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chili ▁na ▁chilema ▁kwaviya ▁hachiza togoligwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Isaka ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mwanangu ▁iwa ze ▁kupata ▁himahima ▁ fa ni le ▁ivo ?” ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁kani taza ▁kupata ▁ivo .”
▁ A le ki za nda , ▁mu hu nzi ▁kani tendela ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁ng ' hani , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁kezamuli ha ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁chiyatendile .
▁Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Nolamba ▁sekemu ni kala mize , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kau temela ▁mate ▁mwanza ▁wangu ▁kamala , ▁ lekeni ▁ni bwele ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁Esau ▁ka uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ha bali ▁kuya tuma ▁mabumbila ▁yano ▁kumwangu ?” ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni londa ▁ni togole ke ▁na ▁weye ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁“ Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi . ▁Nhambiko ▁iyo ▁ye la ▁ng ' hani .
▁Henoko ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁matatu ▁na ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁mitano .
▁Musa ▁ka lola ▁ banzi ▁zose ‚ ▁na ▁viya wone ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo muwona ‚ ▁ka mkoma ▁Mmisili ▁ija ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁kalu fisa ▁muna ▁umsanga .
▁Iviya ▁wahita ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁iviya ▁vi i longigwe ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁“ T e t ele ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁ma ki nda ▁ya ▁nziwa ▁maidi .”
▁Pilato ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mfalume ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ W eye ▁kwo longa ▁niye ▁na ▁Mfalume . ▁Niye ▁nyele kigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁niza ▁mwiisi ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kweli . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁muna ▁ikweli ▁ko ni tegeleza .”
▁Wa bwela ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁Kadeshi ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Palani , ▁wawalongela ▁wose ▁mbuli ▁zi wawonile ▁uko ▁na ▁wawa lagusa ▁matunda ▁ya ▁isi .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho yolonda ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁icho ▁chino , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yoyo mulola ▁Mwana ▁na ▁ku muhuwila ▁yawe ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza n zilibula ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁uhelelo .”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mami ▁yangu ▁yelihi ? ▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁wa lihi ?”
▁“ Na ▁ziya ▁ mhembe ▁longo ▁zo u zi wone ▁ni ▁wafalume ▁longo , ▁waja ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana hokela ▁ufalume , ▁ mbali ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁udahi ▁fana ▁mfalume ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁saa ▁dimwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka walongoza ▁Waisilaili ▁kulawa ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu , ▁wahita ▁kuchuwala ▁cha ▁S huli . ▁ Siku ▁nhatu ▁wa genda ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁ bila ▁kuya wona ▁mazi .
▁Keza mwamha ▁yama bawa ▁na ▁ku mba lu la , ▁ mbali ▁sekeya m kanhe ▁vihande ▁vidi . ▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam timbula ▁hana ▁ulupango , ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁zi ngo di . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wou mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kuhita ▁uko ▁D e ka p o li , ▁kawalongela ▁yaja ▁yose ▁Yesu ▁yoya mtendele . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa hulike ▁wazanywa .
▁Sitefano ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ M weye ▁muli ▁na ▁si ngo ▁ndala ! ▁Ma gutwi ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁vi linga ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu , ▁mweye ▁fana ▁wa saho ▁zenu . ▁ Siku ▁zose ▁mo mulema ▁Muhe ▁Yelile !
▁Yo ya tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kam memez a ▁Muhe ▁wake .
▁One ▁Mndewa ▁sigambe ▁ya hu ng uze ▁siku ▁izo , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yonda ▁ya ho ne . ▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁Mndewa ▁woyawasagule , ▁kaya hunguza ▁zisi ku ▁izo .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁msang ' hani ▁zi yo kala ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁kolondeka ▁yatende ligwe ▁fana ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁ku lihigwa ▁chila ▁mwaka . ▁Hamu londeka ▁kumtendela ▁kwa ▁usede .
▁ Muiteganye ▁sekemu lave ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁ho mu ha wona ,
▁mwiza pata ▁vichala ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zomu zi wona ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yenu .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma tati ya , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Am o si , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Na hu mu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ E sili , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Na ga yi ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yuda ▁Isikaliyoti , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muladi ▁ya mu hinduke ▁Yesu ▁kumwawo .
▁“ ▁‘ Mu ha gobola ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁vimu handile ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu , ▁sekemu gobole ▁m baka ▁muna ▁zim haka ▁za ▁migunda ▁hebu ▁sekemu bwele ▁kuchisogo ▁ku do ndo le za ▁vi sigale . ▁Wa lekele ni ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁nyambenyambe . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .’ ▁”
▁Bul ulu ▁jose ▁di mema ▁tibwilitibwili . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa wagwila ▁Gayo ▁na ▁Ali sitali ko , ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁Makedoniya ▁wowa kalile ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Paulo , ▁wa kimbila ▁nawo ▁m baka ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁m iting ' hano .
▁“ V o mwing ila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁sekemu ng ' we ▁divai ▁hebu ▁upele ▁wowose , ▁bule ivo ▁mwiza danganika . ▁Di no ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu .
▁Mu i hokele ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁ bila ▁kulongelela .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Haluni . ▁Na dabu ▁chaudele ▁na ▁Abihu , ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁zina ▁jake ▁haja ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ugima , ▁ka sigwa ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁da ▁moto .
▁Yo ki ta ni ▁kakala ▁tata ▁wa ▁Ali mo dadi ▁na ▁Shel e fu ▁na ▁Ha sa lima we ti ▁na ▁Ye la ,
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁one ▁kagona , ▁keza hona .”
▁“ Sekeu pwililis e ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi , ▁na ▁sekeu m taze ▁munhu ▁m bananzi ▁kwa ▁kulava ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁U hasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo manyika ▁funhufunhu , ▁hata ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana fika ▁kuna ▁uku lamuliligw a ▁nhaguso , ▁ mbali ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo manyika ▁vondawa galigwe ▁kuna ▁uku lamuliligw a ▁nhaguso .
▁“ Ya ha wona ▁ka habule ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ▁kezadanganika . ▁Ivo ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiza mtenda ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁yadanganike ▁kwa ▁m na mi lo .
▁Musa ▁ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁himahima ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi ▁na ▁ka mtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Loleni , ▁wa a na ke ▁wano ▁wawo ▁wa ya sondelele ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁Balaamu ▁na ▁kuwa tende za ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mu hasanye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuja ▁Peoli . ▁Leka mana ▁ tamu ▁diwe zila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Sekemu di lige ▁zina ▁jangu ▁jelile , ▁kwaviya ▁yo londeka ▁di manyike ▁kuwa ▁jelile ▁na ▁Waisilaili . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoni mtenda ni ▁mwele ,
▁Wa huwila ▁wose ▁ni ▁ulo ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁ko fikiza ▁yose ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vose , ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ufalume ▁wangu ▁siyo ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁bule . ▁One ▁ufalume ▁wangu ▁u wile ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wangu ▁waha dahile ▁kuwa lemesa ▁Wayahudi ▁sekewa ni gwile . ▁Mbali ▁ufalume ▁wangu ▁siyo ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino !”
▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁kahita , ▁kachi sola ▁chitabu ▁icho ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁umkono ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁ija ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume .
▁Mbali ▁yano ▁one ▁haya lawilile , ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yoyolonga ▁kuwa ▁yano ▁yo londeka ▁ya lawilile ▁yezakuwa ze ▁kweli ?”
▁Ivo ▁one ▁kuno geligwa ▁na ▁niye , ▁ni la g u si le ▁nzila ▁zako , ▁muladi ▁niku manye ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁ku nogelw a ▁na ▁niye . ▁U kumbuke ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁dino ▁ni ▁wako .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoi tengenezel a ▁ubani ▁uli ngile ▁uwo ▁na ▁ku usang ' hanila ▁fana ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' ha ▁goya , ▁keza wing igwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake .”
▁M agate ▁yayo ▁yeza mo go ligwa ▁vihande ▁vihande ▁na ▁ku gi di ligwa ▁mavuta . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule .
▁M weye ▁kumwangu ▁mwiza kuwa ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wanhu ▁welile .’ ▁Zi no ▁ni izo ▁mbuli ▁zo nda u walongele ▁Waisilaili .”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁sekeya je ▁nyama ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁yoyose ▁yafile ▁mwenyewo ▁hebu ▁yoyakomigwe ▁na ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁muladi ▁sekeya mbule ▁mwiko . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ha nhu ▁hagati ▁ya ▁mazi ▁haya gole ▁yamazi ▁ banzi ▁mbili .”
▁Isaka ▁kachi tanga ▁ chisima ▁icho ▁“ Si ba ,” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Chila ho .” ▁Ivo ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁do tangigwa ▁Belisheba ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁“ Y eng ' higwe ▁nhogolwa ▁Mndewa , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁Kwa viya ▁keza ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁na ▁kuwakombola .
▁Cho ya chitendile ▁Ona ni ▁iviya ▁chiwa ▁chiha ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁iviya ▁yeye ▁nayo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mkoma .
▁Ha tendile ▁ubagulo ▁wowose ▁hagati ▁yetu ▁cheye ▁na ▁wawo , ▁ka walekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁kwaviya ▁wa muhuwila .
▁ Muiteganye ▁munhu ▁sekeya m wagize ni ▁kwa ▁uvwizi ▁wa ▁ubala ▁wa ▁chiunhu , ▁chandusilo ▁chake ▁ni ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ya ▁vinyamkela ▁watawala , ▁na ▁siyo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo !
▁Muna wo ▁ng a e nga e ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁mwo daha ▁kuwataza ▁lusita ▁lo lo se ▁lu mulonda . ▁Mbali ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Mwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁maidi ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe .
▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁vino ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁hawa muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁wala ▁hamwiza londa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose .
▁U ha komeleza ▁kuwa safya ▁Walawi ▁na ▁kuwa lava ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso , ▁weza sang ' hana ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁cheye , ▁cho m peta ▁Chilisito ▁yoya wa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba , ▁mbuli ▁yoi woneka ▁ching ' hwaso ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi , ▁na ▁ubozi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁wenu ▁mung ' hali ▁mwo lema ▁kuni togola .” ▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁vino ▁kwaviya ▁kavimanya ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso ▁welihi ▁mwa ▁ iwawo ▁wo lema ▁kutogola ▁na ▁munhu ▁yelihi ▁yonda yambiduke .
▁Na yo ▁Yesu ▁viya malile ▁kulonga ▁yayo , ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁luholozi ▁muumoyo , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁keza ni biduka .”
▁Uko ▁chifika ▁ngalawa ▁i kalile ▁yo hita ▁F o i ni ke , ▁ivo ▁chi kwela ▁na ▁chi segela .
▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁munhu ▁cho yodaha ▁kulava ▁kuu pata ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kaidi .
▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Iyo ▁niye . ▁Na ▁mweye ▁wose ▁mwiza niwona ▁niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁nikala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁mwene ▁Lu da b wa , ▁na ▁no kwiza ▁mwii ▁yamawingu ▁ya ▁kuulanga !”
▁Lelo ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chitala ▁mu mu la m b e ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁ya mgale ▁Paulo ▁kumwenu , ▁mutende ▁fana ▁mo londa ▁kuvimanya ▁vinogile ▁mbuli ▁zake . ▁Ch eye ▁chi i tanda ▁kumkoma ▁hata ▁yang ' hali ▁hana fika ▁hano .”
▁M gati ▁ya ▁hema ▁ijo ▁kwiza kwika ▁diya ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁m aabaho ▁i ka ▁panzia ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁Kwiza lumbiliza ▁mapanzia ▁matano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mapanzia ▁sita ▁hamwe , ▁panzia ▁de sita ▁kwiza di ba nda ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁ijo .
▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ko sang ' hana ▁mgati ▁yenu ▁yawa da hi ze ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁lungilo ▁na ▁mu dahe ▁kutegeleza ▁lungilo ▁jake ▁mwenyewo .
▁ Nolonda ▁kuwa ku mbu sa ni ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zi longigwe ▁umwaka ▁na ▁walotezi ▁welile ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya lawile ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁yeli ▁Mulopozi ▁niiyo ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁watumigwa ▁wenu .
▁Ko daha ▁ku mgalila ▁nhosa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vinhu ▁vako ▁viwa nduse ▁kugobola . ▁Mbali ▁havi za lavigwa ▁muna ▁ulupango ▁fana ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Zu a ▁vidi s h wile , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa hulumuka ▁m baka ▁kui di lamba .
▁ Siku ▁viyafikile ▁ya ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁Maliya ▁kutenda ▁ichi hendo ▁cha ▁ku sa f yi zigwa ▁vino ▁ni ivo ▁viwalo ndigwe ▁na ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Musa . ▁Ivo ▁wamsola ▁imwana , ▁wahita ▁nayo ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa mwi ke ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ,
▁Musa ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Chi sola ▁mabululu ▁yose ▁ya ▁Ogu ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁na ▁zisi ▁zili ▁kuna ▁di tambala le ▁da ▁kumulima , ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Gileadi ▁na ▁Bashani ▁m baka ▁Sa leka ▁na ▁ E dile i .”
▁Wa tenda ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁wazi guma ▁kuna ▁zi mhembe ▁mbili ▁za ▁hasi ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁mgati ▁wa ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁habehi ▁na ▁chizibawo .
▁Hamu daha ▁bule ▁kung ' wa ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁iviya ▁kung ' wa ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁vinyamkela , ▁hamu daha ▁kuja ▁muna ▁imeza ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁iviya ▁muna ▁imeza ▁ya ▁vinyamkela .
▁na ▁kamul a ndu lila ▁dizi , ▁“ Ima ▁kwa ▁magulu ▁yako !” ▁ B a ha ja ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ka zumha ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kugenda .
▁“ Mbali ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁chilagano ▁chochose ▁chi kigwe ▁na ▁mgane ▁hebu ▁muke ▁ya sigwe , ▁keza fungigwa ▁na ▁chilaho ▁chake .
▁Maabaho ▁Mwihi ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Niza kwing ' ha ▁ufalume ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vino , ▁kwaviya ▁vose ▁ning ' higwa ▁niye , ▁na ▁niye ▁nodaha ▁kumwing ' ha ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoni mulonda .
▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁ya mulongele , ▁“ Kwa ▁kufose la ▁Isaka ▁kwiza pata ▁welesi ▁wo nikulongele .”
▁“ Mu a mo ni ▁hebu ▁M mo a bu ▁yoyose , ▁ welekwa ▁wawo ▁wose , ▁m baka ▁welesi ▁wa ▁longo , ▁hawa londeka ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁um ting ' hano ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Mbali ▁nyama ▁na ▁mbende ▁kavi soma ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dilago .
▁Mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yo ilumba ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁na ▁malaya ▁weza kuwa ▁fana ▁munhu ▁imwe . ▁Kwa viya ▁viya ndik i kwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁lukuli ▁lumwe .”
▁Loleni ▁ni ▁ulondo ▁uli ngile ▁vilihi ▁uya ching ' hile ▁Tata ▁kuwa ▁chi tangigwe ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ivo ▁vichili , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁hawa chimanya , ▁kwaviya ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mu ha tosa , ▁longeni ▁vino , ▁‘ Tata , ▁Zi na ▁jako ▁di tu n hi zigwe , ▁Ufalume ▁wako ▁ wize .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Ndugu ▁chi tose leni ▁cheye .
▁Bulahimu ▁ka huwila ▁na ▁ka temiligw a ▁mate , ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa huwile ▁wa temiligw a ▁mate ▁fana ▁yeye .
▁Mbali ▁kaye ▁zili ▁muna ▁ivi bulul u ▁zili ▁hazi zungulusil igwe ▁ng ' huta , ▁ziza petigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁migunda , ▁na zo ▁zo daha ▁kukomboligwa ▁na ▁ziza bwelezigwa ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza .
▁Mbali ▁ni zimanya ▁sang ' hano ▁zako ▁zo utenda . ▁No umanya ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁na ▁u huwila ▁wako ▁na ▁ usang ' hani ▁wako ▁na ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁wako . ▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁sambi ▁ko iyoha ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁mwanduso .
▁Niza mpula ▁Tata , ▁nayo ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁M tazi ▁imwenga , ▁nayo ▁keza kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁siku ▁zose .
▁M tu mba ▁wake ▁kodaha ▁ku mkombola , ▁hebu ▁m ta ni ▁wake ▁hebu ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁muna ▁u lukolo ▁lwake . ▁Iviya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kodaha ▁kuikombola ▁one ▁yaha pata ▁utajili .
▁na ▁wa watendela ▁usede ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Vino ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yo tenda ▁choni ? ▁Ye kigwa ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁ubananzi , ▁m baka ▁vondayeze ▁ija ▁m welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁yoya longeligwe ▁viya ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Malagilizo ▁ya galigw a ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wa ▁m ulamuzi .
▁kalonga , ▁“ Na ya duwiligwe ▁Kanani . ▁Keza kuwa ▁mtumwa ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zake .”
▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wengi le ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁muladi ▁wa go ne ▁kwa ▁siku ▁dimwe . ▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁Petili ▁ka isasala ▁kamala ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kuhita ▁hamwe ▁nawo , ▁na ▁wandugu ▁wengi ▁kulawa ▁Yopa ▁wahita ▁na ye .
▁Bule ! ▁Cho huwila ▁na ▁kukomboligwa ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁viweli ▁wawo .”
▁Wa nenu ▁vondawa wa uze , ▁‘ D u gila ▁dino ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?’
▁“ Haluni ▁keza lava ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo , ▁na ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake . ▁Maabaho ▁keza di chinja ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁Yohana ▁kakala ▁fana ▁chitasa ▁chi kalile ▁chi kwaka ▁na ▁kulava ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mu sagula ▁lusita ▁ludodo ▁ku denelela ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁jake .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe , ▁nyafasi ▁i p a ti gwa ▁vi i kalile ▁mwiisi ku ▁ya ▁ku kumbuka ▁ku vumbuka ▁kwa ▁Helode . ▁Helode ▁kakala ▁ka watendela ▁dugila ▁kulu ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Galilaya .
▁Kwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁nowalongela , ▁niye ▁mwenyewo , ▁siyo ▁Mndewa , ▁one ▁mulume ▁yo muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁yahawa ▁na ▁muke ▁ha huwila ▁na ▁katogola ▁kukala ▁nayo , ▁sekeye ya mwing ' he ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁Wayahudi ▁wowa mtogole ▁“ One ▁muha yamha ▁mafundizo ▁yangu , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wanahina ▁wangu ▁kweli .
▁Ulon zi ▁uno ▁wa ▁ukweli , ▁mulala ▁yo languliza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁yoyo lola ▁goya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁ko londa ▁ usang ' hano ▁unogile .
▁I zakuwa ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁kugobola , ▁mwiza mwing ' ha ▁mfalume ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vitan o ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vi ne ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vitan o ▁vi zakuwa ▁venu ▁mweye ▁wenyewo . ▁I we ▁mbeyu ▁ya ▁isi ▁na ▁ndiya ▁yenu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁mwiikaye ▁yenu ▁na ▁wanenu ▁iwa dodo do .”
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitootondo ▁ng ' hani , ▁Yesu ▁ka lamka ▁na ▁kusegela ▁ukaye . ▁Ka lawa ▁hanze ▁mudibululu , ▁kahita ▁hanhu ▁ hali bule ▁wanhu , ▁uko ▁ka tosa .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom dalisa ▁munhu ▁yolaw igwa ▁ufila , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kam kumbuka ▁Nuhu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁ wofugigwa ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁muna ▁isafina . ▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁k ahembe lu la ▁beho ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ndusa ▁ku hunguka .
▁One ▁chiha muleka ▁ya gendelele , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza muhuwila , ▁m aabaho ▁Wa lo ma ▁weza kwiza ▁ku bananga ▁Kaye ▁yetu ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁isi ▁yetu .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tengenez a ▁ vihindo ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁va ▁zahabu ▁muladi ▁ku lumbiliz ila ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁va ▁panzia , ▁ivo ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁diwa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe .
▁Iviya ▁ka mu ya wa li za ▁mbende ▁za ▁i wanaluti ▁waja ▁m makono ▁na ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lu t ele bu ke ▁uli bule ▁upipi ▁muna ▁isi ngo ▁yake .
▁ B umbila ▁jose ▁hamwe ▁na ▁watumigwa ▁wa mtogoza ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁Wa wa sagula ▁Sitefano , ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ya memile ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Filipo , ▁P o lo ko lo ▁na ▁Ni ka no li ▁na ▁T i mo na ▁na ▁Pa li me na ▁na ▁Ni ko la yo ▁yoya lawile ▁Antiyokiya ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo yengile ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁kumsondelela ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁Chiyahudi .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Vino ▁na ▁weye ▁iviya ▁ko lawa ▁Galilaya ? ▁Lola ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁kwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yo lawilila ▁Galilaya ▁bule .”
▁Wa hita ▁kwa ▁Balaamu ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ B a la ki ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Sipol i ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Nokulamba ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁sekei ku ki mili le ▁kwiza ▁kumwangu .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁ka londa ▁yavimanye ▁masita ka ▁haswa ▁ya ▁Wayahudi ▁yowa mtendile ▁Paulo , ▁ivo ▁kam fungula ▁Paulo ▁imi nyolo lo ▁na ▁kalonga ▁wakulu ▁wose ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁watende ▁lu ndo . ▁Maabaho ▁ka mgala ▁Paulo ▁kuna ▁ichitala ▁na ▁ka mwi miza ▁haulongozi ▁wawo .
▁Ka mwing ' ha ▁imwe ▁ma sanduku ▁matano ▁ya ▁hela , ▁imwenga ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi ▁ya ▁hela , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁sanduku ▁dimwe ▁da ▁hela , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁fana ▁viya dahile . ▁Maabaho ▁kasegela , ▁kahita ▁mwanza ▁wake .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁kumgunda ▁sekeya bwele ▁kuchisogo ▁kusola ▁walo ▁jake .
▁Musa ▁katogola ▁kukala ▁haja , ▁Yesilo ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Musa ▁mndele ▁wake ▁ya tangigwe ▁Sipol a ▁ya msole .
▁M sang ' hani ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁yoyo kaliza ▁ulwivi ▁kamuuza ▁Petili , ▁“ Vino ▁na ▁weye ▁ huli ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁munhu ▁ino ?” ▁Petili ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Aka , ▁si ▁niye ▁bule .”
▁Iyo ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁iyo gubula ▁kweli . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁hawa daha ▁bule ▁kumuhokela ▁kwaviya ▁hawa daha ▁kumuwona ▁na ▁ku mmanya . ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mwo mmanya , ▁kwaviya ▁kokala ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁keza kuwa ▁mgati ▁mmwenu .
▁weza mkoma , ▁ mbali ▁zihafosa ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁hamwande , ▁keza zilibuka .” ▁Wa nahina ▁wengi lwa ▁na ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani .
▁No de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁kwa ▁kuwona ▁mo kumbuka ▁kaidi ▁kuni taza . ▁Si londa ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁muni zimiza , ▁ mbali ▁ham patile ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mo ni gesa .
▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁wa ▁Malagilizo ▁wa lawa ▁Yelusalemu , ▁waiting ' hana ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Yesu .
▁Mu ke ▁wa ▁Potifa ▁ka mgwila ▁de b wa ni ▁jake ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ U nya ngale .” ▁Mbali ▁Yosefu ▁ka s ulu p u ka ▁na ▁ka kimbilila ▁kunze , ▁kadi leka ▁de b wa ni ▁jake ▁m makono ▁yake .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁mweye ▁mwo gesa ▁Wa galila ya ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wa hasanyi ▁kufosa ▁Wa galila ya ▁wamwenga ▁kwaviya ▁wa gaya ▁ng ' hani ?
▁Ku watenda ▁fana ▁ufalume ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁na ▁weza tawala ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wa lawa ▁kudibululu , ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu .
▁No mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Tito ▁kuiyoha ▁kuwataza ▁fana ▁viya ▁cheye ▁vichili nayo .
▁Daudi ▁kalonga ▁chinhu ▁chino ▁chino , ▁viyalongile ▁ku mweda ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ka togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁kulola ▁chiya sang ' hane .
▁Ivo ▁kahita ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁isi ▁ija , ▁nayo ▁ka mgala ▁kumgunda ▁ya ka wa di me ▁nguluwe .
▁One ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yoni mwing ' hani ▁diyelo , ▁muha mulonda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁zake ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yake , ▁mwiza kala ▁na ▁kongezeka . ▁Na yo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁muna ▁iisi ▁imu hita ▁kuisola .
▁Yuda ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Isilaili , ▁“ Mu lekelele ▁mwanago ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁na ▁chiza segela ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muladi ▁cheye ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁wanetu ▁chi dahe ▁kuwa ▁wagima ▁sekechi danganike .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁ichitala ▁chiya ▁wa sita ▁magutwi ▁yawo ▁na ▁wa guta . ▁Maabaho ▁wose ▁wa n zum hila ,
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom wagiza ▁chipofu ▁mwiinzila .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁Mbali ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁ludabwa , ▁wa londa ▁Yesu ▁yawa mbigwe ▁muna u salaba . ▁Kwa ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁wa huma .
▁“ ▁‘ Ku dalisa ▁wanyama ▁wamwenga ▁ko mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁yoyose ▁yo dalisa ▁ mitufi ▁yawo ▁ko kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Vi we kigwe ▁kuwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁kuhak igwa ▁mavuta , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalagiliza ▁Waisilaili ▁wa weng ' he ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁nhambiko , ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁yawo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Wa mgalila ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁chi hande ▁chimwe ▁chimwe , ▁na ▁ditwi , ▁nayo ▁kavi timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁One ▁chiha longa , ▁‘ U lawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ,’ ▁cho dumba ▁lung ' husesa ▁kwaviya ▁wose ▁wo togola ▁kuwa ▁Yohana ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulola ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁one ▁yaha wona ▁ lulumu ▁ ze lu ▁ dung ' hu ▁chidogo ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ichihanga ▁na ▁do woneka ▁fana ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁yaja ▁yo mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁iyo ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁na ▁ lumbu ▁jangu ▁na ▁mami ▁yangu .”
▁Kuna ▁Mulungu ▁imwe ▁iviya ▁niiyo ▁Tata ▁wa ▁wose , ▁yeli ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wose , ▁ko sang ' hana ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wose , ▁na ▁ka mgati ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁I wa ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁malaya ▁L a ha bu , ▁yeye ▁ka togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zake , ▁kwaviya ▁kawa hokela ▁waja ▁wa pelemba ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁na ▁kuwataza ▁wahite ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁nzila ▁imwenga .
▁Mbali ▁ mkome ni ▁mulotezi ▁ija ▁hebu ▁m fambula ▁nzozi ▁kwaviya ▁kalonga ▁uvwizi ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yoya mulavile ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ko mu kalile ▁watumwa . ▁Wo geza ▁kumtenda ni ▁muleke ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ugima ▁u yamulagilize ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondamu segeze ▁wihi ▁vimwili .
▁Isaka ▁ha mmanyile ▁Yakobo ▁kwaviya ▁makono ▁yake ▁ya kala ▁na ▁upipi ▁fana ▁Esau . ▁Ivo ▁kakala ▁ko kwandusa ▁ku mtemela ▁mate .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kolonga ▁vinogile ▁mbuli ▁za ▁D e me ti li yo , ▁na ▁kweli ▁yolonga . ▁Iviya ▁cheye ▁wose ▁cho lava ▁ukalangama ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zake , ▁weye ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁ukalangama ▁wetu ▁ni ▁kweli .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Abulamu ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁mwene ▁Udaho . ▁Ni tegeleze ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁u kale ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁yehile .
▁He la ▁yowa i lavile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁i kala ▁chilo ▁ elufu ▁tatu ▁na ▁longo ▁na ▁saba ▁na ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁saba ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano .
▁na ▁M i shi ma ▁na ▁D uma ▁na ▁Masa
▁“ No mulongelani ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo ni togola ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁nayo ▁keza mtogola ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe , ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁yo lu mwa ▁dikulu ▁lukuli ▁lwose ▁keza . ▁Viya muwone ▁Yesu , ▁ka ibwanha ▁hasi ▁chingubingubi ▁na ▁ku mulamba , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁waha londa , ▁kodaha ▁kuni ho nyo !”
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚
▁Wa nhu ▁wa zunguluka ▁na ▁kui duganya , ▁m aabaho ▁wa i dunda ▁kwa ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁kudundila , ▁hebu ▁kui t wa nga ▁muna ▁yama tu li , ▁m aabaho ▁kui to go sa ▁muna ▁zino ngo ▁na ▁ku sasala ▁magate , ▁u mu lile ▁wake ▁ulinga ▁fana ▁ma andazi ▁ya mbi kigwe ▁na ▁mavuta .
▁na ▁iza gendelela ▁m baka ▁Zi fi lo ni ▁na ▁ku helela ▁uko ▁Ha za li ▁Enani . ▁Iyo ▁izakuwa ▁m haka ▁yenu ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi .
▁Nasanayeli ▁ka uza , ▁“ Vino ▁yo dahika ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chinogile ▁chila we ▁Nazaleti ?” ▁Filipo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Izo ▁u lole .”
▁Lelo ▁zoka ▁di kala ▁ vwizi ▁kufosa ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁wowa lumbigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Z o ka ▁di muuza ▁imuke , ▁“ Vino ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁kuwa ▁sekemuje ▁ tunda ▁da ▁mbiki ▁wowose ▁muna ▁umgunda ?”
▁Mbali ▁Maliya ▁ka zi ka ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake ▁na ▁kuzi gesa ▁ng ' hani .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwii gese ▁wenyewo ▁fana ▁mu danganika ▁muna ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁mwa wa gima ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Bahobaho ▁tata ▁wa ▁mwana ▁ija ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ No huwila ▁ mbali ▁uhuwilo ▁wangu ▁mdodo . ▁Ni taze ▁niwe ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mkulu !”
▁Ivo ▁Paulo ▁kasegela ▁kuna ▁um ting ' hano .
▁“ Lelo ▁mfalume ▁kolondeka ▁ya msagule ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁umanyi ▁na ▁ubala , ▁yawe ▁ mulole zi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Kwa viya ▁na ▁niye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁ni li ▁na ▁udahi , ▁na ▁ni nawo ▁wakalizi ▁hasi ▁yangu . ▁Na ha mulongela ▁imwe , ▁‘ Hita ,’ ▁nayo ▁kohita , ▁na ▁na ha mulongela ▁imwenga , ▁‘ Izo ,’ ▁nayo ▁kokwiza , ▁na ▁na ha mulongela ▁mtumwa ▁wangu , ▁‘ Tend a ▁chino ,’ ▁nayo ▁kochi tenda .”
▁“ ▁‘ Vondamu sasale ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁imwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku fikiza ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo , ▁wema ▁wa mshitak a ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁ludabwa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁imwe ▁imwe , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁wana ▁wadoododo ▁muladi ▁ya wekile ▁makono ▁na ▁yawa tose le . ▁Mbali ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wawa bwakila ▁wanhu ▁wa wagalile ▁wana ▁wawo .
▁Isaya ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁kwaviya ▁kau wona ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁zake .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Vondamu lo ke ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ,
▁Yesu ▁heli ba ha ▁bule , ▁kazilibuka ! ▁Kumbuk eni ▁viya walongele ▁viyakalile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya ,
▁“ Mbali ▁mweye ▁ mulema ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kwa ▁kulema ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁wa vimanya ▁kuja ▁kukala ▁na ▁ngalawa ▁imwe ▁muhala . ▁Iviya ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁heng ile ▁bule ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁ mbali ▁wanahina ▁wasegela ▁waidumwe .
▁Ge seni ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁kuulanga , ▁si ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Viwakalile ▁wazanywa ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁icho , ▁bahobaho ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wowa i yawale ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁chwee ▁wema ▁habehi ▁nawo .
▁ fi go ▁mbili ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁yake ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁hamwe ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini .
▁Isaka ▁kamtanga ▁Yakobo , ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu sole ▁mwanamke ▁yoyose ▁Mkanaani .
▁Sa mha ▁m agesa ▁yako ▁yehile , ▁m aabaho ▁u tambike ▁kwa ▁Mndewa , ▁nayo ▁kodaha ▁kuku lekelela ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yano .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ H u mu lu ka ▁hasi ▁uka wa zum e ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁seke we ze ▁kuni lola , ▁bule ivo ▁wezadanganika .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoja ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁na ▁kui ng ' wa ▁damu ▁yangu , ▁iyo ▁kokala ▁mgati ▁mmwangu ▁na ▁niye ▁no kala ▁mgati ▁mmwake .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela , ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wowa kalile ▁wo mulilila ▁na ▁ku mu o mbo le ze la .
▁Na yo ▁viya manyile ▁dizi ▁da ▁Petili , ▁ka de ng ' helele la ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁kakimbila ▁ bila ▁ku vugula ▁ulwivi ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁kuwa ▁Petili ▁kema ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ulwivi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Sol a ▁vilung o ▁vino ▁vili ▁u mu lile , ▁na ta fi ▁na ▁shekel e si ▁na ▁k eli bena , ▁vilung o ▁vili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ubani ▁unogile . ▁Vi nhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁vi we ▁va ▁ningo ▁imwe .
▁Mu mweda ▁Waisilaili ! ▁Habule ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁mweye , ▁wanhu ▁womu komboligwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ni li ▁ng a wo ▁ya ▁u tazi ▁wenu ▁na ▁panga ▁dodi mgalila ni ▁uhumi ! ▁W e hi ▁wenu ▁weza kwiza ▁kui nyendanyenda ▁kumwenu , ▁mweye ▁mwiza wa bojoga .”
▁Vini li ▁ning ' hali ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁Niye ▁ni i jo ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁isi .”
▁Fan a ▁masumula ▁yo kaliza ▁chi sa n ja ▁chake , ▁ku zumha zumha ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ma ki nda ▁yake , ▁ko tanda za ▁mabawa ▁yake ▁muladi ▁kuwa mhilila , ▁na ▁kuwa papa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mabawa ▁yake .
▁M weye ▁mwa ▁wa mbwiya ▁zangu ▁one ▁muha tenda ▁yaja ▁yoni walagilize .

▁“ B a si ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁viya chi longele , ▁cha ndusa ▁mwanza ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holebu , ▁chi fose la ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁ichi kulu ▁cha ▁kudumbiza ▁cho mu chi manyile , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁yoi hita ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁Waamoli . ▁Chi fika ▁Kadeshi ▁Balinea .
▁Hebu ▁kwo daha ze ▁kumulongela ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁‘ Ndugu ▁yangu , ▁ go za ▁ni segeze ▁chi banzi ▁mui di zi so ▁jako ,’ ▁na ▁kuno ▁weye ▁hu di wona ▁ ba le ▁dili ▁mui di zi so ▁jako . ▁Kwa ▁n delenya ▁weye ! ▁Teng ' hu ▁ lava ▁ ba le ▁dili ▁mui di zi so ▁jako , ▁m aabaho ▁kwiza daha ▁kulava ▁chi banzi ▁chili ▁mudi zi so ▁da ▁ndugu ▁yako .

▁Cho chi chi wona ▁sambi ▁ni ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yoi lola ▁muna ▁ichilo le ▁chi fi lile , ▁ mbali ▁baho ▁hamwande ▁chiza wona ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga . ▁ Sambi ▁novimanya ▁haki na kwe ne la , ▁ mbali ▁baho ▁hamwande ▁yose ▁niza yamanya ▁haki na kwe ne la ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viyo nimanya ▁niye .
▁M baka ▁sambi ▁ham pulile ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu . ▁Pu leni ▁mwiza kwing ' higwa , ▁na ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁weza vi sola ▁vi a ▁vose ▁vovi sang ' haniligwa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yelile , ▁na ▁kuvi guma ▁muna ▁ichi tambala ▁cha ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁kwa ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali ▁na ▁ku vika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁viwa mu le kile ▁Yesu , ▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁vinoga ▁cheye ▁chi kale ▁hano . ▁Leka ▁chi ze ng e ▁vi zewe ▁vitatu , ▁chimwe ▁chako , ▁na ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁Musa , ▁na ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁Eliya .” ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁chi yo longa .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yaha ika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁isi ▁yake ▁ili ▁uhazi ▁wake , ▁bei ▁yake ▁iza li ng igwa ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁bei ▁ya ▁mbeyu ▁zi ha ndigwe ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁uwo , ▁chila ▁chilo ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁za ▁mhule ▁bei ▁yake ▁izakuwa ▁shekel i ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁ya ▁hela .

▁Ha longile ▁vino ▁kwaviya ▁kawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁ngayengaye , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁n papa ji ▁wa ▁m ko ba ▁wa ▁hela , ▁na ▁lusita ▁lu mwenga ▁kakala ▁yo bawa ga ▁hela .

▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chi yo ka lila ▁muke ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Filipo ▁ka kwenhuka ▁habehi ▁ya ▁di to lo li ▁ijo ▁na ▁ka muhulika ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko soma ▁chitabu ▁cha ▁Isaya , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Baho ▁Filipo ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁ko yamanya ▁yayo ▁you soma ?”
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁“ K i mu seni ▁nyama ▁ija ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁mui je ▁baho ▁hamwe ▁na ▁gate ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ ichisege ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁za ▁kwikil a ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile . ▁Tend eni ▁fana ▁vini longeligwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁‘ Ha nhu ▁baho ▁heza digwa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage .’
▁Mbali ▁sekeu lu li ng e ▁ luhelengo ▁lwa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁weng ' higwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Na wo ▁weza di t ava ngila ▁bululu ▁jelile ▁kwa ▁miyezi ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁midi .
▁Isaka ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni galile ▁nyama ▁muladi ▁ni je ▁na ▁kuku temela ▁mate .” ▁Yakobo ▁ka mgalila ▁na ▁ka ja , ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁ka mgalila ▁divai ▁ka ng ' wa .
▁na ▁ko kumbuka ▁kuwa ▁kuson gela ▁viu kalile ▁mwana ▁mdodo , ▁kuyamanya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile , ▁yoyo daha ▁ku kwing ' ha ▁ubala ▁wou ching ' ha ▁ukombola ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁ku muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Mbali ▁waha komeleza ▁kulava ▁usindila ▁wawo , ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁do lawa ▁muna ▁dikombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo ▁diza itowa ▁nawo ▁na ▁ko wahuma ▁na ▁kuwakoma .

▁Wa nayo ▁mfalume ▁wawo ▁yo walongoza , ▁nayo ▁niiyo ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Lufyende ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kuna ▁dikombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo , ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya ▁ko tangigwa ▁ A ba do ni ▁na ▁kwa ▁Chigiliki ▁ko tangigwa ▁ A p o li oni , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ M bananzi .”

▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁ha lola ▁lusita ▁luja ▁wanhu ▁viwa kalile ▁hawammanyile , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ko walongela ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁wa leke ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .
▁Na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ I teganye ni ▁na ▁yaja ▁yomu ya hulika ! ▁N dagilizi ▁zomu sang ' hanila ▁kuwa ta g u sila ▁wamwenga , ▁Mulungu ▁keza zi sang ' hanila ▁ndagilizi ▁izo ▁kuwatagusa ▁mweye , ▁m aabaho ▁mwiza k ongeze ligwa .
▁Niye ▁ni mulongelani ▁kweli ▁yoni i hulike ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁lelo ▁mwo londa ▁kunikoma . ▁Bulahimu ▁ha tendile ▁ivo ▁bule .
▁Mbali ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁viwa kalile ▁wo mtagusa , ▁ h edike ▁mbuli ▁yoyose .
▁M kumbuke ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁Elizabeti . ▁I longigwa ▁hadaha ▁ku lela ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁kana ▁wimo ▁wa ▁miyezi ▁sita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁u la la ▁wake .
