▁Saimoni ▁M ka na nayo ▁ mtowa ni la ▁isi ▁yake , ▁na ▁Yuda ▁Isikaliyoti ▁yo yambiduke ▁Yesu .
▁“ Chi lekelele ▁mwenevale , ▁chiza ▁hano ▁ku gula ▁ndiya ▁umwanza ▁wa ▁ichanduso .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁wo tenda ▁uha wi ▁wa vi gala ▁vi tabu ▁vawo ▁na ▁wa vi lunguza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu . ▁Viwa pe tile ▁bei ▁ya ▁vi tabu ▁ivo , ▁wa wona ▁yo daha ▁kufika ▁hela ▁magan a ▁magan a ▁matano .
▁“ Sekeu yawale ▁mawalo ▁ya son igwe ▁kwa ▁ s ufu ▁na ▁chitani ▁hamwe .
▁Iyo ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁icho ▁ka ba mila ▁fana ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁hela ▁ng ' hulu ▁yo tangigwa ▁yasipi ▁na ▁ a ki ki . ▁Pi ndo ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁di zunguluka ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁ banzi ▁zose , ▁di woneka ▁fana ▁zuma li di .
▁One ▁muha langulizigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁hamu ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁Malagilizo .
▁Fan a ▁viyolonga ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Diyelo ▁muha hulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala , ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwatendile ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁viwa mu lemile ▁Mulungu .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni ,
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁Yohana ▁kakala ▁hana kwikigwa ▁mchifungo .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawa sola ▁walume ▁wano ▁wowa ta mbu ligwe ▁mazina ▁yawo ,
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Ni kutendele ▁choni ?” ▁Chi pofu ▁iyo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁no londa ▁kuwona .”
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁uhuwilo ▁uwe ▁fana ▁ng a o ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu , ▁iwa da hi ze ni ▁ku zima ▁mi sa le ▁ija ▁ya ▁mwihi .
▁U i teganye ▁sekeu tende ▁lagano ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁you hita , ▁kwaviya ▁dizakuwa ▁m t e go ▁hagati ▁yako .
▁ Mbwanga ▁imwe ▁kakimbila ▁kahita ▁kumulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ E li dadi ▁na ▁M e dadi ▁walonga ▁fana ▁walotezi ▁muna ▁dilago .”
▁M weye ▁iviya ▁m wolondeka ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁zangu , ▁kwaviya ▁mukala ▁na ▁niye ▁kuson gela ▁mwanduso .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Vondamu fike ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yoni mwing ' hani , ▁chila ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁saba ▁isi ▁yo londeka ▁i humule . ▁Seke ili m igwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁W eye ▁ku londa ▁vinhu ▁vovi m no geze ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kulema ▁mbuli ▁zihile . ▁Leka mana ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁ka ku sagula ▁na ▁ka ku haka ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ka kutenda ▁u de ng ' helele ▁kufosa ▁wayago .”
▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁dino ga , ▁na ▁kavi gola ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁na ▁ziza .
▁Na yo ▁ka landula ▁dizi , ▁“ Yesu ! ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ! ▁Ni wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza gala ▁vitumetume ▁viwo daha , ▁fana ▁viwa temeligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Ivo ▁ ilahile ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁hwiza nivwizila ▁niye ▁na ▁wanangu ▁na ▁welesi ▁wangu . ▁Fan a ▁niye ▁vini wile ▁mwaminika ▁kumwako , ▁ivo ▁na ▁weye ▁uwe ▁mwaminika ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁kwa ▁isi ▁ yu u kala .”
▁Kola ▁viya wa duganye ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁muladi ▁kuwa lema ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uwa lawilila ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Mana ▁haidahik a ▁bule ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁na ▁luti .
▁Wa se mi ▁weza lola ▁goya ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁one ▁m kalangama ▁yahawa ▁m vwizi ▁na ▁ko mulavila ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁uvwizi ,
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Adamu . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁Mulungu ▁viya mu l umbile ▁munhu , ▁ka mu lumba ▁fana ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ,
▁Maabaho ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁welile ▁na ▁m kweli , ▁kwiza kala ma ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ▁ku tagusa ▁na ▁ku lihiliza ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁isi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku chinjigwa ▁kwetu ?”
▁One ▁muha tambikila ▁milungu ▁imwenga , ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁lwiza mwa kila ni ▁fana ▁moto ▁na ▁lwiza wa bananga ni , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yeli ▁hagati ▁yenu , ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁migongo .
▁Na ▁viwa p i mile ▁m hishi ▁zi wa duganye , ▁munhu ▁ya duganye ▁ndiya ▁nyingi ▁ha patile ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁munhu ▁ya duganye ▁chidogo ▁ha patile ▁chidogo ▁ng ' hani . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ka duganya ▁ndiya ▁yoi m faya .
▁Fan a ▁muhe ngila ▁muna di bulul u ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waha muhokela ni , ▁di ye ni ▁chiya ▁chonda mwing ' higwe .
▁yondaya wone ▁isi ▁yoni walaganile ▁ tati ▁zawo . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ya ni ze hile ▁heza iwona .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mo woneka ▁na ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁kunze ▁kuwa ▁munoga , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁mgati ▁mu mema ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁udelenya .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁niku nogeza , ▁no ku pula ▁uhite ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye . ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wana ▁ mizoyo ▁midala , ▁ mbali ▁uchilekele le ▁wihi ▁wetu ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁uchi hokele ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁mwenyewo .”
▁Ka mtaza ▁Isilaeli ▁msang ' hani ▁wake , ▁ka kumbuka ▁ku lagusa ▁ubazi ▁wake
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁kuna ▁wimo ▁na ▁kwiza kweleka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁zina ▁jake ▁kwiza mtanga ▁Ishumaili , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko hulika ▁manhesa ▁yako .
▁Lelo ▁chiwa tuma ▁Yuda ▁na ▁Sila ▁kumwenu . ▁Wawo ▁wezalonga ▁wenyewo ▁chiya ▁chochi wandikile .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mu m funyila ▁umoyo ▁munhu ▁yokwiza ▁na ▁ko m peta ▁Yesu ▁imwenga ▁kufosa ▁Yesu ▁wochi m peta , ▁hebu ▁yomu muhokele ▁muhe ▁mbasakanyo ▁kulawa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁yoyo muhokele , ▁na ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁mbasakanyo ▁kufosa ▁ija ▁yomu i hokele ▁kulawa ▁kumwetu .
▁Chilisito ▁kachi gombo la ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁uku duwiligwa ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁kwa ▁kui sole la ▁ku duwiligwa ▁uko ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu , ▁kwaviya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lu gong ' o ndigwe ▁muna ▁i di biki ▁ka duwiligwa .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka mu hindukila ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁Saimoni , ▁“ Ko muwona ▁mwanamke ▁ino ? ▁Ni ngila ▁mwiikaye ▁yako , ▁hu ning ' hile ▁bule ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kuna wa ▁magulu ▁yangu , ▁ mbali ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁kaya n ava ▁magulu ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁masozi ▁yake , ▁na ▁kaya hangu sa ▁kwa ▁m vili ▁zake .
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁na bule ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kweli ▁cha ▁kum wandikila ▁I m kulu . ▁Ivo ▁ni mgala ▁hano ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁weye ▁mfalume ▁Agilipa , ▁muladi ▁uha komeleza ▁kulola ▁goya ▁ni dahe ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ kwandika .
▁Yesu ▁kalu wona ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ka kwela ▁kuna ▁ulugongo , ▁uko ▁kakala ▁hasi . ▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ,
▁Gayo , ▁mkaya ▁wangu , ▁ija ▁wanhu ▁womuhuwila ▁Yesu ▁wo iting ' hana ▁kumwake ▁ko mu la mu sa ni . ▁ E la sito ▁ mwika ▁hela ▁wa ▁bululu ▁dino , ▁na ▁se kulu ▁wetu ▁Kwa li to ▁womulamsani .
▁ Kolineliyo ▁kedika , ▁“ Siku ▁mane ▁ya fosile ▁saa ▁kenda ▁imisi , ▁nikala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yangu ▁no tosa . ▁ B a ha ja ▁munhu ▁ya yawale ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁ch we ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ hangu ,
▁“ Mwenevale ▁ nitegeleze , ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁magan a ▁se he ke li ▁magan a ▁mane ▁ya ▁hela . ▁Ni ▁choni ▁hagati ▁yako ▁na ▁niye ? ▁Wa wa nde ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jako ▁umo .”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo ng ' wa ▁mazi ▁yano ▁keza wona ▁ng ' hilu ▁kaidi .
▁“ Mndewa , ▁wa wakoma ▁walotezi ▁wako ▁na ▁wa bomola ▁vili ngo ▁vako ▁kwa ▁kuvi g wi sa ▁hasi , ▁niye ▁muhala ▁ni sigala ▁na ▁wa londa ▁kunikoma ▁niye .”
▁Laheli ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁“ Tata , ▁sekeu ni wonele ▁ludoko , ▁ mbali ▁siza k wi nuka ▁bule ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁kwaviya ▁na m z isiku ▁zangu .” ▁Labani ▁ka zi zahila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁yake , ▁ mbali ▁hazi patile ▁bule .
▁Yakobo ▁na ▁wanage ▁viwa kalile ▁wo kwandusa ▁kusegela , ▁Mulungu ▁kawa du mbi za ▁ng ' hani ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁mabululu ▁yose ▁ya ▁habehi ▁m baka ▁hawa dahile ▁kuwa sondelela .
▁Kuuhelelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁ gese ni ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁kweli ▁na ▁zinogile ▁na ▁za ▁kutogoligwa ▁kuno ga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁zelile ▁na ▁zozi londeka ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁na ▁zozi nogeza ▁na ▁za ▁hishima .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁wam gwilile ▁Yesu ▁wa mgala ▁kwika ye ▁ya ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁Kayafa , ▁kuwa kalile ▁waiting ' hana ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo .
▁“ Mu ha ndi ▁kahita ▁ku miza ▁mbeyu . ▁Viya kalile ▁ko miza ▁mbeyu ▁mumgunda , ▁zimwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁nzila , ▁wanhu ▁wo fosa ▁nzila ▁wazi bojoga ▁na ▁ndege ▁wazi ja .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiya tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kulonga , ▁iviya ▁vilaguso ▁va ▁mauzauza ▁viyamulagilize ▁yatende .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Makili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Manase ▁isi ▁ya ▁Gileadi , ▁nawo ▁wakala ▁umo .
▁Yosefu ▁kawauza ▁wakulu ▁wawo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁mwiichifungo ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁mwenevale ▁wake , ▁“ Habali ▁diyelo ▁muna ▁ vihanga ▁va ▁luholozi ?”
▁Maabaho ▁kezamgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁dili bule ▁chilema , ▁ya mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi . ▁ G a la ma ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ija ▁izo weleke ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka sigala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ulwivi . ▁Maabaho ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁yoya manyike ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kabwela , ▁kalonga ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁ko kaliza ▁ulwivi . ▁Maabaho ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kamulongela ▁Petili ▁ yengile ▁mnyumba .
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha gala ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lave ▁usage ▁unogile . ▁Keza u guma ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ubani ,
▁Bahobaho ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ko londa ▁kuchi tenda ▁choni ? ▁Kwiza ▁kuchi tagusa ▁lusita ▁lung ' hali ▁halunafika ?”
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mwika ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kum gubula ▁nyele ▁zake ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁nhosa ▁iyo ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁ku lagusa ▁ubananzi ▁ili ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁ya ▁migongo . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁mwenyewo ▁kezakw a mhilila ▁chi a ▁chiya ▁chili ▁na ▁mazi ▁yeli ▁usungu ▁yoyo gala ▁ duwilo .
▁inga wa ▁kukala ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowa i tendile ▁wahuwila ▁wayetu , ▁wowa londile ▁Tito ▁yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana . ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wengi la ▁chinyele ▁muladi ▁ku pelemba ▁ulegeho ▁wetu ▁wochi li ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁muladi ▁kuchi tenda ▁watumwa .
▁ Haweza wona ▁nzala ▁kaidi ▁na ▁haweza wona ▁ng ' hilu ▁kaidi . ▁ Haweza gazigwa ▁na ▁zuwa ▁hebu ▁vuke ▁ka li .
▁Ivo ▁ isasale ▁na ▁u hulumuke , ▁sekeudumbe ▁kuhita ▁nawo ▁kwaviya ▁niwa tuma ▁niye .”
▁Kwa ▁chimu ▁icho ▁Mulungu ▁kam winula ▁m chanyha ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁zina ▁di di fosa ▁mazina ▁yose .
▁Wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁kaidi , ▁walonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁ya to go l we ! ▁Yo si ▁da ▁moto ▁wou di lunguza ▁bululu ▁do kwela ▁kuulanga ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁mwenyewo ▁no walamba ▁kwa ▁uhole ▁na ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁niye ▁iyo ▁ija ▁i wolonga ▁muhole ▁na ▁u nyendanyenda ▁lusita ▁voni wa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wolonga ▁vini wa ▁hata li ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁mkali .
▁Maabaho ▁Isilaili ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁Yosefu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁ija ▁ tati ▁zetu ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁wakala ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wawo , ▁Mulungu ▁yoya ni di mile ▁muna ▁u u gima ▁wangu ▁m baka ▁diyelo ,
▁Yosefu ▁kachi nula ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁na ▁kamuwona ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Benjamini , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mami ▁yake ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁imdodo , ▁yom nilongele ▁mbuli ▁zake ? ▁Mulungu ▁ya ku nogele , ▁mwanangu .”
▁Bulahimu ▁viyadanganike ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁tano .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yosefu ▁wahita ▁ku dima ▁mifu go ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁uko ▁Shekemu .
▁ivo ▁sekeya watende ▁wanage ▁mwenyewo ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yoni mtendile ▁ye le .’ ▁”
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁ka zu ng ulu sa ▁sengo ▁yake ▁mwiisi , ▁kaha ▁mzabibu ▁wa ▁isi , ▁ka guma ▁hanhu ▁ha kulu ▁ha ▁ku ka mila ▁zabibu , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wo londa ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁wenyewo , ▁hawa londa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu mulongele ze ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁“ Mwiza wa lavila ▁cha mha ▁wanaake , ▁ mbali ▁walume ▁wamwenga ▁weza wa ba nda ma ▁kwa ▁kuwa wa ng ili za . ▁Mwiza zenga ▁kaye , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kala ▁umo ▁bule . ▁Mwiza handa ▁mizabibu ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kwa ha .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ichigulogulo , ▁Yesu ▁keza ▁na ▁na wa nahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi .
▁M vula ▁iyo ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁ ib e me nda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi kalile ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁na ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁wanyama ▁na ▁wanhu . ▁Ma b we ▁ya ▁mvula ▁iyo ▁ya b e me nda ▁mimeya ▁yose ▁na ▁mibiki ▁kuna ▁imigunda .
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁hema , ▁ka tenda ▁mibiki ▁m alongo ▁maidi
▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize .
▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁Muyahudi , ▁m welekwa ▁wa ▁T a so ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Chilikiya , ▁ mbali ▁niku lila ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dino ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁fana ▁mwanahina ▁wa ▁Gamali yeli . ▁Ni fundizigw a ▁kwa mha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁na ▁nikala ▁no iyoha ▁ku muhulika ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁mweye ▁wose ▁muli ▁hano ▁diyelo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezatenda ▁timbwisi ▁na ▁msang a ▁kuwa ▁mvula ▁yenu , ▁timbwisi ▁diza m to ny ela ni ▁m baka ▁muna ngigwe .
▁Niye ▁na mgati ▁mmwawo ▁na ▁weye ▁kwa mgati ▁mmwangu . ▁ Nokulamba ▁wawe ▁wa mwe ▁kweli . ▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁wa vimanye ▁weye ▁kuni tuma ▁na ▁kuwa londa ▁wawo ▁fana ▁viu ni londile ▁niye .
▁Abulamu ▁ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi . ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ,
▁Wamuuza ▁kaidi , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yoya kulongele ▁u sole ▁ lili ▁jako ▁uhite ?”
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Na bule ▁mulume .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ku longa ▁goya ▁viulongile ▁kwa bule ▁mulume .
▁“ M wa ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vovi kala ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁modaha ▁kuja ▁vino , ▁chilumb e ▁chochose ▁chili ▁na ▁m pe pe ▁na ▁ma kala ba ndu ▁modaha ▁kuja .
▁Wa ndusa ▁ku ilongela ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁kolonga ▁yano ▁kwaviya ▁hachi solile ▁magate .”
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mulonda ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁kufosa ▁niye , ▁ha faya ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁mwanahina ▁wangu . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mulonda ▁mwanage ▁kufosa ▁niye , ▁ha faya ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁mwanahina ▁wangu .
▁Kufos ela ▁Chilisito ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁viya vi la gane ▁Mulungu ▁kutend igwa ▁ni ▁“ Ona ” ▁Mulungu ▁ya dahe ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁kwa ▁cheye , ▁kwa ▁kulonga ▁“ ivo .”
▁Iviya ▁hagati ▁yetu ▁cheye ▁na ▁mweye ▁ he kigwa ▁ kombo ▁kulu ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wo londa ▁kulawa ▁kuno ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁wa p o ti gwe , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kumwenu ▁sekewa dahe ▁kwiza ▁kumwetu !’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa segeza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁ng ' ha si liki ▁na ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani , ▁kawa sa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁imwenga ▁fana ▁viili ▁diyelo .’
▁Ivo ▁kamulongela ▁ mwimiliz i ▁wa ▁mgunda , ▁‘ M iyaka ▁mitatu ▁nikala ▁no kwiza ▁ku londa ▁matunda ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁uno ▁wa ▁mtini ▁ mbali ▁si patile ▁chochose ▁bule . ▁U kanhe ! ▁ Habali ▁u gendelele ▁kuu bananga ?’
▁Uko ▁Wamisili ▁wakala ▁wowa wa nda ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wa ▁udele ▁wose ▁wa ▁chilume ▁woya wa komile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tagusa ▁m baka ▁milungu ▁yawo .
▁Di ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo ▁do ni di wone ▁di kala ▁fana ▁ du bu , ▁migulu ▁yake ▁fana ▁chi zo ngo ▁na ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁fana ▁wa ▁simba . ▁N hu la nyi ka ▁ dung ' hu ▁diya ▁di di ng ' ha ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁na ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chake ▁na ▁udahi ▁mkulu .
▁Mbali ▁niza sang ' hanila ▁nguvu ▁zangu ▁kuwatagusa ▁Wamisili ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁vinhu ▁va ▁mauzauza ▁haja . ▁Hamwande ▁keza mulekela ni ▁muhite .
▁Ku komeleze lo ▁nolonga ▁vino , ▁mweye ▁wose ▁m olondeka ▁muwe ▁na ▁moyo ▁umwe ▁na ▁muwe ▁na ▁ gesa ▁dimwe , ▁mwii londe ▁fana ▁ndugu , ▁muwe ▁na ▁u nyendanyenda ▁na ▁uhole .
▁Mbali ▁Wayahudi ▁viwa lemile , ▁niwa ngilizigwa ▁ni kanhe ▁lu fa a ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma , ▁inga wa ▁na bule ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kuwa sita ka ▁wanhu ▁wangu .
▁Iviya ▁wanyama ▁wetu ▁ wofugigwa ▁cho londeka ▁chi segele ▁nawo , ▁heza sigala ▁hata ▁mnyama ▁imwe ▁hebu ▁mapaga , ▁mana ▁chiza m ti mbuli la ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mnyama ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwanyama ▁wetu . ▁Ch eye ▁hachi vimanyile ▁mnyama ▁ilihi ▁yonda chi m ti mbuli le ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁m baka ▁vondachi fike ▁uko .”
▁I mwa na ▁ka kula , ▁ka gendelela ▁kupata ▁ludabwa , ▁ka mema ▁ubala , ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ukala ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Kawa tuma ▁wa senga ▁wa mu longole le , ▁wahite ▁kuna chibululu ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Samaliya ▁kum sasalil a ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁Hebu ▁yelihi ▁yoyo daha ▁kumwing ' ha ▁mwanage ▁ing e ▁yaha pula ▁ fi nga ?
▁one ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yose ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo , ▁muha mulonda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁zake ▁siku ▁zose , ▁mwiza kongeza ▁mabululu ▁yamwenga ▁matatu .
▁Kwa ▁kuwa lola ▁weza woneka ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁wo lema ▁ludabwa ▁lwake , ▁i teganye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Na yo ▁mwenyewo ▁ka londa ▁ku lagusa ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁mkulu , ▁uya ching ' hile ▁cheye ▁woya chi londile ▁chi hokela ▁ubazi ▁wake , ▁cheye ▁woya chi sasale ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁chi hokele ▁ukulu ▁wake .
▁Pilato ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Vino ▁kwo lema ▁kulonga ▁na ▁niye ? ▁Hu vimanyile ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁nina ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuku leke la ▁hebu ▁ku kuwa mba ▁mumsalaba ?”
▁ Habali ▁mo wa bena ▁moyo ▁Waisilaili ▁sekewa hite ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁yoya weng ' hile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?
▁wa mu uze ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ni i ja ▁yoyalongile ▁Yohana ▁kuwa ▁kokwiza , ▁hebu ▁chim gozele ▁imwenga ?”
▁U huwilo ▁ni ▁kuvimanya ▁kwa ▁ukweli ▁mbuli ▁zo chi lolela , ▁ni ▁kuvimanya ▁kwa ▁haki ka ▁mbuli ▁hachi zi wona ▁bule .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁muna ▁yama vi ndi ▁yenu ▁na ▁magulu ▁yenu ▁maihu ▁yehile , ▁hamu daha ▁ku honyigwa , ▁yeza kwe ne la ▁kwandusi la ▁kuu lwa yo ▁m baka ▁kudi do si .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ila ▁niye .
▁Meso ▁yawo ▁ya mema ▁uzinzi , ▁wawo ▁hawa leka ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi . ▁Wo wa kwe ga ▁wanhu ▁nyondenyonde . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wa izo we za ▁ mizoyo ▁ku londa ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁vingi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wa duwiligwa !
▁M abululu ▁yano ▁yezakuwa ▁ya ▁kukimbilila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wokala ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha mkoma ▁miyage ▁ bila ▁kuilunga , ▁kodaha ▁kukimbilila ▁uko .
▁Maabaho ▁niza walongela , ▁‘ M weye ▁si wa manyile ni ▁bule . ▁ Segeleni ▁ha mwa ng u , ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁mwi hile !’
▁Wa nhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁waja ▁hawana kwingila ▁ulungwana ▁bule ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁ mbali ▁wo kwamha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁weza mtagusa ni ▁mweye ▁Wayahudi ▁kwaviya ▁ha mwamha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁hata ▁fana ▁muna yo ▁Malagilizo ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁na ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana .
▁Iviya , ▁wanaake ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁chetu ▁imitootondo ▁ng ' hani ▁wahita ▁ku li di leme . ▁Wa c ha za nya ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ku chilongela
▁Leya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁chitumetume ▁chinogile . ▁Lelo ▁mu lu ma ng u ▁keza ni togola , ▁kwaviya ▁ni mweleke la ▁wana ▁sita ▁wa ▁chilume .” ▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Zabuloni .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa i zindilile ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁na ▁wa itende ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁zawo ▁zose ▁fana ▁viya ▁lagano ▁da ▁siku ▁zose .
▁ Soleni ▁viya ▁vose ▁va ▁ng ' hondo ▁zo yo weng ' ha ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kwima ▁vinogile ▁muladi ▁kuzi huma ▁nzila ▁zihile ▁za ▁Mwihi .
▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁hanhu ▁haja , ▁ka lola ▁uchanyha , ▁kamulongela ▁Za ka yo , ▁“ Z a ka yo , ▁ hulumuka ▁hasi ▁hima , ▁kwaviya ▁niza kala ▁kui kaye ▁yako ▁diyelo .”
▁Balaki ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viyalongile ▁Balaamu , ▁ka lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁chila ▁lupango .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ichigulogulo , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Z u wa ▁di ho nga , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hano ▁hachi li ▁ni ▁chiwa la ▁muhala , ▁wala ge ▁wanhu ▁wahite ▁kuna ▁yamabululu ▁wa ka gule ▁ndiya .”
▁Yohana ▁kawalongela ▁wose , ▁“ Niye ▁no wabatiza ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁kezakwiza ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁niye . ▁Niye ▁si faya ▁kwi inama ▁na ▁ku fungula ▁nzabi ▁za ▁vilatu ▁vake . ▁Y eye ▁keza wabatiza ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁ Siku ▁di sondelele ▁M samaliya ▁ija ▁kamwing ' ha ▁di na li ▁mbili ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁mwene ▁kaye ▁ya ▁wageni . ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ M kalize ▁munhu ▁ino . ▁Ho nda ni bwele ▁nizaku liha ▁chochose ▁cho usang ' hanile .’ ▁”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁woni li nawo ▁ni ▁wako , ▁na ▁wose ▁wou li nawo ▁ni ▁wangu . ▁Na ▁ukulu ▁wangu ▁wo woneka ▁muna ▁ iwawo .
▁I ja ▁imndele ▁yonda ni mulongele ▁ya nenu le ▁nongo ▁yake ▁ya ▁mazi ▁na ▁ku ning ' ha ▁ning ' we , ▁nayo ▁yaha ning ' ha ▁ning ' we ▁niye ▁na ▁ngamiya ▁wangu , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁you m sa gulile ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ▁Isaka . ▁One ▁ ihawa ▁ivo , ▁niza vimanya ▁ku lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwa ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁yaha wika ▁mgunda ▁wake ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁uha mala ▁mwaka ▁uwo , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lamula ▁miyaka ▁yake ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁miyaka ▁isigale ▁kufika ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁na ▁bei ▁yake ▁i hu ng u zigwe .
▁Wa segela ▁Ma la ▁na ▁wahita ▁Eli mu , ▁uko ▁Eli mu ▁kukala ▁na ▁nzasa ▁za ▁mazi ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁m itende ▁m alongo ▁saba , ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁hana ▁wanhu ▁wo we mile ▁hano ▁haweza danganika ▁m baka ▁vondawa muwone ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kokwiza ▁yahawa ▁Mfalume .”
▁muladi ▁mui sole ▁kaidi ▁isi ▁iwa kalile ▁wa saho ▁zenu . ▁Na yo ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁chi sola ▁mabululu ▁yake ▁yose , ▁hata ▁bululu ▁dimwe ▁hadi sigale . ▁M abululu ▁yayo ▁ya kala ▁m alongo ▁sita , ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Ali go bu ▁yoi ta wa ligwe ▁na ▁Ogu ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Bashani .
▁Wa naake ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁wo dunda ▁ndiya , ▁imwe ▁keza soligwa ▁na ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .
▁“ Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ S o ngo la ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁vili ngile ▁fana ▁viya ▁va ▁ichanduso , ▁m aabaho ▁ wize ▁kuno ▁kumwangu ▁kuna ▁umulima , ▁utende ▁sanduku ▁da ▁ biki ,
▁Zu wa ▁vidi kalile ▁do s wa , ▁wanhu ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁watamu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁mitamu ▁mbasakanyo , ▁nayo ▁keka ▁makono ▁yake ▁m chanyha ▁mwa ▁chila ▁imwe , ▁na ▁kawa ho ne za ▁wose .
▁Kwa viya ▁di kala ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Wayahudi ▁Ku isasala , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁ leme ▁di kala ▁habehi , ▁wa wika ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu ▁umo .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Walongele ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wahite ▁na ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mana ▁kahulika ▁kulongelela ▁kwenu .”
▁“ Sekemu we ▁na ▁ningo ▁mbili , ▁i hu hile ▁na ▁iza mile . ▁Sekemu sang ' hanile ▁ningo ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁ya muwonile ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁chiha i londa ▁Mulungu ▁ko ilumba ▁na ▁cheye ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁u to ga ▁mgati ▁yetu .
▁Lubeni ▁viya bwelile ▁kuna ▁disima ▁dili bule ▁mazi , ▁ham wone ▁Yosefu ▁bule , ▁Lubeni ▁ka de ga ▁walo ▁jake ▁kwa ▁usungu .
▁Wa ja ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁dimwe ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wa wehila ▁waja ▁iwa nd ugu ▁waidi .
▁Yesu ▁kamulagiliza ▁chipofu ▁yahite ▁ukaye ▁kumwake ▁na ▁kam gomesa ▁sekeya bwele ▁mudibululu ▁diya .
▁Keza segeza ▁mab ambala ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁luti ▁iyo ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyo segeza ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Maabaho ▁keza ya timbula ▁hana ▁ulupango , ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wake ▁unogile ▁wiza mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁Sekemu leke ▁kutosa , ▁na ▁muha tosa , ▁muwe ▁meso ▁na ▁mu mwing ' he ▁hewela ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁ hite ni ▁na ▁m ka fundize ▁fambulo ▁da ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁yolonga ze , ▁‘ Nolonda ▁ubazi , ▁na ▁si wo ▁nhambiko ▁bule .’ ▁Kwa viya ▁si zile ▁kuwa tanga ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁niza ▁kuwa tanga ▁wa hasanyi .”
▁Weza gaya ▁wene ▁wimo ▁na ▁wo kong ' heza ▁siku ▁izo ! ▁Kwa viya ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁manhesa ▁mengi ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁keza watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino .
▁Nowalondel a ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Mu kale ▁na ▁kwiilumba ▁vinogile ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye . ▁Sekemu ilo ndele ▁makulu , ▁wa sang ' hanileni ▁wanhu ▁wadodo do ▁na ▁ngayengaye . ▁Sekemu i wone ▁mweye ▁muna ▁ubala ▁ng ' hani .
▁vimu kalile ▁wanyondenyonde ▁na ▁viwa wa to wile ▁waja ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁wokwiza ▁kuchisogo ▁yenu ▁kuno ▁wa le gela . ▁Waamaleki ▁hawa m dumbile ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁weye ▁mbwiya ng u ▁wa ▁ku hu wi ligwa , ▁no londa ▁weye ▁u wataze ▁wanaake ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁wa sang ' hana ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁ku pwililisa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chi leme m ti ▁na ▁waja ▁wose ▁wowa sang ' hane ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁mazina ▁yayo ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ugima .
▁Mbali ▁siku ▁ija ▁Lutu ▁viya segele ▁Sodoma , ▁kuwa shi gwa ▁moto ▁wa ▁ch ib ili ti ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁kuwa lunguza ▁wose .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ko i kaliza ▁na ▁ko ilola ▁goya ▁isi ▁iyo ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁mwaka .
▁Ch eye ▁cho iyoha ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁cho mulole la ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima , ▁Mulopozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁haswa ▁waja ▁wohuwila .
▁Pilato ▁kamwidika , ▁“ K wo vimanya ▁niye ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wako ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wako ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wawo ▁wa kugalile ▁kumwangu . ▁Vino ▁kutenda ▁choni ?”
▁ mbali ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ho ha kalile ▁na ▁i hu ▁ha galuka ▁kuwa ▁ lulumu ▁ ze lu ▁hebu ▁kuwa ▁ha dung ' hu ▁na ▁ha ze lu ▁chidogo , ▁yo londeka ▁ku mu la g u sila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Esau ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Vinoga ! ▁Na habehi ▁kudanganika . ▁Ha ki ▁yoni faya ▁choni ?”
▁Wa wa tuma ▁wanahina ▁wawo ▁kumwake ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁cha ▁He lo di . ▁Walonga , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁m kweli , ▁na ▁iviya ▁kofundiza ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁chiu kweli . ▁Hu mdumba ▁munhu ▁yoyose , ▁na ▁iviya ▁hu lola ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁munhu .
▁M abululu ▁yako ▁ya na ▁lwivi ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁zuma ▁na ▁shaba , ▁kwiza kalizigwa ▁siku ▁zose .’
▁Vi nhu ▁vino ▁vi vi komeleze ke , ▁Paulo ▁ka lamula ▁yahite ▁Yelusalemu ▁ka fose la ▁Makedoniya ▁na ▁Akaya , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni ha fika ▁uko , ▁iviya ▁no l ondigwa ▁ni hite ▁Loma .”
▁Kwa viya ▁nikala ▁na ▁nzala ▁hamu ning ' hile ▁ndiya , ▁nikala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁hamu ning ' hile ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa ,
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mwiza lila ▁na ▁kuwona ▁usungu ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu , ▁ mbali ▁isi ▁iza de ng ' helela . ▁Mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁usungu , ▁ mbali ▁usungu ▁wenu ▁wiza galuka ▁ nde ne le lo .
▁Iviya ▁kawa wa ng ili za ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁wanhu ▁wo hishimigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa hishimigwa , ▁wene ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁na ▁ngayengaye , ▁wanhu ▁wa ilegehe ▁na ▁watumwa , ▁we kigwe ▁chilaguso ▁kuna ▁yamakono ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume ▁hebu ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁vawo ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Ka bila ▁da ▁Gadi ▁weza sondelela . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi ▁kakala ▁Eli asafu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁L e u eli .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁sambi ▁mwa wa kalangama ▁na ▁chiya ▁cho watendile ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁wa wakoma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwo wa zengela ▁maleme .
▁Niye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yoya ku lawilile ▁kuja ▁Beseli , ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hou iti lile ▁mavuta ▁im handa ▁ya ▁uku mbu so , ▁na ▁weye ▁kuni la hila . ▁Lelo ▁ isasale ▁na ▁u bwele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako ▁yo welekigwe .’ ▁”
▁Sekemu we ▁na ▁lugano ▁himahima ▁mwiimizoyo ▁m baka ▁ku leka ▁lungilo ▁jenu , ▁wala ▁sekemu si nhu zigwe , ▁kwa ▁muhe ▁wala ▁kwa ▁mbuli , ▁wala ▁kwa ▁usenga ▁wou ge sigwa ▁kuwa ▁wetu , ▁fana ▁siku ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁i fika ▁i mala .
▁muladi ▁ya to le ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁umanyi , ▁ya ho nde ▁zahabu ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁shaba ,
▁V a wa bwelile ▁mnyumba , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza ▁Yesu ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Iviya ▁china zo ▁hela ▁zimwenga ▁za ▁ku gulila ▁ndiya ▁kaidi . ▁Ha chivimanyile ▁bule ▁yelihi ▁ yekile ▁hela ▁yetu ▁muna ▁ma lo bota ▁yetu .”
▁Ivo ▁ni ▁kulonga ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁yo lumbiliza ▁kaidi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁na ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁ bila ▁kupeta ▁yehile ▁yawo . ▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁usenga ▁wa ▁ku lumbiliz igwa ▁kaidi .
▁Na ▁niza mtendela ni ▁chochose ▁chonda mu pule ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁muladi ▁Tata ▁ yatunhizigwe ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Mwana .
▁sekemu igode ▁na ▁kum zimiza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoya mulavile ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ko mu kalile ▁watumwa .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁modaha ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Chodaha ze ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁yo lawa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?’
▁One ▁wa wile ▁na ▁ubala ▁waha vimanyile ▁ha bali ▁wa hu migwa , ▁waha dahile ▁kuvimanya ▁uhelelo ▁wawo ▁wizakuwa ze .
▁Leka mana ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁di tangigwa ▁Babeli , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ti bu la ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁uko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa pwililisa ▁wanhu ▁mwiisi ▁yose .
▁Viya chifikile ▁uko ▁ A so , ▁chim kwe za ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁na ▁chi hita ▁M i tile ne .
▁Mbali ▁cho lagusa ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku funyila ▁umoyo ▁magayo ▁na ▁manhesa ▁na ▁uzidilwa .
▁Kwa ▁meso ▁yangu ▁ya u wona ▁ukombola ▁wako ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁one ▁hai sa f yi le , ▁kodi tenda ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁jambul e ▁mwiko , ▁nayo ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁Waisilaili . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza sigala ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwaviya ▁ha mizil igwe ▁mazi ▁yaja ▁ya ▁kuisafya .
▁Munhu ▁ya chi wone ▁cheye ▁iyo ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁wowo kwika ▁goya ▁vinhu ▁vovi fisigwe ▁va ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁niza kwika ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁kwa ▁mwanago ▁Isaka , ▁yonda yelekigwe ▁na ▁Sala ▁lusita ▁fana ▁luno ▁mwaka ▁u kwiza .”
▁Chilisito ▁ko woneka ▁ka linga ▁kweli ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁woya ho ne ka ▁bule . ▁Ka kala ▁uko ▁ving ' hali ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁havi na lu mbigwa .
▁Vi i fosile ▁miyaka ▁midi , ▁P o liki yo ▁Fesito ▁ka muhokela ▁Felisi ▁ku tawala , ▁kawa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁mkowa . ▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁Felisi ▁ka londa ▁yawa de ng ' hele ze ▁Wayahudi , ▁ka muleka ▁Paulo ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁“ Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁ni wona ▁kuwa ▁no londeka ▁nitende ▁yose ▁ihadahika ▁hata ▁kudi lema ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti .
▁M vula ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁i kalile ▁na ▁lumwe mwe , ▁iyo ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁ya i wonile ▁mvula ▁ili ngile ▁ivo ▁kwandusi la ▁mwanduso .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁ka tosa , ▁“ Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁Isaka , ▁ni hulike ▁niye ! ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ku nilongela ▁ni bwele ▁kuna ▁isi ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁na ▁keza ni tendela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chinogile ▁kumwangu .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka pata ▁ludoko , ▁ka ilaha ▁na ▁kalonga ,
▁“ Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁ng ' o ndo lo ▁m alume ▁waja ▁na ▁u mulongele ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁ weke ▁makono ▁yawo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁jake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa fi kwa ▁na ▁lugano , ▁wawa ▁wo mwing ' ha ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Walonga , ▁“ M ulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu ▁ka lawilila ▁kumwetu ! ▁Mulungu ▁keza ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wake !”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Dani ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S hu ha mu .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo hulika ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁sekeya tende ▁fana ▁voyo londeka ▁kutenda , ▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁munhu ▁yoya ze ngile ▁kaye ▁yake ▁muna ▁umsanga ▁ bila ▁ku himba ▁chandusilo . ▁M vula ▁ng ' hulu ▁vi itonyile , ▁mazi ▁ya itowa ▁kaye ▁ija , ▁ iting isi ka ▁na ▁ku gwa ! ▁Na ▁kaye ▁yose ▁i banangika ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Ivo ▁mudi zindilile ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁na ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala .
▁Esau ▁viya lo lile ▁na ▁kuwa wona ▁iwa naake ▁na ▁iwa na , ▁ka uza , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wou li ▁nawo ▁welihi ?” ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Wa no ▁ni ▁wana ▁Mulungu ▁woya ning ' hile ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wake .”
▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁m olondeka ▁kusondelela ▁simwe ▁jetu . ▁Ch eye ▁vichi kalile ▁na ▁mweye ▁hachi kalile ▁wa b wa ▁bule .
▁Yo faya ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁mbasakanyo ▁ka ti ▁yaja ▁yo c h andika ▁muna ▁ senga ▁zetu ▁vi kalile ▁kutali ▁na ▁chiya ▁chonda ▁chitende ▁vondachi we ▁na ▁mweye .
▁I wamela ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jose ▁da ▁Kola ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vose .
▁Maabaho ▁weza sola ▁mabwe ▁yamwenga ▁na ▁ku ye ka ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hoya kalile ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁u c ha ndu so ▁na ▁ku haka ▁cho ka a ▁imwenga .
▁Ka u wona ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁mumgwazo ▁ya ▁inzila , ▁kau hiti la ▁ mbali ▁ha wonile ▁chochose , ▁ila ▁ka wona ▁mayani ▁muhala . ▁Ivo ▁kau longela ▁mbiki ▁uwo , ▁“ W hiza kwima ▁matunda ▁kaidi ▁ng ' o !” ▁Bahobaho ▁mbiki ▁uwo ▁u nyala .
▁Maabaho ▁nhulanyika ▁di de ka ▁mazi ▁mengi ▁fana ▁lwanda , ▁ya msondelela ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kuchisogo ▁muladi ▁yam kulu le .
▁“ Vonda ni segele , ▁siza muleka ni ▁wachiwa , ▁niza mbwelela ni .
▁Hata ▁imwe ▁wa ▁walotezi ▁wawo , ▁na ▁yeye ▁iviya ▁M chi le t e ▁kalonga , ▁“ Wa chi le t e ▁siku ▁zose ▁wa vwizi , ▁wang ' onyo ▁wehile ▁na ▁wa b wa ▁na ▁wa melo .”
▁Mwiza kwandika ▁funhufunhu ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁yamabwe ▁yayo ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁malagilizo ▁yano .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo ▁ka gazigwa ▁na ▁kudanganika ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi . ▁Munhu ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁hawa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁ya wagale ▁m we n ye ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka komigwa ▁chiunhu ▁ mbali ▁ka tendigw a ▁mgima ▁chimuhe ,
▁Muna ▁im iyanza ▁yangu ▁nikala ▁muna ▁ing ' hondo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ma gombo ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁na ▁ng ' hondo ▁ya ▁wa bavi ▁na ▁ng ' hondo ▁ya ▁ma ng ' onyo , ▁ng ' hondo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi ▁wayangu ▁na ▁ng ' hondo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁ng ' hondo ▁za ▁muna ▁yamabululu , ▁ng ' hondo ▁za ▁kumbago , ▁ng ' hondo ▁kulawa ▁muibahali , ▁na ▁ng ' hondo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mambwiya ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁“ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mu ihazi ▁na ▁kukala ▁umo , ▁m aabaho ▁mwiza longa , ▁‘ Chiza kwika ▁mfalume ▁kumwetu , ▁fana ▁zisi ▁za ▁ banzi ▁zose .’
▁W elesi ▁wawo , ▁kwandusi la ▁welesi ▁we ta tu ▁weza togole ligwa ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁um ting ' hano ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁wasegela ▁kulawa ▁Eli mu ▁na ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni , ▁chili ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Eli mu ▁na ▁Sinai , ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wekaidi , ▁lusita ▁viwa segele ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Ivo ▁mu kome ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁chili ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁uzinzi ▁na ▁u nyolo do ▁na ▁ku me lela ▁mate ▁na ▁u gila , ▁u gila ▁uwo ▁sawa ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁nyang ' hiti ,
▁Imwe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁keza tawala ▁keza wadanganiza ▁wondawa sigale ▁muna ▁dibululu .”
▁Mbali ▁ichilo ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamsola , ▁wa muhulumu sa ▁muna ▁ichi gelo ▁kufose la ▁muna ▁di zonzo ▁dodi kalile ▁muna ▁ing ' huta .
▁Niza mtowa ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kwa ▁utamu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo tenda ▁ugoni ▁nayo . ▁Na ▁ku gala ▁magayo ▁makulu ▁one ▁hawa sa m hile ▁bule ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile ▁zo watendile ▁nayo .
▁Ivo ▁ng ' onyo ▁diya ▁dikali ▁dekaidi ▁di tenda ▁mauzauza ▁ya ▁kwazanya ▁na ▁di tenda ▁moto ▁u hulumuke ▁mui isi ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa landula ▁madizi , ▁“ Di no ▁siyo ▁dizi ▁da ▁munhu , ▁ mbali ▁da ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu !”
▁Naholi ▁viya mweleke ▁Tela ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁longo ▁na ▁kenda , ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Maabaho ▁Ananiya ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁ka ku sagula ▁weye ▁ umanye ▁udahi ▁wake , ▁u muwone ▁mtumigwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁u muhulike ▁viyolonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁jake .
▁ Hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁hebu ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala ▁goya ▁ha ▁kuhumula ▁hebu ▁muna ▁izisi ▁izo . ▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁ludumbo ▁wa ▁moyo , ▁ku fi la ▁kwa ▁meso ▁na ▁kugaya ▁muna ▁muhe .
▁Kwa ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁chinyala , ▁cho t e gele zigwa ▁na ▁ku ze higwa , ▁cho li g igwa ▁na ▁ku to go zigwa . ▁Cho petigwa ▁fana ▁wa vwizi , ▁inga wa ▁cheye ▁cholonga ▁ukweli ,
▁Wa segela ▁ A lu shi ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁L e fi di mu , ▁uko ▁kukala ▁kwa bule ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa .
▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Vino ▁cheye ▁chi leka ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁cho gendelela ze ▁kukala ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ?
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Yosefu ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁kudanganika ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaeli ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁iviya ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndagilizi ▁viya ▁vya ▁kutenda ▁m ivuha ▁yake .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Saimoni ▁kakala ▁uko , ▁yoyatendile ▁uha wi ▁muna ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁na ▁kawa za nya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁da ▁Samaliya . ▁Kalonga ▁yeye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁mkulu .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wawo ▁wa hulika ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁cha ▁vipofu ?”
▁Viya kalile ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁Misili , ▁kamulongela ▁Salayi ▁muke ▁wake , ▁“ No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁muke ▁lumondo .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 4 1 ,500.
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁wowa kalile ▁wo zahila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁kuwa peta ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁hawa ya patile ▁bule ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁ku petigwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Hiteni ▁uko ▁kudibululu , ▁mwiza fika ▁munhu ▁ mulongeleni , ▁‘ Mfundiza ▁kolonga , ▁siku ▁yangu ▁yaha guhi . ▁Niza kuja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wangu ▁kumwako .’ ▁”
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kasola ▁matombo , ▁matombo ▁ya ga ndi le ▁na ▁ija ▁i nyama ▁i fu nganyigwe , ▁kawa sasalil a ▁ndiya ▁manyambenyambe ▁na ▁ka wekila , ▁nayo ▁kema ▁habehi ▁viwa kalile ▁woja ▁haja ▁hasi ▁hana ▁umbiki .
▁N yambenyambe ▁yoyose ▁yo kala ▁kumwenu ▁yahalonda ▁kutenda ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ teng ' hu ▁walume ▁wose ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁ wolondeka ▁wengi zigwe ▁ulungwana , ▁baho ▁keza pete ka ▁kuwa ▁mkaya ▁na ▁ku togole ligwa ▁kutenda ▁dugila . ▁M ulume ▁yoyose ▁heng izigwe ▁ulungwana , ▁sekeya je ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka .
▁Kwa viya ▁kuson gela ▁sambi , ▁wanhu ▁watano ▁wa ▁kaye ▁imwe ▁wezaihasanya , ▁watatu ▁kwa ▁waidi ▁na ▁waidi ▁kwa ▁watatu .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wazanywa , ▁wa uza , ▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kaya ma ze ▁yano ▁yose ▁nayo ▁ha somile ▁bule ▁kui s hu le ?”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁ ke hi ligwa ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁ka muhonya ▁munhu ▁mu isiku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo . ▁Ivo ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu , ▁“ Kuna ▁siku ▁sita ▁zozi faya ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano . ▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo , ▁izo ni ▁mu honyigwe , ▁ mbali ▁sekemwi ze ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo !”
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya longe ▁mbuli ▁ihile ▁kwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza lekeleligwa , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya mu lige ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁heza lekeleligwa ▁bule .
▁Kale bu ▁kawa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wanyama le ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ch olondeka ▁chihite ▁chika i sole ▁isi , ▁mana ▁chodaha ▁ku huma .”
▁Paulo ▁ka dondola ▁m zi go ▁mdodo ▁wa ▁ngodi ▁na ▁ku wika ▁muna ▁umoto , ▁zoka ▁di lawa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uja ▁umoto ▁na ▁di m zingiliza ▁muna ▁umkono .
▁One ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya n zilibule ▁Yesu ▁kuwa danganike ▁kokala ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁iyo ▁yoya n zilibule ▁Chilisito ▁kuwa danganike ▁iviya ▁keza i zilibula ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁zi wo lile , ▁kezatenda ▁ivo ▁kufose la ▁Muhe ▁wake , ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yenu .
▁Wa si nhu ka ▁na ▁kudumba , ▁wa gesa ▁wa wona ▁m zi mu .
▁Na bule ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁fana ▁yeye ▁yoyo wa sang ' hanileni ▁kwa ▁ulondo .
▁Cho gaya ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁kwa ▁makono ▁yetu ▁wenyewo , ▁na ▁chaha duwiligwa ▁chowa temela ▁mate ▁na ▁chiha gazigwa ▁cho funya ▁umoyo ,
▁Maabaho ▁di lawilila ▁wingu ▁diwa gubika , ▁na ▁dizi ▁di lawa ▁mudi wing u ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁mwanangu , ▁nyachende ▁wangu , ▁mu mtegeleze !”
▁Musa ▁keka ▁meza ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi , ▁kunze ▁ya ▁panzia ,
▁One ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁yaha mbandama ▁muke , ▁yahalaw igwa ▁na ▁shahawa , ▁wose ▁waidi ▁ wolondeka ▁wo ge ▁mazi , ▁nawo ▁weza kwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁vimu wile ▁wahuwila ▁mu muhokela ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Aka , ▁hata ▁kuhulika ▁kuwa ▁kuna ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁hachi na hulika ▁bule .”
▁Sila ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁viwafikile ▁kulawa ▁Makedoniya , ▁Paulo ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁lusita ▁lwake ▁lwose ▁kuwapetela ▁Wayahudi ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁iyo ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kema ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Ge ne sa le ti , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wakala ▁wam me me la ▁na ▁kui sung ' ha - sung ' ha ▁kutegeleza ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ulinga ▁munhu ▁ya handile ▁mbeyu ▁mumgunda ▁wake .
▁siku ▁zose ▁niha tambika . ▁Nompul ila ni ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁one ▁yaha n inogela ▁ya ni vugulil e ▁nzila ▁yaha dahika ▁ni dahe ▁ku mu la u leni .
▁Ma bumbila ▁yose ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁yaha i duganya , ▁wa dima ji ▁wo bimbilis a ▁idibwe ▁ijo ▁kwa ▁hamwe ▁kulawa ▁hana ▁i chisima ▁na ▁kuwa ng ' wiza ▁iwa ng ' hondolo . ▁Maabaho ▁wo gubika ▁kaidi ▁i chisima ▁kwa ▁dibwe ▁ijo .
▁M gunda ▁na ▁ tuka ▁dili ▁umo ▁vi guligwa ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Wahiti .”
▁Yesu ▁ka manya ▁m agesa ▁yawo , ▁kamsola ▁mwana ▁m do o dodo , ▁ka mwika ▁habehi ▁nayo .
▁Fan a ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kwii goda , ▁kolondeka ▁ya igode le ▁yaja ▁yoyatendile ▁Mndewa .”
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ka ilinga ▁ugala mu ▁wake , ▁na ▁ukala ▁na ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita ▁kwa ▁ningo ▁ya ▁meso ▁ya ▁chiunhu ▁iya sang ' hanile ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Meso ▁yako ▁ni ▁chitasa ▁cha ▁lukuli ▁lwako . ▁Fan a ▁meso ▁yako ▁yo wona , ▁lukuli ▁lwako ▁lwose ▁lu na ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁ mbali ▁fana ▁meso ▁yako ▁haya wona , ▁iviya ▁lukuli ▁lwako ▁lwose ▁lu na ▁lwiza .
▁Wa nenu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁weza lavigwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁kuno ▁mo wa lolela ▁imisi ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo ▁wa bwele , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁chochose .
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁komulonda ni ▁na ▁ko londa ▁ku fikiza ▁chilaho ▁chiya ilahile ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁leka mana ▁ka mkombola ni ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁uli ▁na ▁udahi ▁na ▁kamtenda ni ▁mu ilegehe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁utumwa ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa dile ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁walume ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁ mbali ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana ▁hawa petigwe ▁bule .
▁Vino ▁manhesa ▁yose ▁ya mulawil eni ▁mweye ▁zi kala ▁bule ? ▁ Haidahika ▁bule !
▁M atambi ▁sita ▁yeza lawilila ▁hana ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁i chinala , ▁matambi ▁matatu ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁na ▁matambi ▁matatu ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga .
▁Ko muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Niye ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .’ ▁Mbali ▁leka ▁chi lole ▁one ▁Mulungu ▁komulonda !”
▁Wa segela ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁S he fe li ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Ha la da .
▁Salayi ▁kamulongela ▁Abulamu , ▁“ Ku vimanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ hani nogele ▁kupata ▁wana . ▁Lelo ▁ka mbandame ▁mtumwa ▁wangu ▁muladi ▁niwa pate ▁wana ▁kufose la ▁yeye .” ▁Abulamu ▁katogola ▁chiya ▁cho yalongile ▁Salayi .
▁Yeli hi ▁yonda ▁yawa lu mize ni ▁one ▁mo londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ?
▁“ Habali ▁hamu daha ▁kui lamulil a ▁wenyewo ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁za ▁kusang ' hana ?
▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁viya wa onile , ▁kawatanga . ▁Na ▁wawo ▁wa muleka ▁Zebedayo ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kusang ' hana ▁mwiingalawa , ▁wamsondelela .
▁Wa tenda ▁vino , ▁wawatum a ▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Sauli ▁wa gale ▁hela ▁kwa ▁walala ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chiya kalile ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁hebu ▁ko mwa , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁“ Sambi ▁moyo ▁wangu ▁u na ▁luholozi . ▁Ni longe ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁ni longe ▁‘ Tata , ▁one ▁yaha dahika , ▁u n yepule ▁na ▁nhungo ▁ino ▁ya ▁manhesa ▁ ichipi ndi ▁chino ?’ ▁Bule , ▁niza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁muladi ▁ni fose le ▁chip indi ▁chino ▁cha ▁manhesa .
▁Paulo ▁kengila ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁na ▁kulonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyezi ▁mitatu , ▁ka geza ▁kuwa kwe sa ▁weze ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁waha wi ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wa tenda ▁vinhu ▁fana ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁uha wi ▁wawo ‚ ▁ivo ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ukala ▁u ng ' hali ▁mdala , ▁na ▁halondile ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ‚ ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁Muyahudi ▁na ▁niye ▁na ▁M samaliya . ▁Vi lihi ▁ko ni pula ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa ?” ▁Kwa viya ▁Wayahudi ▁hawa ihangany a ▁hamwe ▁bule ▁na ▁Wa samaliya .
▁Yesu ▁kamwamha ▁mkono ▁wake ▁na ▁ homa ▁di mulawa , ▁nayo ▁kenuka ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kumsang ' hanila .
▁Mwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁maidi ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema ,
▁Mwenevale ▁wake ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Vinoga ▁mtumigwa ▁unogile . ▁Ku kala ▁kuno ga ▁kwa ▁ma dodo ▁niza kwika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mengi . ▁ Izo ▁u de ng ' helele ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mwenevale ▁wako .’
▁na ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo . ▁Nhambiko ▁zino ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁zo lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁zili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ya walagilize ▁wa duganye ▁ndiya ▁zose ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁miyaka ▁inogile ▁i kwiza , ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁udahi ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁kwika ▁ndiya ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁yose , ▁i ka li z we ▁kwa ▁ kwikigwa ▁goya .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ha no ▁ho chi li ▁chi nayo ▁magate ▁matano ▁muhala ▁na ▁somba ▁waidi .”
▁Maabaho ▁m haka ▁iza fose la ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁na ▁kulawilila ▁kuna ▁I ba hali ▁ya ▁ Munyu . ▁Iyo ▁izakuwa ▁isi ▁yenu ▁fana ▁m haka ▁viili .’ ▁”
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wafika ▁Misili , ▁wa gula ▁ndiya ▁fana ▁viya ▁wamwenga , ▁kwaviya ▁uko ▁kwii si ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁kukala ▁na ▁nzala .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino , ▁kuson gela ▁vini hulike ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁M nd we wa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Ivo ▁hawa dahile ▁bule ▁kumgwila ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu . ▁Wa zanywa ▁kwaviya ▁vi y edike , ▁wanyama la ▁hupi .
▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁wose ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁lukuli ▁lwake .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁yoni longile ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁vini longile , ▁‘ Ko kwiza ▁munhu ▁kuchisogo ▁changu ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁niye ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁baho ▁niye ▁ning ' hali ▁sina ▁ vumbuka .’
▁Mbali ▁muvimanye ▁vino , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi ▁mwiisi .” ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁yahololile ,
▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁vinhu ▁vingi . ▁One ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyatendile ▁chiha ndikigwe , ▁isi ▁yose ▁sigambe i we ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwika ▁vi tabu ▁va ndikigwe .
▁Na yo ▁kawalola , ▁ka lolela ▁kupata ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁kumwawo .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wa londa ▁kumgwila ▁Yesu , ▁kwaviya ▁wa vimanya ▁kalonga ▁simwe ▁ijo ▁kuwa longa ▁wawo . ▁Mbali ▁wawa dumba ▁wanhu , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁wa muleka , ▁wahita .
▁“ No wa tosela . ▁Si wa tosela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁no wa tosela ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wou ning ' hile , ▁kwaviya ▁wano ▁ni ▁wako .
▁One ▁mtufi ▁wake ▁uha la galila ▁muna ▁ichi a ▁cha ▁ulongo , ▁ivo ▁chochose ▁chili ▁mgati ▁ya ▁chi a ▁icho ▁chiza kwa mbula ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁yo londeka ▁chi a ▁icho ▁chi benigw e .
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁Mbali ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zozi gubuligwa ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo , ▁zo woneka ▁ b wi lili ,
▁Wa lu sola ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa u zingiliza ▁sanda ▁hamwe ▁na ▁yaja ▁yam avuta ▁ya ▁kun ung ' hila ▁ya ▁ichi hendo ▁cha ▁Wayahudi ▁cha ▁kuwa nda .
▁So la ▁ balati ▁dino ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wako ▁muladi ▁u dahe ▁kutenda ▁vilaguso ▁va ▁mauzauza .”
▁Niza kala ▁hano ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Efeso ▁m baka ▁zuwa ▁da ▁P e nde ko si t e .
▁L a ga no ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁di kala ▁na ▁nzila ▁zake ▁za ▁kutambikila ▁na ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ha ▁kutambikila ▁ho ha zengigw e ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁ka fundizigw a ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁muhe ▁wake ▁ukala ▁wo di n hila , ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu , ▁ mbali ▁ka mmanya ▁Yohana ▁na ▁viya ▁viyakalile ▁ko wabatiza ▁wanhu .
▁Mu umulomo ▁uja ▁uja ▁mo lawa ▁nhogolwa ▁na ▁ duwilo . ▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁hai faya ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁kuwa ▁ivo .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yaha genda ▁ichilo ▁keza ikwala , ▁kwaviya ▁ka bule ▁bu ng ' hulo .”
▁Uko ▁Damasiki ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanahina ▁imwe , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Ananiya . ▁Mndewa ▁kalonga ▁nayo ▁muna ▁yamalaguso , ▁“ A na ni ya !” ▁Ananiya ▁kedika , ▁“ Ona , ▁Mndewa .”
▁Adamu ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁kenda ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu .
▁ Soleni ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁venu . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁moyo ▁unogile ▁kezamgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁shaba ,
▁“ Chila ▁kuuhelelo ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁wesaba ▁mwiza walekela ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo da igwa .
▁U m gunda ▁viu kalile ▁u ng ' hali ▁hu na u chuuza , ▁ukala ▁wako , ▁viu komeleze ▁ku chuuza , ▁zi hela ▁zi kala ▁zako . ▁Lelo ▁ha bali ▁ku lamula ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁icho ? ▁Hu m vwizi le ▁munhu ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁ku mvwizila ▁Mulungu !”
▁Maabaho ▁Paulo ▁kasegela , ▁kahita ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Tito ▁Y u sito , ▁munhu ▁yo mtambikila ▁Mulungu , ▁kaye ▁yake ▁i kala ▁habehi ▁na ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela .
▁Niye ▁nikala ▁si mmanyile ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁ija ▁ya ni tu mile ▁kubatiza ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yonda u muwone ▁Muhe ▁ko mu hulumukila ▁na ▁kukala ▁m chanyha ▁yake , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁yondaya batiz e ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .’
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁kani taza ▁na ▁ku ning ' ha ▁ludabwa , ▁m baka ▁ni daha ▁ku gong ' onda ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yose ▁i petigwe , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa i hulike , ▁ivo ▁ni komboligwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ifa ▁fana ▁ku lopoligwa ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wa ▁simba .
▁Mana ▁iyo ▁ ilinga ▁fana ▁mhule ▁za ▁ng ' ha la si , ▁i woneka ▁fana ▁nzel u ▁chidogo .
▁Di no ▁hadi dahika ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁kutosa ▁na ▁ku funga .”
▁Melikizedeki ▁yoya kale ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Sa le mu ▁yoya kalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Yeli ▁Uchanyha , ▁ka mgalila ▁Abulamu ▁gate ▁na ▁divai .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁molonga , ▁“ Chi to goliligw a ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose .” ▁Mbali ▁niye ▁nolonga ▁si ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chinoga . ▁M weye ▁molonga ▁“ Chi to goliligw a ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose .” ▁Mbali ▁niye ▁nolonga ▁si ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho taza .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ya galile ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁kezam c hu na ▁na ▁kumsang ula .
▁Chi fuko ▁icho ▁chi ba ndigwe ▁chi zakuwa ▁cha ▁mu la ba , ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili .
▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁habehi ▁na ▁kudi wona ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu , ▁kadi li lila ,
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mba wa ▁miyage ▁muladi ▁ya ka m chuuze ▁hebu ▁kumtenda ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wake , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Na ▁bahali ▁iwa lava ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁weli ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁ifa ▁na ▁kuzimu ▁wawa lava ▁kunze ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁weli ▁mgati ▁yawo . ▁Wa tagusigwa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kwaviya sang ' hane .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yonda ▁ya di tange ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁keza lopoligwa .’
▁Maabaho ▁wingu ▁di segela ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Miliamu ▁kawa ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende , ▁mzelu ▁fana ▁ p a mba . ▁Haluni ▁ka mulola ▁Miliamu ▁na ▁kamuwona ▁kana ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yo lagusa ▁funhufunhu ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁viyo watenda ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁vino ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁m baka ▁uhelelo . ▁Fan a ▁viya ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Munhu ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁keza kala ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo .”
▁ Habali ▁hamu vimanya ▁yano ▁yoni longa ? ▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁hamu daha ▁kutegeleza ▁mbuli ▁zangu .
▁muladi ▁mutende ▁fana ▁viya ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁hai walongela ▁kuwa ▁ muhasanya , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁yehile ▁kuson hela ▁ugen zi ▁wenu ▁unogile ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁wa wone ▁chinyala .
▁Udaho ▁ka nawo ▁yeye ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo !
▁Isi ▁yose ▁hai londeke ▁kuwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wawo ! ▁Wa ze b we gela ▁kuchuwala ▁na ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁kuno ▁wokala ▁muna ▁yama tuka ▁na ▁muna ▁imi na .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁nolonga ▁vino , ▁lusita ▁lu sigale ▁ni ▁luguhi , ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wawe ▁fana ▁wabule ,
▁Fan a ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Chila ▁munhu ▁yo tambika ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa , ▁kezakomboligwa .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya he kigwa ▁kwa ▁kukomigwa , ▁sekeya komboligwe ▁ mbali ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁kuwa ▁hata ▁one ▁uha ning ' ha ▁kaye ▁yako ▁i memile ▁hela ▁na ▁zahabu , ▁niye ▁sidaha ▁ku bena ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁yoyose , ▁inogile ▁hebu ▁ihile , ▁ bila ▁kuwa ngilizigwa . ▁Ni longa ▁kuwa ▁chonda ya longe ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ni icho ▁chonda ni longe .
▁Baho ▁Petili ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwalongela ▁ugaluga ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi lawilile ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso .
▁Kaidi ▁ka geza ▁kui tenda ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁ching wila ▁na ▁chi mtagusa ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yetu .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani ▁viwa wone ▁mauzauza ▁yoyatendile ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁wana ▁viwa la ndu le ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁mwi ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁viwalo ngile , ▁“ Nhogolwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi !”
▁Kwiza mu ja ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁uha wa ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁jako , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁hawa mbule ▁mwiko ▁wodaha ▁ku mu ja ▁fana ▁viu ja ▁m ha la ▁hebu ▁ng ' hu lungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawa langa , ▁kawalongela ▁simwe , ▁“ Vino ▁Lufyende ▁kodaha ▁ku mulava ▁Se ta ni ?
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁Besaniya , ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Saimoni ▁yoya ugu le ▁utamu ▁wa ▁dikulu .
▁Kawauza ▁kaidi , ▁“ Na ▁vini mo gole ▁yaja ▁yamagate ▁saba ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁mu dondola ▁vi gelo ▁vi ngahi ▁va ▁ masigavu ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Chi dondola ▁vi gelo ▁saba .”
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁kahita ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ka wona ▁Waebulaniya ▁waidi ▁wo itowa . ▁Kamulongela ▁ija ▁ya banange , ▁“ Habali ▁ko mtowa ▁Muebulaniya ▁miyago ?”
▁ Nokulamba ▁ni lo ke ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁ni i wone ▁isi ▁iyo ▁inogile ▁ya ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁Yoludani , ▁isi ▁inogile ▁ya ▁ku nogeza ▁ya ▁milima , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁milima ▁ya ▁L e ba no ni .’
▁na ▁m bu ni ▁na ▁lu ga wa ▁na ▁ ba ta ▁mazi ▁na ▁modeli ▁zose ▁za ▁chi nya ng ' hu wi ,
▁Mbali ▁wakulu ▁viwafikile , ▁hawa wa fikile ▁bule ▁wa sang ' hani ▁muna ▁ichifungo . ▁Ivo ▁wabwela ▁kuna ▁I chi ta la ▁na ▁walonga ,
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁ mbali ▁Paulo ▁havi londile , ▁ka mu hindukila ▁na ▁kamulongela ▁iyo , ▁“ Kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁no kulongela ▁mu lawe ▁munhu ▁ino !” ▁Bahobaho ▁chinyamkela ▁ka mulawa ▁munhu ▁ija .
▁U londo ▁wangu ▁uwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁mose ▁muna ▁I chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁Ndugu ▁cho walamba ▁muwa lamule ▁waja ▁wokala ▁chiu b wa , ▁wa gele ni ▁moyo ▁wanhu ▁wowa bene ke ▁moyo ▁na ▁wa tazeni ▁nyondenyonde ▁na ▁wa fu nyi leni ▁umoyo ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁S hu se la ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁ E la ni .

▁Wa ileka ▁nzila ▁igolo ke , ▁wa ga ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁nzila ▁ija ▁ya ▁ B a la mu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Beoli , ▁yoya i sondelele ▁ino ▁ka londa ▁kupata ▁maliho ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁wihi ,
▁“ Vi lo fosile ▁lusita ▁lutali ▁mfalume , ▁kabwela . ▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela ▁watumwa ▁woya weng ' hile ▁hela ▁wa tangigwe ▁haulongozi ▁wake ▁muladi ▁yavimanye ▁faida ▁yoya patile .
▁M sondelele ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁m umdumbe ▁yeye ▁na ▁ muhulike ni ▁na ▁muzindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yake , ▁m tambikile ni ▁na ▁m uilumb e ▁nayo .
▁Ko londa ▁ng ' hani ▁kumuwona ni ▁mweye ▁wose , ▁na ▁ko wona ▁usungu ▁kwaviya ▁ muhulika ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁mtamu .
▁Kulaw a ▁baho , ▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁ko zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku mu hinduka ▁Yesu .
▁Vini zile ▁kumwenu , ▁nikala ▁nyondenyonde ▁na ▁ni gudemeka ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo segeza ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁m haka ▁ya ▁mkaya ▁miyage .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁Yaha mwizila , ▁ko m b wa n ha ▁hasi ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁mwana ▁ya la wigwe ▁na ▁ho vu ▁mu umulomo , ▁ko ge ge da ▁meno ▁na ▁ku nyala ▁ulukuli ▁wose . ▁Ni walongela ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁wa mulave ▁chinyamkela ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁hawa dahile ▁bule .”
▁Kuna ▁mbasakanyo ▁mwingi ▁wa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁yo sang ' haniligwa ▁ni i mwe .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁wabwanga ▁mu wategeleze ▁walala ▁walangulizi . ▁M weye ▁wose ▁m olondeka ▁mui n ye nde n ye nde ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁mu dahe ▁kui sang ' hanila . ▁Kwa viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kana ▁udugi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo igoda ▁ mbali ▁ko weng ' ha ▁unovu ▁wake ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁woi nyendanyenda .”
▁M i gulu ▁yawo ▁i na ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ku lumiza ▁na ▁kukoma .
▁M weye ▁hamu mmanyile ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁ni mmanya . ▁One ▁niha longa ▁si mmanyile ▁bule , ▁no kuwa ▁m vwizi ▁fana ▁mweye . ▁Mbali ▁niye ▁ni mmanya ▁na ▁iviya ▁no yamha ▁mbuli ▁yake .
▁Yuda ▁viyamuwone ▁Tamali ▁ka gesa ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁yo chuuza ▁lukuli ▁lwake , ▁kwaviya ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁kakala ▁ya chi gubike .
▁Fan a ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁hawa longiligwe ▁mbuli ▁zake , ▁weza wona , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ha wahulike , ▁weza vimanya .”
▁W eng i ▁mwa ▁iwa nahina ▁wake ▁viwahulike , ▁walonga , ▁“ M afundizo ▁yano ▁ma dala . ▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yoyo daha ▁kuyamanya ?”
▁One ▁mnyama ▁ya ba wigwe ▁yaha patik a ▁yahawa ▁mgima ▁kwa ▁mbavi ▁iyo , ▁basi ▁mbavi ▁iyo ▁kezamuli ha ▁miyanza ▁midi , ▁yawe ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁One ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha hawa ▁kutali ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kaha sagula ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kumtambikila ▁yeye ▁heli ▁kutali ▁na ▁ukaye , ▁mweye ▁hamu daha ▁kupapa ▁zaka ▁za ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁vo ya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ tende ni ▁vino ,
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁ulo , ▁mfalume ▁kamulagiliza ▁mkalizi ▁kudi gala ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Yohana . ▁M kalizi ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁ichifungo ▁na ▁ku mkanha ▁Yohana ▁iditwi .
▁ Soleni ▁ni la ▁yangu ▁na ▁mwii ke ▁m chanyha ▁yenu , ▁na ▁muka i funze ▁kumwangu . ▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁na mu ho le ▁na ▁no tegeleza ▁i ze n u ▁no wamanya ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu , ▁mweye ▁mwiza pata ▁ la ha ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ U huwilo ▁wenu ▁wa kulihi ?” ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁kudumba , ▁wa ilongela ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁yelihi ? ▁Ko bwakila ▁beho ▁kulu ▁na ▁mawimbi , ▁navo ▁vomu hulika !”
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁mu ja ▁mu ulu ng ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁niku galila ▁mwanangu , ▁kana ▁chinyamkela ▁ya mtendile ▁kuwa ▁bu bu .
▁Mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mkoma ▁kwa ▁panga ▁na ▁wa i sola ▁isi ▁yake , ▁kwandusi la ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Alinoni ▁m baka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Ya b o ki , ▁m baka ▁isi ▁ya ▁Waamoni , ▁kwaviya ▁m haka ▁ya ▁Waamoni ▁i kala ▁yo kalizigwa .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lumsondelela ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa gendelela ▁ku landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ M kome ▁iyo !”
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zetu , ▁ sagule ni ▁wanhu ▁saba ▁vimwili ▁wowo manyika ▁kuwa ▁wa mema ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁ubala , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiza weng ' ha ▁sang ' hano ▁iyo .
▁ivo ▁kwandusi la ▁isi ▁hai na lu mbigwa , ▁Mulungu ▁ka lamula ▁kuchi tenda ▁chiwe ▁wanage ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁Mulungu ▁viya nogeligw e ▁na ▁viyalondile .
▁Yam hi li ligwa ▁na ▁mhanda ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁za ▁shaba ▁zili ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁va ▁shaba . ▁Mbali ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁mhanda ▁izo ▁na ▁ vihindo ▁vake ▁vi kala ▁va ▁hela .
▁kwaviya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .”
▁Yesu ▁viyamuwone ▁mtamu ▁ija ▁ka tambala la ▁haja , ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁mtamu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi . ▁Ivo ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ko londa ▁ku hona ?”
▁“ Mndele ▁yeli ▁yang ' hali ▁kokala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁yaha mu la hila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁kui funga ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁chilagano ,
▁Wa ilongela , ▁“ Izoni ! ▁Chi tende ▁matafali ▁chiya some ▁moto ▁vinogile .” ▁Wakala ▁na ▁matafali ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁mabwe , ▁na ▁ tula si ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁ulongo .
▁Haluni ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁wa lola ▁kuichuwala , ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u lawilila ▁muna ▁diwingu .
▁L usita ▁Mulungu ▁viya ni segeze ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁kuni gala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁imwenga , ▁ni mulongela ▁muke ▁wangu , ▁‘ One ▁u hani londa , ▁hohose ▁honda chi hite ▁u mulongele ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁ni ▁ lumbu ▁jangu .’ ▁”
▁na ▁N e b o ▁na ▁Baali ▁M e oni ▁na ▁S ib i ma , ▁mazina ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁yayo ▁ya galusigwa . ▁M abululu ▁yowa ze ngile ▁wa yeng ' ha ▁mazina ▁yamwenga .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁yoya ni kombole ▁niye ▁muna ▁yehile ▁yose , ▁yawa temele ▁mate ▁wabwanga ▁wano ! ▁Weza tangigwa ▁wanangu ▁kwa ▁lu dongo ▁lwa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁ wongezeke ▁kwa ▁wingi ▁muna ▁iisi .”
▁ka wandigwa ▁na ▁zuwa ▁de ka ta tu ▁kazilibuka , ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ,
▁Ka wona ▁nzala ▁na ▁ka londa ▁ndiya ▁ya je , ▁na ▁ndiya ▁vi i kalile ▁yo sa sa ligwa ▁ka wona ▁malaguso .
▁Paulo ▁kalonga , ▁“ U batiz o ▁uya batiz e ▁Yohana ▁ukala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa sa m hile ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo , ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁wa muhuwile ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yokwiza ▁kuchisogo ▁chake , ▁niiyo ▁Yesu .”
▁Wayahudi ▁wowa kalile ▁ukaye ▁wam fa li ji ▁Maliya , ▁vi wamuwonile ▁Maliya ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kulawa ▁kunze ▁himahima , ▁wa gesa ▁kohita ▁kulila ▁kudileme .
▁Maabaho ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Ka kulihi ▁muke ▁wako ▁Sala ?” ▁Ka wedika , ▁“ Ka kuja ▁ku gati ▁kuna ▁i he ma .”
▁U helelo ▁wa ▁yayo ▁yose ▁mweye ▁m olondeka ▁m wingile ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁uwo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mweye ▁mo gazigwa . ▁Ma ga yo ▁yayo ▁yose ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ino ga .
▁Wala ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ningo ▁mbili , ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁ndodo .
▁M ulume ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M wanamke ▁you mwikile ▁hano ▁na ▁niye , ▁you ning ' hile , ▁iyo ▁ya ning ' hile ▁ tunda ▁da ▁mbiki ▁uwo . ▁Na ▁niye ▁ni di ja .”
▁Vino ▁kodaha ze ▁kumulongela ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁‘ Ima ▁niku lave ▁chi banzi ▁chili ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁jako ,’ ▁kuno ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁jako ▁kuna ▁ ba le ?
▁Ivo ▁Isaka ▁kasegela ▁uko ▁na ▁ka zenga ▁lago ▁jake ▁muna ▁diza nda ▁da ▁Gelali , ▁na ▁kakala ▁uko .
▁U sang ' hano ▁wowo usang ' hana ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ni ▁simwe ▁hebu ▁sisil a ▁da ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kuulanga , ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁viya komeleze ▁ku zenga ▁di zewe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola ▁uka vi tende ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁kwa ▁simwe ▁diya ▁do nikulaguse ▁viu kalile ▁ku lugongo .”
▁One ▁cheye ▁hachi wa ▁wanhu ▁ waminika , ▁yeye ▁keza sigala ▁mwaminika , ▁kwaviya ▁hadaha ▁ku galula ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile .”
▁kawalongela ▁na ▁kawa fambulila ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁kolondeka ▁ya gazigwe ▁na ▁kuzilibuka . ▁Paulo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Yesu ▁ino ▁yoni wapetela ▁mbuli ▁zake , ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi .”
▁Ka zenga ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge . ▁U tali ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁lupango ▁ulo ▁vi ilinga , ▁mita ▁mbili ▁na ▁lobo ▁kwa ▁mita ▁imwe ▁na ▁lobo , ▁na ▁utali ▁wake ▁mita ▁mbili ▁na ▁lobo .
▁I m ndele ▁imkulu ▁kamulongela ▁mdodo ▁wake , ▁“ Sambi ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁mulala ▁na ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ habule ▁mulume ▁wa ▁kuchi sola ▁chi pate ▁wana ▁fana ▁viili ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Sekemu muleke ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁sekemuwadumbe ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁mana ▁wawo ▁chiza wahuma . ▁Hawa kalizigwa , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁sekemuwadumbe .”
▁Wa segela ▁L imoni ▁P ele zi ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁L ib i na .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahawa ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende , ▁kezagal igwa ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Mfalume ▁sekeyawe ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wengi , ▁bule ivo ▁kezamuleka ▁Mulungu , ▁hebu ▁sekeya i patile ▁hela ▁na ▁zahabu ▁nyingi .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁we mba ▁wila ▁uno . ▁“ Chi sima ▁weye ▁ lawa ▁mazi ! ▁Chi mbi leni !
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Siyo ▁mwenevale . ▁Ch eye ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁chiza ▁ku gula ▁ndiya .
▁One ▁waha muuza ▁munhu ▁ino , ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁kodaha ▁ku ifunza ▁kulawa ▁kumwake ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vovi tendile ▁chi mtaguse .”
▁Kwa viya ▁vichi kalile ▁wa nyonde , ▁lusita ▁vilufikile , ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wa hasanyi .
▁Na ▁Chilisito ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ndagilizi ▁ino , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoyo mulonda ▁Mulungu ▁kolondeka ▁iviya ▁ya mulonde ▁ndugu ▁yake .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza ha lola ▁hanhu ▁baho , ▁one ▁upipi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁u galuka ▁kuwa ▁mzelu ▁na ▁utamu ▁wenyewo ▁uha woneka ▁kuwa ▁wa mgati ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwake , ▁basi ▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha komeleza ▁kum pekul a ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁kezachi gaza ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁Wa leke ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wahite ▁muladi ▁wa ka mtosele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wawo . ▁Vino ▁hu gesa ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁yo danganizigwa ?”
▁Wa mwitila ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁u longa ▁ukweli , ▁na ▁hu mdumba ▁munhu ▁yoyose , ▁kwaviya ▁hu lola ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁ mbali ▁muna ▁ukweli ▁muhala ▁kofundiza ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁uchi longele , ▁vino ▁vinoga ▁hebu ▁havi nogile ▁kuliha ▁kodi ▁kwa ▁Kaisali ? ▁Chi mwing ' he ▁hebu ▁sekechi mwing ' he ?”
▁Mbali ▁muladi ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁zi ni gubul i ligwe ▁seke zi ni tende ▁ni ko ligwe ▁magoda , ▁ning ' higwa ▁mawine ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁fana ▁muwa , ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Lufyende ▁kuni towa , ▁sekeni igode ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁kwiza lu safya ▁ulupango ▁na ▁kulu bagula . ▁U ha komeleza ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁lupango ▁lwiza kuwa ▁lw ela ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chondachi dalise ▁ulupango , ▁chi zakuwa ▁chela .
▁Vino ▁keza mulongela ▁hewela ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁kwaviya ▁kaya tenda ▁yoya lagilizigwe ▁kuyatenda ?
▁“ Sekeu muleke ▁mwanamke ▁muha wi ▁yawe ▁mgima .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wawo . ▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁kakala ▁Shamu a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Za ku li .
▁Mndewa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ M a sa , ▁Masa ! ▁Ko hu nga ni ka ▁na ▁kugaya ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vingi ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wolonga ▁mbuli ▁fana ▁izo , ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁woi zahila ▁isi ▁yawo ▁wenyewo .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa galigw a ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁nayo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁muka mtosele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Mbali ▁welihi ▁wondawa hite ?”
▁Munhu ▁imwenga ▁nayo ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ni sola ▁mke ▁sambi , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁sidaha ▁kwiza .’
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Muna yo ▁magate ▁m e ngahi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ M agate ▁saba ▁na ▁somba ▁wadodo .”
▁Na ▁Yo s u wa , ▁zina ▁jake ▁dimwenga ▁Y u sito , ▁iviya ▁ko mu la m sa ni . ▁Wa no ▁watatu ▁wawo ▁Wayahudi ▁muhala ▁wowa huwile ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁wa ni taza ▁ng ' hani .
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁wa ▁dibululu ▁wowa iting ' hane ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dibululu ▁ijo ▁wa itogolela ▁na ▁Hamoli ▁na ▁Shekemu ▁imwana ge . ▁Maabaho ▁walume ▁wose ▁wengi zigwa ▁ulungwana .
▁“ Vondau we ▁uzidilwa ▁wa ▁siku ▁izo , ▁zuwa ▁diza gumigw a ▁ziza , ▁na ▁mwezi ▁hawiza lava ▁mu le ng e ▁wake , ▁na ▁nhondo ▁ziza la gala ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ziza tingisigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁Ya le di ▁viya malile ▁kumwelek a ▁Henoko ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane . ▁Ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Maabaho ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ke nuka , ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ W hi dika ▁mbuli ? ▁Vino ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wo ku lavila ▁ukalangama ▁wa ki ?”
▁Zi no ▁izo ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 6 4 , 3 00.
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁yehile ▁ya gendelele ▁kutenda ▁yehile , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁ya gendelele ▁kwa mbula ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁ya gendelele ▁kutenda ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yelile ▁ya gendelele ▁ kwela .”
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kawa fose za ▁Waisilaili ▁kuna ▁inzila ▁nhali ▁kufose la ▁mui chuwala , ▁kuhita ▁bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu . ▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁Misili ▁kuno ▁wa isasala ▁kwa ▁ng ' hondo .
▁Kulaw a ▁Ma ta na ▁wahita ▁Na hali eli , ▁na ▁kulawa ▁Na hali eli ▁wahita ▁ B a mo si ,
▁Ivo ▁mwiza wamanya ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wam papa ▁munhu ▁ya kalile ▁mbetembete ▁kulawa ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwake . ▁Chila ▁siku ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wo mwika ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁lolu tangigwe ▁“ L wi vi ▁lu nogile ” ▁muladi ▁ya pule ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wo kwingila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wake ‚ ▁“ Loleni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁ni ▁wengi ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wana ▁ludabwa ▁kufosa ▁cheye .
▁Gamali eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P e da s uli ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase .
▁Mazi ▁yawa ▁na ▁china ▁chi tali ▁na ▁safina ▁i yeng e lu ka ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam pekul a ▁na ▁one ▁yaha wona ▁ lulumu ▁ ze lu ▁dodi tenda ▁upipi ▁uwe ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ lulumu ▁ijo ▁di galuka ▁kuwa ▁chi londa ▁chi bisi ,
▁U weke ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kusang ' hana ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁yaha geza ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁kezakomigwa .”
▁Ulon zi ▁wihile ▁sekeu hulikik e , ▁mu longe ▁mbuli ▁zozi faya ▁ku ze nza ▁na ▁kuwataza ▁wamwenga , ▁muladi ▁yomu ya longa ▁ya weng ' he ▁unovu ▁wanhu ▁wo mtegeleza ni .
▁Wo londa ▁kuwa ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁hawa manyile ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁zowo longa ▁wala ▁mbuli ▁zowo zi kanha miza .
▁“ Mu mweda ▁mweye ▁one ▁wanhu ▁waha mwihila ni , ▁wahawa bagula ▁na ▁kuwa liga ▁na ▁kulonga ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wehi , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu !
▁“ U kweli ▁nowalongela , ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wiza segezigwa ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo kweleka ▁matunda ▁yake , ▁wawo ▁ni ▁waja ▁wowo tenda ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa lagiliza ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kovimanya ▁ku yeli ▁Yesu , ▁kolondeka ▁ya longe ▁muladi ▁wang wile ▁Yesu .
▁Ha lo lile ▁wihi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁iviya ▁ha wonile ▁magayo ▁mwa ▁Isilaili . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wawo ▁ka hamwe ▁nawo , ▁dizi ▁da ▁mfalume ▁da ▁hagati ▁yawo .
▁Na ▁muna ▁yama ka ni sa ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ka weka ▁ teng ' hu ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁wekaidi ▁ni ▁walotezi ▁na ▁wekatatu ▁ni ▁wafundiza , ▁m aabaho ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁mauzauza , ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ kuhonya ▁hebu ▁kuwataza ▁wamwenga ▁hebu ▁kuwa languliza ▁hebu ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya .
▁Yesu ▁viya wonile ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁ longe nde la , ▁kamuuza ▁Filipo , ▁“ Chi gule ▁kulihi ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁kuja ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi , ▁“ Saimoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁vino ▁kwo ni londa ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ Ona , ▁Mndewa ▁weye ▁kwo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no ku londa .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Wa lole se ▁wana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu .”
▁Kufos ela ▁yeye ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁ya ching ' hile ▁cheye ▁unovu ▁na ▁u tumigwa ▁wa ▁kuwa languliza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁wawe ▁na ▁kutegeleza ▁ko ku galigw a ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁muladi ▁zina ▁jake ▁di tu n hi zigwe .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁waiting ' hana ▁kulola ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁viwa wone ▁yoya lawilile , ▁wahita ▁kumwawo ▁kuno ▁wo itowa ▁zi ha mba ga ▁kwa ▁usungu .
▁‘ Hata ▁m atimbwisi ▁ya ▁dibululu ▁jenu ▁yeli ▁m ma gulu ▁yetu ▁choya kung ' hu n ha ▁yawe ▁chilaguso ▁kumwenu . ▁Mbali ▁m olondeka ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁habehi ▁na ▁mweye !’
▁Maabaho ▁Esau ▁kawasola ▁wake ▁zake ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake , ▁ng ' ombe ▁wake ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wake ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁viya patile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁na ▁kahita ▁isi ▁imwenga ▁kutali ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁mdodo ▁wake .
▁nayo ▁Haluni ▁keza wagala ▁Walawi ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wawe ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulava ▁muke ▁muna ▁ ulu ba vu ▁lolu soligwe ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mulume ▁iyo , ▁na ▁ka mgala ▁kwa ▁mulume ▁iyo .
▁Sekemu wa leke ▁wakale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu , ▁bule ivo ▁weza mtenda ni ▁muni hasanye , ▁mana ▁muha i tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁kweli ▁kumwenu ▁uwo ▁wizakuwa ▁m t e go ▁wa ▁ku namata .”
▁one ▁chimvuguya ▁icho ▁chiha wa ▁cha ▁ langi ▁ya ▁ya ni ▁ bisi ▁hebu ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁muna ▁diwalo ▁ijo , ▁walo ▁ijo ▁di na ▁chimvuguya . ▁Ivo ▁do londeka ▁di lagusigwe ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Yesu ▁viya humuluk e ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ulugongo , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela .
▁Cho c he lekigwa ▁na ▁lukuli ▁ni ▁lukuli ▁na ▁cho c he lekigwa ▁na ▁Muhe ▁ni ▁muhe .
▁walonga , ▁“ I kombole ▁mwenyewo ▁fana ▁weye ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi .”
▁Sa ng ' hano ▁yose ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Wa g elishoni ▁kwa ▁kupapa ▁mbahasha ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo ▁yose ▁izakuwa ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage . ▁Weza wa p a ngila ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vo wo longeligwa ▁kuvi papa .
▁ mbali ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁heza ku tegeleza ▁bule . ▁Maabaho ▁niza golosa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁uli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁kui tagusa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁kuwa lava ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁kwa ▁kuwatagusa ▁ng ' hani ▁Wamisili .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁ funye ni ▁umoyo ▁na ▁im eni ▁chi gangamale ▁muna ▁uhuwilo , ▁kwaviya ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁kwa habehi .
▁ B ung ' hulo ▁da ▁chitasa ▁hadiza woneka ▁kaidi ▁ng ' o ▁mgati ▁yako ▁na ▁ch ele ko c hele ko ▁za ▁ng ' he n ze ▁za ▁ sola ▁hazi za hulikik a ▁kaidi ▁ng ' o ▁mgati ▁yako , ▁kwaviya ▁wa chuuzi ▁wako ▁wo kuwa ▁magogogo ▁wa ▁isi ▁na ▁ku wagiza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁kwa ▁u sa wi ▁wako .”
▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁kamtanga ▁Bulahimu ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi ,
▁Imwe ▁wawo ▁ya tangigwe ▁ A ga bu ▁kema , ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kuwa ▁iza lawilila ▁nzala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose . ▁Na ▁nzala ▁iyo ▁i lawilila ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁mtawala ▁Chila u di yo .
▁Nowalongela ▁ukweli , ▁m baka ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁vonda vi segele , ▁ habule ▁hata ▁mbuli ▁ndodo ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁Malagilizo ▁yondai se gezigwe , ▁m baka ▁yose ▁ya ti mi ye .

▁Yakobo ▁kadumba ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kengil igwa ▁na ▁luholozi . ▁Kawa gola ▁mabumbila ▁maidi ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁nayo , ▁iviya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁zake ▁na ▁luti ▁zake ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁zake ▁na ▁ngamiya ▁zake .

▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁ku muhaka ▁munhu ▁yo safyigwa ▁muna ▁di gutwi ▁jake ▁da ▁kulume ▁na ▁ dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁ dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁da ▁mgulu ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume .
▁U sa ge ▁wenu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁mwiza mwing ' ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu .
▁M wanduso ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁hawa manyile ▁bule ▁mbuli ▁zino . ▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁vi yatunhizigwe , ▁wanahina ▁wa kumbuka ▁chila ▁chinhu . ▁V ose ▁vi lawilila ▁fana ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyalongile .
▁Yosefu ▁ka duganya ▁hela ▁zose ▁zozi g uli ligwe ▁ndiya ▁na ▁kuzi gala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Ka zi gala ▁hela ▁zose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .

▁Kulaw a ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁ka lumba ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chila ▁isi ▁na ▁kawa tenda ▁wakale ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose . ▁Ka lamula ▁kulawa ▁umwaka , ▁zuwaki ▁na ▁kulihi ▁kuwa kalile ▁wanhu ▁wawo .
▁“ I viya ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁ngubiko ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mapanzia ▁longo ▁na ▁dimwe ▁ya ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁luti .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁ivo ▁kazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁waja ▁wowa mu wi nzile , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁sina muwona ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mkulu ▁fana ▁uno .
▁Munhu ▁yo gobola ▁ndiya ▁kumgunda ▁keza lihigwa , ▁na ▁ko kwika ▁hamwe ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁yo handa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo gobola ▁weza de ng ' helela ▁hamwe .
▁wolonga , ▁“ W eye ▁mwene ▁kui bomola ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kui zenga ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu ! ▁I kombole ▁mwenyewo , ▁one ▁uha wa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ humuluka ▁mumsalaba !”
▁“ Ha mbwe ▁vino ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chi lihi ▁chochi mtenda ▁ya longe ▁ivo ? ▁Ino ▁ko muliga ▁Mu l ugu ! ▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ▁yo daha ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi !”
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁yose ▁yoi galigwe ▁kulawa ▁Misili , ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁kawalongela ▁wanage , ▁“ Bwel eni ▁na ▁ku gula ▁ndiya ▁chidogo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu .”
▁Esau ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁Isaka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hano geligwa ▁bule ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Kanaani .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu hite ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁na ▁mi zi mu ▁hebu ▁waha wi , ▁muladi ▁kuwa pula ▁wa mu la gulile ni ▁na ▁kui tenda ▁mwa mbule ▁mwiko . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Bulahimu ▁kawasola ▁Ishumaili ▁mwanage ▁na ▁walume ▁wamwenga ▁wose , ▁wo welekigwe ▁mwiikaye ▁yake ▁na ▁wowa guligwe ▁kwa ▁hela ▁zake , ▁kaweng iza ▁ulungwana ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize .
▁Na wo ▁ wedika , ▁“ Mndewa ▁komulonda .”
▁Isi ▁iyo ▁ yenela ▁kulawa ▁ A lo eli ▁mwii ng ema ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Alinoni ▁m baka ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Si li oni , ▁niiyo ▁Helim oni ,
▁Ichil o ▁vichi ngile ▁wahuwila ▁wawatum a ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila ▁uko ▁Beleya . ▁Viwafikile ▁uko , ▁wahita ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁ya ▁Wayahudi .
▁Zi gese ▁ng ' hani ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁na ▁kuzi tenda ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa wone ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁viya ▁viu gendelela .
