▁Bahobaho ▁mndele ▁ija ▁kakimbila ▁m baka ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Ni ng ' he ▁sambi ▁baha ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁muna ▁i c hano !”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Vino ▁kwo ni uza ▁weye ▁hebu ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa kulongela ▁mbuli ▁zangu ?”
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁kwetu ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁no huwila ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁mbasakanyo ▁na ▁niye . ▁Kaidi ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁yam vu lu ge ni , ▁yawe ▁yelihi ▁hebu ▁yelihi , ▁kezatagusigwa .
▁Vino ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁yeza chinjigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ? ▁Vino ▁somba ▁wose ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁weza vu wi gwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chawo ?’ ▁”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Yuda ▁wakala ▁Eli ▁na ▁Ona ni . ▁Wawo ▁wa da nga ni kila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁W eye ▁mbozi ! ▁Vino ▁ko londa ▁ku la g u sigwa ▁kuwa ▁uhuwilo ▁ bila ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁hau faya ▁bule ?
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kachi sola ▁ch etezo ▁icho , ▁kachi memez a ▁ma kala ▁ya ▁moto ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ichilingo ▁na ▁ku c ha sa ▁muna ▁isi . ▁Na ▁kukala ▁na ▁m bumo ▁wa ▁ng ' huwa ▁na ▁nyangi ▁na ▁lumwe mwe ▁na ▁ gudemek o ▁da ▁isi .
▁“ Munhu ▁yaha bawa ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ku mchinja ▁hebu ▁kum chuuza , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁ng ' ombe ▁watano ▁kwa ▁ng ' ombe ▁imwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wane ▁kwa ▁ng ' hondolo ▁imwe .
▁Ha mwe ▁na ▁yayo , ▁chi nawo ▁ tati ▁zetu ▁wa c he leke ▁wochi wategeleze ▁viya ▁vo wo chi zuma , ▁ivo ▁cho londeka ▁ku muhulika ▁ng ' hani ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁wa ▁chimuhe ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁kukala ▁wagima .
▁Musa ▁ka potwa ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁wingu ▁di kala ▁uchanyha ▁yake , ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u mema ▁umo .
▁Chila ▁chilumb e ▁chi kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁inyalile ▁chi danganika .
▁Ch u uze ni ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁vose ▁na ▁zi hela ▁muka weng ' he ▁ ngaye - ngaye . ▁I tendeleni ▁mi fuko ▁yo ha i sa kala ▁na ▁kui kila ▁ngama ▁yenu ▁kuulanga , ▁uko ▁haiza hunguka . ▁Uko ▁wa bavi ▁hawa daha ▁kuu bawa , ▁wala ▁ so ndo ▁hawa daha ▁kuu bananga .
▁Hata ▁one ▁muhawa ▁na ▁ndole i zi ▁ma a lu fu ▁longo ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁wa ▁Chi chilisito , ▁ mwabule ▁tata ▁wengi . ▁Kwa viya ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁niwa ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁ku wapetele ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Wo wa wa sondelele ▁wakala ▁Wa ko ha si , ▁wa sola ▁vinhu ▁velile , ▁na ▁hema ▁di zengigw a ▁wang ' hali ▁wawo ▁hawana fika .
▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁chi lawilila ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyalongile . ▁U kulu ▁wangu ▁ni bwele zi ligwa ▁ mbali ▁m okaji ▁magate ▁ka tumbik igwa .”
▁Sekemu we ▁na ▁ubananzi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁ Mbwanga ▁ija ▁vi yezile , ▁chinyamkela ▁chim b wa n ha ▁hasi ▁na ▁ching uma ▁chi sang o . ▁Yesu ▁kachi bwakila ▁chinyamkela ▁na ▁ku muhonya ▁mwana ▁ija , ▁m aabaho ▁ka mbweleza ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Viya danganike ▁Hu s ha mu , ▁Ha dadi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Be dadi ▁ka tawala , ▁niiyo ▁yoya wa to wile ▁na ▁kuwahuma ▁Wa midiani ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Moabu , ▁bululu ▁jake ▁di tangigwa ▁ A vi ti .
▁wa mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁zawo , ▁m ituka ▁sita ▁na ▁mi lu me ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁longo ▁na ▁midi , ▁m tuka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁walangulizi ▁waidi ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mulangulizi . ▁Wa vi gala ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁ Kuson hela ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁kalonga , ▁‘ W eye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u weng ' he ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁mbuli ▁yako ▁ya ▁U li mu , ▁mbuli ▁yako ▁ya ▁S u mi mu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁wo k waminika , ▁wouwa gezile ▁uko ▁Masa . ▁Ku ihuma ▁nawo ▁kuna ▁yamazi ▁ya ▁Meliba .
▁ Nolonda ▁ku manya ▁mbuli ▁imwe ▁kumwenu , ▁vino ▁ muhokela ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁malagilizo ▁viyolonda ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁kuhulika ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁na ▁kui huwila ?
▁Mulungu ▁yoya wa solile ▁kulawa ▁Misili , ▁kawa gombela ▁na ▁wehi ▁wawo ▁fana ▁ng ' ombe ▁mbago .
▁Ni winze ▁niye ▁fana ▁niye ▁vini muwinza ▁Chilisito .
▁Sitefano ▁kedika , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu ▁na ▁ tati ▁zangu , ▁ni tegelezeni ! ▁Wa saho ▁yetu ▁Bulahimu ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁hana hita ▁kukala ▁Halani , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁utunhizo ▁ka mulawil a ▁kuna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Meso p o ta ni ya ,
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Mesusela , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Henoko , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ya le di , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Mahalaleli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Kenani ,
▁Sekeu hokele ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku kutenda ▁u bene ▁malagilizo , ▁kwaviya ▁chinhu ▁icho ▁chowa tula ▁yameso ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁ku wagiza ▁wanhu ▁wanogile .
▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ▁wili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hanhu ▁helile . ▁Vi nhu ▁ivo ▁viza tengenez igwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁vini ku lagilize .”
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁kamulongela ▁Filipo , ▁“ Hita ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁hasi ▁kuna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁kudibwilingu ▁yoi hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁Yelusalemu ▁kuhita ▁ G a za .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Sekemu we ▁na ▁lugano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ndiya ▁cho mulonda ▁muladi ▁kuwa ▁wagima , ▁wala ▁viwalo ▁vomu londa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu .
▁Hawa manyile ▁bule ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁chinhu , ▁keza kong e zigwa , ▁na ▁ija ▁yeli bule ▁keza ho kigwa ▁m baka ▁chiya ▁chidodo ▁chiyeli ▁nacho .
▁Lelo ▁sekeu ni go me se , ▁ni leke ▁niwa danganize ▁kwa ▁ludoko ▁lwangu . ▁Maabaho ▁kufose la ▁weye , ▁niza tenda ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁kulu .”
▁Mulungu ▁ka lola ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyatendile , ▁ka wona ▁kweli ▁vinoga ▁ng ' hani . ▁I wa ▁imitondo ▁iwa ▁ichigulogulo , ▁siku ▁ye sita .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kadi la gaza ▁hasi ▁ balati ▁jake , ▁najo ▁di galuka ▁kuwa ▁zoka . ▁Mbali ▁ balati ▁da ▁Haluni ▁di i me la ▁mibalati ▁yawo .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁muke ▁wa ▁miyago ▁bule ivo ▁kwiza itenda ▁mwenyewo ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Yakobo ▁ka tuma ▁wanhu ▁wa ka wa tange ▁Laheli ▁na ▁Leya ▁kwii chuwala ▁ko yakalile ▁kowa dima ▁iwa ng ' hondolo ▁wake .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Kwa viya ▁kulawa ▁umwaka ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ya kala ▁yo somigwa ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁chila ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁zi petigwa ▁chila ▁bululu .”
▁“ Tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁Waisilaili ! ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁ka du mwe .
▁No mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Niye ▁ni tumigwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁muhala . ▁Wa linga ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa gile .”
▁M olondeka ▁kwa mha ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu . ▁Niye ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁ mbali ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁saba ▁ni ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁ku hu mu za ▁isi , ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kuhumula ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu hande ▁migunda ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁ku da huli la ▁mizabibu ▁yenu .
▁ Siza longa ▁na ▁mweye ▁kaidi ▁mbuli ▁nyingi , ▁kwaviya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁kokwiza . ▁Iyo ▁ka bule ▁nguvu ▁kumwangu .
▁uya kalize ▁vinogile ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁ bila ▁be ge t e ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁vondayeze ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka utenda ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁mdala , ▁hawalek ile ▁Waisilaili ▁wahite .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wa kumbuka ▁kuwa ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Mulungu ▁U londo ▁wangu ▁kwa ▁kaye ▁yako ▁woni koma ▁muumoyo ▁wangu .”
▁Haluni ▁kawalongela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁choya mulongele ▁Musa . ▁Iviya ▁ka tenda ▁vilaguso ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ,
▁Sekemu he m belu sigwe ▁kuno ▁na ▁kuno ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁mwazanyo . ▁ Vinoga ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu ▁ku ga nga mizigwa ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zi kigwe ▁kuson hela ▁ndiya , ▁ndagilizi ▁zino ▁hazi wataza ▁waja ▁wo zi sondelela .
▁Ye lekeni ▁na ▁k wene la ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Uno vu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁uwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Kawa londa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁na ▁kawa kaliza ▁welile ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁hana ▁imigulu ▁yake , ▁na ▁kuhokela ▁malagilizo ▁kulawa ▁kumwake .
▁Chi kala ▁wehi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kachi tenda ▁wa mbwiya ▁zake ▁kaidi ▁kufose la ▁ifa ▁ya ▁Mwanage . ▁Kwa viya ▁sambi ▁cha ▁mambwiya ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ivo ▁chi komboligwa ▁kufose la ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Ma ba mba la ▁yake ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yeza lavigwa ▁nhambiko , ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁m kila ▁na ▁yaja ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ,
▁Wa segela ▁muna ▁yama leme , ▁na ▁hamwande ▁Yesu ▁viya zilibuke , ▁wengi la ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁jelile , ▁uko ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa wawona .
▁Vi ila mu ligwe ▁kuwa ▁chihite ▁I tali ya , ▁Paulo ▁na ▁wa fungigwa ▁wamwenga ▁we kigwa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Y uli yo , ▁yoya kalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁chi tangigwe ▁“ Chi bumbila ▁cha ▁wakalizi ▁cha ▁ A g u sito .”
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kamulongela ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake , ▁“ One ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ingalawa ▁waha lawa ▁muna ▁ingalawa , ▁hamwiza komboligwa ▁bule .”
▁I kala ▁saa ▁sita ▁imisi , ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Ku yi sasala ▁kwa ▁Pasaka . ▁Pilato ▁kawalongela ▁Wayahudi , ▁“ Aino ▁hano ▁mfalume ▁wenu !”
▁Yesu ▁kawa kwenhukila ▁habehi ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni ng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁wose ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁mwi ▁isi .
▁Imwe ▁wenu ▁kodaha ▁ku nilongela , ▁“ o ne ▁ ihawa ▁ivo , ▁ha bali ▁Mulungu ▁ko watagusa ▁wanhu ? ▁Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kulema ▁chi yolonda ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Hiteni ▁mu kamulongele ▁Yohana ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zomu zi hulika ▁na ▁kuzi wona
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ha togole ▁kumtegeleza ▁Balaamu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ka hi ndu la ▁ duwilo ▁ijo ▁na ▁kuwa ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ka mulonda ni .
▁F u ny eni ▁umoyo ▁vimu zum igwa , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ko mtendela ni ▁mweye ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanage . ▁Vino ▁kuna ▁mwana ▁yelihi ▁ha zum igwa ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake ?
▁Lelo ▁fana ▁hamu daha ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chidodo ▁fana ▁icho , ▁ha bali ▁mu gaiye ▁vinhu ▁vimwenga ?
▁Mndewa ▁viyamuwone ▁mama ▁iyo , ▁ka muwonela ▁ubazi , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeu lile .”
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁ivo , ▁m aabaho ▁ka sigala ▁Galilaya .
▁Ka wona ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁ku gubuligwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁ go lole ▁kulu ▁do humulus igwa ▁muna ▁isi ▁kwa ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁nne .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁imitondo ▁ng ' hani ▁Yakobo ▁kalamuka , ▁kasola ▁idibwe ▁dodi kalile ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁jake , ▁kadi simika ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁uku mbu so ▁na ▁kudi gidila ▁mavuta .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma a ti , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma tati ya , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Se me yi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yuda ,
▁Wa kalizi ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa gudemeka ▁wawa ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike .
▁“ Kwiza tengenez a ▁mapa lo ▁ya ▁mkenge , ▁mapa lo ▁matano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁wa ▁hema ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza ▁Musa , ▁“ Mwiza lema ▁kwa mha ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ?
▁ Vondamu galigwe ▁kuna ▁ichitala , ▁seke mdumbe ▁mwiza hita ▁kulonga ▁choni ▁hebu ▁mwiza longa ze ▁lusita ▁lwa ha fika ▁mwiza kwing ' higwa ▁cha ▁kulonga .
▁Yesu ▁kau golosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁na ▁kum dalisa ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁Kamulongela , ▁“ Nolonda ▁ sa f yi ka !” ▁Bahobaho ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ka sa f yi ka .
▁Ivo ▁no funyila ▁umoyo ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁nawo ▁wa pate ▁ulopozi ▁wou patik a ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁wou gala ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wo londa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁wezaku gwa ▁muna ▁uku gezigwa ▁na ▁muna ▁um t e go ▁na ▁tama a ▁nyingi ▁za ▁chibozi ▁za ▁ku gala ▁ku lumiza , ▁zozi watenda ▁wanhu ▁wa ge ▁na ▁ku banangika .
▁Ivo ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁chi tume ▁ tume ▁fana ▁chiya ching ' hile ▁cheye , ▁wochi mtogole ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁lelo ▁niye ▁na ye lihi ▁m baka ▁ni geze ▁ku mu lemesa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Wanage ▁Haluni ▁nawo ▁weza , ▁Musa ▁kawa haka ▁damu ▁imwenga ▁hasi ▁ya ▁magutwi ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume ▁na ▁hana ▁yama dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁makono ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume ▁na ▁hana ▁yama dole ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁magulu ▁yawo ▁ya ▁kulume . ▁Da mu ▁imwenga ▁ka iti lila ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁lupango .
▁“ Tegelezeni , ▁cho hita ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Uko ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza tu ligwa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo , ▁nawo ▁weza mtagusa ▁yadanganike .
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Habali ▁mwenevale ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁ fa ni le ▁zino ? ▁Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁hachi daha ▁kusang ' hana ▁mbuli ▁ fa ni le ▁ino ▁bule .
▁Wa fundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa mgala ▁mwanamke ▁yoya gwiligwe ▁ugoni . ▁Maabaho ▁wa mwika ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁hagati .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chikulu ▁chi ze lu ▁na ▁iyo ▁yo kala ▁m chanyha ▁yake , ▁isi ▁na ▁ulanga ▁vi segezigwa ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁na ▁havi woneke ▁kaidi .
▁Yakobo ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁kolonga ▁nawo , ▁Laheli ▁ya kalile ▁m dimi ▁wa ▁ng ' hondolo , ▁kafika ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Weza sang ' hanila ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁i botigwe .
▁Pilato ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ngala ▁Yesu ▁kumwake ▁kwaviya ▁wa muwonela ▁migongo .
▁Wo se ▁wa muleka ▁Mulungu , ▁wose ▁wa bananga , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁zinogile , ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe .
▁kwa ▁ivo ▁i gele ni ▁moyo ▁na ▁kui taza ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁fana ▁vimu tenda ▁sambi .
▁Ha no ▁ho londeka ▁nzewele ▁na ▁ubala , ▁matwi ▁yayo ▁saba ▁ni ▁migongo ▁saba , ▁yaja ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kokala ▁uchanyha ▁yake . ▁Iviya ▁matwi ▁yayo ▁ni ▁wafalume ▁saba .
▁One ▁imndele ▁ha londa ▁kwii sondelela ▁na ▁weye , ▁basi ▁kwiza lekeleligwa ▁chilaho ▁icho . ▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁vovose ▁mwanangu ▁sekeu mbweleze ▁uko .”
▁Mbali ▁viwa manyile ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁Muyahudi , ▁wose ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁hamwe ▁kwa ▁ma sa a ▁maidi , ▁“ Alitemi ▁wa ▁Efeso ▁ni ▁Mkulu !”
▁“ M iyanza ▁mitatu ▁chila ▁mwaka ▁mwiza tenda ▁madugila ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁yangu .
▁Wa ja ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 4 6 ,500.
▁Ka peta ▁na ▁kui longa ▁na ▁Wayahudi ▁wowo longa ▁Chigiliki , ▁ mbali ▁nawo ▁wa geza ▁kumkoma .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wakala ▁wo nzahila ▁kuna ▁didugila ▁ijo . ▁Ivo ▁wa uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ka kulihi ▁munhu ▁ija ?”
▁Bahobaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁kam g wi sa ▁hasi ▁Helode ▁kwaviya ▁ha mtunhize ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka digwa ▁na ▁sang o ▁na ▁kadanganika .
▁na ▁D ishoni ▁na ▁ E se li ▁na ▁Di s hani . ▁Wa no ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Waholi , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Seili .
▁Wa huwila ▁wose ▁weli ▁hano ▁womu la mu sa ni . ▁I la mu seni ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁chelile ▁cha ▁ulondo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Viwakalile ▁Betelehemu , ▁siku ▁ya ▁Maliya ▁ku ibasula ▁i fika .
▁ Siku ▁za ▁kwa ha ▁zabibu ▁viyafikile , ▁kawatum a ▁watumigwa ▁wake ▁kwa ▁waja ▁iwa li mi ▁muladi ▁wa ka sole ▁zabibu .
▁Yosefu ▁kamtanga ▁mwanage ▁chaudele ▁zina ▁jake ▁Manase , ▁kwaviya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kani tenda ▁ni zimize ▁manhesa ▁yangu ▁yose ▁na ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yangu .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa tenda ▁Waisilaili ▁wa nogelw e ▁na ▁Wamisili . ▁Iviya ▁Musa ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁yo hishimika ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake .
▁niza mgalila ni ▁mvula ▁lusita ▁lufaya ▁muladi ▁isi ▁i pate ▁ndiya ▁nyingi , ▁na ▁mibiki ▁ili ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ izakwima ▁matunda ▁yake .
▁Ka tosa , ▁“ Tata , ▁Tat i ▁yangu ! ▁Yo se ▁yo dahika ▁kumwako . ▁U ni segeze le ▁nhungo ▁ino ▁ya ▁manhesa ▁kumwangu . ▁Mbali ▁si ▁fana ▁vini londa ▁niye , ▁ila ▁viu londa ▁weye .”
▁Mbali ▁nyama ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁yondai sigale ▁m baka ▁siku ▁yetatu ▁iza somigwa .
▁M towe ni ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁yadanganike , ▁kwaviya ▁ka geza ▁kumtenda ni ▁mu muleke ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoya mulavile ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ko mu kalile ▁watumwa .
▁Ivo , ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁kela ▁na ▁lagilizo ▁ je la , ▁dino ga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Nowalongela kweli , ▁izakuwa ▁vi dala ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁matajili ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yoya ze ngile ▁kaye ▁kwa ▁ku himba ▁chandusilo ▁mu ulu we ▁na ▁ku zenga ▁kaye ▁yake ▁baho . ▁M vula ▁ng ' hulu ▁vi itonyile , ▁mazi ▁mengi ▁ya itowa ▁kaye ▁ija , ▁ mbali ▁ha iting isi ke ▁kwaviya ▁i kala ▁i zengigw e ▁vinogile .
▁M abululu ▁yayo ▁yezakuwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tindiwalo , ▁muladi ▁mkomaji ▁sekeya komigwe ▁na ▁munhu ▁yo lihiliza ▁ing ' hali ▁hana hu mizigwa ▁hana ▁iwanhu ▁wose .
▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Chi nyamkela ▁fana ▁ino ▁hadaha ▁kulawa ▁ila ▁kwa ▁kutosa ▁muhala .”
▁Ka lotela , ▁kalonga , ▁“ B a la a mu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Beoli ▁kolonga , ▁Munhu ▁ija ▁yoya gubul igwe ▁yameso ,
▁Petili ▁kakala ▁ko msondelela ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁kutali , ▁kengila ▁mu luhelengo ▁lwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁Ka kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wakalizi , ▁ko ko t ela ▁moto .
▁Wa nhu ▁vondawa walongele , ▁‘ Loleni , ▁ka kuja ,’ ▁hebu , ▁‘ Loleni , ▁ka ku no !’ ▁M weye ▁sekemuwa winze .
▁Sauli ▁nayo ▁ka wona ▁vinoga ▁kukomigwa ▁kwa ▁Sitefano . ▁ Siku ▁ija , ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wose ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁weli ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa ndusa ▁kugaya ▁ng ' hani . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa mtogole ▁Yesu ▁wa p wi lili kila ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁Samaliya , ▁ila ▁watumigwa ▁muhala ▁wa sigala .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁muna ulu ng ' husesa ▁luja ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁ mulongele ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁chi i gole le ▁uhazi ▁wetu .”
▁Mbali ▁Pilato ▁kalu uza ▁lung ' husesa , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁mwa ▁wano ▁waidi ▁mo londa ▁ni mu lekelele ni ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ B a la ba !”
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela , ▁nayo ▁kawahonya .
▁Mbali ▁no ku togola ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁ko ye hila ▁yaja ▁yo wo sang ' hana ▁Wa ni ko la yi , ▁fana ▁viya ▁voni ye hila ▁niye .
▁Iviya ▁Chilisito ▁ha zilibuke , ▁basi ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁si ▁chinhu ▁na ▁mung ' hali ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Mbali ▁chaha longa ▁ukweli ▁kwa ▁ulondo , ▁chiza kula ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose ▁na ▁ku fikila ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito , ▁yeli ▁ditwi ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wose .
▁Mu lole si ▁kaye ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyalagilizigwe , ▁kawasola ▁m baka ▁kwii kaye ▁ya ▁Yosefu .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁ni ▁wa ▁kwaminika ▁yondaya watende ▁mu gangamale ▁na ▁kuwa kaliza ▁na ▁Mwihi .
▁Fan a ▁wana ▁wo mtegeleza ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemu kale ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁tama a ▁zihile ▁zi mu kalile ▁na zo ▁lusita ▁hamu manyile ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁mu hitile ni ▁Mndewa . ▁Y eye ▁niiyo ▁dibwe ▁dili ▁na ▁ugima , ▁dodi lemigwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁ mbali ▁di sa guligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁najo ▁do petigwa ▁do faya ▁ng ' hani .
▁M weye ▁mo lola ▁vinhu ▁vovi woneka ▁kwa ▁kunze . ▁Fan a ▁kuna ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁leka ▁yeye ▁ya gese ▁mwenyewo , ▁kwaviya ▁cho muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁fana ▁viyo tenda ▁yeye .
▁Maabaho ▁ wemiliz i ▁wa ▁Chi isi la ili ▁weza ▁na ▁ku mulilila ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁“ Habali ▁kochi tendela ▁vino ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ?
▁Mbali ▁Yosefu ▁viyahulike ▁kuwa ▁Ali ke la o ▁ka mu hazi ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Helode ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Yudeya , ▁kadumba ▁kuhita ▁uko ▁kwaviya ▁ka zum igwa ▁muna ▁zinzozi . ▁Ka hita ▁kuna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya .
▁Mu ke ▁ka bule ▁udahi ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁mwenyewo ▁ mbali ▁mulumake ▁ka nayo , ▁iviya ▁mulume ▁ka bule ▁udahi ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁mwenyewo ▁ mbali ▁muke ▁wake ▁ka nayo .
▁Wa nhu ▁hawa dahile ▁kui wona ▁hebu ▁kusegela ▁hanhu ▁howa kalile ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu . ▁Mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁uko ▁Gosheni ▁ko wakalile .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁yoya tendigwe ▁na ▁watumigwa , ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wo weka ▁watamu ▁muna ▁zinzila ▁na ▁kuwa go ne za ▁muna ▁yama ko mwa ▁na ▁muna ▁yama lili ▁muladi ▁Petili ▁yaha fosa ▁muhavu ▁sisil a ▁jake ▁diwa dalise ▁wamwenga .
▁One ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ha komboligwe ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁izo , ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza ▁kolondeka ▁ya le kigwe ▁yailegehe , ▁yeye ▁na ▁wanage .
▁Mbali ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mbo na ▁mo dumba ? ▁ Habali ▁muna ▁m ka nga gile ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yenu ?
▁Ni gaya ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁ndala , ▁nikala ▁meso ▁miyanza ▁mingi , ▁nikala ▁na ▁nzala ▁na ▁ng ' hilu , ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁haku wile ▁na ▁ndiya , ▁ni gaya ▁na ▁mbeho ▁na ▁ku p u wa ▁viwalo .
▁Kuna ▁vinhu ▁vili ▁mbasakanyo ▁vi mtende za ▁mulume ▁sekeya sole , ▁wamwenga ▁we lekigwa ▁ivo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁i zi nda ▁za ▁mami ▁zawo , ▁wamwenga ▁wa tendigw a ▁na ▁wanhu ▁kuwa ▁ivo , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁hawa sola ▁kwa ▁kuu zahila ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga . ▁Yo yodaha ▁kwii hokela ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁na ya i hokele .”
▁Si ja ▁ndiya ▁i lavigwe ▁hewela ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁one ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yoyose ▁ya hani liga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ndiya ▁yoni i lavila ▁hewela ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ni mulagusa ni ▁simwe , ▁na ▁mweye ▁m wolondeka ▁kutenda ▁fana ▁vini watendele .
▁Sekemu itende ▁isi ▁yomu kala ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁isi ▁yoni kala ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁no kala ▁hagati ▁yenu ▁Waisilaili .’ ▁”
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Fan a ▁Lufyende ▁yaha igola ▁mwenyewo , ▁vino ▁ufalume ▁wake ▁wiza kwima ze ? ▁M weye ▁m wolonga ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mwene mba go .
▁Kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁ni mu languliza ni ▁kuchuwala , ▁viwalo ▁venu ▁vomu i yawala ▁havi sa kale ▁hebu ▁vilatu ▁venu ▁havi sa kale ▁muna ▁imigulu ▁yenu .
▁Ivo ▁weza ▁na ▁kuwa lamba , ▁m aabaho ▁wawa lava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ichifungo ▁na ▁ka walamba ▁wasegela ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁diya .
▁Ivo ▁wa londa ▁utali ▁wa ▁wingi lo ▁wa ▁bahali ▁kwa ▁ku hulumus a ▁luzabi ▁lu fungigw e ▁chinhu ▁chi titu , ▁wa pata ▁utali ▁na ▁nzel a ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁hamwande ▁chidogo ▁wa tenda ▁ivo ▁kaidi , ▁wa pata ▁utali ▁wa ▁nzel a ▁m alongo ▁matatu
▁Lelo ▁ni longe ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁ndiya ▁yoi ta mbi ki ligwa ▁nyang ' hiti ▁ni ▁chinhu , ▁hebu ▁nyang ' hiti ▁ni ▁chinhu ?
▁Paulo ▁kawauza , ▁“ Lelo ▁mu batiz igwa ▁ubatiz o ▁u lihi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ U batiz o ▁uya batiz e ▁Yohana .”
▁“ Mbali ▁mu togole ligwa ▁kukoma ▁na ▁kuja ▁wanyama ▁hohose ▁homukala , ▁fana ▁vimu temeligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁welile ▁na ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁wodaha ▁kuja , ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimu ja ▁nyama ▁ya ▁m ha la ▁hebu ▁ mba la .
▁fana ▁viya ▁hachi manyike , ▁inga wa ▁cho manyika ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁fana ▁wowadanganike ▁ mbali ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wagima , ▁cho towigwa ▁ mbali ▁hachi komigwa .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ wedika ▁hamwe , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chiza tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .” ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi walongile ▁wanhu ▁wawo .
▁Sekemu tende ▁nawo ▁lagano ▁jojose ▁hebu ▁na ▁milungu ▁yawo .
▁Vini kalile ▁nawo , ▁niwa lole sa ▁goya ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁ya ▁zina ▁jako ▁do u ning ' hile . ▁Ni wa kaliza , ▁na ▁ habule ▁hata ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya gile , ▁ mbali ▁ija ▁yoya londeke ▁kwa ga ▁muladi ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yatimie .
▁“ Zin o ▁ni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yomu londeka ▁kuzi zindilila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁yoya mwing ' hileni ▁mukale ▁siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wenu .
▁Sa a ▁ija ▁ija ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ka lawilila , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁imwana ▁ija ▁kwa ▁iwanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁wou gozela ▁ukombola ▁wa ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Zu wa ▁vidi kalile ▁do s wa , ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Wa la ge ▁wanhu ▁wahite ▁muna ▁ivi bulul u ▁na ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁ili ▁ mmabehi ▁muladi ▁wa pate ▁ndiya ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kugona , ▁kwaviya ▁hano ▁hachi li ▁ni ▁chuwala ▁muhala .”
▁baho ▁mulume ▁keza mgala ▁muke ▁wake ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁na ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁yoi londeka , ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁wa ▁ s ha yi li , ▁ mbali ▁ bila ▁ku guma ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ubani , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁ya ▁migongo , ▁nhosa ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁ku lagusa ▁ubananzi .
▁Y eye ▁mwenyewo ▁ha kalile ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁keza ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁ijo .
▁ka wika ▁muna ▁dileme ▁da ▁sambi ▁dodi kalile ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁hake ▁ha ▁kuwandila ▁do yakalile ▁kadi songola ▁muna ▁uluwe , ▁keka ▁dibwe ▁kulu ▁ha umulomo ▁wa ▁dileme , ▁m aabaho ▁kasegela .
▁Kachi kombola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya manhesa ▁yaja ▁yoya gala ▁ifa , ▁na ▁kezachi kombola . ▁Ch eye ▁chi mwikila ▁lolelo ▁jetu ▁kuwa ▁keza gendelela ▁kuchi kombola ▁kaidi ,
▁L a m ke ni ▁chihite . ▁Loleni , ▁munhu ▁yondaya n ib i du ke ▁kokwiza !”
▁ Siku ▁yetatu ▁Eliabu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁He lo ni , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko .
▁M weye ▁watumwa ▁wa tegelezeni ▁wenevale ▁wenu ▁wa ▁chi isi ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose , ▁na ▁si ▁lusita ▁lu wo mulola ni ▁muhala ▁kwaviya ▁mo londa ▁kui ko mba ▁ko mba ▁kumwawo , ▁ mbali ▁ tende ni ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁moyo , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku mtosela ▁Mndewa .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa gombela ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁vondaya wone ▁kuwa ▁nguvu ▁zawo ▁zi mala . ▁Keza wa wonela ▁ubazi ▁waja ▁wo msang ' hanila , ▁vondaya wone ▁wabule ▁nhazo .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁yaha ja ▁nyama ▁iyo ▁i lavigwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁M weye ▁mwaha londa ▁kutogola ▁usenga ▁uwo , ▁Yohana ▁niiyo ▁Eliya , ▁yoya longigwe ▁kezakwiza .
▁Y andika ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁da ▁Efeso , ▁usenga ▁uno ▁wolawa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo kwa mhilila ▁nhondo ▁saba ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁ija ▁yo genda ▁hagati ▁ya ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kwikil a ▁vitasa ▁viya ▁saba ▁va ▁zahabu .
▁M beyu ▁yaha kangala , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko sola ▁sengo ▁na ▁ko kwandusa ▁ku senga , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁siku ▁za ▁ku kangala ▁ndiya ▁zi fika .”
▁Ivo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Hachi vimanyile ▁bule .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁si mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁notenda ▁yano ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi .
▁ Sambi ▁na m gima , ▁ mbali ▁siyo ▁niye ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁Chilisito ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yangu . ▁Ugima ▁uno ▁woni li nawo ▁na ▁no kala ▁sambi ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo , ▁uhuwilo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya ni londile ▁na ▁kau lava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu .
▁Maabaho ▁ya sole ▁yaja ▁mabe belu ▁maidi ▁ya ▁luti ▁na ▁kuya gala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁L usita ▁vi umbe ▁wane ▁wawo ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁viwo mwing ' ha ▁ukulu ▁na ▁hishima ▁na ▁hewela , ▁yeye ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁siku ▁zose ,
▁Mndewa ▁ko lamula ▁nhaguso ▁na ▁kuchi tagusa , ▁muladi ▁sekechi lamuliligw e ▁nhaguso ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose .
▁ mbali ▁uha wa ▁u lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁mweye ▁hamwiza daha ▁bule ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wa leke , ▁iviya ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mo mulema ▁Mulungu !” ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁wa mtogola ▁Gamali yeli .
▁Ni ng ' hali ▁sina komeleza ▁kutosa ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu , ▁ lola ! ▁Lebeka ▁ka lawilila ▁na ▁nongo ▁yake ▁ya ▁mazi ▁muna ▁di ye ga , ▁ka gidimila ▁muna ▁inzasa ▁na ▁kude ha ▁mazi . ▁Na ▁niye ▁ni mpula , ▁‘ Nolamba ▁u ning ' he ▁mazi ▁ning ' we .’
▁Viya hulike ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lw o fosa , ▁ka uza , ▁“ Kuna ▁choni ?”
▁I kala ▁chilo ▁chimwe , ▁ mwika goya ▁ving ' waji ▁na ▁m okaji ▁magate ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wowa fungigw e ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁wa lota ▁nzozi , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁ka lota ▁nzozi ▁mbasakanyo ▁na ▁miyage , ▁nzozi ▁zi kala ▁na ▁fambulo ▁mbasakanyo .
▁One ▁uha muwona ▁chihongwe ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yo k wi hila ▁ka gwa ▁na ▁mbahasha ▁yake , ▁sekeu muleke ▁m taze .
▁Zi ha fosa ▁siku ▁saba ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁niza gala ▁mvula ▁yonda itonye ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo , ▁muladi ▁kuvi ba na ga ▁vi umbe ▁vi gima ▁vose ▁voni v ilumbile .”
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁nina ▁ukalangama ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ukalangama ▁uya lavile ▁Yohana . ▁Kwa viya ▁ usang ' hano ▁uya ni ni le ▁Tata ▁ni u komeleze , ▁ usang ' hano ▁woni utenda ▁wo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁Tata ▁kani tuma .
▁Ni na ▁mbuli ▁imwe ▁ya ▁ku kulongela , ▁weye ▁ku leka ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁viwa kalile ▁wolawa ▁Yeliko , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela .
▁ H umbe ▁Isaka ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga ▁na ▁Esau , ▁Lebeka ▁kakala ▁yo tegeleza . ▁Ivo ▁Esau ▁viya hitile ▁ku sa ka ▁kwii mba go ,
▁Mulungu ▁hawa lemile ▁bule ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁mwenyewo , ▁woyawasagule ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso . ▁Mo vimanya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga ▁kuson hela ▁Eliya ▁lusita ▁viya mu ya la lile ▁Mulungu ▁kuson hela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .
▁Wayahudi ▁wa ya togola ▁masita ka ▁yayo ▁na ▁walonga ▁kuwa ▁yayo ▁yose ▁ya kala ▁kweli .
▁Kwa viya ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ni ▁sisil a ▁da ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁vonda vi ze ▁na ▁vi ilinga ▁muhala ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁kweli . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁nhosa ▁ziya ▁ziya ▁za ▁malagilizo ▁yoyo lavigwa ▁chila ▁mwaka , ▁hazi daha ▁bule ▁kuwatenda ▁waja ▁wo tambika ▁wawe ▁wo faya .
▁M weye ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁lagilizo ▁dimwe ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁imwe .’ ▁”
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁kamtanga ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Chi no ▁choni ▁cho u nitendele ? ▁ Habali ▁hu nilongele ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁muke ▁wako ?
▁Sekeu togole ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya kwe hu le ▁kwaviya ▁u ng ' hali ▁mbwanga , ▁ mbali ▁uwe ▁simwe ▁kwa ▁wahuwila ▁muna ▁ulonzi ▁wako ▁muna ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁na ▁muna ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁na ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁kukala ▁ugima ▁welile .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁ka songola ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁fana ▁viya ▁va ▁mwanduso . ▁Igolo ▁yake ▁chilo chi lo ▁kasegela , ▁ka kwela ▁kumulima ▁wa ▁Sinai , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize . ▁Ku no ▁kam ha ▁vi bawo ▁viya ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake .
▁Kwa viya ▁yelihi ▁yeli ▁mkulu ? ▁I ja ▁yo kala ▁hasi ▁yoja , ▁hebu ▁ija ▁yo sasala ▁ndiya ? ▁Ni ▁ija ▁yo kala ▁hasi ▁yoja . ▁Mbali ▁niye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁yoyo sang ' hanila ▁mgati ▁yenu .
▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko ▁na ▁kakala ▁ko fosa ▁umo .
▁Uko ▁mwiza m zengela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ulupango ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁mabwe ▁haya songoligwe .
▁“ Vi ni kalile ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁na ▁Damasiki , ▁L usita ▁lwa ▁imisi ▁si nhu kila ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁kulu ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁di lawilila ▁di ni mwemwese la ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka gala ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dimwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ku mwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁weka ▁makono ▁yawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁iyo .
▁“ No walekela ni ▁tindiwalo , ▁no mwin a ni ▁tindiwalo ▁jangu . ▁Si mwin a ni ▁bule ▁fana ▁isi ▁voi tenda . ▁Seke mwa za ny we . ▁ Sekemudumbe .
▁Yesu ▁kawaleka ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ka kwela ▁muna ▁ingalawa , ▁kahita ▁muna ▁i banzi ▁ya ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Ma ga da ni .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁hana ▁ ib e nde la ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁wa sondelela ▁ bumbila ▁dimwe ▁dimwe . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wawo ▁kakala ▁Eli s uli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S he du eli .
▁Mbali ▁iviya ▁yandikigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁wochi togoligwe ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁wochi muhuwila ▁yeye ▁yoya m zilibule ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu .
▁Wa mgale ▁hano ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wawo . ▁Niye ▁niza weng ' ha ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁nawo ▁weza de ng ' helela ▁matunda ▁yose ▁ya ▁isi ▁ino .
▁U chi lekelele ▁ubananzi ▁wetu ▁uja ▁u chitendile , ▁fana ▁cheye ▁vichi walekelele ▁wamwenga ▁wowa chi hasanye .
▁One ▁mulume ▁yaha msola ▁muke ▁wa ▁se kulu ▁wake ▁hebu ▁mdodo ▁wake , ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁ka tenda ▁chinhu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁na ▁ku mguma ▁chinyala ▁se kulu ▁wake ▁hebu ▁mdodo ▁wake . ▁Weza danganika ▁ bila ▁kupata ▁wana .
▁Yesu ▁ka mwikila ▁kaidi ▁makono ▁muna ▁yameso . ▁Maabaho ▁meso ▁yake ▁ya vu g u ka , ▁nayo ▁kawa ▁mgima , ▁na ▁ka wona ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁funhufunhu .
▁Mbali ▁M ika eli , ▁m senga ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁vo ya i hu mile ▁na ▁Mwihi ▁ija ▁na ▁ku ibishil a ▁kwa ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Musa , ▁ha gezile ▁kumtagusa ▁kwa ▁maligo , ▁ mbali ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁ya ku b wa kile !”
▁Apolo ▁viyakalile ▁Kolimso , ▁Paulo ▁ka fosa ▁zisi ▁zili ▁muna ▁ivi lima ▁na ▁kafika ▁Efeso . ▁Uko ▁ka wafika ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wowamsondelel e ▁Yesu ,
▁Y eye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kaye ▁yake ▁viwa komeleze ▁kubatizigwa ▁kachi lamba ▁chihite ▁ukaye ▁yake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ One ▁mu niwona ▁niye ▁no muhuwila ▁Mndewa , ▁izo ni ▁mukale ▁ukaye ▁yangu .” ▁Na ▁kachi lamba ▁ng ' hani ▁chihite .
▁na ▁no mulamba ▁Chilisito ▁ya kale ▁muna ▁im yoyo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo . ▁Na ▁no mtambikila ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁mazi zi ▁na ▁chandusilo ▁muna ▁ulondo ,
▁“ Soleni ▁chitabu ▁chino ▁cha ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁mu chi ke ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁muladi ▁chiwe ▁ukalangama ▁kumwenu .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ka walongolela ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kukala ▁hachisogo ▁chawo . ▁I i viya ▁mhanda ▁ija ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁wingu ▁i segela ▁na ▁kukala ▁hachisogo ▁chawo ,
▁“ One ▁mulume ▁yahawa ▁na ▁wake ▁waidi , ▁muke ▁imwe ▁komulonda ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ha mulonda , ▁wose ▁wa mweleke la ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁ mbali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁ni ▁wa ▁muke ▁ija ▁ha mulonda ▁ng ' hani ,
▁“ Yandik a ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁da ▁Sa li di , ▁“ Niye ▁ni li ▁na ▁ mihe ▁saba ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁nhondo ▁saba ▁nolonga . ▁Ni zimanya ▁sang ' hano ▁zako , ▁na ▁ko manyika ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁mgima ▁ h umbe ▁kudanganika .
▁Ya kulihi ▁milungu ▁i dile ▁nhambiko ▁yenu ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁divai ▁na ▁zabibu ▁za ▁ving ' waji ? ▁Lelo ▁in u ke ▁im tazeni !
▁Baho ▁hau mwaka ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁na ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁nyingi ▁kufose la ▁walotezi ▁wake ,
▁“ Mbali ▁mweye ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Si ya ti la ▁uko ▁ku wo lema ▁kusondelela ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁wihi , ▁hawa i fundize ▁chiya ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wochi tanga ▁‘ sili ▁ya ▁Lufyende ,’ ▁nowalongela ▁kuwa ▁siza wa t wika ▁mbahasha ▁imwenga ▁yoyose .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁ya galile ▁keza mkanha ▁vihande , ▁ko vi gola ▁ditwi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yake , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza vika ▁hana ▁zi ngo di ▁zi kwaka ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁Isaka ▁ka mtuma ▁Yakobo ▁yahite ▁kwii si ▁ya ▁Padani ▁Alamu ▁kwa ▁Labani , ▁yo yelekigwe ▁na ▁Besueli , ▁M wa la mu , ▁Labani ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁Lebeka ▁yeli ▁mami ▁yawo ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Esau .
▁Iviya ▁ tenda ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁uha wona ▁chihongwe ▁hebu ▁mawalo ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chimwenga ▁chochose ▁chonda yagize ▁mkaya ▁miyago . ▁Sekeu leke ▁ku mtaza .
▁“ Leka ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi , ▁sekeu wa pete ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Waisilaili .
▁Ch eye ▁chi kwela ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁chi longole la ▁kuhita ▁ A so , ▁uko ▁chaha msolile ▁Paulo . ▁Ka chilongela ▁chitende ▁vino , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁kohita ▁uko ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁isi ▁inyalile .
▁L wi vi ▁lwenyewo ▁lwa ▁uluwa ▁lwiza kuwa ▁na ▁panzia ▁dili ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁kenda , ▁di tengenez igwe ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁na ▁ku ha mbigwa ▁vinogile . ▁P anzia ▁ijo ▁di zakwamh igwa ▁na ▁mhanda ▁nne ▁zili ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vi ne .
▁Ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Moabu , ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁malagilizo ▁yano . ▁Kalonga ,
▁Mbali ▁mtumwa ▁yaha longa , ▁‘ No mulonda ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ▁na ▁muke ▁wangu ▁na ▁wanangu , ▁si londa ▁ku ilegeha .’
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁waja ▁na ▁we guta . ▁Wa nahina ▁wa dondola ▁vi gelo ▁longo ▁na ▁vidi ▁va ▁ masigavu .
▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁na ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁luti .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Wa gela si ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu ▁ya segele ▁kumwawo ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wo dumba ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁ka kwela ▁mui ngala wa , ▁kahita .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa ngala ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁chipofu ▁kwa ▁Mafalisayo .
▁Wa tumigwa ▁wamulongela ▁Mndewa , ▁“ U cho n geze le ▁uhuwilo ▁wetu .”
▁Y eye ▁iyo ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁simwe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo , ▁yoyo vi tenda ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vi gendelele ▁kuwa ▁baho ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁yili ▁na ▁ludabwa , ▁viya malile ▁kuwa safya ▁wanhu ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo , ▁kakala ▁uko ▁kuchanyha ▁kuulanga ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Mkulu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Mu huwile ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁niye ▁na ha walaga ▁wahite ▁ukaye ▁kumwawo ▁wahawa ▁na ▁nzala , ▁weza si ndu ka ▁mwiinzila , ▁kwaviya ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁wa lawa ▁kutali .”
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁mu zimanya ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Ona ▁chi zimanya .”
▁Isaka ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Mwanangu ▁ kwenhuka ▁ha guhi ▁ni dahe ▁kuku baba sa ▁muladi ▁ni vimanye ▁fana ▁kweli ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Esau ▁mwanangu ▁hebu ▁siyo .”
▁ Mbwanga ▁iyo ▁Muebulaniya ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁Chi mulongela ▁nzozi ▁zetu , ▁na ▁yeye ▁kachi fambulila .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁hawa manyile ▁bule ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ivo ▁wa duwiligwa ▁na ▁Mulungu !”
▁Vino ▁Mulungu ▁heza watagusa ▁waja ▁woyawasagule ▁wo mulilila ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ? ▁Vino ▁keza kala ma ▁kuwataza ?
▁Ni nayo ▁mengi ▁ya ▁kulonga ▁kuson hela ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwatagusa . ▁Mbali ▁ija ▁yoyanhumile ▁ni ▁kweli , ▁na ▁niye ▁nowalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁yaja ▁yoni yahulike ▁kumwake ▁muhala .”
▁Walongele ▁wazi leke ▁si mo ▁za ▁uvwizi ▁na ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁hazi li uko ▁za ▁lu dongo ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁ma wa saho , ▁yayo ▁yo gala ▁ku leka ▁ku itogolela ▁na ▁haya zenga ▁bule ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁yoi manyika ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ G a leni ▁somba ▁wamwenga ▁womu wa vu wile .”
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁ino ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wehi , ▁chila ▁zuwa ▁moyo ▁wake ▁wingi la ▁lugano ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁hazi mtunhize ▁Mulungu .
▁Yakobo ▁kamulongoza ▁Yuda ▁kwa ▁Yosefu ▁muladi ▁ya mu laguse ▁nzila ▁m baka ▁Gosheni . ▁Ivo ▁weza ▁m baka ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Gosheni .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁yaha ga ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kweli , ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yaha mbweleza ▁kaidi ,
▁Fesito ▁kakala ▁nawo ▁za i di ▁ya ▁siku ▁na ne ▁hebu ▁longo ▁hamwe ▁nawo , ▁m aabaho ▁kahita ▁Kaisaliya . ▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁kakala ▁hasi ▁kuna ▁ichitala ▁cha ▁nhaguso ▁na ▁kalagiliza ▁Paulo ▁yeng izigwe ▁mgati .
▁Chila ▁mbiki ▁ha wima ▁ tunda ▁dinogile , ▁wiza kanhigwa ▁na ▁kwa sigwa ▁muna ▁umoto .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁baho ▁vi wamuwonile ▁ko genda ▁na ▁ku mtogoza ▁Mulungu ,
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yolonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁kolondeka ▁ya pule ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ku fambula ▁chiya ▁chi yo longa .
▁Kweli ▁siku ▁zose ▁vinoga ▁ku gaiya ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zinogile , ▁hata ▁one ▁niye ▁ni hawa habule .
▁Yuda ▁ija ▁yo yambiduke ▁Yesu , ▁viya wone ▁kuwa ▁wo mtagusa , ▁ka wona ▁ubazi , ▁ivo ▁kawa bweleze la ▁hela ▁zawo ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁“ Lola , ▁no mtuma ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu ▁muladi ▁yam kalize ni ▁m zila ▁na ▁kumgala ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yoni isasale .
▁Ka bila ▁da ▁Asheli ▁diza sondelela . ▁M ulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli ▁kakala ▁Pa gi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ O kila ni .
▁Vi ifikile ▁siku ▁ya ▁uhelelo ▁ya ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁magan a ▁mane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁mabumbila ▁yose ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wasegela ▁Misili .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁kuwa ▁Lazalo ▁mtamu , ▁ kongeza ▁kukala ▁siku ▁mbili ▁haja ▁ha yakalile .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁muke ▁wa ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁hebu ▁mdodo ▁wako , ▁uko ▁ni ▁ku mguma ▁chinyala ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁hebu ▁mdodo ▁wako .
▁Wa segela ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁D o fu ka .
▁Kwiza weng iza ▁mgati ▁na ▁ku we miza ▁hana ▁mulima ▁wako , ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hou ha sagule ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ha we ▁hanhu ▁ handa u kale , ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁hou ha ze ngile ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wako ,
▁Yuda ▁viya mtumile ▁ija ▁i mbwiya ▁M wa du la mu , ▁ya mgalile ▁ija ▁mwanamke ▁mwana ▁luti ▁muladi ▁yam bwelezele ▁wingi li zi ▁yoya mu lekele , ▁ mbali ▁ham fikile ▁bule .
▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁i londeka ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁ya ti mi ye , ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kalonga ▁kufose la ▁Daudi ▁na ▁ka lotela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yuda , ▁yoya wa longoze ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowa m gwilile ▁Yesu .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha i safya ▁kwa ▁ku igola ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vihile , ▁keza kuwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁chi a ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁chiidumwe , ▁kwaviya ▁ka sa guligwa ▁na ▁ko m faya ▁Mndewa ▁wake , ▁na ▁ka isasala ▁kwa ▁chila ▁sang ' hano ▁inogile .
▁Mbali ▁niza m duwila ze ▁munhu ▁ha duwiligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ? ▁Niza wa longa ze ▁vihile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hawa longile ▁vihile ?
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁kolondeka ▁u fundize ▁mbuli ▁zozi londeka ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁kweli .
▁“ Munyu ▁uno ga , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁waha giza ▁u munyu ▁wake , ▁wiza gumigw a ▁choni ▁m baka ▁uko lele ? ▁“ Mu we ▁na ▁u munyu ▁wa ▁u mbwiya ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁mukale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Isi ▁yoni weng ' hile ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka , ▁nizakwing ' ha ▁weye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako .”
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Chi bwele ▁Yudeya .”
▁Kawalongela ▁vose ▁kwa ▁masimwe ▁ mbali ▁kakala ▁yaidumwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁kawalongela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁funhufunhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kahumuluka ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁kuno ▁kam ha ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁va ▁ukalangama ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake , ▁va ndikigwe ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁“ Kwiza tengenez a ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge ▁ya ▁kwi mizil a ▁dihema .
▁Ivo ▁wa muleka ▁Lebeka ▁yahite ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Iviya ▁wa i sondelela ▁na ▁ya ya ▁wa ▁Lebeka .
▁Mu lima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁wakala ▁wo gubikigwa ▁na ▁yosi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hulumuka ▁muna ▁umoto . ▁Yo si ▁di kwela ▁uchanyha ▁fana ▁yosi ▁da ▁tanuli , ▁mulima ▁wose ▁wa gudemeka ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁i gele ni ▁moyo ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zino .
▁“ Walongele ▁kuwa ▁Muisilaili ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁kumwawo , ▁yo lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁imwenga ,
▁ka ilongela ▁mwenyewo , ▁“ Ni ha dalisa ▁walo ▁jake ▁muhala , ▁niza hona .”
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wo liga ▁mbuli ▁hawa zi manyile ▁bule , ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁wanyama ▁weli bule ▁nzewele , ▁we lekigwa ▁muladi ▁wa gwiligwe ▁na ▁kukomigwa . ▁Iviya ▁weza danganizigwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwo danganizigwa ▁wanyama .
▁Na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁yolonga ▁na ▁niye , ▁kakala ▁na ▁nzel a ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku linga ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁na ▁ nyivi ▁zake ▁na ▁mhongono ▁zake .
▁Mbali ▁no lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwa ▁nyele si ▁maelufu ▁kwa ▁waja ▁woni londa ▁niye ▁na ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mu hungukilw a ▁na ▁uhuwilo , ▁nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁one ▁mu wile ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁ndodo ▁fana ▁mbeyu ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁ha la dali , ▁muha dahile ▁kutenda ▁jojose . ▁Hata ▁one ▁i wile ▁kuu longela ▁ lugongo , ▁‘ Segel a ▁hano ▁uhite ▁kuja ’ ▁nawo ▁uha wategeleze .
▁one ▁mweye ▁mwaha chi taza ▁cheye ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁muna ▁kutambika . ▁Ivo ▁ma p u lo ▁yetu ▁mengi ▁yeza k wi di kigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kezachi temela ▁mate , ▁na ▁wengi ▁weza mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu .
▁ mbali ▁viwa malile ▁kuwa ja ▁ng ' ombe ▁waja ▁wanenehe , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sigambe ▁yavimanye ▁kuwa ▁wawa ja ▁wayawo , ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wa so ka ▁fana ▁viya ▁ichanduso . ▁Maabaho ▁ni lamka ▁m zi n ho ngo .
▁Kaidi ▁kanilongela , ▁“ Mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁ ulotezi ▁zili ▁mwii chi tabu ▁sekeu zi fi se ▁fana ▁sili , ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kulawilila ▁yano ▁yose ▁lwa habehi .
▁Ha nhu ▁hohose ▁haja ▁Yesu ▁haya hitile , ▁mui mi gunda ▁hebu ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁hebu ▁mwii zi isi , ▁wanhu ▁wa weka ▁watamu ▁muna ▁yama g uli lo . ▁Wa mulamba ▁ya walekelele ▁wa dalise ▁hata ▁muna ▁im hindo ▁ya ▁walo ▁jake . ▁Wo se ▁wowa di dalise ▁wa hona .
▁Na ▁ku gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁lusita ▁lufika ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁kuwakombola ▁wanhu ▁wake .”
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Habali ▁kumtowa ▁chihongwe ▁wako ▁miyanza ▁mitatu ? ▁Niza ▁kuku kimilila ▁muladi ▁sekeu gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza ▁uno .
▁ Dib we ▁dino ▁do ni di simike ▁hano ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁uku mbu so , ▁dizakuwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁niye ▁nizakwing ' ha ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁vinhu ▁longo ▁vondau ning ' he .”
▁M weye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁m kaye ▁wa tegelezeni ▁wenevale ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁kuwa hulika ▁ng ' hani , ▁siyo ▁waja ▁wanogile ▁na ▁wa ho le ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁waja ▁wene ▁ku ka li ka .
▁Ivo ▁mfalume ▁kawauza ▁wakulu ▁wake , ▁“ Vino ▁cho m pata hi ▁munhu ▁fana ▁ino ▁Yosefu ▁yeli ▁na ▁muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mgati ▁yake ?”
▁L usita ▁viya bwelile ▁kulawa ▁Padani ▁Alamu , ▁Yakobo ▁kafika ▁goya ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Shekemu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁keka ▁lago ▁jake ▁habehi ▁na ▁dibululu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁Yesilo , ▁m koi ▁wake ‚ ▁na ▁kumulongela . ▁“ Nokulamba ▁ni lekelele ▁ni bwele ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁uko ▁Misili ▁ni ka wa lole ▁fana ▁wang ' hali ▁wagima .” ▁Yesilo ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁Yosefu ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁waidi , ▁Manase ▁na ▁Efulaimu , ▁kwa ▁Asen a ti ▁mndele ▁wa ▁P o ti fe la , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁ O ni .
▁Wa ka ya ▁wa ▁bululu ▁weza mkaliza ▁munhu ▁ya komile ▁muladi ▁sekeya komigwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyakomigwe . ▁Weza mbweleza ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁kukimbilila ▁ko ya kimbilile . ▁Keza kala ▁uko ▁m baka ▁vondaya danganike ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yoya b o b o di gwe ▁mavuta ▁yelile .
▁Musa ▁kehilwa ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁maelufu ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁magan a ▁wowa bwelile ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo .
▁Petili ▁ka gendelela ▁ku hodiza ▁na ▁viwa vugul e ▁na ▁kumuwona , ▁wazanywa .
▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yo mulonga ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁u nhu ▁wake ▁kelek igwa ▁muna ▁welesi ▁lwa ▁Daudi .
▁Baho ▁ kumbuka ▁viya ▁viu kalile , ▁haja ▁u ng ' hali ▁hu na ku gwa ▁bule . ▁U sa mhe ▁uhasanyi ▁wako ▁na ▁sang ' hana ▁yaja ▁yo utendile ▁haichanduso . ▁One ▁hu sa m hile ▁bule ▁uhasanyi ▁wako , ▁niza kwiza ▁kumwako ▁na ▁kuchi segeza ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kwikil a ▁chitasa ▁hanhu ▁hake .
▁Mbali ▁Esau ▁kahita ▁yom kimbilila ▁Yakobo , ▁na ▁kam ge leka ▁isi ngo ▁na ▁kamnonela , ▁na ▁wose ▁waidi ▁wa lila .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁weli bule ▁chilema , ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁da ▁ng ' ombe , ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁maidi . ▁Wa nyama ▁wawo ▁weza kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁mhule ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁ving ' waji ▁ziza lavigwa ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁M i n ung ' ho ▁inogile ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁izo ▁iza ni nogeza ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁kamuuza ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Munhu ▁ija ▁yelihi ▁yo genda ▁mumgunda ▁yokwiza ▁kuchi ho we la ?” ▁M sang ' hani ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .” ▁Maabaho ▁Lebeka ▁kasola ▁chitambala ▁kai gubika ▁ichihanga .
▁Yosefu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Wa no ▁ni ▁wanangu , ▁woya ning ' hile ▁Mulungu ▁hano ▁Misili .” ▁Yakobo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni kwenhus ile ▁habehi ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kuwa temela ▁mate .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wano na ▁na ▁kutowa ▁mate ka , ▁wane ne ha , ▁wawa ▁na ▁ma tu pe ▁na ▁wa nogeza , ▁m aabaho ▁wa muleka ▁Mulungu ▁yawa umbile , ▁wam zeha ▁luwe ▁wa ▁ukombola ▁wawo .
▁ Nimulongelani ▁kuwa ▁mwiza danganika ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu . ▁One ▁hamu togole ▁kuwa ▁‘ Niye ▁Niiyo ’ ▁mwiza danganika ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .”
▁Wa ha wi ▁waja ▁wamulongela ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁“ S ang ' hano ▁ino ▁ka itenda ▁Mulungu !” ▁Mbali ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ka gendelela ▁kuwa ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala , ▁ha wategeleze ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile .
▁Ch eye ▁hachi tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Musa ▁viyatendile , ▁kachi gubika ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁kwa ▁chitambala , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁sekewa u wone ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁di kalile ▁do fi nyi li za .
▁One ▁hamu muhulika ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mwiza na ng igwa ▁fana ▁viyo wananga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yamwenga ▁haulongozi ▁wenu .
▁Maabaho ▁ mulongele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁‘ Ni di lava ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yangu ▁ fungu ▁jelile , ▁ni weng ' ha ▁Walawi ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁wachiwa ▁na ▁wagane , ▁fana ▁viu ni lagilize ▁nitende . ▁S ib eni le ▁malagilizo ▁yako ▁hebu ▁si zimize .
▁Bahobaho ▁viwa komeleze ▁kuja , ▁meso ▁yawo ▁ya gubuligwa ▁na ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wa ukengele , ▁ivo ▁wa sola ▁mayani ▁wa yawala .
▁Wa fika ▁kaidi ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yoi ta ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁walala ▁wa mwitila .
▁ B u ga ▁sekemuje , ▁iyo ▁ko se lu la ▁ mbali ▁mapaga ▁yake ▁ha yaigol ile ▁ banzi ▁mbili , ▁iyo ▁kumwenu ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁“ Yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya hulike ▁yaja ▁Muhe ▁yo o walongela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Mwiza i di la ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ko ▁na ▁ha ▁wanago , ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁ziya laviligw e ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁kwaviya ▁ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vini lagilizigwe .
▁Maabaho , ▁“ Ha nhu ▁haja ▁howa longiligwe , ▁‘ m weye ▁si ▁wangu ,’ ▁baho ▁weza tangigwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁ngima .”
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ni ▁mu h umigwe ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu . ▁M weye ▁mwiza hita ▁kuwatowa ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁imwe , ▁ mbali ▁mwiza wa kimbila ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁saba . ▁Na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁u si sa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁sili ▁yake ▁i manyike ▁kumwetu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile . ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁ko pekul a ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁hata ▁vovi fisigwe ▁kuson hela ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁yo ha mtowa ▁na ▁kum ng ' o la ▁dizi no ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike , ▁kolondeka ▁ya muleke ▁ya segele ▁kwa ▁ku ilegeha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zino ▁jake .
▁Mwiza temeligw a ▁mate ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zose . ▁Vi mwili ▁ha kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁yondaya we ▁ha lela .
▁ mbali ▁be ge t e ▁da ▁ugima ▁uno , ▁uvwizi ▁wa ▁vinhu , ▁na ▁ku londa ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga , ▁vo y ibebenyek a ▁mbuli ▁m baka ▁i p o t we ▁ku lela .
▁M gati ▁mwa ▁iwa ja ▁wowa chi hulike ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁imwe ▁yo mdumba ▁Mulungu . ▁Zi na ▁jake ▁L i diya , ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁ko lawa ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Si ya ti la . ▁Iyo ▁kakala ▁ko chuuza ▁viwalo ▁vi dung ' hu ▁va ▁hela ▁nyingi . ▁Mndewa ▁ka fungula ▁moyo ▁wake ▁na ▁ka hokela ▁yaja ▁yoyalongile ▁Paulo .
▁N hu la nyi ka ▁di mwihila ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁na ▁di hita ▁kwii towa ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁welesi ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁ni ▁waja ▁wose ▁wo tegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kulava ▁usindila ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁Petili ▁kamsondelela ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ichifungo , ▁ mbali ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁yoya tendigwe ▁na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ya kala ▁yo lawilila ▁kweli , ▁ila ▁ka gesa ▁ka wona ▁malaguso .
▁Kayafa ▁iyo ▁ija ▁yoya walongele ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi . ▁M uhavu ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yadanganike ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo , ▁wakala ▁ 3 , 2 00.
▁U m gunda ▁ni ▁isi ▁yose , ▁na ▁ziya ▁zim beyu ▁zinogile ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ma savu ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁M se de .
▁M weye ▁mu komboligwa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁muwa ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu ▁mu ya tende .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kasegela ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu , ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁N e b o , ▁ka kwela ▁kuna ▁ inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Pisiga ▁uli ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yeliko . ▁Uko ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulagusa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁kwandusi la ▁Gileadi ▁m baka ▁Dani ,
▁kawalongela , ▁“ One ▁muha di tegeleza ▁vinogile ▁dizi ▁jangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁na ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁na ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁niye ▁siza mgalile ni ▁matamu ▁yaja ▁yoni wagalile ▁Wamisili . ▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoni muhonya ni .”
▁Ha nhu ▁ha ▁Wakanaani ▁ha ndusil a ▁Sidoni ▁kuhita ▁Gelali ▁m baka ▁kufika ▁ G a za ▁na ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kuhita ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁na ▁Adi ma ▁na ▁Se b o i mu ▁m baka ▁L a s ha .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁wana ▁vi ti ti ▁lusita ▁lose ▁wonda ▁ko ng ' ha ▁ to mbo , ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁m olondeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ng ' hilu ▁ya ▁moto mbo ▁ya ▁chimuhe ▁haya ha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mazi , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kukala ▁na ▁kukomboligwa ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁va ndikigwe ▁kwa ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁Mulungu , ▁vi kala ▁va ndikigwa ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zo ya mulongeleni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kumulima ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁siku ▁ya ▁m ting ' hano .
▁Wa ja ▁Mulungu ▁wo yawala hile ▁ng ' o ▁kuwa ▁haweza kwingila ▁muna ▁iha nhu ▁hake ▁ha ▁kuhumula ▁hoya wa sasalil e ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welihi ? ▁Ni ▁waja ▁hawa mtegeleze .
▁Ivo ▁ivo ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wam ke we za , ▁walonga ,
▁Na ▁chi londeka ▁kwa ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁yo kwika ▁goya ▁ni ▁kwaminika .
▁ H ila ▁ka mbwelela ▁Yuda ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Si muwonile ▁bule . ▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁walonga ▁kuwa ▁hano ▁ha ha kalile ▁na ▁muke ▁malaya .”
▁Hebu ▁wano ▁wenyewo ▁na wa longe ▁dihile ▁dilihi ▁do wa di wonile ▁kumwangu ▁viya ▁vini mile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichitala ,
▁Yakobo ▁ka muwonela ▁ludoko ▁Laheli ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Si daha ▁kusola ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁Y eye ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁ya ku ki mili le ▁weye ▁sekeu pate ▁wana .”
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁Daudi ▁kakala ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kavimanya ▁chiya ▁Mulungu ▁chiya mulongele . ▁Mulungu ▁ka ilaha ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁kezamtenda ▁imwe ▁muna ▁welesi ▁wake ▁ya kale ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyakalile ▁Daudi .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tenda ▁vitasa ▁vake ▁saba ▁na ▁ma ko le o ▁yake ▁na ▁vya no ▁vake ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile .
▁Ye se ▁kamwelek a ▁Mfalume ▁Daudi , ▁Mfalume ▁Daudi ▁kamwelek a ▁Solomoni , ▁mami ▁yake ▁niiyo ▁yoya kalile ▁muke ▁wa ▁U li ya .
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁mwiza mtendela ▁dugila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁hanhu ▁hondayahasagule , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁vimu handile ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zomu sang ' hana . ▁Ivo ▁mwiza de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁“ M ulume ▁yoyose ▁sekeya mbandame ▁muke ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁muladi ▁sekeya m gume ▁chinyala ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Mbali ▁ha wawonile ▁ukalangama ▁wowose , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wema ▁kulava ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁uvwizi . ▁Hamwande ▁weza ▁wa kalangama ▁waidi .
▁“ Ni msagula ▁Bezaleli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁U li , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁Hu li , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda ,
▁Lelo ▁mu yepule ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vi ta mbi kiligwe ▁nyang ' hiti . ▁Sekemu je ▁damu , ▁sekemuje ▁nyama ▁zi fi di gwe ▁na ▁sekemu tende ▁u ashelati . ▁Muha ye pula ▁na ▁yayo ▁mo tenda ▁yanogile .”
▁M we zi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu , ▁kwandusi la ▁ichigulogulo ▁cha ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ya ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁imwe ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Pet a ▁yose ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁i kala ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁m alongo ▁maidi , ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁m alongo ▁maidi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁zawo ▁za ▁usage ▁na ▁ wanaluti ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁kamwidika , ▁‘ Mwanangu , ▁lusita ▁lwose ▁kukala ▁na ▁niye , ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi ni li ▁nacho ▁ni ▁chako .
▁Maabaho ▁Mfalume ▁keza walongela ▁waja ▁weli ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume , ▁‘ Izoni ▁mweye ▁womu temiligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁ hokele ni ▁ufalume ▁uni funga nyi ligwe ▁kwandusi la ▁isi ▁vi i lumbigwe .
▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Ni walongela , ▁ mbali ▁ha mulondile ▁kutegeleza . ▁Lelo ▁mwo londa ▁kuhulika ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁kaidi ? ▁Hebu ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwo londa ▁muwe ▁wanahina ▁wake ?”
▁Wayahudi ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Hachi ku towa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁kwaviya ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza , ▁ mbali ▁chi ku towa ▁kwaviya ▁ku muliga ▁Mulungu ! ▁W eye ▁kwa ▁munhu , ▁ mbali ▁kwo longa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .”
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha gezigwa , ▁sekeya longe , ▁“ No gezigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu .” ▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁hadaha ▁ku gezigwa ▁na ▁wihi , ▁wala ▁yeye ▁ham geza ▁munhu ▁yoyose .
▁ Siku ▁chidogo ▁hamwande , ▁Maliya ▁kahita ▁hima ▁hima ▁m baka ▁bululu ▁dili ▁mui mili ma ▁ya ▁Yudeya .
▁Maabaho ▁ka tenda ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge ▁ya ▁kwi mizil a ▁dihema .
▁“ I hawa ▁mndele ▁yaha soligwa ▁yaha mala ▁kwika ▁chilagano ▁hebu ▁kai funga ▁kwa ▁chilaho ▁chake ▁ bila ▁ku gesa
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo gendelela ▁ko ng ' he zigwa ▁matombo ▁yang ' hali ▁mwana ▁ching ' hele , ▁ha vimanya ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁viwa komeleze ▁ kwimba ▁wila , ▁wahita ▁kumulima ▁wa ▁Mizaituni .
▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁ chigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila ▁kwiza mulavila ▁nhambiko ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁fana ▁vi utendile ▁imitondo , ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁moto ▁wiza ni nogeza ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁yeye ▁ko kuwa ▁kalumb igwa ▁sambi . ▁Mbuli ▁za ▁umwaka ▁zose gela , ▁mbuli ▁za ▁sambi ▁zo kwiza .
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mkoma ▁munhu ▁kezatagusigwa ▁ifa ▁kwa ▁usindila ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁kufosa ▁baho . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁hadaha ▁ku tagusigwa ▁ifa ▁kwa ▁usindila ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe .
▁Ko kala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Saimoni ▁yo sang ' hana ▁mbende , ▁yoyo kala ▁habehi ▁na ▁bahali .”
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Nimulongelani ▁ mala ▁kuwa ▁iyo ▁niye . ▁One ▁mwo ni zahila ▁niye , ▁wa lekeni ▁wano ▁wahite .”
▁Lelo ▁uhasanyi ▁uha mala ▁ku lekeleligwa , ▁haiza londeka ▁kaidi ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁za ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi .
▁Ch a hi ma hi ma ▁kaya guma ▁yamazi ▁ya ▁ino ngo ▁yake ▁muna ▁dizi ga ▁da ▁kung ' wila ▁zing a miya , ▁na ▁kakimbila ▁kuna ▁inzasa ▁kude ha ▁mazi ▁yamwenga ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ngamiya ▁wake ▁wose .
▁Maabaho ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁ya ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁saba , ▁ili ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Ku ilumba , ▁mwiza mtuma ▁munhu ▁ya towe ▁mhalati ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .
▁Iviya ▁ha sang ' hani lwa ▁kwa ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁ko londa ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ko weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ugima ▁na ▁muhe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁“ Sekemu m geze ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimu m gezile ▁kuja ▁Masa .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Ha no ▁cha mwi i chuwala , ▁iza patik a ▁kulihi ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ku we g u ti za ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ?”
▁Maabaho ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza sola ▁vihande ▁viya ▁va ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ditwi ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta , ▁na ▁kwika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ngodi ▁zi wa duganye ▁hana ▁ulupango .
▁“ One ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁waha mwihila ni ▁mweye , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁mo si ▁wa ni hila ▁niye .
▁“ L agilizo ▁dino ▁m olondeka ▁mudi zindilile ▁siku ▁zose . ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wesaba , ▁mweye ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wowo kala ▁kumwenu , ▁siku ▁iyo ▁m olondeka ▁mu funge ▁na ▁muleke ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ One ▁waha londa ▁uwe ▁goya ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁chinhu , ▁ hita ▁uka chuuze ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁viu li ▁navo , ▁m aabaho ▁weng ' he ▁hela ▁ngayengaye , ▁na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ngama ▁kuulanga . ▁Maabaho ▁ wize ▁uni sondelele .”
▁“ ▁‘ Zindilil eni ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ▁yose ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁zose , ▁bule ivo ▁mwiza de kigwa ▁na ▁isi ▁yoni mgala ni .
▁N hu ng we ▁vi ila gale ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lago ▁ichilo , ▁mana ▁ila gala ▁na ▁ nhu ng we ▁iyo .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁ka mzahila ▁luti ▁iyo ▁yoya lavigwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁ka to la ▁kuwa ▁ka timbuligwa ▁kamala . ▁Ivo ▁ka wehila ▁ng ' hani ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁wowa sigale . ▁Kawauza ,
▁Ka mulekela ▁yowa mulondile , ▁ija ▁ye kigwe ▁mchifungo ▁kwaviya ▁kowa kong ' hela ▁wanhu ▁wa itowe ▁muna ▁u u falume ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁kamulava ▁Yesu ▁yakomigwe ▁fana ▁viwa londile .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa gangamala ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ko wa kong ' hela ▁wanhu ▁wa itowe ▁muna ▁u u falume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁yake ▁kuson gela ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Yudeya , ▁ka ndusil a ▁Galilaya ▁m baka ▁kuno .”
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁yoi saguligwe ▁Helode ▁kayawala ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁va ▁chifalume ▁na ▁kakala ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁chake ▁cha ▁ufalume , ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kamulongela ▁Filipo , ▁“ Hita ▁habehi ▁na ▁di to lo li ▁ijo ▁na ▁u kale ▁habehi ▁najo .”
▁na ▁chi mha nga ▁ huwa ▁na ▁modeli ▁zose ▁za ▁masumula ,
▁Viyakomeleze ke ▁yayo ▁ni wawona ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wane ▁wema ▁muna ▁zim banzi ▁nne ▁za ▁isi ▁yose , ▁wo zi kimilila ▁m he ho ▁nne ▁za ▁mwiisi , ▁muladi ▁mbeho ▁seke zi dahe ▁ku bu ma ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁bahali ▁hebu ▁muna ▁di biki ▁jojose .
▁Abeli ▁nayo ▁ka gala ▁nyama ▁inogile ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kwelekigwa ▁kuwa ▁nhosa . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanogel wa ▁na ▁Abeli ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake .
▁Ka lagusa ▁kuwa ▁ka ba hano ▁kwa ▁yanogile ▁yoyatendile ▁viyatendile , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁mvula ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁mavuno ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwake , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndiya ▁nyingi ▁na ▁kuwa de ng ' hele za ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu .”
▁Mbuli ▁zi fisigwe ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo ▁ziza la g u sigwa ▁funhufunhu , ▁na ▁keza tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁kutambika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁keza longa , ▁“ Kweli ▁Mulungu ▁ka ba hano ▁hagati ▁yenu !”
▁Na ▁niye ▁nizawa tuma ▁wa senga ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kuwa sola ▁waja ▁woni wa sagule ▁mwii ▁isi ▁yose , ▁kulawa ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁m baka ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga .
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁kuna ▁ulwivi , ▁luwa ▁lwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili .
▁Vi bawo ▁ivo ▁vi kala ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁mwa ndi ko ▁wa ndikigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁womulamsani . ▁Walamse ▁wahuwila ▁wayetu ▁wowo chi londa ▁muna ▁uhuwilo . ▁No wapulile ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kai gombela ▁mwenyewo , ▁“ Si banange ▁mbuli ▁ha chanyha ▁ha ▁Yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Wayahudi ▁hebu ▁ha chanyha ▁ha ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁ha chanyha ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Loma .”
▁“ Sol a ▁fimbo ▁uka wa duganye ▁wanhu , ▁weye ▁na ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁Haluni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁m ting ' hano . ▁U longele ▁luwe ▁uja ▁uli ▁haulongozi ▁yawo ▁u lave ▁mazi ▁yake . ▁Kwiza ya gala ▁mazi ▁ya lawile ▁muna ▁uluwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁m ting ' hano , ▁ivo ▁wawo ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁wodaha ▁kung ' wa .”
▁Viya fikile , ▁kawatum bali za ▁mavindi ▁iwa nga miya ▁habehi ▁na ▁disima ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dibululu , ▁i kala ▁ichigulogulo , ▁chip indi ▁wanaake ▁wohita ▁kuna ▁disima ▁kude ha ▁mazi .
▁“ Wapete ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Gelishoni ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo .
▁Kaidi ▁sekemuje ▁damu ▁yoyose , ▁iwe ▁ya ▁ndege ▁hebu ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁hohose ▁homukala .
▁Kwa viya ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cha ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁cha ndikigwa ▁muladi ▁kuchi fundiza ▁cheye , ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁kufunya umo yo ▁na ▁ku gumigw a ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁chi dahe ▁kuwa ▁na ▁lolelo .
▁Yesu ▁ka komeleza ▁kwa ▁kuwalongela , ▁“ Ka leni ▁meso , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁ham vimanyile ▁siku ▁wala ▁saa .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Vino ▁siku longele ▁one ▁waha huwila ▁kwiza wona ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Mbali ▁viwa kalile ▁hawana komeleza ▁kuja ▁nyama , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wehila ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ka wagalila ▁ hulo ▁kulu .
▁Wa nhu ▁vi wawonile ▁mauzauza ▁yoya tendigwe ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Kweli ▁ino ▁iyo ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yokwiza ▁muna ▁isi .”
▁Waisilaili ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wawo ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁uko ▁ O b o si .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yeli ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁yaha kigwe ▁mavuta ▁yondaya sole ▁sang ' hano ▁yake , ▁keza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁iyo , ▁ijo ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose . ▁N hosa ▁yose ▁iza timbuligwa .
▁Ku woneka ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁uja ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁moto ▁wou lunguza ▁ha chanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁muna ▁yameso ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁ma se kulu ▁wa ▁Esau ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hawo , ▁nawo ▁ni ▁T i mi na ▁na ▁Ali v a ▁na ▁Ye t e ti
▁Laheli ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ino ▁hano ▁mtumwa ▁wangu ▁Biliha , ▁i bandame ▁nayo ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁wana ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu . ▁Ivo ▁niza kuwa ▁mama ▁kufose la ▁yeye .”
▁“ ▁‘ Mu ha komeleza ▁kugobola ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu , ▁mwiza tenda ▁dugila ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁kwandusi la ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁saba . ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁izakuwa ▁siku ▁ya ▁kuhumula , ▁na ▁siku ▁ye nane ▁iviya ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁kuhumula .
▁“ Tat i ▁yangu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vose . ▁Na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya mmanyile ▁Mwana , ▁ mbali ▁Tata ▁yaidumwe , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya mmanyile ▁Tata , ▁ mbali ▁Mwana ▁yaidumwe , ▁na ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wana ▁wo yolonda ▁kuwa fu n u lila .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa gala ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vose ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁viya ▁Musa ▁viyawalagilize . ▁ B umbila ▁jose ▁wahita ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Bahobaho ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁viwa lekele ligwe , ▁wa di bwelela ▁ bumbila ▁jawo ▁na ▁wawalongela ▁chiya ▁chiwa longeligwe ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁magogogo ▁na ▁walala .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁moyo ▁wangu ▁wo londa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁no mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁Waisilaeli ▁wayangu ▁wa komboligwe .
▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Cho ni longa ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁za b i hu ▁zowo lava ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁wowa lavila ▁vinyamkela , ▁si ▁Mulungu ▁bule . ▁Na ▁si londa ▁mweye ▁m uilumb e ▁na ▁vinyamkela .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁diyelo ▁katogola ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁fana ▁viya ilahile ▁na ▁kuwa ▁m olondeka ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁na ▁mu mtegeleze ▁yeye .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁chinhu ▁ko kong e zi ligwa , ▁ mbali ▁ija ▁yeli ▁bule ▁keza ho kigwa ▁m baka ▁chiya ▁ichi dodo ▁chiyeli ▁nacho .
▁Wa nhu ▁kulawa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza ▁Misili ▁ku gula ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁Yosefu , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemu tende ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku .
▁One ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁waja ▁ha weng izigwe ▁ulungwana , ▁wo tenda ▁fana ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁viyolonda , ▁vino ▁Mulungu ▁heza wa peta ▁kuwa ▁wengi zigwa ▁ulungwana ?
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Na wo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Hachi daha ▁bule ▁m baka ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wose ▁wawe ▁hano , ▁na ▁dibwe ▁di bimbilis we ▁mwii chisima , ▁m aabaho ▁chowa ng ' wiza ▁mazi ▁ng ' hondolo .”
▁Kulaw a ▁kwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁ka pata ▁shekel i ▁1 , 3 6 5 ▁ya ▁hela , ▁fana ▁viili ▁ningo ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁im gane ▁keza muhitila ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁walala ▁wa ▁bululu , ▁kezam vula ▁chila tu ▁chake ▁chimwe ▁na ▁kum bwajulil a ▁mate ▁muna ▁ichihanga ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁‘ Vino ▁ni ivo ▁viyo londeka ▁kutend igwa ▁munhu ▁yo lema ▁kui ge nde sa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁se kulu ▁wake .’
▁Niye ▁nina ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike . ▁No gala ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁kumwako ▁mwenevale ▁muladi ▁ni togole ke ▁haulongozi ▁wako .’ ▁”
▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁muna ▁isi ▁yili ▁habehi ▁na ▁Kaisaliya ▁Filipi , ▁kawauza ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wolonga ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁yelihi ?”
▁Yaha komeleza ▁kung ' wa ▁mazi , ▁one ▁yaha mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁ku leka ▁kwaminika ▁kwa ▁mulumake , ▁mazi ▁yayo ▁yoyo gala ▁ duwilo ▁yeza mgalila ▁mawine ▁makulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁mu nda ▁wawe ▁wiza mema ▁na ▁heza lela . ▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁ duwilo ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁juma , ▁chi iting ' hana ▁muladi ▁chi je ▁ndiya ▁hamwe . ▁Paulo ▁kalonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁m baka ▁chilo ▁chikulu , ▁kwaviya ▁kasegela ▁siku ▁isondelele .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁mudi lu ndo ▁da ▁Wayahudi ▁wa londa ▁mbuli ▁wa dahe ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu , ▁ mbali ▁ha wawonile .
▁Wa fundize ▁walala ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kuwa ▁ wolondeka ▁wawe ▁na ▁kulinganya ▁na ▁wawe ▁na ▁ugen zi ▁unogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wawe ▁na ▁ubala , ▁we me ▁chigangamavu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ulondo ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo .
▁Wa segela ▁ Dib oni ▁Gadi ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Ali mo ni ▁Di bila sa i mu .
▁Maabaho ▁wa muliga ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁mwanahina ▁wake ! ▁Ch eye ▁cha ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Musa !
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁“ Ku nihuwila ▁kwa ko ▁ku kukombola . ▁ Hita ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Yuda ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁chodaha ▁kulonga ▁choni ?” ▁ Chodaha ze ▁kulema ? ▁“ Chodaha ze ▁kui gombela ? ▁Mulungu ▁ka lagusa ▁ubananzi ▁wetu . ▁Lelo ▁cheye ▁chose ▁na ▁ija ▁ya to ligwe ▁na ▁nhungo ▁yako , ▁cha wa tumwa ▁wako .”
▁nawo ▁wahuwila . ▁Viwa hulike ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka we zila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁kuwa lola ▁viya ▁viwo i gaza ▁chiu se de , ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁wa mtosela ▁Mulungu .
▁Kalonga ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi nyamkela ▁mu lawe ▁munhu ▁ino !”
▁One ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yaha mu lumiza ▁ng ' ombe ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kumkoma , ▁wene ▁ng ' ombe ▁weza m chuuza ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁im gima ▁na ▁kui golela ▁zi hela , ▁iviya ▁weza i golela ▁ng ' ombe ▁yafile .
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁nohita ▁Yelusalemu ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁uko .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Ku lihi ▁Mndewa ?” ▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ H o ho se ▁heli ▁na ▁ ki ga , ▁baho ▁honda ▁waiting ' hane ▁vi lele .”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Asheli ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁I mi na ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁I shi vi ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Be li a .
▁Walonga ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁wa muwona ▁Tilo fi mo ▁kulawa ▁Efeso ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Paulo ▁muna ▁dibululu , ▁na ▁wa gesa ▁kuwa ▁Paulo ▁kamwing iza ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁ha tangigwa ▁Ko lo ngo ▁da ▁Eshikoli ▁kwaviya ▁Waisilaili ▁wa kanha ▁chip a mbo ▁chiya ▁hanhu ▁baho .
▁Na ▁kamulongela ▁im ulume , ▁“ Ku mtegeleza ▁muke ▁wako ▁na ▁kuja ▁ tunda ▁di nikulongele ▁sekeu je . ▁Kwa ▁chiya ▁chi utendile , ▁isi ▁i duwiligwa . ▁Kwiza tenda ▁sang ' hano ▁ndala ▁siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wako ▁muladi ▁kupata ▁ndiya ▁i faya .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁hawa longile ▁chochose . ▁Yesu ▁kamwamha ▁munhu ▁ija ▁na ▁ka muhonya , ▁m aabaho ▁ka muleka ▁yahite .
▁Wa wawona ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamwenga ▁woja ▁ndiya ▁kuno ▁makono ▁hayana wigwe , ▁hawana wile ▁makono ▁fana ▁Mafalisayo ▁viwo londa ▁wanhu ▁wana we .
▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kana ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko , ▁kwaviya ▁kana ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake .
▁Maabaho ▁ka mwikila ▁chi fuko ▁chiya ▁cha ▁muimhambaga , ▁na ▁muna ▁ichi fuko ▁icho ▁ka guma ▁U li mu ▁na ▁S u mi mu .
▁Mbali ▁novimanya ▁hata ▁sambi ▁Mulungu ▁kezakw i na ▁chochose ▁chonda u n pule .”
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuwa lava , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wa senga ▁waja ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kalonga , ▁“ K i mbi leni ▁muladi ▁mu honye ke . ▁Sekemu lole ▁kuchisogo ▁na ▁sekemwi me ▁muna ▁dibawe , ▁ kimbilile ni ▁muna ▁imilima ▁muladi ▁sekemu komigwe .”
▁“ Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ni ▁Walawi , ▁sekewa pate ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁isi ▁uko ▁Isilaili . ▁Wawo ▁wezakuja ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ulondo ▁ko funya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁ko taza , ▁ka bule ▁migongo ▁hebu ▁ma to p a ▁na ▁ha igoda .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yoya hulike ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁ka iuzagiza ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake , ▁“ Mwana ▁ino ▁keza kuwa ▁mwana ▁wa ki ?” ▁I o ne ka ▁kweli ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁ya hamwe ▁nayo .

▁Hamwande ▁chidogo ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁baho ▁wamuhitila ▁Petili ▁wamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wawo , ▁ulonzi ▁wako ▁wochi lagusa .”
▁Viya kalile ▁mwiinzila , ▁ka iting ' hana ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wake , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mwana go ▁ka hona !”
▁Mana ▁Mulungu ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁muha ja ▁matunda ▁yayo ▁meso ▁yenu ▁yeza gubuligwa ▁na ▁mwiza kuwa ▁fana ▁yeye ▁na ▁mwiza manya ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁na yahulike ▁yaja ▁Muhe ▁yoyo walongela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁ mbali ▁wa tendeleni ▁vino ▁muladi ▁vondawa vi kwenhukile ▁vinhu ▁velile ▁ng ' hani ▁wawe ▁wagima ▁na ▁sekewa danganike . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza kwingila ▁mgati ▁na ▁ku msagula ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁na ▁mbahasha ▁yake .
▁Wa lole ni ▁ndege ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁hawa handa ▁wala ▁hawa gobola ▁wala ▁wabule ▁ gulu ▁jojose , ▁ mbali ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ko weng ' ha ▁ndiya . ▁Vino ▁mo gesa ▁mweye ▁hamu londeka ▁kuwa fosa ▁wawo ?
▁Viwa mgalile ▁ndiya , ▁msang ' hani ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁“ Siza kuja ▁bule ▁m baka ▁ni longe ▁mbuli ▁yangu .” ▁Labani ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ha ya ▁ longa .”
▁Di t wi ▁dimwe ▁da ▁diya ▁ding ' ho nyo ▁dikali ▁di woneka ▁kuwa ▁di lu mizigwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁ mbali ▁chi londa ▁chi kala ▁chikulu ▁ng ' hani ▁cha ▁kudumbiza ▁chochi gala ▁ifa ▁ mbali ▁chi londa ▁icho ▁chi ho ni le . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁isi ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo ▁na ▁kudi sondelela ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo .
▁ Hita ▁kuna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁iwa lu ti ▁uni galile ▁ wanaluti ▁waidi ▁wanogile ▁muladi ▁ni mwa mbi kile ▁ tati ▁yako ▁ndiya ▁inogile ▁yoya i londa ga ▁ng ' hani .
▁Waisilaili ▁wa sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁zose ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁mwiza longa , ▁‘ Chi ja ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁muna ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁yetu !’
▁“ Hamwande ▁mwanago ▁yaha ku uza ▁fambulo ▁da ▁chinhu ▁chino , ▁kwiza mulongela , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi lava ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake ▁mkulu , ▁kachi segeza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kochi kalile ▁watumwa .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁wana ▁nguvu , ▁mabululu ▁yawo ▁yano ga ▁na ▁makulu ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ya na ▁mhongono . ▁Iviya ▁uko ▁chi wawona ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Ana ki ▁weli ▁wa tali ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wawatum a ▁wa senga ▁wahite ▁kwa ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Waamoli ▁wa kamulongele ,
▁Nhambiko ▁yako ▁ya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁yo daha ▁kuwa ▁ino ga ▁kweli , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁haiza wa gangamiza ▁bule .
▁Iviya ▁kwiza son ela ▁vitan zi ▁va ▁buluu ▁mui m hindo ▁ya ▁dipanzia ▁da ▁uhelelo ▁da ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mwanduso , ▁iviya ▁kwiza s hona ▁vitan zi ▁kuuhelelo ▁wa ▁m hindo ▁ya ▁kunze ▁ya ▁chi hande ▁chimwenga ▁cha ▁panzia .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yaha kuwona ▁weye ▁uli ▁na ▁umanyi ▁kukala ▁hasi ▁ha indi ya ▁mgati ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁kutambikila ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁lungilo ▁nyondenyonde ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁keza gumigw a ▁moyo ▁wa ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁iyo ▁i ta mbi kiligwe ▁nyang ' hiti .
▁Niza walekelela ▁wihi ▁wawo ▁na ▁heza u gesa ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁bule .”
▁Iviya ▁ya longigwa ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Munhu ▁yelihi ▁m baka ▁um kumbuke , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yelihi ▁m baka ▁u mwi ke ▁goya ?
▁Ivo ▁vondani we ▁na ▁mweye ▁kaidi , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kuigodela ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁Chilisito ▁cha ya nitendele ▁niye .
▁Na ▁kwa ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁ mwing ' heni ▁hewela ▁Tata , ▁yoya mtendile ni ▁mweye ▁muwe ▁na ▁hanhu ▁henu ▁ha ▁uhazi ▁uya wekile ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁muna ▁u u falume ▁wa ▁bu ng ' hulo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Sambi ▁notenda ▁lagano . ▁Ha ulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁niza tenda ▁mauzauza ▁yaja ▁hayana lawilila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁hebu ▁muna ▁di kabila ▁jojose . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁womu kala ▁nawo ▁weza wona ▁sang ' hano ▁zangu ▁ng ' hulu . ▁Mana ▁niza tenda ▁na ▁weye ▁mbuli ▁za ▁mauzauza ▁na ▁za ▁kudumbiza .
▁“ Walongele ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁‘ Mu isi la ili ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁yaha lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Wa fika ▁dibwe ▁diya ▁diwa gubike ▁muna ▁dileme ▁di bimbilis igwa ▁hata li ▁na ▁mulomo ▁wa ▁dileme .
▁Maabaho ▁ni muwona ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁imwenga ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁ko humuluka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga . ▁Ka ya wa zigwa ▁wingu ▁na ▁ pinde ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake , ▁na ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi kala ▁fana ▁zuwa , ▁na ▁migulu ▁yake ▁i kala ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁za ▁moto .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁ka lawilila ▁muladi ▁ya u segeze ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu . ▁Na ▁mgati ▁yake ▁ mwabule ▁uhasanyi .
▁Kwiza hokela ▁maliho ▁yayo ▁ya ▁kuilumba ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁kwiza ya sang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁yawe ▁lukumbuso ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁kuwatendela ni ▁kuilumba .”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza wona ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ni ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁mwenyewo , ▁nawo ▁weza mdumba ni .
▁Bahobaho ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁chinyamkela ▁kengila ▁mwii ▁kaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁na ▁ka guta ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ,
▁“ Mu sa ▁kasegela ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁ka mpula ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ G u bule ni ▁makono ▁yenu ▁na ▁mu mwa zi me ▁chiya si ▁chi yolonda ▁ bila ▁kuwa ngilizigwa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁waja ▁na ▁we guta . ▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wa ya do ndo le za ▁ya masigavu ▁na ▁wa memez a ▁vi gelo ▁saba .
▁Kwa viya ▁wa uko ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁haswa ▁waja ▁wa lawile ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁kumsondelela ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁Chiyahudi ▁wo lema ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁walangulizi ▁na ▁ku wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁kwa ▁ubozi ▁wawo .
▁Mu lo nd wa ▁wangu , ▁no ku londe la ▁u kale ▁goya ▁na ▁uwe ▁na ▁ugima ▁unogile , ▁fana ▁muhe ▁wako ▁viu gendelela ▁vinogile .
▁Yesu ▁ka lola ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ I zakuwa ▁vi dala ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Vi zi malile ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁wabwela ▁kulawa ▁kui pelemba ▁isi .
▁Tata ▁mwenyewo , ▁iyo ▁yanhumile ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁zangu . ▁Hamu na wahi ▁bule ▁kuhulika ▁dizi ▁jake ▁wala ▁kuwona ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁lusita ▁lw o l wo se .
▁Kwiza chi haka ▁zahabu ▁yelile , ▁ubanzi ▁wake ▁wa ▁uchanyha ▁na ▁ banzi ▁zake ▁zose ▁na ▁m ahembe ▁yake , ▁iviya ▁kwiza i tendela ▁lu ki ngo ▁lwa ▁zahabu .
▁Mbali ▁sekemuje ▁mnyama ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁mapaga ▁yake ▁ha yaigol ile ▁ banzi ▁mbili ▁na ▁ha se lu la . ▁Sekemu je ▁ng a mi a ▁na ▁bu ga ▁na ▁ pe lele , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁wose lu la ▁ mbali ▁mapaga ▁yawo ▁ha yaigol ile ▁ banzi ▁mbili . ▁Wawo ▁kumwenu ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Pet i ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wa mbu nhu lila ▁yameso . ▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi lole !”
▁Na ▁ma gi dimi lo ▁ya ▁ma ko lo ngo ▁yayo ▁ku gidimila ▁bululu ▁da ▁Ali ▁na ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁Moabu .”
▁sekeyawe ▁m kolwa ▁wala ▁ mtowa ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁yawe ▁munhu ▁muhole ▁na ▁yo londa ▁tindiwalo , ▁iviya ▁sekeyawe ▁munhu ▁wa ▁ku me lela ▁mate ▁hela .
▁Chilisito ▁kakala ▁Mulungu ▁kweli , ▁ mbali ▁ha gesile ▁kuwa ▁ku linga ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kuna na hila ▁kwa ▁ludabwa .
▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁L a ma se si ▁kwa ▁u ga lu ▁ng ' hani ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Wamisili , ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁siku ▁dimwe ▁vidi malile ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka .
▁Nomulongelani ▁vino ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya m vwizi leni ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi , ▁zozi woneka ▁zino ga ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁kowa lola ▁goya ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko tegeleza ▁nhambiko ▁zawo , ▁ mbali ▁ko wehila ▁waja ▁wo tenda ▁yehile .”
▁Wa sang ' hani ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wadumba ▁na ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa wagala ▁watumwa ▁wawo ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁muna ▁ikaye .
▁M i melo ▁yawo ▁iwa ▁fana ▁maleme ▁ya g u bu ke ▁m ili mi ▁yawo ▁yolonga ▁uvwizi . ▁Muna ▁imi lomo ▁yawo ▁mo lawa ▁mbuli ▁zili ▁na ▁ sungu ▁fana ▁da ▁zoka .
▁Mbali ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ wima ▁chigangamavu ▁fana ▁viya ▁dibwe ▁da ▁chandusilo , ▁na ▁kuchanyha ▁yake ▁kwa ndikigwa ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁za ▁chilaguso , ▁“ Mndewa ▁ka wamanya ▁wanhu ▁wake ” ▁na ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wose ▁woi longa ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁wa leke ▁mbuli ▁zihile .”
▁Ivo ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chi li s to ▁wakala ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁Galilaya ▁na ▁Samaliya . ▁Kwa ▁nhazo ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁wa pata ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kongezeka ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁viwa gendelele ▁ku muhulika ▁Mndewa .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo nihuwila ▁niye , ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ N ya nda ▁za ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Ugima ▁ziza ki lima ▁kulawa ▁mgati ▁yake .’ ▁”
▁Y eye ▁ hali ngile ▁fana ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁magogogo ▁wamwenga , ▁halondile ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁chila ▁siku ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu . ▁Ka lava ▁nhosa ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁viya i lavile ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo .
▁Mbali ▁Chilisito ▁keza ▁kuwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁yoyo sang ' hana ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁ziya ▁zi lawilile ▁sambi , ▁yeye ▁kengila ▁muna ▁di zewe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁dinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁hai hu ng i kiligwe ▁na ▁chochose , ▁ zewe ▁ijo ▁hadi zengigw e ▁na ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁siyo ▁ zewe ▁da ▁isi ▁ino ▁i lumbigwe .
▁Esau ▁kalonga , ▁“ Leka ▁niku lekele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wamwenga .” ▁Mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Sekeu sang ' hane ▁ivo . ▁ Vinoga ▁kumwangu ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁weye ▁mwenevale ▁wangu .”
▁Mbali ▁Yakobo ▁hamu lekele ▁bule ▁Benjamini ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁Yosefu ▁kuhita ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁kwaviya ▁kadumba ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁ku mu lumiza .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁wenu ▁weza chinjigwa ▁haulongozi ▁henu , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza la nza ▁hata ▁chi hande ▁chimwe . ▁Vi hongwe ▁wenu ▁weza soligwa ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu ▁na ▁hebu ▁haweza bwelezigwa . ▁Ng ' hondolo ▁wenu ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya dahe ▁ku mtaza ni
▁Ka wafika ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁kudibwilingu , ▁chuwala ▁muhala ▁chili ▁na ▁beho ▁kulu . ▁Kawa kaliza ▁na ▁kuwa lola ▁goya , ▁kawa tenda ▁fana ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ziso ▁jake .
▁Mbali ▁sekemu mtendele ▁fana ▁viya ▁munhu ▁yo mwihila , ▁ mbali ▁m zum eni ▁fana ▁viya ▁ndugu .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Midiani ▁wakala ▁ E fa ▁na ▁ E fe li ▁na ▁He no ki ▁na ▁Abida ▁na ▁Eli da wa . ▁Wo se ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Ke tula .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁mtawala ▁Helode ▁kahulika ▁nhogolwa ▁za ▁Yesu . ▁Ivo ▁kawalongela ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kazilibuka , ▁leka ▁ma a na ▁ludabwa ▁wake ▁wo sang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁mgati ▁yake .”
