▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁no walamba ▁muwa lole ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁wowa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wa i bagule , ▁na ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa gwe , ▁wa leka ▁kutegeleza ▁mafundizo ▁yo muhokele . ▁Mu yepule ▁nawo ,
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ M n he gele ze , ▁cho i ta ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Uko ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza tu ligwa ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo . ▁Na wo ▁weza mtagusa ▁ifa , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁weza m tula ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁Musa ▁ka mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁nokulamba ▁u mu honye ▁Miliamu !”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Niye ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ugima . ▁Wa nhu ▁wowo kwiza ▁kumwangu ▁haweza wona ▁nzala ▁bule , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowo nihuwila ▁haweza wona ▁ni lu ▁bule .
▁U ching ' he ▁diyelo ▁ndiya ▁yetu ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mama , ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁ni ▁mkulu , ▁ivo ▁cho u londa ▁kwiza tende ligwa .” ▁L usita ▁luja lu ja ▁mndele ▁wake ▁ka hona .
▁Mbali ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁voni gesa ▁kuwa ▁voni ta , ▁no vi wona ▁kuwa ▁si ▁chinhu ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁Chilisito .
▁Munhu ▁yaha muwona ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁kotenda ▁uhasanyi ▁uja ▁wou mgala ▁kuna ▁ifa , ▁kolondeka ▁yam pulile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁keza mwing ' ha ▁ugima ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya p uli ligwe ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁yowa son hela ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁hau gala ▁kuna ▁ifa . ▁Wa baho ▁uhasanyi ▁wou mgala ▁kuna ▁ifa , ▁si longa ▁kuwa ▁mu pule ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho .
▁Ivo ▁wose ▁wa gumigw a ▁moyo , ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ka ja ▁ndiya .
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yahawa ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁hadaha ▁kuliha ▁hela ▁ya ▁kuikombola ▁mwenyewo , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kezagal igwa ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulola ▁goya ▁va ▁ku guligwa ▁kwake ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁vi yodaha ▁ija ▁ yekile ▁chilaho .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁kedika , ▁“ A weye ▁munhu ▁weye , ▁si chi manyile ▁bule ▁cho u longa !” ▁Bahobaho ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga , ▁nz ogolo ▁keka .
▁Wa falume ▁wa ▁isi ▁weza gala ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁hishima ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁ijo .
▁na ▁mbende ▁za ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁zi ha kigwe ▁ langi ▁ndu ng ' hu , ▁na ▁mbende ▁za ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali ▁na ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge ,
▁‘ M weye ▁wenyewo ▁ muwona ▁vini watendile ▁Wamisili ▁na ▁viya ▁vini msolile ni ▁fana ▁masumula ▁viyo sola ▁wanage ▁kwa ▁mabawa ▁yake , ▁ni mgala ni ▁kumwangu .
▁U ho le ▁wenu ▁u manyike ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose . ▁Mndewa ▁ka habehi ▁kubwela .
▁Kulaw a ▁uko ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Alinoni , ▁wou ki lima ▁mazi ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁kufose la ▁muna ▁ichuwala . ▁L wa nda ▁ulo ▁lu kala ▁m haka ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Wamoabu ▁na ▁Waamoli .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ha vi nogile ▁bule ▁munhu ▁kukala ▁yaidumwe . ▁Niza mu u sila ▁m tazi ▁yom faya .”
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Lebeka , ▁“ Mbwanga ▁imkulu ▁keza msang ' hanila ▁mbwanga ▁imdodo .”
▁Mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁utamu ▁uwo ▁u nitendile ▁ni wapetele ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁mwanza ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁Kwa viya ▁yayo ▁yezakuwa ▁siku ▁za ▁nhaguso ▁muladi ▁yaja ▁yose ▁ya ndikigwe ▁ya lawilile .
▁Cho mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁“ Ima ▁na ▁uhite , ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁u kuhonya .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁ Sekeudumbe ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cho onda ▁chi ku pate ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁manhesa . ▁ Nokulongela , ▁Mwihi ▁kezawa geza ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wenu ▁keza weka ▁muna ▁ichifungo . ▁U we ▁mwaminika ▁hata ▁ ihawa ▁m baka ▁kudanganika , ▁na ▁niye ▁nizakwing ' ha ▁kombelo ▁da ▁ugima .
▁Nowalondel a ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ chigulogulo , ▁ngalawa ▁i kala ▁mgati ▁mudilamba , ▁ mbali ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁yaidumwe ▁mwiisi ▁inyalile .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kofundiza ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ku petela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile . ▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walala ▁wa mwizila ,
▁“ No kwing ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vinogile ▁va ▁mwanduso ▁kugobola ▁va ▁Waisilaeli ▁vo wo ni lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mavuta ▁yanogile ▁na ▁divai ▁na ▁mhule .
▁Wo wa ba manya ▁na ▁kusola ▁kaye ▁za ▁wagane . ▁Ku yi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁wanoga , ▁wo tosa ▁nhosa ▁nhali . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁weza tagusigwa ▁nhaguso ▁ng ' hulu !”
▁Mwiza handa ▁mizabibu ▁mingi ▁na ▁kui hali la , ▁ mbali ▁hamwiza kwa ha ▁hebu ▁hamwiza kung ' wa ▁divai ▁yake , ▁kwaviya ▁wang ' onyo ▁wezakuja .
▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yondaya wataguse ▁mweye ? ▁Habule ! ▁Kwa viya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika , ▁m aabaho ▁ka zilibuligwa ▁kuwa danganike ! ▁Na ▁kokala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁nayo ▁niiyo ▁yochi tambikila ▁cheye .
▁Wa no ▁ni ▁wakulu ▁wowa lawile ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wa ▁Esau . ▁Elifazi ▁yoya kalile ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ka weleka ▁T ema ni ▁na ▁ O ma li ▁na ▁Ze f o ▁na ▁Ke na zi
▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁sambi ▁niza l wika ▁hamgwazo ▁lukuli ▁luno ▁lolu wola , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁viya ni laguse ▁funhufunhu .
▁Wa no ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁waja ▁Leya ▁woya mweleke le ▁Yakobo ▁kuja ▁Padani ▁Alamu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Dina ▁mndele ▁wake . ▁Pet e ▁ya ▁wanage , ▁wa ndele ▁zake ▁na ▁wabwanga ▁zake ▁wakala ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁watatu .
▁Maabaho ▁Masadukayo ▁wamwenga , ▁wanhu ▁wowo longa ▁kuwa ▁kwa bule ▁u zi li bu lo , ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁wamuuza ,
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁mweye ▁mo liha ▁kodi , ▁kwaviya ▁watawala ▁wawo ▁wo msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu , ▁yahawa ▁wo fikiza ▁viya ▁viilondeka .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Wa no ▁weza tenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁Mwanang ' hondolo , ▁ mbali ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁woya wa ta ngile ▁na ▁kuwa sagula ▁waja ▁weli ▁ waminika , ▁keza wahuma , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wa nde wa ▁na ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁wafalume .”
▁Maliya ▁Magidalena ▁na ▁Maliya ▁mamiyake ▁yake ▁Yosefu ▁waha wona ▁hanhu ▁ha wi kigwe ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu .
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatanga ▁walala ▁waja ▁na ▁kawauza ‚ ▁“ Habali ▁mu tenda ▁vino ? ▁ Habali ▁mu waleka ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wakale ?”
▁“ Sekemu je ▁mnyama ▁yoyose ▁yafile ▁mwenyewo , ▁modaha ▁kumwing ' ha ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁ya je ▁hebu ▁modaha ▁kum chuuzi ya ▁munhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁imwenga , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Sekemu m ki mu se ▁m wanaluti ▁muna ▁di to mbo ▁da ▁mami ▁yake .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Segel a ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ! ▁Seke wize ▁ku niwona ▁kaidi . ▁Mana ▁siku ▁yonda wize ▁kaidi ▁haulongozi ▁wangu , ▁kwiza danganika !”
▁U tunhizo ▁uwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose ! ▁Ivo !
▁Vi zi malile ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁Nuhu ▁ka vugula ▁ zonzo ▁da ▁isafina ▁yoya i tendile ,
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁ko tosa , ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi galuka ▁na ▁walo ▁jake ▁diwa ▁ ze lu ▁chwee !
▁Sekemu taguse ▁kwa ▁kulola ▁kwa ▁kunze ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁ taguse ni ▁viilondeka .”
▁ Nokulamba ▁ muhokele ▁One si mo ▁yoya kalile ▁mwanangu ▁kufose la ▁kuilumba ▁kumwake ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁vini kalile ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁Na ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁di ja ▁dodi kalile ▁baho ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁sambi ▁da habule , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ni ▁mfalume ▁we nane , ▁nayo ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁saba , ▁nayo ▁keza na ng igwa .
▁“ Sekeu bawe .
▁Niye ▁ni lila ▁kwa ▁usungu ▁kwaviya ▁ha woneke ▁munhu ▁ya londeke ▁kuchi vugula ▁chitabu ▁icho ▁hebu ▁kuchi lola ▁mgati .
▁m baka ▁vondani watende ▁wehi ▁wako ▁hasi ▁ya ▁magulu ▁yako .’
▁Waisilaili ▁viwa wile ▁kuichuwala , ▁wa muwona ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ko dondola ▁ngodi ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁Viwafikile ▁hana ▁ imhaka ▁na ▁M isi ya , ▁wa londa ▁wahite ▁ B isi ni ya , ▁ mbali ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁kawa lemesa .
▁“ Mbuli ▁ino ▁i kala ▁in inogela , ▁ivo ▁ni sagula ▁walume ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁mulume ▁imwe ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁kabila .
▁Mu ke ▁viyo kweleka ▁mwana ▁ko wona ▁usungu ▁kwaviya ▁saa ▁yake ▁i fika . ▁Mbali ▁yaha mala ▁ kweleka ▁mwana , ▁ko zimiza ▁usungu , ▁ko denelela ▁kwaviya ▁mwana ▁kelek igwa ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Maabaho ▁Balaamu ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Balaki , ▁wafika ▁K ili a si ▁Hu so si .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ h edike ▁mbuli , ▁Pilato ▁kazanywa .
▁Mbali ▁Lutu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Siyo , ▁wenevale ▁wangu .
▁M ibiki ▁iyo ▁kai fose za ▁muna ▁zi mhete ▁zili ▁muna ▁zi banzi ▁mbili ▁za ▁sanduku ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kupapila .
▁Na wo ▁viwa komeleze ▁kumtegeleza ▁mfalume , ▁wasegela , ▁na ▁nhondo ▁yowa i wone ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁i walongolela ▁m baka ▁vi i mile ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁ha yelekigwe ▁imwana ▁ija .
▁U hasanyi ▁wa ▁Adamu ▁hau daha ▁ku linganyiz igwa ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Kwa viya ▁hata ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wadanganika ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁Mulungu ▁keza kongeza ▁ubazi ▁wake ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁cho c he ne la ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wengi , ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁niiyo ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁chilema , ▁chipofu ▁hebu ▁mbetembete ▁hebu ▁yeli ▁na ▁chihanga ▁chi ba na ng i ke ▁hebu ▁yeli ▁na ▁chi ungo ▁chongezeke ▁muna ▁ulukuli ,
▁Wala ▁ha yeli ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁bahali ▁m baka ▁mu longe , ▁‘ Yeli hi ▁yondaya lo ke ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁bahali ▁ya chi galile ▁muladi ▁chi yahulike ▁na ▁kuya zindilila ?’
▁Ho ke la ▁shekel i ▁tano ▁ya ▁hela ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wa u de le ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wo wongezeke ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁ peta ▁ya ▁walume ▁wa ▁Walawi , ▁fana ▁viili ▁ningo ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁helile ,
▁Isi ▁hai wa fa i ye ▁wose ▁waidi ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁na ▁ fu go ▁nyingi .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiya lagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁nawo , ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi , ▁kabila ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yako , ▁u wagale ▁habehi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁muladi ▁wa i l umbe ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁kuku sang ' hanila , ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁mwiza kuwa ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Vi hongwe ▁wakala ▁ 3 0 , 5 0 0 , ▁mwa ▁ iwawo , ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁imwe ▁wawa lava ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa tumigwa ▁wa tenda ▁vilaguso ▁na ▁mawewedeko ▁mengi ▁m baka ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kadumba .
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Hamu ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁yawo ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁wawo ▁na ▁hanhu ▁howo kala ▁na ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁ mwing ' higwa ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ku muhuwila ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁kugazigwa ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁chake .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo togola ▁usenga ▁wake , ▁ko t h ib iti s ha ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁kweli .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁chiya ▁cho wakalile ▁wolonga , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Habali ▁mo longelela ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁ mwabule ▁magate ? ▁ Mbo na ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁ndodo !
▁Maabaho ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamuuza ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁ija ▁viya ▁viya dahile ▁kuwona . ▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Ka ni haka ▁n ho pe ▁mmeso , ▁m aabaho ▁nina wa , ▁na ▁sambi ▁no wona .” ▁Ivo ▁wa igola ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁wawo .
▁Fan a ▁munhu ▁yaha mbo ne la ▁chinyala ▁niye ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁muna ▁ulel wa ▁uno ▁wa ▁uzinzi ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁niza muwonela ▁chinyala ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁vondanize ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁welile .
▁na ▁wanage ▁Simeoni ▁wakala ▁Ye mu eli ▁na ▁Yam i ni ▁na ▁ O ha di ▁na ▁Ya ki ni ▁na ▁So hali ▁na ▁S ha uli ▁yo yelekigwe ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁Mkanaani .
▁Tend eni ▁ivo ▁siyo ▁lusita ▁viwo mulola ni , ▁muladi ▁mu woneke ▁munoga ▁kumwawo , ▁ mbali ▁sang ' hane ni ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu . ▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁watumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Hamoli ▁na ▁Shekemu ▁mwanage ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dibululu ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁m ting ' hano ▁kulonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁dibululu ,
▁“ Ka wakombola ▁wamwenga , ▁ mbali ▁kuikombola ▁mwenyewo ▁hadaha ▁bule ! ▁Vino ▁yeye ▁siyo ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁One ▁yaha hulumuka ▁mumsalaba , ▁chiza muhuwila !
▁Ivo ▁walume ▁ wolondeka ▁kuwa no gela ▁wake ▁zawo ▁fana ▁ng ' huli ▁zawo ▁wenyewo . ▁Munhu ▁yo mnogela ▁mke ▁wake ▁ko inogela ▁mwenyewo .
▁“ Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ulinga ▁vino . ▁Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoya i da wile ▁imitondo ▁ng ' hani , ▁kahita ▁ku zahila ▁wa sang ' hana ▁muladi ▁ya wagale ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁m kale ▁meso , ▁kwaviya ▁hamu vimanyile ▁bule ▁mwene ▁kaye ▁kokwiza ▁zuwaki , ▁kodaha ▁kwiza ▁ichigulogulo , ▁hebu ▁ichilo ▁chikulu , ▁hebu ▁nz ogolo ▁zi kwika , ▁hebu ▁imitondo .
▁No msang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wangu ▁wose ▁kwa ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁mwanage , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁m kalangama ▁wangu ▁viya ▁vini m kumbuka ni ,
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa zenga ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁mapanzia ▁longo ▁ya ▁mawalo ▁yanogile ▁ya botigwe ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁ku ha mba ▁vilumb e ▁wa li ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa songoligwe ▁na ▁fundi .
▁Yesu ▁viya wa bwele le ▁lwa ka ta tu , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M ng ' hali ▁mwo gona ▁na ▁kuhumula ? ▁Basi ! ▁L usita ▁lufika , ▁niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁sambi ▁no geligwa ▁m makono ▁mwa ▁wa hasanyi .
▁Paulo ▁kedika , ▁“ B ule ! ▁Niye ▁ni ▁Muyahudi ▁m welekwa ▁wa ▁T a li so , ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Chilikiya , ▁isi ▁i manyika ▁ng ' hani . ▁ Nokulamba ▁ni leke ▁ni longe ▁na ▁wanhu .”
▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Niye ▁no wabatiza ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mu samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yokwiza ▁kuchisogo ▁changu ▁keza wabatiza ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁moto . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁niye . ▁Niye ▁si faya ▁bule ▁hata ▁kupapa ▁vilatu ▁vake .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁ya he ka ▁chilaho ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ gala ma ▁ya ▁munhu , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kodaha ▁ku segeza ▁chilaho ▁chake ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁chiya si ▁cha ▁hela ▁chochi li ng igwa ▁fana ▁vino ,
▁M abululu ▁yenu ▁niza ya bomola ▁na ▁hanhu ▁henu ▁helile ▁niza ha tenda ▁kuwa ▁mahame , ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wenu ▁unogile ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siza u togola ▁bule .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁ka londa ▁ ulungu ▁wake ▁wose ▁uwe ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁hohose ▁haja ▁mbuli ▁inogile ▁honda ▁i petigwe ▁mwii ▁iisi ▁yose , ▁chino ▁cha yatendile ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁chiza longigwa ▁kwa ▁kum kumbuka ▁yeye .”
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁mweye ▁hamu walekelela ▁wayenu , ▁nayo ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁heza walekelela ▁bule ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kabwela ▁ukaye . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu iting ' hana ▁kaidi ▁m baka ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁hawa dahile ▁kuja .
▁Wa sola ▁kodi ▁nawo ▁weza ▁kubatizigwa . ▁Wamuuza , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chitende ▁choni ?”
▁ mbali ▁no huwila ▁kuwa ▁na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁niza zilibuligwa .
▁Na ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁magate ▁saba ▁na ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁vino ▁mu memez a ▁vi gelo ▁vi ngahi ▁va ▁ masigavu ?
▁Mbali ▁hawa i bandame ▁bule ▁m baka ▁Maliya ▁viya i ba s ule ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Na ▁Yosefu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁zina ▁Yesu .
▁ Hiteni ▁na ▁ pete ni , ▁‘ Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa habehi !’
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola , ▁no mwing ' hani ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mimeya ▁ili ▁na ▁mbeyu ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁yoi kwima ▁matunda ▁yeli ▁na ▁mbeyu ▁muje .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ‚ ▁“ Kweli ▁ni ya wona ▁manhesa ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁weli ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Ni hulika ▁ndilo ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ wemiliz i ▁wa ▁Misili . ▁Ni umanya ▁usungu ▁wawo .
▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁viyakalile ▁kohita , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁muladi ▁wa mu laguse ▁yama ze ngo ▁ya ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Tend eni ▁fana ▁voni tenda ▁niye , ▁ nogeza ▁ku mnogela ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kwa ▁yose ▁yoni tenda ▁kwaviya ▁si londa ▁yaja ▁yon inogela ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁no londa ▁yaja ▁yowa no gela ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kukomboligwa .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose , ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁yaha muhasanya ▁miyage ▁kwa ▁vovose ▁na ▁ivo ▁ku leka ▁kuwa ▁mwaminika ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kabananga ,
▁Iviya ▁mhanda ▁zake ▁zi kala ▁nne ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vi ne ▁va ▁shaba . ▁Ng wamo ▁zake ▁zi kala ▁za ▁hela , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁uchanyha ▁ha ▁mhanda ▁na ▁ mango ▁zake ▁vi zakwamh igwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁hela .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ichigulogulo , ▁wanhu ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela , ▁Yesu ▁kawa lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁na ▁kawahonya ▁watamu ▁wose .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa gala ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁yo tangigwa ▁ sa li doniki ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁ kwikigwa ▁muna ▁ichi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁na ▁chizibawo .
▁Kwa viya ▁chila ▁kaye ▁yo zengigw a ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁m ze nzi ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wo kwingila ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁ku wavwizila ▁wanaake ▁muladi ▁wa wategeleze ▁wawo ▁muhala . ▁Wa naake ▁wawo ▁ni ▁waja ▁wabozi ▁wa memile ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁chila ▁madambwa .
▁‘ U ko ▁ mhembe le ▁wake ▁hawa fa ▁bule , ▁na ▁moto ▁wake ▁hau fa ▁bule .’
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I yawale ▁viwalo ▁vako ▁na ▁vilatu ▁vako .” ▁Petili ▁ka tenda ▁ivo . ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I yawale ▁ko ti ▁jako ▁na ▁uni sondelele .”
▁Kulaw a ▁kuulanga ▁Mulungu ▁ko lagusa ▁kuwa ▁kana ▁ng ' ha si liki ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁yehile , ▁wowo lema ▁ukweli ▁sekeu manyike ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile .
▁Na ▁one ▁ gutwi ▁di ha longa , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁niye ▁sili ▁ziso , ▁niye ▁si ▁wa ▁lukuli ” , ▁vino ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁sigambe di we ▁chilung o ▁cha ▁lukuli ? ▁Si ivo ▁bule !
▁Ni ilaha ▁kuwa ▁niza muleka ni ▁mukale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya fike , ▁ila ▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni .
▁Ho ho se ▁howo hita ▁wo gala ▁ndilo ▁na ▁wo leka ▁manhesa .
▁Ni mgala ▁kwa ▁wanahina ▁wako , ▁ mbali ▁hawa dahile ▁bule ▁ku muhonya .”
▁Kuuhelelo ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁hana ▁ ib e nde la ▁ya ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani ▁wa kalile ▁wa lole zi ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁muladi ▁sekewa to wigwe ▁kwa ▁kuchisogo , ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza , ▁ bumbila ▁dimwe ▁dimwe . ▁Wa no ▁walangulizi gwa ▁na ▁Ahi ezeli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Am i s ha da i .
▁Baho ▁niza iting ' hana ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁baho ▁heza kwela ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wangu .
▁Wa nyama ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁ndege ▁woguluka ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala ▁na ▁somba ▁wose ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁weza wa dumba ni . ▁Wawo ▁wose ▁mwiza wa tawala .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁nhaguso , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Ni na wi ▁weza kwima ▁na ▁kuwatagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁wa samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁viwahulike ▁ma pete lo ▁ya ▁Yona . ▁Nowalongela ▁ukweli , ▁hano ▁hana ▁munhu ▁mkulu ▁kumfosa ▁Yona !
▁m aabaho ▁di memez eni ▁de ng ' ho ▁jangu ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁ya mwe , ▁ulondo ▁umwe , ▁na ▁moyo ▁umwe ▁na ▁muhe ▁umwe .
▁Bahobaho ▁ku la wila ▁n yu kwa ▁n yu kwa ▁kulu ▁da ▁isi , ▁m baka ▁mhanda ▁za ▁ichifungo ▁zi tingisigwa ▁na ▁zi nyivi ▁zi vu g u ka ▁na ▁minyololo ▁yawo ▁iha gaya .
▁Na ▁Yesu ▁kawahonya ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁mitamu ▁mbasakanyo . ▁Viya ▁viya ▁kawa lava ▁vinyamkela ▁wengi , ▁na ▁ha weng ' hile ▁nyafasi ▁ya ▁kulonga ▁kwaviya ▁wa mmanya ▁yeye ▁ya lihi .
▁“ Seke nd umbe , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Sayuni , ▁Mfalume ▁wenu ▁kokwiza , ▁kakala ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mwana ▁chihongwe .”
▁Viya gendelele ▁kuulongozi ▁chidogo , ▁kawa wona ▁ndugu ▁wamwenga , ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Zebedayo , ▁wose ▁wakala ▁mgati ▁mwiingalawa ▁na ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁Zebedayo , ▁wo zi tenda ▁goya ▁nyavu ▁zawo . ▁Yesu ▁kawatanga .
▁Niza kala ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili , ▁na ▁niza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wawo .
▁I tazeni ▁kwa ▁kui p a p ila ▁mbahasha , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁mo tegeleza ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Chilisito .
▁Mana ▁D ema ▁ka zi londa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁isi ▁ino , ▁kani leka ▁na ▁kahita ▁Sesalonike , ▁K ile si ke ▁kahita ▁Galatiya ▁na ▁Tito ▁kahita ▁Da lima ti ya .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wawona ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waja ▁saba ▁wo kwima ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁weng ' higwa ▁mhalati ▁saba .
▁Ivo ▁fana ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Lufyende ▁waha igola ▁wenyewo , ▁ uza gwa ▁na ▁kufika ▁hau helelo .
▁“ Chila ▁chinhu ▁chochi kigwe ▁hakwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁chi zakuwa ▁chenu .
▁Ivo ▁ mulole ▁ng ' hani ▁vomu kala . ▁Sekemu kale ▁fana ▁wabozi , ▁ mbali ▁mukale ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wabala .
▁One ▁wa wile ▁na ▁m agesa ▁fana ▁yano ▁siku ▁zose , ▁wa ni d umbe ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yangu ! ▁Mbuli ▁zawo ▁zose ▁zi ha gendelele ▁vinogile ▁siku ▁zose , ▁wawo ▁na ▁welesi ▁wawo .
▁Fan a ▁viya ndi kile ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Isaya , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Niza mtuma ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁kuulongozi ▁wako , ▁iyo ▁keza i tanda ▁nzila ▁yako .’
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁yaha mkoma ni , ▁niza mtagusa . ▁Na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha mkoma ▁miyage , ▁kezatagusigwa .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁no londa ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yoni wapetela ni ▁siyo ▁ya ▁chiunhu ▁bule ,
▁“ ▁‘ M haka ▁yenu ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁izakuwa ▁fana ▁vino , ▁kulawa ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Meditelaniya , ▁mwiza tula ▁m ku za ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Holi ,
▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize . ▁Ka msola ▁Yoshua ▁na ▁ku mwi miza ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose .
▁M tumwa ▁ija ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁yayo ▁you ni lagilize ▁ya tendeka ▁ya mala , ▁ mbali ▁hata ▁sambi ▁nyafasi ▁ya baho .’
▁Na ▁cheye ▁china ▁ukweli ▁ng ' hani ▁kuson hela ▁usenga ▁wa ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁one ▁muha u tegeleza , ▁mwiza tenda ▁goya ▁one ▁muha u lola , ▁chitasa ▁chi melemeta ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ziza , ▁m baka ▁vonda ku kung u zu ke ▁na ▁ to ndo ng ' a ndu ▁yokwiza ▁mwiimizoyo ▁yenu .
▁I ja ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁gana ▁wa ▁Loma ▁viya wone ▁yoya lawilile , ▁ka mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ U kweli ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kakala ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Ivo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Hachi vimanyile ▁bule ▁yelihi ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Yohana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kubatiza .”
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁usenga ▁womu u hulike ▁kulawa ▁baho ▁mwanduso . ▁Cho londeka ▁chi i londe .
▁Chila ▁siku ▁muli heni ▁yombe ▁jake ▁ding ' hali ▁zuwa ▁hadi na ku s wa , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ni ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁ko huwila ▁yombe ▁ijo , ▁bule ivo ▁keza mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁na ▁kulila ▁kwake ▁ko lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mu tenda ▁uhasanyi .
▁“ ▁‘ Tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁muli ▁wa zeha , ▁sang ' hane ni ▁mwa ge . ▁Kwa viya ▁chi ni tenda ▁sambi , ▁muna ▁lusita ▁ l wenu ▁ni ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁hachi huwila , ▁hata ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yaha walongela .’ ▁”
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu hokele ▁wanyama ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁manyambenyambe ▁na ▁kuni lavila ▁niye ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Wa nyama ▁wawo ▁wana ▁chilema ▁kwaviya ▁wa kanhigwa ▁na ▁hawa togoligwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .’ ▁”
▁M weye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ku mulonda ni ▁na ▁ku msagula ni ▁muwe ▁wake ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo . ▁Ivo ▁muwe ▁wanhu ▁wene ▁moyo ▁wa ▁ubazi , ▁u nhu ▁goya , ▁ku nyendanyenda , ▁uhole ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo .
▁“ No tenda ▁lagano ▁dino ▁na ▁weye . ▁ Nokulongela ▁kwiza kuwa ▁tata ▁wa ▁makabila ▁mengi .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niza ▁mwiisi ▁ino ▁ku tagusa , ▁vipofu ▁wa wone , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo wona ▁wawe ▁vipofu .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁niza hita ▁na ▁weye , ▁nizaku tenda ▁u humule .”
▁Hebu ▁ko uze ha ▁unovu ▁wake ▁mkulu ▁na ▁kufunya umo yo ▁kwake ▁na ▁uhole , ▁vino ▁hu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wo ku languliza ▁u sa mhe ?
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wekaidi ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁muna ▁ibahali . ▁Na ▁mazi ▁ya galuka ▁damu ▁fana ▁ya ▁munhu ▁yadanganike , ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁vose ▁vi kalile ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁vi danganika .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Ni kutenda ▁weye ▁uwe ▁fana ▁m ulungu ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁Haluni ▁keza longa ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁fana ▁mu longa ji ▁wako .
▁One ▁chaha i tagusa ▁wenyewo ▁ teng ' hu , ▁sigambe ▁chi tagusigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁Haluni , ▁wose ▁wana wa ▁makono ▁yawo ▁na ▁migulu ▁yawo ▁umo .
▁Cho watanga ▁waja ▁wa temiligw a ▁mate ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wowa gozele . ▁Mu hulika ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁kwa ▁ A yu bu ▁na ▁mo vimanya ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁viya mtendele ▁kuuhelelo . ▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁ka mema ▁ubazi ▁na ▁unovu .
▁Vini kalile ▁no londa ▁kutazigwa ▁kuja ▁Sesalonike ▁mu nigalila ▁si ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala .
▁Ni de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁kuwona ▁kuwa ▁wanago ▁wamwenga ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ikweli , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Tata ▁viya chi lagilize .
▁Yesu ▁viya f o nzile ▁isi ki , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Chila ▁chinhu ▁chi ti miya .” ▁Maabaho ▁ka idulika ▁iditwi , ▁kadanganika .
▁Wa ni tenda ▁ni wone ▁ludoko ▁kwa ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zawo , ▁no i wonela ▁migongo ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁milungu ▁ili ▁siyo ▁milungu ▁ya ▁kweli . ▁Ivo ▁nizawa tenda ▁wawa wonele ▁migongo ▁waja ▁weli ▁siyo ▁chinhu , ▁nizawa tenda ▁wehilw e ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hanila ▁zisi ▁za ▁wabozi .
▁Maabaho ▁Mwihi ▁kamsola ▁Yesu ▁m baka ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani , ▁bahobaho ▁ka mulagusa ▁ falume ▁zose ▁zili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Kwa viya ▁mu togola ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁Mndewa ▁wenu , ▁ gendelele ni ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁kwiilumba ▁nayo .
▁Vino ▁mu mweda ▁choni ▁siku ▁ziya ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁sambi ▁yo woneka ▁ya ▁chinyala ▁kumwenu ? ▁U helelo ▁wa ▁yaja ▁yomu tendile ▁ni ▁ifa !
▁Mana ▁mwiza lekigwa ▁kwingila ▁ bila ▁be ge t e ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁“ Kuna ▁dibululu ▁ijo ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yo tangigwa ▁Ananiya , ▁munhu ▁wa ▁di ni ▁yoyo kwamha ▁Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁na ▁kowa hulika ▁Wayahudi ▁wose ▁wokala ▁uko .
▁Vini kalile ▁no lola , ▁nihulika ▁madizi ▁ya ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁mvunyo . ▁Wem a ▁wachi zunguluka ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wane ▁na ▁walala ,
▁M b e nde ▁za ▁ng ' hondolo ▁lume ▁zozi ha kigwe ▁ langi ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁mbende ▁za ▁wanyama ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁m bawo ▁za ▁mkenge ,
▁Mwiza weng ' ha ▁mhule ▁zenu ▁za ▁mwanduso ▁kugobola ▁na ▁divai ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yenu ▁ya ▁mzaituni ▁na ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wenu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁Chilisito ▁ka mgati ▁yenu , ▁Muhe ▁ni ▁ugima ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ni ▁munoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake ▁hata ▁fana ▁lukuli ▁ l wenu ▁lwiza danganika ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi .
▁Meso ▁yake ▁yawe ▁na ▁ma dung ' hu ▁fana ▁divai ▁na ▁meno ▁yake ▁yawe ▁mazelu ▁fana ▁matombo .”
▁Maabaho ▁Paulo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu vimanye ▁kuwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁ulopozi ▁i galigw a ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Na wo ▁weza i tegeleza !”
▁Abulamu ▁na ▁Naholi ▁wa sola ▁wake . ▁Mu ke ▁wa ▁Abulamu ▁ka tangigwa ▁Salayi ▁na ▁muke ▁wa ▁Naholi ▁ka tangigwa ▁Milika , ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Halani . ▁Halani ▁iviya ▁niiyo ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁Milika ▁na ▁Isi ka .
▁“ M weye ▁Waisilaili ▁ tegelezeni ▁chiya ▁chi yolonda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁m umdumbe ▁na ▁mu sondelele ▁nzila ▁zake ▁zose ▁na ▁mu mulonde ▁na ▁mu msang ' hanile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose ,
▁Wa mwenga ▁wenu ▁mukala ▁ivo . ▁Mbali ▁mu safyigwa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi , ▁mu tendigw a ▁muwe ▁welile ▁na ▁mo petigwa ▁munoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu .
▁“ ▁‘ Chila ▁hela ▁iza li ng igwa ▁kwa ▁ningo ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁yondai go ligwe ▁kwa ▁ningo ▁ya ▁vihande ▁m alongo ▁maidi .
▁Chi ng ' hali ▁cho kala ▁muna ▁di zewe ▁dino ▁da ▁mwiisi , ▁cho da mila ▁kwa ▁ku ga nda mizigwa ▁si ▁kuwa ▁cho londa ▁ku vula ▁lukuli ▁luno ▁lwa ▁chi isi , ▁ila ▁china ▁hamu ▁ya ▁kuya wi zigwa ▁lukuli ▁luja ▁lwa ▁kuulanga , ▁muladi ▁chiya ▁chili ▁na ▁kudanganika ▁chi dahe ▁ku galusigwa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁Esau ▁ka ndusa ▁kwa mha ▁nzila ▁yake ▁kubwela ▁Seili .
▁Mbali ▁ino ▁mwanago ▁ka da nga nya ▁vinhu ▁vako ▁na ▁malaya , ▁na ▁viya bwelile ▁ukaye ▁kum chinjil a ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁di ne ne he !’
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lava ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁imwenga ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ▁kuilumba ▁kwaviya ▁ka tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁mtufi . ▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁keza di tenda ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁ je le .
▁No mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁simba ti ze ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁imwenga ▁kumwenu ▁ila ▁Chi li si p o ▁na ▁Gayo .
▁“ Bulahimu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Wa nd ugu ▁zako ▁wa nayo ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁wa wategeleze ▁wawo ▁chi wolonga .’
▁Hata ▁viwa wa fikile ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁wamwenga , ▁wa lu wona ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁luwa zunguluka , ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wo ibishil a ▁nawo .
▁Shekemu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Hamoli ▁Mu hivi ▁yoya kalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁viya mu wene ▁Dina ▁kamwamha ▁na ▁kagona ▁nayo ▁kwa ▁shuluti ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁ya wone ▁chinyala .
▁Baho ▁mfalume ▁kawalongela ▁wa sang ' hani , ▁‘ Mu m funge ▁migulu ▁na ▁makono , ▁m aabaho ▁mu mwa se ▁kunze ▁kudi zi za , ▁uko ▁keza lila ▁na ▁ku dunda ▁meno .’ ▁”
▁Lung ilo ▁da ▁lagilizo ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁ku gala ▁ugima , ▁ mbali ▁kumwangu ▁di gala ▁ifa .
▁Leuweli ▁mwanage ▁Esau ▁ka weleka ▁Na ha ti ▁na ▁Ze la ▁na ▁S ha ma ▁na ▁M iza . ▁Wawo ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wakulu ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁yawo . ▁Wa no ▁wose ▁wakala ▁wana ▁wa ▁Leuweli ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Edomu ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁na ▁ B a se ma ti ▁muke ▁wa ▁Esau .
▁Musa ▁ka zi ka ▁fimbo ▁izo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁I fa ▁yo pata ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ku lumiza ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi , ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wo pata ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁weza kala ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo ▁jake ▁na ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁zisi ▁weza gala ▁vinhu ▁vawo ▁vingi .
▁Lelo ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁ muhuwila , ▁dibwe ▁ijo ▁do faya ▁ng ' hani . ▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo lema ▁kuhuwila . ▁Fan a ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Dib we ▁diwa lemile ▁wa ze nzi ▁kuzengela , ▁diwa ▁dibwe ▁dinogile ▁kufosa ▁mabwe ▁yose ▁ya ▁kuzengela .”
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁viwa hitile ▁ku didugila , ▁Yesu ▁nayo ▁kahita , ▁ mbali ▁ha hitile ▁chiu mwing i , ▁kahita ▁chinyele ny ele .
▁ huwa ▁imwe ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Iviya ▁keza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yo safyigwa ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mulola ▁kaidi . ▁One ▁uhenela ▁muna ▁imbende , ▁basi ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko . ▁U wo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende .
▁Mbali ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁yahawa ▁mbetembete ▁hebu ▁chipofu ▁hebu ▁chilema ▁chochose , ▁sekeu mulave ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako .
▁One ▁chimu ▁changu ▁chaha wile ▁cha ▁chiunhu ▁muhala , ▁kuja ▁kuitowa ▁kwangu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁fana ▁“ wa nyama ▁wa ka li ” ▁muna ▁Efeso ▁ku hani fa i ye ▁choni ? ▁One ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁hawa zilibuligwa , ▁basi , ▁“ Chi je ▁na ▁ching ' we , ▁kwaviya ▁igolo ▁chiza danganika .”
▁Yano ▁yoni mulongelani ▁ni ▁m agesa ▁yangu , ▁si ▁malagilizo .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya mwe hu le , ▁ila ▁m tazeni ▁ya gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wake ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo , ▁muladi ▁ya bwele ▁kumwangu , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁no gozela ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu .
▁Kwa viya ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wana ▁lukuli ▁na ▁damu , ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁kawa ▁fana ▁wawo ▁na ▁ka ilumba ▁na ▁u nhu ▁wawo . ▁Ka kala ▁vino ▁muladi ▁kufose la ▁ifa ▁yake ▁ya mu hume ▁Mwihi , ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ifa ,
▁Na ▁kwaviya ▁walala ▁wawo ▁wa mdumba ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wawo ▁wenyewo .
▁ Leke ni ▁chi mwing ' he ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁uli ▁na ▁utunhizo , ▁uya ching ' hile ▁bule ▁kufose la ▁Mwanage ▁nyachende !
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁na ▁dikulu ▁ka mwizila , ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁ku mpula . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Wa ha londa , ▁kwo daha ▁kuni ho nya .”
▁Mu vimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ko mu lanha ni ▁fana ▁tata ▁viyo mu lanha ▁mwanage .
▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kezachi tenda ▁chi pate ▁za mana ▁ya ▁uhazi ▁wetu ▁yoya wekile ▁chilagano ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zo chi lagusa ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁keza wakombola ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁chi mwing ' he ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wake !
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kahumuluka ▁muna ▁diwingu , ▁kema ▁na ▁Musa ▁haja . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gong ' onda ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Mbali ▁mui manye ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁fana ▁mwene ▁kaye ▁yaha vimanyile ▁fana ▁yonda ▁ye ze ▁mbavi , ▁yaha kalile ▁meso . ▁Wala ▁sigambe ▁ya i leke ▁kaye ▁yake ▁i benigw e ▁na ▁mbavi .
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁kum p u lila ▁Mulungu , ▁kamuwona ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Tegeleza , ▁sambi ▁ku hona . ▁Leka ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁ng ' hani ▁chiza ku pata .”
▁One ▁kuna ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁hau tegeleza ▁usenga ▁wetu ▁wochi mgalila ni . ▁ Muiteganye ▁nayo ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁sekemu longe ▁nayo , ▁muladi ▁ya wone ▁chinyala .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mwenyewo ▁yahalonda ▁ku mkombola ▁mnyama ▁wake , ▁kolondeka ▁yon geze ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano ▁ha ▁bei ▁yake .
▁Mbali ▁viya ▁viya dahile ▁kuwona , ▁hebu ▁yelihi ▁yoya ng u bule ▁yameso ▁hachi vimanyile ▁bule . ▁Mu uze ni ▁mwenyewo . ▁Y eye ▁mkulu ▁ngima , ▁ivo ▁kodaha ▁ kwidika ▁mwenyewo !”
▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁ wolondeka ▁wakale ▁muna ▁ivi ba nda ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Sekeu mdumbe , ▁mana ▁niza tenda ▁mumuhum e ▁yeye ▁na ▁isi ▁yake ▁yose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wose . ▁Kwiza mtendela ▁fana ▁viya ▁viu mtendele ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Waamoli , ▁yoya kalile ▁kokala ▁Heshiboni .”
▁M weye ▁mu chi p a pe ▁chi zewe ▁cha ▁m ulungu ▁Moleki , ▁na ▁nyang ' hiti ▁ya ▁nhondo ▁ya ▁m ulungu ▁wenu ▁L e fa ni , ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zi mtendile ▁izo ▁zi mtosela . ▁Na ▁ivo ▁niza mtuma ni ▁muhite ▁kutali ▁kufosa ▁Babeli .’
▁Zi mwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁muna ▁ulongo ▁unogile . ▁Zi kula ▁na ▁ku lela , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁miyanza ▁gana .” ▁Yesu ▁viyalongile ▁yayo , ▁ka landula ▁dizi ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya ▁kuhulika , ▁na ▁ya hulike !”
▁‘ Chi wa towe la ▁nyila ▁za ▁ sola , ▁ mbali ▁hamu vi ni le ▁bule , ▁chi guta ▁nyangi ▁za ▁ifa , ▁ mbali ▁hamu li lile ▁bule !’
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 4 5 , 4 00.
▁Mbali ▁Mafalisayo ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁ wedika , ▁“ Ka lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwaviya ▁Mwene mba go ▁kamwing ' ha ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁kulava .”
▁Wo wa ba manya ▁wagane ▁na ▁kwa ▁udelenya ▁wo tosa ▁nhosa ▁nhali . ▁Wawo ▁weza tagusigwa ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁imwenga ▁ko zumha ▁kuulanga ▁yahawa ▁na ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ya i pete ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁muna ▁isi , ▁na ▁zisi ▁zose ▁na ▁makabila ▁yose ▁na ▁welesi ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁wose ,
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁kawahonya ▁wengi , ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁wo gaya ▁wakala ▁woi sung ' ha sung ' ha ▁wa dahe ▁ku mwamha .
▁Ni wagalile ni ▁mazi ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁ku guma ▁nhende ▁na ▁kuhumula ▁hasi ▁hana ▁umbiki ▁uno .
▁Viwa hokele ▁hela ▁zawo , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulongelela ▁kwa ▁ija ▁mwene ▁mgunda ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁na ▁ G a bu li yeli . ▁No kwima ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁iyo ▁yoyanitumile ▁ni longe ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁kuku galila ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁inogile .
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Lola ▁weye ▁k welekwa ▁muna ▁uhasanyi . ▁Lelo ▁weye ▁kwo daha ze ▁kuchi fundiza ▁cheye ?” ▁Baho ▁wa muwinga ▁mwi ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Ku tosela .
▁“ Ni bwela ▁Yelusalemu , ▁na ▁vini kalile ▁no tambika ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁ni wona ▁malaguso ,
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁kuna ▁chinhu ▁chochi m ki lila ▁na ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Mwihi , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mu chimanya ▁chinhu ▁icho , ▁ivo ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Mwihi ▁keza woneka ▁lusita ▁lwake .
▁Wa ja ▁iwa ba la ▁wa wedika , ▁‘ Haidahika ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁yano ▁yeli ▁mu no ▁haya faya ▁mweye ▁na ▁cheye . ▁Vino gile ▁muhite ▁kwa ▁wa chuuza ▁mavuta ▁muka gule ▁mavuta ▁yenu ▁wenyewo .’
▁muladi ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanenu ▁mu dahe ▁kukala ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁i yekile ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wa saho ▁zenu . ▁Mwiza kala ▁uko ▁siku ▁zose ▁ulanga ▁vou wa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁isi .
▁“ Sekeu itende ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁mana ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁no wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zili ▁habehi ▁na ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁wo tenda ▁ivo ▁na ▁kui tenda ▁wa mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Ivo ▁ hite ni ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁muka watende ▁wawe ▁wanahina ▁wangu , ▁na ▁muwa batiz e ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Tata ▁na ▁Mwana ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ,
▁kwaviya ▁vomu ni ta zile ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁ku pwililisa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁kwandusi la ▁zuwa ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁vomu hi li ke ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁ko lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁mwene mba go , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁vinyamkela !”
▁Mbali ▁ndiya ▁hai daha ▁kuchi gala ▁habehi ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁chaha leka ▁kuja ▁hachi hungukilw a ▁na ▁chinhu , ▁na ▁chaha ja ▁ha cho n geze ke ligwa ▁na ▁chinhu .
▁Miliamu ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa ndusa ▁ku mulonga ▁vihile ▁Musa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁imuke ▁M ku shi ▁iya msolile .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁yose ▁yondaya mulawilile , ▁ivo ▁kawa lawilila , ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mwo nzahila ▁yelihi ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kamwing ' ha ▁gate ▁na ▁nz ugu . ▁Ka ja ▁na ▁ka ng ' wa ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kasegela . ▁Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁Esau ▁viya i ze hile ▁haki ▁yake ▁ya ▁u c ha u de le .
▁Na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁lolelo ▁dino ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁Chilisito ▁ko i safya ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viya sa f yi ke .
▁Keza tenda ▁mayani ▁yo t e ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanyama ▁wenu , ▁mwiza kuja ▁na ▁mwiza k wi guta .
▁Wa u de le ▁wawo ▁weza komboligwa ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁kuliha ▁shekel i ▁tano ▁ya ▁hela , ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁muha lolela ▁kutend igwa ▁munoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁mu igola ▁kutali ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁ muleka ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa ja ▁i wabozi ▁wa sola ▁ma weng e ▁yawo ▁ mbali ▁hawa solile ▁ngama ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁moto .
▁Maabaho ▁keza lawa ▁na ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁ulupango ▁lw ili ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba . ▁Keza sola ▁damu ▁chidogo ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁ija ▁na ▁luti ▁na ▁ku ihaka ▁muna ▁yam ahembe ▁yose ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁Na ▁m vili ▁zawo ▁zi kala ▁fana ▁m vili ▁za ▁wanaake , ▁na ▁meno ▁yawo ▁ya kala ▁fana ▁meno ▁ya ▁simba .
▁Ni we ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zo u ning ' hile ▁nawo ▁wazi togola . ▁Wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kweli ▁no lawa ▁kumwako , ▁na ▁wa togola ▁weye ▁iyo ▁u nhu mile .
▁Masa yo ▁na ▁Tomasi , ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A lu fa yo ▁na ▁Saimoni ▁yoya tangigwe ▁mkaya ▁ mtowa ni la ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka fosa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Musa , ▁ka gong ' onda , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁ni li ▁na ▁ubazi ▁na ▁unovu , ▁na bule ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁himahima , ▁ni mema ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁kwaminika .
▁“ Chi lo ▁icho ▁niza fose la ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁niza wakoma ▁ welekwa ▁wa ▁udele ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama . ▁Niza i tagusa ▁milungu ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Si tenda ▁lagano ▁dino ▁na ▁chilaho ▁chino ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁muhala .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Kweli ▁Eliya ▁kezakwiza ▁ teng ' hu ▁na ▁ku sasala ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁goya . ▁Mbali , ▁ha bali ▁yandikigwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza gazigwa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku lemigwa ?
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁ka lota ▁nzozi ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁“ Ni lota ▁nzozi ▁imwenga , ▁ni wona ▁zuwa ▁na ▁mwezi ▁na ▁nhondo ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁zi ni tumbalil a ▁mavindi .”
▁Ma kabila ▁yano ▁yo londeka ▁ye me ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁ E bali ▁lusita ▁ duwilo ▁vonda di lavigwe , ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Asheli ▁na ▁Zabuloni ▁na ▁Dani ▁na ▁Nafutali .
▁Na wo ▁wakalizi ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Na ▁cheye ▁chitende ▁choni ?” ▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Seke msole ▁vinhu ▁va ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kwa ▁ludabwa , ▁na ▁sekemu mshitak i ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kwa ▁uvwizi . ▁Mu li zi ke ▁na ▁maliho ▁yenu .”
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁damu ▁yake ▁chi petigwa ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ivo ▁chi komboligwa ▁muna ▁u l udoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Tamali ▁kaya vula ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁u ke fi lwa , ▁kai gubika ▁m ta ndi lo ▁m aabaho ▁kakala ▁hana ▁di ku mba ▁da ▁kwingilila ▁ E na i mu , ▁ chibululu ▁chochi kalile ▁mwiinzila ▁kuhita ▁T i mi na . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁Shela ▁kawa ▁munhu ▁mkulu ▁mgima ▁ mbali ▁Tamali ▁ha soligwe ▁bule ▁na ▁Shela .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ h edike ▁mbuli ▁yoyose , ▁na ▁mkulu ▁iyo ▁kazanywa ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ha nhu ▁hohose ▁homukala , ▁sekemuje ▁chinhu ▁chi gumigw e ▁lusu . ▁M olondeka ▁muje ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wamsondelela ▁na ▁wahuwila , ▁imwe ▁wawo ▁kakala ▁Di oni si yo , ▁munhu ▁wa ▁chitala . ▁Uko ▁iviya ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁ya tangigwe ▁Da ma li si ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wakala ▁mwiinzila , ▁woi ta ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ka walongolela , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa za ny igwa , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa sondelele ▁wengi lwa ▁na ▁ludumbo . ▁Yesu ▁kawasola ▁kaidi ▁kumgwazo ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwalongela ▁yaja ▁yonda ▁ya mulawilile .
▁Mbali ▁mtumwa ▁yoyose ▁ya guligwe , ▁ya he ng i zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁kodaha ▁kuja .
▁Haluni ▁keza lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake .
▁“ One ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁chimvuguya ▁muna ▁diwalo , ▁diwe ▁da ▁ s ufu ▁hebu ▁chitani ,
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Nuhu , ▁“ Chi no ▁ni ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁lagano ▁do nitendile ▁na ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁muna ▁iisi .”
▁Maabaho ▁kawa lawilila ▁wahuwila ▁wengi ▁kufosa ▁magan a ▁matano ▁hamwe , ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁wang ' hali ▁wagima ▁m baka ▁sambi , ▁inga wa ▁wamwenga ▁viweli ▁wa wandigwa ▁wa mala .
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya m so vu le ▁miyage ▁wala ▁ku mwihila ▁muna ▁ imbuli ▁ino . ▁Chi mulongelani ▁kweli ▁chi mala ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁niiyo ▁yonda ▁ya wataguse ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo tenda ▁yayo .
▁Wa watendela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁ma jo ho ▁ya ▁chitani ▁inogile .
▁One ▁ka komigwa ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya mgale ▁im nyama ▁fana ▁usindila , ▁ha londeka ▁kuliha ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁mnyama ▁yoyakomigwe ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago .
▁I nula ▁mhome ▁yako ▁na ▁u i golose ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁bahali ▁uya gole ▁yamazi , ▁muladi ▁Waisilaili ▁wa dahe ▁kufosa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁bahali ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile .
▁Kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁kunze ▁ya ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa , ▁no kala ▁kunze ▁ya ▁malagilizo ▁fana ▁wawo , ▁muladi ▁niwa pate ▁wawo ▁weli ▁kunze ▁ya ▁malagilizo . ▁Ino ▁hai fambula ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁na ku n ze ▁ya ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁no kala ▁hasi ▁ya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa ▁ku komeleze la , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya ni gaze ▁kaidi , ▁nina ▁ng ' ho vu ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lwangu ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ni ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁Na ▁imwe ▁wa ▁walala ▁waja ▁kanilongela , ▁“ Sekeu lile ! ▁Lola ▁simba ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Daudi , ▁ka huma . ▁Y eye ▁kodaha ▁ku bandul a ▁mihul a ▁saba ▁na ▁kuchi vugula ▁chitabu ▁chiya .”
▁Sa ng ' hanileni ▁vinogile ▁chila ▁nzila ▁i mwili ▁nayo , ▁kwaviya ▁siku ▁zino ▁ni ▁za ▁wihi .
▁Wa segela ▁ E si oni ▁Ge b eli ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Kadeshi , ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni .
▁Maabaho ▁wanaake ▁waja ▁wa kumbuka ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁i yawalongele .
▁ya ni chuuzi le ▁ tuka ▁da ▁Makipela ▁dili ▁habehi ▁na ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁mgunda ▁wake . ▁ Mulongele ni ▁ya ni chuuzi le ▁nitende ▁maleme ▁ya ni chuuzi le ▁kwa ▁be yi ▁yoi londeka ▁hano ▁hano ▁kuno ▁mo lola .”
▁Wamisili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁falasi ▁wawo ▁wose ▁na ▁m ituka ▁yoi bulul igwa ▁na ▁falasi ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁wawa sondelela ▁Waisilaili , ▁wa wafika ▁wo zenga ▁lago ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁bahali , ▁habehi ▁na ▁Pi ha h ilosi , ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Baali ▁Se f oni .
▁chila ▁imwe ▁keza lavigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁chilo ▁imwe , ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yanogile ▁ya ho ndigwe .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Go me li ▁wakala ▁ A shi ke na zi ▁na ▁L i fa zi ▁na ▁To goma .
▁Niye ▁ni uza , ▁‘ W eye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ▁Mndewa ?’ ▁Na ▁Mndewa ▁kani dika , ▁‘ Niye ▁ni ▁Yesu ▁weye ▁you ni gaza .’
▁Iviya ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁na ▁nhogolwa ▁inogile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁si ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁sekewa kwe hu le ▁na ▁ku gwa ▁muna ▁um t e go ▁wa ▁Mwihi .
▁Dug a ny eni ▁hana ▁dibu ga ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vomu vi ho kile ▁na ▁kuvi soma ▁moto ▁fana ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Bul ulu ▁ijo ▁dizakuwa ▁na ▁ma to ngo ▁mengi ▁siku ▁zose , ▁najo ▁hadiza zengigw a ▁kaidi .
▁Maabaho ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁dolonga , ▁“ Yandik a ▁vino , ▁wa mweda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁kulawa ▁sambi ▁wo danganika ▁wahawa ▁wa ilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa .” ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kolonga , ▁“ Ona , ▁weza humula ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamagayo ▁yawo , ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁ziza wa sondelela .”
▁ B a ha ja , ▁wanhu ▁wa hulika ▁m bumo ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁fana ▁m bumo ▁wa ▁mbeho ▁wo bu ma ▁kwa ▁ludabwa , ▁nawo ▁u memez a ▁ikaye ▁yose ▁yo wakalile ▁wanhu ▁wawo .
▁Wa ja ▁ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁iwa sisili ▁na ▁wasokile , ▁waja ▁wowa sondelele ▁waja ▁wanenehe ▁na ▁ija ▁m imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba , ▁yoi nya zigwe ▁na ▁mbeho ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁ni ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ya ▁nzala .
▁One ▁uha hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁yanogile ▁yose ▁yondaya chitendele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁weye ▁chiza ku tendela ▁ivo ▁ivo .”
▁Kawa lagiliza ▁wa kamulongele ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁Esau , ▁“ M sang ' hani ▁wako ▁Yakobo ▁kolonga ▁vino ▁‘ Ni kala ▁kuu ge ni ▁kwa ▁Labani ▁m baka ▁sambi .
▁Kwa ▁kufose la ▁yeye ▁Mulungu ▁ka umba ▁vinhu ▁vose , ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁mwiisi ▁na ▁vovi woneka ▁na ▁vo ha vi woneka , ▁wene ▁ufalume , ▁wa languliza , ▁na ▁wakulu , ▁na ▁wene ▁ludabwa . ▁V ose ▁viu mbigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake .
▁Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chi yo ka lila ▁hebu ▁ku go ne la ▁lusita ▁yahawa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake , ▁chiza kwa mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wo se ▁wowo ni na ▁Tata , ▁weza kwiza ▁kumwangu , ▁na ▁yoyose ▁yokwiza ▁kumwangu , ▁siza mwasa ▁kunze ▁bule .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁ vihanga ▁vawo ▁vi dalisa ▁hasi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wose .
▁Mbali ▁m uiteganye ▁kuwa ▁hamu ja ▁damu ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁damu ▁uwo ▁ugima , ▁ivo ▁sekemuje ▁ugima ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nyama .
▁Mwii hali ▁ino ▁ habule ▁kaidi ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁Muyahudi ▁na ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi , ▁ya gumigw e ▁ulungwana ▁na ▁ha gumigw e ▁ulungwana , ▁heli ▁mkaya ▁na ▁nyambenyambe , ▁mtumwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yailegehe . ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁chose , ▁na ▁ka mu na ▁zi mbuli ▁zose .
▁Chi muhulika ▁kolonga ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ino ▁wa ▁Nazaleti ▁keza bananga ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku galusa ▁vi hendo ▁vose ▁vochi hokele ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Musa !”
▁“ Chi nyamkela ▁yaha mulawa ▁munhu , ▁cho hita ▁hanhu ▁heli bule ▁mazi , ▁chaha zahila ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuhumula . ▁One ▁hachi patile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuhumula , ▁cho ilongela , ▁‘ Niza i bwelela ▁kaye ▁yangu ▁yoni i lawile .’
▁Ivo ▁niza igodela ▁munhu ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁siza igoda ▁niye ▁mwenyewo , ▁ka so lo ▁unyondenyonde ▁wangu .
▁ mbali ▁nzasa ▁ya ▁mazi ▁hebu ▁ kombo ▁da ▁mazi ▁ h ava mbule ▁mwiko . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁ya he ngila ▁na ▁ku dalisa ▁mtufi , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kachi tendela ▁unovu ▁ng ' hani . ▁Fan a ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁kana ▁udugi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wo igoda ▁ mbali ▁ko weng ' ha ▁unovu ▁wake ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁woi nyendanyenda .”
▁One ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁bululu ▁dimwe ▁muhala , ▁munhu ▁yo lihiliz ila ▁kodaha ▁kumsondelela . ▁Keza mgwila ▁na ▁kumkoma ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya mkomile ▁miyage , ▁inga wa ▁ha londeka ▁kukomigwa ▁kwaviya ▁ha mwi hile ▁baho ▁haichanduso .
▁Viya m fikile , ▁ka mgala ▁Antiyokiya , ▁na ▁kwa ▁mwaka ▁mgima ▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Sauli ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁na ▁wa wafundiza ▁wanhu ▁wengi . ▁Wa nahina ▁wa tangigwa ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁mwanduso ▁uko ▁Antiyokiya .
▁One ▁chiha gendelela ▁kufunya ▁umoyo , ▁iviya ▁chiza languliza ▁hamwe ▁nayo . ▁One ▁chaha m bela , ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁kezachi bela .
▁Viya malile ▁kuya longa ▁yayo , ▁ka t ema ▁mate ▁hasi , ▁m aabaho ▁ka tenda ▁n ho pe ▁na ▁ka muhaka ▁ija ▁ichi pofu ▁mmeso .
▁Ivo ▁ni humuluka ▁muladi ▁ni wakombole ▁muna ▁imi ko no ▁ya ▁Wamisili ‚ ▁nizawa lava ▁umo ▁na ▁kuwa gala ▁kuna ▁isi ▁ino ▁inogile ▁na ▁ng ' hulu , ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile ‚ ▁isi ▁ya ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁si gesa ▁kuwa ▁ni pata ▁gweko . ▁Mbali ▁notenda ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁muhala , ▁no zimiza ▁ya fosile , ▁na ▁no iyohe la ▁yeli ▁hamwande .
▁Mulungu ▁yoyo ching ' ha ▁tindiwalo ▁ya mtende ni ▁mweye ▁sekemu hungukilw e ▁na ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁mbuli ▁inogile , ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁kuya sang ' hana ▁malond o ▁yake . ▁Na ▁yatende ▁mgati ▁m mwe tu ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁mwenyewo . ▁U tunhizo ▁ka nawo ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo !
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Igolo .” ▁Musa ▁kamwidika ‚ ▁“ Niza tenda ▁fana ▁viulongile , ▁muladi ▁ uvimanye ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu .
▁“ ▁‘ Wa hishimu ▁ tati ▁yako ▁na ▁mami ▁yako , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁viya ku lagilize , ▁ tenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁u kale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁na ▁u kale ▁kwa ▁ku b we da ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yoni kwing ' ha .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamtenda ni ▁muwa hume . ▁Mwiza watendela ▁fana ▁vini mu la gi li zile ni .
▁Kwa ▁ukulu ▁wako ▁kowa g wi sa ▁hasi ▁wehi ▁wako , ▁ludoko ▁lwako ▁lo kwaka ▁na ▁kuwa lunguza ▁fana ▁ma bu wa ▁ya nya lile .
▁Mfalume ▁Agilipa , ▁vino ▁kowa huwila ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ? ▁No vimanya ▁kowa huwila !”
▁Yakobo ▁kasola ▁dibwe ▁kulu ▁na ▁kudi simika ▁fana ▁mhanda ▁ya ▁uku mbu so .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mkoma ▁mnyama ▁kolondeka ▁ya lave ▁mnyama ▁imwenga ▁muladi ▁kuliha ▁ija ▁yakomigwe , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mkoma ▁munhu ▁miyage , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Walamse ni ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁womuhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁ndugu ▁weli ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁womulamsani .
▁Waamaleki ▁wokala ▁isi ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi , ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Wayebusi ▁na ▁Waamoli ▁wokala ▁kuna ▁imilima , ▁Wakanaani ▁wokala ▁habehi ▁na ▁bahali ▁ya ▁Meditelaniya ▁na ▁mwii ng ema ▁ya ▁Yoludani .”
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁Petili , ▁“ Bwel e za ▁zele ▁jako ▁muna ▁iya la . ▁No londeka ▁ning ' wile ▁nhungo ▁ya ▁manhesa ▁yoya ning ' hile ▁Tata .”
▁One ▁iza faya ▁na ▁niye ▁ni hite ▁iviya , ▁basi ▁weza hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye .
▁Keza mtenda ni ▁muwe ▁isi ▁ng ' hulu ▁kufosa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁zi yalumbile ▁na ▁mwiza pata ▁nhogolwa ▁na ▁hishima ▁kufosa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga . ▁Mwiza kuwa ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni .”
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁mi nyo ng ' onyo ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁kanoga .” ▁Wa mwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ M b e ! ▁Ko wagiza ▁wanhu .”
▁kaidi ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁kovimanya ▁kuwa ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁wene ▁ubala ▁si ▁chinhu .”
▁Maabaho ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wose ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁m to go ze ni ▁Mndewa , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁m to go ze ni ▁yeye .”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kasola ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ku haka ▁na ▁kadi haka ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁vose ▁vovi kalile ▁mgati ▁yake ▁kavi tenda ▁ v ele .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁mulume ▁yaha msola ▁ lumbu ▁jake , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁wa ▁mami ▁yake , ▁na ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁katogola ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁na ▁ku mbandama , ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ya ▁chinyala , ▁waidi ▁wawo ▁ wolondeka ▁wa ba guligwe ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁wa tenda ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁chinyala . ▁M ulume ▁iyo ▁kezatagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁waha mbula ▁ hele ni ▁zawo ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁wa mgalila ▁Haluni .
▁Ivo ▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Waamoli .
▁“ ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalagiliza ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom duwila ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake , ▁ko i tendela ▁mwenyewo ▁yawe ▁na ▁ubananzi , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka kanha miza ▁kulonga , ▁“ Hata ▁iha londeka ▁chi danganike ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁siza ku bela .” ▁Na ▁wanahina ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁walonga ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Baho ▁wasegela ▁Misili ▁na ▁kubwela ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁Yakobo ▁mwiisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza tenda ▁vitan zi ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁mui m hindo ▁ya ▁panzia ▁da ▁uhelelo ▁da ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mwanduso , ▁kwiza tenda ▁vitan zi ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁mui m hindo ▁ya ▁panzia ▁ya ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁chi hande ▁chekaidi .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁simwe ▁dino ,
▁“ Chi muhulika ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Niza i bananga ▁Kaye ▁ino ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i zengigw e ▁kwa ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁siku ▁ya ▁tatu , ▁niza zenga ▁imwenga ▁honda ▁i zengigw e ▁bule ▁kwa ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu .’ ▁”
▁Keza mchinja ▁ndege ▁imwe ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁nongo ▁ili ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁nzasa .
▁Chi p indi ▁cha ▁ shi b e ▁hachiza kumbukigw a , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁i kwiza ▁izakuwa ▁ng ' hulu .
▁Wa wa funze ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁malagilizo ▁yako , ▁wawa funze ▁Waisilaili ▁ndagilizi ▁zako . ▁Walawi ▁wa fukiz e ▁ubani ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁wako .
▁I m ndele ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ha ya , ▁ing ' wa ▁mwenevale ,” ▁bahobaho ▁ka nenu la ▁nongo ▁yake , ▁kaya mhilila ▁na ▁kum ng ' wiza .
▁Muna ▁zisi ku ▁nhatu ▁mfalume ▁kezaku lava ▁mchifungo , ▁na ▁kuku chinja ▁ditwi ▁jako . ▁Keza ku tumbik a ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁na ▁ndege ▁wezakuja ▁nyama ▁yako .”
▁Maabaho ▁kawaleka , ▁kahita ▁hanhu ▁hata li ▁chidogo ▁ha ▁munhu ▁kwa sa ▁dibwe . ▁Ka tumbal a ▁mavindi , ▁ka tosa ,
▁Iviya ▁Muhe ▁kochi taza ▁muna ▁unyondenyonde ▁wetu , ▁hachi daha ▁kutambika ▁fana ▁voilondeka , ▁ mbali ▁Muhe ▁mwenyewo ▁kochi tambikila ▁cheye ▁kwa ▁ku gutil ila ▁haku daha ▁ku simulil wa .
▁Ch eye ▁chi umanya ▁ulondo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ino , ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ka lava ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu . ▁Na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁cho londeka ▁kulava ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wahuwila ▁wayetu .
▁Ka wedika , ▁“ Munhu ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁n ho pe , ▁kani haka ▁mmeso . ▁Maabaho ▁kanilongela ▁ni hite ▁Si lo a mu ▁ni ka na we ▁chihanga ▁changu . ▁Ni hita , ▁na ▁vini na wile , ▁bahobaho ▁ni daha ▁kuwona .”
▁Kaidi ▁niza wakoma ▁waja ▁wowo msondelela , ▁na ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁yose ▁weza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁niiyo ▁ni lole sa ▁m agesa ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁ya ▁wanhu . ▁Na ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁sang ' hano ▁yoya sang ' hane .”
▁One ▁uha wa ▁na ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wengi , ▁haweza kuwa ▁wangu ▁bule , ▁uhazi ▁wondawa pate ▁wiza lawa ▁kwa ▁Efulaimu ▁na ▁Manase .
▁Haluni ▁kezachi v a la ▁chi hande ▁icho ▁kuna ▁ichihanga ▁chake , ▁kwa ▁chi hande ▁icho ▁keza sola ▁ubananzi ▁u watendile ▁Waisilaili ▁kuna ▁uku ni lavila ▁nhosa , ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niza zi togola ▁nhosa ▁zawo . ▁Haluni ▁keza v a la ▁chi hande ▁icho ▁lusita ▁lose .
▁U mo ▁munhu ▁keza daha ▁kukimbilila ▁na ▁ku ifisa , ▁one ▁ka mkoma ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁mwihi ▁wake ▁ mbali ▁ha ilungile . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kodaha ▁kukimbilila ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe ▁mwa ▁mabululu ▁yayo ▁na ▁ku kombola ▁ugima ▁wake .
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vichi manyile ▁kuwa ▁chowa londa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku mulonda ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kutegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁zake .
▁kwaviya ▁Wayahudi ▁wengi ▁wamuhitila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁ku muhuwila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chiya ▁chi mulawilile ▁Lazalo .
▁Lelo ▁chi longele , ▁ko gesa ze ? ▁ Vinoga ▁kumwing ' ha ▁kodi ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁hebu ▁havi nogile ?”
▁Ni lola ▁mgati , ▁ni wona ▁wanyama ▁weli ▁muna ▁isi , ▁weli ▁na ▁magulu ▁mane ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁m mba go ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wowo tambala ▁na ▁vi dege ▁va ▁kuulanga .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁ha mulongele ▁m senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoyose ▁kuwa , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁ Mwanangu , ▁diyelo ▁niwa ▁ tati ▁yako .” ▁Wala ▁Mulungu ▁ha longile ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁m senga ▁wake ▁yoyose ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁“ Niza kuwa ▁Tat i ▁yake ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁ Mwanangu .”
▁Ivo , ▁Mulungu ▁ko muwonela ▁ubazi ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mulonda ▁ku muwonela ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kamtenda ▁kuwa ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mulonda .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Kulaw a ▁chip indi ▁icho , ▁Yesu ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ No londeka ▁ni hite ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Uko ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁weza ni gaza ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vingi . ▁Weza ni koma , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁ y eketatu ▁niza zilibuka .”
▁wengi la ▁mwiisafina ▁waidi ▁waidi , ▁muke ▁na ▁mulume ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Nuhu , ▁fana ▁Nuhu ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Muna ▁iisi ▁yondaya mgale ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wanhu ▁weza mwi du ka ni ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁chi lawilile ▁kumwenu , ▁uko ▁weza m ze hani .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ko bena ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁kwaviya ▁uhasanyi ▁ni ▁ku bena ▁malagilizo .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Walawi ▁wawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁“ Nyama leni ▁mu nitegeleze ▁mweye ▁Waisilaili , ▁diyelo ▁muwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Lelo ▁weza mtambikila ze ▁ija ▁wang ' hali ▁hawa muhuwila ? ▁Na ▁weza muhuwila ze ▁one ▁hawana hulika ▁usenga ▁wake ? ▁Na ▁weza hulika ze ▁one ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kuwapetela ?
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Tat i ▁yetu ▁ni ▁Bulahimu .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ One ▁mu wile ▁wana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁muha tendile ▁fana ▁Bulahimu ▁viyatendile .
▁“ Di no ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁ku zindilila ▁one ▁munhu ▁ko danganika ▁muna ▁dihema . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo kwingila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁muna ▁dihema , ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Labani ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁hu daha ▁kuni sang ' hanila ▁ bila ▁kuku liha . ▁Lelo ▁niku lihe ▁hela ▁ nyi ngahi ?”
▁Wa watanga ▁watumigwa ▁mgati ▁na ▁wawa lanha ▁mibalati ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁sekewa fundize ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu , ▁m aabaho ▁wa walekelela ▁wahite .
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wahita ▁kumuhokela ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁wa hulika ▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁chilaguso ▁chino ▁cha ▁mauzauza .
▁Keza ▁na ▁usenga ▁kwa ▁mwa li ▁imwe ▁mhambe ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Maliya . ▁I mwa li ▁iyo ▁ka londeka ▁ku fu di ki ligwa ▁na ▁mbwanga ▁imwe ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Yosefu ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Mfalume ▁Daudi .
▁Na ▁ning ' higwa ▁nzel a ▁ili ngile ▁fana ▁mhome ▁ya ▁ku li ngila , ▁ni longeligwa , ▁“ Hita ▁uka ili ng e ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁chilingo ▁na ▁kuwa peta ▁wanhu ▁wo tambika ▁umo .
▁Hata ▁wana ▁wawo ▁waidi ▁viwa kalile ▁hawana kwe lekigwa , ▁viwa kalile ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana tenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile . ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ▁imwe ▁viweli ▁fana ▁vidi li ▁lungilo ▁jake .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kamsola ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁ku mulagusa ▁kwa ▁mfalume . ▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁mfalume ,
▁ya ni ▁ng ' ombe ▁wose ▁ya sigale ▁keza lavigwa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile ▁ho ha saguligwe ▁kwa sila ▁maivu . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁kezam timbula ▁kwa ▁moto ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ngodi ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁kwi ti lila ▁maivu .
▁Amilamu ▁kamsola ▁Yo ke b e di ▁ lumbu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ‚ ▁nayo ▁kamwelek ela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Musa . ▁Am ula mu ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁saba .
▁Mbali ▁Yosefu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Siyo ! ▁Mwiza ▁ku pelemba ▁unyondenyonde ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yetu .”
▁“ N g ' ombe ▁vondaya h wa ge ▁uhemba , ▁sekeu m z ib e ▁umulomo ▁yahalonda ▁kuja .
▁Musa ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu , ▁walala ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wamsondelela .
▁muladi ▁yawa gombo le ▁wanhu ▁wolanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁muladi ▁cheye ▁chi dahe ▁kuwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Bahobaho ▁Andeleya ▁kamuwona ▁Saimoni ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi muwona ▁Mulopozi ▁yoya saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kuwakombola ▁wanhu .” ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezawa lagiliza ▁wa segeze ▁mabwe ▁yeli ▁hanhu ▁hana ▁ichi m vu g u ya ▁na ▁kuya sa ▁hanhu ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu .
▁igolo ▁mu vi gume ▁moto ▁na ▁ubani , ▁m aabaho ▁mu vi gale ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁yo sa guligwa ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ko kuwa ▁kela . ▁M weye ▁Walawi ▁yo faya !”
▁Viwa i wone ▁in hondo ▁iyo , ▁wa de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Na bule ▁hela ▁wala ▁zahabu , ▁ mbali ▁no kwing ' ha ▁chiya ▁chi ni li ▁nacho , ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁wa ▁Nazaleti , ▁ wime ▁ugen de !”
▁na ▁ mwing ' higwa ▁ugima ▁wou memile ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁nayo . ▁Y eye ▁kana ▁udahi ▁na ▁u languliza ▁kufosa ▁vinyamkela ▁wose ▁wa languliza .
▁One ▁hamu zindilile ▁na ▁kulema ▁kutegeleza ▁na ▁k ulongozi gwa ▁kutambikila ▁milungu ▁imwenga ,
▁Wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mbo na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wolonga ▁Eliya ▁kolondeka ▁kwiza ▁ teng ' hu ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁waja ▁na ▁we guta .
▁Chi tenda ▁ivo ▁siyo ▁kwaviya ▁cha bule ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku londa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁mweye , ▁ila ▁kwaviya ▁cho londa ▁kumwing ' hani ▁simwe ▁da ▁kusondelela .
▁Ch eye ▁cho vimanya ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vose ▁Mulungu ▁kotenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo mnogela , ▁waja ▁woya wa ta ngile ▁fana ▁viyalondile .
▁Ka ta zigwa ▁na ▁Oholi a bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ahi sa ma ki ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani , ▁yoya kalile ▁galu ▁wa ▁ku ha mba , ▁ku cho la ▁na ▁ku ha mba ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe .
▁Mbali ▁hu huwile ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁yondai lawilile ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwake , ▁ivo ▁hwiza daha ▁kulonga ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ijo ▁mbuli ▁zo nikulongele ▁vonda zi lawilile .”
▁He li ▁kakala ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ma tati , ▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Lawi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁M eli ki , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ya na , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ,
▁Mbali ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ka nawo ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .” ▁Baho ▁kamulongela ▁ija ▁yaholole , ▁“ Nokulongela , ▁inuka ▁ wi itwik e ▁ko mwa ▁jako , ▁uhite ▁ukaye ▁yako !”
▁Ivo ▁fana ▁ndiya ▁yo mtenda ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁ya hasanye , ▁siza kuja ▁nyama ▁ng ' o ! ▁M uladi ▁sekeni mtende ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁yatende ▁uhasanyi .
▁Lelo ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁vili ▁mgati ▁yenu ▁ni izo ▁zino . ▁U zi nzi ▁na ▁u c ha fu ▁na ▁ku ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁va ▁lukuli ,
▁One ▁D e me ti li yo ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wayage ▁wana ▁mbuli ▁na ▁munhu ▁wowose , ▁vi ta la ▁na ▁wasemi ▁wa baho . ▁Wo daha ▁ku gala ▁ulonzi ▁wawo ▁uko .
▁“ Haluni ▁vondaya komeleze ▁ku ha tendela ▁kuilumba ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁lupango , ▁keza londeka ▁ya gale ▁luti ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ A za ze li .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁weza , ▁wam papa ▁muna ▁dikomwa ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yaholole , ▁wa geza ▁kumwing iza ▁mgati ▁wa mwi ke ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize . ▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hinda ▁ulwivi ▁hachisogo ▁cha ▁Nuhu .
▁Kachi lopola ▁na ▁kuchi tanga ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁zetu ▁zinogile , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁lungilo ▁jake ▁na ▁unovu ▁wake . ▁Ka ching ' ha ▁unovu ▁uwo ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁kwandusi la ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose .
▁“ Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ulinga ▁vino . ▁U linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo zahila ▁lu lu ▁inogile .
▁Mbali ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁dibululu , ▁modaha ▁kuvi sola ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁modaha ▁kude ng ' helela ▁vinhu ▁vomu vi ho kile ▁kwa ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁viya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁ivo ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wamulongela ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya honyigwe , ▁“ Diyelo ▁ni ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo . ▁Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁yo lema ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kupapa ▁ lili ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁dino .”
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁habehi ▁na ▁chi tanda ▁cha ▁sadaka , ▁kawalola ▁wanhu ▁va wakalile ▁wo lava ▁sadaka . ▁Ma tajili ▁wengi ▁wa lava ▁hela ▁nyingi .
▁Kweli ▁cheye ▁cha ▁Wayahudi ▁kwa ▁kwelekigwa , ▁na ▁si ▁“ Wa nhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wene ▁uhasanyi ” .
▁kwaviya ▁hwiza ni leka ▁kuzimu ▁bule ▁hwiza muleka ▁mtumigwa ▁wako ▁yelile ▁yawo le ▁muna ▁dileme .
▁Leya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁yombe ▁jangu , ▁kwaviya ▁ni mwing ' ha ▁mulume ▁wangu ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁wa ▁chike ” ; ▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Isakali .
▁Wa nahina ▁viwahulike ▁dizi ▁ijo , ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa gwa ▁hasi ▁chingubingubi .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ No vimanya ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁kokwiza , ▁na ▁vondayeze ▁keza chilongela ▁chila ▁chinhu .”
▁Niye ▁no mmanya ▁kwaviya ▁ni lawa ▁kumwake , ▁nayo ▁iyo ▁yoyanhumile .”
▁Yakobo ▁viya fosile ▁P e n u eli , ▁zuwa ▁di kala ▁do so mo za , ▁kakala ▁yon j umbila ▁kwaviya ▁ka si g u ka ▁i chigudi .
▁Wa segela ▁L ib i na ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁L i sa .
▁Chi p indi ▁isi ▁vi i kalile , ▁ msimu ▁wa ▁ku handa ▁na ▁kugobola , ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁chi hu he ▁na ▁vuke ▁na ▁ma si ka ▁na ▁zua , ▁chilo ▁na ▁m isi , ▁havi za mala .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwakombola ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁ 2 7 3 , ▁ wongezeke ▁muna ▁i peta ▁ya ▁walume ▁wa ▁Walawi .
▁Hata ▁cheye ▁chose ▁chi kala ▁fana ▁wawo , ▁chi kala ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁zili ▁mgati ▁yetu ▁na ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zozi nogeza ▁ng ' huli ▁na ▁nzewele ▁zetu , ▁fana ▁vichili ▁chi londeka ▁kupata ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Ni hinduka ▁na ▁ni hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁umulima . ▁Maabaho ▁fana ▁viya ni lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ni ka ▁vi bawo ▁ivo ▁muna ▁disanduku ▁di nitendile , ▁navo ▁va mgati ▁ya ▁sanduku ▁ijo .”
▁ mbali ▁chilumb e ▁chochose ▁chochi kala ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁chili bule ▁m pe pe ▁hebu ▁ma kala ba ndu , ▁vi we ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vovi genda ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁hebu ▁vilumb e ▁vose ▁vovi kala ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ulwanda , ▁vo tibusa ▁kumwenu .
▁Kwa viya ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁kuilumba ▁kwiza tendigw a ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁muladi ▁kum safya ni , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza safyigwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁wose ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ku i chuwala ▁habehi ▁na ▁Betelehemu ▁kukala ▁na ▁wa dimi ▁wowa kalile ▁wo kaliza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁mifu go ▁yawo ▁ichilo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Izoni ▁muje .” ▁Habule ▁mwanahina ▁ya mu u zile , ▁“ W eye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ?” ▁kwaviya ▁wa mmanya ▁kakala ▁Mndewa .
▁“ Ivo ▁nowalongela ni , ▁ pule ni ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kwing ' higwa , ▁za hileni ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza pata , ▁ho di ze ni ▁na ▁mwiza vugulil igwa .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ka uza ▁chiya ▁chi lawilile ▁kwa ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁Waisilaili , ▁ka longiligwa ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁hata ▁mnyama ▁imwe ▁yafile . ▁Hata ▁ivo ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁ka gendelela ▁kuwa ▁na ▁moyo ▁mdala , ▁hawa lekele ▁wanhu ▁wahite .
▁Wa nhu ▁wahita ▁kuwona ▁chiya ▁chochilawilile . ▁Viwafikile ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa muwona ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya la wigwe ▁na ▁chinyamkela ▁kakala ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁ya ▁Yesu , ▁kayawala ▁viwalo , ▁na ▁nzewele ▁zake ▁zi mbwelela . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wadumba .
▁M uladi ▁kuisafya ▁kaye ▁iyo , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁ndege ▁waidi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mwele zi , ▁ s ufu ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁tambi ▁da ▁hisopo .
▁Vi leme la ▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁mauzauza ▁yano ▁yose ▁haulongozi ▁wawo , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁hawa mtogole ▁bule .
▁Iviya ▁wakala ▁na ▁vi so mba ▁vi dodo . ▁Yesu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Mulungu ▁hewela , ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa wagolele ▁wanhu ▁iviya .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁mab ung ' hulo ▁maidi ▁makulu , ▁zua ▁di mwemwese ▁imisi ▁na ▁mwezi ▁u mwemwese ▁ichilo , ▁iviya ▁kau sa ▁nhondo .
▁Maabaho ▁keza segeza ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁fana ▁viyo segeza ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza ya timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zozi lavigwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Ivo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mtendela ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁kezalekelelwa .
▁Sekemu lihe ▁dihile ▁kwa ▁dihile ▁hebu ▁ li go ▁kwa ▁ li go , ▁ mbali ▁muwa temele ▁mate , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁vi yamtangile ni ▁kamulongela ni ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kamwidika ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ‚ ▁“ Lola , ▁Waisilaili ▁hawa nitegeleze . ▁Lelo ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁keza ni tegeleza ? ▁Niye ▁sidaha ▁kulonga ▁vinogile !”
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁chi wakalile ▁wo gesa , ▁ivo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ufalume ▁wowose ▁wo wi igola ▁wenyewo ▁vi bumbila ▁vi bumbila ▁vovi itowa ▁ v e n ye wo ▁kwa ▁ v e n ye wo ▁hawiza daha ▁ng ' hani ▁bule . ▁Na ▁bululu ▁jojose ▁hebu ▁lukolo ▁lo lo se ▁yoi igola ▁yenyewo ▁kwa ▁yenyewo ▁muna ▁ivi bumbila ▁ bumbila ▁vovi itowa ▁ v e n ye wo ▁kwa ▁ v e n ye wo , ▁viza ku gwa .
▁Muna ▁yamalaguso ▁kamuwona ▁munhu ▁zina ▁jake ▁Ananiya ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁na ▁ku mwikila ▁makono ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁kuwona ▁kaidi .
▁Ka muhitila , ▁kamwamha ▁mkono ▁na ▁kum winula . ▁U tamu ▁u mulawa , ▁na ye ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwa sang ' hanila .
▁Iyo he ▁ku mtaza ▁Ze no ▁munhu ▁wa ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁Apolo , ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁wawo ▁na ▁kupata ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho wo chi londa .
▁“ L usita ▁ulo ▁chi sola ▁isi ▁iyo ▁ya ▁wafalume ▁waidi ▁wa ▁Waamoli ▁wa kalile ▁wokala ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁kulawa ▁kudi ko lo ngo ▁da ▁Alinoni ▁m baka ▁kumulima ▁wa ▁Helim oni .”
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁walume ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁m baka ▁m alongo ▁matano , ▁wowo daha ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁muladi ▁wa sang ' hane ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka potigwa ▁kuwa gala ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ iyawalaganile ▁kuweng ' ha , ▁ivo ▁ka wakoma ▁kuichuwala .’
▁Kumbuk eni ▁chiya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁chiya mtendele ▁Miliamu ▁vimu kalile ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁kulawa ▁Misili .
▁“ W e za sola ▁chitambala ▁cha ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁vitasa ▁na ▁vitasa ▁vake ▁na ▁mi ba to ▁yake ▁na ▁vya no ▁vake ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vovi sang ' haniligwa ▁kwikil a ▁mavuta .
▁Wa lawilila ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁ivo ▁wafundiza ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁weza lawilila ▁kumwenu . ▁Wawo ▁weza m fundiza ni ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁yoyo gala ▁kunangigwa ▁na ▁ku mulema ▁Mndewa ▁yoya wakombole , ▁na ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁weza i galila ▁kwa ▁kusi nhu ki za ▁madang a ni zi ▁wawo ▁wenyewo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalola ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu mweda ▁mweye ▁ngayengaye , ▁kwaviya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁wenu !
▁Weza lema ▁kutegeleza ▁ukweli ▁na ▁weza tegeleza ▁si mo ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁I lole ▁goya ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁yako . ▁Ge ndele la ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁kwaviya ▁one ▁uha tenda ▁ivo , ▁kwiza i lopola ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁kuwa lopola ▁waja ▁wo ku hulika .
▁Viwa segele ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁wa wafika ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wowa kalile ▁wowa gozela .
▁Mbali ▁nhulanyika ▁diya ▁na ▁wayage ▁wa hu migwa , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hawo ▁ha ▁kukala ▁ha ha woneke ▁kaidi ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wo se ▁wa lila , ▁wa mu ha gati la ▁na ▁wam nonela , ▁m aabaho ▁wa mu la ga .
▁Mbali ▁weye ▁sekeu togole , ▁kwaviya ▁hana ▁wanhu ▁kufosa ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁wa isasala ▁kum zum hila ▁wa ilaha ▁haweza kuja ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁wala ▁haweza kung ' wa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁m baka ▁vondawa mkome ▁Paulo . ▁ Sambi ▁wakala ▁goya ▁wo gozela ▁ ulamuzi ▁wako .”
▁Vi kalilo ▁va ▁luwa ▁lu zunguluke ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁va ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁luwa ▁na ▁vi g ingi ▁vose ▁va ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁va ▁luwa .
▁Na yo ▁kawedika , ▁“ Ni watenda ▁mweye ▁mu zi manye ▁Mbuli ▁za ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁nowalongela ▁kwa ▁masimwe , ▁muladi , ▁‘ wa lole ▁ mbali ▁sekewa wone , ▁na ▁wa hulike ▁ mbali ▁sekewa vimanye .’
▁Musa ▁ka mchinja ▁ng ' hondolo ▁iyo , ▁m aabaho ▁idamu ▁ka iti lila ▁muna ▁zi banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁lupango .
▁Bahobaho ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka ndusa ▁kuhulika ▁na ▁lu da n ha ▁lwa ▁lulimi ▁lwake ▁lu le gela , ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga ▁goya .
▁Ivo ▁chi gala ▁vinhu ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁chiya patile ▁chila ▁munhu , ▁vi a ▁va ▁zahabu ▁na ▁vi g uku ▁na ▁ ba ng ili ▁na ▁ mhete ▁za ▁chilaguso ▁na ▁vi p uli ▁na ▁u sa lu . ▁Chi vi lava ▁fana ▁maliho ▁kwa ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kenul igwa ▁m baka ▁kuulanga . ▁Nolonga ▁kaidi ▁iwe ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kenul igwa ▁chi lu ku li ▁hebu ▁chimuhe ▁niye ▁si vimanyile , ▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ▁kovimanya
▁Maabaho ▁Felisi , ▁ya manyile ▁goya ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Nzi la ▁ija , ▁ ke miza ▁ imbuli ▁iyo . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ L isi ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁vondayeze , ▁niza lamula ▁mbuli ▁yenu .”
▁Fan a ▁kwa ▁kulema ▁kutegeleza ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁uhasanyi . ▁Iviya ▁kutegeleza ▁kwa ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza petigwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Izo ▁chitende ▁lagano ▁niye ▁na ▁weye , ▁iwe ▁ukalangama ▁hagati ▁ya ▁weye ▁na ▁niye .”
▁Ha mwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁iyo ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁ya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁keza gala ▁magate ▁yoya gumigw e ▁lusu .
▁Wem ili zi ▁wawo ▁wa iyoha ▁kulonga ‚ ▁“ Ko me le ze ni ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zi mu tenda ga ▁fana ▁baho ▁umwaka ▁vimu kalile ▁mo galil igwa ▁mayani .”
▁Uko ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Zakaliya , ▁kamul a m sa ▁Elizabeti .
▁Niza ▁wa lagusa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yokwiza ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁kuni tegeleza ▁na ▁kuni hulika
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁mo yamanya ▁vinogile ▁yonda ni longe , ▁kwaviya ▁nolonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo kwamha ▁ndagilizi . ▁N dagilizi ▁yom tawala ▁munhu ▁yahawa ▁ngima .
▁I chigulogulo ▁diza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁ng ' h wa le ▁na ▁wa di gubika ▁dilago ▁da ▁Waisilaili , ▁imitondo ▁ nhu ng we ▁i zunguluka ▁lago ▁jose .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁wa londeni ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁yanogile , ▁wa kwa zi me ni ▁wanhu ▁ bila ▁ku lolela ▁ku bwele zi ligwa . ▁Maabaho ▁gweko ▁jenu ▁dizakuwa ▁kulu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Uchanyha ▁Ng ' hani . ▁Kwa viya ▁yeye ▁kanoga ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli bule ▁hewela ▁na ▁wehi .
▁Ivo ▁wanage ▁Yakobo ▁wabwela ▁kulawa ▁ku dima ▁wanyama ▁wawo , ▁viwahulike ▁ivo ▁wa wona ▁usungu ▁na ▁wehilw a ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁yoyatendile ▁Shekemu , ▁kwaviya ▁kawa liga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁kwa ▁ku mbandama ▁kwa ▁shuluti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁mwiko .
▁“ Walongele ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁zo nda wa ni lavile ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto ▁zizakuwa ▁vino , ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁maidi ▁yeli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁yeli bule ▁chilema , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Uko ▁chi wawona ▁Wa ne fi li , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Ana ki . ▁Chi iwona ▁wenyewo ▁fana ▁ mba la ng ulu , ▁nawo ▁ni ivo ▁vo wa chi wonile .”
▁Mbuli ▁iyo ▁si ▁ya ▁kwazanya ▁kwaviya ▁Lufyende ▁mwenyewo ▁ko wavwizila ▁wanhu ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁m senga ▁wa ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁yoya tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁nolonga ▁vino . ▁ Mwaha iting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁kum tambika ▁Mulungu , ▁imwe ▁ye m b e ▁wila , ▁imwenga ▁ya lave ▁mafundizo , ▁imwenga ▁ya sang ' hanile ▁chitumetume ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁cha ▁kulonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁yawe ▁na ▁ma gubul o ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ya fa mbule ▁yoyo longigwa . ▁Yo se ▁yawe ▁kwa ▁kuwataza ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Vino ▁kuna ▁munhu ▁kumwenu ▁ka p a ti gwa ▁na ▁yehile ? ▁Na ya tose ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka na ▁moyo ▁wa ▁kusang a la la ? ▁Na ye m b e ▁nyila ▁za ▁nhogolwa .
▁“ ▁‘ Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule . ▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ulupango .
▁Kwa viya ▁siku ▁yo za kwiza , ▁wehi ▁wako ▁vondawa ku zengele ▁mhongono , ▁wezaku zunguluka ▁na ▁kuku mi nya mi nya ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁Mbali ▁ichilo ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁Abimeleki ▁muna ▁zinzozi ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Kwiza danganika ▁kwaviya ▁kumsola ▁muke ▁ino , ▁yoya malile ▁ku soligwe .”
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁niye ▁nowalongela , ▁sekemwi i bwelezele ▁na ▁iyo ▁munhu ▁yehile . ▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha ku towa ▁ka nza ▁da ▁kulume , ▁iviya ▁mu lekelele ▁ya ku towe ▁ka nza ▁da ▁kumoso .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Yuda ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Shela ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Pelesi ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Ze la .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ‚
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁seke mwing i l we ▁na ▁luholozi ▁na ▁sekemu ila u mu ▁we n ye we ▁kwaviya ▁muni chuuza . ▁Mulungu ▁kani tuma ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu ▁muladi ▁ni kombole ▁ugima ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁Petili ▁ka bela ▁kaidi , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Aka .” ▁Bahobaho ▁nz ogolo ▁keka .
▁Kwa viya ▁Waisilaili ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wangu , ▁woni wa lavile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Petili ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Kwa ▁wageni .” ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vinoga . ▁Ivo ▁wakaya ▁hawa londeka ▁kuliha ▁kodi ▁bule .
▁Ihaw a ▁cho mulole la ▁ng ' hani ▁Chilisito ▁muna ▁ugima ▁uno ▁muhala , ▁basi ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ku wone ligwa ▁ubazi ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁chi fosa ▁mwii i fa ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ugima , ▁kwaviya ▁chowa londa ▁wahuwila ▁wayetu , ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁ulondo ▁kokala ▁muna ▁i i fa .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa muhokele ▁na ▁wowa muhuwile , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ng a ye - ngaye ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁ko londa ▁kuja ▁ masigavu ▁ya la gale ▁muna i me za ▁ya ▁tajili ▁ija . ▁Na ▁zimbwa ▁zi kala ▁zo kwiza ▁ku mu la mbi ta ▁vi londa ▁vake .
▁Mu chi tose le ▁cheye ▁iviya , ▁muladi ▁Mulungu ▁ya ching ' he ▁nzila ▁inogile ▁ya ▁kupeta ▁usenga ▁wake ▁hau manyika ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁leka mana ▁niye ▁sambi ▁na mu na ▁ichifungo .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo vabik a ▁gate ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁muna ▁ichi zi ga , ▁iyo ▁yondaya ni hinduke .
▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁vinoga ▁ng ' hani ▁one ▁na ha sigala ▁kukala .
▁baho ▁kodaha ▁kusang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wake , ▁fana ▁waja ▁Walawi ▁wamwenga ▁viwo sang ' hanila ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Viya ni gi dile ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁hela ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lwangu , ▁ka funga nya ▁ku wandigwa ▁kwangu .
▁Ha mwe ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁kwiza lava ▁chi baba ▁cha ▁usage ▁lu n hi li ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yanogile ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁divai ▁fana ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Fan a ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Vi ya kweli le ▁kuchanyha ▁ng ' hani , ▁kasola ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo kwa m hi li ligwa ▁hamwe ▁na ye , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁vitumetume .”
▁Lelo ▁mo wona ▁munhu ▁ino ▁viyeli ▁mkulu . ▁Hata ▁Bulahimu ▁wa saho ▁yetu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁viya patile ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo .
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁viwa iting ' hane , ▁Pilato ▁kawauza , ▁“ M o londa ▁ni mu lekelele ▁yelihi , ▁Balaba ▁hebu ▁Yesu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Chilisito ?”
▁Maabaho ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wenu ka , ▁wa ngala ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁Pilato .
▁“ Niza watenda ▁Wamisili ▁wano ge ▁kumwenu ▁muladi ▁vondamu segele ‚ ▁sekemu segele ▁makono ▁muhala .
▁Kwa viya ▁mu umanya ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁inga wa ▁kakala ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ka itenda ▁ngayengaye ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁kwa ▁u ngaye ngaye ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁ zindilile ni ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁kwa ▁kumsondelela ▁yeye ▁na ▁kumdumba .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁ni ▁ya ▁chilaho ▁hebu ▁ya ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo , ▁iza digwa ▁siku ▁ija ▁iyo lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake . ▁Yo nda i sigale ▁iza digwa ▁igolo ▁yake .
▁ Mwing ' heni ▁ngayengaye ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi ▁na ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁umwe ▁ bila ▁kulongelela , ▁kwaviya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chimu sang ' hana .
▁Abimeleki ▁kamulongela ▁Isaka , ▁“ Segel a ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yetu , ▁mana ▁weye ▁kuna ▁nguvu ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁cheye .”
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza vi sola ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo ▁na ▁kuvi timbula ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ulupango ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁kutimbuligwa , ▁vi we ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wou ni nogeza ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Iyo ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁yoi timbuligwa ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Sol a ▁ch etezo ▁chako ▁uchi gume ▁moto ▁wou lawa ▁hana ▁ulupango , ▁m aabaho ▁uchi gume ▁ubani ▁uhite ▁nacho ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁himahima ▁uka watendele ▁kuilumba . ▁L udoko ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁luwa fikila ▁na ▁ hulo ▁jandusa ▁kuwa pata .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Lola ! ▁Ku nihuwila ▁kwa ko ▁ku kuhonya .”
▁Yesu ▁viyamuwonile ▁mami ▁yake , ▁na ▁habehi ▁yake ▁kema ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁iya mulondile , ▁kamulongela ▁mami ▁yake , ▁“ Mama , ▁ lola , ▁iyo ▁niiyo ▁mwanago .”
▁Mbali ▁kumwangu ▁niye ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁ku tagusigwa ▁na ▁mweye ▁hebu ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wala ▁si i tagusa ▁niye ▁mwenyewo .
▁kawa gula ▁kwa ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ivo ▁sang ' hanileni ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Mndele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kamulongela ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁“ M sole ▁imwana ▁ino ▁u nyo ng ' he ze le , ▁nizaku liha .” ▁Ivo ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁kamsola ▁imwana ▁ka mo ng ' heza .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Salayi , ▁mfalume ▁ka mtendela ▁yanogile ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁ka hokela ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike ▁na ▁ngamiya .
▁Iyo heni ▁ng ' hani ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁na ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ kwela , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo onda ▁ya muwone ▁Mndewa ▁ bila ▁kuwa ▁yelile .
▁K i m bila ! ▁ H i ma hi ma ! ▁ Siza daha ▁kutenda ▁chochose ▁m baka ▁vondau fike ▁uko .” ▁Lutu ▁kadi tanga ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁“ S o a li ” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ D o do .”
