▁Yesu ▁kachi bwakila ▁icho ▁chinyamkela , ▁“ Nyama la ! ▁Mu lawe ▁munhu ▁ino !” ▁Maabaho ▁chinyamkela ▁icho ▁ching wi sa ▁hasi ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁haulongozi ▁hawo ▁na ▁kulawa ▁ bila ▁ku mu lumiza .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Kola , ▁“ Tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁wana ▁wa ▁Lawi !
▁Malagilizo ▁yayo ▁yayo ▁yo mson hela ▁mkaya ▁Muisilaili ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁na ▁mweye .”
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Mbali ▁Yohana ▁keza , ▁ka funga ▁kuja ▁na ▁ha ng ' wile ▁bule ▁divai , ▁wanhu ▁walonga , ▁‘ Ka na ▁chinyamkela !’
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ I b o mo leni ▁Kaye ▁ino ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza i zenga ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu !”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wakala ▁wo ilongela , ▁“ Vino ▁zino ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ki ? ▁Munhu ▁ino ▁kana ▁udahi ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁ku bwakila ▁vinyamkela , ▁navo ▁vomu hulika !”
▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁mtumigwa , ▁si tangigwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wala ▁si tumigwe ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁Tata , ▁yoya m zilibule ▁Yesu ▁kulawa ▁kowa danganike .
▁Paulo ▁viyakalile ▁yowa go za ▁Sila ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁uko ▁Asen e , ▁kehilwa ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake ▁viya wonile ▁bululu ▁diya ▁di mema ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zi gendelela ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁midi , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁Asiya , ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁wa hulike ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Ha m somile ▁ a ndi ko ▁jelile ▁vo di longa . ▁‘ Dib we ▁do wa lemile ▁wa ze nzi ▁kuzengela , ▁diwa ▁dibwe ▁dinogile ▁kufosa ▁mabwe ▁yose ▁ya ▁kuzengela .
▁Yesu ▁kawatanga ▁hamwe ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kulava ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁ kuhonya ▁watamu .
▁ mbali ▁one ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo , ▁kolondeka ▁ya sigale ▁mgane ▁hebu ▁ya i l umbe ▁na ▁mulumake , ▁na ▁mulume ▁kolondeka ▁sekeya mwing ' he ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Hebu ▁mwo gesa ▁waja ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁wa nane ▁wowadanganike ▁kwa ▁ku la galil igwa ▁na ▁lingo ▁uko ▁Si lo a mu ▁wakala ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁Yelusalemu ?
▁Maabaho ▁ni di wona ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁na ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁wawo , ▁waiting ' hana ▁kutenda ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁ija ▁ya kalile ▁muna ▁ifa la si ▁mzelu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁wawo .
▁Di no ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁ku zindililigw a ▁siku ▁zose , ▁m olondeka ▁mudi zindilile ▁muladi ▁kuwatendela ▁kuilumba ▁Waisilaili ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁chila ▁mwaka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .” ▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁yose ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Mu ha hita ▁kuitowa ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yaha mtenda ni ▁mu hume ▁na ▁kuwa sola ▁wa fungwa ,
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu sang ' hana ▁vinogile ▁kuwa ▁m v ava ▁na ▁niye ▁muna ▁uzidilwa ▁wangu .
▁mwana ▁wa ▁M eli ki , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Adi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ko sa mu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Eli ma da mu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Eli ,
▁Mbali ▁ni nawo ▁wa li ▁waidi ▁wang ' hali ▁mhambe . ▁ Leke ni ▁ni mwing ' heni ▁wawo ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza watenda ▁chochose ▁chi mulonda ▁kuwatenda . ▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁sekemu watende ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁wano ▁ni ▁nyambenyambe ▁wangu , ▁no londeka ▁niwa kalize .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁mfalume ▁na ▁kusegela .
▁Bulahimu ▁wa itogolela ▁na ▁Efiloni , ▁ka muli ngila ▁chi bugulu ▁cha ▁hela ▁chiya londile ▁kuno ▁Wahiti ▁wose ▁wo lola , ▁shekel i ▁magan a ▁mane ▁ya ▁hela , ▁chiya si ▁cha ▁wa c hulu zi ▁wa ▁chip indi ▁icho .
▁No wa wonela ▁migongo ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyo wa wonela ▁migongo , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁fana ▁mhambe ▁niwa sole la ▁mulume ▁imwe , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁ku mgalila ▁Chilisito .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁kwo i lavila ▁ukalangama ▁wako ▁mwenyewo , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁chiu longa ▁siyo ▁kweli .”
▁Hamwande ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mkwenhukila , ▁nayo ▁kaweng ' ha ▁ndagilizi ▁zose ▁zi yeng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuja ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho vimanya ▁m baka ▁vino ▁sambi , ▁vi umbe ▁vose ▁vo gutil ila ▁kwa ▁usungu , ▁fana ▁usungu ▁wa ▁ku ibasula ▁mwana .
▁Balinaba ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁yanogile , ▁ka mema ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁uhuwilo , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa mbwelela ▁Mndewa .
▁Baho ▁hakala ▁mi zi ga ▁sita ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁i kigwa ▁mazi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chihendo ▁cha ▁Wayahudi ▁cha ▁kuna wa ▁nhende . ▁Chila ▁ziga ▁do daha ▁ku mema ▁nongo ▁nne ▁m baka ▁tano .
▁Mbali ▁viilondeka ▁ku mulekela ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁moyo , ▁sekeya gumigw e ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku ka n hi zigwa ▁tama a ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ka vugula ▁mwi na ▁wa ▁dikombo ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo , ▁na ▁yosi ▁di lawa ▁muna ▁u mwin a ▁uwo ▁dili ngile ▁fana ▁yosi ▁dodi lawa ▁muna ▁di ta n uli ▁kulu , ▁zuwa ▁na ▁ulanga ▁vi gumigw a ▁ziza ▁kwa ▁yosi ▁di lawile ▁mudi kombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo .
▁Mwenevale , ▁one ▁imwe ▁wetu ▁yaha woneka ▁ka nayo , ▁yakomigwe , ▁na ▁chondachi sigale ▁chi zakuwa ▁watumwa ▁wako .”
▁Efiloni ▁mwenyewo ▁kakala ▁imwe ▁wa ▁Wahiti ▁wawo ▁wowa kalile ▁waiting ' hana ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dibululu . ▁Ivo ▁Efiloni ▁Mu hiti ▁kamwidika ▁Bulahimu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁baho ,
▁I chigulogulo ▁Yakobo ▁viyakalile ▁ko bwela ▁kulawa ▁kuchuwala , ▁Leya ▁kahita ▁kumuhokela ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Chi lo ▁cha ▁diyelo ▁uhite ▁kugona ▁kumwangu ▁kwaviya ▁ni kwing ' ha ▁makalanga ▁ya ▁mwanangu .” ▁Ivo ▁chilo ▁icho ▁kagona ▁nayo .
▁I lawilila ▁vino ▁muladi ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yatimie , ▁“ Habule ▁hata ▁ vu ha ▁jake ▁dimwe ▁dondadi benigw e .”
▁Chilo ▁chimwe , ▁wanhu ▁viwa gonile ▁munhu ▁yehile ▁kumwake ▁ka handa ▁ savu ▁muna ▁uhemba , ▁m aabaho ▁kahita .
▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Wa lekeni ▁wana ▁wadoododo ▁weze ▁kumwangu , ▁sekemuwa leme se . ▁Kwa viya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ni ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁fana ▁wawo .”
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kengila ▁mwi ▁ingalawa , ▁kalu sola ▁u lwa vu ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁isi ▁inyalile . ▁Lu mema ▁somba ▁wakulu ▁gana ▁dimwe ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁na ▁watatu . ▁I nga wa ▁kukala ▁na ▁somba ▁wengi , ▁lwavu ▁ha lu du mu ke ▁bule .
▁Laheli ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni kala ▁na ▁u go m vi ▁mkulu ▁na ▁mwa li ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁ni huma .” ▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁Nafutali .
▁Kwiza tumbik a ▁dipanzia ▁muna ▁i zi m handa ▁nne ▁za ▁mkenge ▁zozi ha kigwe ▁zahabu , ▁zili ▁na ▁ng wamo ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vi ne ▁va ▁hela .
▁Ya tendile ▁magayo ▁yayo ▁siyo ▁Mulungu ▁ yamtangile ni ▁bule .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁walondwa ▁sekemu zimize ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁ka hu ha ▁kuhulika , ▁ mbali ▁sekeya hu he ▁kulonga ▁wala ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ludoko .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁zenu ▁zi mu nilongele ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ni hulika ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁zo wa kulongele , ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zi walongile ▁zino ga .
▁Kwa viya ▁zaka ▁zowo ni lavila ▁Waisilaili ▁ni weng ' ha ▁Walawi ▁kuwa ▁uhazi ▁wawo . ▁Leka mana ▁nilonga ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁haweza kuwa ▁na ▁uhazi ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili .”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁wa delenya ! ▁Mu la gula ▁Isaya ▁ kala gula ▁vinogile ▁kumwenu ▁va yalongile , ▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wo n ho go za ▁kwa ▁mi lomo ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁ya ku tali ▁na ▁niye .
▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁niuwo ▁usenga ▁wetu ▁wowa ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yetu , ▁usenga ▁uwo ▁u manyika ▁na ▁ku somigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Malagilizo ▁yayo ▁yoya ching ' hile ▁Musa , ▁ni ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁Yakobo .
▁mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁moto ▁wou timbula , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁migongo .
▁Viwafikile ▁kuna ▁dibululu , ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁ichiheleto ▁cha ▁uchanyha ▁chi wakalile ▁wokala . ▁Na wo ▁wakala ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Andeleya ▁na ▁Filipo ▁na ▁Tomasi ▁na ▁ B a tu lo ma yo ▁na ▁Masa yo ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A lu fa yo ▁na ▁Saimoni ▁Ze lo ti ▁na ▁Yuda ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yakobo .
▁“ Ino ▁Musa ▁iyo ▁ija ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁wa mu lemile , ▁viwa mulongele , ▁‘ Vino ▁yelihi ▁ya k wi kile ▁weye ▁kuwa ▁mtawala ▁na ▁m ulamuzi ▁wetu ?’ ▁Kufos ela ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁yoya mu lawile ▁Musa ▁muna ▁ichi ba go ▁chochi kalile ▁cho kwaka ▁moto ▁kudibwilingu , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtuma ▁iyo ▁Musa ▁yawe ▁mulangulizi ▁na ▁ mkombola .
▁Ng ' holo ▁za ▁Wa l ib i ni ▁na ▁Wa shi me i ▁zi lawa ▁kwa ▁Gelishoni .
▁Pilato ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁kaidi , ▁kawalongela ▁Wayahudi , ▁“ Loleni , ▁no mulava ▁kumwenu ▁muladi ▁muvimanye ▁si patile ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kumtagusa .”
▁Munhu ▁keza kwika ▁mkono ▁wake ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku mchinja ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁wezakwi ti lila ▁damu ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁ulupango .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ W elesi ▁wa ▁siku ▁zino !” ▁W i hile ▁na ▁wazinzi ▁wo londa ▁chilaguso ? ▁Bule ! ▁Mbali ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Yona .
▁Ivo ▁chodaha ▁kulonga ▁vino , ▁lusita ▁Bulahimu ▁viya li hile ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu , ▁na ▁iviya ▁Lawi ▁yo hokela ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁ka liha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁kufose la ▁yeye .
▁Mwii teganye ▁muladi ▁sekem wagize ▁yaja ▁yo chitendile , ▁ mbali ▁mwiza gwe kigwa ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ni mwing ' ha ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ku samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wake , ▁ mbali ▁halondile ▁ku leka ▁ugoni ▁wake .
▁Ka ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yo kala ▁siku ▁zose , ▁Mulungu ▁ yalumbile ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁na ▁bahali ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo . ▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kalonga , ▁“ Habule ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ku gozela ▁kaidi .”
▁M olondeka ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁chiza wa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga . ▁Mbali ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ugima ▁uno ▁siyo ▁chinhu ▁chikulu !
▁Wa tenda ▁chizibawo ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe .
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁mbuli ▁yoi longigwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ iti mi ye , ▁“ Niza longa ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁masimwe , ▁niza walongela ▁mbuli ▁hazi manyike ▁kulawa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Niye ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁dodi zile ▁mwiisi , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo nihuwila ▁sekewa kale ▁muna ▁diziza .
▁V oni kwandikila ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁kwiza ni hulika ▁na ▁kwiza tenda ▁kufosa ▁viya ▁vini longa .
▁Fan a ▁Isaya ▁viyalongile ▁kulonga , ▁“ One ▁Mndewa ▁mwene ▁ludabwa ▁lose ▁sigambe ya u lekelele ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁chiha wile ▁fana ▁Sodoma , ▁chi hali ngile ▁fana ▁Gomola .”
▁L usita ▁lo kwiza ▁walume ▁wamwenga ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jenu ▁wenyewo ▁vondawa mulongeleni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi ▁muladi ▁ku wagiza ▁waja ▁wowamsondelel a ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kuwatenda ▁wawa sondelele ▁wawo ▁muhala .
▁Kwa viya ▁vimu kalile ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁uhasanyi , ▁mukala ▁hamu langulizigw a ▁na ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁chi se ge ▁cha ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁na ▁ma andazi ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁na ▁magate ▁ma sisili ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁ya b o b o di gwe ▁mavuta ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁usage ▁na ▁ching ' waji .
▁Vino ▁iyo ▁si i yo ▁mwanage ▁ija ▁im songola ▁vinhu ▁na ▁iviya ▁mami ▁yake ▁niiyo ▁yo tangigwa ▁Maliya ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁niwa wo ▁wo tangigwa ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wo tangigwa ▁Saimoni ▁na ▁Yuda ?
▁Mfalume ▁ka mbweleza ▁ mwika goya ▁ving ' waji ▁muna ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁wa ▁kung ' wiza , ▁muladi ▁ya mwing ' he ▁nhungo ▁mfalume ▁muna ▁yamakono .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M afundizo ▁yoni fundiza ▁siyo ▁yangu ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁yo lawa ▁kwa ▁ija ▁ya ni tu mile .
▁Chila ▁hanhu ▁honda mu b o jo ge ▁heza kuwa ▁henu . ▁Isi ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁kwandusi la ▁kuchuwala , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁m baka ▁milima ▁ya ▁L e ba no ni ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi , ▁kulawa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Efulati , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁m baka ▁bahali ▁ya ▁Meditelaniya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ M iyanza ▁mingi ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁wo funga ▁kuja ▁na ▁wo tosa , ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Mafalisayo ▁wo tenda ▁ivo ▁ivo , ▁ mbali ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁woja ▁na ▁kung ' wa !”
▁Kwiza i tendela ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁hasi ▁muna ▁ ulu ki ngo ▁lwa ▁ mba vu ▁zake ▁mbili ▁zozi ilola , ▁ mhete ▁izo ▁ziza sang ' haniligwa ▁kwa mhilila ▁mibiki ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁kui p a p ila .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁ulel wa ▁uli bule ▁uhuwilo ! ▁Ng ' ha le ▁na ▁mweye ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁M gale ni ▁kumwangu .”
▁Maabaho ▁Paulo ▁viya vimanyile ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁baho ▁wengi ▁wakala ▁Masadukayo ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁Mafalisayo , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁niye ▁ni ▁Mfalisayo ▁na ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ma fa li sa yo . ▁Niye ▁no tagusigwa ▁kwaviya ▁no lolela ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁weza zilibuka !”
▁Kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁no mwing ' hani ▁u si ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kuwa ▁wose ▁mu longe ▁zi mwe ▁na ▁wala ▁sekemu i s we le ▁na ▁mu gese ▁dimwe ▁na ▁muwe ▁na ▁lungilo ▁dimwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁umwaka ▁mu tenda ▁fana ▁viwo tenda ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu , ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ugoni ▁na ▁tama a ▁zihile ▁na ▁uko lwa ▁na ▁ma du gi li ▁yaja ▁wanhu ▁wo ng ' wa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁za ▁chinyala ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kwi hiza ▁za ▁kutambikila ▁nyang ' hiti .
▁“ Haluni ▁keza sola ▁mabe belu ▁maidi ▁ya ▁luti ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .
▁Wa funze ni ▁wanenu ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁mu zi longe ▁vomu kala ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁na ▁vomu genda ▁na ▁vomu gona ▁na ▁vomu lamka .
▁Kwa viya ▁ni ▁kweli ▁ he zile ▁kuwataza ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁keza ▁kuwataza ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Na ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁kumwenu ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁viyo m kumbuka ni ▁mweye ▁viya ▁vimu tegeleza , ▁vimu muhokele ▁kwa ▁u du mbo ▁na ▁ku gudemeka .
▁Mbali ▁nowalongela , ▁Eliya ▁keza ▁kamala , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa mtendela ▁vo wa londile , ▁fana ▁va ya ndi kiligwe ▁muna ▁yam aandiko .”
▁Kwiza hita ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yeli ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁siku ▁iyo ▁na ▁u mulongele , ▁‘ Diyelo ▁no togola ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wangu ▁kuwa ▁ni ngila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁i yawala hile ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁ku ching ' ha ▁cheye .’
▁Wa ja ▁wo gesa ▁kuwa ▁wo vimanya ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁hawavimanyile ▁fana ▁vi wolondeka ▁kuvimanya .
▁ Siku ▁ye nane ▁keza sola ▁ huwa ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁nziwa ▁waidi ▁na ▁ku mgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Efulaimu ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S hu se la ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Be ke li ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁T a hani .
▁Viwa lo ▁vi yawale ▁Yohana ▁vi kala ▁vi son igwa ▁na ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁yo tangigwa ▁ngamiya , ▁na ▁m chigudi ▁kayawala ▁mkwiji ▁wa ▁mbende . ▁N diya ▁yake ▁i kala ▁nzige ▁na ▁u ki ▁wa ▁mwii mba go .
▁“ Sekeu di sang ' hanile ▁chakachaka ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mtagusa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yo di sang ' hanila ▁chakachaka ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Y eye ▁kachi fungu lila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁nzila ▁i gala ▁ugima , ▁kufose la ▁panzia ▁diya . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁kui lava ▁lukuli ▁lwake .
▁M weye ▁Wa fi li p i ▁mu vimanya ▁vinogile ▁kuwa ▁vini segele ▁Makedoniya ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁diya ▁vini kalile ▁no peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁mweye ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁ bumbila ▁dimwe ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁womu ni ta zile ▁muna ▁ imbuli ▁ya ▁kulava ▁na ▁kuhokela .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁mweye ▁vimu li ▁hano ▁yelihi ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake ▁yaha gwa ▁muna ▁dikombo ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁na ▁heza mulava ▁kunze ▁bule ?
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka mu ha mbula ▁Haluni ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁ka mu yawaza ▁Eleazali . ▁Haluni ▁kadanganika ▁kuja ▁kuna ▁ inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima . ▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁wa hulumuka .
▁M ibiki ▁iyo ▁ya ▁hasi ▁i i leke ▁ mbali ▁i lumbiliz igwe ▁kwa ▁kuchanyha ▁kuna ▁i mhete ▁imwe . ▁M ibiki ▁yose ▁ya ▁ivi ng obweda ▁ka itenda ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁ itende ▁mbili .
▁Ivo ▁kukala ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁diya .
▁“ Mu ha funga , ▁sekemuwe ▁fana ▁wa delenya ▁wowo kwe sa ▁ng ' ho mbali ▁zawo ▁fana ▁wana ▁usungu ▁muladi ▁wa woneke ▁kuwa ▁wa funga . ▁Nowalongela ▁kweli ▁wa hokela ▁gweko ▁jawo ▁wa mala .
▁Maabaho ▁walala ▁wa ▁bululu ▁weza msola ▁mulume ▁ija ▁na ▁ku mu lanha ▁mibalati .
▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁wadanganika ▁wahawa ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁ bila ▁kuhokela ▁mbuli ▁zo wa longiligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁wazi wona ▁kwa ▁kutali ▁na ▁wa togola ▁funhufunhu ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wageni ▁na ▁wa genda genda ▁mwiisi .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Ha na ▁hanhu ▁habehi ▁yangu , ▁honda u dahe ▁kwima ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁luwe .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Mu muwanda ▁kulihi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁izo ▁u lole .”
▁“ Ka waleka ▁wa tawale ▁isi ▁in u ke , ▁na ▁waja ▁vinhu ▁vo tile ▁muna ▁imigunda . ▁Ka weng ' ha ▁u ki ▁muna ▁uluwe , ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁uluwe ▁lu dala .
▁i mbwanga ▁hakala me ▁hata ▁chidogo ▁ku fikiza ▁chochi longigwe , ▁kwaviya ▁viya no gi ligwe ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Yakobo . ▁Shekemu ▁niiyo ▁yoya hishi mi ke ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁na ▁kumwing ' hani ▁muhavu ▁mweye ▁womu gaya . ▁Na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁kezatenda ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁chip indi ▁Mndewa ▁vondaya bwele ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁weli ▁na ▁ludabwa ,
▁Haluni ▁kolondeka ▁kuya safya ▁m ahembe ▁ya ▁ulupango ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁mwaka . ▁Keza ya safya ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁chila ▁mwaka ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu ▁zose , ▁mana ▁lupango ▁ulo ▁lw ela ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Chila ▁tambi ▁mgati ▁mmwangu ▁do ha di kwima ▁matunda , ▁yeye ▁kodi kanha . ▁Mbali ▁ko da huli la ▁chila ▁tambi ▁dodi kwima ▁matunda ▁muladi ▁di me ▁matunda ▁mengi .
▁Viya malile ▁yano ▁ni wona ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yili ▁Ze we ▁da ▁U kalangama , ▁i vu guligwa ▁kuulanga .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁mavuta ▁yose ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ma i ni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ fi go ▁mbili ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yake , ▁vose ▁u vi ti mbule ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁Di no ▁diwe ▁ku mbu ku mbu ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁ya ni ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni , ▁sekeya hite ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁kum fukiz ila ▁ubani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Bule ivo ▁keza danganizigwa ▁fana ▁Kola ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jake . ▁Yano ▁yose ▁ya tendeka ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Eleazali ▁kufose la ▁Musa .
▁‘ Kuna ▁wanhu ▁wowa lawile ▁Misili ▁wene la ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Lelo ▁izo ▁uni du wi lile ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁hu we nda ▁niza daha ▁kuitowa ▁nawo ▁na ▁kuwawinga .’ ▁”
▁Baho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko ▁ka de ga ▁viwalo ▁vake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ka liga ! ▁ Hachi londa ▁wa kalangama ▁kaidi ! ▁ Sambi ▁ muhulika ▁viya li gile .
▁Lelo ▁yeye ▁yoyo lema ▁mafundizo ▁yano ▁ha mulema ▁munhu ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁ko mulema ▁Mulungu , ▁yoyo weng ' ha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Ka mtemela ▁mate ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ A bu la mu ▁ya temeligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁Yeli ▁Uchanyha , ▁ yalumbile ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi .
▁Na ▁waja ▁wose ▁wadanganike ▁wahawa ▁wa ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁wa ga ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mbali ▁no dumba ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁zoka ▁vidi m vwizi le ▁Hawa ▁kwa ▁ubala ▁wake , ▁m agesa ▁yenu ▁iviya ▁yeza vwiziligwa ▁hata ▁mu dahe ▁kwa giza ▁u waminika ▁na ▁u gangamavu ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Viya iting ' hane ▁nawo , ▁kawalagiliza ▁vino , ▁“ Sekemu lawe ▁Yelusalemu , ▁ mbali ▁mu gozele ▁chitumetume ▁choni mulongeleni , ▁chitumetume ▁chiya ▁choya walaganile ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁M sang ' hani ▁wekaidi ▁keza , ▁kamulongela ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁hela ▁yako ▁i gala ▁ma fungu ▁matano ▁ya ▁yaja ▁you ning ' hile .’
▁ Hachi za hazi ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁kwaviya ▁cheye ▁chi pata ▁hanhu ▁ he tu ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁Yoludani .”
▁Kaini ▁kaha segela ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kakala ▁isi ▁i tangigwa ▁“ No di ” , ▁niiyo ▁ili ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁ E de ni .
▁Viwakalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁ chibululu ▁chi wakalile ▁wohita , ▁Yesu ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁ko londa ▁kugendelela ▁ku mwa nde .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalu longela ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake .
▁Maabaho ▁Abimeleki ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Lola ▁isi ▁ino ▁yose ▁yangu , ▁ kala ▁hohose ▁hou londa .”
▁Mndewa ▁yawe ▁na ▁muhe ▁wako . ▁No wapulile ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁One ▁si u manyile ▁ulonzi ▁wou longigwa , ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁ulonzi ▁uwo ▁weza kuwa ▁wageni ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁niye ▁niza kuwa ▁mgeni ▁kumwawo .
▁Mbali ▁kanilongela , ▁unovu ▁wangu ▁wo ku faya , ▁kwaviya ▁udahi ▁wangu ▁wo fi ki zigwa ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁unyondenyonde . ▁No de ng ' helela ▁kuigodela ▁unyondenyonde ▁wangu ▁muladi ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁u kale ▁uchanyha ▁yangu .
▁Baho ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwanage ▁Yuda , ▁kamuhitila ▁baho ▁hamgwazo ▁ya ▁inzila ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Nolonda ▁niku bandame .” ▁Tamali ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kwiza ning ' ha ▁choni ▁waha n ibandama ?”
▁Iviya ▁kasola ▁m ituka ▁inogile ▁magan a ▁sita ▁na ▁m ituka ▁imwenga ▁yose ▁ya ▁Wamisili , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁wake ▁wose , ▁wakwela ▁m ituka ▁iyo .
▁“ Ni na zo ▁mbuli ▁nyingi ▁za ▁kuwalongela , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁zizakuwa ▁nyingi ▁na ni ▁kumwenu ▁ku zimanya .
▁Musa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walala ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wawa lagiliza ▁wanhu , ▁walonga , ▁“ Zindilil eni ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁yose ▁yoni mwing ' hani ▁diyelo .
▁Yakobo ▁kedika , ▁“ W eye ▁mwenyewo ▁kuvimanya ▁viya ▁vini ku sang ' hanile , ▁kuvimanya ▁vini wekile ▁goya ▁wanyama ▁wako .
▁Ka hita ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁di tangigwe ▁Nazaleti . ▁Ivo ▁chiya ▁chi longigwe ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁chi ti miya , ▁“ K e za tangigwa ▁M na za la yo .”
▁Ku longa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kufose la ▁wa saho ▁yetu ▁Daudi , ▁msang ' hani ▁wako , ▁viyalongile , ▁‘ Habali ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa mema ▁ludoko ? ▁ Habali ▁wanhu ▁wo panga ▁mi pango ▁ili bule ▁fambulo ?
▁Ka la ▁hano , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza kuwa ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁nizakutemel a ▁mate . ▁Niza kwing ' ha ▁zisi ▁zino ▁zose ▁kuwa ▁zako ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako . ▁Niza kwika ▁goya ▁chilagano ▁choni ilahile ▁na ▁ tati ▁yako ▁Bulahimu .
▁Wa mgwila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wamsola , ▁wahita ▁nayo ▁kwii kaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁Petili ▁kawa sondelela ▁kwa ▁kutali .
▁T engenez a ▁u pango ▁wa ▁mibiki ▁na ▁uli ▁na ▁u vu ng u ▁mgati ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁simwe ▁do nikulaguse ▁kumulima .
▁Mbali ▁ija ▁msang ' hani ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁sanduku ▁dimwe , ▁kahita , ▁ka himba ▁hasi ▁na ▁ka ifisa ▁hela ▁ya ▁mwenevale ▁wake .
▁Modaha ▁kuwa leka ▁wawe ▁fana ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁wanenu , ▁mwiza watenda ▁kuwa ▁watumwa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Mbali ▁sekemuwa tawale ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁Waisilaili ▁chiu se de .
▁Na ▁wanahina ▁wowa kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁viwa wone ▁yoya lawilile , ▁wa uza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁chiwa towe ▁na ▁mi panga ?”
▁M ulume ▁kamtanga ▁muke ▁wake ▁Hawa , ▁kwaviya ▁niiyo ▁mama ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima .
▁na ▁Ahi la ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Enani ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali .
▁“ Vi za temeligw a ▁mate ▁vi se ge ▁venu ▁va ▁mhule ▁na ▁vi a ▁venu ▁va ▁ku bu lu gila .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza u dunda ▁uwe ▁usage ▁lu n hi li ▁muladi ▁ usang ' hani ligwe ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku wika ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁hanhu ▁honda ni iting ' hane ▁na ▁weye , ▁uwo ▁kumwenu ▁wizakuwa ▁ubani ▁welile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela ‚ ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁yelihi ▁m baka ▁ni mtegeleze ▁na ▁ku walekelela ▁Waisilaili ▁wahite ? ▁Si mmanyile ▁bule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁si walekelela ▁bule ▁Waisilaili ▁wahite .”
▁Mbali ▁watumigwa ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wa vi de ga ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁na ▁wa kimbila ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wa guta ▁nyangi ,
▁Wa ka ya ▁vi wawonile ▁zoka ▁do ting a ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wa ▁Paulo , ▁wa ilongela , ▁“ Yodahika ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ka koma , ▁inga wa ▁ka kombo ka ▁muna ▁ibahali , ▁ mbali ▁yeli bule ▁ubagulo ▁haiza muleka ▁ya gendelele ▁kuwa ▁mgima .”
▁Elifazi ▁kakala ▁na ▁muke ▁imwenga ▁zina ▁jake ▁T i mi no , ▁iyo ▁kamwelek ela ▁Esau ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁zina ▁jake ▁Am a le ki , ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wazukulu ▁wa ▁Ada ▁muke ▁wa ▁Esau .
▁Yosefu ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Ali ma sa ya , ▁munhu ▁wa ▁chitala ▁cha ▁Wayahudi , ▁na ▁yo t e gele zigwa ▁ng ' hani , ▁kafika . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁ko gozela ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka mwitila ▁Pilato ▁ bila ▁kudumba , ▁ka mpula ▁ya mwing ' he ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Yesu .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Kweli ▁mwiza kung ' wila ▁nhungo ▁yangu , ▁ mbali ▁kukala ▁ubanzi ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kumoso ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wangu ▁wa ▁kulume , ▁niye ▁na bule ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuweng ' ha . ▁Mbali ▁wo kwing ' higwa ▁waja ▁wa sasalil igwe ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu .”
▁na ▁vondamu je ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁isi , ▁mwiza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha tenda ▁ubananzi ▁wou mulonda ▁yakomigwe , ▁na ▁yaha komigwa ▁kwa ▁ku tumbik igwa ▁muna ▁umbiki ,
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kamulongela ▁Abimeleki ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ sima ▁diya ▁do wa mu ho kile ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁Abimeleki .
▁Ivo ▁wamwidika ▁Yesu , ▁“ Ch eye ▁hachi vimanya .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁si walongela ▁bule ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi ▁notenda ▁yano ▁yose .”
▁Ivo ▁ lekeni ▁ugen zi ▁wenu ▁wa ▁ichanduso ▁fana ▁ku ha mbula ▁mawalo ▁yenu ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁ya ni ▁uja ▁u nhu ▁wenu ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁wou kalile ▁wo banangigwa ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁yake ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁Mwiza wedika , ▁‘ Ino ▁ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁Pasaka , ▁kwaviya ▁ka fosa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁kaye ▁za ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁viya wa komile ▁Wamisili , ▁ mbali ▁cheye ▁hachi komile .’ ▁” ▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wa idulika ▁matwi ▁yawo ▁na ▁kumtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Chi bulul u ▁cha ▁Besaniya ▁chi kala ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yelusalemu , ▁utali ▁wa ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁ma ili ▁mbili ,
▁Fan a ▁vichi longile , ▁na ▁sambi ▁nolonga ▁kaidi , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha wapetela ▁usenga ▁umwenga ▁mbasakanyo ▁na ▁uja ▁womu uhokele , ▁na ya duwiligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza wananga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo , ▁womu hita ▁kuwawinga ▁na ▁kukala ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zawo .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁ku nogelw a ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chilagano ▁chiya ▁cha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁wili ▁muna ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niza fosa ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁na ▁kuku lagusa ▁unovu ▁wangu ▁wose . ▁Niye ▁niza gong ' onda ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu .’ ▁Niza mnogela ▁ija ▁yoni londa ▁ku mnogela ▁na ▁niza muwonela ▁ubazi ▁ija ▁yoni londa ▁ku muwonela ▁ubazi .”
▁Chila ▁siku ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kofundiza ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁ichilo ▁kohita ▁ku umulima ▁wa ▁Mizaituni ▁na ▁kukala ▁uko .
▁ija ▁yeli ▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ▁na ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu , ▁ya to go zigwe ▁na ▁yawe ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁udahi , ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁kwandusi la ▁umwaka ▁ing ' hali ▁isi ▁yose ▁hai na ▁lu mbigwa , ▁sambi ▁na ▁siku ▁zose ! ▁Ivo .
▁Wa kumbuke ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako , ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁wouwa la hile ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Niza kongeza ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁fana ▁nhondo ▁za ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁niza weng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁isi ▁ino ▁yose ▁yoni mu la hileni ▁kuweng ' ha , ▁izakuwa ▁yawo ▁siku ▁zose .’ ▁”
▁U ching ' he ▁diyelo ▁ndiya ▁yetu .
▁Keza de ng ' helela ▁mtumwa ▁ija ▁fana ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁yaheza ▁keza mfika ▁kotenda ▁ivo .
▁Paulo ▁hebu ▁Apolo ▁hebu ▁Ke fa , ▁isi ▁ino ▁hebu ▁ugima ▁hebu ▁ifa , ▁vinhu ▁va ▁lusita ▁lo no ▁hebu ▁vinhu ▁vi kwiza . ▁Vino ▁vose ▁ni ▁venu ,
▁M senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁Musa ▁muna ▁di la mbi ▁da ▁moto ▁muna ▁ichi ba go . ▁Musa ▁ka wona ▁ichi ba go ▁cho kwaka ▁moto ▁ mbali ▁hachi ta ka mile .
▁Musa ▁kasola ▁damu ▁ija ▁na ▁kawa mizil a ▁wanhu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁damu ▁ya ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁diya tendile ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁kui sondelela ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose .”
▁U ha gula ▁isi ▁hebu ▁ku chuuza ▁isi ▁kwa ▁miyago , ▁sekeu mbu n ze .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁niiyo ▁nzila , ▁na ▁ukweli , ▁na ▁ugima . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kuhita ▁kwa ▁Tata ▁ bila ▁kufose la ▁kumwangu .”
▁Ni walongela , ▁‘ Chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁zahabu ▁ya vi gale . ▁Ivo ▁wa nigalila , ▁ni vi lumbu la ▁muna ▁umoto ▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁di lawilila !’ ▁”
▁Vino ▁ivo ▁vo ili ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka londa ▁ku lagusa ▁ludoko ▁lwake ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁lwake . ▁Mbali ▁kawa funyila ▁umoyo ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa londeke ▁kuwatagusa ▁kwa ▁ludoko ▁lwake , ▁wawo ▁ wolondeka ▁kunangigwa .
▁Wa nhu ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁kumgunda , ▁imwe ▁keza ga ndu ligwa , ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .
▁Na sa na eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S u a li ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza wagalila ▁ma duwilo ▁yano ▁yose ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁wowa mwi hileni ▁na ▁kuwa gaze ni .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁sambi ▁no mulongelani , ▁hamwiza niwona ▁kaidi ! ▁M baka ▁vondamu longe , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁yo mtemela ▁mate ▁iyo ▁yokwiza ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa .’ ▁”
▁Muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wafika ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Si ni ▁na ▁wakala ▁Kadeshi . ▁Uko ▁Miliamu ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁ku wandigwa ▁uko .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁kaidi , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁niye ▁ni ▁ulwivi ▁wa ▁ng ' hondolo .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya gule ▁zahabu ▁zawo ▁na ▁hela ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁na ▁lu lu ▁na ▁viwalo ▁va ▁chitani ▁na ▁viwalo ▁va ▁ langi ▁ya ▁zambalau ▁na ▁viwalo ▁va ▁ha lili ▁na ▁viwalo ▁vi dung ' hu ▁na ▁chila ▁mibiki ▁in ung ' hila ▁goya ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chochi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁meno ▁ya ▁n he mbo ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yose ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁na ▁shaba ▁na ▁zuma ▁na ▁ma lu ma lu ,
▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁yelihi ▁kumwenu ▁mwene ▁ng ' hondolo ▁gana , ▁ng ' hondolo ▁imwe ▁yaha ga , ▁hawa leka ▁waja ▁m alongo ▁kenda ▁na ▁kenda ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudimila , ▁na ▁kuhita ▁ku nzahila ▁ija ▁yoya gile ▁m baka ▁ya muwone ?
▁Weza komigwa ▁kwa ▁ mize le , ▁na ▁weza soligwa ▁fana ▁wa fungwa ▁mwii zi si ▁zose . ▁Bul ulu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁diza b o jo g igwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁m baka ▁chip indi ▁chawo ▁ngayengaye ▁vondachi fike .
▁Ivo ▁Labani ▁kahita ▁na ▁ka zahila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁izo ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Yakobo , ▁m aabaho ▁kengila ▁hema ▁da ▁Leya ▁na ▁hema ▁da ▁wa sang ' hani ▁waja ▁waidi ▁wa ▁chike , ▁ mbali ▁ha wonile ▁bule ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁yake . ▁Maabaho ▁kengila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Laheli .
▁M wa si leni ▁yeye ▁ku sa fa gila ▁kwenu ▁ko se , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kowa gesa ni ▁vinogile .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu iting ' hana ▁kuna ▁didugila ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowo tangigwa ▁ welekwa ▁wa u de le , ▁wowa ndikigwe ▁mazina ▁yawo ▁kuulanga . ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁yowa lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa woneka ▁wanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowa tendigwe ▁wo faya .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Waebulaniya , ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Vino ▁kwiza lema ▁kui nyendanyenda ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁Wa lekelele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite , ▁muladi ▁wa ka ni tose le .
▁Yakobo ▁ka mulonda ▁Laheli , ▁ivo ▁kamulongela ▁Labani , ▁“ Niza ku sang ' hanila ▁miyaka ▁saba , ▁one ▁uha n itogolela ▁kumsola ▁Laheli .”
▁Zu a ▁da ha lawa ▁na ▁vuke ▁jake ▁ka li ▁do nya za ▁mimeya ▁yose , ▁na ▁maluw a ▁yake ▁yo p a gati ka ▁na ▁unovu ▁wake ▁wose ▁wo banangigwa . ▁Ivo ▁ivo ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁keza ▁na ng igwa ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zake .
▁Wa lumbu ▁zake ▁hawa kala ▁hano ▁bule ? ▁Lelo ▁kaya pata ▁kulihi ▁yano ▁yose ?
▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁ha tangigwa ▁K ib ilosi ▁Hata ava , ▁kwaviya ▁baho ▁wawa wa nda ▁wanhu ▁wa melo .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁wanhu ▁wagoni kigwe ▁muna ▁i sola ▁wodaha ▁ku funga ▁kuja ▁lusita ▁ija ▁yo sola ▁ka hamwe ▁nawo ? ▁ Aka ! ▁ Haidahika ▁bule .
▁Munhu ▁yolonga ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁mwenyewo ▁ko londa ▁utunhizo ▁wake . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yo londa ▁ukulu ▁kwa ▁ija ▁yoya mtumile , ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mwa mi ni fu , ▁na ▁ka bule ▁wihi ▁mgati ▁mmwake .
▁Yakobo ▁kawa gola ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁wawo , ▁m aabaho ▁kawa la g u sila ▁kuna ▁iwanyama ▁weli ▁na ▁uzolizoli ▁na ▁m indi li zi ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁u titu ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁da ▁Labani . ▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁Yakobo ▁ka pata ▁ bumbila ▁jake ▁mwenyewo ▁hadi ha nganye ▁na ▁diya ▁da ▁Labani .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Kwa ▁kutenda ▁vino ▁Waisilaili ▁weza huwila ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zawo ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁ka ku lawilila .”
▁“ ▁‘ Zindilil eni ▁ Siku ▁zangu ▁za ▁Mhumulo ▁na ▁muha hishimu ▁hanhu ▁ hangu ▁helile . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Sekeudumbe , ▁Zakaliya ! ▁Mulungu ▁kahulika ▁nhosa ▁yako . ▁M ke ▁wako ▁kezakwelek ela ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza mtanga ▁Yohana .
▁Petili ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kalila ▁kwa ▁usungu .
▁ Siyo ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Nowalongela , ▁one ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁hamu samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁wose ▁mwiza danganika ▁fana ▁wawo .”
▁Mbali ▁wa tendeleni ▁vino , ▁ bene ni ▁chila ▁ma lu pango ▁wawo ▁na ▁mu b o mo le ▁mhanda ▁zawo ▁za ▁kutambikila , ▁i kanhe ni ▁ mize ngo ▁yawo ▁ya ▁m ulungu ▁ A s hela ▁na ▁mu zi ti mbule ▁kwa ▁moto ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zawo ▁za ▁kuson go ligwa .
▁One ▁mkono ▁wako ▁uha kutenda ▁utende ▁yehile , ▁u u kanhe . ▁M uhavu ▁ wingile ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁mkono ▁umwe ▁muhala , ▁kufosa ▁kwingila ▁na ▁makono ▁maidi ▁jehanamu . ▁Uko ▁moto ▁wake ▁hau zi mi ka ▁bule .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali ▁kakala ▁P e dahe li ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Amihudi .”
▁Mfalume ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Yosefu ▁zina ▁da ▁Chi mi sili , ▁Ze fa na ti ▁Pa ne ya , ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁muke , ▁Asen a ti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁P o ti fe la , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁bululu ▁da ▁ O ni . ▁Yosefu ▁kahita ▁uko ▁na ▁uko ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Yoshua , ▁“ S a gula ▁walume ▁uhite ▁uka itowe ▁na ▁Waamaleki . ▁Igolo ▁niza kwima ▁ku inhembeti ▁ya ▁mulima , ▁no ya mhilila ▁mhome ▁ija ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wangu .”
▁Wa segela ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁Abalimu ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁kuna ▁yama bawe ▁ya ▁Moabu ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁uli ▁ma lola ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko .
▁Yosefu ▁na ▁Maliya ▁viwa komeleze ▁yose ▁yowa londeke ▁kutenda ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁wabwela ▁ukaye ▁kumwawo ▁Nazaleti , ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Galilaya .
▁I fosa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁mi nane ▁kwandusi la ▁vichi segele ▁Kadeshi ▁Balinea ▁m baka ▁ku loka ▁chiza nda ▁cha ▁Ze le di . ▁ Walume ▁wose ▁wa dahile ▁kuhita ▁kuitowa ▁kui ng ' hondo ▁wadanganika ▁muna ▁dilago , ▁fana ▁viya ilahile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wachi ke ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁zake ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁kau gala ▁Misili .
▁M weye ▁mwiza ika ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁kuwa ▁lagilizo ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁wanenu ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Wa mulongelani , ▁“ Siku ▁za ▁uhelelo ▁weza lawilila ▁wanhu ▁wondawa wa ze he ▁mweye , ▁wanhu ▁wo sondelela ▁tama a ▁zawo ▁hazi mtunhiza ▁Mulungu .”
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondau i ze ng e , ▁utali ▁wake ▁iwe ▁makono ▁magan a ▁matatu ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁makono ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁na ▁chimo ▁chake ▁makono ▁m alongo ▁matatu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Gol o sa ▁mkono ▁wako ▁kuulanga , ▁muladi ▁ziza ▁totolo ▁di i gubike ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Zi za ▁dondadi watende ▁wanhu ▁wa baba se .”
▁Niye ▁si iza hi lila ▁utunhizo ▁mwenyewo . ▁Ka uko ▁yoyo u zahila , ▁nayo ▁niiyo ▁msemi .
▁Kwa ▁ huwilo ▁ijo ▁chi komboligwa , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁chinhu ▁chi lole ligwa ▁chiha woneka , ▁baho ▁ habule ▁ huwilo ▁kaidi . ▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yo lolela ▁chinhu ▁chiyeli na cho ?
▁One ▁notenda ▁sang ' hano ▁ino ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo , ▁nina ▁gweko , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁notenda ▁sang ' hano ▁iyo ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo , ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁iyo ▁ni itende .
▁Maabaho ▁chilonge ▁choni ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁izo ▁zose ? ▁One ▁Mulungu ▁kau banzi ▁wetu , ▁yelihi ▁yondaya dahe ▁kuchi liga ?
▁Sekeu mtogole ▁hebu ▁sekeu muhulike ▁hebu ▁sekeu muwonele ▁ubazi ▁hebu ▁sekeu mu lekele ▁hebu ▁sekeu m kalize ,
▁Na ▁sekemu mtende ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yawe ▁na ▁ma ny ulu ny ulu , ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁iyo ▁ni nyo ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁kumwenu ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kuwa lagusa ▁kuwa ▁zuwa ▁do kwiza ▁na ▁yeye ▁keza mkombola ni .
▁Sekemu m ki mili le ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Waamoli ▁wa kalile ▁wokala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁ili ▁kumulima , ▁wa mulawil a ni ▁na ▁wa muwinga ni ▁fana ▁viwo tenda ▁n yu ki , ▁wamtowa ni ▁uko ▁Seili ▁m baka ▁Holi ma .
▁Viya viya ▁muke ▁yo muleka ▁mulumake ▁na ▁kusoligwa ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga , ▁ko mtendela ▁uzinzi ▁mulumake .”
▁Vi lihi ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁ng ' hulu ▁zi ni lawilila ▁niye ▁m baka ▁mama ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wangu ▁ya ni la ule ?
▁Ivo ▁diyelo ▁nowalongela ni ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kumwenu ▁yaha ga , ▁ manye ▁wenyewo . ▁Niye ▁na mwabule !
▁One ▁mu hali g igwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Ku muhuwila ▁Chilisito , ▁mu mweda , ▁iyo ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa ▁utunhizo ▁kokala ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁M tume ni ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁yam sondelele ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁imdodo ▁na ▁kuno ▁wamwenga ▁wo gozela ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁baho ▁honda u manyike ▁ulonzi ▁wenu ▁kweli ▁yake , ▁ la ▁ s ivo ▁no ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁mfalume , ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wapelembaji .”
▁Ivo ▁ka bota ▁kwa ng wa ▁da ▁luzabi , ▁ka wawinga ▁wose ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe . ▁Iviya ▁kavi hi ndu la ▁vi pango ▁va ▁wo kwasakany a ▁hela ▁na ▁kuzi pwililisa ▁hela ▁zawo .
▁‘ Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁mulume ▁keza ▁ muleka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake , ▁nayo ▁keza ilumba ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ,
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Ka kala ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Ye s hulu ni , ▁lusita ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁viwa iting ' hane , ▁viya iting ' hane ▁hamwe ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Mo to ▁wa ▁lupango ▁ wolondeka ▁u gendelele ▁kwa ka , ▁sekeu zi m igwe . ▁Chila ▁siku ▁imitondo ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza kwika ▁ngodi ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uwo ▁na ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁keza kwika ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁na ▁kutimbula ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo .
▁Ma goda ▁yenu ▁haya nogile . ▁Vino ▁hamu vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁lusu ▁chidogo ▁do gong o mo la ▁ b o ng e ▁jose ▁da ▁usage ?
▁m baka ▁mwii ▁kaye ▁yonda ▁ yengile , ▁na ▁mu mulongele ▁mwene ▁kaye , ▁mfundiza ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Chi lihi ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁wageni ▁muladi ▁ni je ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wangu ?’
▁“ ▁‘ Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha mtowa ▁miyage ▁na ▁ch uma ▁na ▁kadanganika , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mkomaji ▁na ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Wamuuza , ▁“ H umbe ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ? ▁W eye ▁kwa ▁Eliya ?” ▁Yohana ▁kawedika , ▁“ M b e , ▁si ▁niye ▁bule .” ▁Wamuuza ▁kaidi , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya longigwe ▁kokwiza ?” ▁Ka wedika , ▁“ Si ▁niye ▁bule .”
▁Isilaili ▁ka ndusa ▁mwanza ▁wake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁kahita ▁Belisheba , ▁uko ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Isaka .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wenu , ▁m olondeka ▁m umdumbe ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mweye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wenu , ▁kwa ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yose ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁zose ▁zo ni mwing ' hani , ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ulanga ▁kani gala ▁kulawa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁kulawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kanilongela ▁na ▁kani la hila ▁kuwa ▁keza weng ' ha ▁isi ▁ino ▁welesi ▁wangu . ▁Keza mtuma ▁m senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kuulongozi ▁wako , ▁ivo ▁kwiza m patila ▁muke ▁mwanangu ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁ku sa tu , ▁wa mfika ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁mgati ▁mwa ▁wafundiza ▁wa ▁Chiyahudi , ▁kowa tegeleza ▁na ▁kowa uza ▁m bu za .
▁Kuna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁na ▁wa ▁mwezi , ▁na ▁wa ▁nhondo , ▁iviya ▁nhondo ▁na zo ▁zo isosokanya ▁kwa ▁utunhizo .
▁Labani ▁ka mfika ▁Yakobo ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁Yakobo ▁vi yekile ▁lago ▁jake ▁kumulima , ▁Labani ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Gileadi .
▁ B a ha ja ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose , ▁isi ▁iya kalile ▁Da sa ni ▁na ▁Abilamu ▁i gubuka .
▁Viya fosile ▁yayo ▁Bulahimu ▁ka longiligwa ▁kuwa ▁Milika ▁kamwelek ela ▁wana ▁Naholi ▁se kulu ▁wake ,
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁yadanganike ▁ teng ' hu , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁ya tagusigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Ni hulika ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ mwimiliz i ▁wa ▁mazi ▁kolonga , ▁“ Ku watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁viilondeka , ▁weye ▁ Kwel a , ▁wili ba ha ▁na ▁u kalile ▁uko .
▁Uno ▁ni ▁mwaka ▁wekaidi ▁wa ▁nzala ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁na ▁ing ' hali ▁miyaka ▁imwenga ▁mitano ▁iyo ▁wanhu ▁haweza daha ▁ku lima ▁hebu ▁kugobola .
▁kau leka ▁ng o lole ▁wake , ▁kakimbila ▁mwa zi .
▁na ▁ni m memez a ▁Muhe ▁wangu . ▁Ni mwing ' ha ▁udahi ▁na ▁ku zowel a ▁na ▁nzewele ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wa ▁ku tengenez a ▁vinhu ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza mwihila ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zina ▁jangu . ▁Mbali ▁yondaya funye ▁umoyo ▁m baka ▁kuuhelelo , ▁kezakomboligwa .
▁Wa segela ▁Kadeshi ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi , ▁muna ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁isi ▁ya ▁Edomu .
▁Yakobo ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I la he ▁kwa ▁yayo ▁you longile .” ▁Yosefu ▁kamul a hila , ▁m aabaho ▁Isilaili ▁kai na mila ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ditwi ▁da ▁ko mwa ▁jake .
▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁yaja ▁yo wakalile ▁wo gesa , ▁ivo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Habali ▁mwo gesa ▁yehile ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ?
▁ham dala si ni ▁na ▁ hi liki ▁na ▁ma vu mba ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' hila ▁goya ▁na ▁ubani ▁na ▁divai ▁na ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁mizaituni ▁na ▁usage ▁unogile ▁na ▁uhemba ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁falasi ▁na ▁m ituka ▁ya ▁ku bulul igwa ▁na ▁falasi ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wawo ▁na ▁hata ▁ugima ▁wa ▁wanhu .
▁U linga ▁na ▁mbeyu ▁ya ▁ha la dali ▁yili ▁ndodo ▁kufosa ▁mbeyu ▁zose ▁zili ▁mwiisi .
▁“ Ivo ▁kuja ▁kudibwilingu ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁wakala ▁na ▁ zewe ▁diya ▁da ▁ukalangama ▁di tengenez igwa ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viya mu longile ▁Musa ▁ya di tende ▁sisil a ▁ijo ▁da ▁iviya ▁viya lagusigwe .
▁Ka danganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁muladi ▁chi kale ▁hamwe ▁nayo , ▁chiwe ▁wagima ▁hebu ▁chi danganike ▁lusita ▁vondaya bwele ,
▁Yano ▁yose ▁ya la wila ▁muladi ▁yaja ▁yose ▁ya longigwe ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yatimie ,
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha gesa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mulotezi , ▁hebu ▁kana ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁yavimanye ▁kuwa ▁yano ▁yoni mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa .
▁M ulume ▁yatende ▁yaja ▁yoyo londeka ▁ya mtendele ▁muke ▁wake , ▁na ▁muke ▁yatende ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁mulumake .
▁ Nolonda ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wawe ▁fana ▁vini li ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁chitumetume ▁chake ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁kana ▁chitumetume ▁chino , ▁imwenga ▁kana ▁chiya .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Biliha ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁Laheli ▁wakala ▁Dani ▁na ▁Nafutali .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁“ Hita ▁ukaye , ▁na ▁chiya ▁chiu huwila ▁chiza tendeka .” ▁Bahobaho ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁ka hona .
▁Ma kabila ▁yano ▁maidi ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya hokela ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁kwandusi la ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yeliko , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua .”
▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁na ▁kahita ▁muna ▁isi ▁yili ▁habehi ▁na ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni .
▁“ One ▁Muisilaili ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo kala ▁kumwawo ▁koja ▁damu ▁yoyose , ▁niza mulema ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku mbagula ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kasola ▁m ituka ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁kaweng ' ha ▁Walawi .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lumsondelela ▁kwaviya ▁wa wona ▁vilaguso ▁viyatendile ▁va ▁ku wahonya ▁watamu .
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁ko n ha nga ▁niye ▁ninoga ?” ▁Habule ▁yanogile ▁ila ▁Mulungu ▁ya i du we .
▁Kwa ▁k ongeze la , ▁ndugu ▁chi tose leni ▁muladi ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁u gendelele ▁ku pwililika ▁hima ▁hima ▁na ▁ku ho ki ligwa ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁fana ▁viya ▁vidi li ▁kumwenu .
▁Pilato ▁kawalongela , ▁“ msole ni ▁na ▁mu mtaguse ▁kwa ▁malagilizo ▁yenu .” ▁Wayahudi ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Ch eye ▁hachi londeka ▁kumtagusa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yakomigwe .”
▁mu hani lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwa ng ' ombe ▁wenu ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wenu , ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁muladi ▁ku fikiza ▁chilaho , ▁hebu ▁iwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ku londa ▁wenyewo , ▁hebu ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁za ▁madugila ▁yenu ▁ya pangigwe , ▁muladi ▁kumtendela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile .
▁na ▁meza ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁magate ▁yelile ▁ye kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ,
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Sekeu we ▁na ▁luholozi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mwana ▁ino ▁na ▁Hajili ▁mami ▁yake . ▁Mbuli ▁yoyose ▁yondaya kulongele ▁Sala ▁u itende , ▁kwaviya ▁kufose la ▁Isaka ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁welesi ▁woni ku laganile .
▁ Tegelezeni ▁mweye ▁Waisilaili ▁na ▁muzindilile ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁kongezeka ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁ viyamulaganileni .
▁S ha ba ▁ziya ▁Waisilaili ▁zo wa mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kwinula ▁uchanyha ▁zi kala ▁shekel i ▁ 2 1 2 , 4 0 0 ▁ya ▁hela .
▁Lelo ▁heza kuwa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁yoya cho ligwe ▁mazina ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili . ▁Chila ▁dimwe ▁dizakuwa ▁fana ▁uhul a ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hachi itogolela ▁fana ▁ bumbila ▁na ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana , ▁ivo ▁chiza msola ▁mndele ▁wetu ▁na ▁kuhita .”
▁Weza kwamha ▁mazoka , ▁na ▁hata ▁waha ng ' wa ▁ma da ka ▁ha ye za watenda ▁vihile ▁bule . ▁Weza wekila ▁watamu ▁makono ▁yawo , ▁nawo ▁weza hona .”
▁Kwa viya ▁si wona ▁chimu ▁cha ▁ku mulongele za ▁mwenyewo ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu , ▁ mbali ▁iyo ▁hai lagusa ▁kuwa ▁ninoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mndewa ▁iyo ▁yonda ▁ya ni lamulil e ▁nhaguso .
▁Kwa viya ▁cho vimanya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya n zilibule ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁kulawa ▁kuu da nga ni ko , ▁iviya ▁kezachi zilibula ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kuchi ka ▁haulongozi ▁wake .
▁ Muiteganye ▁muladi ▁vondamu lole ▁zuwa ▁hebu ▁mwezi ▁hebu ▁nhondo , ▁sekemu vi tambikile ▁kwaviya ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kavi lumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zimwenga .
▁“ B a ho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatanga ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁himahima ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁‘ Ni muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁ni muhasanya ni .
▁Kwiza ▁kwake ▁kwiza tendeka ▁lusita ▁lu londeka ▁lwikigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu , ▁yeye ▁yaidumwe ▁yo tawala ▁na ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁wafalume ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wa nde wa .
▁Wawo ▁niiyo ▁walume ▁wapetigwe , ▁waja ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawa peta ▁kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁waja ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁“ Seke mwa mhe ▁chino ▁na ▁sekemu la n ze ▁chiya ▁na ▁sekemu dalise ▁chiya ?”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa ▁siku ▁zino ▁wo sola ▁na ▁kusoligwa .
▁“ Vondau wa pete ▁Waisilaili , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kezamuli ha ▁maliho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ugima ▁wake ▁muladi ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁sekekuw e ▁na ▁mitamu ▁ihile ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ku petigwa .
▁ kala ▁nayo ▁kwa ▁lusita , ▁m baka ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁lu hunguke .
▁Na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁dili ▁habehi ▁na ▁haja ▁howa u fikile ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁wana we ▁makono ▁yawo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ijo ▁di da ng ' ang ' a ▁di benigw e ▁isi ngo ▁umo ▁muna ▁dikolongo .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wa wedika ▁ bila ▁kuwa wonela ▁chinyala , ▁“ Chi londeka ▁chi mulongeleni ▁mweye ▁ teng ' hu ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁mo i lema ▁na ▁kuwona ▁kuwa ▁hamu faya ▁bule ▁kwa ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Lelo ▁cho muleka ni ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwa galila ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaheza ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁ha wagalile ni ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁Chilisito , ▁sekemu muhokele ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu ▁wala ▁sekemu mu la m se .
▁Vino ▁wawo ▁ni ▁Waebulaniya ? ▁Na ▁niye ▁ivo . ▁Vino ▁wawo ▁ni ▁Waisilaeli ? ▁Na ▁niye ▁ivo . ▁Vino ▁wawo ▁ni ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ? ▁Na ▁niye ▁ivo .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kahita ▁ukaye .
▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala ▁fana ▁viya ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁viwa mu lemile ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwatendile ▁muna ▁yama zu wa ▁yaja ▁viwa kalile ▁muna ▁ichuwala , ▁baho ▁viwa ni lemile .
▁Wa nhu ▁waha ilaha , ▁wo ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁wawo ▁wenyewo , ▁na ▁chilaho ▁cho lamula ▁ubishi ▁wose .
▁Yakobo ▁viya bwelile ▁kulawa ▁Padani ▁Alamu , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mulawilila ▁kaidi ▁na ▁kamtemela ▁mate .
▁Mbali ▁isi ▁yomu hita ▁kuisola ▁ni ▁isi ▁ya ▁milima ▁na ▁ma ko lo ngo , ▁yo pata ▁mazi ▁ya ▁mvula ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Ha mu somile ▁chiya ▁Daudi ▁cha yatendile ▁na ▁wayage ▁va wakalile ▁na ▁nzala ?
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁ha gesile ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁Yosefu ▁ka tu li ligwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choya chitendile ▁ka tenda ▁vinogile .
▁Wala ▁hai lawa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁wenyewo , ▁ivo ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya igode .
▁M nyama ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁mapaga ▁ yaigol ile ▁na ▁ha se lu la , ▁iyo ▁kumwenu ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo dalisa ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wa ja ▁i wabozi ▁wawalongela ▁iwa ba la , ▁‘ Chi ng ' heni ▁mavuta ▁yenu ▁chidogo ▁kwaviya ▁ma weng e ▁yetu ▁ya zi mi ka .’
▁“ Sekemu zimize ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁na ▁mweye ▁kuja ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Holebu ▁hagati ▁ya ▁moto , ▁hamu muwone ▁viyeli . ▁Ivo ▁m uiteganye ▁ng ' hani .
▁Na ▁mi bumo ▁iyo ▁saba ▁vi i bu mile , ▁vini londile ▁ kwandika , ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁“ Mbuli ▁za ▁mi bumo ▁iyo ▁saba ▁ni ▁sili , ▁sekeu za ndike .”
▁Mu ke ▁wa ▁Potifa ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁Yosefu ▁kadi leka ▁de b wa ni ▁jake ▁na ▁kukimbilila ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ikaye ,
▁Laheli ▁viyadanganike ▁ka wandigwa ▁mumgwazo ▁ gwa zo ▁wa ▁dikulu g u mbi ▁dodi hita ▁ E fu la ta , ▁sambi ▁yo manyika ▁Betelehemu .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya nogeligw e ▁kumtendela ni ▁yanogile ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wengi , ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza nogeligw a ▁ku mgalila ni ▁manhesa ▁na ▁kum da nga ni za ni . ▁Mwiza wing igwa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁mui sole .
▁Ugima ▁wenu ▁wiza memezigw a ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁ku mtunhiza ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wafilisiti ▁wazi sili za ▁nzasa ▁zose ▁zozi hi mbigwe ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁lusita ▁Bulahimu ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima .
▁Ya ki s hani ▁kamwelek a ▁S he ba ▁na ▁D e da ni , ▁wana ▁wa ▁D e da ni ▁ni ▁Wa a s hulu ▁na ▁Wa le tu si ▁na ▁Wa le u mi .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo lema ▁ku muhulika ▁msemi ▁hebu ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yo ye mile ▁baho ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁mwiza segeza ▁wihi ▁uwo ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Wa naake ▁vi kalile ▁wang ' hali ▁mwi ▁inzila ▁wohita , ▁wakalizi ▁wamwenga ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi lawilile .
▁U chinje ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁ijo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Yosefu ▁ka kwela ▁m tuka ▁wake ▁na ▁kahita ▁kum kimilila ▁Isilaili ▁ tati ▁yake ▁uko ▁Gosheni . ▁Viwa iting ' hane ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁wa i ge leka ▁zisi ngo ▁na ▁kalila ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lutali .
▁Uko ▁Chilisito ▁ ke kigwa ▁mchan ya ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁ tawala ▁zose , ▁udahi , ▁nguvu ▁na ▁ falume , ▁ko tawala ▁chila ▁zina ▁diya ▁dili ▁na ▁udahi ▁dodi tangigwa ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁luno ▁na ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁luja ▁lu kwiza .
▁na ▁ka soma ▁ubani ▁uli ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁uchanyha ▁yake , ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Asheli ▁kakala ▁na ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike ▁zina ▁jake ▁Se la .
▁Ivo ▁ hite ni ▁kudi kulu g u mbi , ▁na ▁wose ▁wonda mu wa wone ▁wa tange ni ▁kuna ▁i sola .’
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁no walamba ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁mu laguse ni ▁fana ▁viya ▁mo mulonda ▁kaidi .
▁Lelo ▁ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁milungu ▁yose , ▁mana ▁ka wakombola ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Wamisili ▁wowa watendele ▁magoda .”
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁kafika ▁na ▁kuhulika ▁Yesu ▁ko isosokanya ▁na ▁Masadukayo . ▁Viya onile ▁Yesu ▁kawedika ▁goya , ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁yose , ▁lagilizo ▁dilihi ▁dikulu ▁kufosa ▁yose ?”
▁ Siku ▁ye nane ▁kezamgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku safyigwa ▁kwake ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele , ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁walala ▁na ▁wa fu ndi nza ▁Malagilizo ▁waiting ' hana ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu .
▁I kala ▁i j uma a , ▁i kala ▁siku ▁ya ▁Ku isasala ▁kwa ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁na ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁i kala ▁habehi ▁kwa ndusa .
▁Mbali ▁nowalongela , ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁N ha g u so , ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Sodoma ▁kufosa ▁mweye !”
▁na ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁na ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁ubazi ▁na ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Baho ▁hachisogo ▁vini wandikile ▁na ▁muna ▁usungu ▁na ▁ludoko ▁muumoyo ▁na ▁kuno ▁na ▁masozi ▁mengi , ▁lungilo ▁jangu ▁hadi wile ▁bule ▁kuwa guma ▁usungu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁kuwa lagusa ni ▁no walonda ▁ng ' hani ▁mose .
▁Yosefu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ No zahila ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wowo dima ▁mifu go ▁yawo . ▁Ko daha ▁ku nilongela ▁haja ▁ha we li ?”
▁One ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁ wolondeka ▁ku lolela ▁yayo ▁kulawa ▁kumwenu . ▁Ch eye ▁china ▁haki ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁wawo . ▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁hachi i sang ' hanile ▁haki ▁ino . ▁ B a dala ▁yake , ▁chi funyila ▁umoyo ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muladi ▁sekechi ke ▁ching ' wa so ▁chochose ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Chilisito .
▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁Yelusalemu ▁na ▁kahita ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Ka lola ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁ugaluga , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁zuwa ▁di kala ▁di s wile , ▁kahita ▁Besaniya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi .
▁Viya danganike ▁Baali hana ni , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A k ib o li , ▁ka tawala ▁Ha dadi , ▁bululu ▁jake ▁di tangigwa ▁Pa w u ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁ka tangigwa ▁M e he ta b eli ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Ma tile di ▁na ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁M e za ha bu .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁saba ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wahita ▁ku dondola ▁ndiya , ▁ mbali ▁hawa fikile ▁chinhu .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁siyo ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁tibwilitibwili ▁ mbali ▁wa ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iviya ▁fana ▁viili ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁welile ▁womuhuwila ▁Chilisito ,
▁Niye ▁Petili , ▁yoni tangigwe ▁kuwa ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁No wandikila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wowasaguligwe , ▁wowa i mwa gile ▁uko ▁P o n to ▁na ▁Galatiya ▁na ▁Ka p a do ki ya ▁na ▁Asiya ▁na ▁ B isi ni ya .
▁Ka mweda ▁munhu ▁ija ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁hau petigwa ▁bule ▁na ▁Mndewa !”
▁Iviya ▁hai lemigwa ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yo temela ▁mate ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁munhu ▁yo temeligw a ▁mate .
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wahita ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ,
▁“ Z a bu lo ni ▁keza kala ▁habehi ▁na ▁bahali . ▁Keza si ga miza ▁m eli ▁yake ▁muna ▁ing ema ▁M baka ▁yake ▁iza haka na ▁na ▁Sidoni .”
▁Mbali ▁Saimoni ▁na ▁iwa ya ge ▁wahita ▁ku mulonda .
▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Viya kalile ▁kofundiza , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kotenda ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Yeli hi ▁ya kwing ' hile ▁udahi ▁uno ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawauza ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ B a ho ▁vini mtumile ni ▁mweye ▁ mwabule ▁m fuko ▁hebu ▁m ko ba ▁hebu ▁vilatu , ▁mu hu ng u ki ligwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Hachi hu ng u kiligwe ▁na ▁chinhu ▁bule .”
▁Yosefu ▁ka gendelela ▁kukala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Yosefu ▁viyadanganike ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁ku mi .
▁na ▁Yo a na ▁mke ▁wa ▁Ku za , ▁yoya kalile ▁mkulu ▁mwii di lu ndo ▁da ▁kwa ▁Helode . ▁Iviya ▁wakala ▁S uza na ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wamwenga ▁wengi . ▁Wa naake ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wo mtaza ▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vawo .
▁Viwa muwone ▁kwa ▁kutali , ▁na ▁yang ' hali ▁kuwa fi ki lila , ▁wa ilungila ▁kumkoma .
▁Yesu ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwafundiza ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kolondeka ▁ya gazigwe ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ku lemigwa ▁na ▁walala , ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo . ▁Keza komigwa , ▁ mbali ▁zihafosa ▁siku ▁nhatu , ▁keza zilibuka .”
▁Ka bwela ▁kaidi , ▁ka wafika ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa gona ▁kwaviya ▁meso ▁yawo ▁ya kala ▁na ▁ vu wo vu wo .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Vino ▁wanhu ▁wa go ne kigwe ▁ku didugila ▁da ▁kusola ▁wodaha ▁ku funga ▁kuja ▁chip indi ▁munhu ▁yoyo sola ▁ka hamwe ▁nawo ? ▁Hawa daha ▁ku funga ▁kuja .
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁weza kuwa ▁kumgunda , ▁imwe ▁keza soligwa ▁na ▁imwenga ▁keza lekigwa .
▁“ Mwizagaya ▁mweye ▁walangulizi ▁vipofu . ▁Mo fundiza , ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ilaha ▁kwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁siyo ▁chinhu , ▁ mbali ▁kodaha ▁ku ilaha ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁ya ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kai funga .’
▁Maabaho ▁tata ▁iyo ▁ka kumbuka ▁lu kala ▁lusita ▁luja ▁luja ▁Yesu ▁viyamulongele , ▁“ Mwana go ▁keza hona .” ▁Ivo ▁yeye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kaye ▁yake ▁yose ▁wa muhuwila ▁Yesu .
▁Mbali ▁mu gendelele ▁kuhulika ▁mbuli ▁“ Diyelo ” ▁yo somigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁i gele ni ▁moyo ▁chila ▁zuwa ▁muladi ▁hata ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁sekeyawe ▁mdala ▁wa ▁ku vwiziligwa ▁na ▁uhasanyi .
▁na ▁ fi go ▁zose ▁mbili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁habehi ▁na ▁ chigudi , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini ,
▁Ivo ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wake ▁Mulungu , ▁ka ching ' ha ▁sang ' hano ▁ino ▁chi sang ' hane , ▁ivo ▁hachi fa ▁moyo .
▁Tat i ▁zetu ▁viwa hitile ▁Misili , ▁hanhu ▁hawa kalile ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁mingi . ▁Wamisili ▁wa wagaza ▁ tati ▁zetu ▁na ▁cheye ▁iviya .
▁Mu mweda ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁waha muliga ni ▁na ▁kun gaza ni ▁na ▁ku longigwa ▁vihile ▁kwa ▁usungu ▁kwaviya ▁mwa wa nahina ▁wangu .
▁Kwa viya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁Mwana go ▁udahi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muladi ▁ya wene ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁waja ▁wose ▁wou mwing ' hile .
▁“ Wa kwenhus e ▁habehi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁na ▁uwe ke ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁muladi ▁wa msang ' hanile .
▁Isaka ▁viyakalile ▁mulala ▁meso ▁yake ▁yawa ▁haya lola ▁bule . ▁Ivo ▁kamtanga ▁Esau ▁mwanage ▁chaudele ▁na ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwanangu !” ▁Na yo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Aino ▁hano .”
▁N za sa ▁ila wa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁ulongo ▁na ▁i ta p a giza ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Kwa viya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁si ▁kuja ▁na ▁kung ' wa , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁vovi galigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Mwenevale ▁ka muwonela ▁ubazi , ▁kam fungula , ▁ka mulekelela ▁di de ni ▁na ▁ka muleka ▁yahite .
▁Maabaho ▁Tamali ▁kasegela , ▁kaha mbula ▁m ta ndi lo ▁woya i gubike , ▁kayawala ▁ nya wa lo ▁zake ▁za ▁u gane .
▁“ Kuson hela ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Di no ▁ijo ▁kabila ▁di yo di londa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁do kala ▁goya ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁kodi kaliza ▁siku ▁yose , ▁na ▁kokala ▁hagati ▁yawo .’
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁kaidi , ▁“ Niye ▁nohita , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza ni zahila , ▁na ▁mwiza danganika ▁muna ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu . ▁Hamu daha ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁ho ni hita .”
▁Ke ng ' higwa ▁chitabu ▁cha ▁Isaya , ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Kachi gubula ▁na ▁ku soma ▁hanhu ▁ha ndikigwe ▁vino ,
▁Na ▁muna ▁i v a ndusil o ▁va ▁mhongono ▁za ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁kukala ▁na ▁mabwe ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi , ▁na ▁ha c ha nya ▁ha ▁chila ▁dibwe ▁ha ndikigwa ▁zina ▁da ▁mtumigwa ▁mwa ▁iwa ja ▁watumigwa ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi ▁wa ▁Mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Saimoni ▁mwenyewo ▁iviya ▁ka huwila ▁na ▁hamwande ▁ka batiz igwa , ▁kakala ▁ko m ko lele za ▁Filipo ▁na ▁kazanywa ▁na ▁mauzauza ▁yoya tendigwe .
▁Munhu ▁imwenga ▁keza longa , ▁“ N diya ▁kwa ▁mu nda , ▁na ▁mu nda ▁kwa ▁ndiya .” ▁Ona , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kezavi bananga ▁vili ▁muna ▁u mu nda ▁na ▁ndiya . ▁Lu ku li ▁lwa ▁munhu ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ugoni ▁ila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁iyo ▁yo wika ▁goya ▁lukuli .
▁“ Mwiza duwiligwa ▁kwa ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁wana ▁wadodo ▁na ▁ndiya ▁ndodo ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wadodo ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wadodo .
▁Wa no ▁i wo ▁wanhu ▁wowa gola ni ▁mweye , ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁chiunhu , ▁wabule ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁I mitondo ▁ng ' hani ▁Labani ▁kawa nonela ▁wazukulu ▁zake ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁kawa temela ▁mate , ▁m aabaho ▁ka walaga , ▁kawaleka ▁na ▁kabwela ▁ukaye .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kakala ▁na ▁wimo , ▁kakala ▁yo lila ▁kwa ▁ku landula ▁dizi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁usungu ▁na ▁magayo ▁ya ▁ku ibasula ▁mwana .
▁Lu mbu ▁jake ▁imwana ▁kema ▁hata li ▁hai nzila ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kulola ▁chiya ▁chondachi mulawilile .
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁ A sili eli ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Shekemu
▁Niza gala ▁mulotezi ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁weye ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wawo ▁wenyewo , ▁niza mulongela ▁cha ▁kulonga , ▁nayo ▁keza walongela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni mu lagiliza .
▁Ivo ▁weye ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jako ▁jose ▁mu mulema ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁M weye ▁mu mulongele la ▁Haluni , ▁ mbali ▁ukweli ▁mo mulongele la ▁Mulungu .”
▁Na ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi kala ▁fana ▁lumwe mwe , ▁na ▁mawalo ▁yake ▁ya kala ▁mazelu ▁chwee !
▁Cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁ko togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁ku muhuwila ▁Chilisito , ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁viya ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo . ▁Ch eye ▁iviya ▁chi muhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁chi togoligwe ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁uhuwilo ▁yetu ▁kwa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁viya ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo . ▁Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo togoligwa ▁kuwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁viya ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁No mwandikilani ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁mweye ▁womu di huwila ▁zina ▁da ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ Wa longeligwa ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁ko wafundiza ▁Wayahudi ▁wose ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa leke ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁kuwalongela ▁sekewa weng i ze ▁ulungwana ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wala ▁sekewa winze ▁vi hendo ▁vetu .
▁Lutu ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁ka hinda ▁ulwivi .
▁Uko ▁Yesu ▁ka galuka ▁haulongozi ▁hawo , ▁ichihanga ▁chake ▁chiwa ▁fana ▁viya ▁zuwa ▁na ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁viwa ▁vizelu ▁chwee ▁fana ▁bu ng ' hulo .
▁Vini kalile ▁no lila , ▁si dile ▁zaka ▁yoyose , ▁si i lavile ▁kunze ▁ya ▁kaye ▁yangu ▁vini kalile ▁ nya mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁si lavile ▁zaka ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike . ▁Ni ku tegeleza ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wangu , ▁ni tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chiu lagilize .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ M sole ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni , ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁mgati ▁yake ▁na ▁u mwikile ▁mkono ▁wako .
▁Munhu ▁yoja ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁sekeya mwe hu le ▁ija ▁haja ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁ija ▁yoja ▁ mbo ga ▁ya ▁mayani ▁muhala ▁sekeya mtaguse ▁ija ▁yoja ▁vinhu ▁vose , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Ku nilongela , ▁‘ Wa longoze ▁wanhu ▁wano ,’ ▁ mbali ▁hu nilongele ▁yelihi ▁yonda u m tume ▁na ▁niye . ▁Ku longa , ▁‘ Ni ku manya ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jako ▁na ▁ni nogeligw a ▁na ▁weye .’
▁M apanzia ▁yose ▁kulu zunguluka ▁uluwa ▁ya kala ▁ya ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe .
▁Chila ▁siku ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁umwe ▁wa gendelela ▁ku iting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁waja ▁ndiya ▁hamwe ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zawo ▁na ▁wa de ng ' helela ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Musa ▁kasegela ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁kahita ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu , ▁kenul a ▁makono ▁yake ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mi bumo ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁vi leka . ▁M vula ▁ha itonyile ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Sekemu itendele ▁wenyewo ▁ubani ▁uli ngile ▁vino , ▁ubani ▁uwo ▁wizakuwa ▁we la ▁kumwenu ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Tegelezeni ! ▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁no mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁one ▁muha togola ▁ku gumigw a ▁ulungwana , ▁Chilisito ▁heza mbwe de la ni ▁chochose .
▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁siza wawinga ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwaviya ▁isi ▁iza sigala ▁ya bule ▁chinhu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁weza k ongeze ka ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kaidi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Vondau fike ▁Misili ▁utende ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁mauzauza ▁yose ▁yoni kwing ' hile ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuyatenda . ▁Mbali ▁niye ▁niza utenda ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁mdala , ▁nayo ▁heza walekela ▁Waisilaili ▁wa segele .
▁Zi na ▁da ▁lwanda ▁ l weka i di ▁ni ▁ G i ho ni , ▁ulo ▁lo i zunguluka ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Ku shi .
▁Hamu m gesile ▁Lu we ▁yoya mwing ' hileni ▁ugima , ▁mu m zimiza ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mweleke ni .
▁Pet a ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 5 3 , 4 00.
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ubazi , ▁heza muleka ni ▁hebu ▁heza mwa nga miza ni , ▁hebu ▁heza zimiza ▁lagano ▁di yekile ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁ku ilaha .
▁Mbali ▁ni mulongelani , ▁“ Mwiza hazi ▁isi ▁yawo , ▁niza mwing ' hani ▁fana ▁uhazi , ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile .” ▁Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoni m bagule ni ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga .
▁bu ng ' hulo ▁ijo ▁do mwemwes a ▁mudi zi za , ▁na ▁ziza ▁hadi dahile ▁bule ▁kudi segeza .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁ nyo ka ▁wa ▁shaba ▁na ▁kam tumbik a ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mbiki . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yoya l umigwe ▁na ▁ nyo ka ▁viya mu lo lile ▁ nyo ka ▁iyo ▁wa ▁shaba , ▁ka hona .
▁Kwa ▁kuilumba ▁nayo ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mu zengigw a ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁muwe ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kukala ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁na ▁nz o ko we ▁na ▁modeli ▁za ▁mu lo wa ▁na ▁chi z ogolo ▁ s ha mba ▁na ▁ gomba lima .
▁Dug ila ▁ijo ▁vidi fikile ▁ha lu do n ho , ▁Yesu ▁nayo ▁kahita ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kufundiza .
▁hebu ▁muha wi ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yo londa ▁mbuli ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁mi zi mu ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁hebu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike .
▁Na ▁viya komeleze ▁sang ' hano ▁iya tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁ya itende , ▁kawa languliza ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowa mtegeleze ▁wa uhokele ▁ulopozi ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ,
▁Viwa hulike ▁kolonga ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya , ▁wanyama la ▁hupi , ▁na ▁Paulo ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁walala ▁wo wezile ▁kumgwila , ▁“ Vino ▁mwiza ▁na ▁ma panga ▁na ▁ma lungu ▁fana ▁niye ▁na mba vi ?
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁mo mulonda , ▁ ihawa ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna ▁ muwona , ▁sambi ▁mo muhuwila ▁ ihawa ▁hamuna muwona . ▁Ivo ▁mo de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani , ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu .
▁Baho ▁hau mwaka ▁Mulungu ▁ka wekila ▁wanhu ▁chilagano ▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁Inogile ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁walotezi ▁wake , ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile .
▁ B umbila ▁jose ▁di kala ▁hupi ▁do wa tegeleza ▁Balinaba ▁na ▁Paulo ▁viwo simulil a ▁mauzauza ▁na ▁mawewedeko ▁yoyatendile ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kufose la ▁wawo .
▁Vi nyamkela ▁viya ▁vi mulamba ▁Yesu ▁sekeya vi gume ▁mudi kombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo .
▁U tende ▁ chisuwili ▁na ▁chiwe ▁mkono ▁umwe ▁hagati ▁wa ▁di gulu ▁m aabaho ▁i ka ▁lwivi ▁ubanzi ▁umwe , ▁safina ▁iwe ▁na ▁ go lo fa ▁nhatu .
▁Kwa viya ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁viyo tenda ▁wanhu ▁wano ge ▁haulongozi ▁hake , ▁nawo ▁wa ndusa ▁nzila ▁yawo ▁wenyewo , ▁hawa i sondelela ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁ya ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wano ge ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ M ke ▁wako ▁hwiza mtanga ▁kaidi ▁Salayi , ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁zina ▁jake ▁Sala .
▁Musa ▁kawedika , ▁“ G o ze leni ▁m baka ▁vondani hulike ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chi yo lagiliza ▁kuson hela ▁mweye .”
▁Mbali ▁hachi wa togole le ▁hata ▁chidogo ▁muladi ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁u sigale ▁na ▁mweye ▁siku ▁zose .
▁M wa ▁yeye ▁cho komboligwa ▁na ▁ku lekeleligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu .
▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ One ▁kweli ▁muha tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁vimu longile , ▁basi ▁baha no ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mu isasale ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ,
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁ka mpula ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kawahonya ▁Abimeleki ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁watumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike , ▁ivo ▁ weleka ▁wana .
▁Ivo ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁nhosa ▁yako ▁ya ▁chinyele , ▁na ▁Tata ▁yo wona ▁ya fisike , ▁kezaku gwe ka .
▁Kwa viya ▁chaha komeleza ▁kui yawala ▁lukuli ▁luja ▁lwa ▁kuulanga ▁basi ▁vondachi woneke ▁cha bule ▁lukuli .
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁no mulamba ni , ▁sekemu fe ▁moyo ! ▁Habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁yonda yagize ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁ mbali ▁ngalawa ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁yonda yagize .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa longole ▁na ▁waja ▁wam sondelele ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁wa guta , ▁“ Mwing ' heni ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁yo mtemela ▁mate ▁iyo ▁yokwiza ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa !
▁Za ha bu ▁ya ▁isi ▁iyo ▁ino ga . ▁Uko ▁iviya ▁kuna ▁m vu mba vu mba ▁wou n ung ' hila ▁goya ▁wo tangigwa ▁be do la ▁na ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁bei ▁ng ' hulu ▁yo tangigwa ▁one ki .
▁Kwa viya ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁kuzilibuka ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁wagima ▁na ▁wadanganike .
▁Lelo ▁ hita , ▁nizaku taza ▁kulonga ▁na ▁kuku fu nza ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kulonga .”
▁Viwa hulike ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁wa somigwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁ku landula ▁madizi , ▁“ M kulu ▁ni ▁ Alitemi ▁wa ▁Efeso !”
▁Mbali ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁keng ' higwa ▁mabawa ▁maidi ▁yoya li ngile ▁fana ▁viya ▁mabawa ▁ya ▁m hu ng u ▁mkulu , ▁muladi ▁ya pate ▁ku gulu ka ▁yahite ▁kudibwilingu ▁hanhu ▁hake ▁hoya sasalil igwe , ▁ko nda ya kale ▁goya ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁nusu , ▁kutali ▁na ▁nhulanyika ▁ijo .
▁One ▁uha walongela ▁wahuwila ▁wayago ▁ndagilizi ▁zino , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza kuwa ▁msang ' hani ▁yanogile ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁weye ▁mwenyewo ▁ko gendelela ▁kuku la ▁chimuhe ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁za ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁kweli ▁you ya tegeleze .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Chi p indi ▁cha ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁sambi ▁chifika .
▁Na ▁one ▁hamu dahile ▁bule ▁kwika ▁vinhu ▁va ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁vinogile , ▁yelihi ▁yonda ▁ya weng ' he ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁wenyewo ?
▁Naholi ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kenda ▁kamwelek a ▁Tela .
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁na ▁zele . ▁Ka di lava , ▁ka mtowa ▁ mba nde ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka mkanha ▁ gutwi ▁da ▁kulume . ▁M tumigwa ▁iyo ▁ka tangigwa ▁Maliki .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mbeyu ▁zi ha gumigw a ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁ha ▁mtufi ▁ha zilagalila , ▁mbeyu ▁izo ▁kumwenu ▁za mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Ch eye ▁cho huwila ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁kazilibuka , ▁ivo ▁cho huwila ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁keza wagala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁wadanganike ▁wa kalile ▁womuhuwila .
▁M sang ' hani ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁keza , ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁hela ▁yako ▁i gala ▁faida ▁ya ▁ma fungu ▁longo .’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mbweleza ni ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁m eli , ▁mwanza ▁u yekile ▁chilagano ▁kuwa ▁hamwiza hita ▁kaidi . ▁Uko ▁mwiza geza ▁kui chuuza ▁kwa ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁kuwa ▁watumwa , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondayam gule ni .”
▁“ Wa gaze ▁Wa midiani ▁na ▁u wakome ,
▁One ▁ya wile ▁hano ▁muna ▁isi , ▁sigambe ya we ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ng ' o , ▁kwaviya ▁wa uko ▁wa lava ▁nhosa ▁za ▁vitumetume ▁vi vi londeka ▁kwa ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Kachi vugula ▁na ▁ka wona ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Ka kala ▁ko lila , ▁ivo ▁ka muwonela ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Chiebulaniya .”
▁Ivo ▁wakala ▁mwii vi bumbila ▁va ▁wanhu ▁gana - ga na ▁na ▁va ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matano - ma ta no .
▁Ka mwing ' ha ▁Mwana ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku tagusa ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu .
▁Wa ja ▁wa hulike ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kulema ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welihi ? ▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁walangulizi gwe ▁na ▁Musa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Viya lemile ▁kuchi tegeleza , ▁chi muleka ▁na ▁chi longa , ▁“ Y o yolonda ▁Mndewa ▁ya tendeke .”
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawalagiliza ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Waisilaili .
▁Mndewa ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I sasale ▁uhite ▁kui nzila ▁yoi tangigwa ▁Nzi la ▁Igolo ke , ▁na ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Yuda , ▁mu m zahile ▁munhu ▁yo tangigwa ▁Sauli ▁kulawa ▁T a li so . ▁ Sambi ▁yang ' hali ▁ko tosa .”
▁Mkulu ▁iyo ▁wa ▁Loma ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mwenevale ▁niye ▁si faya ▁weye ▁ wingile ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yangu , ▁ mbali ▁ longa ▁mbuli ▁muhala ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ▁keza hona .
▁Wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ B ule ! ▁Chi fungu lile ▁Balaba !” ▁I ja ▁Balaba ▁kakala ▁mbavi .
▁Ko mfunga ▁chihongwe ▁wake ▁kwa ▁nzabi ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁zabibu ▁na ▁ko mfunga ▁mwana chi hongwe ▁kwa ▁nzabi ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁zabibu ▁unogile , ▁muladi ▁ya je ▁mayani ▁ya ▁mzabibu . ▁Ko fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁muna ▁i di v a i , ▁Viwa lo ▁vake ▁muna ▁i di v a i ▁ndu ng ' hu .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni ▁kakala ▁Shemu eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Amihudi .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁kawalongela ▁walume ▁wowa bwelile ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁“ Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yo yamulagilize ▁Musa ,
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁vino ▁ku lagusa ▁ni ▁ifa ▁ilihi ▁yo onda ya danganike .
▁Na ▁iviya ▁cho londeka ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁vi muhulike ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁kumwetu , ▁hamu i togole ▁bule ▁fana ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁munhu , ▁ mbali ▁fana ▁viya ▁kumwenu ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Na ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁i tenda ▁sang ' hano ▁mgati ▁ya ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁mweye ▁ muhuwila .
▁Ka ibwanha ▁m ma gulu ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁M samaliya .
▁Kwa viya ▁chi gong ' onda ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁fana ▁viwatendile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa ▁umwaka . ▁Wa hulika ▁usenga ▁ mbali ▁hau wa fa i ye , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa u togole ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo .
▁M e za ▁ija ▁kwiza ika ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kunze ▁wa ▁panzia ▁ijo , ▁ chinala ▁chiya ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁kwiza chi ka ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁dihema , ▁vi i lole ▁na ▁imeza . ▁M e za ▁iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁weza vi timbula ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁hana ▁ulupango ▁fana ▁ndiya , ▁nhosa ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁moto ▁kulava ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Ma ba mba la ▁yose ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ni ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Vonda wa wa gwile ▁mweye ▁na ▁kuwa gala ▁kwii chi ta la , ▁sekemu gese ▁chonda ▁mu longe . ▁L usita ▁vonda lu fike , ▁longeni ▁chochose ▁chila ▁chonda ▁ mwing ' higwe , ▁kwaviya ▁siyo ▁mweye ▁mu longa ▁ila ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁Maabaho ▁chiza daha ▁kui peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁muna ▁isi ▁zozi kala ▁kutali ▁ya ▁isi ▁yenu . ▁ Hachi daha ▁kuigodela ▁sang ' hano ▁yo watendile ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ▁viwa kalile ▁wose gela , ▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yohana , ▁“ Mu hita ▁ku zahila ▁choni ▁kudibwilingu ? ▁Uko ▁kudibwilingu ▁ mulawa ▁kulola ▁choni ? ▁Lu sa n ze ▁lolu tingisigwa ▁na ▁mbeho ?
▁Mbali ▁viwalo lile , ▁wa wona ▁dibwe ▁diya ▁kulu ▁di bimbilis igwa ▁mwaka .
▁Wa nhu ▁vi wawonile ▁Musa ▁kakala ma ▁ku humuluka ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁waiting ' hana ▁kum zunguluka ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Chi tengenezel e ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁yondai chi longoze . ▁Musa ▁yoya chi lavile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁hachi vimanyile ▁ka p a ti gwa ▁na ▁choni .”
▁“ Maabaho ▁walangulizi ▁weza walongela ▁wanhu , ▁‘ Kuna ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya ze ngile ▁kaye ▁na ▁hana ili mbula ? ▁Ya bwele ▁ukaye ▁muladi ▁sekeya danganike ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ya ili mbule .
▁Ndugu ▁keza mu hinduka ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁yakomigwe , ▁na ▁tata ▁keza mu hinduka ▁mwanage ▁yakomigwe . ▁Wana ▁weza wa lema ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo .
▁Ivo ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁wawo ▁ni iwawo ▁welesi ▁wa ▁kweli ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Kwiza guma ▁U li mu ▁na ▁S u mi mu ▁muna ▁ichi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁cha ▁ku humiza , ▁izo ▁zizakuwa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁moyo ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁chila ▁viyo kwiza ▁haulongozi ▁wangu . ▁Haluni ▁keza sola ▁ ulamuzi ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wawo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁moyo ▁wake ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁muwe ▁wa nyendanyenda , ▁wa ho le , ▁mu funye ▁umoyo , ▁na ▁mui londe ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kawatum a ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁m ka chi sasalil e ▁Pasaka ▁chi je .”
▁Mbali ▁muna ▁ichi hendo ▁chenu , ▁no mulekelela ga ▁m fungwa ▁imwe ▁muna ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁Pasaka . ▁M wo londa ▁ni mu lekele ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?”
▁Ivo ▁mwenevale ▁kamulongela ▁mtumwa ▁wake , ▁‘ L a wa ▁kunze ▁uhite ▁kuzi nzila ▁na ▁kuzi m haka , ▁u walongele ▁wanhu ▁weze ▁muladi ▁kaye ▁yangu ▁i me me .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka watendela ▁viwalo ▁va ▁mbende ▁za ▁wanyama ▁Adamu ▁na ▁muke ▁wake , ▁na ▁kawa yawaza .
▁Mbali ▁m olondeka ▁muwe ▁m we la ▁muna ▁ugen zi ▁wenu ▁wose ▁fana ▁viya ▁ija ▁ yamtangile ni ▁kela .
▁Chila ▁imwe ▁wa ▁vi umbe ▁wano ▁wane ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁kakala ▁na ▁mabawa ▁sita , ▁wakala ▁wene la ▁meso ▁lukuli ▁lose . ▁Walonga ▁m isi ▁na ▁chilo ▁ bila ▁kuhumula , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi , ▁ni ▁Yelile , ▁Yelile , ▁Yelile , ▁ya kalile ▁uko , ▁yeli ▁baha ▁na ▁yokwiza .
▁Wa nhu ▁waha gomba ▁wokwiza ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁niye ▁no wa humiza ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mulungu .”
▁Filipo ▁ka lawilila ▁uko ▁ A zo to ▁na ▁viyakalile ▁ko fosa ▁ka peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yose ▁m baka ▁kafika ▁Kaisaliya .
▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁munhu ▁ko huwila ▁na ▁ko petigwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁mulomo ▁ko togola ▁na ▁kukomboligwa .
▁Na ▁hano ▁mwiisi ▁sekemu m tange ▁yoyose , ▁‘ Tata ,’ ▁kwaviya ▁muna ▁Tata ▁imwe ▁muhala ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁ 6 7 5 ▁wa lavigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁ya sang ' hanile ▁chitumetume ▁chake ▁cho yeng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kuwataza ▁wamwenga ▁fana ▁mkalizi ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁yanogile ▁wa ▁vitumetume ▁mbasakanyo ▁va ▁Mulungu .
▁U wa sole ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁mwanage , ▁u wagale ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi ,
▁Musa ▁kawa duganya ▁hamwe ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vo yamulagilize ni ▁mutende .
▁Ng ' hondo ▁iza gala ▁zi fa ▁nyingi ▁kunze ▁ya ▁zikaye , ▁weza kuwa ▁na ▁ludumbo ▁muna ▁zikaye , ▁wabwanga ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁wezadanganika , ▁wana ▁ving ' hele ▁hebu ▁walala ▁weli ▁na ▁u he nga , ▁haweza kuwa ▁wagima .
▁“ Wa isi la ili ▁watende ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lu pangigwe .
▁Wa naake ▁wawo ▁wo geza ▁ku ifunza ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁viweli ▁hawa daha ▁ku umanya ▁ukweli .
▁I mwenga ▁keza longa , ▁“ Ni togole ligwa ▁kutenda ▁chila ▁chinhu .” ▁Ona , ▁ mbali ▁siyo ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chinoga ▁kumwenu . ▁No daha ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁no togole ligwa ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁ mbali ▁si londa ▁ku ta wa ligwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁ Yodahika ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁keza londa ▁kuni baba sa , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza woneka ▁fana ▁viya ▁no mvwizila , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁niza i galila ▁ duwilo ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate .”
▁Modaha ▁kuja ▁wanyama ▁wano , ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti
▁“ Mfalume ▁keza wedika , ▁‘ No walongele ni ▁kweli , ▁fana ▁vimu watendela ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wawo ▁wadodo , ▁muni tendela ▁niye !’
▁Na wo ▁wa sasala ▁vitumetume ▁vawo ▁va ▁kumwing ' ha ▁Yosefu , ▁vondaya bwele ▁imisi , ▁kwaviya ▁wa longiligwa ▁kuwa ▁wezakuja ▁ndiya ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Iviya ▁Esau ▁ka mbi ka ▁ndiya ▁inogile ▁na ▁ka mgalila ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Kamulongela , ▁“ Ha ya ▁tata , ▁ kala ▁u je ▁nyama ▁yoni kugalile , ▁muladi ▁u dahe ▁kuni temela ▁mate .”
▁ H engelehengele ▁di kala ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁ija ▁imkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kadumba ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁waha m to wile ▁Paulo ▁vihande ▁vihande . ▁Ivo ▁kalagiliza ▁wakalizi ▁wa hulumuke ▁na ▁wa msole ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo , ▁m aabaho ▁wa ngala ▁muna ▁im ho ngo no .
▁Lelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁mweye ▁mwa wa na ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wana ▁fana ▁Isaka .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁ijo ▁kahita ▁ku iting ' hana ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁viwamuwone , ▁wamulamba ▁ya segele ▁muna ▁isi ▁yawo .
▁Seti ▁nayo ▁ka pata ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁kamtanga ▁Enosi . ▁Baho ▁wanhu ▁wa ndusa ▁kumtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zetu , ▁ka mtunhiza ▁Yesu ▁msang ' hani ▁wake . ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu msola ▁muladi ▁yakomigwe , ▁mu mwika ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁na ▁m umbe la ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Pilato , ▁m baka ▁Pilato ▁viyalondile ▁ku mu lekele ▁yahite .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa wonela ▁ludoko ▁na ▁kasegela .
▁Yuda ▁viyafikile , ▁bahobaho ▁ka n gendela ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Mfundiza !” ▁Maabaho ▁kamnonela .
▁Mbali , ▁hachi daha ▁kusang ' hana ▁ bila ▁vilung o ▁va ▁lukuli ▁vovi woneka ▁vi nyonde nyonde .
▁Labani ▁viya hitile ▁kuwa kanha ▁mazoya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake , ▁Laheli ▁ka bawa ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Leka mana ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi ▁ha weng ' higwe ▁uhazi ▁wa ▁isi ▁fana ▁makabila ▁yamwenga ▁vi yeng ' higwe , ▁ila ▁wa hokela ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁fana ▁viya laganile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Munhu ▁yondaya lave ▁nhambiko ▁yake , ▁kolondeka ▁ya mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁ya ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁lita ▁imwe ▁ya ▁mavuta .
▁Na ▁ukalangama ▁wenyewo ▁uwo ▁uno , ▁Mulungu ▁ka ching ' ha ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁ugima ▁uwo ▁wo patik a ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mwanage .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁mwanamke ▁yahalaw igwa ▁na ▁damu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁kufosa ▁vi i wa ga ▁siku ▁zake ▁hebu ▁ko la wi gwa ▁damu ▁siku ▁siyo ▁zake , ▁siku ▁zose ▁zo yo la wi gwa ▁na ▁damu ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko .
▁M tegelezeni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁muzindilile ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yose ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo .”
▁Chi tabu ▁chino ▁cholonga ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁Musa ▁ziya walongele ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁viwa kalile ▁kuchuwala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani . ▁Wakala ▁kuna ▁dikolongo ▁da ▁Yoludani ▁habehi ▁na ▁S ufu , ▁hagati ▁ya ▁bululu ▁da ▁Palani ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁na ▁mabululu ▁ya ▁To fe li ▁na ▁Labani ▁na ▁Ha se lo si ▁na ▁Di za ha bu , ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga .
▁nayo ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwafundiza .
▁Na ▁mbiki ▁unogile ▁hau daha ▁kwima ▁ tunda ▁dihile , ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wihile ▁hau daha ▁kwima ▁ tunda ▁dinogile .
▁Yesu ▁kolondeka ▁ya hishi m igwe ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁Musa , ▁fana ▁viya ▁m ze nzi ▁wa ▁kaye ▁kana ▁hishima ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁kaye ▁yenyewo .
