▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Ni kutenda ▁uwe ▁tata ▁wa ▁makabila ▁mengi .” ▁Chi lagano ▁icho ▁ni ▁kweli ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya hu i wi ligwe ▁na ▁Bulahimu . ▁Mulungu ▁yowa zilibula ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁na ▁kuwa golela ▁ugima , ▁na ▁kwa ▁lagilizo ▁jake ▁vinhu ▁havi kalile ▁uko ▁vo kuwa ▁uko .
▁Kweli ▁kusang ' hana ▁yo mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kutogola ▁kuwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁viyeli navo ▁ni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kuchi taza ▁ng ' hani .
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁u temela ▁mate ▁wa ▁Musa ▁munhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁ing ' hali ▁hana danganika . ▁Kalonga ,
▁M koi ▁wa ▁Saimoni ▁kakala ▁ya gonile ▁mudi ko mwa , ▁kolumwa . ▁Bahobaho ▁Yesu ▁viyafikile ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁mtamu ▁iyo .
▁Kwa viya ▁haidahik a ▁kaidi ▁kuwa bweleza ▁wanhu ▁wa ule kile ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁wasamhe . ▁Wa ja ▁wowa kalile ▁mwanduso ▁wa umanya ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku la nza ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁wa muhokela ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ,
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁weza walongela ▁walala ▁wa ▁bululu , ▁‘ M wa ne tu ▁kana ▁moyo ▁mdala ▁na ▁ko tu ndu ka ▁na ▁ha londa ▁kuchi tegeleza ▁na ▁m melo ▁na ▁ko kolwa ▁upele .’
▁Wa gendelela ▁kukala ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁lose ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁nhogolwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka lola ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁muladi ▁ya muwone ▁yoyatendile ▁ivo .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁yaha mwihila ▁miyage ▁na ▁kum sepa ▁na ▁ku mwin u kila , ▁ka mtowa ▁m baka ▁kadanganika , ▁nayo ▁ka kimbilila ▁bululu ▁dimwe ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁matatu ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wokala ▁kumwenu , ▁m olondeka ▁mwa mhe ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yangu , ▁na ▁hebu ▁sekemu tende ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zi tibusa .
▁Ch eye ▁hachi li ngile ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁wengi ▁wa chuuzi ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁malond o ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁kweli ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wa tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁ peta ▁ya ▁vi a ▁vi sang ' hani ligwe ▁kwika ▁hema ▁da ▁kwika ▁goya ▁vi bawo ▁va ▁ukalangama . ▁Pet a ▁ino ▁i sa sa ligwa ▁na ▁Walawi ▁kwa ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁Musa , ▁muna ▁ ulongozi ▁wa ▁Isamali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni .
▁“ One ▁muha hulika ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁dimwe ▁mwa ▁mabululu ▁yenu ▁kuwa ▁ka uko ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁yo tenda ▁wihi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁na ▁ku bena ▁lagano ▁jake ,
▁Seke chi tende ▁uzinzi ▁fana ▁wamwenga ▁wawo ▁viwatendile , ▁wadanganika ▁zuwa ▁dimwe ▁wanhu ▁ 2 3 ,000 .
▁One ▁mtawala ▁yaha hulika ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁cheye ▁chiza longa ▁nayo , ▁na ▁mweye ▁hamwiza dumba ▁bule .
▁Viya malile ▁yayo ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wekane ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁muna ▁dizuwa , ▁najo ▁ding ' higwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuwa lunguza ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Yakobo ▁ka mkwenhukila ▁na ▁kamnonela , ▁Isaka ▁viyahulike ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁viwalo ▁vake , ▁kamtemela ▁mate ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lola ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁mwanangu ▁ulinga ▁fana ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁mgunda ▁wou temeligw e ▁mate ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁kamuuza ▁kaidi , ▁“ W eye ▁kweli ▁mwanangu ▁Esau ?” ▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Iyo ▁niye .”
▁Sekemu gaiye ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁mu la m b eni ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kumtambikila ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela .
▁Fan a ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁“ Ni mulonda ▁Yakobo ▁ mbali ▁ E sa w u ▁ni mwihila .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁I ng iza ▁mibiki ▁iyo ▁muna ▁zi mhete ▁zili ▁ banzi ▁mbili ▁za ▁sanduku , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kudi papa .
▁Balaamu ▁ka lava ▁ ulotezi ▁uno , ▁“ B a la ki ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁ka nigalila ▁kulawa ▁Alamu , ▁kulawa ▁Siliya , ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa ▁milima . ▁Kalonga , ▁‘ Izo ▁ uwaduwile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu , ▁izo , ▁uwa longe ▁vihile ▁Waisilaili .’
▁U tali ▁wa ▁panzia ▁di sigale ▁kwiza i ba nda ▁nusu ▁mita ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁mita ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga , ▁muladi ▁ iting e ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁dihema ▁muladi ▁iwe ▁na ▁ngubiko .
▁Wa mweda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wo sigala ▁kwaminika ▁muna ▁uku gezigwa , ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁vondawa ya hume ▁magezo , ▁weza hokela ▁gweko ▁jawo ▁da ▁ugima ▁uja ▁Mulungu ▁u yalongile ▁keza weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo mulonda .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁mazi ▁yelile ▁muna ▁ichi a ▁cha ▁ulongo , ▁m aabaho ▁keza sola ▁timbwisi ▁dili ▁hasi ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kudi guma ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁yayo .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mulonde ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wako ▁wose ▁na ▁kwa ▁muhe ▁wako ▁wose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa wo ▁lose , ▁na ▁kwa ▁nzewele ▁zako ▁zose . ▁ Mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁vou i londa ▁mwenyewo .”
▁Chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁sekeya zahile ▁malond o ▁yake ▁m hu ha la ▁ mbali ▁u zahile ▁malond o ▁ya ▁miyago .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁na ya kale ▁ku wi nza na ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁vi yeng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁fana ▁viya tangigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Di no ▁ijo ▁ka n u ni ▁do ni fundiza ▁kwa ▁wahuwila ▁wose .
▁Maabaho ▁idamu ▁ija ▁kezam mizil a ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yo safyigwa ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁miyanza ▁saba , ▁m aabaho ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kela . ▁N dege ▁ija ▁yeli ▁mgima ▁kezamuleka ▁yahite ▁kuna ▁imigunda ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁kadi kung ' hu sila ▁di zo ka ▁muna ▁umoto ▁ bila ▁kulu migwa ▁hohose .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kawa segeza ▁wanage ▁hana ▁yama vi ndi ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁ka tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁m baka ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi dalisa ▁hasi .
▁Cho tambika ▁vino ▁muladi ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁di tu n hi zigwe ▁mgati ▁yenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁di tu n hi zigwe ▁kwa ▁kwiilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Baho ▁umwaka ▁kakala ▁haku faya ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁kochi faya ▁ng ' hani ▁weye ▁na ▁niye .
▁U sungu ▁ vu u m fikile ▁wa ▁kwi ibasula , ▁ mba sa ▁imwe ▁ka lava ▁mkono ▁kunze , ▁nayo ▁imu la la ▁ka mfunga ▁kwa ▁ lusi ng i ja ▁lu dung ' u ▁kuno ▁kolonga , ▁“ Ino ▁niiyo ▁ya nduse ▁kwelekigwa .”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Isilaili , ▁“ Chi no ▁icho ▁cha ya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁mkaya ▁hebu ▁nyambenyambe ▁yo di liga ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza mkoma ▁kwa ▁kumtowa ▁na ▁mabwe .
▁Kufos ela ▁yeye , ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁vinhu ▁vose , ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁chi lumbigwe ▁ bila ▁yeye .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ▁ya muhokele ▁imwana ▁ fa ni le ▁ino ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁ko ni hokela ▁niye . ▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyo ni hokela ▁niye , ▁ hani hokela ▁niye ▁niidumwe , ▁ila ▁ko muhokela ▁na ▁ija ▁yoyanhumile ▁iviya .”
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemu sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowose .
▁ivo ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Muhe ▁i na ▁utunhizo ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁“ I sasale ni ▁kwa ▁jojose ▁dondadi ze , ▁ funge ni ▁mkwiji ▁muna ▁ivi g u di ▁venu ▁na ▁vitasa ▁venu ▁vi we ▁vo kwaka .
▁Mbali ▁mwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu , ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Gileadi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Makili , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Manase ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁wa kwenhuka ▁habehi ▁na ▁kulonga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Pilato ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁ka tenda ▁chinhu ▁ ga ni ▁chihile ?” ▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa iyoha ▁ku landula ▁ya madizi , ▁“ Mu wambe ▁mu ▁msalaba !”
▁Ha mala ▁baho ▁Yosefu ▁ka tenda ▁chilaho ▁kwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ni laganile ni ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁vondaya wa segeze ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino , ▁mwiza i papa ▁m ivuha ▁yangu ▁kulawa ▁hanhu ▁hano .”
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁isi ▁yawo ▁ yenela ▁m baka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁ lamba ▁da ▁Galilaya , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁ A la ba , ▁niiyo ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁ Munyu , ▁m baka ▁ma humuluk o ▁ya ▁Pisiga , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa .
▁“ M iyanza ▁mitatu ▁kwa ▁mwaka ▁chila ▁mulume ▁kolondeka ▁kui duganya ▁haulongozi ▁wangu , ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁ mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁yaidumwe . ▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁keza ▁na ▁wa gomba ▁m baka ▁imitondo .
▁Mfalume ▁Agilipa ▁nodaha ▁kulonga ▁na ▁weye ▁ bila ▁ludumbo , ▁kwaviya ▁ku zimanya ▁mbuli ▁zino . ▁No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁yoya lawilile ▁yo manyika ▁kumwako ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁hai tendeke ▁kuna ▁yama fi so ▁bule .
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁Sekemu i l umbe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa huwila , ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile ▁hawa daha ▁kuwa ▁mambwiya . ▁Zi za ▁na ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁havi daha ▁kukala ▁hamwe .
▁Haluni ▁kezachi ka ▁ chinala ▁icho ▁cha ▁vitasa ▁mgati ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁kunze ▁ya ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁muladi ▁vi gendelele ▁kwa ka ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwandusi la ▁ichilo ▁m baka ▁imitondo . ▁N dagilizi ▁ino ▁yo londeka ▁i zindililigw e ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu .
▁Bulahimu ▁kabwela ▁hima ▁kuna ▁i he ma ▁kamulongela ▁Sala , ▁“ L o p o la , ▁ sola ▁m hishi ▁tano ▁za ▁usage ▁unogile ▁na ▁u ho nde ▁magate .”
▁wa vika ▁ivo ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁vi dali , ▁nayo ▁kavi timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wa mbwakila ▁na ▁wamulongela ▁ya nyama le . ▁Mbali ▁yeye ▁ka gendelela ▁ku tanga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁ni wonele ▁ubazi !”
▁Ivo ▁wasegela ▁wahita ▁kudi kaliza ▁dileme ▁kwa ▁kwika ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁idibwe .
▁Chi nayo ▁mengi ▁ya ▁ku walongele ni ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁vi dala ▁ku mulongelani ▁mweye ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁muwa ▁wa b wa ▁kuhulika .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁ya la wigwe ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁ka mulamba ▁Yesu ▁ya hita ▁hamwe ▁nayo . ▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamul a ga ▁na ▁kamulongela ,
▁Chi na jo ▁lolelo ▁ijo ▁fana ▁dibwe ▁kulu ▁da ▁kwi mizil a ▁ngalawa ▁ya ▁ugima ▁wetu . ▁L o le lo ▁ijo ▁di gangamala ▁na ▁ dima ▁goya , ▁do ibebenyek a ▁kuna ▁dipanzia ▁m baka ▁do fika ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁ka wahuma ▁ng ' hani ▁Wayahudi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁ka lagusa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi .
▁Viya longile ▁vino , ▁Masadukayo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wa ndusa ▁kwii hasanya , ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁di igola .
▁ Siku ▁za ▁kusoligwa ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁kuulanga ▁viyakalile ▁habehi , ▁Yesu ▁ka londa ▁kuhita ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Iviya ▁ni tenda ▁nawo ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁kuwa ▁niza weng ' ha ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁uko ▁weza kala ▁fana ▁nyambenyambe .
▁Maabaho ▁muna ▁di bugulu ▁da ▁walume ▁wa lawile ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁ bagula ▁mchan go ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Chi nhu ▁chimwe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁vinhu ▁magan a ▁matano , ▁iwe ▁wanhu ▁hebu ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti ,
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mulungu ‚ ▁“ Niye ▁yelihi ▁m baka ▁ni dahe ▁kuhita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁kuwa lava ▁Waisilaili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ?”
▁Mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa isi la ili ▁wano ▁weza da nga ni kila ▁muna ▁ichuwala .” ▁Ha sigale ▁hata ▁imwe ▁viweli , ▁ila ▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni .
▁na ▁ku lungu ▁na ▁m ha la ▁na ▁ng ' ho go ni ▁na ▁luti ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁na ▁m ha la ▁mzelu ▁na ▁ pofu ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁kumulima .
▁“ Kwel a ▁mulima ▁uno ▁wa ▁Abalimu , ▁mulima ▁wa ▁N e b o , ▁uli ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Moabu , ▁voi lola ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko , ▁uka i lole ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁yoni weng ' ha ▁Waisilaili ▁wa i sole .
▁Nowalondel a ni ▁m ongeze ligwe ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁ulondo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁waha lema ▁yahite ▁na ▁cheye , ▁hachiza hita ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kachilongela ▁funhu la ▁funhu la ▁kuwa ▁‘ Siza wa hokela ▁mweye ▁m baka ▁m wize ▁na ▁mdodo ▁wenu .’ ▁”
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kuna wa ▁chihanga ▁chake , ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁na ▁kai ya nga mbi za , ▁kalagiliza ▁ya galil igwe ▁ndiya .
▁M i lima ▁ino ▁midi ▁ya ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Wakanaani ▁wowo kala ▁ A la ba ▁ili ▁chiu so u so ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁ G i liga li , ▁habehi ▁na ▁mibiki ▁mi kulu ▁uko ▁Mo le .
▁uko ▁kakala ▁miyezi ▁mitatu . ▁Ka kala ▁yo isasala ▁kuhita ▁Siliya ▁ mbali ▁ka to la ▁kuwa ▁wa uko ▁Wayahudi ▁wo londa ▁kumtendela ▁yehile , ▁ivo ▁ka lamula ▁kubwela ▁kufose la ▁Makedoniya .
▁Niye ▁mwenyewo ▁no kuwa ▁mwingi li zi , ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza nya mhilila ▁niye . ▁One ▁si mbweleze ▁kumwako , ▁ni da igwe ▁niye ▁siku ▁zose
▁Lameki ▁kawalongela ▁wake ▁zake , ▁“ A da ▁na ▁Zi la ▁ni tegelezeni , ▁M weye ▁wake ▁wa ▁Lameki ▁ tegelezeni ▁yoni mulongelani ▁Niye ▁ni mkoma ▁munhu ▁kwaviya ▁ka ning ' ha ▁ ba n ha ▁Ni mkoma ▁i mbwanga ▁kwaviya ▁kani lumiza .
▁Mu n he ndele ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁ulongo ▁na ▁ mulave ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁wanyama , ▁fana ▁viya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Chila ▁hanhu ▁honda ni wa ku mbuse ▁wanhu ▁zina ▁jangu , ▁niza mwizila ni ▁na ▁ku mtemela ni ▁mate .
▁M ibiki ▁izakuwa ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁nne ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita ,
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ V a ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma .” ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Mwing ' heni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁vili ▁va ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁na ▁ mwing ' heni ▁Mulungu ▁vili ▁va ▁Mulungu .”
▁Muna ▁umwe zi ▁wa ▁sita ▁wa ▁wimo ▁wa ▁Elizabeti , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtuma ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoya tangigwe ▁ G a bu li yeli ▁yahite ▁kudibululu ▁dodi tangigwa ▁Nazaleti ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya .
▁Ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ Chi ya ▁chochi lawa ▁muumoyo ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁icho ▁chi mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko .
▁Na yo ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni ku hulika ▁muna ▁umgunda , ▁ni dumba ▁kwaviya ▁na ukengele . ▁Ivo ▁ni ifisa .”
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kawalagiliza ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁vino , ▁“ Lelo ▁niye ▁nohita ▁kwiilumba ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁muna ▁ifa , ▁muni wa nde ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ tati ▁zangu ▁muna ▁dituka ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁Efiloni ▁Mu hiti
▁“ Saimoni , ▁Saimoni ! ▁Ni tegeleze ! ▁Lufyende ▁kawa londa ▁ya pate ▁kuwa gola ▁wanogile ▁na ▁wehile ▁fana ▁muli mi ▁viyo b e ta ▁uhemba .
▁“ Munhu ▁mwene ▁ludabwa ▁yoyo i kaliza ▁kaye ▁yake ▁kwa ▁silaha , ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁havi za ba wi gwa .
▁“ Na ▁weye ▁mwanangu , ▁kwiza tangigwa ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Uchanyha ▁Ng ' hani . ▁Kwiza mu longole la ▁Mndewa , ▁kum sasalil a ▁nzila ▁yake .
▁Ke dika , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁yoni mtegeleza ▁siku ▁zose , ▁kezaku galila ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku kutenda ▁u fa ni ki we . ▁Kwiza msole la ▁muke ▁mwanangu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaham bena ▁miyage ▁di vu ha , ▁nayo ▁kolondeka ▁ya benigw e ▁di vu ha , ▁ziso ▁kwa ▁ziso , ▁zino ▁kwa ▁zino . ▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yomu lumiza ▁miyage ▁kolondeka ▁ya lu m izigwe ▁fana ▁viya mulumize ▁miyage .
▁Ivo ▁ ilinga ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁si ▁waja ▁we le kwe ▁kwa ▁lukuli ▁niiyo ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁wo welekigwe ▁kwa ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁niiyo ▁wo petigwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Ivo ▁mwii togole ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁wenyewo , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viya mtogole ni ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁umuh a ke ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁kuwa bagula ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁ B umbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁jose ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wowa hulike ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani .
▁Viya lu le kile ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁kengila ▁mnyumba , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamulongela ▁yawa fa mbuli le ▁simwe ▁diya .
▁Ma ba mba la ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁ijo ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁m kila ▁na ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁yo gubika ▁utumbo ▁na ▁ fi go ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Efulaimu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁wapetigwa ▁kwa ▁mazina , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Mfalume ▁Helode ▁viyahulike ▁ivo , ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁luholozi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka bela ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wose , ▁kedika , ▁“ Si vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kolonga ▁choni .”
▁Dani ▁keza kuwa ▁msemi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁fana ▁imwe ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Isilaili .
▁Nowalondel a ▁mweye ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Sekemu se n ye ▁nyele ▁zili ▁mumgwazo ▁wa ▁matwi ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁sekemu wegule ▁ nde vu ▁zenu .
▁Mbali ▁wanahina ▁viwa m zunguluke , ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁dibu lu . ▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁yeye ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wahita ▁D eli b e .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zo ni longa ▁sambi ▁si ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁ mbali ▁no zi longa ▁fana ▁mbozi ▁kuson hela ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁ya ▁kuigodela .
▁Kwa viya ▁Chilisito ▁kolondeka ▁ya tawale , ▁m baka ▁Mulungu ▁vondaya weke ▁wehi ▁wose ▁hasi ▁ya ▁migulu ▁yake .
▁Di zi ▁di longa ▁kulawa ▁kudi wing u , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁ Mwanangu ▁yoni msagule , ▁m tegelezeni ▁yeye !”
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁weza ▁Antiyokiya ▁kulawa ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kuwafundiza ▁wahuwila , ▁“ One ▁ham wingile ▁ulungwana ▁fana ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁viyolonga , ▁hamu daha ▁bule ▁ku lopoligwa .”
▁Kwa viya ▁fana ▁yaha ndusa ▁ku himba ▁chandusilo , ▁hadaha ▁kuu komeleza , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo wona ▁chiyatendile ▁weza m se ka .
▁Mbali ▁sekemuje ▁nyama ▁ili ▁na ▁damu , ▁kwaviya ▁ugima ▁wake ▁wa umo ▁muna ▁idamu .
▁Chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁chiza fungigwa ▁kuna ▁ichizibawo ▁kwa ▁ku lumbiliza ▁mkwiji ▁wake ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁kwa ▁luzabi ▁lwa ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu , ▁muladi ▁chi fuko ▁icho ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁sekechi to ho ke ▁ mbali ▁chi kale ▁muna ▁ichizibawo .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Wamisili ▁wa wahi miza ▁Waisilaili ▁wa segele ▁himahima ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁yawo , ▁walonga , ▁“ One ▁hamu segele , ▁wose ▁chiza danganika .”
▁Ndugu ▁zangu ▁one ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁waha mwihila ni , ▁sekem wa za ny we .
▁Yakobo ▁kasola ▁ mango ▁m bisi ▁za ▁mibiki ▁mitatu ▁mbasakanyo , ▁ka zi go mo la ▁yama go me ▁muladi ▁m indi li zi ▁ mize lu ▁i woneke ▁muna ▁zi mango ▁izo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁kwiza lawilila ▁dihile , ▁kezatagusigwa ▁ugima ▁kwa ▁ugima ,
▁M wime ▁chigangamavu ▁na ▁muwe ▁magalu , ▁sekemuwadumbe , ▁mana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁He za muleka ni ▁hebu ▁heza mwasa ni .”
▁Na wo ▁wawalongela ▁fana ▁Yesu ▁va yawalongele , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wa waleka ▁wahite .
▁Ivo ▁kwaviya ▁kadanganika ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala , ▁uhasanyi ▁wabule ▁ludabwa ▁kaidi ▁kumwake , ▁na ▁ugima ▁u yo kala ▁sambi , ▁kokala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Mulungu
▁N hosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yondai sigale ▁izakuwa ▁ya ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁iyo ▁ni ▁nhosa ▁yelile ▁ng ' hani ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yano ▁yose ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁muladi ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁iwa fikile ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁na ▁wa mulavile ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁hewela ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁utunhizo ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Nolamba , ▁ kwenhuke ni ▁habehi ▁yangu .” ▁Wa kwenhuka , ▁nayo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁Yosefu , ▁yomu ni chuuzi le ▁kuhita ▁Misili .
▁na ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi ▁mwiza tula ▁m ku za ▁m baka ▁Ha ma si . ▁Maabaho ▁m haka ▁iza hita ▁m baka ▁uko ▁Se dadi ,
▁mu manye ▁nguvu ▁yake ▁vo ili ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu ▁cheye ▁wochi huwile , ▁nguvu ▁iyo ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁mgati ▁yetu , ▁ni ▁sawa ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁luja ▁lukulu ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Abulamu ▁kabwela ▁kulawa ▁Misili ▁kengila ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁Negebu . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Lutu .
▁Iviya ▁weza lawilila ▁wanhu ▁hawa walonda ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga , ▁hawa londa ▁kulekelela ▁na ▁ wavwizila ji ▁na ▁wa delenya ▁na ▁wa ka li ▁na ▁hawa londa ▁yanogile ,
▁Na ▁niye ▁vondanize , ▁nizawa tuma ▁waja ▁wonda ni wa sagule ▁vomu li ▁wa gale ▁usenga ▁na ▁vitumetume ▁venu ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Mbali ▁cho mwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ! ▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁lusita ▁lose ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wa hu mi ▁muna ▁yama so ndele lo ▁ya ▁Chilisito . ▁Mulungu ▁kochi tende za ▁cheye ▁chi vimanye ▁ku pwililisa ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁chila ▁hanhu , ▁fana ▁chinogile ▁chi n ung ' hila ▁goya .
▁Ma tu mba ▁yayo ▁na ▁matambi ▁yake ▁yawa ▁yake , ▁yawa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe . ▁Chi na la ▁icho ▁chose ▁chi h ondigwa ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile .
▁na ▁kwaviya ▁wa londa ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁kufosa ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁weza di humulus a ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁dikolongo ▁da ▁chiza nda ▁hachi nyala , ▁kolongo ▁ijo ▁hadi li migwa ▁hebu ▁hadi ha n digwa , ▁uko ▁weza di bena ▁isi ngo ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁ijo .
▁Wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Isaka ▁wa himba ▁ chisima ▁chimwenga , ▁icho ▁nacho ▁wachi gombela , ▁ivo ▁Isaka ▁kachi tanga ▁ chisima ▁icho ▁“ Si ti na ,” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Ku lema ” .
▁Na ▁niye ▁china manya ▁ng ' hani ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ya nduse ▁ usang ' hano ▁unogile ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁keza i komeleza ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁do nda ya bwele ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekeu m me lele ▁mate ▁muke ▁wa ▁miyago ▁hebu ▁sekei u me lele ▁mate ▁kaye ▁yake , ▁hebu ▁mgunda ▁wake ▁hebu ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike ▁hebu ▁ng ' ombe ▁wake ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁wake , ▁hebu ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chiyeli ▁nacho ▁miyago .’
▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wasegela ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hawa kalile ▁iwanhu ▁na ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa ibwanha ▁chingubingubi , ▁baho ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uwa lawilila .
▁Yuda ▁ija ▁imu hinduka , ▁kakala ▁ka l wing ' ha ▁chilaguso ▁lung ' hu se ▁ulwo ▁kuwa , ▁“ I ja ▁yonda ni m no ne le ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁m gwile ni , ▁mu mgale ▁na ▁mu m kalize ▁sekeya s ulu p u ke .”
▁M weye ▁wana , ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁mu wahuma ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁kwaviya ▁Muhe ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁yenu ▁kana ▁ludabwa ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁muhe ▁yo kala ▁mgati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose .
▁Wa sang ' hana ▁wa ▁mwene ▁ikaye ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁hu handile ▁mbeyu ▁zinogile ▁bule ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wako ? ▁I jo ▁di savu ▁di lawa ▁kulihi ?’
▁Sauli ▁ka uza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ?” ▁Di zi ▁diya ▁di mwidika , ▁“ Niye ▁ni ▁Yesu ▁you ni gaza !”
▁Yano ▁yose ▁yo woneka ▁ya ▁kudumbiza ▁ng ' hani , ▁hata ▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ No dumba ▁na ▁ku gudemeka .”
▁Viya fikile ▁na ▁kuwona ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wanhu , ▁ka de ng ' helela ▁na ▁ka walamba ▁wa gendelele ▁ku muhuwila ▁Mndewa ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁yose .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ I si ▁yo t e ze ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mimeya ▁yoi kwima ▁mbeyu ▁zake ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁yoi kwima ▁matunda ▁yeli ▁na ▁mbeyu ▁zozi gendelela ▁ko t e za ▁mimeya ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁modeli ▁yake .” ▁I lawilila ▁ivo .
▁Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁ija ▁yaha longa ▁muumoyo ▁wake , ▁‘ Mwenevale ▁wangu ▁keza kala ma ▁kubwela .’ ▁Maabaho ▁ka son ga ▁kuwatowa ▁watumwa ▁wamwenga ▁walume ▁na ▁wanaake , ▁m aabaho ▁ka ja ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁m baka ▁ka kolwa .
▁Muna isiku ▁ya ▁nhaguso ▁Mulungu ▁ ke wa wonela ▁ubazi ▁kwa ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni ▁kufosa ▁kumwako .
▁Ni ja ndi kila ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁Di o tu le fe , ▁yoyo londa ▁kuwa ▁mulangulizi ▁wawo , ▁ko lema ▁kuchi tegeleza .
▁Iviya ▁utali ▁wa ▁panzia ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wizakuwa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁nne ▁na ▁mhanda ▁zake ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁za ▁shaba , ▁ mbali ▁ng wamo ▁na ▁mhanda ▁zake ▁na ▁ vihindo ▁vake ▁vi zakuwa ▁va ▁hela .
▁ Siku ▁ye sita ▁Waisilaili ▁wa duganya ▁ndiya ▁iyo ▁miyanza ▁midi ▁kufosa ▁mwanduso , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁m hishi ▁mbili . ▁Ivo ▁walangulizi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wamuhitila ▁Musa ▁na ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁izo .
▁Na ▁waja ▁walala ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁wane , ▁wokala ▁muna ▁ivi goda ▁va ▁chifalume ▁vawo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁wa tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁na ▁wa du li sa ▁matwi ▁yawo ▁na ▁wa mtambikila ▁Mulungu ,
▁no kwika ▁ pinde ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kuna ▁yamawingu . ▁Chi zakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁lagano ▁jangu ▁na ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Mbali ▁wamulamba , ▁“ U kale ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁kwaviya ▁dizuwa ▁di s wa , ▁na ▁lwiza ▁lo tanda ” ▁Ivo , ▁kengila ▁na ▁kukala ▁nawo .
▁Mbali ▁hamu vimanyile ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁vondau we ▁igolo ! ▁M weye ▁mu linga ▁fana ▁kung ugu ▁dodi lawilila ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁luguhi ▁na ▁ku ha lawa .
▁One ▁yahawa ▁mnyama ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁ha faya ▁ku mulava ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya mulavile ▁keza mgala ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yom kwela ▁mnyama ▁yoyose .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ M a tu kwa ▁wana ▁mi na , ▁na ▁ndege ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wana ▁m vu lu , ▁ mbali ▁Niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁na bule ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku go ne za ▁ditwi ▁jangu ▁na ▁kuhumula .”
▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁haja ▁na ▁kahita ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁wa ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Galilaya . ▁Na ▁ka kwela ▁kuu lugongo ▁na ▁kakala ▁hasi .
▁Yesu ▁kamala ▁ku mmanya ▁ija ▁yonda yambiduke ▁leka mana ▁kalonga ▁si ▁wose ▁welile .
▁W eye ▁mwenyewo ▁kolondeka ▁uwe ▁simwe ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁yanogile . ▁Kaidi ▁mafundizo ▁yayo , ▁uya mhe ▁na ▁kuya huwila .
▁“ Kwiza tenda ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁kwa ▁zahabu ▁yelile . ▁I tendigwe ▁kwa ▁kuhonda , ▁ kalilo ▁jake ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wake ▁na ▁nhungo ▁zake ▁na ▁ma tu mba ▁yake ▁na ▁maluw a ▁yake , ▁vose ▁viza tendigw a ▁kwa ▁chi hande ▁chimwe .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ L usita ▁lufika , ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁habehi . ▁ Leke ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁na ▁kui togola ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ! .”
▁Ebeli ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁waidi ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁zina ▁da ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ni ▁Pelegi , ▁kwaviya ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁lwake ▁isi ▁i igola , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yo ki ta ni .
▁Keza wagala ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁nayo ▁keza mulava ▁imwe ▁yawe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁ku mbo b o to la ▁isi ngo ▁ bila ▁kum segeza ▁iditwi .
▁Wa gendelela ▁kumtowa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁Sitefano , ▁Sitefano ▁ka tosa , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁ uhokele ▁Muhe ▁wangu .”
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁hamu londeka ▁kuja ▁magate ▁ya gumigw e ▁lusu . ▁M agate ▁ya gumigw e ▁lusu ▁hebu ▁lusu , ▁seke vi woneke ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁yose .
▁Waisilaili ▁wamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Chiza danganika ! ▁Chi komelezeka ! ▁Chi komelezeka !
▁M wa ka ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁wa ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁T ib eli yo , ▁Pilato ▁kakala ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya , ▁Helode ▁kakala ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁Galilaya , ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Filipo ▁kakala ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁I tu le ya ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁T ila ko ni ti , ▁na ▁Lu sa ni ya ▁kakala ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁ A b ile ne .
▁ Siku ▁ziya ▁Helode ▁viyakalile ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Yudeya , ▁kukala ▁na ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁imwe , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Zakaliya , ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁cha ▁ A b i ya . ▁M ke ▁wake ▁ka tangigwa ▁Elizabeti , ▁nayo ▁kalawa ▁muna ▁u lukolo ▁lwa ▁Haluni .
▁Yesu ▁viya segele ▁baho ▁ha yakalile , ▁kahita ▁kuulongozi , ▁viyakalile ▁yo fosa ▁kamuwona ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁yo tangigwa ▁Masa yo , ▁kakala ▁howo lihi la ▁kodi , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ni sondelele .” ▁Masa yo ▁kenuka ▁na ▁kamsondelela .
▁Chi gendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wetu ▁kulawa ▁Tilo ▁kuhita ▁To lema yi , ▁uko ▁chiwa la m sa ▁wahuwila ▁wayetu ▁na ▁chi kala ▁nawo ▁zuwa ▁dimwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁kai zeha ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ka bena ▁malagilizo ▁yake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya ba guligwe ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁nayo ▁kezatagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .’ ▁”
▁Na ▁wano ▁wawo ▁woyawasagule , ▁Saimoni , ▁Yesu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁zina ▁Petili ,
▁Musa ▁kawatanga ▁M i s ha eli ▁na ▁Eli sa fa ni ▁weli ▁wana ▁wa ▁U zi eli ▁ mtumba ▁wake ▁Haluni , ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Izoni ▁hano , ▁wa sole ni ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁muwa segeze ▁hano ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁muwe ke ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dilago .”
▁One ▁si tendile ▁bule ▁kumwawo ▁sang ' hano ▁ziya ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁imwenga ▁yoya zi tendile , ▁sigambe ▁wawe ▁na ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁wayawo na ▁ya nitendile , ▁na ▁wang ' hali ▁woni hila ▁niye ▁na ▁iviya ▁wo mwihila ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamulongela , ▁“ One ▁mbuli ▁za ▁munhu ▁na ▁mke ▁wake ▁za hawa ▁ivo , ▁muhavu ▁ku leka ▁kusola .”
▁Wa ilongela , ▁“ Chi msagule ▁mulangulizi ▁na ▁chi bwele ▁Misili .”
▁Mbali ▁imwe ▁wawo , ▁Mfalisayo ▁ya tangigwe ▁Gamali yeli , ▁yoya kalile ▁ Mfundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁ka du mbigwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁kema ▁muna ▁ichitala . ▁Kawalongela ▁watumigwa ▁we kigwe ▁kunze ▁lusita ▁luguhi .
▁Hamwande ▁Leya ▁ka pata ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike , ▁na ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Dina .
▁Yesu ▁kengila ▁mwiingalawa ▁imwe ▁ya ▁Saimoni , ▁kamulongela ▁ya i kwe se ▁hata li ▁chidogo ▁kulawa ▁hamgwazo ▁ha ▁dilamba ▁m baka ▁mmazi . ▁Maabaho ▁kakala ▁umo ▁ mwing a lawa ▁na ▁kufundiza ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁uhelelo ▁ya ▁dugila ▁ijo ▁dodi kalile ▁siku ▁ng ' hulu ▁ya ▁dugila , ▁Yesu ▁kema , ▁ka landula ▁dizi , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁ni lu , ▁na ye ze ▁kumwangu ▁yang ' we !
▁Masa a ▁matatu ▁hamwande , ▁mke ▁wake ▁kengila , ▁ha vimanyile ▁bule ▁chinhu ▁chi lawilile .
▁Musa ▁kawalagiliza ▁mweye ▁mutende ▁chihendo ▁cha ▁kuweng iza ▁ulungwana ▁wanenu ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁inga wa ▁si ▁Musa ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁wawo ▁wa nduse . ▁Ivo ▁na ▁mweye ▁mo mwing iza ▁ulungwana ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hata ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁nayo ▁ka gong ' onda ▁ ulotezi ▁uno , ▁“ B a la a mu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Beoli ▁ko lotela , ▁ ulotezi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya gubul igwe ▁yameso ,
▁Iviya ▁kamuwona ▁mgane ▁imwe ▁ngayengaye ▁ko guma ▁sente ▁mbili ▁ndodo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kawalongela ▁Simeoni ▁na ▁Lawi , ▁“ M weye ▁mu nigalila ▁magayo ▁kwa ▁kuni tenda ▁ni hi ligwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁ya ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wapelizi . ▁Niye ▁na bule ▁wanhu ▁wengi , ▁na ▁one ▁waha i duganya ▁hamwe , ▁weza ni nanga ▁niye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zangu .”
▁Sekemu je ▁damu ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁mwii tile ▁hasi ▁fana ▁mazi .
▁Ha kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁yondaya teng ule ▁hebu ▁kuwa ▁m gum ba ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu . ▁Niza mtenda ni ▁mukale ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani .
▁Kawa wona ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wo gaya gaya ▁kutowa ▁zing ' ha fi , ▁kwaviya ▁beho ▁kulu ▁di kala ▁do wa bweleza ▁kuwa lawile . ▁N z ogolo ▁zi kwika , ▁Yesu ▁kawa hiti la ▁kuno ▁ko genda ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mazi . ▁Ka londa ▁kuwa fosa ,
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ko watenda ▁wa senga ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁mbeho , ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁m ila mbi ▁ya ▁moto .”
▁Maabaho ▁ka gozela ▁siku ▁zimwenga ▁saba , ▁ka mtuma ▁kaidi ▁nziwa , ▁mwanza ▁uno ▁nziwa ▁ha bwelile ▁bule .
▁Kwiza mvaz a ▁Haluni ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁na ▁wanage ▁mawalo ▁yano , ▁m aabaho ▁uwa ha ke ▁mavuta ▁na ▁kwika ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁na ▁uwa bagule ▁muladi ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁“ Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kani wonela ▁ludoko ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Ka lema ▁kuni tegeleza ▁na ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Y o faya ! ▁Sekeu longe ▁kaidi ▁mbuli ▁ino .
▁“ Mbali ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁wa lema ▁ku muhulika , ▁wa msung ' ha ▁kutali ▁na ▁wa gesa ▁kuwa ▁weza bwela ▁Misili .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁vino , ▁kalonga , ▁“ U tamu ▁uno ▁ha uza mkoma ▁Lazalo ▁bule ▁ mbali ▁u n pata ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ yatunhizigwe ▁kufose la ▁utamu ▁uno .”
▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁keza bwela ▁na ▁kulola ▁kaidi . ▁One ▁chimvuguya ▁chi he ne la ▁muna ▁ing ' huta ▁ya ▁kaye ▁iyo ,
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁ mwika goya ▁ving ' waji ▁kamulongela ▁mfalume , ▁“ Diyelo ▁no kumbuka ▁ubananzi ▁wangu ▁woni utendile .
▁Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yosefu ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Yudeya ▁muna ▁i chibululu ▁chi tangigwa ▁Ali ma sa ya . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁kanoga , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁ko gozela ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁I nga wa ▁kakala ▁imwe ▁wa ▁iwa kulu ▁wa ▁chitala ▁cha ▁Wayahudi ▁ mbali ▁hachi togole ▁bule ▁chiya ▁cho watendile ▁wayage .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁sekemu wataze ▁wakale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo ▁hebu ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁vingi .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Tat i ▁yangu ▁ko sa na na ▁ usang ' hano ▁lusita ▁lwose , ▁iviya ▁niye ▁no londeka ▁ni sa nane .”
▁Kwa viya ▁ habule ▁chinhu ▁hachi dahika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani , ▁kakala ▁Am i eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ge ma li .
▁hawa u fikile ▁bule ▁mtufi ▁wake . ▁Wa bwela ▁na ▁ku chilongela ▁wala wi li ligwa ▁na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoya walongele ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ngima .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mhule ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁one ▁ha ila gale ▁muu lo ngo ▁na ▁kudanganika , ▁iza sigala ▁imwe ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁iha danganika , ▁iza kweleka ▁mbeyu ▁nyingi .
▁Iviya ▁ka mkombola ▁Lutu , ▁munhu ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁usungu ▁kwa ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁ugoni ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa bananzi .
▁Ivo ▁sekemuwadumbe ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁mkulu ▁na ▁wa ▁kudumbiza .
▁“ I viya ▁ muhulika ▁wanhu ▁viwa longeligwe , ▁‘ Munhu ▁wowose ▁ija ▁yondayam wa se ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁ya mwing ' he ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa .’
▁Leka mana ▁nolonga ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁masimwe , ▁kwaviya ▁wo lola ▁ mbali ▁hawa wona , ▁na ▁iviya ▁wo tegeleza ▁ mbali ▁hawa hulika ▁na ▁hawa vimanya .
▁Wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁chihongwe ▁ija ▁na ▁mwana ▁chihongwe , ▁wa nza nza ▁viwalo ▁m chanyha ▁yake ▁na ▁Yesu ▁ka kwela ▁ku ngo ngo ▁wake .
▁Wa mgala ▁kwa ▁Yesu . ▁Chi nyamkela ▁viyamuwone ▁Yesu , ▁bahobaho ▁ka mguma ▁chi sang o ▁mwana ▁ija , ▁mwana ▁ija ▁ka gwa ▁hasi ▁ko i bimbilis a ▁kuno ▁ko lava ▁ho vu ▁mu umulomo .
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wa ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti ▁sekewa komboligwe ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁we la . ▁Kwiza lu mizil a ▁ulupango ▁damu ▁zawo , ▁mavuta ▁yawo ▁kwiza ya timbula ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁moto ▁ili ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Mami ▁yake ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wa sang ' hani , ▁“ Tend eni ▁chochose ▁chonda ya mulongeleni .”
▁Waisilaili ▁wasegela ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Holi ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Salimon a .
▁Kwa viya ▁one ▁wanhu ▁hawa manyile ▁fambulo ▁da ▁lukuli ▁lwa ▁Mndewa ▁viwo ja ▁gate ▁na ▁kung ' wila ▁nhungo , ▁woi galila ▁nhaguso ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁viwo ja ▁na ▁kung ' wa .
▁Mahalaleli ▁viya mweleke ▁Ya le di , ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁chike ,
▁“ Ivo ▁sekemudumbe ▁wanhu . ▁Ch ochose ▁chochi gubikigwe , ▁chiza gubuligwa , ▁na ▁chochose ▁chochi fisigwe ▁chiza woneka .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kasegela , ▁baho ▁kahita ▁mwiisi ▁yili ▁habehi ▁na ▁dibu lu ▁da ▁Tilo . ▁Uko ▁kengila ▁mnyumba ▁na ▁halondile ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yavimanye ▁kuwa ▁kaha ja , ▁ mbali ▁ha dahile ▁bule ▁ku ifisa .
▁na ▁one ▁muha soma ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁mwiza daha ▁ku manya ▁viya ▁voni imanya ▁sili ▁yoi mson hela ▁Chilisito .
▁Mwenevale ▁keza mkanha ▁vihande , ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wa delenya , ▁uko ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ndilo ▁na ▁ku dunda ▁meno .
▁Na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo guma ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁mwii ▁mi fuko ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁umwaka . ▁Kwa viya ▁yaha tenda ▁ivo , ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁iza i tula ▁mbende , ▁na ▁divai ▁iza kwitika ▁na ▁mi fuko ▁iza banangika . ▁Mbali ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi ▁i gumigw a ▁mwii ▁mbende ▁ya ▁sambi .”
▁Yohana ▁ko walongela ▁wanhu ▁wowa mu hitile ▁wa batizigwe , ▁“ M weye ▁ulel wa ▁wa ▁zoka ! ▁Yeli hi ▁yoya walongele ▁mwo daha ▁ku gwa za ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁i kwiza ?
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁na ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁wo mkaliza ▁Yesu , ▁viwa di wone ▁ gudemek o ▁da ▁isi ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zozi tendeke , ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani , ▁walonga , ▁“ Kweli ▁ino ▁kakala ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka leme la , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hita ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁uka walongele ▁yaja ▁yose ▁Mndewa ▁yoya kutendele ▁na ▁viya ku wonele ▁ubazi .”
▁“ Tata , ▁ihadahika , ▁uni segeze le ▁nhungo ▁ino ▁ya ▁manhesa . ▁Mbali ▁siyo ▁fana ▁voni londa ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁you londa ▁weye ▁ya tendeke .”
▁“ Ndugu ▁zangu ▁na ▁ tati ▁zangu , ▁ni tegelezeni , ▁vini i gombela ▁mwenyewo ▁haulongozi ▁wenu .”
▁Mbali ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Pu bu li yo ▁kakala ▁kagona ▁muna ▁dikomwa ▁mtamu ▁na ▁ko ha la ▁damu . ▁Paulo ▁kumuwona , ▁na ▁viya komeleze ▁kutosa , ▁keka ▁makono ▁yake ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake ▁na ▁ku muhonya .
▁Ka ng ' wa ▁divai ▁na ▁ka ko ligwa , ▁m aabaho ▁kagona ▁ukulu ng e ▁muna ▁dihema ▁jake .
▁No iyohe la ▁m baka ▁ku helelo ▁wa ▁ku ihuma ▁muladi ▁ni hokele ▁gweko ▁diya ▁da ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁gweko ▁ijo ▁Mulungu ▁kani tanga ▁kufose la ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁niza golosa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁na ▁kuwa galila ▁wanyama ▁wako ▁mitamu , ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁vihongwe ▁na ▁m hu nda ▁na ▁ngamiya ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti .
▁Mbali ▁wengi ▁weli ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁kuuhelelo , ▁na ▁wengi ▁weli ▁wa ▁kuuhelelo ▁sambi , ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁ Siku ▁ y eketatu ▁wengi zigwe ▁ulungwana ▁wang ' hali ▁wana ▁ma sungu ▁ng ' hani , ▁wana ▁waidi ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁niiyo ▁Simeoni ▁na ▁Lawi ▁ lumbu ▁zake ▁Dina ▁wa sola ▁ng u gulila ▁zawo ▁wa di hiti la ▁dibululu ▁ijo ▁kwa ▁kusi nhu ki za ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁walume ▁wose .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoja ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁na ▁kui ng ' wa ▁damu ▁yangu , ▁iyo ▁ka nawo ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁niye ▁niza n zilibula ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁uhelelo .
▁Wa fundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁wo londa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁ku mshitak a ▁Yesu . ▁Ivo ▁wakala ▁wo gozela ▁wa lole ▁fana ▁keza muhonya ▁munhu ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu tambikile ▁nyang ' hiti ▁na ▁sekemu itendele ▁milungu ▁ya ▁zuma ▁na ▁kui tambikila . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁Musa ▁kasola ▁fimbo ▁ija ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyalagilizigwe .
▁Wa ye ka ▁mabwe ▁yayo ▁muna ▁ivi hande ▁va ▁muna ▁ya mayega ▁va ▁chizibawo ▁chiya ▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁Isilaili , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Yesilo ▁ka de ng ' helela ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zinogile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ziya watendele ▁Waisilaili ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kuwakombola ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Wamisili .
▁Fan a ▁yaha wona ▁hadaha , ▁kowa tuma ▁wa senga ▁wake ▁wahite ▁kwa ▁Mfalume ▁iyo ▁yang ' hali ▁kutali ▁wa mu la m b e ▁ku we ▁na ▁tindiwalo .
▁Chilo ▁ elufu ▁nhatu ▁za ▁hela ▁zi sang ' haniligwa ▁ku tendela ▁vi kalilo ▁viya ▁gana ▁va ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁diya ▁dipanzia , ▁chilo ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chi kalilo .
▁Chi wandikila ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁uko ▁Ko lo sa i ▁weli ▁ndugu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito . ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁ya mwing ' heni ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁ma kala ▁ya ▁moto ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola .
▁Walongele ▁wanhu ▁sekewa zimize ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁na ▁kuwa zuma ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁wa leke ▁ku isosokanya ▁mbuli . ▁Ku isosokanya ▁uko ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁haku gala ▁m ta zo ▁ mbali ▁ko gala ▁ubananzi ▁mkulu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wo hulika .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Chi no ▁icho ▁chiyalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chip indi ▁viyalongile , ▁‘ Niza i lagusa ▁kuwa ▁yelile ▁kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁habehi ▁na ▁niye , ▁niza tunhizigwa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁wose .’ ▁” ▁Haluni ▁ka nyama la .
▁Zi no ▁ni ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Walawi ▁zozi petigwe ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zawo , ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Gelishoni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Kohasi ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Melali .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niza kwing ' ha ▁welesi ▁mwingi ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya dahe ▁kuwa peta .”
▁Cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ha ye kigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wowo tenda ▁yanogile ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa bena ji ▁na ▁wa ze le nzi ▁na ▁waja ▁hawa tegeleza ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowo lema ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁na ▁wa hasanyi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁si ▁welile ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa manyile ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo wakoma ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo ▁hebu ▁wa komaji ▁wowose ▁waja .
▁Niye ▁niwa sagula ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁Walawi ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili , ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁ni ▁chitumetume ▁chochi ng ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁wa sang ' hanile ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁ ga nza ▁dimwe ▁da ▁usage ▁unogile ▁na ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ubani ▁wose ▁na ▁kuvi timbula ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁fana ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁lukumbuso ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wake ▁unogile ▁wiza mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁waidi ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo .
▁One ▁chaha tegeleza ▁ndagilizi ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁chodaha ▁kuvimanya ▁kweli ▁chi mmanya .
▁Sa ng ' hano ▁ya ▁Wa ko ha si ▁i kala ▁kupapa ▁vi a ▁velile ▁va ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .”
▁Yosefu ▁viya wa wone ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁kawa ta mbula , ▁ mbali ▁ka itenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁hawa manyile ▁bule . ▁Kawauza ▁kwa ▁uka li , ▁“ M weye ▁ mulawa ▁kulihi ?” ▁Na wo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Chila wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Kanaani , ▁chiza ▁ku gula ▁ndiya .”
▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁baho , ▁“ Segeleni ▁hano , ▁mndele ▁ino ▁ha danganike ▁bule , ▁kagona .” ▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ndusa ▁kum se ka .
▁Ya me so ▁yawo ▁ya fungu ka . ▁Yesu ▁kawalagiliza , ▁“ Sekemu mulongele ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁ija ▁mbuli ▁zino !”
▁Wa mtegeleza ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁mwingi ▁kakala ▁kowa za nya ▁kwa ▁uha wi ▁wake .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁Yelusalemu ▁muna ▁didugila ▁da ▁Pasaka , ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa mtogola ▁kwaviya ▁wa wona ▁mauzauza ▁yoyatendile .
▁M wanamke ▁iyo ▁keza ▁na ▁ka gwa ▁chingubingubi ▁hana ▁ yamagulu ▁ya ▁Yesu , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mwenevale ! ▁Ni taze .”
▁No walamba ▁ E u di yo ▁na ▁Si m ti ke ▁wawe ▁na ▁lungilo ▁diya ▁diya ▁mwa ▁Mndewa .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ Nokulamba ▁u nilongele , ▁vino ▁weye ▁ tati ▁yako ▁yelihi ? ▁Vino ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yako ▁muna ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁kugona ?”
▁Wa segela ▁Ali mo ni ▁Di bila sa i mu ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁Abalimu , ▁habehi ▁na ▁mulima ▁wa ▁N e b o .
▁ sola ▁ sa nzi ya ▁na ▁u to b o le ▁ gutwi ▁jake ▁m baka ▁ sa nzi ya ▁iyo ▁i ngile ▁muna ▁ulwivi , ▁nayo ▁keza kuwa ▁mtumwa ▁wako ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Iviya ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ▁wa ▁chike ▁ mtendele ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Wakala ▁we ha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi , ▁kwaviya ▁hawa ni huwile ▁niye ▁bule ,
▁Wanage ▁Yuda ▁wakala ▁Eli ▁na ▁Ona ni ▁na ▁Shela ▁na ▁Pelesi ▁na ▁Ze la . ▁Mbali ▁Eli ▁na ▁Ona ni ▁wadanganika ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Wana ▁wa ▁Pelesi ▁wakala ▁He si lo ni ▁na ▁Hamu li .
▁Ivo ▁kawatum a ▁waidi ▁wa ▁watumigwa ▁wake , ▁Timoseyo ▁na ▁ E la sito ▁wahite ▁Makedoniya , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁kakala ▁kuna ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya .
▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁miyetu ▁kwaviya ▁ka sa guligwa ▁muladi ▁chi sang ' hane ▁nayo ▁sang ' hano ▁ino .”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Pelesi ▁wakala ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁He si lo ni ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁Hamu li .
▁Walonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁magoda ▁na ▁ zilibule ▁mana ▁na ▁kusang ' hanila ▁tama a ▁za ▁ugoni ▁na ▁kuwa kwe ga ▁wanhu ▁wowa nduse ▁ku igola ▁vino ▁sambi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁uvwizi .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wenu ka ▁na ▁kumsondelela .
▁Ch a hawa ▁wagima , ▁cha wa gima ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa , ▁na ▁chaha danganika , ▁cho danganika ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa . ▁Ivo ▁chiha wa ▁wagima ▁hebu ▁chiha danganika , ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁mulume ▁yaha iting ' hana ▁na ▁muke ▁yoya u zigwe ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁kuchuwala , ▁yaha mgwila ▁na ▁ku mbandama , ▁mulume ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁yondaya komigwe .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kaya gese la ▁kuya sagula ▁yaja ▁yo wo ni gwa ▁kuwa ▁ya chi b o zi ▁na ▁ya ▁zisi , ▁muladi ▁yawa gume ▁chinyala ▁wene ▁ubala , ▁iviya ▁kaya sagula ▁yaja ▁yeli ▁nyondenyonde ▁muladi ▁yawa gume ▁chinyala ▁wene ▁nguvu .
▁Kale bu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yefune ▁muhala ▁niiyo ▁yondaya i wone ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁yeye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁isi ▁iyo ▁iya ib o jo ge , ▁kwaviya ▁kani sondelela ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mbuli .’
▁Muna ▁ivi b i ndo ▁venu ▁va ▁miyanza , ▁sekemu sole ▁chinhu ▁hebu ▁zahabu ▁hebu ▁hela ▁ya ▁shaba .
▁Wakala ▁wo gozela ▁ya lulumu ke ▁hebu ▁ya gwe ▁na ▁bahobaho ▁yadanganike . ▁Mbali ▁viwa gozele ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lutali ▁na ▁ha wawonile ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chi mulawilile , ▁wa b i du la ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Ino ▁ni ▁imwe ▁wa ▁milungu !”
▁Ng ' ombe ▁waja ▁saba ▁wa sisili ▁na ▁wasokile , ▁wawa ja ▁ng ' ombe ▁waja ▁wa t e lele ▁na ▁wanenehe . ▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁kalamuka .
▁Ni wahuma ▁Wayahudi ▁wayangu ▁wa ▁ li ka ▁jangu ▁kwa ▁kwa mhilila ▁di ni ▁ya ▁Chiyahudi , ▁niiyo ha ▁ng ' hani ▁ku yamha ▁ma hokel o ▁ya ▁wa saho ▁zetu .
▁Ka mtenda ni ▁mudi hulike ▁dizi ▁jake ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁muladi ▁yam funze ni ▁kumtegeleza . ▁Ha no ▁hana ▁iisi ▁ka muleka ni ▁muu wone ▁moto ▁wake ▁mkulu ▁na ▁kuhulika ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uwo .
▁Chi nyamkela ▁ka ng ela ▁chi sang o ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁kalila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁na ▁ku mulawa .
▁Wa fosa ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁wa zunguluka ▁lago ▁da ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁do yo di londa . ▁Mbali ▁moto ▁u hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga , ▁uwa ta ka miza .
▁Wala la ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁na ▁walala ▁wa ▁Midiani ▁wa sola ▁ma y ombe ▁kumuliha ▁mganga , ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁Balaamu ▁na ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁zi lawile ▁kwa ▁Balaki .
▁isi ▁ya ▁Wa ke ni ▁na ▁Wa ke ni zi ▁na ▁Wa ka di mo ni
▁Kwa ▁Yesu ▁yeli ▁mu lumbiliz i ▁wa ▁lagano ▁da ▁sambi , ▁na ▁ija ▁damu ▁yake ▁im izigwe ▁yolonga ▁mbuli ▁zinogile ▁kufosa ▁damu ▁ya ▁Abeli .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka utenda ▁moyo ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kuwa ▁mdala , ▁ha walekelele ▁Waisilaili ▁wahite .”
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kumwelek a ▁Seti , ▁Adamu ▁kakala ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁manane ▁na ▁kelek a ▁wana ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁wadanganika ▁kwa ▁kugal iligwa ▁ hulo ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka leni ▁muna ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kuno ▁mo m gozela ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁kwa ▁ubazi ▁wake ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁weketatu ▁ka itowa ▁mhalati ▁yake ▁na ▁nhondo ▁ng ' hulu ▁yoi kwaka , ▁fana ▁weng e ▁da ▁moto , ▁ igwa ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku humuluka ▁ha chanyha ▁ya ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁ziny a nda ▁na ▁nzasa ▁za ▁mazi .
▁“ W e za tengenez a ▁chizibawo ▁cha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁za ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁na ▁fundi .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁kolonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁masimwe ?”
▁Ha ching ' higwa ▁kaidi ▁mayani ▁yoyose , ▁na ▁kuno ▁chowa ngilizigwa ▁kutenda ▁matafali . ▁Iviya ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁cho towigwa , ▁ mbali ▁wa banange ▁wanhu ▁wako .”
▁Ch eye ▁wose ▁wochi ka ngale ▁chimuhe , ▁cho londeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yayo ▁yayo . ▁Mbali ▁one ▁wamwenga ▁wenu ▁wahawa ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yamwenga , ▁Mulungu ▁keza mulagusa ni ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Ivo ▁no mtuma ▁kumwenu ▁ya mulongeleni ▁viya ▁cheye ▁wose ▁vichi gendelela ▁na ▁ku mguma ni ▁moyo .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁kulema ▁kulava ▁usindila ▁kuna ▁ichitala ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁iya wone ▁hebu ▁kuhulika , ▁kezatagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake .
▁Ivo ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kahita ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁jake ▁kwa ndikigwa ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ No wa uza ▁mweye , ▁Vino ▁Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁yochi londa ▁chitende ▁choni ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ? ▁Ku tenda ▁yanogile ▁hebu ▁yehile ? ▁Ku ho nya ▁ugima ▁wa ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁kuu koma ?”
▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁viwa komeleze ▁kuwa sa gulila ▁walala ▁muna ▁chila ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁kutambika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ku funga ▁wa weka ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁wowa muhuwile .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ Hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wano , ▁ mbali ▁kwiza longa ▁chiya ▁chonda nikulongele ▁muhala .” ▁Ivo ▁Balaamu ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa tumigwe ▁na ▁Balaki .
▁Viya kalile ▁ko lawa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁ulwivi , ▁ka iting ' hana ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁imwe ▁wa ▁chike . ▁M tumigwa ▁iyo ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁hanhu ▁haja , ▁“ Ino ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti .”
▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁ko wafundiza ▁wanahina ▁wake . ▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Niye , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁niza geligwa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁nawo ▁weza ni koma . ▁Mbali ▁zihafosa ▁siku ▁nhatu , ▁niza zilibuka .”
▁Mbali ▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wa ndusa ▁ku ilongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁kawa hokela ▁wene ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁koja ▁hamwe ▁nawo !”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezam pwililisa ni ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga , ▁wadodo ▁vimwili ▁niwa wo ▁wondawa sigale ▁uko ▁ko nda ya mu wingile ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁lusita ▁lu mwenga ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ko hulumuka ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁na ▁kuya ti bu la ▁yamazi . ▁M tamu ▁yo kwandusa ▁kwingila ▁muna ya ma zi ▁viya ti bu ke , ▁kakala ▁ko honyigwa ▁utamu ▁wowose ▁u yakalile ▁nawo .
▁Na ▁siku ▁isondelele , ▁di kala ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁waiting ' hana ▁na ▁Pilato ,
▁Adamu ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matatu , ▁ka pata ▁mwana ▁yoya li ngile ▁yeye , ▁yeli ▁na ▁chihanga ▁fana ▁chake ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Seti .
▁Waisilaili ▁viwa kalile ▁uko ▁S hiti mu , ▁walume ▁wa ndusa ▁kutenda ▁ugoni ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Moabu .
▁Vino ▁hamu daha ▁bule ▁kulola ? ▁U huwilo ▁wake ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁zake ▁vi tenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁hamwe , ▁uhuwilo ▁u ga nga mizigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zake .
▁Wa ku mbuse ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁kui nyendanyenda ▁kwa ▁watawala ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁udahi , ▁ wolondeka ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁na ▁ku isasala ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁inogile .
▁Ni hokela ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vimu ning ' hile , ▁kaidi ▁ni ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁vini vi londile . ▁Ni na ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁kwaviya ▁lelo ▁ E p a f uladi to ▁kamala ▁ku mgalila ni ▁chitumetume ▁chenu . ▁Chi tume tume ▁chino ▁ni ▁fana ▁viya ▁nhambiko ▁in ung ' hila ▁goya , ▁nhambiko ▁i togoligwa ▁na ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ One ▁muke ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ga ▁na ▁ku leka ▁kwaminika ▁kwa ▁mulumake ,
▁“ One ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁yaha ku bananga , ▁ hita ▁uka mu lamule ▁weye ▁na ▁yeye ▁mwii du mwe . ▁One ▁yaha ku hulika , ▁kum pata ▁ndugu ▁yako .
▁Kwiza i tendela ▁ mhete ▁nne ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi ka ▁kuna ▁zi mhembe ▁zake ▁muna ▁imigulu ▁yake .
▁Ka wona ▁muhavu ▁kugazigwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kufosa ▁kude ng ' helela ▁u hondo ▁wa ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo .
▁Wa bota ▁kombelo ▁da ▁mi wa ▁na ▁wa dika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁na ▁ balati ▁kuna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁wa ▁kulume , ▁wa n zeha ▁na ▁wamtowa ▁ma ng ' huwa ▁haulongozi ▁wake , ▁walonga , ▁“ N da m sa ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi !”
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Munhu ▁ija ▁yonda ni mwin e ▁gate ▁do ni di towe ze ▁mwii ba ku li ▁ni ▁iyo .” ▁Maabaho ▁ka towe za ▁gate , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Yuda , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Saimoni ▁Isikaliyoti .
▁“ Ku pata ▁matunda ▁yanogile ▁ la zima ▁uwe ▁na ▁mbiki ▁unogile , ▁na ▁one ▁uha wa ▁na ▁mbiki ▁wihile ▁kwiza pata ▁matunda ▁yehile . ▁M biki ▁wo manyika ▁kwa ▁matunda ▁yake ▁yo kwima .
▁“ Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chi fuko ▁icho ▁cha ▁muimhambaga , ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁m ikufu ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁i botigwe ▁fana ▁luzabi .
▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Mulongele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁choni kulongela .”
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁kuna ▁ugoni , ▁chila ▁mulume ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁mwenyewo , ▁na ▁chila ▁muke ▁kolondeka ▁yawe ▁na ▁mulumake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Weza lihigwa ▁magayo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁magayo ▁yowa ya galile . ▁Wo de ng ' helela ▁ku fikiza ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁madambwa ▁ya ▁lukuli ▁chim isi mi si . ▁Ku fika ▁kwa wo ▁kuna ▁yamadugila ▁yenu , ▁ko gala ▁chinyala ▁na ▁ku lemigwa ▁ng ' hani ▁wo de ng ' helela ▁mbuli ▁zihile .
▁Bulahimu ▁ka mkwenhukila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kwiza wananga ▁wanhu ▁wanogile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wehile ?
▁Weza watendela ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁kwaviya ▁hawammanyile ▁Tata ▁wala ▁hawa ni manyile ▁niye .
▁Niza wa bagula ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako . ▁Chila g u so ▁chino ▁cha ▁mauzauza ▁chiza lawilila ▁igolo .”
▁Yelusalemu , ▁na ▁I du me ya , ▁na ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁Yolodani , ▁na ▁ banzi ▁za ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni . ▁Wo se ▁wawo ▁weza ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁wa hulika ▁mbuli ▁za yatendile ▁Yesu .
▁Kawauza ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ E na i mu , ▁“ Ka kulihi ▁muke ▁ija ▁malaya ▁yoya kalile ▁hano ▁hana ▁dikulu g u mbi ▁yoyo tenda ▁u mala ya ▁fana ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ?” ▁I wa nhu ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Ha nhu ▁hano ▁ha kalile ▁na ▁muke ▁malaya ▁bule .”
▁Kwiza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yoi tendigw a ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁ivo , ▁kwiza i gala ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁nayo ▁keza i gala ▁kuna ▁ulupango .
▁“ Maabaho ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁diza segela ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lago ▁da ▁Walawi ▁hagati ▁ya ▁malago ▁yose , ▁fana ▁viwo panga ▁malago . ▁Weza hita ▁ivo ▁ivo , ▁chila ▁ bumbila ▁hanhu ▁hake ▁heli ▁na ▁be nde la ▁zake .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yaha lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jake , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lave ▁be belu ▁dili bule ▁chilema .
▁Bahobaho ▁mtamu ▁ija ▁ka honyigwa , ▁kasola ▁ lili ▁jake , ▁kahita . ▁Chi nhu ▁icho ▁chi lawilila ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ,
▁M ulume ▁kana ▁u tawala ▁kwa ▁mke ▁wake , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viyeli ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁wose ▁wowomuhuwila , ▁nayo ▁Chilisito ▁niiyo ▁Mulopozi ▁wawo , ▁wawo ▁niuwo ▁lukuli ▁lwake .
▁Ivo ▁kakala ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁kakala ▁yolonga ▁na ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wowo mtosela ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁chila ▁siku ▁kakala ▁kowa simulil a ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁muumwingi .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha geza ▁kuwa lumiza , ▁moto ▁wolawa ▁mwii mi lomo ▁yawo ▁na ▁kuwa nanga ▁wehi ▁wawo , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yondaya geze ▁kuwa lumiza ▁kezakomigwa ▁kwa ▁ifa ▁iyo .
▁Mbali ▁niku tambikila ▁weye , ▁Saimoni , ▁muladi ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁sekeu hunguke , ▁na ▁weye ▁vondau bwele ▁kaidi ▁wa gangamize ▁ndugu ▁zako .”
▁Mu kale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo . ▁ Mbwiy a ▁zenu ▁womulamsani . ▁Walamse ni ▁mbwiya ▁zetu , ▁chila ▁munhu .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁wose ▁wa muleka ▁na ▁ku kimbila .
▁Kufos ela ▁welesi ▁wako ▁makabila ▁yose ▁yeza temeligw a ▁mate , ▁kwaviya ▁kuni tegeleza .’ ▁”
▁No ku lagiliza ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁welile , ▁ uza mhe ▁ndagilizi ▁izo ▁zose ▁ bila ▁ku bagula .
▁Kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁mi gudemek o ▁mi kulu ▁ya ▁isi ▁na ▁nzala ▁na ▁mitamu ▁chila ▁hanhu . ▁Na ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁ku du mbigwa ▁na ▁vilaguso ▁vi kulu ▁vya ▁kuulanga .
▁Hata ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Holebu , ▁mu mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yehilwe ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁ka londa ▁ku mwa nga miza ni .
▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Yesu , ▁ni kumbuke ▁viwo nda ▁ wize ▁na ▁Ufalume ▁wako !”
▁Mndewa ▁kedika , ▁“ M weye ▁wa delenya ! ▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁vimwili ▁ham fungula ▁ng ' ombe ▁wake ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁wake ▁kulawa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudi la ▁na ▁kumgala ▁kung ' wa ▁mazi ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ?
▁Wayahudi ▁wa londa ▁wa mkome ▁Yesu ▁kwaviya ▁ka hasanya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁kamtanga ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yake , ▁ivo ▁ka itenda ▁ka linga ▁Mulungu .
▁Mwiza lava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ili ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Ni vimanya ▁kukala ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vi dodo ▁na ▁ni vimanya ▁kukala ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi . ▁One ▁na hawa ▁na ▁nzala ▁hebu ▁na he guta , ▁one ▁ni hawa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁hebu ▁vi dodo , ▁ni ifunza ▁kude ng ' helela ▁chila ▁chinhu ,
▁Wa nhu ▁viwa ge ndi le ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua , ▁wafika ▁ bawe ▁da ▁S hi na li , ▁wakala .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ija ▁ija , ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wowa kalile ▁wo muwinza ▁Yesu ▁wakala ▁wohita ▁muna ▁i chibululu ▁chochi tangigwa ▁ E ma w u , ▁utali ▁wa ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁ma fa na ▁maidi ▁kulawa ▁Yelusalemu .
▁U langa ▁na ▁isi ▁viza fosa , ▁ mbali ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁hazi za fosa ▁bule .
▁Nowalongela ▁yano ▁ivi no ▁sambi ▁yang ' hali ▁hayana ▁ lawilila , ▁muladi ▁vondaya lawilile , ▁m dahe ▁kutogola ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁‘ Niye ▁Iyo .’
▁Wa tumwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁na ▁wenevale ▁womuhuwila ▁Chilisito ▁sekewa wa ze he ▁kwaviya ▁wowa gesa ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁ni ▁wahuwila ▁wayawo ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁ wolondeka ▁wawa sang ' hanile ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁wenevale ▁wawo ▁wo mweda ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁kaidi ▁ni ▁wahuwila ▁wayawo ▁wowo walonda . ▁Ko londeka ▁kufundiza ▁na ▁kupeta ▁mbuli ▁zino .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁mkowa ▁kam fu nyi za ▁Paulo ▁ya longe , ▁na ▁Paulo ▁kalonga , ▁“ No vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kukala ▁msemi ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁mingi , ▁nod eng ' helela ▁kui gombela ▁mwenyewo ▁haulongozi ▁wako .
▁‘ Tat i ▁yangu ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁kudanganika , ▁kani kila ▁lagano ▁ku muwanda ▁muna ▁dituka ▁do ya sasale ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani . ▁Ivo ▁ lekeni ▁ni hite ▁ni ka mu wa nde ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁niza bwela .’ ▁”
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁yeli ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁hebu ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁ufila , ▁sekeya je ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁velile ▁m baka ▁ya safyigwe . ▁Iviya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁chinhu ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wadanganike , ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁shahawa ,
▁I mi to o to ndo ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁juma , ▁kung ' hali ▁haku na kunguzuka , ▁Maliya ▁Magidalena ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁dituka ▁na ▁kadi wona ▁dibwe ▁di bimbilis igwa ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dituka .
▁Ivo ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ya chi lela ▁m baka ▁vi yezile ▁Chilisito , ▁muladi ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁uhuwilo ▁chi petigwe ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawatum a ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Palani ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Wo se ▁wakala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Ivo ▁viya zilibuke , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa kumbuka ▁chila ▁chiyalongile . ▁Maabaho ▁wa ya togola ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁na ▁wa togola ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zi yalongile ▁Yesu .
▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁wokala ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Gosheni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁wa pata ▁utajili ▁na ▁wana ▁wengi ▁na ▁wongezeka .
▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁isi ▁yose ▁i mema ▁wihi , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wa tenda ▁i he .
▁Leka mana ▁nzasa ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Be eli ▁L a ha ▁I lo i . ▁N za sa ▁iyo ▁yaha gati ▁ya ▁Kadeshi ▁na ▁Be le di .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mwana , ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁Mulungu , ▁ufalume ▁wako ▁wizakuwa ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁Na ▁kwiza wa tawala ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁viilondeka .
▁Ma b we ▁yayo ▁maidi ▁yeza kwikigwa ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vihande ▁va ▁muna ▁ya mayega ▁va ▁chizibawo ▁ku lagusa ▁makabila ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁Isilaili . ▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁keza v a la ▁mazina ▁yayo ▁muna ▁ya mayega ▁yake ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁lukumbuso .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Abulamu , ▁“ U vimanye ▁kuwa ▁welesi ▁wako ▁weza kuwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁siyo ▁yawo ▁na ▁weza kuwa ▁watumwa ▁na ▁weza gazigwa ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Yesu ▁ka kwela ▁hanhu ▁henu ke ▁na ▁kuwa langa ▁wanhu ▁woya wa londile ▁mwenyewo , ▁na ▁wawo ▁wamsondelela .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala ▁ivo ▁hawa togole ▁bule , ▁na ▁wa i longa ▁vihile ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa . ▁Ivo ▁Paulo ▁kawaleka ▁na ▁kawasola ▁wowa huwile ▁na ▁kulonga ▁nawo ▁chila ▁siku ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ku fu ndi zila ▁ya ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya tangigwe ▁T ila no .
▁ Hita ▁uka walongele ▁wa bwele ▁muna ▁yamahema ▁yawo .
▁“ Vino ▁Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁yo chilongela ▁chi mtaguse ▁munhu ▁ching ' hali ▁hachi na mtegeleza ▁ teng ' hu ▁na ▁ku manya ▁chi yo tenda ?”
▁“ Nowalongela ▁ukweli , ▁wanhu ▁weza segeze ligwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁maligo ▁ya o ▁yose ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ M weye ▁mwiza kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁waidumwe . ▁Ivo ▁sekemuje ▁nyama ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁yakomigwe ▁na ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago . ▁ Nyama ▁iyo ▁mwiza wa sila ▁zimbwa .
▁“ N ha mbi ko ▁zino ▁mwiza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁yamadugila ▁yenu ▁ya pangigwe , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi la ho ▁venu ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁ku londa ▁wenyewo , ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁zenu ▁za ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁zenu ▁za ▁ching ' waji ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁za ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Ivo ▁yam heni ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu , ▁mana ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁ivo ▁keza kuwa ▁mgima . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁diziza , ▁weza wona ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁waja ▁wokala ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁ziza ▁da ▁ifa , ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁diza wa mwemwese la .”
▁muladi ▁ya togoligwe , ▁keza lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁hebu ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dili bule ▁chilema , ▁hebu ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁dili bule ▁chilema .
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁voni li ▁mgima ▁na ▁fana ▁isi ▁yose ▁voi mema ▁utunhizo ▁wangu ,
▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wawa mha ▁wa sang ' hani ▁waja , ▁wawa liga ▁na ▁kuwakoma .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Musa ▁viyakalile ▁yo dima ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁luti ▁wa ▁Yesilo ▁m koi ▁wake ‚ ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Midiani , ▁kadi languliza ▁ bumbila ▁kufosa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁kuhita ▁Holebu ‚ ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁ila ▁nilonga ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁muhala ▁haulongozi ▁hawo , ▁‘ No tagusigwa ▁kwaviya ▁no huwila ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wadanganike ▁weza zilibuka .’ ▁”
▁Ni wandikila ▁usenga ▁uno ▁kwaviya ▁ni londa ▁kumgeza ni ▁na ▁kulola ▁fana ▁mo tegeleza ▁chila ▁chinhu .
▁Wa lole ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁waja ▁woja ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁chilingo ▁ni ▁mu ilumba ▁kwa ▁iyo ▁za b i hu ▁yoilavigw a ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁u komaji ▁uwo ▁hawiza mtenda ni ▁muwe ▁na ▁ubananzi , ▁kwaviya ▁mu tenda ▁yaja ▁yo mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁wakala ▁wo zahila ▁zi la ▁ya ▁kumgwila , ▁ mbali ▁wakala ▁wo dumba ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wa muwona ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Maabaho ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongoza ▁Saimoni ▁kengila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁Maliya ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁wa ngala ▁imwana ▁Yesu ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wa mtendele ▁fana ▁vi i londeke ▁muna i chi hendo ▁cha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁Yuda , ▁ija ▁yo yambiduke ▁Yesu , ▁kaha manya ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁kwaviya ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kohita ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake .
▁Bulahimu ▁kaha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha .” ▁M baka ▁diyelo ▁wanhu ▁wolonga , ▁“ Muna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wanhu ▁wo kwing ' higwa .”
▁Malagilizo ▁ni ▁yayo ▁yano , ▁“ Sekeu tende ▁ugoni , ▁sekeu kome ▁munhu , ▁sekeu bawe , ▁sekeu me lele ▁mate ▁vinhu ▁va ▁wanhu .” ▁Ya yo ▁yose ▁yekigw a ▁muna ▁lagilizo ▁dino , ▁“ Mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁viya ▁viu i londa ▁weye ▁mwenyewo .”
▁No mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kalawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁i yalongile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁kawa duganya ▁walangulizi ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁na ▁ka we miza ▁ku zunguluka ▁hema .
▁Haluni ▁keza kuwa ▁mu lo nzi ▁wako ▁na ▁keza walongela ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako . ▁W eye ▁kwiza kuwa ▁fana ▁m ulungu ▁kumwake .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁kezamuli ha ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁chiya sang ' hane .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lubeni , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Gadi , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu ,
▁Wa mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya wone ▁migongo ▁kwa ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁wa mtenda ▁ya wone ▁ludoko ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁zihile .
▁Abulamu ▁ka fosa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Shekemu , ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁na ▁mbiki ▁mkulu ▁uko ▁Mo le . ▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Wakanaani ▁wakala ▁wokala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁vondaya weke ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yenu , ▁muha wahuma ▁na ▁ku wadanganiza , ▁sekemu tende ▁nawo ▁lagano ▁jojose ▁hebu ▁sekemuwa wonele ▁ubazi .
▁Wayahudi ▁wengi ▁wachi soma ▁chilaguso ▁chino , ▁kwaviya ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁hoya wa mbigwe ▁Yesu ▁hakala ▁habehi ▁na ▁bululu , ▁na ▁chilaguso ▁cha ndikigwa ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya ▁na ▁Chi lu mi ▁na ▁Chigiliki .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kutenda ▁chiya ▁cha ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chake , ▁wa muhulumu sa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umsalaba ▁na ▁wa mwika ▁muna ▁dileme .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yahalonda ▁ku kombola ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vino , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁bei ▁yake ▁na ▁yon geze le ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano ▁ha ▁bei ▁yake .
▁Wanangu , ▁niza kala ▁na ▁mweye ▁lusita ▁ludodo . ▁Mwiza ni zahila , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁nowalongela ▁chiya ▁choni walongele ▁Wayahudi , ▁‘ Ha m daha ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁ho ni hita ▁niye .’
▁Ino ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁zuwa ▁dimwenga ▁di tangigwa , ▁“ Diyelo ” ▁miyaka ▁mingi ▁i fosile ▁kalonga ▁kufose la ▁Daudi ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yoya longigwe ▁“ Diyelo ▁muha hulika ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemuwe ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala .”
▁Ivo ▁wa ileka ▁na ▁wahita ▁Antiyokiya , ▁uko ▁wa watanga ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁na ▁wa weng ' ha ▁usenga ▁uwo .
▁Musa ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁yoi nyendanyenda ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Haluni ▁kamsola ▁Eli s he ba ▁mndele ▁wa ▁Aminadabu , ▁iviya ▁kakala lumbu ▁jake ▁Nashoni , ▁nayo ▁kamwelek ela ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali .
▁“ One ▁uha wona ▁chi sa nza ▁cha ▁ndege ▁china ▁ma ki nda ▁hebu ▁ma fi nga , ▁na ▁ndege ▁mwene ▁ma ki nda ▁yayo ▁kaya gubika ▁ma ki nda ▁yayo ▁hebu ▁ma fi nga , ▁sekeu msole ▁ndege ▁na ▁ma ki nda ▁yake .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁vimwili ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁ bila ▁kuilunga ▁kwa ▁ku dalisa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cha mbule ▁mwiko , ▁iwe ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁hebu ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁ku fu g igwa ▁hebu ▁m ng ' onyo , ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁na ▁kabananga .
▁Na yo ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Ku tenda ▁goya , ▁msang ' hani ▁unogile ! ▁Kwa viya ▁kukala ▁mwaminika ▁muna ▁ichi nhu ▁chidodo , ▁niza kwika ▁uwe ▁mulangulizi ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁longo .’
▁Wa dimi ▁weza ▁na ▁wa wawinga ▁wa ndele ▁waja ▁saba , ▁ mbali ▁Musa ▁kema ▁na ▁kuwataza ▁kudi ng ' wiza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wanyama ▁wawo .
▁“ Tend eni ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho nimulagilizani , ▁sekem ongeze ▁hebu ▁sekemu hu ng uze ▁chinhu .
▁Wa ha wi ▁wa potwa ▁kwima ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Musa ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁na ▁maihu , ▁mana ▁Wamisili ▁wose ▁wakala ▁na ▁maihu .
▁Ivo ▁kakimbila ▁kuulongozi , ▁ka kwela ▁m chanyha ▁mu mbi ki ▁wa ▁m ku yu ▁muladi ▁ya muwone ▁Yesu , ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁keza fose la ▁nzila ▁ija .
▁Lelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁mu teganye ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kumwenu ▁sekeyawe ▁na ▁moyo ▁wihile ▁fana ▁uwo ▁na ▁yeli bule ▁uhuwilo ▁m baka ▁ku igola ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁ham waminika ▁bule ▁kumwake , ▁mweye ▁siyo ▁wanage ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wihi , ▁mweye ▁ni ▁welesi ▁wihile ▁na ▁wa gile .
▁Ko vimanya ▁munhu ▁fana ▁ino ▁ka leka ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kweli , ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁wo lagusa ▁kabananga .
▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu ▁weli ▁wana ▁wa ▁Haluni , ▁wa sola ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ch etezo ▁chake , ▁weka ▁moto ▁na ▁ubani , ▁wa mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁moto ▁hau londeka , ▁ha uli ngile ▁fana ▁uya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁M weye ▁muna ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁kwa ▁mvunyo , ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁na ▁umanyi ▁na ▁kuiyoha ▁ko se ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁kumwetu , ▁ivo ▁ivo . ▁Vi mu tendile ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁kulava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalola , ▁m aabaho ▁kawauza , ▁“ Mbuli ▁ino ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni , ▁‘ Dib we ▁do wa lemile ▁wa ze nzi ▁kuzengela , ▁diwa ▁dibwe ▁dinogile ▁kufosa ▁mabwe ▁yose ▁ya ▁kuzengela ’ ?
▁Kachi gala ▁hano ▁na ▁ka ching ' ha ▁isi ▁ino ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile .
▁Balaki ▁kamulongela ▁Balaamu , ▁“ B a si ▁seke uwaduwile , ▁hebu ▁sekeu wa temele ▁mate !”
▁“ Chila ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁tatu ▁ gale ni ▁zaka ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vimu gobole ▁na ▁ku vika ▁ngama ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁sekewa vi tende ▁vinhu ▁velile ▁va ▁Waisilaili ▁va mbule ▁mwiko , ▁viya ▁viwo mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu
▁“ Ni gona ▁chingubingubi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁kaidi ▁si dile ▁hebu ▁si ng ' wile ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁womu tendile , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kumtenda ▁ya wone ▁ludoko .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa mgalila ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁chi nzi wi ▁na ▁yeli ▁na ▁lu da n ha , ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu ▁ya mwikile ▁makono ▁munhu ▁iyo .
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁ludabwa ▁kumfosa ▁yeye ▁yaheza ▁kumtowa , ▁keza muhoka ▁silaha ▁zake ▁zose ▁zo yakalile ▁ko zi huwila , ▁na ▁kusola ▁vinhu ▁vake .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viyalongile . ▁Ma bumbila ▁makulu ▁ya ▁ng ' honzi ▁yeng ila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo ▁wa gazigwa ▁na ▁ng ' honzi ▁wawo .
▁Tito , ▁iyo ▁ni ▁miyangu ▁ko sang ' hana ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁ku mtaza ni ▁mweye , ▁na ▁waja ▁ndugu ▁wamwenga ▁wohita ▁hamwe ▁nayo . ▁Wawo ▁ni ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wohuwila ▁na ▁wo mtunhiza ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa lagilize ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁umanyi ▁woni weng ' hile ▁ubala ▁wa mson ele ▁Haluni ▁mawalo , ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁ku ba guligwa ▁kuwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wangu .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁wa son ga ▁ku iuzagiza ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁wenyewo ▁yelihi ▁yondaya we ▁mkulu ▁viweli .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁‘ W eye ▁Betelehemu ▁uli ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya , ▁ huli ▁mdodo ▁bule ▁muna ▁iwa langulizi ▁wa ▁Yuda . ▁Kwa viya ▁keza lawa ▁munhu ▁yondaya wa di me ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .’ ▁”
▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁galu ▁wa ▁ng ' hondo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni i jo ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Muna ▁yamabululu ▁Yesu ▁ko yatendile ▁mauzauza ▁mengi ▁wanhu ▁hawa sa m hile ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo . ▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁ka pata ▁luholozi ▁na ▁kuya bwakila .
▁Tela ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁saba ▁ka weleka ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁Naholi ▁na ▁Halani .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Di s hani ▁wa tangigwa ▁U si ▁na ▁ A la ni .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Nokulongela ▁kweli , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁U u falume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwa ▁mazi ▁na ▁kwa ▁Muhe .
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kuweng ' ha ▁ngamiya ▁mazi , ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kasola ▁ mhete ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁i guligwe ▁hela ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Lebeka , ▁na ▁ma kung ' u ▁maidi ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁ya za mile ▁ng ' hani , ▁ka mvaz a ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yake .
▁Munhu ▁one ▁yaha papa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ mitufi ▁yake ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo , ▁na ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁vo londeka ▁vi fu wigwe .
▁M ulume ▁iyo ▁keza gala ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Nhambiko ▁iyo ▁ni ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kuni lavila ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Izoni ▁muje ▁nyama ▁ya ▁wafalume ▁na ▁nyama ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁na ▁nyama ▁ya ▁magalu ▁na ▁nyama ▁ya ▁falasi ▁na ▁ya ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁na ▁nyama ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁wahawa ▁wa lekele l we ▁hebu ▁watumwa ▁na ▁nyama ▁ya ▁wo hishimigwa ▁na ▁hawa hishimigwa .”
▁Maabaho ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Yosefu ▁wa mwizila ▁na ▁wa mtumba lila ▁mavindi ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Ch eye ▁hano ▁cha ▁watumwa ▁wako .”
▁Mu hokele ni ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho , ▁fana ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁Mndewa . ▁Wa hulike ni ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa li ngile ▁fana ▁yeye .
▁Ananiya ▁kahita ▁na ▁kengila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁iya kalile ▁Sauli ▁na ▁ka mwikila ▁makono . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Ndugu ▁Sauli , ▁Mndewa ▁ka nhu ma , ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁yoya ku lawilile ▁muna ▁inzila . ▁Ka nhu ma ▁muladi ▁u pate ▁kuwona ▁kaidi ▁na ▁u memezigw e ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .”
▁Maabaho ▁Tomasi , ▁ya tangigwe ▁M ba sa , ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wayage , ▁“ G o za ▁chihite ▁na ▁mfundiza ▁muladi ▁chi danganike ▁hamwe ▁nayo .”
▁U lu pango ▁wowose ▁wonda mu m zengele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ wolondeka ▁u ze ng e ligwe ▁mabwe ▁haya songoligwe . ▁Uchanyha ▁ya ▁u pango ▁uwo ▁mwiza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbula .
▁Ivo , ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁hachi m peta ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁ hali ▁ya ▁chiunhu . ▁Hata ▁fana ▁chim peta ▁Chilisito ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁sambi ▁hachi m peta ▁kaidi ▁kui nza na ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yaja .
▁M weye ▁mwii du mwe ▁niiyo ▁lolelo ▁jetu , ▁de ng ' ho ▁jetu ▁na ▁kombelo ▁jetu ▁da ▁uhumi ▁do nda chi igode le ▁lusita ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁vondaya bwele .
▁Na ▁sambi ▁si ▁mtumwa ▁kaidi , ▁ mbali ▁ni ▁kufosa ▁mtumwa , ▁ndugu ▁mulondwa ▁mwa ▁Chilisito . ▁Y eye ▁munhu ▁goya ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwangu ! ▁Na ▁munhu ▁goya ▁ng ' hani ▁kumwako , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁na ▁ndugu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa !
▁Na ▁mafundizo ▁yaja ▁you hulike ▁no ya fundiza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wa kalangama ▁wengi , ▁uwa fundize ▁wanhu ▁wo k waminika ▁wondawa dahe ▁kuwafundiza ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga .
▁Yesu ▁ka komeleze la ▁kwa ▁kulonga , ▁“ Wa ja ▁weli ▁wa ▁uhelelo ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwanduso , ▁na ▁waja ▁weli ▁wa ▁um wanduso ▁weza kuwa ▁wa ▁uhelelo .”
▁Na ▁si ▁welesi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ W elesi ▁wako ▁wiza lawa ▁kwa ▁Isaka .”
▁Mbali ▁u yepule ▁na ▁ku isosokanya ▁kwa ▁chibozi ▁na ▁mbuli ▁ zilibule ▁m ta zo ▁wowose , ▁ uvimanye ▁kuwa ▁zo gala ▁ndwagi .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza i safya ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁ya ▁wanenu , ▁muladi ▁mu mulonde ▁yeye , ▁kwa ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁yose ▁na ▁kwa ▁ mihe ▁yenu ▁yose , ▁muladi ▁mukale .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁kawa londa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁m baka ▁kamulava ▁Mwanage ▁nyachende , ▁muladi ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yoyo mtogola ▁sekeya danganike , ▁ mbali ▁yawe ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose , ▁ziga ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁jake ,
▁Esau ▁kahita ▁kwa ▁Ishumaili ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁kamsola ▁muke ▁imwenga ▁yo tangigwa ▁Ma ha la ti , ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁N e ba yo ti .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mweye ▁mo ni zahila ▁siyo ▁kwaviya ▁ muwona ▁chilaguso , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁mu ja ▁magate ▁na ▁mwi guta .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁mwiisi ▁yose ▁m ka pete le ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Ugima ▁wenu ▁sekeu langulizigw e ▁na ▁hela , ▁mu fa i ke ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vo mwili ▁navo . ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Siza kuleka ▁ng ' o , ▁wala ▁siza kwa sa ▁ng ' o .”
▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wa sigala ▁uko ▁Antiyokiya , ▁wawo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wengi ▁wafundiza ▁na ▁wa peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mndewa .
▁Viya fikile ▁kui kaye ▁ya ▁Yailo , ▁halondile ▁munhu ▁kwingila ▁hamwe ▁nayo , ▁ mbali ▁Petili , ▁Yohana , ▁Yakobo , ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁mndele ▁ija .
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁walala ▁wawo ▁kani uza , ▁“ Wa no ▁wa yawale ▁ng ' hanzu ▁nzel u ▁wawo ▁welihi ▁na ▁wala wahi ?”
▁Muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kunze ▁ya ▁panzia ▁ijo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza dika ▁goya ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ichigulogulo ▁m baka ▁imitondo . ▁L agilizo ▁dino ▁do londeka ▁ ja m higwe ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁na ▁nyele si ▁zawo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Hajili ▁viya mweleke ▁Ishumaili , ▁Abulamu ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁sita .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezamgalila ni ▁mweye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁manhesa ▁na ▁matamu ▁makulu ▁yoyo gendelela .
▁Mwana ▁ija ▁kedika , ▁‘ N de ma ,’ ▁ mbali ▁hamwande ▁katogola ▁na ▁kahita ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Kwa viya ▁fana viya ▁Yona ▁viyakalile ▁chilaguso ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Ni na wi , ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel o ▁uno .
▁Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya ▁kuhulika , ▁ya hulike ▁yaja ▁Muhe ▁yoyo ya longela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁Wa ja ▁wo onda ▁wa hume ▁niza weng ' ha ▁na ▁ku mulekela ▁kuja ▁matunda ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁ugima ▁yeli ▁muna ▁Pa la di so ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁wihi ▁wawo , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁mwa wa delenya ! ▁ Mbo na ▁mo ni geza ?
▁Wa itowa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Midiani , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa , ▁wa wakoma ▁walume ▁wose .
▁m aabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza mbweleze la ni ▁ugima ▁wenu ▁unogile ▁na ▁ku muwonela ni ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kum duganya ni ▁kaidi ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁izisi ▁ziya ▁ziya m pwililis eni .
▁One ▁Chilisito ▁ha zilibuke , ▁basi ▁ku petela ▁kwetu ▁si ▁chinhu ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁si ▁chinhu .
▁na ▁meza ▁na ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁ya ▁kwa m hila ▁na ▁viya ▁vake ▁vose , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁magate ▁yelile ▁ye kigwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁Musa ▁k andika ▁wila ▁uno ▁na ▁kawa fu nza ▁Waisilaili .
▁Lazalo ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁makono ▁yake ▁na ▁magulu ▁yake ▁ya zi ngilizigwa ▁sanda , ▁na ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi gubikigwa ▁na ▁walo . ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M fungu leni ▁na ▁mu muleke ▁yahite .”
▁One ▁yaha lema ▁kumtegeleza ni , ▁di longele ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁one ▁yaha lema ▁kuwa tegeleza ▁wahuwila , ▁muleke ▁kumwako ▁yawe ▁fana ▁munhu ▁ha mmanyile ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁m sola ▁kodi .
▁“ H o ke la ▁nhambiko ▁izo ▁muladi ▁zi sang ' hani ligwe ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁yondai sang ' hani gwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁U weng ' he ▁Walawi ▁chila ▁imwe ▁fana ▁viili ▁sang ' hano ▁yake .”
▁Mu lavile ni ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Pasaka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wenu , ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo , ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kumtambikila ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Musa ▁k andika ▁zina ▁da ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁ho wekile ▁lago , ▁lago ▁m baka ▁lago , ▁kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vichi i solile ▁isi ▁iyo , ▁ni weng ' ha ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁Gadi ▁kwandusi la ▁kasikazi ▁mwa ▁ A lo eli ▁habehi ▁na ▁kolongo ▁da ▁Alinoni ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁milima ▁ya ▁Gileadi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mabululu ▁yake .
▁Ng ' holo ▁za ▁Kohasi ▁wa londeka ▁kwika ▁lago ▁jawo ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka songola ▁meza ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mkenge , ▁utali ▁wake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁manane ▁na ▁na ne ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁nne ▁na ▁chimo ▁chake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Yuda ▁keza kwamha ▁mhome ▁ya ▁chifalume , ▁W elesi ▁wake ▁wiza tawala ▁siku ▁zose . ▁M baka ▁vondayeze ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ufalume ▁M baka ▁makabila ▁weza mtegeleza .
▁M tamu ▁ija ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁na bule ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kuni ka ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁lusita ▁yaha ti bu ligwa . ▁Chila ▁ho ni londa ▁kwingila , ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ko ni longole la .”
▁Maabaho ▁ka dika ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku tumbik a ▁panzia , ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kadi fisa ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulongele ▁Musa .
▁na ▁mulumake ▁yaha hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁na ▁ham gomesa , ▁imuke ▁keza fungigwa ▁na ▁chilaho ▁chake ▁chi yekile .
▁Wa nyama ▁wanenehe ▁viwa ti zile , ▁Yakobo ▁keka ▁zi mango ▁haulongozi ▁hawo ▁hana ▁zi mba lu ti ▁za ▁kung ' wi zila ▁mazi ▁muladi ▁wa pate ▁wimo ▁habehi ▁na ▁ mango ▁izo .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza lawa ▁kunze ▁na ▁kui hinda ▁kaye ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁One ▁uha lema ▁ku walekelela ▁wahite , ▁nizaku galila ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁ng ' honzi , ▁weye ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako . ▁Ng ' honzi ▁wawo ▁weza kwingila ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁zenu , ▁kaye ▁zose ▁za ▁Wamisili ▁ziza mema ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁ng ' honzi , ▁hata ▁isi ▁yose ▁wanhu ▁ha we li .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa wonile ▁ivo , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulongelela , ▁“ Ko hita ▁kukala ▁na ▁‘ mu hasanyi !’ ▁”
▁Ha ja ▁hakala ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wengi ▁wo lola ▁kwa ▁kutali , ▁wawo ▁wowamsondelel e ▁Yesu ▁kulawa ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Galilaya ▁na ▁ku mtaza .
▁Seke m gese ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁niza mulongele za ni ▁kwa ▁Tata . ▁Musa , ▁iyo ▁mweye ▁mu mulole la ▁iyo ▁yondaya mulongele ze ni .
▁ Mwing ' heni ▁hewela ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chochi lawilila ▁kwaviya ▁yayo ▁ni ▁malond o ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kumwenu ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chi ili sito ▁Yesu .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁imwenga ▁kafika ▁kasola ▁ch etezo ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichilingo ▁cha ▁ku lavila ▁nhosa , ▁nayo ▁keng ' higwa ▁ubani ▁mwingi ▁ya u lave ▁nhosa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ha chanyha ▁ha ▁ichilingo ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁chili ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume .
▁Vino ▁sambi ▁ku zuma ▁siyo ▁mbuli ▁i woneka ▁ya ▁kude ng ' helela ▁ mbali ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁usungu . ▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁iza gala ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁ugima ▁wou mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wose ▁wa fundizigw e ▁na ▁ku zum wa ▁uko .
▁Musa ▁viya humuluk e ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁kuno ▁kam ha ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁ukalangama ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake ▁va ndikigwe ▁mbuli ▁za ▁lagano , ▁ha vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi kala ▁chi kwaka ▁kwaviya ▁kalonga ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁muhawa ▁wa bagula ji ▁wanhu , ▁mo tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yo watagusa ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁wa bena ▁malagilizo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zino ▁ugaluga ▁fana ▁vimu kwenhuka ▁hamwande . ▁ Hamwiza daha ▁kuwa bananga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo ▁zose ▁mwanza ▁umwe , ▁kwaviya ▁muha tenda ▁ivo ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁weza k ongeze ka ▁na ▁iza mtenda ni ▁mu d umbe .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ U da ho ▁wose ▁wou li nawo ▁kumwangu ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Na yo ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya ni galile ▁kumwako ▁kana ▁uhasanyi ▁mkulu ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Maabaho ▁ifa ▁na ▁kuzimu ▁wa sigwa ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁da ▁moto . ▁L a mba ▁dino ▁da ▁moto ▁iyo ▁ifa ▁yekaidi .
▁Kwa ▁lusita ▁lutali ▁msemi ▁iyo ▁ka lema ▁ku mtaza ▁mgane ▁ija . ▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁ka ilongela ▁mwenyewo , ▁‘ Hata ▁fana ▁niye ▁si mdumba ▁Mulungu ▁wala ▁si wa gesa ▁wanhu ,
▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁we mile ▁baho ▁wawa uza , ▁“ M o tenda ▁choni ? ▁ Habali ▁mo m fungula ▁iyo ▁chihongwe ? .”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ Sekemu nga ze ! ▁Mu lekeni ▁ya ye ke ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁siku ▁da ▁ku wandigwa ▁kwangu .
▁Ivo ▁mu handa ji ▁si ▁chinhu ▁na ▁wala ▁ng u mila ji ▁mazi ▁si ▁chinhu . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁chinhu , ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁yoyo itende za ▁i ku le .
▁Musa ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁katogola .
▁hebu ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁habehi ▁na ▁mweye , ▁hebu ▁milungu ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁kutali , ▁kulawa ▁n ho nga ▁imwe ▁ya ▁isi ▁m baka ▁n ho nga ▁imwenga .
