▁Chi mwing ' he ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Tata ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ! ▁Kwa ▁kuchi lumbiliza ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁kachi temela ▁mate ▁na ▁ku ching ' ha ▁chila ▁bala ka ▁ya ▁chimuhe ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁chila ▁va wa mu onile ▁Yesu , ▁wa gwa ▁haulongozi ▁hake , ▁na ▁wa lila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁kovimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁chi yo ku londa ▁ usang ' hane , ▁na ▁kodaha ▁ku sagula ▁yanogile ▁kwaviya ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yo ku fundiza , ▁chi lihi ▁chinogile .
▁Igolo ▁yake ▁wanhu ▁wa i da wa ▁wa lava ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Wa nhu ▁wakala ▁hasi ▁kuja ▁na ▁kung ' wa , ▁m aabaho ▁wema ▁na ▁kuvi na .
▁Ka gela ▁vitan zi ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁muna ▁dipanzia ▁da ▁mwanduso ▁da ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁vitan zi ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁muna ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁panzia ▁dekaidi , ▁vitan zi ▁vose ▁vi ilola .
▁“ Ivo ▁Mfalume ▁Agilipa ▁si ya lemile ▁bule ▁malaguso ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa towa ▁ng ' hondo ▁wawo ▁wa si galile ▁wa komigwe ▁na ▁panga ▁di lawile ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wa ▁ija ▁ya kweli le ▁falasi ▁mzelu . ▁N dege ▁wose ▁we guta ▁kwa ▁nyama ▁zawo .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yo genda ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁ lamba ▁da ▁Galilaya , ▁kawa wona ▁ndugu ▁waidi ▁wa vula ▁somba , ▁Saimoni ▁yo tangigwa ▁Petili ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Andeleya . ▁Ndugu ▁wawo ▁waidi ▁wakala ▁wo vula ▁somba ▁kwa ▁lwavu .
▁Kenani ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁saba , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁zina ▁jake ▁Mahalaleli ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza ya wing a ▁makabila ▁yano ▁yose ▁haulongozi ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza sola ▁zisi ▁ng ' hulu ▁zili ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kumfosa ni ▁mweye .
▁ Haidahika ! ▁ Walume ▁muhala ▁wawo ▁wondawa hite ▁ku mtosela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mana ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁iyo ▁yo mulondile ▁umwaka .” ▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wa wing igwa ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁viwa manyile , ▁wamsondelela . ▁Yesu ▁kawa hokela , ▁kalonga ▁nawo ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kawahonya ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁wo londa ▁ku honyigwa .

▁Mbali ▁fana ▁viya ▁siku ▁ziya ▁mwana ▁ija ▁yo yelekigwe ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁viwo kwe lekigwa ▁ka mba manya ▁ija ▁yo yelekigwe ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁iviya ▁na ▁siku ▁zino .
▁Yosefu ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁“ Siyo ▁ivo ▁tata . ▁Ino ▁niiyo ▁chaudele , ▁ mwikile ▁mkono ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulume ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁jake .”
▁Mbali ▁keza longa ▁kaidi , ▁‘ No mulongelani ▁si mmanyile ni ▁ mulawa ▁kulihi . ▁ Segeleni ▁kumwangu ▁mweye ▁mose ▁mo tenda ▁yehile !’
▁Ha mwe ▁na ▁yayo , ▁ni sasalil eni ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁kugona , ▁kwaviya ▁no lolela ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mwidika ni ▁nhosa ▁zenu ▁zose ▁na ▁kuni bweleza ▁kaidi ▁kumwako .
▁Maabaho ▁keza sola ▁ ga nza ▁dimwe ▁da ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁kwa ▁lukumbuso ▁lwa ▁kui timbula ▁hana ▁ulupango . ▁Keza m ng ' wiza ▁mwanamke ▁mazi ▁yayo .
▁Wa zanywa ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁yake , ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁kofundiza ▁kwa ▁udahi .
▁ Yandikigwa ▁vino ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo , ▁“ Mndewa ▁kolonga , ▁niza longa ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁niza longa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wangu . ▁Niza longa ▁kwa ▁mi lomo ▁ya ▁wageni , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁haweza ni tegeleza ▁bule .”
▁Cho i lagusa ▁kuwa ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁u sa f yo ▁wa ▁moyo ▁wetu , ▁ya ▁umanyi ▁wa ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁kweli ,
▁Keza ▁kumwake ▁mwenyewo , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁hawa muhokele ▁bule .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha sola ▁muke ▁na ▁ku mbandama ▁na ▁hamwande ▁ka lamula ▁ku mwasa ,
▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ U msole ▁Isaka ▁mwanago ▁nyachende ▁you mulonda ▁na ▁uhite ▁m baka ▁isi ▁ya ▁Mo li ya ▁na ▁u mulave ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁kutimbuligwa ▁muna ▁mulima ▁uja ▁wonda nikulongele .”
▁“ One ▁yaha komeleza ▁ku ilola ▁goya ▁kaye ▁iyo , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza wona ▁chimvuguya ▁ha c he ne le ▁vi i komeleze ke ▁kuhak igwa ▁cho ka a , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁kaye ▁iyo ▁haya mbule ▁mwiko , ▁kwaviya ▁chimvuguya ▁chi mala .
▁Kwa viya ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁zenu ▁na ▁nhazo ▁yo yi lawa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁niza ilegeha .
▁Ha na ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁Mnazili ▁iyo ▁keza we gula ▁nyele ▁zake ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁muna ▁umoto ▁uli ▁hasi ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo .
▁Haluni ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ‚ ▁mabula ▁ya lawilila ▁na ▁ya i gubika ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Iviya ▁mu mulongele , ▁‘ M sang ' hani ▁wako ▁Yakobo ▁kaha chisogo ▁chetu ▁kokwiza .’ ▁” ▁Yakobo ▁ka tenda ▁ivo ▁ka gesa , ▁“ H u we nda ▁niza mu ho za ▁kwa ▁vitumetume ▁ivo ▁voni mu longoze la , ▁na ▁hamwande ▁nodaha ▁kui wona ▁nayo ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga , ▁hu we nda ▁keza ni hokela .”
▁Mo to ▁wiza gendelela ▁kwa ka ▁siku ▁zose ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁ bila ▁kuzi migwa .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kamsola ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁hamgwazo ▁heli bule ▁wanhu . ▁Ka guma ▁vi dole ▁vake ▁muna ▁yama gutwi ▁ya ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁Maabaho ▁ka t ema ▁yama t e ▁na ▁kum dalisa ▁lulimi .
▁F a la si ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁m ituka ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wake ▁vi wengile ▁muibahali , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kaya bweleza ▁mazi ▁ya ▁bahali ▁na ▁yawa gubika . ▁Mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁wa gendelela ▁kugenda ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile ▁hagati ▁ya ▁bahali .
▁Ivo ▁kukala ▁na ▁mibiki ▁mi nane ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁longo ▁na ▁sita ▁va ▁hela .
▁Kwa viya ▁m go lole ▁wake ▁wa ▁kui gubika ▁uwo ▁muhala . ▁Vino ▁weye ▁ko gesa ▁keza i gubika ▁choni ? ▁Ya hani li lila ▁niza mwidika ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁nina ▁ubazi .
▁Ivo ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁wanhu ▁wa humula .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wengi , ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wam ta ndi le ▁ngalawa ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁sekewa msung ' he sung ' he .
▁Maabaho ▁wamuuza ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁ija , ▁“ Ku longa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka kuhonya ▁meso ▁yako . ▁Lelo ▁weye ▁kwo longa ze ▁ku mson hela ▁munhu ▁iyo ?” ▁Ka wedika , ▁“ Munhu ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁weza zi sondelela ▁nzila ▁zawo ▁za ▁ugoni , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁wanhu ▁weza i liga ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kweli .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁m zukulu ▁wako , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mwanago ▁hebu ▁wa ▁mndele ▁wako , ▁uko ▁ni ▁kui guma ▁chinyala .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ No muuza ni ▁mbuli ▁imwe , ▁one ▁mu hani dika , ▁niza mulongelani ▁kuwa ▁notenda ▁yano ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁yelihi .
▁Sekeu m b wa kile ▁mulala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁u longe ▁nayo ▁kwa ▁uhole ▁fana ▁viya ▁ tati ▁yako , ▁ watendele ▁wabwanga ▁fana ▁viya ▁ndugu ▁zako ,
▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza temiligw a ▁mate . ▁Kwa viya ▁wawo ▁hawa daha ▁kuku liha , ▁Mulungu ▁kezaku liha ▁muna isiku ▁ya ▁ku zilibuligwa ▁wanhu ▁wanogile .”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ha londa ▁kuu kombola ▁mgunda ▁hebu ▁kam chuuzi ya ▁munhu ▁imwenga , ▁basi ▁mgunda ▁uwo ▁sekeu komboligwe ▁kaidi .
▁ Habali ▁sekechi longe , ▁“ Leka ▁chitende ▁yehile ▁muladi ▁chi hokele ▁yanogile ?” ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ni liga , ▁walonga ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no fundiza ▁ivo . ▁Weza tagusigwa ▁fana ▁vi wolondeka .
▁Kalonga ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁yaja ▁ya yalongile ▁yawe ▁kweli , ▁“ Tata , ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wou ning ' hile ▁si m wagize ▁hata ▁imwe .”
▁Seke chi m geze ▁Mndewa ▁Chilisito , ▁fana ▁viwa m gezile ▁wawo ▁viwatendile , ▁nawo ▁wa komigwa ▁na ▁mazoka .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁Ahi la ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Enani , ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali ▁ka lava ▁nhambiko ▁yake .
▁Wa no ▁ni ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Musa ▁chip indi ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁na ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Sinai .
▁ mbali ▁Sauli ▁kai hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo . ▁Ichil o ▁na ▁imisi ▁wa mkaliza ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ya ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁muladi ▁wa mkome .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Munhu ▁hadaha ▁kuwa ▁ngima ▁bule ▁kwa ▁gate ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mbuli ▁yoi lawa ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wa ▁Mulungu .’ ▁”
▁Mwiza mwika ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁uno , ▁m aabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁weza chinja ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁ichigulogulo ▁ng uku ▁zikwingila .
▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁S he mi da ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁He fe li .
▁Maabaho ▁chilaguso ▁chimwenga ▁chi lawilila ▁kuulanga , ▁nhulanyika ▁ dung ' hu ▁dili ▁na ▁matwi ▁saba ▁na ▁ mhembe ▁longo , ▁na ▁chila ▁ditwi ▁di kala ▁na ▁kombelo .
▁“ Sekeu ni lavile ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁damu ▁na ▁lusu , ▁hebu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁sekei si gazigwe ▁m baka ▁imitondo .
▁Ivo ▁wa mgwila ▁na ▁kumkoma , ▁m aabaho ▁wa mwasa ▁kunze ▁mwa ▁mgunda ▁uwo .
▁Wamisili ▁wawa sondelela ▁na ▁wengi la ▁mgati ▁muna ▁ibahali , ▁falasi ▁wawo ▁wose ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi ▁wawo ▁na ▁m ituka ▁yawo ▁ya ▁ng ' hondo .
▁Hamwande , ▁Yosefu ▁yoya lawile ▁chi langulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Ali ma sa ya ▁ka mpula ▁Pilato ▁ya mwin e ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁Yesu . ▁Yosefu ▁kakala ▁mwanahina ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁chinyele ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁kowa dumba ▁Wayahudi . ▁Pilato ▁ka mtogole la , ▁ivo ▁Yosefu ▁kau sola , ▁kahita ▁nawo .
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁nyambenyambe ▁waja ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ L usita ▁fana ▁luno ▁mwaka ▁u kwiza ▁nizaku bwelela , ▁na ▁muke ▁wako ▁Sala ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .” ▁Sala ▁kakala ▁hachisogo ▁chake ▁hana ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁i he ma ▁ko tegeleza .
▁Hamwande ▁Yesu ▁kawa lawilila ▁kaidi ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁dilamba ▁da ▁T ib eli ya . ▁I lawilila ▁vino ,
▁na ▁m imada ▁iyo ▁mi sisili ▁im ela ▁ija ▁m imada ▁saba ▁inogile . ▁Ni walongela ▁wa ga nga ▁nzozi ▁izo , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya dahile ▁kuni fambulila .”
▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁no kwandika ▁ndams a ▁zino ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁mwenyewo . ▁Kumbuk eni ▁ miza b i ▁yangu . ▁No wapulile ni ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁chi ilegeha ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁cha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa , ▁kwaviya ▁chi danganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁yoi chitendile ▁watumwa . ▁ Sambi ▁cho sang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ugima ▁wa ▁sambi ▁wa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁na ▁si ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ hali ▁ija ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁ya ▁malagilizo ▁yoya ndikigwe .
▁M wa ka ▁u sondelele ▁wa mwizila ▁kaidi ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁ukweli ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁hela ▁zetu ▁zose ▁zi mala ▁na ▁iviya ▁mifu go ▁yetu ▁iwa ▁yako . ▁Lelo ▁mwenevale , ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁cha bule ▁chochose ▁chochi daha ▁ku kwing ' ha ▁ mbali ▁ng ' huli ▁zetu ▁na ▁migunda ▁yetu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ha muhuwila ▁chiya ▁choya ndike ▁Musa , ▁mwiza daha ze ▁kuhuwila ▁chiya ▁chi ni longa ▁niye ?”
▁Weza danganika ▁kwa ▁nzala ▁na ▁ homa , ▁wezadanganika ▁kwa ▁mitamu , ▁niza gala ▁wanyama ▁weli ▁na ▁meno ▁ya so ngo ke ▁na ▁mazoka ▁weli ▁na ▁sumu ▁wa w alume .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ilaha ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁ bila ▁ku gesa , ▁chinogile ▁hebu ▁chihile ▁fana ▁munhu ▁ha vimanyile , ▁vondaya vimanye ▁keza kuwa ▁kabananga .
▁Ivo ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha ▁kudimila ▁heza kuwa ▁mita ▁ 9 0 0 ▁na ▁heza kwe ne la ▁chila ▁ubanzi , ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁dizakuwa ▁hagati . ▁Ha nhu ▁baho ▁heza kuwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kudimila ▁mumgwazo ▁ya ▁mabululu ▁yawo .
▁Cho vimanya ▁fambulo ▁da ▁kumdumba ▁Mndewa , ▁cho geza ▁kuwa gala ▁wanhu ▁kumwake . ▁Mulungu ▁ka chimanya ▁funhufunhu ▁na ▁niye ▁no lolela ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁mo mmanya ▁funhufunhu ▁iviya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni . ▁M weye ▁mwiza wa zima ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁nyingi , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁hamwiza kwa zima . ▁Iviya ▁mwiza tawala ▁zisi ▁nyingi , ▁ mbali ▁wawo ▁haweza m tawala ni .
▁No dumba ! ▁Seke i we ▁ la bu da ▁sang ' hano ▁yose ▁yoni sang ' hane ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁ya ga ▁bule .
▁Yano ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁watumigwa ▁longo ▁na ▁waidi , ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Andeleya , ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Yohana , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Zebedayo ,
▁Chila ▁ b onde ▁di memezigw e , ▁na ▁chila ▁mulima ▁na ▁chi lima ▁vi se sigwe , ▁nzila ▁zo hazi goloke ▁zi go lo s we , ▁na ▁nzila ▁zihile ▁zi kigwe ▁goya .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya dahe ▁ku mulema ni . ▁Ho ho se ▁honda mu hite ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza watenda ▁wanhu ▁wa mdumbe ni ▁fana ▁ viyamulaganileni .
▁Ni wa sola ▁Walawi ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁udele ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemu sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku .
▁Leka mana ▁cho gendelela ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁Cho mulamba ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁yam da hi ze ni ▁ku londeka ▁mukale ▁fana ▁vi yamtangile ni ▁kukala . ▁Ka komeleza ▁chila ▁lungilo ▁jenu ▁da ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁chila ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁ya ▁uhuwilo ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwake .
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ ihawa ▁kweli ▁na ▁ habule ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁um ha m b e ▁wake ,
▁Kwa viya ▁ndiya ▁yoyo chi na ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yokwiza ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku we a ▁ugima ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁mu isi .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁yaidumwe , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁longo ▁dimwe ▁na ▁waidi ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁kumulongela ▁yawa fa mbuli le ▁masimwe ▁yayo .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁nyambenyambe ▁hebu ▁m fosa nzila ▁yo kala ▁kumwenu ▁ko kuwa ▁tajili ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁Muisilaili ▁ko kuwa ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁kui chuuza ▁kwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁iyo ▁hebu ▁m fosa nzila ▁iyo ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zawo ,
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁ka kimbilila ▁kuchuwala ▁kwi li ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hoya sasalil igwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁ya lole s we ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁siku ▁alufu ▁imwe ▁na ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alongo ▁sita .
▁One ▁ng ' ombe ▁yaham kenha ▁mbwanga ▁hebu ▁mndele , ▁iza hu mizigwa ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁Mulungu ▁viya mu laganile ▁Bulahimu ▁ka ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jake ▁mwenyewo , ▁kwaviya ▁ habule ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁kufose la ▁iyo ▁yaha dahile ▁ku ilaha .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁mwa li ▁wako ▁yoya saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁wo kula mu sa .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoni ho ka ▁ugima ▁wangu . ▁No u lava ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁mwenyewo . ▁Ni na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuu lava , ▁na ▁nina ▁udahi ▁wa ▁kuu sola ▁kaidi ▁ugima ▁wangu . ▁Vino ▁ivo ▁Tata ▁viya ni lagilize ▁nitende .”
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁wakala ▁wa londa ▁kun geza , ▁ivo ▁kawalongela ,
▁Ni mulawilila ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ‚ ▁ mbali ▁zina ▁jangu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁si di tendile ▁di manyike ▁kumwawo .
▁L usita ▁lukulu ▁lu fosa , ▁muke ▁wake ▁Yuda ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S huwa ▁kadanganika . ▁Yuda ▁viya komeleze ▁ndilo , ▁kasegela ▁na ▁mbwiya ke ▁ H ila ▁kulawa ▁M wa du la mu ▁wahita ▁T i mi na ▁kwa ▁wa kanha ▁m izo ya ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake .
▁Maabaho ▁Yakobo ▁kamnonela ▁Laheli ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kulila ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁na ▁de ng ' ho .
▁Ku no ▁Helodiya ▁ko kong ' hi ligwa ▁na ▁mami ▁yake , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni g ' he ▁sambi ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁muna ▁i c hano .”
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁moto ▁na ▁uwa lunguza ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano ▁wowa fukiz e ▁ubani .
▁Ndugu ▁zake ▁wamulongela , ▁“ K wolondeka ▁u segele ▁hano ▁uhite ▁Yudeya ▁muladi ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁wa wone ▁mauzauza ▁you tenda .
▁Maliya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Niye ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁n he ndi ligwe ▁ivo ▁viulongile .” ▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁kasegela .
▁Mbali ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁saba , ▁kwiza leka ▁migunda ▁yako ▁yose ▁ bila ▁ya ▁ku handa ▁mbeyu ▁muladi ▁ngayengaye ▁weli ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁wa pate ▁ndiya ▁isigale ▁umo ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁wa je . ▁Kwiza tenda ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wako ▁wa ▁mizabibu ▁na ▁mizaituni .
▁ Siku ▁ya ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wekaidi , ▁mwaka ▁wekaidi ▁kwandusi la ▁Waisilaili ▁viwa segele ▁Misili , ▁wingu ▁di kalile ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁di n u ligwa .
▁Maabaho ▁we mba ▁wila , ▁wasegela ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Mizaituni .
▁One ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁yaham kenha ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike , ▁mwene ▁ng ' ombe ▁kezamuli ha ▁mwenevale ▁wa ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁shekel i ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁ya ▁hela , ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe ▁kwa ▁ku towigwa ▁na ▁mabwe .

▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawa towa ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁na ▁kuwakoma ▁m baka ▁wose ▁wa mala .
▁T a mbi ke ni ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kulawa ▁vinogile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁hawa muhuwila ▁Yesu ▁weli ▁uko ▁kuna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu ▁uko ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu ▁i dahe ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁uko .
▁ Yodahika ze ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁kaye ▁ya ▁nyang ' hiti ▁yo ta mbi ki ligwa ▁na ▁wanhu ? ▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁ni ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima ! ▁Fan a ▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁viyalongile , ▁“ Niza kala ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁na ▁niza genda ▁hagati ▁yawo , ▁na ▁niza kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁wawo , ▁nawo ▁weza kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wangu .”
▁Ni longa , ▁‘ Chi leke ▁chi fose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako , ▁chiza fose la ▁muna ▁inzila ▁muhala ▁ bila ▁ku hinduka ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁hebu ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kumoso .
▁I ja ▁yoya tangigwe ▁Mbuli ▁kawa ▁munhu , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye . ▁Na ▁cheye ▁chiu wona ▁utunhizo ▁wake , ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mwana ▁N ya c he nde ▁yo yezile ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Tata , ▁ka mema ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁ukweli .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Segel a ▁hano ▁ha mwa ng u , ▁weye ▁Lufyende ! ▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁‘ U mtosele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁na ▁u msang ' hanile ▁yeye ▁muhala !’ ▁”
▁“ M ulume ▁yoyose ▁yo mwasa ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁kusola ▁muke ▁imwenga ▁kotenda ▁uzinzi , ▁na ▁mulume ▁yoyo msola ▁muke ▁yoya sigwe ▁kotenda ▁uzinzi .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁na ▁mweye ▁mu isasale ▁kwaviya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kokwiza ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁hamu ilo lele .
▁Maabaho ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁ka inama ▁na ▁ka tambikila ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁ Siku ▁dimwe ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kofundiza . ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wowa lawile ▁chila ▁bululu ▁da ▁Galilaya , ▁Yudeya ▁na ▁Yelusalemu ▁wakala ▁baho . ▁Udaho ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁ukala ▁haja ▁ya dahe ▁ kuhonya ▁watamu .
▁Yaha fosa ▁yayo , ▁kwiza lawilila ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ya ▁nzala , ▁na ▁miyaka ▁ija ▁inogile ▁iza zi mi z wa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwaviya ▁nzala ▁iza lumiza ▁isi .
▁No dumba ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁vondanize ▁kumwenu , ▁siza wafika ▁goya ▁bule ▁fana ▁viya ▁vini londa , ▁na ▁mweye ▁hamwiza ni fika ▁goya ▁bule ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi mulonda . ▁No dumba ▁kuwa fika ▁muna ▁udelenya , ▁migongo , ▁kui ng ' o ng ' a , ▁ndwagi , ▁kui vwizi la , ▁u de si , ▁magoda ▁na ▁tibwilitibwili .
▁Kwa viya ▁si londa ▁kui yo na ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁kufosa ▁muhala . ▁No lolela ▁kukala ▁na ▁mweye ▁lusita ▁ludodo ▁Mndewa ▁yahalonda .
▁U ha wi ▁hau daha ▁kuwahuma ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁hebu ▁u ga nga ▁hau daha ▁kuwahuma ▁Isilaili . ▁Mbuli ▁za ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Isilaili ▁ziza longigwa , ▁‘ Loleni ▁mauzauza ▁yoyatendile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu !’
▁“ Ka ba hano ▁mbwanga ▁ka navo ▁vi ga t e ▁vitan o ▁va ▁uhemba ▁na ▁vi so mba ▁vidi . ▁Mbali ▁icho ▁choni ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁fana ▁wano !”
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Dani , ▁Ahi ezeli ▁mwana ▁Am i s ha da i ,
▁Ni ivo ▁ili ▁m baka ▁diyelo ▁Waisilaili ▁hawa ja ▁bule ▁mu ge ▁wa ▁ chigudi , ▁kwaviya ▁imu nhu ▁ija ▁kam dalisa ▁Yakobo ▁hana ▁u mu ge ▁wa ▁i chigudi ▁chake ▁viwa kalile ▁wo gomba .
▁Mu mweda ▁mweye ▁muli ▁na ▁nzala ▁sambi , ▁kwaviya ▁mwiza k wi guta ! ▁Mu mweda ▁mweye ▁womu lila ▁sambi , ▁kwaviya ▁mwiza sekelela !
▁Wa fika ▁hanhu ▁ho tangigwa ▁Ge si se ma ne . ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ L usita ▁niye ▁lu ni ta ▁kutosa , ▁mweye ▁ka leni ▁hano .”
▁Bulahimu ▁kakala ▁mulala ▁wa ▁habehi ▁wa ▁miyaka ▁gana , ▁ mbali ▁uhuwilo ▁wake ▁hai hunguke ▁bule , ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁kavimanya ▁hadaha ▁kupata ▁mwana , ▁na ▁mke ▁wake ▁Sala ▁ha dahile ▁ku lela ▁bule .
▁Ivo ▁Yesu ▁kawa gubulila ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁wa pate ▁kuyamanya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile .
▁So mba ▁weli ▁mu ulwanda ▁wa fa ‚ ▁ulwanda ▁lu n ung ' ha ▁ vu ndo ‚ ▁ivo ▁Wamisili ▁wa potwa ▁kuya ng ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁ulo . ▁Isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili ▁i mema ▁damu .
▁Kaye ▁ziza memezigw a ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁viya ▁mweye ▁hamu vi kile ▁bule , ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁vi sima ▁hamu vi hi mbi le ▁na ▁migunda ▁ya ▁mizabibu ▁na ▁mizaituni ▁hamu vi handile ▁bule . ▁ Vondamu je ▁na ▁kwi guta ,
▁“ Kuson hela ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Zabuloni ▁na ▁Isakali ▁kalonga , ▁‘ M weye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni ▁de ng ' heleleni ▁vi mulawa ▁na ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali ▁de ng ' heleleni ▁vimu ki ngila ▁muna ▁yamahema ▁yenu .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁Chilisito ▁vi yezile ▁muna ▁isi , ▁kamulongela ▁Mulungu , ▁“ H u londile ▁ mala vi lo ▁na ▁nhosa , ▁ mbali ▁ku ning ' ha ▁lukuli ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu .
▁Ivo ▁mu bwela ▁na ▁mu mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁yam tazeni , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ham t e gele zile ni ▁bule .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁na ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai , ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wekaidi , ▁viwa lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili . ▁Kamulongela ,
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁viweli ▁wana ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi . ▁Munhu ▁mdodo ▁ng ' hani ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ni ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁Yohana .
▁Na yo ▁kezawa la g u sila ▁chiheleto ▁chikulu ▁chili ▁uchanyha ▁chi malile ▁ku ta n digwa . ▁U mo ▁m ni sasalil e .”
▁Tat i ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁wa wedika , ▁“ Ch eye ▁chi vimanya ▁ino ▁niiyo ▁mwa ne tu , ▁na ▁iviya ▁kelek wa ▁chipofu .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁Yakobo ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁kudanganika , ▁kawa temela ▁mate ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Yosefu , ▁na ▁ka mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁kuno ▁ka si ga mila ▁mhome ▁yake .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁weza ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁yamabululu ▁yeli ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yelusalemu , ▁wa wagala ▁watamu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela , ▁nawo ▁wa wahonya ▁wose .
▁Wa saho ▁zetu ▁wa mtosela ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ulugongo ▁luno , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁Wayahudi ▁m wolonga ▁chi londeka ▁ku mtosela ▁Mulungu ▁uko ▁Yelusalemu .”
▁Vondaya umanye ▁uhasanyi ▁uyatendile , ▁kolondeka ▁ya gale ▁nhambiko ▁yake ▁ya ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁dili bule ▁chilema .
▁Lelo ▁chi chi kwenhukile ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁mwene ▁unovu , ▁chi hokele ▁ubazi ▁na ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁kuchi taza ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁uzidilwa .
▁One ▁mwanamke ▁hai gubika ▁ditwi ▁jake , ▁muhavu ▁ya wegule . ▁Mbali ▁ni ▁chinyala ▁kwa ▁mwanamke ▁ya se n ye ▁hebu ▁ya wegule , ▁muhavu ▁ya gubike ▁ditwi ▁jake .
▁ Sambi ▁nohita ▁kwa ▁ija ▁yanhumile , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁hata ▁imwe ▁vimwili ▁yoni uza , ▁‘ Ko hita ▁kulihi ?’
▁“ M we zi ▁uno ▁wizakuwa ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁kumwenu .
▁ ihawa ▁kweli ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁kanoga .
▁Maabaho ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁chilume . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kahulika ▁kuwa ▁no k wi hi lwa .” ▁Ivo ▁Leya ▁kamtanga ▁zina ▁jake ▁Simeoni .
▁Nompul a ▁Mulungu ▁yo weng ' ha ▁wanhu ▁kufunya umo yo ▁na ▁kuwa guma ▁moyo ▁yam da hi ze ni ▁kwima ▁hamwe ▁chigangamavu ▁na ▁kutenda ▁fana ▁viyatendile ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁muka i lole ▁isi ▁viili . ▁Iviya ▁mu pelembe ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁umo ▁wana ▁nguvu ▁hebu ▁wanyondenyonde , ▁wadodo ▁hebu ▁wengi .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yahawa ▁ muhulika ji ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁na ▁siyo ▁msang ' hana ji , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yoyo lola ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁mwii chi lole .
▁ Siyo ▁chinhu ▁bule ! ▁Yaha wa ▁kwa ▁lungilo ▁dihile ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁lungilo ▁dinogile , ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Chilisito ▁zo gong ' ondigwa , ▁ivo ▁nod eng ' helela . ▁Ona ▁niza gendelela ▁kude ng ' helela .
▁no mulamba ni , ▁mudi di me ▁ bumbila ▁diya ▁diya mwing ' hileni ▁Mulungu , ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁kuwa ngilizigwa , ▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁vi mulonda ▁na ▁fana ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu . ▁Sekemu sang ' hane ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁hela , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁unogile .
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁viya komeleze ▁kuwahuma ▁mfalume ▁Sihoni ▁wa ▁Waamoli ▁ya kalile ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Heshiboni ▁na ▁mfalume ▁Ogu ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁ya kalile ▁kuna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁ A shi ta lo ti ▁na ▁ E dile i .
▁Maabaho ▁nilonga , ▁‘ Na ba hano , ▁kutenda ▁chiu londa , ▁weye ▁Mulungu , ▁fana ▁vi nya ndi kiligwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .’ ▁”
▁niza itowa ▁na ▁mweye ▁na ▁kumtagusa ni ▁miyanza ▁saba ▁kufosa ▁ichanduso ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Abimeleki ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ku chi tendela ▁choni ?” ▁“ I mwe ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁one ▁ya mbandame ▁muke ▁wako , ▁weye ▁uha chitendile ▁chi hasanye .”
▁ Nimulongelani ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁mgati ▁mmwangu ▁na ▁muwe ▁na ▁tindiwalo . ▁Muna ▁isi ▁ino ▁mwiza gazigwa . ▁Mwii gangamize ! ▁Niye ▁ni ihuma ▁isi ▁ino !”
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wakombola ▁Waisilaili ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Wamisili . ▁Waisilaili ▁wa wawona ▁Wamisili ▁mumgwazo ▁mwa ▁ibahali ▁wadanganika .
▁M weye ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁m tangigwa ▁muladi ▁mu ilegehe , ▁ mbali ▁ku ilegeha ▁uko ▁sekekuw e ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁cho mulonda , ▁ila ▁mui sang ' hanile ▁kwa ▁ulondo .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁ka dika ▁de b wa ni ▁diya , ▁m baka ▁mwenevale ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁viya bwelile ▁ukaye .
▁“ Chila ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁mwezi , ▁mwiza mgalila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula . ▁Ma da ng ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁maidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁saba ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁wose ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁chilema .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Chilo ka ▁ibahali ▁ya ▁Chilikiya ▁na ▁Pa m fi li ya , ▁chifika ▁M ila ▁bululu ▁da ▁L i ki ya .
▁Musa ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁chimo ▁cha ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁Musa ▁ka lamula ▁kuhita ▁kuwa lola ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁Waisilaeli .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye ▁kuitowa ▁na ▁wehi ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁na ▁kumtenda ni ▁mu hume .’
▁Ka gona ▁kaidi ▁na ▁ka lota ▁nzozi ▁zimwenga . ▁M imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁i mema ▁na ▁i kangala , ▁i kung ' hu na ▁muna ▁dibu wa ▁dimwe .
▁Na ▁chiha longa , ▁‘ Ni ▁wanhu ,’ ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza chi towa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁kwaviya ▁wose ▁wo togola ▁kuwa ▁Yohana ▁kakala ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Maabaho ▁kaya sola ▁yaja ▁yamagate ▁saba ▁na ▁waja ▁iwa so mba , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu , ▁kaya mo gola , ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake . ▁Wa nahina ▁nawo ▁wa weng ' ha ▁wanhu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁notenda ▁sang ' hano ▁zake , ▁hata ▁fana ▁hamu nihuwila , ▁basi ▁ togole ni ▁sang ' hano ▁izo , ▁muladi ▁mu manye ▁na ▁ku ta mbula ▁kuwa ▁Tata ▁ka mgati ▁mmwangu ▁na ▁niye ▁na mgati ▁mmwake .”
▁Wa lekelele ▁wanhu ▁wahite ▁muna ▁imigunda ▁na ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yeli ▁habehi ▁muladi ▁wa ka gule ▁ndiya ▁wa je .”
▁“ Mwiza sagula ▁wasemi ▁na ▁ wemiliz i ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ya makabila ▁yenu ▁yondaya mwing ' heni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁nawo ▁weza wa humiza ▁wanhu ▁voilondeka .
▁Ha mala ▁baho , ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁kamtanga ▁ija ▁im sang ' hani , ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ W eye ▁kwa ▁msang ' hani ▁yehile ! ▁Niye ▁niku leke la ▁de ni ▁diya ▁jose ▁kwaviya ▁kuni lamba ▁niku lekele .
▁W ela ▁na ▁wa temiligw a ▁mate ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wonda ▁wawe ▁muna ▁uzilibuko ▁wa ▁mwanduso . ▁I fa ▁yekaidi ▁ya bule ▁ludabwa ▁kumwawo , ▁ mbali ▁weza kuwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi , ▁weza languliza ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁fana ▁wafalume ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁alufu ▁imwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi fisigwe ▁chiza woneka , ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi gubikigwe ▁chiza gubuligwa .
▁Baho ▁mtumigwa ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁ka mulawilila ▁na ▁kumwing ' ha ▁ludabwa .
▁Sa ndu ku ▁vidi hitile , ▁Musa ▁kalonga , ▁“ Inuka ▁weye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ! ▁W e hi ▁wako ▁wa p wi lili ke ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo k wi hila ▁wa kimbile ▁na ▁ku hu migwa .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁ikaye ▁iyo ▁waha muhokela ni , ▁tindiwalo ▁jenu ▁diza kala ▁na ▁wawo , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁hawa muhokele ni , ▁tindiwalo ▁jenu ▁diza sigala ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁no tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Tata ,
▁“ ▁‘ N hosa ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yonda u mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yo londeka ▁sekei gumigw e ▁lusu , ▁kwaviya ▁hai londeka ▁ku guma ▁lusu ▁hebu ▁u ki ▁muna ▁in hosa ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kulaw a ▁lusita ▁ulo , ▁Yesu ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁usenga ▁wake , ▁“ Leke ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Ku u langa ▁wa ▁habehi .”
▁ Mbwanga ▁imdodo ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁‘ Tata , ▁ning ' he ▁vinhu ▁vangu ▁va ▁uhazi ▁sambi .’ ▁Ivo ▁tata ▁ija ▁kawa golela ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁sawa ▁sawa ▁wabwanga ▁waja ▁waidi .
▁Nhambiko ▁ino ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁iza lavigwa ▁chila ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁kufosa ▁nhosa ▁ija ▁ya ▁chila ▁siku ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Keza vabik a ▁chi dole ▁chake ▁muna ▁idamu ▁iyo ▁na ▁kui miza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁miyanza ▁saba , ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁panzia ▁da ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Ni nawo ▁ubatiz o ▁woni l ondigwa ▁ni uhokele , ▁na ▁niye ▁no gaya ▁m baka ▁u ma le !
▁Ku i nzi ngo ▁ya ▁panzia ▁dekaidi , ▁kukala ▁na ▁di zewe ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁di tangigwe , ▁Ha nhu ▁He lile ▁Ng ' hani
▁Teng ' hu ▁kalonga , ▁“ H u londile ▁wala ▁hu nogeligw e ▁na ▁nhosa ▁za ▁wanyama ▁na ▁ mala vi lo ▁hana ▁ichilingo ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhosa ▁m baka ▁maivu .” ▁Kalonga ▁vino ▁inga wa ▁vino ▁vose ▁vi tendeka ▁fana ▁viyeli ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weza mulole la ▁yeye .”
▁I la ▁m olondeka ▁kulonga ▁vino , ▁“ One ▁Mndewa ▁yahalonda , ▁chiza kala ▁na ▁kutenda ▁vino ▁hebu ▁viya .”
▁Vino ▁kuna ▁mulotezi ▁yoyose ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ija ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁hawa m ga zile ▁bule ? ▁Wa wakoma ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁waja ▁umwaka ▁wowa longile ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kwiza ▁kwake ▁mtumigwa ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁Na ▁sambi ▁mweye ▁mu m biduka ▁na ▁mu mkoma .
▁Wa gale ▁mwiisafina ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁vi umbe ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁vidi , ▁va ▁chilume ▁na ▁va ▁chike , ▁na ▁u vi lole se ▁vi kale .
▁Wa sang ' hana ▁fana ▁wasemi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁lusita ▁lose . ▁Mbuli ▁ziza mile ▁wa mgalila ▁Musa , ▁ mbali ▁mbuli ▁ndodo n dodo ▁wazi komeleza ▁wawo ▁wenyewo .
▁“ Hata ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁yeli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mami ▁yako , ▁hebu ▁mwanago ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁mwanago ▁wa ▁chike , ▁hebu ▁muke ▁wako ▁you mulonda , ▁hebu ▁mbwiya ko ▁wa ▁habehi , ▁wodaha ▁kuku son geza ▁kwa ▁chinyele ▁u tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga , ▁milungu ▁ija ▁weye ▁hebu ▁wa saho ▁zako ▁hamu i tambikile ,
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu muhitila ▁na ▁wa mgalila ▁vi lema , ▁mbetembete ▁na ▁vipofu ▁na ▁ma bu bu ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁wengi ▁wa weka ▁hana ▁imigulu ▁ya ▁Yesu , ▁nayo ▁kawahonya .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vinoga ▁cheye ▁kukala ▁hano ! ▁One ▁uha londa , ▁niza zenga ▁vi zewe ▁vitatu ▁hano , ▁chimwe ▁chako ▁weye ▁na ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁Musa ▁na ▁chimwe ▁cha ▁Eliya .”
▁Maabaho ▁ lumbu ▁wa ▁imwana ▁kamuuza ▁mndele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁“ Ni hite ▁ni ka m tange ▁muke ▁wa ▁ku mo ng ' heza ▁imwana ▁mwa ▁wanaake ▁wa ▁Chiebulaniya ?”
▁Mu lu ma ke ▁keza kuwa ▁ka bule ▁ubananzi ▁wowose , ▁ mbali ▁mwanamke ▁kezatagusigwa ▁kwa ▁ubananzi ▁wake .’ ▁”
▁Ka mwidika , ▁‘ Vi p i mo ▁gana ▁va ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁zaituni .’ ▁Mu lole zi ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁‘ Sol a ▁ch e ti ▁chako , ▁ kala ▁hasi ▁hima , ▁ya ndik a ▁ningo ▁m alongo ▁matano .’
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yonda ni mwing ' heni ▁na ▁kugobola ▁vinhu ▁vi ha ndigwe ▁umo , ▁mwiza mgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁m ga nda ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kugobola .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Mwihi ▁keza gubul iligwa , ▁ mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁yaheza ▁keza mkoma ▁kwa ▁m hu mu zi ▁ya ▁mulomo ▁wake ▁na ▁kum nanga ▁kwa ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁da ▁ wi zi lo ▁wake .
▁Sauli ▁kakala ▁hamwe ▁nawo ▁na ▁wahita ▁wose ▁Yelusalemu ▁yose , ▁ka peta ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁ bila ▁kudumba .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Se mi yo ni , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Lawi , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu , ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali , ▁wanhu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁alufu ,
▁M abululu ▁yawo ▁yose ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo ▁na ▁malago ▁yawo ▁yose ▁vi somigwa ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ One ▁u vimanyile ▁chinhu ▁cho yo lava ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁one ▁iviya ▁u vimanyile ▁yelihi ▁yo ku pula ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa , ▁uha m pulile ▁yeye , ▁nayo ▁yaha kwing ' hile ▁mazi ▁ya ▁Ugima .”
▁Na yo ▁keza mulola ▁na ▁one ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁chi galuka ▁kaidi ▁kuwa ▁chi ze lu , ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁kela . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kela .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁mweye ▁ mwili ▁Loma , ▁yomu tangigwe ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁va wahulike ▁yayo , ▁wa ndusa ▁ku londa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumkoma ▁Yesu . ▁Mbali ▁wakala ▁wa mdumba ▁kwaviya ▁lung ' husesa ▁lose ▁lu ka nga nyi ka ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁yake .
▁Wa ja ▁wanahina ▁waidi ▁viwa muhulike ▁Yohana ▁kolonga ▁ivo , ▁wa muwinza ▁Yesu .
▁na ▁mfalume ▁kamuuza ▁Yakobo , ▁“ L ika ▁jako ▁ni ▁miyaka ▁mi ngahi ?”
▁“ Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako ▁yoni ku lavile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁ko u kalile ▁mtumwa .
▁chilaho ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chiza lamula ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁iyo ▁yeng ' higwe ▁ka mwabule ▁muu bavi ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁va ▁miyage . ▁Mwene ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁keza togola ▁chilaho ▁icho , ▁na ▁iyo ▁miyage ▁heza liha ▁chochose .
▁Baho ▁ni tumbal a ▁mavindi ▁hana ▁ yamagulu ▁yake ▁ni londa ▁kumtambikila , ▁ mbali ▁yeye ▁kanilongela , ▁“ Leka ▁sekeu tende ▁ivo ! ▁Niye ▁ni ▁msang ' hani ▁fana ▁weye ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zako , ▁cheye ▁wose ▁cho mulavila ▁usindila ▁Yesu . ▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wo mulavila ▁usindila ▁Yesu ▁wolanguliz igwa ▁na ▁muhe ▁wouwa languliza ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ilumba ▁na ▁kuwa lema ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila . ▁Maabaho ▁wakulu ▁wawa ha mbula ▁ivi wa lo ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila , ▁na ▁wa lagiliza ▁wala n higwe ▁mibalati .
▁Wa segela ▁ O b o si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁I ye ▁Abalimu , ▁muna ▁ imhaka ▁ya ▁Moabu .
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁nawo ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁masimwe .
▁wa i to a ▁na ▁mfalume ▁Ke do lila o ma ▁wa ▁ E la mu ▁na ▁T i dali ▁wa ▁Go i mu ▁na ▁Am ila fe li ▁wa ▁S hi na li ▁na ▁Ali yo ki ▁wa ▁ E la sa li , ▁wafalume ▁wane ▁wa itowa ▁na ▁wafalume ▁watano .
▁Wa segela ▁L i sa ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Ke hela sa .
▁“ Mfundiza , ▁Musa ▁ka c ha ndi kila . ▁‘ Munhu ▁yaha da nga ni ki ligwa ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁mwene ▁muke , ▁ mbali ▁ndugu ▁yoya danganike ▁ka bule ▁mwana , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya msole ▁mgane ▁iyo ▁muladi ▁ya n patile ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wana .’
▁na ▁uha wa sagula ▁wa ndele ▁wawo ▁wawe ▁wake ▁wa ▁wanago , ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁wawo ▁wo tambikila ▁milungu ▁yawo , ▁weza wa son geza ▁wabwanga ▁zenu ▁wa sondelele ▁milungu ▁yawo ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wowo tenda ▁ugoni .
▁kwa ▁kugona ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁ bila ▁mulumake ▁kuvimanya , ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁hata ▁one ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya wonile ▁chiyatendile ▁kwaviya ▁ha gwiligwe ▁ugoni .
▁Maabaho ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Nuhu ▁na ▁wanage ,
▁Mbali ▁Sauli ▁ka gendelela ▁kupata ▁ludabwa ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁lugano ▁Wayahudi ▁wowo kala ▁Damasiki ▁kwa ▁ku lagusa ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁Chilisito .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kachi la g u sila ▁ulondo ▁wake , ▁vichi kalile ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chetu !
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I vi no ▁sambi ▁no londa ▁u togole . ▁Kwa viya ▁ni ivo ▁viilondeka ▁kuya fikiza ▁yaja ▁yose ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu .” ▁Maabaho ▁Yohana ▁katogola .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalagiliza ▁Waisilaili ▁wa sole ▁chi dali ▁chochi n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁na ▁chi ma ▁chochi lavigwe ▁cha ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁za ▁tindiwalo , ▁wa mwing ' he ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake ▁iwe ▁hanhu ▁hawo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Keza kwika ▁mkono ▁wake ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁da ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁iyo ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁ku mchinja ▁hanhu ▁howo chinjil a ▁wanyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .
▁yondaya wa longole le ▁na ▁kuwa longoza ▁muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zawo ▁zose , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁sekewawe ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁weli bule ▁m dimi .”
▁Ivo ▁m imada ▁mi sisili ▁iya ja ▁ija ▁im imada ▁saba ▁yoi ne ne he . ▁Mfalume ▁kalamuka ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁ko lota .
▁Chila ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁siku ▁na ne ▁vimu li ▁kolondeka ▁yeng izigwe ▁ulungwana ▁na ▁chila ▁mulume ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wenu , ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁ yelekigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁yoya guligwe ▁kwa ▁hela ▁zenu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁manyambenyambe
▁Weza wa sang ' hanila ▁Haluni ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁hanhu ▁helile .
▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁viwa kalile ▁wolawa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁kum p u lila ▁Mulungu , ▁wanhu ▁wa walamba ▁weze ▁kulonga ▁kaidi ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁imwenga
▁Wanangu , ▁m uiteganye ▁na ▁milungu ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁mbuli ▁ini walongele ▁vini kalile ▁ning ' hali ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye . ▁I londeka ▁vi tendeke ▁vose ▁vo v a ndikigwe ▁kuson hela ▁niye ▁muna ▁yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa ▁na ▁muna i vi tabu ▁va ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁Za bu li .”
▁Pet a ▁ya ▁walume ▁wowa ndikigwe ▁kwandusi la ▁wana ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wakala ▁ 6 , 2 00.
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁kodaha ▁ku manya ▁vinhu ▁vose , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo daha ▁ku mu lamulil a ▁nhaguso .
▁“ W i i l umbe ▁na ▁m sita ki ▁wako ▁cha ▁himahima , ▁mung ' hali ▁muna ▁inzila ▁kuhita ▁kuchi ta la . ▁Bule ▁ivo ▁m sita ka ▁wako ▁kezaku gala ▁kwa ▁msemi ▁na ▁msemi ▁keza ▁ku gala ▁kwa ▁mkalizi , ▁m aabaho ▁na ▁weye ▁kwiza fungigwa ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁Nuhu ▁ka weleka ▁wana ▁watatu ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁wowa tangigwe ▁Shemu ▁na ▁Hamu ▁na ▁Yafesi .
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Mbuli ▁i yalongile ▁Yosefu ▁i mnogeza ▁mfalume ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wake .
▁Seke mwa za ny we ▁na ▁chino , ▁lusita ▁lo kwiza ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁weza hulika ▁dizi ▁jake .
▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ulondo , ▁no londa ▁kuku lamba , ▁niye ▁Paulo ▁ni li ▁mulala ▁na ▁sambi ▁ni ▁m fungwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu .
▁“ ▁‘ Sekemu tende ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁milungu ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁hebu ▁sekemwi mize ▁nyang ' hiti ▁za ▁ku songola , ▁hebu ▁mhanda , ▁hebu ▁nyang ' hiti ▁ya ▁dibwe ▁jojose ▁di songoligwe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu ▁muladi ▁mudi tambikile . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁“ M abululu ▁ya ▁ A ta lo si ▁na ▁ Dib oni ▁na ▁Ya ze li ▁na ▁Ni mu la ▁na ▁Heshiboni ▁na ▁ E le a le ▁na ▁Se ba mu ▁na ▁N e b o ▁na ▁Be oni ,
▁Wa nhu ▁vondawa longe , ▁“ Kuna ▁tindiwalo ▁na ▁u goya ” ▁lusita ▁ulo ▁ubananzi ▁wiza wa pata ▁kwa ▁kusi nhu ki za ▁fana ▁viya ▁mawine ▁ya ▁ku ibasula ▁mwana ▁viyo m pata ▁muke ▁yeli ▁na ▁wimo , ▁wanhu ▁haweza daha ▁ku ho nyo kwa .
▁ Mbwanga ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁kayawala ▁ng o lole ▁kakala ▁yo msondelela ▁Yesu . ▁Viwa londile ▁kumgwila ,
▁Chilo ▁chikulu ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wakoma ▁wana ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁kwandusi la ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁yoya kalile ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁m baka ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁m fungwa ▁na ▁wa u de le ▁wose ▁wa ▁wanyama .
▁Mbali ▁Chilisito ▁kweli ▁kazilibuka , ▁wam wanduso ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wa gonile ▁muna ▁i i fa .
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁ mwing ' higwa ▁ku zimanya ▁mbuli ▁zi fisigwe ▁za ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbali ▁waja ▁weli ▁kunze ▁wo zi hulika ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁kwa ▁masimwe ,
▁Wa lave ni ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wose , ▁wawe ▁walume ▁hebu ▁wanaake , ▁muladi ▁sekewa di tende ▁lago ▁jangu ▁do ni kala ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁jambul e ▁mwiko .”
▁Ivo ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁chila ▁munhu ▁na ya kale ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁viyakalile ▁lusita ▁viya tangigwe .
▁Imwe ▁wa ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kagolosa ▁mkono ▁wake , ▁ka so mo la ▁zele ▁jake , ▁ka mkanha ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁di gutwi ▁da ▁kulume .
▁Yesu ▁viyamuwone ▁kuwa ▁kana ▁chi holo zi , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Ni ▁vi dala ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu !
▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Wayahudi ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁vidi kalile ▁habehi , ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Ka nza nza ▁panzia ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁keka ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁hema ▁uchanyha ▁yake , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Sala ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka nigalila ▁de ng ' ho ▁na ▁se ko . ▁Chila ▁yondaya hulike ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁keza se ka ▁na ▁niye .”
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Muna yo ▁magate ▁m e ngahi ? ▁ Hiteni ▁m ka lole .” ▁Viwa vimanyile , ▁wamulongela . ▁“ Kuna ▁magate ▁matano ▁na ▁somba ▁waidi .”
▁Ivo ▁m tegelezeni ▁Mulungu . ▁Mu we ▁na ▁udugi ▁na ▁Mwihi , ▁nayo ▁kezam kimbila ni .
▁Chi ya ho ka ▁na ▁kuya bananga ▁mabululu ▁yake ▁yose , ▁chi wakoma ▁walume ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana , ▁hachi mu le kile ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yawe ▁mgima .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba .
▁Iviya ▁uhuwilo ▁wiidumwe ▁ bila ▁ya ▁sang ' hano ▁u fa ▁u mala .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁hambule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ku gonile ▁na ▁mulume ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kela , ▁basi ▁ka ilegeha ▁na ▁keza daha ▁kupata ▁wana .
▁Uko ▁mkulu ▁ija ▁kai fika ▁ngalawa ▁ya ▁ A le ki sa ndi lila ▁i kalile ▁yo hita ▁I tali ya , ▁ivo ▁kachi kwe za ▁umo .
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁Wa ke ni ▁mwiza danganizigwa , ▁m baka ▁Ashulu ▁vondaya wa sole ▁mate ka .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wowa kalile ▁haja ▁wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁ni ▁munhu ▁wa ki ▁yoyo daha ▁kulekelela ▁wanhu ▁uhasanyi ?”
▁Yesu ▁kabwela ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁dilamba . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu m me me la ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁mwa ▁dilamba .
▁Ch eye ▁china ▁ulondo , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kachi londa ▁cheye ▁ teng ' hu .
▁Ndugu ▁cho mulagilizani ▁muna ▁dizi na ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁m uiteganye ▁na ▁ndugu ▁wowo kala ▁chiu b wa , ▁na ▁si wo ▁kusondelela ▁mafundizo ▁yochi weng ' hile .
▁Niye ▁Paulo ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito . ▁Ni sa guligwa ▁na ▁ni tumigwa ▁kuwataza ▁wanhu ▁wowasaguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁uhuwilo ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁kuwafundiza ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ,
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁mabwe ▁maidi ▁ya ▁ sa li doniki ▁na ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁kwiza cho la ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Bulahimu ▁kalonga ▁kuwa ▁Sala ▁kakala ▁ lumbu ▁jake . ▁Ivo ▁mfalume ▁Abimeleki ▁wa ▁Gelali ▁kamsola ▁Sala .
▁“ Ni na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁sidaha ▁kutenda ▁ usang ' hano . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ H wiza loka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .’
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁ka ilumba ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁kolondeka ▁kukala ▁fana ▁viyakalile ▁Yesu .
▁“ Ino ▁izakuwa ▁haki ▁ya ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wo lava ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kolondeka ▁yeng ' higwe ▁mkono ▁na ▁ma ka nza ▁na ▁utumbo .
▁Mana ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Malagilizo ▁niye ▁ni danganika , ▁Malagilizo ▁yenyewo ▁ya ni koma ▁muladi ▁ni kale ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mulungu . ▁Niye ▁ni danganika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁muna ▁umsalaba .
▁Maabaho ▁vini kalile ▁no lola ▁nihulika ▁m hu ng u ▁ko gulu ka ▁hagati ▁kuulanga ▁kolonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ W e za gaya ! ▁Weza gaya ! ▁Weza gaya ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wokala ▁muna ▁isi , ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁watatu ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana towa ▁mhalati ▁zawo .”
▁Wala ▁sekewawe ▁na ▁uhazi ▁mwa ▁ndugu ▁zawo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niiyo ▁uhazi ▁wawo ▁fana ▁viya walongele .
▁Wo se ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁wengi lwa ▁na ▁m ka nga gile , ▁wa iuzagiza , ▁“ Vino ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?”
▁Vino ▁vose ▁vihile ▁vo lawa ▁mgati ▁muumoyo ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁navo ▁ni ivo ▁mwa mbula ▁mwiko ▁munhu .”
▁Ha mala ▁baho ▁Lubeni ▁kawa bwelela ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mbwanga ▁ka habule ▁hano ! ▁Cho ni ▁chonda ni tende ?”
▁Yesu ▁vi yengile ▁mnyumba , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza ▁viyakalile ▁yaidumwe , ▁“ Habali ▁cheye ▁hachi dahile ▁bule ▁ku mulava ▁chinyamkela ?”

▁Yano ▁yayo ▁yoyalongile ▁muna ▁zi senga ▁zake ▁zose ▁lusita ▁viya ndi kile . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga ▁ndala ▁ku zimanya ▁muna ▁zi senga ▁zake , ▁wanhu ▁wabozi ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo t e yate ya ▁na ▁wo zi fambula ▁kwa ▁uvwizi ▁fana ▁viwa ya longa ▁kwa ▁uvwizi ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile . ▁Ivo ▁wa i galila ▁kunangigwa .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini , ▁kakala ▁Pa li ti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁L a fu .
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kamtanga ▁Musa ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁muka mtosele ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanenu . ▁Mbali ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wenu ▁na ▁luti ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁ wolondeka ▁wa sigale ▁hano .”
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁vi goda ▁va ▁chifalume ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa kalile ▁m chanyha ▁yake ▁weng ' higwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku lamula ▁nhaguso . ▁Iviya ▁ni wona ▁ mihe ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wowa kanhigwe ▁matwi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁usindila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wano ▁hawa di tambikile ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁wala ▁nyang ' hiti ▁yake , ▁wala ▁ha we kigwe ▁chilaguso ▁chake ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁vawo ▁hebu ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo . ▁Wa pata ▁ugima ▁kaidi ▁na ▁watawala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁fana ▁wafalume ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁alufu ▁imwe .
▁M welekwa ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁na ▁chilema ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni , ▁sekeya kwenhuke ▁kuni lavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Kwa viya ▁kana ▁chilema , ▁sekeya kwenhuke ▁kulava ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wake .
▁Chi fosa ▁mhwani ▁kwa ▁manhesa ▁makulu , ▁m aabaho ▁chifika ▁hanhu ▁ha tangigwe ▁ B a nda li ▁Inogile , ▁habehi ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁L e se ya .
▁Kwiza iwona ▁isi ▁ili ▁kuulongozi ▁wako , ▁ mbali ▁hwiza kwingila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁yoni weng ' ha ▁Waisilaili .”
▁P anzia ▁da ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁luwa ▁di tendigw a ▁kwa ▁lu zi ▁lwa ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe ▁na ▁ku ha mbigwa ▁vinogile , ▁najo ▁di kala ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁kenda ▁na ▁chimo ▁mita ▁mbili . ▁Di linga ▁fana ▁mapanzia ▁ya ▁uluwa .
▁“ Di no ▁ni ▁lagilizo ▁do ya lagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Walongele ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa wagalile ni ▁ng ' ombe ▁muke ▁m dung ' hu ▁yeli bule ▁chilema ▁chochose ▁na ▁yang ' hali ▁ku fungigwa ▁ni la
▁Maabaho ▁wabwela ▁kuna ▁isi ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁imwenga , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kawa zuma ▁muna ▁zinzozi ▁sekewa bwele ▁kwa ▁Helode .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Zilipa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁Leya ▁wakala ▁Gadi ▁na ▁Asheli . ▁Wana ▁wano ▁ni iwawo ▁woya weleke ▁Yakobo ▁uko ▁Padani ▁Alamu .
▁No kwandikila ▁usenga ▁uno , ▁no lolela ▁kwiza ▁kumwako ▁vino ▁sambi .
▁T u ki ko ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁nyachende ▁na ▁msang ' hani ▁mwaminika ▁muna ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁zose ▁muvimanye ▁choni sang ' hana .
▁Lelo ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zi mwa ndike ▁kuwa . ▁“ Vinoga ▁m sa ka ▁sekeya sole ” .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chino ▁nod eng ' helela ▁unyondenyonde , ▁maligo , ▁magayo ▁na ▁manhesa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vi dala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Chilisito . ▁Kwa viya ▁lusita ▁voni wa ▁nyondenyonde , ▁ulo ▁lusita ▁lo ni wa ▁na ▁ludabwa .
▁Niza ki w ng ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vingi , ▁na ▁chochose ▁chonda u ni pule ▁nizaku tendela . ▁ Izo ▁ uwaduwile ▁wanhu ▁wano .’ ▁”
▁Uko ▁ni uko ▁kuwa wa ndigwe ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁Sala , ▁iviya ▁uko ▁ni uko ▁kuwa wa ndigwe ▁Isaka ▁na ▁muke ▁wake ▁Lebeka , ▁iviya ▁uko ▁ni uko ▁ni mu wa ndi le ▁Leya .
▁Munhu ▁yoyo msang ' hanila ▁vino ▁Chilisito , ▁ko nde ng ' hele za ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ko to goliligw a ▁na ▁wanhu .
▁Ivo ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁siyo ▁wageni ▁hebu ▁wa fosa ▁nzila , ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wakaya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁welile , ▁na ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁I mitondo ▁yake ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁Loma ▁wawatum a ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wawa kalizi ▁kwa ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Wa lekeni ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wahite .”
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁wapetigwe ▁wakala ▁ 6 0 3 , 5 5 0 .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kagolosa ▁mhome ▁yake ▁kuulanga , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁na ▁m bumo , ▁lumwe mwe ▁lumwe ka ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Mbali ▁mgane ▁ija ▁hadaha ▁kuu gomesa ▁moyo ▁wake ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁va ▁madambwa , ▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁kadanganika ▁kamala , ▁hata ▁one ▁ko woneka ▁mgima .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ L usita ▁hebu ▁ msimu ▁vi kigwa ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁mweye ▁siyo ▁sang ' hano ▁yenu ▁kuvimanya ▁izakuwa ▁zuwaki .
▁Mbali ▁ija ▁m bananzi ▁imwenga ▁ka mbwakila ▁miyage , ▁kalonga , ▁“ W eye ▁hu mdumba ▁hata ▁Mulungu ▁bule ? ▁W eye ▁na we ▁kwa ▁muna ▁in ha g u so ▁iyo ▁iyo .
▁M weye ▁mwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁Mwihi , ▁kwa ▁ivo ▁mwo londa ▁kutenda ▁wihi ▁fana ▁ tati ▁yenu . ▁ Kuson gela ▁mwanduso ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁mkomaji , ▁wala ▁ha ilumba ▁na ▁kweli , ▁kwaviya ▁ mwabule ▁kweli ▁mgati ▁mmwake . ▁Vi yo v wiza ▁ko i lagusa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁m vwizi ▁na ▁ni ▁tata ▁wa ▁uvwizi .
▁“ I si ▁ya ▁Zabuloni ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁Nafutali , ▁inzila ▁ya ▁ku hiti la ▁kuna ▁ibahali , ▁kuna ▁umwambu ▁wa ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani , ▁Galilaya , ▁isi ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi !
▁Lung ilo ▁da ▁lagilizo ▁dino ▁ni ▁kuwa ▁Waisilaili ▁ wolondeka ▁wa mgalile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁zawo ▁za ▁wanyama ▁ziya ▁umwaka ▁wakala ▁wa zowel a ▁kuzi chinjil a ▁kuna ▁imigunda . ▁Weza wagala ▁wanyama ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁weza wa chinja ▁na ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo .
▁“ Chi na ▁tata ▁sekewa komigwe ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wana ▁wawo , ▁hebu ▁wana ▁sekewa komigwe ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁ tati ▁zawo , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo .
▁Ino ▁ni ▁ndiya ▁yoi humuluk e ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁siyo ▁fana ▁i mana ▁iwa dile ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁m aabaho ▁wadanganika . ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoja ▁ndiya ▁ino ▁kana ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Ivo ▁kuson hela ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁i ta mbi kiligwe ▁nyang ' hiti , ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁nyang ' hiti ▁si ▁chinhu ▁bule ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁na ▁cho manya ▁kuwa ▁kuna ▁Mulungu ▁imwe ▁muhala .
▁Maabaho ▁Bulahimu ▁kawalongela ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake , ▁“ Ka leni ▁hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ichi hongwe , ▁niye ▁na ▁ino ▁i mbwanga ▁cho hita ▁kuja ▁m chanyha ▁kutosa ▁m aabaho ▁chiza wa bwelela ▁mweye .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalongela ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Maabaho ▁ hite ni ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kutambikila ▁hoya ha sagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁na ▁muhawa ▁haulongozi ▁hake ▁mwiza kuja ▁zaka ▁ya ▁mhule ▁zenu ▁ya ▁divai ▁yenu ▁na ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ya ▁wa u de le ▁wa ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wenu . ▁Tend eni ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁mui funze ▁kumdumba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ Mbali ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ▁yaha kulongela , ▁‘ Si londa ▁kusegela ▁kumwako ,’ ▁kwaviya ▁ko ku londa ▁weye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako ▁na ▁ko nogelw a ▁kukala ▁na ▁weye ,
▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁munhu , ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo . ▁Kawa lumba ▁mulume ▁na ▁muke .
▁Niza wagalile ni ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁kuwa pwililisa ni ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zimwenga . ▁Isi ▁yenu ▁izakuwa ▁mahame ▁na ▁mabululu ▁yenu ▁yeza banangika .
▁Mbali ▁Yuda ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁ija ▁kachi zuma ▁kwa ▁uka li ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Siza wa hokela ▁bule ▁fana ▁ha mwi zile ▁nayo ▁ndugu ▁yenu .’
▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kezadanganika ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁viyalondile , ▁ mbali ▁keza gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoyo mu hinduka !”
▁Viwa bwelile ▁wachi galila ▁matunda ▁yamwenga ▁ya ▁isi ▁ija ▁na ▁walonga ▁kuwa ▁isi ▁iyo ching ' ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu , ▁ino ga ▁ng ' hani .
▁Ivo ▁wakalizi ▁wahita , ▁wa bena ▁magulu ▁ya ▁munhu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁yoya wa mbigwe ▁mumsalaba ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁wa bena ▁magulu ▁ya ▁ija ▁munhu ▁imwenga .
▁Munhu ▁ino ▁kakala ▁na ▁wa li ▁wane ▁hawana soligwa ▁wowa kalile ▁wo gong ' onda ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁Mwihi ▁yoya kalile ▁ko wavwizila ▁ka sigwa ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁dodi memile ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁ ba lu ti ▁yoyo kwaka ▁moto , ▁mudi li ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁ija . ▁Wawo ▁weza gazigwa ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁na ▁mwanahina ▁imwenga ▁wa muwinza ▁Yesu . ▁Kwa viya ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁imwenga ▁ka manyika ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo , ▁kahita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu ▁muna ▁u luhelengo ▁lwa ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁na ▁dikulu ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁kum tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁haulongozi ▁wake ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Mndewa ▁waha londa ▁kodaha ▁kuni safya .”
▁Isi ▁i gubuka ▁na ▁ku wamela . ▁Wa danganika ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Kola ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jake ▁lusita ▁moto ▁viu wa danganize ▁wanhu ▁ 2 5 0 , ▁di kala ▁lamulo ▁kwa ▁wanhu .
▁Wa fundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁kulonga ▁goya !”
▁Ha mwe ▁nayo ▁chi mtuma ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁yoya togoligwe ▁na ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wowa muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁So p a ti lo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Pi lo ▁kulawa ▁Beleya , ▁wahita ▁nayo , ▁ivo ▁Ali sitali ko ▁na ▁Se ku ndo ▁kulawa ▁Sesalonike , ▁m aabaho ▁Gayo ▁kulawa ▁D eli b e , ▁T u ki ko ▁na ▁Tilo fi mo ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya .
▁Kwa ▁u hi ka ▁wawo ▁wihile ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁mvunyo , ▁wafundiza ▁wano ▁wa ▁uvwizi ▁weza i patila ▁faida ▁kulawa ▁kumwenu ▁kufose la ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi . ▁Mulungu ▁ka lamula ▁kwandusi la ▁umwaka ▁kuwa ▁keza watagusa ▁na ▁wala ▁hana gona ▁na ▁kweli ▁keza wananga .
▁Kwiza sola ▁nyama ▁ya ▁be belu ▁ijo ▁da ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁na ▁kui ki mu sa ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁hamwenga ▁helile .
▁“ M weye ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁wa de ng ' heleleni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mulungu ▁ko watagusa ▁wose ▁wo wakoma ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Ko wa lihiliz ila ▁wehi ▁wake ▁na ▁ko lekelela ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wake .”
▁M weye ▁walangulizi ▁vipofu ! ▁Mo ge mu la ▁ng ' honzi ▁muna ▁yamazi , ▁ mbali ▁mo me la ▁mnyama ▁yo tangigwa ▁ngamiya !
▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza kwing ' higwa ▁Walawi , ▁wawo ▁wa lavigwa ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili ▁muladi ▁wawa sang ' hanile .
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kude ng ' helela ▁ugima ▁na ▁kuwona ▁siku ▁zinogile , ▁ya yepule ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁na ▁ya leke ▁kulonga ▁uvwizi .
▁kawalongela , ▁“ Na ni ye ▁ning ' heni ▁udahi ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yonda ni mwikile ▁makono ▁yangu ▁ya hokele ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .”
▁Ma ge zo ▁yaja ▁lungilo ▁jake ▁ni ▁ku lagusa ▁ukweli ▁wa ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu . ▁Na ▁hata ▁zahabu ▁yenyewo ▁inga wa ▁yo daha ▁ku banangigwa ▁na ▁ku gezigwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁iviya ▁ni ivo ▁yili ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu , ▁niuwo ▁u faya ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁zahabu , ▁yo londeka ▁i ge z we ▁i dahe ▁ku to ga . ▁Na ▁baho ▁mwiza hokela ▁nhogolwa ▁na ▁ukulu ▁na ▁hishima ▁muna ▁dizuwa ▁diya ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁vondaya gubul igwe .
▁Sala ▁kawa wona ▁na ▁kamulongela ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ M segeze ▁mtumwa ▁ino ▁na ▁mwanage . ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁mtumwa ▁hadaha ▁ku hazi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mwanangu ▁Isaka .”
▁Kulaw a ▁Mulungu ▁viya umbile ▁isi , ▁ukulu ▁wake ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁ ulungu ▁wake ▁vi woneka ▁funhufunhu , ▁hata ▁one ▁havi woneka ▁kwa ▁meso ▁vi manyika ▁funhufunhu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wodaha ▁kuyamanya ▁kwa ▁vinhu ▁vi yalumbile . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁hawa daha ▁kui gombela ▁wenyewo .
▁Sekeu msole ▁mwa li ▁wa ▁muke ▁wako ▁kuno ▁muke ▁wako ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima . ▁Iyo ▁iza watenda ▁wa g ombe .
▁Musa ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Kawa duganya ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Nuhu , ▁“ I ngila ▁mwiisafina ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁wose , ▁kwaviya ▁ni kuwona ▁weye ▁muhala ▁kuno ga ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁mwa ▁iwanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose .
▁“ Munhu ▁yaha mvwizila ▁mhambe ▁yeli ▁hana u zigwa ▁na ▁ka mbandama , ▁kolondeka ▁yam fu ngile ▁ zengele ▁na ▁kumsola ▁yawe ▁muke ▁wake .
▁Ndugu ▁zangu , ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁uwe ▁na ▁ mihe ▁yenu . ▁Ivo .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mndele ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yahawa ▁mgane ▁hebu ▁keng ' higwa ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁na ▁ka bule ▁mwana , ▁nayo ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁kukala ▁nayo ▁fana ▁viyakalile ▁mbwanga , ▁kodaha ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁muhala ▁ni iwawo ▁ wolondeka ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁iyo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Walongele ni ▁wanhu ▁wakale ▁hasi .” ▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁hakala ▁na ▁ savu ▁di mema . ▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wakala ▁hasi . ▁ Walume ▁muhala ▁wowa kalile ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa ▁luja ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁i kala ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁matano .
▁Lelo ▁ hite ni ▁m ka sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano , ▁mana ▁hamwiza kwing ' higwa ▁mayani ‚ ▁na ▁m olondeka ▁kutenda ▁matafali ▁ peta ▁ija ▁ija .”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kamsola ▁mbwanga ▁ija , ▁ kangala ▁kwa ▁imkulu , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Paulo ▁kani tanga ▁na ▁kani lamba ▁ni ngale ▁mbwanga ▁ino ▁kumwako , ▁kwaviya ▁kana ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁ku kulongela .”
▁Musa ▁ka mtegeleza ▁m koi ▁wake ▁na ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁viyamulongele .
▁Wo wa t wika ▁wanhu ▁mbahasha ▁ziza mile ▁na ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁hawa londa ▁bule ▁ku golosa ▁hata ▁kwa ▁chi dole ▁wa dahe ▁kupapa .
▁U londo ▁wabule ▁uhelelo . ▁U senga ▁wenyewo ▁wo lotela ▁wiza leka , ▁na ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya ▁wiza leka ▁ku longigwa . ▁V ose ▁vochi vimanya ▁viza banangigwa .

▁M sang ' hani ▁iyo ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁ka lava ▁viwalo ▁na ▁vi a ▁va ▁hela ▁na ▁mahambo ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kam golela ▁Lebeka . ▁Iviya ▁kam golela ▁ndole ndo le ▁za ▁hela ▁ng ' hulu ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁Lebeka .

▁Ivo ▁si longa ▁kuwa ▁sekemu ihangany e ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wanhu ▁hawa muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁weli ▁wazinzi ▁hebu ▁wene ▁ku ta ma ni , ▁hebu ▁wa h okaji , ▁hebu ▁wene ▁kutambikila ▁nyang ' hiti . ▁Kwa viya ▁m olondeka ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁isi ▁muladi ▁mu yepule ▁nawo .
▁“ K e za ko ga ▁lukuli ▁lose ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁m aabaho ▁keza v a la ▁mawalo ▁yelile . ▁Keza yawala ▁ng ' hanzu ▁ya ▁chitani ▁mgati ▁ya ▁walo ▁da ▁mgati ▁ya ▁ka p u tula ▁ya ▁chitani ▁na ▁kui funga ▁mkwiji ▁wa ▁chitani , ▁na ▁keza funga ▁chi lemba ▁cha ▁chitani .
▁Uno ▁niuwo ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Tela . ▁Tela ▁ka weleka ▁Abulamu ▁na ▁Naholi ▁na ▁Halani . ▁Na yo ▁Halani ▁kamwelek a ▁Lutu .
▁Wawo ▁wa u lava ▁ugima ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁na ▁kumgala ▁ukaye . ▁Maabaho ▁keza watanga ▁mambwiya ▁zake ▁na ▁wakaya ▁wayage ▁na ▁kuwalongela , ▁‘ D eng ' heleleni ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁kwaviya ▁ni muwona ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu ▁ya gile .’
▁ Hachi sondelele ▁si mo ▁muhala ▁zozi tu ngigwe ▁chiu ba la ▁lusita ▁vichi wa fu ndu ze ▁kuson hela ▁ludabwa ▁lwake ▁na ▁ wi zi lo ▁wake ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁chiu wona ▁utunhizo ▁wake ▁wenyewo .
▁Wawo ▁wenyewo ▁wa ilunga ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁na ▁kweli ▁wa londeka ▁kutenda ▁ivo . ▁Kwa viya ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa hokela ▁vinhu ▁va ▁chimuhe ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Wayahudi , ▁nawo ▁ wolondeka ▁wa wagolele ▁Wayahudi ▁vinhu ▁va ▁lukuli .
▁Yesilo ▁m koi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁viya wonile ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁Musa ▁ziya watendele ▁Waisilaili , ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Chi no ▁choni ▁cho u watendela ▁wanhu ? ▁ Habali ▁ko lamula ▁nhaguso ▁wiidumwe ▁kuno ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁wa ku zunguluka ▁kulawa ▁imitondo ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁niye ▁nowalongela ▁vino , ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁na ▁maligo ▁yawo ▁yose ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁weza leke li ligwa , ▁ mbali ▁yoyo muliga ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁heza lekeleligwa .
▁Ivo ▁ni v a mha ▁viya ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe , ▁ni v a sa ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yangu , ▁ni vi bena ▁haulongozi ▁wenu .
▁Iviya ▁kachi tengenezel a ▁ichi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁ vihindo ▁va ▁zahabu ▁na ▁ mhete ▁mbili ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁muna ▁zi mhembe ▁mbili ▁za ▁chi fuko ▁icho .
▁Bulahimu ▁kamuuza ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Habali ▁hu muleka ▁Ishumaili ▁yaha zi ▁chiya ▁cho u ni laganile ?”

▁Ko wa humiza ▁wachiwa ▁na ▁wagane , ▁kowa londa ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁ko weng ' ha ▁ndiya ▁na ▁mawalo .
▁Mbali ▁siku pula ▁bule ▁uwa segeze ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁ mbali ▁no pula ▁uwa lole se ▁na ▁ija ▁i mwi hi .
▁Na ▁ivo ▁ni londeka ▁kuwa gesa ni , ▁kwaviya ▁no wa gesa ni ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wangu . ▁M weye ▁mose ▁mui hanganya ▁muna ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁lusita ▁voni wa ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁hebu ▁voni wa ▁kunze ▁no lagusa ▁na ▁no i gombela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁Maabaho ▁Abulamu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulawa ▁hanhu ▁m baka ▁hanhu ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁Negebu .
▁Ha gati ▁ya ▁Waisilaili ▁kukala ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁dimwenga ▁di kala ▁na ▁hamu ▁ng ' hulu . ▁Waisilaili ▁wa lila ▁kaidi , ▁walonga , ▁“ M uhavu ▁chi pate ▁nyama ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁kuja !
▁Wa nenu ▁weza kuwa ▁wa dimi ▁muna ▁ichuwala ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁weza gaya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku leka ▁kwaminika ▁kwenu , ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁kezadanganika ▁kuchuwala .
▁Mbali ▁wamwenga ▁walonga , ▁“ One ▁ka muhonya ▁munhu ▁chipofu , ▁vino ▁ka potigwa ▁kumtenda ▁Lazalo ▁sekeya danganike ?”
▁Viwa malile ▁kum ke we za , ▁wam vula ▁viwalo ▁va ▁ langi ▁ya ▁zambalau , ▁wa mu yawala ▁viwalo ▁vake . ▁Amalabaho ▁wa mulava ▁kunze ▁muladi ▁wa muwamb e ▁mu ▁msalaba .
▁Mulungu ▁kamzilibula ▁na ▁hamu le kile ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁lu wo le ▁muna ▁dileme , ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Niza kwing ' ha ▁bala ka ▁zelile ▁na ▁za ▁kweli ▁zo ni ila gane ▁na ▁Daudi .’
▁Haluni ▁kamwelek a ▁Na dabu ▁na ▁Abihu ▁na ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁Isamali .

▁“ Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondau watendela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁muladi ▁kuwa bagula ▁wa ni sang ' hanile ▁fana ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko . ▁So la ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁dimwe ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁maidi ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁yeli bule ▁chilema ▁chochose ,

▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawa hindukila ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁na ▁kalonga ▁nawo ▁waidumwe , ▁“ Wa mweda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo vi wona ▁vinhu ▁vomu vi wona ▁mweye !

▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kamtemela ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁hamu msang ' hanila ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho ▁na ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁u goloke .
▁Ku gobola ▁mhule ▁kwiza gendelela ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ya ▁kwa ha ▁zabibu , ▁na ▁kwa ha ▁zabibu ▁kwiza gendelela ▁m baka ▁siku ▁ya ▁ku handa ▁mbeyu . ▁Mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁ndiya ▁nyingi ▁na ▁kukala ▁ bila ▁kudumba ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu .
▁Ch eye ▁chose ▁ni ▁ndugu , ▁cheye ▁siyo ▁wapelembaji , ▁cheye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁hachi londa ▁uvwizi .”
▁na ▁uwa funge ▁mi kwiji ▁muna ▁ivi g u di ▁na ▁ku wavaz a ▁ko fi ya ▁zawo , ▁vino ▁ivo ▁vondau weke ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile . ▁Wawo ▁weza kuwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ Mbali ▁mwene ▁mgunda ▁kawedika , ▁‘ Tegelezeni ▁mbwiya ▁zangu , ▁si mbu nzile ni ▁bule . ▁Vino ▁hachi i togole le ▁mweye ▁mu sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁siku ▁yose ▁kwa ▁maliho ▁ya ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe ?’
▁Viya wa wone ▁Petili ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wo kwingila ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kawa pula ▁wa mwing ' he ▁chinhu ▁chochose .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu mwitila ▁Pilato ▁na ▁ku mpula ▁ya walekelele ▁m fungwa ▁imwenga ▁fana ▁viyo tenda ga .
▁Habule ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi fisike ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu , ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁ukulu mba ▁cho ng ' a a ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁hachi gubikigwe ▁hana ▁yameso ▁yake . ▁Na ▁kumwake ▁yeye ▁cheye ▁chose ▁chiza mulongela ▁mbuli ▁zetu ▁zo chitendile .
▁Maabaho ▁kulawilila ▁nzala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁Kanaani , ▁iwa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wazi di l we ▁ng ' hani . ▁Wa saho ▁zetu ▁hawa dahile ▁bule ▁kupata ▁ndiya ▁yoyose .

▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ▁viwahulike ▁masimwe ▁yayo , ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁kakala ▁kowa longa ▁wawo .

▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Habali ▁mo gona ? ▁L a m ke ni ▁ tose ni ▁muladi ▁sekemu gezigwe .”
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kalonga ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁kavi bwakila ▁vinyamkela ▁vimu lawe . ▁M iyanza ▁mingi ▁vinyamkela ▁ivo ▁vi kala ▁vo mwizila ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁I nga wa ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wam zingiliza ▁makono ▁yake ▁kwa ▁vi zuma ▁na ▁magulu ▁yake ▁kwa ▁m hi ng u ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁muu kalizi , ▁ mbali ▁ka daha ▁ku bena ▁vi zuma ▁na ▁m hi ng u ▁vo wa m zi ng ili zile , ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁vi ngala ▁m baka ▁kudibwilingu .
▁Ha nhu ▁haja ▁hakala ▁na ▁ ny hu p a ▁i kalile ▁na ▁si ki . ▁Ivo ▁wa vabik a ▁ dodo ki ▁muna ▁isi ki , ▁wa dika ▁muna ▁ ulu mango ▁lwa ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁hisopo , ▁m aabaho ▁wa dika ▁mu umulomo ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁vino ▁ku lagusa ▁Petili ▁vondaya danganike ▁na ▁ku mtunhiza ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela ▁Petili , ▁“ Ni winze !”
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kengil wa ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ku mu lumba ▁munhu ▁na ▁ku mwika ▁muna ▁iisi , ▁na ▁ka wona ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁umoyo ▁wake .
▁Niye ▁ni ▁mdodo ▁kufosa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁unovu ▁wake , ▁muladi ▁ni wapetele ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁utajili ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁uli bule ▁ningo ,
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ka ye ▁yangu ▁iza tangigwa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁nhambiko .’ ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mui tenda ▁kuwa ▁mi na ▁ya ▁wa bavi .”
▁Mbali ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁viwa iting ' hane ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁muladi ▁kulongelela , ▁wa hinduka ▁kulola ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu , ▁wa wona ▁wingu ▁di gubika ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁u lawilila ▁hanhu ▁baho .
▁M wa mhilile ▁ng ' hani ▁lolelo ▁do chi di longa , ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁ya chi laganile ▁kokwaminika .
▁Kwa viya ▁mu yamanya ▁yaja ▁yam afundizo ▁yochi weng ' hile ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu .
▁Maabaho ▁Wayahudi ▁wamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Lelo ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kuna ▁chinyamkela ! ▁Bulahimu ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁iviya ▁walotezi ▁wadanganika , ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁ko o longa ▁munhu ▁yo kwamha ▁mafundizo ▁yako ▁heza danganika ▁ng ' o !
▁Musa ▁vi yengile ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kulonga ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁kahulika ▁dizi ▁dolonga ▁na ▁yeye ▁kulawa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁vilumb e ▁waidi ▁wa li ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ngubiko ▁ya ▁kuilumba ▁hana ▁disanduku ▁da ▁lagano , ▁na ▁kalonga ▁nayo .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁yawa no geze ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁kwa ▁kuwatendela ▁yanogile , ▁muladi ▁yam ze ng e ▁ija ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁muna ▁uhuwilo .
▁M wika goya ▁ving ' waji ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁kamulongela ▁Yosefu , ▁“ Muna ▁in zo zi ▁yangu ▁ni wona ▁ku zu bu ku ▁da ▁mzabibu ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ,
▁Na yo ▁kezawa tuma ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁hamwe ▁na ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁da ▁mhalati , ▁nayo ▁kezawa ting ' hana ▁wa nya c he nde ▁wake ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁isi , ▁kulawa ▁uhelelo ▁uno ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁m baka ▁umwenga .
▁wou utendile ▁u woneke ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Chi nanga ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁na ▁mabululu ▁yose , ▁iviya ▁chi wakoma ▁walume ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana ▁fana ▁viya ▁vi chitendile ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁ya ▁Sihoni ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Heshiboni .
