▁Viya li g igwe , ▁yeye ▁ha bwelezele ▁ li go , ▁na ▁viya gazigwe , ▁yeye ▁ha bwelezele ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁yo lamula ▁nhaguso ▁viilondeka .
▁M sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Bulahimu ▁viyahulike ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁ka inama ▁na ▁ka mtambikila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁P anzia ▁di kalile ▁mwii ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁di dege ka ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁kulawa ▁kuchanyha ▁m baka ▁hasi .
▁Wa dimi ▁wa ▁ zinguluwe ▁wa kimbila ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁dibululu , ▁uko ▁wawalongela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zozi wa lawilile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowa kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela .
▁“ Mulonde ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁muzindilile ▁malagilizo ▁na ▁ndagilizi ▁zake ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ One ▁mwo walonda ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wo mulonda ni ▁mweye , ▁vino ▁mwiza hokela ▁unovu ▁u lihi ? ▁Kwa viya ▁hata ▁‘ wene ▁uhasanyi ’ ▁wowa londa ▁waja ▁wowo walonda ▁wawo !
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wekane ▁ka itowa ▁mhalati ▁yake ▁na ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁zuwa ▁na ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁na ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁nhondo ▁vi gumigw a ▁ziza . ▁Ivo ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ziza ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁zuwa ▁imisi ▁na ▁se lusi ▁ya ▁zuwa ▁ichilo .
▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁va ▁hela , ▁vi kalilo ▁vidi ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chila ▁mbiki .
▁Mbali ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Mulungu ▁kani tuma ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Petili ▁viya tumigwe ▁kui peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wengi le ▁ulungwana .
▁Elizabeti ▁viyahulike ▁ndams a ▁ya ▁Maliya , ▁mwana ▁ching ' hele ▁ka kwe sa ▁mwii nda ▁yake . ▁Elizabeti ▁ka memezigw a ▁Muhe ▁Yelile
▁Na ▁weye ▁u di ha ke ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁mgati ▁na ▁kunze , ▁u d itendele ▁lukingilo ▁lwa ▁zahabu ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁Na ▁wenevale ▁wa tendeleni ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁watumwa ▁wenu , ▁na ▁sekemu watende ▁wa mdumbe ni . ▁Na ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁wose ▁muna yo ▁mwenevale ▁imwe ▁kuulanga , ▁nayo ▁keza mtagusa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ bila ▁ku bagula .
▁Sekemu da igwe ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁ mbali ▁mu da igwe ▁kui londa ▁muhala . ▁Kwa viya ▁ija ▁yo mulonda ▁miyage , ▁iyo ▁ko ya tegeleza ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa .
▁“ Ivo ▁muvimanye ▁nowalongela , ▁mbuli ▁yoyose ▁ija ▁hai nogile , ▁yondai longigwe ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁nhaguso ▁weza londeka ▁ kwidika ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁ihile ▁i longigwe .
▁Ch eye ▁hachi hokele ▁muhe ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁ mbali ▁chi hokela ▁Muhe ▁ya tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁chi vimanye ▁yose ▁yo ching ' higwe ▁bule ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁“ Ku hawa ▁na ▁munhu ▁ngayengaye ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁di yo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁sekemuwe ▁wa gila ▁na ▁wa ga hi ga hi ▁kumwake .
▁Isi ▁ino ▁yose ▁yo wi iwona , ▁nizakwing ' ha ▁weye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Lutu ▁kawa b e m b ele za ▁ng ' hani ▁m baka ▁wa togola , ▁wa hinduka ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake . ▁Lutu ▁kawa sasalil a ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu ▁na ▁ka sasalil a ▁dugila ▁kwa ▁manyambenyambe . ▁Ma n yambenyambe ▁waja ▁zi ndi ya ▁zi sa sa ligwe .
▁“ ▁‘ Vondamu fike ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁ku handa ▁modeli ▁zose ▁za ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁matunda , ▁matunda ▁yayo ▁hamwiza ya ja ▁bule . ▁Mwiza leme sigwa ▁kuya ja ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu .
▁V ula vu mbi ▁da ▁kusi ▁jandusa ▁kubun a ▁nawo ▁wa gesa ▁kuwa ▁wa pata ▁chiwa londile ▁kupata , ▁ivo ▁wa ndusa ▁kusegela , ▁we nde sa ▁ngalawa ▁m baka ▁habehi ▁na ▁mhwani ▁ya ▁Chilete .
▁Ka u wona ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁kwa ▁kutali ▁uli ▁na ▁mayani ▁mengi . ▁Ka u gendela ▁ya wone ▁fana ▁kodaha ▁kupata ▁nhini . ▁Mbali ▁viyafikile , ▁ha wonile ▁ ti ni , ▁ila ▁mayani ▁muhala , ▁kwaviya ▁hau kalile ▁ msimu ▁wa ▁nhini .
▁Saimoni ▁kamwidika , ▁“ No gesa ▁ni ▁ija ▁ya leke ligwe ▁hela ▁nyingi .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ K wi dika ▁goya .”
▁Ivo ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya mtaguse ni ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ndiya ▁hebu ▁ching ' waji , ▁hebu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kwa mha ▁madugila , ▁ ihawa ▁dugila ▁da ▁kwima ▁kwa ▁mwezi ▁hebu ▁Zu wa ▁da ▁Mhumulo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kalu longela ▁lung ' husesa , ▁“ I teganye ni ▁na ▁u gila , ▁kwaviya ▁ugima ▁wa ▁munhu ▁ha uli ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁viyeli ▁navo !”
▁ mbali ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁yo kala ▁siku ▁zose .” ▁U senga ▁uwo ▁niiyo ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yomu pete ligwe .
▁M sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁ha londeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ndwagi . ▁Ko londeka ▁kuwa ▁muhole ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁yawe ▁mfundiza ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yo funya ▁umoyo ,
▁Wa mgala ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wa vi ta ndik a ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁m chanyha ▁yake , ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁iyo .
▁Sa ng ' hanila ▁chilo ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁na ▁tano ▁va ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁ku tengenez a ▁ chinala ▁cha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose .
▁Mbali ▁Yohana ▁ka mbwakila ▁Mfalume ▁Helode , ▁kwaviya ▁ka muhoka ▁Helodiya ▁muke ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁vihile ▁Helode ▁vo ya vi tendile .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ya huwila ▁yaja ▁yoya longigwe , ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁hawa ya huwile .
▁Maabaho ▁mu komeleze la ▁ usang ' hano ▁wo usang ' hani gwe ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zenu .
▁Ivo ▁wanaake ▁waja ▁wasegela ▁kudileme ▁himahima , ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁na ▁de ng ' ho ▁kulu , ▁na ▁wa kimbila ▁kuwalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake .
▁Kwa viya ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁haya dahile ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chi faya . ▁Mbali ▁lelo , ▁hanhu ▁hake ▁ he kigwa ▁lolelo ▁dinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁dili ▁kwa ▁ijo ▁chodaha ▁ku mkwenhukila ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁ko togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁uhuwilo , ▁na ▁si ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁viyolonda ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁walo ▁ijo ▁diwe ▁di lu kigwa ▁hebu ▁d ib o ti gwa ▁kwa ▁chitani ▁hebu ▁ s ufu ▁hebu ▁walo ▁di tendigwe ▁kwa ▁mbende ▁yoyose ,
▁Sekeu mwa ndike ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁wagane ▁mwanamke ▁mgane ▁yoyose ▁yang ' hali ▁ku fikiza ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁sita , ▁kaidi ▁ya kalile ▁ya soligwe ▁mwanza ▁umwe ,
▁Mbali ▁miyangu ▁Tito , ▁inga wa ▁ni ▁M gi liki , ▁ha shulutiz igwe ▁bule ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ,
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁ya zi wone ▁wala ▁kuhulika , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya gesile ▁kuwa ▁ziza lawilila , ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁Mulungu ▁chiya wa sasalil e ▁waja ▁wowo mulonda ▁yeye .”
▁Mbali ▁wengi ▁wawo ▁Mulungu ▁hawa nogele ▁bule , ▁ivo ▁ mitufi ▁yawo ▁i pwililis igwa ▁kuna ▁dibwilingu .
▁No we na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁nawo ▁haweza danganika ▁bule . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kuwa lava ▁m makono ▁yangu .
▁Ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁m wima ▁chigangamavu , ▁no igoda ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu , ▁no gumigw a ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ! ▁Muna ▁ya manhesa ▁ning ' hali ▁no funya ▁umoyo , ▁nod eng ' helela ▁ng ' hani .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁kakala ▁mwihi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁tibwilitibwili ▁ je ne la ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kamtanga ▁Yoshua ▁na ▁kamulongela ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁“ W i me ▁chigangamavu ▁na ▁uwe ▁galu , ▁mana ▁weye ▁kwiza wa languliza ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ iyawalaganile ▁wa saho ▁zawo , ▁weye ▁kwiza weng ' ha ▁wa ihazi .
▁Viya muwone ▁Yesu ▁ko fosa , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Loleni ! ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ I ng ' heni ▁moyo ! ▁Ni ▁niye . ▁ Sekemudumbe !”
▁yawa de ng ' hele ze ▁kwa ▁kumgala ▁Paulo ▁Yelusalemu , ▁kwaviya ▁wakala ▁wa ilungile ▁kumkoma ▁yang ' hali ▁muna ▁inzila .
▁Maabaho ▁Mafalisayo ▁wahita ▁kunze ▁kutenda ▁u sa g u zi ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kum t e ga ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zake .
▁Zi na ▁da ▁muke ▁wa ▁Amilamu ▁di kala ▁Yo ke b e di , ▁m welesi ▁wa ▁Lawi , ▁iyo ▁yo yelekwe ▁na ▁Lawi ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁nayo ▁kamwelek ela ▁Amilamu ▁wana ▁waidi ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Musa ▁na ▁Miliamu ▁ lumbu ▁jawo .
▁Yesu ▁kamtanga ▁mwana ▁ndodo , ▁ka mwi miza ▁haulongozi ▁wawo ,
▁M pule ni ▁Mndewa ▁wa ▁mavuno , ▁ya gale ▁wa sang ' hana ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wake ▁wa ▁ndiya .
▁“ Ivo ▁mukala ▁Kadeshi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi .
▁Ivo ▁wakala ▁wo zahila ▁nzila . ▁Wa wa tuma ▁wanhu ▁wowa i tendile ▁wanoga , ▁muladi ▁wam gwile ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zake , ▁wa dahe ▁kumgala ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Loma .
▁Baho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kani uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ha bali ▁ko kwazanywa ▁ng ' hani ? ▁Niza kulongela ▁fambulo ▁da ▁ fu mbo ▁da ▁mwanamke ▁ino ▁na ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo ▁dodi m papile ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁di kala ▁na ▁matwi ▁saba ▁na ▁m ahembe ▁longo .
▁“ Yandik a ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁da ▁Fil a de li fi ya , ▁“ Niye ▁n yeli le ▁na ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁niye ▁nina ▁u vugul o ▁uja ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁yaha vugula ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo daha ▁ku hinda ▁na ▁yaha hinda ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo daha ▁ku vugula .
▁Mbali ▁chilumb e ▁chochose ▁chili bule ▁m pe pe ▁na ▁ma kala ba ndu ▁sekemuje . ▁I cho ▁kumwenu ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko .
▁W i mo ▁uwo ▁ukala ▁na ▁ma mba sa , ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wa ihuma ▁mui nda ▁ya ▁Lebeka . ▁Na yo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Chi no ▁choni ▁chochi ni lawilila ?” ▁Ivo ▁kahita ▁kumuuza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Walondwa , ▁no walamba ▁fana ▁wa fosa nzila ▁na ▁wa genda ji ▁muna ▁isi , ▁mu yepule ▁na ▁tama a ▁zihile ▁na ▁izo ▁zo i ba sakany a ▁na ▁ mihe ▁yenu .
▁One ▁mu wile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁waha mulonde ni . ▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁siyo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino . ▁Niye ▁ni msagula ni ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁wo mwihila ni .
▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁chiya ▁chitasa , ▁vilung o ▁kwa ▁mavuta ▁yelile ▁na ▁ubani ▁uli ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ,
▁Y eye ▁muhala ▁kokala ▁siku ▁zose ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo ▁hadi daha ▁ku kwe nhu ki ligwa ▁na ▁munhu . ▁Wala ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya dahile ▁kumuwona ▁wala ▁yo daha ▁kumuwona . ▁Ku mwa ke ▁yeye ▁iwe ▁hishima ▁na ▁udahi ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo .
▁Chi ha bwela ▁na ▁kui fika ▁kaye ▁yake ▁i f ya gi ligwa ▁na ▁ku ha mbigwa ,
▁Na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wekatatu ▁kawa sondelela ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁waja ▁waidi ▁wowa longole ▁na ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo di tumbalil a ▁mavindi ▁ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁na ▁nyang ' hiti ▁yake ▁na ▁kutogola ▁ kwikigwa ▁chilaguso ▁muna ▁ichihanga ▁chake ▁hebu ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mkono ▁wake ,
▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁ka lagusa ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁kumwetu ▁kwa ▁ku mtuma ▁Mwanage ▁nyachende ▁muna ▁isi , ▁muladi ▁chiwe ▁na ▁ugima ▁kufose la ▁yeye .
▁‘ Niye ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁ini ku lavile ▁Misili , ▁ko u kalile ▁mtumwa .
▁“ Hamwande ▁wanenu ▁waha muuza ni , ▁‘ N dagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁vo yamulagilizileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁mu vi tende ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?’
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁na ▁kawa lema , ▁kwaviya ▁kawa wonela ▁ludoko ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike .
▁ Walangulizi ▁wa ▁Edomu ▁wadumba , ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁wa gudemeka ▁kwa ▁kudumba , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁Kanaani ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁i mo ng ' ho nyo ka .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha ku towa ▁ka nza ▁dimwe , ▁muleke ▁ya ku towe ▁ka nza ▁dimwenga . ▁Na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ku ho ka ▁ko ti ▁jako , ▁muleke ▁ya sole ▁na ▁ng ' hanzu ▁yako .
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁ha kalile ▁na ▁ulwivi , ▁ubanzi ▁uwo ▁ukala ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁mbili .
▁Ivo ▁ka leni ▁meso ▁na ▁mu kumbuke ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁masozi ▁yangu , ▁ni m fundiza ▁chila ▁munhu ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ,
▁Paulo ▁na ▁wayage ▁wang ' o la ▁ingalawa ▁kulawa ▁Pa f o ▁m baka ▁P eli ge , ▁bululu ▁da ▁Pa m fi li ya . ▁Uko ▁Yohana ▁Maliki ▁kawaleka , ▁kabwela ▁Yelusalemu .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁ziza lawilila ▁wang ' hali ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁sambi ▁hawana danganika .
▁No mwandikilani ▁mweye ▁wanangu , ▁kwaviya ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu ▁u segezigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁“ M senga ▁kuulanga ▁keza mulongolelani ▁na ▁kumgala ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi , ▁nawo ▁niza wadanganiza .
▁M sitali ▁wekatatu ▁ukala ▁wa ▁ya sito ▁na ▁ agate ▁na ▁ a me si sito .
▁Viya kalile ▁ko peta , ▁ka galil igwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wake ▁imwe ▁ya kalile ▁ko da igwa ▁de ni ▁da ▁hela ▁m ili yo ni ▁nyingi .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁walonga , ▁“ Mu wambe ▁mumsalaba ! ▁Mu wambe ▁mumsalaba !”
▁Ivo ▁keza i safya ▁ikaye ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁damu ▁ya ▁ndege ▁yafile ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁nzasa ▁na ▁ndege ▁im gima ▁na ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mwele zi ▁na ▁ s ufu ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁tambi ▁da ▁hisopo .
▁Ku kala ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁nguluwe ▁wo di migwa ▁muna ▁umulima .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁vi wawonile ▁chiyatendile ▁Paulo , ▁wa ndusa ▁ku landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁Chi lu ko ni ya , ▁“ M i lungu ▁iza ▁kumwetu ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁fana ▁va ▁wanhu !”
▁Kwa viya ▁fana ▁Bulahimu ▁ka togoligwa ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁yoyatendile , ▁yaha wile ▁na ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kuigodela , ▁ mbali ▁si ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁wa sagula ▁imwe ▁mwa ▁wawo ▁waidi ▁kwa ▁kuwa towe la ▁mhiya , ▁na ▁mhiya ▁i mgwila ▁Ma ti ya si , ▁nayo ▁ko n gezigwa ▁muna ▁iwa tumigwa ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe .
▁weza mu lanha ▁mibalati , ▁m aabaho ▁weza mkoma . ▁Mbali ▁siku ▁nhatu ▁hamwande , ▁keza zilibuka .”
▁Ivo ▁niye ▁ni li ▁m fungigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mndewa , ▁no mulamba ni ▁ugen zi ▁wenu ▁uwe ▁fana ▁vi muhokele .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wano ▁weza ni zeha ▁m baka ▁zuwaki ? ▁ Haweza nihuwila ▁m baka ▁zuwaki , ▁inga wa ▁ni tenda ▁vilaguso ▁ivo ▁vose ▁kumwawo ?
▁Ka sola ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chake ▁na ▁kasegela ▁cha hi ma hi ma . ▁Ka loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Efulati ▁na ▁kahita ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Gileadi .
▁Mkulu ▁iyo ▁kamuuza ▁Filipo , ▁“ Ni pulile , ▁mulotezi ▁ino ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁yelihi ? ▁Ko longa ▁zake ▁mwenyewo ▁hebu ▁za ▁munhu ▁hebu ▁iviya ▁za ▁imwenga ?”
▁Bahobaho ▁wa ileka ▁ingalawa ▁na ▁ tati ▁yawo , ▁wamsondelela ▁Yesu .
▁Viwa bwelile ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁L e u eli ‚ ▁kawauza ‚ ▁“ Habali ▁diyelo ▁ham kala me ▁bule ▁kubwela ?”
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatanga ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ‚ ▁kawalongela ‚ ▁“ M pule ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya ya segeze ▁mabula ▁yano ▁kumwangu ▁na ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁niza walekelela ▁wanhu ▁wenu ▁wahite ▁wa ka m tambikile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Yesu ▁kawa langa ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁na ▁kuwalongela , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁mgane ▁ino ▁keka ▁nyingi ▁mwii chi tanda ▁cha ▁sente ▁kufosa ▁wose .
▁Sekemu vwizi ligwe , ▁Mulungu ▁ha ze higwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁bule . ▁Wa nhu ▁weza gobola ▁chiwa handile .
▁Leka mana ▁cholonga ▁kwa ▁ugangamalo , ▁“ Mndewa ▁iyo ▁m tazi ▁wangu , ▁ Siza dumba . ▁Vino ▁munhu ▁kodaha ▁kuni tenda ▁choni ?”
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁unovu ▁wake ▁kakala ▁ya ni sagule ▁ ta ng u ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ku vumbuka . ▁Ka ni tanga ▁ni msang ' hanile
▁M olondeka ▁mukale ▁nawo ▁fana ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁ku lihigwa ▁hebu ▁wa fosa ▁nzila . ▁Weza msang ' hanila ni ▁m baka ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza ,
▁M weye ▁ham fikile ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Sinai ▁lolu daha ▁ku dali si ka ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwatendile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁wawo ▁wafika ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁luja ▁lolu kwaka ▁moto , ▁lu gubikigwa ▁na ▁ziza ▁na ▁wingu ▁ titu ▁na ▁beho ▁kulu ,
▁Si ▁niye ▁muhala ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wochi londeka ▁kupata ▁vinhu ▁vovi londeka ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano .
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁yang ' hali ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁dibululu , ▁ mbali ▁kakala ▁kema ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁haja ▁Masa ▁haya muhokele .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁mwanza ▁wekaidi ‚ ▁“ I ka ▁mkono ▁mudi wa lo ▁jako .” ▁Musa ▁keka ▁mkono ▁wake ▁muna ▁diwalo , ▁viya u lavile ‚ ▁u galuka ▁mzelu ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende .
▁“ M olondeka ▁muwe ▁na ▁hanhu ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁honda mu hite ▁mwanza ▁mkulu .
▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁viyakalile ▁kuchi fu ngo ▁kahulika ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁ziya kalile ▁yo tenda ▁Chilisito , ▁kawatum a ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamwenga ,
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁iyo ▁womu i lagusa ▁munoga ▁kwa ▁wanhu , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁ka mmanya ni ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu . ▁Kwa viya ▁chinhu ▁chochi woneka ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁chi woneka ▁chiha .
▁wahita ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁m ting ' hano . ▁Wa walongela ,
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁dilago ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁“ Y oyose ▁yeli ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ye ze ▁hano !” ▁Ivo ▁welesi ▁wose ▁wa ▁Lawi ▁waiting ' hana ▁kum zunguluka .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yolonga ▁ka mu na ▁dibu ng ' hulo ▁ mbali ▁ko mwihila ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yang ' hali ▁muna ▁diziza .
▁So la ▁chila ▁chi umbe ▁chili ▁na ▁ugima ▁chili ▁na ▁weye , ▁ndege ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁u lawe ▁nawo ▁kunze ▁muladi ▁ weleke ▁na ▁k wene la ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .”
▁Sekemu ya ze he ▁yaja ▁matambi ▁ya kanhigwe . ▁Na ▁one ▁kuna ▁da ▁kwi igodela , ▁vino ▁mo igodela ▁choni ? ▁M kumbuke ▁si ▁mweye ▁imu i dima ▁mizizi , ▁ mbali ▁mizizi ▁niiyo ▁iwa dima ▁mweye .
▁M umanye ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wou fosa ▁ili mu ▁yose , ▁mu memezigw e ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁Mulungu , ▁muwe ▁fana ▁Mulungu .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha kwa c ha ▁moto , ▁nawo ▁uha soma ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mi wa ▁na ▁k wene la ▁m baka ▁ku soma ▁ maguniya ▁ya ▁ndiya ▁hebu ▁ndiya ▁za ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁zili ▁hazi na go b o ligwa ▁hebu ▁mgunda ▁wose ▁wa haka , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya kwa chi le ▁moto ▁uwo ▁kolondeka ▁kuliha ▁u da nga nyi ▁uwo ▁wose .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoja ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo , ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁kawatum a ▁wahite ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁wa mu uze , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁iyo ▁ija ▁yokwiza ▁hebu ▁chi n gozele ▁imwenga ?”
▁“ No mulongelani ▁wa mbwiya ▁zangu , ▁sekemuwadumbe ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wowo lu koma ▁lukuli , ▁m aabaho ▁hawa daha ▁bule ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chihile .
▁“ Chi nyamkela ▁yaha mulawa ▁munhu , ▁ko zunguluka ▁ku londa ▁hanhu ▁ha nya lile ▁heli bule ▁mazi ▁muladi ▁ya humule , ▁na ▁one ▁ha patile ,
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ E no shi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Seti , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Adamu ▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁chinyala ▁na ▁chi fi so ▁chi zi leke , ▁chi lamula ▁sekechi kale ▁chiu vwizi ▁wala ▁kwa ▁ku hanganya ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁uvwizi , ▁cholonga ▁ukweli ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁wamwenga ▁viwo longa ▁wa i safya ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁kuwa ▁chi chi longa ▁ni ▁kweli .
▁Zi mwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁muna ▁uluwe ▁ hali ▁na ▁ulongo ▁chidogo . ▁ Z o ta ▁hima ▁hima ▁kwaviya ▁ulongo ▁ukala ▁chidogo .
▁Kwa viya ▁chi hulika ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa lawile ▁kumwetu ▁wa wagaza ▁kwa ▁kuya giza ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zawo , ▁ mbali ▁hachi watumile ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mwasa ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁kusola ▁muke ▁imwenga , ▁iyo ▁ko mtendela ▁uzinzi ▁muke ▁wake ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁ Siza mtanga ni ▁mweye ▁watumwa ▁kaidi , ▁kwaviya ▁mtumwa ▁ha zimanya ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁mwenevale ▁wake . ▁Mbali ▁no watanga ▁mweye ▁mbwiya ▁zangu ▁kwaviya ▁ni mulongelani ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vini longiligwe ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu .
▁Mulungu ▁siyo ▁munhu , ▁m baka ▁ya longe ▁uvwizi , ▁hebu ▁siyo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁m baka ▁ya ga lu le ▁m agesa ▁yake . ▁Vino ▁kodaha ▁ku la ga ni la ▁chochose ▁na ▁sekeya chi tende , ▁hebu ▁kulonga ▁chinhu ▁na ▁sekeya chi fi ki ze ?
▁Maabaho ▁wa mkwenhukila ▁habehi ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Chiza zenga ▁mab umba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanyama ▁wetu ▁na ▁chiza zenga ▁mabululu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanetu .
▁“ Wa lagilize ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mulave ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yolaw igwa ▁na ▁ufila ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ku dalisa ▁mtufi .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁vimwili ▁ya wahulike ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake , ▁na ▁m olondeka ▁mui zindilile ▁siku ▁yangu ▁ya ▁ mhumulo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁kwa ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁kwiza lava ▁lita ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁divai , ▁kuwa ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Salayi ▁kakala ▁ka bule ▁wana ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁m gum ba .
▁Mbali ▁mu weng ' he ▁ ngaye - ngaye ▁vimwili ▁navo , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁keza de ng ' helela ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho mu chi tenda .
▁Bahobaho ▁Yuda ▁viya solile ▁gate , ▁Lufyende ▁kamwing ila . ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Tend a ▁himahima ▁chiu londa ▁kutenda !”
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo ng ' wa ▁divai ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁ya londe ▁kung ' wa ▁divai ▁ya ▁sambi . ▁Kwa viya ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Di v a i ▁ya ▁umwaka ▁ino ga .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁cho londa ▁kuhulika ▁m agesa ▁yako , ▁kwaviya ▁chi vimanya ▁kuwa ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁wanhu ▁wolonga ▁vihile ▁kuson hela ▁ bumbila ▁jako .”
▁Kwiza kwika ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁L wa vu ▁ulo ▁kwiza wika ▁mu lu gi go ▁lwa ▁ulupango ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁hasi ▁muladi ▁lwavu ▁lu fike ▁hagati ▁ya ▁u pango .
▁Wa i sola ▁ing ' hanzu ▁m baka ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yawo ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Chi i i to la ▁ino , ▁ lola ▁vino ▁ino ▁niiyo ▁ng ' hanzu ▁ya ▁mwanago ?”
▁Na ▁panga ▁di kutwa ▁di lawa ▁muna ▁umulomo ▁wake ▁na ▁keza ▁wa huma ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁kwa ▁u panga ▁uwo ▁na ▁keza ▁wa languliza ▁kwa ▁mhome da ▁zuma . ▁Iviya ▁keza bojoga ▁ bojoga ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ku b o jo gela ▁zabibu ▁ya ▁ludoko ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁Yeli ▁na ▁Udaho .
▁Ivo ▁ziso ▁hadi daha ▁kuu longela ▁mkono , ▁“ W eye ▁siku londa !” ▁Wala ▁ditwi ▁hadi daha ▁ku ilongela ▁migulu , ▁“ M weye ▁si mulonda ni !”
▁Maabaho ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁wa sigale ▁weza hulika ▁chochilawilile , ▁weza dumba ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya tende ▁wihi ▁fana ▁uwo ▁vimwili .
▁na ▁niza kwandika ▁muna ▁ivi bawo ▁ivo ▁chiya ▁chi nya ndike ▁muna ▁ivi bawo ▁viya ▁va ▁ichanduso ▁vou b eni le , ▁m aabaho ▁u vi ke ▁muna ▁disanduku .’
▁U ha fose la ▁muna ▁umgunda ▁wa ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁uli ▁na ▁mhule , ▁kodaha ▁ku kwa ny ula ▁ma s u ke ▁yake ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁na ▁kuja , ▁ mbali ▁sekeu kanhe ▁na ▁sengo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezam vugulil a ni ▁ dung u ▁jake ▁dinogile ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ku gala ▁mvula ▁muna ▁iisi ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwake ▁na ▁ku temela ▁mate ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu . ▁Mwiza wa zima ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁nyingi , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁hamwiza kwa zi migwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose .
▁Ka muuza , ▁‘ Mbwiyangu ▁kwingila ze ▁mu no ▁na ▁weye ▁kwa bule ▁chiwalo ▁cha ▁ zengele ?’ ▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kakala ▁hupi .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Zin a ▁jako ▁hadiza kuwa ▁Yakobo ▁kaidi . ▁Mbali ▁zina ▁jako ▁dizakuwa ▁Isilaili , ▁kwaviya ▁ku gomba ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁kufunya ▁umoyo .”
▁One ▁muha longa , ▁“ Chiza kuja ▁choni ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wesaba ▁one ▁hachi handile ▁hebu ▁kugobola ?”
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza ▁wenyewo , ▁“ Ka longa ▁vino ▁kwaviya ▁cha bule ▁magate .”
▁Wo walongela ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁kuwa ▁weza ilegeha , ▁hata ▁ivo ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁ni ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁ubananzi . ▁Kwa viya ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ni ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi mu languliza .
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁cha ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁chiza hazi ▁bala ka ▁zo yo wekila ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁na ▁iviya ▁chiza hazi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁chiya ▁chiya mwikile , ▁lelo ▁one ▁chiha gaya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁iviya ▁chiza kala ▁nayo ▁muna ▁ukulu ▁wake .
▁Zi na ▁da ▁lwanda ▁lw eketatu ▁ni ▁T i gi li , ▁ulo ▁lo kulu mila ▁ banzi ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zua ▁wa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ashulu . ▁Zi na ▁da ▁lwanda ▁ l weka ne ▁ni ▁Efulati .
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁yaha lamula ▁ bila ▁shuluti ▁muumoyo ▁wake ▁ku leka ▁kusola ▁na ▁fana ▁yaha daha ▁kuzi ki mila ▁tama a ▁zake ▁na ▁ku lamula ▁va ▁kutenda , ▁ivo ▁kotenda ▁goya ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁ha msolile ▁mhambe ▁iyo .
▁Kwa viya ▁ni walongela ▁yano ▁yose , ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁i mema ▁usungu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mulumake ▁yaham gomesa ▁siku ▁iyo ▁i yahulike , ▁baho ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁keza segeza ▁chilagano ▁icho ▁cha ▁imuke ▁na ▁chilaho ▁chiya ▁chiya ilahile ▁ bila ▁ku gesa . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mulekelela .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁mafundizo ▁yake .
▁Ino ▁niiyo ▁miyanza ▁ya ▁Waisilaili ▁viwa lawile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁kwa ▁mabumbila ▁yawo ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni .
