▁Maabaho ▁ni lola ▁na ▁ni wona ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁ng ' hani ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁kuwa peta . ▁Wa nhu ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁wolawa ▁chila ▁isi ▁na ▁chila ▁kabila ▁na ▁chila ▁welesi ▁na ▁chila ▁ulonzi . ▁Wakala ▁we mile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁na ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mwanang ' hondolo , ▁wa yawala ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁na ▁wa mha ▁matambi ▁ya ▁m itende ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo .
▁ teng ' hu ▁wa ngala ▁kwa ▁Ana si . ▁Ana si ▁kakala ▁m koi ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Kayafa , ▁yoya kalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁mwaka ▁uja .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa londa ▁kuwatowa ▁na ▁mabwe . ▁Maabaho ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁uwa lawilila ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Yakobo ▁kawalongela ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wa duganye ▁mabwe , ▁nawo ▁wa duganya ▁mabwe ▁na ▁weka ▁chi bugulu . ▁Maabaho ▁waja ▁ndiya ▁habehi ▁na ▁chi bugulu ▁chiya ▁cha ▁mabwe .
▁Wa wa gangamiza ▁wanahina ▁ mizoyo ▁yawo ▁wa ▁mabululu ▁yayo ▁na ▁wa walamba ▁wakale ▁muna ▁uhuwilo . ▁Wa wafundiza , ▁“ Ch olondeka ▁chi fose le ▁muna ▁ya manhesa ▁mengi ▁muladi ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa mgalila . ▁Na yo ▁kawauza , ▁“ Chi ha nga ▁chino ▁na ▁zina ▁dino ▁va ▁yelihi ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ V a ▁Kaisali .”
▁“ Mu isi la ili ▁yoyose , ▁mulume ▁hebu ▁muke ▁ha londeka ▁kuwa ▁malaya ▁wa ▁kaye ▁ya ▁m ulungu ▁imwenga .
▁Mbali ▁fana ▁kwa ▁kukala ▁chi isi , ▁niza daha ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁uli ▁na ▁faida ▁ng ' hani , ▁ivo ▁si vimanya ▁ni sagule ▁choni .
▁“ One ▁uha muwona ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁ka ga , ▁sekeu muleke , ▁ mbali ▁u mbweleze ▁kwa ▁mwenyewo .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ M a na ▁makono ▁yenu ligwa ▁uchanyha ▁kuna ▁ichi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁ng ' hondo ▁na ▁Waamaleki ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Wa nhu ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁viwahulike ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁wa de ng ' helela ▁wa u togola ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁wa saguligwe ▁kupata ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose , ▁wawa ▁na ▁uhuwilo .
▁Wa nhu ▁wengi ▁wazi togola ▁mbuli ▁zake ▁na ▁wabatizigwa , ▁na ▁muna ▁d isiku ▁ija ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁matatu ▁wongezeka ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁ichitala ▁wa mbu nhu lila ▁meso ▁Sitefano ▁na ▁wa wona ▁kuwa ▁chihanga ▁chake ▁chi linga ▁fana ▁chihanga ▁cha ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa fi le ▁wa si galile ▁hawa patile ▁ugima ▁m baka ▁miyaka ▁alufu ▁imwe ▁i fike . ▁Uno ▁uwo ▁uzilibuko ▁wa ▁mwanduso .
▁Ivo ▁kufose la ▁Yesu , ▁chi gendelele ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ku mtogoza ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbuli ▁izo ▁za ▁nhogolwa ▁ni ▁ mala vi lo ▁yetu ▁haja ▁ho chi longa ▁kwa ▁mi lomo ▁yetu ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mndewa .
▁Niza danganika ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino , ▁siza loka ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwiza loka ▁ulwanda ▁na ▁kuisola ▁isi ▁inogile .
▁Paulo ▁viyakalile ▁ko i gombela , ▁Fesito ▁ka landula ▁dizi ▁jake , ▁“ Paulo ▁kuna ▁lukwale ! ▁Ku soma ▁ng ' hani ▁ku kutenda ▁uwe ▁na ▁lukwale !”
▁Ivo ▁wa sagula ▁mazina ▁maidi , ▁Yosefu ▁yoya tangigwe ▁ B a li sa ba , ▁iviya ▁ka tangigwa ▁Y u sito , ▁na ▁imwenga ▁Ma ti ya si .
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁kolondeka ▁kuvimanya ▁kuwa ▁no mulonda ▁Tata ▁na ▁no sa na na ▁chiya ▁choya ni lagilize ▁niye . ▁“ Lelo ▁izo ni ▁chihite .
▁Chi chuuzi le ▁ndiya ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kung ' wa . ▁Cho ku lamba ▁uchi leke ▁chi fose ▁kwa ▁migulu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yako .
▁L usita ▁luja ▁luja ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamulamba ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁ teng ' hu ▁diya !”
▁Ivo ▁sekemu sang ' hanile ▁ya ▁igolo , ▁kwaviya ▁ya ▁igolo ▁yeza i sang ' hanila ▁yenyewo . ▁Chila ▁siku ▁yoi sang ' hanila ▁yenyewo .
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁watano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Ahi ezeli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Am i s ha da i .
▁Mulungu ▁kani gubulila ▁lungilo ▁jake ▁da ▁sili ▁na ▁kani tende za ▁ni umanye . ▁Na ▁niye ▁ni mala ▁kulonga ▁muna ▁usenga ▁uno ▁kwa ▁u guhi ,
▁Maabaho ▁Yesilo ▁m koi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁ka mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁kutimbuligwa ▁na ▁nhambiko . ▁Haluni ▁keza ▁na ▁walala ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁muladi ▁wa je ▁ndiya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesilo ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Mu we ▁fana ▁wanhu ▁wowo gozela ▁mwenevale ▁wawo , ▁vondaya bwele ▁kulawa ▁kuna i sola . ▁ Vonda ye ze ▁na ▁ku hodiza , ▁wa dahe ▁kum vugulil a ▁bahobaho .
▁Nolonga ▁nayo ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga , ▁funhufunhu ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁chi fi so , ▁ko niwona ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vini li . ▁ Habali ▁mweye ▁hamu dumbile ▁ku mulonga ▁vihile ▁Musa ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu ?”
▁Chi bugulu ▁chino ▁na ▁mhanda ▁ni ▁ukalangama ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁siza fosa ▁chi bugulu ▁chino ▁kwiza ▁kumwako ▁hebu ▁weye ▁hwiza fosa ▁chi bugulu ▁chino ▁na ▁mhanda ▁ino ▁kwiza ▁kumwangu ▁kwa ▁wihi .
▁Wala ▁sekemu tende ▁lupango ▁uli ▁na ▁vi da ndo ▁va ▁ku kwele la , ▁muladi ▁munhu ▁yo kwela ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁sekeya kale ▁mwa zi .”
▁Mwihi ▁viya komeleze ▁kumgeza ▁Yesu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila , ▁ka muleka ▁kwa ▁lusita .
▁Ni mwidika , ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁wawo ▁wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁ni hita ▁kuna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁na ▁ku wagwila ▁na ▁kuwatowa ▁wose ▁wo ku huwila ▁weye .
▁Ogu ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Bashani ▁niiyo ▁ya sigale ▁muhala ▁mwa ▁Walefai . ▁Ko mwa ▁jake ▁dodi tendigwe ▁kwa ▁zuma , ▁di kala ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁nne ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁wa ▁mita ▁mbili , ▁fana ▁viya ▁viili ▁ningo ▁zi zo weleke . ▁Ko mwa ▁ijo ▁ding ' hali ▁da uko ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁dodi tangigwa ▁L a ba , ▁dili ▁da ▁Waamoni .
▁Munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁chipofu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M wo nya za nya ! ▁M weye ▁hamu vimanyile ▁ko yo lawa , ▁ mbali ▁kani ho nya ▁meso ▁yangu !
▁Tata ▁ha mtagusa ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Mwanage ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku tagusa ,
▁Ya ng ' hali ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁hayana kwikigwa , ▁uhasanyi ▁ukala ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose . ▁Mbali ▁uhasanyi ▁hau petigwe ▁fana ▁uhasanyi ▁haja ▁heli bule ▁Malagilizo .
▁“ ▁‘ Siku ▁za ▁ku safyigwa ▁kwake ▁vonda zima le , ▁yaha pata ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chike , ▁kezamgalila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula , ▁iviya ▁kezamgalila ▁nziwa ▁hebu ▁ huwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi .
▁“ Si me oni ▁na ▁Lawi ▁ni ▁ndugu . ▁Wo sang ' hanila ▁silaha ▁zawo ▁kutenda ▁usede .
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁Na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ja ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁ha ▁mnyama ▁ya ▁mtufi ▁uwo , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁walo ▁jake , ▁ mbali ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo . ▁Na ▁yoyose ▁yondaya p a pe ▁mtufi ▁uwo ▁kolondeka ▁ku fu wa ▁walo ▁jake ▁na ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ chigulogulo .
▁M weye ▁mu vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wo tenda ▁yehile ▁haweza kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu . ▁ Sekemwi i vwizi le ▁wenyewo ! ▁Wa nhu ▁wokala ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁kuya ngala ▁chakachaka ▁na ▁wa tambikila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁na ▁wazinzi ▁hebu ▁wala wi ti ,
▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Mu hulike ni ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁mu mtunhize ▁yeye , ▁kwaviya ▁lusita ▁lwake ▁lwa ▁ku tagusa ▁lufika . ▁M tose leni ▁yeye ▁ yalumbile ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁na ▁bahali ▁na ▁nzasa ▁za ▁mazi .”
▁Yesu ▁ka wapetela ▁wanhu ▁mbuli ▁yake ▁kwa ▁masimwe ▁yamwenga ▁fana ▁ino , ▁kawalongela ▁viya ▁viwo daha ▁kuvimanya .
▁Bahobaho ▁kulawilila ▁ gudemek o ▁kulu ▁da ▁isi , ▁kwaviya ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ka hulumuka ▁kadi bimbilis a ▁dibwe ▁diya ▁na ▁ka dika lila .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁L o ta ni ▁wa tangigwa ▁Holi ▁na ▁He ma ni na , ▁ lumbu ▁jake ▁L o ta ni ▁ka tangigwa ▁T i mi na .
▁Weza de ng ' helela ▁ng ' hani ▁watumigwa ▁waja ▁mwenevale ▁wawo ▁vondaya bwele ▁ko wafika ▁wa me so ! ▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁mwenevale ▁iyo ▁keza i funga ▁mkwiji ▁mwii chigudi , ▁keza kala ▁nawo ▁mwii me za ▁na ▁kuwa sang ' hanila .
▁Yesu ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wakala ▁woja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ichilo . ▁Mwihi ▁kakala ▁kamwing ila ▁kamala ▁Yuda ▁Isikaliyoti , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Saimoni , ▁muladi ▁ yambiduke ▁Yesu .
▁Fesito ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mfalume ▁Agilipa ▁na ▁wose ▁ mwili ▁hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye , ▁mo muwona ▁munhu ▁ino . ▁Kaye ▁yose ▁ya ▁Wayahudi , ▁hano ▁na ▁kuja ▁Yelusalemu ▁wa ni lamba ▁kwa ▁ku guta ▁nyangi ▁kuwa ▁ha londeka ▁kuwa ▁mgima ▁kaidi .
▁Maabaho ▁keza sola ▁chi hande ▁cha ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁mwele zi ▁na ▁hisopo ▁na ▁ s ufu ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁ndege ▁yeli ▁mgima , ▁kezavi vabik a ▁vose ▁muna ▁idamu ▁ya ▁ndege ▁ija ▁ya chinjigwe ▁na ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁ya ▁nzasa . ▁Keza i mizil a ▁ikaye ▁iyo ▁miyanza ▁saba .
▁Mwiza ya mbi ka ▁nyama ▁iyo ▁na ▁kui di la ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁ha ▁kumtambikila ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Maabaho ▁igolo ▁yake ▁imitondo ▁mwiza bwela ▁muna ▁yamahema ▁yenu .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Yandikigwa ▁vino , ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁keza gazigwa ▁na ▁zuwa ▁d eketatu ▁hamwande ▁keza zilibuka .
▁Kwa ▁siku ▁sita ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁hayag umigwe ▁lusu , ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁ku mtogoza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu . ▁Sekemu sang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁wowose ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo .
▁Mbali ▁Eli ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁m du kula ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka mkoma .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa walongele ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa i gole ▁mwii vi bumbila - bumbila , ▁wakale ▁hasi ▁hana ▁yama savu ▁ma bisi .
▁Wayahudi ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Ka ye ▁ino ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁i zengigw a ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁na ▁sita ! ▁W eye ▁kwiza i zenga ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu ?”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya dalise ▁vinhu ▁ivo , ▁kolondeka ▁yafu we ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁yo ge , ▁nayo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁“ Chi p indi ▁icho , ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wizakuwa ▁fana ▁vino . ▁Ku kala ▁na ▁wa li ▁longo ▁wowa solile ▁ma weng e ▁yawo , ▁m aabaho ▁wahita ▁kun gozela ▁m sola ji .
▁Habule ▁chimu ▁cha ▁ku wandikila ni ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ulondo ▁kwa ▁wahuwila ▁wayenu , ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁m fundizigw a ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁viya ▁viilondeka ▁ku inogela .
▁Yesu ▁viya wawonile ▁wowagonikigwe ▁wengi ▁wa sagula ▁vi goda ▁va ▁kuulongozi , ▁kawalongela ▁wose ▁simwe ▁dino ,
▁“ Mu hu mize ▁voilondeka ▁kwa ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁wachiwa , ▁hebu ▁sekemu sole ▁walo ▁da ▁mgane ▁kuwa ▁ le hani .
▁Vino ▁hachi londeka ▁ku hi ga ▁masimwe ▁ya ▁watumigwa ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁ma se kulu ▁zake ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁Ke fa , ▁kwa ▁kui longoza ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁yo huwila ▁muna ▁im iyanza ▁yetu .
▁Viwa lo kile ▁dilamba ▁wafika ▁isi ▁ya ▁Ge ne sa le ti ,
▁wa tegeleze ▁ tati ▁yako ▁na ▁mami ▁yako , ▁na ▁u mulonde ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁fana ▁viu i londa ▁weye ▁mwenyewo .”
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁hadaha ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁yaidumwe . ▁Ko daha ▁kutenda ▁chiya ▁muhala ▁chiya muwonile ▁Tat i ▁yake ▁kochi tenda , ▁kwaviya ▁chochose ▁chi yo tenda ▁Tata , ▁iviya ▁Mwana ▁kochi tenda .
▁muladi ▁ya i galile ▁mwenyewo ▁wahuwila ▁weli ▁na ▁ukulu , ▁wahuwila ▁weli bule ▁chinhu ▁chihile ▁hebu ▁uvwizi ▁hebu ▁kui ko nya ko nya , ▁ mbali ▁wawe ▁welile ▁na ▁weli bule ▁ubananzi .
▁Musa ▁kakala ▁msang ' hani ▁mwaminika ▁muna ▁i sang ' hano ▁yake ▁yose ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kalonga ▁vinhu ▁vondaya longe ▁Mulungu ▁hamwande .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁muna ▁ulung ' husesa ▁viwa muhulike ▁kolonga ▁ivo , ▁walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁kweli ▁ni ▁ija ▁im ulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Wa mgala ▁hanhu ▁ha tangigwe ▁Go li go ta , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Ha nhu ▁ha ▁ B o mbwe .”
▁One ▁Mulungu ▁yahalonda ▁niza kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho , ▁na ▁ni de ng ' helele ▁kuhumula ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁One ▁muha msola ▁ino ▁iviya ▁kulawa ▁kumwangu ▁yaha p a ti gwa ▁na ▁yehile ▁mwiza ni humulus a ▁kuzimu ▁na ▁kuno ▁na ▁mulala ▁ni li ▁na ▁m na mi lo .’
▁wowa petigwe ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁za ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁wakala ▁ 2 , 6 3 0 .
▁Wa segela ▁T a ha si ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Tela .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza kwiza ▁kulawa ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁nawo ▁weza kala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Bulahimu , ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁“ Walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Vondamu lo ke ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ,
▁Sa ng ' hane ni ▁sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁kwa ▁siku ▁sita , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁ni ▁siku ▁ya ▁kuhumula ▁ni ▁ye la , ▁siku ▁ini i bagule ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo , ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁nhaguso ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Ni na wi ▁weza wa z ugu miza ni ▁mweye , ▁kwaviya ▁wa samha ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁viwa muhulike ▁Yona ▁ko petela . ▁Nowalongela ▁hano ▁hana ▁mkulu ▁kumfosa ▁Yona .
▁“ Vi lu fosile ▁lusita ▁lutali , ▁mwenevale ▁wa ▁watumigwa ▁waja ▁kabwela ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kupeta ▁hela ▁ziya weng ' hile ▁watumigwa ▁wake .
▁muladi ▁ku lagusa ▁chinhu ▁chelile ▁hebu ▁cha mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Ya yo ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁kuson hela ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁na ▁chimvuguya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁uli ▁ma lola ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko ,
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Simeoni , ▁kakala ▁S ha fa ti ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Holi .
▁Mo to ▁u lawilila ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁uwa soma , ▁nawo ▁wadanganika ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁M wa nahina ▁imwe ▁yoya lo ndigwe ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ya kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁Niye ▁na hamwe ▁na ▁weye ▁na ▁kuku kaliza ▁hohose ▁hou hita , ▁na ▁nizaku bweleza ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino . ▁ Siza kuleka ▁m baka ▁vondani kutendele ▁yose ▁yoni ku laganile .”
▁No walongele ni ▁kweli , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel wa ▁uno ▁haweza fosa ▁bule ▁m baka ▁yayo ▁yose ▁ya lawilile .
▁Musa ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wokwiza ▁kumwangu ▁ku uza ▁viyolonda ▁Mulungu .
▁Yosefu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga , ▁“ M weye ▁wenyewo ▁ muwona ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yenu ▁na ▁hata ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁Benjamini ▁ka niwona ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yake ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁iyo ▁mwenyewo ▁Yosefu ▁yoni longa ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Vi zifosile ▁siku ▁chidogo , ▁Yesu ▁kabwela ▁kaidi ▁Kapelinaumu , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa hulika ▁kuwa ▁ka ▁ukaye .
▁“ Walongele ni ▁Waisilaili ,
▁Wanangu , ▁uno ▁ni ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁uhelelo ! ▁Mu hulika ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udugi ▁kwa ▁Chilisito ▁kezakwiza , ▁ mbali ▁hata ▁sambi ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weli ▁na ▁udugi ▁kwa ▁Chilisito ▁wa lawilila , ▁ivo ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁uno ▁ni ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁uhelelo .
▁na ▁ go l ombe la ▁na ▁ng ' he ng e ▁na ▁ g u gulu ▁na ▁lwivi .
▁Wanage ▁Lawi ▁wakala ▁Gelishoni ▁na ▁Kohasi ▁na ▁Melali .
▁Iviya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁nawo ▁wa dahe ▁ku mtunhiza ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubazi ▁wake . ▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Kwa viya ▁nizaku togoza ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zimwenga . ▁Na ▁iviya ▁niza kwimba ▁nhogolwa ▁ya ▁zina ▁jako .”
▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁iyo ▁Musa ▁kawalagiliza ▁wanhu , ▁kalonga ,
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁yelihi ▁yoyatendile ▁uhasanyi ▁hata ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ yelekigwe ▁chipofu ? ▁Vino ▁ni ▁yeye ▁mwene y wo ▁hebu ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kamwidika ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Mbali ▁Waisilaili ▁haweza nihuwila ▁na ▁haweza ni tegeleza , ▁mana ▁wezalonga , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁haku lawilile ▁bule .’ ▁”
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Kuna ▁munhu ▁kani dalisa , ▁kwaviya ▁ni wona ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁u ho nya ji ▁lu ni lawa .”
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁mwaha potwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁mwiza tagusigwa ▁kwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Kuna ▁lukwale .” ▁Mbali ▁yeye ▁ka kanha miza ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁i kala ▁ivo . ▁Walonga , ▁“ Iyo ▁ni ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wake !”
▁Ka i tendela ▁imeza ▁iyo ▁ mhete ▁nne ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kuzi guma ▁muna ▁ivi ng obweda ▁vake ▁vi ne ▁hai mile ▁imigulu .
▁M wanamke ▁imwe ▁Mkanaani ▁yoyo kala ▁isi ▁ija ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁kalila ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi ! ▁Ni wonele ▁ubazi , ▁Mwenevale ! ▁ Mndele ▁wangu ▁kana ▁chinyamkela ▁na ▁ko gaya ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Yohana ▁kamulongela ▁Yesu , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁chi muwona ▁munhu ▁ko lava ▁vinyamkela ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jako . ▁Chi n gomesa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kwaviya ▁heli ▁mwii chi bumbila ▁chetu ▁bule .”
▁Abimeleki ▁kawa zuma ▁wanhu ▁wose , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondayam dalise ▁munhu ▁ino ▁hebu ▁muke ▁wake ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .”
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁M weye ▁watumwa , ▁wa tegelezeni ▁wenevale ▁wenu ▁chi lu ku li , ▁kwa ▁kudumba ▁na ▁kwa ▁ku gudemeka , ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁unogile , ▁fana ▁vimu mtegeleza ▁Chilisito .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁wose ▁wa lava ▁vinhu ▁vovi sigale ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vawo , ▁ mbali ▁ino ▁muna ▁u ngaye ngaye ▁wake ▁ka lava ▁vose ▁viyeli navo .”
▁Mfalume ▁kawauza , ▁“ S ang ' hano ▁yenu ▁ilihi ?” ▁Na wo ▁wamwidika ▁mfalume , ▁“ Ch eye ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako ▁ni ▁wa dima ji ▁fana ▁viya ▁viwa kalile ▁wa saho ▁zetu .”
▁Viwafikile ▁Sala mi , ▁wa peta ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁za ▁Wayahudi . ▁Yohana ▁Maliki ▁kakala ▁m tazi ▁wawo .
▁Mbali ▁Musa ▁kedika , ▁“ W eye ▁ko wona ▁migongo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu ? ▁Ihaw ile ▁vinoga ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁waha wile ▁walotezi ▁na ▁one ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yahawa gum ile ▁muhe ▁wake !”
▁Lelo ▁m uiteganye ▁sekemwi ze ▁ku p a ti gwa ▁na ▁yaja ▁ya longigwe ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁M se de ▁ya handile ▁mi savu ▁niiyo ▁Mwihi ▁ku gozela ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁isi ▁na ▁waja ▁wo gobola ▁ni ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Ya mwenga ▁ya ▁ kongeza , ▁muwe ▁na ▁ulondo ▁kwaviya ▁ulondo ▁wo lumbiliza ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁chigangamavu .
▁Sekemu i sole ▁nawo . ▁Wa ndele ▁wenu ▁sekewa soligwe ▁kumwawo ▁hebu ▁wabwanga ▁zenu ▁sekewa sole ▁kumwawo ,
▁wa tanga ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁na ▁wa uza , ▁“ Ha no ▁hano ▁mgeni ▁yo tangigwa ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ?”
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁ka kwela ▁kumulima ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamtanga ▁Musa ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vondau walongele ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Waisilaili .
▁Pa gi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ O kila ni ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Asheli ,
▁ Muiteganye ▁sekemuwa zimize ▁Walawi ▁lusita ▁lose ▁lo mu kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yenu .
▁na ▁wa zima ▁m izo to ▁mi ka li , ▁wa ho nyo kwa ▁kudanganika ▁kwa ▁zele ▁kulu , ▁wakala ▁nyondenyonde ▁ mbali ▁wa pata ▁ludabwa , ▁wakala ▁magalu ▁muna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁ivo ▁wa wawinga ▁wa towa ng ' hondo ▁wa ▁chi ge ni .
▁Loleni , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ka ika ▁isi ▁ino ▁haulongozi ▁wenu . ▁ Hiteni , ▁muka ihazi ▁fana ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁viya mulongeleni . ▁ Sekemudumbe ▁hebu ▁sekemu fe ▁moyo .’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka wona ▁kuwa ▁Leya ▁ha l ondigwa ▁goya , ▁ivo ▁kamtenda ▁ye leke , ▁ mbali ▁Laheli ▁ he leke ▁bule .
▁One ▁yahawa ▁ngayengaye , ▁sekeu kale ▁na ▁walo ▁jake ▁ichilo ▁chose .
▁M pule ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁mana ▁mi bumo ▁ino ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁vi iyoha ▁ng ' hani . ▁Niye ▁niza mulekela ni ▁mu segele ▁na ▁hebu ▁hamwiza gendelela ▁kukala ▁hano .”
▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yo daha ▁kuzi huma ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁za ▁zisi ▁zose ? ▁Munhu ▁ija ▁yo huwila ▁kuwa ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Nokulamba ▁Mndewa , ▁niye ▁sidaha ▁kulonga ▁goya ▁kwandusi la ▁mwaka ‚ ▁hata ▁kuson gela ▁baho ▁viulongile ▁na ▁niye ▁msang ' hani ▁wako , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁sidaha ▁kulonga ▁goya , ▁na ▁lulimi ▁lwangu ▁lu za ma .”
▁Na ▁wa wagala ▁wanaake ▁na ▁vinhu ▁viwa vi ho kile ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁Waisilaili , ▁hana ▁ya mala go ▁hana ▁izisi ▁zili ▁muna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Moabu ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁uli ▁ma lola ▁na ▁bululu ▁da ▁Yeliko .
▁Keza mu longole la ▁Mndewa , ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁fana ▁lwa ▁Eliya ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwatenda ▁china ▁tata ▁wawa gese ▁iwa na ▁wawo . ▁Keza wahi ndu la ▁wanhu ▁wo hawa muhulika ▁Mulungu ▁wa gese ▁m agesa ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wanogile , ▁kuwatenda ▁wanhu ▁wa isasale ▁kumuhokela ▁Mndewa .”
▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁mulotezi ▁wake ▁Isaya ▁chi ti mi ye ,
▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁weza msola ▁na ▁kumgala ▁kwa ▁walala ▁kuna ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁bululu .
▁One ▁ija ▁ya tagusigwe ▁keng ' higwa ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁ku la n higwa ▁mibalati , ▁msemi ▁keza lagiliza ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ya tambala le ▁hasi ▁ya la n higwe ▁mibalati ▁kwa ▁viya ▁viya banange .
▁yo faya ▁choni ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo ▁uko t ele ▁moto ▁ wi g u t e ,” ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kumwing ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁va ▁ugima ?
▁Vino ▁hai londeke ▁bule ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁kugazigwa ▁vili ngile ▁vino , ▁na ▁hamwande ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wake ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁diyelo ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Daudi ▁kelek igwa ▁Mulopozi ▁wenu , ▁iyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mndewa !
▁“ Mu teganye ▁sekemu sang ' hane ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kutogoligwa ▁na ▁wawo . ▁Mu vimanye ▁mwaha sang ' hana ▁mbuli ▁zi fa ni le ▁izo , ▁hamwiza daha ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁gweko ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Benjamini ▁kakala ▁Eli dadi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁K isi lo ni .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni longa ▁funhu ▁funhu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose . ▁ Siku ▁zose ▁mafundizo ▁yangu ▁ya tendeka ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁muna ▁Zi kaye ▁za ▁kutosela , ▁hanhu ▁howo iti na na ▁Wayahudi ▁wose . ▁Si longile ▁chochose ▁kwa ▁chi fi so .
▁ mulongeleni ▁mwene ▁kaye , ▁‘ Mfundiza ▁ko ku uza , ▁cha kulihi ▁chiheleto ▁cha ▁wageni , ▁ni je ▁Pasaka ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wangu ?’
▁Iviya ▁ka gala ▁ziga ▁da ▁zahabu ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁di memile ▁ubani ,
▁“ Mbali ▁one ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaha lola ▁na ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁chimvuguya ▁ha c he ne le ▁bule ▁muna ▁diwalo ,
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁ya so ngile ▁ku lima ▁m aabaho ▁ko lola ▁kuchisogo , ▁ha faya ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Mu hu mize ▁voilondeka ▁na ▁sekemu lole ▁chihanga ▁cha ▁munhu ▁na ▁sekemu hokele ▁lu s h wa , ▁kwaviya ▁lu s h wa ▁yo tula ▁meso ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁na ▁ubala ▁na ▁kwa giza ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wanogile .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁ sa fu la ▁keza ▁kwa ▁Yesu .
▁Maabaho ▁kawa bwelela ▁waja ▁wanahina ▁watatu , ▁ka wafika ▁wa gona . ▁Ka muuza ▁Petili , ▁“ Saimoni , ▁kugona ? ▁Hu dahile ▁kukala ▁meso ▁hata ▁kwa ▁zuwa ▁dimwe ▁muhala ?”
▁Wa nahina ▁wamuuza ▁munhu ▁yoya honyigwe , ▁“ Munhu ▁iyo ▁ka kulihi ?” ▁Ka wedika , ▁“ M a n ye .”
▁Sekeu chi gume ▁muna ▁yama ge zo , ▁ mbali ▁uchi kombole ▁na ▁ija ▁mwihi , ▁kwaviya ▁ufalume ▁wako ▁u na ▁ludabwa , ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .’
▁ Mogesa ▁mu mala ▁kupata ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁cho mulonda . ▁ Mogesa ▁muwa ▁matajili ▁mu mala . ▁ Mogesa ▁muwa ▁wafalume , ▁inga wa ▁cheye ▁siyo . ▁ Vinoga , ▁no wa londe leni ▁muwe ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁muladi ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiwe ▁wafalume ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye .
▁Ona , ▁Tata , ▁chino ▁ni icho ▁chi ku no geze ▁weye .
▁Wa kulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁wakulu ▁wetu ▁wam tula ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁Chi lu mi ▁ya tagusigwe ▁ifa , ▁m aabaho ▁kawa mbigwa ▁mumsalaba ,
▁‘ Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kolondeka ▁ku geligwa ▁m makono ▁ya ▁wa hasanyi , ▁nawo ▁weza muwamb a ▁mumsalaba , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁ y eketatu ▁hamwande ▁keza zilibuka .’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁wang ' wa ▁divai ▁i ka li ka ▁ya ▁ku londa ▁ng ' hani ▁ugoni , ▁wafalume ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose ▁wa tenda ▁ugoni ▁nayo , ▁wa chuuzi ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose ▁wawa ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁madambwa ▁yake .”
▁Laheli ▁na ▁Leya ▁wamwidika ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Ch eye ▁cha bule ▁kaidi ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁hebu ▁uhazi ▁wowose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yetu .
▁Kalonga , ▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁damu ▁yoi lagusa ▁lagano ▁diya ▁Mulungu ▁di yamulagilize ni ▁mudi tegeleze .”
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁walala , ▁“ Chi gozele ni ▁hano ▁m baka ▁vondachi bwele . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Hu li ▁weza kuwa ▁baha no ▁na ▁mweye , ▁yoyose ▁yondaya we ▁na ▁mbuli ▁kodaha ▁kuwa hiti la ▁wawo .”
▁“ Na ▁mwana ▁wa ▁m mba go ▁yoyose , ▁hebu ▁mwana ▁yondaya mweleke , ▁m baka ▁welesi ▁wa ▁longo , ▁ha londeka ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁um ting ' hano ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁chi dali ▁chiya ▁chi n u ligwe ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso ▁cha ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁chi ma ▁chochi lavigwa ▁nhambiko , ▁modaha ▁kudi la ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁ha hana kwa mbula ▁mwiko . ▁Kwiza kuja ▁weye ▁na ▁wanago ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁wa ▁chike . ▁Vi nhu ▁ivo ▁ kwing ' higwa ▁kuwa ▁hanhu ▁ha ko ▁na ▁ha ▁welesi ▁wako ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁zi nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo ▁za ▁Waisilaili .
▁Leka mana ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁walonga , ▁“ Mu uze ni ▁mwenyewo . ▁Y eye ▁ni ▁munhu ▁mkulu ▁ngima !”
▁Lelo ▁ hinduke ni ▁mu gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza , ▁ hite ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁milima ▁ya ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁kolongo ▁da ▁Yoludani , ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁na ▁ma bawe , ▁uko ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁na ▁mhwani . ▁ Hiteni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁na ▁L e ba no ni ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁ulwanda ▁ ulu kulu ▁lwa ▁Efulati .
▁na ▁Eliabu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁He lo ni ▁kakala ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni .
▁Maabaho ▁munhu ▁ija ▁kasegela ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁kuwa ▁yoya mu ho nyi le ▁kakala ▁Yesu .
▁“ ▁‘ S o mba ▁yoyose ▁wa ▁muna ▁ibahali ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ulwanda ▁yeli ▁na ▁m pe pe ▁na ▁ma kala ba ndu ▁modaha ▁kuja ,
▁Mbali ▁Chilisito ▁ka lava ▁nhosa ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi , ▁nhosa ▁yoi faya ▁siku ▁zose , ▁m aabaho ▁kakala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Iviya ▁wayage ▁Saimoni , ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁Yohana ▁wana ▁wa ▁Zebedayo , ▁nawo ▁wazanywa . ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela ▁Saimoni , ▁“ Sekeudumbe , ▁kwandusi la ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁kwiza kuwa ▁mvula ji ▁wa ▁wanhu .”
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa wonile ▁di lawilile , ▁wawalongela ▁wamwenga ▁yaja ▁yam patile ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁nguluwe .
▁Na ▁L e uma ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁chike ▁wa ▁Naholi ▁yoya mtendile ▁fana ▁muke ▁wake , ▁iviya ▁kamwelek ela ▁wana , ▁T e ba ▁na ▁ G a la mu ▁na ▁T a ha la shi ▁na ▁Ma a ka .
▁Ka kala ▁kokwaminika ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya msagule ▁kutenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁uno , ▁fana ▁viya ▁Musa ▁viyakalile ▁mwaminika ▁muna ▁u kuwa sang ' hanila ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁wowa tangigwe ▁kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Zilipa ▁kamwelek ela ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wakale ▁hasi . ▁Ka ya sola ▁yaja ▁yamagate ▁saba , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Mulungu ▁hewela . ▁Maabaho ▁kaya mo gola ▁yamagate ▁yaja ▁na ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wa weng ' he ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁wawo ▁wa tenda ▁ivo .
▁Na ▁uno ▁uwo ▁usenga ▁uchi u hulike ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kuwa gong ' onde la ni . ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁bu ng ' hulo , ▁na ▁kumwake ▁yeye ▁kwa bule ▁ziza ▁jojose .
▁Ya yo ▁yose ▁ya lawilila ▁ya pate ▁kufika ▁yaja ▁ya longigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁kufose la ▁mulotezi ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁kweli .
▁ Muiteganye ▁muladi ▁ulegeho ▁wenu ▁sekeu watende ▁wa nyonde nyo nda ▁wa ▁uhuwilo ▁wa gwe ▁muna ▁uhasanyi .
▁“ Sekemu zimize ▁chino ▁choni mulongeleni ! ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza tu ligwa ▁m makono ▁ya ▁wanhu .”
▁Waisilaili ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza ▁kulawa ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi , ▁wa fose la ▁nzila ▁yoi hita ▁bahali ▁ya ▁Shamu ▁muladi ▁wa i zunguluke ▁isi ▁ya ▁Edomu . ▁Mbali ▁muna ▁inzila ▁wanhu ▁wa ndusa ▁ku le gela .
▁Wa nhu ▁wo kwe nde s ha ▁m ituka ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo kwela ▁vihongwe ▁iviya ▁wahita ▁hamwe ▁nayo , ▁di kala ▁ bumbila ▁kulu .
▁Ivo ▁Yohana ▁kahita ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁habehi ▁na ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yolodani . ▁Ka wapetela ▁wanhu , ▁“ Leke ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu , ▁mu batizigwe , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa segeze la ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu .”
▁Kaidi ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁ino ▁yolonga , ▁“ Haweza kwingila ▁ng ' o ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ hangu ▁ha ▁kuhumula .”
▁Hu lo ndigwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁kutimbuligwa ▁ ti mbu ▁wala ▁nhosa ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mbali ▁sambi ▁kwa ▁ifa ▁ya ▁Mwanage , ▁Mulungu ▁kamtenda ni ▁muwe ▁wa mbwiya ▁zake , ▁muladi ▁ya mwi ke ni ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weli bule ▁ching ' wa s u ▁haulongozi ▁wake ,
▁M tumwa ▁si ▁munhu ▁wa ▁mwiikaye ▁siku ▁zose , ▁ mbali ▁mwana ▁ni ▁munhu ▁wa ▁mwiikaye ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Baho ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ndusa ▁ku iuzagiza ▁kwa ▁ludoko , ▁“ Vino ▁munhu ▁ino ▁kodaha ze ▁kuchi g ha ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁chi je ?”
▁Sekeu m gaze ▁mgane ▁yoyose ▁hebu ▁mwana ▁m chi wa .
▁Zi no ▁zi kala ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Lubeni . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa petigwe ▁wakala ▁ 4 3 , 7 3 0 .
▁Maabaho ▁weza ngala ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁wawo ▁weza m ke we za ▁na ▁weza mu lanha ▁mibalati ▁na ▁weza muwamb a ▁mumsalaba , ▁ mbali ▁siku ▁d eketatu ▁hamwande ▁keza zilibuka ▁kuwa danganike .”
▁Sekemu we ▁m v ava ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zihile , ▁zili ▁muna ▁diziza , ▁ mbali ▁zi gubul eni .
▁M nyama ▁iyo ▁kolondeka ▁ya di gwe ▁siku ▁iyo ▁iyo , ▁sekemu m si gaze ▁m baka ▁igolo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Baho ▁weza ilongela ▁milima , ▁‘ Chila galile ni ,’ ▁na ▁vi lima , ▁‘ Chi gubike ni .’
▁Petili ▁viya vimanyile ▁chochi mulawilile , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁novimanya ▁kweli ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁ka mtuma ▁m senga ▁wake ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ya ni lave ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Helode ▁na ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chowa chi lole le ▁Wayahudi ▁chi tendeke .”
▁Pilato ▁kawatanga ▁hamwe ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala ▁na ▁wanhu ,
▁U mwi mize ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose , ▁u mwing ' he ▁sang ' hano ▁iyo .
▁Kulaw a ▁mulima ▁lwa ▁Holebu ▁m baka ▁Kadeshi ▁Balinea ▁ni ▁ugen zi ▁wa ▁siku ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Seili .
▁Mbali ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanogel wa ▁na ▁Nuhu .
▁Vino ▁tata ▁yelihi ▁vimwili ▁yondaya p u ligwe ▁somba ▁na ▁mwanage ▁keza mwing ' ha ▁zoka ?
▁Bulahimu ▁kadanganika ▁mulala ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁kakala ▁na ▁de ng ' ho , ▁kahita ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zake .
▁N za sa ▁zose ▁za ▁mazi ▁hasi ▁ng ' hani ▁ya ▁isi ▁na ▁ma zonzo ▁ya ▁kuulanga ▁vi hindigwa , ▁na ▁mvula ▁ ileka ▁ku to nya .
▁Na wo ▁weza woneka ▁wa bananga ▁kwaviya ▁wa leka ▁chilagano ▁chawo ▁cha ▁mwanduso .
▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁ya ▁Wayahudi ▁di kala ▁habehi .
▁Yesu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Vino ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ulinga ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁nodaha ▁kuu linganyiz a ▁na ▁choni ?
▁Na ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Tata , ▁chila ▁lulimi ▁lwiza togola ▁kuwa , ▁“ Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁ni ▁Mndewa !”
▁Wa lotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ndik a , ▁‘ Wa nhu ▁wose ▁weza fundizigw a ▁na ▁Mulungu .’ ▁Na ▁yoyose ▁yoyo muhulika ▁Tata ▁na ▁ku ifunza ▁kumwake ▁kezakwiza ▁kumwangu .
▁Wo tenda ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muladi ▁wawo ni gwe ▁na ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁wo v a la ▁mu la mu lo ▁wa ndikigwe ▁Malagilizo ▁muna ▁i vihanga ▁vawo ▁na ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo , ▁na ▁wo p a nula ▁vi b wa ya ▁va ▁viwalo ▁vawo .
▁One ▁munhu ▁ha huwila ▁bule ▁yahawa goneka ▁muka je ▁ndiya ▁na ▁mo londa ▁kuhita , ▁di ye ni ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi kigwe ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu , ▁ bila ▁ku uza uza ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁lungilo ▁jenu .
▁Leka ▁chi i sole , ▁mweye ▁mwiza wa sola ▁wanetu ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiza wa sola ▁wanenu .
▁“ Siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁nne ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁ni ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁“ L agilizo ▁ni ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ubananzi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yondaya tende ▁kuilumba ▁niiyo ▁yondaya sole ▁nyama ▁ya ▁nhambiko .
▁Ivo ▁waja ▁wa nduse ▁kusang ' hana ▁vi wezile , ▁wa gesa ▁weza hokela ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁ mbali ▁nawo ▁weng ' higwa ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe .
▁Wa no ▁ni iwawo ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁woya walagilize ▁wa wagolele ▁Waisilaili ▁uhazi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani .
▁Y eye ▁muhala ▁yoyo daha ▁kuchi lopola , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁yo ching ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo daha ▁kuchi lopola .”
▁Cho vimanya ▁malagilizo ▁ni ▁ya ▁chimuhe , ▁ mbali ▁niye ▁ni ▁wa ▁chi lu ku li , ▁woni chuuzigwe ▁fana ▁viya ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁uhasanyi .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kawalongela ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁uja ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁“ Si wona ▁bule ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kumtagusa ▁munhu ▁ino .”
▁Wamwidika ‚ ▁“ M mi sili ▁kachi lopola ▁na ▁wa dimi ‚ ▁na ▁iviya ▁kachi de hela ▁mazi ▁na ▁kung ' wiza ▁wanyama ▁wetu .”
▁Maabaho ▁wafika ▁Eli mu , ▁ko ku kalile ▁na ▁nzasa ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁m itende ▁m alongo ▁saba . ▁Uko ▁weka ▁ma he ma ▁jawo ▁habehi ▁na ▁mazi .
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kuchisogo ▁mwiingalawa , ▁kagona ▁na ▁ka dika ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁mu m to . ▁Wa nahina ▁wa mu la mu sa , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁hu gesa ▁cheye ▁vichi danganika ?”
▁L udoko ▁lwangu ▁lwiza kwaka ▁fana ▁moto ▁lwiza soma ▁m baka ▁kuzimu , ▁na ▁ku lunguza ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁iisi . ▁I wiza bananga ▁isi ▁na ▁vose ▁vili ▁umo , ▁lwiza lunguza ▁va ndusil o ▁va ▁milima .
▁Musa ▁ka fundizigw a ▁ubala ▁wose ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁kakala ▁galu ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁na ▁sang ' hano .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza hita ▁na ▁kulola . ▁One ▁chimvuguya ▁ch e ne la ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁iyo , ▁uwo ▁ni ▁utamu ▁wa ▁chimvuguya , ▁kaye ▁iyo ▁ya mbula ▁mwiko .
▁“ M weye ▁ tegelezeni ▁na ▁mui funze ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁di si mwe ▁da ▁muha ndi .
▁Sekeu mbandame ▁muke ▁wa ▁mwanago , ▁kwaviya ▁iyo ▁ni ▁m koi ▁wako ▁wa ▁chike .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁keza mtemela ni ▁mate , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁wana ▁wengi ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wengi ▁na ▁migunda ▁yenu ▁iza lava ▁mazao . ▁Kwa viya ▁keza nogelw a ▁ku mtemela ni ▁mate ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyalondile ▁kuwa temela ▁mate ▁wa saho ▁zenu ,
▁Wa iting ' hana ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁mu iyoha ! ▁M ting ' hano ▁wose ▁we la , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kela ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ▁wose . ▁ Mbo na ▁mweye ▁mo itenda ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁M apanzia ▁yose ▁ya kala ▁na ▁utali ▁wa ▁mita ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁ugala mu ▁mita ▁mbili . ▁M apanzia ▁yose ▁ya kala ▁na ▁ningo ▁imwe .
▁Mbali ▁nhosa ▁izo ▁zo lavigwa ▁chila ▁mwaka ▁kuwa ku mbu sa ▁wanhu ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .
▁One ▁mweye ▁mwo watendela ▁yanogile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wowo mtendela ni ▁yanogile , ▁vino ▁mwiza hokela ▁unovu ▁u lihi ? ▁Kwa viya ▁hata ▁‘ wene ▁uhasanyi ’ ▁wo tenda ▁ivo !
▁Ivo ▁kaha segela ▁hana ▁indiya , ▁keka ▁ng o lole ▁wake ▁hamgwazo , ▁m aabaho ▁kasola ▁ng o lole , ▁kai funga ▁m chigudi .
▁Mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kahita ▁S uko ti , ▁uko ▁kai zengela ▁kaye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁vi zewe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanyama ▁wake . ▁Ivo ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁ha tangigwa ▁S uko ti .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁china ▁tata ▁sekemu watende ▁wanenu ▁wehilw e , ▁muwa lele ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁muna ▁in zuma ▁na ▁mafundizo .
▁Na yo ▁kedika , ▁“ Ni ▁ija ▁yoya muwonele ▁ubazi .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hita , ▁na ▁uka tende ▁ivo ▁ivo .”
▁“ Vondau ze ng e ▁kaye , ▁ zenga ▁ng ' huta ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁di gulu , ▁muladi ▁sekeu gale ▁ubananzi ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yako ▁munhu ▁yaha gwa ▁uko .
▁Iviya ▁keza gala ▁ huwa ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁nziwa ▁waidi ▁fana ▁vi yodaha . ▁Imwe ▁keza kuwa ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁imwenga ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula .
▁Iviya ▁one ▁um gulu ▁wako ▁uha kutenda ▁utende ▁yehile , ▁u kanhe . ▁M uhavu ▁ wingile ▁muna ▁ugima ▁na ▁um gulu ▁umwe , ▁kufosa ▁kuwa ▁na ▁migulu ▁midi ▁na ▁kwa sigwa ▁jehanamu .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chike , ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ma j uma ▁maidi , ▁fana ▁viili ▁viyo kuwa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake . ▁Keza gendelela ▁muna ▁uku i safya ▁kwake ▁kwa ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Bwel e za ▁fimbo ▁ya ▁Haluni ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano . ▁Iyo ▁iza kwikigwa ▁goya ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁muladi ▁iwe ▁lamulo ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili ▁wowo mulema ▁Musa , ▁one ▁hawalek ile ▁ku nilongele lela ▁wezadanganika .”
▁One ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ham nogele ▁bule , ▁ya muleke ▁yahite ▁ko ko se ▁ko yolonda . ▁Seke ya m chuuze ▁hebu ▁sekeya mtende ▁mtumwa , ▁kwaviya ▁ka mtendela ▁vihile .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁wazanywa ▁vi wawonile ▁ugangamalo ▁wa ▁ pe ti li ▁na ▁Yohana , ▁na ▁kuwa manya ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁hawa somile . ▁Wa vimanya ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁wakala ▁hamwe ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁M weye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁mu linga ▁fana ▁tambi ▁da ▁mzaituni ▁mbago , ▁mu lavigwa ▁uko ▁mwi kigwa ▁muna ▁umbiki ▁wa ▁kumgunda , ▁muna ▁di si na ▁dili ▁si ▁jenu ▁bule . ▁Mbali ▁Wayahudi ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁mzaituni ▁wa ▁kumgunda , ▁Lelo ▁ habule ▁u dala ▁Mulungu ▁kui ombe ka ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁di si na ▁jawo ▁wenyewo .
▁“ F i ne ha si ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Eleazali , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni , ▁kalu hi ndu la ▁ludoko ▁lwangu ▁lu lawe ▁kwa ▁Waisilaili , ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁na ▁migongo ▁hagati ▁yawo ▁fana ▁ini li ▁nayo ▁niye , ▁hata ▁ni leka ▁ku wadanganiza ▁Waisilaili ▁kwa ▁migongo ▁yangu .
▁“ Kwiza sola ▁vilung o ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁fana ▁vino , ▁mane ma ne ▁ya ▁mazi ▁chilo ▁sita , ▁mdala si ni ▁uli ▁na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁chilo ▁nhatu , ▁vilung o ▁vi n ung ' hila ▁goya ▁chilo ▁nhatu ,
▁Mu ho ke ni ▁hela ▁iyo ▁i yeli ▁nayo , ▁ mwing ' heni ▁ija ▁yeli ▁na ▁ma sanduku ▁longo ▁ya ▁hela .
▁“ ▁‘ M haka ▁yenu ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zua ▁izakuwa ▁ Bahali ▁ya ▁Meditelaniya .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kehilwa ▁kwaviya ▁kahita . ▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kam kimilila ▁muna ▁inzila . ▁Balaamu ▁kakala ▁ka kwela ▁chihongwe ▁wake ▁yahawa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁waidi .
▁Sa a ▁viifikile , ▁Yesu ▁kawasola ▁watumigwa ▁wake ▁na ▁kukala ▁nawo ▁mwii me za .
▁Kwa viya ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo pula , ▁kezahokela , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo zahila , ▁keza pata ▁na ▁yoyose ▁yo hodiza , ▁keza vugulil igwa .
▁Weza kuja ▁nyama ▁ichilo ▁icho ▁vondawa yo ke , ▁wezakuja ▁hamwe ▁na ▁gate ▁hadi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁na ▁ mbo ga ▁zili ▁usungu .
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁kema ▁haja ▁hagati ▁ya ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume , ▁ka zunguluk iligwa ▁na ▁vi umbe ▁weli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wane ▁na ▁walala . ▁Ka woneka ▁fana ▁ka chinjigwa . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁m ahembe ▁saba ▁na ▁meso ▁saba , ▁niiyo ▁M i he ▁saba ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoi tumigwe ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose .
▁Chilo ▁chimwe ▁Mndewa ▁kamulongela ▁Paulo ▁muna ▁yamalaguso , ▁“ Sekeudumbe , ▁ gendelela ▁kupeta ▁na ▁wala ▁sekeu nyama le ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁u mulongele ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Waebulaniya ▁kolonga , ▁‘ Wa lekele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite ▁muladi ▁wa ka ni tose le .
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁vichi vimanya , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁viweli ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mwihi ▁ija ▁viweli . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁hawa tenda ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁ku leka ▁kuwa londa ▁ndugu ▁zawo ▁siyo ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁nayo ▁kezam ng ' wiza ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁mazi ▁yayo ▁yeli ▁usungu ▁yoyo gala ▁ duwilo , ▁nayo ▁yeza kwingila ▁mgati ▁yake ▁na ▁ku mgalila ▁mawine ▁makulu ▁ng ' hani .
▁Na ▁viyakalile ▁muu mwa nza , ▁wanhu ▁wa nza nza ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁mwiinzila .
▁ bila ▁kumgala ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁ha ▁kwingilila ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ko kuwa ▁kabananga ▁kwa ▁kwi itila ▁damu , ▁ ke ti la ▁damu ▁na ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁ija ▁yo longigwa ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile , ▁‘ Dib we ▁do wa lemile ▁mweye ▁wa ze nzi ▁kuzengela , ▁diwa ▁dibwe ▁dinogile ▁kufosa ▁mabwe ▁yose ▁ya ▁kuzengela .’
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁waja ▁watatu ▁wawa o na ▁Musa ▁na ▁Eliya ▁wolonga ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁“ M biki ▁wa ▁mtini ▁uwa fundize ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁vondamu wone ▁matambi ▁yake ▁yo kuwa ▁mate ke ▁na ▁mayani ▁yo s u ka , ▁mwo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ msimu ▁wa ▁mvula ▁wa mmabehi .
▁One ▁muha tenda ▁ivo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza muwonela ni ▁ludoko . ▁Keza tenda ▁mvula ▁seke itonye , ▁na ▁isi ▁yenu ▁iza nyala ▁na ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁havi za kula ▁bule . ▁Maabaho ▁mwiza na ng igwa ▁uko ▁himahima , ▁inga wa ▁ni ▁isi ▁inogile ▁iyo mwing ' hani .
▁Bahobaho ▁panzia ▁da ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁di tulika ▁vihande ▁vidi ▁kulawa ▁uchanyha ▁m baka ▁hasi , ▁isi ▁i gudemeka ▁na ▁mi lu we ▁i tulika .
▁Iviya ▁kumbukeni ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomola ▁na ▁mabululu ▁yoya kalile ▁mumgwazogwazo , ▁wakaya ▁wake ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁waja , ▁wa tenda ▁ugoni ▁na ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kuya ngala ▁walume ▁kwa ▁walume , ▁weng ' higwa ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁moto ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁diwe ▁lamulo ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Efulaimu , ▁kakala ▁Ho s he a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni .
▁Na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁we ▁sita ▁ka gida ▁ha mha ▁jake ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁F ula ti , ▁mazi ▁yake ▁ya nyala ▁muladi ▁ku sasala ▁nzila ▁ya ▁wafalume ▁kulawa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa .
▁Yaha wa ▁cho u togola ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁wanhu , ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ uza ma ▁ng ' hani , ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁ka lava ▁ukalangama ▁vino ▁kuson hela ▁Mwanage .
▁“ Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁na ▁ku muhuwila ▁ija ▁yoyanitumile , ▁kana ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose . ▁He za tagusigwa ▁kwaviya ▁ka fosa ▁muna ▁i i fa ▁na ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁u u gima .
▁Kawa sa ▁ng o lole ▁wake , ▁ka zumha ▁na ▁ku mwitila ▁Yesu .
▁“ Muiteganye ▁na ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁uvwizi , ▁wokwiza ▁kwa ▁ku woneka ▁fana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁kwa ▁kunze , ▁ mbali ▁mgati ▁yawo ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁mbwizi .
▁Viya wonile ▁Wayahudi ▁wano geligwa ▁na ▁chiya ▁chiyatendile , ▁ka gendelela ▁na ▁kahita ▁kumgwila ▁Petili . ▁Yano ▁ya lawilila ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁Didugila ▁da ▁M agate ▁hayana gumigw a ▁L usu .
▁Malagilizo ▁ya lawilila , ▁ivo ▁wihi ▁wongezeka , ▁ mbali ▁uhasanyi ▁vi wongezeke , ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wongezeka ▁ng ' hani .
▁ Zindilil eni ▁ndagilizi ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yose ▁yoni mwing ' hileni ▁diyelo , ▁muladi ▁mu temeligw e ▁mate ▁hamwe ▁na ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁na ▁mu gendelele ▁kukala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁iwe ▁yenu ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁U ka zi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ukala ▁kuna ▁ivi leme , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya dahile ▁ku mfunga ▁kaidi , ▁hata ▁kwa ▁minyololo .
▁L i da ▁si ▁hata li ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁Yopa , ▁ivo ▁wanahina ▁viwahulike ▁Petili ▁ka uko , ▁wawatum a ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁kumwake , ▁na ▁wamulamba , ▁“ Izo ▁kumwetu ▁himahima ”
▁Wanangu ▁walondwa , ▁no mwandikilani ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁muladi ▁sekemu tende ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁chi nayo ▁yeye ▁yoyo chi gombela ▁kwa ▁Tata , ▁niiyo ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁vihongwe ▁wakala ▁ 6 1 ,000
▁Mbali ▁Sauli , ▁zina ▁jake ▁dimwenga ▁Paulo , ▁kuno ▁ka mema ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁kam bunhul ila ▁yameso ▁Eli ma ,
▁“ Sekeu mulongele ze ▁mkaya ▁miyago ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uvwizi .
▁Vino ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁muhala ? ▁Vino ▁si ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ? ▁Ona ▁yeye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁iviya .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ chigulogulo , ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁wamuhitila ▁na ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Ha nhu ▁hano ▁ho chi li ▁ni ▁chuwala ▁muhala , ▁na ▁sambi ▁di s wa .
▁“ ▁‘ Siku ▁zose ▁za ▁chilaho ▁chino ▁cha ▁kuika ▁hakwe , ▁sekeya wegule ▁nyele ▁zake ▁m baka ▁siku ▁zake ▁za ▁kuika ▁hakwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vonda zi fike , ▁keza kuwa ▁kela ▁na ▁keza zi leka ▁nyele ▁zake ▁zi ku le .
▁Sekemu itowe ▁nawo ▁kwaviya ▁siza mwing ' hani ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yawo . ▁ Siza mwing ' hani ▁hata ▁hanhu ▁ha dodo ▁ha ▁ku bojoga . ▁Isi ▁iyo ▁ya ▁milima ▁ya ▁Seili ▁ni weng ' ha ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Esau ▁iwe ▁yawo .
▁Maabaho ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁iyo ▁kasegela , ▁na ▁ Kolineliyo ▁kawatanga ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁waidi ▁na ▁mkalizi , ▁mkalizi ▁iyo ▁ni i ja ▁ya kalile ▁yon dumba ▁Mulungu ▁na yoyo k waminika ▁mwa ▁iwa ja ▁wowo msang ' hanila .
▁Yosefu ▁kai kumbuka ▁nzozi ▁yoya ilo tile ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ M weye ▁mwiza ▁ku pelemba ▁u nyo nyonde ▁wa ▁isi ▁yetu .”
▁Kaidi ▁Mulungu ▁hai yo ne le ▁ubazi ▁isi ▁yose ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁ mbali ▁ka mkaliza ▁Nuhu ▁yoya gong ' onde ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁saba ▁baho ▁viya wagalile ▁ gombo ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁ya ▁wihi .
▁Ivo ▁walume ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wapetigwa , ▁weli ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wowa dahile ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁ng ' holo ▁zawo ▁na ▁kaye ▁zawo .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁yowa gela ▁moyo ▁wanhu ▁wa bene ke ▁umoyo , ▁ka ching ' ha ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁kwiza ▁kwa ▁Tito .
▁Chi hongwe ▁viyamuwonile ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ka tambala la ▁hasi . ▁Balaamu ▁ka wona ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ka mtowa ▁kwa ▁fimbo ▁yake .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo lema ▁kutegeleza ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁ko danganika ▁ bila ▁ubazi ▁one ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁usindila ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu .
▁Na ▁weye ▁Kapelinaumu ! ▁Vino ▁ko londa ▁kui nula ▁mwenyewo ▁m baka ▁kuulanga ? ▁Kwiza hulumus igwa ▁m baka ▁kuzimu ! ▁One ▁mauzauza ▁yoya tendeke ▁kumwako ▁yaha tendeke ▁Sodoma , ▁basi ▁bululu ▁ijo ▁di ha wile ▁baho ▁m baka ▁diyelo .
▁Wa tumigwa ▁wa togola , ▁vi ku kung u zu ke ▁wengi la ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kufundiza . ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo ▁na ▁wayage ▁wa watanga ▁hamwe ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁ichitala ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi , ▁m aabaho ▁wawatum a ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁wa wagale ▁watumigwa ▁waja .
▁Wa mweda ▁waja ▁weli ▁wa ho le , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁keza watenda ▁wawe ▁wa hazi ▁wa ▁isi .
▁Kwa ▁uhuwilo ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁wo longiligwa ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Vino ▁yelihi ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Mulungu ▁chinhu ▁chochose , ▁m baka ▁ya dahe ▁ku lihigwa ▁chinhu ▁icho ?”
▁Balaamu ▁kamulongela ▁Balaki , ▁“ Ni zengele ▁hano ▁ma pango ▁saba , ▁uni galile ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁m alume ▁saba ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁saba .”
▁Uko ▁Yopa ▁kukala ▁na ▁mwanahina ▁wa ▁chike ▁ya tangigwe ▁T a b i ta , ▁kwa ▁Chigiliki ▁D o li ka si , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ M ta la ti ” ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁kotenda ▁yanogile ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁ka wataza ▁ngayengaye .
▁nawo ▁walala ▁wa ▁chike ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁u longe ▁nawo ▁kwa ▁uhole ▁fana ▁viya ▁mami ▁zako , ▁na ▁wa ndele ▁fana ▁viya ▁ lumbu ▁zako , ▁ bila ▁kuwa gesa ▁vihile .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamzilibula ▁Yesu , ▁na ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁ha lu wo lile ▁bule .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁ Nokulongela ▁ni ▁vinoga ▁u gule ▁kumwangu ▁zahabu ▁i sunh igwe ▁kwa ▁moto ▁muladi ▁uwe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁kaidi ▁muhavu ▁u gule ▁walo ▁ ze lu ▁u v a le ▁na ▁ku gubika ▁chinyala ▁cha ▁mwa zi ▁wako , ▁ gula ▁da wa ▁ya ▁meso ▁uka gume ▁mmeso ▁yako ▁u dahe ▁kulola .
▁ mbali ▁no wamanya . ▁No manya ▁kuwa ▁ mwabule ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Sekemu muwonele ▁ubazi ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁mu segeze ▁wihi ▁wa ▁kumkoma ▁munhu ▁yeli bule ▁ubananzi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili , ▁muladi ▁mukale ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .
▁Wing u ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁di kala ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁imisi , ▁umoto ▁wa ka ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁ichilo , ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁kaye ▁zose ▁za ▁Waisilaili ▁lusita ▁lose ▁lwa ▁miyanza ▁yawo .
▁Ka gwa ▁hasi ▁na ▁kuhulika ▁dizi ▁do mulongela , ▁“ S a uli , ▁Sauli ! ▁ Habali ▁ko ni gaza ?”
▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁i mguma ▁luholozi ▁ng ' hani ▁Bulahimu , ▁kwaviya ▁Ishumaili ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁kakala ▁mwanage .
▁Ng ' hondo ▁na ▁ndwagi ▁kumwenu ▁vo lawa ▁kulihi ? ▁V o lawa ▁muna ▁zi ta ma a ▁zenu ▁za ▁madambwa ▁zozi itowa ▁mgati ▁ya ▁ng ' huli ▁zenu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Beleya ▁wakala ▁wo tegeleza ▁goya ▁kuwa fosa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Sesalonike . ▁Wa u hokela ▁usenga ▁uja ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho , ▁na ▁chila ▁siku ▁wakala ▁woya pekul a ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁muladi ▁wa wone ▁fana ▁Paulo ▁kolonga ▁kweli .
▁na ▁iviya ▁ha tangigwa ▁M isi p a , ▁mana ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ya chi kalize ▁weye ▁na ▁niye ▁lusita ▁vichi wa ▁kutali ▁ bila ▁kui wona .”
▁One ▁kuna ▁munhu ▁yoya m gum ile ▁usungu ▁umwenga ▁ hani gum ile ▁usungu ▁niye , ▁ mbali ▁kawa guma ▁usungu ▁mweye ▁mose ▁na ▁iviya ▁si londa ▁niwe ▁m ta tali ▁ng ' hani ▁bule .
▁Zi no ▁izo ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁kabila ▁da ▁Manase , ▁ peta ▁yawo ▁wakala ▁walume ▁ 5 2 , 7 00.
▁“ Siyo ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yoni tanga ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁Mndewa ’ ▁keza kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁muhala ▁wowo tenda ▁yaja ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yoyo londa ▁wa ya tende .
▁“ Niye ▁na n z abibu , ▁mweye ▁mwa ▁matambi . ▁Munhu ▁yaha kala ▁mgati ▁mmwangu ▁na ▁niye ▁mgati ▁mmwake , ▁kezakwelek a ▁matunda ▁mengi , ▁kwaviya ▁mwii du mwe ▁ham daha ▁bule ▁kutenda ▁chochose .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Mulungu ‚ ▁“ One ▁niha hita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁na ▁kuwalongela ‚ ▁‘ Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁ka nhu ma ▁kumwenu ‚ ’ ▁nawo ▁weza ni uza ‚ ▁‘ Zin a ▁jake ▁na ni ?’ ▁Ni walongele ze ?”
▁Sekeu togole ▁kuhulika ▁ma longele zi ▁yo mson hela ▁mulala ▁yo languliza ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁one ▁haya galigwe ▁na ▁wa kalangama ▁waidi ▁hebu ▁watatu .
▁He lo di ▁ka wehila ▁ng ' hani ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni , ▁ivo ▁wahita ▁hamwe ▁kumulola . ▁Teng ' hu ▁wa tenda ▁u mbwiya ▁na ▁ B a la sito , ▁ya kalile ▁msang ' hani ▁yo k waminika ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁muladi ▁ya wataze . ▁Maabaho ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁Helode ▁na ▁wa mpula ▁ku we ▁na ▁tindiwalo , ▁kwaviya ▁zisi ▁zawo ▁zi huwila ▁isi ▁ya ▁mfalume ▁kupata ▁ndiya .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁heza mulekelela ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza muwonela ▁ludoko ▁na ▁migongo ▁munhu ▁iyo . ▁Ma duwilo ▁yose ▁yoya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino ▁yeza m pata , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza di segeza ▁zina ▁da ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Walonga ▁wawo ▁wabala , ▁ mbali ▁wawa ▁wabozi .
▁Yesu ▁ka muwonela ▁ubazi , ▁kau golosa ▁umkono ▁wake , ▁kam dalisa ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Nolonda ▁kuku taza , ▁ hona !”
▁keza mu ja ▁mwanage ▁yeli ▁ching ' hele ▁na ▁ko ndo ▁jake ▁ bila ▁mulumake ▁hebu ▁mwanage ▁yoyose ▁kuvimanya .
▁Mbali ▁no uza , ▁vino ▁ha wahulike ▁bule ? ▁Ona ▁kuhulika ▁wa hulika , ▁fana ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Di zi ▁jawo ▁ je ne la ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose , ▁mbuli ▁zawo ▁zi fika ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose .”
▁Ko mulongela ▁Mulungu , ▁“ Niza walongela ▁ndugu ▁viya ▁vi wi li , ▁niza k wi m bila ▁nyila ▁za ▁nhogolwa ▁muna ▁im iting ' hano ▁yawo .”
▁Vino ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ tati ▁yetu ▁Yakobo ? ▁Y eye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁wanage ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wake ▁wang ' wa ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ chisima ▁chino !”
▁Hamoli ▁na ▁Shekemu ▁mwanage ▁wa nogelw a ▁kwa ▁icho ▁chi longigwe ,
▁“ Sekeu tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁no manyika ▁kwa ▁zina , ▁‘ Yeli ▁na ▁migongo ,’ ▁niye ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁migongo .
▁One ▁mo gumigw a ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁kwiilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁one ▁ulondo ▁wake ▁wowa gela ▁moyo , ▁one ▁muna ▁m v ava ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁na ▁one ▁muna ▁ubazi ▁na ▁uhole ,
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Shemu ▁wakala ▁ E la mu ▁na ▁Ashulu ▁na ▁Alifakisadi ▁na ▁Lu di ▁na ▁Alamu .
▁Maabaho ▁nzala ▁i kala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Kalonga ▁kuwa , ▁chiza nzahila ▁ mbali ▁hachiza muwona , ▁na ▁iviya ▁hachi daha ▁bule ▁kuhita ▁hanhu ▁ha yeli . ▁Vino ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁choni ?”
▁W eye ▁kwiza mchinja ▁na ▁damu ▁yake ▁kwiza i mizil a ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁ulupango .
▁Wa temele ni ▁mate ▁waja ▁wowa duwila ▁mweye , ▁wa tose leni ▁waja ▁wowo muwonela ni ▁mweye .
▁Tamali ▁kahulika ▁kuwa ▁m ko yi ▁wake ▁wa ▁chilume ▁kakala ▁yo hita ▁T i mi na , ▁kuwa kanha ▁m izo ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wake .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wa landula ▁madizi ▁yawo ▁na ▁wa lila ▁ichilo ▁icho .
▁Cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weli ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁hawa gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁kwaviya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ko mulole sa ▁goya , ▁wala ▁mwihi ▁ija ▁hadaha ▁kuwatenda ▁chochose !
▁Mbali ▁kukala ▁na ▁walume ▁wamwenga ▁wa mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ku dalisa ▁mtufi ▁wa ▁munhu , ▁ivo ▁hawa dahile ▁kude ng ' helele ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo . ▁Wa hita ▁kuulongozi ▁wa ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo .
▁Kwa viya ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁ni icho ▁chino , ▁“ Muna ▁u lusita ▁lu nogile ▁niza bwela ▁na ▁Sala ▁kezakwelek a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .”
▁“ Mwiza temeligw a ▁mate ▁muladi ▁mu pate ▁wana ▁wengi ▁na ▁ndiya ▁nyingi ▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wengi ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wengi .
▁Ivo ▁niye ▁no londa ▁ng ' hani ▁ku wapetele ni ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁womu kala ▁Loma .
▁Kuna ▁mbasakanyo ▁ya ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe . ▁Kwa viya ▁uhasanyi ▁wa ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁Mulungu ▁ka lava ▁nhaguso , ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁viwatendile ▁uhasanyi , ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁kuwa togola ▁wanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁Walonga , ▁“ Vino ▁ino ▁siyo ▁Yesu ▁mwanage ▁Yosefu ▁bule ? ▁Vino ▁ tati ▁yake ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁hachi wa manyile ▁bule ? ▁Lelo ▁kodaha ze ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Ni humuluka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ?’ ▁”
▁Ka inama ▁na ▁ku sungu lila ▁mgati , ▁ka wona ▁sanda , ▁ mbali ▁heng ile ▁mgati ▁bule .
▁Na yo ▁yoyanhumile ▁ka hamwe ▁na ▁niye , ▁ hanile kile ▁niidumwe ▁bule ▁kwaviya ▁siku ▁zose ▁notenda ▁yaja ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁yeye .”
▁na ▁wawalongela ▁Waisilaili ▁wose , ▁“ I si ▁yochi hitile ▁kui pelemba ▁ino ga ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wa fundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁baho ▁wa ndusa ▁ku yi uza ▁wenyewo ,
▁Ge ze ni ▁ku manya ▁dilihi ▁dodi mnogeza ▁Mndewa .
▁Yesu ▁kawa togole la , ▁ivo ▁vinyamkela ▁wa mulawa ▁munhu ▁ija ▁na ▁wengi la ▁mwii zinguluwe . ▁Lung ' husesa ▁lose ▁lwa ▁nguluwe ▁m alongo ▁magan a ▁maidi ▁wa kimbilila ▁mudilamba , ▁na ▁wadumb u kila ▁muna ▁yamazi ▁wadanganika .
▁Yesu ▁viya humuluk e ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁ka lola ▁na ▁ka wona ▁lung ' husesa ▁lukulu ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁kawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁na ▁kawahonya ▁waja ▁wa kalile ▁watamu .
▁na ▁mapanzia ▁ya ▁luwa , ▁na ▁mhanda ▁zake ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁vake ▁vose , ▁panzia ▁da ▁ulwivi ▁lwa ▁luwa ,
▁Ma zum o ▁yetu ▁si ▁ya ▁uvwizi ▁hebu ▁yeli bule ▁lungilo ▁dihile ▁hebu ▁ya ▁ku v wiza .
▁Viya kalile ▁ko miza , ▁mbeyu ▁zimwenga ▁ zilagalila ▁mwiinzila , ▁na ▁ndege ▁weza ▁wazi ja .
▁Walondwa ▁wangu , ▁chi i londe , ▁kwaviya ▁ulondo ▁wolawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁ulondo ▁kawa ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ka mmanya ▁Mulungu .
▁Baho ▁wa de ga ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁kwa ▁lugano , ▁wawa p a p iza ▁mi zi go ▁vihongwe ▁wawo , ▁na ▁wabwela ▁kuna ▁dibululu .
▁Leka mana ▁no mtuma ▁kumwenu ▁muladi ▁yam sangalaz eni ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁ku walongele ni ▁mbuli ▁zetu .
▁Kawa tuma ▁Betelehemu , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁muka m zahile ▁imwana ▁vinogile . ▁Muha m vika , ▁izo ni ▁mu nilongele ▁muladi ▁na ▁niye ▁ni mtosele .”
▁Ivo ▁Yosefu ▁kadanganika ▁uko ▁Misili ▁yahawa ▁na ▁miyaka ▁gana ▁na ▁longo . ▁Wa lu boboda ▁da wa ▁lukuli ▁lwake ▁na ▁wa l wika ▁muna ▁disanduku ▁muladi ▁seke lu wo le .
▁Munhu ▁wowose ▁ija ▁yondaya bene ▁lagilizo ▁dimwe ▁da ▁yaja ▁yama dodo , ▁na ▁kuwafundiza ▁wanhu ▁ivo , ▁keza tangigwa ▁mdodo ▁ng ' hani ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁ mbali ▁yondaya tende ▁na ▁ku z ifunza , ▁iyo ▁keza tangigwa ▁mkulu ▁muna ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Kwiza wa sola ▁wanage ▁na ▁ku wavaz a ▁ng ' hanzu .
▁Ha he zakuwa ▁na ▁ichilo ▁kaidi ▁wala ▁haweza londa ▁bu ng ' u lo ▁da ▁chitasa ▁hebu ▁zuwa , ▁kwaviya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa mwemwese la , ▁nawo ▁weza languliza ▁fana ▁wafalume ▁siku ▁zose .
▁“ Niye ▁na n z abibu ▁wa ▁kweli , ▁na ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁iyo ▁muli mi .
▁Yohana ▁kawedika , ▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyo daha ▁kuwa ▁na ▁chinhu ▁one ▁heng ' higwe ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga .
▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁vino ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁ya ni banange ▁miyanza ▁mi ngahi ▁na ▁niye ▁ni mu lekelele ? ▁Hata ▁ya hani bananga ▁miyanza ▁saba ?”
▁Wa nhu ▁wowa msolile ▁Paulo , ▁wahita ▁nayo ▁m baka ▁Asen e . ▁Maabaho ▁wabwela ▁m baka ▁Beleya ▁wakala ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Paulo ▁kuwa ▁Sila ▁na ▁Timoseyo ▁sekewa kala me ▁kumsondelela ▁Paulo .
▁isi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ihuma ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili , ▁ni ▁isi ▁inogile ▁kwa ▁wanyama , ▁cheye ▁china ▁wanyama ▁wengi ▁ng ' hani .
▁Maabaho ▁kawatum a ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁wawa tange ▁waja ▁wowagonikigwe ▁kuna i sola , ▁ mbali ▁wowagonikigwe ▁wa lema ▁kwiza .
▁“ Y e e ! ▁Ko londa ▁kuchi tenda ▁choni , ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti ? ▁Vino ▁kwiza ▁kuchi koma ? ▁Ni ku manya ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi , ▁weye ▁ni ▁M tumigwa ▁Yelile ▁wa ▁Mulungu !”
▁Ivo ▁wa mbwiya ▁zangu ▁one ▁cha hawa ▁ching ' higwa ▁chilagano ▁chino ▁chose , ▁chi i sa f ye ▁na ▁ku segeza ▁yaja ▁yose ▁yo daha ▁kutenda ▁ng ' huli ▁zetu ▁na ▁ mihe ▁yetu ▁va mbule ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁chiwe ▁welile ▁kwa ▁kumdumba ▁Mulungu .
▁Ch eye ▁chi wona ▁na ▁kuwa lavila ▁ukalangama , ▁Tata ▁ka mtuma ▁Mwanage ▁yawe ▁Mulopozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁zisi ▁zose .
▁Na ▁Y asoni ▁kawa hokela ▁ukaye ▁yake . ▁Wo se ▁wa lema ▁kutenda ▁chiya lagilize ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Loma ▁na ▁walonga ▁ha mbwe ▁kuna ▁mfalume ▁imwenga , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yesu .”
▁I nga wa ▁hawa patile ▁chimu ▁cha ▁kumtagusa ▁ifa , ▁wamulamba ▁Pilato ▁ya mkome .
▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ,
▁Maabaho ▁Kaini ▁kamulongela ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁Abeli , ▁“ Chi hite ▁kumgunda .” ▁Viwakalile ▁kumgunda , ▁Kaini ▁kam zum hila ▁mdodo ▁wake ▁na ▁ka mkoma .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yakobo , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Isaka , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Tela , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Naholi ,
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza , ▁“ Mama , ▁kwo li lila ▁choni ? ▁K wo nzahila ▁yelihi ?” ▁Maliya ▁ka gesa ▁iyo ▁ni ▁mkalizi ▁wa ▁ichi zi , ▁ivo ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁one ▁kumsola , ▁no ng ele ▁ku mwika ▁kulihi ▁ni hite ▁ni ka msole .”
▁Vino ▁Mulungu ▁kamwing ' hani ▁Muhe ▁wake ▁na ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza ▁hagati ▁yenu , ▁kwaviya ▁mo kwa ma ▁Malagilizo ▁hebu ▁kwaviya ▁mo hulika ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁na ▁kui huwila ?
▁Mbali ▁lusita ▁luja ▁lwikigwe ▁vilufikile , ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtuma ▁mwanage . ▁Yo yelekigwe ▁na ▁mwanamke ▁na ▁kakala ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ,
▁Yesu ▁kalawa ▁kunze , ▁k ava la ▁kombelo ▁da ▁mi wa ▁na ▁walo ▁da ▁chifalume . ▁Pilato ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Loleni ! ▁Munhu ▁mwenyewo ▁ a i no ▁hano !”
▁Musa ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni ▁weza ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁walonga ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁zili ▁muna ▁u wila ▁uno , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaili ▁wa u hulike .
▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo mtowa ▁ tati ▁yake ▁hebu ▁mami ▁yake ▁kolondeka ▁yakomigwe .
▁Kwa ▁k ongeze la ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁chi wafundiza ▁viya ▁vimu londeke ▁kukala ▁muladi ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kweli ▁viya ▁vimu kala . ▁Na ▁sambi ▁cho mulamba ni ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁mutende ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ng ' hani .
▁Chi nhu ▁chochose ▁chi gubikigwe ▁chiza gubuligwa , ▁na ▁chochi fisigwe ▁chiza manyika .
▁M e za ▁iyo ▁kwiza ihaka ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁na ▁kui zungulusil a ▁lukingilo ▁lwa ▁zahabu .
▁“ Mu tende ▁dugila ▁da ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁ A b i bu ▁na ▁kutenda ▁Dug ila ▁da ▁Pasaka ▁kwa ▁hishima ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁muna ▁umwe zi ▁uwo ▁wa ▁ A b i bu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kamulava ni ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁ichilo .
▁One ▁uha lema ▁kuwa leka ▁wahite , ▁niza itowa ▁isi ▁yako ▁yose ▁kwa ▁ku gala ▁mabula .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kuvimanya ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁mbeyu ▁ziya ▁zi la galile ▁mwiinzila ▁na ▁ija ▁I mwi hi ▁kokwiza ▁na ▁ko ga ndu la ▁chiha ndigwe ▁muumoyo ▁wake .
▁No uza ▁kaidi , ▁vino ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ikwala ▁m baka ▁wa gwa ▁ka b i sa ? ▁Si ▁ivo ▁bule ! ▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁wa tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁ukombola ▁u hita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁ivo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa tendigw a ▁wa wone ▁migongo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni !” ▁Ivo ▁wawa lawa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁na ▁wengi la ▁mwa ▁nguluwe . ▁Ng ulu we ▁wose ▁wa gidimila ▁mudilamba ▁na ▁wadanganika ▁muna ▁yamazi .
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁wengi zigwe ▁ulungwana ▁kweli , ▁kwaviya ▁cho tambika ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuigodela ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁wala ▁hachi huwila ▁chochi sang ' hana ▁muna ▁ulukuli .
▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yaha mwa sila ▁dibwe ▁dodi daha ▁kumtenda ▁munhu ▁yadanganike ▁na ▁kumkoma , ▁inga wa ▁ha kalile ▁mwihi ▁wake ▁hebu ▁halondile ▁ku mu lumiza ,
▁Kwa viya ▁nowalongela ni , ▁Ino ▁iyo ▁Pasaka ▁ya ▁uhelelo ▁no ja ▁na ▁mweye ▁m baka ▁honda ▁i ka mili ke ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Ivo ▁wenu ka ▁na ▁wa b e n zu la ▁yameso ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁ha wamuwonile ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁ila ▁Yesu ▁yaidumwe .
▁Maabaho ▁Pilato ▁kahita ▁kaidi ▁mwii m ho ngo no , ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁kwa ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?”
▁ Vondau muleke ▁yailegehe , ▁sekeu muleke ▁ya segele ▁ bila ▁chinhu .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chi fuko ▁icho ▁cha ▁mwii mha mba ga , ▁ka tengenez a ▁m ikufu ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁yelile ▁i botigwe ▁fana ▁luzabi .
▁Na yo ▁kezawa lagusa ni ▁chiheleto ▁chikulu ▁chili ▁uchanyha ▁chochi kigwe ▁goya . ▁Na ▁mweye ▁ sasale ni ▁umo .”
▁M tumwa ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁gana ▁dimwe ▁wa ▁Loma ▁kakala ▁mtamu , ▁habehi ▁na ▁kudanganika . ▁Mkulu ▁iyo ▁kakala ▁komulonda ▁ng ' hani ▁mtumwa ▁ija .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁dimwe ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo , ▁wa ka mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule ▁yoi ha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwaviya ▁diyelo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mulawilila ni .”
▁Esau ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁“ Ko daha ▁ku temela ▁mate ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala ▁ tati ▁yangu ? ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁na ▁niye ▁iviya ▁n he me le ▁mate !” ▁Ka ndusa ▁ku landula ▁dizi ▁na ▁kalila .
▁Ivo ▁kumbukeni ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Ka muhuwila ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhuwilo ▁yake ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogola ▁kanoga ▁haulongozi ▁hake .”
▁Maabaho ▁Maliya ▁kasola ▁chi c hu p a ▁cha ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' hila ▁goya ▁yoya guligwe ▁kwa ▁hela ▁ng ' hulu , ▁kam boboda ▁Yesu ▁m ma gulu ▁na ▁ku mu hangu sa ▁kwa ▁nyele ▁zake . ▁Kaye ▁yose ▁in ung ' ha ▁goya .
▁na ▁wazi sang ' hanila ▁sente ▁izo ▁ku gulila ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁chilo ngo ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁viya ni lagilize .”
▁Y ava le ▁mawalo ▁yamwenga ▁na ▁ya kale ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁n ha nga ▁ tati ▁zake ▁na ▁mami ▁zake ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁mwezi ▁umwe , ▁m aabaho ▁ya msole .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁niza mkumbus a ni ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁hata ▁fana ▁mu mala ▁ku zimanya ▁na ▁mo kwima ▁chigangamavu ▁muna ▁ikweli ▁i muhokele .
▁Wem ili zi ▁wa ▁Chi mi sili ▁na ▁wa nya p a la ▁wa ▁Chi isi la ili ▁wahita ▁na ▁kuwalongela ▁Waisilaili ‚ ▁“ m falume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawalongela ▁kuwa ▁heza weng ' ha ▁mayani .
▁Ni muwona ▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁yeli ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁yoyo petela ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Yeli hi ▁yo londeka ▁ku bandul a ▁mihul a ▁na ▁kuchi vugula ▁chitabu ▁icho ?”
▁Mbali ▁uha tenda ▁dugila , ▁wa goneke ▁ngayengaye , ▁vi lema , ▁mbetembete , ▁na ▁vipofu ,
▁Chilo ▁chimwe , ▁kamuhitila ▁Yesu , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mfundiza , ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁mfundiza ▁you tumigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo daha ▁kutenda ▁mauzauza ▁you tenda ▁one ▁Mulungu ▁heli ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁bule .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeye ze ▁hamwe ▁na ▁weye , ▁hebu ▁sekeya woneke ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁kuna ▁mulima , ▁hebu ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁sekewa dimi gwe ▁kuna ▁mulima .”
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wose ▁wa ▁Waisilaili ▁wa watendela ▁Walawi ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Chi ha nga ▁chino ▁na ▁zina ▁dino ▁va ▁yelihi ?”
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli , ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁zo kwiza ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ulel wa ▁uno .
▁Si ▁yayo ▁muhala ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁cho de ng ' helela ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁yoyatendile ▁Mulungu ▁kufose la ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁yoya chitendile ▁chiwe ▁wa mbwiya ▁kaidi ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Esau ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁Isaka ▁kamala ▁ku mtemela ▁mate ▁Yakobo ▁na ▁ku mtuma ▁yahite ▁Padani ▁Alamu ▁ya ka sole ▁muke . ▁Iviya ▁kavimanya ▁kuwa ▁Isaka ▁viya mtemele ▁mate , ▁kamulongela ▁sekeya sole ▁muke ▁Mkanaani .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Nafutali , ▁kakala ▁Na b i ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Wo fi si ,
▁ mbali ▁kwaviya ▁mgane ▁ino ▁ko ni gaza , ▁niza mwing ' ha ▁chi yo londeka ▁kupata ▁muladi ▁sekeye ze ▁chila ▁siku ▁na ▁kuni le geza .’ ▁”
▁Maabaho ▁Mwihi ▁ka mwizila ▁Yesu , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ One ▁weye ▁wahawa ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ya longele ▁yamabwe ▁yano ▁ya galuke ▁magate .”
▁Ivo ▁Mulungu ▁ka watendela ▁yanogile ▁walala ▁wawo , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wongezeka ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa gendelela ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁ng ' hani .
▁nayo ▁isi ▁i kala ▁ya bule ▁u mbo ▁hebu ▁ya bule ▁chinhu ▁chochose . ▁Na ▁ziza ▁di kala ▁di gubika ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mazi , ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kakala ▁ka tanda ▁u c ha ny ' ha ▁ya ▁mazi .
▁Ka msola ▁imwana ▁mdodo , ▁ka mwi miza ▁hagati ▁yawo . ▁Maabaho ▁kamuhagatila ▁na ▁kuwalongela ,
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo mtogola ▁ha tagusigwa ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyo lema ▁ku mtogola ▁iyo ▁ka tagusigwa ▁kamala , ▁kwaviya ▁ha mtogole ▁Mwana ▁nyachende ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Iyo heni ▁kwika ▁goya ▁kuilumba ▁kwenu ▁ko ku galigw a ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁tindiwalo ▁dodi wa lumbiliz e ▁hamwe .
▁Isi ▁yose ▁iza gaya ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁zozi watenda ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁uhasanyi . ▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁za kuwa tenda ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁uhasanyi ▁zo lo de ka ▁zi ze , ▁ mbali ▁keza gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo watenda ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁uhasanyi !
▁muladi , ▁Wa lole , ▁ mbali ▁sekewa wone , ▁wa hulike , ▁ mbali ▁sekewa vimanye , ▁Kwa viya ▁waha vimanya ▁wodaha ▁ku mbwelela ▁Mulungu , ▁na ye ▁keza daha ▁kuwa segeze la ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo .”
▁Mbali ▁one ▁isi gala ▁miyaka ▁mi dodo ▁kufika ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kubweleza , ▁keza i peta ▁fana ▁viili ▁ peta ▁ya ▁miyaka ▁yake , ▁ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondaya lihe ▁ gala ma ▁ya ▁kukomboligwa ▁kwake .
▁Yesu ▁ka komeleze la ▁kulonga , ▁“ Ivo ▁ni ivo ▁vondaiwe ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁vondaya watende ▁mweye , ▁one ▁mweye ▁hamu wa lekele ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu .”
▁One ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yaha nogelw a ▁na ▁cheye , ▁kezachi gala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku ching ' ha ▁iwe ▁yetu , ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁ulongo ▁unogile ▁ng ' hani .
▁Sekemu tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga , ▁milungu ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wokala ▁habehi ▁na ▁mweye .
▁U walongele ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ! ▁Niza mulava ni ▁na ▁ku mulekela ni ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁utumwa ▁wa ▁Wamisili . ▁Niza winula ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁wili ▁na ▁ludabwa ▁kuwatagusa ▁Wamisili ▁na ▁niza mkombola ni .
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁wakala ▁Manase ▁na ▁Efulaimu .
▁U tajili ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ubala ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wake ▁ni ▁vi kulu ▁kufosa ▁ningo ! ▁Yeli hi ▁yo manya ▁viyo lamula , ▁yelihi ▁yo manya ▁nzila ▁zake ?
▁One ▁muke ▁yaha mbandama ▁mnyama , ▁muke ▁iyo ▁na ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁ wolondeka ▁wa komigwe . ▁Wo i tendela ▁wenyewo ▁wawe ▁na ▁ubananzi .
▁Musa ▁ka vika ▁vose ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁nawo ▁wa vi nula ▁uchanyha ▁kuwa ▁chilaguso ▁kwa ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko .
▁no m gong ' onde la ni ▁diyelo ▁kuwa ▁mwiza na ng igwa . ▁ Hamwiza kala ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yomu hita ▁kuisola , ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .
▁Ni mtuma ▁T u ki ko ▁yahite ▁Efeso .
▁Iviya ▁ka tenda ▁ngubiko ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁hema ▁ je ile ▁kwa ▁mapanzia ▁longo ▁na ▁dimwe ▁ya ▁mazoya ▁ya ▁luti .
▁Mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁nzala ▁ng ' hani , ▁ivo ▁mwiza kuja ▁wanenu ▁wenyewo , ▁wachi lu me ▁na ▁wachi ke .
▁I kala ▁ichigulogulo ▁ya ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Ku yi sasala ▁kwa ▁Isi ku ▁ing ' hali ▁ya ▁Mhumulo .
▁Maabaho ▁Isaka ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Kwiza kala ▁kutali ▁na ▁mgunda ▁unogile ▁u lava ▁na fa ka ▁na ▁divai ▁nyingi ▁na ▁kutali ▁na ▁mvula ▁ya ▁kuulanga .
▁Wa nahina ▁viwalo kile ▁dilamba , ▁wa zimiza ▁kusola ▁magate .
▁Keza wa bweleza ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wawo .
▁Ivo ▁wa mbwiya ▁zangu ▁walondwa , ▁siku ▁zose ▁vini kalile ▁na ▁mweye ▁mu n he gele za , ▁fana ▁vini li ▁kutali ▁na ▁mweye , ▁ gendelele ni ▁kutegeleza . ▁Sa ng ' hane ni ▁sang ' hano ▁kwa ▁ludumbo ▁na ▁ku gudemeka ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ukombola ▁wenu ,
▁Mbali ▁lwivi ▁lwa ▁ugima ▁ni ▁lu sisili ▁na ▁nzila ▁yoi golose ▁uko ▁ni ▁ sisili ▁iviya , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wo iwona ▁nzila ▁iyo ▁ni ▁wadodo .
▁U banzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁wa ▁hema ▁kwiza tengenez a ▁mibiki ▁m alongo ▁maidi
▁Ivo ▁wa wagwila ▁na ▁wa weka ▁mchifungo ▁m baka ▁siku ▁isondelele , ▁kwaviya ▁i kala ▁ chigulogulo .
▁Ka mweda ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ hani lema ▁niye ▁kwa ▁yaja ▁yoni ya tenda !”
▁Yesu ▁kawedika , ▁“ M weye ▁weng ' heni ▁ndiya ▁wa je .” ▁Wamuuza , ▁“ Vino ▁chihite ▁chika gule ▁magate ▁ya ▁hela ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani ▁chi weng ' he ▁wa je ?”
▁Maabaho ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁kawatanga ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁na ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁muka mtosele ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino .”
▁Wa msola ▁m baka ▁Kaisaliya ▁na ▁wam golela ▁usenga ▁imkulu ▁iyo ▁wa ▁mkowa ▁na ▁wa mwika ▁Paulo ▁hau kalizi ▁wake .
▁Lelo ▁wa kome ni ▁wana ▁wose ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁chila ▁muke ▁yoya ba nda m igwe ▁na ▁mulume ,
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Isakali , ▁kakala ▁I ga li ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ni ng ' hali ▁na ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁ludodo , ▁m aabaho ▁niza hita ▁kwa ▁ija ▁yoyanitumile .
▁Mbali ▁niye ▁niza watagusa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yondai sang ' hanile ▁kuwatenda ▁mweye ▁watumwa . ▁Maabaho ▁nizawa lava ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁welesi ▁wenu ▁muna ▁isi ▁iyo ▁nawo ▁weza ni tambikila ▁niye ▁hanhu ▁hano .
▁Mu londeka ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ufunya ▁umoyo , ▁muladi ▁mu dahe ▁kutenda ▁yaja ▁yoyo londa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kuhokela ▁chiya ▁chiya laganile .
▁Wa kulu ▁wo mtaza ▁mfalume ▁viwamuwone ▁Salayi , ▁wa mtogoza ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁na ▁ka galigw a ▁muna ▁im ho ngo no ▁ya ▁mfalume .
▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kamwidika , ▁“ W eye ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito ▁Mkombola , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁ngima .”
▁Na ▁ivo ▁wa mulema . ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ M ulotezi ▁ko hishimigwa ▁chila ▁hanhu , ▁ mbali ▁kuna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁mwenyewo ▁ha hishimigwa ▁bule .”
▁D eng ' heleleni ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vinogile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁viya mwing ' hileni ▁mweye ▁na ▁kaye ▁zenu , ▁mweye ▁na ▁Walawi ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wowo kala ▁kumwenu .
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁madang ' ang ' a ▁m alume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ peta ▁yawo , ▁fana ▁voilagilizigw e .
▁Nhambiko ▁yake ▁i kala ▁vino , ▁cha no ▁ya ▁hela ▁ili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁nusu ▁na ▁bu yu ▁da ▁hela ▁dili ▁na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁magan a ▁manane ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁za ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Ivo ▁vose ▁vi memezigw a ▁usage ▁unogile ▁uha nganyigwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage .
▁Ivo ▁no londa ▁ng ' hani ▁ku mtuma ▁kumwenu , ▁muladi ▁vondamu muwone ▁mu de ng ' helele , ▁na ▁usungu ▁wangu ▁wiza mala .
▁Sekemu gaiye ▁ndiya ▁yoi wola , ▁ mbali ▁ gaiye ni ▁ndiya ▁yoi kala ▁siku ▁zose . ▁N diya ▁ino ▁iyo ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza we na , ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁ka mtogole la ▁kutenda ▁ivo .”
▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Sala ▁muke ▁wake ▁wa wandigwa ▁kuna ▁umgunda ▁uja ▁Bulahimu ▁uya gulile ▁kwa ▁Wahiti .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yuda ▁kakala ▁ko papa ▁m ko ba ▁wa ▁hela , ▁wanahina ▁wamwenga ▁wa gesa ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁ko mulongela ▁yahite ▁ya ka gule ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁dugila , ▁hebu ▁ya ka wene ▁chinhu ▁ngayengaye .
▁Kwa viya ▁Waisilaili ▁ni ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wangu ▁woni wa lavile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili , ▁sekewa chuuzigwe ▁fana ▁watumwa .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yoya ha kigwe ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ kwikigwa ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁ya sole ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁iyo ▁kezatenda ▁kuilumba ▁kuno ▁kayawala ▁mawalo ▁yelile ▁ya ▁chitani
▁ Yandikigwa ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁yenu ▁kuwa , ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁ni ▁wa ▁kweli .
▁ Vondamwingile ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yoya walaganile ni ▁kumwing ' hani , ▁mwiza tenda ▁dugila ▁dino .
▁Mbali ▁mwiza gaya ▁mweye ▁matajili , ▁kwaviya ▁ nde ng ' helelo ▁yenu ▁iza mala ▁sambi !
▁No golosa ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁ku ilaha ▁kwa ▁ugima ▁wangu ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose
▁Chi p indi ▁icho ▁Muyahudi ▁imwe ▁yo tangigwa ▁Apolo , ▁m welekwa ▁wa ▁Wa isi ka nda li ya , ▁kafika ▁Efeso . ▁Iyo ▁kakala ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁udahi ▁na ▁ya manyile ▁vinogile ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bululu ▁jake ▁wa mwihila , ▁ivo ▁wawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wahite ▁wa ka mu lu v ye , ▁‘ Hachi mulonda ▁ino ▁ya chi langulize .’
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ‚ ▁“ Yeli hi ▁ya umbile ▁mulomo ▁wa ▁munhu ? ▁Hebu ▁yelihi ▁yo mtenda ▁munhu ▁yawe ▁chibu bu ▁hebu ▁m s u wa ma gutwi ? ▁Yeli hi ▁yo mtenda ▁munhu ▁ya lole ▁hebu ▁yawe ▁chipofu ? ▁Vino ▁siyo ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?
▁Ivo ▁i kala ▁ichilo ▁chili ▁ behi ▁na ▁ku kunguzuka , ▁Yesu ▁kawa hiti la ▁wanahina ▁kuno ▁ko genda ▁na ▁magulu ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mazi .
▁Isi ▁ng eni ▁iza sola ▁mazao ▁yose ▁ya ▁isi ▁yenu ▁na ▁matunda ▁ya ▁vuke ▁jenu , ▁mweye ▁mwiza ba ma ny igwa ▁na ▁kugazigwa ▁siku ▁zose ,
▁Maabaho ▁m imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba , ▁imisi sili ▁i nya zigwe ▁na ▁mbeho ▁ili ▁na ▁vuke ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁i lawilila ,
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa wagala ▁wana ▁wawo ▁wadoododo ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁ya wekile ▁makono . ▁Wa nahina ▁viwa wa wone ▁ivo , ▁wawa bwakila ▁wanhu ▁waja .
▁ Siku ▁tano ▁hamwande , ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁Nhambiko ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁Ananiya ▁kahita ▁Kaisaliya ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walala ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁ya manyile ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ka tangigwa ▁T eli tu lo . ▁Wem a ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Felisi , ▁wamulongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Paulo .
▁Viwafikile ▁Kapelinaumu , ▁wengi la ▁mnyumba . ▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Mu kala ▁mwi ibishil a ▁choni ▁mui nzila ?”
▁Mbuli ▁zako ▁zi we ▁za ▁kweli ▁ zilibule ▁ubananzi , ▁muladi ▁hata ▁wehi ▁wako ▁waja ▁wo ku lema ▁wa pate ▁chinyala ▁kwaviya ▁weza p u wa ▁chochose ▁chihile ▁cha ▁kulonga ▁kuson hela ▁cheye .
▁Ino ▁i kala ▁mwanza ▁wekatatu ▁Yesu ▁kuwa lawilila ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁kuson gela ▁viya zilibuke .
▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kufundiza ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zose , ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ,
▁Kawauza ▁ku h usu ▁ugima ▁wawo ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu ni simulil a ▁ku h usu ▁ tati ▁yenu ▁imu la la , ▁vino ▁ka c he lwa ? ▁Vino ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima ?”
▁Sekemu togole ▁ku vwiziligwa ▁na ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kwa ▁vovose ▁viya . ▁Kwa viya ▁siku ▁ija ▁hadiza ▁m baka ▁U le mo ▁Mkulu ▁u lawilile ▁na ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo tangigwa ▁Mwihi , ▁uhelelo ▁wake ▁ni ▁kunangigwa .
▁Ch ochose ▁chochi gendela ▁mu nda ▁wake ▁na ▁chochose ▁chochi gendela ▁migulu ▁yose ▁mine ▁hebu ▁migulu ▁mingi , ▁sekemu vi je ▁kwaviya ▁vo tibusa ▁kumwenu .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa mtegeleza ▁Paulo ▁m baka ▁kalonga ▁vino , ▁m aabaho ▁wa ndusa ▁ku landula ▁madizi ▁yawo , ▁“ M kome ▁iyo ! ▁Ha faya ▁bule ▁kuwa ▁mgima !”
▁Kaidi ▁yandikigwa , ▁wezaku sola ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁yawo , ▁muladi ▁sekeu ikwale ▁muna ▁idibwe .’ ▁”
▁M afundizo ▁yayo ▁yo patik a ▁muna ▁I mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁utunhizo ▁na ▁yo temela ▁mate , ▁yoni ng ' higwe ▁ni i pete .
▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wazanywa ▁na ▁wa uza , ▁“ Ino ▁munhu ▁wa ki ? ▁M baka ▁beho ▁na ▁mawimbi ▁vomu hulika !”
▁Kaidi ▁Mulungu ▁ha dumbile ▁kulonga ▁kufose la ▁Isaya , ▁“ Ni woneka ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁hawa ni zahile ▁bule , ▁niwa la wila ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁hawa ni u zile ▁niye .”
▁Tat i ▁yawo ▁Isilaili ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Ha ya ▁kwaviya ▁yo londeka ▁iwe ▁ivo , ▁basi , ▁ tende ni ▁ivo , ▁ sole ni ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁imi fuko ▁yenu ▁mazao ▁yanogile ▁ya ▁isi , ▁mavuta ▁chidogo ▁ya ▁m kwa zu ▁na ▁u ki ▁chidogo ▁na ▁ubani ▁na ▁mavuta ▁yon ung ' ha ▁goya ▁na ▁mbeyu ▁za ▁kuja .
▁Mbali ▁wawo ▁wa go ne kigwe ▁hawa gesile , ▁kwaviya ▁chila ▁imwe ▁kakala ▁na ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake . ▁Munhu ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁kamulongela ▁mtumwa ▁ija , ▁‘ Ni gula ▁mgunda , ▁ivo ▁no londeka ▁ni ka u lole . ▁ Nokulamba ▁uni lekelele .’
▁W e ka i di ▁ka vumbuka ▁kuno ▁ka mhilila ▁chi si gi n ho ▁cha ▁Esau , ▁ivo ▁zina ▁jake ▁ka tangigwa ▁Yakobo . ▁Esau ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁viwa vu mbu ke ▁Isaka ▁kakala ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁sita .
▁Zu wa ▁vidi kalile ▁do s wa , ▁Abulamu ▁kakala ▁na ▁ vu we vu we ▁da ▁nhongo , ▁ziza ▁totolo ▁di m gubika .
▁Leka mana ▁cho igodela ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁muna ▁ya mabumbila ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁womuhuwila ▁Chilisito . ▁Cho igodela ▁kwaviya ▁mo gendelela ▁kufunya ▁umoyo ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁na ▁ku lolela ▁kufose la ▁manhesa ▁yose ▁na ▁magayo ▁yomu ya pata .
▁Ivo ▁wamsola ▁Paulo , ▁wa mgala ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁ichitala ▁cha ▁bululu ▁da ▁ A le o p o ko ▁na ▁walonga , ▁“ Ch o londa ▁kuvimanya ▁mafundizo ▁yako ▁ya ▁sambi ▁yolonga ▁choni .
▁Viya patile , ▁kahita ▁na ▁ka chuuza ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁va yeli ▁navo , ▁muladi ▁ya gule ▁lu lu ▁iyo .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kwiza ▁kumwangu , ▁ya i zum e ▁mwenyewo , ▁ya u p a pe ▁msalaba ▁wake ▁ya ni sondelele .
▁M beyu ▁ila gale ▁muna ▁imi wa ▁simwe ▁jake ▁ni ▁munhu ▁yo handa , ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁kudumba ▁ dumba ▁kwa ▁isi ▁ino ▁na ▁ku londa ▁utajili ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁wo sondelela ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁nayo ▁hawa lela ▁matunda .
▁Maabaho ▁Balaamu ▁kamuwona ▁Am a le ki , ▁ka lotela ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ A ma le ki ▁ni ▁isi ▁ili ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁zisi ▁zose , ▁ mbali ▁kuuhelelo ▁iza danganizigwa ▁ng ' hani .”
▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁kakala ▁ko mulongela ▁Helode , ▁Malagilizo ▁yolonga , ▁“ Ha vi londeka ▁bule ▁weye ▁kumsola ▁mke ▁wa ▁se kulu ▁wako .”
▁One ▁muha handa ▁migunda ▁yenu ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁we nane , ▁mwiza kuwa ▁mung ' hali ▁mo ja ▁vinhu ▁vimu gobole ▁umwaka . ▁Mwiza gendelela ▁kuja ▁m baka ▁vondamu gobole ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁kenda .
▁Mwiza mtegeleza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁yake ▁yose ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo .
▁Maabaho ▁ka lava ▁mnyama ▁ija ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁fana ▁viyalagilizigwe .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha tenda ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁ku muleka ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ku mvwizila ▁miyage ▁kwa ▁ lima ng we ▁yo ye kiligwe , ▁hebu ▁ku muhoka , ▁hebu ▁ku mba manya ▁miyage ,
▁Wa a vi ▁umwaka ▁wakala ▁uko ▁kuna ▁yamabululu ▁yeli ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁Meditelaniya ▁m baka ▁ G a za . ▁Wa ka fi to li ▁kulawa ▁chi si wa ▁cha ▁Chilete ▁wa wadanganiza ▁na ▁wakala ▁umo ▁ ba dala ▁yawo .
▁Mo londa ▁kui tunhiza ▁wenyewo , ▁wala ▁hamu zahila ▁bule ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁yaidumwe ! ▁Vino ▁mwiza daha ze ▁ku nihuwila ?
▁Ihaw a ▁ivo ▁Mndewa ▁kavimanya ▁va ▁kuwakombola ▁wowomuhuwila ▁muna ▁yama ge zo . ▁Mbali ▁kavimanya ▁ku weka ▁wanhu ▁hawa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁muna ▁in ha g u so ▁m baka ▁isi ku ▁ija ▁ya ▁kuwa lamulil a ▁nhaguso .
▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Ha mu chi manyile ▁bule ▁chiya ▁chimu pula . ▁Vino ▁modaha ▁kumgwila ▁nhungo ▁yoni ng ' wila ▁niye ?” ▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Chodaha .”

▁Yakobo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wake ▁wa gendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁wasegela ▁Beseli , ▁viwa kalile ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana fika ▁ E fu la ta , ▁Laheli ▁ka pata ▁usungu ▁ng ' hani ▁wa ▁ku ibasula .
▁yoya kalile ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Aminadabu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Alamu , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁He zi lo ni , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Pelesi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yuda ,
▁“ Yano ▁ni ▁malagilizo ▁yoya mwing ' hileni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁vimu iting ' hane ▁hana ▁umulima . ▁Viya longile ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁umoto ▁na ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁na ▁muna ▁diziza ▁totolo , ▁kamwing ' hani ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁na ▁ habule ▁yamwenga . ▁Maabaho ▁k andika ▁malagilizo ▁yano ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁na ▁ka ning ' ha ▁niye .
▁Musa ▁kaweng ' ha ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁hela ▁izo ▁za ▁ukombola , ▁fana ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁voi mu lagilize .
▁“ Siku ▁ye nane ▁keza gala ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁waidi ▁weli bule ▁chilema ▁na ▁zi ke ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁dimwe ▁da ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁dili bule ▁chilema ▁na ▁chilo ▁nhatu ▁za ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁mhule , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mavuta ▁se lusi ▁imwe ▁ya ▁lita .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kanilongela ▁ni mwing ' heni ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁‘ Mwaha behi ▁kufosa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ili ▁kuna ▁imilima ▁ya ▁Seili , ▁isi ▁ya ▁wakaya ▁wayenu , ▁weli ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Esau . ▁Wawo ▁weza wa d umbe ni , ▁ mbali ▁m uiteganye ▁ng ' hani .
▁Wakala ▁wo ilongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vovi lawilile .
▁Maabaho ▁wam petela ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mndewa , ▁yeye ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wose ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake .
▁Kwa viya ▁kwa ▁sadaka ▁yake ▁imwe ▁kawa tenda ▁waja ▁wose ▁wowo safyigwa ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo ▁kuwa ▁wo faya ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Ka wafika ▁wanhu ▁M wiikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁wo chuuza ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁nziwa ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wakala ▁muna ▁ivi goda ▁vawo ▁wo kwasakany a ▁hela .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake ▁simwe ▁kuwafundiza ▁kuwa ▁ wolondeka ▁kutosa ▁siku ▁zose ▁na ▁sekewa fe ▁moyo .
▁Ha kwiza kuwa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁kaidi ▁chonda ▁chi duwiligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu . ▁Chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁cha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁cha ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁chi zakuwa ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁ijo , ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁weza mtambikila .
▁Mazi ▁ya kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁siku ▁gana ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano .
▁Kwa viya ▁Bulahimu ▁kakala ▁ko gozela ▁bululu ▁dili ▁na ▁chandusilo . ▁Bul ulu ▁ ja ndu sigwe ▁na ▁ku zengigw a ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Isaka ▁viya komeleze ▁ku mtemela ▁mate ▁Yakobo , ▁lusita ▁Yakobo ▁viya segele , ▁Esau ▁se kulu ▁wake ▁kabwela ▁kulawa ▁kuu kala .
▁Ivo ▁kawa temela ▁mate ▁siku ▁ijo ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Wa isi la ili ▁weza sang ' hanila ▁mazina ▁yenu ▁ku temela ▁mate , ▁wezalonga , ▁‘ Mulungu ▁ya ku tende ▁weye ▁fana ▁Efulaimu ▁na ▁Manase .’ ▁” ▁Ni ivo ▁Yakobo ▁viya mwikile ▁Efulaimu ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Manase .
▁Sekeu leke ▁kusang ' hanila ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁chimuhe ▁chili ▁mgati ▁yako , ▁cho wing ' higwe ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kwa ▁kwikil igwa ▁makono ▁na ▁lu ndo ▁da ▁walala ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁yo ching ' ha ▁tindiwalo ▁ya mtende ni ▁welile ▁kwa ▁chila ▁nzila , ▁ye ke ▁moyo ▁na ▁muhe ▁na ▁lukuli ▁ bila ▁ching ' wa s u ▁chochose ▁vondayeze ▁kaidi ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Ya yo ▁ni ▁mazina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wa ▁Haluni , ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wowa ha kigwe ▁mavuta ▁na ▁wo we kigwe ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile ▁muladi ▁wa sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .

▁I zakuwa ▁vinoga ▁kwa ▁msang ' hani ▁ija ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁yaheza ▁ko mfika ▁ka tenda ▁ivo .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha ika ▁kaye ▁yake ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yelile , ▁ko londa ▁kuikombola ▁kwa ▁ kongeza ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁tano , ▁nayo ▁izakuwa ▁yake .
