▁Di ng ' onyo ▁dikali ▁diya ▁do u di wone ▁di kala ▁ gima ▁baho ▁haichanduso ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁di danganika , ▁hata ▁ivo ▁habehi ▁ng ' hani ▁diza kwela ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁dikombo ▁di tali ▁dili bule ▁uhelelo , ▁ mbali ▁diza na ng igwa . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wokala ▁muna ▁isi ▁waja ▁mazina ▁yawo ▁hayana kwa ndikigwa ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁cha ▁ugima ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁wa ▁kulumbigwa ▁kwa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁weza kwazanywa ▁vondawa di wone ▁ding ' onyo ▁dikali ▁ijo , ▁kwaviya ▁umwaka ▁di kala ▁ gima ▁m aabaho ▁di danganika ▁na ▁sambi ▁do lawilila ▁kaidi .
▁Yano ▁yose ▁ya kala ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁mane ▁na ▁m alongo ▁matano . ▁“ Hamwande , ▁Mulungu ▁kaweng ' ha ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁m baka ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁za ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁Sa mwe li .
▁M ha mba ▁ya ▁mana ▁lita ▁mbili ▁i kala ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁vinhu ▁longo , ▁ningo ▁iyo ▁izo weleke ▁yoi tangigwa ▁ e fa .
▁Mulungu ▁kawatanga ▁‘ mi lungu ’ ▁waja ▁we ni gwe ▁usenga ▁wake , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chi vimanya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga ▁kweli ▁siku ▁zose .
▁L usita ▁luja , ▁mweye ▁wenyewo ▁mukala ▁fana ▁vino ▁vimu ta wa ligwe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁va ▁uhasanyi .
▁“ Sekeu tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁ila ▁niye .
▁“ Sekeu lave ▁damu ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁yangu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁magate ▁ya gumigw e ▁lusu , ▁na ▁sekeu ya leke ▁mavuta ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁ya ▁dugila ▁jangu ▁ya sigale ▁m baka ▁imitondo .
▁Ke ngila ▁kaidi ▁mwii m ho ngo no , ▁kamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Vino ▁weye ▁ko lawa ▁kulihi ?” ▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ h edike ▁bule .
▁Viya malile ▁yayo ▁ni muwona ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁imwenga ▁ko hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga . ▁Ka kala ▁na ▁udahi ▁mkulu ▁na ▁isi ▁yose ▁imwe mwe sigwa ▁kwa ▁utunhizo ▁wake .
▁Mwiza danganika ▁kuna ▁izisi ▁zimwenga , ▁mwiza me ligwa ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁wehi ▁wenu .
▁“ Kwiza tengenez a ▁ngubiko ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁hema ▁kwa ▁mbende ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁i ho ndigwe ▁ya ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁m chanyha ▁yake ▁ngubiko ▁imwenga ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali .
▁“ M o ya wona ▁mabwe ▁yano ? ▁ Siku ▁yokwiza , ▁hadiza sigala ▁dibwe ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁dibwe ▁dimwenga , ▁chila ▁dibwe ▁diza kwa sigwa ▁hasi .”
▁Sekemu wa tawale ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁diya ▁do mu londeka ▁kudi dima , ▁ mbali ▁muwe ▁simwe ▁kumwawo .
▁Sekeu i lekelele ▁ku hu migwa ▁na ▁wihi , ▁ mbali ▁u u hume ▁wihi ▁kwa ▁unovu .
▁“ Ch ochose ▁chochi fisigwe ▁chi zakuwa ▁wazi , ▁na ▁chochose ▁chochi gubikigwe , ▁chiza gubuligwa ▁na ▁kugal igwa ▁kuna ▁dibu ng ' hulo .
▁Ma bu la ▁yeza ku da nda ▁weye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wako .’ ▁”
▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁kamzilibula ▁Yesu , ▁vimu komeleze ▁kumkoma ▁kwa ▁ku muwamb a ▁muna u m salaba .
▁Ku temeligw a ▁mate ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁ku hume ▁ku temiligw a ▁mate ▁kwa ▁migongo ▁ya ▁umwaka , ▁Ku temiligw a ▁mate ▁uko ▁ku we ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁Yosefu , ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁jake ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁ndugu ▁zake .”
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁viyolonga , ▁“ Mu we ▁welile ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ ny ela .”
▁“ Maabaho ▁muni dika , ▁‘ Ch eye ▁chi muhasanya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁lelo ▁chiza hita ▁na ▁kuitowa ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁viya chi lagilize .’ ▁Ivo ▁chila ▁munhu ▁vimu li ▁kolondeka ▁ya isasale ▁kuitowa ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo , ▁na ▁mu gesa ▁kuwa ▁iha wile ▁vi hu ha ▁kuhita ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iyo ▁ili ▁kumulima .
▁Yakobo ▁kamwidika ▁Labani , ▁“ Ni dumba ▁kwaviya ▁ni gesa ▁u hani ho kile ▁wa ndele ▁wako .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ng ' ombe ▁ka zowel a ▁kuwa kenha ▁wayage ▁na ▁mwene ▁ng ' ombe ▁ham fu ngile , ▁mwenyewo ▁kezamuli ha ▁miyage ▁ng ' ombe ▁mgima , ▁ng ' ombe ▁yafile ▁keza kuwa ▁wake .
▁Iviya ▁ija ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi ▁ka sang ' hanila ▁ka pata ▁faida ▁ma sanduku ▁maidi ▁yamwenga .
▁M weye ▁muwa tuma ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁Yohana , ▁nayo ▁kawalongela ▁mbuli ▁za ▁kweli .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁mafundizo ▁yake .
▁“ Mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo hulika ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁na ▁ku ze hu la , ▁iyo ▁ka linga ▁fana ▁munhu ▁mbozi ▁ya ze ngile ▁kaye ▁yake ▁muna ▁umsanga .
▁M d umbe ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mu msang ' hanile ▁na ▁mu m sondelele ▁yeye ▁na ▁ku ilaha ▁kwa ▁zina ▁jake .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza sola ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁nhosa ▁iyo ▁iwe ▁ya ▁ku kumbukigw a ▁na ▁kui timbula ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango . ▁U wo ▁ni ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wou mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁mui lole , ▁munhu ▁sekeye ze ▁yawa vwizi le .
▁M we zi ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁muna ▁mwaka ▁wekaidi , ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi , ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁di si mi kigwa .
▁Kwa ▁ivo ▁kwiza walongela , ▁‘ Mu ha komeleza ▁kulava ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁kufosa ▁zose , ▁hanhu ▁ha sigale ▁heza kuwa ▁henu , ▁fana ▁viili ▁kwa ▁muli mi ▁yo sola ▁chi sigale ▁viya komeleze ▁kulava ▁nhosa ▁zake ▁za ▁mhule ▁na ▁zabibu .
▁“ Habule ▁mtumwa ▁yoyo daha ▁kuwa sang ' hanila ▁wenevale ▁waidi . ▁Kwa viya ▁keza mwihila ▁imwe ▁na ▁ku mulonda ▁imwenga , ▁hebu ▁keza mwa mhilila ▁imwe ▁na ▁kunze ha ▁imwenga . ▁Hamu daha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Mulungu ▁kuno ▁mo sang ' hanila ▁hela .”
▁Basi ▁kwaviya ▁vinhu ▁vino ▁vose ▁viza danganizigwa , ▁m olondeka ▁mweye ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ugen zi ▁u lihi , ▁m olondeka ▁ku muhuwila ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ku hishimu ,
▁Lelo , ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁vi lagano ▁na ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁m welesi ▁wake , ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁haya longa ▁“ W elesi ▁wake ” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁wanhu ▁wengi , ▁ mbali ▁yolonga ▁“ M welesi ▁wake ,” ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁munhu ▁imwe , ▁niiyo ▁Chilisito .
▁Wa nhu ▁wa ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Lubeni ▁na ▁Gadi ▁ni weng ' ha ▁isi ▁kulawa ▁Gileadi ▁m baka ▁kolongo ▁da ▁Alinoni . ▁M haka ▁yawo ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kusi ▁i kala ▁hagati ▁ya ▁lwanda , ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kasikazi ▁i kala ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Ya b o ki , ▁lolu haka na ▁na ▁isi ▁ya ▁Waamoni .
▁Wa mkaliza ▁m baka ▁vondawa vimanye ▁chi yolonda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Kwa viya ▁wo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁yaja ▁yo londeka ▁na ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yawo . ▁I mizoyo ▁yawo ▁yo lagusa ▁kuwa ▁yano ▁ni ▁kweli , ▁kwaviya ▁m agesa ▁yawo ▁yo lagusa ▁fana ▁wa tenda ▁yanogile ▁hebu ▁yehile .
▁Ke ma ▁habehi ▁yangu ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁‘ Ndugu ▁yangu ▁Sauli , ▁u wone ▁kaidi !’ ▁Bahobaho ▁ni wona ▁kaidi .
▁Ndugu ▁zetu , ▁cho londeka ▁kumwing ' ha ▁hewela ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu . ▁ Vinoga ▁cheye ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁kwaviya ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu ▁wo kula ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁munhu ▁uwa ▁mwingi .
▁Mbali ▁m uiteganye ▁ng ' hani ▁muladi ▁sekemu zimize ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zi mu zi wone ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yenu ▁wenyewo . ▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁seke zi lawe ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁siku ▁zose ▁za ▁ugima ▁wenu . ▁Wa simulil eni ▁wanenu ▁na ▁wazukulu ▁zenu ,
▁Ku chuwala ▁kamwing ' hani ▁mana ▁muje , ▁ndiya ▁ija ▁wa saho ▁zenu ▁hawana i ja . ▁Katenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁yam nyendeni nyendeni ▁na ▁kuwa geza ni ▁ya dahe ▁ku mtemela ni ▁mate ▁kwa ▁kumwing ' hani ▁yanogile ▁kuuhelelo .
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁yesaba ▁Mulungu ▁ka komeleza ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁yose , ▁na ▁siku ▁iyo ▁yesaba ▁Mulungu ▁ka humula .
▁Mazi ▁mengi ▁ya ▁bahali ▁yawa gubika , ▁wadumb u kila ▁muibahali ▁fana ▁dibwe .
▁Kwa ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Walawi , ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁weng ' higwa ▁malagilizo . ▁Lelo , ▁one ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Walawi ▁uha fa i ye , ▁sigambe ▁ku londeke ▁ku lawilile ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁umwenga ▁mbasakanyo ▁uja ▁u sondelela ▁viya ▁viu londeka ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Melikizedeki , ▁siyo ▁uja ▁wa ▁Haluni .
▁No l wing ' ha ▁lukuli ▁lwangu ▁manhesa ▁ma dala ▁na ▁kulu gaza ▁ng ' hani ▁muladi ▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁sekeni lemigwe , ▁m aabaho ▁kuwapetela ▁usenga ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga .
▁na ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁kwa ▁chila ▁mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Maabaho ▁ubatiz o ▁wetu ▁ni ▁fana ▁chi wandigwa ▁hamwe ▁ chilisito ▁na ▁chi ilumba ▁muna ▁ifa ▁yake , ▁muladi ▁fana ▁viya ▁Chilisito ▁viya zi li bu ligwe ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lwa ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Tata , ▁iviya ▁na ▁cheye ▁chi dahe ▁kukala ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁sambi .
▁Viwakalile ▁wo m fungula ▁mwana ▁chihongwe , ▁wenyewo ▁wawa uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ha bali ▁mwo m fungula ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ?”
▁“ ▁‘ Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ha londeka ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁yelile , ▁nyambenyambe ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yo kala ▁kumwake , ▁hebu ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁ku lihigwa , ▁sekeya je ▁chinhu ▁chelile .
▁Maabaho ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Hita ▁uka na we ▁muna ▁dilamba ▁da ▁Si lo a mu .” ▁Si lo a mu ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Y o ya tumigwe ” . ▁Baho ▁iyo ▁chipofu ▁kahita , ▁kana wa ▁chihanga ▁chake , ▁m aabaho ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁kuno ▁ko wona .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁ko kwela ▁mwiingalawa , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁vinyamkela ▁ka mulamba ▁wahite ▁wose .
▁Balaamu ▁kamwidika ▁Balaki , ▁“ Vino ▁siku longele ▁kuwa ▁no londeka ▁kutenda ▁chi yo longa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁Kwa viya ▁vo wa hitile ▁kuna ▁dibawe ▁da ▁Eshikoli , ▁wa iwona ▁isi , ▁viwa bwelile ▁wawa bena ▁umoyo ▁Waisilaili ▁muladi ▁sekewa hite ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁iya weng ' hile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Na ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mu isasale , ▁kwaviya ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kezakwiza ▁fana ▁hamu i manyile ▁bule .”
▁Viya ugu bule ▁uhul a ▁weketatu , ▁ni muhulika ▁chi umbe ▁mwene ▁ugima ▁ija ▁weketatu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Izo !” ▁Ni lola ▁na ▁kuulongozi ▁wangu ▁kukala ▁falasi ▁m titu . ▁Na ▁ija ▁ya kweli le ▁ifa la si ▁kakala ▁ka mhilila ▁ miza ni ▁muna ▁umkono ▁wake .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁no wa tambikila ni ▁mweye ▁mose ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁no tambika ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho
▁Kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁Waisilaili ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza , ▁na ▁kwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁wa zenga ▁lago , ▁lusita ▁diwingu ▁diya ▁vidi kalile ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁wakala ▁muna ▁dilago ▁jawo .
▁Vini hitile ▁kumulima ▁kuhokela ▁vi bawo ▁va ▁mabwe ▁va ndikigwe ▁lagano ▁diya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁di yekile ▁na ▁mweye , ▁nikala ▁uko ▁siku ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁ichilo ▁na ▁imisi ▁si dile ▁hebu ▁si ng ' wile ▁chochose .
▁Wamwidika , ▁“ Vondau kale ▁muna ▁ichi goda ▁chako ▁cha ▁Ufalume ▁muna ▁utunhizo ▁wako , ▁cho londa ▁chi kale ▁na ▁weye , ▁imwe ▁ubanzi ▁wako ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁imwenga ▁ubanzi ▁wako ▁wa ▁kumoso .”
▁Ch eye ▁wenyewo ▁chi hulika ▁dizi ▁dino ▁dodi lawa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁lusita ▁vichi kalile ▁nayo ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lw e lile .
▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁hawa lu mize ▁walangulizi ▁wawo ▁wa ▁Isilaili . ▁Wa muwona ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁waja ▁na ▁kung ' wa .
▁W elesi ▁wako ▁wizakuwa ▁fana ▁msang a , ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yondaya dahe ▁kuu peta .
▁Si ▁kutogola ▁ p u lo ▁jetu ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁iviya ▁kakala ▁na ▁hamu ▁ya ▁kuwataza ▁kwaviya londile ▁mwenyewo ▁ka lamula ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu .
▁“ Mu vimanya ▁viya ▁vichi kalile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili ▁na ▁viya ▁vichi ge ndi le ▁muna ▁izisi ▁zimwenga .
▁Na wo ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Ku u kombola ▁ugima ▁wetu , ▁na ▁ku lagusa ▁unovu ▁wako ▁na ▁cheye ▁chi zakuwa ▁watumwa ▁wa ▁mfalume .”
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ku fungigwa ▁kwangu , ▁kuwa tende za ▁ndugu ▁wengi ▁kuwa ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁m baka ▁wo kuwa ▁magalu ▁wa ▁kuu pwililisa ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁ bila ▁ya ▁ludumbo .
▁Maabaho ▁wanahina ▁waja ▁watatu ▁wa muwona ▁Musa ▁na ▁Eliya ▁wolonga ▁na ▁Yesu .
▁Wa nhu ▁viwahulike ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zihile , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulila ▁kwa ▁usungu ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁ya v a lile ▁mahambo .
▁kalonga , ▁“ Niza ku tegeleza ▁vonda we ze ▁waja ▁wowa ku sita ki .” ▁Maabaho ▁kalagiliza ▁Paulo ▁ya kalizi gwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁ufalume ▁ya ▁Helode .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁wa sisili ▁na ▁wasokile ▁weza ▁na ▁wawa ja ▁iwa ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁waja ▁wanenehe ,
▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Ishumaili ▁mwanage ▁wengi zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁siku ▁iyo .
▁Wa muhitila ▁Filipo , ▁mkaya ▁wa ▁Besisaida ▁yili ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Galilaya , ▁wamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁chi ye ▁cho londa ▁kumuwona ▁Yesu .”
▁Mbali ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya u lole ▁goya ▁ugen zi ▁wake ▁mwenyewo , ▁u hano ga , ▁kodaha ▁kuigoda ▁mgati ▁yake ▁ bila ▁kulola ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁munhu ▁imwenga .
▁One ▁munhu ▁yaha chuuza ▁kaye ▁yake ▁iyo kala ▁ili ▁mgati ▁ya ▁dibululu ▁dodi zengigw e ▁ng ' huta , ▁keza daha ▁kuikombola ▁kwa ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwandusi la ▁viya chuuzi le . ▁Kwa ▁mwaka ▁uwo ▁wose ▁keza kuwa ▁na ▁haki ▁ya ▁kuikombola .
▁Musa ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Ka sola ▁wanyama ▁wake ▁wose ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁viya vi patile ▁kuja ▁Padani ▁Alamu , ▁ka ndusa ▁mwanza ▁kubwela ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Kanaani ▁kwa ▁Isaka ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Mbali ▁yaha mala ▁ku safyigwa ▁uhele ▁uwo ▁uhenela ,
▁Ivo , ▁one ▁u hani gesa ▁niye ▁fana ▁miyago , ▁ muhokele ▁iyo ▁fana ▁viya ▁ vu ni i hokele ▁niye .
▁Vino ▁ha bali ▁mu bawa ▁nhungo ▁ma lu mu ▁ya ▁mwenevale ▁wangu ? ▁Vino ▁nhungo ▁ino ▁siyo ▁ija ▁iyo ng ' wila ▁nayo ▁ko i sang ' hanila ▁ku la gula ? ▁Ivo ▁mu tenda ▁vihile ▁kwa ▁dino !’ ”
▁Pet a ▁ya ▁walume ▁wose ▁kwandusi la ▁wana ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁na ▁kugendelela ▁wakala ▁ 7 ,500.
▁Kaye ▁yoyose ▁yonda mwing ile , ▁m wanduse ▁kulonga , ▁‘ Tindiwalo ▁diwe ▁mwiikaye ▁ino ’
▁Lebeka ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Ni muhulika ▁ tati ▁yako ▁viyamulongele ▁se kulu ▁wako ▁Esau ,
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Niza m to ny ela ni ▁mvula ▁ya ▁magate ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga . ▁Chila ▁siku ▁wanhu ▁weza lawa ▁na ▁ku duganya ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁siku ▁iyo . ▁Kwa ▁nzila ▁ino ▁nizawa geza ▁ni wone ▁fana ▁weza sondelela ▁ndagilizi ▁zangu ▁hebu ▁haweza sondelela .
▁Go za ▁chi mulole ▁iyo ▁Chilisito , ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ! ▁Ya hulumuke ▁sambi ▁mu ▁msalaba , ▁na ▁cheye ▁chiza muhuwila !” ▁Na ▁hata ▁waja ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wawa mbigwe ▁mu ▁mi salaba ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁wa muliga .
▁Kwa viya ▁mwene ▁ludoko ▁hadaha ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁zozi mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁ka bela ▁mbuli ▁iyo , ▁“ M wanamke ▁weye , ▁si mmanyile ▁bule ▁iyo ▁you mulonga !”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya wone ▁kuwa ▁Musa ▁ko kwenhuka ▁habehi , ▁kamtanga ▁kulawa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁ichi ba go ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu sa ! ▁Musa !” ▁Musa ▁kamwidika ▁“ Wona , ▁na ba ha .”
▁Mbali ▁kuson gela ▁sambi ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁keza kala ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁kulume ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁na ▁Lu da b wa .”
▁Yesu ▁kolonga , ▁“ Tegelezeni , ▁no kwiza ▁sambi ! ▁Ka mweda ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo tegeleza ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ ulotezi ▁zili ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino !”
▁Ka wona ▁uja ▁mbiki ▁wou nogeza ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁matunda ▁yake ▁yo daha ▁ku dika , ▁na ▁ka gesa ▁uno ga ▁ng ' hani ▁uha dahile ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ubala , ▁ivo ▁kaha ▁ tunda ▁na ▁ka ja . ▁Maabaho ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mulumake , ▁nayo ▁iviya ▁ka ja .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Lelo ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kawa ▁fana ▁imwe ▁wetu , ▁ka yamanya ▁yanogile ▁na ▁yehile . ▁Mbali ▁yo londeka ▁kum gomesa ▁kuja ▁diya ▁di tunda ▁da ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁ugima , ▁mana ▁yaha di ja ▁keza kala ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Sekemu mulole ▁munhu ▁kuna ▁uku humiza , ▁m olondeka ▁mu wahulike ▁ngayengaye ▁na ▁weli ▁na ▁vinhu , ▁sekemudumbe ▁ vihanga ▁va ▁wanhu , ▁kwaviya ▁nhaguso ▁yomu ilava ▁yo lawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mbuli ▁yoyose ▁ ihawa ▁ndala ▁kumwenu , ▁i gale ni ▁kumwangu , ▁niye ▁niza i tegeleza .’
▁Lelo ▁damu ▁ija ▁izakuwa ▁chilaguso ▁chenu ▁cha ▁ku lagusa ▁kaye ▁zondamu we . ▁Niye ▁vondani wone ▁damu ▁iyo , ▁nizawa fosa ni ▁na ▁hamwiza p a ti gwa ▁na ▁dihile ▁jojose ▁lusita ▁vondani wataguse ▁Wamisili .
▁Ku temeligw a ▁mate , ▁one ▁muha zindilila ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yo nimulagilizani ▁diyelo .
▁Muha ja ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wowose , ▁one ▁mu mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁kufosa ▁zose . ▁Sekemu vili ge ▁vinhu ▁velile ▁va ▁Waisilaili ▁muladi ▁sekemu danganike .’ ▁”
▁Y eye ▁ yatunhizigwe ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wose ▁wa ▁Chilisito , ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁mwenyewo ▁muna ▁u lusita ▁lose , ▁siku ▁zose . ▁Ivo !
▁“ Siku ▁ya ▁longo ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁uno ▁wesaba ▁ni ▁ Siku ▁ya ▁Ku ilumba . ▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo ▁ya ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁mwiza funga ▁na ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁“ Niza wagalila ▁magayo ▁na ▁nizawa towa ▁kwa ▁mi sa le ▁yangu .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁we guta . ▁Amalabaho ▁wanahina ▁wa do ndo le za ▁ masigavu ▁na ▁wa memez a ▁vi gelo ▁saba .
▁Ivo ▁ka mtuma ▁munhu ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁na ▁ku mkanha ▁iditwi ▁Yohana .
▁Katenda ▁joho ▁da ▁kuval a ▁mgati ▁ya ▁chizibawo ▁cha ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu .
▁Mana ▁niye ▁ni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁ivo ▁m olondeka ▁mwii lave ▁wenyewo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu ▁na ▁muwe ▁welile , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁ni ▁yelile , ▁sekemu itende ▁mwa mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chochi tambala ▁muna ▁iisi .
▁Mbali ▁Esau ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni na ▁vinhu ▁va ▁ku faya ▁se kulu ▁wangu , ▁vinhu ▁viu li ▁navo ▁u sigale ▁navo .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁habehi ▁kufika ▁Yeliko , ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁chipofu ▁kakala ▁mumgwazo ▁ya ▁inzila ▁ko pula .
▁Munhu ▁hau papa ▁msalaba ▁wake ▁na ▁kuni sondelela , ▁ hani faya ▁bule .
▁Mbali ▁hamwande ▁makono ▁ya ▁Musa ▁ya le gela . ▁Ivo ▁Haluni ▁na ▁Hu li ▁wa sola ▁dibwe ▁na ▁wa dika ▁habehi ▁na ▁Musa , ▁nayo ▁kakala . ▁Maabaho ▁wa yamha ▁na ▁kwinula ▁mi ko no ▁yake , ▁imwe ▁kenul a ▁mkono ▁wa ▁kulume ▁na ▁imwenga ▁mkono ▁wa ▁kumoso . ▁Ivo ▁makono ▁ya ▁Musa ▁ya gendelela ▁ku gangamala ▁kuno ▁yenu ligwa ▁uchanyha ▁m baka ▁zuwa ▁vidi s wile .
▁Mbali ▁hata ▁kawa mbigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁unyondenyonde ▁wake . ▁Na ▁sambi ▁mgima ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁cha wa nyonde nyonde ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁chiza kala ▁nayo ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁muladi ▁ usang ' hane ▁ usang ' hano ▁vimu li .
▁Yesu ▁kolonga , ▁“ Tegelezeni , ▁no kwiza ▁sambi !” ▁ Vonda ni ze , ▁niza m gwe ka ▁chila ▁munhu ▁kwa ▁sang ' hano ▁yake ▁i yatendile .
▁Mbali ▁Petili ▁kalawa ▁na ▁kakimbila ▁m baka ▁kudileme . ▁Viya fikile , ▁ka inama ▁na ▁ku sungu lila ▁mgati , ▁baho ▁ka wona ▁sanda ▁muhala . ▁Maabaho ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁ko kwazanywa ▁kwa ▁icho ▁chochilawilile .
▁Mbali ▁cho vimanya ▁munhu ▁ino ▁ko lawa ▁kulihi . ▁Chilisito ▁vondayeze ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondaya manye ▁ko yo lawa .”
▁kwaviya ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chila ▁chi umbe ▁wa ▁muna ▁idamu . ▁Leka mana ▁ni walongela ▁Waisilaili , ▁‘ Sekemu je ▁damu ▁ya ▁chi umbe ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁ugima ▁wa ▁chi umbe ▁wa ▁muna ▁idamu ▁yake .’ ▁Y oyose ▁yondaya je ▁damu ▁kezaba guligwa ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Wa ja ▁ng ' ombe ▁saba ▁wanenehe ▁ni ▁miyaka ▁saba , ▁na ▁ija ▁m imada ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhemba ▁inogile ▁iviya ▁ni ▁miyaka ▁saba , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁ni ▁dimwe .
▁Wa kalizi ▁wa wedika , ▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yoyalongile ▁fana ▁viyolonga ▁munhu ▁ino !”
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza ya timbula ▁mab ambala ▁yayo ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁hana ▁ulupango , ▁ mbali ▁chi dali ▁chi zakuwa ▁cha ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Yandik a ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁muna ▁ichitabu , ▁m aabaho ▁i gong ' onde ▁muna ▁yama gutwi ▁ya ▁Yoshua ▁iwe ▁lukumbuso ▁kwaviya ▁nizawa segeza ▁Waamaleki ▁wose ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁muladi ▁mweye , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁muwe ▁na ▁udahi ▁wa ▁ku manya ▁viya ▁ulondo ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁vi wene la ▁kwa ▁ugala mu ▁na ▁utali , ▁kwa ▁chimo ▁na ▁ ki gidila .
▁Ha londeka ▁kusola ▁muke ▁mgane ▁hebu ▁muke ▁ya sigwe ▁hebu ▁muke ▁ya mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁ugoni ▁hebu ▁malaya , ▁ mbali ▁kolondeka ▁ya sole ▁mhambe ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwanhu ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ,
▁ Nokulongela , ▁hwiza lawa ▁uko ▁ng ' o ▁m baka ▁u lihe ▁sente ▁ya ▁uhelelo .”
▁Maabaho ▁hano ▁hana ▁chilaho ▁cha ▁Mulungu . ▁L usita ▁wamwenga ▁viwa tendigwe ▁kuwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁haku kalile ▁na ▁chilaho .
▁“ Yeli hi ▁vimwili ▁mweye ▁yahalonda ▁ku zenga ▁lingo , ▁hakala ▁ teng ' hu ▁na ▁kupeta ▁ gala ma , ▁kulola ▁kuwa ▁kana zo ▁hela ▁za ▁kuu komeleze la ▁ usang ' hano ▁wake ?
▁Vino ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁hawa chi patile ▁bule ▁chinhu ▁chiya ▁cho wakalile ▁wochi zahila ? ▁Bule , ▁ mbali ▁waja ▁wa saguligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁wachi pata , ▁wamwenga ▁wa tendigw a ▁wabozi .
▁Na ▁baho ▁vinhu ▁ivo ▁vo nd ava nduse ▁kulawilila , ▁msang a la le . ▁M wime , ▁ mwin ule ▁matwi ▁yenu ▁kwaviya ▁ukombola ▁wenu ▁wa habehi .”
▁Helode ▁viya vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁waja ▁nyam ilo to ▁wa ▁nhondo ▁wowa lawile ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa ▁wa mvwizila , ▁kengil wa ▁na ▁ludoko ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ivo ▁ka lava ▁lagilizo ▁kuwa ▁wana ▁wose ▁umo ▁Betelehemu ▁wa kalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁midi ▁na ▁kubwela ▁hasi ▁wa komigwe , ▁kulawa ▁lusita ▁luja ▁waja ▁nyam ilo to ▁wa ▁nhondo ▁viwalo ngile ▁in hondo ▁vi i woneke .
▁Mbali ▁ hita ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁u msole le ▁muke ▁mwanangu .’
▁“ Munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁magutwi ▁ya hulike ▁yaja ▁Muhe ▁yoyo ya longela ▁mabumbila ▁ya ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito . ▁“ Munhu ▁yonda ▁ya hume ▁heza da nga nyi z wa ▁na ▁ifa ▁yekaidi ▁ng ' o .
▁Wawo ▁weza hita ▁kwingila ▁magayo ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose , ▁na ▁wanogile ▁weza hita ▁kuna ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .”
▁Na ▁mawalo ▁yoya botigwe ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁helile , ▁ya a ni ▁mawalo ▁yelile ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁sang ' hano ▁zawo ▁za ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .”
▁Chila ▁sang ' hano ▁hai mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁kuna ▁uhasanyi ▁hau mgala ▁munhu ▁muna ▁i i fa .
▁woya ching ' hile ▁ bila ▁ningo ! ▁Kwa ▁ubala ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wake ▁wose
▁Labani ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ivo ▁weye ▁ni ▁lukuli ▁lumwe ▁na ▁damu ▁imwe ▁na ▁niye .” ▁Yakobo ▁kakala ▁na ▁Labani ▁mwezi ▁umwe .
▁Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁munhu ▁yo londa ▁ku kombola ▁ugima ▁wake ▁mwenyewo ▁keza wagiza , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yo wagiza ▁ugima ▁wake ▁kwa ▁sam a ▁yangu , ▁na ▁kwa ▁sam a ▁ya ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza u kombola .
▁Hamwande ▁Mafalisayo ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁chibumbila ▁cha ▁mfalume ▁Helode ▁watumigwa ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁muladi ▁wam t e ge ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zake .
▁Ha behi ▁na ▁ku c ha , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kawalola ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Wamisili ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁im handa ▁ija ▁ya ▁moto ▁na ▁wingu , ▁kawa tenda ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Misili ▁wawe ▁na ▁lugano ▁ng ' hani .
▁Munhu ▁yanogile ▁ko lava ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁muna ▁ ingama ▁yake , ▁na ▁munhu ▁yehile ▁ko lava ▁vinhu ▁vihile ▁muna ▁ ingama ▁yake .
▁Walondwa ▁wangu , ▁ ihawa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi londa ▁cheye ▁fana ▁vino , ▁cho londeka ▁na ▁cheye ▁chi i londe .
▁im a ▁hagati ▁ya ▁Wamisili ▁na ▁Waisilaili . ▁M handa ▁ya ▁wingu ▁iyo ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁i lava ▁ziza , ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga ▁i lava ▁bu ng ' hulo . ▁Ivo ▁mabumbila ▁yayo ▁maidi , ▁wakalizi ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁Waisilaili ▁hawa i kwenhukile ▁chilo ▁chose .
▁Maabaho ▁ka walongoza ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu ▁yawa temele ▁mate ▁kuhita ▁Besaniya , ▁nayo ▁kenul a ▁makono ▁yake ▁uchanyha ▁na ▁kawa temela ▁mate .
▁Maabaho ▁Shekemu ▁kamulongela ▁ tati ▁yake ▁Dina ▁na ▁iwa lumbu ▁zake , ▁“ Nolamba ▁muni tende ▁ni togoligwe ▁haulongozi ▁wenu ▁na ▁niye ▁niza wagolele ni ▁cho mulonda .
▁Na ▁ mulongeleni ▁Ali ki p o , ▁“ W i lole ▁goya ▁sang ' hano ▁ija ▁yo wing ' higwe ▁na ▁Mndewa .”
▁Mbali ▁lelo ▁niye ▁nowalongela , ▁munhu ▁wowose ▁yo mwasa ▁muke ▁wake ▁na ▁yondaya mwing ' he ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa ▁kwaviya ▁muke ▁iyo ▁ka tenda ▁uzinzi , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ko mtenda ▁imuke ▁yawe ▁m zi nzi . ▁Iviya ▁mulume ▁yondaya msole ▁muke ▁yeng ' higwe ▁chibu wa ▁cha ▁nyasa , ▁iyo ▁nayo ▁kotenda ▁uzinzi .
▁Kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁miyaka ▁saba ▁ya ▁ shi b e ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁ Mbwanga ▁ija ▁ka lamka ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kulonga . ▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kamwing ' ha ▁mami ▁yake ▁mbwanga ▁ija .
▁U huwilo ▁wenu ▁na ▁ulondo ▁wenu ▁vo kuwa ▁na ▁chandusilo ▁muna ▁di lole lo ▁do mwi kiligwe ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu . ▁Mu hulika ▁kuson hela ▁uhuwilo ▁uwo ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁mwanduso ▁vimu pe ti ligwe ▁usenga ▁wa ▁kweli ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .
▁“ Mu ha loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani , ▁makabila ▁yano ▁yo londeka ▁ye me ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Ge li zi mu , ▁muladi ▁wawa temele ▁mate ▁wanhu , ▁Simeoni ▁na ▁Lawi ▁na ▁Yuda ▁na ▁Isakali ▁na ▁Yosefu ▁na ▁Benjamini .
▁Vino ▁mweye ▁hamu longa , ▁‘ I ng ' hali ▁miyezi ▁mine ▁m baka ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁kugobola ▁chi fike ?’ ▁Nowalongela , ▁in u leni ▁yameso ▁yenu ▁ mulole ▁migunda ! ▁N diya ▁zi kangala ▁na ▁zo londeka ▁ku go b o ligwa .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁koja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁ichilo ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Masa yo , ▁wa sola ▁kodi ▁wengi ▁weza ▁na ▁wa hasanyi , ▁waja ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake .
▁“ Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁kulonga ▁yano ▁yose , ▁muladi ▁sekemu u leke ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu .
▁Wa lagilize ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁muna ▁isi ▁ino ▁ya ▁sambi , ▁sekewa igode ▁na ▁sekewa lole le ▁vinhu ▁vingi ▁viya ▁havi daha ▁ku lole ligwa , ▁ mbali ▁wa mulole le ▁Mulungu ▁yoyo ching ' ha ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁kwa ▁wingi ▁muladi ▁chi vi de ng ' helele .
▁“ Mwizagaya ▁mweye ▁wafundiza ▁Malagilizo ▁na ▁Mafalisayo ! ▁Wa delenya ! ▁Mu linga ▁fana ▁maleme ▁yoya ha kigwe ▁ langi ▁nzel u , ▁yo woneka ▁yano ga ▁kwa ▁kunze , ▁ mbali ▁mgati ▁ya mema ▁m ivuha ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chi fi lile .
▁Kwa viya ▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Sekeu m ta tali ze ▁ng ' ombe ▁umulomo ▁viu msang ' hanila ▁ku huta ▁uhemba ,” ▁na ▁iviya ▁“ Munhu ▁yo sang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁kolondeka ▁ya li higwe ▁yombe ▁jake .”
▁Ivo ▁keza mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁gate ▁dimwe ▁kulawa ▁chila ▁nhosa . ▁M agate ▁yayo ▁yezakuwa ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yo k w itila ▁damu ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁tindiwalo ▁kuna ▁ulupango .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ▁kuna ▁ichuwala ▁cha ▁Sinai ,
▁Mbali ▁mo togola ▁wenyewo ▁kuwa ▁mweye ▁mwa wa na ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wawa komile ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁ka da nga ni kila ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Moabu , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile .
▁Enosi ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁miyaka ▁magan a ▁kenda ▁na ▁mitano .
▁Ka guta ▁nyangi ▁kwa ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁“ Yesu ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁Ku chanyha ▁Ng ' hani ! ▁Cho ni ▁chiu londa ▁kumwangu ? ▁I la he ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁hwiza n he sa !”
▁“ U ha mfika ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁chihongwe ▁wa ▁mwihi ▁wako ▁ka ga , ▁m bwelezele ▁mwenyewo .
▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁funhufunhu . ▁Petili ▁kamsola ▁kumgwazo ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kun ' bwakila .
▁Ihaw a ▁wingu ▁di kala ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁siku ▁mbili ▁hebu ▁mwezi ▁hebu ▁mwaka , ▁Waisilaili ▁wakala ▁muna ▁dilago ▁jawo , ▁ mbali ▁vi dinuligwe ▁uchanyha ▁wa ndusa ▁mwanza .
▁Wamoabu ▁wawalongela ▁walala ▁wa ▁Midiani , ▁“ M ting ' hano ▁uno ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wiza nanga ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁mumgwazo ▁yetu ▁fana ▁viya ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁viyo ja ▁mgina ▁muna ▁imigunda .” ▁Ivo ▁Balaki ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Sipol i ▁yoya kalile ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Moabu ▁lusita ▁ulo ,
▁Wala ▁seke wi ila he ▁kwa ▁ditwi ▁jako , ▁kwaviya ▁hu daha ▁kulu tenda ▁hata ▁lu vili ▁lumwe ▁luwe ▁lu ze lu ▁hebu ▁luti tu .
▁Maabaho ▁ni kumbuka ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁Mndewa , ▁‘ Yohana ▁ka batiz a ▁kwa ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁mweye ▁mwiza batiz igwa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .’
▁Ivo , ▁sekechi igode ▁na ▁sekechi i so vu le , ▁na ▁sekechi i wonele ▁migongo .
▁Sekemu je ▁damu , ▁ mbali ▁i tile ni ▁hasi ▁fana ▁mazi .
▁Ndugu ▁zetu ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁mwanza ▁wetu ▁kumwenu ▁hau wile ▁bule .
▁“ ▁‘ Ya duwiligwe ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo koma ▁kwa ▁ku ifisa .’ ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wezakwidika , ▁‘ Ivo .’
▁ E p a fu lo , ▁yeli ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kumsang ' hanila ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu , ▁k okulamsa .
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁walume ▁waidi ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁matano ▁na ▁mabe belu ▁ya ▁luti ▁matano ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁watano ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo . ▁Iyo ▁i kala ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁Shel u mi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁S uli s ha da i .
▁Mfalume ▁ka sasala ▁m tuka ▁wake ▁wa ▁ku bulul igwa ▁na ▁falasi ▁na ▁kuwa sola ▁wakalizi ▁wake .
▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁viifikile , ▁ka ndusa ▁kufundiza ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela . ▁Wa nhu ▁wowa muhulike ▁wazanywa . ▁Wa uza , ▁“ Vino ▁ka zi pata hi ▁mbuli ▁zino ?” ▁Viya ▁ubala ▁wa ki ▁wo yeng ' higwe ▁ino ▁m baka ▁yatende ▁mauzauza ▁yano ?
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁wamwidika , ▁“ Ko wona ▁wanhu ▁viwo ku sung ' ha - sung ' ha , ▁m aabaho ▁weye ▁ko uza ▁yelihi ▁yoya ku dalise ?”
▁na ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁kawa funyila ▁umoyo ▁kudibwilingu .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁nhulanyika ▁vidi wonile ▁kuwa ▁ ja sigwa ▁mwiisi , ▁jandusa ▁ku muwinga ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁ya i ba s ule ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume .
▁ Siku ▁ija ▁Yesu ▁kasegela ▁mwiikaye ▁na ▁kahita ▁kakala ▁mumgwazogwazo ▁wa ▁dilamba , ▁uko ▁kakala ▁hasi ▁na ▁kufundiza .
▁Viwafikile ▁kwa ▁Yesu , ▁wamulamba ▁ng ' hani , ▁walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁ko faya ▁um taze ,
▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁Waisilaili , ▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamsagula ▁Bezaleli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁U li , ▁m zukulu ▁wa ▁Hu li ▁kulawa ▁kabila ▁da ▁Yuda .
▁Weza chi guma ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁mgati ▁ya ▁mbende ▁ya ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁mwiibahali ▁na ▁kuchi ka ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kupapila .
▁M afundizo ▁yangu ▁yeza la ga ▁fana ▁ma do ndo ▁ya ▁mvula ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁zi la gale ▁fana ▁ nhu ng we , ▁fana ▁ nyi mi nyi mi ▁muna ▁ivi nhu ▁vi ha ndigwe , ▁fana ▁ma wa ga ▁muna ▁mayani ▁ma bisi .
▁Chila ▁chinhu ▁cho londeka ▁chi tendeke ▁kwa ▁u goya ▁na ▁u ta la ti bu .
▁“ Yano ▁yayo ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁nhambiko ▁za ▁tindiwalo ▁ziya ▁munhu ▁zi yodaha ▁ku mulavila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa nahina ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁Mbatizi ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Mafalisayo ▁wakala ▁wo funga ▁kuja . ▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa mwitila ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kumuuza , ▁“ Habali ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Yohana ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wa ▁Mafalisayo ▁wo funga ▁kuja , ▁ mbali ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁hawa funga ▁kuja ?”
▁Mu londeni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁mu mtegeleze ▁na ▁mu muhuwile ▁yeye , ▁m aabaho ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanenu ▁mwiza kala ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁i walaga ni ligwe ▁wa saho ▁zenu , ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo .”
▁Lelo ▁cho vimanya ▁fana ▁Malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁viyolonga , ▁yolonga ▁na ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁Yamalagilizo ▁ya ▁Musa ▁muladi ▁chila ▁munhu ▁ya leke ▁kui gombela , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa tagusigwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Wamulongela , ▁“ Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti ▁ko fosa .”
▁Nowalongela ni , ▁kuson gela ▁sambi ▁siza kung ' wa ▁bule ▁divai ▁ya ▁mzabibu ▁m baka ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁vonda wize .”
▁Maabaho ▁walala ▁wa ▁bululu ▁weza mtanga ▁na ▁kulonga ▁nayo . ▁One ▁yahawa ▁yang ' hali ▁ko lema ▁kumwing i lila ,
▁L onde ni ▁ng ' hani ▁vitumetume ▁vinogile . ▁Na ▁sambi ▁niza mulagusa ni ▁nzila ▁inogile ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁zose .
▁Maabaho ▁uhelelo ▁wiza kwiza , ▁Chilisito ▁vondaya mwing ' he ▁Ufalume ▁Mulungu ▁Tata . ▁Vondaya banange ▁ tawala ▁zose , ▁udahi ▁na ▁nguvu .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela , ▁“ I chigulogulo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁nyama ▁muje , ▁imitondo ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁magate ▁muje ▁mwi g u t e , ▁kwaviya ▁kahulika ▁kulongelela ▁kwenu . ▁Vino ▁cheye ▁china ▁na ni ▁m baka ▁ mulongele le ▁kumwetu ? ▁Ha mulongele le ▁kumwetu ▁ mbali ▁mu longelela ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁umwe , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ,
▁Paulo ▁kawa la m sa ▁na ▁kawalongela ▁dimwe ▁kwa ▁dimwe ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁ziya tendile ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁kufose la ▁sang ' hano ▁yake .
▁Wa nahina ▁wazanywa ▁viwahulike ▁mbuli ▁iyo . ▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁kaidi , ▁“ Wa na ng u , ▁vi dala ▁ng ' hani ▁kwingila ▁muna ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁Mulungu !
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Apolo ▁ndugu ▁yetu , ▁ni mulamba ▁ng ' hani ▁yahite ▁kumwenu ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁wamwenga , ▁ija ▁halondile ▁kuhita ▁sambi , ▁ mbali ▁kezakwiza ▁honda ya pate ▁nyafasi .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza sola ▁yaja ▁mawalo ▁ya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁u mvaz e ▁Haluni , ▁joho ▁na ▁ng ' hanzu ▁na ▁chizibawo ▁na ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁na ▁kum zingiliza ▁um kwiji ▁uja ▁u botigwe ▁vinogile .
▁Yesu ▁ka hinduka ▁kamuwona ▁mwanamke ▁ija , ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I ng ' he ▁moyo , ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁u kuhonya .” ▁Na ▁mwanamke ▁ija ▁ka hona ▁kuson gela ▁lusita ▁luja .
▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁iwa tenda ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wa i hasanye ▁nawo . ▁Ivo ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Balinaba ▁wa sa guligwa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wahuwila ▁wamwenga ▁wa ▁Antiyokiya ▁wahite ▁Yelusalemu ▁kuwa lola ▁watumigwa ▁na ▁walala ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁iyo .
▁Ivo ▁wa sola ▁maivu ▁ya ▁tanuli ▁na ▁wema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili , ▁Musa ▁kaya p i gi sa ▁uchanyha , ▁nayo ▁yawa ▁maihu ▁yo tu mbu ka ▁na ▁kuwa ▁vi londa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama .
▁Bahobaho ▁kulawilila ▁ gudemek o ▁kulu ▁da ▁isi , ▁na ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁bululu ▁ha banangika , ▁wanhu ▁alufu ▁saba ▁wadanganika ▁muna ▁di gudemek o ▁diya . ▁Na ▁wanhu ▁wa si galile ▁wadumba ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa mtunhiza ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁ko kwing ' higwa ▁lu gubul o ▁lwa ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Ivo ▁ivo ▁lulimi ▁ni ▁chi ungo ▁chidodo ▁cha ▁lukuli , ▁na lo ▁lo igodela ▁mbuli ▁ng ' hulu ▁ng ' hani . ▁Lola ▁moto ▁mdodo ▁wodaha ▁ku soma ▁mbago ▁ng ' hulu .
▁No uza ▁kaidi , ▁vino ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli ▁hawavimanyile ▁bule ? ▁Mulungu ▁kalonga ▁kufose la ▁mulomo ▁wa ▁Musa ▁k alongo la ▁kulonga , ▁“ Niza watenda ▁muwa wonele ▁migongo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁imwenga , ▁nizawa tenda ▁muwa wonele ▁ludoko ▁wanhu ▁wabozi .”
▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁yo we zila ▁wose ▁wo lema ▁kumtegeleza .
▁Iviya ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Mulopozi ▁nayo ▁hai patile ▁hishima ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁digogogo . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁mwanangu , ▁diyelo ▁niwa ▁ tati ▁yako .”
▁Ivo ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa zahila ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kumkoma ▁Lazalo ▁iviya ,
▁W e ka i di ▁ka tangigwa ▁Eli ezeli , ▁kwaviya ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yangu ▁kani taza ▁na ▁kani kombola ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁u panga ▁wa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili .”
▁Ma ha mbo ▁yano ▁yo londeka ▁ya lawe ▁mgati ▁ya ▁moyo ▁wa ▁munhu ▁na ▁ni ▁mahambo ▁haya wola ▁na ▁ya ▁u nyendanyenda ▁na ▁ya ▁muhe ▁wa ▁uhole ▁yoyo faya ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mulungu .
▁na ▁ng ' ombe ▁wakala ▁ 7 2 ,000
▁Na ▁nhulanyika ▁diya ▁ ja sigwa ▁mwiisi , ▁nhulanyika ▁diya ▁da ▁umwaka ▁dodi tangigwa ▁Mwihi ▁hebu ▁Lufyende , ▁dodi wa vwizi le ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose . ▁ J a sigwa ▁hasi ▁hana ▁iisi ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wake .
▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Nokulongela ▁kweli , ▁ichilo ▁cha ▁diyelo , ▁yang ' hali ▁nz ogolo ▁hana kwika ▁miyanza ▁midi , ▁kwiza ni bela ▁miyanza ▁mitatu .”
▁Waisilaeli ▁viwa iting ' hane ▁hamwe ▁kuja ▁kudibwilingu , ▁Musa ▁kakala ▁uko ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu ▁na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ija ▁yoyalongile ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁kuja ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Si na yi , ▁iyo ▁yoyeng ' higwe ▁mbuli ▁za ▁ugima ▁ya ching ' he ▁cheye .
▁niye ▁ni handa ▁mbeyu , ▁Apolo ▁kai gum ila ▁mazi , ▁ mbali ▁Mulungu ▁iyo ▁ya i tendile ▁i ku le .
▁Sekemu li ng e ▁fana ▁wawo . ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁kavimanya ▁kamala ▁yaja ▁yo mulonda ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna mpula .
▁wala ▁si hitile ▁Yelusalemu ▁kuwa uza ▁waja ▁wa ni longole le ▁kuwa ▁watumigwa . ▁Mbali ▁ni hita ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁ A la b i ya , ▁na ▁m aabaho ▁ni bwela ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Damasiki .
▁Wa duganye ni ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁walala ▁wose ▁wa ▁makabila ▁yenu ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wenu ▁wose , ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁wazi hulike , ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁vi lave ▁ukalangama ▁kuson hela ▁wawo .
▁Ni uza , ▁‘ Mndewa , ▁weye ▁kwa ▁yelihi ?’ ▁Mndewa ▁kamwidika , ▁‘ Niye ▁niiyo ▁Yesu ▁wa ▁Nazaleti , ▁weye ▁you ni gaza .’
▁W e ne v a le ▁wa ▁mndele ▁ija ▁vi wawonile ▁lolelo ▁da ▁kupata ▁sente ▁di mala , ▁wa wagwila ▁Paulo ▁na ▁Sila ▁na ▁wawa bulul a ▁m baka ▁wa u gulila ▁vinhu ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁iwa kulu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Lebeka , ▁“ Mu i nda ▁yako ▁muna ▁makabila ▁maidi , ▁Ma kabila ▁maidi ▁yonda yelekigwe ▁na ▁weye ▁yeza igola . ▁Di mwe ▁dizakuwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kufosa ▁dimwenga ; ▁I m kulu ▁keza msang ' hanila ▁imdodo .”
▁Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁uwo ▁kwiza kuwa ▁na ▁dugila , ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba ▁mwiza kuja ▁magate ▁yeli bule ▁lusu .
▁“ Wa isi la ili ▁weza kwika ▁malago ▁yawo , ▁chila ▁munhu ▁hana ▁ ib e nde la ▁yake , ▁hana ▁ichi la g u so ▁cha ▁kaye ▁ya ▁ tati ▁yake . ▁Weza kwika ▁malago ▁yawo ▁kudi zunguluka ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu .
▁Ka zanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wabule ▁uhuwilo . ▁Amalabaho ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁mwi ▁ivi bulul u ▁vili ▁habehi , ▁ka fundiza ▁wanhu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ‚ ▁“ Hita ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁u mulongele , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kolonga ‚ ▁‘ Wa lekelele ▁wanhu ▁wangu ▁wahite ▁wa ka ni tambikile .
▁Basi ▁Balaamu ▁viya wonile ▁kuwa ▁i mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa temela ▁mate ▁Waisilaili , ▁ha hitile ▁ku lotela ▁kaidi , ▁ka lola ▁kuchuwala .
▁ B ung ' hulo ▁kadi tanga ▁“ M isi ” ▁na ▁ziza ▁kadi tanga ▁“ Chi lo .” ▁I wa ▁imitondo ▁iwa ▁ichigulogulo ▁siku ▁ya ▁mwanduso .
▁Wa segela ▁Holi ▁Ha gi di ga di ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁Yo ti ba sa .
▁Yeli hi ▁hagati ▁yenu ▁kwa ▁kui gaza ▁kodaha ▁ kongeza ▁hata ▁fana ▁dimwe ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wake ?
▁Iviya ▁mu muwona ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya m papile ni ▁kuna ▁ichuwala , ▁fana ▁tata ▁viyo m papa ▁mwanage , ▁nzila ▁yose ▁imu fose le ▁m baka ▁mu fika ▁hano .’
▁ Nyama ▁iyo ▁yo londeka ▁i di gwe ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iya chinjigwe ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁hebu ▁igolo ▁yake . ▁ Nyama ▁yoyose ▁yondai sigale ▁m baka ▁siku ▁yetatu ▁yo londeka ▁i so m igwe ▁na ▁moto ,
▁Ni mwing ' hani ▁mweye ▁vinhu ▁vovi londeka ▁ng ' hani ▁vini hokele , ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁kadanganika ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁fana ▁viya ndikigwe ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ,
▁No dumba ▁kuwa ▁mwanza ▁umwenga , ▁Mulungu ▁keza ni tende za ▁niwe ▁m nyendanyenda ▁haulongozi ▁wenu . ▁Na ▁niye ▁niza lila ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁wo watendile ▁uhasanyi ▁baho ▁hau mwaka ▁nawo ▁hawa sa m hile ▁bule ▁na ▁ku leka ▁u c ha fu , ▁uzinzi ▁na ▁m agesa ▁yehile ▁yo watendile .
▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁mwene ▁mu ti ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁m guhi ▁ng ' hani , ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁ha lola ▁goya ▁hebu ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhele ▁hebu ▁yoya lu mile ▁zi mbwe gele .
▁Kwa viya ▁lusita ▁luja ▁vichi kalile ▁kumwenu ▁chi mulagilizani ▁mbuli ▁ino , ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁yaha lema ▁kusang ' hana ▁ usang ' hano ▁sekeya je ▁ndiya .
▁hebu ▁yaha pata ▁chinhu ▁cha gile ▁na ▁kulonga ▁kuwa ▁hachi wonile ▁bule , ▁hebu ▁ku ilaha ▁uvwizi ▁kuson hela ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁chi wo tenda ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ku bananga ,
▁Mbali ▁kwaviya ▁Wamisili ▁viwa wa ga zile ▁Waisilaili , ▁ni ivo ▁vi wongezeke ▁na ▁k wene la . ▁Wamisili ▁wawa dumba ▁Waisilaili ,
▁Na ▁cheye ▁cho wapetela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁Mulungu ▁iya ila gane ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zetu .
▁Yakobo ▁kalonga , ▁“ Ni muwona ▁Mulungu ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga ▁na ▁ning ' hali ▁mgima .” . ▁Ka ha tanga ▁hanhu ▁baho ▁P e n u eli .
▁Vi l umbe ▁vose ▁vili ▁na ▁ugima ▁muna ▁iisi ▁vi danganika , ▁ndege ▁wose ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁ wofugigwa ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁wa ▁kumbago ▁na ▁wang ' onyo ▁wose ▁wotambala ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁Musa ▁kawauza , ▁“ Habali ▁mu waleka ▁wanaake ▁wano ▁wa sigale ▁wagima ?
▁Sekemu wa zimize ▁waja ▁weli ▁muna ▁ichifungo ▁fana ▁viya ▁mu fungigwa ▁hamwe ▁nawo . ▁Sekemu wa zimize ▁waja ▁wo gaya ▁fana ▁viya ▁mo gaya ▁fana ▁wawo .
▁Baho ▁ka lawilila ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁ko fosa ▁muna ▁inzila ▁ija , ▁ mbali ▁viyamuwone ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo yatowigwe , ▁ka gwa za .
▁Mbali ▁kumwenu ▁mweye ▁si ▁ivo ▁bule . ▁I ja ▁yeli ▁mkulu ▁na ya we ▁fana ▁mdodo ▁kuwa fosa ▁wose , ▁na ▁mulangulizi ▁yawe ▁fana ▁mtumigwa .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁ka londa ▁kumuwona ▁Yesu ▁ni ▁munhu ▁wa ▁vilihi , ▁ mbali ▁ka potigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu , ▁na ▁kwaviya ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁n guhi .
▁Yesu ▁kawauza , ▁“ Chi nhu ▁ ga ni ?”
▁Yakobo ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Yohana , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Zebedayo , ▁wano ▁kaweng ' ha ▁zina ▁ B o a ne lige , ▁fambulo ▁jake ▁“ Wa nhu ▁wa ▁Ng ' huwa ,”
▁W elesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁weli ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁weza duganya ▁ngodi ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁na ▁ku b wi n ha ▁moto .
▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza u lola ▁utamu ▁uwo . ▁One ▁yaha wona ▁kuwa ▁ha gidimila ▁na ▁upipi ▁uwa ▁wa ▁uko le ▁na ▁m sisili , ▁basi ▁keza gong ' onda ▁kuwa ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko , ▁kwaviya ▁uwo ▁ni ▁uhele ▁na ▁utamu ▁wa ▁mbende ▁wa ▁muna ▁iditwi ▁hebu ▁muna ▁ichi de vu .
▁One ▁muha chi togole la ▁cho mulamba ni ▁mu ching ' he ▁isi ▁ino ▁iwe ▁yetu , ▁sekemu chi lo se ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁Yoludani .”
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kuwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁“ Ni segela ▁Yelusalemu ▁miyaka ▁mingi , ▁lelo ▁ni bwela ▁muladi ▁ni wataze ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁na ▁kulava ▁sadaka .
▁Wa ileka ▁nzila ▁ija ▁yoni walagilize ▁kui sondelela , ▁wa tenda ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁da ▁zahabu ▁na ▁kudi tambikila ▁na ▁kudi lavila ▁nhosa , ▁wolonga , ▁‘ W eye ▁Isilaili , ▁ino ▁niiyo ▁m ulungu ▁wetu , ▁yoya chi lavile ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili !’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁mtumwa ▁yoya tangigwe ▁na ▁Mndewa . ▁Iviya ▁viya ▁ka ilegeha ▁kwa ▁Mndewa , ▁viya tangigwe ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁muna ▁utumwa ▁wake .
▁“ Wa mweda ▁waja ▁ngayengaye ▁wa ▁muhe , ▁kwaviya ▁Ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁ni ▁wawo !
▁Kuuhelelo , ▁muke ▁ija ▁nayo ▁kadanganika .
▁Nowalongela ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁kwaviya ▁niye ▁niwa ▁mtumigwa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi , ▁na ▁no i tunhiza ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu .
▁Chilisito ▁mwenyewo ▁kau papa ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu ▁muna ▁ulukuli ▁lwake ▁mumsalaba ▁muladi ▁chi leke ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁kukala ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu . ▁Kwa ▁ma londa ▁yake ▁mweye ▁mu hona .
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Tegelezeni ▁mbuli ▁zangu , ▁ku hawa ▁na ▁mulotezi ▁hagati ▁yenu , ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁niza i lagusa ▁kumwake ▁muna ▁yamalaguso , ▁niza longa ▁nayo ▁muna ▁zinzozi .
▁L usita ▁ulo ▁ulo ▁ulung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁vi wamuwonile ▁Yesu , ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁wam kimbilila ▁kumulamsa .
▁M wanamke ▁ija ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Mwenevale , ▁ning ' he ▁mazi ▁yayo ▁muladi ▁sekeni wone ▁ng ' hilu ▁na ▁wala ▁sekeni ze ▁hano ▁kude ha ▁mazi .”
▁Vi ifikile ▁siku ▁ya ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka ning ' ha ▁vi bawo ▁vidi ▁va ▁mabwe ▁va ndikigwe ▁lagano .
▁Mbali ▁wa baho ▁wadodo ▁uko ▁Sa li di ▁wowo vika ▁goya ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁kuwa ▁vizelu . ▁Wawo ▁weza hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁niye ▁na ▁ku yawala ▁viwalo ▁vizelu ▁kwaviya ▁ wolondeka ▁wawe ▁ivo .
▁W eye ▁Kola ▁na ▁ bumbila ▁jako ▁jose ▁m olondeka ▁mutende ▁vino . ▁ Soleni ▁vetezo ,
▁Vi ifikile ▁siku ▁ya ▁ku kumbuka ▁ku vumbuka ▁kwa ▁Helode , ▁ Mndele ▁wa ▁Helodiya ▁kavi na ▁hana ▁iwanhu ▁na ▁Helode ▁kanogel wa ▁ng ' hani ,
▁Niza ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Tat i ▁yangu , ▁hamu ni hokele ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁imwenga ▁yaheza ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wake , ▁mwiza muhokela .
▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁wana ▁wawo ▁weli ▁hawana hulika ▁malagilizo ▁yano , ▁weza hulika ▁na ▁ku ifunza ▁kumdumba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁lusita ▁lose ▁lo wo kala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yomu hita ▁kukala ▁ku umwambu ▁wa ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani .”
▁Ha mala ▁baho ▁vitumetume ▁vino ▁kamwing ' ha ▁ tati ▁yake ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mwanza , ▁vihongwe ▁longo ▁wowa papile ▁vinhu ▁vinogile ▁kulawa ▁Misili , ▁vihongwe ▁wake ▁longo ▁wowa papile ▁ndiya , ▁magate ▁na ▁ndiya ▁zimwenga .
▁One ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁yaha iswela ▁na ▁ muhuwila ▁miyage , ▁ko geza ze ▁kuhita ▁ku mu lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁hawammanyile ▁Mulungu ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁ku mshitak i ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu ▁welile .
▁“ Habule ▁munhu ▁ya vimanyile ▁siku ▁ija ▁wala ▁saa ▁ija . ▁Hata ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wala ▁Mwana ▁hawavimanyile , ▁ila ▁Tata ▁yaidumwe ▁iyo ▁ya vimanyile .
▁ B ung ' hu la ▁dino ▁do lagusa ▁ vu u londa ▁weye ▁kwa ▁manyambenyambe , ▁na ▁diza gala ▁utunhizo ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁wa ▁Isilaeli .”
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁ka tendigw a ▁kuwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁chilaho ▁lusita ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulongele , ▁“ Mndewa ▁kalonga ▁kwa ▁ku ilaha ▁na ▁heza galusa ▁chiyalongile , ▁‘ Kwiza kuwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siku ▁zose .’ ▁”
▁Ni walamba ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁wa mulave ▁chinyamkela ▁iyo , ▁ mbali ▁wa potigwa .”
▁Na ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga ▁muna ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁kolonga , ▁“ Kwiza kuwa ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁siku ▁zose ▁fana ▁viya ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Melikizedeki .”
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁kolonga ▁ivo , ▁kakala ▁kolonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ija ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁womuhuwila ▁weza muhokela . ▁M baka ▁siku ▁ija , ▁wanhu ▁wakala ▁wang ' hali ▁hawana kwing ' higwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁kakala ▁yang ' hali ▁ku tunhizigwa ▁bule .
▁Na ▁ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa sigale ▁wam zahile ▁Mndewa , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁woni wa ta ngile ▁wawe ▁wangu .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁wa ▁lukolo ▁lwa ▁chifalume , ▁ka funga ▁mwanza ▁kuhita ▁isi ▁ya ▁kutali ▁muladi ▁ya kwe zigwe ▁kuwa ▁Mfalume , ▁m aabaho ▁ya bwele ▁ukaye .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Ku kala ▁na ▁munhu ▁imwe ▁tajili ▁yoya kalile ▁na ▁ mulole zi ▁wa ▁vinhu ▁vake . ▁T ajili ▁ino ▁ka longeligwa ▁kuwa ▁ mulole zi ▁wake ▁kakala ▁ko da nga nya ▁vinhu ▁vake .
▁Wa segela ▁Ha shi mo na ▁na ▁weka ▁lago ▁jawo ▁uko ▁M ose lo si .
▁Hamu dile ▁gate ▁hebu ▁kung ' wa ▁divai ▁hebu ▁ching ' waji ▁chochose ▁chi ko la , ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ni ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .
▁ Muiteganye ▁ mizoyo ▁yenu ▁sekei vwizi ligwe ▁na ▁ku hinduka ▁na ▁kui sang ' hanila ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kui tambikila .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁yaham gula ▁mtumwa , ▁hebu ▁mtumwa ▁ya he lekigwa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake , ▁mtumwa ▁iyo ▁kodaha ▁kuja ▁ndiya ▁ya ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko .
▁Kwa viya ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo tenda ▁ivo , ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wo v wiza , ▁wo mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yehilwe .
▁ Siku ▁zose ▁zo yo ika ▁hakwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁sekeya kwenhukile ▁mtufi .
▁Munhu ▁imwe ▁kodaha ▁kulonga , ▁“ Fan a ▁uvwizi ▁wangu ▁wo kongeza ▁ukweli ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wo kongeza ▁utunhizo ▁wake , ▁lelo ▁ha bali ▁no tagusigwa ▁fana ▁mu hasanyi ?”
▁ivo ▁no gazigwa ▁na ▁ni fungigwa ▁minyololo ▁fana ▁munhu ▁yo tenda ▁yehile . ▁Mbali ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁hai fungigwa ▁minyololo ▁bule .
▁Nomulambani ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁mu some ▁usenga ▁uno ▁kwa ▁wahuwila ▁wose .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesilo ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Vi usang ' hana ▁havi nogile .
▁Mwiza tenda ▁ivo ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁wa u de le ▁wa ▁ng ' ombe ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wenu . ▁Chila ▁m welekwa ▁wa ▁udele ▁mwiza muleka ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba , ▁siku ▁ye nane ▁mwiza ning ' ha ▁niye .
▁Abulamu ▁viya komeleze ▁kwi igola ▁na ▁Lutu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ I nula ▁chihanga ▁chako ▁u lole ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁Nompul a ▁Mndewa ▁ya muwonele ▁ubazi ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁uhelelo ! ▁Na ▁weye ▁kovimanya ▁vinogile ▁ng ' hani ▁mbuli ▁ziya ▁zose ▁zo ya nitendele ▁One si f o lo ▁uko ▁Efeso .
▁Musa ▁kamulongela ▁Haluni , ▁“ Hita ▁kuna ▁ulupango ▁uka lave ▁nhambiko ▁yako ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chako ▁na ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili . ▁Maabaho ▁ lava ▁nhosa ▁za ▁wanhu ▁na ▁kuwatendela ▁kuilumba ▁fana ▁viyalagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .”
▁Ivo ▁sekemuwe ▁wabozi , ▁ mbali ▁mu manye ▁yaja ▁Mndewa ▁yoyo mulonda ni ▁mutende .
▁Wa nhu ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani , ▁walonga , ▁“ Ka tenda ▁yose ▁vinogile . ▁Kawa tenda ▁vi nzi wi ▁wa hulike ▁na ▁ma bu bu ▁wa longe !”
▁M vili ▁zake ▁zi kala ▁nzel u ▁fana ▁viya ▁ p a mba , ▁iviya ▁nzel u ▁chwee , ▁na ▁meso ▁yake ▁fana ▁viya ▁m ila mbi ▁ya ▁moto .
▁Maabaho ▁Waisilaili ▁wa mu la hila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁walonga , ▁“ One ▁weye ▁kwiza wa guma ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁muna ▁imi ko no ▁yetu , ▁kweli ▁cheye ▁chiza ya nanga ▁ng ' hani ▁mabululu ▁yawo .”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁ usang ' hano ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁iyo , ▁niza mkoma ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wake .
▁Mulungu ▁keka ▁mab ung ' hulo ▁yayo ▁kuulanga ▁muladi ▁ya mwemwese ▁isi .
▁ Siku ▁yesaba ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam pekul a ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁iyo , ▁one ▁ ihawa ▁ku linga na ▁na ▁ulo la ji ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁utamu ▁uwo ▁ha wene la ▁bule ▁muna ▁imbende ▁yake , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mbagula ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁zimwenga ▁saba .
▁“ ▁‘ One ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yahadanganika ▁ bila ▁kuu gula ▁habehi ▁yake , ▁ija ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko , ▁m aabaho ▁siku ▁yesaba ▁vondaya safyigwe ▁keza we gula ▁ditwi ▁jake .
▁Mbali ▁kwa ▁ku londa ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo , ▁kaya lekelela ▁yayo ▁yose , ▁na ▁kawa ▁fana ▁mtumwa . ▁Ke lekigwa ▁kuwa ▁munhu , ▁ka woneka ▁fana ▁munhu .
▁Vi ifikile ▁ichigulogulo ▁keza ▁munhu ▁tajili ▁wa ▁Ali ma sa ya , ▁zina ▁jake ▁Yosefu , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁mwanahina ▁wa ▁Yesu .
▁No duwila ▁ludoko ▁lwa wo ▁kwaviya ▁lu ka li ▁ng ' hani , ▁Na ▁muna ▁ing ' ha si liki ▁yawo , ▁kwaviya ▁ni ▁usede . ▁Niza wa gola ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Yakobo . ▁Niza wa pwililisa ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili .”
▁Mbali ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yaha longigwa ▁ya lave ▁yombe ▁muladi ▁kuu lekelela ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁kolondeka ▁ya lihe ▁chi ma ▁chiya ▁chonda ya longiligwe ▁kulava .
▁Mbali ▁si ▁vi umbe ▁muhala , ▁ mbali ▁hata ▁cheye ▁chili ▁na ▁Muhe , ▁ya kalile ▁cha ndu so ▁cha ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu , ▁cho gutil ila ▁mgati ▁yetu ▁kuno ▁cho gozela ▁kutend igwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kukomboligwa ▁ng ' huli ▁zetu .
▁Lebeka ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Yakobo ▁indiya ▁inogile , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁diya ▁di ga t e ▁do ya di sasale .
▁Ndams ileni ▁ A pe le , ▁ija ▁kwaminika ▁kwake ▁kwa ▁Chilisito ▁ku woneka . ▁Iviya ▁ndams ileni ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weli ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁Ali sito bu lo .
▁Na ▁cheye ▁cho vimanya ▁kuwa ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁igolo ka ▁kwa ▁waja ▁wo sang ' hana ▁vinhu ▁fana ▁ivo .
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁umwaka ▁mukala ▁muu l wiza , ▁ mbali ▁vimu wile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mndewa , ▁mwa ▁muna ▁dibu ng ' hulo . ▁Ivo ▁m olondeka ▁kukala ▁fana ▁viya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁bu ng ' hulo .
▁Pilato ▁kawauza , ▁“ Vino ▁mwo londa ▁ni mu lekele ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?”
▁Viya danganike ▁S ha uli , ▁ka tawala ▁Baali hana ni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ A k ib o li .
▁Yano ▁yayo ▁yamazi na ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Ishumaili ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁kwelekigwa ▁kwa wo , ▁chaudele ▁wa ▁Ishumaili ▁ni ▁N e ba yo ti ▁na ▁wamwenga ▁ni ▁Ke dali ▁na ▁ A b i de li ▁na ▁M ib i sa mu
▁Keza kwiza ▁na ▁One si mo , ▁ndugu ▁mulondwa ▁yeli ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kwaminika , ▁iyo ▁ni ▁munhu ▁wa ▁kumwenu ▁keza walongela ni ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁hano ▁hamwe tu .
▁Vino ▁mu hita ▁kulola ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁mu gesa ▁keza ▁munhu ▁yoya i yawale ▁mawalo ▁yanogile ? ▁Bule ! ▁Wa nhu ▁woi yawala ▁mawalo ▁yanogile ▁na ▁wene ▁ugima ▁unogile ▁wokala ▁mwii zi kaye ▁za ▁wafalume !
▁Vino ▁niza vimanya ze ▁kuwa ▁kuno geligwa ▁na ▁niye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako , ▁one ▁hu hitile ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ? ▁U ha hita ▁hamwe ▁na ▁cheye ▁iza chi tenda ▁niye ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wako ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁chi i ye ka ▁mwa ▁iwanhu ▁wako .”
▁Kwa viya ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁do gala ▁unovu ▁na ▁ku nogeza ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ukweli .
▁ Siku ▁isondelele ▁imitootondo ▁na ni , ▁Yesu ▁kahita ▁kaidi ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wamuhitila , ▁nayo ▁kakala ▁hasi , ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwafundiza .
▁One ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁yahawa ▁hagati ▁ya ▁miyaka ▁mitano ▁m baka ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁shekel i ▁m alongo ▁maidi ▁ya ▁hela ▁one ▁yahawa ▁mulume , ▁na ▁one ▁yahawa ▁muke ▁kezakomboligwa ▁kwa ▁shekel i ▁longo ▁ya ▁hela .
▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Izo !” ▁Petili ▁kahumuluka ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kugenda ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁mazi ▁ko muwinza ▁Yesu .
▁Mbali ▁si wile ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁muumoyo ▁wangu ▁bule , ▁kwaviya ▁si m fikile ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁Tito , ▁ivo ▁ni walaga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁haja ▁na ▁ni hita ▁Makedoniya .
▁Petili ▁kamulongela , ▁“ A na ni ya , ▁ha bali ▁ko mulekela ▁Lufyende ▁ya ku langulize ▁na ▁ku kutenda ▁um vwizi le ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁kwa ▁ku fisa ▁hela ▁zimwenga ▁zi u patile ▁kwa ▁ku chuuza ▁mgunda ?
▁Kaidi ▁kwiza gala ▁lita ▁mbili ▁za ▁divai ▁kwa ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ching ' waji ▁yoilavigw e . ▁Nhambiko ▁yose ▁i na ▁mn ung ' ho ▁wa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁keza kwika ▁mkono ▁wake ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁na ▁ku mchinja ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Maabaho ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁wezakwi ti lila ▁damu ▁ulupango ▁ banzi ▁zose .
▁Kulaw a ▁K ib ilosi ▁Hata ava ▁wanhu ▁wa genda ▁m baka ▁Ha se lo si , ▁wakala ▁uko .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁“ Vi za lawilila ▁vinhu ▁vonda vi watende ▁wanhu ▁watende ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁keza gaya ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yo vi tenda ▁vi lawilile .
▁Ni kutenda ▁wanhu ▁wa ku manye , ▁na ▁niza gendelela ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁muladi ▁ulondo ▁wou li nawo ▁kumwangu ▁u kale ▁mgati ▁mmwawo , ▁iviya ▁na ▁niye ▁niza kala ▁mgati ▁mmwawo .”
▁M avuta ▁yano ▁ya ▁sente ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani ▁yaha chuuzi gwa ▁kwa ▁sente ▁nyingi , ▁na ▁sente ▁zino ▁wo goliligw a ▁ngayengaye .”
▁Tend a ▁vino ▁muladi ▁kuwa safya , ▁ miza ▁uchanyha ▁yawo ▁mazi ▁ya ▁kuwa safya , ▁m aabaho ▁u walongele ▁wa i wegule ▁nyele ▁lukuli ▁lose ▁na ▁wa fu we ▁viwalo ▁vawo ▁muladi ▁kuisafya .
▁Maabaho ▁mab ambala ▁ya ▁mavuta ▁na ▁ fi go ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hanogile ▁ha ▁ini ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁i nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁kavi timbula ▁vose ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁lupango ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Mafalisayo ▁wowo londa ▁hela ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁wa n zeha ▁Yesu .
▁Bulahimu ▁kenul a ▁meso ▁na ▁ka wona ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁di namata ▁ mhembe ▁zake ▁kuna ▁ichi so lo , ▁Bulahimu ▁kahita ▁na ▁kamsola , ▁kamulava ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ ba dala ▁ya ▁mwanage .
▁Mbali ▁Paulo ▁ka hulumuka ▁hasi , ▁ka mgwila ▁na ▁kam tumbalil a ▁mavindi . ▁Kalonga , ▁“ Sekemudumbe , ▁yang ' hali ▁mgima !”
▁Bulahimu ▁kalonga , ▁“ Nokulamba ▁Mndewa , ▁sekeu we ▁na ▁ludoko ▁ mbali ▁leka ▁ni longe ▁kaidi . ▁One ▁waha wafika ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matatu ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ Siza tenda ▁ivo ▁bule ▁one ▁na ha wafika ▁wanhu ▁m alongo ▁matatu .”
▁Ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁masita ka ▁yenyewo ▁yo son hela ▁ubishi ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁hanhu ▁hamwenga ▁ha ▁malagilizo ▁yawo , ▁ivo ▁si wonile ▁kuwa ▁ka tenda ▁chochose ▁chihile ▁chochi mulonda ▁yakomigwe ▁hebu ▁yafu ngigwe ▁muna ▁ichifungo .
▁Niye ▁mweye wo ▁ni ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁udahi , ▁na ▁nina ▁wakalizi ▁hasi ▁yangu . ▁Ni ha mulongela ▁ino , ▁‘ Hita ,’ ▁nayo ▁kohita , ▁na ▁imwenga , ▁‘ Izo ,’ ▁nayo ▁kokwiza . ▁Iviya ▁no mulongela ▁msang ' hani ▁wangu , ▁‘ Tend a ▁chino ,’ ▁nayo ▁kotenda .”
▁Mazi ga ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁zahabu ▁ya memile ▁ubani , ▁chila ▁dimwe ▁di na ▁n zamo ▁ya ▁gila mu ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ningo ▁ya ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Za ha bu ▁yose ▁ya ▁mazi ga ▁yaja ▁i kala ▁chilo ▁imwe ▁na ▁chidogo .
▁Mbali ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Yesu ▁zen ela ▁chila ▁hanhu , ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁weza ▁kumtegeleza ▁na ▁ku honye zigwa ▁mitamu ▁yawo .
▁Katenda ▁chi fuko ▁cha ▁muimhambaga ▁fana ▁viya ▁viyatendile ▁ichizibawo ▁chiya , ▁kwa ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁zahabu ▁na ▁nyuzi ▁za ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁na ▁ya ▁zambalau ▁na ▁ndu ng ' hu ▁na ▁kwa ▁walo ▁dinogile ▁dibotigwe .
▁Mahalaleli ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁tano , ▁kamwelek a ▁mwana ▁zina ▁jake ▁Ya le di .
▁I zakuwa ze ▁one ▁mwiza muwona ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ko bwela ▁kuulanga ▁hanhu ▁ha yakalile ▁mwanduso ?
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka gala ▁ nyo ka ▁weli ▁na ▁ sungu ▁hagati ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁Waisilaili ▁wengi ▁wa lu migwa ▁na ▁wengi ▁wadanganika .
▁Ivo ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wa mulava ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago , ▁m aabaho ▁wamtowa ▁na ▁mabwe ▁m baka ▁kadanganika , ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Wa nhu ▁waja ▁viwa kalile ▁wohita , ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa mgalila ▁Yesu ▁munhu ▁yoya kalile ▁hadaha ▁kulonga ▁kwaviya ▁kakala ▁na ▁chinyamkela .
▁Wa mwenga ▁walonga ▁Eliya ▁ka lawilila , ▁wamwenga ▁walonga ▁imwe ▁wa ▁walotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁kazilibuka .
▁ Vonda ni n u ligwe ▁m chanyha ▁ya ▁isi , ▁nizawa tenda ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁weze ▁kumwangu .”
▁Bul ulu ▁ijo ▁di kala ▁na ▁mhongono ▁nhali ▁na ▁ng ' hulu , ▁yili ▁na ▁ nyivi ▁ng ' hulu ▁longo ▁na ▁mbili , ▁chila ▁lwivi ▁lumwe ▁lu kalizigwa ▁na ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga . ▁Uchanyha ▁ya ▁chila ▁lwivi ▁ha ndikigwa ▁zina ▁dimwe ▁ya ▁mazina ▁longo ▁na ▁maidi ▁ya ▁makabila ▁ya ▁Waisilaeli .
▁Walawi ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viyalongile . ▁ Siku ▁iyo ▁wanhu ▁ elufu ▁nhatu ▁wa komigwa .
▁na ▁chila ▁mulume ▁wa ▁kumwenu ▁yondaya sole ▁silaha ▁keza loka ▁ulwanda ▁lwa ▁Yoludani ▁kwa ▁ ulangulizi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁m baka ▁vondaya wa segeze ▁wehi ▁wake
▁Musa ▁ka lola ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁ka wona ▁Waisilaili ▁wa sang ' hana ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalagilize . ▁Ivo ▁Musa ▁kawa temela ▁mate .
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁mwa ▁Waisilaili ▁yaha chinja ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁hebu ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁luti ▁mgati ▁ya ▁lago ▁hebu ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ,
▁One ▁muha mu hishimu ▁ng ' hani ▁munhu ▁ija ▁yoya yawale ▁viwalo ▁vinogile ▁na ▁kumulongela , ▁“ Ka la ▁hanhu ▁hano ▁hanogile ,” ▁ mbali ▁mo mulongela ▁ija ▁ngayengaye , ▁“ Ka la ▁hano ▁hasi ,”
▁Mu vimanya , ▁hamwande ▁viyalondile ▁kaidi ▁kutemel igwa ▁mate ▁na ▁ tati ▁yake , ▁ tati ▁yake ▁ka mulema ▁kwaviya ▁ha patile ▁nzila ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁ kwasakany a ▁chiya ▁cha yatendile , ▁hata ▁fana ▁kai zahila ▁kwa ▁masozi .
▁Cho se ▁chi gwa ▁hasi , ▁niye ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁do nilongela ▁kwa ▁Chiyebulaniya , ▁‘ S a uli , ▁Sauli ! ▁ Habali ▁ko ni gaza ? ▁Vi dala ▁kumwako ▁kutowa ▁lu biki ▁lu so ngo ke .’
▁Vino ▁voni longa ▁mo gesa ▁no londa ▁kuwa nogeza ▁wanhu ? ▁Bule , ▁no londa ▁ku mnogeza ▁Mulungu . ▁Vino ▁mo gesa ▁no londa ▁kuwa nogeza ▁wanhu ? ▁One ▁ni gezile ▁kutenda ▁ivo , ▁niye ▁sigambe ni we ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁bule !
▁Vino ▁ni ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyalongile ▁na ▁Musa ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga , ▁fana ▁viya ▁munhu ▁kolonga ▁na ▁mbwiya ke . ▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kabwela ▁kuna ▁dilago . ▁Yoshua , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Nuni , ▁mbwanga ▁yoya kalile ▁msang ' hani ▁wake , ▁ka sigala ▁muna ▁dihema .
▁No mtambikila ▁Mulungu ▁kuwa ▁m v ava ▁na ▁mweye ▁ wime ▁vinogile ▁muna ▁uhuwilo , ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁uhuwilo ▁uwo ▁u pate ▁ku manya ▁yanogile ▁yose ▁yochi wa ▁nayo ▁muna ▁ugima ▁wetu ▁wa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito .
▁ Mndele ▁wa ▁S huwa ▁ka pata ▁wimo ▁na ▁kelek a ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁Yuda ▁kamtanga ▁Eli .
▁Maabaho ▁mwenevale ▁wa ▁msang ' hani ▁ija ▁kezakwiza ▁siku ▁hamu ilo lele ▁na ▁saa ▁hai manyile .
▁Yakobo ▁ka gesa , ▁“ One ▁Esau ▁yaheza ▁na ▁kudi towa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁mwanduso , ▁ bumbila ▁dondadi sigale ▁diza i ba nga .”
▁Vini kalile ▁mwana ▁nilonga ▁fana ▁mwana , ▁ni vimanya ▁fana ▁mwana , ▁ni gesa ▁fana ▁mwana . ▁Vini wile ▁mkulu , ▁mbuli ▁za ▁uwa na ▁ni zi leka .
▁Yesu ▁viyahulike ▁yayo , ▁kazanywa , ▁kau hindukila ▁luja ▁ulung ' husesa ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁wou kalile ▁womu i nza , ▁kalonga , ▁nowalongela ni , ▁“ Si na wona ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁uhuwilo ▁mkulu ▁fana ▁uno ▁hata ▁muna i isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli !”
▁Munhu ▁yaha mulongelani ▁mbuli ▁yoyose , ▁longeni , ▁‘ Mndewa ▁kowa londa ▁na ▁kezawa bweleza .’ ▁”
▁“ Wa nhu ▁hawa wa s ha ▁chitasa ▁na ▁kuchi gubika ▁na ▁nongo ▁hebu ▁kuchi ka ▁muu vu ng u , ▁ mbali ▁wochi ka ▁ha ▁ ichingolobweda ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁wa he ngila ▁mnyumba ▁wa wone ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁jake .
▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁kodaha ▁kumwing ' hani ▁yanogile ▁ya ▁chila ▁modeli , ▁muladi ▁siku ▁zose ▁mu pate ▁viya ▁vomu vi londa , ▁kufosa ▁vomu vi londa ▁muna ▁ichi la ▁sang ' hano ▁zinogile .
▁Yesu ▁ka we zila , ▁kawa dalisa , ▁kawalongela , ▁“ I n u ke ni , ▁ Sekemudumbe !”
▁Niye ▁no gaiya ▁mbuli ▁izo , ▁ mbali ▁si wona ▁chinyala ▁kwaviya ▁ni mmanya ▁ija ▁yoni muhuwila , ▁kaidi ▁novimanya ▁kuwa ▁kezachi kaliza ▁vinogile ▁chiya ▁choya ning ' hile ▁m baka ▁zuwa ▁diya ▁vondayeze ▁kaidi .
▁ mbali ▁wana ▁wa ▁watumwa ▁wake ▁wa kalile ▁fana ▁wanaake ▁zake ▁wowa mweleke le ▁wana ▁kawa golela ▁ndole ndo le ▁viyakalile ▁yang ' hali ▁hana danganika , ▁kawa gala ▁kuna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁ulawil o ▁wa ▁zuwa , ▁kutali ▁na ▁mwanage ▁Isaka .
▁“ W eye ▁na ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁ng ' holo ▁za ▁Waisilaili , ▁ pete ni ▁vinhu ▁vovi ho kigwe ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama .
▁Labani ▁kamwing ' ha ▁Zilipa ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike ▁yawe ▁mtumwa ▁wa ▁Leya ▁mwanage .
▁kani sagula ▁niwe ▁mtumigwa ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Sa ng ' hano ▁yangu ▁ya ▁u lava ▁nhambiko ▁kui peta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wa pate ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁i togoligwa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁sadaka ▁i safyigwe ▁na ▁Muhe ▁Yelile .
▁“ I viya ▁ muhulika ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁umwaka ▁viwa longiligwe , ▁‘ Sekeu b ele ▁viya ▁viu ilahile , ▁yo londeka ▁u fi ki ze ▁kwi ilaha ▁kwa ko ▁kwa ▁Mndewa .’
▁Zi fosa ▁siku ▁saba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya ga lu se ▁mazi ▁ya ▁lwanda ▁lwa ▁Naili .
▁Wa nahina ▁wasegela ▁na ▁wahita ▁muna ▁ivi bulul u ▁vose , ▁waha petela ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁na ▁ku wahonya ▁watamu ▁chila ▁hanhu .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁Y eye ▁ni ▁nhogolwa ▁yenu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁yoya mtendele ni ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁ng ' hulu ▁na ▁za ▁kudumbiza ▁zomu zi wone ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yenu .
▁Mwii nogele ▁fana ▁mwa nd ugu ▁mwa ▁Chilisito , ▁mwii tegeleze ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye , ▁kwa ▁hishima .

▁Mana ▁Mu la la ▁mulangulizi ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁yo lola ▁mbuli ▁za ▁wanhu ▁ni ▁ndole zi ▁wa ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Ko londeka ▁yawe ▁munhu ▁ha longigwa ▁vihile ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wamwenga ▁na ▁yeli bule ▁ludoko ▁na ▁siyo ▁m kolwa ▁na ▁yeli bule ▁ndwagi ▁na ▁yeli bule ▁magoda ▁na ▁ha londa ▁kupata ▁hela ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ihile ,

▁Ivo ▁lelo ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁iyo heni ▁ng ' hani ▁ku utenda ▁uwo ▁um ta ngo ▁wenu ▁na ▁ku sa guligwa ▁kumwenu ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁iwe ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁kugendelela ▁fana ▁muha kala ▁ivo ▁hamwiza ku gwa ▁ng ' o o ! .

▁Sekeu mbandame ▁ lumbu ▁jako , ▁mndele ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁hebu ▁mndele ▁wa ▁mami ▁yako , ▁yawe ▁ lumbu ▁ yelekigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yenu ▁hebu ▁ku mwenga .
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kulonga ▁vino , ▁Paulo ▁kasola ▁gate , ▁ka mtogoza ▁Mulungu ▁haulongozi ▁hawo ▁wose , ▁kadi mo gola ▁na ▁ka ndusa ▁kuja .

▁One ▁mulume ▁yaha mbandama ▁muke ▁na ▁damu ▁ya ▁siku ▁za ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁iha mu la galila ▁mulume ▁iyo , ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba . ▁Ko mwa ▁jojose ▁do nda ya go ne le ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁diza kwa mbula ▁mwiko .

▁Wa nhu ▁wa kalile ▁muna ▁umwanza ▁umwe ▁na ▁Sauli ▁wema ▁haja , ▁wakala ▁wabule ▁da ▁kulonga , ▁wa hulika ▁dizi ▁diya ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yoyalongile ▁hawa muwone .
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kumgwila ▁Petili ▁ka mwika ▁mchifungo , ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁mabumbila ▁mane ▁ya ▁wakalizi ▁wane ▁wane . ▁Helode ▁ka londa ▁Pasaka ▁iha mala ▁ya mu lekelele ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu .
▁Ivo ▁Petili ▁viya hitile ▁Yelusalemu , ▁wanhu ▁wowa muhuwile ▁Yesu ▁wo weng izigwe ▁ulungwana ▁wa mulonga ,
▁Mbali ▁lusita ▁luno ▁ngalawa ▁i kala ▁i fika ▁hana ▁ ulu do n ho ▁lwa ▁dilamba , ▁beho ▁di itowa ▁na ▁mawimbi ▁i i sung ' ha sung ' ha ▁uko ▁na ▁uko .
▁Ivo ▁ni mwing ' hani ▁matombo , ▁si ▁ndiya ▁ndala , ▁kwaviya ▁mukala ▁hamu i daha . ▁M baka ▁sambi ▁mung ' hali ▁hamu i daha ▁bule .
▁Walawi ▁wose ▁wapetigwe , ▁walume ▁wose ▁kwandusi la ▁wana ▁weli ▁na ▁mwezi ▁umwe ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁waja ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ▁wawa peta ▁fana ▁viyalagilize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wakala ▁ 2 2 ,000 .
▁Munhu ▁yo handa ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁zihile ▁zili ▁mgati ▁yake , ▁umo ▁keza gobola ▁ubananzi , ▁ mbali ▁munhu ▁yo handa ▁kwa ▁Muhe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁umo ▁keza gobola ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yo mwihila ▁ muhuwila a ▁miyage ▁ni ▁mkomaji , ▁na ▁mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ habule ▁mkomaji ▁yeli ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose .
▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ▁kaidi ▁lw eketatu , ▁“ Saimoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁vino ▁kwo ni londa ?” ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁ka wona ▁usungu ▁kwaviya ▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ▁lw eketatu , ▁“ Vino ▁kwo ni londa ?” ▁Ka mwidika , ▁“ Mndewa , ▁kwo vimanya ▁chila ▁chinhu , ▁kwo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁no ku londa .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Wa lole se ▁wana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu .
▁Na ▁ ja hazi ▁iviya , ▁inga wa ▁ni ▁kulu ▁ng ' hani ▁na ▁do sung ' higwa ▁na ▁beho ▁kulu , ▁do daha ▁ku hi ndu sigwa ▁na ▁ng ' ha fi ▁ndodo ▁ng ' hani , ▁do hita ▁ko ko se ▁ko yolonda ▁de le v a .
▁Ivo ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁vino ▁vi zakuwa ▁vako ▁weye ▁one ▁u hani dumba lila ▁mavindi .”
▁Maabaho ▁ni wona ▁chilaguso ▁chikulu ▁cha ▁kwazanya ▁chimwenga ▁muna ▁ulanga , ▁baho ▁hakala ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁saba ▁weli ▁na ▁ma hulo ▁yoyo gaza ▁ng ' hani ▁saba ▁ya ▁uhelelo , ▁kwaviya ▁kwa ▁ma hulo ▁yayo ▁saba ▁yoyo gaza ▁ng ' hani , ▁ludoko ▁lwa ▁Mulungu ▁lwiza komelezeka .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kachi gubika ▁chitabu , ▁kamwing ' ha ▁msang ' hani , ▁m aabaho ▁kakala ▁hasi . ▁Wa nhu ▁wose ▁wowa kalile ▁mwiikaye ▁ya ▁kutosela ▁wa mbu ng ' huli la ▁meso .
▁Mbali ▁ku leka ▁kwika ▁chilaho ▁siyo ▁uhasanyi .
▁Ni yamanya ▁yaja ▁yo utendile , ▁ni vimanya ▁kuwa ▁ huli ▁moto ▁hebu ▁ huli ▁u zi zi mi . ▁M uhavu ▁uha wile ▁u zi zi mi ▁muhala ▁hebu ▁moto ▁muhala .
▁Walonga , ▁“ Munhu ▁ino ▁kalonga , ▁‘ No daha ▁kui bomola ▁Kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kui zenga ▁kaidi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nhatu .’ ▁”
▁Muyahudi ▁kweli ▁si ▁ija ▁yo woneka ▁kwa ▁kunze ▁muhala , ▁wala ▁kwingiz igwa ▁ulungwana ▁si ▁chinhu ▁cha ▁kunze ▁wala ▁cha ▁lukuli .
▁Yakobo ▁viyamuwone ▁Laheli ▁mndele ▁wa ▁ mtumba ▁wake ▁Labani ▁hamwe ▁na ▁zing ' hondolo , ▁kahita ▁hana ▁disima ▁na ▁kudi bimbilis a ▁idibwe ▁kulawa ▁hana ▁disima ▁na ▁kuwa ng ' wiza ▁mazi ▁iwa ng ' hondolo ▁wa ▁ mtumba ▁wake .
▁hebu ▁fana ▁wang ' onyo ▁wotambala ▁hebu ▁somba .
▁Mbuli ▁zino ▁zose ▁zi tendeka ▁na ▁Mulungu , ▁kachi lumbiliza ▁kaidi ▁hamwe ▁nayo ▁kwa ▁nzila ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁na ▁ku ching ' ha ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁kuwa languliza ▁wanhu ▁kaidi ▁wa i l umbe ▁nayo .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka tenda ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viya m pulile . ▁Kawa segeza ▁ng ' honzi ▁wose ▁kwa ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁na ▁kwa ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake ▁na ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁ha sigale ▁hata ▁ng ' honzi ▁imwe .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mwanang ' hondolo ▁iyo ▁yeli ▁habehi ▁na ▁chi goda ▁cha ▁chifalume ▁chiya ▁chili ▁hagati ▁keza kuwa ▁m dimi ▁wawo , ▁nayo ▁keza walongoza ▁kuna ▁zi nza sa ▁za ▁mazi ▁ya ▁ugima . ▁Na ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa hangu sa ▁masozi ▁yawo ▁yose .”
▁Weza gaya ▁china ▁mama ▁weli ▁na ▁wimo ▁na ▁wo kong ' heza ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁izo .
▁Wa ching ' ha ▁vitumetume ▁vingi , ▁na ▁vi c ha nduse ▁kaidi ▁umwanza , ▁weka ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁vinhu ▁vovi chi londile ▁muna ▁umwanza .
▁Ndugu ▁sekemu i longe ▁vihile ▁mweye ▁kwa ▁mweye , ▁yondaya mu longe ▁vihile ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁na ▁ku mu lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁iyo ▁ko ya longa ▁vihile ▁na ▁kuya lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁One ▁uha ya lamulil a ▁nhaguso ▁malagilizo , ▁basi ▁weye ▁hu ya sondelela ▁malagilizo ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁ko ya lamulil a ▁nhaguso .
▁mapa lo ▁matano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ubanzi ▁umwenga ▁wa ▁hema , ▁na ▁mapa lo ▁matano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁kuchisogo ▁cha ▁hema ▁na ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁uswelo ▁wa ▁zuwa .

▁W andika ▁vinhu ▁vichi longiligwe ▁na ▁waja ▁wa vi wonile ▁kwa ▁meso ▁yawo ▁na ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁mbuli ▁ija ▁kulawa ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile .”
▁Leya ▁kakala ya nogile , ▁ mbali ▁Laheli ▁kakala ▁lumondo ▁ng ' hani .
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu mulongela , ▁“ W eye ▁kuna ▁chinyamkela ! ▁Yeli hi ▁yoyo londa ▁kuku koma ?”
▁Lung ' husesa ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu muuza , ▁“ Malagilizo ▁yetu ▁yolonga ▁kuwa ▁Chilisito ▁keza kuwa ▁ngima ▁siku ▁zose . ▁ Habali ▁lelo ▁kwo longa ▁‘ Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁kolondeka ▁yenu ligwe ?’ ▁Vino ▁ino ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁yelihi ?”
▁Yesu ▁kalonga ▁ivo ▁kwa ▁kun geza ▁Filipo ▁kwaviya ▁kavimanya ▁chiya ▁chonda ya tende .
▁ Siku ▁izo ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Yudeya ▁wakala ▁hawana niwona ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga .
▁Kwa viya ▁hachi ngila ▁muumoyo ▁ mbali ▁cho kwingila ▁m mu nda , ▁m aabaho ▁cho lawa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lukuli .” ▁Viya longile ▁ivo , ▁Yesu ▁ka zi togola ▁ndiya ▁zose ▁ku digwa .
▁Iyo he ▁kuya huma ▁magezo ▁muna ▁uhuwilo , ▁muladi ▁u pate ▁ugima ▁wa ▁siku ▁zose ▁wou ta ng i ligwe ▁na ▁Mulungu ▁lusita ▁viu togole ▁na ▁kulonga ▁mwenyewo ▁uhuwilo ▁wako ▁uwo ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁wa kalangama ▁wengi .
▁Wa duganye ni ▁wanhu , ▁walume ▁na ▁wanaake ▁na ▁wana ▁na ▁nyambenyambe ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu , ▁muladi ▁wa dahe ▁kuhulika ▁na ▁ku ifunza ▁kumdumba ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁na ▁kusondelela ▁chigangamavu ▁malagilizo ▁yano .
▁Kwiza kala ▁kwa ▁kuwakoma ▁wanhu ▁kwa ▁sengo , ▁Kwiza msang ' hanila ▁ndugu ▁yako . ▁Mbali ▁uha lema , ▁kwiza tenda ▁vou londa ▁mwenyewo .”
▁“ Mbali ▁ tegelezeni , ▁kweli ▁kukala ▁na ▁wagane ▁wengi ▁muna ▁isi ▁ya ▁Isilaeli ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁Eliya . ▁Chi p indi ▁icho , ▁mvula ▁ha itonyile ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu ▁na ▁miyezi ▁sita , ▁ivo ▁kukala ▁na ▁nzala ▁ng ' hulu ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yose .
▁Kwiza tenda ▁vi a ▁vake , ▁viza e ▁va ▁ku zo lela ▁maivu ▁na ▁viza e ▁va ▁ku hali la ▁moto ▁na ▁mi ba ti lo ▁na ▁ma ge m b e ▁na ▁vya no ▁va ▁ku hali la ▁moto . ▁Vi nhu ▁vose ▁viza ha kigwa ▁shaba .
