▁Isaka ▁kamwidika ▁Esau , ▁“ Ni mala ▁kumtenda ▁Yakobo ▁kuwa ▁mulangulizi ▁wako ▁na ▁ni mwing ' ha ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wose ▁kuwa ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wake . ▁Ni m patila ▁na fa ka ▁na ▁divai . ▁Lelo ▁ni kutendele ▁choni ▁weye ▁mwana g u ?”
▁Wa ja ▁woni walonda , ▁no wa ka li kila ▁na ▁kuwatagusa . ▁Iyo he ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wose ▁u sa mhe ▁uhasanyi ▁wako .
▁Na wo ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Kolond a ▁chika sasale ▁kulihi ?”
▁Yesu ▁kedika , ▁“ Vinoga , ▁Saimoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁kwaviya ▁yano ▁you longile ▁si wo ▁ya ▁chiunhu , ▁ mbali ▁ya k wi zila ▁siku ▁zose ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁Tat i ▁yangu ▁wa ▁kuulanga .
▁“ ▁‘ M wanamke ▁yoyose ▁viyo kuwa ▁muna ▁zisi ku ▁zake , ▁keza kuwa ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁siku ▁saba . ▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yondayam dalise ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁kezakw ambula ▁mwiko ▁m baka ▁ichigulogulo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁kawaleka , ▁kahita ▁kunze ▁ya ▁bululu ▁da ▁Besaniya , ▁uko ▁kagona .
▁Chi gendelela ▁na ▁umwanza ▁ugaluga ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi , ▁kwa ▁manhesa ▁makulu ▁chifika ▁habehi ▁na ▁Ni do . ▁Kwa viya ▁ vula vu mbi ▁di kala ▁do chi goma , ▁chi fose la ▁ubanzi ▁wa ▁hasi ▁ya ▁chi si wa ▁cha ▁Chilete , ▁habehi ▁na ▁Salimon e . ▁Uko ▁ vula vu mbi ▁hadi wile ▁kulu .
▁Yesu ▁kema , ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu ▁wa mgale ▁kumwake . ▁Chi pofu ▁ija ▁viyafikile ▁habehi , ▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ,
▁Bul ulu ▁ijo ▁hadi londa ▁zuwa ▁hebu ▁mwezi ▁ku mwemwese la , ▁kwaviya ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wo mwemwes a ▁na ▁chitasa ▁chake ▁ni ▁Mwanang ' hondolo .
▁Mbuli ▁ino ▁izakuwa ▁lagilizo ▁da ▁siku ▁zose , ▁muna ▁ziny elesi ▁zenu ▁zose ▁na ▁hanhu ▁hohose ▁homukala . ▁Sekemu je ▁mavuta ▁hebu ▁damu .’ ▁”
▁Munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo londa ▁kuu kombola ▁ugima ▁wake ▁mweye wo , ▁keza wagiza , ▁na ▁yoyose ▁yo wagiza ▁ugima ▁wake , ▁keza u lopola .
▁Iviya ▁ka tenda ▁mapa lo ▁ya ▁mkenge , ▁mapa lo ▁matano ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁ubanzi ▁umwe ▁wa ▁hema ,
▁Sekemu wa d umbe ▁wehi ▁wenu , ▁yayo ▁yeza lagusa ▁kuwa ▁wawo ▁weza na ng igwa , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza komboligwa ▁kwaviya ▁ukombola ▁wenu ▁wolawa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁wakalizi ▁kamulongela ▁mbwanga ▁iyo , ▁“ Sekeu mulongele ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁kuwa ▁ku nilongela ▁mbuli ▁ino .” ▁Maabaho ▁ka muleka ▁ya segele .
▁Maabaho ▁nihulika ▁dizi ▁do nilongela , ▁‘ P e ti li , ▁inuka , ▁uwa chinje ▁uwa je !’
▁“ Kwa viya ▁yandikigwa ▁muna ▁I za bu li , ▁‘ Ka ye ▁yake ▁i kale ▁bule , ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁sekeya kale ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁iyo .’ ▁Iviya ▁yandikigwa , ▁‘ Munhu ▁imwenga ▁ya mhe ▁sang ' hano ▁yake .’ ▁”
▁“ Mwiza duwiligwa ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yenu ▁na ▁migunda ▁yenu .
▁Yam ha ▁malagilizo ▁yoni kwing ' ha ▁diyelo . ▁Niza wawinga ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁Waamoli ▁na ▁Wakanaani ▁na ▁Wahiti ▁na ▁Wapelizi ▁na ▁Wa hivi ▁na ▁Wayebusi .
▁mwene ▁dikombo ▁ijo ▁kolondeka ▁ya mu lihe ▁hela ▁mwene ▁mnyama ▁iyo , ▁na ▁mnyama ▁iyo ▁yafile ▁keza kuwa ▁wa ▁mwene ▁dikombo .
▁ Mwing ' he ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi ▁chiya ▁chiya kwing ' hile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wako , ▁ bumbila ▁jako ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁na ▁mhule ▁na ▁divai . ▁Kwiza mwing ' ha ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viya ku temele ▁mate .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Ni longa ▁kwaviya ▁ni huwila .” ▁Muna wo ▁modeli ▁uja ▁uja ▁wa ▁muhe , ▁cheye ▁iviya ▁cholonga ▁kwaviya ▁cho huwila .
▁Ng ' ombe ▁na ▁luti ▁wowa lavigwe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁waja ▁damu ▁yawo ▁i galigw a ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani , ▁muladi ▁kutenda ▁kuilumba , ▁weza galigw a ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁na ▁kutimbuligwa . ▁M b e nde ▁zawo ▁na ▁nyama ▁zawo ▁na ▁ma vi ▁yawo ▁vose ▁viza timbuligwa .
▁Petili ▁kawa simulil a ▁mbuli ▁zimwenga ▁nyingi ▁ng ' hani , ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu ilo lo p o le ▁wenyewo ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁welesi ▁uno ▁wihile .”
▁Na yo ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁icho ▁kodaha ▁kuwa lopola ▁wawo ▁wowo mwizila ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kufose la ▁yeye , ▁kwaviya ▁kokala ▁siku ▁zose ▁muladi ▁ya wapulile ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁walimi ▁waja ▁viwamuwone ▁mwanage , ▁wa ilongela ▁wawo ▁kwa ▁wawo , ▁‘ Ino ▁iyo ▁muha zi , ▁chi mkome ▁muladi ▁chi sole ▁uhazi ▁wake .’
▁Ivo ▁no londa ▁waja ▁wagane ▁wa li ▁wa li ▁wa soligwe ▁na ▁ weleke ▁wana , ▁na ▁kulola ▁goya ▁kaye ▁zawo , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁hawa chi londa ▁sekewa pate ▁nzila ▁ya ▁kuchi longa ▁vihile .
▁Sekemu zimize ▁kutenda ▁yanogile ▁na ▁kui taza , ▁kwaviya ▁zino ▁izo ▁nhosa ▁zozi mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁M aandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁mweye ▁Wayahudi , ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁wo di liga ▁zina ▁da ▁Mulungu .”
▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ▁keza gesa ▁kuwa ▁Waisilaili ▁wo we gela ▁muna ▁iisi ▁na ▁chuwala ▁chi wahi ndi la .
▁Labani ▁kachi tanga ▁chi bugulu ▁icho ▁Ye ga sa ha du sa , ▁ mbali ▁Yakobo ▁kachi tanga ▁ G a le di .
▁Lelo ▁kwa ▁waja ▁weli ▁wa sa ka ▁na ▁wagane ▁nolonga ▁kuwa ▁muhavu ▁wa gendelele ▁kukala ▁ bila ▁ya ▁kusola ▁fana ▁vini li ▁niye .
▁“ Sekemu mulavile ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁yeli ▁na ▁chilema ▁chochose , ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁yo mtenda ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁yehilwe .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mgane ▁yahawa ▁na ▁wana ▁hebu ▁wazukulu , ▁wawo ▁ wolondeka ▁wa i funze ▁kutenda ▁yoyo mnogeza ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁wenyewo ▁na ▁kuwa liha ▁ tati ▁zawo ▁na ▁mami ▁zawo ▁na ▁wa saho ▁zawo ▁yaja ▁yanogile ▁yowa watendele ▁mwanduso , ▁kwaviya ▁mbuli ▁iyo ▁yo mnogeza ▁Mulungu .
▁Solomoni ▁kamwelek a ▁L e ho b o a mu , ▁L e ho b o a mu ▁kamwelek a ▁ A b i ya , ▁ A b i ya ▁kamwelek a ▁ A sa .
▁Na ▁vi lu fosile ▁lusita ▁mwingi , ▁na ▁siku ▁ya ▁ku funga ▁i kala ▁i fosile , ▁lelo ▁i kala ▁ng ' hondo ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁na ▁ngalawa , ▁ivo ▁Paulo ▁kawa zuma
▁Wa falume ▁wa ▁isi ▁wa isasala ▁goya , ▁na ▁walangulizi ▁waiting ' hana ▁hamwe , ▁wa mu leme ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁wa mu leme ▁Chilisito ▁wake .’
▁Nomulambani ▁muje ▁ndiya , ▁mo i londa ▁muladi ▁muwe ▁wagima . ▁Kwa viya ▁hata ▁m vili ▁imwe ▁muna ▁ya matwi ▁yenu ▁haiza kwa ga .
▁Miliamu ▁ka we m bila , ▁“ M wi mbi leni ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁uchanyha ▁ng ' hani . ▁Kawa sa ▁muibahali ▁falasi ▁na ▁wakwela ▁falasi .”
▁na ▁nzewele ▁zawo ▁za ▁muna ▁u l wiza . ▁Wa ku tali ▁na ▁ugima ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁u ze ze ge zi ▁uli ▁mgati ▁yawo ▁na ▁u dala ▁wa ▁m yoyo ▁yawo .
▁“ Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁mwiza lava ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁walume ▁waidi ▁weli ▁na ▁mwaka ▁umwe ▁weli bule ▁chilema ▁na ▁chilo ▁mbili ▁za ▁usage ▁unogile ▁wouhanganyi gwe ▁na ▁mavuta , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁chilumb e ▁chimwe ▁uhelelo ▁umwe ▁na ▁chilumb e ▁chimwenga ▁uhelelo ▁umwenga . ▁Katenda ▁vilumb e ▁wawo ▁wa li ngile ▁fana ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kuna ▁imi helelo ▁ya ▁ngubiko ▁iyo , ▁viwa ▁chinhu ▁chimwe ▁na ▁ngubiko .
▁Mbali ▁ha bali ▁chi danganike ▁kwa ▁kutimbuligwa ▁na ▁moto ▁uja ▁mkulu ? ▁One ▁chiha hulika ▁kaidi ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wetu ▁chiza danganika .
▁Ku ja ▁kuichuwala ▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁wa longelela ▁kwa ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni ,
▁Ka mu la hila ▁Bulahimu ▁wa saho ▁yetu
▁Mbali ▁kukala ▁na ▁Wayahudi ▁wamwenga ▁kulawa ▁mkowa ▁wa ▁Asiya , ▁wawo ▁niiyo ▁ wolondeka ▁kuwa ▁haulongozi ▁wako ▁kulava ▁masita ka ▁yawo ▁one ▁wana ▁chochose ▁cha ▁kulonga ▁kuson hela ▁niye .
▁Kwa ndusil a ▁lusita ▁ulo , ▁haku na lawilila ▁mulotezi ▁imwenga ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Isilaili ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁Musa , ▁yoyalongile ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁chihanga ▁kwa ▁chihanga .
▁“ Niye ▁nyambenyambe , ▁yoni kala ▁hano ▁hamwe ▁na ▁mweye , ▁ni chuuzi leni ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuwandila ▁muladi ▁ni dahe ▁ku muwanda ▁muke ▁wangu ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁kabila ▁jangu .”
▁Ivo ▁m uiteganye ▁mutende ▁mbuli ▁zose ▁za ▁lagano ▁dino ▁muladi ▁mu temeligw e ▁mate ▁muna ▁zi sang ' hano ▁zenu ▁zose .
▁Wa londeni ▁nyambenyambe , ▁kwaviya ▁mweye ▁mukala ▁nyambenyambe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ya ▁Misili .
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa kalile ▁wema ▁haja ▁viwahulike ▁ivo , ▁walonga , ▁“ Tegeleza , ▁ko mu tanga ▁Eliya !”
▁Uno ▁uwo ▁ukalangama ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁baho ▁walangulizi ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁kulawa ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yelusalemu ▁viwa watumile ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁n ho se lo ▁na ▁Walawi ▁kuhita ▁kwa ▁Yohana , ▁kumuuza ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁kakala ▁yelihi .
▁ Sekemudumbe . ▁Niza weka ▁goya ▁mweye ▁na ▁wanenu .” ▁Ivo ▁kawa guma ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁kulonga ▁nawo ▁mbuli ▁zinogile .
▁Basi , ▁yahawa ▁niwa guma ▁usungu ▁kwa ▁usenga ▁wangu , ▁na bule ▁lugano ▁ha chanyha ▁yake ▁sambi . ▁Ni na ▁lugano ▁vini hulike ▁kuwa ▁usenga ▁uja ▁ugala ▁usungu ▁ mbali ▁ukala ▁ni ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁muhala .
▁“ Maabaho ▁kwiza we miza ▁Walawi ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁na ▁kwika ▁haulongozi ▁wangu ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁wawe ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kwi n u ligwa ▁uchanyha ▁kwa ▁chilaguso .
▁Viwa komeleze ▁kuja , ▁Yesu ▁kamuuza ▁Saimoni ▁Petili , ▁“ Saimoni ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yohana , ▁vino ▁kwo ni londa ▁niye ▁kufosa ▁wano ?” ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ona , ▁Mndewa ▁weye ▁kwo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁no ku londa .” ▁Yesu ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Wa lole se ▁wana ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wangu .”
▁Waisilaili ▁wose ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyawalagilize ▁Musa ▁na ▁Haluni .
▁kwaviya ▁weye ▁kuvimanya ▁vi hendo ▁vose ▁va ▁Wayahudi ▁na ▁kui hasanya ▁kwa wo . ▁Ivo ▁nokulamba ▁u nitegeleze ▁kwa ▁kuni funyila ▁umoyo .
▁“ One ▁walume ▁waha itowa ▁na ▁ku mu lumiza ▁mwanamke ▁yeli ▁na ▁wimo , ▁m baka ▁ka vu mbula ▁siku ▁siyo ▁zake , ▁munhu ▁ija ▁ya mulumize ▁keza liha ▁fana ▁vondaya londe ▁mulume ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁iyo ▁na ▁fana ▁wasemi ▁vondawa lamule .
▁Yesu ▁viyakalile ▁na ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁ka tenda ▁mauzauza ▁mengi , ▁mauzauza ▁yamwenga ▁haya ndikigwe ▁bule ▁muna ▁ichitabu ▁chino .
▁Maabaho ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Lelo ▁de heni ▁yamazi ▁na ▁mu mgalile ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁didugila .” ▁Wa sang ' hani ▁wa tenda ▁ivo ▁fana ▁viya walongele .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁chi londa ▁icho ▁chi hona ▁na ▁ku galuka ▁kaidi ▁kuwa ▁chi ze lu , ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza bwela ▁kwa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ,
▁Mbali ▁cheye ▁wenyewo ▁chiza sola ▁silaha ▁zetu ▁chihite ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zetu ▁Waisilaili , ▁cheye ▁chi zakuwa ▁kuulongozi ▁kuna ▁ing ' hondo ▁m baka ▁chiwa fi ki ze ▁hanhu ▁honda wa kale . ▁Chi p indi ▁icho ▁wanetu ▁weza kala ▁kuna ▁yamabululu ▁yeli ▁na ▁mhongono , ▁muladi ▁kui kaliza ▁na ▁wakaya ▁wa ▁isi ▁iyo .
▁M kalizi ▁imwe ▁ka mu homa ▁Yesu ▁na ▁m go ha ▁mu lu ba vu . ▁Bahobaho ▁ila wa ▁damu ▁na ▁mazi .
▁Kalonga , ▁‘ Siza wataza ,’ ▁m aabaho ▁niza wona ▁chondachi wa lawilile , ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁weli ▁na ▁ mizoyo ▁midala ▁na ▁ha waminika .
▁Baho ▁mwanduso , ▁Mulungu ▁ka lumba ▁ulanga ▁na ▁isi ▁yose ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁chili ▁umo ,
▁Na ▁lupango ▁lwa ▁kutimbuli la ▁nhambiko ▁hamwe ▁na ▁lwavu ▁lwa ▁shaba , ▁mibiki ▁yake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁ziga ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁jake ,
▁Mbali ▁mweye ▁mu fika ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lwa ▁Sayuni ▁na ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁yeli ▁mgima , ▁Yelusalemu ▁ya ▁kuulanga , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁hawa pete ka , ▁wowo iting ' hane ▁kwa ▁de ng ' ho .
▁M gati ▁ya ▁di go lole ▁kukala ▁na ▁chila ▁modeli ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wose ▁weli ▁na ▁magulu ▁mane , ▁na ▁wowo tambala ▁hasi ▁na ▁vi dege ▁va ▁kuulanga .
▁Viyakomeleze ▁kutosa , ▁kawa hiti la ▁wanahina ▁wake . ▁Ka wafika ▁wa gona ▁nhongo , ▁wakala ▁na ▁usungu .
▁Wa nahina ▁wake ▁vi wawonile ▁ivo , ▁wazanywa ▁ng ' hani , ▁wa i uza , ▁“ Vino , ▁ha bali ▁mtini ▁uno ▁u nyala ▁chi hi ma ▁hima ?”
▁Muna ▁zi mbuli ▁zose ▁niwa lagusa ▁kuwa ▁kwa ▁ku za mha ▁sang ' hano ▁zino ▁m olondeka ▁kuwataza ▁nyondenyonde ▁na ▁kuzi kumbuka ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁Yesu ▁viya ▁viyalongile ▁mweye wo , ▁‘ Vinoga ▁kulava ▁kufosa ▁kuhokela .’ ▁”
▁Kwa viya ▁mweye ▁ni ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁woya wa londile , ▁m olondeka ▁mu geze ▁kuwa ▁fana ▁yeye .
▁Mwene ▁kaye ▁keza kwima ▁na ▁ku hinda ▁lwivi , ▁na ▁mweye ▁mwiza kwima ▁kunze ▁na ▁ku hodiza ▁muha longa , ▁‘ Mwenevale , ▁chi vugulil e ▁ulwivi .’ ▁Mbali ▁yeye ▁keza wedika , ▁‘ Si mmanyile ni ▁mweye ▁wala ▁ko mulawa !’
▁Petili ▁kedika , ▁“ Chila ▁munhu ▁kolondeka ▁ya leke ▁uhasanyi ▁wake ▁na ▁ya batizigwe ▁kwa ▁zina ▁da ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito , ▁Mulungu ▁keza ▁ mulekelela ni ▁uhasanyi ▁wenu . ▁Na ▁mweye ▁mwiza hokela ▁Muhe ▁Yelile , ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁Mulungu .
▁Niza kwing ' ha ▁lu vugul o ▁lwa ▁ufalume ▁wa ▁kuulanga . ▁ J o jo se ▁do nda u funge ▁mwii ▁isi ▁dizakuwa ▁di fungigwa ▁kuulanga , ▁na ▁jojose ▁do nda u vugul e ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁kuulanga ▁diza vu guligwa .”
▁Maabaho ▁wahita ▁kwa ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁na ▁walala , ▁walonga , ▁“ Chi ilaha ▁kuwa ▁hachiza kuja ▁wala ▁hachiza kung ' wa ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁m baka ▁vondachi mkome ▁Paulo .
▁Mbali ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁iyo ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Sekemudumbe ! ▁Ni wagalila ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yondai wa de ng ' hele ze ▁wanhu ▁wose .
▁“ Vichi bwelile ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wako ▁ tati ▁yangu , ▁chi mulongela ▁mbuli ▁zako ▁mwenevale .
▁Kwa viya ▁cheye ▁ni ▁vi umbe ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁kwa ▁kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁Yesu ▁kachi lumba ▁chi sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁zinogile , ▁Mulungu ▁kachi sasalil a ▁cheye ▁chi zi tende .
▁Ka di g wila ▁nhulanyika ▁diya , ▁nhulanyika ▁diya ▁da ▁umwaka , ▁ijo ▁do tangigwa ▁Mwihi ▁hebu ▁Lufyende , ▁kadi funga ▁kwa ▁ nyolo lo ▁lusita ▁lwa ▁miyaka ▁alufu ▁imwe .
▁munhu ▁iyo ▁keza we gula ▁nyele ▁zake ▁na ▁ nde vu ▁zake . ▁Mbali ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁heli ▁na ▁uhele ▁heza ha we gula ▁bule , ▁m aabaho ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁keza mbagula ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kwa ▁siku ▁zimwenga ▁saba .
▁Hata ▁ivo , ▁no londeka ▁diyelo , ▁igolo ▁na ▁chi si ndo ▁nyam he ▁nzila ▁yangu , ▁kwaviya ▁hai londeka ▁mulotezi ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁yadanganike ▁kunze ▁ya ▁Yelusalemu !
▁Viya ▁vi mmanyile ▁vichi msang ' hanile ▁chila ▁imwe ▁wenu ▁fana ▁viya ▁tata ▁voyo msang ' hanila ▁mwanage ▁mwenyewo .
▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Vino ▁hata ▁mweye ▁iviya ▁mung ' hali ▁hamu vimanyile ▁bule .
▁“ Yeli hi ▁yeli ▁msang ' hani ▁mwaminika ▁mwene ▁nzewele , ▁mwenevale ▁wake ▁ya mwi ke ▁ha chanyha ▁ya ▁wamwenga , ▁ya weng ' he ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁lusita ▁lwake .
▁Andeleya , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁Saimoni ▁Petili ▁kakala ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wanhu ▁waidi ▁wowa hulike ▁chiya ▁chiyalongile ▁Yohana ▁na ▁ku muwinza ▁Yesu .
▁Mu ifunza ▁unovu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁ E p a fu lo ▁msang ' hani ▁miyetu ▁mulondwa , ▁yeli ▁msang ' hani ▁mwaminika ▁wa ▁ usang ' hano ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁kwa ▁chimu ▁chetu .
▁Maabaho ▁Petili ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ija ▁mwanahina ▁imwenga ▁wahita ▁kuna ▁dituka .
▁ Siku ▁zikwiza , ▁kwaminika ▁kwangu ▁kwiza woneka ▁funhu la fu nhu la ▁vonda wize ▁kulola ▁yombe ▁jangu . ▁One ▁yaha woneka ▁luti ▁yoyose ▁yeli bule ▁uzegenha ▁hebu ▁uzolizoli , ▁hebu ▁ng ' hondolo ▁yoyose ▁heli ▁na ▁u titu ▁muna ▁dibumbila ▁jangu , ▁iyo ▁keza kuwa ▁ka ba wi gwa .”
▁L wa nda ▁lo kulu ma ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁ E de ni ▁na ▁mazi ▁ya kulu mila ▁muna ▁ichi zi , ▁kulawa ▁uko ▁wii gola ▁ nya nda ▁nne .
▁Wa ha wi ▁kwa ▁uha wi ▁wawo ▁wa geza ▁kutenda ▁m atimbwisi ▁ya galuke ▁kuwa ▁u sa wa sa wa , ▁ mbali ▁wa potwa . ▁U sa wa sa wa ▁uwo ▁u w ava mba ▁wanhu ▁na ▁wanyama .
▁L usita ▁lu mwenga ▁mu gwiligwa ▁na ▁mutende ligwa ▁vihile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁wanhu , ▁miyanza ▁mingi ▁m wima ▁nawo ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa t e ndi ligwe ▁ivo .
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni ▁ka kwela ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Holi ▁kwa ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁uko ▁kadanganika ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁mwanduso ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁we ta no , ▁muna ▁umwaka ▁wa ▁m alongo ▁mane , ▁kwandusi la ▁Waisilaili ▁viwa lawile ▁Misili .
▁ Nolonda ▁wose ▁mu longe ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁ mbali ▁niha londile ▁ng ' hani ▁muwe ▁na ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ku lotela , ▁kwaviya ▁munhu ▁mwene ▁chitumetume ▁cha ▁ku lotela ▁ni ▁wa ▁mana ▁ng ' hani ▁kufosa ▁iyo ▁yolonga ▁kwa ▁ulonzi ▁wa ▁kwazanya , ▁ila ▁one ▁ka baho ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kuzi fambula ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zi yo longa ▁muladi ▁wahuwila ▁wa ta zigwe .
▁Maabaho ▁wa muwamb a ▁mu ▁msalaba ▁na ▁wa yi golela ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁kwa ▁kutowa ▁mhiya ▁ku lamula ▁yelihi ▁ya pate ▁chi lihi .
▁Yosefu ▁viyafikile ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁wam vula ▁ng ' hanzu ▁yake ▁ya ▁chi i ye ka ▁yoi yawale .
▁M weye ▁wenyewo ▁mwa ▁wa kalangama ▁vini walongele , ▁‘ Niye ▁sili ▁Chilisito , ▁ mbali ▁ni tumigwa ▁ni mu longole le .’
▁Wa nhu ▁wamwenga ▁wa londa ▁wang wile , ▁ mbali ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yoya golose ▁mkono ▁wake ▁kumgwila .
▁Wa ja ▁wanhu ▁wa nduse ▁kusang ' hana ▁saa ▁longo ▁na ▁imwe ▁vi wezile , ▁wa hokela ▁chila ▁munhu ▁yombe ▁da ▁siku ▁dimwe .
▁Muna ▁umwaka ▁we sita ▁niza i temela ▁mate ▁isi , ▁nayo ▁iza m patila ni ▁ndiya ▁za ▁kuwa faya ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁mitatu .
▁Ivo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁kezam sa gulila ni ▁mulotezi ▁ya li ngile ▁fana ▁niye ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁iwa ka ya ▁wayenu , ▁m olondeka ▁mu mtegeleze .
▁“ One ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁hebu ▁mwanang ' hondolo ▁hebu ▁m wanaluti ▁yaha vumbuka ▁keza kala ▁na ▁mami ▁yake ▁siku ▁saba . ▁Kwa ndusil a ▁siku ▁ye nane ▁na ▁kugendelela , ▁keza kuwa ▁ko faya ▁ku lavigwa ▁nhambiko ▁kwa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamulongela ▁Musa ,
▁ Walume ▁wose ▁weli ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁ya ▁Bulahimu , ▁wo welekigwe ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁na ▁wowa guligwe ▁kwa ▁hela , ▁wengi zigwa ▁ulungwana ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁Maabaho ▁Yesu ▁ka gendelela ▁na ▁mwanza ▁kuhita ▁Yelusalemu . ▁Viya kalile ▁nzila , ▁ka fose la ▁muna ya m abululu ▁na ▁mwii vi bulul u ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu .
▁One ▁ni londile ▁kuigoda , ▁sigambe ni we ▁mbozi , ▁kwaviya ▁nolonga ▁ukweli ▁muhala . ▁Mbali ▁no ye pula ▁kuigoda , ▁muladi ▁wanhu ▁sekewa ni pete ▁kuwa ▁mkulu ▁kufosa ▁viya ▁vini tenda , ▁hebu ▁kuni hulika ▁voni longa .
▁Basi ▁vini kalile ▁niku mbigwa ▁na ▁Muhe , ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁kani gala ▁kuna ▁ulugongo ▁lutali ▁ng ' hani . ▁Ka ni lagusa ▁Yelusalemu , ▁Bul ulu ▁ J e lile , ▁dodi hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁kwa ▁Mulungu .
▁Mbali ▁Yesu ▁kawalongela , ▁“ Di zi ▁ijo ▁hadi lawile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁changu , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu .
▁Balaamu ▁kamulongela ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga , ▁“ Ni tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁mana ▁si vimanyile ▁kuwa ▁kukala ▁kuni kimilila ▁muna ▁inzila . ▁Lelo ▁one ▁hu londa ▁niye ▁ni gendelele ▁na ▁mwanza ▁uno , ▁basi ▁niza bwele ga nya .”
▁ sole ni ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁va ▁mwanduso ▁kugobola ▁muna ▁iisi ▁iyo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mu vi gume ▁muna ▁ ichisege ▁na ▁kuvi gala ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁hondayahasagule ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ha we ▁uka zi ▁wake .
▁Habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁ku bela ▁vinhu ▁vino . ▁Ivo ▁m olondeka ▁mu nyama le ▁na ▁muleke ▁kutenda ▁chinhu ▁chochose ▁himahima .
▁Na ▁kwaviya i tunhize ▁na ▁kutenda ▁mbuli ▁za ▁magoda , ▁ mwing ' heni ▁magayo ▁na ▁usungu . ▁Kwa viya ▁kolonga ▁muumoyo ▁wake , ▁‘ Ni kala ▁hano , ▁niye ▁ni ▁nyang ' o ng we ▁wala ▁si wo ▁mgane , ▁siza pata ▁ma ny ulu ny ulu ▁ng ' o .’
▁Mbali ▁one ▁ubananzi ▁wetu ▁wo lagusa ▁Mulungu ▁kotenda ▁viilondeka , ▁lelo ▁chilonge ▁choni ? ▁Vino ▁Mulungu ▁kotenda ▁vihile ▁yaha chi tagusa ? ▁Ha no ▁nolonga ▁chiunhu
▁Wa segela ▁kulawa ▁kuna ▁mulima ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁wa genda ▁siku ▁nhatu . ▁Sa ndu ku ▁da ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁di walongolela ▁muladi ▁kuwa za hi lila ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁kuhumula .
▁Maabaho ▁Yosefu ▁kamuhagatila ▁Benjamini ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁na ▁kalila , ▁Benjamini ▁nayo ▁kalila ▁na ▁kuno ▁wa i ha gati la .
▁ng ' ombe ▁wenu ▁na ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wenu ▁na ▁hela ▁zenu ▁na ▁zahabu ▁zenu ▁na ▁vinhu ▁venu ▁vimwenga ▁vose ▁vonda v ongeze ke ,
▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam pekul a ▁kaidi ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁siku ▁yesaba . ▁One ▁ ihawa ▁ku linga na ▁na ▁ulo la ji ▁wake , ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁iha tamu ▁ha fi la ▁na ▁utamu ▁ha wene le , ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁kezam gong ' onda ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁kuwa ▁kela , ▁uwo ▁ni ▁uhele ▁muhala . ▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁keza fu wa ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁keza kuwa ▁ka safyigwa .
▁na ▁ O fi li ▁na ▁Ha vi la ▁na ▁Yo ba bu . ▁Wawo ▁wose ▁wakala ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Yo ki ta ni .
▁U zi a ▁kamwelek a ▁Yo s ha mu , ▁Yo s ha mu ▁kamwelek a ▁ A hazi , ▁ A hazi ▁kamwelek a ▁He ze ki ya .
▁Ivo ▁waja ▁Mafalisayo ▁na ▁wafundiza ▁wa ▁Malagilizo ▁wamuuza ▁Yesu , ▁“ Habali ▁wanahina ▁wako ▁hawa wi nza ▁mafundizo ▁yochi hokele ▁kwa ▁wa saho ▁zetu ? ▁ Habali ▁woja ▁ndiya ▁kwa ▁makono ▁haya sunh igwe ?”
▁Niye ▁hata ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁siku galile ▁mnyama ▁wako ▁yoyakomigwe ▁na ▁mnyama ▁wa ▁kumbago , ▁ mbali ▁ni liha ▁ubananzi ▁uwo ▁niye ▁mwenyewo . ▁W eye ▁kuni londa ▁ni lihe ▁ bila ▁ku gesa ▁fana ▁ka ba wi gwa ▁imisi ▁hebu ▁ichilo .
▁Kwiza pata ▁wimo , ▁na ▁kwiza kweleka ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁nayo ▁kwiza mtanga ▁Yesu .
▁Vino ▁mweye ▁mung ' hali ▁hamuna vimanya ▁bule ? ▁Vino ▁ham kumbuka ▁bule ▁viya ▁vini mo gole ▁magate ▁matano ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁magan a ▁m alongo ▁matano ? ▁Vino ▁mu memez a ▁vi gelo ▁vi ngahi ▁va ▁ masigavu ?
▁Niza mgala ni ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija ▁yoni ilahile ▁kuweng ' ha ▁Bulahimu ▁na ▁Isaka ▁na ▁Yakobo . ▁Niza mwing ' hani ▁mweye ▁iwe ▁yenu ‚ ▁niye ▁iyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu .’ ▁”
▁Ivo ▁ni wona ▁vinoga ▁kuwalongela ▁ndugu ▁wawo ▁wa ni longole le ▁kwiza ▁kumwenu ▁muladi ▁wa sasale ▁vinhu ▁viya ▁vi mwikile ▁chilagano ▁kulava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi . ▁Ivo ▁izakuwa ▁ ta ya li ▁na ▁iza lagusa ▁kuwa ▁mu vi lava ▁kwa ▁makono ▁maidi , ▁wala ▁si ▁kwa ▁u gila .
▁Y andika ▁kwa ▁m senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁wa ▁ bumbila ▁da ▁wahuwila ▁wa ▁Chilisito ▁wa ▁Si mi na . ▁“ U no ▁ni ▁uwo ▁usenga ▁wake ▁yeye ▁yeli ▁wa ▁mwanduso ▁na ▁wa ▁uhelelo , ▁yoya kalile ▁kadanganika ▁na ▁kawa ▁mgima ▁kaidi .”
▁ni muwona ▁Mndewa ▁kanilongela , ▁‘ Sambi ▁ segela ▁Yelusalemu ▁himahima ▁kwaviya ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁hano ▁haweza togola ▁ukalangama ▁wako ▁kuson hela ▁niye .’
▁Ni hita ▁uko ▁kwaviya ▁Mulungu ▁kani gubulila ▁ivo . ▁Uko ▁vini iting ' hane ▁na ▁walangulizi , ▁ni walongela ▁usenga ▁wa ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁yoni wapetele ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi . ▁Ni tenda ▁ivo ▁muladi ▁sang ' hano ▁yangu ▁yoni i sang ' hane ▁na ▁ija ▁yoni gendelela ▁kui sang ' hana , ▁sekei we ▁bule .
▁Yesu ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁mtawala ▁wa ▁Loma , ▁iyo ▁kamuuza , ▁“ W eye ▁iyo ▁Mfalume ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ?” ▁Yesu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ V o u longa ▁ivo ▁yili .”
▁Kwa viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁ko mwihila ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yo tenda ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zozi tibusa , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁keza wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁zisi ▁izo ▁haulongozi ▁wenu .
▁Mulungu ▁ya kwing ' he ▁mvula ▁kulawa ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁ya kwing ' he ▁ulongo ▁unogile ▁u lava ▁na fa ka ▁na ▁divai ▁nyingi .
▁na ▁mwiza mwing ' ha ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Eleazali . ▁Ng ' ombe ▁iyo ▁kezagal igwa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁lago ▁na ▁ku chinjigwa ▁haulongozi ▁hake .
▁L usita ▁lumwe ▁hamu kalile ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁mweye ▁muwa ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁lusita ▁lumwe ▁hamu manyile ▁ubazi ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ mbali ▁sambi ▁ muhokela ▁ubazi ▁wake .
▁“ One ▁munhu ▁yaha mtowa ▁muna ▁dizi so ▁mtumwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike ▁hebu ▁wa ▁chilume ▁na ▁kudi lava , ▁kolondeka ▁ya muleke ▁ya segele ▁kwa ▁ku ilegeha ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁ziso ▁jake .
▁Ka mu lagiliza ▁msang ' hani ▁ya longole , ▁“ Wa ha iting ' hana ▁na ▁se kulu ▁wangu ▁Esau , ▁yaha ku uza , ▁‘ W eye ▁kwa ▁msang ' hani ▁wa ▁yelihi ? ▁Ko hita hi ? ▁Wa nyama ▁kuulongozi ▁wako ▁wa ▁yelihi ?’
▁ mwing ' he ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁hela ▁ya ▁ukombola ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Waisilaili ▁ wongezeke ▁muna ▁i peta .”
▁Ivo ▁weka ▁goya ▁indiya ▁m baka ▁imitondo ▁fana ▁Musa ▁viya walongele , ▁nayo ▁hai wo lile ▁na ▁hai lavile ▁ma vu nyo ▁hebu ▁hai n ung ' hile ▁ vu ndo .
▁Niye ▁no mulole la ▁Mulungu ▁fana ▁wawo ▁viwo mulole la , ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wadanganike ▁weza zilibuka , ▁wehile ▁na ▁wanogile .
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ Hiteni ▁ku chibululu ▁chili ▁kuulongozi . ▁ Vondamwingile , ▁mwiza ▁ muwona ▁mwana ▁chihongwe ▁ka fungigwa , ▁yang ' hali ▁hana kwe ligwa ▁na ▁munhu . ▁M fungu leni ▁mu mgale ▁hano .
▁Kwa viya ▁Chilisito ▁heng ile ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁ng ' hani ▁ho ha zengigw e ▁na ▁makono ▁ya ▁wanhu , ▁hanhu ▁heli ▁simwe ▁da ▁chinhu ▁ch e n ye wo ▁chili ▁kuulanga . ▁Ke ngila ▁kuulanga ▁ kwe n ye wo , ▁uko ▁sambi ▁kema ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu ▁kochi gombela .
▁Yesu ▁ka lava ▁dizi ▁kulu , ▁m aabaho ▁kadanganika .
▁Mbali ▁one ▁mulumake ▁yaham nyama lila ▁siku ▁ija ▁viyahulike , ▁baho ▁keza kuwa ▁katogola ▁vi la ho ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁vi lagano ▁vake ▁vose , ▁mana ▁mulumake ▁viyahulike ▁ka nyama la .
▁Yesu ▁viya komeleze ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁izo ▁zose , ▁lung ' husesa ▁lwose ▁lwa ▁wanhu ▁lu kalile ▁baho ▁lwa zanywa ▁kwa ▁mafundizo ▁yake ,
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁ya ▁ching ' waji , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁lume ▁ijo ▁na ▁be belu ▁da ▁ng ' hondolo ▁ijo ▁na ▁wanang ' hondolo ▁wawo ▁kuilinga ▁na ▁ peta ▁ya ▁wanyama , ▁fana ▁voilagilizigw e .
▁Fan a ▁mweye ▁muli ▁wehi ▁mu vimanya ▁kuweng ' ha ▁wanenu ▁vinhu ▁vinogile , ▁vino ▁Tat i ▁yenu ▁yeli ▁kuulanga ▁heza weng ' ha ▁Muhe ▁Yelile ▁wanhu ▁waja ▁wowo n pula ?”
▁Mbali ▁Abimeleki ▁kamulongela , ▁“ Niye ▁si vimanyile ▁bule ▁yelihi ▁yoyatendile ▁vino . ▁Na ▁weye ▁hu nilongele ▁bule ▁mbuli ▁zino , ▁hebu ▁sina hulika ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁m baka ▁diyelo .”
▁Kawalongela , ▁“ M weye ▁wenyewo ▁mo vimanya ▁kuwa ▁Muyahudi ▁ka lemigwa ▁na ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁di ni ▁yake ▁kukala ▁na ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁siyo ▁Muyahudi ▁hebu ▁ku mu la ula . ▁Mbali ▁Mulungu ▁kani lagusa ▁sekeni m tange ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁ha safyigwe ▁hebu ▁ka mbula ▁mwiko .
▁Wa mtanga ▁Lutu ▁kunze ▁na ▁wamuuza , ▁“ Wa kulihi ▁walume ▁waja ▁ wezile ▁kumwako ? ▁Chi lavile ▁kunze ▁muladi ▁chiwa bandame .”
▁Kumbuk eni ▁kuwa ▁keza mwing ' hani ▁gweko ▁diya ▁do ya wekile ▁wanhu ▁wake . ▁Mo msang ' hanila ▁Chilisito ▁Mndewa ▁mwenyewo !
▁Iviya ▁mwiza lava ▁be belu ▁da ▁luti ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁uhasanyi , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁usage ▁na ▁nhosa ▁yake ▁ya ▁ching ' waji .
▁Kwa viya ▁ ihawa ▁mo vimanya ▁chidogo , ▁hamwande ▁mwiza igoda ▁fana ▁cheye ▁vondachi igode ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Mbali ▁Wayahudi ▁wa ▁Sesalonike ▁viwahulike ▁Paulo ▁ko peta ▁Mbuli ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁uko ▁Beleya ▁iviya , ▁wahita ▁uko ▁na ▁wa ndusa ▁kuwa kong ' hela ▁wanhu ▁na ▁ndwagi .
▁Leka mana ▁ni mtuma ▁Timoseyo ▁kumwenu , ▁yeli ▁mwanangu ▁mulondwa ▁mwaminika ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁na ▁keza mkumbus a ni ▁nzila ▁ini i nzile ▁niye ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito , ▁nzila ▁ija ▁ini fundiza ▁chila ▁hanhu ▁muna ▁ ga mabumbila ▁ ga ▁wanhu ▁womuhuwila ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamsola ▁mulume ▁iyo ▁na ▁ka mwika ▁muna ▁mgunda ▁wa ▁ E de ni ▁ya chi li me ▁na ▁ya chi lole se .
▁Ivo ▁yam heni ▁chigangamavu ▁yose ▁yoni mu lagilize ni , ▁sekemu tende ▁chihendo ▁chochose ▁cha ▁ku tibusa ▁chochi tendigwe ▁na ▁waja ▁wa mu longole leni ▁kukala ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija . ▁Seke mwa mbule ▁mwiko ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁izo . ▁Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu .”
▁Ya ku temele ▁mate ▁weye ▁na ▁welesi ▁wako ▁fana ▁viya ▁viya mtemele ▁mate ▁Bulahimu ▁muladi ▁u dahe ▁ku hazi ▁isi ▁ino ▁you kala ▁fana ▁nyambenyambe , ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Bulahimu !”
▁Ivo ▁no wa tuma ▁ndugu ▁wano , ▁muladi ▁kuigoda ▁kwetu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁sekekuw e ▁si ▁chinhu . ▁Mbali ▁fana ▁voni longile , ▁m olondeka ▁mu isasale ▁ku taza .
▁Haluni ▁kamulongela ▁Musa , ▁“ Lola , ▁diyelo ▁wa lava ▁nhambiko ▁yawo ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁na ▁nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁hata ▁ivo ▁mbuli ▁zino ▁zi ni pata ! ▁Vino ▁diyelo ▁one ▁ni dile ▁nhambiko ▁ija ▁ya ▁uhasanyi ▁iha togoligwe ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ?”
▁“ Mbali ▁siku ▁iyo ▁niza i bagula ▁isi ▁ya ▁Gosheni ▁i wo kala ▁wanhu ▁wangu , ▁muladi ▁ng ' honzi ▁sekewawe ▁uko . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁kwiza vimanya ▁kuwa ▁niye ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ino .
▁Wa watanga ▁wayawo ▁wowa kalile ▁muna ▁ingalawa ▁imwenga ▁weze ▁kuwataza . ▁Weza ▁na ▁wazi memez a ▁ngalawa ▁zose ▁mbili ▁somba , ▁m baka ▁za ndusa ▁ku za ma .
▁Nomulongelani ▁kweli ▁muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁N ha g u so ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa wonela ▁ubazi ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Tilo ▁na ▁Sidoni ▁kufosa ▁mweye .
▁Sekemu m zimize ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁hebu ▁sekemu tambikile ▁milungu ▁imwenga ▁na ▁kui sang ' hanila . ▁One ▁muha tenda ▁ivo , ▁no mu lamula ni ▁diyelo ▁kuwa ▁mwiza na ng igwa .
▁Mbali ▁Laheli ▁hamwe lekele ▁Yakobo ▁wana ▁wowose , ▁na ▁ivo ▁ka muwonela ▁migongo ▁mwa li ▁wake ▁na ▁kamulongela ▁Yakobo , ▁“ Ni ng ' he ▁wana , ▁bule ivo ▁niza danganika .”
▁‘ Ni galile ▁mnyama ▁na ▁u nya mbi kile ▁ndiya ▁inogile . ▁Na ha komeleza ▁kuja ▁nizakutemel a ▁mate ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ning ' hali ▁sina danganika .’ ▁”
▁“ Maabaho ▁kwiza gala ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁lume ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁hema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza kwika ▁makono ▁yawo ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ditwi ▁da ▁dang ' ang ' a ▁da ▁ng ' ombe ▁ijo .
▁Lelo ▁sekeu wone ▁chinyala ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁za ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁hebu ▁kulonga ▁mbuli ▁zangu ▁niye ▁ni li ▁m fungigwa ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kupeta ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Chilisito . ▁Mbali ▁i l umbe ▁na ▁niye ▁ku funyila ▁umoyo ▁yehile ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile , ▁u sondelele l ▁iviya ▁kwa ▁ludabwa ▁lu wing ' higwe ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Sekemu tende ▁uhasanyi ▁kwa ▁nyang ' hiti ▁yoyose ▁ya ▁ku songola ▁hebu ▁ili ngile ▁vovose , ▁simwe ▁da ▁chilume ▁hebu ▁da ▁chike ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kezawa uza ▁wanhu ▁wake , ▁‘ Ya kulihi ▁milungu ▁yenu , ▁mi lu we ▁yomu i kimbilile ▁kwa ▁kukala ▁goya ?’
▁Na ▁chila ▁Mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ▁ko kwima ▁chila ▁zuwa ▁ko lava ▁nhambiko , ▁na ▁ko lava ▁nhosa ▁za ▁wanyama ▁ziya ▁ziya ▁miyanza ▁mingi , ▁ziya ▁hazi daha ▁ng ' o ▁ku segeza ▁uhasanyi .
▁Yuda ▁kamulongela ▁Tamali ▁im ko yi ▁wake ▁wa ▁chike , ▁“ Bwel a ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yako ▁u kale ▁u gane ▁m baka ▁mwana g u ▁Shela ▁vondaya ku le .” ▁Yuda ▁kadumba ▁Shela ▁sekeya danganike ▁fana ▁viya ▁ndugu ▁zake . ▁Ivo ▁Tamali ▁kabwela ▁ukaye ▁kwa ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Ni we ▁na ▁mbuli ▁yako ▁ mbali ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino ▁wa wehila , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁siyo ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino , ▁fana ▁Niye ▁vi sili ▁munhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁ino .
▁Haluni ▁na ▁wanage ▁weza v a la ▁ka p u tula ▁izo ▁chila ▁vonda wengile ▁muna ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu ▁hebu ▁vondawa we ▁habehi ▁na ▁ulupango ▁na ▁kutenda ▁sang ' hano ▁za ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁hana ▁iha nhu ▁helile . ▁Kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁haweza lagusa ▁mwa zi ▁wawo ▁na ▁kukomigwa . ▁Iyo ▁izakuwa ▁ndagilizi ▁ya ▁siku ▁zose ▁kwa ▁Haluni ▁na ▁welesi ▁wake .
▁“ Hiteni ▁mke me ▁muna ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu , ▁muka walongele ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁mbuli ▁ya ▁ugima ▁uno ▁wa ▁sambi .”
▁Ivo ▁ka gendelela ▁kuwapetela ▁wanhu ▁muna ▁zikaye ▁za ▁kutosela ▁za ▁isi ▁ya ▁Yudeya .
▁Yesu ▁kema ▁na ▁kawatanga , ▁kawauza , ▁“ M o londa ▁ni mtendele ni ▁choni ?”
▁Ka lola ▁na ▁ka wona ▁ chisima ▁mwii chuwala ▁na ▁mumgwazo ▁yake ▁mabumbila ▁matatu ▁ya ▁ng ' hondolo ▁wa gona . ▁Ng ' hondolo ▁wakala ▁wo ng ' wi zigwa ▁muna ▁i chisima ▁icho ▁chochi gubikigwe ▁na ▁dibwe ▁kulu .
▁“ I viya ▁na ▁mhanda ▁za ▁luwa ▁ku zunguluka ▁ banzi ▁zose ▁za ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁na ▁vi kalilo ▁na ▁vi g ingi ▁na ▁nzabi ▁zake ▁hamwe ▁na ▁vinhu ▁vake ▁vose ▁na ▁vi a ▁vake ▁vimwenga ▁vose . ▁Kwiza wa p a ngila ▁kwa ▁kusondelela ▁mazina ▁yawo ▁vinhu ▁vo wolondeka ▁kupapa .
▁niye ▁mwenyewo ▁niza mu hindukila ▁munhu ▁iyo ▁na ▁kumtagusa ▁yeye ▁na ▁lukolo ▁lwake ▁lose . ▁Niza wa bagula ▁mwa ▁wanhu ▁wawo , ▁yeye ▁mwenyewo ▁na ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁muna ▁ikaye ▁yake ▁wa linga ▁fana ▁wagoni ▁kwa ▁kumtambikila ▁m ulungu ▁Moleki .
▁Wa m vula ▁viwalo ▁vake ▁na ▁wa mu yawaza ▁chiwalo ▁chi dung ' hu .
▁Kulaw a ▁kumwake ▁kaye ▁zose ▁zili ▁kuulanga ▁na ▁zili ▁mwiisi ▁zo hokela ▁zina ▁jake ▁kweli .
▁ Kuson gela ▁mwanduso ▁Mbuli ▁kakala ▁na ▁Mulungu .
▁Yuda ▁Isikaliyoti , ▁imwe ▁wa ▁wanahina ▁wake , ▁ija ▁yonda yambiduke ▁Yesu ▁ka uza ,
▁Maabaho ▁Mwihi ▁kamsola ▁Yesu ▁m baka ▁kuna ▁dibululu ▁da ▁Yelusalemu , ▁ka mwika ▁kui chisuwili ▁cha ▁I kaye ▁ya ▁Mulungu . ▁Kamulongela , ▁“ One ▁weye ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁ ib wa n he ▁hasi .
▁I ja ▁im kalizi ▁wa ▁chifungo ▁kamulongela ▁Paulo , ▁“ Wa kulu ▁wa ▁Loma ▁wa lagiliza ▁weye ▁na ▁Sila ▁muleke li ligwe . ▁Lelo ▁modaha ▁kusegela , ▁ hite ni ▁kwa ▁tindiwalo .”
▁Kulaw a ▁saa ▁sita ▁m baka ▁saa ▁kenda , ▁isi ▁yose ▁i gubikigwa ▁na ▁ziza .
▁na ▁sekewa wa ba wile ▁wenevale ▁wawo . ▁Mbali ▁wa i laguse ▁kuwa ▁wodaha ▁kuwa ▁wanoga ▁na ▁wo k waminika ▁muladi ▁wa ya ha m b e ▁mafundizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁Mulopozi ▁wetu ▁kwa ▁chila ▁chi usang ' hana .
▁Wa segela ▁kwaviya ▁isi ▁yo wakalile ▁wokala ▁Esau ▁na ▁Yakobo ▁i kala ▁hai wa fa i ye ▁bule . ▁Wakala ▁na ▁mifu go ▁mingi ▁na ▁wa potwa ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁muna ▁iisi ▁ija .
▁“ Muna ▁isi ku ▁ya ▁longo ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁saba ▁mwiza kuwa ▁na ▁m ting ' hano ▁wa ▁kutosa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu , ▁sekemuje ▁hebu ▁sekemu sang ' hane ▁sang ' hano ▁yoyose .
▁ mulongeleni ▁Yosefu ▁vino , ▁‘ Nolamba ▁u walekelele ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁wihi ▁wawo ▁na ▁uhasanyi ▁wawo , ▁kwaviya ▁wa ku tendela ▁yehile .’ ▁Lelo ▁cho ku lamba ▁uchilekele le ▁wihi , ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁ tati ▁yako .” ▁Yosefu ▁viya uhokele ▁usenga ▁uwo ▁kalila .
▁Na ▁wana ▁wa ▁Lawi ▁nawo , ▁waja ▁wowo kwing ' higwa ▁ukulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko , ▁wana ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁yoya mwing ' hile ▁Musa ▁kusola ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁longo ▁ha ▁vinhu ▁kulawa ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Isilaeli , ▁ya ni , ▁ndugu ▁zawo , ▁ ihawa ▁wa lawa ▁muna ▁u welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu .
▁Leka ▁chi gese ▁nzila ▁za ▁kui guma ▁moyo ▁kwa ▁ku lagusa ▁ulondo ▁na ▁kusang ' hana ▁yanogile .
▁ Vonda ni wa tume ▁Ali t ema ▁hebu ▁T u ki ko ▁kumwako , ▁iyo he ▁kwiza ▁Ni ko p o li , ▁kwaviya ▁ni lamula ▁kukala ▁uko ▁chip indi ▁cha ▁chihuhwe .
▁M senga ▁wa ▁kuulanga ▁we ▁sita ▁ka itowa ▁mhalati ▁yake . ▁Ni hulika ▁dizi ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁zi mhembe ▁nne ▁za ▁chilingo ▁cha ▁zahabu ▁chi kalile ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Maabaho ▁vidi fikile ▁siku ▁da ▁na ne , ▁weza ▁kumwing iza ▁ulungwana ▁imwana . ▁Wa londa ▁ku mtanga ▁Zakaliya , ▁zina ▁da ▁ tati ▁yake .
▁Nhambiko ▁ya ▁kutimbula ▁ino ▁iza lavigwa ▁chila ▁siku , ▁ija ▁i lagilizigwe ▁uko ▁kuna ▁umulima ▁wa ▁Sinai ▁iwe ▁mn ung ' ho ▁unogile ▁wa ▁ku nogeza , ▁nhambiko ▁iyo laviligw a ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁moto .
▁Lelo ▁chitende ▁dugila ▁da ▁Pasaka , ▁siyo ▁kwa ▁lusu ▁diya ▁da ▁umwaka ▁na ▁lusu ▁da ▁wihi ▁na ▁uhasanyi , ▁ mbali ▁kwa ▁gate ▁hadi gumigw e ▁lusu ▁na ▁gate ▁da ▁ku safya ▁na ▁ukweli .
▁Kwa viya ▁weye ▁ku yamha ▁mbuli ▁yangu ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ufunya ▁umoyo ▁ng ' hani , ▁niye ▁nizaku kaliza ▁vinogile ▁lusita ▁luja ▁lwa ▁magayo ▁yoyo kwiza ▁muna ▁isi ▁yose ▁kuwa geza ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁wowo kala ▁muna ▁isi .
▁Mbali ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁waha togola ▁kukala ▁na ▁cheye ▁na ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa mwe , ▁kwa ▁chilagano ▁chino ▁cha ▁kumwing iza ▁ulungwana ▁chila ▁mulume ▁vichili , ▁fana ▁viya ▁wawo ▁vi weng izigwe ▁ulungwana .
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁ka hulumuka ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁diwingu ▁na ▁kulonga ▁nayo . ▁Ka sola ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁muhe ▁uli ▁uchanyha ▁yake ▁na ▁kau guma ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁walangulizi ▁waja ▁m alongo ▁saba . ▁Muhe ▁uwo ▁viu wa hulu mu kile , ▁wa ndusa ▁kulonga ▁fana ▁walotezi . ▁Mbali ▁wa tenda ▁ivo ▁mwanza ▁umwe ▁muhala .
▁Maabaho ▁Musa ▁kawalongela ▁wanhu , ▁“ Mu isasale ▁kwa ▁chi si ndo , ▁mulume ▁yoyose ▁sekeya mbandame ▁muke ▁wake .”
▁Viya fikile ▁kau sola ▁mkwiji ▁wa ▁Paulo ▁na ▁kai zi nga ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁na ▁muna ▁ yamagulu ▁na ▁kalonga , ▁“ Mu he ▁Yelile ▁kolonga , ▁Wayahudi ▁kuja ▁Yelusalemu ▁weza mfunga ▁fana ▁vino ▁munhu ▁yeli ▁na ▁mkwiji ▁uno , ▁na ▁ku mguma ▁muna ▁yamakono ▁ya ▁wanhu ▁weli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi .”
▁Amalabaho , ▁no mulonde la ni ▁muwe ▁wa gangamavu ▁muna ▁u kuilumba ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁kwa ▁kutazigwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁zake .
▁ mbali ▁Paulo ▁ha gesile ▁kuwa ▁vinoga ▁kumsola ▁Yohana , ▁kwaviya ▁halondile ▁kukala ▁nawo ▁m baka ▁uhelelo ▁wa ▁sang ' hano ▁yawo , ▁ mbali ▁Yohana ▁kabwela ▁na ▁kawaleka ▁Pa m fi li ya .
▁ka mpula , ▁“ Mndele ▁wangu ▁ni ▁mtamu ▁ng ' hani . ▁ Nokulamba ▁ wize ▁uka mwikile ▁makono ▁ya pate ▁ku hona .”
▁Ino ▁iyo ▁sang ' hano ▁ya ▁Wa g elishoni ▁hana ▁dihema ▁da ▁Mulungu . ▁Weza sang ' hana ▁kwa ▁kulanguliz igwa ▁na ▁Isamali ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mkulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁Haluni .
▁Muna ▁Isi ku ▁ya ▁Mhumulo ▁chila wa ▁kunze ▁ya ▁dibululu ▁na ▁chi hita ▁kuna ▁ulwanda , ▁hanhu ▁haja ▁chi gesa ▁hana ▁hanhu ▁ha ▁Wayahudi ▁ku iting ' hana ▁hamwe ▁kutosa . ▁Chi kala ▁hasi ▁na ▁chi longa ▁na ▁wanaake ▁wowa iting ' hane ▁haja .
▁“ Ino ▁iyo ▁damu ▁yangu ▁ya ▁lagano , ▁yoi kwitika ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wengi ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁kulekelela ▁uhasanyi .
▁Mulungu ▁mwenyewo ▁yoya chi sasalil e ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁chinhu ▁chino , ▁na ▁ka ching ' ha ▁Muhe ▁wake ▁fana ▁chilagano ▁cha ▁yose ▁yaja ▁yoya chi kile .
▁Ugima ▁wenu ▁wizakuwa ▁wa ▁kudumba , ▁mwiza dumba ▁imisi ▁na ▁ichilo ▁na ▁hamwiza kuwa ▁na ▁kuhuwila ▁ugima ▁wenu .
▁Kulaw a ▁kabila ▁da ▁Zabuloni , ▁kakala ▁Gadi eli ▁mwana ▁wa ▁So di .
▁na ▁wa muwona ▁Mulungu ▁wa ▁Isilaili . ▁Ha si ▁ya ▁migulu ▁yake ▁hakala ▁na ▁chinhu ▁chili ngile ▁fana ▁ sa ka fu ▁ya ▁mabwe ▁ya ▁ya ku ti ▁ya ▁ langi ▁ya ▁buluu ▁fana ▁ulanga .
▁Y eye ▁ka lavigwa ▁muladi ▁yakomigwe ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁cha ▁uhasanyi ▁wetu , ▁m aabaho ▁kazilibuka ▁muladi ▁ya dahe ▁kuchi tenda ▁chino ge ▁haulongozi ▁ha ▁Mulungu .
▁Wa ndele ▁wa ▁Selofehadi ▁wa tenda ▁fana ▁viya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁viyamulagilize ▁Musa .
▁Nowalongela ▁kweli , ▁lusita ▁lo kwiza , ▁na ▁sambi ▁lufika ▁wanhu ▁wowadanganike ▁vondawa hulike ▁dizi ▁da ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Mulungu , ▁na ▁waja ▁wose ▁wondawa di hulike ▁weza kuwa ▁wagima .
▁“ ▁‘ Siku ▁zose ▁isi ▁sekei chuuzigwe , ▁kwaviya ▁isi ▁ni ▁yangu . ▁M weye ▁ni ▁nyambenyambe ▁na ▁wa fosa nzila ▁muna ▁iisi ▁yangu .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁yo ilumba ▁na ▁Chilisito ▁ha gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁bule , ▁ mbali ▁yo gendelela ▁kutenda ▁uhasanyi ▁ha muwonile ▁bule ▁hebu ▁ha mmanyile .
▁“ Wa isi la eli ▁wayangu , ▁welesi ▁wa ▁Bulahimu , ▁na ▁mweye ▁wanhu ▁wose ▁muli ▁siyo ▁Wayahudi ▁womu mtosela ▁Mulungu , ▁mbuli ▁ino ▁ya ▁ulopozi ▁i galigw a ▁kumwetu .
▁Muna ▁umwanza ▁wake ▁ka londeka ▁ya fose le ▁Samaliya .
▁Maabaho ▁ka ndusa ▁kuwatowa ▁wa sang ' hani ▁wayage ▁na ▁kuja ▁na ▁kung ' wa ▁hamwe ▁na ▁wa le vi .
▁Maabaho ▁kwiza di bagula ▁dizi ga ▁na ▁ kalilo ▁jake ▁na ▁kuvi haka ▁mavuta ▁fana ▁ivo ▁ivo .
▁M olondeka ▁muvimanye ▁kuwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁weza lamula ▁nhaguso ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose . ▁One ▁mwiza lamula ▁nhaguso ▁ilihi ▁kwa ▁wanhu ▁wa ▁isi ▁yose , ▁m aabaho ▁m olondeka ▁mu dahe ▁ku lamula ▁nhaguso ▁ilihi ▁kwa ▁mbuli ▁ndodo .
▁Kwa viya ▁Mulungu ▁yoyalongile , ▁“ B ung ' hulo ▁di mwemwese ▁kulawa ▁muna ▁diziza ,” ▁ka tenda ▁bu ng ' hulo ▁jake ▁uchanyha ▁ya ▁ mizoyo ▁yetu ▁muladi ▁chi dahe ▁ku manya ▁utunhizo ▁wa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁kumulola ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Chila ▁munhu ▁wam tu lila ▁nyang ' hiti ▁zose ▁za ▁milungu ▁ya ▁chi ge ni ▁zo wakalile ▁na zo , ▁hamwe ▁na ▁ hele ni ▁zo wakalile ▁wo zi v a la ▁m ma gutwi . ▁Yakobo ▁ka zi hi m bila ▁hasi ▁ya ▁mbiki ▁wa ▁muwa lo ni ▁u kalile ▁habehi ▁na ▁Shekemu .
▁kwaviya ▁ya mbula ▁mwiko , ▁na ▁one ▁munhu ▁yoyose ▁yaha ja ▁nyama ▁iyo , ▁nhambiko ▁iyo ▁siza i togola ▁bule .
▁“ ▁‘ Niye ▁niiyo ▁Mulungu , ▁ habule ▁imwenga ▁ya li ngile ▁niye . ▁No koma ▁na ▁no lava ▁ugima , ▁no lumiza ▁na ▁ kuhonya , ▁na ▁ habule ▁munhu ▁yo daha ▁kulema ▁choni tenda .
▁Wa ja ▁Mulungu ▁yawe hile ▁kwa ▁miyaka ▁m alongo ▁mane ▁ni ▁wanhu ▁welihi ? ▁Wa ja ▁wanhu ▁wowa kalile ▁wo tenda ▁uhasanyi , ▁waja ▁wa fi le ▁muna ▁dibwilingu
▁Musa ▁k andika ▁malagilizo ▁ya ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁kaweng ' ha ▁wakulu ▁wa ▁nhambiko ▁weli ▁wana ▁wa ▁Lawi , ▁wowa papile ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁da ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu . ▁Iviya ▁kaweng ' ha ▁walala ▁wose ▁wa ▁Isilaili .
▁Cho mulonde la ni ▁unovu ▁na ▁tindiwalo ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁Tat i ▁yetu ▁na ▁Mndewa ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Chilisito .
▁Niye ▁niwa gong ' onde la ▁Mbuli ▁Inogile ▁ya ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁si lo londile ▁hela , ▁ni nyendanyenda ▁muladi ▁ni pate ▁ku wenu la ▁mweye . ▁Vino ▁kwa ▁kutenda ▁ivo ▁ni hasanya ?
▁Yuda ▁kalonga , ▁“ Leka ▁ya vi sole ▁vinhu ▁ivo . ▁Seke ya chi tende ze ▁wanhu ▁wachi ze he . ▁W eye ▁mwenyewo ▁kuwona ▁ni mgalila ▁mwana ▁luti ▁ mbali ▁weye ▁hu m fikile ▁bule .”
▁Fan a ▁viya ▁manhesa ▁ya ▁Chilisito ▁yo iyoha ▁kumwetu , ▁ni ivo ▁yili ▁ku taza ▁goya ▁kwetu ▁ko iyoha ▁kwa ▁Chilisito .
▁Lung ilo ▁dino , ▁Mulungu ▁vondaya di fi ki ze ▁lusita ▁vondau fike ▁na ▁kuvi ku nza nya ▁hamwe ▁vinhu ▁vose ▁na ▁chila ▁chinhu ▁muna ▁isi ▁na ▁kuulanga , ▁muna ▁u tawala ▁wa ▁Chilisito .
▁Iviya , ▁vondamu wone ▁yose ▁yayo ▁yo lawilila , ▁m vimanye ▁Mwana ▁wa ▁Munhu ▁ka mmabehi ▁ng ' hani ▁kwiza .
▁“ Kwa ▁ulondo ▁wako ▁wa ▁kufunya ▁umoyo , ▁kuwa longoza ▁wanhu ▁wou wakombole , ▁kwa ▁udahi ▁wako ▁mkulu ▁kuwa longoza ▁m baka ▁hanhu ▁helile ▁hou kala .
▁Abimeleki ▁kamuuza ▁Bulahimu , ▁“ Habali ▁kusang ' hana ▁ivo ?”
▁Mbali ▁walala ▁wa mdumba ▁Mulungu ▁na ▁ha watendile ▁fana ▁viyawalagilize ▁mfalume ▁wa ▁Misili ‚ ▁wa waleka ▁wana ▁wa ▁chilume ▁wakale .
▁Kwa viya ▁Yamaandiko ▁Yelile ▁yolonga , ▁“ Niza u bananga ▁ubala ▁wa ▁wabala ▁na ▁umanyi ▁wawo ▁nizawa sa ▁kutali .”
▁Bezaleli ▁ka tenda ▁sanduku ▁da ▁lagano ▁kwa ▁mibiki ▁ya ▁mkenge , ▁utali ▁wake ▁ukala ▁sent imita ▁gana ▁na ▁longo , ▁ugala mu ▁wake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁chimo ▁chake ▁sent imita ▁m alongo ▁sita ▁na ▁sita .
▁“ Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu ▁viya komeleze ▁kuwawinga ▁wanhu ▁wawo ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu , ▁sekemu longe ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu , ▁‘ Kwa viya ▁chinoga ▁haulongozi ▁wa ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kachi gala ▁chi i sole ▁isi ▁ino .’ ▁Si ivo ▁bule , ▁ko wawinga ▁wanhu ▁wano ▁kuulongozi ▁wenu , ▁kwaviya ▁wawo ▁wa bananzi .
▁Kwa viya ▁mo hokela ▁ulopozi ▁wa ▁ mihe ▁yenu , ▁ni i jo ▁lungilo ▁da ▁uhuwilo ▁wenu .
▁ Muiteganye ▁m agesa ▁yehile ▁sekeya mwing ileni ▁muna ▁ imizoyo ▁yenu ▁na ▁kulonga , ▁‘ M wa ka ▁wa ▁saba , ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁ku walekela ▁wochi wa da i , ▁wa habehi .’ ▁One ▁muha m gesa ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁ngayengaye ▁kwa ▁uka li ▁na ▁kulema ▁kumwing ' ha ▁chochose , ▁yeye ▁kodaha ▁ku mulilila ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kwa ▁ ichimu ▁chenu ▁na ▁ivo ▁yo kuwa ▁uhasanyi ▁kumwenu .
▁Na yo ▁ka ibasula ▁mwana ▁wa ▁chilume , ▁ka sa sa ligwa ▁ku languliza ▁zisi ▁zose ▁kwa ▁mhome ▁ya ▁zuma . ▁Na ▁mwana ▁iyo ▁keza ga ndu ligwa ▁na ▁kugal igwa ▁kwa ▁Mulungu ▁kuna ▁ichi goda ▁chake ▁cha ▁chifalume .
▁Munhu ▁iyo ▁kedika , ▁“ Niza daha ze ▁kuyamanya ▁one ▁munhu ▁ hani fa mbuli le ▁bule ?” ▁Kamulongela ▁Filipo ▁ya kwele ▁mchan ya ▁na ▁kukala ▁hamwe ▁nayo .
▁“ B a la a mu ▁kamulongela ▁Balaki , ▁‘ Lelo ▁niza !’ ▁Mbali ▁nodaha ▁kulonga ▁chochose ? ▁Mbuli ▁yondaya nilongele ▁Mulungu ▁niiyo ▁yonda ni i longe .”
▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu ▁kamwidika , ▁“ Ni walekelela ▁fana ▁viu pulile .
▁“ Vondamu kale ▁muna ▁yamabululu ▁yo mwing ' hani ▁Mndewa ▁Mulungu , ▁Mulungu ▁wenu , ▁modaha ▁kuhulika
